Damn it, there's no use comparing. Lonemoon felt as if he was a bastard to the Heavens — Yi Qing was definitely the true son.
MD，心好累，想辞职！

Pui!
——第一届暨最后一届万妖大会，落幕！
—The curtain closed on the first and last Myriad Demon Congregation!
“MD，老子切了你！”他直接拔出剑就冲了上去。
"Damn it, I will slaughter you!" He drew his sword and charged toward the radish.
“……”MD，要不是厨子闭关，她才不管这只矫情鬼！
"..." Damnit, if not for the fact that Chef was about to go into seclusion, she would not have bothered with this spoiled brat!
Son of a b*tch!
“……”不是你让问的吗？
"..." Weren't you the one who made me ask?
“……”不知道，你来当什么护卫！掌事嘴角一抽，又不好得罪一个金丹道君，“那……两人一共三块下品灵石，怎么样？”

"…" Don't know, then what kind of guard did you intend to be! The steward twitched his mouth, but he could not offend a Golden Core Dao Lord. "Then… two of you will share three pieces of low-grade spirit stones, how about that?"
“……”也没说要找毛团啊，她口味还没这么重。
"..." I didn't say I want to partner Furball. She didn't have that strange a taste.
"..." What ball?
“……”什么都没有啊喂？
"..." There is nothing there?
“……”什么鬼，“那鱼呢？”
“……”What the Heck，“Then, where is the fish now？”
"..." What the hell?
“……”从天而降，是这个世界惯用的出场方式吗？还好……菜已经吃完了。
"…" Are things always introduced by dropping from the sky in this world? Thank goodness… I finished eating the dishes.
“……”他上次就顺口一说，你还真是不客气啊，拖家带口就来了。
"..." He only mentioned it casually the previous time, but yet he really took him seriously and brought his entire family over.
“……”他原本俊俏的仙容上，突出拳头大小一块红肿，在他一身白衣的映衬下，显得特别闪亮。
"..." His once perfect face was now swollen where Shen Ying had punched him. His shimmering robe was now shining more brightly.
“……”他能说不吗？
“……”Can he even say no？
“……”他说啥了？
"..." What did I say?
“……”他转头看了看黑衣的猫，蓝衣的羿清，青衣的沈萤。他居然无法反驳。
"..." He glanced at everyone standing around him. The cat was in black, Yi Qing was in blue and Shen Ying was in green. He couldn't think of a comeback.
“……”众人面面相觑了会，才小心翼翼的问，“掌门，您……忘了？”
"..." Everyone exchanged glances. One of them asked warily, "Sect Master, don't you... remember?"
“……”众人齐齐沉默了。
"..." The crowd fell silent.
“……”你TM就只记得烤鸡吗？
"…" Are roasted chickens the only f**king thing you can remember?
“……”你丫啥时候给我说过了？老子神TM会知道啊喂？
"…”Dude, since when did you ever mention that to me？How was I suppose to freaking know about it?
“……”你们师徒是来讨债的吗？TM就不能给我留一点，“连人名都记不住，怎么这种事你就记得这么清楚，给给给，全还给你，满意了吧？”

"…" Are you two master-disciple pair out to collect debts? Can't you bloody leave some for me? "You can't even remember the names of people, how come you can remember this kind of thing so well. Here, take, take, take, I give them all back to you, are you satisfied?"
“……”你已经揍了！
"..." You already hit me!
“……”公放什么鬼？
"..." What the hell was public mode?
“……”到是听人把话说完啊喂，仙魂只好看向旁边的孤月，“这位有缘人，你……”
"…" Hey, you should listen to what someone is saying first. The immortal soul could only look over to Lonemoon and try again. "Since we have affinity, you…"
“……”卧槽，你到底对这只兔子做了什么啊喂！“算了，我不管了，你们爱咋咋滴。”
"…" Holy shit! What exactly did you do to this rabbit? "Forget it, I give up. You can all do what you like."
“……”卧槽，该情还是个爱情故事，他说为啥它怀里那个死婴是人形，原来生母是人。
"…" Holy shit, there was a love story behind all this! Lonemoon had been wondering why the dead baby in the fox demon's arms had a human form — it was because its mother was actually a human.
“……”卧槽，还真是啊喂。
"..." Holy shit, this is for real.
“……”厨子原本是个这么有职业操守的人吗？
"..." Was Chef always so professional?
“……”叫妖王来修房子！
"…" Asked a Demon Monarch to fix the house!
“……”吃鸡吃鸡吃鸡。
"…" Someone was still eating chicken nonstop.
“……”呃，只是看你同一个菜，加了三次咸，想问句还能吃吗？
"…" Uh, it’s just that the same dish has been seasoned with salt thrice, and I wanted to ask if it is still edible?
“……”呃，有这种事吗？他细一想自己的确有给她介绍过各种武器，难怪是那个时候？可是他以前不是个丢三落四的人啊，为啥给她看过就忘了收了？

"…" Uh, such a thing happened? He looked back on his memories and remembered that he had indeed introduced these weapons to her. Could it have been at that time? But he was not a careless person, why would he forget to keep them after showing them to her?
“……”啥意思？什么没吃完，水果吗？可刚刚吃水果的人，不只有沈掌门吗？
"..." What does that mean? What hasn't he finished eating? Fruits? But wasn't Sect Master Shen the one who was eating the fruits?
"…" What?
“……”女子脸抽畜了一下，喂，别骂人啊。
"…" The woman's face twitched. Hey, don't insult me.
“……”她是小孩吗，这么容易被拐。
"…" Was she a child who was so easily abducted?
“……”她的名字这么难记吗？
“……”Is her name that hard to remember？
“……”好吃好吃好吃。
"…" It was very, very, very delicious.
“……”好麻烦啊。
"..." So troublesome.
“……”孤月一愣，没由来的就静下了急躁的心。
"…" Lonemoon hesitated. He slowly calmed down and said nothing further.
“……”孤月一愣，确实大道三千，羿清是羿清，他是他。修道本来就是修自己的道，与其它人无关。羿清能得顿悟那是他自己的造化，他能穿越到这个世界，也是自己的造化，又何必纠结于这些。

"..." Lonemoon fell silent. Indeed, there were many paths to the Great Dao. Yi Qing and he were separate entities. The cultivation of Dao actually means cultivating one's own Dao, it does not concern other people. Yi Qing's breakthroughs were his karma. He, Lonemoon could transmigrate to this world, that was also his karma. So why bother with such trivialities.
“……”孤月一愣，这才明白她问的什么，皱了皱眉顺手给自己倒了杯茶道，“你什么时候看出来的？”明明他根本没有提起过。
"..." Lonemoon paused and finally understood what she was asking. He frowned and poured himself a cup of tea. "When did you find out?" He had never mentioned it before.
“……”孤月只觉得心口一塞，一口老血涌了上来。深吸了一口气才压了下去，淡定淡定，她还是个萌新，虽然是变态级别的那种，“灵气是修士修练必不可少的东西，就像人要吃饭一样，修士只有呼吸吐纳天地间的灵气才能提升修为。各种法术剑术都要依赖灵气运转。”

"…" Lonemoon felt a stuffiness in his chest, a mouthful of blood threatening to rush out of his mouth. He took a deep breath before it was kept under control. Keep your cool, she is still a newbie, although she is the type that is rarely seen. "Spirit Qi is something that cultivators require for cultivation. Just like how humans need to eat to survive, cultivators must breathe the Spirit Qi of the Earth and Sky to improve their cultivation. All kinds of Dharma spells rely on how the Spirit Qi is manipulated."
“……”孤月嘴角一抽，他不是嫌少啊喂！这只吃鸡还不忘付钱的妖怪到底从哪来的？
"…" Lonemoon's mouth twitched. I'm not concerned about the amount! This demon even remembers to settle the bill for for his meal! I wonder where he comes from?
“……”孤月嘴角一抽，关他毛事，这明显是沈萤抖出来的好吗？
"…" Lonemoon's mouth twitched. What has that got to do with me, wasn’t it obviously shaken out by Shen Ying?
“……”孤月愣了一下，半会似是想到了什么。
"..." Lonemoon faltered before he thought of something.
“……”孤月沉默了，上青界这么多年来，唯一传说飞升成功的，就只有郁家老祖，但上次升仙塔的事后。才知道他并没有成功，而是入了魔。这么说，还真没有飞升成功的仙人。他顿时迷惑了，难道这个世界真的没有天门？！

"..." Lonemoon fell silent. After all these years, the only person whom he heard had achieved immortality was the ancestor of the Yu Family. After what happened with the Immortal Ascension Pagoda, he knew that that ancestor had not actually succeeded - he had just turned into a demon. That means there was indeed nobody who ascended into immortality. At that moment, he felt completely confused. Was there really no Heavenly Gate in this realm?
“……”孤月没有回答，眉头却皱得更紧了，若不是见到白泽，他都快忘了这是一本书里写的世界。
"..." Lonemoon did not answer her; he only frowned more deeply. If he had not seen Bai Ze, he would have fogotten that this was a world that belonged in the book.
“……”孤月没有回话，这的确是现在唯一的办法。
"..." Lonemoon did not respond. This was really the only way.
“……”孤月皱了皱眉，却没这么乐观，那本书的剧情里，可没有提到有什么办法。
"..." Lonemoon frowned. He was not so hopeful, as according to the book, there was no solution mentioned for this.
“……”孤月脸色一僵，顿时想起书中的描写，只觉得心梗了一下，上不来下不去的。
"…" Lonemoon's face stiffened as he thought of what the book described and felt a stuffiness in his chest.
"..." My heart is so weary!
“……”感觉萝卜心中了一箭。
"..." Radish felt an arrow to the heart.
“……”我没用意啊。
"…" I didn't intend anything.
“……”我的刀呢？
"..." Where's my sword?
“……”戚橙雨手间一紧，一个噬心诀差点就随着一口老血扔了过去，“你是不是想找死！说了让你往右走，往右，你到底认不认路？”
"…" Qi Chengyu clenched her hands and almost vomited blood. "Do you want to die! I told you go to the right, to the right, can't you follow directions?"
“……”所以万妖的死，是因为开会声音太大？
"…" The reason why so many demons died was simply because they were too loud?
“……”所以天生剑体，是因为产妇营养过剩造成的吗？这事厨子知道吗？
"..." So, a natural powerhouse is formed from the overfeeding of the expectant mother? Does the chef know about this matter?
“……”所以说死的那些妖族，之所以尸骨无存，是因为都做成了食物？说好的断食辟谷是人修入门必备呢？三宗六派这群骗子！

"…" So the reason why there were no remains left from those demons was because they were used as food? Wasn't grain abstinence a fundamental requirement for human cultivators? That bunch of liars from the Six Schools Three Sects!
“……”所以那魔窟的事真是她做的啊喂！“这些人又怎么回事？”他指了指她身边的一群去而复返的妹子，“你又揍了谁？”
"…" So she was really the one who took down the Fiend Den! "What are these people doing here?" He pointed to the group of girls who had returned from their escapade. "Who did you hit this time?"
“……”无法反驳。
"..." Lonemoon could find no words to rebut her.
“……”易峰一脸懵逼。
"..." Yi Feng's expression tightened..
“……”易峰嘴角一抽，毛团是什么鬼？眼看着事情瞒不下去，只好主动解释，“灵主是神兽白泽，这万年来一直住在我易家万兽峰，为的就是不让幻海异兽随意踏足三青界，为祸人间。”

"..." Yi Feng's mouth twitched. What the hell was a furball? Seeing that there was no way he could conceal the matter any longer, he explained, "This divine beast is Spirit Master Bai Zhe. He has been living in my Yi Family's Myriad Beast Peak for ten thousand years, defending the three Azure worlds from invasion by Mirage Sea beasts.
“……”易峰想死。
"..." Yi Feng wished he could die at that moment.
“……”果然还是不平衡，沈心机！￣へ￣
"..." He was indeed biased, scheming Shen! ￣へ￣
"..." Shit!
“……”槽！你怎么什么都答应，“这种地方连上青界都难有，妖界这么大，就算有也很难找……”

"…" Holy shit! Why are you agreeing to everything? "It’s hard to find such a place even in the Upper Azure World. The Demon Realm is so big. Even if there were such a place, it would be very difficult to find…"
“……”毕浩一惊，他居然没有发现，魔尊旁边还有一人。细一看却发现对方只是毫无灵气的凡人，顿时松了口气。想要收回手，却发现抽……不回来！

"…" Bi Hao was taken aback. He had not realized there was someone else beside the Fiend Supremacy. Taking a closer look, he saw that this person was a mortal with no Spirit Qi, after which he heaved a sigh of relief.
“……”沈萤一僵，额头又开始冒汗了，指教啥？剑法什么的，她压根不懂啊。
"…" Flustered, Shen Ying began to perspire. What guidance could she give? She didn't know anything about sword techniques.
“……”沈萤嘴角一抽，看着眼前这只仿佛整根萝卜都写着，你看不见我，你看不见我，你看不见我的萝卜，所以这是个智商不太高的萝卜精吗？

"…" The corner of Shen Ying's mouth twitched. She could almost hear the thoughts in the radish's mind: You can't see me, you can't see me, you can't see this radish… Was this a particularly stupid radish spirit?
“……”沈萤嘴角一抽，这家伙吃炸药了？画风跟之前完全不同了。
"…" Shen Ying's mouth twitched. Did this fellow eat an explosive? He had an entirely different style from before.
“……”沈萤嘴角抽了抽，顺手接了过去，左右看了看，也没看出什么不同来，“我也没见过这花……”

"..." The corner of Shen Ying's mouth twitched as she received the flower and turned it around in her hands to study it from all angles. She did not find anything special either. "I have never seen this flower..."
"..." Opposite shore of the river!
“……”灵主原来这么热心的吗？
"..." Has Spirit Master always been this passionate?
“……”猫奴什么鬼，“那只是他的灵兽。”
"..." What do you mean by cat slave. "That's just his spirit beast."
“……”睡你妹啊，你除了吃和睡还有没有点别的爱好，那边打架的是你亲徒弟吗？
"…" Sleep my ass! What else do you do besides eating and sleeping? Do you really take that fellow as your disciple?
“……”素菜家族是什么？他是家主，不是什么家长啊？还有这种把游仙当孙子训的口气是肿么回事？
"…" What Vegetable Family? He was the master of the family, not the parent. And why was she talking to the Traveling Immortal as if he was her grandson?
“……”羿清一呆，片刻脸上浮现巨大的欣喜，急喘了两口声，朝着她用力的嗑了三个头，“多谢前辈成全，徒儿羿清，见过师父。”

"..." Yi Qing was stunned for a moment, then his face broke into a huge grin. Taking a few deep breaths, he turned toward her and bowed three times. "Thank you for granting my request, Senior. I am your disciple, Yi Qing. Please accept my respects, Master."
“……”羿清愣住了，想了半会，拼命想要找个顺眼的，却发现好像没人配得上自己完美的师父。甚至光想想师父身边会出现另一个人，他就没由来的有些暴躁。

"..." Yi Qing stopped short. He kept quiet for a second trying to think of someone pleasing to the eye, but he realised that no one around him could match up to his master, who was perfect in his eyes. Just thinking about another person hanging around Master made his heart race with anger.
“……”脑海顿时闪过了某个画面，在场众人齐齐抽了抽嘴角。
"…" A certain image flashed past Xuan Yuanyu’s mind and everybody present pursed their lips at the same time..
“……”膝盖中了一剑。

"..." Took an arrow in the knee[1. is a memorable quote originating from the role-playing video game The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim. An often repeated stock line throughout the game, it went on to inspire the snowclone “I used to X, then I took an arrow to the knee.”]
“……”舔你妹啊，以为这是打游戏啊？你丫的就是想捡钱吧？我都看到你装口袋里了，“把金子给我放下啊喂！”
"…" Picking up loot my foot! You think you are playing an online game? I think you just want to pocket the money. I saw you put them in your pocket. "Put down the gold pieces!"
“……”要不要答应得这么快啊？不会真有吧？“就算妖界有这样的地方，也不可能生出灵脉吧？”
"…" Do you have to agree so quickly? Is there really such a place? "Even if there is such a place in the Demon Realm, surely it can’t produce a spirit vein?"
“……”要不要这么现实啊喂？好歹是上古传承，别这么嫌弃啊？
"…" They didn't have to be so practical, did they? This was an ancient heritage they were being asked to receive — how could they despise it so?
“……”要不要这么贴心？
"…" Do you need to be so considerate?
“……”觉得这个理由一点都不意外是肿么回事？
"…" Why did this reason not sound surprising at all?
“……”说到底，你丫还是舍不得这些吃的啊喂！
"…" At the end of the day, all you're concerned about is food!
“……”说得好有道理，他竟无言以对。
"…" This made so much sense that Lonemoon was speechless.
“……”谁能跟你个外挂比！
"..." Who wants to be compared with a cheat like you!
“……”轩辕禹嘴角一抽，似是想到了什么，隐隐觉得一口老血涌了上来。看了看后面出来的沈萤，不得不得又硬咽了下去。

"…" The corner of Xuan Yuanyu's mouth twitched. He suddenly recalled something and felt his blood pressure begin to rise. Upon seeing Shen Ying following behind the radish, however, he had no choice but to swallow his anger.
“……”这么厉害的吗？
"..." Is it that unbelievable?
“……”这也可以睡着，你TM在逗我？！
"…" Sleeping in this situation, are you freaking kidding me?!
“……”这是在转移话题吧，绝对是的吧？
“……”She is trying to change the topic, right？
“……”这是忘了吧？绝对是忘了吧。
"..." You forgot right? You definitely forgot.
“……”这货到底怎么靠着一脸懵逼活到现在的？！
"…" How did she survive until now with that stupid face of hers?!
“……”这进来的都是一群什么奇葩啊喂，打架比传承更重要吗？有没有人听他说话！
"…" These few people that came in were weirdos. Was fighting more important than passing on the legacy? Was anybody even listening to him?!
“……”那你有什么脸收徒啊喂！
"…" Yet you have the cheek to take in a disciple!
“……”郁海珩心口又是一塞。
"..." Yu Hai Heng was dumbfounded.
“……”郁红嘴角抽了抽，看着这个哪哪都不靠谱的所谓掌门，半会才压下心底的冲动道，“既然如此……已经入门，以后诸事还望掌门安排？”

"…" Yu Hong's mouth twitched as she looked at this unreliable so-called sect master, and it took her a while before suppressing the impulse to act rashly and said, "If that's the case… now that we have entered this sect, we hope that Sect Master will help us to make arrangements for future matters."
“……”随意是什么鬼？“掌门，我等入门不需厅登记入册之类的吗？”
"…" What did that mean? "Sect Master, don't we need to register or something?"
“……”难吃还不让人说了，委屈。
"..." I'm not even allowed to criticize bad cooking. Sad.
“……”马屁拍在马腿上的魔王一缩，又团成了鹌鹑。大仙好凶，好无常，好无理取闹！
"..." The boot-licking Devil King quivered and shrunk back to his quail-like form. The Great Immortal was fierce, irrational and unreasonable!
“……”鬼要跟你一起吃啊！原来你之前问的可不可以吃，是真的想吃啊喂。
"..." I'm not going to eat that with you! So you were really thinking of eating the beasts when you asked if they could be eaten earlier?
“……不说就算了。”
"... If you don't want to tell me, then forget it."
“……也没多担心。”干活的都是牛爸爸，她只在旁边坐坐。
"... I was not really worried." The grunt work was done by Father Niu, all she did was sit on the chair.
"Despicable!"
“……啊？啊！”碧涛傻了。
"... Ah? Ah!" Bitao went silent.
“……啥？！”这什么鬼理由？
"… What?!" What the heck was that reason?
“……我TM还卤煮，生煎，暴炒呢！”
"... How about freaking braised, pan fried and deep fried!"
“……我说的到不是这个。”
"... this is not what I meant."
“……是这样吗？”
"... Is that it?"
“……是，师父。”羿清只好又蹲了回去，却忍不住回头警告似的瞪向那五人，虽然能猜到他们会来抢千叶草木灵，却没想到会来得这么快，竟是连片刻都等不下去了吗？没想到堂堂上界世家，吃相也是一样的难看。

"… Yes, Master," Yi Qing obediently squatted back down but he couldn't stop himself from throwing a warning glare at the five strangers standing in front of them. He had guessed that they would come to steal the Thousand Leaves Vegetation Spirit, but he didn't think they would be so fast. Could they really not wait any longer? To think that an aristocratic family from the Upper World would have such an ugly, greedy side.
“……是，师父。”羿清这才一步三回头的走了，临出门还冷冷的瞪了思羽一眼。小婊砸，又来抢我师父！

"... Yes, Master." Yi Qing started to walk out, but not without turning back every few steps. Just before he stepped out of the door, he glared at Si Yu coldlly. Little girl, trying to steal my master again!
“……滚。”谁想给你钱了，你TM能不能忘了牛爸爸这回事，“你丫有这么穷吗？算了，看在你帮我一回的份上。以后你要是缺灵石，尽量来找哥，我罩你。”他好歹是个化神尊者，灵石还是不缺的。

"… Get lost." Who wants to give you money, can you just forget about the Father Niu incident? "Are you really that broke? Forget it, since you have helped me before, next time when you are in need of spirit stones, feel free to come and find your brother, I will take care of you." Anyhow, he was a Soul Formation Supremacy; he was not lacking in spirit stones.
“一万两！”
"Ten thousand taels!"
“一两紫金一天啊！一两紫金那可是能在风月楼包个花魁玩上十天十夜了，可惜我武技不行啊，否则一定要进去混个金牌陪练玩玩。”

"A tael of purple gold a day! One tael of purple gold can allow me to book a courtesan at the Fengyue Brothel and have fun with her for ten entire days and nights! Sadly, my skills are not good enough, otherwise I would definitely go in and pass off as a good token-grade sparring partner and have some fun."
“一两紫金一天？拼了，去试试！”
One tael of purple gold a day? I'll risk it and go for broke!
“一两紫金？”
"One tael of purple gold?"
“一个月？”
"A month?"
“一些灵根不好，或是原本就仙途无望，却颇有姿色的女子，为了自保，会甘愿成为炉鼎。依副于高阶修士之下，以自身修为供人采补。”他脸上全是尴尬，似是有些难以启齿，“虽然双修采补之术，不是什么上得台面的术法。但对修为确实有益，所以绻养炉鼎在各门各派来说，很……常见！大部分金丹以上的修士，都有这种习惯。”

"Some of those girls without good spirit roots, or those who did not have a future with immortal cultivation but are rather pretty will be willing to become a human cauldron for self-protection. Going under the wings of a high level cultivator, they allow the use of their bodies to provide harvest for others." His expression was completely awkward, seemingly finding it hard to speak about this matter. "While dual cultivation harvesting sorcery is not glamorous, it really does help with cultivation, so to many sects, keeping a human cauldron is… very common! Most of the cultivators with Golden Cores and above have experienced this kind of practice."
“一力……降十会？一力降十会……”羿清默念了几句，突然身上灵气暴涨，剑气满溢，连着四周的灵气都开始涌动起来。

"One strong man… can overcome ten? One strong man can overcome ten…" Yi Qing silently recited this a few times. Suddenly, the Spirit Qi and Sword Qi in his body started to soar and even the Spirit Qi in the surrounding began to surge in response.
“一句失误就完了，没那么容易！你们刚刚吃的那顿，可都是灵植灵米做的，少说也有十几块下品灵石。”

"You expect this to be over just because you claim it was a mistake? It's not so easy! All the food you ate earlier on was made from spirit herbs and spirit rice. It would cost you more than ten low-grade spirit stones."
“一年前振祥真人突然损落，却连遗体都找不着。”郁海衍继续道，“他死后门下九名炉鼎也消失了踪迹，据最后看到振祥的人说，他是因为法器被盗，前去捉拿盗宝的叛徒才一去不返的。定是被那九人所害，我做为家主，自然要帮门下的人讨回这个公道。”

"One year ago, the Perfected One Zhen Xiang suddenly fallen yet his body was nowhere to be found." Yu Hai Heng continued, "After his death, the nine human cauldrons under him also vanished. According to the person who last saw Zhen Xiang, he did not return from chasing the betrayer who stole his Dharma artifact. He was certainly harmed by those nine of them, as the Master of the family, of course I have to help my people seek justice。
“一时说不清楚，师叔随我去一趟药丹峰就明白了！”他脸色更为沉重，转头看了羿清一眼，继续抱拳道，“恭喜羿道友顺利结婴，此事关系重大，羿真人也一块过来吧！多事之秋，真人的结婴大典估计要延后些时日了。”

"I can't explain it clearly. Let me bring Uncle Master to Elixir Peak and you will understand!" His expression was grave as he turned around to look at Yi Qing and cupped his fists before continuing, "Congratulations to Fellow Daoist Yi Qing for successfully completing your Nascent Soul Formation. Since this matter is pretty serious, Perfected Yi, you come along as well! With so much happening recently, Perfected Yi’s Nascent Soul Formation ceremony will have to be pushed back."
“一派胡言。”郁海珩急了，似是没有想她会说这些反驳道，“振祥是旁系中出了名的随和之人，谁会相信他会做这种事？”

"That's all nonsense." Yu Hai Heng panicked as if not expecting her to rebut like that, "Zhen Xiang was the collateral kin who was known for being friendly and amicable, who would believe he'd done such things?"
“一缕大半柱香时间，十缕差不多能坚持一个时辰！”
"If one wisp can last for more than two and a half minutes, ten wisps can last more almost two hours!"
“万一又有哪个不长眼的拐走了师父怎么办？还是我守在这里更安全。”
"What if another person who does not look where they are going came to abduct Master again? It is safer for me to stand guard here."
“三个月！只要马家三个月内找不到我，我境界最少能达到铸鼎境四五重，配合黑色元力综合战力应该达到铸鼎境八九重，到时候就算你们派人来刺杀，小爷就不怕了！难不成他们还会不要脸的派紫府境强者出手？”

"Three months! If the Ma Family did not manage to locate me by the end of three months, my attainment would reach the fourth or fifth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm at the very least. Combined with the black essence force, my powers should reach the eighth or ninth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. By that time, even if the Ma Family were to send their assassins, this young master would have nothing to fear! Would they even be so audacious as to sending a powerful martial artist who is at the Purple Mansion Realm?"
“三人铸鼎境二重，一人铸鼎境三重！”
"Three of them are at the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. One of them is at the third stage of the Cast Tripod Realm!"
“三位长老请求家主之时，很多弟子都可以做证。”
"When the three Elders asked our Sect Master for permission, a lot of our disciples were present."
“三十三丈？”枫影转头直接在眼前的灵植地里，来回扫视了四五遍也没发现任何身影，“人呢，系统你是不是看错了？”
"33 feet?" Feng Ying turned his head and looked directly at the spirit herb vegetation, glanced around several times but did not find anyone, "Where's the person, system did you make a mistake?"
“三叔……”那个喊话的化神修行一急，似是想说什么，却被对方一个冷眼制止。
"Third Uncle…" The previously shouting Soul Formation cultivator panicked, seemingly trying to say something but was silenced by the look thrown at him by the other.
“三大世家数十位游仙都没能出来。”枫影摇了摇头道，“那孤月尊者怕是也凶多吉少了。”
"Even the traveling immortals from each of the three aristocratic families have not come out of the pagoda," Feng Ying shook his head. "It looks like Supremacy Lonemoon is in trouble."
“三点水的沈，萤光的萤！”继续补充。
"That's S-H-E-N Y-I-N-G!" Lonemoon added.
“上……”那你为啥没说啊喂？
"When we came..." Why didnt you say anything then?
"Exalted... Exalted Immortal..."
“上……上仙。”兔王尽量压下心底的恐惧，“上仙如果缺食材，小的到是可以效力。我族兔妖多，分布的地域广，啥吃的都能找着，不如……”它瞅了瞅对方的脸色，吞了口口水，硬着头皮继续道，“我将您需要的食材每日定时送到您府上如何？”

"E-exalted Immortal!" The Rabbit Monarch tried its best to repress its fear. "I might be able to provide some assistance if you lack any ingredients for your meals. We rabbit demons are numerous in number and we are scattered across an extensive piece of land. We can procure all sorts of food for you. Why not…" It took a look at the woman to gauge her response before gulping down a mouthful of saliva and biting the bullet to continue, "What do you think about me delivering ingredients for your meals punctually every day?"
“上仙……”兔王满心的感动，蹭了蹭酸涩的鼻子，忍不住就脱口道，“上仙，您喜欢小兔子吗？刚出生的那种。要不我生了送你几只。”无以为报，以身相许怎么样？

"Exalted Immortal…" The Rabbit Monarch was filled with gratitude. It rubbed its nose as a lump rose in its throat — it blurted out, "Exalted Immortal, do you like little rabbits? Those newborns. Why not I give a few of mine to you after they are born?" With no way of expressing gratitude, the rabbit considered pledging its marriage to her.
“上仙。”兔王浑身触电似的抖了一圈，原本挺直的兔身，瞬间就垮了，整个都软趴了下去，若不是保持着兔形，这态势到有几分跪舔的味道，“按您的吩咐，我已经找齐人手了。”

"Exalted Immortal." The Rabbit Monarch's body quivered as if having received an electric shock. Its originally upright rabbit body collapsed in a second and it laid feebly on the ground. If not for the fact that it was retaining a rabbit's form, this situation would actually have seemed obsequious. "As per your orders, I have already found all the manpower you need."
“上仙哪里话，是在下自愿孝敬您的，无须灵石银钱！”
"Exalted Immortal, it's a way for me to show my respect for you. There is no need for you to pay me!"
“上仙慢走！”
"Exalted Immortal, take care!"
“上仙放心。”兔王用力的点头，“我这些兔子兔孙，做事向来麻利，交给他们一定没问题的。”

"Exalted Immortal, fret not, " the Rabbit Monarch nodded its head aggressively, "My rabbits and rabbit grandchildren have always been dexterous with their work. It will not be a problem to let them handle it."
“上仙放心，它们都是素食妖类。”兔王简直不敢相信，她居然这么好说话，而且好像还……挺客气，“那就这么说定了，明日开始我就给上仙送食材。”

"Exalted Immortal, rest assured. They are all herbivores." The Rabbit Monarch reeled in disbelief. It never expected the woman to be so agreeable to its proposal. Furthermore… she was rather polite. "It's settled then. I will deliver food to your residence from tomorrow onwards."
“上仙饶命，上仙饶命，我错了，是我等有眼不识泰山，犯冒了上仙。”兔王泪水鼻涕糊了一脸，硕大的兔头嗑得那叫一个卖力，整个身子抖得兔毛都一浪接一浪的。

"Exalted Immortal, please spare me! I was wrong, I had been entertaining angels unawares yet have offended you!" Covered in snot and tears, the Rabbit Monarch's massive head repeatedly struck the ground forcefully. Its body was trembling so vigorously that waves were flowing down its rabbit fur.
“上仙！”
"Exalted Immortal!"
“上仙，您找我？”
"Exalted Immortal, are you looking for me?"
“上仙，既然贵人没事，我就先行告退了。”
"Exalted Immortal, since Benefactor is fine, I shall be taking my leave."
“上仙，薄城主，既然魔界之门的事有仙君处理，不知两位接下来有什么打算？”他可不相信，堂堂曲双城城主，会除了仙城内那座府邸外，再找不着别的住所，还大老远的来这里蹭住。

"Exalted Immortal, City Lord Pu. Since the Lord is handling the matter of the door of Demon Realm. What do you two plan to do next?" asked Lonemoon. He refused to believe that the very City Lord of Qushuang City did not have other places to go other than living in their house in Qushuang City, let alone coming all the way to the Immortal Sect to live with him.
“上仙，请留步。”
"Exalted Immortal, please wait a moment!"
“上仙，贵人这是因为妖气入体，他又刚刚修复经脉，未及时将妖气排出，还强行动用灵气封印鬼旗，使得妖气反噬伤及肺腑，所以导致金丹受损。”

"Exalted Immortal, demonic aura has infiltrated Benefactor's body and since he has just regulated his meridians, he did not manage to discharge the demonic aura in time. On top of that, he forcefully used Spirit Qi to seal the eerie flag causing the demonic aura to infiltrate and harm his internal organs, thereby resulting in the damage of his Golden Core."
“上仙，贵人这是怎么了？”兔王实在忍不住问，指了指屋外，“我看他都跪了三天了。”

"Exalted Immortal, what happened to Benefactor?" The Rabbit Monarch could not hold back from asking any longer as it pointed outside of the house and said, "I saw that he has been kneeling for three days."
“上古丹阳宗！”青亦眼神越加的兴奋，死死盯着上面的字，“哈哈哈哈哈，这里果然……果然是上古丹阳宗的仙宫。”
"Ancient Dan Yang Sect!" Qing Yi's gaze grew more excited as he stared at those words. "Hahaha, this place is indeed… indeed the Ancient Dan Yang Sect's Immortal Pavilion."
“上古秘境入口，向来需要五百到一千年才会打开一次，最多持续三个月。你们这些下界仙门，可要抓紧了。”青尹满脸嘲讽的笑了一声，三人一起御剑而起转瞬消失在天际。

"The entrance to an Ancient Mystic Realm only reveals itself once every 500 to 1000 years and it will only remain for approximately three months. Those of you from the lower realm had better seize this opportunity," Qing Yin scoffed. With that, the three got onto their swords and disappeared into the horizon.
“上古秘境现世引发了上界一番异象，我等奉家主之命，前来查探。”青尹继续道，“此秘境凶险未知，而且上古之地，就连上青界也知之甚少。以防有失，我等愿助中青界先行入境一探。”

"The resurgence of the Ancient Mystic Realm has set off numerous anomalies in the Upper Azure World, thus we are here by the order of our master to investigate." Qing Yin continued, "The dangers of this mystic realm is currently unknown, and even the Upper Azure World has little knowledge of ancient realms. In case of any problems, we are willing to lend a helping hand to the Middle Azure World and head in first check it out."
“上善若水，水善利万脉而不争……天地浩浩，唯大道永恒，欲证天道，必先修自身……呃，错了……”

“Benevolent acts resemble water in character. Water benefits all and does not compete… In the vastness of the heaven and earth, only The Way is eternal. To obtain proof of heavenly law, one must first cultivate oneself… eh… no, wrong…”
“上山去了。”沈萤指了指山顶。
"Up the mountains." Shen Ying pointed to the peak.
“上岛的时候。”
"When we came onto the island."
“上次之事，多有误会。还得多谢大仙手下留情。”轩辕禹笑得一脸的和善，“不知这回大仙驾到，所为何事啊？”

"There were many misunderstandings between us the other time. We are most grateful to Great Immortal for being merciful to us." Xuan Yuanyu smiled a friendly smile. "May I enquire as to the matter which has brought Great Immortal here?"
“上次轩辕家的那个游仙。”孤月嘴角抽了抽，指着轩辕勇解释，转头看了看旁边的人，“至于这位，应该是轩辕家主吧？”

"He is the Traveling Immortal from the Xuan Yuan Family that we visited the other time," Lonemoon explained, his mouth twitching as he pointed to Xuan Yuanyong. He then turned to look at the man next to Xuan Yuanyong. "And you must be the patriarch of the Xuan Yuan Family?"
“上青城。”孤月上前一步道，“一般下界进入上青界的人，都会先去上青城。各大世家门派会在那里招收弟子门人。我们刚来，对上界的东西不了解，先去那里打探一下情况也好。”

"Upper Azure Town," Lonemoon corrected. He stepped forward and continued, "Normally, people from the Lower Realm visiting the Upper Azure World would stop by at that town first. The aristocratic families will go there to invite disciples to join their family. We've just arrived and we don't know much about the Upper Azure World. It'll be best if we head to Upper Azure Town to check things out first."
“上青城？”沈萤一脸茫然，把手里最后一块糕点塞进嘴里，“干嘛？”
"Go to Upper Azure Town?" Looking blank, Shen Ying stuffed the last piece of cake in her hand into her mouth. "What for?"
“上青界众所周知。”
"Everyone in the Upper Azure World knows that."
“上青界奥运会？”
"Upper Azure World Olympics?"
“上青界！”孤月一惊，“难怪他明明资质一般，却还是结婴了。原来是跟上界有关联。”
"The Upper Azure World!?" Lonemoon was alarmed. "It's no wonder he was a Nascent Soul despite his average talents. So it has to do with his connections with the upper world."
"Attack!"
“上，将这个丧心病狂的疯子的腿打断，送去刑堂，等候我父亲发落，”江如狼也冷喝一声，从另外一边朝江逸冲去。
"Go, break this maniac's legs and send him to the Disciplinary Court. My father shall serve his punishment there," Jiang Rulang let out a shout and rushed at Jiang Yi from the other side.
“下次别放了，我讨厌香菜。”
"Don't use it next time, I hate parsley."
“下界来的剑修，貌非是……”男子睁大了眼睛，焦急的来回走了两趟，“五位游仙老祖可回来了？”
"Sword cultivators from the Lower Realm. Could it be…" The man's eyes widened as he paced around unnervingly, "Have the five Traveling Immortal Patriarchs returned?"
“不……不是。”郁红的脸色有些古怪，“这贴子不是用术法传送过来的。”
"No... No." With a odd expression on her face, Yu Hong explained, "This card was not sent over by sorcery."
“不……不用！”思羽带些羞涩的推了回去，“我只是有个问题想……请教掌门。”
"No… no need!" Si Yu bashfully pushed back a proffered fruit. "I only have a question to… consult Sect Master about."
“不……不能……不能告诉我爹……不能告诉家族！”
"No... Do not... Do not tell my dad... Do not tell the Family!"
"You're... welcome."
“不……我就问一下，另一只鸡熟了吗？”
"No… I want to ask, is the other chicken cooked?"
“不……打扰！”说打扰有用吗？你们人都来了啊！
Lonemoon answered awkwardly, "No... trouble at all!" Would there even be a point if I said it was troublesome? They are all here already!
“不一定，少的话三四个月，多的话……半年到一年也难说。”
"No fixed duration, a short one could take three to four months, a long one… about half a year to one year."
“不不不，一点都不麻烦。”兔王受宠若惊，用力的摇头。
"No no no, not at all!" Overwhelmed by the flattery, the Rabbit Monarch hurriedly shook its head.
“不不不，那个，我的意思是说……”
"No, no, no, what I mean is..."
“不久，也就三百多年。”
"Not long, only about three hundred years."
“不了解。”
"I do not understand."
“不了！”
"Don’t bother!"
“不仅如此，这人怕是对本派之事，很是熟悉。”奚辰狠声道，“我玄天宗的堂主，命牌与宗脉相连，在宗内受到伤害，会直接触发护山大阵，将凶手困于其中。此人特意选在羿真人渡劫结婴，护山大阵抵御劫雷余波，自动开启，无人察觉之时，才对玉鼎痛下杀手的。”

"Not only that, this person might actually be very familiar with the happenings within our sect." Xi Chen fiercely said, "As Blackheaven Sect's hall master, my life is intertwined with the sect. If i were to be harmed in the sect, it will immediately trigger the protective mountain array and trap the culprit within it. This person must have carefully selected this timing when Perfected Yi was going through his Nascent Soul Formation. The protective mountain array was resisting the aftermath of the lightning tribulation and opened up automatically, so without anyone realizing, he went ahead and murdered Yu Ding."
“不会吧你……”孤月转头看向沈萤，看了看四周压边声音道，“你这就不厚道了，揍他们一顿出出气就行了，干嘛连轩辕家本来那颗千叶草木灵也给抢过来了？那可是轩辕家的命根子啊。”你到底对轩辕家主做了什么啊喂？

"Oh no, you…" Lonemoon turned toward Shen Ying, and then looked around the vicinity. He lowered his voice and said, "That's not very kind. Beating them up to let off some steam was good enough, why did you snatch away the Xuan Yuan Family's Thousand Leaves Vegetation Spirit? That is their dearest possession." What exactly did you do to the Xuan Yuan Family's master?
“不会吧，你还真信啊喂？”智商呢？
"You can't be serious, you really believe that?" Does he have a brain?
“不会吧，原来真是他拿得？”
"That's impossible, he really took it?"
“不会是反派吧？”
"He's not a villain, is he?"
“不会是肉文吧？”
"Is it some obscene content?"
“不会！”
"No."
“不凶残啊。”她顿时想起某只兔兔，“除了胆子小了点，还是挺讲义气的，我是很喜欢的。”
"It's not scary," she replied, suddenly thinking of a certain rabbit. "They may be a little timid, but they are incredibly loyal. I like that."
“不去！”
Shen Ying shouted, "Not going!"
“不去！”她再次趴回桌上，都快要断粮了，还出什么门啊，不如省点力气。
"I'm not going!" She slumped back onto the table. We're about to go through a famine and he's thinking of going out? We should be saving whatever energy we have left.
“不去！”沈萤瘫在桌上的头一歪，秒拒！
"I'm not going!" Shen Ying immediately retorted, tilting her head slightly sideways as she continued to rest against the table.
“不去，又没工资！”
"I'm not going. I'm not even getting paid for it!"
“不可能。”他摇了摇头道，“师父除了吃和睡觉，从来不关心别的，连朋友都没几个，怎会请你……”
"That's impossible," Yi Qing shook is head. Other than eat and sleep, Master never cares about anyone or anything else. She doesn't even have many friends. Why would she invite you..."
“不可能，你不是有很多道具吗？再怎么样也不可能输吧。”
"That's impossible, don't you have a lot of tools? There's no way I can lose right."
“不可能，这……怎么可能？”
"No way, this... How can this be possible?"
“不啊！”沈萤老实回答。
"No!" Shen Ying replied honestly.
This is bad!
“不好意思，我讨厌渣男！”
"Sorry, but I hate scums!"
“不好看吗？”沈萤瞅了瞅后面华美的一片殿宇。
"Isn't it beautiful?" Shen Ying commented after she turned around to look at the beautiful palace.
“不好！”
"Damn it!"
“不好！师妹你要结丹了！”郁红一惊，大声道，“快坐下，凝神聚气，专心结丹。”
"Oh no! Junior Sister, you are going to complete your Core Formation!" Yu Hong was surprised as she shouted, "Quick, have a seat. Concentrate, gather your Qi and focus on your Core Formation."
“不好，它要化形了！”孤月一惊，四处看了看道，“这里灵气太杂乱，木灵气薄弱，会影响到它化形的。”
"No, it is manifesting!" Lonemoon was shocked, looking around him. "The Spirit Qi here is too messy. The Wood Spirit aura is very faint, so it will affect its manifestation."
“不好，是鬼王的声攻！”奚秋立马跳开了一步，如临大敌般对着屋内的人喊道，“快，布下结界！”
"Not good, it’s the Ghost King's sound attack!" Xi Qiu immediately jumped back, as if confronted by a formidable enemy. He shouted to the people in the hall, "Quick, set up the barrier!"
“不客气。”沈萤不在意的道，“下次还来玩啊。”
"You're welcome," said Shen Ying blithely. "We'll come again."
“不对！”
"No way!"
“不对！既然蓝色元力可以辅助疗伤，我这黑色元力这么变态，那也可以快速辅助疗伤啊？我何必还要去融合丹药的药力呢？”

"No, wait! Since blue essence force can help heal wounds and my black essence force is so obscenely powerful, surely it can speed up and facilitate my healing process? Why would I ever need to merge it with the elixir medical power?"
“不必。”
"No need."
“不必了！”他话音刚落两道白色的身影顿时落了下来，“我们已经来了。”那么大的动静，他们早已经察觉。
"There's no need for that!" The moment this voice was heard, two white silhouettes had landed at the hall simultaneously. "We are already here." They must have noticed such a large happening.
“不必，家师所知，已足我毕生学习。”羿清完全不为所动，一脸我有师父我骄傲的样子，“无需再选师门。”
"That's not necessary. The knowledge of my master is enough to last me an entire lifetime." Yi Qing was completely unmoved. With a look of pride, he said, "I don't need to look for another master."
“不想你们虎哥死，立即给我退后！”
"If you don't want your Brother Hu to die, back away from me immediately!"
“不愧……是师叔！”最先回过神来的是奚秋，也不知道是想到了什么，一脸惊喜的看向孤月道，“这鬼王果然被您赶出来了。”

"No wonder… it’s my Uncle Master!" The first to recover from the shock was Xi Qiu. It was unknown as to what he was thinking, but his face beamed with delight as he looked at Lonemoon. "This Ghost King was indeed drawn out by you."
“不愧是上古仙府。小小一个鼎炉，居然内藏天地。”尹岚回头看了看那个练丹炉，转头看向前方的三人，“还得多谢这位尊者留下的出口，我等才能寻着你们的气息，到了这仙宫。”

"This ancient immortal residence is really amazing. It’s just a tiny cauldron, but an entire world is hidden inside." Yin Lan looked back at the elixir-refining cauldron, then turned to look at the three people in front. "My thanks to this Supremacy for leaving us this entrance which enabled us to track your aura to this immortal pavilion."
“不愧是剑修，小子你果然有几分本事。”青亦一手按着胸口，摇摇晃晃的站了起来，带些警惕的看向浑身是血的羿清，“若今日你修为再强些，是化神……不，或许只要元婴后期。本尊还真就要载在你手上了。”刚刚那一剑，其实已经破了他的红莲业火，若不是他修为低，灵力不足，只维持了半刻钟，否则连他都要死在那剑下。

"You're a true sword cultivator. You're one capable lad," Qing Yi said as he held his chest. Slowly, he got to his feet, looking at the blood-covered Yi Qing with caution. "If you were just a little bit stronger, Soul Formation- No, just Nascent Soul in the late stages, I could have really died at your hands." Yi Qing's sword had actually overcome the Red Lotus Karmic Fire. If his cultivation level wasn't this low and he had more Spiritual Power, he would have been able to maintained the Great Sword for longer than half a minute. Then, Qing Yi would really have died at his hands.
“不愧是能进到塔顶的人，在这么浓烈的魔气之中，居然还能安然无恙。”那个黑影感叹了一句，语气之中更加的满意了。

"You realy have the capabilities to make it to the top of the pagoda. You're still so calm and peaceful despite being surrounded by such thick demonic Qi," the black figure exclaimed. He sounded even more satisfied than before.
“不拔？！”他冷眼顿时就扫了过去，“你以为维持一个门派的正常运营这么容易啊？不拔萝卜我们哪来的灵石？”
"Not harvest?!" He sneered as he scanned over, "Do you think its is so easy to maintain the normal operations of a sect? If we do not harvest radishes, how are we going to get spirit stones?"
“不搬家！”沈萤歪了歪头，搬家什么的好麻烦啊。
"We are not moving!" repeated Shen Ying. What is so good about moving house? It is so troublesome.
“不敢不敢不敢！”魔王连连摇着头保证，却不敢起来，干脆也就跪着了，深吸了一口气，才试探的问，“那大仙，能提点一下，小魔到底做错了什么吗？”
“NO NO NO！”魔王连连摇着头保证，却不敢起来，干脆也就跪着了，深吸了一口气，才试探的问，“那大仙，能提点一下，小魔到底做错了什么吗？”
“不敢欺瞒尊上。”
"I dare not hide facts or lie in front of you, Supremacy."
“不是……”她没想驱使，只是想吃而已。
"I don't mean..." She did not want to control beasts, she just wanted to eat them.
“不是……”沈萤仍是没动，“阿飘不说他那化仙丹是五万年前练的吗？”
"No…" Shen Ying refused to move. "Didn't the ghost say that the Immortal Formation Pill was refined 50,000 years ago?"
“不是……”郁红嘴角抽了抽，“易家家主……已经来了。”
"No... " Yu Hong's mouth twitched. "The Yi Family Patriarch is... already here."
“不是……他们不是来投靠的，说是……说是下界来……来算账的！”
"No… they are not here to seek refuge, they said… said that they are from the Lower Realm… and are here to settle scores!"
“不是。”羿清摇了摇头，“这是最近的一个修士城池，顺于城。玄天宗路途太远，单是御剑的话，恐怕要半个月才能到达山门。此城里面有传送阵法，可直接传到玄天宗。”

"No." Yi Qing shook his head. "This is the nearest city for cultivators, Shunyu City. The distance to Blackheaven Sect is way too far, relying solely on sword-riding would take half a month before we can get there. This city has an array formation for transportation, which can send us directly to Blackheaven Sect."
“不是你说要建宗立派吗，不招……卧槽，你不会不打算招人吧？”孤月上下打量了她一眼，指了指后面仙气缭绕的一片宫殿道，“不收弟子，你TM建这么大一片殿宇干嘛？”

"Didn't you say you wanted to establish a sect? If we don't recruit… Holy shit, you're not planning to recruit any disciples, are you?" Lonemoon looked Shen Ying up and down, then pointed to the palace surrounded by Immortal Qi behind him. "If we won’t recruit disciples, why did you build such a freaking huge palace?"
“不是吧，沈萤。”孤月拉了拉她的衣袖，一脸不赞同的低压声音道，“你不会同情这个妖怪，想放过它吧？”那个魔修就算了，本性不坏，而且情有可原！但这妖狐一看就是浑身血煞气，生性嗜杀，现在放了，以后还不定害死多少人。

"No way, Shen Ying." Lonemoon pulled at her sleeve. With a face filled with disagreement, he asked her in a low voice, "Don't tell me you sympathize with this demon and want to let it go? That fiendish cultivator was not evil in nature so it was understandable to let her go! But this fox demon obviously gives off an immense blood aura. It’s bloodthirsty in nature, so if it’s released, it could harm way more people in the future.”
“不是吧？别吓我啊！”看沈萤这样子，压根没有认出他来，直接把他当成吵她睡觉的同伙了，这起床身也太恐怖了吧，偏偏他根本没地方躲，“等等……沈萤，别冲动啊喂，你清醒点看看我是谁啊！沈萤……掌门……大佬！”

"You think so? Don't frighten me!" Looking at Shen Ying, Feng Ying realized that she showed no signs of recognition, but instead regarded him as part of the gang who had disturbed her sleep. Her just-got-up-from-bed persona was truly terrifying but he could find no place to hide. "Wait... Shen Ying, don't be hasty, take a good look at me! Shen Ying...Sect Master...Big Guy!"
“不是啊。”
"Nope."
“不是啊。”对方无辜的眨了眨眼，摇摇头道，“我是看天晚了，所以打算不走了。”说完，变戏法般从身后掏出两只色泽艳丽的野鸡，“妹子，你会烤鸡吗？”

"No, it's not that." Shen Ying blinked innocently and shook her head. "It was getting late so I decided to stay." Then as if by magic, she pulled out two pheasants from behind her. "Sister, can you roast chicken?"
“不是啊！”
"Nope!"
“不是啊！”沈萤摇头。
"No!" Shen Ying shook her head.
“不是啊，我只是单纯的想换个地方吃饭。”
"Nope, I purely wanted to switch places to eat."
“不是她，是另一个！”他像是想起了什么，浑身突然一抖。
"It's not her, it's the other one!" As if recalling something, he shuddered.
“不是我……”
"No, I-"
“不是有句话叫：一力降十会嘛！”
"Isn't there the saying: one strong man can defeat ten skillful ones!"
“不是有意的？”
"Did not mean to do it?"
“不是自己跑的！”趴在桌上沈萤突然插了一句，“有人拉走的。”
"They didn't run away on their own" Shen Ying, who had been lying on the table, suddenly interrupted. "Someone took them away."
“不是说只要到塔顶就行了吗？”
"I thought you said that reaching the top level was the goal?"
“不是！”沈萤一把敲下了他的筷子，我哪知道你是不用吃饭的啊！“我跟你不一样，我吃饭是因为饿，必须吃。既然饭菜对你修行无益，就别吃了。”万一真的吃坏肚子怎么办？

"No!" Shen Ying slapped at his chopsticks. How would I have known that you did not need to eat! "I am unlike you, I eat because I'm hungry, because I have to. Since food is not beneficial to your cultivation, then better not eat." There was no knowing what harm the food might cause to his stomach.
“不是，孤月长老。”她有些着急的上前一步，指了指外面道，“我的意思是，他们……现在已经到山下了。”
"No, Elder Lonemoon." Yu Hong hurriedly stepped forwards and pointed outside. "I mean they're... already at the foot of the mountain."
“不是？”羿清一愣，低头认真的思考了半会又睁大了眼睛，“莫非……师父认为此行会发生什么特殊情况，对我的修行会是一种考验，担心我不能应付？”

"No?" Perplexed, Yi Qing bowed his head in thought. After pondering for a while, his eyes widened and he asked, "Could it be that… Master thinks that something unusual will happen during this expedition which will put my cultivation to the test and you are worried that I can't cope?"
“不死冥皇！”
"Undying Netherworld King!"
“不然呢？你有带孜然啊？”看不出，你还是个有讲究的厨……妹子！
"What more is there to it? Ah, do you have cumin with you?" I didn't know that you were such a meticulous chef… sister!
“不用。”
"There's no need."
“不用。”珠子她很多的。
"No need." She had plenty of such beads.
“不用了。”
"That's not necessary."
“不用了。”她摇了摇头，接着又加了句，“我喜欢吃兔子，又不喜欢养兔子！”
"There's no need." She shook her head and continued, "I like to eat rabbits, not raise and take care of rabbits!"
“不用了吧？”
"That's not necessary?"
“不用了！”
"That won't be necessary!"
“不用了，我又没做啥。”
"There's no need. I didn't do anything actually.”
“不用了，我回头再来好了。”
"No need. It's fine; I'll come back again."
“不用太大，有房有厅，有厨卫就行了。嗯……要不你就照着你妖王殿那样盖就行了，挺好看的。”
"Doesn't need to be too big. It just needs to have a bedroom, a living room, a kitchen and a bathroom. Er… or you could build it like how you did for your demon palace, it looks great.”
“不用这么悲观嘛？人家不都说了只是来玩的吗？”她瞅了瞅锅内，连忙推了推人，“快翻一翻，要糊了要糊了。”
"Don't be so pessimistic. Didn't he say he came to play?" Shen Ying looked longingly at the food in the wok and nudged Yi Qing, "Quick, give it a quick stir, it's going to burn!"
“不用，不用……”轩辕禹连忙摇了摇头，一脸真诚的道，“在下就是想跟贵派结个善缘，没有别的意思，并无所求。”就算有求，他也不敢要啊？况且好歹是四大家族之一，还真不缺灵石，除非……

"No need, no need…" Xuan Yuanyu quickly shook his head and then said earnestly, "I just want to form good karmic ties with your sect. There is no other meaning to it." Even if he had any requests, would he dare to ask for it? Moreover, coming from one of the four aristocratic families, he really was not lacking in Spirit Stones, unless…
“不用？”孤月瞪了她一眼，“光靠眼睛能找着人吗？你以为那姓甘的是个傻叉，自己蹦出来让你们揍！”
"No need?" Lonemoon glared at her. "Can you find someone with just your eyes? You think that guy called Gan is an idiot who will voluntarily leap out in front of you to let you thrash him!?"
“不着急。”
“There's no rush.”
“不知仙师，是否方便。”郁红再次急声问。
"Immortal Master, will that be convenient?" Yu Hong asked hurriedly again.
“不知尊者此番前来，所为何事？”
"May I know what matter that Supremacy has come for?"
“不知尊驾，是哪位尊者？”还未入内，对方已经第一时间发现了他，并转头看了过来。
"May I have the honor of knowing the Supremacy who has just arrived?" The person inside turned around to look at him. He had discovered Lonemoon's presence even before he had stepped in.
“不知是否符合要求。”
"I wonder if I meet the criteria."
“不知道。”她又埋了回去，“那人又没出来。”
"I don't know," she lay her head back down on the table. "That person didn't appear."
“不知道啊。”话说修为到底是啥？
"I don't know." By the way, what the hell is cultivation?
“不知道！”他摇了摇头，“当时我专心压制剑气，并没有细看，只是隐隐感觉到一股刺骨的寒意。之后我再想探入他神识中查看，又半点痕迹都寻不到了。所以我才托师父帮我看看他有何不同。”再说仙界不比凡界，若是有人动了他的元神，以薄家父子的修为不可能看不出来。

"I don't know!" He shook his head, "I didn't manage to scrutinize since all my mind was on suppressing Qi of sword. All I felt was the biting chill that vanished when I tried to further probe into his primordial spirit, which is why I beseeched Master to keep an eye on his abnormalities." Moreover, Immortal Realm is nothing like the Mortal Realm. If anyone meddled with his primordial spirit, they would definitely realize.
“不知道，但……”沈萤皱了皱眉，“最后那两道雷，是他劈的。”
"I don't know, but..." Shen Ying frowned, "the last two bolts of lightning were from him."
“不确定啊！”沈萤回过头看向他，“所以才要去。”戚橙雨说的遭遇确实很惨，惨到无论谁都会升起同情心，但什么话都不能只听一个人说，是真是假，去趟悟剑峰自然就清楚了。

"I am not sure!" Shen Ying turned back and faced him. "That's why I want to go." The way Qi Chengyu had described her encounter was truly tragic, so terrible that anyone would pity and sympathize with her, but there were always two sides to a story; only by visiting Sword Comprehension Peak could they find out the truth.
“不等了，随便打几场吧，你们这武殿待一天可要一两紫金，我来这可不是玩的。”少女冷哼两声，转身走进一个练功房内，杨总管连忙朝江逸这边的人群中喊道：“野猪！出战，上场。”

"I'm not waiting any longer. I'll just fight a few casual rounds with them. I need a tael of purple gold just to stay for a single day at your Martial Arts Hall. I did not come here for fun." The youth coldly snorted twice, before turning and walking into one of the technique-practicing rooms.
Manager Rong hurriedly shouted to the group of individuals in Jiang Yi's corner of the room. "Wild Boar! It's time to do battle, so get in the sparring room!"
“不算急了。”他一脸坚定的道，“前些日子多谢师父体恤，如今徒儿的伤势已经全愈，灵气也已经恢复，可以开始修行了。”

"It cannot be considered a matter of urgency," he said with a face of conviction. "But previously, thanks to Master's sympathy and understanding, I have totally recovered, and my Spirit Qi is also back to normal. I am ready to practice cultivation."
“不管了!他们也住不了几天了。”孤月有些烦闷的挥了挥手道，“反正你们记住，玲爱生命，远离主角！以后离他们远点，别再跟这个叫宁子安的扯上任何关……”

"Whatever! They won't stay for long." Frustrated, Lonemoon waved his hands and said, "Just remember, treasure your life and stay away from the protagonist. From now on, just keep yourselves away from this Ning Zi..."
“不管了，你先尽量隐瞒吧！”
"Scrap that, just try your best to conceal my identity!"
“不管了，最后试一次，不行就回家吃饭了。”
"Forget about it, I'll try again for one last time. If I fail again, I'll just return home and have my meal."
“不管他了，以后再想办法吧，时间不早了，先把伤口疗养好，迟些还要上五号药田清点呢，可别被江如虎等人堵了……”

"Forget it, I'll think of a plan next time. It's not early anymore. Let me heal my wounds first. I have to go to Field Number Five to take stock later. Hopefully I won't be blocked by Jiang Ruhu and gang..."
“不管她是谁，以后见到此人，可千万别再招惹了。就是她那两个剑修的属下……也能避则避吧！”
"No matter who she is, we should be careful not to offend her the next time we see her. If we can… we should even avoid her two subordinates as well!"
“不能再留在这里了。”孤月皱了皱眉，“太虚派迟早会发现这里的动静，我得出去忽悠一趟，至于山上那几个人，沈萤你……咦？沈萤！沈萤人呢？”

"We cannot stay here any longer." Lonemoon furrowed his brows. "The Grand Vacuity Sect will find out what's happening here sooner or later. I need to leave and cause a diversion. As for the few of them on the mountain, Shen Ying, you… huh? Shen Ying! Where's Shen Ying?"
“不能碰的吗？”沈萤呆了一下，连忙弹开了手，“不好意思，我不知道。”
"I can't touch it?" Shen Ying hesitated. She quickly retracted her hand. "I'm sorry, I didn't know."
“不行。”
"Nope."
“不行就是不行！”
"No means no!"
“不行！”
"No!"
“不行！”孤月冷冷的瞪了她一眼，打断她偷懒的想法，“它们是妖，多少身带妖气，这批萝卜，呸……这些灵植是要交给轩辕家练丹用的，不能沾染半点妖气，你必须去。”

"No!" Lonemoon glared at her coldly, interrupting her thought to slack off, "They are demons so they have some sort of demonic aura, this batch of radishes, pu... these spirit herbs are to be given to the Xuan Yuan Family to refine pills, they cannot be polluted with demonic aura, you have to go."
“不行！”孤月瞪了她一眼，“我昨天已经去上青城以无敌派的名义报名参赛了，这届的比赛是四大家族的印家主办的，地点就在印天城。我们明日就必须出发。”

"No!" Lonemoon glared at her. "I already went to Upper Azure Town yesterday and signed up for the competition under Invincible Sect’s name. This year's competition is organized by the Yin Family of the four aristocratic families and the venue is in Yin Tian Town. We need to set off tomorrow."
“不行！”孤月越想就越着急，“绝对不能让他得到化仙丹，不然我们就真的出不去了。”
"No!" The more Lonemoon thought about it, the more anxious he became. "We cannot allow him to obtain this Immortal Formation Pill. Otherwise, we really won’t be able to leave this place."
“不行！”羿清哐的一下扔掉了手里的锅铲。
"No!" Yi Qing yelped, slamming the spatula down onto the floor.
“不行！绝对不行！”
"No! Definitely not !"
“不要。”她又不是送快递的。
"Nope." She was not a delivery courier.
“不要。”蒲公英很粘衣服的。
"I don't want it." Dandelions would get all over her clothes.
“不要乱，各位师弟妹守好自己的阵眼！”呈安到底是掌门的大弟子，眼看一时拿不下来，开始指挥众人先用阵法束缚妖怪。

"Don't panic, junior brothers and sisters defend your assigned formations!" Cheng An was the lead disciple of the sect master. Seeing that it would take time to capture the demon, he instructed everyone to use the array formation to box in the demon.
“不要啊大仙！”刚还装着死的魔蛟，猛的一弹，缩了缩尾巴，眼泪顿时奔涌而出，“我……我还没有完全入魔呢，你看我的右眼，还有一半是黑的呢。”

"No, Great Immortal!" The wyrm which had been playing dead suddenly bounced off the floor and contracted its tail. Tears began to flow from its eyes, "I... I haven't become a full demon. Look at my right eye - half of it is still black."
“不要！”
"I don't want it!"
“不要！”九个妹子齐齐惊呼出声。
"No!" The nine sisters shouted in unison.
“不要！”萝卜用力的摇了摇头，一脸委屈的看着沈萤，“人家的花花，只想开给小姐姐看的。”
"No!" The radish shook its head hard and it looked at Shen Ying with grievance on its face. "I want to let only Little Missy look at my flowers."
“不见了，算了，错觉吧。”沈萤回过头，也没在意，再次夹起那块肉，啊呜两口就啃了个干净。
"It's gone. Forget it. I think I saw something else," Shen Ying looked back at the table and wiped it out of her mind. She reached for the slab of meat once gain and finished it off in two mouthfuls.
“不见了，这……这是什么法术？”因为送刀离得最近的轩辕禹也是一脸茫然，居然可以在大仙眼皮底下逃走，更奇怪的是，连他都没有感觉到任何灵力波动，到底用的是什么术法？

"They've vanished. What… kind of sorcery is this?" Even Xuan Yuanyu, the one who had handed over the knife and thus was the nearest to Yu Haiheng, was stunned. It was incredible that Yu Haiheng had managed to escape under the Great Immortal’s very nose. And what was even stranger was that he had not felt any fluctuations of spiritual power. What kind of sorcery was this?
“不认啊！”她回得一脸坦荡，这不迷路了嘛。
"I can't!" she replied honestly. I guess this means I'm lost.
“不认识。”沈萤摇了摇头，看向对面的孤月，顺口问道，“对了，你以前干嘛的？”
"Nope." Shen Ying shook her head. She looked towards Lonemoon and asked conveniently, "Oh right, what did you do in the past?"
“不记得。”
"No I do not remember."
“不许说出去！”
"Don't tell anyone!"
“不说？”沈萤长叹了一口气，这届挨揍的不行啊，手一松，直接用力一脚踹在他的背上。只听见咔嚓一声脆响，他整个人被踢出几米。

"You're not going to talk?" Shen Ying sighed. People had to be beaten to learn their lesson. She released her grip on his collar and kicked him hard in the back. There was a loud cracking sound and the man flew a couple of metres.
“不走。”
"I'm not going."
“不辛苦。”
"It's no trouble at all."
“不过……你跟那个剑修，到是个意外。”郁昊天扫了她一眼，魔气越加浓郁，“一个丝毫不受心魔影响，一个居然还能直接破塔而入。这等修为真是世间罕见，合该成为我炼魔的好材料！”

"But... You and that sword cultivator surprise me." Yu Haotian swept a glance at Shen Ying, his demonic Qi increasing in intensity. "One was not affected by mental demons, while the other could actually break into the pagoda directly. Such levels of cultivation are rare, both are good materials for my demon practice!'
“不过师父放心，我会尽快出关的。”
"Don't worry, Master, I will try to be as quick as possible."
“不过这房子破得有点厉害。”沈萤直接站了起来，四下看了看，看来要修好几天了，正打算安排人去叫兔子。
"But this room is quite badly damaged." Shen Ying stood up and looked around. Rebuilding this room would take a couple of days. She was just about to arrange for someone to call for the rabbit.
“不过，我还要带两个人去。”
"But I will still need two people to go with me."
“不过，此株草木灵好像还未到花期。”
"But this vegetation spirit doesn't look like it's about to bloom anytime soon."
“不错啊。”沈萤顺口夸了一句，“你们还挺厉害的嘛。”
"Not bad." Shen Ying added another word of praise, "Well done, everybody."
“不需要吗？”
"Don't we need it?"
"No!"
“不！”魔王却摇了摇头，“不是天生，是前生。”
"NO!" The Devil King shook his head and said, "Not from birth, but from the past life."
“不！不要！”
"No! Don't!"
“不！安儿绝对不是魔族！”羿清还没回答，薄飞平先一道清醒过来反驳道，“他生下来时，的的确确是个仙胎，只是不知何时……被种下了魔种。”他一脸的自责，关键是他们这么多年，居然都没有察觉。

“It cannot be！An is definitely not a demonic beast！”Pu FeiPing rebutted before Yi Qing could say a thing. “He was indeed born a fetal immortal. I don't know when he was planted the demonic seed. ” He reproached himself bitterly for not realizing it all these years.
“不！必须要换。”
"No! It must be changed."
“不，不可能的！”血狐的脸上更加的狂乱，“他是我跟雪儿的儿子，是她留给我在这世上唯一的血脉，他不会死的！你胡说！胡说！”

"No, impossible!" The blood fox looked even more frenzied. "He is my son with Snow Flake, the only bloodline that she has left for me in this world. He cannot be dead! You're talking nonsense! Nonsense!"
“不，不对！”
“No! Wait! Hang on…”
“不，不要！”魔修惊恐的大喊了一声，眼看着就要被剑气绞杀，突然叮铃一声响，那个被他扔出去的铃铛法器飞了起来，直接朝着羿清背后冲了过去。

"No, no!" The fiendish cultivator was seized with terror as he screamed. Just as the Sword Qi was about to pierce him, a ringing sound was heard; the bell-like Dharma artifact that he had thrown out flew above and headed straight for Yi Qing.
“不，我压不住它。”它压根怕的不是他吧？
"No, I can't suppress it." It was totally not afraid of him?
“不，我只是有些事没想通。你们不好奇吗……”她指了指血狐即使尾巴全断了，却还是下意识把用断尾护着的那个死婴，“它尾巴上那个，真的是他儿子？”

"No, I just haven't thought through some stuff. Aren't you all curious…" She pointed at the blood fox who, despite having all its tails pulled out, was still subconsciously protecting that dead infant with its broken tails. "The one on its tail, is that really his son?"
“不，我的意思……”
"No, I mean..."
“不，我的意思是说……”她一脸认真的道，“牛爸爸你飞升前，能不能为女儿们，留下足够的灵石？”会没钱吃饭的。
"No, I mean..." Shen Ying said earnestly, "Father Niu, Before you ascend, you you leave sufficient spirit stones for your children?" We would have no money for food.
“不，我认真的。”女子不知悔改的举了举手，肩头却不自觉下垂，显得更弱了，“你们真没必要出去找人报仇。”

"No, I'm serious." The woman raised her hand, showing no repentance. However, her gesture only caused her shoulder to slouch even further, making her look even weaker. "There is really no need for you to seek the culprit for revenge."
“不，是弟子学艺不精，才受此重伤，与师父无关。”羿清一脸坚定，“今后定会加倍修行，不辱师门。”

"No, I was seriously injured because my skills are not up to par. It has nothing to do with Master." Yan Qing said with a look of determination, "From now on I'll work doubly hard on my practice so that I won't be a disgrace to Master."
“不，此恩一定要报，不然有违我的道心。请恩人尽管吩咐。”
"No, this debt must be repaid, otherwise it would go against my Dao values. Please tell me your biddings, my benefactor."
“与其战战兢兢过一辈子，不如努力修练，拼出一条生路。我们从未做过任何伤天害理之事，为何不能堂堂正正的活在这个世界上？”

"We'd much rather work and train hard to live a life that we want to instead of living a life of fear. We have never done anything to hurt anyone else, so why can't we hold our heads high in this world?"
“与灵兽交流扬威结印呢？”
"Are you good at dominating the spirit beast or sealing them?"
“两……两位道友。”他僵硬的转头看向旁边两位，“可否愿接……”
"My two… two Fellow Daoists." He forced himself to face the two people standing beside him. "Can you please take over…"
“两人？”掌事一愣，转头往对方左右看了四五圈，这才注意到旁边的沈萤。咦？这人什么时候在这的，他刚刚居然没有注意到。细一打量，对方没有半点灵气，居然是个凡人。但想着另一个是金丹，又觉得不可能，问道，“道友也是来当护卫的？恕在下眼掘，不知是什么修为？”

"Two of you?" The steward paused, and then looked left and right about four or five times before he noticed Shen Ying at the side. Huh? When was this person even here, how could he have not noticed her? Upon taking a closer look, it was evident that she did not have any Spirit Qi, and even seemed to be a mortal at that. But the partner accompanying her was a Golden Core cultivator, so that did not seem plausible. He asked, "Fellow Daoist is also here to be a guard? Pardon me, but may I know what your cultivation level is?"
“两位家主，告辞！”孤月抱拳，扬起了商业笑容。
"Farewell, you two Family Masters!" Lonemoon cupped his fists and put on his best businessman smile.
“两位师兄！”孤月深吸了一口气，下定了决心，朝着余阳抱拳道，“孤月不想管什么宗门大义，但却知道什么叫朋友义气，他们是为了我才入那秘境，玄天宗既然护他们不住，我却不能坐视不管。请恕孤月从此不能再以玄天宗弟子自居。”这样的宗门，他留下来有什么意思？

"My two Senior Brothers!" Lonemoon sighed. He had made up his mind. He clenched his fist and turned around to Yu Yang. "Lonemoon doesn't care about the favours that Shen Ying and Yi Qing did for this sect. They entered the mystic realm for my sake. Blackheaven Sect can't protect them and I'm not about to stand by and do nothing about it. From now on, please consider Lonemooon as separate from the Blackheaven Sect." What good would it be even if he were to remain in the sect?
“两位请跟我来。”掌事带着两人上了二楼，他们这才发现，里面已经坐满了人，隐隐还能听到喊价的声音。看着像是一个小型的拍卖会。

"The two of you may follow me." The steward brought them to the second floor — that was when they realized this place was filled with people, as the faint sounds of shouts for bids could be heard. It looked like a mini auction sale.
“两位贵人来了。”一只兔妖上前道，“有小妖通知说发现这个人鬼鬼祟祟的出现在山门口，我们就把他堵住了。”

"Benefactors, you are here," a rabbit demon greeted them and stepped forward. "A few lesser demons spotted this man sneaking around outside the entrance to the hill. That's why we came here to stop him."
“两位走得真快，让我等好找！”其中一人上前一步笑道。
"You two moved so quickly, you really made us work to find you!" One of them stepped forward and said mockingly.
“两位道友打扰了。”那个中年游仙上前一步，笑得一脸和气的看向沈萤，只是眼底的贪婪却仿佛要溢出来，“请恕我等擅自跟来，实在是情非得已。我们有个不情之请，还请道友成全。”

"Sorry to intrude on you, Fellow Daoists." A middle-aged Traveling Immortal stepped forward and smiled, looking at Shen Ying. He sounded like he came in peace, yet he had pure greed in his eyes. "Please forgive us for following you — we really couldn't control ourselves. We have a favour to ask of you, Fellow Daoists."
“两位道友，谁要是肯接这传承，我……我……”碧涛四下找了找，最终一咬牙，一脸羞耻的指向旁边的练丹炉道，“我就将这炉中异火赠于二位，如何？”不管怎么说，这传承一定带出去，不然他死不瞑目！

"My two Fellow Daoists, if either of you are willing to inherit this heritage, I… I…" Bitao looked around him, searching for something to offer. He gritted his teeth and with a look of shame, he pointed to the elixir-refining cauldron beside him and continued, "I will donate the Deviant Fire in that cauldron to you. How's that?" No matter what, he had to pass down the heritage. Otherwise, he wouldn't rest in peace!
“中午了，又到了吃饭的时间。”沈萤推了推旁边，还处于懵逼状态的某人，“园长，你们园里出来旅游，都是不管饭的吗？”
"It's afternoon already, time for our meal." Shen Ying nudged a certain someone who was still in a daze. "Director, don't you provide food on your tours?"
“中午好！”
"Good afternoon!"
“丹纹没用，对丹药药效没有任何加成。”
"The elixir pattern is no use. The pattern does not add any addition ability to the elixir medical efficacy itself."
“丹药。”孤月一愣，莫非那青亦的目的，是里面某一样丹药。但他早已经是游仙，修为再不得寸进，什么仙丹能让他如此激动。

"Pills," Lonemoon repeated. Could the pills inside be what Qing Yi had been after? But he's already a Traveling Immortal — his cultivation level can’t get any higher. What Immortal Pill could have made him that agitated?
“为了妖界……”
"For the Demon Realm…"
“为了掌门，为了无敌派！”
"For the Sect Master, for Invincible Sect!"
“为什么？”
"Why?"
“为什么？”枫影一脸莫名，“凭我们打不过那些化神的，她不是很强吗？”
"Why?" Yin Feng was baffled. "There is no way we can defeat those Soul Formation cultivators by ourselves, isn't Shen Ying very powerful?"
“为啥要招弟子？”她愣了愣，好好修自己的不行吗？
"Why do we need to recruit disciples?" asked Shen Ying, baffled. Can't we just stick to practicing our own cultivation?
“为啥？”千算万算都没算到她居然会拒绝。
"Why?" Never had it crossed his mind that she would refuse him.
“为啥？”她一愣，早说啊拖了这么远。
"Why not?" she questioned. If she had known this earlier, she wouldn't have wasted so much effort in dragging this beast along.
“之前那个闯入城内的魔族还记得吗？”孤月沉声道，“你可知他是如何逃走的？”
"Do you remember the demonic beast that invaded the city? Do you know how he escaped?" Lonemoon asked solemnly.
“之前，是我等有眼无珠冒犯了掌门。无论有任何责罚我们都甘愿承受，还请允许我等正式入门。今后定将努力修行，扬我无敌派之名，恳请掌门收我等为徒！”

"Before, we were ignorant. That was why we offended you, Sect Master. We're willing to take any punishment as long as you allow us to remain in your sect. From today onwards, we will train hard to bring honor to Invincible Sect. Please, Sect Master, accept us as your disciples!"
“之增么可冷（这怎么可能）！”那人眼里终于染上些许的惊恐，连话都说不清楚了。他明明用了十成的功力，为什么一点反应都没有，她到底是什么人？

"Hof fan fith be (How can this be)!" The man's expression was one of pure shock. He was not even speaking clearly. He had used all of his powers, yet it did not affect her in the least. What kind of person was she?
“九九不是八十一吗？”沈萤愣了一下，为啥是八十二道？
"Doesn't nine nine makes eight-one?" Shen Ying was confused, why was it eighty-two?
“九天锁星阵！”
"Empyreal Star Lock Array!"
“也不会。”
"Also no."
“也不是！”孤月脸色有些为难，跟同样表情的羿清交换了个眼神，一时不知道怎么解释，半会才沉声道，“因为她……是纯阴之体！”

"It's not that!" Lonemoon appeared a little troubled, as he exchanged eyes with Yi Qing who was wearing the same expression. He did not know how to explain it, and only continued after a while. "Because she has… the body of pure Yin!"
“也不知道你怎么想的，明明知道沈萤会来，拼什么命啊？”孤月忍不住念叨道，“要是再晚一会，可不是昏迷半个月这么简单，连你这身修为都要废了。”

"I don't know what you were thinking. You knew very well that Shen Ying would come, so why did you go all out?" Lonemoon could not help nagging. "A little longer and it would not be as simple as being comatose for two weeks; you would have lost your all your cultivation."
“也不知道这墙后面有什么，值得那人连同门都可以出卖。”孤月瞅了瞅眼前闪着阵法光芒的墙，下意识的捏了几个法诀拍在墙面上，却发现那墙面一点反应都没有。

"I wonder what's behind this wall that that guy would even betray his own people." Lonemoon glanced at the shining array formation on the wall in front of him, subconsciously produced a hand seal and tapped on the wall, but the wall showed no response.
“也可以啊！”
"That's okay too!"
“也可以这么说。”
"You could put it that way."
“也可以这么说。”他点了点头道，“只是门派大比，每十年才举办一次，这一次刚好就是三天后。”
"You can call it that." He nodded. "This competition among the sects only occur once in ten years and this time it’s coincidentally happening in three days time."
“也行！”沈萤犹豫了一下，这才移开了踩着他的脚，想想自己的目的又问了一句，“那你以后，还敢不敢了？”
“That works！”Shen Ying removed her foot from his chest after a moment of hesitation. She added,"Then, do you still dare to do it again？”, after thinking about her purpose.
“书斋先生的腰也不酸了。”
"The book store master's back pain has gone away."
“书斋家的大黄狗断了条腿。”
"The yellow dog in the book store lost two of his legs."
“乱嚷嚷什么？”正在上首的男子睁开眼睛，“如此慌乱成何体统，到底发生了何事？”
"What are you blabbering about?" The man seated at the top opened his eyes. "So disorderly, what exactly happened?"
“乱我军心者，便是这厮下场！”
"This is what will become of you if you dampen our troops’ morale!"
“事到如今还敢狡辩！”一道带着化神威压的声音瞬间就从前面传了过来，门口不远的印元飞和思羽眼看着就要被逼跪了下去。

"You still dare to deny at this point!" a formidable Soul Formation oppressive sound travelled from inside the room. Just inside the door, Yin Yuanfei and Si Yu looked as though they were being forced to kneel.
“事有轻重缓急，想我丹阳宗创派万载，出了多少练丹奇才。却终是躲不过覆灭的命运，但唯有这一派之传承，绝不可断。今日我便将此传承于……”

"There are important things and unimportant things in this world. Since Dan Yang Sect was formed, so many other prodigies in pill refining were produced. Yet, not one of them managed to avoid being wiped out. However, the Dan Yang Sect alone has managed to hang on to this day. Now, I have finally found someone to pass the heritage down to-"
“二。”沈萤纠正。
"Second," Shen Ying corrected.
“二位若是没什么事……”毕浩抬头看了一眼，试探性的道，“我等二人，可否先行告退？”
"If the both of you are alright…" Bi Hao raised his head, and carefully said, "May we make a move first?"
“五、天……”孤月直接把手里的东西就扔了过来，“那你这些天吃的是什么？猪食吗？”
"Five days…" Lonemoon threw the object in his hand straight at her. "Then what have you been eating these few days? Pig swill?"
“五万年来，你是唯一……”
"You are the first in 50,000 years to..."
“五十灵珠一位！”守在传送阵前的修士，朝两人伸出手。
"50 spiritual pearls per person!" The cultivator guarding the transportation array stretched out his hands towards them.
“交代个屁！“
"Account my ass!"
“人剑合一……”羿清身上突然暴发出了庞大的剑气，四周的灵气开始疯狂的向他身体涌去，瞬间填满了他早已经枯竭的丹田，身上的伤口也以肉眼可见的速度开始恢复，就连修为也开始疯长。

"Be one with your sword…" Sword Qi began to surge around Yi Qing's body as Spirit Qi began to flow right into him. In seconds, his Qi was restored and the wounds on his body began to heal in front of their eyes. Even his cultivation level began to increase rapidly.
“人妖？”沈萤一愣，再次嫌弃的退后了一步。
"A human demon?" Shen Ying hesitated. She took another step back in disgust.
“人妖？”虎王愣了一下，“人妖是什么妖？从未听闻！”
"A human demon[1. Human demon literally means transvestites in Chinese.]?" The Tiger Monarch was taken aback. "What's a human demon? I have never heard of one before!"
“人跟妖真的能有孩子？”
"Humans and demons really can have children?"
“人阶上品丹药十两银子一枚，我这丹药听这炼丹师的口气品阶不高，不过他们小姐都惊动了，显然也看出这丹药的不寻常了？价值怎么也比人阶上品丹药高吧？”江逸脑海飞快转动，很快咬牙道：“二，二十两银子一枚。”

"The Man-tier superior-grade elixirs are worth ten taels of silver per pill. According to your alchemist here, my elixirs are not of high-quality, yet they were able to trigger the Young Mistress their caln to settle this herself. Is it not evident enough that this elixir is extraordinary? Surely, the value would be higher than any Man-tier superior-grade elixir?" Jiang Yi's mind moved as fast as lightening. Very soon, he gritted his teeth and said, "Two, twenty taels of silver for each pill."
“人阶上品武技流星拳？江豹，你……”
“The Man-tier superior-grade martial art technique Shooting Star Punch? Jiang Bao, you…”
“人阶下品，应该不止吧？不说是地阶，最少也应该是人阶上品吧？”江逸暗暗琢磨了一下，就回道：“不是人阶下品。”

"Man-tier Inferior-grade - it surely can't be only at that level? To say nothing of being of earth-grade, but surely the elixirs should at least be of Man-tier superior-grade?" Jiang Yi hesitated for a while before replying, "They are not of Man-tier inferior-grade."
“人？”易峰一惊，“什么人？在哪？”
"A person?" Yi Feng was shocked. "Who? Where?"
“什……什么小孩？”魔王一脸懵逼，还没从那顿披头盖脸的毒打中回过神来，从来没有被人这么揍过，简直就是辗压！

“Ki...Kid? What kid?" The Demon King was dumbstruck, clearly yet to recover from the horror of the brutal beating he had just received. Never had he ever been boxed until this extent, with him being at the clear lost ground.
“什么……什么萝卜，你……到底是谁？”
"What… what radish? You… who are you?"
“什么事？”
"What is it?"
“什么人，出来！”她转头看向右侧的树丛间。
"Who are you, come on out!" She looked to the right of the forest.
“什么人，敢闯入……”正想着，门口却传来一道熟悉的声音，刚刚下山的易峰带着几个弟子冲了进来，看到她突然愣住。

"Who is this, who dares to invade..." Just as Shen Ying was trying to figure out what was happening to the beast, a familiar voice sounded from the door. Yi Feng, who had already descended the peak earlier, suddenly charged into the cave with his disciples following behind him. He hesitated when he recognised Shen Ying.
“什么人？”
"Who is it?"
“什么人？”他唤出自己的武器，转身看向妖气的来源。
"Who are you?” Summoning his weapon, he turned towards the source of the demonic aura.
“什么人？”宁子安吓了一跳，惊呼出声，已经分不清是哪个的声音了。整个身子退后两步，这才抬头看向她，眼里的疑惑一闪，认出她来，“是你！你是沈……沈……”

“Who is that？”Utterly shocked, Ning ZiAn exclaimed, failing to recognize the source of the sounds. He retreated backwards, then raised his head to look at her. Bewilderment flinched in his eyes, before he recognized her,"It's you! You're Shen...Shen...... ”
“什么人？”芮糜一惊，猛的回头看去，却看到一个灰扑扑的人，身上还裹着被子，浑身脏兮兮的，乱蓬蓬的头发上还插着几根稻草。他心下一紧，是个女人，她什么时候在这里的？以他的修为，居然毫无察觉！

"Who's that?" Rui Mi was taken aback. He violently turned his head back to check, but all he saw was a person covered in dust with a blanket over the body. Her body was filthy and her messy hair even had several pieces of hay stuck in it. His heart contracted — it was a woman, since when was she here? With his level of cultivation, he did not detect anything at all!
“什么仙门修士，原来也只是自私的普通人罢了。”他叹了一声，似是放下了什么，转头看向旁边的人笑了笑，“沈萤多谢了！够义气，以后你就是我亲妹子了！”

"What immortal sect cultivators, at the end of the day they are just some selfish normal human beings." He sighed, as if letting go of something, then turned to look at the person beside him and said with a smile, "Shen Ying, thanks a lot! Since you are so loyal, from now on you are my sister!"
“什么升仙塔？”郁红和思羽听得一脸迷糊，“上青界谁有这么大的本事，可以同时困三大世家的家主和游仙？”

"What Immortal Ascension Pagoda?" Both Yu Hong and Si Yu looked baffled. "Who in the Upper Azure World is capable of trapping the three great aristocratic families' patriarchs and traveling immortals?"
“什么大事，这么着急？”奚秋做了两百年的掌门，这还是第一次见他这么凝重的样子，还特意来请他。

"What's the matter, what's the hurry?" Xi Qiu had been the sect master for 200 years. This was the first time he saw him with such a grave expression and for him to even specifically come to invite him over.
“什么情况？”
"What's the situation?"
“什么意思？”沈萤转头带些惊讶的看向他，“这个世界纵容强\奸犯的吗？”
"What does that mean?" Shen Ying turned around and looked at him in shock. "This world shelters rapists?"
“什么海鲜?”
"What seafood?"
“什么狗屁门规？”
"What kind of stupid rule is this?"
“什么身份？”孤月一愣，他不就是薄飞平的儿子吗？还有什么叫他的男主？
“What identity？”Lonemoon went blanked. Is he not just the son of Pu FeiPing? And why are they calling him male protagonist?
“什么重丰日？”沈萤皱眉。
"What "Heavy Day"?"
“什么！”
"What!"
“什么！”你不是散修吗？奚秋一惊，脱口而出，“你师父是谁？”
"What! Aren't you an itinerant cultivator?” Surprised, Xi Qiu blurted out, "Who is your master?"
“什么！”孤月一惊，卧槽，男主不是个名门正派吗？啥时候变反派了，这剧情偏纲了啊喂，“你是说这些魔气是他放出来的……他也是魔族？！”

“What!”Lonemoon exclaimed，F***，Isn't he the protagonist？Since when did he transform to become the antagonist?This storyline is going far off，“You mean he released these Demonic aura... He is a demonic beast？!
“什么！”孤月一惊，连那冷淡的表情都快要维持不住，“你说他叫什么？”
"What!" Lonemoon exclaimed, unable to maintain his usual calm demeanor. "What did you say his name was?"
“什么！”青尹一愣，似是没有想到有人发现了上古秘境后，不单没有着急的宣告主权，划到自己宗门里，居然还通知了其它门派一起分享。眉头瞬间就拧了起来，果然只是些下界的修士，一群蠢货！身上化神期的威压顿时就朝着对方放了过去。

"What!" Qing Yin was shocked. Apparently he did not think that anyone who discovered a mystic realm would have informed other sects to share in it instead of immediately claiming ownership over it. His brows furrowed together, thinking: no wonder they are just some lower realm cultivators, a bunch of idiots! The Soul Formation stage’s suppression in him was immediately released towards the other party.
“什么！你叫我讨好她？不可能！她可是毁了我追魂楼的人。”
"What! You ask me to boot lick her? Impossible! She destroyed the people of my Soul Chasing Tower."
“什么，活人练丹！”印风一惊，这可是只有魔修才会做的事。
"What, refining pills using living people!" Yin Feng was stunned, that was what fiendish cultivators would do.
“什么？”
"What?"
“什么？”他下意识的问了一句。
"What?" He responded.
“什么？”孤月一愣，这怎么可能！“没受伤，不是说这镇子死了十几个人，还有金丹修士吗？”
"What?" Lonemoon was confused. How could this be! "No injuries, but weren't we told that the demon has killed more than a dozen people, including a Golden Core cultivator?"
“什么？”轩辕家主脸色一沉，“好大的口气，两个化神修士，居然也敢来轩辕主家撒野！通知惩戒堂堂主，带人拿下那两人。”

"What?" The look on the master of the Xuan Yuan Family became solemn. "What a grand notion. Two Soul Formation cultivators having the audacity to behave atrociously in the Xuan Yuan Family! Go inform the Disciplinary Hall's Hall Master, get people to hold those two down."
“什么？你不做工了？要外出三个月？”
"What? You are quitting? And leaving for three months?"
“什么？连净化阵也逼不出里面的恶鬼？”不出幡，它们是想魂飞魄散吗？
"What? Even the purge array cannot force the demon souls out?" Did they want their souls to be pulverized into non-existence by staying inside the gonfalon?
“今天天气真好啊，午饭吃啥呢？”
"The weather is so good today. What should we have for lunch?"
“今天迟了，明天吧！”
"It's getting a little late, let's settle on tomorrow!
“从……”沈萤想了想才回答，“你骂男人都不是东西的时候。”
"From…" Shen Ying fell into thought for a few seconds. "From the time you said that men were useless."
“从今天开始，你就是我的厨……啊呸！”她临时开了口，“你就是我徒弟了！”
"From this day onwards, you are my chef... arh! She quickly corrected herself. "You are my disciple!
“从你们抱怨，工作多没提成的时候起。”她耸了耸肩，朝三个越退越远的人招了招手，“怕什么，我又不是你们老板？我叫沈萤，来来来，过来坐，我有点事想问问你们。”

"Ever since you guys were complaining about how you were getting no raises at your jobs." She shrugged and waved towards the three of them who were retreating further away from her. "What are you afraid of, I am not your boss. I am Shen Ying. Come over here, I have some stuff that I want to ask you guys."
“从未听闻！”羿清摇头。
"No!" Yi Qing shook his head.
“从此之后，你须……你说啥？”仙魂愣了一下，这人是不是傻，“这可是传承，你居然不要。你知不知道只要你练出了传承中的丹药，飞升成仙指日可待。”

"From today on, you will… What did you say?" The immortal soul hesitated. Was this person out of her mind? "This is a heritage. How could you refuse it? Do you know that if you manage to refine a pill from our heritage, you could easily attain immortality?"
“从现在开始你们就是我无敌派的弟子了。”他朝着眼前这群仍旧裹得严严实实，还刻意低着头的女子扫了一眼，皱了皱眉指向终于做完饭的羿清道，“本派目前虽然只有三个人，但以我和他的修为，足够教导你们。望你们以后努力修行，早登仙途。”

"From now on, you are all disciples of my Invincible Sect." He looked towards the group who were still mostly covered up in their robes and even purposely glanced at the girl who was hanging her head, and then he furrowed his brows and pointed towards Yi Qing who had finally finished cooking. "Although this sect currently only has three people, his and my cultivation will be sufficient to teach all of you. Hopefully, all of you will work hard on your cultivations and head towards the path of immortality soon."
“他……他们是剑修，不只是惩戒堂堂主，几位化神长老都去了，根本拦不住那两个人。”
"They… they are sword cultivators. Not only the Disciplinary Hall's Hall Master, a few of the Soul Formation Elders went up against them as well, but they just could not stop those two."
“他……他就是刚刚在珍宝阁，跟我抬价拍法器的人。”修士瞅了瞅对方脸上的黑色条纹，往后缩了缩，“没想到，他居然是魔修。”

"He… he was just at the Treasure Pavilion, bidding against me for my Dharma artifact." The cultivator glanced at the man whose face was covered in black stripes, shrunk back and said, "Never did I expect him to be a fiend cultivator.""
“他不是剑修吗？要那练丹圣物干嘛？”
"Isn't he a sword cultivator? What does he want that pill-refining monster for?"
“他们已经出发了？”孤月更加惊讶，“用得着这么急吗？那去通知下兔王，到时让它们放行就是。”
"They're already on their way?" Lonemoon was even more surprised. "Did they have to be in such a hurry? In that case, inform Rabbit King to let them in when they arrive."
“他们要找的就是这个草木灵？”羿清问。
"They're here to find this vegetation spirit?" Yi Qing asked.
“他们说，此妖只在深夜出没。来时伴着一股黑气，根本看不清它的样貌。”呈安继续道，“镇西的绸缎庄，酒庄，客栈，镇东的书斋，胭脂铺，就连街尾住的猎户家那妖怪都闯入过。”

"They said that this demon only came out in the middle of the night. It was shrouded in a black Qi, so they couldn't see its appearance at all." Cheng An continued, "The textile shop, the winery and the inn in the west of the town, the school, the rouge shop in the east of the town, and even the houses of the hunter families at the end of the street have been broken into by the demon."
“他们都是你们家的游仙。可能还有人沉陷心魔，失去自我……”羿清没有再说下去。
"They are all your family's traveling immortals. Some of them may still be trapped in their mental demons and lost their self..." Yi Qing let his sentence trail off.
“他又不是人。”
"He's not a person."
“他可不是幻象，这便是升仙塔第一层的考验。只要你打败他，离飞升就更近一步。”那声音再次响起，带着些嘲讽的味道，“大道无情，为你心中之道，是否能手刃同……咦？”

"He's not an illusion. This is the first level test of this Immortal Ascension Pagoda. If you defeat him, you will be one step closer to achieving Immortal Ascension," the mocking voice sounded once more. "The road is ruthless. What remains to be seen is whether your heart can be equally ruthless to... Eh?"
“他吃了就可以直接成仙？”
"They can achieve Immortal Ascension if they eat the pill?"
“他在秘境中顿悟了。”孤月嘴角抽了抽。
"He had an epiphany in the mystic realm," Lonemoon explained as the corner of his mouth twitched..
“他大概这么高，八岁的样子，穿蓝白色衣服。”沈萤比了比自己的腰际，“我问过附近的阿黑，他们说这里你最大，事都是你做主的，所以我才来找你的。”

“He is approximately this height, around eight years old, wore blue and white colored clothes." Shen Ying said as she placed her hands at the height of her waist as a gage,"I've asked the 'Blackies' nearby. They say you are the highest in power here. You are the decision maker to all matter, hence I came to find you.”
“他如何做到的？”再怎么遁逃也不可能退得这么干净。
"How exactly did he do it?" Yi Qing questioned. However he escaped, it was impossible for him to do it so cleanly without a trace.
“他怎么了？”孤月问。
“What happened to him？”Lonemoon asked.
“他挺好的啊。”还会端盘子呢，沈萤一边啃着糕点，顺口回了句。关键长得挺好吃的样子。
"He's quite nice," Shen Ying retorted as she chewed on a pastry. He knows how to serve dishes too. The best part about him is he looks delicious.
“他果然躲在下面，追！”孤月说了一声，就跳了进去。这狐妖也是狡猾，怪不得它要躲回洞里，洞中黑暗，如果他们逃进去，绝对发现不了这个阵法，自然也找不到它。只是它估计没想到，他们会把洞劈开。

"He really is hiding underneath. After it!" cried Lonemoon, jumping in. This fox demon was so cunning. No wonder it decided to hide in this cave; the darkness in the cave meant that there was no way they could detect the array formation, so naturally they would not be able to locate it as well. It was just that it had not counted on them breaking the cave apart.
“他自愿签的契约，怪我罗。”孤月一脸商业假笑，扫了她一眼道，“我这么拼命为门派创收，都是为了谁啊？！”还不是为了养你们这群吃货！

"He voluntarily signed the contract, can't blame me." Smiling his fake businessman's smile, Lonemoon defended himself. Casting a glance at her, he said, "Isn't it all for your sakes that I'm working my butt off, generating income for the sect?!" I'm doing all this to feed you foodies!
“他要见我干嘛？”沈萤懵了懵。
"What does he want to see me for?" Shen Ying asked.
“他要这个干嘛？”
"What does he want this for?"
“他闭关了。”孤月顺口回了一句。
"He is in seclusion." Lonemoon replied.
“他？可那明明是天道的紫宵天雷，什么人可……”他突然似是想到什么，细一看对方身上的气息，脸色顿时一沉，“你是上界的仙人。”

"Him? But those were bolts of Violet Nightfall Heavenly Lightning from the Heavenly Dao. How can someone...@ He trailed off, as if having suddenly thought of something. He studied the stranger's aura and his expression darkened, "You are an Immortal of the Upper World."
“仙……仙师！”终于有人忍不住开口道，“听……听刚刚两位仙长说，您……您是无敌派掌门？！”
"Immortal… Immortal Master!" Finally, someone could not hold back, asking "I heard… heard from the two immortal elders from before that you… you are the sect master of Invincible Sect?!"
“仙师，我们可以加入吗？”
"Immortal Master, can we join?"
“令牌！”
"The token!"
“以前你跟系统对话时，也是这样把别人晾在旁边的吗？”
"Previously when you talk to your system, do you also shove others to the side?"
“以后也不收了。”她又加了一句。
"And I won’t be taking in any disciples in the future as well," she added.
“以后我就住这里了。”
"I'll be staying here from now on."
“以她那个变态的实力，该担心的应该是那个魔修吧？！”你急个屁啊！
"With her freakish strength, shouldn't we be more concerned for the fiendish cultivator?!" Why the hell are you so worried!"
“以我们现在情况加入哪个世家都不适合。”孤月皱了皱眉。沈萤这个吃霸王餐的名声先不说。轩辕家那一闹，他和羿清也出了名，但四世家之间本来就是个平衡的局面，如果让他们加入，就是明摆着跟轩辕家做对。而其它的门派，更是不敢公然与之为敌。

"We're not suited to join any sect or family given our current situation," Lonemoon frowned. Shen Ying's reputation as a freeloader aside, Lonemoon and Yi Qing's names were spreading like wildfire because of what happened with the Xuan Yuan Family. The four aristocratic families existed as coequals; if any one of those families took Lonemoon and Yi Qing in, they would clearly be pitting themselves against the Xuan Yuan Family. As for the other sects, no one would dare to make an aristocratic family their enemy.
“以我对师父的了解……”羿清皱了皱眉，犹豫了一会才道，“她不是斗不过那魔修。”
"From what I know about Master…" Frowning, Yi Qing hesitated for a moment before saying, "It's not that she can't fight and defeat the fiendish cultivator."
“任翼师弟，如此美人，你怎么就不懂得怜香惜玉点呢？”
"Junior Brother Ren Yi, how can you not cherish and be more tender towards such a beauty?"
“休想狡辩。”孤月声音一沉，“你敢说这镇中的骚乱不是因你而起。”
"Don't try to deny it." Lonemoon deepened his voice. "You dare to say that the chaos in this town was not your doing."
“会……吧？”这不就是有一个吗？
"Guess... so? Isn't there one here?
“会的，一会定的！”郁红紧了紧身侧的手，不知道是给自己还是她们打气，“我们连断空涯都能逃出来，还有什么可惧的。只要等我们到了下界就自由了。有那个人的庇护，我们可以重新开始新的生活，没有人敢再轻视我们。”

"Yes, yes we can!" Yu Hong held the hand of the girl beside her tightly, not sure if she was encouraging them or herself. "We have escaped even from the Sky Severance Cliff, so what else is there to fear? As long as we can hang on until we reach the Lower Realm, we will get our freedom. With that person's protection, we can start anew and no one would dare to belittle us again."
“传承！”孤月一惊，一脸不敢置信的瞅了瞅那残魂，再瞅向沈萤，“他……他不会就是这座仙宫的主人吧？！”他定神一看，果然发现那道残魂身上隐隐还萦绕着仙气，这真是道仙魂！

“Heritage!" Lonemoon was shocked, not daring to believe what he was hearing. He glanced at the remnant soul before turning to face Shen Ying. "Don't tell me he's… he's the master of this Immortal Pavilion!" He calmed himself down and took another look at the remnant soul. Indeed, he saw that the remnant soul was surrounded with Immortal Qi. He was really an immortal soul!
“传闻中的追魂楼主果然有点本事。”郁海珩冷笑着上前道，“仅仅是元婴修为就可以布下迷魂阵，只可惜这样的阵法困得住我们一时，却困不住一世。你们终究逃不了一死。”

"The Master of the Soul Chasing Tower is capable indeed," Yu Hai Heng mocked. "You're just a Nascent Soul, yet you're able to set up a Soul Confundus Array. It's a pity that the array could only hold us back for awhile and not forever. You can't escape death afterall."
“传闻用草木灵的花练丹，还有提升丹药品阶的作用。”羿清也看了看那草木灵补充道。
"It's said that we can use its flower to refine and upgrade our pills," Yi Qing chimed in as he, too, studied the vegetation spirit.
