“但……你们却可以！”血狐话音一转，神情越加的兴奋，看着羿清和孤月的眼光仿佛看着什么饕餮盛宴，“哈哈哈……没想到玄天宗会直接送我一个化神和一个元婴修士，有了你们俩的修为，再加上这血祭大阵，我就能重新唤回我儿的魂魄，他就可以复生！”

"But… you can!" cried out the blood fox, his expression becoming increasingly excited. He looked at Yi Qing and Lonemoon like he was looking at a sumptuous feast. "Ha ha ha… I didn’t expect Blackheaven Sect to send me a Nascent Soul and a Soul Formation cultivator. With the cultivation from both of you, plus this Blood Sacrifice Array, I can recall the soul of my child, he can be resurrected!"
“但你给我兽丹之事，就不必跟他们提了。”她转了转手里的蓝色珠子，“这些所谓的名门正派，向来自以为是，有的是下作的手段，你不要犯傻死撑！要真怕说漏嘴，这珠子就算是我抢的吧。”反正她也不在乎多一个杀人夺宝的罪名。

"But you don't have to mention about giving me the beast pill." She turned the blue bead over in her hand. "These so-called righteous people from established sects think very highly of themselves but secretly do the dirtiest things. Don't try to tough it out! If you're afraid of saying the wrong thing, say that the pill was taken by me." In any case, she no longer cared whether one more count of killing and robbery was added to her list of crimes.
“住口！”孤月心底一凉，瞪向说话的那人，他怎么可以说这种话？当初那三人找上玄天宗，若不是这些人无能，怎么可能轮得到羿清一个刚入门没多久元婴进去。好不容易回来，还带回了那么多灵植，还一根不留全交给了宗门。如今大难临头，他们为了活命，要不顾他的死活吗？

"Shut up!" Lonemoon's heart stilled. He turned to glare at the Hall Master. How could he say something like that? When the three Traveling Immortals came up to Blackheaven Sect, Yi Qing was a mere Nascent Soul. He wouldn't have had the chance to go if the people from their sect had not been so useless. To think that the three of them had fought so hard to come home with so many spirit herbs in tow and had even given everything they had found to the sect. Now, in the face of trouble, these people were willing to give up Yi Qing's life to save their own?
“住口！”振祥脸色扭曲了一瞬，“满口胡言，分明是你们背叛师门，还打算就此下界与魔修为伍，今日我只是阻止你们犯下大错。”

"Shut up!" Zhen Xiang's expression grew twisted for a moment. "You’re full of crap. It was obvious that you guys betrayed the sect and even intended to go to the Lower Realm to partner up with fiendish cultivators. I am only preventing you guys from making a huge mistake today."
“住手！”
"Stop!"
"Stop it!"
“住手！”眼看着血祭大阵里开始漫延出一条条血痕，以极快的速度朝着四朝开始蔓延，大部分直接朝那个小镇的方向而去，孤月心下越加的着急，“血狐你要是敢屠城，我玄天宗必不会放过你的。”

"Stop it!" Streams of blood seeped out from the Blood Sacrifice Array, spreading quickly in all directions with most of it spreading towards the small town. Lonemoon panicked and said, "Blood Fox, if you dare to massacre the town, my Blackheaven Sect will never let you go."
“住手！”羿清飞身上前想阻止，却已经来不及了，旗上他布下的封印，应声而碎，金色的法符碎破成了千万片，浓郁的鬼气顿时喷涌而出，气温骤降。

"Stop it!" Yi Qing flew forward in an attempt to stop him but it was too late. The seal that he had placed on the gonfalon shattered; the golden Dharmic amulet broke into thousands of pieces, and the temperature fell rapidly as dense Ghost Qi spewed out.
“住手！芮糜她只是一个凡人。”
"Stop it! Rui Mi, she is only a mortal."
“住手，救命啊！小姐姐……”
"Stop, help! Little Missy..."
“何为入股？”
"What are shares?"
“何为歪歪？洗衣鸥？”羿清听得一脸茫然，“师父以前听说过他？”
"What's Wai Wai? See Yee Oh?" Yi Qing looked blank. "Master, have you heard of him in the past?"
“何人？”
"Who?"
“你NPC吗？还要把台词从头说一遍。”
"Are you an NPC? Why are you repeating your lines?"
“你TM不是来安慰我的吗？有你这样只吃东西不说话的安慰吗？好歹问问我为什么不高兴吧？”
"Can't you freaking comfort me? Why would you sit there and eat and yet not say a word? Why don't you at least ask why I'm unhappy?"
“你TM就不能忍着？”
"Can't you bloody bear with it?"
"You…"
“你……”从没见过这么不要脸的人，他心口一塞，越说越是窝火，干脆直接拔出剑，指向她道，“甚至欺人太盛，我追魂楼虽然不是什么世家仙门，但也不是任人欺凌之辈。”

"You..." He had never seen such a shameless person, he was dumbfounded. The more he spoke, the more he felt the anger so he directly took out his sword and pointed at her, "You are really bullying others to the extreme, although my Soul Chasing Tower isn't some aristocratic family, we are not ones to be bullied."
“你……”他忍不住开口道，“你……到底对我的系统做了什么，为什么只有你可以听到系统的话？”而且还有问必答。
"You..." he couldn't help but ask, "What exactly did you do to the system? How are you the only one who can hear what it says?" And why does the system answer every single one of your questions?
“你……”他这会是真的慌了，脸色变换了好几次，突然想到了什么，咬牙冷笑出声道，“哼，你们这群不自量力的凡人！就算现在抓了我又如何？今天就是重丰日，等时间一到，这笔账我定会讨回来。你们一个都逃不掉。”

"You..." He was really panicking now. Several different expressions flickered past his face. Suddenly looking as if he thought of something, he scoffed, "Pfft, you are just a bunch of mortals who do not know their own strength! So what if you catch me? Today is "Heavy Day". When the time comes, I will come back to settle the score with you. Then, you can only dream of escaping."
“你……”她深吸了好几口气，才压下想要杀人的冲动，用力指了一个方向，“你再敢回来，我就将你抽骨练魂，那边！”

"You…" She had to take a few deep breaths before she managed to suppress the urge to kill. Pointing hard at one direction she said, "If you dare to come back, I will use your bones for my spirit practice. Over there!"
“你……”孤月一急，正要上前却被旁边的余阳一把拉住，“师兄！”
"You…" Flustered, Lonemoon was just about to go forward, but he was held back by Yu Yang. "Senior Brother!"
“你……”孤月气急，搜魂是何定阴损的法术，虽然可以寻搜到对方生前所有记忆，但却是直接作用于魂魄的，此术一下被搜魂者不死也要半残了，他这话跟明目张胆说想要杀人有什么区别。

"You…" Lonemoon was furious. Soul-searching was an exceedingly depraved method. The user would have access to all of a person's memories, but this would have a grave effect on the person's soul. That person would definitely end up a paralytic, at best. What difference was this from saying he wanted to kill Yi Qing?
“你……”孤月顿时有些生气了，他好歹是个化神修士，都主动要收徒了，他居然还再三拒绝。就算是未来的剑仙，架子也用不着摆这么高吧，“虽说一日为师，终身为父。但我等修仙之人，自与凡人不同。为了你的仙途，不必守这等死礼。”

"You…" Lonemoon was a little angry now. He was, after all, a Soul Formation cultivator. He had taken the initiative to take him on as a disciple, yet Yi Qing had the gall to reject him again and again. Even if he were the future sword cultivator, he did not have to put on such high airs. "Although the saying 'Once your teacher, forever your teacher' is not wrong, it does not apply to those who practice immortal cultivation as they are different from mortals. For the sake of your immortal future, you should forgo traditional proprieties."
“你……”戚橙雨紧了紧手心，一脸复杂的看了沈萤一眼。
"You…" Gripping her palms tightly, Qi Chengyu looked at Shen Ying with a complicated expression.
“你……”羿清刚憋出的大招卡住了，一时间不知道当不当放。
"You…" Yi Qing had forced out a huge move but held it back, unsure of whether he should unleash it.
“你……”羿清突然睁大眼睛看向他，“你的天劫要来了！”
"You..." Yi Qing looked at him in sudden realization and exclaimed, "Your Heavenly Tribulation is coming!"
“你……”要不是他的凌云峰被她劈了，以为他愿意过来这里啊。嗯，绝对不是因为想找唯一的老乡唠嗑！
"You…" He would never have come here if his Lingyun Peak had not been split apart by her. Well, definitely not because he wanted to look for the only person from his hometown!
“你……”见他油盐不进，孤月只好用激将法，“你师父要是对你好，也会愿意你拜我的。她毕竟只是个凡人，修仙的事她知道个J8，将来要是你……”

"You…" Seeing that Yi Qing did not take this bait, he resorted to psychological warfare. "If your master knows what's good for you, she will also want you to become an apprentice under me. She is only a mortal after all. What the heck does she know about immortal cultivation. In the future, if you…"
“你……”谁TM要做你徒弟啊！
"You…" Who the hell wants to be your disciple!
“你……”这怎么可能？她居然轻而易举的就折断了他的九品灵剑。
"You..." How was that possible? She so easily broke apart a ninth-grade spirit sword.
“你……”郁红更是惊讶，她……她不是中了禁制吗？为什么还能动？
"You…" Yu Hong was even more surprised than he was. She… wasn't she restricted? How can she move?
“你……什么时候来的？”郁红心底猛的一沉。
"You… when did you appear?" Yu Hong's heart sank.
“你……你一路小心，我明天一早再……再去你们那小院找你。”
"You... you be careful on the way home. First thing tomorrow morning... I'll go to your small yard to look for you."
“你……你不是住在后殿吗？”
"You... don't you stay in the back of the hall?"
“你……你个死脑筋怎么就说不通呢？”孤月气急，来回走了一圈。很想就此调头回去，你爱拜不拜。偏偏为了自己的前途，他还不得不搭上他这条船。深吸了一口气，这才继续劝道，“我说兄弟，我这可是为你好。我好歹是一派的化神尊者，做了我徒弟你直接就是个富二代了，要啥没有？你不是快要修成剑意了吗？我可以帮你啊！”

"You… why can't I knock sense into your stubborn head?" Lonemoon was so angry that he paced back and forth. He really wanted to turn and leave. He really wanted to say, 'Do what you like,' and turn and leave. But for the sake of his future, he had to latch onto Yi Qing's coattails. Taking a deep breath, he continued, "I say, Brother, I'm doing this for your own good. I am a Soul Formation cultivator of a sect, as my disciple you would automatically become a rich second generation. You can have anything you desire. Aren't you almost at the point of attaining Sword Intent? I can help you!"
“你……你们想干什么？”
"What... what are you trying to do?"
“你……你到底对千叶草木灵做了什么？”那游仙眼珠一转，硬着头皮大声道，“这就是我轩辕的千叶草木灵，定是你向它施加了什么邪术，才让这已认主的草木灵，听命于你。”

"You… why do you have a Thousand Leaves Vegetation Spirit?" The Traveling Immortal turned around, frowned and continued, "This is the Thousand Leaves Vegetation Spirit that belongs to my Xuan Yuan Family. They must have cast some sort of evil spell on the Thousand Leaves Vegetation Spirit so that is no longer recalls who its real owner is. That's why it's listening to you."
“你……你听得到！”枫影猛往后一退，一脸见鬼的样子看向沈萤。
"You... you can hear it!" Feng Ying took a huge step back with a face like he was spooked out and looked at Shen Ying.
“你……你怎么会……啊！”
"You... How could you... Ah!"
“你……你怎么会有这个？”戚橙雨猛的睁大了眼睛。
"You… how did you get this?" Qi Chengyu's eyes widened in astonishment.
“你……你是谁？！”清韵跳了起来，连退了好几步，他们居然完全没有察觉到身边多了一个人，“你到底何时坐在这的？”
"You… who are you?!" Qing Yun jumped up and fell back a few steps; they had not realized in at all that there had been a person beside them. "When exactly did you sit here?"
“你……你要给我？！”戚橙雨不敢置信的睁大眼看着她。只差没在脸上写上，你是不是傻几个字了，“放心，我答应放你走，就不会反悔。这虽然是五阶水属性的灵兽内丹，疗伤圣药。但这灵兽既然是你捡到的，那便注定是你的。本尊还不屑做夺人机缘之事。”

"You… you want to give it to me?!" Qi Chengyu stared at her in disbelief, the words "Are you stupid?” all but written on her face. "Rest assured, since I promised to let you go, I will not go back on my word. This is a fifth-level water attribute spirit beast pill, a medicine with magical healing powers. Since this beast was found by you, it is destined to be yours. I won't deprive others of their good fortune."
“你……你跟那两个闯入的剑修是一伙的？”他警惕的退后了一步，这才看到女子的手上好像抓着条绳子，他顺着那绳子看去，只见那端似绑着什么，女子轻轻一拉，顿时扯出一串的人影，咚咚咚的全倒在了地上。

"You… you are with the two sword cultivators that broke in?" Alarmed, he took a step back before realizing that this girl had a rope in her hand. His gaze followed the rope to the other end that seemed to be tying something together. When the girl lightly pulled, a bunch of silhouettes appeared, all falling onto the ground.
“你……你还想干什么？”郁海珩眼睛大睁，惊恐的看着她手里的刀，“我……我可是郁家家主。”
"You… what else are you intending on doing?" Yu Haiheng’s eyes widened in horror as he looked at the knife in her hand. “I… I am the patriarch of the Yu Family."
“你……你这样看我干嘛？”孤月瞬间从扇子上炸了起来，你到底明白什么了啊喂，“说了那是我侄女的书，不是我买的！你这眼神啥意思，我像是买黄书的人吗？”

"You… why are you looking at me like that?" Lonemoon immediately exploded on the fan. What did you even understand? "I already told you it's my niece's book, I didn't buy it! Why are you looking at me like that, do I look like someone who buys porn?"
“你……全都听见了！”
"You... heard everything!"
“你……开玩笑？”沈萤嘴角抽了抽，这人脑子没事吧？他好像之前萝卜过敏来着，不会有啥后遗症吧？
"Are you… kidding?" Shen Ying's mouth twitched. Is this person alright in the head? He did seem to have an allergy towards carrots, could this be some kind of post-allergy symptom?
“你……是体修！”这怎么可能！
"You... you're a body cultivator!" How could this be!
“你……真的可以？”别啊，我还可以再体恤点的。
"You… are sure that you can?" Please don't, I can still be more sympathizing.
“你、还、我、礼、物！”
"Return me my gift!"
“你一开始就知道我是纯阴之体！”
"You knew that I had a body of pure Yin all along!"
“你一边哦一边摇头是几个意思，没听懂就直说。”
"Why do you shake your head while saying ‘oh’. If you didn't understand just tell me."
“你不变人形，打扫的人就不够了！”
"If you don't change into the human form, the number of people doing cleaning will not be enough!"
“你不叫我叫了。”他话还没说完，沈萤突然转头喊了一声，“萝卜，你出来一下。”
"If you don't call it, I will." He hadn't completed his sentence before Shen Ying turned around and interrupted him. She called out, "Radish, come out here for a while."
“你不必谢我，我只是……你说啥？！”孤月一顿，到口的话又吞了回去。他听错了吗？一个化神修士想收他为徒。他……他居然拒绝了！他招牌式的清冷神情都僵了一下，质问的话脱口而出，“为什么？”

"You don't have to thank me, I just… what did you say?!" Lonemoon paused, and swallowed back the words that had come to his mouth. Did he hear it wrongly? A Soul Formation cultivator wanted to take him as a disciple. He… he actually declined! His trademark cool expression stiffened, and he blurted out questioningly, "Why?"
“你不是不要吗？”
"I thought you don't want it."
“你不是我的系统吗？为什么要帮着外人？”
"Aren't you my system? Why are you helping an outsider?"
“你不是拿给我的吗？”孤月挑衅似的扬了扬眉，“去去去，再拿几碟过来。”
"Didn't you bring these for me?" said Lonemoon, raising his brows tauntingly. "Go, go, go, bring me a few more plates of pastries."
“你不用担心，我是真心收徒。有任何疑问，都可问我。”孤月忙加了一句。
"Don't worry, I have only the best intentions for him. Feel free to air any doubts you have." Lonemoon added hurriedly."
“你个吃货有不爱吃的吗？”孤月回头瞪了沈萤一眼，“话说你到底哪边的……等等，你在捡什么？”
"Is there any food that you don't like?" Lonemoon turned around and glanced at Shen Ying. "Whose side are you on… Wait, what are you doing?"
“你丫给我站好！”孤月恨铁不成钢的瞪了她一眼，扶正了一下旗子。他有想过，新生的门派很难收到弟子，却没想到情况会这么冷，连好奇来问问的人都没几个。还尽是一些杂灵根，或是灵根品阶太低的。根本不适合做剑修。

"You better freaking stand up straight!" Lonemoon turned to look at her with a death glare and adjusted the flag. He knew that it would be difficult for a new sect to recruit disciples, but he had not expected that their situation would be so bleak. There were not even many people who cared to ask about their sect and the people who did were of low-quality Spirit Roots—they were not even suited to be cultivators.
“你为什么没事？”在上古灭灵阵里，她居然可以行动自如！这怎么可能！
"Why are you not affected?" She could move around freely in the ancient Spiritual Annihilation Array! How was that possible!
“你也没问啊！”
"You didn't ask either!"
“你也知道它只是疗伤圣药，而不是复生之药。紫霞玄芝是救不活一个已经死了，连魂魄都没有的尸体。”这婴儿这么久还没醒就是证明，羿清继续道，“血狐，你手中的婴儿，早在出生之时就已经死了。”

"You too know that it is just a divine healing medicine, not a medicine for resurrection. Splendor Lingzhi cannot revive a corpse whose soul has already left its body. The fact that this baby has not woken up for so long proves it." Yi Qing continued, "Blood Fox, the baby you are holding was already dead at birth."
“你什么意思？”
"What do you mean?"
“你什么意思？”他明明已经历劫成功。
"What do you mean?" Lonemoon had already successfully completed the Lightning Tribulation.
“你什么意思？”孤月眉心一紧，有种不详的预感。
"What do you mean?" Lonemoon's heart sank with an ominous feeling.
“你从哪看出这是个育儿系统了？”枫影瞬间炸毛，他堂堂元婴真人哪里育儿了，“你知不知道它……”
"Who told you this is a parenting system?" Feng Ying was infuriated. He was a Perfected Nascent Soul afterall, definitely not a child. "Do you know it-"
“你从郁家回来的？到底发生了什么事？解决了吗？”孤月问道。
"You came back from the Yu family? What exactly happened? Has it been resolved?" inquired Lonemoon.
“你仔细想想，这只毒兽附近有没有别的什么东西？”孤月把手里的内丹递了过去问道。
"Think carefully. Was there anything else where you found this toxic beast?" Lonemoon asked as he stretched his hand forward to show Shen Ying the beast's internal core.
"You…"
“你们……”沈萤突然推了推易峰道，“不觉得这里有点暗吗？”
"Don't you..." Shen Ying nudged Yi Feng, "think it's a little dark here?"
“你们……”郁海珩显然很不满这么个结果，原本想打压打压这个无敌派，没想到结果什么好处没讨到不算，估计还要扯出一堆，让郁家丢脸的丑事，“就算如此，她们也终是郁家的逃奴。”

"All of you..." Yu Hai Heng was obviously unhappy with the result, the intention to suppress this Invincible Sect ended with not gaining any benefits and also dragged out the ugly matters from his family into the open, "Even if that's the case, they are still the escaped slaves of the Yu Family."
“你们……为啥如此俱怕沈姑娘。”他忍不住问。
"All of you… why would you be so afraid of Lady Shen," he couldn't help but ask.
“你们不觉得……”沈萤突然开口道，“有点热吗？”
"Don't you guys feel a little..." Shen Ying suddenly broke the silence, "... hot?"
“你们两个不走就让一让，莫挡着后面的人。”守卫有些不耐烦的挥开了两人，继续朝着后面的伸出手。对方掏出一把半透明的珠子递过去，走向了图案中。

"Move aside if the two of you are not traveling, don't block the people behind." The guard impatiently waved at the two of them to go away as he continued to signal to the people at the back. The next person in line took out a handful of translucent pearls and passed it over, then walked towards the patterns.
“你们两个，给我站住！”
"Hold up, you two!"
“你们两小姑娘，跑外面来……”枫影话还没看完，一看前方顿时一愣，“咦，你……郁家家主！”他不是失踪了吗？
"You two little gals, why did you run out ..." Feng Ying stopped in mid-speech, stunned by the scene in front of him. “Hey, you... Yu Family Patriarch!" Wasn’t he missing?
“你们也看到那个叫沈萤的女子了，为何那两位都是化神，她却没有半点修为。你们不觉得奇怪吗？”郁红脸色变了变道，“说是掌门，我看也只是个笑话而已。许是那两位藏私，不想教授她而已。或是里面还有别的阴私。这样的人，你们确定他们会护住我这些，‘叛出师门’的人？”

"You saw the lady they call Shen Ying. How come she remained a mortal while the two men reached Soul Formation? Don't you think that's weird?" Yu Hong's expression changed as she said this. She continued, "They say she's the sect master, but I think they're making a joke out of her. Maybe they're just hiding their skills from her because they refuse to teach her. Maybe they are hiding other things too. Do you think people like them would take care of people like us who have ‘betrayed our sect masters’?”
“你们做总裁的，天凉王破不是标配吗？”她笑道。
"Isn't it customary for you CEOs to attempt to bankrupt others?" she joked.
“你们到是运气好。”青尹冷笑了一声，轻蔑的扫了对面的人一眼，“居然会先我等一步找到这里。咦？那是……”他突然猛的睁大眼睛，视线直直盯向孤月的腿上，“你们居然找到了千叶草木灵！”

"Luck seems to favour you." Sneering, Qing Yin looked disdainfully at the people in front of him. "You actually managed to arrive before us. Huh? That's…" He suddenly widened his eyes, staring fixedly at Lonemoon's leg. "You actually found the Thousand Leaves Vegetation Spirit!"
“你们可想好了应对的方法？”
"Have you all come up with a strategy?"
“你们就是想要去下界的人？”街角走出一人，看着年纪不大，金丹修为，身着一身黑色的衣袍，一只细小的眼睛不断的打视着眼前的几人。

"You guys are the ones who wanted to go to the Lower Realm?" A young man stepped out from around the corner. He was a Golden Core cultivator, dressed in black. His slit eyes scanned the group that stood before him.
“你们居然追到了这里！”一道男声突然响起，只见那祭台上站着个一身红衣的身影，明明是男子，却长得分外妖媚，眉眼间尽是风情，背后脱着九条红色的大尾巴，其中两条断了一截，断口上还能看到血迹，正是刚刚那只九尾血狐。

"You actually tracked me right up to this place!" A male voice suddenly sounded out. A figure clad in red was standing at the altar. Although obviously a man, he looked especially seductive, with a flirtatious look in his eyes. Nine big, red tails trailed behind his back, two of which were severed, and blood stains could still be seen on the site of the wounds. It was the nine-tailed blood fox which they had been pursuing.
“你们掌门何在？”那三人在上空停留了一会，最右侧的一人扫视了脚下的主峰一眼，眼神满是轻视，似是有些嫌弃周遭的一切，身上还放出了淡淡的威压。

"Where is your sect master?" The three of them paused in the air for a while. The one on the right glanced at the main peak with disdain, seemingly looking down on everything around, and he even released a mild suppression.
“你们是不是……”瞎啊？
"Are all of you... blind?"
“你们是什么人？敢擅闯悟剑峰。”
"Who are you people? How dare you break into Sword Comprehension Peak."
“你们是什么门派？”一个白衣少年一脸天真的问。
"What sect are you from?" asked a white-clothed young man innocently.
“你们的确不是什么仙子，但你们可以是所有人的噩梦！”
"You bunch are definitely no fairies, but you could be nightmares of all these people!"
“你们看到那个魔界之门了？”他问。
“You guys saw the Door of Demon Realm？”He asked.
“你们看啊，那家长明明是我揍的，那五个游仙也是我绑回去的。为啥一路来大家说的都是你们，一下都没有提到我的名字？存在感这么低，有点不科学吧？”

"Look, I was the one who hit that family's parent. I was also the one who tied up the five Traveling Immortals and carried them back. Yet, on the way here, people have only been talking about the two of you. Why hasn't anyone mentioned my name? It doesn't make sense that I seem so insignificant, right?"
“你们真的不回屋休息？”
"You all really don't want to rest in the house?"
“你们要加入我派？！”孤月一喜，总算有识货的人了。
"You guys want to join my sect?!" Lonemoon was delighted. Finally, someone with good discernment.
“你们觉不觉得……”她神色更加正经，一字一句的道，“我的知名度太低了点？”
"Don't you think…" Her expression became more serious as she emphasised each of the following words, "I'm not very famous?"
“你们说……它是谁的萝卜？”沈萤看向众人。
"What do you think... who does this radish belong to?" Shen Ying turned to face the crowd.
“你们说这个啊。”孤月呵呵一笑，抱起腿上的萝卜挂件，笑得一脸得瑟的道，“真是不好意思，这小东西与我们有缘，刚进秘境就遇到了，没办法啊。”

"Oh, you mean this." Chuckling, Lonemoon picked up the radish pendant on his leg. With a cocky expression on his face, he said, "I'm sorry but this little thing seems to have an affinity with us. We met immediately on entering the mystic realm. Can’t be helped, it's fate."
“你们还有什么话说？杀害三位长老的，就是此人！”那人转头指向大殿前的羿清，一脸愤怒的道，“今日若你们不把这凶手，与那日进入过秘境的人全都交出来，那你们这宗门，也没有存在的必要了。”

"What else do you have to say? This is the person who killed the three Elders!" The speaker turned towards Yi Qing in anger. "Today, if you guys do not hand over the murderer along with all the people who entered the mystic realm that day, your sect will not have a purpose to exist."
“你们这些人……真无聊。”沈萤长长叹了口气，有找茬的时间，吃点好的多好。回头看向后面的玄天宗众人，眼神一扫而过，没有半点停留，转身就对着羿清道，“厨子啊，这里的东西我吃腻了，要不换个地吧。”

"You people… have nothing better to do," Shen Ying sighed. How good would it have been if they had used their spare time to savour some delicacies? She turned around to face the crowd from the Blackheaven Sect. She swept the crowd with her eyes, not resting her gaze on anyone. Turning around to Yi Qing, she said, "Chef, I'm tired of eating the food from this sect. Let's change location…"
“你们这啥眼神？”他直接回了两人一个白眼，“老子还不是为你们擦屁股？再怎么说，我们都是玄天宗的人，随便跑到别人山头来找茬，不编个理由说得过去吗？”

"What's with that look of yours?" He rolled his eyes back at the duo. "Wasn't I just cleaning up your mess? Besides, we are all from Blackheaven Sect, how can we not fabricate an excuse when we come to their mountain to stir trouble?"
“你们这是……”沈萤瞅了瞅两人，用力啃了口瓜，“在打情骂俏吗？”
"Are you guys..." Shen Ying looked at the two of them and chewed hard on a melon, "flirting?"
“你们这样看着我干嘛？怎么了？”沈萤皱了皱眉，这一起便秘的表情是怎么回事？“昨晚发生什么事了吗？”
"Why are you looking at me like that? What's wrong?" Shen Ying frowned. Why were they looking at her with that constipated expression? "What happened last night?"
“你们这种人我见得多了，不见棺材不落泪。若是不给你们点教训，以后岂不人人都敢到店里来白吃白喝。”说着他一招手，团团围住的众人纷纷唤出了武器。

"I've seen many people like you. You’d continue to hold out hope until you're faced with grim reality. If I don't teach you a lesson today, everybody would come to my restaurant and think they can have free meals." As soon as he had finished, he waved his hand. The crowd surrounding them began to draw their weapons.
“你们这话是什么意思？”郁海珩也有些怒了，似是不满他们帮腔，“难道我堂堂郁家家主，这种事也会弄错吗？况且她刚刚自己都承认了。”

"What are you guys trying to say?" Yu Hai Heng became angry, as if he were unhappy with those people supporting their arguments, "Are you saying that as the Yu Family's Master, I can make such a mistake? Besides, she has just admitted it herself."
“你休想!”郁红握紧了手中的剑，无敌派只有战死，没有降兵！
"Dream on!" Yu Hong tightened her grip on her sword. People from the Invincible Sect would only die in battle - they would never surrender!
“你休想！”血狐眼睛暴睁，身后狐尾直接朝着沈萤攻击了过去，眼看着就要将她打个对穿。她却突然回过头，随手一抓就抓住了拧成一股的数条狐尾，令其再不能再进一步。

"You wish!" The blood fox's eyes bulged as his fox tails directly targeted Shen Ying. But just as his tails were about to impale her, she suddenly turned back and grabbed the tails, twisting them into a bundle and restraining them from moving another inch forward.
“你使唤人到是挺熟练啊，一只还不够，也不怕撑死！”她抱怨了一句，却还是接了过去。多久了……多久没有和人这么平静的说话了。对方的眼里没有恐惧，没有憎恨，更没有那种恶心的贪婪。

"You seem to be very experienced in ordering people around. Is one chicken still not enough for you? I hope you don't die of overeating!" She grumbled for a while, but still took the bird over to cook. How long had it been… How long had it since she had held such a calm conversation with another person? There was no fear in the other's eyes, no hatred and no disgusting greed.
“你再回来一次，我真的杀了你！”
"If you come back again, I will really kill you!"
“你再敢问路，我现在就杀了你！”戚橙雨直接一个火球扔了过去，在她身侧烧出一个半米大的坑。
"If you dare ask the way again, I'll kill you now!" Qi Chengyu straightaway hurled a fireball in Shen Ying's direction, burning a half-meter pit into the ground next to her.
“你再说一遍，那人带了什么上山？”高坐于大殿上的玄天宗掌门奚秋，猛的站了起来。
“Tell me again, what was the man carrying up the mountain?" Startled, the Blackheaven Sect’s master Xi Qiu shot up in alarm from his high seat in the great hall.
“你刚刚同意羿清单挑，不会是因为犯困懒得动吧？”
"Did you agree to let Yi Qing fight Qing Yi alone because you were too lazy to move?"
“你刚是在装死？”女子眨了眨眼，在兔子跟前蹲下。
"You were feigning death?" The woman blinked before squatting down before the rabbit.
“你别突然对我笑好不好？我会以为……你想给我钱的。”
"Can you not smile at me all of a sudden? I will think that… you want to give me money."
“你到是个重情重义之人。”他朝着羿清赞赏的点了点头，“既如此，我允你拜入我门下后，仍可照拂于她便是。”这些一日为师想法，他还是可以理解的。

"You are indeed an empathetic and righteous person." He nodded at Yi Qing in appreciation. "Since that's the case, I'll permit you to continue taking care of her even after you join my sect." As the saying went: 'Once your teacher, forever your teacher'. He could understand Yi Qing's feelings for his teacher.
“你到是有善心。”芮糜不屑，朝沈萤走了过去，“自己都这样了，还想救人！”
"You are so kind," Rui Mi showed disdain on his face. He walked in Shen Ying's direction and said, "You are already in this state and you still have thoughts of saving others!"
“你去哪了？里面到底发生啥了？”
"Where have you been? What happened on the inside?"
“你又想干什么？”戚橙雨看着他手上的丹药。
"What are you up to now?" Qi Chengyu looked at the elixir in her hand.
“你叫本仙过去，本仙就一定要过去吗？”碧涛冷哼一声，完全没有飘动的意思，他也是有情绪的。
"Do you expect me to go over just because you told me to?" Bitao snorted. He stayed right where he was; he had feelings too.
“你可以继续闭关。”
"You can continue to be in seclusion."
“你吃了我，也没必要白跑一趟啊？”
"Even after you eat me, there's no need for you to make a wasted trip, right?"
“你呢？”沈萤突然转头看向他，顿时杀气四溢。
"And you?" Shen Ying suddenly turned to look at him, full of murderous intent.
“你啥意思？你是说我打不过她？”
"What do you mean? You mean I can't defeat her?"
“你大爷！”他直接放弃了神识传音，自暴自弃的吼出声，“系统你够了！什么鬼梨花带雨，快点把这眼泪收回去。”
"Fuck you!" He immediately gave up on the voice transmission through divine perception, and snarled in despair, "That's enough system! What weeping beauty, get those tears back in now."
“你好了？”沈萤看了他一眼。
"Are you done?" Shen Ying glanced at him.
“你好啊！”沈萤也挥了挥手。
"Hello!" Shen Ying waved her hand too.
“你娘亲是我的主人，不是她我江云海早就死了，也不会有今日的成就，我当年发誓一辈子效忠与她！”

"Your mother was my master. Without her, I would have been dead a long time ago, not to mention attaining whatever successes I have today. Back then I swore that I would be loyal to her for the rest of my life!"
“你干嘛？”孤月吓了一跳，还是第一次见到她这么紧张的样子，“发生啥事了？”
"What are you trying to do?" She gave Lonemoon a shock since it was the first time she presented herself in such a stressed out manner, "what happened?"
“你干嘛？”孤月心有余悸的退后一步，怎么有种会被打劫的感觉？
"What are you doing?" Lonemoon shuddered at her actions as he stepped back. Why did he feel like he was going to be robbed?
“你干嘛？”沈萤吓了一跳。
"What are you doing?" Shen Ying was shocked.
“你得了吧，虽然陪练对战时双方封印了元力，但里面那群公子小姐，哪个不是铸鼎境五六重以上？就算不动用元力，凭借反应速度和武技也可以轻松把你揍成猪头。昨天我那个铸鼎境三重的表哥就去陪练了一天，最后却是爬着出来了，此刻还在家里养伤呢。那群公子小姐下手太狠了，这钱不好赚啊……”

"Alright, that's enough. Although both sparring parties have their essence force sealed off from use during sparring practice, that group of young masters and young mistresses... which one of them does not have a power level at the fifth or sixth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, or even higher?
"Even if they don't use any essence force, they can easily beat you to a pulp just by relying on their reaction speed and martial arts techniques alone. Yesterday, my cousin, whose power level is at the third stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, went to be a sparring partner for a day, but in the end, he left the place crawling.
"At this moment he is still healing his injuries at home! Those young masters and young mistresses are too ruthless in their combat actions! This money is not easy to earn at all..."
“你心情不好，也要吃饭的啊。”她直接把糕点放下，拍了拍他的肩道，“说吧牛爸爸，你想让哪家破产？”
"No matter how unhappy you are, you have to eat,” she set the pastries down beside him and patted his shoulder. "Talk, Father Niu. Which family do you want to bankrupt?"
“你怀小兔子了？”她突然问道。
"You are pregnant with bunnies?" the woman suddenly asked.
“你怎么不吃？不饿吗？”好像记得他跪的这三天，一点东西都没吃吧，连她递过去的萝卜白菜，他也拒绝了。还以为他要绝食抗议呢？这会她都已经答应他了，不饿吗？

"Why aren't you eating? Not hungry?" She seemed to recall that he had been kneeling for the past three days. So he probably hadn't eaten anything, as he had even rejected the carrot and cabbage that she offered. She had assumed that he was on a hunger strike. Now that she had already given her promise, why was he still not eating?
“你怎么可能不知道！”他顿时从椅子上跳了起来，“那它为什么处处帮着你？”要不是灵魂契约不能取消，他都要怀疑这叫系统的家伙，想换个主人了。
"How can you not know!" Feng Ying jumped out of his chair. "Then why is it helping you all the time?" If soul contracts could be terminated, he imagined that the system would want to change its host.
“你怎么知道？”狸猫的哭声停了一下，扬着泪眼哗哗的双眼道，“万妖王……的本体，的确是……兔族的。”
"How did you know?" The civet cat suddenly stopped crying. Looking at Shen Ying with teary eyes, it said, "The Myriad Demon King's... true form is indeed... of the rabbit race."
“你怎么连这都不知道？”戚橙雨诧异看了她一眼，解释道，“妖是妖，兽是兽。妖类本是牲畜，开了灵智即为妖，修练神通就可化形。而兽生来不凡，但却没有灵智，修练高阶才能化形生智。”

"How come you don't even know this?" Qi Chengyu looked at her in surprise and explained, "Demons are demons, beasts are beasts. Demons are originally animals that turned into demons upon gaining sentience. If they cultivate in divine powers they can attain manifestation. Beasts are extraordinary creatures at birth but they do not have sentience, they can only attain manifestation and gain sentience if they reach a high level of cultivation."
“你怎知此事？”羿清道，虽然都知道魔界的存在，但却没有人真正去过，怎么会出现在仙界偏远的曲双城中？“此事兹事体大，你确定是魔界之门？”

"How did you know about this? This is a serious matter. Are you sure that was the door of the Demon Realm? " Yi Qing asked skeptically. Even though everyone knew of the Demon Realm's existence, but no one has ever went into the realm before. How could it appear in the remote Qushuang City?
“你总算好了，走，去曲双城！”孤月朝他招了招手，后面拉着的就是沈萤。
"Let's go," Lonemoon pulled Shen Ying to her feet.
“你恢复了修为！”郁红有些不敢置信的看向郁海珩，明明他的修为在那天就已经被掌门废了，这怎么可能！
"You've recovered your cultivation!" Yu Hong stared at Yu Hai Heng in disbelief. His cultivation had been destroyed by Sect Master the other day. How could it be!
“你恶不恶心？”孤月瞪了他一眼，立马给自己施了个去尘诀。
"Aren't you disgusting?" Lonemoon glared at her and immediately casted a dirt removal spell.
“你想多了。”羿清眼神转了一下，更加一本正经的转移话题道，“你也是剑修，为何会陷入心魔这么久？”还直接被人操纵，如果再晚一点，他估计就出不来了，“你到底看到了什么？”

"You're thinking too much," Yi Qing avoided eye contact with Lonemoon. He changed the topic swiftly, "You're a sword cultivator yourself, why were you trapped with your mental demons for so long?" And you were manipulated without realising. If Lonemoon had been trapped for a second longer, he would never have made it out alive. "What did you see?"
“你想屠城！”羿清上前一步道，显然他跟孤月一样想到了这一点。他杀的那十几个人，明显不够启动血祭大阵，但是如果加上镇子里所有的人，那就够了。若不是他们来得早，估计之前那个小镇早已经是尸横遍野了。

"You want to slaughter the entire town!" Yi Qing said, stepping forward, evidently coming to the same conclusion as Lonemoon. The dozen or so people he had killed were obviously not enough to activate the Blood Sacrifice Array, but if all the people in the town were included, it would be enough. If they had not arrived in time, the entire town would likely have been full of corpses.
“你想干什么！”他这话一落，地上的人受到刺激一样的拼命想爬起来，大声喊道，“你还想害人！”
"What are you intending!" At his words, the man on the ground was provoked and used all his might to crawl up, shouting, "You still want to harm people!"
“你想干嘛？等等！”下一刻沈萤突然身形一闪，消失在了原地，她顿时有种不详的预感……
"What are you doing? Wait!" The next moment, Shen Ying had vanished from sight. All of a sudden, she had an ominous feeling…
“你想找她师父当面对质？”
"You want to confront her master?"
“你想死啊！”他回头翻了个白眼，“没看到满天的剑气，再近点不被切片才怪！”
"Do you want to die!" He looked back and rolled his eyes. "Do you not see the sky full of Sword Qi. It would be a miracle to not get slashed into pieces!"
“你想泡我？！”
"You want to hit on me?"
“你想要啊？”沈萤歪了歪头。
"You want it?" Shen Ying tilted her head.
“你感觉出什么了？”孤月也看出这片地界有异，心下警惕起来。
"What are you sensing?" Lonemoon also felt that this wasteland felt different. He was on his guard.
“你愿断去魔骨？散尽魔气？”白泽突然沉声道。
"Are you willing to get rid of your demonic bones and dissipate all your demonic Qi?" Bai Ze suddenly asked in a low voice.
“你懂个屁！那真不是黄书，我也是无意中翻了几页，没细看。”虽然有颜色的段落的确写得让人印象深刻，但他绝对不是因为这个才记住这本书的，“我哪知道现在的小女孩，居然喜欢看这种东西。我可从来不看的。”

"What do you know! It really wasn't porn, plus I only flipped a few pages accidentally, didn't read it in detail." Although the obscene paragraphs had left quite the impression, he definitely did not remember the book because of that. "How would I have known that little girls nowadays actually like this kind of stuff. I never read them."
“你才放肆!”沈萤扬手就朝它后脑勺拍了一下，“吓唬小孩你很有本事啊？”
"You're the one who's being absurd!" Shen Ying slapped the back of his head. " Are you very proud of scaring little children?"
“你打不过我。”白泽仍是冷着张脸道。
"You're not my match." Bai Zhe said, still wearing that cold look.
“你把消息泄漏给了别人！”男子顿时有些恼怒，立即就唤出了武器，作势要灭口，“这事可不能让其它人知道。”
"You told other people about this!" The man became outraged and immediately drew his weapon. He was ready to silence all of them. "Nobody else can know about this."
“你投生到了曲双城？”
"You were reincarnated into the Double Cities of Qu?"
“你故意引我们入阵！”上古灭灵阵是早已经失传的阵法，传说可以吸取阵中任何生物的灵气，他也只是在一些典籍中看到过此阵的形容。

"You deliberately led us into the array!" The ancient Spiritual Annihilation Array was a long-lost array formation. Legend had it that it could absorb the Spirit Qi of any creature inside the array. Lonemoon had only seen it described in some ancient records.
“你敢叫我一声临时厨子试试？”没等沈萤说完，厨房里炒菜的身影猛的回过了头，“信不信我真揍你！”
"Don't you dare call me a temp chef!" Without waiting for Shen Ying to finish her sentence, the figure stir-frying in the kitchen turned around fiercely. "Or believe me I will really thrash you!"
“你无需做多余担心。”似是看出他顾虑什么，孤月沉声道，“天生剑体虽然难得，本尊到还不看在眼里。”天生剑体，绝佳的剑修资质，的确很容易招人眼红夺舍。看他这神情，估计之前不少遇到这种事。

"You don't have to worry about it." As if he could tell what Yi Qing was worried about, Lonemoon said, "Innate Sword Embodiments are rare no doubt, but to me they are nothing special." Innate Sword Embodiment represented the perfect quality to being a sword cultivator; it was something coveted by many people. Looking at Yi Qing's expression, Lonemoon guessed he had encountered such situations before.
“你既然认识那个剑修，看来你就是那个所谓的无敌派掌门吧？郁海珩可是栽在你手上了！”
"You know that Sowrd Cultivator. You must be the so-called Sect Master of the Invincible Sect. Yu Hai Heng was really putty in your hands!
“你是YY集团CEO……”沈萤睁大了眼睛，大人物啊！Z国首富，“牛爸爸？”
"You are YY corporation's CEO…" Shen Ying widened her eyes. Such a big shot! Nation Z's richest man. "Father Niu?"
“你是主峰弟子？”孤月皱了皱眉，“奚秋找我何事？”
"You are a disciple of the Main Peak?" Lonemoon furrowed his brows. "Why is Xi Qiu looking for me?"
“你是什么人？”羿清心下警惕看向四周，却没有感觉到任何陌生的气息。
"Who are you?" Yi Qing cautiously looked around but did not detect any unfamiliar aura.
“你是什么人？！”黑影周身的黑雾突然涌动起来，隐隐有一道赤红的目光，正扫了过来，“你到底怎么进到这的？”
"Who are you?" the fog surrounding the black figure began to surge as a pair of red eyes scanned Shen Ying. "How exactly did you come in here?"
“你是何人？”
"Who are you?"
“你是剑修！”那游仙也是一惊，一个化神初期的修士，在他的威压之下居然还能安然无恙，也就只有剑修了。

"You're a sword cultivator!" The Traveling Immortal was surprised. The fact that a cultivator who had just risen to Soul Formation stage was able to withstand his formidable power could only mean that this cultivator was a sword cultivator.
“你是想逐个击破？”孤月一惊，眼睛顿时亮了几分。
"You plan to divide and conquer ?" Lonemoon's eyes suddenly lit up with excitement.
“你是说……”孤月一愣，顿时明白她的意思，原来玉鼎当初背后的人，是郁家的旁系真人，难怪当初甘子睿能躲进悟剑峰，突然就明白这些人曾经都经历了些什么。

"You mean…" Lonemoon hesitated. He realized what she was saying. The person behind the jade token was the Perfected One of the Yu Family's branch lineage. It was no wonder Gan Zirui was able to hide in Sword Comprehension Peak. Suddenly, everything he had gone through made sense.
“你是说……他天生就这样了？”没听说过天生的精神分裂啊？
"Are you saying... that he was born like this?" Have you not heard of "Schizophrenia" from birth?
“你是说，郁家家主突然消失了？还带上了那些游仙长老。”孤月越听眉头就皱得越深。
"You're saying, the Master of the Yu Family suddenly disappeared? And he also brought all those Traveling Immortal elders with him," Lonemoon frowned as he repeated.
“你是谁？！”血狐一惊，猛的转过头，这人什么时候进来的，刚刚有这么一个人吗？而且……
"Who are you?!" Shocked, the blood fox turned back abruptly; when did this person enter, was there such a person there before? Moreover…
“你是金丹修士！”魔修眉头一皱，满脸的忌惮，狠狠瞪了不远处的陆修士一眼，“臭小子，没想到你居然请到金丹修士护送。可惜……”他手间一扬快速结印，冷笑了一声，“你们遇上了我，注定要死在这里。”

"You are a Golden Core cultivator!" The fiend cultivator's brows furrowed together, his face filled with dread, and he stared at Cultivator Lu who was standing nearby, "You punk, never did I expect you to get a Golden Core cultivator to escort you. Too bad…" He waved his hand to remove the seal and sneered. "Since all of you met me, you are destined to die here."
“你是魔修。”羿清步步走近，脸上没有半丝动容，“此等杀人夺宝之事，你亦不是第一次。我若放了你，岂不助纣为虐？此番饶你不得！”

"You are a fiendish cultivator." Yi Qing stepped closer without a change in expression. "It must not be your first time committing such acts of murder and stealing treasures. If I were to let you go, wouldn't I be helping you do evil? This time I must not let you off!"
“你是？”
"You are…"
“你有办法？”孤月有些惊讶的看向他。
"Do you have a way?" Lonemoon looked at him in surprise.
“你来小院干嘛？”思羽有些不满的退后一步，自认跟这个人不熟。
"What do you want to come to our small yard for?" Si Yu stepped forward unhappily. She wasn't that familiar with this man.
“你来干嘛？”羿清终于转头看向旁边的人，眼神顿时一冷，又来偷师的！
"Why did you come?" Yi Qing finally turned to look at the person next to him, a chilly expression in his eyes. He's trying to steal my master again!
“你来真的？！”这人脑子真的有病，怎么办？好麻烦啊！
"Are you for real?!" This person must be seriously ill in the head, what should I do? So troublesome!
“你没听过吗？”沈萤认真道，“一力降十会啊！”
"Have you not heard of it?" Shen Ying said seriously, "One strong man can overcome ten!"
“你父亲很强大，但他当年抛弃了夫人，不是他夫人也不会死，所以……不到万不得已，我不想去找他，甚至我都不想看到他，否则我怕我会拼了命也要刺杀他的！”

"Your father was formidable. However, if it wasn't for him abandoning My Lady back then, she would never have died. So... unless absolutely necessary, I would never want to find him. No, I don't even want to see him, if not I am afraid that I might kill him even at the cost of my own life."
“你猜得没错，真正跟上青界有关的……是玉鼎！”
"You guessed correctly. It's really related to the Upper Azure World… It's Yu Ding!"
“你用不着紧张。郁家那些……虽然是我的后代，但说到底他们的生死，于我而言半点关系都没有。”他语气轻松，完全没有想要为郁家报仇的意思，“我恢复他们的修为，也只是看在他们唤醒本尊的份上而已。”

"Don't be nervous. The Yu Family... may be my descendants, but their life and death have nothing to do with me." He sounded relaxed, not at all like he had any intention to take avenge his descendants. "I restored their cultivation because they were the reason I was awaked in the first place."
“你用不着谢我，我又不是帮你！”孤月转头横了某人一眼，继续道，“这次只是特例，你始终是魔修。若是平日，我不会手软。再说，这事还没个定论呢！”

"You don't need to thank me, I am not helping you!" Turning to glare at a certain someone, Lonemoon continued, "This is a special case. You are still a fiendish cultivator. Normally, I would not have been lenient with you. Besides, we have not formed our conclusion on this matter yet."
“你用哪只眼睛看见是她？”孤月不满的道，“就她那懒样，出门揣块灵石都嫌麻烦。明明是我背……”
"What makes you think it's her?" said Lonemoon, annoyed. "She's too lazy to even carry spirit stones with her when she goes out. I was obviously the one who carried..."
“你疯了！”另一个声音慌乱的大声喝斥，“我就是你，杀了我，你也得不了好。你不是想要变得更强吗？成了魔我们就会变得更强，超过别的天帝，你就是三界中最强的人。”

“You're crazy！”the other increasingly flustered voice bawled out ，“We are the same persoN. If I die, you will be nowhere better. Don't you want to become stronger?Become a demon and we will gain more strength. Our strength will surplus all other Heavenly Lords. You will be the strongest among all Three Realms.”
“你疯了！”孤月横了他一眼，“第二层是什么情况，你也看到了。上面还不知道会有什么呢？”
"You're crazy!" Lonemon glared at Yi Qing. "You saw for yourself what the second level was like. Who knows what you'll see up there?"
“你疯了！”沈萤还没回答，孤月却先一步开口，“他虽然没有成仙，但也是个游仙。你根本就打不过他。”剑修是厉害，羿清更是他见过最厉害的剑修，可以光凭着元婴的修为，就能越级单挑化神。但关键是对方可是游仙。该用外挂的时候，就要用啊！兄弟！

"You're crazy!" Before Shen Ying could answer, Lonemoon shouted. "He hasn't achieved immortality, but he's still a Traveling Immortal afterall. You're not his match." Sword cultivators were powerful, and Yi Qing was one of the most powerful sword cultivators Lonemoon had ever met, but a mere Nascent Soul stage cultivator would not be able to beat someone at the Soul Formation stage, much less a Traveling Immortal. We should use the cheat while we can, brother!
“你疯了？！”任翼更加惊讶了，却再次被对方眼神制止。
"Are you crazy?!" Ren Yi was completely stunned, but he was once again silenced by the look thrown at him by the other.
“你的意思是……”奚秋一惊，“去的是一个剑修！”世间剑修难寻，能闯入万魔窟的，最少都可能是名金丹剑修。

"You mean…" Xi Qiu was stunned. "That person was a sword cultivator!" It was rare to come across a sword cultivator in this world, and one who was capable of breaking into the Myriad Fiend Den had to be at least a Golden Core cultivator.
“你看啊。”沈萤却一本正经解释起来，“时代在发展，时代也是在进步的。你这些技术都隔了五万年了，怎么着外面也得革新换代个十几次了吧？”

"Look!" Shen Ying began to explain in a serious tone, "Times have changed and will continue to change. All your techniques were used 50,000 years ago. The outside world must have undergone tens of revolutions right?"
“你看啊，理论上来说，不同种群的个体，受不同基因型控制有不同的生殖行为及相关生殖率，所以种群间的基因流动受到限制或被阻止，物种不同是不可能产生后代的。”

"You see, theoretically, different species are controlled by different gene structures thus will have varying reproductive methods and also reproductive rates, hence the mixing of genes among species will be controlled and restricted, so different species will not be able to procreate together."
“你看的书里，白泽是什么麻烦的人物吗？”
"What troublesome character is Bai Ze in the book that you read?"
“你看的剧情里有他？”
"Is he in the plot of the book that you read?"
“你看的那本小说，到底写了些啥？”
"The novel that you read, what exactly was it about?"
“你看这条可以吗？”她一脸认真的问。
"Is this okay?" she asked seriously.
“你真当以为我们不知，你杀我们，只是为了掩饰你修练的是魔功吗？”
"You really think we don't know that killing us is just to cover up your cultivation of fiendish techniques?"
“你真的不知道？”
"You really don't know?"
“你真的对这个世界，一点都不了解？！”
"You really have no understanding of this world at all?!"
“你真的没吃过人？”
"Have you really never eaten a human before?"
“你真的要去悟剑峰？！”一路已经听完了前面后果的孤月，看了一眼篝火对面正闭眼打坐调息的人，转头看向沈萤问。

"Are you really going to Sword Comprehension Peak?!" After having listened to the entire story on the way, Lonemoon took a look at the person meditating by the bonfire as he turned and asked Shen Ying.
“你知我为何为你取名橙雨吗？橙雨，承雨，承受雨露恩泽，不就是你这纯阴之体应当的吗？”
"Do you know why I named you Chengyu? Chengyu, Chengyu, to inherit grace from Mother Nature, isn't that befitting of your body of pure Yin?"
“你知道你现在的样子叫什么吗？”沈萤一本正经的道。
"Do you know what you look like?" Shen Ying asked seriously.
“你确定是你家的？”
"Are you sure it belongs to your family?"
“你确定要加入我无敌派。”总觉得哪里不对劲。
"You’re sure that you want to join my Invincible Sect?" Something just felt off to him.
“你确定，传承里都是五万年前的极品丹方？”
"Are you sure that the heritage contains the recipes for supreme-grade pills and elixirs from 50,000 years ago?"
“你确定，就这样……”送给她？没有任何条件！
"You are sure, just like this…" Is she giving it to me? With no conditions!
“你穿越过来多久了？”
"How long have you been transmigrating?"
“你站住！”
"Stop right there!"
“你等会再练也行。”
"You can train later."
“你管我！”孤月翻了个白眼，连说话都懒得装那文皱皱的样子，彻底放飞自我，“你不是要教学生吗？整个玄天宗都是我的地盘，我旁观一下你要收费啊？”

"Who are you to care!" Lonemoon rolled his eyes. He couldn't even be bothered to act well learned and totally just let himself loose. "Aren't you going to teach your student? The whole Blackheaven Sect is my territory, are you going to charge me for watching?"
“你给我回来!”孤月连忙拉住了人，一头黑线，“你个脑残粉能不能冷静点，你就这么去说，人家能相信你吗？”再说就凭沈萤这自带的隐身属性，就算信了别人转眼也能忘了。

"Get back here!" Lonemoon quickly pulled him back, frowning helplessly. "You brain damaged fan, can you calm down. If you were to just go and talk like that, would people believe you?" Moreover, with Shen Ying's invisible nature, even if they believed, they might just forget it the next moment.
“你给我回来！”孤月一把拽住了某个脑残粉，满腔的槽点顿时喷涌而出，“现在是去找吃的时候吗？你们以为这是旅游啊！拜托帮忙也帮得正经点好不好？！”那妹子不是你朋友嘛喂？！

"Come back, you!" Lonemoon took hold of the brain-damaged fan, and all kinds of profanities starting spewing out of his mouth. "Is this the time to look for food? You think this is a leisure tour! If you want to help, please do it seriously, ok?!" And I thought this lady was your friend?!
“你胡说什么！”血狐顿时狂暴起来，血红的双眼死死的盯向羿清，“紫霞玄芝活死人肉白骨，是最好的疗伤圣药，怎么可能没用？我儿马上就会醒来，马上！”

"What are you talking about!" The blood fox suddenly turned violent, his blood red eyes glaring at Yi Qing. "Splendor Lingzhi can revitalise dead flesh and bones, it is the best healing divine medicine, how can it be useless? My son will soon wake up, right now!"
“你胡说！”羿清张口喷出一口血，完全提不起半丝灵气。他真没想到，这魔修居然有胆子在妖界入口布下聚灵阵。他一时大意中招，妖气入体，灵气尽散。这才被他偷袭成功，伤到如此地步。他虽然只是一个散修，但修的也是正统的道法，求的是无上大道。眼睁睁的看着他生摄活人灵魄，怎么可能不管，凡人的命就不是命吗？

"What nonsense!" Yi Qing spewed a mouthful of blood, barely having any Spirit Qi left. He had never imagined that this fiend cultivator would have such guts to set up a soul gathering array at the entrance of the Demon Realm. His carelessness had ended up letting the demonic aura to enter his body and his Spirit Qi to dissipate completely. Hence, he was successfully sneak attacked and now he was already wounded to this state. While he was only an itinerant cultivator, he was certainly cultivating the orthodox Dharmic Dao, seeking the supreme Great Dao. How could he watch helplessly and not act as the fiend captured human souls? Weren't the lives of mortals also lives?
“你胡说！”远远的就听到了思羽妹子，撕气力竭的反驳声。
"You're talking nonsense!" They could hear Sister Si Yu's sharp exclamation from afar.
“你胡说，法器又不是灵器，无需认主。这明明是我买的。”
"Nonsense, the Dharma artifact is not a spirit item, it does not need to recognize its owner. It was obviously bought by me."
“你胡说，谁是郁家逃奴。”印风还没说话，印元飞已经忍不住上前道，“谁不知道思羽是金丹大比的魁首，什么时候成了你郁家的逃奴？”

"You're spouting nonsense, who's the escaped slave from the Yu Family?" Yin Yuanfei blurted before Yin Feng could respond. "Who doesn't know that Si Yu is the champion of the Golden Core competition? Since when was she a slave of the Yu Family?"
“你能做完晚饭再去吗？”
"Can you prepare dinner before you leave?"
“你能把他们其中一个拉出来的吧？”
"Can you pull one of them out?"
“你自小收养我们，却不教我们正统的术法，只教些炉鼎才会学的法术。将我们做当物品一般，逼我们帮你试功偿毒，死了就练成丹药。”郁红越说越恨，眼睛越发的红，“你将我们扔到断空涯，也只是因为我们被你的功法伤了根基，不能再供你采补，连练丹都没有价值而已。”

"You adopted us since we were young yet you never taught us proper sorcery, only teaching Dharma spells that human cauldrons would learn. You treat us like objects, forcing us to help you try out cultivations and poisons, and if we died you would turn us into elixirs." The more Yu Hong spoke, the more hatred she felt, and her eyes grew red as she continued, "You threw us into Sky Severance Cliff only because our foundations had been damaged by your cultivation techniques and you cannot harvest from us, because we are not even worth being concocted into elixirs."
“你自己小……等等，你往哪去？说了直走，那是直吗？不对……又去右边干嘛，城门在那边啊喂。你给我回来！”眼看着那个绕过颗树，就分不清方向的某人，戚橙雨实在忍不住把人又给提了回来，“你瞎吗？到是看看路啊喂！你到底还想不想回去了？”

"You be care-… Wait, where are you going? I said go straight, is that straight? No… why are you going to the right, the gate is over there. Come back!" Looking at the girl who got her directions mixed up immediately after going past a tree, Qi Chengyu had no choice but to go fetch her. "Are you blind? Look at the road! Hey, do you really want to go back or not?"
“你虽然是个剑修却身附极品火灵根，不错！到是个练丹的好资质。”碧涛满意的打量了孤月一眼，摸了摸胡须又变回了那仙风道骨的貌样，“小娃娃，你能到此也算是你我有缘……”

"You may be a sword cultivator, but there is a fire-element Spirit Root inside of you. That's not bad! You'd make a good pill refiner." Bitao seemed satisfied with Lonemoon. He combed his beard and transformed back into his sage-like form. "Little boy, fate has brought us together-"
“你要啊？”
"You want it?"
“你要的人！”
"The person you want!"
“你见过？！”沈萤有些开心的走近了几步。
"You've seen him?" Shen Ying walked forward excitedly.
“你觉得……清华，北大怎么样？”
"How about... Tsinghua and Beida[2. Names of top universities in China]?"
“你认识？”羿清问。
"You know him?" Yi Qing asked.
“你诓他们？”沈萤抬头看了他一眼。
"You deceived them?" Shen Ying looked up and gave him a look.
“你说。”
"Tell me!"
“你说。”沈萤特别好说话的点头。
"Go ahead." Shen Ying nodded in a very easygoing manner.
“你说你一只狸猫，不去吃鱼，好端端的吃人家鸡干嘛？”孤月白了这妖一眼，之前就听奚秋提过，那些死去的人身上有着很深的爪印，伤口细而长，镇上丢失的家禽大部分是鸡，所以他才猜测对方可能是狐妖。从没想过会有两只妖。

"As a civet cat, you should stick to eating fish, why do you eat other people's chickens?" Lonemoon glanced at the demon. Xi Qiu had told him that those who died had deep claw marks on their body. As the cuts were long and narrow, and most of the missing animals in the town were chickens, he guessed that it might be a fox demon. It had never crossed his mind that there were two demons.
“你说啥，有种再说一遍。”
"What are you talking about, I dare you to repeat it."
“你说的是他们吗？”突然一个女声在耳边响起。
"Do you mean them?" Suddenly a girl's voice rang beside his ear.
“你说的是真的？！”戚橙雨一惊，眼睛顿时染红，杀气满溢。
"Are you speaking the truth?!" Qi Chengyu was shocked — her eyes had turned red and were emanating murderous intent.
“你说这个吗？”沈萤突然掏出一枚写着悟字的白色玉牌。
"Do you mean this?" Shen Ying suddenly pulled out a white passage jade token with the word 'Enlightened' written on it.
“你说这花可以打开三界之门？”孤月拿出了之前那朵玄灵花，意味不明的问了一句。
"Did you say this flower can break open the realm gate?" Lonemoon took out the Black Spirit Blossom and raised it up between them, not believing his ears.
“你说那个啥宗，好客吗？”
"Do you think that whatever-you-call-it Sect is generous with its hospitality?"
“你跟来干嘛？”沈萤转头看了一眼，紧跟着他们落地，一身蓝底白衣装逼范的孤月。
"Why did you follow us?" Shen Ying turned to glance back. Right behind them was Lonemoon, dressed in blue and white with his show-off attitude.
“你跟着我干嘛？”刚走了两步，转头却看到背后多了条尾巴，那个萝卜精正一跳一跳的跟了上来。
"Why are you following me?" She noticed a little tail following close behind her as she started walking — the radish spirit was hopping alongside her.
“你跟这位孤月尊者，什么仇什么怨？”为啥连对方的本命法器都会在你这啊！
"What grudges do you hold against this Lonemoon person?" How did that person's intrinsic dharmic artifact end up in your hands!
“你身无灵根，不愿接此传承，我也不为难你。如今自有别人可以传承，你又何须不平。”

"You have no Spirit Root in your body and you're not willing to accept the heritage, so I'm not making things difficult for you. Now, someone else is willing to take over the heritage. Why are you still making trouble?"
“你还想屠城！”孤月着急的看向血狐。
"You still want to slaughter the town's residents!" cried Lonemoon, looking anxiously at the blood fox.
“你还我的礼物！还我礼物！还我礼物……”
"You return me my gift! Return me my gift! Return my gift..."
“你还有脸说！”孤月顿时就炸了，“还不都是你害的，你瞧瞧整个上青界，不，整个青界有哪个仙门跟我们一样，门派百分之八十的支出，都是花在吃饭上。”不赚钱是打算坐吃山空吗？

"You have the audacity to say that!" Lonemoon exploded immediately, "Isn't it all your fault, look at the entire Upper Azure World, no look at the entire Azure World, which immortal sect spends 80% of their expenditure on food." If we weren't earning money, were we going to sit idle and eat?
“你还问我为啥？”孤月一下就炸了，“我们门派是什么情况，你心里没点B数吗？加上我们三都才十二个人，整整一年了才十二个！还TM全让你整成了体修，有半点门派的样子吗？”

"You dare to ask me why?" Lonemoon exploded. "Don't you have any freaking idea of our sect's current situation? We only have twenty sect members including the three of us. Only twenty people after a whole year! And all of them were turned into Body Cultivators by you. Does it even look like a sect?"
“你这啥怀疑的眼神？”孤月嘴角一抽，“我就不能飞升吗？前两天我修为就突破化神大圆满了，飞升也是很正常的事？”

"Don't you believe me?" Lonemoon's mouth twitched. "Why can't I ascend? During the previous two days, I achieved a breakthrough-- I'm now past the Soul Formation level and have perfected my cultivation. Immortal Ascension is only a matter of course."
“你这女娃实在是气人！”再次被打断的碧涛，顿时怒了，“到底懂不懂尊重前辈？择人传承是何等重要之事，这不比区区一个阵法重要。”

"You're really infuriating, little girl!" This time, Bitao was done being interrupted. "Do you know anything about respecting your elders? Choosing the right person to hand down an entire heritage is such an important matter — much more important than any array formation."
“你这新人，怎么可以做甜的，豆腐脑只有咸的才好吃。”他冷冷的扫了对方一眼，难得发脾气似的冷哼了一声，“连师父的口味都不知道，也敢随意下厨。师父您稍等，我马上给您再做碗咸的！”

"You, newbie, how can you make it sweet? Beancurd must be eaten salty." He glanced at the other party coldly. Yi Qing was someone who rarely flared up, yet he sneered, "You don't even know Master's taste yet you dare to cook so nonchalantly. Master, please wait for a while. I will make a bowl of salty ones right away!"
“你这是啥眼神？”孤月皱了皱眉，怎么觉得她在心底骂他，“这跟我又没关系，是宗门的安排。再说他是客卿长老，带弟子历练本就是……”

"What kind of look is that?" Lonemoon frowned. Why did he feel that she was silently scolding him? "This has nothing to do with me. It is the arrangement of the sect's elders. Besides, he is a guest elder and leading a training expedition is supposed to be…"
“你醒了就好。”沈萤点了点头，“这次是我判断失误，去得太慢，才害你受伤。”
"It's good that you woke up," said Shen Ying. "I made an error in judgement this time. I came too late and caused you to suffer these injuries."
“你醒醒神，好好看着点路。”她再次交待，想了想又从储物袋里拿出一小袋的灵石给她，“这些你拿着，路上小心点，别傻胖胖的让人给骗走了。”

"Stay alert and keep your eyes on the road," Qi Chengyu reminded her again. After some thought, she took out a small bag of spirit stones and handed it to Shen Ying. "Take this, be careful on the road and don't let other people cheat you."
“你错了，易剑！”
"You're wrong, Yi Jian!"
“你闭关的时候……可以出来做饭吗？”
"While you're in lock-up... can you come out to cook?"
“你闭嘴！”
"Shut your mouth!"
“你骗鬼呢！”孤月瞬间炸毛，别以为我不知道，你刚那表情，跟沈萤那个坑货一模一样，“你丫刚刚不会是趁机揍我吧？”

"Who are you lying to!" Lonemoon furiously retorted. Don't think I didn't realise. The expression your face was the expression Shen Ying, that cheat, usually has. "You were taking the chance to beat me up, weren't you?"
“你！”青尹气急，偏偏的确是他技不如人，只好死死盯向孤月，眼神都快戳出刀子了。
"You!" Qing Yin was flustered. It was clear that he was not as skillful as the other party, so all he could do was to glare at Lonemoon with a sharp gaze.
“你！姑娘，快跑啊！她不是好人！”地上的人拼命想爬过来，却完全阻止不了芮糜的脚步，只能一声比一声大的让人快跑。

"You! Lady, start running! He is not a good person!" The person on the ground tried to climb up on his feet but was utterly powerless to stop Rui Mi's footsteps. He was only capable of shouting for Shen Ying to escape as his voice reached a crescendo.
“你？”孤月见鬼似的回头看向她，“你有病吧？没事拿我的本命法器干嘛？”而且还送给魔修玩是什么鬼？说好的同乡之间的友谊呢？

"You?" Lonemoon turned back and looked at her as if he had seen a ghost. "What's your problem? Why would you take my intrinsic dharmic artifact for no reason?" More so, giving it to a fiendish cultivator to play with? Where was the camaraderie between fellow villagers?
“你？”沈萤斜了他一眼，“会做饭吗？”
"You?" Shen Ying glanced at him. "Can you cook?"
“信不信由你！”他继续冷笑道，“你不如仔细想想，此界十万年来可有飞升成功的仙人？”
"Believe it or not, it's your choice!" He laughed coldly, "Why don't you think about whether there has been one single cultivator from this realm that has achieved Immortal Ascension?"
“俩位这是……怎么回事？”孤月上前扶住人问。
“What happened to this 2？”Lonemoon went forward as he pulled them to their feet.
“修士的修行方式不同，分为法修，剑修，体修等。以及生活技能为主的，练丹的丹修，打铁的器修，画符的符修等等。羿清跟我都是剑修。修为的提升又分为几个大境界，刚入门的叫练气期，后面分别是，筑基，金丹，元婴，和化神。大境界之间，还有十层小境界，一到三层为初期，四到八层为中期，八层以上是后期，十层称之为大圆满。”

"Cultivators have different cultivation methods, consisting of Dharmic cultivation, sword cultivation, body cultivation and so on… Besides those, there are also the methods that focus on life skills such as core cultivation for making cores, equipment cultivation for forging ironware, talisman cultivation for the making of talismans etc.. Yi Qing and I are both sword cultivators. Cultivation advancements consists of a few large realms. The beginner stage is called the Spirit Training phase. It is then split into Foundation Establishment, Golden Core, Nascent Soul and Soul Formation. Within a large realm, there are ten levels of small realms. The first to third levels are the early-stages, fourth to eighth are the mid-stages, eighth and above are the late-stages, and the tenth level is considered to have reached perfection."
“修士都是用灵石交易，不如……”他一脸认真的建议，“让狸崽换成灵石吧。”
"Cultivators have always been using spirit stones to trade, so why don't we…" Yi Qing suggested earnestly, "Get the civet cat to exchange these gold for spirit stones instead."
“修炼速度？”
"Refining speed?"
“修炼！修炼！”
"Cultivate! Cultivate!"
“修炼！修炼，我要不断练出黑色元力，把这封印完全破开！”
"Refine! Refine! I want to continuously refine black essence force, so that I can completely break this seal!"
“修炼！试验！再修炼一些，一定要多试几次。”
"Cultivate! Experiment! I must cultivate and try a few more times."
“修炼，继续破解封印！明日清点药田后，再去城中转转，看看怎么赚钱还债。”

"I have to continue cultivation practice, and continue breaking my seal! Tomorrow, after I take stock in the medicinal plantations, I will stroll around the city and see if there are any more ways to make money to pay off my debts. "
“修行之事，马虎不得。”
"Matters such as cultivation cannot be carried out sloppily."
“偏偏还站在洛书派弟子旁边，谁不知道洛书派专出仙子般的女修。”
"Yet despite that they chose to stand next to the Venation Sect who are renowned for producing female disciples with angelic beauty."
“做事？做什么事？”江逸迷糊的眨了眨眼睛问道。
"Settle some matters? What matters?"
“做汤哪有清炒好吃。”孤月甩了甩揍酸的手，“我看还是切丝，或是油炸，要不生煎也行。”
"It'll be great if you made radish soup," Lonemoon beat his fist into his palm. "Or slice it and fry it in oil. You could even steam it."
“停停停！”什么乱七八槽的，你个小小的狸猫妖懂得还挺多，“那镇里死的那十几个人，还有那被剖心挖腹的金丹修士，你做何解释？”

"Stop, stop, stop!" You're going way off topic. As a small civet cat demon you sure know a lot. "How do you explain the dozen people who died in this town, and the Golden Core cultivator who was disemboweled?"
“停！别吵吵了。”沈萤上前一步，来回看了看两人，一脸认真的道，“都是成年人，有什么事不能停下来，好好打一架解决的呢？”能别只打嘴炮吗？

"Stop! Stop quarreling." Shen Ying took a step forward and looked back and forth between the two of them. With a serious look on her face, she said, "Both of you are adults, no matter what happened, can't you just stop for a moment and have a good fight to settle it?" Did they only know how to bicker?
“像，像，和昨日的两枚地品丹药很像啊！啧啧，地品丹药，这得多少钱一枚？或许……我将这三枚丹药卖了，就能值十两紫金？”

"Similar, similar, they looks very similar to the two earth-grade elixirs from yesterday! Tsk, Tsk! Earth-grade elixirs, how much does one pill cost? Perhaps...if I sell these three elixir pills, would they be worth ten taels of purple gold?"
“元魂丹、灵神丹、黑参丹、元力丹、黄参丹……”
"Essence Soul Pills, Spirit Pills, Black Ginseng Elixirs, Essence Force Pills, Yellow Ginseng Elixirs..."

"Let's move out first. I'll explain to you on the way," Lonemoon said hastily as he climbed on his sword.
“先带回去再说吧！”他转头看了看四周，“天色不早了，这秘境里一定还有其它的东西，我们还是赶紧出发，往东探探看吧。”

"Let's bring it back with us before we decide!" Lonemoon turned to survey their surroundings. "It's getting dark. I'm sure there are other valuable things in this mystic realm. Let's head east to keep looking."
“兔子们呢？哪去了？”她转头看了看，发现屋子已经修好了，而且还长大长宽了，从一个单间的小茅屋，变成了五室的大茅屋。是群好兔子啊！

"What happened to the rabbits? Where have they gone?" She turned around to take a look and then realized that the cottage was already fixed. It had become even bigger than before — from a small straw cottage, it had transformed into a huge five-room straw house. What a great bunch of rabbits!
“兔子你看看，是这样的不？”
"Rabbit, look. Do they look like that?"

"Rabbit, hold on!" Shen Ying shouted suddenly.

"Rabbit, this place needs to have a spirit vein!" Shen Ying continued to add to her list of conditions.
“关他啥事？”孤月一愣，“他又不是主角。反正你知道的，书里那些主角，全都是灾难体质，柯南附体的那种。跟他们扯上关系，没什么好处，特别是这本书里的主角有些……反正一言难尽。所以我才不喜欢那个白泽，主角引发的灾难，或多或少有他添的火。况且女主还是个……”

"What has it got to do with him?" Lonemoon asked. "He's not the main lead. Anyway, as you know, the characters in that novel have catastrophic body types - the geniuses that seemed Conan[1. The main detective in a Japanese detective manga]-possessed. No good will come out of being associated with them, especially the novel's... Ah, it's difficult to explain. “关键是，你丫一个人吃就算了……”他眼光一扫，顿时盯向左右两边，正在扒饭的迷妹团，“你TM还带着整个门派都吃是什么鬼？好歹是个掌门，不知道吃饭对她们修行没用吗？”

"The main point is, I can close one eye if you are the only one eating like that..." He scanned over left and right at the girls who were scooping rice, "You freaking brought the whole sect along in eating? As a Sect Master, don't you know that eating does not help them in cultivation?"
“兴许这是一只特殊的鬼王！”奚秋道，“传闻鬼王有着与其它恶鬼不同的强大能力，而且生成之日，能让天地色变，引发异变。五日前，玄海之水突然从中断裂，海上一个岛屿与师叔的凌云峰同时被毁，兴许也是鬼王出世之兆。”

"Perhaps this is a special Ghost King!" Xi Qiu continued, "Legend has it that a Ghost King has a formidable power different from the rest of the demon souls. Moreover, the day of its birth can cause the earth and sky to transform, bringing about strange changes. Five days ago, the waters of the Black Sea suddenly parted in the middle, an island on the sea along with Uncle Master's Ling Yun Peak were simultaneously destroyed. Perhaps that was the sign of a Ghost King being born."
"But-"

"Actually… I'm really not interested in this type of vegetable. If you want it, ask me nicely for it and I may give it to you. But…" She narrowed her eyes and faced the five strangers in front of her. "Giving it to you is one thing. But if you want to snatch it, I'm not going to be very happy…"
“其实吧，事情很简单。你们家人，随便出去抢人家东西这种行为，让我很不高兴。”沈萤一本正经的道，“我听说你是素菜家族的家长，提醒你一下，家里人干坏事，你该教育的还是要教育的。”

"Actually, things are really simple. Your family goes out and steals whatever you please. That kind of behavior makes me really unhappy," Shen Ying explained. "I heard that you're Vegetable Family's parent. Let me remind you that your family members have done some really horrible things. You should educate them."

“Actually, it was just my conjecture.“ With furrowed eyebrows, Yi Qing said,"Afterall, that kid seemed perfectly normal for the past eight years. Maybe I was overthinking?"
“具体情况在下也不清楚，但看来不是小事，家主现在已经赶过去了，若是晚了……”
"I'm not too sure of what exactly is happening as well, but it doesn't seem like a small matter. My Family Master is on the way over right now, if we're late..."

"Going above that level would be to advance to Immortal Ascension." “再来一块！”
"One more piece!"
“再来！”

“再点信不信我揍你？”沈萤不满的退后一步。
"Press any harder and I'll hit you!" Shen Ying threatened as she took a step back.

"Goodbye!"
“再试试！”
"Let me try this again!"

"What's more, they are clearly already suspicious of us," Yu Hong warned. "We need to leave soon. The people who were after us back at Upper Azure Town are probably already gone. We should take this chance to look for that man on the street and ask him to take us to the Middle Azure World."
“况且这三位长老里，有两位乃游仙修为。”他意有所指的看向羿清，“这世间能连杀他三人的，怕是除了上界真仙，也只有身怀绝世异宝之人。所以还请这位道友，将我轩辕传世之宝——千叶草木灵归还。”

"Moreover, out of three of the Elders, two of them were Traveling Immortals." Therefore I would like to ask this fellow daoist to return our Xuan Yuan family's treasure — the Thousand Leaves Vegetation Spirit."

"Please hold on!" The three of them were just about to move off when they were stopped by a voice from behind. From out of nowhere, Bitao suddenly floated toward them. "How about the heritage? My two little friends, are you interested to inherit the heritage?"
“几位仙友总算来了。”他脸色一喜，客气的抱了抱拳，视线定在了羿清身上，顿时一惊，“羿清仙人，您的修为……”十天前还是个地仙呢，怎么突然就成墨仙了？

Pu Feiping's face lit up and respectfully cupped his fists as he welcomed, "My immortal friends, you have finally arrived." Then, his gaze landed on Yi Qing and he was shocked. “几位请放心，灵主的身份，的的确确就是上古神兽白泽。”

"Get out! With such standards, all of you are not qualified to enter my kitchen!" “切！”萝卜不屑的冷哼一声，“又一个不要脸的跟屁虫！”
"Pfft!" The radish snorted arrogantly and said, "Another shameless follower!"
“切！”萝卜嫌弃的退后一步，一把拍下了孤月的爪子，“丑逼，别碰我！”
"Cheh!" Radish stepped back in disdain as it slapped at Lonemoon's hand. "Ugly, don't touch me!"
“切，你敢说你没看过《仙缘》这本书？”他一脸你别装了的表情。
"Cheh, do you dare say that you have never read the book Immortal Fate?"

"Pfft, are you blind?" Lonemoon could take it no longer. He walked up to Shen Ying and waved the flower in front of her face. "He came all this way, can't stop stuttering, and even gave you a flower. What do you think he wants?"
“切，得了吧！”孤月翻了个白眼，“轩辕家一直没有说出沈萤来，而且坚持称我们去的当日，族中的游仙未归，你难道还看不明白？”不就是他们丢不起这个人吗？全族最强的五个游仙都被人家揍成了孙子什么的，这种事要让整个上青界都知道，他们还要不要混了。

"Cheh, forget it!" "Enough of this!" Before Yi Qing could reply, Lonemoon jeered, "Stop pretending, if you can impress me with a trick or two, you can be my master!"

"Who was the one who spoke earlier?" The Tiger Monarch was infuriated. "Where did such a timid demon come from? Show yourself!"
“别人说话，不要插嘴！”沈萤一字一句的道。

"Don't be rash." The Blackheaven Sect did not have the means to fight with them.
