“别动！”孤月连忙按住她的手，“听，好像有声音！”
"Don't move!" Lonemoon quickly held onto her hand. "Listen, there's a sound!"
“别客气，反正我去的印天城离这不远，顺路而已。”男子回了她个笑容，再次飞了起来，“那我先走了，再见！”
"You're welcome, anyway, Yin Skycity, where I'm heading, is not far from here, so it's along the way." The man returned her smile and flew off again. "I'll take my leave now, goodbye!"
“别打了，大爷别打了……你就算打死小奴，我也不会签卖身契的……大爷别打了，我会想办法赔钱的……”
"Please stop beating me! Master, please stop… Even if you beat me to death, I won't sign the indenture contract… Master, please stop beating. I will think of a way to pay you back…"
“别抖了，要撞到人了。”她突然提醒了一句。
"Stop trembling. You’re going to knock into others," she suddenly warned.
“别的……”她认真想了想，“也就还有一点点小需求……你能找些家居，厨具之类的日用品吗。”
"Anything else…" Shen Ying thought over it seriously. "I still have a small request… Can you get ahold of a few household items like furniture, kitchen utensils and other such living essentials?"
“别管这些了。”沈萤打断两人的自我介绍，推了推羿清道，“厨子，为了庆祝你出关，不如……现在开始做饭吧？”
"Let's not talk about this anymore," Shen Ying interrupted the introductions and nudged Yi Qing. "Chef, to celebrate your re-appearance, let's... start cooking now?"
“别紧张，我就找你商量点事。”沈萤顺手摸了把它的耳朵，兔子果然是胆小的动物，连忙指了指它身后的椅子道，“来，坐坐坐。”

"Don't be nervous, I just need to discuss something with you," said Shen Ying, stroking its ear assuringly. True to its species, the rabbit was a timid animal. She quickly pointed to the chair behind it. "Come, take a seat."
“别装了。”他拍了拍她的肩道，“知道你讲义气，你离开玄天宗，不就是怕我难做才主动离开的吗？”
"Stop acting." He tapped her shoulders. "I know you are loyal, didn't you leave Blackheaven Sect on your own accord because you are afraid that staying there would make things difficult for me?"
“别装了！”孤月扔了她个白眼，“你不就是因为这个，才收他为徒的吗？”
"Stop acting!" Lonemoon rolled his eyes at her. "Didn't you take him as your disciple because of this?"
“别误会，我对基佬没偏见。”说着，她还挥了挥手让两人继续。
"Don't misunderstand, I have nothing against gays," she gestured for them to carry on.
“别走啊小姑娘，你来都来了，确定不带点什么回去？”仙魂见她仍旧不为所动，一着急扑过去直接抱住了大脚，“我都等了几万年了，就等来了你一个人，你不带谁带啊。不把传承带出去，我会死不冥目的。”

"Don't go, young lady, since you are here, are you sure you don't want to bring something back?" Seeing that she did not budge, the immortal soul hurried over and hugged her big foot. "I have waited thousands of years, and all I got is you, you didn't even bring anyone. If I don't get the legacy out, I will not rest in peace."
“别过来！”她张嘴吐掉一口血，死死的看向对面同样狼狈的人，“多谢好意，但我的仇，我要亲手报！”说完，再次攻击了过去。

"Do not come over!" She spewed out a mouthful of blood and stared at the person who was in the same terrible state as her. "Thank you for your good intentions, but my revenge has to be carried out myself!" She then resumed her attack once again.
“到了！”沈萤指了指前方，唤醒了还在懵逼中的众人，她们顺着她指的方向看去，下一刻却被眼前的情景惊呆了。
"We've arrived!" Shen Ying pointed ahead of her, waking up those who were still in bewilderment. Their gazes followed the direction she was pointing towards and were shocked by the next scene.
“到了！大仙！”
"Here it is, Great Immortal!"
“到底怎么回事？”
“What is this matter entirely about?”
“到底是本啥书？”
"What kind of book is that?"
“到底是谁封印了我的丹田？这封印该如何破解？”
"Who on earth sealed my dantian? And how can I break this seal?"
“到底谁与魔修为伍？”郁红直接一把撕开了自己的衣袖，只见她右手遍布着大大小小的伤痕，似是沉年的旧伤，却道道皮肉外翻十分骇人，“我们这些人，名义上是你的弟子，实际却连炉鼎都不如！我们身上的伤，毁掉的经脉，断裂的灵骨，哪一个不是你所赐！”

"Who exactly is the one partnering up with fiendish cultivators?" Yu Hong tore off her sleeve and revealed her right arm. It was covered in large and small scars which seemingly looked to be old injuries, yet every wound was hair-raising and horrifying. "We are only your disciples in name but in reality, we are worse than human cauldrons! Our wounded bodies, our destroyed meridians, our broken spirit bones. They were all your doings!"
“制服魔修并不是我一人之功。”羿清诚实的回答。
"I did not subdue the fiendish cultivator by myself." Yi Qing answered honestly.
“前些时日，我曾特意去那魔窟查看过。”奚辰解释道，“发现里面那些害人之物被毁了个干净，虽然不见那魔头的踪影，但他手下那些用活人练功的走狗，却已被尽数诛杀，而且都是一剑毙命，魔窟内还残留着剑气。必是有人曾闯入那里。”

"A few days ago, I took a look at the fiend den," Xi Chen explained. "I found that the harmful creatures inside had been totally destroyed. I didn't see any sign of the fiend, but all his lackeys who practiced on live humans had been killed, and killed by a single stroke of the sword, no less. There was still some Sword Qi lingering in the den. Someone must have broken into it."
“前殿……前殿突然闯进两个化神修士。”
"The front of the hall… the front hall was suddenly intruded by two Soul Formation cultivators."
“前辈。”他神情越加认真，“您与我素不相识，却救我于危难，助我疗伤护我周全。这份恩情，羿清此生怕是都报答不完。”

"Senior," his expression grew more solemn as he continued, "You and I were complete strangers, yet you rescued me in a time of danger, aided in my recovery and took care of me in all other aspects. I am afraid that I will never be able to repay all your kindness in this lifetime."
“前辈不要误会。”他急急的解释道，“我是真的仰慕前辈，所以才想拜入门下。不单是因为您的修为，更是因为敬重您的德行。”

"Senior please do not be mistaken," he explained hurriedly. "I truly admire you, Senior, which is why I want to learn under your wing. It is not solely because of your cultivation, but more so due to my respect for your virtues and ethics."
“前面就是悟剑峰了。”孤月指了指那个被裹在透明球里的浮峰，眉头皱了皱，仍是有些不赞同的看向沈萤道，“虽然最近没有听说哪位化神修士入峰，但悟剑峰内有三位常年镇守着通往上青界通道的化神尊者。只要一入峰，就会被他们察觉，你们要想清楚了。确定现在真的要闯进去吗？”这一去，等于就是同时与三位化神尊者为敌啊。

"Ahead of us is Sword Comprehension Peak." Lonemoon pointed to the floating peak enclosed in a transparent shield. Frowning, and still with that disapproving expression, he turned to Shen Ying and said, "Although I have not heard of any Soul Formation cultivators having entered the peak recently, there are three Soul Formation cultivators in Sword Comprehension Peak guarding the passage to the Upper Azure World. As soon as anyone enters the peak, they will be detected. You have to think carefully. Are you sure that you really want to break into Sword Comprehension?" This was tantamount to declaring war against all three of the guarding Soul Formation cultivators.
“剑……”郁红脸色僵了一下。
"Sword..." Yu Hong's face fell.
“剑仙？”沈萤呆了一下，一会剑气一会剑仙的，到底是些啥。
"Sword immortal?" Shen Ying was dazed for a while. One moment there was Sword Qi, and then in another moment there was a sword immortal. What exactly were these?
“剑修羿清，见过秋掌门，各位真人。”他抱拳行了个礼。
"Sword Cultivator Yi Qing paying my respects to the Perfected Ones." He clasped his fists and saluted.
“剑修顿悟之时，会放出全身的剑气，感悟大道。这个时候的剑气不受他的元神掌控，会攻击所有靠近的人。”

"During a sword cultivator's epiphany, he will release all the Sword Qi within him to realize the Dao. The Sword Qi at this time will not be within his primordial spirit's control and will attack anyone who comes near."
“剑修！”那个黑影声音一沉，那些涌动的黑气缓了缓，打量了她半会，好似这才压住刚刚的惊讶，笑得越加阴冷起来，“原来你跟下面那个剑修是一伙的。”

"A Sword Cultivator!" the black figure exclaimed. The black fog slowed down and he began to study her. Then, he suppressed the surprise he felt earlier on. He smiled even more coldly than before, "So you're on the same side as the Sword Cultivator below."
“剑修，羿清。”羿清道。
"Sword Cultivator, Yi Qing," Yi Qing said.
“剑修？”孤月回过头。
"Sword Dao?" said Lonemoon, turning around.
“剑气？”沈萤歪了歪头，那是啥？
"Sword Qi?" Shen Ying tilted her head. What was that?
“剩下那个就是上青界了，我也没去过。听说那里的人不是很友善。”孤月皱了皱眉，“与我们中青界不同，那个世界的顶尖修士，都出自于世家，而不是宗门。那里灵气最为浓郁，听说是个元婴遍地走，金丹不如狗的地方。”

"The last one would be the Upper Azure World which I have never been to. It is rumored that the people there aren't friendly." Lonemoon furrowed his brows. "As compared to our Middle Azure World, that world has top notch cultivators from aristocratic families, not sects. The Spirit Qi is the densest there, and it is said that Nascent Soul cultivators are everywhere, and Golden Core cultivators are worse off than dogs in that place."
“力气？”
"Strength?"
“力量果然是增大不少，否则绝对砸不裂这青石板，至少有两马之力的加成！”
"My strength has indeed increased greatly. If not, I would be unable to split up the limestone slab. For me to split it means that my strike carries the force of two horses!"
“化神修士？”男子皱了皱眉，“既然有修士投靠，你自去请五长老安排就是，不必来通知我。”

"Soul Formation cultivators?" The man furrowed his brows and said, "Since there are cultivators seeking refuge, you should just go and inform the five Elders to make arrangements. There is no need to inform me."
“化神！剑修！”而且还是两位，众人齐齐倒吸了一口气，眼神都亮了几分。
"Soul Formation! Sword cultivators!" And there were two of them at that! Everyone gasped as their eyes lit up.
“十万恶鬼，怕是无人能以一已之力压制。”他紧了紧手心，一脸坚定的道，“所以……我想将此幡送到仙门，玄天宗。那里地处灵脉之上，可用灵气洗唰恶鬼的戾气，借此超渡里面的十万亡魂。只是……”

"I'm afraid that no one person can suppress hundreds of thousands of evil spirits alone." He gripped his palms and said with conviction, "So… I am intending to bring this gonfalon to the Immortal Sect, Blackheaven Sect. It is located above ley lines, and the energy from those ley lines can be used to cleanse the evil spirits' noxiousness which can also an opportunity to help release those souls from their suffering. But…"
“十两紫金？”
"Ten taels of purple gold?"
“十大天才？哪十个？”江逸好奇的问了一声。
"Top ten geniuses? Which ten?" Jiang Yi asked out of curiosity.
“十天前我已经通知过薄城主了，只是他们全城排查，还是没有找着那门。”孤月继续道，“所以为防万一，我们才等到你历劫完，一起去看看。”

"I have already informed City Lord Pu 10 days ago. However, they had looked through the entire city but still could not find the door. Thus we waited for you to finish your Heavenly Tribulation before we go take a look, just in case." Lonemoon continued.
“十天！”
"Ten days!
“十缕？这么少能干什么？”
"Ten strands? What can I do with so little?"
“千叶草木灵！”莲花上的人异口同声的发出一阵惊呼，不敢置信的看着地上那株白白胖胖的灵植，真的是千叶草木灵！而且看起来灵智还十分完全。太好了，没想到那秘境真有此物！

"Thousand Leaves Vegetation Spirit!" The people on the Lotus Flower began to exclaim together. They couldn't believe their eyes — that fat, white body really belonged to that of a Thousand Leaves Vegetation Spirit! Its sentience was flawless too. It was perfect. They hadn’t thought that the mystic realm would produce such a treasure!
“千真万确！“
"It's the absolute truth!"
“升仙塔？”啥玩意？沈萤呆了呆，转头就看向旁边的枫影道，“那个……宝宝你信息多，解释一下？”

"Immortal Ascension Pagoda?" What kind of place was this? Shen Ying was silent for a moment, then she turned her head and looked at the Feng Ying, who was beside her. "You... Baby, you have more information, can you explain?"
“半刻钟后出发。”白泽没有理会他的疑问，留下一句，便转身就往洞内走去。
"We'll leave in five minutes." Not bothering to reply, Bai Zhe turned and walked back to his cave.
“卧槽!”他降到一半的飞剑，一个没站稳，差点一头栽下来，这……不是轩辕家那五个游仙吗？
"Holy shit!" He slipped on his flying sword and went out of balance, nearly falling headfirst onto the ground. Aren't they… the five Traveling Immortals from Xuan Yuan Family?
“卧槽。”孤月却一下跳了起来，“沈萤你能不能悠着点，你没事劈这个秘境干嘛？”惨了惨了，多好的上古秘境，这一下能不能用还不一定。

"Holy shit." Lonemoon jumped. "Shen Ying, can you chill out? Why did you have to destroy this mystic realm?" This is terrible. It was such a rare ancient mystic realm. Now, we might not even be able to remain here.
“卧槽！”他猛的退开一步，差点一头从剑上栽了下来，险险站住，这才指着她道，“你……你……你真不是穿书过来的？那……那你干嘛收羿清收徒！”

"Holy shit!" He abruptly took a step back, almost falling off the sword. Balancing himself precariously, he pointed at her and said, "You… you… you really didn't transmigrate through the book? Then… then why did you take Yi Qing as your disciple!"
“卧槽！”孤月吓了一跳，退一开步，“你刚刚跑哪去了？”
"Holy shit!" Taken aback, Lonemoon retreated a step. "Where did you just go?"
“卧槽！”孤月暗骂了一句，没想到还是没赶上，“赶紧离开这里。”现在只能闪人了，他顺手拉起沈萤，刚要转身，却没拉动。

"Holy shit!" Lonemoon cursed. He didn't expect that they would be too late. "We have to get out of here, quick!" They could only run now. He pulled Shen Ying's hand and started to turn around, but he couldn't move her.
“卧槽！”孤月直接就炸了，“你妹啊，你看见了为什么不叫我们？”
"Holy shit!" Lonemoon exploded, "What the heck, why did you not call out to us when you saw us?"
“卧槽！”羿清心底咯噔一声，去你妹的相信，他是疯了才会相信沈萤的话，这两师徒没一个靠谱的，“喂喂喂，羿清你还活着吗？”他再厉害，隔着两个大境界，会赢才有鬼。

"Holy shit!" Lonemoon's heart skipped a beat. Believe in him my ass! Lonemoon must have been crazy to listen to Shen Ying. Neither the master nor the disciple was reliable. "Hey, hey, hey. Yi Qing, are you still alive?" No matter how powerful he is, he couldn't have beaten Qing Yi.
“卧槽！你就当帮我个忙，好歹是老乡，你要不要这么不讲义气？只要进去一趟秘境，三个月就回来，很快的。我上次也帮你去悟剑峰了，礼尚往来一下啊。”

"Holy shit! Would you take it as you doing me a favour? We're from the same hometown afterall, are you just going to leave me to fend for myself? We're just going to make one trip into the mystic realm. We'll be back in three months at most — they'll pass in a flash. I got you to Sword Comprehension Peak the last time too. It's time you repaid the favour."
“卧槽！我的凌云峰！”
"Oh no! My Lingyun Peak!"
“卧槽，你不会又顿悟了吧！”孤月睁大眼站了起来，这是要上天啊！
"Holy shit, you're not going to have another epiphany, are you?" Lonemoon's eyes widened and he stood up. You're going to go off the charts!
“卧槽，你们看我干嘛？”孤月脸也黑了，他这不是着急那根死萝卜，一时忘记了吗？还有……干嘛付钱的就一定是他啊喂？

"Holy shit, what are you looking at me for?" Lonemoon's expression also darkened. If he had not been so agitated by that stupid radish, he would not have forgotten to pay. Also… must he always be the one footing the bill?
“卧槽，你干嘛要撕我衣服？！”孤月捂着只剩半截的下衫，一下跳了起来。没有纸写，你丫不会撕自己的吗？还真不把自己当外人啊！

“Holy shit! Why did you rip my clothes out?" Lonemoon exclaimed, standing there with only his undershirt remaining. "Can't you use your own clothes in place of paper? You're really making yourself comfortable with me aren't you?"
“卧槽，你干嘛！”孤月一个箭步冲上去，险险拉住了对方正打算脱裤子的手，一边朝着一脸震惊众妹子挥手，“你们都转过去，转过去！”
"Holy shit! What are you doing?!" Lonemoon rushed up and barely managed to stop the radish from taking off its pants. In shock, he said to the girls, "All of you turn away, turn away!"
“卧槽，你真找到魔界之门了？在哪？”
"Holy shit, did you really find the Door of Demon Realm? Where is it?" Lonemoon asked hurriedly.
“卧槽，沈萤你有……”他话还没说完，却看到对方突然抬起头，一眨不眨的盯着上空，眉头都拧了起来，“干嘛？”
"Holy shit, Shen Ying, do you have..." Before he could finish, he raised his head to glance at Shen Ying and found that she was frowning and staring into the sky. "What's up?"
“卧槽，这也可以！”丫的，你要不要一听忽悠就顿悟啊喂？脑残粉也不用这么专业吧？你以为顿悟是你的粉丝周边吗？

"Holy shit, how can this be!" F*cker, do you have to gain an epiphany even from a bunch of nonsense? You may have a screw loose, but you don't have to be this professional, right? Do you think epiphanies are like a bunch of fans surrounding you?
“印元飞，金丹的第二名。”羿清回道，顺便又加了一句，“就是白天被思羽揍的那个。”
"Yin Yuanfei. He came in second at the Golden Core finals," Yin Qing replied. He then added, "That guy who was thrashed by Si Yu during the day."
“印兄来了。”郁家笑了笑，立马收敛了威压，扫了一遍进来的三人，愣了一下，“怎么连轩辕兄也惊动了。”

"Brother Yin, you're here," the Yu Family Master smiled. He immediately kept his sword and scanned the three people who had just joined them. His eyes rested on Xuan Yuanyu as he asked, "Why is even Brother Xuan Yuan here?"
“印兄，轩辕兄，那么就祝我们以后合作愉快了。”孤月高兴的握了握对方的手，一副标准的商场精英样。
"Brother Yin, Brother Xuan Yuan, let's toast to our happy future collaboration." Lonemoon happily gripped Yin Feng's hand, the very picture of a crack businessman.
“印公子……很好。”她头埋得更低了，“只是，我们不合适。我以前毕竟是个炉……”
"Young Master Yin... is great." She lowered her head further. "It's just that we're not suited for each other. Afterall, I used to be a human cauld-"
“印公子？”谁啊？
"Young Master Yin?" Who's that?
“印家主误会了。”郁海珩笑了笑，半点没有理亏的样子，“我们并非要针对印家，而是令公子非要护着这个逃奴，我等不得已才将公子一起请到了这里。”

"Family Master Yin, you are mistaken," Yu Hai Heng laughed humorlessly. He did not look in the least bit afraid. "We're not going against your Yin Family, but the Young Master of your family insists on protecting this escaped slave. We had no choice but to drag your son here as well."
“印家主，易家主，还有轩辕家主！”孤月诧异的来回扫了一遍这十几个人，果然其它几人全是游仙，“这……这不是最先入塔的几人吗？怎么会……”

"Family Master Yin, Family Muster Yi and Family Master Xuan Yuan!" Lonemoon scanned the other people and realised that they were all Traveling Immortals. "Aren't... aren't they the first people who entered the pagoda? Why are they..."
“印家就是主办这次大比之人。”
"The Yin Family is the organiser of this great compettiion."
“印家，印元飞向道友讨教！”那个蓝色的身影抱拳行了个礼开口道。
"I am Yin Yuanfei from the Yin Family. Please show me your ways, Fellow Daoist!" The man in blue cupped his fists and bowed at Si Yu.
“印家？”沈萤愣了愣。
"Yin Family?" Shen Ying's face was blank.
“历练？”沈萤一愣。
"Experiential training expedition?"
“原来……原来你从一开始，就打算毁了我！”
"So… so you have been wanting to destroy me from the very beginning!"
“原来丹药回炉需要一味中性药剂地黄粉，只有将丹药恢复中性才能再次回炉凝造……”

"So, the elixir reheating process requires the addition of a simple neutral medicinal ingredient like rehmannia powder. One only needs to restore the elixir to a neutral state, to be able to once again reheat and form the elixir..."
“原来如此……”他瞅了瞅手上一脸不情愿的萝卜，“这小东西，估计是感应到了同类的气息，所以才想要带走这株枯草吧。”
"I see…" He glanced at the unwilling radish. "You little thing, you probably sensed the aura of your kind. That's why you brought the withered plant along."
“原来如此。”易峰了然的点了点头，“上次升仙塔之事，还未多谢两位尊者的救命之恩。”
"So that's what happened." Yi Feng nodded, "I have not thanked the two Supremacies for savingmy life previously at the Immortal Ascension Pagoda."
“原来如此。”羿清点了点头，“原来尊者修仙之前，还有这般经历，那师父以前呢？”
"I see." Yi Qing nodded. "So Supremacy had such a past before immortal cultivation. Then what about Master?"
“原来如此。”羿清看了孤月一眼，“虽然师父与尊者同出一处，不知之前可相识？”
"I see." Yi Qing looked over at Lonemoon. "Although Master and Supremacy are from the same hometown, were the both of you previously acquainted?"
“原来如此！”羿清眼睛发亮，一脸兴奋的道，“师父果然是重情重义之人！”
"I see!" Yi Qing's eyes shone and his face was filled with excitement as he said, "Master is indeed a person who treasures kinship and loyalty!"
“原来如此！”郁红点了点头，“还请掌门明示。”
"So that's what it is!" Yu Hong nodded in understanding. "Sect Master, please demonstrate for us."
“原来是做梦啊……”
“Oh... Thankfully, it was all a dream…”
“原来是天生剑体，怪不得……”对方完全没有回答他的意思，继续道，“能看破心魔，也算是心性坚毅之人，那就看你能不能突破第一层的问道一关。”

"You have an Innate Sword Embodiment, no wonder..." The other person clearly had no intention to answer his question. The voice continued, "You can defeat your mental demons - you must be a mentally determined person. Let's see if you have what it takes to pass the quiz in this first level."
“原来是孤月尊者。”羿清眼里闪过一丝惊讶，立马起身抱拳行了一礼。在整个修仙界无人不知道孤月这个名字，他是一位修仙奇才。听闻只三百年的时间，就修成了化神，是玄天宗的三位化神尊者之一。虽然修为不及其它的化神修士，但却是化神修士中唯一的剑修，若真打起来，估计无人是他的对手。同为剑修，羿清自然也关注过此人。

"So you are Supremacy Lonemoon." A flash of surprise showed in Yi Qing's eyes, and he immediately got up and gave a salute. Everyone in the immortal cultivator world knew the name of Lonemoon; he was an immortal cultivator prodigy. It was said that he took only three hundred years before reaching level of Soul Formation. He was one of the three Soul Formation Supremacies in Blackheaven Sect. Although his cultivation level was not as high as the other Supremacies, he was the only sword cultivator among them. No one could defeat him in actual battle. Yi Qing, being a sword cultivator, had naturally paid attention to this man.
“原来是羿掌门和孤月尊者！”自以为得知真相的印风，这才转头看向右边的另一人，“那不知这位尊者是？”

"So you are Supremacy Yi Qing and Supremacy Lonemoon!" Thinking that he now understood the true situation, Yin Feng turned to look at the remaining person on the right and asked, "And this Supremacy is?"
“原来是这样！”
"So this is how it is!"
“原来魔尊认识在下。”那人呵呵一笑，“不错，禹琰魔尊就是我等的主人。”
"So Fiend Supremacy has heard of me." That person laughed. "Not bad. Fiend Supremacy Yu Yan is our master."
“厨……”神TM厨房啊喂！
"Kitch..." What freaking kitchen!
“厨子你说。”沈萤继续吃自己的饭。
"Chef, you tell her about it." Shen Ying went on with her meal.
“厨子修为高，涨得快，关你屁事？”沈萤嫌弃的扫了他一眼，边翻白眼边道，“他的剑法是自创的，修为是自己练的，顿悟也是自己悟的。吃你家大米……呃，就算吃了跟你有啥关事，你干嘛要跟他比？”

"Chef advances fast because of his high standards of cultivation practice. " Shen Ying looked at him in exasperation. Rolling her eyes, she said, "His sword techniques are self-created, his cultivation is built up through self-practice and his epiphany is also a result of his self-discovery. Yes, you provide for his needs... But even if that's the case, what business is it of yours, why are you comparing yourself with him?"
“厨子！”沈萤条件反射的跑过去，伸手扶住人坐在了地上，“喂喂喂……别吓我，醒醒啊喂？”
"Chef!" cried out Shen Ying as she rushed over to him. Supporting him with her hands, she helped him sit up, "Hey, hey, hey... Don't scare me, wake up, will you?"
“厨子，你到底打算站到什么时候？”
"Chef, how long do you intend on standing there?"
“厨子，你怎么了？”见他突然就地坐下不动了，沈萤忍不住伸手戳了戳。
"Chef, what's wrong with you?" Seeing that he remained unmoving after suddenly sitting down, Shen Ying couldn't help reaching her hand out to poke him.
“厨子，你这是咋了？”她下意识的问了一句。
"Chef, what's wrong with you?" asked Shen Ying anxiously.
“厨子，你这闻着像香菜的是啥？”
"Chef, what is this thing that smells like coriander?"
“厨子，快走！”沈萤转身，一脸着急的就要往那边跑。
"Chef! Quick! Make a move!" Shen Ying turned around and was about to dash over hastily.
“厨子，我觉得……”
"Chef, I think..."
“去你妹的作业……”你们一个两个要不要都这么不靠谱啊喂，“别说得好像，你真的教过他一样啊喂！他只是个元婴，真的会……”
"Assignment my ass!" You guys are really unreliable. "Don't make it sound as if you've really taught him anything! He's only at the Nascent Soul stage, he'll-"
“去喊毛团，回家吃饭！”
"Tell Furball to go home for dinner!"
“去打听一下，今天街上有没有发生什么关于印家少主的消息。”孤月也发现事情有些不平常，直接派了个妹子去问。
"Go and find out if anything related to the Young Master of the Yin Family happened today," Lonemoon instructed one of the sisters. He too felt that something was amiss.
“去那个什么……什么涯？”
"Go to that... that Something cliff?"
“又……又顿悟！”他不是刚刚顿过一次了吗？这也太快了吧！奚秋的压下心底的震惊，细一想，那可是个上古秘境，许是他得了什么机缘，连忙朝对方行了个礼，“恭喜羿清尊者了。”

"Yet… yet another epiphany!" Didn't he just have an epiphany not long ago? He is advancing so quickly! Xi Qiu suppressed his surprise and tried to think carefully. That was an ancient mystic realm — maybe he was lucky. He bowed to Yi Qing and congratulated him, "Congratulations, Supremacy Yi Qing."
“又不是我拿的，萝卜自己要的啊。”她摊了摊手，不顾萝卜的反对，顺手把挂件扔给了孤月，“你找它！”

"I wasn't the one who took it, it's the radish who wanted it." She spread her hands open, and despite the radish's objections, conveniently threw the item towards Lonemoon. "You go and check with it!"
“又废了一炉，蠢猪都是因为你……”
"Another cauldron is ruined! Stupid swine, it's all because of you again..."
“又是翊家的人……”
"Someone from the Yi Family again..."
“又有人偷药！”
“Someone’s trying to steal the herbs again!”
“又来蹭饭？”沈萤瞅了瞅这个闲着没事，整天来唠嗑的老乡，挥了挥手道，“还没到饭点，厨子还没回来呢。”
"Are you here to freeload again?" Shen Ying glanced at her fellow compatriot, this idle man who constantly nagged at her, and waved her hand. "It's not yet meal time, the cook hasn't come back yet."
“又没路走了……”
"I've run out of options once again..."
“双修之术属于偏门，由于各人灵根和灵气的不同，采补的灵气斑驳，需要花费时间才能溶合已用。”他看了对面的人一眼，“但纯阴之体，本身有溶合灵气的能力，与这样的人……双修的速度是其它人的几十倍不止。”

"Dual cultivation is considered non-orthodox. Because everyone's spirit roots are different, the harvesting of Spirit Qi is very complicated and requires a lot of time to fuse and be able to use." He looked at the person opposite of him. "But the body of pure Yin is a body that fuses the energies of Spirit Qi. With someone like that… the speed of dual cultivation can be increased by more than ten times."
“双倍？”掌柜的脸色这才好看了点，上下扫视了孤月一眼，这才示意众人收起了剑，“你说的可是真的？”
"Double?" The restaurant owner's expression softened. He looked Lonemoon up and down, then signalled for the men around him to put away their weapons. "Are you serious?"
“双尾狸猫？！”孤月有些诧异的上前一步，这不是只六阶妖怪吗？说好的八阶呢？
"Double-tailed civet?!" A surprised Lonemoon stepped forward. Isn't this just a sixth-level demon? But they told us it was eighth-level?
“反……反正跟鬼王没关系！放心，噬魂幡的事，我会解决的。”突然就不担心噬魂幡了什么鬼？再次抬头看了看天上的幡旗，他捏了个诀，把幡直接收了回来。细一看上面除了那个残破得看不清的阵法外，仍旧看不出任何特殊的地方。

"Any… Anyway, it has got nothing to do with the Ghost King! Rest assured, I will resolve this matter with the Soul Devouring Gonfalon." Suddenly not worried about what ghost was inside the Soul Devouring Gonfalon. He raised his head and looked at the gonfalon in the air, produced a hand seal and kept the gonfalon. Upon a closer look, apart from the dilapidated array formation that could not be seen clearly, he still could not notice anything special.
“反正……今日起，这丹宗的传承就交给你了。”
"In any case... From this day on, this Alchemical Sect will be handed down to you."
“反正……反正不能是白泽！神族向来只存在于传说中，没有人见过真正的神族，他是不是真的还不一定呢。”他一脸坚定的摇头，想了想又加了一句，“对了，那个叫易峰的也不行。身为御兽修士，却认兽族为主，一看就不是好人。”

"In any case... in any case, it cannot be Bai Ze! The divine race has always only existed in stories. No one has seen a true divine being. We can't be sure if he's for real," Yi Qing shook his head. "Oh yes, you cannot choose that Yi Feng either. He is a beast control cultivator, yet he acknowledges a beast as his master. He's definitely not a good man."
“反正……用不着因别人的优秀，就怀疑自己啊。”她继续啃自己的糕点道，“你们不天天说，大道三千吗？本来走的就不是同一条路，瞎比什么冠军呢？”

"Anyway... Don't doubt yourself just because other people are better than you." Still munching on her pastry, she said, "Aren't you cultivators always saying there are three thousand paths leading to the Great Dao? Since everyone follows a different path, what's the point of comparing?"
“反正我们无敌派也没有什么朋友，别管什么友谊第一了。”她眼神冷了冷，一字一句的道，“所以……不用给我面子，尽管弄死他丫的！”

"In any case, our Invincible Sect has no friends, so don't bother about what I said about placing friendship first." The expression in her eyes turned cold and emphasizing every word, she said, "So… don't give me face. Just thrash them all!"
“反派到不至于。”他叹了一声，捏了捏手里的茶杯道，“我说过，那种小女生看的小说，我记得也不多。而且那些剧情都是发生在仙界的，白泽是神族。本就比普通仙人实力都高，他应该算是……主角的金手指之类的人物吧。”

"He's not a villain," he sighed and played with the teacup in his hands. "I've siad it before - I don't remember much of that story because it's meant for little girls. What's more, the story develops in the Immortal Realm. Bai Ze is of the Divine Realm. He is naturally much stronger and more capable than immortals. I think you can say that he's... the main lead's "gold finger"[1. Chinese slang for a character in novels that is unrealistically powerful or good] sort of character."
“发现了。”沈萤回。
"I found it," Shen Ying replied.
“发生了什么事？”羿清和孤月飞了下去，看了那男子一眼，神识瞬间就扫了过去，却仿佛触到了一层云雾，根本探不出对方的修为，“咦？”

"What's going on? Yi Qing and Lonemoon quickly flew down the hill and studied the man with their Divine Perception. A cloud blocked their perception so that they had no way of figuring out the man's cultivation level. "Eh?"
“叔……叔伯？我……不会在作梦吧？”虽然断了几根骨头，掉落了些修为，但是……他们居然还活着，一个都没有死。
"Un… uncle? Am… am I dreaming?" They had broken a few bones and dropped a few cultivation levels, but… they were still alive. None of them had died.
“叔伯！”男子猛的睁大了眼睛，这才发现地上那几个被捆成了粽子的人，就是那迟迟不归的五位游仙，“你们怎么……”
"Uncles!" The man's eyes bulged; he then realized that the few people bundled up like dumplings on the floor were the five Traveling Immortals who had not returned. "How did you all…"
“受伤了？”
"You are injured?"
“受教了！”
"I thank you for your advice!"
“变不了？”
"You're not able to manifest?"
“变相嫖娼！你的意思是这个世界，不禁黄？”
"An evolved way of prostitution! You mean in this world, they do not ban such an obscenity?"
“叛教之人？还是逃奴？”羿清眉头紧了紧，无法哪样都不像什么好人。
"Sect traitors? Or escaped slaves?" Yi Qing furrowed his brows. Either possibilities did not put them in a good light.
“另一个？你是说……”
"The other one? You meant..."
“只是对剑意有了新的感悟而已。”羿清摇了摇头道，“算不上顿悟。”
"I just have better insights on swore intent," Yi Qing shook his head. "It doesn't count as an epiphany."
“只是想与无常魔尊结个善缘而已。”他呵呵一笑，似是怕怀疑，还自己吃了一颗，“听闻尊上一直在找太虚派甘子睿的消息，我偶然听闻，此人其实一直躲在太虚派的悟剑峰上。”

"I only want to make befriend you and build up good karma between us," he laughingly said, as if worried of being doubted, he even swallowed one of the rejuvenation pills. "It is rumored that Supremacy has been looking for Gan Zirui from Grand Vacuity Sect. I have chanced upon the news that he is currently hiding in Grand Vacuity Sect's Sword Comprehension Peak."

“只是，徒儿所求之事，非同寻常且迫在眉睫。”说着，他手间一转，拿出之前封印的噬魂幡解释道，“此幡仍魔修芮糜所造。他曾屠民数十万，将魂魄尽数困于此幡，并养于戾气血池之中。引幡中恶鬼相互厮杀，想借此养出鬼王。如今幡内还余数万恶鬼，随便一只放出，都会引得生灵涂炭。”想起那魔修的恶行，他手心一紧，深吸了一口气才继续道，“如今此幡失去主人的控制，里面的恶鬼必会趁机破幡而出。我昨晚虽然用术法暂时封印住此幡，但也不是长久之计，待月圆之日，阴气最盛之时，恶鬼必会冲破封印，为祸人间。”

"It's just that, my request is not a common one and is also of great urgency." He flipped his hand and took out the previously sealed Soul Devouring Gonfalon and explained, "This gonfalon is still the creation of fiend cultivator Rui Mi. He once massacred tens of thousands of people and trapped those souls within this gonfalon to breed in the Blood Pool of Noxiousness. This incited the evil spirits within the gonfalon to kill each other, the purpose of which was to breed a Ghost King. Currently, this gonfalon still contains millions of evil spirits. Releasing any one of them would lead to the loss of lives as well as great misery and suffering." Recalling the evil doings of that fiend cultivator made him clench his fists. He continued after inhaling a deep breath. "Now that this gonfalon has become free of its owner's control, the evil spirits inside will certainly make use of this opportunity to escape from it. Although I used a spell to temporarily seal the gonfalon last night, it is not a long-term solution. When the night of full moon arrives, the Yin energy will be at its peak and the evil spirits will definitely break the seal, bringing harm to the world."
“只有一个问题了。”
"I have only one question."
“只有这边的山壁上有血迹。”羿清在四周查看了一圈，出声道。
"Only this side of the mountain wall has blood stains." Yi Qing informed them after having made a sweep of the surroundings.
“只要有了你们的修为，我就能化去凡胎成为真正的魔族！”他声音里满满都是兴奋，连着整个塔仿佛都感受到了他的情绪，开始猛烈的晃动起来，“到时即使是上界仙神，也不是我的对手。”他笑得越加的张狂，眼中红光一闪，带着浑身阴冷入骨的气息，铺天盖地的朝着沈萤飞了过去。

"Once I have your cultivation, I can transform from an immortal into a true member of the demon tribe!" His voice was full of excitement, and the whole pagoda began to shake violently as if in sympathy. "When that happens, even an upper world immortal will not be my match." His laughter became even more menacing, the red light in his eyes flashing. Then he launched his whole body, covered in spine chilling aura, towards Shen Ying.
“叫了，你们没听见。”她一脸无辜，毕竟中间隔着条河，“再说，你们也没叫我啊！”我咋知道你们在找我？

"I called out but you did not hear it." She wore an innocent look. After all, there was a river between the shores. "Also, you guys did not call for me!" How would I have known that you were looking for me?
"But…"
“可……”她眼睛亮了亮，“他毕竟是印家少主，要是得罪了他，会不会对门派不利？”
"But..." Si Yu's eyes lit up, "He is the Young Master of the Yin Family afterall. If I offend him, would it be detrimental to our sect?"
“可……之前出妖界死的最多就是兔……”兔王话到一半，立马捂住了三瓣嘴。这三个月死了上百只妖，三分之一的都是兔妖。

"B-but… we rabbits were the ones that suffered the greatest casualties when we exited the Demon Realm…" The Rabbit Monarch spoke halfway before covering its mouth immediately. More than a hundred demons had died in the past three months, of which a third were rabbit demons.
“可……之前的森林又是怎么回事？”孤月有些想不通，如果这个上古秘境的入口，一开始就在这练丹炉里的话，不可能里面还有着一座森林吧？

"But… what happened to the forest?" Lonemoon couldn't figure it out. If the entrance to the ancient mystic realm was all along at the elixir-refining cauldron, how could it contain a forest inside as well?
“可……可是……”易峰有些不敢相信，“这等小事断不敢麻烦灵主，幻海虽然凶险，但像背云兽这样的事还是少见，灵主不用担心。况且您的身份不宜暴露，不如……”

"But... but..." Yi Feng could not believe his ears. "We would not dare to trouble you with such a small matter, Spirit Master. The Mirage Sea may be dangerous, but we rarely come across such high-level beasts like the Cloud-Bearing Beast. Don't worry, Spirit Master. Morever, it won't be convenient to reveal your identity. Why not...."
“可……可鸡肉好吃喵。”狸猫弱弱的回了一句。
"But… but chicken meat is delicious." The civet cat replied timidly.
“可……这不是我的历练啊。”这只是一个简单的门派任务，他只需要把弟子送到指定地点，然后保证他们的安全就行。
"But… this is not my training." This was just a simple sect mission. He only needed to accompany the sect's disciples to the designated location and see to their safety.
“可……那不是一个凡人吗？”明明没有灵气。
"But… isn't she a mortal?" She had obviously possessed no Spirit Qi.
“可……长老，我们不是体修门派吗？”
"But... Elder, aren't we a sect of body cultivators?"
“可不是吗？这无敌派到底是什么来头，居然可以正面对抗郁家。”
"Isn't that right? Where exactly is this Invincible Sect from? How are they able to do such damage to the Yu Family?"
“可以你妹啊！”你丫说的是朗朗上口还是津津有味啊！孤月气得想咬人，“你能不能放过吃的！取这样的名字，是想告诉别人，门下弟子都是被吃的菜吗？”

"Okay your ass!" Are these pleasing to the ears or pleasing to your mouth? Lonemoon was furious. "Can you stop thinking about food for once? If we choose names like that, won’t we be telling other sects that our disciples can easily be devoured?"
“可以的大仙，很快的大仙！”拼命点头。
"Yes, I can, Great Immortal. I'll get it done immediately, Great Immortal!" The Rabbit Monarch nodded its head vigorously.
“可你每天站我窗外，也不是个办法啊。你明天还要早起做早饭呢？”
"But standing outside my window everyday isn’t the solution. You still have to wake up early tomorrow to prepare breakfast, right?"
“可刚刚您是在挖坑啊！”羿清更疑惑了。
"But you were digging a pit just now!" Yi Qing was growing more bewildered.
“可大家来都来……”郁红一脸为难，刚要解释，眼神扫到了某人，顿时一亮，“掌门！”
"But everyone is already here..." Yu Hong looked like she was being put in a spot. She began to explain herself, but her gaze landed on someone and brightened, "Sect Master!"
“可它们的样子……”沈萤瞅了瞅众兔四条雪白的爪爪，“方便吗？”
"But they look…" Shen Ying took a quick glance at the surrounding colony of rabbits' four snow-white paws and said, "Will it be convenient?"
“可它刚不说，那小孩是人生的吗？”
"But didn't he just say that the kid was born from a human?"
“可它要这枯草干嘛？”用来埋吗？
"But what does it want to do with that withered plant?" To bury it?
“可恶！”狐妖怒吼了一声，连忙撤回一尾挡在身前，瞬间又被削去了一尾，可他能挡住一波剑招，却挡不住第二波，只见灵剑刷啦啦的插入他脚下的地面，正逼阵眼，阵法顿时一暗。眼看着满天剑雨就要落下来，血狐不得不往后疾退了出去，飞出了刚刚的阵法中心。

"Damn!" The fox demon roared in anger, and quickly withdrew one of its tails to shield himself. This tail was instantly cut off. Although he could block their first wave of sword attacks, he could not ward off their second wave. The spirit swords plunged right into the ground under his feet, close to the eye of the array, causing the formation to suddenly turn dark. On seeing that a skyful of swords was about to rain down on him, the blood fox was left with no choice but to retreat and fly out of the array formation.
“可惜了，太可惜了！这可是一位可能成为……”姬听雨满脸的失望，摇了摇头，再次看了江逸两眼，一句话没说朝外面走去，打开大门后径直离开，没有再回头一次。

"What a pity, what a huge pity! He could have been..." Ji Tingyu was filled with disappointment. Shaking her head, she gave Jiang Yi one last look before heading outside wordlessly. She opened the doors and left straight away, without another backward glance.
“可惜我是孤儿，不然定要像师父一样，修仙也不忘父母生养之恩。”
"It's too bad that I was an orphan, otherwise I would have definitely wanted to be just like Master, never forgetting gratitude for my parents raising me up even after immortal cultivation."
“可我们三人在此已经守了几百年了，也不知还要守到什么时候？主家何时才会允我等回去。”
"But the three of us have been waiting here for a few hundred years, how much longer must we wait? When will Master allow us to go back?"
“可拉倒吧你！你是你，他是他。连根都不在一个世界，原本就没有什么因果关系？你到底哪里想不开，硬要跟人家死磕，比较这些？”她啧啧了两声，“牛爸爸你多大岁数了，还这么矫情？”

"But what! Yi Qing is Yi Qing, you are you. You are from different worlds, there is basically no karmic ties between the two of you. Why must you make yourself unhappy by always thinking of keeping up with others?" Clucking her tongue she admonished, "Father Niu, should should you be acting up like this at your age?"
“可是……”他瞅了瞅那比眼睛还小的裂缝，“这么小的裂缝，真的能通向神界？”
"But..." he studied the crack, which was about the size of his own eyeball. "This is such a small crack. Can it really take us to the Divine Realm?"
“可是……”还是有人有些担忧，带些犹豫的道，“郁红姐，我们真的要离开吗？我看……那两位尊上不像是坏人。而且这里又在妖界，振祥……那老贼也不会找到这里来的。而且那两位尊上都是化神，还是剑修。”

"But…" There were some who were still worried and one of them said hesitantly, "Sister Yu Hong, do we really have to leave? I think… those two Supremacies don't look like bad people and this is in the Demon Realm. That old crook, Zhen Xiang… even he won’t be able to find his way here. Moreover, those two Supremacies are at the Soul Formation stage and on top of that, they are sword cultivators."
“可是……师父一旦睡着了，雷打都不醒的啊！”
"But… Master, once you fall asleep, even thunder cannot wake you up!"
“可是……这样不好吧？”她瞅了瞅那边两人，还有小孩在呢？
Cautiously she said, "but... I don't think this is a good idea." She gazed at the duo beside, and there is even a kid here.
“可是……除了六派三宗，谁还有实力，能在三个月内，杀掉所有出界的妖族。”虎王还是坚持自己的想法。
"But… other than the Six Schools Three Sects, who else possesses the might to kill every demon who stepped out of the Demon Realm over the past three months?" insisted the Tiger Monarch.
“可是不吃会饿啊！”
"But we'll be hungry if we don't eat!"
“可是他连忽悠也能提升修为。”他神情越加的颓废了，“老子苦练了几百年都比不上被忽悠一次。”

"But he could use your bluff to improve his cultivation level." Lonemoon's expression became even more troubled, "I have been training for hundreds of years, but my training can't compare to him being bluffed one time."
“可是我们跟这些修仙门派，向来泾渭分明，他们为何突然阻我等出界之路。”狐王一脸疑惑。
"But we have always tried to stay out of the cultivation sects way as much as possible. Why would they suddenly blockade the path out of our Demon Realm?" the Wolf Monarch questioned doubtfully.
“可是掌门去个后殿都会迷路，她……能找着升仙塔？”
"But Sect Master would get lost even in the rear hall. Can she... make it to the Immortal Ascension Pagoda?"
“可是此事太过蹊跷。”狼王皱了皱眉，“直到现在，我们也不知道到底是谁动的手？目的为何？”
"But there is something amiss about this matter." The Wolf Monarch frowned. "We still have no idea who it is that attacked us, nor do we know their aim."
“可是除了鬼王出世，又有什么可以引起这种天地异变？”奚秋一脸茫然。
"But besides the birth of the Ghost King, what could have caused the earth and sky to transform?" Xi Qiu looked blank.
“可是，我连剑也……”他拿起手中的半截的断剑，一个剑修的剑折断，那就是耻辱。
"But even my sword is…" He lifted up the broken sword in his hand. It was utterly humiliating for a sword cultivator to have his sword broken.
“可有什么要求？”
"What kind of spirit beast are you looking for?"
“可能吧？”这些她不懂。
"Maybe?" She didn't know about these things.
“可能当面被拆穿，有点接受不了吧！”沈萤不在意的翻了个身，继续趴着，“习惯了就好。”
"Perhaps exposing him in front of everyone was a little too much!" Shen Ying could not be bothered. She turned away and continued to lay there. "Just get used to it and it will be fine."
“可能是她们赢了大比，让一些人眼红了吧！”孤月冷哼一声，捏了捏手里的笛子，“要眼红，也要看他们有没有这个本事，还真当我们无敌派人少好欺负吗？”

"Maybe the girls won a huge sum and people got jealous!" Lonemoon tutted. He twirled the flute in his hands. "Even if they're jealous, they should think about their own capabilities. Do they really think our Invincible Sect can be so easily bullied?"
“可这都做好了……”
"But these are already done..."
“可，刚刚那株……”他突然想起之前草木灵抱走的枯草。
"But, that..." He suddenly remembered the withered grass that the Vegetation Spirit took with it.
“叽~~”突然被拧出的萝卜，配合的挥了挥叶子。
"Ji~" The radish was delighted to have been let loose from Shen Ying's leg. It waved its leaves at its audience as a greeting.
“叽……”它的声音一沉，连着叶子都蔫巴了下去，整颗萝卜都是被拒绝的伤心样。
"Ji..." it lowered its voice as the leaves atop its head seemed to go limp. It looked dejected.
“叽……”整只萝卜瞬间焉巴了。
"Ji..." The entire radish immediately seemed dejected.
“叽……”萝卜往回蹦，沈萤直接把它头顶攒了一大把的蒲公英拿了下来，顺手递给了地上的家主，“这个你们应该有用，就当交换吧！萝卜走了。”

"Ji…" The radish hopped forward. Shen Ying reached for the huge dandelion atop the radish's head and plucked it off. She handed it to the Master and said, "This should be useful to you. Take it as an exchange! Radish, let's go."
“叽……”萝卜挂件立马扬了扬叶子。
"Ji..." The radish immediately raised its leaves.
“叽……”萝卜钻了出来，一头就扎进沈萤怀里，似是受到什么天大的委屈，叫得又快又急，“叽叽叽叽叽……”
"Ji…" The radish rushed headlong into Shen Ying's arms. It seemed to be suffering from a terrible grievance, squeaking urgently, "Ji ji ji…"
“叽……叽……叽……”萝卜越加的委屈，指了指地上的人，头上的叶子舞得又快又急。
"Ji… Ji… Ji…" The radish seemed even more aggrieved, pointing to the man on the ground and waving the leaves on its head desperately.
“叽。”萝卜卷着叶子，直接把头上的蒲公英拔了下来，讨好似的递给沈萤，“叽叽。”
"Ji," the radish rolled its leaves back in and plucked the dandelion off of its head. It handed the dandelion to Shen Ying, as if begging for her approval. "Ji ji."
“叽叽。”
"Ji ji."
“叽叽。”萝卜抖了抖叶子，蹭蹭蹭的加快速度蹦了过来，几片叶子讨好似的缠到了她腿上，带些兴奋的道，“叽叽叽叽……”
"Ji ji," the radish replied as it shook the leaves on its head. It hopped quickly to catch up with Shen Ying and used its leaves to wrap around her legs, making excited noises as it went.
“叽叽叽……”萝卜从他手里挤了出来，转身就想挂回沈萤腿上，却被对方一瞪，叶子瞬间蔫了下来，委屈兮兮的退了回去。

"Ji ji ji…" The radish squeezed its way out of his hands and tried to hang back onto Shen Ying's leg, but was glared at by the other party. Its leaves shriveled and it retracted them back in grievance.
“叽叽叽……”话音一落，手上的萝卜突然激动的扭动起来，沈萤只好松了手。草木灵一落地，整个萝卜都往下缩了缩，连着身上都缩出了折子，头上的叶子全卷了起来，好似浑身在用力使劲一般，连叫声也变成了一段段的：“叽……叽……”

"Ji ji ji…" Just as Yi Qing finished speaking, the radish began to twist and turn in Shen Ying's hands. She had no choice but to release it. The vegetation spirit fell to the ground. Immediately, it began to contract its entire body. Even its leaves began to roll up. It looked like it was using every ounce of energy it had. It began to cry out in spurts, "ji… ji…"
“叽叽叽叽叽……”萝卜用力的点着叶子。
"Ji ji ji..." The radish frantically nodded with its leaves.
“叽叽叽叽叽……”萝卜着急的蹦了蹦，瞅了瞅殿内又看了看他，突然用力一蹦，跳到了她刚刚坐的那个高台上，挥着叶子朝椅子后面的墙中伸了进去，半会掏出了什么，朝她举了举，“叽叽叽……”

"Ji ji ji…" The radish nervously bounced on the spot. It looked at something located further inside of the hall, then turned back to Shen Ying. Suddenly, it hopped up forcefully and landed on the seat atop the platform where Shen Ying was seated just seconds ago. The radish used its leaves to reach into the wall behind the chair. A moment later, it pulled something out and lifted it up to Shen Ying. "Ji ji ji…"
“叽叽叽叽！”萝卜突然跳了下来，往殿内蹦了蹦。
"Ji ji ji ji!" The radish suddenly hopped back into the hall.
“叽叽！”点头。
"Ji… Ji…!" It nodded.
“叽叽？”萝卜愣了一下，瞅了瞅前面已经飞走的两人，再瞅瞅自己抱着的腿，好似这才意识到抱错人了，顿时叶子一甩，把刚刚还抓着的花狠狠往地上一扔，发出了一个细小的音节：

"Ji ji?" The radish appeared shocked. It turned to look at the two people in the air and turned back to look at the leg it was hanging on to. Realising that it was hanging onto the wrong person, it swept its leaves against Lonemoon's leg and threw the dandelions toward the ground.
"Ji…"
“叽！”它憋了半天，突然身子一直，叶子瞬间展开。头顶噗哧一声，冒出了一朵纯白如雪的……
"Ji!" After all this while, the radish suddenly stood upright. Its leaves unfolded as out of its head sprung something white as snow…
“叽！”果然小姐姐还是喜欢我绝世的容颜。
"Ji!" Indeed, Little Missy still likes my absolute beautiful looks.
“叽！”萝卜叶子一扬，身形一闪，就变成了那个美得不分男女的样子，转头就想往沈萤脚上扑，“我就知道，小姐姐一定还是喜欢我绝世的容颜。”

"Ji!" The radish's leaves were raised up. Its silhouette flashed and it transformed to take the appearance of a beautiful, gender-neutral looking individual, and then attempted to latch onto Shen Ying's leg. "I know Little Missy must still like my absolute beauty."
“叽！”萝卜应了一声，举了举头上的枯叶，又看了看她。似是听懂她的话，蔫下的叶子瞬间又立了起来，“叽叽叽叽叽……”
"Ji!" The radish replied. It raised the withered leaves on its head, looked at her again as if understanding her words, and then the shriveled leaves immediately stood up. "Ji ji ji…"
“叽！”萝卜点头，突然似是想到什么，扬着一片叶子可怜兮兮的伸到她的跟前，发出一连串的连哭带抖的声音，“叽~叽叽……”
"Ji!" Radish nodded. Suddenly, as if recalling something, it pitifully reached out one of its leaves towards her, all the while quivering and squeaking, "Ji… Ji… Ji…"
“叽！”那萝卜一个激凌，缓缓转过白胖胖的身子，看了她一眼，似是吓了一跳，开始更快的刨起了坑，“叽叽叽叽……”一时也不管坑有没有挖好，整根萝卜拼命的往那个只挖了一半的坑里硬塞，还掩饰性的挽起两把土，撒在头顶的叶子上，然后摆了个自然的造型，一动不动了。

“Ji!" The radish huffed, slowly turning its fat, white body around. It faced Shen Ying and was visibly shocked. It quickly turned back and resumed digging rapidly. "Ji ji ji…" Without checking first if it had dug deep enough, the radish burrowed itself into the half-dug pit. Having gone as far as it could, it picked up two handfuls of soil and dumped it atop its head. Then, it stayed as still as it could.
“叽？”萝卜愣了一下，瞅了瞅出门的人，再瞅了瞅挺尸手里的蒲公英，然后字正腔圆的发出一声。
"Ji?" The radish articulated. It paused as its eyes followed Shen Ying. Then, it turned around to look at the dandelion in the Master's hands.
“叽？”萝卜身子歪了歪，一脸茫然。
"Ji?" The radish tilted its body with a face of puzzlement.
“吃你妹啊！”孤月手里的杯子一紧，瞬间捏了个粉碎，直接炸毛，“有什么好庆祝的？！”
"Eat your head!" Lonemoon tightened his grip around the cup in his hand and shattered it. He exploded immediately afterward, saying, "What's there to celebrate?!"
“吃你妹啊！”有你这么聊天的吗？他话还没说完呢，鬼才要……
"Eat my foot!" Is this the way you hold a conversation? He had not finished, who would want to...
“吃吗？”她直接把糕点递了过去。
"Do you want some?" she offered Lonemoon some pastries.
“吃吗？”沈萤边啃着水果边问。
"Want to eat?" Shen Ying asked as she munched on her fruit.
“吃啊！”她理所当然的回道，“我也要生活的嘛。”
"Eat, of course!" The woman replied as though it was a matter of fact. "I need to live too."
“吃啊，别客气！”沈萤推了推他的手，指了指满扇的糕点。
"Go ahead and eat, no need to stand on ceremony!" Shen Ying nudged at Lonemoon’s hands as she pointed at the all the pastries that filled the surface of the fan.
“吃得差不多了。”沈萤摸了摸肚皮，一本正经的道，“不如……回去做饭吧？”
"I am almost done with eating." Shen Ying touched her belly and said with a straight face, "How about… we go back and prepare for a meal?"
“吃过！”
"Yes, you have!"
“吃饱了没事做，要不……找人算个账去吧？”
"Since we have nothing to do after eating, how about… let's find someone to settle a score?"
“各位大仙，我真的是只好喵喵，求求你们放了我吧。”狸猫朝着几人重重的嗑了个头，“七天后，就是万妖大王的晋升大典，我要是迟到了，我们族长会扒了喵的皮的。”

"Dear Immortals, I'm really a good little kitty cat, I beg you to release me." The civet cat turned to them and bowed repeatedly. "The ceremony to celebrate the advancement of the Myriad Demon Monarch is in seven days time. If I am late for it, our clan patriarch will have my skin."
“各位妖族，近来此间发生的事，想必诸位心里有数。”虎族向来强悍，虎王第一个开口到是使众妖都安静了下来，“我们同属妖类，此等危机之下，我觉得各族应该抛去成见，同声连枝，共同解决眼下的问题。”

"Demonfolks, I believe everyone is aware of the recent happenings!" Tigers were one of the more domineering races, so the demons immediately fell silent the moment the Tiger Monarch spoke. "As fellow demons, in light of the crisis we are facing, I believe that we should put aside our differences and work to overcome the problem facing us."
“各位说的可是贵派的另一位剑修前辈。”印元飞突然像是想到了什么，“我在来的路上遇到过他了，前辈听说了此事，已经先行一步去升仙塔救人了。还特让我来请大仙，贵派的方位就是他告诉在下的。此时怕是已经到了，还请大仙……咦，大仙？大仙人呢？”

"Are you talking about the other elder in your Sect?" Yin Yuanfei suddenly asked, looking as if he just recalled something important. "I saw him on my way here. He told me that he had heard there was trouble and was on his way to the Immortal Ascension Pagoda to rescue people. He was the one who told me where I could find you and your honorable sect, Great Immortal. I think he's already there. Great Immortal, please... Wait, Great Immortal? Where's Great Immortal?"
“各位道友，秘境凶险，发生什么意外很正常。诸位是不是哪里弄错了？”奚秋压下心底的火气，沉声提醒道。

"Fellow Daoists, the mystic realm is treacherous, accidents are commonplace. Is it not possible that you have made a mistake somewhere?" Xi Qiu suppressed the anger in his heart and reminded them in a low voice.
“同门？你们不是都见过了吗？”
"The rest of the sect? Haven't you already seen them?"
“听到什么了？”孤月看了沈萤一眼，系统的声音只有枫影和她听得到，“那到底是啥东西？”
"What did you hear?" Lonemoon asked Shen Ying. Only Shen Ying and Feng Ying could hear the system. "What is that thing?"
“听说是那十个人里，有一个昨晚与人私斗受了重伤，所以直接退赛了。她运气又好。两次都抽到了轮空。”所以啥事没做，直接就进了最后的三强决赛。

"I heard that one of the top ten fighters got into a personal fight last night and was badly injured. That’s why he withdrew from the competition. She's lucky to have been given a walkover for two rounds." So it turned out she hadn't lifted a finger and made it to the top three.
“听说那两人啊……”
"I heard that those two..."
“听闻掌门姓羿……单名一个清字！一年前轩辕家的事听过没？就是羿掌门跟门下的孤月长老做的。”

"I heard that the Sect Master's surname is Yi... and first name is a single word, Qing! Have you heard about what happened with the Xuan Yuan Family a year ago? Sect Master Yi and her subordinate, Lonemoon, were responsible for that too."
“听闻无常魔尊容颜绝世，当初修仙之时就是三宗六派第一美人，人称雨仙子。我等二人一直仰慕您的风采，如今路经此地，所以特意前来拜见。”

"It has been rumored that Fiend Supremacy Impermanence is an absolute beauty. At the beginning of your immortal cultivation you were already the number one beauty throughout the entire Six Schools Three Sects, known as Fairy Yu. Both of us have always admired your elegance. We are passing by this place, so we specially came over to pay you a visit."
“听闻是个隐世的大仙门，没人知道他们门派具体在哪，但门内弟子不是剑修就是体修。”
"I heard that they have a hidden Great Immortal. No one knows exactly where they are based, but their disciples are either sword cultivators or body cultivators."
“听闻是因为郁家主，抓了无敌派两名弟子，还打成了重伤。印家和轩辕家主去劝都不放人，这不，人家掌门一生气，就把郁家连锅端了？”

"I heard the Yu Family's Master caught two disciples from the Invincible Sect and even seriously injured them. He refused to let them go no matter how much the masters of the Yin Family and Xuan Yuan Family tried to persuade them to. That's why the Master of the Invincible Sect got angry and took care of the Yu Family."
“听雨你先忙着，迟些我再来找你好了。”马黑旗长相很英俊，和江恨水有的一比，不过肤色有些偏黑，此刻穿着一身黑色花边锦袍，也像一个黑马王子，他看出了姬听雨的不喜，很是识趣的转身离开了。

"Tingyu, I'll leave you to your business and look for you later," Ma Heiqi was a handsome man, his looks on par with that of Jiang Henshui, albeit with a darker skin tone. In silken robes with black trimmings, he looked, in this moment, suitably like a dark-skinned prince charming. Sensing the displeasure in Ji Tingyu, he wisely turned and left.
“听雨没这意思，只是我们这的一些规矩，易公子别见怪……”
"I didn't mean that! It's just that there are some rules here that we have to follow. Young Master Yi, please don't get offended..."
“启禀两位长老，山下的兔妖说，发现个想闯入无敌派的奸细。”郁红禀告道。
"Greetings, Elders. The rabbit demon at the bottom of the hill said it discovered a spy trying to break into the Invincible Sect," Yu Hong reported.
“吵死了！”
"What's with the noise!"
“呀？令牌！”江小奴一看满脸惊讶，开心的叫道：“少爷，你赎回令牌了？你怎么来的十两紫金呢？”
"Ah? It's the command token!" Xiaonu cried out in pleasant surprise, "Young Master, you've managed to redeem it? But how did you procure ten taels of purple gold?"
"Er…"
“呃……”不是你让闭嘴的吗？
"Er..." Didn't you ask me to shut up?
“呃……”不，她只是路痴不敢乱走而已。
"Uh…" No, she was just terrible with directions and dared not wander around.
“呃……”不，我是真的没钱。
"Uh…" No, I really don’t have any money.
“呃……”他是说是还是不是呢？
"Er..." Is he saying yes or no?
“呃……”你也不是女的啊，“这是师命，听话。”
"Er..." You're not a girl. "This is an order. Listen."
“呃……”她僵了一下，半会才扬起手打了个招呼，“早上好！你们……是来叫我吃早饭的吗？”也不用来得这么齐吧？
"Oh..." She said. After a moment of silence, she raised her hand in greeting, "Good morning! Are you... are all you here to call me down for breakfast?" Did you all have to come?
“呃……”她怎么有种接了分手费的感觉，抬头看了看眼前的人，“你要去干死那个姓甘的吗？”
"Hey…" Why did she get the feeling that this was a break-up fee? Raising her head, Shen Ying looked at the person in front of her. "You're going to kill that man called Gan?"
“呃……”她是这么容易被骗的人吗，“放心，毛团虽然不太说话，但不是啥坏人。”
"Er..." Was she that gullible? "Don't worry, Furball doesn't talk much but he's not a bad person."
“呃……”好像用力过猛了，“看来我不适合用剑！”沈萤抓了抓头，转手就把剑扔回给了厨子，“那啥，今天晚上吃什么？”
"Er…" I must have used too much force. Shen Ying scratched her head and then threw the sword back to the chef. "What's-your-name, what's for dinner tonight?"
“呃……”孤月脸色一红，越加的羞耻了，他们还真没想起付账的事。
"Er…" Lonemoon blushed, growing increasingly ashamed of himself. He really had not realized that they did not foot the bill.
“呃……”怎么突然学术起来了啊，他以前是学金融的又不是学生物的，完全听不懂啊。但是……莫名觉得很有道理是肿么回事？

You may not have a sword in your hands, but it doesn't matter as long as you have one in your heart. The sword is nothing but a medium. Even a flower or a branch could be your sword."

"Swish! Swish! "
"Swish!"
“哇哦。”沈萤抬头看了看天空，这雷跟她以前看到的劫雷完全不同，“飞升的雷都这么厉害的吗？”
"Wow." Shen Ying looked up at the sky. This lightning was completely different from the ones she had seen before. "Is the lightning tribulation of the Immortal Ascension so powerful?"
“哇，好高的塔啊。”沈萤仰着头看向眼前那座高耸入云白色巨塔，它几乎占据了大半个华元城，几里之外都能一眼看到。
"Wow, what a tall pagoda." Shen Ying looked up at the gigantic white pagoda before her. It occupied almost half of Huayuan City and could be seen from a few miles away.
“哈……欠，好困啊！牛爸爸你看着，我先眯一会。”沈萤伸了个懒腰，突然开口。
Shen Ying yawned. "I'm so sleepy! Father Niu, you keep an eye on him. I'm going to take a nap." Shen Ying suddenly said as she stretched.
"Haha--"
“哈哈哈……”
"Hahaha......"
“哈哈哈……妖气入体的滋味怎么样啊？”黑衣人笑得更加得意，“不枉我废尽心思布下聚灵阵，花了三天将你引到这里。”

"Hahaha… How does it feel to have the demonic auras entering you?" The person in black sniggered, "The painstaking efforts I put in to set up this soul gathering array during the three days used to lure you in were not a waste."
“哈哈哈哈……”他正打算解释，声音顿时又一变，发出一阵狂笑，“你以为这地仙奈何得了我？别忘了这里可是魔界，她早就自身难保。一个地仙连普通魔族都对付不了，更别说这里还有魔王。”

"Hahahaha..." as he was just about to explain further, his voice quickly changed to a hysterical laughter. "You really think that this Earth Immortal can deal with me? Don't forget,this is the Devildom. Don't expect her to save you when she cannot even help herself. A mere Earth Immortal cannot even deal with a common devil, let alone under the presence of the Devil King. "
“哈哈哈哈……”嚣张的笑声在半空响起，紧接着一个黑色的身影缓缓落了下来，踩在了她那倒了一半的茅屋废墟中，“羿清小儿，你不是要除魔卫道吗？不是要杀我吗？怎么这就不行了？”

"Hahaha…" An arrogant laughter rang out in the air. A black shadow then slowly landed on the ruins of her cottage. "Youngling Yi Qing, didn't you want to annihilate the fiends and defend the Dao? Weren't you going to kill me? Why are you not taking action yet?"
“哈哈哈哈……”青尹突然张狂的笑了起来，“你们还真以为凭着一个化神和元婴就能打过我们，哼！剑修又如何，在游仙面前你们只是蝼蚁而已，等我师……青岚师兄！”他威胁的话才说了一半，突然看到了地上已经没了动静的人，猛的睁大了眼睛。

"Hahaha…" Qing Yin suddenly laughed maniacally. "You guys thought a Soul Formation cultivator and a Nascent Soul cultivator were able to defeat us, hmph! So what if you are a sword cultivator, you are nobody in front of Traveling Immortals. You just wait… Senior Brother Qing Lan!" His threatening words were left hanging halfway when he suddenly saw the person on the ground who already showed no movements, and his eyes widened.
“哈哈哈哈……没想到这个秘境里居然藏着一座仙宫！”
"Hahahaha… I didn't expect an immortal pavilion to be hidden inside this mystic realm!"
“哈哈哈哈哈……”他突然大笑了起来，“你们还真当我是傻子不成。”
"Hahaha..." he suddenly burst into laughter. "You all really think I'm that hopeless."
“哈哈哈哈哈……”站在阵法之外的血狐突然狂笑起来，冷冷的看了两人一眼，“哼，你们真以为，我会什么都没准备，就这么坐以待毙？”

"Ha ha ha ha ha…" The blood fox, who had been standing outside the array, suddenly laughed hysterically. Looking at the two of them coldly, he said, "Hey, did you really think that I did not make any preparations, that I would just sit and wait for death?"
“哈哈哈哈哈……”魔蛟笑得越发嚣张了起来，“白泽，就算你是神兽，也别想挡住我这水族大军。况且……”他话音一顿，阴冷的视线突然朝着沈萤和易峰的方向扫了过来，“你不是一向喜欢护着那些人类，不许兽族靠近陆地吗？不知今日你我一战之时，你是否还能分神护住这两个人修？”

"Hahaha..." The Wyrm Demon laughed arrogantly. "Bai Zhe, even if you're a Divine Beast, there's no way you can overcome my marine race army. Besides..." He paused for a moment, sweeping his gaze over to Shen Ying and Yi Feng. "Weren't you always protective of humans, refusing to let the beast tribes come close to land? I wonder if you can still protect these two cultivators when we start our battle?"
“哈哈哈哈哈哈……”魔修身上的黑气大盛，直接冲出了剑阵，手里拿着正是那面噬魂幡，“真是得来全不费功夫。”
"Hahaha…" The fiendish cultivator's black smoke grew in abundance and broke free of the sword array, his hand holding the Soul Devouring Gonfalon. "It was really a piece of cake to get this."
“哈哈哈哈哈，噬魂幡是我的了！”魔修越笑越大声，眼睛大睁，兴奋的看着四周森森的鬼气，“从此以后，化神之下无人将是我的敌手，万鬼驱使，我……噗！”他话还没说完，张嘴喷出一口血，形势突变。

"Hahaha, the Soul Devouring Gonfalon is mine!" The fiendish cultivator's laughter grew louder and his eyes opened wider. He excitedly looked at the eerie Ghost Qi surrounding him. "From now on, no one below the level of Soul Formation can stand up against me, millions of ghosts are at my beck and call, I… pfft!" Before he could finish what he was saying, he spat a mouthful of blood and the situation suddenly took a turn.
“哈哈哈哈，姑娘说得好。比起来人灵兽的确更讲义气，更可靠。”易峰好久没有遇到喜欢御兽的女修，而且对方貌似还是个隐藏很深的高阶修士，顿时起了结交的心思，“在下易峰，是易家家主，不知姑娘如何称呼？”

"Hahaha, well said, Lady. Compared to humans, spirit beasts are indeed much more loyal and reliable." It had been a long time since Yi Feng met a female cultivator who liked spirit beasts. Shen Ying also looked like a hidden expert. After a moment, Yi Feng decided that he wanted to get to know her better. "I'm Yi Feng, the Family Master of the Yi Family. May I know how to address you, Lady?"
“哈哈哈哈，果然是英雄出少年啊！”奚秋大笑出声，跟在坐的各堂主交换了一个眼神，众人皆是同样的想法。这样的人才，一定要不惜一切代价留下来。

"Hahaha, you really are an outstanding young man!" Xi Qiu laughed loudly, and exchanged looks with each of the Hall Masters in turn. Everyone had the same thought. Such a talent had to stay with them no matter what.
“哈哈哈哈，苍天有眼啊！老天爷，你终于开了一次眼了！”
"Hahahaha, the heavens have eyes! Heavenly father, you've finally come to help me for once!"
“哈哈哈！”
"Hahaha!"
“哈哈哈，宝贝呀，这真的是宝贝，老天有眼啊……”
"Hahaha, yeah! This is a treasure, a real one. The Heavens do favor me…"
“哈哈哈，成了？”
"Hahaha, does that count as a success?"
“哈哈哈，这魔音铃总算是我的了。”突然阵法中心的荆棘之上，出现了一个人，四五十岁的样子，一身黑衣，脸上都是黑色的条纹。正一脸兴奋的拿着刚刚年轻修士扔掉的那个盒子。

"Hahaha, this Fiend’s Bell is finally mine." Suddenly, out of nowhere appeared a person, looking about forty to fifty years old and dressed in full black with even his face covered in black stripes, standing on the thistles in the center of the array formation. He excitedly held onto the box that the young cultivator had dropped.
“哈哈！”
"Haha!"
“哈哈！怎么？还想动手？你打我啊！来啊，我绝不还手。”
"Ha ha! What, you want to fight? Strike me then! Come on, I promise I will not hit back."
“哈哈！江逸就你这实力，还想和我战？”
"Haha! Jiang Yi, with power like yours, you still think of sparring with me?"
“哈哈，听雨小姐，你实力冠绝全雄，都已经是铸鼎境八重了，这群陪练哪是你的对手？要不在下陪你战一场？”

"Haha, Miss Tingyu, your power is top-class and a head above the rest. With your power level already at the eighth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm,which sparring partner here could ever be a worthy opponent? How about I join you for a match?"
“哈哈，地阶丹药？这一炉灵神丹竟然炼出地阶丹药？这其中莫非有什么玄妙不成？不行我得好好研究研究……”

"Haha, Earth-tier elixirs? This cauldron of Spirit Pills could actually refine Earth-tier elixirs? Could there perhaps be something mysterious behind it? No, I have to carefully examine and research this..."
“哈哈，我还以为是谁？江逸，又是你这个废物？”
“Hah! And I was just wondering who it was! It’s just Jiang Yi, the good-for-nothing boy!”
“哈？”啥意思？
"Huh?" What did she mean?
“哈？”她直接傻掉，这什么节奏，收徒？想跟她学什么？宅丧废吗？
"Huh?" She was immediately dumbfounded. What's happening? What disciple? What did he hope to learn from her? To be a total lazy shut-in?
“哎呀！”
"Oh no!"
“哎呀，断了！”沈萤一脸意外的扔开手里长长的尾狐，“也没用力的说。”
"Oh man, it broke off!" Shen Ying appeared surprised as she tossed away the long fox tails in her hands. "I didn't use much strength.”
"Ouch!"
“哎哟！”
"Ouch!"
"Wow! "
“哟……”她上前一步，正要叫人。
"Hey..." She stepped forwards and was about to call him.
“哟，你好啊！”沈萤走近几步，“请问，有看到我家厨子吗？他叫什么……清，长得挺帅的那个！”
"Hey, how are you!" Shen Ying walked toward him. "May I ask if you've seen my sect's chef? He's called... Something... Qing. He looks quite handsome!"
“哟，你好！”
"Hey, hello!"
“哟，兔子你来了。”没等羿清搞明白怎么回事，沈萤洗完手，往她那件灰袍子上抹了两把，走了过来，“来得挺早啊。”

"Hey, Rabbit you are here." Yi Qing had yet to have a single clue as to what was going on, when Shen Ying walked over after having washed her hands, drying them on that grey robe of hers as she said, "You are pretty early."
“哟，兔子，好久不见！”
"Hey, Rabbit. Long time no see!"
“哟，原来还活着啊！”她突然就叹了口气。
“Oh, so you are still alive!" she said with a deep sigh.
“哟，厨子。”沈萤扬手打了个招呼。
"Hey, Chef," Shen Ying waved.
“哟，变长了。”沈萤有些惊讶的睁大眼睛。
"Oh, it's become long," Shen Ying's eyes widened.
“哟，小绿妹子啊。”
"Hey, Sister Little Green."
“哟，搞定了。”刚回来的沈萤推了推旁边的人，突然开口。
"Hey, it's done." Shen Ying who had just came back suddenly spoke and nudged the person beside her.
“哟，早上好，你们……”她话一顿歪了歪头，“谁啊？”
"Oh, good morning. You…" Pausing in mid-speech, she asked, "Who are you?"
“哟，牛爸爸。”沈萤朝他招了招粘满了油渍的手，习惯性的让出了点位置，“吃午饭了，要一起吗？”她指了指正在感肉的羿清，对方回了孤月一个嫌弃的眼神——不要脸，还来偷师！

"Hey, Father Niu!" Shen Ying waved her greasy hands at him and made space for him out of habit. "It's lunch time, do you want to join us?" She pointed toward Yi Qing who was still roasting meat. Yi Qing shot Lonemoon a dirty look. How shameless — you still want to steal my master!
“哟，醒了！”一炸毛更圆更像毛团了。
"Hey, you're awake!" The beast's fur bunched up, making it like a huge furball.
"Oh…"
“哦……”不就是取名字吗？她很擅长的，“朗朗上口那就：碧粳、松糕、酥酪、鱼盏……”
"Oh…" Isn't it just a name? "Catchy and pleasing to the ears. Bijing[1. A type of grain], Sponge Cake, Cheese, Fish…"
“哦……”原来是做为广告部出去宣传的。
"Oh…" So it's about going there as the marketing department to advertise.
“哦……”原来这世界真的有神仙啊，有意思。
"Oh…" So this world really does have immortals, interesting.
“哦……”原来那个抖M，“你父亲咋了？”
"Oh..." So it was that asshole. "Is your father alright?"
“哦……”她歪头呆了呆，“那是不是都长在肚子上的？”
"Oh…" She tilted her head as she fell into a momentarily daze. "Do they all grow in the stomach?"
“哦……”她点了点头，难怪刚这只小动物不说人话，“那能吃吗？”
"Oh…" She nodded. No wonder this little animal didn't speak human language just now. "Can it be eaten?"
“哦……”她顿时想起了白天某个被揍得直抽抽的身影，同情看了一眼某人还未恢复的脸，“现在的年轻人，口味挺重啊！”打一顿居然也能看对眼了？！

"Oh…" A sudden image of a figure bashed up so badly that it was shaking uncontrollably came to Shen Ying's mind. She looked sympathetically at the person whose face had yet to recover. "Today's youngsters have strong tastes!" Love at first bash?
“哦……”对方一脸状况外，愣愣的唤出飞剑，飞了起来。
"Oh…" The other party looked a little confused. She summoned her flying sword in a daze before she started to fly.
“哦……”强行征用吗？“历练要多久？”
"Oh…" Forcibly recruited? "How long is this experiential training expedition?"
“哦……”懂了。也就是说怪刷了，装备没摸。
"Oh..." She understood now. She had killed the beast but she hadn't looted its possessions.
“哦……”搞半天还是个素菜。
"Oh..." All this fuss over a vegetable.
“哦……”沈萤一脸兴趣缺缺的样子，“可以不去吗？”
"Oh…" Shen Ying's interest was dwindling. "Can we not go?"
“哦……”沈萤仍是一脸无所谓的样子，“要不扔了。”
:Oh..." Shen Ying still looked unbothered. "Let's throw it away then."
“哦……”沈萤到是一点都不在意，拍了拍魔王的肩道，“我相信你！”
"Oh..." Shen Ying wasn't bothered the least bit, and patted the Devil King on his shoulder. "I believe you!"
“哦……”沈萤夹起碟子上的糕点，凑近他的小脸道，“这是核桃酥。”
"Oh... this is walnut cake." Shen Ying said as she went closer to Ning ZiAn and picked up the pastry on the plate.
“哦……”沈萤晃然，“那个抢萝卜的素菜家族啊。”
"Oh…" Suddenly recalling them, Shen Ying exclaimed, "That vegetable family who tried to snatch the radish."
“哦……”沈萤点了点头，“写了些啥？”
"Oh…" Shen Ying nodded. "What's written in it?"
“哦……”沈萤点了点头，“啥叫灵气？”
"Oh..." Shen Ying nodded. "What's Spirit Qi?"
“哦……”沈萤点了点头，也就是说他现在是多了一个分身，一死死两？这个世界的设定好麻烦啊，“那有其它办法吗？”

”Oh..." Shen Ying nodded his head. This means that there's another duplicate of him now. If one dies, the other perishes as well. The way this world works... It's so annoying. “Is there any other way around it?"
“哦……”沈萤点了点头，看了地上魔蛟一眼，“原来魔族这么没用的吗？”连宠物都做不了。
"Oh..." Shen Ying nodded. She looked at the demonic wyrm, "So demonic beasts are useless?" They can't even be adopted as pets.
“哦……”沈萤点了点头，细一看牛爸爸，他已经闭上了眼睛，看来的确陷入了心魔之中。只不过不到五分钟的时间，又再次张开。很明显他渡过了心魔。

"Oh..." Shen Ying nodded and looked carefully at the Father Niu. He had closed his eyes and seemed to be caught up with his mental demons. In less than five minutes he opened his eyes again. Obviously he had overcome his mental demons.
“哦……”沈萤点点头，完全没听懂的说，“你到底想说啥？”
"Oh… " Shen Ying nodded, totally not understanding a word he said. She then asked, "What exactly are you trying to say?"
“哦……”沈萤皱了皱眉，也没有多想，就着雷光又抓了把瓜子，继续嗑。
"Oh..." said Shen Ying frowning. Leaving her thoughts aside, she grabbed another bunch of melon seeds as another bolt of lightning struck and continued munching.
“哦……”沈萤眉头拧了起来，“真的要走？”
"Oh..." Furrowing her brows, Shen Ying asked, "You're really going?"
"Oh..." Still does not get it.
“哦……”那个抖M，原来是感情问题啊，“咋了，不喜欢？”自从那天宴席后，那个叫印元飞的就天天来找人，变着花的找理由约人家出去，什么送定金啦，定金送少了啦，改主意想预付全款啦……

"Oh..." that masochist. So this was a relationship problem. "What's wrong, you don't like him?" Since the banquet, Yin Yuanfei had been coming up to their sect every single day to look for Si Yu and giving rotten excuses to take her out. First, he wanted to send the deposit. Then, he said he gave too little deposit. Then, he wanted to pay the full sum...
“哦……什么？！”孤月一惊，就连薄飞平也立马看了过来，震惊的看向她，“你看到啥了？”

Shocked, Lonemoon exclaimed, "OH! What?!"
Even Pu Feiping came over immediately and asked in astonishment, "What did you see?"
“哦……记住了。”
"Ok... I'll remember."
"Oh."
“哦。”也就是说，需要挂个牌，不然就是魔修黑户？“那我们自己成立一个呗。”
"Oh." In other words, we have to hang tags around our necks or we’ll look like fiendish cultivators? "Then let's just establish one on our own."
“哦。”兔王一愣，这才明白她的意思，“没事的，他们早已经会化形了，只是习惯了兔身而已。”

"Oh," the Rabbit Monarch was stupefied, but then finally understood what she meant and replied, "It's alright, they already know how to make use of manifestation but are just accustomed to the rabbit form."
“哦。”原来传承就是本生活技能大全。
"Oh." So the heritage was just a compilation of life techniques.
“哦。”原来如此，她了然的点了点头。没有再问，转头瞅了瞅眼前的一片狼藉，转移话题道，“园长，我们接下来去哪？”
"Oh," so that's the reason. She nodded and stopped asking questions. She turned to study the mess in front of them and changed the topic, "Leader, where are we headed next?"
“哦。”吃得差不多的沈萤拍了拍手也站了起来，“那谁……谢谢啊，再见！”
"Oh." Shen Ying had eaten her fill. She dusted off her hands and got to her feet, "That whoever... Thank you. Goodbye!"
“哦。”吃饱喂足正趴在桌上不想动的人，懒懒的应了一声。
"Oh," lazily responded the person laying on the table, having eaten her fill.
“哦。”女子呆了呆，突然朝它一点头，“恭喜啊！”
"Oh." The woman fell into a momentary daze before nodding at it. "Congratulations!"
“哦。”她一脸认真的指了指塔顶，“那为什么不直接从外面飞上去呢？”
"Oh." With an earnest expression, Shen Ying pointed to the pagoda and asked, "Then why don't they fly directly up to the pagoda from outside?"
“哦。”她点了点头。
"Oh," she nodded.
“哦。”她点了点头，眼里没有任何波澜的问了一句，“那这样的还有吗？”
"Oh." Shen Ying nodded. With an innocent look look, she asked, " Are there any others?"
“哦。”她端起糕点就打算撤。
"Oh," she picked up the plate of pastries and prepared to leave.
“哦。”早说啊！
"Oh." Could have just said that earlier!
“哦。”果然是犬瘟吧？
"Oh." It’s a dog after all.
“哦。”某人弱弱的退回了印风背后。
"OK." A certain someone meekly went back and stood behind Yin Feng.
“哦。”根本不知道他说啥的沈萤，只能猜到他是不想吃的意思，于是收回筐，“那再见！”说着就想转身进屋。
"Oh." Shen Ying had no idea what he was saying but could only guess that he meant he did not want to eat. "In that case, goodbye!" she said, keeping the basket, then turned towards the house.
“哦。”沈萤一愣，直接转头看向兔子加了句，“那兔子，我要没妖气的地。”
"Oh." Shen Ying pondered for a while, then turned her head and looked at the rabbit, adding, "Then in that case, Rabbit, I want a place with no demonic aura."
“哦。”沈萤一脸失望。
"Oh." Shen Ying was clearly disappointed.
“哦。”沈萤也没在意，晃了晃特别酸痛的左手，却发现四周的竹林已经倒了大半，光秃秃的枝干，连叶子都见不到几片。昨天刮大风了吗？吹得这么厉害。她往前走了两步，却看到前方有一个硕大的坑，像是被什么砸出来一样。嗯……这的风景真有意思！

"Oh." Unconcerned, Shen Ying started shaking her particularly sore left hand. She then realized that half of the surrounding bamboo forest had been toppled down, and most of their branches were bare except for a few leaves. Were there strong winds yesterday? Must have been some powerful wind. She walked two paces, and saw a huge hole in front of her, as if the ground had been smashed hard by something. Well… The scenery was really interesting.
“哦。”沈萤又看了一眼，没见过的小动物，不知道能吃不？
"Oh." Shen Ying looked at it again. I’ve never seen this little creature before. Wonder if it can be eaten?
