"None of you can escape." Yu Haiheng said coldly. Turning to the other monks behind him, he instructed, "Kill them!"
“哼，九阳老儿，你枉自拥有绝世天资，最终却没能成仙，就是因为这种无聊的感情！区区庸碌众生，不过是天地间的刍狗罢了，若是看不穿这点，又如何能够做到寿与天齐，成就仙班？如果你的废话只有这些，本座可没兴趣继续听下去了，拔出你的火龙剑，本座这就送你一程！”冥皇手中凭空出现一把数丈长的镰刀形兵器，随手一挥，冥气和死气泾渭分明，缭绕两边。

"Hmph! Fogey Nine Yang, you possess peerless talent, but ultimately you failed to become immortal, solely because of this pointless attitude! Mere mortals are nothing but dogs in this world.
“If you can't overlook this, how can you expect to enjoy a lifespan equal to the world and ascend to the ranks of the immortals? If rubbish is all you can spew, I have no reason to continue listening. Draw your Fire Dragon Sword. I am going to send you on your way!"
A long sickle-like weapon appeared out of thin air and floated into the hands of the Netherworld King. With a flick of his hands, the smell of death and hell arose, lingering on both sides.
“哼，九阳老儿，几千年没见，没想到你的废话还是这么多，脸皮还是这么厚！”
"Hmph! Fogey Nine-Yang, I haven't seen you for a few thousand years, yet you are still full of crap and as thick-skinned as ever!" the Netherworld King retorted coldly.
“哼，你们用不着在这虚张声势。”郁海珩却好似耐心用尽，朝着后面的众人一挥手道，“别说她现在不在这里，就算以后知道了此事又如此，只要她敢来郁家报仇，一样会被困入塔内。今日你们谁都别想逃掉！”

"Hmph, you don't have to act unafraid," Yu Hai Heng patiently replied. He waved toward the people behind him and said, "She's not here now, and even when she finds out about this next time, she will be trapped in the pagoda like the rest if she dares to seek revenge from the Yu Family. All of you can forget about escaping today!"
“哼，你们要杀……便杀！”血狐冷哼一声，身上的血像是不要钱似的往外冒，它却仍是一脸狠厉的道，“我只后悔没有尽快杀了镇上那些凡人，为我妻儿报仇。”

"Hmph, just… kill me if you want!" sneered the blood fox. The blood in his body was bleeding out ceaselessly, but it remained fierce. "My only regret is that I didn't manage to kill those mortals in the town to avenge my wife and son."
“哼，你们说的没错，我刚试过了，紫霞玄芝的确救不活我儿。”他狐尾一扫，直接把祭台上的盒子扫落在地。
"Hmmph, you are right, I had just tested the Splendor Lingzhi. It really could not revive my son." Swishing his tails, the fox demon swept the box on the altar to the ground.
“哼，你自身都难保了，还想救人。”任翼根本不把她的威胁放在心上，“凡人确实不能采补，不如就做成傀儡吧！”
"Hmph, you cannot even save yourself and you still want to save others." Ren Yi did not take her threat to heart. "Mortals cannot be harvested, but perhaps she can be made into a puppet!"
“哼，你这个小娃娃，到是颇有眼光。”碧涛这才满意的飘了过来，上下打量了孤月一眼道，“老朽的确就是这仙宫之主，丹阳宗宗主，道号碧涛。”

"Hmph, you little girl. You do have quite good taste." Bitao was satisfied. He flew over and looked Lonemoon up and down. "I am indeed the master of this Immortal Pavilion, and the Sect Master of Dan Yang Sect. My Dao name is Bitao."
“哼，几位真是让我等好找！”那青衣的中年人上前一步，一甩手里的算盘转身对旁边的人大声道，“老板刚刚在‘飘香楼’吃霸王餐的，就是这几人！”

"Hmph, you really made me work hard to find you!" the green-robed middle-aged man said as he stepped toward them. He waved the abacus, turned to the man beside him and said, "Boss, these are the people who ate at our Fragrant Restaurant and didn't pay up!"
“哼，别跟我来这套，说出你们的目的！”
"Hmph, don't try to fool me. Speak your real motive!"
“哼，少给我装蒜！”右边一个化神修士直接上前一步，听声音正是之前喊话的那一位，“我轩辕家三位长老好心来此界，帮你等一探新出世的秘境虚实，你们却不知好歹，也不知用何等卑鄙手段将他们杀害在秘境之中。我轩辕氏做为上青界四大家族之一，不该来向你们讨回这笔血债吗？”

"Hmph, stop feigning ignorance!" The cultivator on the right came forward. "My three Elders of the Xuan Yuan Family came over to this world in good faith to help you explore and check how true the newly surfaced mystic realm was. Yet not only did you guys not appreciate it, you used some despicable means to kill them in the mystic realm. As one of the four largest aristocratic families in the Upper Azure World, should I not have come here to claim blood revenge?"
“哼，幻影拳，我也会！”
"Hmph, Phantom Punch. I know it too!"
“哼，成王败寇，不过你休想我透露半点信息。”
"Hmph, you have the upper hand now and act like you're right, but I won't tell you anything."
“哼，我原本就没打算活着出去。”她根本不受他的威胁，招式越加的凌厉起来。
"Hmph, I did not intend to leave here alive." Unafraid of his threat, her attacks became even more powerful.
“哼，我原本确实打算如此。”血狐冷哼了一声，好像藏着什么的尾巴突然朝身前动了动。它低下头原本狠戾的神情瞬间换成了满脸的柔情，扬手在尾巴拂了拂，动作轻柔得似乎怕是吓醒什么，“算那镇中的人命大，谁让那狸猫为我儿带来了更好的东西。”

"Oh, I had intended to." The blood fox snorted, and the tail that seemed to be hiding something suddenly moved a little to the front of his body. He looked down and the previously vicious expression on his face turned tender. Raising his hand, he patted at the tail, his movement so gentle that it seemed as if he was afraid to awaken something. "The town can count itself lucky, as the civet cat has brought me something even better."
“哼，我等未亲自去找她的麻烦，没想到她的人，居然主动送上门来了。”
"Hmph, we haven't gone to settle scores with her. I didn't think that her subordinates would voluntarily turn up at our doorstep."
“哼，没想到本尊在这塔中等了千万年，世界终于出了两个，有能力登上塔顶的人物，真是……天助我也！哈哈哈哈哈……”他突然发出一阵狂笑，周身的黑雾瞬间大盛，眨眼间就迷蔓了整个塔顶。刚刚还算明亮的空间顿时阴暗起来。

"Hmph, who would've thought that after waiting for millions of years, the world would give me two people who are capable enough to reach the top of this pagoda. The Heavens are on my side! Hahaha..." he suddenly laughed maniacallyy. The black fog around him thickened and began to fill the entire space. The well-lit room quickly fell into darkness.
“哼，现在没听过没关系，以后你们会记住这个名字的！”那男子一脸自信。
"Hmph, it's okay if you haven't heard of us yet. You will definitely remember us in future!" The man smiled arrogantly.
“哼，知道我来自上界，还不给我退下！”那人牛气轰轰的瞪了众人一眼，眼神轻蔑得仿佛在看什么脏东西一样，沉声道，“你这妖女，到底对我用了什么法术？”他居然摆脱不了。

"Pfft, you know that I am from the Upper World and you're not going to back off?" The person was clearly furious. He glared at each person around him, as if they were dirt underneath the sole of his shoes. "You wretched woman, what spells did you cast on me?" He could not shake it off.
“哼，算你识相。”
"Hmph, at least you are sensible."
“哼，自不量力。”游仙青岚眉心一拧，冷哼了一声，看了旁边的另一个修士一眼，也飞身攻了上来。羿清直接迎上另一名修士。

"Pui, you've overestimated yourself." Travelling Immortal Qing Lan's eyebrows furrowed. He snorted, glanced at the cultivator beside Lonemoon, and flew forward to attack. Yi Qing moved to attack the last cultivator.
“哼，自不量力。”郁海珩再没保留，也直接加入了战局。与其它化神修士一起朝着枫影去不同。他条条风刃全数挥向了思羽和郁红，仿佛只想致她们于死地一般。

"Hmph, you don't know your own strength," Yu Hai Heng went all out and increased his intensity in battle. He adopted a different strategy from the other Soul Formation cultivators - he continuously shot wind blades at Si Yu and Yu Hong, as if he was determined to kill them.
“哼，臭小子！”那魔修从盒子里拿出一个铃铛样的法器，瞪了年轻修士一眼，“这魔音铃合该就是魔修法器，就凭你这练气的小子也敢跟本座抢。”

"Hmph, you punk!" That fiend cultivator took out a bell-shaped Dharma artifact from the box and glared at the young cultivator, "This FIend’s Bell should have been a fiend cultivation Dharma artifact, how dare a puny punk like you snatch it from me."
“哼，虽然不能手刃那妖女，杀了你也能一解我等心中郁气。”
"Hmph, we might not get to deal with that demoness, but killing you will allow us to let off some steam!"
“哼，说得好听。老贼！若是不逃，你还会让我们活着回到郁家吗？”郁红冷哼一声，满腔的恨意顿时就暴发了出来，“堂堂郁家旁系的真人，却与断空涯的魔修有来往。主家若是知道这些，可会放过你！”

"Hmph. Isn’t that nice to hear, old crook! If we do not run away, will you let us return to the Yu Family alive?" Yu Hong sneered with bursting hatred she said, "As a Perfected One of Yu Family's branch lineage, you had dealings with a fiendish cultivator of Sky Severance Cliff. If Master had found out about that, he would not have let you off!"
“哼，谁知道她们用了什么手段？”郁家仍旧不肯罢休，扫了思羽一眼道，“别忘了振祥说过丢失了法宝，她突然变成体修，不就是证明吗？况且她口中的那个师姐，还姓郁！我已经验过血脉了，她的确是我郁家旁系的子孙，也是那失踪的逃奴之一。振祥之死，就算不是她们做的，也……”

"Hmph, who knew what kind of means they resorted to?" The Yu Family still did not let it go, he glanced at Si Yu, "Don't forget that Zhen Xiang had lost a Dharma treasure, and she suddenly became a body cultivator, isn't that proof? On top of that, the Senior Sister that she said had the Yu surname! I had already tested their bloodline, she is indeed the descendants of the Yu Family's collateral kin and one of the missing escaped slaves. As for Zhen Xiang's death, even if they weren't the culprit, they also..."
“哼，跑得了吗？”
"Hmph, is it even possible to escape?"
“哼，还在狡辩！”那人突然扬手化出了两面水镜，一边结印一边大声道，“我轩辕家的人，入门之时会在神识中种下追魂印，此印只会在陨落之时启动，将受术者死前的影像传回宗门。”

"Hmph, you are still quibbling!" That person suddenly raised his hand to manifest two crystallic mirrors, and as he produced a seal, he said loudly, "The people of my Xuan Yuan Family plant a Soul Chasing Seal in their Divine Perception. This seal would only be activated upon being destroyed, sending an image of the moment right before their death back to the sect."
“哼，迟了……看我的暗器，万毒穿心粉！”
"Hmph, it was too late... taste my hidden weapon - the Heart-Pierce Million-Poison Powder!"
“哼，道友可别胡说，千叶草木灵是我轩辕家至宝。什么时候成了你的物品？”
"Hmph, this Fellow Daoist is just talking nonsense. The Thousand Leaves Vegetation Spirit is the treasure of my Xuan Yuan Family. Since when did it become yours?"
"Sigh"...
“唉……好汉不提当年勇，回忆再多也无用，就不知我这惨状待会被小奴看到，又会担心成什么样子。”

Jiang Yi sighed. “Worthy men do not dwell on past glories. It’s useless no matter how much I look back. Come to think of it, I have no idea how much Xiaonu would start worrying about me if she saw me in this pitiful state…”
“唉……我都五天没吃饭了。”力气都没有，哪有功夫记名字。
"Ah… I haven't eaten in five days." How can I remember names when I don't have any strength left.
“唉……这陪练果然不是人干的活啊，难怪如此高价还是缺人，这群公子小姐完全不把陪练当人看。”

Sigh... this sparring partnership job is definitely not a task that humans should do. No wonder why there is still a shortage of personnel even with an offer of high pay: these young masters and mistresses don't even treat their sparring partners as fellow human beings.
"Sigh"...
“唉！”另一名化神尊者叹了一声道，“如今这中青界的化神修士是越来越少了。这都快一百年了，才有愿意从这里升入上青界的人。”

"Sigh!" Another one of the Soul Formation Supremacies sighed and said, "Nowadays the number of Soul Formation cultivators in the Middle Azure World has been dwindling. It has been almost 100 years since someone is willing to enter the Upper Azure World."
“唉！算了，我在这！”
"Sigh! Forget it, I'm here!"
“唉，其实吧，就算我听不见，你招呼不打就找系统聊天去了，跪这半天干瞪眼，不觉得有点尴尬吗？”
"Eh, actually even if I can't hear it, you didn't have any greeting and began to talk with the system, then knelt here for so long and just glaring around, don't you find it awkward?"
“唉，只希望这次来的……咦？”他话到一半突然愣住，猛的睁大了眼睛，“我怎么感觉山下有魔修的气息？”
"Sigh, we can only hope the one that is coming this time… huh?" He stopped in mid-sentence looking shocked, his eyes widened. "Why can I feel the aura of a fiendish cultivator?"
“唉，小红妹子她们都已经正式入门了，不会再半夜来这了。”
"Sigh. Little Hong and her girls have already been officially accepted into the sect, so they won’t be coming here at midnight anymore."
“唉，我总是说不过你！不过爱好和平的我既然死到临头，也就没心情再打上一场了……”
Wu Ming sighed. "I can't win a war of words against you! Now that the peace-loving me is at hell's gate, I’m in no fighting mood…"
“唉，我玄天宗怎么出了这么一个人。”
"Eh, how did my Blackheaven Sect produce such a person?"
“唉，是我等疏忽。”薄仪也长叹了一声道，“安儿身上早已有了魔种。之前那个闯入的魔族，定是看透了这一点，所以才干脆将魔门转移到安儿身上，想要引他入魔后，再开启界门。”

“Sigh.. It was our negligence. ”Pu Yi sighed，“An had the demonic seed in him all these while. The demonic beast that broke in must have realized that too, which is why he transferred the gate to the Door of Demon Realm onto An. He wanted to re-open the Realm gate after luring him to become a demon beast.”
“唉，算了！”沈萤觉得这一趟有点亏，还以为出来能吃顿好的，没想到啥都没有。看来园长明显没有抖M他爹，那么懂事啊。她叹了一声，转眼却看到岸边不断被海水冲上来，各种半截的小动物。

"Hai, forget it!" Shen Ying felt shortchanged; she though she would get to eat good meals on this trip. Apparently Yi Feng was not as savvy as the masochist's father. As she was sighing, her eyes alighted on severed animal body parts on the shore that had been washed up by the tide.
“唔……这些你别管，相信我！小奴，或许……要不了多久，我就能让你过上好生活了，再也不用出去做工了。”
"Huh... You don't have to worry about these things, believe me! Xiaonu, perhaps... very soon, I will be able to provide a good life for you. You will no longer need to go out and work anymore."
“唔……这小子好快的反应速度，这是铸鼎境二重吗？”
"Huh... this brat has such a swift reaction, is he at the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm?"
"Oh."
“唔舍（没啥）。”正拼命塞糕点的某人回了一声，吞下口里的糕，顺口回道，“一些以前村里的事。”
"It was nothing." Someone replied while busily shoving pastries into her mouth. After swallowing the cake in her mouth, she continued, "It was about our old matters in the village."
“唔苏（我说）……唔苏！”他说还不行吗？
"I'nn sveak (I'll speak)... I'nn sveak!" Can't he choose to speak now?
"Swish! Swish! Swish!"
“啃老有什么好学的喂？你脑袋是不是有坑啊？”
"What's there to learn about leeching off your parents? Is your brain damaged?"
“Ah—”
“啊……”护法？有吗？
"Ah..." Protecting Dharma? Did I?
“啊……”这个问题他还真没想过。说话你丫想了半天，就是为了这个问题吗？
"Oh…" This was a question he really had not considered. So after all that thinking, this was what she actually wanted to ask?
"Ah... Ah!"
“啊啾！”主峰中，正商量到一半的孤月打了个喷嚏，咦？怎么觉得刚刚有人在骂他？
"Ah choo!" In the main peak, Lonemoon sneezed in the middle of a discussion. Ah? Why does it feel like someone just scolded me?
“啊啾！”孤月忍不住打了个喷嚏，迎来数十道齐唰唰的目光谴责。他心底一梗，妈的，他是疯了才半夜不睡觉，跟着这群智障出来胡闹。这么久了，连根妖怪毛都没看到。

"Ah choo!" Lonemoon let out an involuntary sneeze and was greeted by dozens of chiding eyes. He must be crazy leaving his bed in the middle of the night to follow this group of mental retards. They had waited for so long but not so much as a demon's hair could be seen.
“Ah!”
“啊！”她愣了一下，“不是无限量供应的吗？”
"Ah!" She faltered momentarily. "Wasn’t it unlimited?"
“啊！”戚橙雨一时没反应过来，呆了一下。走？去哪？
"Oh!" Qi Chengyu did not react in time and was dazed for a moment. Go? Go where?
“Ah!” “Ah!” “Ah!”
“啊！啊？”兔王彻底呆了，猛的睁大了眼睛，“您打算……放过我？”
"Ah! Ah?" The Rabbit Monarch was completely dumbfounded as it widened its eyes in disbelief. "You plan on… letting me go?"
“啊！啊？”印风还沉静在那份不平等的契约里没回过神，对方却已经起身打算走人了。
"Ah! Huh?" Yin Feng was still silent, thinking about the unequal contract. Yet, Lonemoon was already planning to leave.
“啊！啊？”易峰一愣，想了想解释道，“灵主……只是下去休息，并是……”不是回易家。
"Ah! Huh?" Yi Feng hesitated and explained, "Spirit Master... we are only going to take a rest, we're not..." We're not returning to the Yi Family.
“啊！啊？”易峰愣了一下，还有什么？
"Huh! Huh?" Yi Feng was confused. What others?
“啊！啊？”薄飞平一愣，还以为对方至少会犹豫一下，秒拒是什么鬼？
"What! What?" Pu Feiping exclaimed. He originally thought that the other party would ponder over it for a while, but what is the meaning of this instant rejection?
“啊！啊？”这就答应了，不需要再考虑一下吗？
"Huh! Huh?" You agreed just like that, don't you need to think it over?
“啊！啊？”那人惊了一下，以为听错了，“您……您不是掌门吗？”
"Ah! Ah?" The asker was taken aback and thought that she had heard wrongly. "You… you are the sect master, right?”
“啊！那我们……”
"Ah! Then we..."
“啊！？”羿清差点以为自己听错了，见她不像是开玩笑的样子，才试探的问，“师父……可是习惯御器而行？”
"Ah!?" Yi Qing almost thought he had heard wrongly, but she did not seem to be joking, so he tried asking, "Master… Are you used to travel by artifact-riding?"
“啊，啊……江逸你完了，你他妈竟敢打断我的手，你完了，你这次死定了！”
"Ah… ah… Jiang Yi, you are a goner! You bloody bastard! How dare you break my arm!? You are a dead duck this time!"
“啊，啊！小野种，我要杀了你，杀了你！”
"Ahh, Ahh! Little bastard, I'm going to kill you, kill you!"
“啊，啊，不要——”
“Ah… Ah… No!”
“Ah!” “Ah!” “Ah!”
“啊，我杀了你这野种！”
"Ahh! I will kill you, bastard!"
"Huh?"
“啊？”啥意思？
"Huh?" What does she mean?
“啊？”她愣了一下，专心吃去了，根本听见他们在说什么。
"Ah?" She faltered then continued eating in concentration, not listening to what they were saying.
“啊？”好不容易吃上顿饱饭的沈萤，转头看了看旁边一脸坚定的厨子，“你伤没好？”
"Huh?" Shen Ying finally ate a full meal for the first time in a long time. She turned to look at the Chef beside her, who had a look of determination. "You haven't recovered?"
“啊？”易峰愣了一下，好吃是什么意思？细一想以为她指的是训服的技巧，“越是高阶的灵兽，想要契约训服就越是困难，想必不会轻易被制服的。对了，沈道友看着也是对御兽颇有研究的人，不知对那些生性高傲，特别是十阶以上的不肯轻易契约的灵兽，有没有什么特别的应对方法？”

"Huh?" Yi Feng hesitated. What did she mean by delicious? Thinking that she was referring to the training techniques, he said, "The higher the beast's level, the harder it will be to train them. I don't think they will submit to you so easily. Oh right. Fellow Daoist Shen Ying, you look like you know your spirit beasts really well. Do you have any advice on taming high-level beasts, especially those above the tenth-stage?"
“啊？”易峰愣了一下，这才应了一声，“哦。”
"Huh?" Yi Feng hesitated, "oh."
“啊？”沈萤一脸懵逼，顺手就接过那个旗子，“阵法是啥意思？”
"Huh?" Shen Ying was dumbfounded. As she received the gonfalon, she asked, "What does array formation mean?"
“啊？”沈萤一脸茫然，干嘛？
"Huh?" Shen Ying was blank. What do you want?
“啊？”沈萤愣了一下，一脸的茫然，“说啥？”
"Ah?" Shen Ying faltered for a moment, stunned. "What am I supposed to say?"
“啊？”沈萤愣了一下，想起来某块禁止牌，才反应过来，“哦，你叫我，对，我是羿掌门。”

"Huh?" What does he mean?

“嗯，差不多吧！”沈萤回想了一遍牛爸爸的话，“要那种萝卜地，你以前不是经常给我送萝卜吗？应该有的吧？”

"Yes, that's about the jist of it!" Recalling what Father Niu had said, Shen Ying asked, "I want the kind of place suitable for growing radishes. Didn't you often use to send me radishes? I imagine you should have such a place?"
“嗯，师……”他习惯性的想点头，眼神一扫前面的人，瞬间又改变了主意，“师父，现在是巳时，还不到午饭时间。”他得在这盯着，坚决不给小婊砸接近师父的机会。

"Yes, Mas..." he habitually nodded his head and scanned the group of people in front of him before he suddenly changed his mind. "Master, it's only ten in the morning; it's not lunch time yet." He had to keep watch around here to make sure that the little bastard did not try to steal his master.
“嗯，我也这么想。”孤月点了点头。
"Yes, I think so too." Lonemoon nodded.
“嗯，我相信你，努力加油！”沈萤用力拍了拍他的肩膀，“好好休息，争取早点恢复才能继续做……修行！”
"Well, I believe in you, you can do it!" said Shen Ying giving him a an encouraging thump on the shoulder. "Have a good rest so that you will recover faster to continue with your... practice!"
“嗯，我穿过来那天，就这样了。”
"Well, I was like that from the day I was transported here."
“嗯，看一本顶三百年。”
"Yeah, one book is sufficient to last you for 300 years."
“嗯，看看消耗之后是否能继续提炼出？”
"Hmm... Let's see if I can continue extracting after consuming them."
“嗯，辛苦了。”
"Good job."
“嗯，辛苦你了。”
"Thanks."
“嗯，这个是茯苓，二十钱……”
"Yes, this is china root, one hundred grams..."
“嗯，这个要问牛爸爸。”招生策划是他写的，“不急，等他回来再说吧。”
"Yeah, you have to ask Father Niu about that." He was the one who wrote the recruitment plan. "No rush. Wait till he gets back to talk about that."
“嗯，这名江家子弟本性不错，不贪心！”
"Uh huh, this Jiang Clan son has a good personality, he's not at all greedy!"
“嗯，这点我也清楚。”孤月点了点头，“但这秘境毕竟出现在玄天宗的地界，于情于理我们都不能不理。至于入秘境之事……你是掌门，这事由你来决定。”

"Yes, I am clear about that." Lonemoon nodded. "But since this mystic realm has surfaced within Blackheaven Sect domain, there is no reason for us to ignore it. As for entering the mystic realm… you are the sect master, you shall make the decision."
“嗯，酒庄老板娘都不失眠了。”
"The winery boss has no more insomnia."
"Oh?"
“嗯？”他话还没说完，沈萤猛的回过头来，顿时满天的杀气，像决堤的洪水一般，哗啦啦朝他涌了过来。
"Huh?" Before he could finished his sentence, Shen Ying turned her head and suddenly a stream of murderous aura, like water from a flooded bank, rushed toward him.
“嗯？”她回头一看，只见刚刚还在打嗝的萝卜，突然全身发出红光，转瞬从一只白萝卜变成了一只红萝卜，“这是……熟了吗？”
"Huh?" She turned back to see the burping radish emitting a red glow, transforming from a white radish to a red radish. "Is it… cooked?"
“嗯？”她应了一声，转头换了个边，继续摊在桌上。
"Yes?” she answered, turning her head around before resting it on the table again.
“嗯？”杀气四溢。
"Huh?" A murderous vibe filled the air.
“嗯？”正想唤出下一道风刃的郁海珩，皱了皱眉似是发现了什么，扫了在场的众人一眼，突然露出一个诡异的笑容，“你们所有人都集中在前殿，故意不往左边的偏殿而去，莫非那里藏着什么重要的东西不成？”

"Eh?" Yu Hai Heng was just about to summon another wind blade when he realised something. He frowned and scanned the people surrounding him. Then, he smiled deviously, "You're all gathered around the front hall and avoiding the Palace Wing on the left. Are you hiding something important in there?"
“嗯？”沈萤一愣，顺着他的视线看向手里的剑，啥意思？
"Hm?" Shen Ying followed Yi Qing's line of sight and stared at the broken sword in her hand. What is he talking about?
“嗯？”沈萤再次回头，“还有事？”
""Huh?" Shen Ying turned her head around once again and asked, "Is there still anything else?"
“嗯？”沈萤回过头。
"Yes?" Shen Ying turned.
“嗯？我没跟你说吗？”沈萤抓了抓头道，“那天厨子在帮他驱除元灵剑气的时候，在他体内发现了点别的东西。”

“Hmm？Did I not mention this to you？”Shen Ying scratched her head as she went on, “Other than the Qi of YuanLing Sword the chef tried to help him drive out the other day, something else was discovered in his body. ”
“嗯？果然有点意思！”
"Mm? How fascinating indeed!"
“嗯？这位少爷好强的气势，最少有铸鼎境六重吧？这是哪家的少爷，为何要点名找我？”

"Oh? What a powerful aura coming off of this young master, I'd reckon the power level is at least at the sixth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. Which family does this young master belong to, and why has he ordered me?"
“嘤嘤嘤……”
"Wa wa wa..."
“嘤嘤嘤……”你们这是嫉妒我的美貌。
"Wa wa wa...." You are all just jealous of my beauty.
"Hiss..."
“嘿嘿！”
"Hehe!"
"Pop!"
“噬魂幡还没有净化！”孤月一惊，三天前他已经布下了净化大阵，按说里面的恶鬼再强，也应该被净化了才是，莫非又出了什么变故？

"The Soul Devouring Gonfalon has not been purged!" Lonemoon was shocked. Three days ago, he had already set up a huge purge array; logically speaking, no matter how powerful the demon souls inside it were, they should have been purged. Could something unforeseen have happened again?
“噬魂幡！”
"The Soul Devouring Gonfalon!"
“噬魂幡！”羿清一惊，接过旗子仔细一看，只见那旗面上黑气翻涌，脸刷的一下白了，“不好，这幡少了主人的控制，上面的噬魂阵就要崩溃了，里面又全是怨死的恶鬼……”他想到什么，脸色更加难看，立马盘脚坐下，“必须赶紧封印它们。”

"Soul Devouring Gonfalon!" Shocked, Yi Qing took the flag from her and looked at it closely. The flag was covered with swirls of black Qi. His face turned pale instantly, "Oh no, the Gonfalon is under the control of his master. The Soul Devouring Array is about to collapse, and inside it are all the ghosts of those who died in grievance..." His expression grew more serious as a certain thought crossed his mind. He sat down immediately in the lotus position. "We must quickly seal them off."
“噬魂幡？居然是噬魂幡！难道来人就是魔修芮糜。”奚秋上前一步，一脸怒气的道，“好个魔修，居然敢闯上我玄天宗，我到要看看他有什么能耐？各位师兄弟，且随我一块去灭了这魔头。”说着就打算带着一众长老下山。

"Soul Devouring Gonfalon? It's a Devouring Gonfalon! Could the man be the fiendish cultivator Rui Mi?" Xi Qiu stepped forward with an angry look on his face and said, "The cheek of the fiendish cultivator! He actually dares to break into my Blackheaven Sect. I'd like to see what he is capable of. Come with me comrades, let's destroy this fiend together." Saying that, he prepared to lead a group of elders down the mountain.
“四五章……喂，都说不是肉文了。”
"Four to five chapters… Hey, I said it's not obscene content."
“四马之力，铸鼎境四重！”
"The strength of four horses... Fourth stage of Cast Tripod Realm!"
“回去修炼！”
"I'll go back home to practice cultivation!"
“回去吧！”他捡起一地的玻璃心，这才出了这个上古秘境，出来连跟其它人打招呼的心思都没有，一路飞回了玄天宗。

"Let's go back!" He picked up the broken pieces of his heart before he headed out of the ancient mystic realm. Even after he exited the mystic realm, he didn't communicate with anyone around him. Instead, he headed straight for Blackheaven Sect.
“回大仙！”魔王嘿嘿一笑，一五一十的报告道，“这小……小友，魂体带着魔种，此时已经孵化成长，与他的心魔结合一体。如今正与他本体善念呈分庭抗争之势。”

"Great Immortal! The Devil King let out a sly laughter and reported the entire incident to the Great Immortal, " This... this little kid's soul entity carried a demon seed which has now hatched, matured and even fused with the demon within him. It is now riding the wave of his physical body and virtuous thoughts' fight against the Court.
“回太师叔。”呈安上前一步，抱拳回道，“我们本想问问那些见过妖怪出没的人家，打听一下这是一只什么妖怪，但一问才知，这镇上大半的人家都见过此妖。”

"Cheng An reporting to Uncle Master." Cheng An stepped forward and cupped his fists. "Our intention had been to ask only those who had seen the demon to find out what kind of demon it was, but after questioning we found out that about half the town folk had seen this demon."
“回尊者，掌门说噬魂幡出现异变，请尊者速速前去查看。”
"Supremacy, Sect Master said that the Soul Devouring Gonfalon is undergoing strange changes, and would like for Supremacy to hurry over to examine it."
“回师叔，芮糜确实已死，却不是我们所为。”奚秋恭敬的躬身解释道，“他被是被一位散修所杀，此幡就是被他送来净化鬼气的。”

"With all due respect Uncle Master, Rui Mi is indeed dead, but we didn't kill him." Xi Qiu bowed and explained, "He was killed by an itinerant cultivator who delivered the flag here to be purged of Ghost Qi."
“回掌门，那人说是噬魂幡。”堂下通传弟子答道。
"Sect Master, the man said it was the Soul Devouring Gonfalon," replied the disciple.
“回来的那天。”沈萤老实回答。
"The day I returned," Shen Ying answered honestly.
“回来！”他嘴角一抽，“以前怎么没见你这么听话，还真就端走了。”有你这么安慰人的吗？
"Come back!" Lonemoon's mouth twitched, "you weren't so obedient before. Now, you're really leaving after I tell you to." Is this how you comfort people?
“回长老，我知道什么回事！”
"Report to Elder, I know what exactly happened!"
“因为……”他愣了一下，却半天都想不到理由。鬼知道为啥啊？反正他就是讨厌那个人粘着师父的样子。
"Because..." he thought for a long time but could not think of a good reason. Who knows why? He just hated the sight of that beast hanging around Master.
“因为……兔兔好吃啊！”
"Well, that's because rabbits are delicious!"
“因为他是游仙。”羿清脸色也沉了沉，接着解释道，“师父，所谓游仙都是飞升失败兵解而成，但他们也是受过天劫之人，在受劫之时便会生成仙骨。但在渡劫失败之后，仙骨会直接被天雷击散，所以游仙再无飞升的机会。但化仙丹可以恢复仙骨，也就是说……”

"He's a Traveling Immortal," Yi Qing's expression darkened as he explained. "Master, Traveling Immortals are soldiers who have failed to achieve Immortal Ascension. They are also people who have been through the Heavenly Tribulation. As they go through the tribulations, their immortal bones will form. But when they fail the Tribulation Transcendence, their immortal bones would be broken into pieces by the divine lightning. Therefore, Traveling Immortals don't have another chance to achieve Immortal Ascension. The Immortal Formation Pill would heal their immortal bones. In other words-"
“因为我？”
"Because of me?"
“因为魔界之门。”孤月沉声道，“那门就在曲双城内！”
"The door of the Demon Realm. It's right inside Qushuang City." Lonemoone explained.
“因吾（因为）……”羿清还没有回答，旁边却传来咕噜一下咽饭声，一道女声突然插了进来，“他师父是我啊。”又一个抢厨子的。
Before Yi Qing could answer, a female voice suddenly cut in. "Because—" This was followed by the sound of food being swallowed. "—I am his teacher." Seems like another case of chef snatching.
“园长家养的毛团子，说是养了几万年。”沈萤顺口解释道，“本来是只白色的动物，之前还一起去了幻海的。”

"His the furball reared by the Director. He said he has had it for thousands of years." Shen Ying added as an afterthought, "It was originally a white furred animal. We even went on the trip to the Mirage Sea together."
“园长，什么叫灵主？”沈萤突然开口道。
"Leader, what is a Spirit Master?" Shen Ying suddenly asked.
“园长，会水煮肉吗？”
"Director, do you know how to boil meat?"
“园长，会炒肉片吗？”
"Director, do you know how to saute meat?"
“园长，借我一下。”它话还没说完，沈萤突然伸手一把接过了易峰手里的灵剑。
"Director, please lend me your sword." Before the Wyrm Demon completed his sentence, Shen Ying suddenly reached out and took the spirit sword from Yi Feng.
“园长，谢谢你的剑。”沈萤把手里的剑递了过去。
"Director, thank you for your sword," Shen Ying handed the sword in her hands back to Yi Feng.
“在上青城啊。”沈萤道，“那人应该还在地底下，你们去挖挖，能挖到的。”想了想又加了一句，“嗯，可能要挖深点。”

"It's in the Upper Azure Town." Shen Ying replied, "That person should still be beneath the ground, you guys can go and dig a little, should be able to dig up his body." Then she pondered for abit before adding, "Yeah, maybe you need to dig deeper."
“在下是剑修，修为金丹。”
"I am a sword cultivator, Golden core cultivation level."
“在下是真心想随您修行，请前辈成全！”
"I am truly sincere in learning cultivation from you, Senior, please grant me this chance!"
“在历史上承载过九任天帝的天庭并不适合你，我就不留下来让你破坏了。还是将它留给今后适合的继任者吧……”

"The Heavenly Court, the responsibility of nine generations of Celestial Thearchs throughout history, does not suit you. I shall not leave it for you to destroy. It'd be better to leave it to future successors…"
“在说你那男主的身份啊！”沈萤回了一句。
“Talking about the identity of your male protagonist ！”Shen Ying replied
“在那！”
"There!"
“地上这个，发白光的！”孤月大声喊道，“用周围散落的灵剑，劈开地上的几何图案就可以了。”
"This thing on the ground that's glowing!" Lonemoon shouted loudly, "Using the spiritual swords fallen on the ground nearby to slash at some of those drawings on the ground will do."
“地下有东西！”孤月一惊，转身朝众人道，“这里要塌了，赶紧飞出去。”说完连忙转身御剑。
"There's something underground!" Lonemoon shouted to everybody around him. "This place is falling apart, we have to fly out of here!" He started to sword-ride just as the words left his mouth.
“地你妹啊！”孤月瞪了她一眼。
"Earth your head!" Lonemoon glared at her.
“地阶丹药？”
"Earth-tier elixirs?"
“地震？”她歪了歪头。
"Earthquake?" She tilted her head.
“城东边有树林！”羿清提醒。
"There is a forest to the east of the city!" Yi Qing reminded.
“城中有几处地方，仙气好似比其它地方都更浅薄。”他在图片点了几处，原本城中仙人多，时常有人修练入定，所以仙气有浓有浅很正常。但上次魔族入侵后，城中走了很多仙人，按理说此城在仙脉之上，那些点上又没有仙人吸纳仙气，仙气应该更浓郁才是，但现在仙气却好像故意绕开了那些地方一样。

Pu Feiping said, "There are a few places in the city where the immortal Qi seems to be much lesser than the others."
He pointed at a few spots on the map. Originally there were a lot of immortals in the city, and it was a common occurrence for people to meditate, hence it was normal for the immortal Qi to be thick and thing. However, after the invasion by the Demonic beast, many of the immortals left the city. Logically speaking, this city is built on top of the immortal pulse, so for the places that do not have immortals to breathe in the immortal Qi, there should be a lot of immortal Qi there. However, it seems as if the immortal Qi is avoiding that area on purpose.
“城主误会了，她们不……”孤月话到一半又停住，眼神转了一圈，突然有了个打消对方念头的好办法，于是话音一转，“她们并非全都是剑修，但确实不错，嗯很不错！”

Lonemoon hurriedly said, "Oh City Lord, you have mistaken. They aren't..." An idea suddenly poppd up in his mind, and he immediately continued, "They aren't all sword cultivators, but they are indeed not bad. Not bad at all!"
“城主请便。”孤月点头，“若有任何需要，仅管开口，我无敌派必鼎力相助。”
Lonemoon nodded his head in agreement and replied, "Please do, City Lord. If you need any help,don't hesitate to ask us. My Invincible Sect would do our utmost best to assist you."
“城主还是带我们去看看吧？”孤月提议，有些东西他们看不到，但外挂萤可以啊。
"City Lord, could you just bring us there to take a look?" Lonemoon suggested. There are some things that they cannot see but Shen Ying could.
“堂主已经……倒下了。”
"The Hall Master has already… fallen."
“声攻只会越来越强，现在没事，一会就来不及了。”
"The sound attack will only grow more powerful. You are alright now, but in a while it may be too late."
“多谢……”他强撑着抬起头，看到魔王下意识的皱了皱眉，立马又转向了沈萤，“多谢沈掌门相助。”

"Thank you..." He raised his head with a fair bit of effort and knitted his eyebrows subconsciously when he saw the Devil King. He immediately turned to Shen Ying and said, "Thank you Sect Master Shen for your help."
“多谢三位尊者的好意，此秘境出现在我玄天宗的地界，我宗也不好单独处理，所以昨日就已经邀各门各派前往相商进入的事，此时恐怕各派已经到了秘境门口，就不劳三位尊者试水。”

"Thank you for your kindness, but this mystic realm has appeared within Blackheaven Sect domain, and as it would be inconvenient for my sect alone to handle this, we have already sent invitations to each sect to come over and discuss the matter of entering the realm. I am afraid they have already reached the entrance of the mystic realm, so I shall not burden you, Supremacies, to go and test waters."
“多谢三位的成全，让我报此血海深仇。”她抬起头，似是终于懈下了什么重担一般，朝着他们露出一个笑容，“我此生再无遗憾，自愿随尊者回玄天宗，听侯发落。无论贵派有任何处置，戚橙雨绝无怨言。”

"I thank the three of you for helping me exact my vengeance." She looked up as though she had finally unloaded a huge burden. She smiled at them. "I have no more regrets in my life. Supremacy, I'm willing to accompany you back to Blackheaven Sect and await my outcome. Regardless of the punishment your esteemed sect metes, I will not say a single word."
“多谢二位好意。”孤月直接拒绝道，“我派弟子虽不多，但住在这里也习惯了，无意再换府地。”笑话，再多的利福，也比不上你们有个招祸体质的主角啊！

Lonemoon directly rejected them, "Thank you for your kind heart. Even though I may not have many disciples, but we have already got used to living here, thus we do not intend to change our place of lodging." What a joke, no matter how good the benefits are, it still cannot amount to the harm that your main intention would bring.
“多谢印家主款待，今日天色已晚，我等就不多加打扰了。”孤月放好怀里的契约书，举起酒杯敬了主座上的人一杯。

"Thank you for hosting us, Yin Family Master. It's getting late, we shan't hold you back any longer," Lonemoon put down the contract and raised his wine glass to toast the host, who was seated at the main seat.
“多谢大仙，多谢大仙！”轩辕这才舒了口气。
"Thank you, Great Immortal! Thank you, Great Immortal!" Xuan Yuanyu heaved a great sigh of relief.
“多谢尊者相助。”戚橙雨上前认真的行了个礼。
"Thank you, Supremacy for your help." Qi Chengyu went up to salute him.
“多谢师父！”他更加激动了，“还请师父指教。”
Thank you Master!" He grew even more emotional. "Please guide me."
“多谢师父！”他立马跪地行个礼。
"Thank you Master!" He immediately knelt and bowed.
“多谢师父！”没等他说完，羿清一脸感动对着沈萤道，“您又救了我一命，还不不辞辛劳的照顾了我这么久？”
"Thank you Master!" Without waiting for him to finish, Yi Qing turned to Shen Ying and said, "You have saved my life once again and now you even nursed me for so long?"
“多谢掌门美意。”羿清摇了摇头，“在下并没有加入宗门的想法。”
"Thank you for your kind offer." Yi Qing shook his head and continued, "But I have no intention of joining your sect."
“多谢掌门！我们会努力的。”
"Thank you, Sect Master! We will do our best!"
“多谢易家主热情款待，不愧是大世家，此行让我等受益良多。”孤月抱拳行了个礼，笑得一脸如沐春风。
"Thank you, Yi Family Patriarch, for your hospitality. The Yi Family is truly a great aristocratic family. I've benefited a lot from this visit." A beaming Lonemoon saluted Yi Feng with cupped fists.
“多谢杨管事。”
"Thank you very much, Manager Yang."
“多谢羿道友帮本门解决芮糜这个祸害。”奚秋笑得一脸灿烂的上前，赞赏的拍了拍对方的肩。
"I give thanks to Fellow Daoist Yi for helping us get rid of Rui Mi, the scourge of our sect." Xi Qiu said with a brilliant smile, patting him on the shoulder approvingly.
“多谢青亦师兄。”青尹心有余悸的退了一步。
"Thank you Senior Brother Qing Yi." Qing Yin stepped back, still lingering in fear.
“多谢！”他这才飞了下去，安排后续工作起来。
"Thank you!" Pu Feiping exclaimed before flying down to complete the follow-up work.
“多谢！”枫影身形一闪，瞬间飞了进去。
"Thank you!" Feng Ying turned around and flew in the direction that Lonemoon pointed.
“够了！”孤月实在忍不住打断，回头冷冷的瞪了沈萤一眼，“闭嘴！吃你的饭去。”
"Enough!" Lonemoon could not stop himself from interrupting. He looked back at Shen Ying coldly and said, "Shut up! Go and eat your rice."
“大……大仙是想，找个居所？”兔王松了口气，原来不是要灭它啊，还好还好。
"Great… Great Immortal is thinking of looking for a place to live?" The Rabbit Monarch heaved a sigh of relief. So she was not here to massacre its clan. All's well, all's well.
“大……大仙，别打了……再打我就散了!我错了，真的再也不敢了，饶命啊！”
“Grea... Great Immortal, please stop beating me... Anything more and I'll be out of joints! I was wrong! It'll never happen again, please spare me! ”
“大……大仙，您……您怎么来了？”直到走到沈萤旁边，轩辕禹才敢相信自己的眼睛，妈呀，原来不是错觉，真的是这个祖宗！顿时觉得幻肢好疼。

"Great… Immortal, you… what brings you here?" It was not until he had walked up to Shen Ying that Xuan Yuanyu dared to believe his eyes. By the Gods, it was not an illusion. It was really her! All of a sudden, he felt his phantom balls hurting.
“大……大仙？”怎么又回来了？
“Grea...Great Immortal？" Why is she back?
“大……大家好。”沈萤条件反射的挥了挥手。
"Hi... everybody," Shen Ying waved apprehensively.
“大事……少爷？狗屁的少爷！哈哈哈哈……”
“Great things? Young Master? Young Master my ass! Hahahaha…”
“大事！”
"'Great things'!"
“大仙……”反而魔王压低声音提醒道，“这魔种与他的心魔已经溶为一体，所以这也是他的一部分，如果就这么灭了？他也会死的。”

"Great Immortal..." It was the Devil King who reminded in a lowered voice. "This Demon Seed has fused with the Devil within him, which means that it is now a part of him. If we destroy it now, he will perish along with it."
“大仙……”魔王这才松了口气，所以他刚刚的马屁还是有用的啊。
"Great Immortal..." The Devil King finally heaves a sigh of relief. His boot licking skills proved to be effective and of use.
“大仙不必客气，这是应该的，应该的。”
"No need to thank me, Great Immortal. It's my duty."
“大仙你……揍得好啊！”他话语一转，继续硬着头皮灭火，一本正经的道，“那振祥真人，一定不是什么好人，才会劳您亲自动手。”

"Great Immortal, you... did a great job in thrashing him!" He switched his response, continued holding it out tenaciously with a serious look, "That Perfected One Zhen Xiang must not be a good person for you to take him out personally."
“大仙可还需要点别的？”
"Does Great Immortal require anything else?"
“大仙好！”
"Greetings, Great Immortal!"
“大仙的门人当然厉害！”轩辕禹连连点头，再次看了众人一眼才继续道，“但是……在下初初观几位道友的灵骨，似是……根基有损，而且看着是沉年旧患。恕在下直言，此等损伤应尽快治愈，不然会影响以后的仙途。”

"Great Immortal’s disciples are naturally formidable!" Xuan Yuanyu nodded as he looked at them again before continuing, "But… after taking a rough glance at my Fellow Daoists' spirit bones, it seems like… their foundations have been damaged, and they seem to be old wounds. Forgive me for being straightforward, but such injuries should be treated as soon as possible. Otherwise, it will affect their immortal cultivation path in the future."
“大仙！”床尾一人突然走了过来，朝着她直接跪了下去，“求大仙救救家父！”
"Great Immortal!" A man who was standing at the end of the bed walked directly towards her. "Great Immortal, please save myfather!"
“大仙！”轩辕禹也是一脸的吃惊，顺便看了一眼，她旁边正吐得昏天暗地的掌柜。
"Great Immortal" Xuan Yuanyu's expression was one of utter surprise as well. He glanced at the shopkeeper next to her, who was puking his guts out at that moment.
“大仙！”辰戈发出一声惊呼。
"Great Immortal!" Chen Ge let out a astonished cry.
“大仙，不要！”
"Great Immortal, no!"
“大仙，慢走！”
" Great Immortal, remember to watch your steps!"
“大仙，我保证，无论你这两位下属，谁接了我这传承，都会成为名动四方的练丹师。轻而易举就可以练出储丹室那边的丹药。”

"Great Immortal, I promise that whichever of your two subordinates who inherits my heritage will become the next renowned alchemist. He who inherits the heritage can easily refine any of the pills you saw in the Pill Storage Repository earlier."
“大哥果然聪明！”
“Big brother is intelligent indeed！”
“大哥，你没睡醒吧？”
"Big Brother, have you not had enough rest?"
“大哥，看来你对灵兽山学院一点不懂啊！”
"Big Brother, it appears that you are clueless to how the Mt. Spirit Beast College works!"
“大哥，缘分呐，我们居然在一个院子内住，以后还希望大哥多多照顾。”
“Big brother, it is fate that brought us together to stay in the same yard. Hope big brother can guide me along in the future.”
“大家要隐藏好自己的气息，这里是妖界。切记不要惊动任何妖类。”郁红一一检测了一遍她们身上的阵法，沉声交待道，“只要我们找到了接头之人，到了冥阴山，就真正安全了。”

"Everyone, hide your auras well. We're in the Demon Realm. Remember not to alert any demons." Yu Hong checked each of their array formations and gave further instructions, "Once we find that man on the street and reach Ming Yin Mountain, we'll be safe.”
“大爷爷，你没事真的太好了……”睡梦中的江逸满脸泪痕地唤了一声。
Tears streaming down his cheeks, the still-dreaming Jiang Yi whispered, “Grandfather, you’re back, and completely fine! This is great news…”
“大爷，进去玩玩吧！我们风月楼的姑娘可是最会疼人的！”
"Sir, come in and enjoy yourself! Our Fengyue Brothel's ladies are best at pampering you!"
“天地浩浩，唯大道永恒，欲证天道，必先修自身……”
“In the vastness of the heaven and earth, only The Way is eternal. To obtain proof of heavenly law, one must first cultivate oneself…”
“天生剑体……如此材料，合该属于本尊。真是愚蠢至极，大道三千，偏选了除魔卫道的路，为了救些蠢货就闯进塔内，如今自身难保又有谁能救……”

"An Innate Sword Embodiment... a fighter of such calibre rightfully belongs to me, the Supremacy. There were so many Daos he could have chosen, yet he chose one committed to annihilating fiends. He even rushed into this pagoda to save a few idiots. Now, he can't fend for himself. Who can save..."
“太不像话了！”羿清快步走过去，直接把众人挡开了，“这饺子皮太厚，莲子羹太稠，小笼包都漏馅了，这豆浆也不知道能不能喝？你们居然有脸端给师父，简直就是在玷污我师门！”

"This is ridiculous!" Yi Qing marched over and pushed everybody away from Shen Ying. "These dumplings are too thick, these lotus seeds are too tough, these Xiao Long Baos are too crammed full of stuffing, and the soya bean milk looks disgusting. How dare you bring all of this food to Master? You're mistreating her!"
“太好了！”易家几代人的承诺，没想到在他这一代实现了，他连忙抱拳行礼道，“恭喜灵主，您终于可以回去了。”
"Thats great!" The Yi Family finally fulfilled the promise that they had passed down for generations. "Congratulations, Spirit Mster, you can finally go home."
“太虚派出了何事？”到是羿清看了看峰外问道，从刚刚开始，他就感觉到悟剑峰外传来不小的渲闹声。
"What happened to the Grand Vacuity Sect?" Yi Qing looked toward the peak and asked. From the beginning, he had felt that there was quite a din coming from Sword Comprehension Peak’s periphery.
“夫人和那个人如此强大，少主的资质怎么会差？”
"My Lady and that guy were so capable. Young master, you wouldn't be that far off from them."
“奇怪我怎么知道的吗？”那黑影笑得越加的得意，“前阵子我那些不争气的郁家子孙，可是多亏了你们的关照呢？”
"Wondering how I know this?” the black figure grinned, "Awhile ago, the descendants of my Yu Family were taken care of by you."
“奔三？”她愣了愣，“掌门说话好高深，我修行也有六七十载了，仍是不能完全领悟。”
"Thirty? She hesitated. "Sect Master, you speak so deeply. I've been cultivating for 60 to 70 years, yet I cannot fully understand."
“奚掌门，门中弟子，每日可有灵米灵果等食物供应。”他一本正经的问。
“Sect Master Xi, does your sect provide your disciples with a daily supply of food, such as spirit rice and fruit?" he asked solemnly.
“奚秋你！”孤月不敢置信的看向奚秋。
"Xi Qiu, you!" Lonemoon looked at Xi Qiu with disbelief.
“奸细？！”孤月一愣，莫非是郁家的人，看了旁边的羿清一眼，交代郁红让众弟子别下山，这才跟羿清飞了出去。

"A spy?" Lonemoon exclaimed. Could it be someone from the Yu Family? Lonemoon turned to glance at Yi Qing and instructed Yu Hong to prevent any disciple from going down the hill. He immediately flew out with Yi Qing.
“她……”巨兽突然打断他的话，声音意外带着点茫然的道，“叫什么？”
"What..." the beast suddenly interrupted him. It sounded surprisingly calm as it asked, "is her name again?"
“她不是甘子睿为玉鼎找的第一个炉鼎。听说以前他门下弟子很多，全都是女性，但却没有一个活得久的。后来烤鸡妹子入魔结婴，让手下的魔修到处找他，他意识到有危险，所以才躲进了悟剑峰。”

"She was not the first human cauldron whom Gan Zirui was seeking for Yu Ding. I heard that he had many disciples under him, and they were all female. However, none of them managed to live for long. Later, when Roasted Chicken Gal turned fiendish and became a Nascent Soul and got her fiendish cultivators to seek him out, he sensed danger and hid in Sword Comprehension Peak."
“她们身上一定有什么掩盖气息的东西，所以才看不穿她们的身份。”他转了转手里的笛子，“不过也藏不多久，兴许明日就知道了。”

"They must have something with them which conceals their aura and that's why we can't see through their identity." He flipped the flute in his hand. "But they can't hide it for long. If we’re lucky, perhaps we’ll find out tomorrow."
“她是师父。”理所应当。
"She's my master." It is a matter of course.
“她没骗你。”孤月一脸过来人的语气道，“她说不知道，那就是真的不知道。你习惯了就好。”天真，跟外挂讲什么理由？受着就好。

"She's not lying," Lonemoon said empathetically. "When she says she doesn't know, she really doesn't know. You just have to get used to it." How naive. What use is it to try and reason with a cheat? Just accept things as they are.
“她邀我去玩。”白泽一本正经的道。
"She invited me for a visit." Bai Zhe answered gravely.
“好……”奚秋愣愣的招过一位弟子带路。
"Alright…" A bemused Xi Qiu called over a disciple to lead the way.
"Alright."
“好。”思羽点头，立马扶起了地上的人，朝两位兔妖点了点头道，“多谢两位。”
"Alright." Si Yu nodded and turned her attention to Yin Yuanfei, cradling him in her arms. Nodding at the two rabbits, she said, "Thank you both for your help."
“好。”沈萤回头瞅了瞅毛团，这才跟着那弟子走了出去。不知道明天能不能也找到一只，招财团子？
"Alright," Shen Ying turned to frown at the spirit beast, then followed the disciple out of the cave. Will I be lucky enough to meet another beast tomorrow?
“好。”沈萤没什么意见。
"Alright," Shen Ying said .She had no preference.
“好。”白泽眼神一沉，直接一掌打在了它的头上。只见他掌心一道白红闪过，没入它额心。
"Good," Bai Ze lowered his gaze and slammed his palm into the wyrm's head. Flashes of red and white light shot out of his palm and into the wyrm's heart.
“好丹药！”
"What a good elixir!"
“好主意！”
"Good idea!"
“好了别吃了，准备一下，我们得去上青城了。”孤月把某个吃货从饭桌拉了下来，交代道。
"OK, stop eating and get ready. We have to go to Upper Azure Town," instructed Lonemoon, pulling a certain foodie away from the table.
“好了！”碧涛终于解完了阵法，只见那墙再次打开，不到半会就变成了一道门。门内是一间巨大的储物室，到处都是一排排像是书架一样的格子，每个格子里都放着一到两个颜色各异的瓶子。

"Alright!" Bitao had finally finished cracking the array. The wall split open. In a moment, it turned into a door. Behind the door was a huge Storage Repository. There were shelves and pigeon holes beside the Storage Repository, and each shelf had two different coloured bottles on it.
“好了，东西齐了。时间不早，我们出发吧！”沈萤推了推戚橙雨，催促道，“可以飞了。”
"Alright, since the items are all set, and it's getting late, let's start moving!" Shen Ying nudged at Qi Chengyu, urging her, "You can fly now."
“好了，他剑意已成。”孤月松了口气，正打算飞过去，突然轰隆一声巨响，一道白色的闪电从天而降，直直的劈在了下方人身上。

"Alright, his sword intent is complete." Lonemoon heaved a sigh of relief. Just as he was about to fly over, a loud rumbling sound was heard accompanied by a white flash of lightning descending from the sky and striking right at the people below.
“好了，易公子，我先回去了！”
"Alright, Young Master Yi, I'll be leaving!"
“好了，相信少爷，我会有办法的，先进去吧。”
"Alright, trust in your young master; I will come up with a plan. Head on in."
“好你妹啊！有见过哪个门派这么少人的吗？”一想起那九个未来的金钢芭比，他就肝疼好吗？“再不做点广告，打点人气出去，我们永远别想招到别的弟子了。再说我试过她们九个的身手，虽说越阶挑战难了点，但她们根基……扎实！”他咬了咬牙才吐出这两个字，“反正同级之间的比斗还是很有优势的。这次去大比，我要求也不高，她们能有一人拿到前十就好。至少让人知道我们无敌派的实力。”

"Good your head! Have you seen any sect that has so few people?" When he thought of those nine future iron barbies, his liver began to hurt, alright? "If we don't do some promotion, gain some popularity, then we can say goodbye to recruiting other disciples. Moreover, I have tested the skills of the nine of them. Although competing against people with higher cultivation levels will be a little tough, their foundations are… solid!" He had gritted his teeth to spit out that word. "Anyway, they stand at an advantage when competing with those of the same level. For this competition, I don’t have very high expectations. It will be good as long one of them can land a place in the top ten. At least let other people know the capabilities of our Invincible Sect."
“好像叫白……白……”白什么来着，“忘了，反正是只白色长角的，长得挺好吃的小动物。”
"I think he was called Bai... Bai..." Bai something or other. "I can't remember. Anyway, he was white, had a long horn and looked like a tasty animal."
“好厨……徒弟！”
"You really are a good chef… disciple!"
“好厨子，现在就开始吧！”
"Yes, Chef, let's start with that!"
“好吧……我说实话！”
“Alright... I will speak the truth！”
“好吧！”
"Alright then!"
“好吧！”沈萤叹了口气，竖起手里的筷子，“我只有一个问题。”
"All right!" Shen Ying sighed, holding up her chopsticks. "I only have one problem."
“好吧！”沈萤叹了口气，走过去蹲在了郁红面前，一本正经的道，“那……你们会做菜吗？”
"Alright then!" Shen Ying sighed, walked over and squatted in front of Yu Hong, saying earnestly, "Then… do you all know how to cook?"
“好吧！”薄飞平见此，知道再劝也没用，只好放弃了让他们搬家的念头，突然想起了一件事，眼神一转，转移话题道，“贵派能出两个剑仙，看来门下弟子也定是不俗？难得有机会来此，能否让我跟父亲，开开眼界？”见识过了，说不得就得交流一番，到时再让安儿以请教的名义留下来，也是一样的。

"Okay then!" said Pu Feiping. After seeing the current situation, he knew that it would be of no use for him to continue persuading further, and he could only give up on the idea of them moving house.
Suddenly he thought of something and the gaze in his eyes changed. He said, "Your sect could produce two sword immortals, thus your disciples must be good as well. Since we have a chance now, why not let my father and me have the opportunity to see your skills?" After seeing it for themselves, they might need to interact and when that comes, he could still let Ning ZiAn stay on the basis of consulting them.
“好吧！那……”沈萤这才放下碗筷走了过去，一脸认真的在众人眼前走过，最终停在了郁红面前，“妹子，你……有 Freestyle 吗？”

"Okay! Then…" Shen Ying finally put down her cutlery and walked over. Wearing a serious look, she walked past the other disciples and stopped in front of Yu Hong. "Sister, do you… have any Freestyle moves?"
“好呀！”
"Sure!"
“好呀！”对方秒回，转身一蹦就跳到了他的剑上，“谢谢啊，我站稳了，开车开车。”
"That's great!" She replied immediately as she leapt onto his sword. "Thank you, I have gotten my balance, start the car, start the car."
“好啊。”沈萤点了点头，转身进屋就趴在石桌上打起了嗑睡，好累啊！为了对付那只绿狐，一晚上没睡，她还真有点犯困。趴了半会，眼看着上下眼皮就要开始相亲相爱了。

"Alright." Shen Ying nodded, and then she went inside the house and immediately laid on the stone table to sleep. So tired! Dealing with that green fox had made her sacrifice her sleep for a night, so she was already nodding off. After laying down for a moment, both of her eyelids were about to close.
“好啊。”沈萤点头，打包价嘛。之前了解过，一块下品灵石等于一百颗灵珠，已经够路费了。

"Alright." Shen Ying nodded; it was a package price. Before this, she had come to understand that a piece of low-grade spirit stone was equivalent to 100 spiritual pearls, which was sufficient for the travel fees.
“好啊！”她想也不想的点头，“它们不吃人就行。”
"Sure!" The woman nodded without any hesitation. "It's fine as long as they don't eat humans."
“好啊！”正无聊呢，沈萤拍了拍旁边的椅子，“坐，嗑瓜子吗？”
"Alright!" She was bored anyway. Shen Ying patted the seat next to her, "Sit. Do you want some melon seeds?"
“好啊！”毕竟收了钱。
"That's right!" After all, I took your money.
“好啊！”沈萤摸了摸肚皮，就等你说这句呢。
"Sure!" Shen Ying touched her belly. She had been waiting for him to say this.
“好啊！”沈萤眼睛一亮，正要坐下，旁边一直关着门的店子，却突然冲出来一个一身灰袍的人，似是没看清楚路，刚好拌到了椅子，扑哧一下整个人摔在了三人的面前。灰袍滑落，露出半截格外亮丽的衣衫。

"Alright!" Shen Ying's eyes lit up as she sat down on the stool. But suddenly, a lady in a gray robe rushed out the doors of the shop next to them which had been closed all the way up till that moment. She was not watching where she was going and before long, tripped over Shen Ying's wooden stool and fell down before the three of them. The lady’s gray robe fell to the floor, revealing bright and colorful clothing beneath.
“好啊！在这炼丹房才做事一天，你都装起来了？”
"Good! You've only been working in the alchemy lab for a day, and you're already protecting yourself?"
“好啊，等回去让厨子做。”
"Sure, I will get chef to make one later."
“好啊，谢谢。”沈萤特自然的站了上去。
"Alright, thanks," Shen Ying climbed atop the sword.
“好嘞，来人取十枚灵神丹来。”
"Right away, sir. Servants, fetch me ten Spirit Pills."
“好困……”睡意来袭，沈萤伸了个懒腰，拉了拉破旧的被子。这一晚够累的，终于可以继续睡觉了，希望不要再遇到扰人清梦的事了。

"So sleepy…" Shen Ying stretched her lazy bones as drowsiness overwhelmed her while she pulled at her old, tattered blanket. This night was especially tiring and she could finally continue sleeping; hopefully she would not encounter anymore events that would disturb her from her sweet dreams.
“好多……海鲜啊！”
"So much... seafood!"
“好多丹药……”
"So many elixirs..."
“好学生！”
"Good student!"
“好强大的剑意！”孤月一惊，能凝聚这样的巨剑，这羿清真的只是个元婴修士吗？或许……或许他真的可以……
"His sword intent is so strong!" Lonemoon exclaimed. Yi Qing is capable of condensing all his sword intent to form a Great Sword like that… Is he really just a Nascent Soul? Or… or could he really…
“好得上仙，没问题上仙！上仙你还有什么需要吗？”
“As per your wish, Exalted Immortal, no problem, Exalted Immortal! Exalted Immortal, do you desire anything else?”
"I think... they did."
“好机会！”
"That was such a good opportunity!"
“好热闹啊。”她下意识的说了一句。
"What a huge crowd." Shen Ying muttered to herself.
“好的大仙。”
"OK, Great Immortal."
“好的大仙！”兔王用力点头。
"Alright, Great Immortal!" The Rabbit Monarch nodded its head vigorously.
“好的大仙！交给我大仙！”
"Yes, Great Immortal! Leave it to me, Great Immortal!"
“好的大仙，没问题大仙！”
"OK, Great Immortal! No problem, Great Immortal!"
“好的大仙，没问题大仙！”魔王撸起袖子就移了过去。眼睛却不受控制瞅了瞅界门。
"Alright, Great Immortal! Not a problem, Great Immortal!" The Devil King rolled up his sleeves and moved along. However, the Devil King's eyes peered uncontrollably at the Gates of Devildom.
“好的师父！”
"Great idea, Master."
“好的师父！”羿清这才坐了回来。
"Okay Master!" Yi Qing sat back down.
“好的师父！没问题师父！”他立马乖乖躺好，顺手还拉了拉被子。
"Yes Master! No problem Master!" Pulling back the covers, Yi Feng lay down obediently.
“好的师父，没问题师父。”
"Yes Master, no problem Master!"
“好的师父，没问题师父！”
"Yes Master, no problem Master!"
“好的师父，没问题师父！”羿清用力一点头，转身噌的一下就飞走了。
"Alright Master, no problem Master!" Yi Qing nodded hard, turned around and flew off.
“好的师父，没问题师父！”羿清神采飞扬的，一头扎进了厨房中。
"Alright, Master. No problem, Master!" Yi Qing had a skip in his step as he walked into the kitchen.
“好的师父，没问题师父！师父真厉害！”
"Yes Master, no probem Master! You're amazing, Master!"
“好的师父，马上就来了。”羿清应了一声，端着两盘海鲜就走了出来。
"Yes, Master. It'll be out in a second," Yi Qing responded. He carried two plates of seafood and walked out of the kitchen
“好的爸爸，没问题爸爸！”
"Yes Father, no problem Father!"
“好的，牛爸爸！”她提起两袋灵石，转身就往厨房跑去，一边跑还一边得瑟，“厨子，我们有钱了，买菜去不？”
"Alright, Father Niu!" She picked up the two bags, stood up and scurried into the kitchen. As she approached the kitchen, she sang, "Chef, we have money now! Shall we go to the market?"
“好看你妹啊！”孤月气得肝痛，“你别告诉我，你盖这么多楼就是给我们三个人住的。”你丫是皇帝吗？要住这么大的地方，这走一圈都要两天好吗？

"Beautiful your ass!" Lonemoon was outraged. "Don't tell me that you had such a huge palace built just for the three of us?" Do you take yourself as an emperor? The palace is so huge that it’ll take two days just to walk one lap around it.
“好神奇……”
"How weird..."
“好神奇，这黑色元力竟能让丹药的药力增强？”
"How weird! To think that this black essence force could actually increase the medicinal power of an elixir..."
“好端端的，你耍什么流氓啊喂？”生气也不能这样啊。
"Why do you want to play hooligan out of nowhere?" Being angry isn’t an excuse for this.
“好系统啊！”沈萤顺口夸了一句。
"Good system!" Shen Ying praised.
“好累啊！”她念了一句，眼睛就开始不受控制往下搭。就连那个叫萝卜的男子，也是一脸自然，习惯性的就地挖了个坑，坐了进去，一副也要入睡的模样。

"So tired!" She said one line and her eyes began to shut uncontrollably. Even the man named Radish looked at that scene as if it was natural before habitually digging a hole and sitting in it, looking as if he were about to sleep as well.
“好险！”
"What a close shave!"
“好饿啊！”
"I'm famished!"
“好香哦……”沈萤给羿清点了个赞，瞬间觉得废了几个月的胃，又活过来了，扒饭扒饭扒饭！“牛爸爸，吃啊！”

"It smells so good...” Shen Ying gave Yi Qing a thumbs up. The appetite that seemed to have disappeared over the last few months was whetted. Steak rice, steak rice, steak rice! "Father Niu, let's eat!"
“好麻烦啊。”出门什么的最讨厌了，在家睡觉多好。
"It's going to be so troublesome." Shen Ying detested leaving the house. All she wanted was to rest at home.
“好麻烦啊。”沈萤抓了头，牛爸爸这么精明的人，也跑里面干嘛？怎么办，要去救人吗？她还没吃早饭的说，四下找了找，却没看到熟悉的身影，“厨子呢？他不说只出去一天吗？”

"This is really troublesome," Shen Ying scratched her head. Father Niu is such a smart man, why did he enter the pagoda? What should I do, should I save them? But I haven't eaten my breakfast. She scanned the crowd once more but did not find any familiar face. "Where's Chef? Didn't he say he would only be away for a day?"
“好麻烦啊！”她抓了抓头，“丹药什么的，我又不是学医的，没兴趣啊。不过你要是有什么食谱之类的，到是可以给我。”拿给厨子研究。

"It's so troublesome!" She scratched her head. "Pills and whatnot… I'm not trained in medicine, I'm not interested. But if you have any recipes for good food, you could hand them to me." I'll bring them to Chef so he can look through them.
“好麻烦啊，不拔行不行？”
"So troublesome, can we not harvest?"
"Greetings!"
“好！”她用力一拍他的肩膀，“我答应你了。”
“Good!” Slapping his shoulders hard, she said, "You have my approval."
“好！”她转看向羿清，“厨……徒……呃，你叫什么清来着？”
"Good!" She turned to Yi Qing, "Chef... Disciple... er, your name is Qing something?"
“好！”孤月乐呵呵的一笑，“加入我们，你们一定不会后悔的。不过……”他认真看了一眼这群女子，“我看几位原本就是修士，而且有三位已经结丹。之前真的无门派吗？”

"Great!" Lonemoon laughed joyfully. "Join us and you won’t regret it. However…" He took a serious look at the group of girls. "I can see that a few of you were originally cultivators while three of you have already completed Core Formation. Are you guys really not from a sect?"
“好！”小奴对于江逸的话从不怀疑，顿时憨笑个不停，跟着江逸快步朝自家小院走去。
"Good!" Jiang Yi had never questioned Jiang Yi's words. She immediately smiled naively as she followed Jiang Yi with quick steps towards the small courtyard of their home.
“好！”羿清这才似松了口气般，看向一边的孤月道，“等会他们追上来，你先引开四个尊者，不必与他们相斗，只要拖住他们，又追不上你就行。”

"Good!" At this, Yi Qing heaved a sigh of relief. Looking at Lonemoon, he said, "When the four Supremacies catch up with us, divert them away first. You don't have to fight with them, just delay them, but don't let them catch up with you."
“好！”郁红按拳上前。
"Alright!" Yu Hong clenched her fist and stepped forward.
“好！今日起，你们就是我无敌派剑修了。”孤月扬手一挥，顿时唤出数把灵剑，放在每人的面前，“你们要先从最简单的剑招练起。”

"Great! From today onwards, all of you are Sword Cultivators of my Invincible Sect." Lonemoon waved his hand, summoning forth several spirit swords and placing them before the girls. "You will all need to learn from the most basic of sword techniques."
“好！我听你的。”孤月点了点头，深吸了一口气。
"Alright! I'll do as you say." Lonemoon nodded and took a deep breath.
“好！我相信你？”沈萤点头。
"Alright! I'll believe you?" Shen Ying nodded his head.
"Alright! I will crawl..."
“好！看在你们还算是有诚意的份上。”掌柜的这才消了气继续道，“本店也不是不讲理的，这灵石我收下了。”他接过了灵石袋，突然想到了什么，“看你们的样子，像是刚刚上界的修士，这次就饶了你们。哼！以后再看到你们吃霸王餐，就不会这么简单了。”

"Alright! Since you're so sincere about this…" The owner seemed less angry now as he continued, "My restaurant isn’t unreasonable. I'll accept your spirit stones." He received the bag of spirit stones and suddenly seemed to realize something. "From your looks, you must be cultivators who have just arrived here in the Upper World. I'll let you off this time. Hmph! The next time I catch you trying to eat a free meal, it won’t end this simply!"
“好，不变招了你就等着输吧！缠丝手！迷幻步！”
"Great, prepare to lose if you weren't going to change your technique! Silk Hand! Psychedelic Step!"
“好，不错！小子你很不错！”
"Nice, well done! Well done, you brat!"
“好，中计了！”
Good, he fell for my trick!
“好，什么时候回去？”
"Ok, when do we head back?"
“好，加油！”沈萤点了点头。
"Alright, all the best!" Shen Ying nodded.
“好，师侄觉得上古秘境之事，兹事体大。”上古秘境现世是好事，刚听到这消息时，他内心也是狂喜的，毕竟那可是上古秘境！而且还是没有人踏足过的，里面不知道藏着多少珍奇异宝，谁不欢喜？谁不激动？只是狂喜过后，他心底顿时又浮现出了几分担忧，“之前灵光冲天，各门各派必定已经有所察觉，必会遣人查看。此事用不了多久都会知晓。”

"Okay, Disciple-Nephew feels that the Ancient Mystic Realm matter is very serious." The resurgence of the Ancient Mystic Realm was a good thing. When he first heard of the news, he was over the moon, especially since it was the Ancient Mystic Realm! Moreover, no one had ever set foot inside. There could be countless unique gems and jewels hidden inside, so who wouldn't be delighted? Who wouldn't be excited? Yet after the feelings of joy passed, worries began to surface in his mind. "Previously, that divine light shone through the sky. All the sects must have noticed it and will go to check it out. This resurgence will be known to all in a matter of time."
“好，我们走。”
"Alright, let's go."
“好，我加入了！”
"Okay, I'm in!"
“好，这点我就不跟你算了。”他深吸了一口气，转身指向右边的枫影道，“这货又是怎么回事？为什么他还在这里啊？”拿的还是他惯用的饭碗！

"Alright, I shall not fight about this with you." He took in a deep breath, turned and pointed at Feng Ying to the right, "What happened to this fellow? Why is he still here?" And using the cutlery that he always used!
“好，那就把……刚那个长得丑的拽出来吧！”
"Alright, then... pull out the ugly one that I was just talking about!"
“如今夜色已深，她一定已经入睡，不能打扰掌门睡觉的。”
"It is now late in the night, she must have fallen asleep, we cannot disturb Sect Master's sleep."
“如今灵气稀薄，会有此情况也是正常的。”清韵也叹了一声道，“反正我等的任务，只要接有缘之人，升入上青界，也算是完成主家的交待了。人多人少到是无所谓。在精不在多，若是些资质平庸的，想必主家也不会满意。我得又何必着急。”

"Now that the Spirit Qi is so diluted, such a situation is also very normal." Qing Yun also sighed. "Anyway, our mission is to bring the fated people to the Upper Azure World and in doing so we will have completed our Master's instructions. It doesn't matter how many people are going. Quality over quantity. If those cultivators with mediocre quality were accepted, Master would not be happy either. We need not be too rushed."
“如今的你，不过区区孤家寡人罢，现在死到临头了，你不垂死挣扎一番，莫非还有什么遗言要留？”
"You are now just a lonely man in your final moments, and yet you are not putting up a struggle. Hmph, don't tell me that you still have a dying wish?"
“如果沈萤问你，会不会烤肉？你一定要告诉她不会。”
"If Shen Ying asks if you know how to roast meat, you have to tell her you don't."
“如此便好……”羿清松了口气，以妖王的修为，即使那人不死，也讨不了好。况且他身上的巨毒对妖气可没用。

"In that case, it's fine..." Yi Qing heaved a sigh of relief. Even if he had survived, he would meet no good end in the face of that Demon Monarch's cultivation. Moreover, the venom in his body would have no effect on demonic aura.
“如此多的万年灵植，此行辛苦师叔和羿清真……”奚秋话到一半，突然停住，一脸见鬼的看向羿清，“你……你，你的修为怎么会……”出门时还是个元婴，怎么回来就是化神，难道他瞎了。

"There are so many ten thousand-year-old spirit herbs! The trip must have been hard on Uncle-Master and Perfected Yi…" Xi Qiu suddenly paused as he studied Yi Qing with disbelief written all over his face. "You… your… your cultivation level… why is it…" Yi Qing was at the Nascent Soul stage when he left Blackheaven Sect. How did he return as a Soul Formation cultivator? Was he blind?
“如此看来，那妖怪在此肆虐已久。”孤月紧了紧手上的玉笛，“那些见过妖怪的人怎么样了？伤情如何？”
"So it seems that this demon has been wreaking havoc here for a long time." Lonemoon clenched the jade flute in his hand. "How are the people who have seen the monster? What condition are they in?"
“如此，我这就去传信各门各派。”奚秋行了个礼，快步出了门。
"Alright, I shall send letters out to all the sects now." Xi Qiu bowed and left quickly.
“妖……妖丹！”它整只兔子都惊呆了，“这……这……”也太多了，这么大一袋算起来有数千颗吧。
"Demon… demon cores!" The rabbit was utterly shocked, "This… this…" There were so many — such a huge sack should contain thousands of cores.
“妖丹是啥？”
"What's a demon's core?"
“妖女，你到底对我叔伯做了什么？”男子一脸怒气的看向对方，直接唤出一把灵剑，就朝着对方砍过去，“竟敢如此对我轩辕家的人，我杀了你！”

"Demoness, what have you done to my uncles?" He looked at the other party in rage, manifested a spirit sword and slashed towards the person. "How dare you do this to the people of my Xuan Yuan Family, I am going to kill you!"
“妖气！”羿清抬头看向两人道，“是那只狐妖的。”
"Demonic aura!" Yi Qing looked up at the other two. "It belongs to the fox demon."
“妖界怎么可能没……”
"How can any place in the Demon Realm have no…"
“妹子啊！”
"Sister!"
“妹子啊，我找不着那条河了！”
"Sister, I can't find the river!
“妹子，你确定是这边不？”熟悉的声音再次响起，“那边只有条河，没有海啊！”
"Sister, are you sure that is the way?" That familiar voice rang out again. "There is no sea there, only a river!"
“妹子，你还记得我们从哪个方向飞来的不？”
"Sister, do you remember which direction we flew from?”
“姑娘？”他坐起来，忍不住出声。
"Miss?” He sat up, unable to keep quiet any longer.
“姬听雨？这聚珍阁果然是姬家的商号，这位看来是城主家的小姐了。”
"Ji Tingyu? This Pearl Gathering Pavilion is certainly the business establishment of the Ji Family, and this lady must be the daughter of the City Lord's family.
“姬小姐实力强大，在下佩服。”江逸苦涩一笑，铸鼎境八重的武者战力果然彪悍，如果不是元力被封印，怕是他一招都接不下。

"Young Mistress Ji's power is enormously great, I truly admire it and admit being weaker." Jiang Yi smiled with some bitter agony. The combat ability of a martial artist with a power level in the eighth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm was indeed formidable. If not for both their essence forces being sealed off from use, it was likely that he would not even be able to withstand a single attack technique.
“娘亲，干爷爷，孩儿，孩儿的封印终于有希望破开了……”他睁开眼睛，轻声的喃喃一声，满脸都是狂喜和落寞！
"Mum, God-Granddad, your son... your son finally has hope of breaking his seal..." he muttered in a low voice as he opened his eyes, his face filled with ecstasy and loneliness!
“字，啥字？”孤月一脸莫名。
"Words, what words?" Lonemoon was baffled.
“孤……月兄。”薄飞平还是一脸懵逼的神情，“刚……刚，她是体修？”女的？活的？！而且还成仙了？
"Brother... Brother Lonemoon. Just now... was she a body cultivator?" stuttered a confused Pu Feiping. A girl?! Alive?! And she became an immortal?
“孤月……”余阳也皱了皱眉，上前劝道，“这也不能怪他们，毕竟事关宗门，要以大局为重。”
"Lonemoon…" Yu Yang frowned and stepped forward. "You can't blame them. This concerns the whole sect. We need to have the bigger picture in mind."
“孤月。”他沉声回了两个字，双手背于身后，仍是那清冷的样子。
"Lonemoon." He replied curtly with his hands behind his back, still wearing that cold expression.
“孤月兄别着急做决定，可以慢慢想清楚嘛。”见这事要黄，薄飞平一急，只好把眼光定在在场的其它两人身上，“要不先问问羿清仙友和……这位仙子的意思？”他记得这个女子才是掌门吧？虽然他早已看出，门派中真正做决定的人是孤月，但为了儿子，他不得不拉其它两人进来，“靖邢城仙气比起这里浓郁得多，对门中弟子修为更为有利。”

Seeing that the matter would soon come to nothing, Pu Feiping anxiously set his gaze on the other two parties involved, and said, "Brother Lonemoon do not rashly make a decision. You can slowly think about it. Why don't you ask Yi Qing and this... this... fellow immortal's decision?"
He remembered that Shen Ying was the real master of the sect. Even though he had already realized this point earlier on, but the true decision maker in the sect is actually Lonemoon. However, for his son, he had no choice but to drag other people into the equation.
He continued, "The Immortal Qi in Jing Ya City is much more dense than your sect. It would definitely be better for your disciples."
“孤月兄！”薄飞平一喜，笑得一脸灿烂就迎了上来，“多日不见，一切可好啊？”
"Brother Lonemoon!" Pu Feiping exclaimed and his face was filled with delight. "I haven't seen you in many days, how have you been?"
“孤月尊者客气了。”易峰回礼道，“尊者与沈掌门驾临我易家，才是我等的荣幸。”想起自己那只白得的契约青蛟，心下越加的感动，话语也越加的真诚，转头看向沈萤道，“沈掌门相助之情，易某定不会忘。”

"Supremacy Lonemoon is too kind," said Yi Feng returning the salute. "Sect Master Shen and you are the ones who have honored our Yi Family with your visit." Yi Feng heart warmed towards her as he thought about the contract wyrm that he had gotten for free. Turning to Shen Ying, he said sincerely, "I won't forget Sect Master Shen's help."
“孤月尊者已经在等您了，沈掌门请！”易峰客气的伸出手，“我们明日就出发去幻海，沈掌门早些歇息。”

"Supremacy Lonemoon is already there waiting for you. Sect Master Shen, please!" Yi Feng politely raised his hand, pointing in the direction that she was supposed to walk. "We will set out for the Mirage Sea tomorrow morning. Sect Master Shen, please rest well tonight."
“孤月师弟……”两位尊者齐齐一惊，正要细问。不远处的护山大阵嘭的一声响，直接被攻破了，那朵巨大的莲花朝着主峰大殿直飞过来，停在了大殿前方不远的空中。

"Junior Brother Lonemoon…" Both Supremacies were shocked. Just as they were about to ask further, a loud bang was heard at the Protective Mountain Array; it had broken under the attack of the enemy. The gigantic lotus flower headed towards the main peak's hall and stopped in the air before the hall.
“孤月长老，在这……吗？”
She asked hesitantly, "Elder Lonemoon, do I do it here...?"
“孺子可教，这名江家子弟果然比江松聪明多了……”
"This boy is promising and worthy of being taught. This son of the Jiang Clan is definitely much smarter than Jiang Song..."
“它……它是千叶草木灵？”轩辕禹一脸震惊的看向萝卜，居然这么快就化形了！轩辕家可是努力了上万年，都没有让家中草木灵化形，还养着养着就养死了！

"This… is this a Thousand Leaves Vegetation Spirit?" Xuan Yuanyu looked towards the radish in shock. It had manifested so quickly! The Xuan Yuan Family had worked hard for thousands of years yet they had not managed to get their Vegetation Spirit to manifest, even though they had nurtured it till its death!
“它们盖好了房子，怕打扰您睡觉，就先行回去了。”羿清解释，指了指屋前那一堆的食材道，“这是兔王留下的，说是今日的份例。”

"After they were done with fixing your house, they were afraid of disrupting your sleep, so they went back first." Yi Qing explained as he pointed to a pile of food ingredients and said, "This was left by the Rabbit Monarch who said that this is today's portion."
“它是凭空消失的，连那些魔气也是。”那么庞大的魔气说没就没了，“事后薄城主到处搜寻也没有再找到半丝魔族的踪迹。”

Yi Qing exclaimed, "He disappeared into thin air, just like the demonic Qi." The thick demonic Qi disappeared at will. He continued, "Afterwards, City Lord Pu searched everywhere, but could not even find a hint of the demonic beast's trace."
“它要历劫了。”孤月提醒了一句，转手在三人身边布下了阵法。
"It's about to transform," Lonemoon reminded the other two. He turned around and set up another array formation around the group.
“它还会开花？”沈萤眼睛睁了睁，盆栽？
"It flowers?" Shen Ying's eyes widened. It's a potted plant?
“它？”孤月低头看了眼手上的萝卜，“那你就这么拿走了，轩辕家主没跟你拼命？”
"It?" Lonemoon looked down at the radish in hand. "So you just took it away and the master of the Xuan Yuan Family did not fight for it desperately?"
“安儿！”薄仪立马接过了她手里的宁子安，细细探了遍他的脉向，这才松了口气。也注意到了她手上的那个女婴，“沈掌门，这孩子是？”

"Lil An! Bao Yi received the Ning Zi An in her hands immediately and gave his pulse a detailed checkup. She let out a sigh of relief. She noticed the infant girl in her hands and asked, "Sect Master Shen, this child is?"
“安儿！”薄飞平突然紧张的喊了一句。
“An！”Pu FeiPing exclaimed anxiously.
“安排……”沈萤这才想起，不能让她们干站着，爬起来指了指若大的殿宇道，“要不你们随便找个房间先住下？等牛爸爸回来再说，这里挺大的，随便住哪间都可以的。”

"Arrangements…" Shen Ying finally recalled that she should not just let them stand there. She climbed up and pointed toward the huge hall. "How about you guys just find a room and settle down first? Wait for Father Niu to come back to make any arrangements. This place is pretty big so staying anywhere is fine."
“完了！”
"I'm done for!"
“实力！”
“Strength!”
“客你妹啊！”他不是追魂楼楼主吗？回你追魂楼去啊！在这蹭什么饭，饭不要灵石的吗？凭什么占了他的位子，吃着他那份。

"Guest your head!" Wasn't he the Soul Chasing Tower's Tower Master? Get back to your Soul Chasing Tower! Why are you here to freeload, don't rice need spirit stones? Why did he have the right to take up his seat and eat his portion.
“家主……”一个弟子慌乱的跑进后殿，“不好了，不好了！”
"Master…" A flustered disciple ran to the back of the hall. "Oh no, oh no!"
“家主……”有反应过来的化神，想要上前救人，却发现完全没用，而且还会直接被沈萤狂暴的怒气卷进去，她似是完全不知道自己手里抓的是什么，冲上来一个，抡起手里的东西就砸倒一个。

"Patriarch..." The Soul Formation cultivators, who had recovered from their shock, wanted to go forward to help, but discovered that they were no only unable to help but were themselves drawn into Shen Ying's inferno of rage. She seemed completely unaware of what she was holding onto. Whoever who came up to her was hurled to the ground.
“家主客气。”孤月笑得越加的商业，“都是正派仙门，理该同气连枝。”
"Family Master, you are too kind." Lonemoon smiled more politely, "We are righteous and established sects of course we should
“家主客气了。”孤月上前一步笑道，“轩辕家不也有五人进入了决赛，我们顺道也恭喜家主了。”

"Family Master, you're too kind," Lonemoon said as he stepped into view. "Five disciples from your Xuan Yuan Family have also made it into the finals. We’ll take this chance to congratulate you too, Family Master."
“家主，不要！”五个粽子齐齐出声。
"Master, no!" The five dumplings shouted in unison.
“家主，此事切莫再提了!”那游仙一脸惊慌的提醒，“家主也知道，我们原本那株千叶草木灵千年前就已经失了智灵，如今连本体都已经枯死了，估计也救不回来了。”所以他们才着急的寻找下一株千叶草木灵，“如今用一株枯草换来这十几株的千叶灵花，已经是大仙仁厚了。况且……”

"Master, let's never speak of this again!” The Traveling Immortal reminded him, his expression one of panic. "Master, you know that the Thousand Leaves Vegetation Spirit that we had had already lost its sentience a thousand years ago. Its body had already withered. It's unlikely that we would have been able to revive it anyway." That was why they had so desperately wanted to find another Vegetation Spirit. "The Great Immortal has already been so kind to give us more than ten Thousand Leaves Spirit Flowers in exchange for that withered grass. What's more…"
“家师，沈莹。”羿清回答，一脸恭敬的神情，还不忘给对方添了碗饭。
“She is my master, Shen Ying." Yi Qing replied with a respectful look on his face, not forgetting to give her another bowl of rice.
“家父和其它两大世家家主，以及很多门派的修士，被郁家所惑，进入了升仙塔，至今生死未卜！”印元飞一脸急切的道。

"My father and the other two aristocratic family patriarchs, as well as many cultivators from the various sects were lured by the Yu family into the Immortal Ascension Pagoda. I don't know whether they are alive or dead!"
“家父和族中各位太叔伯就是入塔的第一批人。”印元飞沉声道。
"My father and several uncles from my family are some of the people who were invited to enter the pagoda," Yin Yuanfei said in a low voice.
“家父已经前去上都，将此事上报了。”薄飞平道，如果真是魔界之门，他们小小一个仙城自然做不了主。

Pu Feiping said, "My father had already went to the upper courts to report this matter." If that really was the Door of Demon Realm, a mere city like theirs could not be responsible enough to make a decision.
“容天不弃，今日终是迎来有缘之人，可继我衣钵，续我传承。”高台之上，缓缓浮现出一缕半透明的仙魂，白衣如雪仙气萦绕，“看破炉中乾坤之人，有资格入我门中。我乃丹阳宗主金仙碧涛之残魂，五万年来你是唯一一个进入我仙宫之人，现将此丹宗传承予你。忘你修心修道，早成正果。”

"The Heavens have permitted that you and I cross paths today — someone who can take over the mantle and continue my heritage." Slowly, a translucent immortal soul appeared on the stage. A white cloud of Immortal Qi surrounded him. "He who sees through the fiery furnace has earned his right to enter this pavilion. I am the Sect Master of the Dan Yang Sect, the remnant soul of Golden Immortal Bitao. You are the first one who has entered my Immortal Pavilion in 50,000 years. I will pass my Alchemical Sect down to you. May you bear fruit in cultivating your heart and mind."
“容天不弃，今日终是迎来有缘之人，可继我衣钵，续我传承，看破炉中……”
"The Heavens have permitted that you and I cross paths today — someone who can take over the mantle and continue my heritage. He who sees through the fiery furnace…"
“对……禀报大总管，禀报刑堂，将江逸处死……”
"Right... report this to the Chief Supervisor, report to the Disciplinary Court, and punish Jiang Yi by giving him the death penalty..."
“对了……武殿！去武殿内做陪练去！这样不仅可以赚些银钱，还说不定能遇见姬小姐！”
"Right... The Martial Arts Hall! I should go to the Martial Arts Hall and be a sparring partner! Like that, not only can I make some money, I might even be able to meet Young Mistress Ji!"
“对了。”奚秋突然想起一件事，“不知上青界……”
"Oh, yes," Xi Qiu suddenly recalled something. "Was the Upper Azure World…"
“对了。”沈萤想到了什么，转过头直直的看向郁海珩，慢慢的，仿佛一字一句开口，“不管你以后查到什么，小绿也好，小红也好。她们以前是什么人我不管，但以后都是我无敌派的妹子，不能随便抓！我脾气不好，你要记住了。”

"Right." Shen Ying thought of something, turned over to look at Yu Hai Heng, and slowly said, "No matter what you find out in the future about Litte green or Little red, I do not care about their pasts, but they are my girls of the Invincible Sect, you cannot just catch them like that! My temper is not good, you better remember that."
“对了。”沈萤突然加了一句，“那个渣男跟欺负烤鸡妹子的那两个人认识。”
"That's right," Shen Ying suddenly added. "That scum was friends with the two people who bullied Roasted Chicken Gal."
“对了沈萤，这只灵兽叫啥？”孤月顺口问道。
"By the way, Shen Ying, what's this spirit beast called?" asked Lonemoon casually.
“对了！”
"Oh, that's right!"
“对了！”她枕在桌上的脑袋歪了歪，“那人好像还留了个东西……”
"By the way!" She tilted her head, which had been resting on the table. "That person seemed to have left something behind..."
“对了，上次让你带的东西呢？带了吗？”她直接拉过它手里的筐，找了起来。
"Oh right, did you bring the item that I requested for previously? Did you bring it along?" She simply took over the basket from its hands and started looking through it.
“对了，你叫什么？”
"Oh yes, what’s your name?"
“对了，你跟那易峰很熟吗？”孤月放下手里炒的最后一碟菜问。
"By the way, are you close to Yi Feng?" asked Lonemoon. Having finished cooking, Lonemoon placed the last dish on the table.
“对了，先去丹药房领丹药！”
"Right, off to the Elixir Room to retrieve an elixir!"
“对了，刚师叔旁边似乎……站了个人，你们可认识？”
"Oh right, just now beside Uncle Master… there seemed to be someone, do any of you know?"
“对了，园长叫它灵主来着。”
"And the Director called him Spirit Master."
“对了，我还在河边给你们留了只鸡呢，你们看到没有？”她可是个好老板。
"Right, I even left a chicken by the shore for both of you, did you guys see it?" She was certainly a good boss.
“对了，那个谁……你家还有多远？”她回头看向姓陆的修士。
"By the way, whatever you’re called… how much further to your house?" She looked back at the cultivator named Lu.
“对了，黑色元力全消耗完了，我得赶紧提炼一些，随时备用。还有昨日回炉蓝色元力也消耗的太多了，得补上一些。”

"Oh yes, I have consumed all of my black essence force. I have to hurry and refine more, so I can use it at any time. Additionally, I consumed too much blue essence force during the reheating yesterday—I have to make up for that loss."
“对呀！这都十六天了。”
"That's right! Almost sixteen days."
“对呀，可水灵了，你瞧这颜色，这水份。我们族里最爱吃了。”
“That's right, and as juicy as it is tasty too. Just look at the color, the water content. The kind that our races loves to eat most."
“对呀，还有羿清真人。”他也是剑修，比之化神尊者也不差，的确很适合。
"Oh yes, Perfected Yi Qing." He was a sword cultivator himself, comparable to Soul Formation stage Supremacies. He was indeed a good choice.
“对哦。”沈萤赞同的点了点头，“吃饱了才有力气干架嘛。”
"You're right." Shen Ying nodded in agreement. "We need to fill our stomachs so that we have the energy to carry out our task."
“对啊。”不然呢？
"Yes." What about it?
“对啊。”沈萤老实点头，“你是谁？”
"Yes." Shen Ying nodded earnestly, "Who are you?"
“对啊。”那又怎样？
"Yeah, so?"
“对啊！”孤月点了点头，呵呵一笑道，“我没跟你们说吗？我跟羿清都没有收徒的经验，她们修着修着就这样了。所以整个无敌派，除我跟羿清外，所有弟子全是体修。”

"Yes!" exclaimed Lonemoon. He nodded his head and chuckled, "Did I not tell you previously? Yi Qing and I both do not have any experience in accepting disciples. They just became like this while cultivating. Hence for the entire Invincible Sect, other than Yi Qing and me, all of the disciples are body cultivators.
“对啊！”沈萤懒洋洋的点了点头。
"Yes!" Shen Ying nodded lazily in affirmation.
“对啊！”沈萤点头，“你不知道吗？”
“Yeah！”Shen Ying，“You mean you didn;t know？”
“对啊，剑修向来都是苦修之人，如果我们安心留下来，或许不会……”另一名女子也有些动摇道，“我还听闻，前阵子有两位剑修闯入轩辕主家，连轩辕家主都拿他们没办法。他们也是两个人，你说他们会不会就是……”

"You're right. Sword cultivators have always trained the hardest. If we stay behind, maybe we wouldn't-" Another girl also seemed to waver as she interrupted, "I also heard that there were two sword cultivators who recently broke into the Xuan Yuan Family and even that family couldn't do anything to them. There are also two sword cultivators here, so do you think they're-"
“对啊，四五年……”他眼神越加的飘乎，“短短四五年的时间，他就从一个金丹修士，直接升到了化神。连续两次大顿悟。这种话要是说出去，整个三青界，怕是没有人会相信吧。”

"That's right, four or five years..." his eyes glazed over. "In a mere four or five years, he rose from a Golden Core cultivator to a Soul Formation. He went through two epiphanies in a row. If you told anyone in the Upper Azure World about this, nobody would believe you."
“对！江逸立即放了虎哥，否则虎哥出了事，你绝对死路一条！”
"Right! Jiang Yi, let Brother Hu go immediately, otherwise, should something bad happen to Brother Hu, you would definitely only have one end-result - death!"
“对！没错！不能告诉家族！”
"Right! That's right! We can't tell the family clan!"
“对，不是还有个老头没解决吗？反正顺便，买一送一了。”
"Yes. Don't we have another old fogey to deal with? Since it's convenient, I’ll give you guys a buy one get one free service."
“对，大家都知道我界的妖气对他们修为有损，所以他们从不靠近边界林，又怎么会专程守在此处。”

"That's right. Everyone knows that the demonic aura of our realm is damaging to their cultivation, making it rare for them to approach the periphery forest of our realm. Why would they suddenly deploy manpower to guard the borders all of a sudden?"
“对，我要干……”戚橙雨话到一半停住，猛的睁大眼睛，“你……怎么知道？”
"Yes, I am going to…" Qi Chengyu stopped mid-sentence, her eyes widening in surprise. "How did you… know?"
“对，羿清！”她一本正经的道，“我叫羿清。”
"Yes, Yi Qing!" she continued gravely. "My name is Yi Qing."
“封了？那门怎么办？”
Lonemoon asked, "Closed? Then what about the door"
“封印元力对练？”
"Sparring with your essence force sealed off?"
“封印符文已经破解了四百枚了，修炼速度达到原先的十五倍，都可比家族的普通子弟修炼速度了！呼……按这速度增幅下去，等全部封印破解掉，我的修炼速度能增幅到何等恐怖的地步？”

"I've already broken four hundred runic patterns on my seal; my cultivation speed is now 15 times as fast as before, on par with an average descendant in the family! Hah... at this rate, just how terrifyingly fast would my cultivation speed become once the seal breaks completely?"
“封印！”
"The seal!"
“尊者。”羿清回身朝他抱拳点了点头，比起前者来客气有余亲近不足，亲疏立见。
“Supremacy." Yi Qing cupped his fists towards him and nodded. He was far more courteous yet less friendly towards him, drawing a clear line between him and his master.
“尊者好走。”奚秋手抖了一下，还是接了过去，顿时有种无地自容之感，这事本来最无辜的就是他们亲徒，偏偏为了宗门……

"Supremacy, I wish you all the best." Xi Qiu's hands trembled as he received the jade token. He suddenly felt extremely ashamed of himself. The most innocent people in this entire situation were his own disciples. Yet, for the sect…
“尊者尽管放心，我们不惧吃苦。”知道他担心的是什么，郁红上前一步，一脸坚定的道，“世间最苦的事，我们都已经经历过了，还有什么可怕的？”

"Supremacy, don't worry. We aren’t afraid of hardship." Knowing what he was worried about, Yu Hong stepped forward with firm determination and said, "We have already experienced the toughest thing in the world, so what's there to be afraid of?"
“尊者慎言。”羿清猛的一拍桌子，像是真的生了气，“家师知之甚多，不是随便什么人可以置喙的。”说我可以，说我师父不行！

"Supremacy, please choose your words with care." Yi Qing thumped the table fiercely. He seemed provoked. "My master knows a lot, not just anybody can impose judgement on her." You can criticize me, but not my master!
“尊者见谅！”
"Supremacy, please forgive me!"
“尊者误会，我并没有另投师门的打算。”羿清仍旧拒绝。
"Supremacy, you misunderstand. I have no plans to look for another master."
“尊者请回！”羿清眉头一皱，隐隐也有了些火气，“我羿清虽然只是一个金丹，但决不做背叛师门之事。”说完还郑重的朝着沈莹道，“师父放心，徒儿此生都只会是您的徒弟。”

"Supremacy, please leave!" Yi Qing frowned, showing a hint of anger. "I, Yi Qing, though only a Golden Core cultivator, will never do anything to betray my master." And so saying, he turned solemnly to Shen Ying and said, "Master please be assured, I will remain your disciple for the rest of my life."
“尊者，我们原本是打算去中青界冥阴山的。”郁红出口解释道，“冥阴山魔尊与其它魔修不同，虽然修魔却从未行恶事，门下之人也是一样。听闻她曾经跟我们有同样的遭遇，收留了很多我们这样的女子。只是我等身份特殊，也不知她会不会……”

"Supremacy, we wanted to go to the Middle Azure World's Ming Yin Mountain," Yu Hong explained. "Ming Yin Mountain's Fiend Supremacy is different from other Fiendish Cultivators—she has never done anything evil. The disciples in her sect are the same. We heard that she had suffered from the same fate as us a while ago and took in many girls like us. We're just not sure if she would take us in given our special identities…"
“尊者？！”戚橙雨一惊，一脸不敢置信的抬起了头，他这是……打算放过她？
"Supremacy!?" Qi Chengyu was alarmed as she looked up in disbelief. He was… planning on letting her off?
“小奴！”
"Xiaonu!"
“小奴，你一定要坚持住！”
"Xiaonu, you need to hang in there!"
“小奴，你的仇……少爷帮你报了！”
"Xiaonu, young master... has avenged you!"
“小奴，我去去就回。”
"Xiaonu, I'm just heading out quickly and will be back in a jiffy."
“小奴，我在这！”
"Xiaonu, I am over here!"
“小奴，走！”
"Let's go, Xiaonu!"
“小姐姐……”它可怜兮兮的抬起头，习惯性伸手想抱她的大腿。
"Little Missy…" It raised its head pitifully and hugged her thigh out of habit.
“小姐姐……”萝卜不死心的用叶子伸向沈萤，好不委屈。
"Little Missy..." The radish refused to give up. Using its leaves, it reached out for Shen Ying.
“小姐姐，你终于回来了！”刚进屋，穿得跟翡翠似的萝卜就扑了过来，沈萤习惯性的往旁边退开一步，就见那块翡翠径直砸到了后面的孤月身上。

"Little Missy, you are finally back!" Upon entering the house, the radish, who was dressed like a jade, pounced onto Shen Ying who habitually dodged a step to the side. It resulted in that jade-resembling piece smashing directly into the person behind Shen Ying - Lonemoon.
“小姐姐，你说好给我浇……”水字还没有出口，却一眼看到白泽手里的玄灵花。整只萝卜瞬间就炸了，炮仗一样冲了过来，“太过分了，居然把外面的野花花带到这里来，拿开拿开。我家小姐姐是这种野花花可以高攀的吗？”

"Little Big Sister, you said you would water...” Radish did not finish its sentence. It stared blankly at the Black Spirit Blossom in Bai Ze's hands and blew up like a cannon. "This is too much. You've brought wild flowers in here. Take it away, take it away. Do you think my Little Big Sister can be bought over by this wild flower?"
“小姐姐，我化形……哎呀！”他话没说完，突然脚下一拐，绝美的身影一颤，直接摔了下去，咕噜咕噜的一路滚到了三人的脚下。
"Little Missy, I've taken form… Aiya!" But before she could finish, she tripped. Her perfect form fell to the ground and she began to roll toward the group of three, stopping right before their feet.
“小姐姐，我喜欢这个地方！”萝卜挂件从孤月腿上蹦了下来，开心的在萝卜地里打起了滚，它本就是草木灵，自然喜欢木灵气旺盛的地方。

"Little Missy, I like this place!" The radish pendant hopped down from Lonemoon's leg, rolling around happily in the radish land. Being a Vegetation Spirit, it naturally liked places where Wood Spirit Qi was dense.
“小子，你可别乱说。”沈萤还没来得及开口，一边的魔王却吓得一下跳了起来，浑身都是一抖，“谁虎视眈眈，谁要去仙界！我才不稀罕呢！”别在大仙面前乱说啊喂，好歹自己刚帮了他，这小子居然立马恩将仇报，你给我等着！

"Don't spout nonsense , lad!" before Shen Ying could begin, the Devil King jumped and quivered in fear. " Who are you trying to frame? Who covets the Immortal World, who even wants to go to the Immortal World? I couldn't care less for it!" Hey, do not spout nonsense in front of the Great Immortal. After all, I just helped him out of trouble and this lad had the audacity to turn on me right after. Oh, just you wait!
“小小宗门，竟敢伤我轩辕家的人，快交出谋杀三位长老的凶手，不然，我等便血洗了这里！”
"A little sect like yours actually dared to hurt someone from my Xuan Yuan Family. Hand over the three murderers, who killed three of our elders. Otherwise, I will turn this place into a bloodbath!"
“小心！”一直没有开口的白泽，冷声警告了一句。
"Be careful!" Bai Ze, who had been quiet, suddenly warned.
