“小心！”枫影手中的剑顿时就飞了出去，绕着两人转了数圈及时打散了风刃。
"Be careful!" Feng Ying threw his sword toward the girls. The sword flew toward them and circled them a few times, successfully deflecting the wind blades.
“小心！”羿清一个急转，连忙疾退了好几十丈，才躲开那片火焰。回头一看，只见大片大片火焰从地面燃了起来，正从四面八方蔓延过来，片刻之间眼前就已经是一片火海了。

"Be careful!" Turning swiftly around, Yi Qing hurriedly retreated a few feet, barely avoiding the flames. Looking back, he saw huge flames leaping out from the ground, spreading in all directions. Within moments, everything before him was covered in a sea of flames.
“小心！”羿清一把把人给拽了回来，唤出灵剑朝前一挥，凌厉的剑气，朝着荆棘扫了过去，瞬间斩落大片。但下一刻地下却冒出更多的荆棘，朝他们涌来。

"Be careful!" Yi Qing grabbed and hurled him backwards, summoned his spirit sword and swung it down forwards; the swift and fierce brilliance of his sword qi charged towards the thistles and swept across them, severing a huge section. But in the next moment, more thistles grew out from the ground, attacking them.
“小朋友，你继续说。”
"Go on, little one."
“小朋友，我现在要带你回去。但最好先把这事解决先，不然我不好向牛爸爸交待！”她扫视了他一眼，“告诉我，到底怎么回事？谁才是那个……什么安？”

"Little one, I'm now going to bring you back. But first, I'd have to settle this matter in order to account to Father Cow." She glanced over at him and asked, " Now, tell me. What happened? Who's the real...whatever An?"
“小杂碎，哪里跑！”
"Little rascal, where do you think you are going!"
“小杂种，你找死！”
"You bastard, you clearly want to die!"
“小白……兔，加油！”
"Little white... Bunny, you can do it!"
“小白啊。”
"Little White."
“小白，加油！”
"Little white, you can do it!"
“小的是印家门下正丰楼的掌柜。”那人匆匆的介绍了一句，显得有些着急，“是家主让我来请羿掌门，速速前去华元城郁家别院一趟的。”

"I am the shopkeeper of the Yin Family's Zheng Feng Restaurant," he hurriedly introduced. He looked very anxious. "My Family Master instructed me to invite you, Sect Master Yi, to the Yu Family's shed in Huayuan City."
“小绿啊！”沈萤皱了皱眉，直接打断她的话，“没人可以改变过去，你能改变的只有未来。我就觉得你很好，你也要觉得自己好，那么别人才会觉得你好。人要先学会爱自己，才能去爱别人。”

"Little Green!" Shen Ying frowned and interrupted her immediately. "No one can change their past but you can change your future. I think you're great. You need to think you're great too so that other people will think you're great. You must learn to love yourself before you can love others."
“小绿妹子上场了。”沈萤指了指场中，突然出声道。
"Little Green Sister is up," Shen Ying pointed to the stage.
“小绿，交给你！”沈萤招了招手道，“揍到说为止！”
"Little Green, you handle this!" Shen Ying waved. "Hit him until he talks!"
“小蓝，加油！”
"Little blue, you can do it!"
“小说？”
"Novel?"
“小野种，你好卑鄙！”
"Little bastard, you are so despicable!"
“小野种，你，你竟敢用虎哥当武器？”
"You little bastard, you, how you dare to use Brother Hu as a weapon?"
“小野种，看招……”
"Little bastard, take this..."
“小黑，看看他啥毛病？”昨天还好好的个孩子，怎么突然就精神分裂了。
"Blacky, go check on him." How could a child just suffer a mental breakdown all of a sudden when he was in a pink of health yesterday?
“小黑？”什么鬼？“等等，你干嘛？”
"Blacky?" What the hell? "Hold on, what are you doing?"
“少主和思羽，还有郁红姑娘，此刻就在郁家！”
"Young Master, Si Yu, and Miss Yu Hong are all at the Yu Family's house!"
“少年？”
"A young man? "
“少爷加油！”
"Young Master, all the best!"
“少爷！您有什么吩咐？”刘管事连忙掉头望着马飞，却看到一双阴冷得让人不寒而栗的眸子。
"Young Master! Do you have any instructions?" Housekeeper Liu hastily looked aback at Ma Fei, and was met with a pair of cold and cruel eyes that sent shudders down his spine.
“少爷，你别冲动呀，我可是听说风月楼背后势力很强大的，你不是他们对手！”
"Young Master, please don't be impulsive! I heard that the forces behind the people of Fengyue Brothel are very powerful—you're not their match at all!"
“少爷，你在哪？”
"Young Master, where are you?"
“少爷，你要去哪啊？”
"Young Master, where are you going?"
“少爷，少爷，你没事吧！”
"Young Master, Young Master, are you alright?"
“少爷，春芽说南街那边有个饭庄需要人洗碗，我想和她……”江逸回到家中扒着饭菜，江小奴坐在一边突然诺诺低声说道。

"Young Master, Chunya mentioned that someone is needed at the restaurant at South Street to wash dishes, I am thinking of going with her to..." Jiang Yi had returned home and was having his meal when Jiang Xiaonu, who was sitting beside him, suddenly spoke in a low voice.
“少爷，这真的是紫金吗？我不是在做梦吧？还有……少爷你的封印真的能破开吗？”
"Young Master, is this real purple gold? I'm not dreaming, am I? And... Young Master, can your seal really be broken?"
“少给我装蒜！”掌柜瞪了他一眼，气冲冲的道，“刚刚所有修士都看到了，你们三个就是故意跑掉的。今日我若是不追，你们难道还会回来结账不成？”

"Stop acting!" The owner glared at him and shouted, "All the cultivators saw what you did earlier. The three of you ran away on purpose. If I didn't chase after you, would you have come back to foot the bill?"
“就从此地开始搜寻吧。”他直接飞了下去，指着密林道，“此地灵气浓郁，应该会有十阶以上的灵兽存在。”

"Let's start our search from here,” he descended toward the island and pointed at the dense forest. "There is thick spirit Qi on this island. We should be able to find spirit beasts minimally in their tenth-stage."
“就你这实力，还想杀我？小爷还没认真打呢！”
"With your strength and you want to kill me? I have not yet begun to fight!"
“就是刚刚进魔界的小孩，一刻钟前。”
“The kid that recently entered the Demon Realm, 15 minutes ago. ”
“就是印家少主，印元飞。”
"The Young Master of the Yin Family, Yin Yuanfei."
“就是就是，他们到底是什么门派，怎么尽收些丑八怪。”
"That's right, which sect that takes in such hideous characters are they from?"
“就是师父原来住的那个茅屋啊。”羿清愣了一下，“师父不打算回去吗？”
"The straw cottage that you were living in." Yi Qing hesitated. "Master, are you not planning to return there?"
“就是知道才想不明白啊？”他一脸便秘的样子，“你老实说，那些根本就是忽悠人的吧。”
"I knew what you were talking about, that's why I don't understand." Lonemoon was utterly confused. "Tell me honestly: you were just bluffing, weren't you?"
“就是！”豹王也愤愤不平道，“这么多年都这样过来了，哪个妖没有吃过个把凡人，三宗六派怎么会突然发难？我觉得不是他们。”

"Isn't that so!" the Panther Monarch agreed indignantly. "All these years, which demon has never devoured a mortal before? Why would the Six Schools Three Sects suddenly make things difficult for us? I don't think it is them."
“就是，一个小小的中青界而已。何必让我等三人一起镇守。领的资源又少，修为停滞这么久，回去还不定被其它人怎么嘲笑。”

"That's right, this is just a tiny Middle Azure World. Why would it require the three of us to guard it? The resources we received were so little, and our cultivation has also been stagnant for so long. We may be mocked by the rest when we return."
“就是，就是！”印元飞也似是反应过来，反驳道，“而且思羽姑娘是体修，我可从未曾听说郁家有过体修？”
"Yes, yes!" Yin Yuanfei seemed to finally react and rebutted, "Moreover Si Yu is a body cultivator, I have never heard of Yu Family having body cultivators?"
“就是，江逸，再敢动手，别怪我们出手了！”
"That's right. Jiang Yi, if you dare make another move then don't blame us for being harsh!"
“居然是宝器！这人看来在马家地位不低啊。”
"An actual Treasured Artifact! It seems that this man has quite a high status in the Ma Family."
“居然有人可以这么快突破心魔，成功进入第一层。”
"Someone actually managed to defeat the mental demons and make it to the first level."
“居然能撑到现在，兴许还真有升仙的资质。可惜……”他叹了一声，话语里却没有半分怜惜的意思，反正带着一股说不出的阴冷。
"He can hold on up till now. He indeed has the potential to become a Perfected Immortal. What a pity..." he sighed, but his tone was anything but sympathetic. Instead, it seemed frighteningly cold.
“屠了他们又怎样？”血狐神情越加的疯狂，似是想到了什么，牙关紧咬眼里的杀意都快溢出来了，“那群愚蠢的凡人，早就该死了！是他们……是他们害死了我的雪儿。说什么人妖殊途？都是放屁！我跟雪儿是真心相爱，干他们何事？雪儿是我一生所爱，却因他们而死，他们就应该为此偿命！”

"So what if I slaughter them?" The expression on the blood fox grew increasingly deranged. Seemingly thinking of something, he clenched his teeth and the murderous intent in his eyes intensified. "That stupid bunch of mortals, they should have died long ago! They… they were the ones who killed my Snow Flake, claiming that human and demons couldn't be together. All a bunch of bullshit! Snow Flake and I really loved each other, what business was it of theirs? Snow Flake was the love of my life, and she died because of them, so they should pay for what they did!"
“工资！”
"Here, salary!"
“已经很晚了，快回去睡觉吧？”她摸了摸它的兔毛，“你不是要生小兔子了吗？回去早点休息。”
"It's already late, quickly go back and sleep?" She touched its rabbit fur and said, "Aren't you going to make more rabbit babies? Get back early and have a good rest."
“师……父。”羿清走了过去，看向她身后。视线交汇，空中仿佛响过嗞啦啦的电光声。
"Master..." Yi Qing walked toward her, glancing at the person behind her. They locked eyes and the air between them felt as if it were charged with static.
“师……父？”羿清却愣愣的看着她手里的剑，明明这把剑已经断了，明明这已经不能算是武器，“为什么……”为什么师父还能使出那么厉害的招式。
"Mas…ter?" Yi Qing stared at the sword in her hand. The sword had been broken — it couldn't be used as a weapon. "How…" How did Master manage to do something so incredible with a broken sword?
“师兄且慢！”一边的持法堂堂主奚辰连忙拦住了人，“依我看，来人未必是那魔头。”
"Senior Brother, wait!" Disciplinary Hall Master Xi Chen held him back hastily. "In my opinion, this person might not be that fiend."
“师兄可听说，前阵子魔修芮糜的万魔窟突然现世之事？”
"Senior Brother, have you heard the news recently about fiendish cultivator Rui Mi's Myriad Fiend Den’s sudden resurgence?"
“师兄！”任翼一惊，连忙扣住他另一只手的脉，一探之下眼睛猛的暴睁，“师兄……你的金丹！！怎么会？你何时受的重伤？”

"Senior Brother!" Shocked, Ren Yi quickly took his pulse from the other arm. After checking his pulse, Ren Yi's eyes widened. "Senior Brother… your Golden Core! How could it? When did you sustain such serious injuries?"
“师兄！”任翼不敢置信的看着这个突然改变主意的人。
"Senior Brother!" Ren Yi was stunned at seeing this sudden change in attitude.
“师兄！”青尹全无防备，想要躲已经来不及，只能一脸不敢置信在满天的剑意中化为灰烬。而青亦已经转身消失在了墙内，墙面也恢复成了原本的样子。

"Senior Brother!" Qing Yin was defenseless and did not have the time to dodge. All that was left was his face of disbelief as he turned into ashes under the attacking sword intent. Qing Yi on the other hand had already disappeared behind the wall, which had returned to its original state.
“师兄，你到底什么意思？”刚飞出百里距离，任翼再也忍不住甩开了对方，“这么好的机会，你居然就这么放走了。以我们的姿质，错过了这次，或许再没结婴的机会！”

"Senior Brother, what was all that about?" After flying for 50km, Ren Yi could no longer hold it in and he flung him aside. "It was such a good opportunity, and you just let it go like that. With our talents, once we miss this chance, we may never be able to complete our Nascent Soul Formation!"
“师兄，别跟她废话了。瞧她这貌样明显就是受了重伤，就算我们想怎么样，她又能耐我们何？”那人直直的看向戚橙雨，眼神却越来越火热，仿佛要将人吞吃进去一般，“听说她可是难得一见的纯阴之体。与其双修，能让修为大涨。以前她是元婴魔尊，我们动不了，现在她重伤在身，你还磨叽什么？还不赶紧采补了她！”

"Senior Brother, don't waste your time speaking nonsense with her. Look at her state now, she is obviously seriously wounded. Even if we were to do anything, what could she do to us?" The other person stared directly at Qi Chengyu and the look in their eyes grew hot, as if ready to swallow her whole. "I heard that she has a body of pure Yin. Cultivating with that can allow our cultivation to rise dramatically. She was previously a Nascent Soul Fiend Supremacy, and we couldn't touch her, but now she is seriously wounded. What are you waiting for? Quickly harvest her!"
“师兄，这到底是……”持法堂堂主奚辰上前一步，急声问。
"Senior Brother, this is…" Disciplinary Hall Master Xi Chen stepped forward and asked hurriedly.
“师兄？”任翼一愣。
"Senior Brother?" Ren Yi was taken aback.
“师兄？”孤月不敢置信的睁大了眼睛，“你也这么认为!”
"Senior Brother?" Lonemoon could not believe his ears. His eyes widened as he asked, "Even you think so?"
“师叔……”他去的确是最合适的。
"Uncle-Master…" Lonemoon was right to say that he was in the best position to go.
“师叔无需过谦，此次多愧师叔相助，原来之前这鬼王迟迟不出来，是太害怕师叔的原故。”
"Uncle Master, you need not be so humble. It was all thanks to your help. The Ghost King did not come out all this while because it was too afraid of Uncle Master."
“师叔说得对，之前是我太高估了这鬼王，没想到在师叔的威压之下，它居然连站都站不起来了。”
"Uncle Master was right. Previously, I overestimated this Ghost King. Who would have known that under the coercion of Uncle Master, it could not even stand up."
“师叔！”
"Uncle-Master!"
"Uncle-Master!" x N!
“师叔！”奚秋抱拳行了个礼，回头指向里面道，“您总算来了，快看看这噬魂幡。”
"Uncle-Master!" Xi Qiu cupped his fists and bowed. He turned and pointed in, "You are finally here, come and have a look at this Soul Devouring Gonfalon."
“师叔，刚刚我们四人已经试过了，无论用什么术法。这鬼旗都没有反应，不知是何故？”奚秋解释。
"Uncle Master, the four of us have just tried the same thing. No matter what spell we used, this ghost flag still did not respond. I wonder why." Xi Qiu elaborated.
“师叔，噬魂幡……”要怎么办？
"Uncle Master, the Soul Devouring Gonfalon…" What now?
“师叔，快将幡旗放回阵里，不能让鬼王的声音传出去！”
"Uncle Master, quickly place the gonfalon back into the array. We must not let the Ghost King's sound attack be transmitted!"
“师叔，那这鬼王……”奚秋急唤了一声。
"Uncle Master, that Ghost King…" Xi Qiu urgently called out.
“师叔？”奚秋疑惑的看了他一眼。
"Uncle-Master?" Xi Qiu looked at him quizzically.
“师姐！”思羽连忙冲过去，小心翼翼想扶起了地上的人。
"Senior Sister!" Si Yu quickly rushed over and heped her up carefully.
“师姐！”还好思羽反应快，转身往她身边跑去，打落了致命的几剑。
"Senior Sister!" Thankfully, Si Yu reacted quickly. She turned and ran to Yu Hong's side, shielding her from several swords.
“师姐，发生什么事了？”她们朝着刚飞回来的郁红等人围了上去。
"Senior Sister, what happened?" They crowded around Yu Hong and the others who had just returned.
“师弟！”
"Junior Brother!"
"Master..."
“师父……”他正要坐起来，身上却传来一阵撕裂感。
"Master..." He was about to sit up when he felt a tearing pain in his body.
“师父……”他突然转头看向沈萤，眼神分外的坚定起来，“请将此人交给我一人处理，徒儿定不辱师门。”
"Master…" He suddenly turned around and looked at Shen Ying, his expression one of conviction. "Please let me handle this man. I will not fail you, Master."
“师父……”唯一冷静的羿清开口提醒，“她再不停手，那人就要被打死了。”而且她气昏了头，貌似听不到别人的话了。

"Master…" Only Yi Qing remained calm as he reminded, "If she don't stop, that man is going to be beaten to death." What’s more, her head was filled with anger, so she most likely would not listen to anyone’s words.
“师父……”眼着山洞已经被切成了一堆碎石，羿清这才飞了回来，“好了！”没有陷阱了。
"Master…" Seeing that the cave had been chopped into a pile of gravel, Yi Qing had flown back. "Okay!" No more traps.
“师父……”羿清一愣，顿时明白了她的意思。咬了咬牙，回头瞪了众人一眼，师父想把轩辕家的注意力，都转移到她身上，以解玄天宗的危机吗？

"Master…" Yi Qing hesitated. After a moment, he understood what she meant. He gritted his teeth and turned around to glare at the crowd behind him. His master had attempted to distract the Xuan Yuan Family — she wanted to turn the attention to herself to help the Blackheaven Sect avert disaster.
“师父……”羿清一脸愧疚，与芮糜那一战，能保住命都已经是个奇迹了，他是真的忘了储物袋丢了的事，“都是弟子的错，若不是我着急来送噬魂幡，也不会害得师父连灵石也没带。”

"Master…" Yi Qing was filled with guilt. After the battle with Rui Mi, it was already a miracle to have kept himself alive; he had truly forgotten about losing the storage bag. "It's all my fault, if I had not rushed to deliver the Soul Devouring Gonfalon, I would not have caused Master to not bring any spirit stones."
“师父……”羿清一脸的愧疚，“外事堂的人说，我们本月灵米的数额已经……领完了。”
"Master…" Looking all guilty, Yi Qing said, "The people from the Outer Affairs Hall said that we have already hit… the limit for spirit rice collection this month."
“师父……”羿清动了动，转头看向旁边的沈萤，眼里满满都是愧疚和不甘，“对不起，徒儿学艺不精……没有赢……过他。”
"Master…" Yi Qing twitched, turning to face Shen Ying. His eyes were filled with guilt as he apologised, "I'm sorry. Your disciple has failed to take after you… I didn't… win against him."
“师父……”羿清擦掉嘴角的血迹，抬头看向空中的青亦，“那人……不是化神期！”刚刚那道气息，不会是化神修士的。

"Master…" Yi Qing wiped off the blood at the corner of his mouth, and looked up towards Qing Yi who was in the air. "That person… is not at the Soul Formation stage!" That aura definitely did not belong to that of a Soul Formation cultivator.
“师父……”羿清放下手中刚炒完的菜，难得没有继续扎进厨房里，反正坐了下来，看向沈萤道，“这些天，您看出来了吗？”
“Master……”Yi Qing put aside the dish he just cooked, sat down, and looked at Shen Ying as he said “Did you manage to spot anything these few days?”
“师父……”羿清眉头紧了紧，翻动了几下锅铲，才沉声道，“他明显对您别有用心，您可千万别被他骗了。”
"Master..." Yi Qing frowned and stirred the contents of the wok. ”He is obviously spending extra effort to please you; please don't be so easily bought over."
“师父……”羿清脸已经黑成了锅底，一把夺过了郁红手里的碗，一字一句义正词辞的道，“您从来不吃甜豆腐脑的！”
"Master…" Yi Qing's face was already as black as the bottom of a pot. He snatched over the bowl from Yu Hong and pointed out sternly, "You never eat sweet beancurd!"
“师父……”羿清鼻子一酸，满心的感动无处安放，师父果真是大善之人，此生无愧入师门。
"Master…" Yi Qing felt a lump in his throat — he was extremely touched. Master was indeed a person with great kindness; he felt no regrets in following under her wing.
“师父……它是？”羿清愣了愣，残魂本来就不宜察觉，再加上这里满殿的霞光仙气，他们还真没发现殿中原来还有一丝残魂。

"Master… he is…?" Yi Qing questioned. Remnant souls were not normally that easy to detect. Given that this hall was filled with multi-colored Immortal Qi, it was even more difficult to spot the remnant soul.
“师父……放……心！无妨！”
"Master… Do… not… worry! It's alright!"
“师父……这不能吃。”羿清一脸为难的回答。
"Master... this beast can't be eaten," Yi Qing painfully replied.
“师父。”洗完碗出来的羿清突然开口。
"Master." Yi Qing, who had emerged from the kitchen after doing the dishes, suddenly spoke.
“师父。”羿清上前一步提议道，“这洞看着不深，不如我用剑阵逼它出来。”
"Master." Yi Qing stepped forward with a proposal. "This cave doesn't look deep, why not let me force it out using a sword array."
“师父。”羿清上前一步解释道，“向来高阶凶兽旁边，必有异宝。如今此兽已死，也就是说它守着的宝物，已经成了无主之物。”
"Master," Yi Qing began to explain, "usually, where there are high-level beasts, there would be treasure. Now that this beast is dead, its treasures will be unguarded. They're free for our taking."
“师父。”羿清从顿悟中醒来的时候，沈萤已经睡了个午觉起来了，“多谢师父指点，弟子修为才得以小进。”
"Master," Yi Qing called out after having recovered from his epiphany. Shen Ying had already woken up from her nap. "Thank you for your guidance. It helped your disciple make a little progress."
“师父。”羿清快步迎了上来，上下扫了她一遍才松了口气，还好没丢。
"Master." Yi Qing quickly went forwards to greet Shen Ying and looked her over carefully from head to toe, and only after doing so did he heave a sigh of relief. Thank God she had found her way back.
“师父。”羿清没理孤月直接走了回来。
"Master," Yi Qing turned back, ignoring Lonemoon's call.
“师父。”羿清瞅了瞅旁边的人，犹豫了一下，还是忍不住问出了口，“不知您与尊者在商量何事？弟子可有打挠？”莫非孤月仍是对师父贼心不死，想拜师？

"Master." Yi Qing glanced at the person beside him and hesitated for a moment before spouting out, "Did you and the Supremacy have something to discuss? Did I interrupt the discussion?" Could Lonemoon still be insistent in wanting to become my master's disciple?
“师父。”羿清第一个迎了上来，刚要走近却脚步一顿，看着她手上的人，“这是……”怎么多了个婴儿？
"Master." Yi Qing was the first to welcome them but as she came closer to see who he'd brought along, she was stumped. "This...", where did this other Infant come from
“师父。”羿清默默上前一步提醒道，“金子对于修士来说是没有任何意思的。”
"Master." Yi Qing silently stepped forward with a reminder, "Gold holds no meaning for cultivators."
“师父不是说吃饭要准时准点吗?”
"Master, didn't you say you want to have meals at fixed timings?"
“师父不用为我忧心。”羿清一边吐着血一边急声开口道，“是我自愿运功封住噬魂幡的，与它人无关。能在死前……拜在师父门下，羿清……余愿足矣！”

"Master, you need not worry about me," said Yi Qing hurriedly, vomiting blood at the same time. "I willingly drew out my power to seal the Soul Devouring Gonfalon, it does not concern anyone else. To die after… being accepted under your wing, I… can die with no regrets!"
“师父不用担心，我的伤的确是好了。”羿清皱了皱眉，放下手里新炒的菜道，“只是经过塔内那一战，感觉此前已经巩固的修为有所松动，想闭关参详，冲击一下修为。”

"Don't worry, Master, I have more or less recovered," Yi Qing frowned. He placed a new dish on the table and continued, "It's just that after that battle in the pagoda, I've been feeling like my cultivation has deteriorated. I want to lock myself up to assess my situation and work on my cultivation."
“师父且慢！”羿清深吸了一口气，用从未有过的认真表情看向沈萤道，“请恕弟子愚顿，还未参透师父此招的用意。”

"Master, wait!” Yi Qing took a deep breath and looked at Shen Ying with an expression of earnestness such as he had never shown before. "Please forgive your disciple's ignorance, I have yet to understand the intent behind this move of Master's."
“师父为什么还能用这把剑？”他眼里满满都是求知欲，这剑明明已经废了，无论谁都不可能用出任何剑招的，“徒儿想知道，我到底还有哪里不足？”

"Master, how are you still able to use this sword?" His eyes reflected a hunger for knowledge. He had thought the sword was useless. Nobody would have been able to use it to do anything. "Your disciple wants to know where he is lacking."
“师父你看，牛爸爸也这么说！”羿清用力点了点头，第一次响应孤月的话，“师父你要三思啊。”
"Look, Master, even Father Niu says so! Yi Qing nodded furiously. This was the first time he agreed with something Lonemoon said. "Master, you need to reconsider."
“师父你稍等，马上就好。”他一边生火，一边把储物袋里的灵兽肉往外掏，“这里仍旧是玄天宗范围，难有灵兽出没，不过东方的集市上就有传送阵，只要过了那传送阵，再经三日我们就可以回到茅屋了。”

"Master, please wait here. Lunch will be ready in a second.” He started a fire while he took the remaining spirit beast meat out from his storage bag. "We're still in Blackheaven Sect's territory so it's unlikely we'll be able to find any spirit beasts. The town in the east has transportation arrays. As soon as we cross the transportation array, we should take no more than three days to get back to the straw cottage.”
“师父只是……懒得反抗！”
"Master was just… too lazy to resist!"
“师父可否告知徒儿，上次与我交手的魔修芮糜在何处？”他皱了皱眉，接着道，“他以活人魂魄祭练噬魂幡，手上血债累累。而且他修行的是极为阴毒的魔功，全身带有巨毒。”

"Can Master reveal the whereabouts of Rui Mi, the fiendish cultivator, the one I had fought with?" He frowned and continued on, "He used the souls of living mortals as sacrifice to the Soul Devouring Gonfalon. A great debt of blood is on his hands. Not only that, his whole body is covered in venom from cultivating an extremely vicious fiendish technique."
“师父可是担心，不知我现在剑术水平如何？”见她久久不回羿清猜测，“是羿清疏忽了，不如我们换个场地，我演示给师父看。您再从旁指导如何？”

"Master, are you worried about my current level of swordsmanship?" guessed Yi Qing, seeing that she did not reply for a while. "It's my negligence, how about we change location and I can demonstrate for Master to see. Perhaps you can then guide me from the side?"
“师父可是没带趁手的兵器？”羿清赶忙把手里的灵剑递给了她，“是徒儿疏忽，要不先用我的吧。”
"Master doesn't have a weapon on hand?" Yi Qing quickly passed her the spirit sword in his hand. "Excuse my oversight, please use mine for the moment."
“师父已经用玄灵花，助你打开界门了。”离我师父远点小婊砸！“界门开启时间有限，道友还是尽快出发的好。”快滚！

"Master has already used the Black Spirit Blossom to help you open the realm gate." Stay away from my master, you little bastard! "The realm gate only stays open for a liimited time. Fellow Daoist, you best be going now." Get lost!
“师父您……忘了？”羿清试探的问。
"Master, you… don't remember?" asked Yi Qing.
“师父我去吧！”羿清脸色一沉，上前一步道，“这挑战之地也就一日的路程，弟子有信心可以取胜。”
"Master, let me go!" With a serious expression, Yi Qing stepped forward and said, "This challenge venue is only a day's journey away. I am confident that I can win."
“师父放心。”他直接站了起来，“我这就去跟他们说清楚，当日力战轩辕家的人其实是师父，我们其实根本就没有进入轩辕家后殿。”说完转身就打算下楼与那些议论的人解释。

"Rest assured, Master." He stood up. "I will go and clear up the misunderstanding. It was actually Master who fought off the people from the Xuan Yuan Family, we did not even enter the back of their hall." He then turned and intended to go downstairs to explain to those people who were in the middle of discussion.
“师父放心，很快的。”羿清一本正经的加了一句，顺便一脸忌惮的扫了一眼满桌子的菜，一道道的看完，神情才松了松，越加冷笑道，“哼，就这样的菜，也敢做给师父吃！”

"Rest assured, Master, it will be done very quick," Yi Qing added another line earnestly as he carefully scanned the table full of dishes at the same time. After scanning each and every one of them, his expression finally relaxed before he sneered again. "Hmph. How dare you all make such dishes for Master to eat!"
“师父放心，徒儿不累。”
"Master, do not worry. Your disciple is not tired."
“师父放心，过两天就到门派分发奉例的日子，到时弟子就可以领到灵石了。”羿清立马宽慰道，“而且玄天宗附近走兽居多，这几天可能要委屈师父吃些肉食，我这就去抓！”

"Master, do not worry. It will be pay day two days later, then your disciple will be able to receive spirit stones." Yi Qing immediately consoled, "Moreover, the Blackheaven Sect has many animals nearby, so for the next few days Master will have to suffer a little and eat their meat. I shall go and catch them now!"
“师父放心，马上就到了。”
"Master, don't worry, we are almost there"
“师父早。”半会羿清才回了一句，有些犹豫的扫了她一眼，“您……醒了？”
"Good morning, Master." Yi Qing could only manage this reply after a long moment. He glanced at her hesitantly. "You're… awake?"
“师父是玄天宗，他们是修仙大派，门下弟子众多。至于好不好客，我就不知道了。”
“Master, they are called the Blackheaven Sect, an established sect for cultivating immortals that has many followers. As for hospitality, I don't know."
“师父是说开宗立派？！”羿清也是一脸的震惊。
"Master, you're saying we should establish a sect?" Yi Qing was also startled.
“师父果然高深莫测！”羿清眼睛一亮，“这一定是什么高阶功法？师父能否再说一遍？”
"Master is indeed unfathomably profound!" Yi Qing's eyes lit up as he said, "This must be some high level cultivation technique? Can Master repeat again?"
“师父没有空闲。”
"Master is not free."
“师父的意思是说，只要能力到了，招式剑法其实都不重要！”
"So what Master is saying is that as long as one has attained the capability, the sword style and technique is not important!"
“师父稍等。”
"Master, please hold on."
“师父稍等，马上就好了。”羿清的锅铲挥舞得更快了。
"Master, wait a moment. It will be ready in a moment." Yi Qing's spatula moved at an even greater speed.
“师父说得对！”
"Master is right!"
“师父说得没错！”
"Master is right!"
“师父说的对！”羿清秒拒+1
Yi Qing followed, "Master is right!"
“师父请在此稍侯，马上就好。”
"Master, please wait here, it will be ready soon."
“师父请讲。”
"Please tell me."
“师父请说。”
"Master, please tell me."
“师父这两个名字取得好！”羿清用力点头，“一听就是可以流芳百世的名字。”
"Master, these names are great!" YI Qing nodded profusely. "They sound like extremely reputable names."
“师父！”他急匆匆飞了下来，转眼看到旁边的戚橙雨，眼神一厉，却没有直接动手，反而快步朝沈萤走了过来，“是徒儿疏忽让师父受此劫难，您没事吧？”

"Master!" He hurriedly flew down and then saw Qi Chengyu at the side. He looked over with caution but did not immediately take action, instead quickly coming over to Shen Ying. "It's my negligence to have let Master experience such a predicament. Are you alright?"
“师父！”大声。
"Master!" He was being so loud.
“师父！”羿清一喜，“您没……”
"Master!" Yi Qing was delighted, "You are not..."
“师父！”羿清一惊，大声提醒。
"Master!" Yi Qing exclaimed, alarmed.
“师父！”羿清一惊，欲言又止。
"Master!" Yi Qing was shocked. He was about to say something, but did not do so in the end.
“师父！”羿清一惊，猛的转头看向她，“您……不会真的想找个道侣吧？”
"Master!" Yi Qing turned to her in shock. "You... You are not really looking for a Dao partner right?"
“师父！”羿清不敢置信的瞪大眼，满脸都写着，你居然帮着这个小婊砸。
"Master!" Yi Qing's eyes widened in disbelief. Betrayal was written all over his face. You're helping this little bastard?
“师父！”羿清也快步走了过来，看了地上的人一眼，“这……是什么人？”为什么会从劫雷之上掉下来？
"Master!" Yi Qing quickly moved toward them and looked at the person on the floor. "Who... is this?" Why did he fall down from what seemed to be the Lightning Tribulation?
“师父！”羿清也连忙把沈萤拉回了剑上，与重新化为黑气的狸猫一起，朝上飞出了这个深坑。
"Master!" Yi Qing quickly pulled Shen Ying back onto the sword. Together with the civet cat - which had by then transformed into black Qi - he flew out of the pit.
“师父！”羿清先一步迎了上去。
"Master" Yi Qing ran toward her, closing the gap quickly.
“师父！”羿清回过了神，转头看了她一眼，眼里有着显而易见的怒气，似是再也忍不住了，退后一步指着白泽，不客气的道，“他说自己叫白泽，但白泽乃是传说中的上古神兽，从未有人见到过，是否真的存在还难说，怎么可能出现在凡界。我看这人来我无敌派，定是不怀好意。”

"Master!" Yi Qing regained her composure and turned to Shen Ying, anger flashing in his eyes. He could take it no longer. He retreated and pointed to Bai Ze, "He calls himself Bai Ze, but Bai Ze is a legendary ancient immortal beast. No one has seen it before and nobody knows if it really exists. How can it appear in the mortal world? I think this person has come to Invincible Sect harbouring evil intentions."
“师父！”羿清突然发出一声惊呼，“这萝卜……”
"Master!" Yi Qing suddenly let out a gasp. "The radish…"
“师父，不可啊！”
"No, Master, don't do it!"
“师父，东边灵气大盛。”羿清抬头看了看右侧，沉声解释道，“应该是有异宝降世。”
"Master, the Spirit Qi in the east has spiked." Yi Qing raised his head and looked to the right, explained in a solemn voice, "There probably is a unique treasure descending into the world."
“师父，人心险恶，总得以防万一。”他一脸认真的道，“之前是徒儿的失误，才让师父第二次被劫走。我决不允许自己再犯第三次错误。”

"Master, the heart of a person is always unpredictable and evil. We need to be careful just in case." He continued seriously, "Previously, it was your disciple’s mistake in letting Master be abducted. I will not let myself make this mistake a third time."
“师父，你忘了金乳酥！”羿清立马补充。
"Master, you forgot the Golden Butter Crumble!"
“师父，别让这些猪食玷污了您高贵的身躯。我马上就给你做新的。”
"Master, do not let these pig feed pollute your noble body. I will immediately make some new ones for you."
“师父，到了。”羿清停了下来，收起了灵剑。
"Master, we have arrived." Yi Qing stopped and put away his spiritual sword.
“师父，在下羿清。”
"Master, I am Yi Qing."
“师父，孤月尊者又来了。”羿清边收拾碗筷，带点犹豫的开口。
"Master, Supremacy Lonemoon is here again." Yi Qing hesitated as he kept the cutlery.
“师父，它没事。”羿清出声解释，“草木灵成形前不染凡世因果，所以雷劫是所有生灵里伤害最小的。”

"Master, it's alright," Yi Qing answered. "Before the Vegetation Spirit takes form, it is unaffected by anything that happens in the natural world. The Lightning Tribulation does the least harm to these spirits."
“师父，已经比完了。”羿清突然开口道。
"Master, the competition is over," Yi Qing suddenly said.
“师父，徒弟第一次做，不知可否符合您的口味。”羿清带些忐忑的问。
"Master, this is my first attempt, I hope it will be to your taste?" Yi Qing asked in nervous anticipation.
“师父，快看后面！”羿清突然出声，“我们出来的地方……”
"Master, look behind!" Yi Qing suddenly cried out. "The place where we came out from…"
“师父，您今天想吃什么？”解决了一件大事，羿清瞬间觉得神清气爽，自动切换到了点菜模式，“上次您带回的那些海鲜，您想吃暴炒、红烧、清蒸还是油闷？”

"Master, what would you like to eat today?" Yi Qing was much more relieved now that Bai Ze and Yi Feng were gone. He felt as if a heavy weight had been lifted off his chest. Now, he was ready to play the chef again. "Earlier, you brought home a lot of seafood. Woud you like to have it deep fried, roasted, steamed or boiled?"
“师父，您所说的存在感是很重要的东西吗？”羿清一脸认真的问。
"Master, are you saying that having presence is something very important?" Yi Qing asked with a face of seriousness.
“师父，您真的要一起去吗？”对于沈萤突如其来的随行决定他有些惊讶。
"Master, you really want to join us?" He was a little surprised by this sudden decision of Shen Ying's.
“师父，想吃点什么？”
"Master, what would you like to eat?"
“师父，我出……”他话到一半突然愣住，这才发现，沈萤身边多了一个人。身着一身白衣，挨得极近，手里还端着个盘子，正一个个把里面的水果递给身边的人。那亮得有些刺眼的眼神，非常的不顺眼。

"Master, I'm out..." he stopped himself mid-sentence when he realised that there was a stranger seated next to Shen Ying. He was dressed in white and was standing extremely close to her with a plate in hand. He was handing the fruits on the plate to Shen Ying. His bright eyes were really... annoying.
“师父，我在筑基之时，就已僻谷。况且凡人的食物，对修行无益，所以我……”他话到一半又停住，似是发现了什么，眼睛一亮道，“莫非师父是想告诉徒儿，食用凡人的食物，也是一种修行？”

"Master, during my Foundation Establishment, I had already been practicing Grain Liberation. Moreover, the food of mortals is not beneficial to cultivation, so I..." He stopped in mid-sentence, as if having realised something. Eyes brightening, he asked, "Is Master telling me that eating the food of mortals is a form of cultivation?" With that said, he happily took up the chopsticks and started eating.
“师父，我明白了！”他压制住因顿悟开始疯长的修为，转身朝着沈萤一拜，然后直接朝对面的青亦又飞了出去。

"Master, I understand now!" Yi Qing suppressed his epiphany as his cultivation level increased rapidly. He turned around to bow to Shen Ying and immediately flew toward Qing Yi, who had been standing opposite from them.
“师父，我觉得这个白泽不是什么简单的人物，还是不要过多接触才是。”羿清用从未有过的严肃神情道。
"Master, I don't think that Bai Ze is a simple charaacter. It would be better if you minimize contact with him," Yi Qing spoke sternly to Shen Ying for the very first time.
“师父，我这就去做饭。”羿清一挥手，瞬间收走了桌上所有的食物，一头扎进了厨房。
"Master, I'll make some rice for you." Yi Qing put away all the food on the stone table and headed into the kitchen.
“师父，接下来我们要去哪？”见两人吃得差不多了，羿清灭了火，习惯性的收拾了一下野餐现场问道。
"Master, where are we going to go now?" Seeing that both of them were almost finished with the food, Yi Qing put out the fire and habitually packed up the picnic.
“师父，是徒儿的错，让您担心了。”
"Master, it's my fault that I have caused you to worry."
“师父，是防御铃。”羿清直接拿出一串一模一样的小铃铛递给她，“我昨晚连夜练出来的防御法器，可以挡下元婴修士全力一击。”

"Master, it's the Defense Bells." Yi Qing immediately took out a string of small bells which all looked exactly the same and handed them to her. "I pulled an all nighter to refine these defense Dharma artifacts last night. They will be able to withstand a full attack from a Nascent Soul cultivator."
“师父，此去最近的市集，估计还要两个时辰。”他看了看前方，提议道，“时日不早了，不如我们在此休息一下，待师父用过午饭再赶路。”
"Master, we are at least four hours from the nearest town." He turned back to face the front and suggested, "It's getting late. Why don't we stop here for lunch before we continue on our way?"
“师父，稍等！”他行了个礼，这才快步一头扎进了厨房里，临走还不忘用周身的剑气，把桌上原本的食物毁尸灭迹。

"Master, please wait!" He bowed and then quickly headed into the kitchen. Before going in, he even used the Sword Qi around him to utterly destroy all the original dishes on the table, leaving no trace of them at all.
“师父，要不我还是再去猎几只灵兽吧？”
"Master, shall I still go and hunt a few spirit beasts?"
“师父，还不到午饭的时辰。”羿清一脸不满的看着进来的思羽一动不动，他才不走。
"Master, it's not yet lunch time," Yi Qing stayed rooted at his spot. He glared at Si Yu. No way was he leaving.
“师父，这……”羿清一愣，不是刚从那回来吗？
"Uh, but Master, I..." Yi Qing mumbled. He was confused, did he not just come back from there?
“师父，这个狐妖怎么处置？”
"Master, how should we deal with this fox demon?"
“师父，这就是我平日所用之剑法。”羿清抱拳向着沈萤一拜，直直的看向她，眼睛那叫一个闪亮。
"Master, this is the sword technique I usually use." Yi Qing turned towards Shen Ying, his fists cupped in respect. He looked straight at her, his eyes shining.
“师父？”
"Master?"
“师父？”孤月正打算发飙，一道熟悉的声音响起。
"Master?!" Lonemoon was just about to flip out when a familiar voice rang out.
“师父？”羿清突然轻声唤了一句。
"Master?" Yi Qing called out softly.
“师父？”羿清认真的问，“有何奇怪之处?”
"Master?" Yi Qing asked seriously, "What strange thing did you realise?"
“师父？怎么……”跟在身后的羿清刚要开口，眼睛一扫，也僵住了。
"Master? What's wrong…?" Yi Qing, who was behind her, was about to ask what the matter was when he too froze after seeing the sign.
“带了带了。”兔王连忙点头，“上仙的吩咐，我怎么敢忘？”说着从筐里掏出一堆的肉食，猪羊牛肉都有，“这是我让兔孙们，连夜赶到百里外的凡人镇人上弄的，新鲜着呢！”

"Yes I brought it, I brought it," the Rabbit Monarch nodded hastily. "How could I dare forget instructions from the Exalted Immortal?" He took out a bunch of meats from the basket which included pork, lamb and beef. "These are what I made my rabbit grandchildren rush throughout the night to the mortal town beyond fifty thousand meters to get. They are still fresh!"
“带路。”
"Lead the way."
“干哈！”沈萤猛的转头过来，杀气（起床气）四溢ing……
"What!” Shen Ying suddenly turned her head forcefully. A killing vibe, or rather a 'being-disturbed in-her-sleep' vibe, filled the entire atmosphere.
“干嘛一定要加入？”沈萤问，“自己修练自己的不行吗？”
"Why must we join them?" Shen Ying asked. "Why can't we work on cultivating ourselves?"
“干嘛不走了？”沈萤伸手戳了戳身前的人。
"Why are you not moving?" Shen Ying stretched out her hand to poke the person in front of her.
“干嘛，还要我开花？”
"What, do you want me to flower?"
“干嘛？”
"What for?"
“干嘛？”孤月皱了皱眉，却还是挥手在石桌上唤出了纸笔。
"What for?" Lonemoon frowned. Nevertheless, he took out a piece of paper and a pen and placed them on the stone table.
“干嘛？”想赶他走，吃独食啊？
"What?" Was she going to chase him away so she could have everything?
“干嘛？”沈萤一脸莫名，“你要当素菜家族的萝卜？”
"What are you doing?" Shen Ying asked, confused. "You want to be the Vegetable Family's radish?"
“干嘛？她能去，我不能去吗？”不带这么差别对待的，“本尊是看你们此行危险，好心来保护这些小弟子的，不行啊？”人都走了，他多无聊。

"Why do you ask? If she can go, why can't I?" Such discrimination could not be tolerated. "I've come along to protect the both of you as I think that this expedition is going to be dangerous." If both of them left, he would be bored to death.
“并非如此！”奚秋连忙解释道，“只是不知道为何，这幡中的恶鬼就算被是阵法中的灵气侵蚀，却不曾从这幡中出来，故此无法完全净化。”

"No, that is not the case!" Xi Qiu quickly explained, "But we are not sure why the demon souls never came out of this gonfalon even when their Spirit Qi was eroded by the array formation, which was why they could not be completely purged."
“幻影拳！”
"Phantom Punch!"
“应该……想吧？”沈萤歪了歪头，仍是那副万事不上心的散漫样。
"I think… so?" Shen Ying cocked her head to one side, still wearing that nonchalant expression of hers.
“应该了解啥？”
"What do I need to understand?"
“应该就是。”孤月点头，“听说上青界四大世家之中，有一个世家的修士大多都是专门练制丹药的丹修。这个世家的至宝就是千叶草木灵，也是世间唯一一株。”

"I think so." Lonemoon nodded. "I've heard that among the top four aristocratic families in the Upper Azure World, there is one that specialises in refining pills. The cultivators from that family are mostly core cultivators who specialise in refining pills. The family owns the only Thousand Leaves Vegetation Spirit in the world and it's their treasure."
“应该是吧，不然他这么拼命干嘛？”孤月随口回了句。
"Probably, why would it risk its life otherwise?" Lonemoon replied.
“应该是有人倒霉遇到凶兽了。”旁边的青岚回答，“看这动静，多半就是这片树林的兽王，少说也是十二阶。”
"It looks like someone got unlucky and met with a beast," Qing Lan replied. "From what we've seen, most of the beasts in this realm are at least twelfth-level beasts, if not beast kings."
“应该是炉内的储药格。”羿清指了指练丹炉的右侧，那里的确有个打开的格子。
"It's probably the medicine storage compartment in the cauldron." Yi Qing pointed at the right side of the elixir-refining cauldron. There was indeed an open compartment there.
“应该的，应该的。”兔王讨好的笑了笑，这才提着兔胆儿，说出自己的目的，“那么……以后我族进出妖界，能不能请您……高抬贵手，不杀？”

"It's only right to do so," said the Rabbit Monarch with a fawning smile. Only then did it muster the bit of its rabbit guts to mention its motive. "Then… the next time we rabbits leave the Demon Realm, is it possible for you to… spare them?"
“应该的，应该的！”两兔子抖了抖耳朵，转身飞似的告辞了。直到飞出老远才松了口气，还好没遇到大仙。

"Don't mention it. It's our duty!" Shaking their ears, the two rabbits turned and flew off. It wasn't until they had flown some distance away that they heaved a sigh of relief. Thank goodness they hadn't met the Great Immortal.
“应该的，应该的，大仙请！”
"It's my duty. Come this way, Great Immortal!"
“废丹？”
"Useless elixirs?"
“废物！”
"Useless boy!"
“废物，麻利点！”
"Good-for-nothing, be quicker and more efficient!"
“废话。”孤月回头白了他一眼，你也就是遇到跟沈萤无关的问题时，智商才会回归，“刚刚她们中明明有三人都已经结丹，报上来的修练功法却只是一些低阶，甚至有些是散仙都不会去练的功法，谁信？明显一个都没说真话。”

"Of course I know that." Lonemoon rolled his eyes at him. Your intelligence only returns when the matter doesn’t concern Shen Ying. "Just now amongst them, there were already three people who have completed their Core Formation, yet the cultivation techniques they reported are only some low level ones, some of them skills that not even an itinerant cultivator would practice. Who would believe that? Obviously, none of them were speaking the truth."
“废话少说，来战。”他话还没说完，羿清却已经再次朝着空中的人冲了过去，剑招再起又是满天的剑光。
"Stop talking rubbish, let's fight." He had not finished his words, yet Yi Qing was already going towards the person in the air, moving his sword as it shone in the sky.
“建一个门派就我们三个？你别逗了！”孤月白了她一眼道，“开宗立派哪是这么容易的事？你真以为是开店啊，有钱就行！不说别的，我们总得有个地盘吧！这上青界的灵脉都被世家和门派占得差不多了，上哪找灵脉去？除非回青界。”而且中青界也没那么容易找着。

"Establish a sect with just the three of us? Don't be silly!" Lonemoon rolled his eyes. "Do you really think it's so easy to establish a sect? Do you think it's like setting up a shop and all we need is money? All else aside, we need to at least have a place! The spirit veins in the Upper Azure World are all occupied by the aristocratic families and sects. Where are we supposed to find a spirit vein for ourselves? We'd have to return to the Middle Azure World." It was not that easy to find one even in the Middle Azure World.
“开……开花了！”羿清一惊。
"It's... it's flowering!" Yi Qing exclaimed.
“开了。”他话还没说完，沈萤突然说了一句，手指张开，顿时一条指间大小的裂缝就出现在她手心上方。像是停滞的闪电一样，闪着白光，浮在半空。

"It's open." Before Yi Feng could finish, Shen Ying interrupted him. She unclenched her fist and revealed a small crack on her palm. It looked like a bolt of flashing white lightning. The bolt began to float into the air.
“开了！”孤月提醒一句，示意大家后退。
"It's open!" warned Lonemoon, signaling everybody to move back.
“开始吧！”沈萤催促了一句，还赶着回家吃饭呢！
"Let's begin", Shen Ying prompted, " I need to return home for dinner!"
“开席了吗？”沈萤对这种商业互吹没兴趣，直接问主题！
"Has the banquet started?" Shen Ying was not interested in this kind of business small talk and went straight to the main topic!
“弟子不明，刚刚师父明明是很简单的一挥，为何却有如此威力？”
"Disciple does not understand, how can that simple move of Master’s be so powerful?"
“弟子说的是其它的人。”
"Your disciple meant the rest of the sect members."
“当初。”他点了点头道，“飞升成仙，自然就到仙界去了，三界之间都是有界限的，不能随意穿越。那白泽不正是因此，才在下界呆了几万年？若是没有那玄灵花，怕是连你也打不开界门。”

"In the initial stage, yes." He nodded. "Once I ascend to become an Immortal, naturally I'll be in the Immortal Realm. There are boundaries between the three realms. You can't transmigrate the realms at your whim. Same case for Bai Ze. He had been in the lower realm for tens of thousands of years. If we did not have the Black Spirit Blossom, even you would not have been able to open the realm gate."
“当初若不是那个金丹修士多管闲事，自己前来找死，我的血祭大阵也不会拖到现在。”他冷哼一声，背后的狐尾一甩，扫开了插在了阵眼上的灵剑，血祭大阵再次启动，刺眼的白光中红光又起，“不过现在也不错，我儿复活后，只要吃了你们两个，最少也能直接结丹了，哈哈哈哈哈哈！”

"If it weren't for that busybody Golden Core cultivator who came looking for death, my Blood Sacrifice Array would not have been delayed until now." The blood fox sneered and flung out his tail, sweeping away the spiritual sword stuck on the array, and the Blood Sacrifice Array once again began to gleam with white and red glows. "But this is alright too, after my son’s resurrection, as long as I devour the both of you, I can at least complete my Core Formation immediately, hahaha!"
“当日打败郁家的是师父，总不能让众派如此误会下去。趁此机会，可以跟大家说清楚。”
"Master defeated the Yu family that day. We can't let this misunderstanding continue amongst the sects. I will take this opportunity to clear up this matter."
“当然啦！”她用力的点了点头，“我是过来人了，男女感情这种事，分分合合很正常了，看淡了就好。人不能在一颗树上吊死，一生这么长，总要多吊几棵试试。你还小，所以才纠结要不要喜欢的问题。”

"OF course!" She nodded furiously. "I've gone through this before. It is normal for a man and a woman to get together and separate. You just have to learn to take things lightly. We cannot be too inflexible and stubborn. We have long lives ahead of us, we have to try things out sooner or later. You're still young, that's why you're still struggling with whether you should even like him."
“当然是准备过去啊！”孤月习惯性的回答，“异宝降世，无论出来的是什么，都是无主之物，越早到达越有优势。”

"Of course to get ready to go over there!" Lonemoon habitually answered, "A unique treasure descended into the world, no matter what it is, it is an item with no Master, the sooner we reach, the greater our advantage."
“当然有用！”孤月有些激动的看向她手上的草木灵，“它是灵植灵气汇聚而生，所以可以感应到世间所有灵植的存在。也就是说，只要带着它，就有了这个秘境所有灵植的位置。”

"Of course they're useful!" Lonemoon exclaimed agitatedly. Fixing his eyes on the vegetation spirit in her hands, he continued, "It's formed from the Spirit Qi of many spirit herbs. Naturally, it'll be able to sense other spirit herbs. In other words, as long as we keep it with us, we'll be able to locate all the spirit herbs in the mystic realm."
“当然！”
"Of course!"
“当然！”孤月解释道，“先不说练丹，但凡种植或是灵植生长的地方，灵气都是别的地方的几倍。灵脉也是由此而成，无论是什么修士，哪个不需要灵气。”

"Of course!" Lonemoon explained, "Refining pills aside, wherever herbs and spirit herbs grow, the Spirit Qi would be ten times thicker than normal. That’s also how a spirit vein forms. Every cultivator needs Spirit Qi."
“当然！随便一个都是至宝。”
"Of course! They are all treasures."
“当然，你忘了虽然三界不能自由往来，但妖界可以啊。我有一个绝对可行的想法……”他一脸认真的道，“如若楼主同意，可以帮您达成此愿。”

"Of course, you forgot that although you cannot roam freely in the three realms, you can do so in the demon realm. I have am absolutely foolproof method..." He said earnestly, "If you allow it, it can help to achieve your goals."
“当然，听闻这几年又新立了好些个门派呢。”易家家主易峰摸了摸躺在旁边的十阶妖兽，笑笑道，“好在这印天城够大，就算再多来一倍的人，怕是也没有问题。不愧是富有四海的印家。咦，怎么不见印家主呢？”

"Of course. I have heard that in recent years, quite a number of new sects have been formed." The Yi Jia Family’s patriarch, Yi Feng, patted the tenth-stage demon beast lying next to him. He said with a chuckle, "Fortunately, this Yin Skycity is big enough. Even if double the number of people came, it would be no problem. The Yin Family really lives up to its reputation of superior wealth. But why is there no sign of the Yin patriarch?"
“当然，当然！这都是一场误会，就不要计较别的了。郁家主还是快点让人把另一位无敌派弟子，放出来吧。”
"Of course, of course! This is a misunderstanding, there's no need to fuss about it. Master Yu, quickly let the other disciple of the Invincible Sect out."
“当然，最好又厉害又霸气，可以名震三界的那种。”
"Of course. We want to sound formidable and strong. We want the kind of name that would shake the Three Realms."
“当然，相信我，男女间就是这么回事。”
"Of course, trust me, this is how relationships work."
“当然，算起来都快奔三的人了。”
"Of course, I've been cultivating for almost thirty years."
“当真？”旁边的人也睁开了眼，“清韵师兄，可有感应到是谁？”
"Truly?" The others by the side also opened their eyes. "Senior Brother Qing Yun, can you sense who that person is?"
“当真？”易峰一喜，“不知是何办法？”
"Really?" Yi Feng was evidently surprised. "What is your advice?"
“当真？”枫影一惊，快行两步走近，“孤月尊者说的是真的？”
"For real?" Feng Ying was stunned, he took two steps forward, "Supremacy Lonemoon are you speaking the truth?"
“影楼主说得没错，此事的确是我等的失误，应该给您一个交待。”他笑得越发的和善，职场模式全开。
"Tower Master Ying, you are right, this matter was indeed our mistake, we should give you an explanation." He smiled more amicably as he started the professional mode.
“往左前方向出去。”易峰强行稳住身形御剑而起，回头冲着沈萤提醒道。
"Jump ahead toward the left," Yi Feng shouted to Shen Ying as he forcefully got on his sword.
“很疼？”
"Is it painful?"
“很简单！”
"Very easy!"
“徒儿也是刚刚知晓，每月灵米供应是有数的。”早知道前阵子他就不做那么多糕点了，都怪蹭饭的某人，对，一定是他吃太多，才害师父没米下锅，“外事堂说，到是可以用灵石与其它弟子交换，但是……”

"Disciple has also only just found out about there being a limit to the amount of spirit rice provided per month." If only he had known, he would not have made so many pastries. It was all that freeloader's fault, yes, that must be it. He ate too much, which was why his master didn’t have food to eat now. "The Outer Affairs Hall said spirit stones can be used to exchange with other disciples, but…"
“徒儿以前筑基之时，经常会接这种活计。师父放心，此城甚小，地域不广，一般不会太远，天亮前即可结束，耽搁不了多久。”

"When I was in the Foundation Establishment realm, I have often picked up jobs like these. Master, rest assured, this city is small and the district is not wide, so the trips will usually not be too long and can be finished before sunrise. It will not waste too much time."
“徒儿知道师父心有大善，所以才常年驻守在此边界，以防妖类出去作恶。”
"I know that Master has a great heart, which is why you stay guard by the borders to prevent demons from leaving and creating chaos."
“徒儿这就去为您寻些吃食，开火做饭。”
"Disciple will now go to procure some food for you and start a fire to cook."
“得了吧！”一路跟来的孤月翻了个白眼，直接拆台，“她唯一担心的只是没人做饭而已。”
"Come off it!" Lonemoon, who had tagged along, rolled his eyes and cut to the chase, "The only thing she is worried about is that there will be no one doing the cooking."
“御兽？”
"Beast riding?"
“必须的，我专业的！”魔王立马拍胸保证，“大仙，您看我的！”
"Definitely, that's my area of expertise!" the Devil King promised with confidence, "Great Immortal, just you see!"
“忘了啥？”她歪了歪头，脸色更加茫然。
"Forger what?" Shen Ying shook her head, looking even more perplexed.
“快三更了，拖了这么久，得尽快把伤口处理好，免得小奴回来唠叨！”
“Damn, it’s almost midnight! Why did I dilly-dally for so long? I’d better deal with my wounds quickly before Xiaonu returns home and starts nagging me!”
“快则一两月，慢则一年半载。”羿清回道。
"If I'm quick, I'll take one or two monhs. If I'm slow, I could take about six months to a year," Yi Qing answered.
“快去禀报家族刑堂，禀报大总管！”
"Quickly go and report it to the family clan Disciplinary Court! Report this situation to the Chief Supervisor!"
“快天黑了，再坐一会就回家吧，迟些小奴又会担心了。”
"The sky is about to turn dark. I'll stay here for just a bit longer before heading home. If I stay for too much longer, Xiao Nu will get worried again."
“快快，指导指导。”孤月笑得更深了，顺手还推了她一把，阴阳怪气的道，“你再不快点，太阳要下山了。”
"Quickly, guide him, guide him." The grin on Lonemoon widened even more. He gave her a nudge and said, "You need to hurry, the sun is going down soon."
“快注入元力，回炉……”
"Quick, add some essence force! Melt them down..."
“快看，那几个人的脸，怎么毁成那样也敢出来！”
"Take a look. Those people there have such ruined faces, yet they dare to come out?"
“快走！”孤月立马抱起桌上的红萝卜，三人唤出了灵剑转身就往外飞了出去。
"Quick, let's go!" Lonemoon immediately grabbed the red radish from the table and the three of them summoned their spirit swords and began to fly away.
“快走！”郁红顾不得追击，转头大声让大家离开，但却已经来不及了。
"Let’s go quickly!" Yu Hong could not be bothered with chasing after the man. She instead turned to shout at everyone to leave, but it was already too late.
“快进去吧，界门要关了。”孤月也加了一句。
"Quickly enter, the realm gate is closing," Lonemoon added.
“快，快！背上虎哥！”
"Quick, quick! Carry Brother Hu!"
“怎么不是？”
"How is it not so?"
“怎么不能增幅下我的修炼速度？修炼速度还是慢如蜗牛，而且这黑色元力只能提炼出十缕太少太少了，就算这黑色元力再变态，我以后也只能对付铸鼎境界二三重的武者，还是个废物……”

"Why can't it increase my cultivation speed? My growth is still as slow as a snail. Additionally, I can only refine ten strands of black essence force, which is simply too little. No matter how obscene the power of this black essence force, I can only deal with an opponent at the second or third stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. I'm clearly still useless..."
“怎么不见小奴？”
"Where is Xiaonu?"
“怎么不见羿清尊者？”易峰往他们背后看了看，有些疑惑的问。
"Why don't I see Supremacy Yi Qing?" Yi Feng looked behind them and asked inquisitively.
“怎么什么乱七八糟的弱小妖类，都敢来参加万妖大会。”虎王愤愤不平的瞪了女子一眼，“你个没种的小妖，休得在此胡说八道，影响我等前去复仇的士气。”

"How dare a random lesser demon like you attend the Myriad Demon Congregation?" The Tiger Monarch glared at the woman furiously. "You spineless lesser demon, don't you continue your nonsense and dampen the morale of our revenge-seeking warriors!"
“怎么会这样？没道理啊！”
"How can this be? This doesn't make sense!"
“怎么会，我牛……我孤月也算是一派长老，言出必行！”他笑得眼睛都眯成了一线，上前拍了拍他的肩，一脸诚恳的道，“说实话，我早就听闻过追魂楼的威名，楼主能在短短百年的时间，就建立起比世家还庞大的信息网，实在是令我佩服。”

"Why would I, I Niu... I, Lonemoon, am also considered an Elder of a sect, I am a man of his word!" He smiled till his eyes became a line, he stepped forward and tapped on his shoulders, and spoke earnestly, "To be honest, I have long heard of the renown reputation of Soul Chasing Tower, you have managed to build a network larger than the aristocratic families within a hundred years, I really do admire you."
“怎么会？”
"Why would that be so?"
“怎么办？”他们被困在中间了，进退两难。
"What should we do?" Trapped in the middle, they could neither advance nor retreat.
“怎么办？”孤月有些烦，“这样下去，他们即使没有陷入心魔，也会被耗死在这里。”
"What should we do?" Lonemoon was annoyed. "If this carries on, they will waste away even if they don't get trapped by their mental demons."
“怎么办？回头再来？”
"What should I do? Come back later?"
“怎么取个菜名？”掌柜皱了皱眉，这才将目光扫向最后的沈萤，“那你……算了不重要！这回就算了，大家回去吧？！”
"Why are you named after a vegetable?” The owner frowned. He turned to look at Shen Ying and said, "You… Forget it, it's not important! We'll forget about it this time. Let's head back, guys!"
“怎么只有桂花糕？我记得上次没吃完的还有小天酥，莲花饼和缕子脍来着。”
“How come there is only Osmanthus Muffin? I remember that there were Crispy Delight, Lotus Tart and Fish Flake that I didn’t finish last time."
“怎么可能，要不是跟我看了同一本书，你是怎么穿越过来的？”
"How is that possible? If you didn't read the same book as i did, how did you transmigrate here?"
“怎么回事？”
"What's the matter?"
“怎么回事？为什么我们的术法完全没用？”奚辰眉头紧皱，看向中间的鬼旗，“若是不将里面的恶鬼放出，就不能净化里面的鬼气。可这上面的封印明明已经解开，为何却迟迟不见一丝鬼气溢出？”

"What happened? Why is our sorcery totally useless?" Xi Chen frowned and looked at the ghost flag in the center. "If we don't release the evil spirits, we can't purge the Ghost Qi inside. But the seal on the flag surface is already torn, why is there still no sign of any ghosts emerging?"
“怎么弄啊？”
"How on earth do I make these?"
“怎么有外人？”他强调外人两个字，上前一步，有意无意的隔开了两人，“不知是哪位道友？”小婊砸离我师父远点。

"Who is this outsider?" he emphasised on "outsider", subconsciously putting a distance between him and the two visitors. "Who is this Fellow Daoist?" Little bastard, you better stay away from my master!
“怎么样，这些能用吗？”
"So, are these useful?"
“怎么研究呢？下午拳头、腿、手肘、眼睛都试过了，要不试试耳朵？”
"How should I research? This afternoon, I've already tried it with my fists, legs, elbows, and eyes. How about I try with my ears?"
“怎么？怕了？”
"What's the matter? Are you scared?"
“怎么？莫非这幡内的鬼气可以免疫我的阵法不成。”
"What? Could it be that the Ghost Qi in this gonfalon is immune to my array formation?"
“思羽……”他神色一喜，突然想到了什么，“这里无敌派？思羽……快，带我去见大仙！快带我去见她。”
"Si Yu..." Yin Yuanfei was glad to see Si Yu. Then, suddenly recalling something, he asked, "Is this the Invincible Sect? Si Yu... Take me to Great Immortal! Take me to her quickly."
“思羽！”她快速扶起地上的人，扯了扯对方被拉开的灰袍，把那半截亮丽的衣衫又给裹了进去，“怎么样？没受伤吧？”
"Si Yu!" The woman who had rushed out quickly helped the lady on the ground up and re-tied her gray robe, hiding the bright and colorful clothing once again. "Are you okay? Are you alright?"
“思羽！”郁红脸色一沉，打断她的话，“就算他们就是打败轩辕家的剑修又如何？这么多年，你还没有看清楚吗？男人没有一个可靠的！我们不能冒这个险。”

"Si Yu!" Yu Hong's expression darkened as she cut her off. "So what if they were the sword cultivators who were able to defeat the Xuan Yuan Family? It's been so long, yet do you still not understand? There is not one man on this earth who is reliable! We cannot afford to take this risk."
“怪不得……”孤月点了点头，“上次在升仙塔的时候，他那只叫雪银的狮吼兽受了重伤，想来终还是没能挺过去。他现在叫你去，除了想与我派交好外，估计也确实想去再找一只新的灵兽。”

"No wonder..." Lonemoon nodded. "The last time he was in the Immortal Ascension Pagoda, his Lion Roaring Beast, Silver Snow, was injured critically. I think that the purpose of his invitation, besides building good relationship with our sect, is to look for a new spirit beast."
“怪不得上青界，不惜连游仙都派来这秘境中。”孤月也明白过来，那三个人进秘境要找的东西是什么了。

"No wonder even Traveling Immortals from the Upper Azure World were sent to this mystic realm." Lonemoon finally understood what the three people who entered the mystic realm just before them had been looking for.
“怪我罗？”沈萤翻了个白眼，明明就是这里太脆。
"You're blaming me?" Shen Ying rolled her eyes. This place is clearly too fragile.
“总之，那孩子的元灵剑气暴发，可能不单是因为那个魔族入侵的原故。”羿清沉声道，“一定还有别的什么原因，只是不知薄家父子是否知情而已。”

"Anyways, the invasion of the Demonic beast might not be the only cause of the kid's insurging Qi of Yuan Ling Sword," Yi Qing said solemnly, "thre must be other reasons, which Pu's Father and Son might or might not know."
“恩人慢走！”他再次鞠了躬。
"Please take care, my benefactor!" He bowed once again.
“恩人，它们这是……”羿清实在忍不住开口问，看这情形这些兔妖是她招来的。
"Benefactor, they are…" Yi Qing could not hold the question in any longer because she seemed to be the one who had invited these rabbit demons.
“恭喜羿清真人，顺利结婴。”好吧，你是大腿，他忍！
"Congratulations, Perfected Yi Qing, for successfully forming your Nascent Soul." Alright, you’re the big shot. I'll put up with it.
“悟剑峰前的识真石，能认出化神尊者的本命法器。”
"The authenticity detector stone at Sword Comprehension Peak can recognize the Supremacy's intrinsic dharmic artifact."
“您……怎么会在这里？”易峰快步迎了上去，下意识的问了一句，他不是从来不出万兽峰的吗？难道是感应到他有危险，所以特意赶来的？
"How... did you get here?" Yi Feng quickly walked toward his spirit master. I thought he never left Myriad Beast Peak? Did he come here because he sensed that I was in danger?
“您……觉得我们刚刚的剑招怎么样，有哪些不足？”
"What… did you think of our sword moves just now? What are we lacking?"
“您不知道？！”到是兔妖一脸震惊，他不是上仙的朋友吗？兔王明明说过他在这院中都躺了一个月了，“其实……我也不是很清楚。”兔妖看了看正在屋顶盖草的王，压低声音道，“只是听王说，这位上仙法力无边，无人是其敌手，谁也不知道她修为到了何种境界。她隐居在此数月，专程拦着那些出界吃人玩的妖族，听闻当初九位妖王一起联手，在她手下都没走过一招。所以我王千叮万嘱，令我等切不可惹上仙生气。”

"Did you not know?!" The rabbit demon's face was filled with astonishment — wasn't he the Exalted Immortal's friend? The Rabbit Monarch had clearly stated that he had stayed in this yard for a month. "Actually… I am not very sure," the rabbit demon took a quick glance at the Monarch who was laying hay on the roof and lowered his volume, "It is because the Monarch said that this Exalted Immortal has boundless powers and nobody is her match. No one knows which stage of cultivation she has achieved. She lived in such solitude for many moons, purposely intercepting those demons who left the realm to devour humans for fun. I have heard that previously, the nine Demon Monarchs who had combined forces could not even take a blow from her. This is why our Monarch repeatedly advised us not to agitate the Exalted Immortal."
“您好，请问沈上仙在吗？”
"Hello, may I ask if Exalted Immortal Shen is here?"
“想吃？”她问。
"Do you want to eat?" Shen Ying asked.
“想啥？”你到是说呀？
"Want to what?" What are you trying to say?
“想要我的命？凭你也配？”
"You want my life? With what army?"
“想逃？”
"Planning to run?"
“意图穿过魔界之门，跑去仙界，还用我提醒吗？”
“You still reminders on how you intended to get to the Immortal Realm through the Door of Demon Realm? ”
“愣着干嘛？”沈萤转身走出了厨房，招了招手，“赶紧的，把午饭打包一下，我们边走边吃。时间紧迫，锅里那个菜就算了。”反正已经糊了。

"Why are you still standing there?" Shen Ying walked out of the kitchen and gestured at him, "Quickly, pack the lunches and we can eat them on the way. Time is of the essence, we can forget about the vegetables in the pan." Since they are already overcooked.
“慢点慢点！”沈萤连忙把他又压了回去，“你伤还没长好呢？”
"Slowly, slowly!" Shen Ying hurriedly pushed him back down, saying, "Your injuries are not fully healed yet."
“慢着！”沈萤刚要接过去，羿清已经一个箭步，先一步怒气冲冲的过去了。
"Hold on!" Just as Shen Ying was about to take it, however, Yi Qing had already taken big strides to rush over angrily.
“慢着！”郁红立马挡在了沈萤面前，咬了咬牙道，“她什么都不知道，我保证她不会说出去。我们……我们可以加灵石。”说着掏出一袋灵石递了过去。

"Wait!" Yu Hong went to stand in front of Shen Ying. She gritted her teeth and said, "She doesn't know anything and I promise that she won't say a word to anyone else. We… we can give you more spirit stones." She took out a bag of spirit stones from her bag and handed it over.
“成为此塔的一部分吧！”眼看着漫天的黑气就要扑向对面的人。
"Become part of this pagoda!" The blob of black gas was just about to pounce on Shen Ying.
“成立一个？”孤月一惊。
"Establish one?" Lonemoon repeated in shock.
“成色不对，又废了一炉，不炼了……他娘亲的问题出在哪？难道是药剂添加的不对？我昨日到底不小心添加了什么药剂才炼出地阶丹药？”

"It's the wrong color. I've made yet another useless pot. I'm not refining any longer... Where on earth does the problem lie at? Could it be that medicinal compounds were added incorrectly? What did I accidentally add in yesterday that allowed me to refine that Earth-tier elixir?"
“我……”她突然抬头看了看旁边的羿清，有些不好意思的低下了头。
"I..." She suddenly lifted her head to look at Yi Qing who was next to her. Then, she bowed her head in embarrassment again.
“我……”孤月嘴一抽，偏偏他还真有！咬牙从身侧的储物袋里掏出一叠糕点，“给，上次你没吃完，我给你收起来的。吃吃吃，吃死你！”

"I…" Lonemoon's mouth twitched, but he really did have it! Gritting his teeth, he pulled out a stack of cakes from the storage bag by his side. "Here, last time you didn't finish them, so I packed them up for you. Eat, eat, eat till you die!"
“我……”思羽仍是有些紧张。
Nervously, Si Yu mumbled, "I..."
“我……我……”狸猫被孤月的眼神吓得一抖，犹豫了半会才一咬牙道，“我……我其实是奉我们狸猫族长之命。去……去祝贺万妖大王晋升之喜的。狐妖要抢的，就是……我送的贺礼——紫霞玄芝！”

"I…I…" Terrified by the look in Lonemoon's eyes, the civet cat trembled in fear. Hesitating, he gritted his teeth and said, "I… I am actually on a mission for the patriarch of our civet cat clan. To… to send our congratulations to the Myriad Demon King for the ascension of his cultivation level. What the fox demon wants is… the gift I'm delivering—the Splendor Lingzhi!"
“我……我不知道啊！大仙！”他在魔宫中沉睡得好好的，她突然就闯进来了，二话不说，揪起他就是一顿胖揍，他哪知道什么小孩啊，“大……大仙，您要什么尽管拿去就好，但我真的没有看到什么小孩啊？”

“I... I really don;t know! Great Immortal!” He was having a good sleep in the Demonic Palace when she just barged in and gave him a thrash without mentioning a singe word. How was he suppose to know about some kid that entered Demon Realm," Grea...Great Immortal, you can take whatever you want, but I really did not spot any kid around?"
“我……我是偷吃了几只鸡！那是因为我饿啊喵。”狸猫哭得越加大声了，满脸都是委屈，“但……但我都有付钱的！真的，我没害人。”它指了指地上的金碇子，说完掰着指头数了起来，“我还治好了，王大叔腰伤；李大叔的脚疼；赵大叔的风湿；孙大娘葵水不调……”

"I… I did eat a few chickens! That was because I was hungry. Meow." The civet cat cried louder and louder, an expression of deep hurt on his face. "But… but I paid for everything! Really, I didn't harm anyone." Pointing to the gold pieces on the ground, it started counting on its fingers. "I also cured Uncle Wang's waist injury; Uncle Li's aching foot; Uncle Zhao's rheumatism; Auntie Sun's menstrual imbalance…"
“我……是魔修！”她忍不住提醒。
"I… am a fiendish cultivator!" she couldn't help but remind Shen Ying.
“我、叫、枫、影！”再叫一声宝宝，老子跟你翻脸你信不信！
"My name is Feng Ying!" Call me baby again and you'll be sorry, believe me!
“我。”他话还没说完，一道低沉的声音，突然在他身后响起。
"Me." Before he could finish, a low voice sounded out from behind him.
“我一直都在啊。”拜托，她明明跟着厨子徒弟一块进来的。
"I’ve been here all this time." Come on, it was obvious that she had entered together with her chef disciple.
“我不会。”
"I do not know how."
“我不收小红她们做徒弟，行了吧！”
"I’m not taking Little Hong and the girls as my disciples. Will that be fine?!"
“我不是……”
"I didn't..."
“我不知道啊！”
“I didn't know！”
“我不确定。”孤月指向沈萤，“她看到的。”
"I'm not sure myself. She saw it." said Lonemoon and pointed at Shen Ying.
“我不跟你说过了吗？”她懒懒的回了句，“我也不知道啊！”
"Didn't I tell you? She replied lazily, "I don't know!"
“我乃上青界轩辕家的长老，道号青尹，这两位是我师兄。”青尹微仰着头，带些自傲的出声道。
"I am an elder of the Xuan Yuan family in the Upper Azure World, Dao name - Qing Yin. These two are my Senior Brothers." Qing Yin answered with arrogance as he held his head high.
“我也不清楚。”奚秋心下一沉，转身拉过一名弟子交待道，“快去凌霄峰通知晔星、余阳两位尊者，请他们立即出关。”

"I am not sure either." Xi Qiu's heart sank as he turned towards a disciple and ordered, "Quickly head over to Ling Xiao Peak to inform the two Supremacies, Ye Xing and Yu Yang, and invite them to immediately come out of seclusion.”
“我也不清楚。”毕浩紧了紧现在还在颤抖着的手，“不过那人一定不简单。记住，若是以后再遇到此人，躲得越远越好！”

"I am not sure either." Bi Hao clenched his trembling hands. "But that person must not be simple. If we were to ever meet that person again, it would be best for us to keep away from her as far as possible!"
“我也不知道。”
"I don't know either."
“我也是刚刚接到的消息。”枫影顺手从废墟中扒出一张椅子，扫了扫上面的灰道，“升仙塔是昨天突然出现在华元城郁家的，说是你当初跟郁家家主一战，触动了郁家的禁制，引得升仙塔现世。对了昨天上午出现的那阵天地异象，就是升仙塔引起的。过来坐！”

"I just received the news as well," Feng Ying pulled a chair out of the wreckage and dusted the surface. "The Immortal Ascension Pagoda suddenly appeared in the Yu Family home in Huayuan City. Apparently, your battle with the Yu Family made them take extra precautions against you by setting up the Immortal Ascension Pagoda. The Heaven and Earth phenomena we witnessed yesterday was caused by that Immortal Ascension Pagoda. Come, sit down!"
“我也是刚刚知道，她们是我郁家旁系一年前失踪的几名逃奴。”郁海珩满是恶意的扫向沈萤身后的思羽，“她跟那个叫郁红的女子，之前都是郁家旁系元婴真人振祥的炉鼎。”

"I also just found out that they were the missing escaped slaves of the collateral kin of my Yu Family." Yu Hai Heng gazed at Si Yu who stood behind Shen Ying, filled with malice, "She and the girl called Yu Hong were Zhen Xiang, Perfected Nascent Soul, collateral kin of Yu Family's human cauldrons previously."
“我也没想听的。”沈萤叹了口气，“可……你们是不是忘了关公放了？”
"I didn't want to listen." Shen Ying sighed, "But... did you guys forget to off the public mode?"
“我也没让你来啊。”不是他自己主动跑过来，问她有什么需要的吗？“再说……那天不是你让我挥那一剑的吗？”
"But I didn't ask you to come." Wasn't he the one who came asking whether she needed anything? "Besides… didn't you ask me to wield that sword the other day?"
“我也饿了。”他直接动手剩了碗饭坐下，心底满满的都是不平衡，瞄了旁边某吃货一眼，又忍不住念道，“下午你跟门下弟子们，把后山那片萝……灵植采收一下。”说着他掏出一张字条递给她道，“这是清单，按照上面的数，一株都不能少。”

"I am also hungry." He immediately served the remaining rice to sit down, his heart was filled with indignant, he glanced over at a certain foodie and could not help but nagged, "In the afternoon, you bring the disciples to the back of the mountain to harvest the radish... spirit herbs." He then took out a note and passed it to her, "This is a checklist, take according to the numbers on it, not one herb less."
“我什么我？”
“I? What I?!”
“我以前也端过。”
"I served her food before."
"We-"
“我们……我们刚刚是在这炉中！”怪不得，满地都是异火，原来是这练丹炉的丹火，看来这个练丹炉也是个仙器，里面居然自有一番天地。

"We… we were in this cauldron just now!" No wonder the ground was covered with Deviant Fire. It was actually the fire for refining elixirs. So it appeared that this elixir-refining cauldron was also an immortal artifact; there was a whole new world inside it.
“我们也想如掌门一般，强大到无人敢欺，无事可辱，无祸可惧。掌门修为高深，哪怕能习得您万分之一的本领，也会令我得受用无穷。”

"We want to become like you, Sect Master, who is so strong and fearless that no one can bully you and embarrass you. Sect Master, your cultivation level is extremely advanced. We'd be honored to learn to become even one percent as powerful as you."
“我们什么时候走呀？择日不如撞日，要不现在就出发吧！午饭可以打包。”
"When are we leaving? Why not today, let's set off now! Lunch can be packed and brought along."
“我们会带着掌门祝福，参加大比。”
"We will bring your blessings to the competition."
“我们刚刚起步招人，人是少了点。”沈萤想了想，解释道，“嗯，以后就多了。”
"We just began to recruit so there aren’t a lot of people." Shen Ying had pondered for a bit before explaining. "Yeah, there will be more in the future."
“我们清楚的。”郁红点了点头，“那……道友可否现在就送我们下界。”
"We know.” Yu Hong nodded. "So… Fellow Daoist, can we go to the Lower Realm now?"
“我们需要那些吗？”
"Do we need those?"
“我修习的是……”
"I learned and practiced..."
“我修习过……御水诀！”
"I learned and practiced… the Water Negation Art!"
“我先进去看看情况吧！”孤月也想到了这一点，沉声道，“先不论秘境里什么样，单这三人走的这一趟，算是跟玄天宗结下了梁子，其它元婴堂主去，都不合适。我至少可以自保。”

"Let me go in and take a look first!" Lonemoon was thinking hard about their situation too. In a low voice, he continued, "There's no point discussing what lies inside the mystic realm. The fact that the three of them are making this trip into the mystic realm shows that they're deliberately going against Blackheaven Sect. It's simply not appropriate to let any of the other Nascent Soul stage cultivators to go after them. I at least will be able to protect myself."
“我其实……咦？”魔种一愣。
"I actually...Huh？" The Demon Seed froze.
“我再问一次。”沈萤脸色更沉，“为什么要在九九劫雷上加雷？”
"I'll ask you one more time," Shen Ying's expression darkened. "Why did you add extra bolts of lightning to the Nine Nine Lightning Tribulation?"
“我刚杀了玉鼎那个伪君子，你若明日就毫发无伤的回去，想来玄天宗定会心疑于你！”她看了沈萤一眼，闪过一丝担忧，“你最好拖个几日再回，他们问起，你再如实告诉他们，杀玉鼎老贼的是我无常毒煞戚橙雨。”

I just killed that hypocrite Yu Ding. If you go back tomorrow without any injury, Blackheaven Sect will suspect you!" She glanced at Shen Ying, and a trace of worry flashed in her eyes. "You better wait a few days before returning. If they question you, just tell them the truth, that the one who killed that old thief Yu Ding was me, Qi Chengyu."
“我到是有个办法，可以帮追魂楼解决这个问题。”
"I do have an idea to solve this problem."
“我去主峰找奚秋。”刚回到玄天宗，孤月交待了一句，也没管余下的两人，就火急火燎的去找掌门商量秘境的事去了。

"I am going to the main peak to look for Xi Qiu." After returning to Blackheaven Sect, Lonemoon only threw down those words with no regard for those two people and left in a hurry to find the sect master to discuss the matter of the mystic realm.
“我又不是你们无敌派的人，让开！”枫影有点暴躁。
"I'm not a member of your Invincible Sect, get out of my way!" Feng Ying was starting to get agitated.
“我又没有虐杀小动物的癖好，骗你干嘛？”它又没吃人。
"It's not like I have any interest in slaughtering little animals. Why would I lie to you?" The Rabbit Monarch did not eat humans after all.
“我只是问个路而已，你瞎BBBBB……B个毛啊！”她一边砸一边生气的大声吼道，“知不知道人家还没有吃饭？叫你拖时间，叫你拖时间……”

"I was just asking for directions, why are you giving me all this bullshit!" scolded Shen Ying as she continued her bashing. "Don't you know I haven't eaten yet? This will teach you to waste my time, teach you to waste my time..."
“我只能送你们到这里了。”孤月抬头看了看峰顶道，“再往里走，就会被发现了。我好歹是玄天宗的人，太虚派多半人都见过我，跟着你们上去，也不合适。”他要是被发现，到时就是两个门派之间的问题了。

"I can only bring you up to this point." Lonemoon looked up at the summit. "If I venture any further, I will be spotted. I am a member of Blackheaven Sect and most people in the Taixu Sect know me, so I don’t think it’s appropriate for me to follow you up." If he were recognized, it would create a problem between the two sects.
“我只见过魔修往下界跑的，修士想下界还是第一次。”男子笑了笑，转头点了点人数，皱起了眉，“不是说九个吗？怎么多了一个人？”

"I only see fiendish cultivators heading for the Lower Realms. This is the first time I'm meeting immortal cultivators who want to enter the Lower Realm," the man mocked. He turned to count the number of people and then frowned, "Didn't you say nine? Why is there one more person?"
“我叫孤月！”羿清立马接了一句。
"My name is Lonemoon!"
“我叫戚橙雨，大小也算是个魔尊，我瞧着你挺顺眼的，以后要在玄天宗混不下去了，记得来冥阴山找我，兴许还能活久点！”这么蠢的人，没人看着，会死的吧？！

"My name is Qi Chengyu, a Fiend Venerate. You seem like a person I can relate to. If you find that you cannot make it in Blackheaven Sect in future, look for me in Ming Ying Mountain. Maybe then you can survive a little longer!" Such a stupid person like this will surely die without protection?!
“我叫沈萤，是跟刚那个小伙一块来的啊！”沈萤指了指之前弟子出去的方向。
"I am Shen Ying, the one who came with that lad just now!" Shen Ying pointed in the direction that the disciple from moments ago had headed towards.
“我可是小姐姐的萝卜！”
"I'm Little Missy's radish!"
“我同意他的说法。”沈萤还没回答，孤月突然举手，一脸认真的道，“我是不管你找不找对象啦，但谁都可以，白泽就算了。”

"I agree with him," Lonemoon suddenly raised his hand before Shen Ying could answer. His expression was sombre, "I dont care if you look for a partner, and you can look for anyone you want except Bai Ze."
“我咋知道。”孤月仔细打量了萝卜一眼，“灵植草木类大多都是没有性别区分的，化形后估计也是可男可女的。”
"How would I know?" Lonemoon scanned the radish and continued, "Spirit herbs mostly don’t have genders. Naturally, once it takes form, it could take on either gender."
“我咋知道，它自己要跟的。”沈萤低头瞅了瞅地上那只举着蒲公英，见她不收还卖力开出了第二朵的萝卜，嫌弃的退了一步，“你喜欢啊，送你啊！”

"How would I know? It chose to follow me." Shen Ying looked down at the raised dandelion. The vegetation spirit had already forced out another flower, in the hopes that Shen Ying would be more pleased with it. She took a step back, her expression one of disgust. "If you like it so much, you can have it!"
“我咋知道？”沈萤摇了摇头，“他有社交恐惧症，不爱说话。难道……它也喜欢吃海鲜？”她想起了那满袋子的存货。
"How would I know?" said Shen Ying shaking her head. "He has socio-phobia, doesn't like to talk. Don't tell me... he has a thing for seafood too?" She thought of the hoard of seafood in her bag.
“我啊！”他们话音刚落，身边却顿时响起一个声音。
"It's me!" Right after their words ended, a voice rang out by their side.
“我啊！”他话音刚落，眼前顿时扬起了一只爪，下一刻一张放大的脸凑到了身前，“我说大哥，你当我的面挖墙脚不好吧？”

"I am!" Just as he completed his sentence, a raised fist appeared before his eyes and the next moment a super-sized face zoomed right in front of him. "I say big brother, don't you think you are too much, trying to lure my staff away right before my eyes?"
“我啥都没做啊！”沈萤好奇的举了举旗子，“咦，怎么还滴水了？在水里泡过吗。”只见那旗身上，突然湿透了，正滴滴答答的往外渗着水。

"I did not do anything!" Shen Ying held up the gonfalon curiously. "Huh, why is it dripping water? Was this soaked in water?" The gonfalon was suddenly soaking wet, dripping water that was seeping out of it.
“我在这，这里！”
"Here! I'm here!"
“我好了。”她走了过去，随口问，“往哪边走？”
"I'm done." She walked over and casually asked, "Which way are we going?"
“我好饿。”
"I'm famished."
“我宁死也不会成魔。”
“I'd rather die than to become a demon.”
“我完不完不知道，不过……江豹今天你是肯定完了！”
"It doesn't matter whether I am a goner or not. Either way, you, Jiang Bao, are definitely not going to make it past today!"
“我就一会。”
"It will only take a while."
“我左边，你右边！”羿清没有多说，握紧手里的剑就冲了过去，现在也只能打了。孤月也冲向众人。

"I'll take the left, you take the right!" Yi Qing shouted. He tightened his grip on the sword in his hands and charged forward. They had no choice but to fight now. Lonemoon followed suit and charged toward the group.
“我并不认识什么……”
"I don't know any…"
“我并无歹心。”白泽也看这个老挡着自己的凡人不顺眼，“我就是来玩，是沈……你师父亲自邀请我的。”
"I have no evil intentions,” Bai Ze grew increasingly irritated with this mortal, who seemed hell-bent on opposing him. "I am here to play, it is Shen... your Master who invited me here."
“我想到一个很适合的地方。”沈萤一本正经的道。
"I know somewhere we could go," Shen Ying said seriously.
“我愿我愿我愿。”疯狂点头，它不想被吃掉啊！人修太恐怖，它再也不想着去青界吃人了。
"I am, I am, I am," the wyrm nodded. It did not want to be eaten. Human cultivators were so scary; it dared not go to the Azure World to feed on humans again.
“我懒得经常应付你们，所以只是想郑重的告诉你一声，以后如果还有一个轩辕家的人，蹦出来打扰我吃饭……我就揍你！”
"I can't be bothered to deal with you guys, so I'm going to give you a stern warning right now. If anyone from the Xuan Yuan Family appears midway through my meal again… I'll hit you!"
“我找不着回去的路了，你带我去。”
“I cannot find the way back, you will bring me there.”
“我找了他数百年，就为报达他的‘师恩’。”她神情越来越深沉，似是沉浸在什么里面，眼底慢慢染上了疯狂的神色，“这些年，我杀了所有当年辱我之人，却独独找不着他，百年来我日日夜夜都在想着，若是有一天……若是有一天……”

"I have been looking for him for hundreds of years, just to repay this debt of 'gratitude'." Her expression became grimmer and she seemed to be immersed in her thoughts, her eyes slowly taking on a crazy look. "In these past several years, I have killed all the those who tormented me, but he was the only one I couldn't track down. I had been thinking day and night for a hundred years, if one day… if one day…"
“我数三声还不滚，你就准备……用手爬着回去吧！”
"If you don't leave on the count of three, get ready... to crawl back on your hands!"
“我无意和你们为敌，你们别逼我！滚！”
"I have no intention to make all of you my enemies. Don't force my hand! Get lost!"
“我日你大爷，你到底谁的系统啊？”可无论他怎么反抗，眼泪还是哗啦啦的往下流，止都止不住，哭得他头都开始眩晕了，也没有停止迹象。突然觉得什么报仇，什么出气，什么节操全是辣鸡。

"Fuck you, whose system are you exactly?" Yet no matter how he retaliated, the tears still kept coming down, there was no way to stop them. He cried till he began to feel dizzy yet there was no sign of stopping. Suddenly felt that revenge and venting out, and integrity are all rubbish.
“我明白了。”
"I understand."
“我明白了，如此……此行要辛苦师父。”羿清仍旧一脸坚定，师父的苦心外人怎么懂，“徒儿一定不会让您失望的。”

"I understand now, in that case… thank you, Master, for your trouble." Yi Qing still wore that look of unwavering conviction. How can Master's well-meaning intentions be understood by outsiders? " Disciple will definitely not let you down."
“我昏迷了半个月？”
"I was unconscious for two weeks?"
“我是一名散修无门无派，亦无师门，现为金丹剑修，一心问道，只求以手中之剑扫平世间邪祟。”羿清认真的道，“幸结识前辈，仰慕前辈高义。斗胆自请拜入门下，还请前辈成全。”

"I am an itinerant cultivator with no home, sect nor master. Currently I am a Golden Core sword cultivator, wholeheartedly seeking the Dao, and my wish is to use the sword in my hand to eliminate all heretic spirits in the world." Yi Qing earnestly said, "I am so lucky to have gotten to know you Senior, and I truly admire Senior's righteousness. Pardon my boldness in asking you to accept me under your wing, but I do hope that you will allow it."
“我是人。”女子回答。
"I'm human," answered the woman.
“我是他师父啊。”沈萤指了指羿清，难得想起了自己的身份，“我纠正一下啊，你们那三个人，只有那个吃错药的……对，就是右边镜子里那个，是厨……呃，我徒弟杀的，其它的事都是我做的。”拿工资的那种。

"I'm his master," Shen Ying replied, pointing to Yi Qing. It was rare for her to identify herself this way. "Let me correct you: Chef- I mean, my disciple only killed one out of three of your people. He killed the one who ate the wrong medicine… Yes, the one in the right-hand side mirror. I killed the other two." And I was paid to do so.
“我是师父唯一的弟子，这种事当然由我来。”
"I'm Master's only disciple. I am in charge of these things."
“我是觉得……秘境开启的时间向来有限，既然这事各派迟早会知道。不如直接通告三宗六派，邀他们一起进入秘境一探究竟。”奚秋沉声道，“至于入秘境的人选，也随各派决定。这毕竟是上古秘境，有机遇也会有风险，端看各人的造化。”

"I feel that… the time a mystic realm remains open has always been limited. Since this matter will be known to all the sects sooner or later, why not we directly inform the Six Schools Three Sects and invite them to enter the mystic realm together to check it out." Xi Qiu lowered his voice and said, "As for the members to be sent, each sect can decide on their own. This is an Ancient Mystic Realm after all. With opportunities come risks — it all depends on one's fate."
“我是谁？！”他冷笑了一声，满脸讽刺的道，“追魂楼这个名字，你可记得？”
"Who am I?!" He laughed coldly, his face filled with sarcasm, "Soul Chasing Tower, do you remember this name?"
“我是通知你一声，你那徒弟今天估计赶不回来做饭了。掌门正跟他商量历练的事呢。”
"I am just here to inform you, your disciple will probably be unable to come back to cook today. The sect master is talking to him about an experiential training expedition."
“我是！”小孩话到一半，语调一变，眼里闪过一丝精光道，“我才是真的宁子安！辰戈意图夺舍，你快点动手，把他从我身体里赶出来。”
"I am!" The child's tone changed and a his eyes glimmered as he spoke. " I am the real Ning Zi An! Chen Ge is attempting to seize me. Hurry up and exorcise him from my body.
“我有个屁的天赋啊。”
"I have talent my ass."
“我有事！”孤月翻了个白眼，握了握自己失而复得的法器，“沈萤，这到底咋回事？你知不知道我们找了你多久？”
"I have an issue!" Lonemoon rolled his eyes, grabbed his reclaimed dharma artifacts and asked, "Shen Ying, what exactly is happening? Do you know how long we have been searching for you?"
“我有正事。”
"I have serious matters."
“我有要事处理，不能再带着你这个累赘了。就此别过，你自己小心。”
"I have something to deal with, having you come along will be a burden to me. Farewell and take care of yourself."
“我本来姓牛，叫牛化云!”
"My surname is Niu. I'm called Niu Huayun!"
“我没有拿你们任何东西。”羿清上前一步沉声道，“青亦的确是我所杀，但也是他欲杀人夺宝，动手在先。”
"I didn't take anything that belongs to you,” Yi Qing said firmly as he stepped forward. "I did kill Qing Yi, but that was only because he attempted to kill us and take our treasure."
“我灭了你这混蛋！”
"I am going to destroy you, bastard!"
“我爹，还有印家、易家和轩辕家家主，还有各位游仙太叔伯们，都被困在了升仙塔里。只有大仙……只有大仙才能救他们！”印元飞一脸的急切。

"My father, as well as the Yin, Yi and Xuan Yuan family patriarchs and all the traveling immortal uncle-masters are trapped in the Immortal Ascension Pagoda. Only the Great Immortal... Only the Great Immortal can save them!" said Yin Yuanfei anxiously.
“我生前……”碧涛弱弱的看了沈萤一眼，回道，“好像是……留了几颗。”
"While I was alive..." Bitao once again glanced at Shen Ying before he continued, "I think I... left a few in there."
“我的悟性就真的这么差？半点都悟不到。”
"Is my perception really that bad? I can't even perceive anything."
“我的意思是，你们刚说的那个杀尽妖类，禽兽不如的家伙……”她叹了口气，拍了拍那灰扑扑的袍子抬起头，仍是那无精打采的样子，却指了指自己的鼻子道，“可能……是我！”

"What I mean is that the merciless fellow who slaughtered demons and is worse than beasts you spoke of earlier…" She sighed and patted her gray robe. With that same spiritless look on her face, she pointed at herself, "might… be me!"
“我的法器……”
"My Dharma artifact..."
“我的狮吼兽就是在那座岛屿上遇到的。”易峰指了指右侧的一座大岛道。
"My Lion Roaring Beast was found on that island," YI Feng gestured to a huge island to his right.
“我的确在秘境见过千叶草木灵。”羿清脸色沉了沉，自然也猜到了对方的目的，直接越过众人上前道，“却不是你们轩辕家带入秘境的。”

"I did find a Thousand Leaves Vegetation Spirit in the mystic realm." Yi Qing's expression darkened. He understood what the Xuan Yuan Family was up to as well. As he walked past the crowd, he continued, "But it isn't the one that the Xuan Yuan Family brought into the mystic realm."
“我的确是剑修。”虽然不知道对方的来意，羿清还是坦荡的点了点头。
"I am indeed a sword cultivator." Although he didn't know the other party's intentions, Yi Qing still nodded without any reservations.
“我的身份？”
“My identity？”
“我的！”他话音刚落，一道女声突然开口道。
"It belongs to me!" A female voice replied as soon as he had finished asking the question.
“我相信!”轩辕禹立马举手站队。
"I believe!" Xuan Yuanyu immediately raised his hand to show his stand.
“我相信，大……羿掌门，不是随便冤枉别人的人，既然她已经动了手，肯定是那振祥犯了大错。”
"I believe, Great... Sect Master Yi, would not malign people, since she had already took him out, he must have made a huge mistake."
“我看派中的灵兽对沈掌门气息很是敏感，想必你一定精通寻踪观气？”
"The spirit beast in my sect was very drawn to Sect Master Shen's aura. My guess is you're proficient in the pursuit and the observation?"
“我看道友对灵兽貌似也很有兴趣？”
"Fellow Daoist, you seem to be very interested in spirit beasts."
“我知师父担心弟子，但是有战不接，定会让其它门派小看了我无敌派。”
"I know that Master is worried about me, but if we do not accept, other sects will look down on our Invincible Sect."
“我知道你们要去追刚刚那个修士，但何必急于这一时，只要你们有人接了这传承，飞升成仙指日可待。以后又何须怕他。”
"I know you all want to go after that cultivator, but you don't have to rush. Once you take over the heritage, you'll be able to ascend to immortality soon. You won't have to fear him anymore."
“我知道师父不会有事。”羿清却没有停下，反而飞得更快了，“我是担心师父一个人出门。”
"I know Master will be okay." Instead of stopping, Yi Qing flew faster. "I am worried about Master going out alone."
“我知道师父在此，是为了修行。冒然离开，怕是对……咦？咦！师……师父，你答应了！”羿清不敢置信的睁大了眼睛，感觉像是幻听。毕竟选择在这妖界旁边居住，必定是修为受到了什么大的阻碍，不得已而为之。而修行之事，最忌半途而废。她居然就这么轻易答应她离开！

"I understand that Master has stayed here for the sake of cultivation. To ask you to just leave like that might be… Huh? Oh! M-… Master, you accept!" Yi Qing grew round-eyed in disbelief. He felt as if he had imagined what he heard. After all, her decision to stay by the borders of the Demon Realm must have been due to some huge obstacle in cultivation, a choice borne out of desperation. Giving up halfway was something that should be avoided the most during cultivation, yet she actually agreed to leave this place so easily!
“我突然发现一个严重的问题！”她站了起来。
"I suddenly realised a serious problem!" she exclaimed as she stood up abruptly.
“我端得稳。”
"I'm comfortable holding this."
“我等估计要在此小住一段时间，不打扰吧？”
Pu Feiping asked, "I think we would have to stay here for a little while. Would we be imposing on you?"
“我等修为低微，看不出仙师们的深浅，不知那两位仙师的修为是？”
"Our cultivation levels are low and we can't seem to see how high your levels are. May we enquire as to the levels of your cultivations?"
“我等已开宗立派，名唤无敌派。这次是带门下弟子来参赛的。”孤月解释。
"We have already formed a sect called the Invincible Sect. We have brought our disciples here to participate in the competition," Lonemoon explained.
“我管她什么鬼生命体？这话我听不懂，现在只想为我追魂楼出口气，痛揍他一顿！”
"I don't care what kind of stupid living organism? I don't understand, I just want to have my revenge for the Soul Chasing Tower and beat her up!"
“我练过，轻体术。”
"I have practiced the Light Body Spell."
“我给的啊！”沈萤回。
"I gave it!" Shen Ying replied.
“我肚子饿了啊。”沈萤一脸无辜。
"I'm really hungry," Shen Ying explained innocently.
“我装点东西。”
"To store something."
“我要冬眠！”
"I'm going into hibernation!"
“我要有什么事？”沈萤一脸茫然。
"Why wouldn't I be?" Shen Ying looked confused.
“我要杀了你，杀了你……”
"I'm going to kill you, kill you..."
“我让他们把升仙塔的事散播出去，就是为了引天下修士齐集塔中。”他语气满满都是得意，“只要他们一入塔，就会陷入心魔之中，时日一长，他们的肉体，元神，修为都会被塔吸收，成为供我成魔的养分。所以这塔还有另外一个名字——炼魔塔。”

"I let them spread the word about the Immortal Ascension Pagoda because I wanted to attract all the cultivators into it," he proudly declared. "As soon as they enter the pagoda, they will have to face their mental demons. As time goes by, their physical body, primordial spirit and cultivation will be absorbed by this pagoda. This way, they will provide the nutrients I need to become a Perfected Demon. That's why this pagoda has another name - the Demon Cultivating Pagoda.
“我说……”沈萤掀开被子，眉头紧皱，“你们能不能安静点？”很晚了的说。
"I am thinking…" Shen Ying pulled away her blanket, her brows furrowed, "Can't you all be quieter? It is already very late."
“我说……”沈萤眼神微眯，突然倾身上前，宛若无物的迎着黑气走了过来，伸手一抓。
"I say..." Shen Ying narrowed her eyes. Suddenly she leaned forward, walked nonchalantly over to the blob of black gas and reached her hand inside.
“我说沈萤……”她刚想开口，突然耳边传来一道急促的风声，心下一紧，转手抓住人往后疾退到了十丈开外。下一刻一把阴气四溢利剑就插在了之前站立的地方。

"Shen Ying…" But just as she was about to start talking, the sound of fierce winds was suddenly heard. Alarmed, she turned to grab the person beside her and retreated 100 feet. The next moment, a sword emitting Yin Qi was stabbed into the spot where they had been standing at.
“我说的那些，你不都知道吗？”
"You don't know what I was talking about before?"
“我说过只要江如虎江豹江松的腿，其他人不想被误伤，请让开！”江逸不带一丝情绪波动的声音响起，让很多江家子弟自动后退几步，江逸敢在演武殿动手，很明显已经豁出去了，和一个疯子斗不值得。

"I said I only want the legs of Jiang Ruhu, Jiang Bao and Jiang Song. Those that do not want to be mistakenly injured, please stand aside!" Jiang Yi's voice echoed without any emotions.
