Majority of the descendants of Jiang Clan took a few steps back. If Jiang Yi dared to make a move in the Martial Arts Demonstration Hall, it meant that he was taking all risks. It wasn't worth it to fight it out with a madman.
“我走了。”沈萤转身就往殿外走去。
"I'm leaving," Shen Ying turned and headed out.
“我跳进来的啊。”她指了指头顶那个窟窿。
"I jumped in here," she pointed toward the hold on top of her head.
“我这也没啥……”她想了想，转手把手里的铁锹递给他，“要不你帮我把坑填了吧，我挖了十几天了，挺麻烦的。”

"I haven't anything that needs doing…" She thought for a while before passing the metal spade to him, saying, "Maybe you can help me fill up the pit. I spent ten days digging it, it was really tedious."
“我这回来，就是想告诉你们一声。”她直接把萝卜从腿上拔了下来，“这虽然是个萝卜，但也是有主萝卜。你们再喜欢吃素菜，我不给，你们抢也没用。”

"I came back to tell you guys this." Shen Ying plucked the radish from her thigh and continued, "This may be a radish, but it belongs to someone. Your family may really love vegetables, but you can't snatch it from me if I refuse to give it to you."
“我这就去准备。”
"I'll go and prepare them right now."
“我追魂楼的事，你们还没给我个交待呢？”枫影直接一拍桌子站了起来，义正词辞的道，“孤月长老，我废了半生的心血才建起的追魂楼，你们说砸就砸了。事到临头，一句救人心切找错人就完了？反正我不管，要么你们赔我个追魂楼，要么你们现在就杀了我，不然我绝不离开。”

"You guys have not given me an explanation for the matters of my Soul Chasing Tower?" Feng Ying immediately hit the table and spoke sternly, "Elder Lonemoon, I have painstakingly spent all my effort to build the Soul Chasing Tower and you guys just destroyed it like that. At this juncture now, one line of wanting to help and save the people and that I have knocked on the wrong door? Anyway I don't care, it's either you guys compensate me my Soul Chasing Tower, or kill me now, if not I will not leave."
“我门下那些弟子，哪比得上大仙的门人。”轩辕禹笑得越加的客气，开始了一波商业互吹，说完又掏出一瓶丹药递了过去，“对了，此丹是调养灵气用的凝灵丹，不是什么大不了的丹药，只是与之前那瓶养神丹配合使用效果会更好。正是适合贵派的弟子，就当祝贺贵派进入决赛了。”

"The disciples from my sect cannot compare to yours." Xuan Yuanyu smiled more politely. Lonemoon and Xuan Yuanyu exchanged one line for another, praising one another's sect. After a while, Xuan Yuanyu retrieved a bottle of pills from his bag and handed it over. "Oh yes, these pills are Spirit Condensing Pills. They will help to nurse your Spirit Qi. They're not that special, but they will have a better effect if you consume them together with the nourishing elixirs from before. They're perfect for your disciples. Take it as a congratulatory gift from me to you.”
"Me?"
“我？”孤月一惊，连上青界都千方百计想得到的东西，她就随随便便的送人了？到底知不知道草木灵意味着什么，那可是数不尽的灵植和丹药，你到底还要不要涨修为了。

"Me?" Lonemoon was shocked. Why was she so easily giving away something that was so highly sought after, even in the Upper Azure World? Did she not understand what this vegetation spirit could do? It was the equivalent of countless spirit herbs and pills. Did she even want to continue cultivating?
“我？”沈萤一愣，老实的回答，“我没修为。”
"Me?" Shen Ying paused and answered honestly, "I have no cultivation."
“或者……”他扫了一圈众人，“真要等我们血洗了这里，再来慢慢寻回我族传世之宝。”说完他身上的威压再次放了出来，带来的人也纷纷亮出了武器。

"Or…" The man swept his gaze across the crowd before he continued, "Do you really want me to turn this place into a bloodbath so that I can take my time to look for the treasure that rightfully belongs to my family?" As soon as the words were out of his mouth, he released the suppressive force from his body once again. The people he had brought with him also began to take out their weapons.
“戚橙雨，别忘了这里可是悟剑峰，你杀了我也休想从这出去？”他大声威胁道，“山上的尊者们，马上就会发现这里的！”

"Qi Chengyu, do not forget that this is Sword Comprehension Peak. If you kill me, do you think you can leave here alive?" he threatened loudly. "The Supremacies on the mountains will discover this immediately!"
“所以……”他突然回过头，一脸肯定的道，“她绝对找不到回来的路！”
"The problem is…" He suddenly turned his head and said with a look of certainty, "She'll never find her way back!"
“所以……你们是去找烤鸡妹子的？”一个熟悉的女声，突然在她身后响起。
"So... you're going to look for the Roasted Chicken Gal?" A familiar voice sounded out from behind them.
“所以……你要恩将仇报？”他不会想赖上她吧？这一穷二白的，你眼光有点歪啊！
"So… You want to bite the hand that fed you?" Did he actually want to rely on her? She was already destitute, what a funny way of thinking!
“所以……我一个人上去。”羿清扫了众人一眼，又看向已经开始慢慢消失的这片荒原，才沉声道，“这片地界开始消失了，证明这升仙塔是不会让我们继续停留在这一层的，我们没有回头的路。我先上去看看是否有其它出路，如若不是什么凶险之地，你们再上来。如若……”他停顿了一会，才继续道，“你们就等到万不等已的时候再上来吧？我们这么久没有回去，师父定会来寻我们的。”

"That''s why... I'm going alone," Yi Qing scanned the group and looked around the fast disappearing wasteland. He lowered his voice, "This level is beginning to disappear. This proves that the pagoda would not let us remain at this level. There's no turning back. I'll go up to see if there's another way out. If it's not a dangerous place, I will inform you and you can come up. If..." Yi Qing paused. "You will wait until you can wait no longer, then come up. We've been away for so long. Master will surely come for us."
“所以三宗六派中只有化神尊者，才有进入那的通行玉牌。”她认真的道，“除非有通行的玉牌，不然……”

"So Soul Formation Supremacies from the Three sects Six Schools are the only ones who have the passage jade token, and only they can gain entry." She explained earnestly, "Unless one has the passage jade token, otherwise…"
“所以不单是她们要参赛，为免有人小瞧她们，我们都得去，包括你！”说完他直接扯过她的手，硬把那个参赛令牌塞进了她手里，“你明天最好早点起来，不然……”他脸色一沉，一字一句的道，“下个月的伙食费，取消！”

"So not only are they going to participate in order to prevent people from belittling them, we have to go as well, including you!" When he finished, he immediately pulled her arm over and forcefully stuck the token in her hand. "You better wake up earlier tomorrow, otherwise…" His expression became solemn as he pronounced each of the following words clearly, "Next month's food allowance will be canceled!"
“所以没有人会问……她们愿不愿意？”
"So nobody would ask… if they were willing?"
“所以？”
"What's the problem?"
“手中无剑，心中有剑……”
"No sword in my hand, but a sword in my heart..."
“扑通！”
“Crash!”
“打一场？”
"Spar in a match?"
“打一顿就好了。”
"Just beat them."
“打得不错，继续加油！”
"You guys fought well. Keep working hard!"
“打架去了！”
"I went to fight!"
“扔你妹啊。”敢情刚刚他白说了一堆是吧。
"Throw my ass!" Had he offered so much explanation in vain?
“扶……扶什么思达？”郁红一脸的茫然，“掌门请恕弟子愚钝，此话何意？”
"Fu… Fu what Si Da?" Yu Hong was stunned. "Sect Master, please forgive your disciple’s ignorance, but what did that phrase mean?"
“找人？”
"Get help?"
“找到了！”她用力一拉，突然从床下拽出一面黑色的幡旗，“就是这个，兔子只搬走了他的身体，留了这个下来，你要吗？”她伸手递了过去。
"Found it!" She gave a tug and suddenly pulled out a black flag. "This is the one, the rabbit only carried out his body, but left this behind. You want it?" She extended it to him.
“找姬听雨？”
"Search for Ji Tingyu?"
“找得到吗？兔子？”
"Can you find it, Rabbit?"
“找死！”
"You must be tired of living!"
“把千叶草木灵，给我！”他突然转身唤出条火龙，朝三人扑了过来，火光到处，满室的丹药顿时化为了灰烬。

"Give me the Thousand Leaves Vegetation Spirit!" Suddenly, Qing Yi turned around and released an inferno dragon. A flaming light filled the room as all the pills in the Storage Repository disintegrated in the flames.
“把饭吃完才能走！”他指了指桌上被她扔开的筷子。
"Finish you food before leaving!" Lonemoon pointed at the chopsticks she had discarded on the table.
“抓住她！”呈安大喊了一声，一时间院内阵法大亮，早就埋伏好了的弟子拿着武器就冲了过去。
"Catch it!" Cheng An shouted. Immediately the array formation was activated and the disciples who had been lying in ambush rushed over with their weapons.
“护山大阵！”刚刚那一瞬间，护法大阵启动了。奚秋顿时脸色一白，跟孤月对视了一眼，“出事了！”
"Protective Mountain Array!" Immediately, the Protective Mountain Array was set up. Xi Qiu's face turned pale as he turned to meet Lonemoon's eyes. "Something's happening!"
“护山大阵！”孤月一惊，顶头看着已经全黑下来的天空，“这是……元婴雷劫，他居然直接就结婴了！”卧槽，要不是这么快！一场顿悟直接从金丹跳到了元婴，这简直就是撑杆跳了，“果然不愧是未来的最强剑仙。”

"Protective mountain array!" Lonemoon was taken aback as the sky above had become totally dark. "This is… a Nascent Soul Lightning Tribulation. He has even achieved Nascent Soul Formation realm!" Holy shit, that was really quick! One session of epiphany and he had jumped from Golden Core realm to Nascent Soul Formation realm, which was tantamount to pole-vaulting. "He is indeed the future's most powerful sword immortal."
“抱歉。”羿清也立马抱拳，“椅子是我放的。”绝不能让师父背锅！
"Sorry." Yi Qing also immediately cupped his fists. "The chair was placed there by me." Definitely cannot allow Master to be the scapegoat!
“担心什么？傻丫头，少爷是修炼忘记了时间！”
"What is there to worry about? Silly girl, your young master was just so busy practicing essence force refinement that he forgot the time!"
“拆穿？”他愣了一下，突然想起五天前，师父的确是问了一句话，他就火烧屁股似的跑出去了。从那天起，就开始扬着一张便秘脸，日日站在门口张望，“对了，师父那日说的穿越……是何意？”难道是什么高深的道法？

"Expose?" Taken aback, he suddenly recalled that five days ago, Master had indeed asked a question which resulted in Supremacy Lonemoon dashing out in a hurry. Ever since then, he had begun to have an expression as if constipated, and stood by the door daily. "Oh right, Master mentioned transmigration that day… What does that mean?" Could it be some kind of high level Dharmic Dao?
“拉走？”孤月一愣，“你是说有人救他们，是什么人？”
"Took them away?" Lonemoon hesitated. "You mean somebody saved them. Who?"
“拔萝卜？”沈萤一愣，“要不我叫兔……”
"Pull out the radish?" Shen Ying faltered, "How about I get rabbit..."
“招弟子什么的，好麻烦啊……”
"It's so troublesome to recruit disciples..."
“挨饿伤胃的。”
"Hunger can hurt the stomach."
“振祥老贼！”郁红咬牙怒瞪向对面的人，本以为白天躲了他的追击，他定会派人去其它地方寻找。没想到居然早就料到她们还会回来，还联合了那个接头人，将她们骗到这里。

"Zhen Xiang, you old crook!" Yu Hong gritted her teeth and glared at the man across from her. She had thought that since they managed to evade his pursuit in the day, he would have ordered people to search in other areas. But she had never imagined that he already knew they would return and even colluded with that middleman to trick them over here.
“损个屁！”
"At stake, my ass!"
“据我追魂楼传来的消息，郁家的确凭着这升仙塔的事，又成了上青界最受关注的大世家。人人争相与郁家打好关系，就想多得知些升仙塔的消息。”枫影继续解释道，“郁家自知无法独占，家主又失踪，所以由郁家长老做主请了其它三大世家的大能修士，先行进塔一试。”

"According to the information obtained by my Soul Chasing Tower, the Yu Family attracts the most attention out of all the aristocratic families because of this pagoda. Everyone wants to get into their good books so that they can learn more about this Immortal Ascension Pagoda," Feng Ying explained. "The Yu Family knows that they cannot keep the pagoda to themselves now that their Master is missing. The elders of the Yu Family thus decided to invite the great cultivators from the other three aristocratic families to enter the pagoda and try it out\."
“掌……掌门。”思羽妹子突然走了进来，带些犹豫和纠结怯怯的看了她一眼，“我……我有事能请教下您吗？”
"Sect... Sect Master," Sister Si Yu suddenly walked into the room. Her eyes were troubled and she hesitated, "I... I have something to ask you."
“掌柜的……”孤月一脸尴尬的上前，活了两辈子，第一次吃饭没给钱，还被人追出来，太丢脸了！“咳，是我们一时失误，着急离开忘了付账，这就补上。不知刚刚那顿，是多少灵石？”

"Owner…" Lonemoon had an awkward expression on his face as he stepped forward. He had already lived one lifetime and was on his second, but this was the first time he had been chased after for having forgotten to pay for a meal. This is so embarrassing! "Heh, this was our mistake. We were in such a rush that we forgot to pay our bill. We'll compensate you right now. How many spirit stones did our meal cost?"
"Sect Master..."
“掌门、孤月长老。”正考虑怎么让牛爸爸带她去城里补一顿，郁红拿着一张红色的贴子走了进来，脸色有些古怪的道，“这是……易家的拜贴。”

"Sect Master, Elder Lonemoon." Just as Shen Ying was was thinking of a way to get Father Niu to take her to the city for a meal, Yu Hong walked in with a red card in her hand. With a queer look on her face, she said, "This is... the Yi Family's visiting card."
“掌门。”思羽低下头，半会才低声道，“我以后……能不能不见印公子了?”
"Sect Master," Si Yu bowed her head. After a moment, she whispered, "In future... can I never meet Young Master Yin again?"
“掌门。”思羽吸了吸鼻子，一时间像是找到什么依靠似的，全身气息一散。转瞬间又变成了刚刚那个娇弱的软萌妹子，“可……可是我的铃铛……”
"Sect Master." Si Yu sniffled as if having found a pillar to lean on. Her aura of before subsided and she immediately turned back to that gentle and cute girl. "But… but my bell…"
“掌门。”未等他们开口，郁红抬起头道，“经过昨天一事，我们才明白，无论多么强大的庇护都只是一时的，只有自己变强才能改变我们的命运。冥阴山虽好，但我们毕竟还是修仙之人。除非散功重修，不然我们永远都只能止步于此。”

"Sect Master,” Yu Hong began without waiting for Shen Ying to say anything. "After what happened yesterday, we understand that no matter how strong our protection is, we will only be able to truly control our fate if we ourselves become strong. Ming Yin Mountain is good, but we are Immortal Cultivators after all. Unless we're willing to render our cultivations null and train again from scratch, we will never be able to improve there."
“掌门与我们同在！”
"May Sect Master always be with us!"
“掌门您忘了。”郁红上前回道，“孤月长老去的就是印家。而且听昨晚那郁海珩所言，他好似……也已经入塔了。”
"Sect Master, you forgot," Yu Hong stepped forward and answered. "Elder Lonemooon went to the Yin Family. According to what Yu Hai Heng said yesterday, Elder Lonemoon also... went into the pagoda."
“掌门放心！我们一定为派争光！”
"Sect Master, rest assured! We will fight for glory!"
“掌门！”旁边顿时响起一道女声，郁红突然捧着个碟子从旁边插了进来，上面是一只吃剩的包子，“羿清长老准备的夜宵，您……要吃吗？”

"Sect Master!" A female voice suddenly rang out. Yu Hong, holding a plate on which sat a left-over bun, walked over and inserted herself between them. "This is the supper prepared by Yi Qing, would you like to ... have it?"
“掌门！”看到沈萤，思羽一把推开了身边的印元飞，快步迎了上去，一脸委屈的拉住了衣袖，“红师姐……他们抓了红姐姐！”

"Sect Master!" Si Yu immediately pushed Yin Yuanfei aside and rushed to Shen Ying's side upopn seeing her. She tugged at Shen Ying's sleeve and cried in frustration, "Senior Sister Hong... They took Big Sister Hong!"
“掌门！”趁着休息时间，性格最软的思羽妹子忍不住上前拦住了路过的外挂。
"Sect Master!" Making use of the break time, Sister Si Yu, who had the softest character, could not help but go to stop that cheat who was passing by.
“掌门，修行很久了吗？”
"Sect Master, have you been cultivating for a long time?"
“掌门，喝喝我这现煮的豆浆怎么样？”
"Sect Master, why don't you try this soya bean milk that I've made?"
“掌门，您先尝尝这碗甜豆腐脑，看看合不合口味？”郁红笑着把手里的碗递了过去。
"Sect Master, do try this bowl of sweet beancurd and see if it is to your liking?" Yu Hong passed the bowl of beancurd over with a smile.
“掌门，您再尝尝这莲子羹，我用灵火熬着的，可香了。”
"Sect Master, please try the lotus seeds. I used spirit fire to cook them. They're really fragrant!"
“掌门，您觉得这饺子怎么样？合您口味吗？”
"Sect Master, what do you think about the dumplings? Are they to your liking?"
“掌门，我这小笼包也熟了，要试试吗？”
"Sect Master, my Xiao Long Baos[1. A type of bun] are cooked! Would you like to try them?"
“掌门，要……送我？！”她眼泪一收，一脸不敢置信，“那……能再送我一个新铃铛吗？”
"Sect Master, you are giving it to me?!" Her tears stopped as she wore a face of disbelief. "Then… can you gift me a new bell?"
“掌门，这是印家少主印元飞。”思羽上前解释道，“他被郁家的人追杀，昨日半夜被兔妖们送到这的。”

"Sect Master, this is Yin Yuanfei, the young master of the Yin family," Si Yu stepped forwards to explain. "He was escaping pursuit from the Yu Family, who were trying to kill him. Yesterday, the rabbit demons brought him to in here in the middle of the night."
“掌门，除了护山大阵以外，可否有封锁整个玄天宗的方法？”羿清突然开口道。
"Sect Master, apart from the protective mountain array, are there any other ways to seal up the entire Blackheaven Sect?" Yi Qing suddenly asked.
“掌门？”思羽一愣，“你为何要见掌门？你这一身的伤又是怎么回事？”
"Sect Master?" Si Yu was puzzled. "Why do you want to see Sect Master? How did you get all these injuries on your body?"
“接下来再试试融合！”
"Next, I'll attempt to fuse it!"
“接下来去哪？”沈萤看向孤月，你是老板你说话。
"Where should we go next?" Shen Ying glanced at Lonemoon. You're the boss — you call the shots..
“接下来去哪？”沈萤问。
"Where should we go next?" Shen Ying asked.
“接下里再试哪里，要不试试脑袋？可人阶中品武技铁头功我还没学啊，没事，要不本少爷就随便来一发头槌吧……”
"Next, I could try other spots. Should I try my head? I have not yet grasped the Man-tier medial-grade Iron Head Technique fully. But that's fine. Why don't I try out a head blow…"
“提炼黑色元力！”
"Time to extract more black essence force!"
“搞网络的。”孤月回答，错觉嘛，怎么感觉剑仙对他有敌意，“以前自己开了个公司，养着一堆人，挺累的。对了，我之前不叫孤月，修仙后他们说要取个道号，才叫这个的。”

"I was involved with web stuff," Lonemoon answered. It must have been an illusion; why did it feel like the sword immortal was hostile towards him? "I previously owned a company and was supporting a bunch of people. It was pretty tiring. Oh right, I wasn't called Lonemoon previously. I have this name because they said I needed a nickname after I started immortal cultivation."
“摔碑手！”
"Wrestling Hand!"
“撤了。”孤月一把拽起旁边的沈萤。
"Let's go," Lonemoon pulled Shen Ying to her feet.
“改日有空，我等再登门拜访，易家主一路顺风。”
"If you are free, please come and visit us again. Have a safe trip home, Family Master Yi."
“放……放肆！”他似是完全被激怒了，身上顿时白光一亮，浓郁的仙气暴发出来，利刃一般全数朝着沈萤攻去。骇人的仙压震着在场的人都站立不稳，直接跪了下去。

"Ri- ridiculous!" He was furious now. A white light shone onto his body as a surge of Immortal Qi burst forth, cutting the air, heading straight for Shen Ying. The sinister immortal suppression forced everybody around to crumble and fall to their knees.
“放屁！”郁红更加气愤的道，“什么除魔卫道，你何曾做过任何正义之举？可动手杀过一个魔修。你只是随手把我们这些无用的炉鼎，扔到断空涯送死而已。”她直直的看了过去，眼里都是入骨的恨意，“可笑的是，偏偏就是我们这些废物炉鼎，不单没死，还做到了你都做不到的事，重伤了那个魔头。你追杀我们，不就是想让人以为这事是你做的，而不是我们这些炉鼎做，得到主家的看重吗？”

"Bullshit!" Yu Hong grew angrier. "What do you mean, annihilate fiends and protect the Dao. When have you done anything for justice? Have you ever lifted a finger to kill a fiendish cultivator before? All you did was to conveniently use us, useless human cauldrons, and then threw us over to Sky Severance Cliff to die." She looked directly over at him, her gaze consumed by hatred. "The laughable thing is, not only did we useless human cauldrons not die somehow, we even managed to do what you couldn’t, to harm that fiendish cultivator. Aren't you trying to kill us because you want to let others think that you were the one who did it and not us, to be highly regarded by the Master?"
“放开噬魂幡！”
"Let go of the Soul Devouring Gonfalon!"
“放开？”魔修冷笑了一声，“你以为我是芮糜那个蠢货！有这样的宝贝在手，居然还能败给你！剑修又如何，今日我便要拿你祭旗！”说完，他唤出一道阴气，直接拍向旗上的封印。

"Let go?" The fiendish cultivator sneered. "Do you think I am like that stupid Rui Mi! With such a treasure in hand, how could I lose to you! So what if you are a sword cultivator, today I will offer you to the gonfalon!" He then mustered a stream of Yin Qi, tapping directly on the seal of the gonfalon.
“放心吧，师父自有打算的。”羿清看了一眼众人飞走的方向，“再说……师父绝对不会有事的。”
"Don't worry. Master has her own plans." Yi Qing looked in the direction which Shen Ying’s group had flown towards and continued, "Moreover… nothing will happen to Master."
“放心！”沈萤回头看了她们一眼，难得好心的解释道，“里面都是吃素的好动物，不伤人的。”
"Don't worry!" Shen Ying looked back at them and actually kindly explained to them, "All the animals inside are vegetarians. They won't hurt people."
“放心，它是只吃草的好兔兔！”
"Don't worry, it's just a gentle, vegetarian rabbit!"
“放心，我有信心可以抵住那天雷，你不用担心。”
"Don't worry, I'm confident I can bear the divine lightning, don't worry."
“放心，我跟兔子很熟的。”她拍了拍他的肩，一脸自信。
"Don't worry. I know Rabbit very well." She patted his shoulder with a confident look on her face.
“放心，放心，就你那堪比隐身的存在感，他们记不住你的。”
"Don't worry, don't worry. Your presence is insignificant anyway, so they won’t remember you."
“放心，有我呢，怕啥？”
"Don't worry, I'm here. There's nothing to be afraid of."
“放心，死不了，只是晕过去了。”见孤月一直看着那几人，沈萤好心的解释了一句，摇了摇头道，“现在的年……中年人啊，身体也太弱了点。”一点都不经摔，还不如小动物们。

"Don't worry, they'll survive. They're just unconscious for now," Shen Ying assured Lonemoon after noticing that he had been surveying the bodies. She shook her head and continued, "Today's… middle-aged men are so weak." They did no damage at all to her — they were just like little animals to Shen Ying.
“放心，魔族不会再过来了。”沈萤保证道。
"Rest assured,the devils will never step foot into the Immortal Kingdom again." Shen Ying promised.
“放肆！”魔王喝斥了一句，身上魔气一放，“怎么跟大仙说话呢？”
"Absurd!" The Devil King hollered, filled with demonic aura. "Is that the right way to speak with the Great Immortal?"
“敢问恩人芳名？”
"May I know my benefactor's name?"
“敢闯入玄天宗，并神不知鬼不觉杀了一位元婴真人，一定不是泛泛之辈，想必修为最少都是元婴。”奚秋补充道。

"Someone who dares to break into the Blackheaven Sect, and even silently killed a Nascent Soul Perfected One, cannot be someone to be ignored, and must have at least reached the Nascent Soul realm." Xi Qiu added.
"Sky... Severance Cliff?"
“族人的妖魂在上，我等誓报此仇。”
"The dead souls of our departed brethren, we vow to exact revenge for you!"
“无常魔尊今日之事是我等冒犯，还忘魔尊大人不计小人过。”毕浩突然带些恭敬的开口，眼里早没了刚刚的得意，反而……染上了恐惧？

"Fiend Supremacy Impermanence, we are very sorry for everything that has happened today, and we hope for your forgiveness and that you will let go of insignificant figures like us." All of a sudden, Bi Hao spoke in an extremely respectful tone, the pride and glee long disappeared from his eyes which were instead… filled with fear?
“无心之失而已，没事。”那个叫郁红朝他们笑了笑。说完直接带着那七八个人离开，刚转身却脚步一顿，似是看到了什么，突然又快步走了回来，扫了三人一眼道，“三位仙师可是在招收门人？”

"It was just a careless mistake. It's alright." The woman named Yu Hong laughed at them. She then went ahead and began to lead those seven or eight people away. But just as she was about to turn around, she paused in her steps as if something had caught her eye and then suddenly walked back with quick steps. She glanced at the three of them and asked, "Immortal Masters, are you recruiting disciples?"
“无敌派……”易峰愣了一下，想了半天也没想起这是个什么门派，一时也没在意，“我看沈道友灵气内敛，想必也是修为高深之人，以后若是有兴致，到是可以一起去幻海之滨寻找些高阶灵兽，传言那里可是有很多三青界内都见不到的灵兽。”

"Invincible Sect…" Yi Feng hesitated. He fell deep in thought for a while, but he couldn't figure out which sect that was. He shrugged and said, "Fellow Daoist Shen Ying, judging from your restrained Spirit Qi, I'm guessing that you're a hidden expert. In future, if you're interested, we can go to the Mirage Sea Shore to look for high-level spirit beasts together. I heard that there are many spirit beasts you can find there which cannot be found in the Three Realms."
“无敌派在何处？”未等他起身，熟悉清冷的语调就传了过来。
"Where's the Invincible Sect?" Before Yi Feng could straighten up, he heard the familiar cool voice ask.
“无敌派？”易峰愣了一下，半会才答道，“听闻是在……妖界。”
"Invincible Sect?" Surprised by his question, Yi Feng paused for a moment before answering, "I heard that it's... in the Demon Realm."
“无耻！”戚橙雨气得咬牙，直接想催动灵气结印，却不想心口一阵刺痛，如万剑入心，全身顿时动弹不得，“灼心阵，你们……”

"Shameless!" Qi Chengyu gritted her teeth as she wanted to form a hand seal using Spirit Qi, but she immediately felt an acute pain in her heart as if it was being pierced by millions of swords — she was immobilized. "Heart Burn Array, you…"
“既然已经出来了，就交给你们净化吧！”孤月回了一句，瞬间消失在门口。
"Since it's already out, I shall leave it to all of you to purge it!" Lonemoon replied and disappeared at the door.
“既然搞定了，就回去吧，走了！”沈萤指了指敞开的大门，刚走了两步，却发现那小屁孩居然没跟上来，“还有事？”

"Since it's all settled, let's just go! Move along!" Shen Ying pointed to the Gates which were wide open and only walked two steps before he realised that the Little One did not tag along. He asked, "Is there still something on?"
“既然此事是一场误会，我等也就不便打忧了。”那莲上的游仙一挥手，整个莲花就离开了主峰，天空一阵扭曲，破出了一个通道，巨大的莲花顿时飞向了那个入口，只是原本坐在莲花正中间的五位游仙突然不见了踪影。

"Since this was all a big misunderstanding, we will not impose on the Blackheaven Sect any longer." The Traveling Immortal waved his hand as the entire Lotus Flower left the Main Peak. The air around them twisted, creating an escape route. The great Lotus Flower exited from that route, but the five Traveling Immortals atop the Lotus Flower suddenly disappeared.
“既然还未查清真相，那今日之事，就到此为止吧。”印风上前一步道，“还请郁家主，放了无敌派两名弟子。”
"Since the truth has not been investigated, this matter shall rest for today." Yin Feng took a step forward, "Master Yu, please let the two disciples of the Invincible Sect go."
“早说啊，那好办！”沈萤拍了拍它的头，“我跟兔子很熟的，别哭了，我帮你写个信解释一下就行了，”说完四下找了找，转手撕啦一下，从旁边人的身上撕下一块布料。

"You should have said so earlier! That makes things much easier," Shen Ying slapped the cat's head. "I'm really close to the rabbit. Don't cry, I'll write a letter to the rabbit for you." She searched her surroundings, and swiftly tore a piece of cloth from the clothes of the person beside her.
“时间，只要再给我一些时间，任何问题都不是问题了！”
Time! If only I had more time, whatever problems I have would not be problems anymore!
“明日决赛之后。”
"Tomorrow, after the competition."
“明日起，我可能需要闭关一段时间。”
"From tomorrow onwards, I may have to lock myself up for awhile."
“明明就是那振祥勾结魔修，想杀我们灭口。”思羽大声反驳。
“It was obvious that Zhen Xiang colluded with the fiendish cultivators and tried to silence us." Si Yu rebutted loudly.
“易家主事务繁忙，我无敌派就不留您久住了。”羿清也一脸自然的接口。
"Family Master Yi, you must be busy. My Invincible Sect will not keep you any longer," Yi Qing added, his expression remaining neutral.
“易家主，白泽已经回到了神界，想必此时易家还有很多后续事情需要处理。”孤月一本正经的道，完全没有半点刚踹过人的心虚。

"Family Master Yi, Bai Ze has gone back to the Divine Realm. The Yi Family must have a lot of matters to settle now that he's gone," Lonemoon said sombrely. He did not seem at all guilty about kicking Bai Ze through the gate.
“易家先祖曾经答应过灵主，如若飞升仙界，定会想尽一切办法，助它回到原来的地方。只是这么多年来，易家却未有一人飞升成功，就连仙界都上不去，更别说是更莫测的神界了。”他满脸的愧疚，“所以……这么多年来，它才会一直留在易家。也是因为它在幻海之滨，那些水族兽类，才不敢轻易上岸，进入上青界。”

"The Yi Family's ancestors promised Spirit Master that if they achieved Immortal Ascension, they would do all they can to help Spirit Master return to where he came from. But up till now, no one in the Yi Family has achieved Immortal Ascension - no one can even so much as step into the Immortal Realm, much less the Divine Realm." His expression was one of pure guilt, "So... all these years, he has been stuck with the Yi Family. It is because of his presence that the water beasts in Mirage Sea dare not step up onto the shore to enter the Upper Azure World."
“易家在上青界的最北边，靠近幻海之滨，确实很远。若是用传送阵的话，估计也得四五天的路途。”
"The Yi Family is situated at the northernmost part of the Upper Azure World, close to the Mirage Sea Shore. It is indeed very far, about four to five days journey if we go by transportation array."
“易家难道还派人亲自送来了？”孤月一愣，这诚意有点足啊，“到是客气，那你直接回他，方便的话，定个日期过来便好，我们随时恭候。”

"You mean the someone from the Yi Family actually came here with the message?" asked Lonemoon in surprise. This was quite an expression of sincerity. "They're really courteous. Then tell him that they can pick a date and we'll be happy to receive them."
“易峰是易家家主。”孤月解释，想了想又加了一句，“就是门派大比那几日，坐在你右边带着灵兽的那个。”
"Yi Feng is the Yi Family Patriarch," explained Lonemoon. Then he added, "At the sect competition-- he was the one with the spirit beast who sat on your right."
“春你妹啊！”孤月气得冒烟，偏偏拿眼前这个不要脸的没办法，只好继续劝道，“这可是宗门大事，你要是帮了这个忙，大家都会记得你的好的。”

"Hibernation my ass!" Lonemoon was fuming. He couldn't believe that faced with such a shameless slob, he was helpless but to keep trying to persuade her. "This concerns the entire sect. If you help out this time, your name will go down in history."
“春芽，你先回去，记住，这事和任何人都不要说！”
"Chunya, return first,” he instructed quickly. “Remember, don't breathe a single word of this to anyone!"
"It's…"
“是……”众人点了点头，只是脸色却没有多少好转。
"Yes…" The girls nodded, but they showed no signs of lightening up.
“是……是的。”兔王点了点头，下意识的缩了缩肚皮。
"Y-yes." the Rabbit Monarch nodded as it subconsciously tried to suck in its tummy.
“是……是真的吧？”一个游仙回，也是一脸还没有回过神来的样子。
"Is... is this real?" Another Traveling Immortal added. He, too, looked like his mind was somewhere else.
"Yes!"
“是。”他习惯性的一扬手，顿时一把剑凭空出现在眼前，他朝前一步，御剑飞身而起。正要加速，回头一看却发现某人还在原地，于是提醒道，“师父？此去玄天宗路遥远，需得御剑而行。”

"Yes," he habitually raised his hand and a sword appeared out of nowhere. He climbed onto the sword and it began to fly. As it gained speed, he turned back to realized that someone was still standing at the same spot. He then reminded, "Master? This journey to the Blackheaven Sect is going to be very long, so it is necessary to travel by sword-riding."
“是。”羿清点头。
"Yes," Yi Qing nodded.
“是个人啊。”身边沈萤开口道。
"It's a person," Shen Ying responded.
“是传讯纸鹤！好像是给我的。”羿清伸出手，那纸鹤乖乖落在了他手里，细细一看，“这鹤上的图纹，应该是明心宗传来的。”

"It's a messenger paper crane! It seems to be for me." Yi Qing reached out his hand, and the paper crane fell into his hand. Looked at it carefully, he said, "From the pattern on this crane, it should be from the Bright Heart Sect."”
“是位一道金丹道君，在散修中颇有名望。”奚秋边笑边道，“他已经以客卿之名加入我派，名唤羿清。”
"He is a Golden Core Dao Lord, and he has quite a reputation among the itinerant cultivators." He said laughingly. "He has joined our sect as a guest elder. His name is Yi Qing."
“是何人？”羿清问。
"Who are they?" Yi Qing asked.
“是你们，你们到底做了什么手脚？”他整张脸都开始扭曲起来，眼神凶狠得似乎想从他们身上咬下一块肉来。
"It was you guys. What did you do to the pills?" His entire face began to twist in fury. His eyes were filled with so much rage that he looked as if he wanted to tear at their flesh.
“是你！”正打算叫醒人的陆修士一惊，抬头看向那人。
"It's you!" Just as Cultivator Lu was about to wake her up, he looked up and saw that person.
“是又怎么样！”枫影气哼哼的一转头，一脸破罐子破摔的样子。
"So what if that's the case!" Feng Ying tutted once more and turned away. He was thoroughly indignant.
“是吗？”沈萤眼神一眯，脚终于抬了起来，却直接换到了他脸上，用力往下一压顿时把他脑袋也压进了地里，隐隐还听见咔嚓嚓，什么断裂的声音，学着他刚刚的口气道，“那你发一个，让我承受承受？”

"Oh really?" Shen Ying narrowed her eyes. She raised the leg that was on the man's shoulder and stepped on his face instead. She pushed his head down into the ground. All they heard were muffled sounds coming from under her foot. She imitated his tone, "Then try me, see if I can handle your wrath?"
“是吧，毕竟事关羿长老。”现场也没少别的人。
"I think so. This concerns Elder Yi afterall." Apart from Shen Ying, everybody else was still there.
“是呀师叔！虽然您是化神，也不可大意啊！还是用上结界吧！”
"That's right Uncle Master! Although you are at Soul Formation realm, you must not be careless! It is best to use a barrier!"
“是呀！”她打了个哈欠道，“这不是因为……刚刚猜拳的时候输了吗？”
"Yes!" She yawned, then said, "Isn't that because… I lost in the finger-guessing game before?"
“是呀！”她继续道，“不挖，哪来的土填坑？”
"Yes!” she continued, "If I don't dig, where do I get the earth to level the pit?"
“是呀，每个都那么丑？我还从来没有见过这么丑的修士呢？不会是魔修吧？”
"Yeah, they are all so ugly! I have never seen such ugly cultivators! Could they be Fiendish Cultivators?"
“是呀，郁家主，快点放人吧！”轩辕禹也催促。
"Yes, Master Yu, quickly let them go!" Xuan Yuanyu hurried.
“是呈命牌。”他从怀里掏出一块四四方方的牌子，只见除了右上角一小块是白色外，整个牌子一片漆黑，“我印家本就是做生意的，经常会帮修士转手些奇珍异宝，为防有人杀人夺宝，所以门下所有人，都会有这么一块呈命牌，如若变成黑色，就证明对方出了事，危及生命。”

"It's the Life Presenting Token." He retrieved a squarish token from inside his robe. Only the upper right corner of the square was white - the remaining parts of the token were all black. "My Yin Family does business. We often help cultivators sell some rare treasures that are highly sought after by bad people who might attempt to kill us and steal them. Everybody in my family carries a life token like that. If it becomes black, it shows that someone from the family is in life-threatening danger."
“是啊！”她一脸自然的点了点头，“他跟兔子长得还挺像的。”
"Yep!" She nodded her head naturally and continued, "He pretty much resembled a rabbit."
“是啊！”沈萤叹了口气，指了指旁边的房间，一本正经的道，“我说小红啊……你们半夜说悄悄话我不反对，但你们蹲在我窗外，还正对着我床头讲，这就说不过去了吧？”她正要睡觉呢！

"Yeah!" Shen Ying sighed. She pointed to the room beside her and said seriously, "Little Hong… I'm alright if you want to whisper in the middle of the night. But squatting outside my window and whispering right next to my headboard… that's unacceptable, right?" She had been sleeping!
“是啊！他刚不是说了吗。”他点头，“它爱上了一个人类。它是妖，身上有妖气是不可能跟人在一起的，所以才说人妖殊途嘛。凡人向来害怕妖怪，会排斥跟妖相爱的人也很正常。就是为了这个，他才想报复那镇上的人的。”

"Yes! He just said so." He nodded. "He fell in love with a human being. He is a demon, and with the demonic aura he possesses, there was no way he could live with the human, hence the saying that humans and demons take different paths. Humans have always been afraid of demons — to discriminate against a human in love with a demon is very normal. Which is exactly why, he wanted revenge on the people in that town."
“是啊，我住在这好几天了。”沈萤点头。
"Yeah, I've been staying here for a few days." Shen Ying nodded in affirmation.
“是啊，这位大爷快进去吧，我们家烟火姑娘最近可是学会了一种新的玩法，叫吹箫弄月，可舒坦了……”
"Yes, Sir, come on in! Our Lady Yanhuo has just learned a new trick called Flute Blowing Bosom Moons. It's very enjoyable…"
“是啊，这群低贱的陪练怎么能有幸和小姐对战？马某最近感悟了一种地阶武技，正好陪小姐练练！”

"Yes, how could these lowly sparring partners ever have the good fortune of sparring in combat with the Young Mistress? I, Young Master Ma, recently developed a new earth-tier martial arts skill, just perfect to be used in a practice round with you, Young Mistess!'
“是师父带我回来的吗？”羿清问。
"Master must have brought me back? asked Yi Qing.
“是异火！”羿清道，他终于知道这里灵气哪里不对了，是火灵气，空气中的火灵气太浓郁了，而且仿佛十分狂暴。应该是受到了这方异火的影响。

"It's Deviant Fire!" cried out Yi Qing. He finally realised what was wrong with the Spirit Qi here. The Spirit Qi in the air was too dense and seemed too violent; it must have been be affected by this fire.
“是弟子考虑不周。要不我多准备些吃的，用术法封存起来？”
"Your disciple failed to consider the circumstances properly. How about if I prepare more food and use some sorcery to store them?"
“是我之过，早该清除了你。”另一个声音再次道，手上的动作反而更快了。
“"This is my mistake, I should have killed you much earlier." The other voice said, speeding up his hand movements.
“是我做的。”沈萤似是终于听不下去了，举起了手，“那个渣男，的确是我揍的。”
"I did it." Shen Ying could not stand listening to it anymore as she raised her hand, "That scum was thrashed by me."
“是我邀你们进的上古秘境。”孤月深吸了一口气，一脸认真的对着两人道，“轩辕家找上玄天宗根本不是你们的错，他们却……，说到底……是我连累了你们。”

"I was the one who encouraged you guys to go to the ancient mystic realm with me." Lonemoon sighed. He looked at the two of them with a sombre expression and said, "It was not your fault that the Xuan Yuan Family came to confront the Blackheaven Sect. Yet, they… Whatever it is… this only happened because of me."
“是我郁家！”他话还没说完，一道男音响起，前方突然阵法大亮，不到半会眼前顿时出现了十几道身影。

"It's my Yu Family!" Before Yin Yuanfei could finish his sentence, a male voice rand out, and suddenly an array formation lit up brightly in front of them. Within moments, a dozen figures suddenly appeared before their eyes.
“是战贴！”郁红惊呼出声。
"It’s a invitation to a duel!" Yu Hong exclaimed.
“是易家家主。”孤月下意识的解释，指了指旁边的易峰，然后转身看白泽，“和……”一时不知道怎么介绍，眉头下意识的就皱了皱。
"He is the Yi Family's Family Master," Lonemoon explained, gesturing toward Yi Feng. He turned toward Bai Ze, "... and..." he frowned, not knowing #how to address Bai Ze.
“是是是！”孤月用力点头，太丢脸了！
"Yes, yes, yes!" Lonemoon nodded. This is so embarrassing!
“是是是！牛爸爸V5，牛爸爸霸气！”
"Yes, yes, yes! Father Niu V5, you are the greatest!" [1. V5 implies one's awesomeness because in certain games, V5 tends to be ones with the best powers.]
“是的师父。”
"Enough, Master."
“是的师父。”羿清沉声解释道，“飞升时降下的是紫宵天雷，是世间威力最大的劫雷。可以直接粹练仙骨，这还只是第一道心魔劫，后面的只会更重。”

"Yes Master." Yan Qing explained in a sombre tone, "The lightning that descended from the Immortal Ascension descending is the Violet Nightfall Divine Lightning. It is the most powerful lightning tribulation in the world. It can directly form immortal bones. This is only the first strike -- the mental demon tribulation, the others that follow will be worse."
“是的！”
"That's right!"
“是的，徒儿已经成功结婴。”羿清行了个礼，语调带着些难掩的兴奋，他也没有想到，一场顿悟会直接让他升上元婴，而且还这般顺利，这一切多亏了师父的提点，他果然拜了个好师父，“多谢师父在此为我护法。”

"Yes, I have already completed his Nascent Soul Formation." Yi Qing bowed and his tone was filled with excitement that he could not hide. He did not expect that one session of epiphany would allow him to advance to Nascent Soul realm directly, moreover it had been such smooth sailing. It was all due to Master's enlightenment; he indeed had a great Master. "All thanks to Master for protecting the Dharma for me."
“是的，我们愿意加入……”她抬头看了看旗子，才接口继续道，“无敌派！”
"Yes, we are willing to join…" She looked up at the flag before continuing, "the Invincible Sect!"
“是药丹峰堂主，玉鼎真人。”屋内传来一道回音，是早就到达的其它堂主之一，玄天堂的十大堂主都到齐了，正在查看屋内的情况，“也不知是哪个魔修，居然下此狠手。”

"It's the Elixir Peak's hall master, Perfected Yu Ding." An echo was heard from the house, it was from one of the hall masters that had arrived earlier on. All ten of Blackheaven Hall's hall masters had arrived and were checking on the situation inside the house. "Don't know which fiendish cultivator actually resorted to such cruel means."
“是西边的常青殿！”孤月瞬间认出了方位，脸上却更加的惊讶，“那是薄家三人住的地方！”为什么会在哪里出现？

"It is the Evergreen Palace in the West!" Lonemoon was extremely quick in identifying directions, which brought more bewilderment onto her face. "That's where the Pu Family lives!" Why would the Demonic Qi appear there?
“是谁？”虎王更是一声虎啸，搜寻这个没种的妖类。
"Who is it?" the Tiger Monarch roared furiously as it searched for that cowardly demon.
“是郁家。”郁红上前一步，由于轩辕禹友情赠送的丹药，回来的路上她的伤就已经好得差不多了，于是把郁家发生的事一五一十的说了一遍。萝卜是为了保护她，才被郁家游仙削掉了叶子变回原型的，也因此被人看出了真身。

"It's the Yu Family," Yu Hong stepped forward. Her wounds had healed significantly on the way back thanks to the elixirs she got from Xuan Yuanyu. She explained everything that happened to the Yu Family in detail. The radish's leaves got cut off to protect her, causing it to return to its true form. That was how everyone found out what it really was.
“是阴气！”羿清手里的剑一紧，转头往后提醒道，“退后，封闭五感，防止阴气入体。”
"It's Yin Qi!" Yi Qing held onto his sword tightly as he turned back to warn, "Stand back, shut your five senses to prevent the Yin Qi from entering your body."
"Yes!"
“是！”他点了点头，“我犹豫了很久，才将仙体封入薄家夫人体内。只是我没有想到，虽然只是我随手造出来的仙体，薄家为了令其降生，却不惜动用了大量仙脉的仙气。以致于将此胎养成了天生剑体。”

"Yes!" He nodded his head and continued, " I hesitated for a long time, before sealing the Immortal Being within Lady Bao. What I did not see coming, was that even though I'd just casually created the Immortal Being, the Baos used large amounts of Immortal Qi from the Immortal blood for the incarnation of the Immortal Being. By disregarding the consequences and using these large amounts of Immortal Qi, they raised the Immortal Child to be a natural powerhouse since birth.
“是！”他重重的点头，见沈萤一脸为难，突然想到了什么，“师父可是身体有恙？”
"Yes!" He nodded hard. But looking at Shen Ying's awkwardness, he suddenly thought of something. "Master, is your body alright?"
“是！”众人齐齐回答。
"Yes!" Everyone answered in unison.
“是！”孤月应了一声，心下更加警惕了。
"I am!" Lonemoon replied, growing increasingly wary.
“是！”羿清一喜，立马接过她手里的铁锹，“定不负恩人所托。”
"Yes!” Delighted, Yi Qing took over the metal spade from her, replying, "I will definitely not disappoint you."
“是！”羿清揉了揉鼻子，压下心底的感动，转身灭了火，挺直腰杆大步走了出去，隐隐有种名为‘师门骄傲’的东西涌了出来。

"Yes!" Yi Qing rubbed his nose and suppressed the gratitude within him as he turned to extinguish the fire. He stood tall and upright as he strode outside, slightly overwhelmed with the pride of being under the wing of this Master of his.
“是！”那弟子连忙应了一声，却仿佛忌讳什么一样，没有过来。
"Yes!" The disciple quickly responded. Yet, he stayed where he was, as if under some kind of spell.
“是！”郁红点了点头，回头看了众人一眼，其它人也纷纷点头。
"Yes!" Yu Hong nodded. She looked back at her group and they all nodded in agreement as well.
“是！”郁红这才转身走了出去，不到一会带着一名娇娇柔柔的绿衣仙子进来了，对方带些怯怯的朝着两人行了个礼，似是有些怕生，有意无意的往后躲了躲。

"Sure!" exclaimed Yu Hong before leaving the room. Not long after, Yu Hong then came back with a dainty young fairy wearing green. She walked towards them cautiously before bowing to them. It seems as if she was afraid of strangers as she subconsciously took a step back.
“是！师父。”
"Right, Master."
“是！师父。”羿清紧了紧身侧的手，深吸了一口气转身道，“秋掌门，这些时日在贵宗多有打扰，羿清本就是散修，受不得宗门规矩束缚，自请辞去客卿长老一职，仙途渺渺望诸位能早登仙界。”说完直接掏出入门时，发下的弟子玉牌递了过去。

"Yes, Master!" Yi Qing clenched his fists and breathed in deep. Turning around, he said, "Hall Master Qiu, I've troubled you. Yi Qing has always been an itinerant cultivator, never wanting to conform to a sect's rules. I hereby ask for permission to leave this sect. May all of you have good progress toward Immortality." Never heard of it."

“没想到这种深山老林，还有凡人居住。”芮糜嘴角一弯，浮出一个诡异的弧度，“又是一个祭旗的好材料。”
"I can't believe that there is a mortal living deep within the mountainous forest," Rui Mi's lips formed a strange arc, "Another good material to sacrifice to the Gonfalon."
“没拿？千叶草木灵就在那三位长老身上，不是你又能是谁？你敢不敢让本尊搜魂试试，看你有没有见过那千叶草木灵。”

"You didn't take it? The Thousand Leaves Vegetation Spirit was with the three Elders. If you hadn't taken it, who did? Do you dare to let me search your soul to see if you have seen the Thousand Leaves Vegetation Spirit?”
“没有。”沈萤摇头。
"Nope." Shen Ying shook her head.
“没有啊。”沈萤歪了歪头，突然像是想起了什么，抬头把脚上的挂件扒了下来，“萝卜拿了把咸菜算吗？”
"Nope." Shen Ying tilted her head, but suddenly thinking of something, she then raised her head and grabbed an item off her leg. "The radish took an extra pickle, do you count that?"
“没有强大的实力！我江逸一辈子都会被江如虎这样的杂碎给踩在脚下，百般凌辱！这不是我想要的生活，绝对不是！”回想着晨时的一幕幕，江逸脸上条条青筋爆起，拳头紧握，连指甲都深深陷入了掌心。

“With my lack of strength, I, Jiang Yi, am doomed to be trampled under the feet of swine like Jiang Ruhu and fated to endure countless humiliations! This is not the life I want—neither now, nor in the future!”
Jiang Yi recalled the sequence of events that had taken place in the morning. His face burning with rage and indignation, he clenched his fists tightly, letting his fingernails pierce deep into his palms.
“没有游仙还算什么世家？我看郁家要乱了，以后四大世家，要少一个了。”
"What kind of aristocratic family doesn't have Traveling Immortals? I think the Yu Family is in a mess right now. t looks like one out of four of the aristocratic families won't be around anymore."
“没有灵脉就没有灵气，没有灵气哪来的灵植灵兽。没有这些又怎么修练？”他看了看旁边，已经恢复成了人形的萝卜道，“我们就一个萝卜而已，虽然是个宝贝，可以找到世间所有的灵植，但上青界大部分地区都是世家的。长在人家的地里，就算你知道方位，总不能去拔吧！”

"If we don't have a spirit vein, we won’t have Spirit Qi. Without Spirit Qi, we won't have spirit herbs and spirit beasts. Without those, how are we supposed to cultivate?" He turned to the radish beside him who had once again taken human form. "All we have is a radish. It might be valuable and it might help us find spirit herbs, but most of the land in the Upper Azure World belongs to the aristocratic families. If a spirit herb is in someone else's land, knowing where it is doesn't mean you can grab it!"
“没有生殖隔离吗？”
"Aren’t their reproductive systems different?"
“没有！”
"Nope!"
“没用的。”孤月叹了一声，“就算她说的全是真的，她那个师父也真的做过这种事又如何。她去悟剑峰讨不到任何便宜，太虚派也不会处置那个姓甘的，她或许连命都会送在那里。”

"That's useless." Lonemoon sighed. "Even if what she said is all true, and that master of hers really did all those things. So what? Going to Sword Comprehension Peak will not do her any good, and the Grand Vacuity Sect will also not punish the one named Gan, she might even lose her life there."
“没用的，你那孩儿，醒不过来。”羿清突然冷声道。
"It's no use, your baby won't wake up." Yi Qing suddenly said coldly.
“没看过。”
"Never read it."
“没见过的，不认识？”沈萤摇了摇头，指着岛上的右上角道，“在那！黑衣服那个。”
"I've never seen him before. I don't know him," Shen Ying shook her head and pointed at the upper righthand corner of the island, "There! He's in black."
“没见过，听师叔叫她沈……沈什么来着？没看清，也不知是男是女？”
"Never seen before. Uncle Master called that person Shen… Shen something? Didn't take a good look, not really sure as to that person’s gender?"
“没认主！”孤月一脸看傻逼的表情，“没认主它跟着你干嘛？”还主动开花讨好。
"No?" Lonemoon was incredulous. "Why is it following you then?" It even tried so hard to flower just to please you.
“没道理啊，看速度这小子的确是铸鼎境二重啊，怎么会有那么变态的反应能力？”
"This does not make sense. Seeing the speed of this boy, his power level is indeed at the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. How could he have such obscenely powerful ability to react?
“没错。”孤月一脸复杂的看着地上那株，不断举高高着自己的花，努力想要送给某人的草木灵。要是那三人知道，他们苦心寻找的东西，刚一进秘境就被沈萤捡走了，会不会气炸了。

"That's right," Lonemoon affirmed. He held a puzzled expression as he studied the Thousand Leaves Vegetation Spirit, which was still holding its flower up to Shen Ying, hoping she would accept it. Those three would be so pissed if they found out that the thing they had been trying so hard to look for had fallen into Shen Ying's hands the moment she entered the mystic realm.
“没错。”羿清继续道，“不仅如此，在我驱除剑气的过程中，虽然没有感觉到他还有意识，却似乎一直在有意配合。前期我并没有遇到任何阻碍。只是在我仙气无意间扫过他神识的时候，却突然受到了全力反抗。所有剑气悉数暴动，所以我当时才会被他的剑气侵入，被反伤。”

"Exactly," Yi Qing continued, "That's not all. During the process, he seems to be acting in concert with me intentionally even though he seemed unconscious. The only resistance I encountered was when Immortal Qi swept past his Divine Perception unintentionally. That was a full-fledged one with all the insured Qi, hence my recoil. Other than that, everything was unwrinkled."
“没错。”薄仪点头，又是担心又是愧疚的道，“我们不知道这点，所以才带他离开了曲双城，少了仙脉的压制，安儿被魔气侵蚀暴发才……都是我等连累了贵派。”

“Exactly. ” Pu Yi nodded，before concern and guilt weighed him down, “We didn't know about it, which is why we brought him away from Qushuang City. The demonic aura in An only insurged because there was a lack of the Immortal pulse to suppress it. This then caused... Whatever happened to your sect was all our fault...”
“没错。”郁海珩笑得一脸得意，“我郁家有先祖护佑，恢复修为这种小事，又算得了什么？你们最好乖乖投降，兴许还能留尔等全尸。”

"That's right," Yu Hai Heng smiled smugly. "The ancestors of the Yu Family are watching over me. Recovering my cultivation is such a small matter, how difficult could it be? You'd do well to surrender, I might still be willing to leave your corpses whole."
“没错。”郁红上前道，“按事先联系的，我们带来了足够的灵石，今晚就想进入下界。”
"That's right," Yu Hong answered as she stepped forward. "Just as we discussed, I brought the spirit stones. We want to go to the Lower Realm tonight."
“没错！”奚辰点头，“我看山下之人，敢这么光明正大的前来玄天宗，手里又有噬魂幡。兴许就是那个闯入万魔窟之人。”

"Yes!" Xi Chen nodded. "Seeing how this man dared to come up to Blackheaven Sect so openly, and counting the fact that he is carrying the Soul Devouring Gonfalon, I think he is probably the one who broke into the Myriad Fiend Den.”
“没错！”易峰用力的点头道，“灵主确实提过，所以此花他向来亲自收着，从不轻易示人，除非是在偿试开启界门之时。”

"That's right!" Yi Feng nodded. "Spirit Master mentioned it before. That's why he personally protects this flower and never lets anyone near it, unless they're trying to help him break open the realm gate"
“没错！”郁红用力点了点头，一脸兴奋，“长老放心，思羽试过他们每个人的身手，她们确实都很有天份。”
"That's right!” Yu Hong nodded excitedly, "Don't worry, Elder, Si Yu has tested each of them and they're all very talented."
“没错！”鹿王头一个响应，“我儿就是死在他们手里，与其在这里猜来猜去，不如出去杀个痛快。三宗六派又如何，我们妖类什么时候怕过他们！”

"That's right!" echoed the Deer Monarch. "My children died at their hands. Instead of guessing, I'd rather slaughter a way out. So what if they are the Six Schools Three Sects, when have we demons been afraid of them?"
“没错，你且像平日练习一般就好，不必拘谨。”
"That's right. Just do it like it is your every day practice. There is no need to be humble."
“没错，就是害点灭了整个轩辕世家的那两个……”
"Yes, they were the two who almost wiped out the Xuan Yuan Family..."
“没错，我也是郁家人，是升仙塔真正的主人，更是郁家的第一代当家郁昊天。”他语气里全都是森森的冷意，每说一句四周的黑气就越深，“惊讶吗？！世人都以为我早已经飞升成仙，却不知我已弃道成魔，一直留在这塔内，等一个成为真魔的机会！就连郁家都已经忘了我的存在。”

"That's right, I belong to the Yu Family too. I am the real owner of this Immortal Ascension Pagoda, and the first-generation Master of the Yu Family, Yu Haotian." His tone became more and more hostile and the black fog around him thickened with each sentence. "Are you surprised? Everybody in this world knows that I have already achieved Immortal Ascension, but they don't know that I have abandoned the Dao and become a demon. I remained in this tower, waiting for the chance to become a Perfected Demon! Even the people of my Yu Family have forgotten of my existence."
“没错，我的确要去悟剑峰！”她眼神一沉，紧了紧手心，努力半会才将心底即将翻涌而出的暴戾给压了回去，朝她露出个笑容，“既然你能猜到这些，就该知道我此去可能就回不来了，你就……好自为之吧。”

"You're right, I really am going to Sword Comprehension Peak!" Her eyes grew dark and she clenched her hands into fists. It was only after much effort that she managed to suppress the raging emotions inside her that were on the brink of erupting. Giving Shen Ying a smile, she said, "Since you have guessed this, you should know that I might not be able to return, so you will have to… look after yourself."
“没错，我认得他。”另一人开口道，“门派大比那日见过，他就是跟在那妖女旁边的人。”
"That's right, I recognsie him," another person replied. "I saw him that day at the competition amongst the sects. He was seated next to the demoness."
“没错，本仙以劫雷毁你仙骨，也只是好心保你一命而已。若是仙骨已成，必会被这方世界排斥，就凭你不到地仙的修仙，根本抵抗不了天地威压。”

"That's right. I wanted to use the Lightning Tribulation to destroy your immortal bones and save your life. If you form immortal bones, this world will reject you immediately. Even if a cultivator like you achieves immortality, you would not be able to withstand the pressures of Heaven and Earth."
“没错，此仇不报，枉为妖！”
"Agreed! If we don't exact vengeance, it would be embarrassing to call ourselves demons!"
“没错，没错了，这的确是……”
"That's right, that's right, this is indeed..."
“没错，绸缎庄老板也是，精神比以前好多了。”
"That's right, the boss of the textile shop, Old Zhuang, also said that his mental condition has improved."
“没错，而且看这动静，那东西估计还不小。”孤月一脸激动的道，“你们赶紧的，收拾准备一下，我们这就过去。”
"That's right, and from the stir, this item must not be small." Lonemoon continued excitedly, "You guys hurry and pack up, we will go over and check it out."
“没错，这些出界的妖，最过份也只顶多出去吃几个凡人而已。又没吃他们三宗六派的第子。”蛇王也猜测道，“他们没必要这样撕破脸吧？”

"That's right! The worst the demons who went beyond the Demon Realm borders did was to devour some mere mortals. It's not as if the disciples of the Six Schools Three Sects had been eaten," analyzed the Snake Monarch. "There's no need for them to go this far, right?"
“没错，这破地方，我算是待够了。灵气稀薄，资源又少，再这样把寿元耗下去，我等怕是升仙无望。”
"That's right, I have had enough of this crappy place. The Spirit Qi is so diluted, resources are also limited. If we continue to waste our lives over here, we may never get to become immortals."
“没问题大仙，大仙对房子可有具体需求？”
“No problem, Great Immortal. Does Great Immortal have any specific requirements for this house?"
“没问题，大仙！”卖力点头。
"No problem, Great Immortal!" The Rabbit Monarch nodded its head vigorously.
“河边啊！”沈萤抬手指了指左边，想了想又换到了右边。
"By the riverside!" Shen Ying pointed her finger to the left, but after thinking for a moment she switched to the right.
“混账东西，这一炉丹药几乎全炸了，你是怎么做事的？”
"You darned brat, this cauldron full of elixirs has been completely destroyed! What the hell did you do?"
“混账！”
"Bastard!"
“游仙？”中间那人突然反问了一句，冷冷一哼，突然满天威压就朝着羿清铺天盖地的压了过去。
"Traveling immortals?" the person in the center asked and tutted. The air pressure suddenly rose and Yi Qing felt a strong suppressive force weighing on him.
“滚。”你个素菜！
"Get lost." You vegetable thing!
"Get lost!"
“滚！”他一把拍下她的爪子，“你走不走，不走我收回了。”
"Scram!" Slapping her hand away, he warned, "If you don't leave I'm going to take it back."
“滚！”他瞪了她一眼，“你一天到晚都在想什么？别烦我了。”
"Get lost!" Lonemoon glared at Shenying, "What do you even think about all day? Stop bothering me."
“滚！”我没有你这样没良心的闺女。
"Scram!" I don't have such an unfilial daughter like you.
“滚！”沈萤一脚把他的脸踩到了地上，转头看向孤月道，“你那个扇子的交通工具也借我一下，这么多人呢！”
"Get lost!" Shen Ying stomped its face onto the ground and then turned to look at Lonemoon, saying, "Can you lend me your fan transport? There's too many people!"
“滚！”素菜没有发言权。
"Get lost!" A vegetable thing has no right to speak up.
“滚！”谁是你牛爸爸！
"Get lost! I'm not your Father Niu!"
“滚！老子没你这开挂的闺女。”孤月嘴角一抽，克制不住翻了个白眼，如今牛化云这个名字，也就只有她会惊讶了。

"Get lost! I don't have a daughter who is such a cheat." Lonemoon mouth's twitched as he involuntarily rolled his eyes. His name, Niu Huayun[1. Play of words, combination of the names of the two richest businessmen in China. Ma Huateng (Tencent CEO), and Ma Yun (Alibaba CEO). Ma means horse, and Niu here means cow.], was the only thing that had managed to surprise her so far.
“灵……主是……我们易家对长辈的一种特殊的称呼。”易峰扯出一个僵硬的笑容，硬着头皮解释。
"Spirit... Masters are... a special greeting used by people from my Yi Family," Yi Feng forced a smile.
“灵……主？”孤月愣了愣，突然想到什么，拐下一脚差点从剑上摔了下来。
"Spirit... Master?" Lonemoon paused for a moment. Suddenly a thought struck him and he almost fell off from his sword.
“灵主……”易峰有心想问，对方却已经失去了踪迹，他只能一脸沉重的看着下面那片突然出现黑色风刃，可无论怎么放开神识，却仍探不进那些风刃里。他从未听闻，有灵兽可以发出这种黑色的风刃，而且这气息，从来没有遇过，阴冷得……有些可怕，“这里面到底是什么？”

"Spirit Master..." Before Yi Feng could ask a question, his Spirit Master disappeared. He could only continue looking on at the black wind blades. No matter how hard he tried to use his divine perception, he could not see through the wind blades. He had never heard of any spirit beast that could summon this kind of black wind blades. He had also never felt such an aura before. It was frighteningly... cold. "What exactly is in there?"
“灵主。”易峰朝着眼前的人行了个礼，“不知唤属下来，有何吩咐？”
"Spirit Master." Yi Feng bowed and saluted the man in front of him. "May I know what is it you have summoned me for?"
“灵主你去哪？”只是送个人而已，别跟着一起飞走啊喂！
"Spirit Master, where are you going?" We're just sending them off, why are you flying off with them!
“灵主你抱着玄灵花干嘛？”你不是说这是神族的圣物，不许任何人动吗？
"Spirit Master, why are you carrying the Black Spirit Blossom?" Didn't you say that nobody was allowed to touch this holy artifact of your divine race?"
“灵主本不属于此界，它是意外受伤，才来到下界的。恰巧在幻海见到遭遇兽潮的易家先祖，是它逼退了兽群救了先祖，并将御兽之术传于我易家，才让我族得以在上青族立足。这世上除了神族，谁还有统御万兽之能。”他沉声解释，想了想又加了一句，“当然沈大仙除外。”

"My Spirit Master does not belong to this world. He got injured by accident and fell down here. By pure luck, he chanced upon my ancestors, who were caught in a stampede at the Mirage Sea. Spirit Master chased those beasts away and saved my ancestors. Then, he handed down the beast control techniques to my Yi FAmily. That was how my family achieved its standing in the Upper Azure World. Besides the divine race, no one else in this world can control tens of thousands of beasts," Yi Feng explaned. Thinking of something, he added, "Besides Great Immortal Shen, of course."
“灵主，先祖的承诺我们易家终于做到了，您……一路保重啊。”易峰也是一脸的激动加不舍。

"Spirit Master, the Yi Family has finally fulfilled the promise that its ancestors made tens of thousands of years ago. You... please take care," Yi Feng was a mess of emotions, not bearing to see his spirit master go.
“灵主，弟子保证沈掌门绝对不是什么坏人。”易峰继续解释道，“她门下弟子，羿清尊者，就是力破升仙塔，救了各派修士之人。若不是他，弟子和易家各位师伯们，怕早已命丧塔中。而且她这次来，也只是助我前去幻海寻找契约灵……”

"Spirit Master, your disciple promises that Sect Master Shen is not a bad person," Yi Feng explained. "Her disciple, Supremacy Yi Qing, is the one who broke the Immortal Ascension Pagoda and rescued all the cultivators from the various sects. Had it not been for him, your disciple and the various elders of the Yi Family would probably have died inside the pagoda. She's here this time to help me find the Contract Spirit in the Mirage Sea."
“灵主，确实要抓紧时间了。”易峰指了指已经开始缩小的界门，带些着急的提醒了一句。
"Spirit Master, you do need to hurry!" Yi Feng nervously pointed to the realm gate, which was quickly closing.
“灵主，这是否就是……”易峰带着兴奋的问。
"Spirit Master, is this..." Yi Feng asked excitedly.
“灵兽？”孤月愣了愣，可以化形的灵兽，最少也是十一阶以上了吧，“那他老跟我们干嘛？”
"Spirit Beast?" asked Lonemoon, a little surprised. To be able to manifest, Spirit Beasts had to be at least at the eleventh level. "So why is he following us?"
“灵根是不错……”孤月点了点头。
"Your Spirit Roots aren’t bad…" Lonemoon nodded.
“灵珠是什么？”
"What are spiritual pearls?"
“灵神丹！”
"Spirit Pills!"
“炸丹了？”
"The elixir exploded?"
“烤鸡妹子就是冥阴山魔尊戚橙雨。你们不是要去中青界要找她吗？”孤月只得解释一遍，回头瞪了某人一眼，“你丫就不能有一个记住的名字？”

"Roasted Chicken Gal is the Fiend Supremacy on Ming Yin Mountain, Qi Chengyu. Aren't you girls planning to go to the Middle Azure World to look for her?" Lonemoon explained. Turning around to glare at Shen Ying, he chided, "Can't you even remember a freaking name?"
“然后？”
"What about it?"
“照你这拿法，你干脆连人都叫过来得了！”
"Since you have all these items, you might as well ask the owner to come over as well!"
“爱拿多少拿多少？”
"Take as much as I want?"
“父亲招待贵客，元飞哪有不出来招呼的道理，各位贵客请坐。”印元飞却完全没有回去的意思，反而笑得越加的……姹紫嫣红，还引着众人就坐。视线却一直看着思羽，热情得仿佛要发光似的。

"Father is entertaining guests, so how can I not come out to greet them. Ladies and gentlemen, please sit." Showing no intention of leaving, Yin Yuanfei smiled even more… colorfully as he led everyone to their seats, but his line of sight never left Si Yu. He seemed alight with passion.
“爹！”男子几乎是小跑过来，先是朝着沈萤几人行了个礼，“见过几位尊者。”
"Father!" exclaimed the man who came running over. He first saluted Shen Ying and her group. "Greetings, Supremacies."
"Great!"
“牛尊者……看着似乎与往日不同。”羿清皱了皱眉。
"Supremacy Niu... seems a bit different from before," Yi Qing frowned.
“牛尊者。”印风点了点头，“诸位里面请。”
"Supremacy Niu." Yin Feng nodded. "Please proceed inside."
“牛尊者，冷静！”羿清连忙上前一步，拦住了人，“他刚刚化形，还是个孩子，不懂人情事故很正常，你无须放在心上。”

"Supremacy Niu, calm down!" Yi Qing quicky stepped forward and stopped Lonemoon. "It just took form and is still a child. It doesn't know how to interact with other humans and that's perfectly normal. Don't take it to heart."
“牛爸爸……”沈萤打了哈欠，手里的旗歪了下去，“已经一上午了也没收到一个人，要不我们回去吃饭吧。”
"Father Niu…" Shen Ying yawned as the flag in her hand began to tilt. "We've been trying to recruit disciples all day and we haven't recruited a single one. Let's take a break for lunch."
“牛爸爸。”
"Father Niu."
“牛爸爸。”她突然拍肩打断他的话，那张一向懒洋洋的脸上，难得的多了些正经神色，“你要相信他！”
"Father Niu." She interrupted him. Her usually uncaring expression suddenly took on a more serious change. "You have to believe in him!"
“牛爸爸。”沈萤没有回答，想起什么似的推了推他道，“你的储物袋借我用一下。”
"Father Niu." Shen Ying did not answer his question. As if recalling something, she gave him a push and said, "Lend me your storage bag."
“牛爸爸也困在那塔里了？”
"Father Niu is stuck in the pagoda too?"
“牛爸爸，你……没发烧吧！”说着伸手往他额头探去。
"Father Niu, you... you are not sick, are you?" Shen Ying reached her hand out to touch his forehead.
“牛爸爸，你说得太有道理了！”转头一本正经对旁边的人道，“厨子，为了门派的前途，今晚加班吧！快点准备些凉碟、糕点、速食、水果之类好路上吃，一定不能饿坏我们的奥运健儿！明白吗？”

"Father Niu, what you said made so much sense!" She turned to say to the person beside her, "Chef, for the future of our sect, let's work overtime tonight! Quickly prepare some cold dishes, pastries, fast food, fruits and so on to eat on the way. We musn’t let our Olympians be hungry! Understand?"
“牛爸爸，去庆功宴吃饭了。”沈萤朝屋内，那个一脸绝望的人招了招手。
"Father Niu, let's go for the celebration meal." Shen Ying waved towards the a certain person wallowing in despair in the house.
“牛爸爸，我觉得你说得特别有道理！我们去招人吧？”说完转头向旁边的羿清道，“厨子，赶紧把这些糕点打包一下，顺利再做点零食路上吃啊，对了多带点食材，赶不回来还可以野餐。”

"Father Niu, I think you're right! Shall we go and recruit some disciples now?" After saying this, she turned to glance at Yi Qing beside her, saying, "Chef, quickly pack up all of these pastries. We can have them as snacks on the way. Bring more ingredients as well so that we can have a picnic if we don't make it back here in time."
“牛爸爸，把你旁边那盘水果递给我一下。”
"Father Niu, can you pass me that plate of fruits."
“牛肉炒太老、鸡肉没放辣椒、鱼都糊了、汤炖得不浓。牛爸爸，你这样太不尊重小动物了……要不还是让小红来做？”

"Beef is overcooked, there's not enough pepper in the chicken, the fish is too mushy, the soup is not thick enough. Father Niu, you don't have enough respect for these little animals... why not let Little Hong do it?"
“狐妖躲进洞里了？”孤月飞了下来问道，“你干嘛不追进去？”
"Is the fox demon hiding in the cave?" Lonemoon flew down and asked. "Why don't you chase after it?"
“猜的！”
"I simply guessed!"
“玄灵花。”易峰忍不住接口，一脸的肉痛的道，“这是灵主族中……的圣物。”连他都没见过几次呢，居然真的就这么送出去了。

"A Black Spirit Blossom," Yi Feng could not help but complete Bai Ze's sentence. He had a pained expression as he continued, "This is a... monster of the Spirit Master race." Even Yi Feng had only seen it a few times before. He could not believe that his Spirit Master was giving it away just like that.
“玄灵花，需要强大的灵力才能触动界门。”易峰沉声解释道，“听闻这种灵力，比起飞升之时也差不了多少。而且此花世间只有一朵，要是……”

"Only strong spiritual power can make use of this Black Spirit Blossom to break open the realm gates," Yi Feng explained. "It is said that the spiritual power needed is comparable to the amount used when one ascends to immortality. There is only one such flower on this Earth. If..."
“玉鼎。”她突然说了个名字。
"Yu Ding." She suddenly said a name.
“现在不适合出门啊。”
"We shouldn't be leaving the house now."
“现在假装没听见还来得及吗？”
"Is it too late to act like I didn't hear anything?"
“现在咋办？总不能跟人说，门派名字还没想好吧？”他回头瞅了瞅来人，压低声音催促，“赶紧的，地盘是你找到的，快想一个啊。”

"What should we do now? We can't tell him that we haven't thought of our sect name, can we?" Lonemoon turned around to glance at the young man. He lowered his voice and urged Shen Ying, "Hurry, you were the one who found the land. Think of something."
“现在玄天宗暂时回不去，趁此给你科普一下常识吧，不然你怎么死的都不知道。“他清了清嗓子道，“简单的说，我们所在的这个世界叫‘青界’，青界又分三大小界，分别是上青界，中青界，以及下青界。上青界的灵气最为浓郁，中青界其次，下青界很少。所以下青界大多都是凡人，修仙者很少。修为撑死到元婴。听说整个下青界，元婴之人不足十数。”

"We cannot return to the Blackheaven Sect right now. Let me teach you some general knowledge about this world, otherwise you wouldn't even know how you died." He cleared his throat and began, "Simply put, we are in a world called the Azure World. It consists of three large and small worlds, namely the Upper Azure World, Middle Azure World, and the Lower Azure World. The Upper Azure World has the densest Spirit Qi of all, followed by the middle and the Lower Azure World having the least. That's why most of the people in the Lower Azure World are mortals with few being cultivators. The highest form of cultivation is reaching the Nascent Soul realm. Rumor has it that the entire Lower Azure World has fewer than ten Nascent Soul cultivators.”
“现在还管什么疑问？逃命要紧啊！”他们根本干不过一个仙人的，“趁着他还在提升修为，走！”

"What could you possibly want to ask now? We have to run for our lives!" They would never be able to go up against an immortal. "We have to leave now, while his cultivation level is still increasing!"
“现在还管这个？”枫影觉得这群人有病。
"This is not the time for niceties!" Feng Ying felt that this group of people were crazy.
“现在？”他冷笑了一声，“只有化神尊者，才能划破虚空，我哪有这个本事？连接两界的阵法不在这里，跟我来吧！”说着转身就往右走。

"Now?" He laughed humorlessly. "Only Soul Formation Supremacies can tear through the void. I'm not that capable. The array formation that connects the two worlds is not here. Follow me!" He turned toward the right and began to walk.
“甘子睿。”
"Gan Zirui."
“甘子睿的事？”他愣了一下，“你查到啥了？”
"Is it about Gan Zirui?" He was taken aback. "Did you figure out something from your investigations?"
“甘子睿！”戚橙雨也没想到，这么快就可以找到人，双眼瞬间赤红，死死盯向对面的人，“五百年了！你可还认得我？”

"Gan Zirui!" Qi Chengyu had also not expected that he would be found so quickly. Her eyes instantly turned red, and she fixed her gaze on the person opposite her. "It has been five hundred years! Do you still recognize me?"
“甘？”他愣了一下，眼睛大睁，“你说的是甘子睿和玉鼎？”
"Gan?" He faltered for a while, and then his eyes grew wide. "You mean Gan Zirui and Yu Ding?"
“生殖隔离限定了，人跟动物间是不可能有繁殖可能的。所以说……”她歪了歪头，“那个小孩到底哪来的？”
"Separate reproductive systems have resulted in restrictions, humans and animals cannot procreate. So…" She tilted her head. "Where did that kid come from?"
“用剑气劈开火墙，冲过去。”羿清回了一句，手里的剑已经挥出，顿时凌厉的剑气化成一股气流，直接冲向了火海，瞬间劈出了一条通道，但不到三秒又重新被火吞没。

"Let's use our Sword Qi to hack a path through the fire wall and dash over." Yi Qing suggested, thrusting his sword forwards. Immediately, his formidable Sword Qi transformed into a stream of air which rushed directly towards the sea of fire, instantly forming a path in its wake. However, within seconds, this path was swallowed up by the flames.
"You're crazy..."
“Ouch, Ow…”
“白泽!”还没来得及问，那条魔蛟突然开口，声音有些尖锐，带股子格外阴冷的气息，冷笑着看向对面的白泽道，“没想到，你还真的主动入了这幻海之内。”
"Bai Zhe!" Before she could ask, the Wyrm Demon suddenly spoke. Looking at Bai Zhe with a menacing expression, he sneered, "I didn't expect you to enter the Mirage Sea."
“白泽。”到是白泽，主动开了口，转头看了沈萤一眼，再次强调道，“我叫白泽。”说完脸色又开始泛起了红，毛团她一个人叫就好。
"Bai Ze," Bai Ze said curtly. He turned to glance at Shen Ying and raised his voice slightly, "My name is Bai Ze." He began to blush. She would be the only one who coould call him Furball.
“白泽是谁？”
"Who is Bai Ze?"
“白泽道友。”
"Fellow Daoist Bai Ze."
“白泽！”那人却突然转过身来，再次直直的看向对面的沈萤，“我的名字。”
"Bai Ze!" The man suddenly turned around and looked at Shen Ying. "That's my name."
“白痴。”
"idiot."
“白痴！都是因为你，这炉丹药又废了，快去取刚才一样的药材，继续炼……”
"Idiot! It's because of you that this cauldron of elixirs is ruined! Quickly retrieve the same ingredients as before and continue refining..."
“白？”易峰愣了一下，看了她一眼，立马明白过来，沈掌门到底是个姑娘，自然想找些好看点的灵兽，可以理解。
"White?" Yi Feng hesitated and glanced at her. Then, he understood. Sect Master Shen was a lady afterall. Naturally, she was looking for spirit beasts that looked good. This was understandable.
“的确会……一点。”
“Yes, I do know...a little.”
“的确如此。”呈安点了点头道，“可那些见过妖怪的人，确实没有受伤。弟子还给那些人一一看过脉象，无论是精神还是躯体都没损伤，而且听他们说……好像比往常还强壮了。”

"That is indeed the case." Cheng An nodded and said, "Those who have seen the demon were indeed not injured. Disciple has also checked the pulse of every one of them, there was no damage to either their mind or body, and they even said that… they seemed to be even stronger than usual."
“的确如此。”奚秋神色更加凝重，“恶鬼一向最怕灵气，如今三日过去它们还未出来，弟子猜测这幡内恐怕……已有鬼王。”

"You are right." Xi Qiu's expression became graver. "Demon souls are most afraid of Spirit Qi. Now that three days have passed and they have yet to come out, I'm guessing that this gonfalon may already have a Ghost King."
“相当于一次各门派之间的，技能太比拼。”孤月解释道，“上青界所有门派世家都可以参加，按修为境界一共设立三个分组，练气，筑基和金丹，取最高的前三名。由主办方出资奖励。”

"It’s equivalent to a competition where each sect gets to compete their skills against each other," Lonemoon explained. "All the sects from the aristocratic families in the Upper Azure World can participate according to cultivation realm. There are three separate divisions: Spirit Training, Foundation Establishment and Golden Core. The top three in each divisions will receive an award from the organizer."
“看什么看！你也有份好吗？”孤月回头瞪了羿清一眼，“再说，她又不会有事。”
"What are you looking at! You had a part to play in this too, okay?" Lonemoon turned around to glare at Yi Qing. "Besides, she'll be alright."
“看你们往哪跑！”嗖的一下，孤月也一起攻了上去。
"Let's see where you all can escape to!" Lonemoon immediately attacked together with Yi Qing.
“看你反应就知道了。”牛爸爸虽然管无敌派的人管得宽了些，但向来只“窝里横”，对外人他可是十分客气随和，注意形象的，只在背后默默挖坑。但唯独对白泽不一样，他好像从一开始就不怎么喜欢他。甚至在羿清强烈反对的时候，坚定的站在了他那边，连刚刚送对方回神界时，都顺便补了一脚。

"I know from your responses," Father Niu did not care much for the people in Invincible Sect, but he has always only shown his ugly side to people from the sect. To outsiders, he was always polite and easy-going because he cared so much about his image. He would only talk about them behind their backs. Yet, he treated Bai Ze differently. Right from the beginning, he did not look fond of Bai Ze. When Yi Qing strongly opposed to him being in the sect, Lonemoon insisted on taking Yi Qing's side. Lonemoon even kicked Bai Ze through the realm gate earlier.
“看出来的啊！”自从那个咸猪手说出那个消息后，她这几天烤鸡都烤得不专心了，水平大减。
"It was obvious!" Ever since that lecher had given her that news, her mind had not been on the task of roasting chicken the past few days, resulting in a great drop in cooking standard.
“看吧，果然闹肚子了。”沈萤一本正经的道。
"Look, his stomach is suffering," Shen Ying commented calmly.
“看在你还算听话的份上，走吧！我不杀你。”
"Seeing that you are so obedient, you can go! I won't kill you."
“看我干嘛！”孤月瞪了回去，“我谈的是正经生意，没坑人！”
"What are you looking at me for?" Lonemoon glared indignantly at them in return. "It was a legitimate business deal. I didn't cheat them!"
“看我干嘛？”孤月瞪了她一眼，气还没消呢，“都是谁害的！老子现在不也没地方去了，你们爱去哪去哪，我随便。”
"Why are you looking at me?" Lonemoon glared at her; his anger had not simmered down. "Whose fault is this! I also do not have a place to go now. You guys can go wherever you like, I don't care."
“看我干嘛？”沈萤一愣，“我说错啥了吗？”
"Why are you all looking at me?" Shen Ying paused, "Did I say anything wrongly?"
“看我干嘛？刚刚吃得最多的，不是你吗？”用一下她的名字怎么了，“总不能告诉他真名吧？羿清不也改名叫萝卜的吗？”
"What are you looking at me for? You were the one who ate the most just now." I'm only using your name. "We can't tell him our real names, can we? Yi Qing changed his name to Radish as well."
“看招！流星拳！”
"Take this! Shooting Star Punch!"
“看招！缠丝手！”
"Take this! Silk Hands!"
“看来不再给你点教训，你这个废物的脑子永远不会灵光！”
“Looks like I’m going to have to teach you a lesson, or your good-for-nothing brain will never learn!”
“看来不是啊？”孤月更加好奇了，“那你身上这系统到底是什么？”
"So you didn't transmigrate?" Lonemoon's curiosity peaked. "Then what is this system in your body?"
“看来你还记得我。”它冷笑了一声，眼里的杀意更重，“以往你在岸上，我打不过你。但现在你主动送上门来。正好，万年前你伤我之仇，现在可以算个清楚。”

"So you still remember me." The Wyrm Demon laughed coldly, the murderous intent in his eyes intensifying. "In our previous encounters, you were on land, so I couldn't defeat you. Now by coming here, you deliver yourself to your enemy. Just as well, I can pay you back for the injuries you caused me ten thousand years ago."
“看来姑娘也是同道中人啊。”易峰一喜，御兽之术向来需要长时间与灵兽为伍，甚至有时为取得灵兽的信任，还不得不与灵兽一同生活，所以御兽之术很少有女修喜欢，特别是像雪银这种长得有些恐怖的高阶灵兽。这会好不容易遇见个特别的，他顿时来了兴趣，“灵兽虽然大多长相可怖，但相处久了就会发现，其实兽比人更重感情。我那雪银就是，一但认主便会终身待在主人身边，只是世人皆重皮相，认为兽类太过凶残恐怖。”

"It seems that you, Lady, are very similar to me." Yi Feng smiled. The techniques related to spirit beasts required one to first get familiar with a spirit beast which required a long time. Sometimes, in order to earn the spirit beast's trust, one had to live with it. That explained why few female cultivators enjoyed taming beasts, especially when it came to high-level spirit beasts which looked as terrifying as Xue Yin did. Yi Feng was happy to know that Shen Ying was interested—she was a rare find indeed. "Spirit beasts may look scary, but as you interact with them, you'll find that they're actually more sentimental than humans are. Xue Yin is like that. Once it acknowledges its master, it will follow its master for life. Humans just tend to be superficial. They get scared once they see how scary these beasts look."
“看来是我达到了铸鼎境二重，蓝色元力凝练了，这黑色元力也被凝练了，所以消耗的速度变慢了很多。”

"Looks like I've reached the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. The blue essence force is more condensed; the black essence force has also become more condensed, thus its consumption speed has become much slower than before."
“看来这个世界真心对自己好的，只有娘亲，大爷爷和小奴吧？”
"Are Mother, Grandfather, and Xiaonu the only ones in this world who would show real kindness to me?"
“看来这几天要仔细观察柳长老炼丹，先把这炼丹的手法学会再说……”
Looks like I should carefully observe how Elder Liu refines elixirs for the next couple of days. I must first learn the art of refining elixirs before I can think of doing anything else...
“看来这秘境入口的位置是随机的。”孤月看向旁边的羿清道，“还好我们事先在身上种了随影术，才不至于走……咦，沈萤呢！？”

"Looks like entrance to the mystic realm is completely random." Lonemoon turned to face Yi Qing and continued, "We're lucky that we set up the shadow imitation on our own bodies. Surely we won't get… Ah, where's Shen Ying?!"
“看来这里就是陪练的地方了，这小房间是练功房？这最少有二十间吧？难怪陪练不够。”

It seems like this is the place where sparring practice occurs. Is this small room the technique-practicing room? Surely there must be at least twenty rooms here, no? No wonder there are not enough sparring partners available.
“看见树林外面那座修士城了吗？城内就有到玄天宗的传送阵。”戚橙雨指了指前面的城池道。
"Do you see the cultivator city outside the woods? There is a transportation array to Blackheaven Sect inside the city." Qi Chengyu pointed to the road ahead.
“真不知道。”
"I really don't know."
“真人不必客气。”那人笑了笑，看了众人一眼。早知道是郁家的人，他就不接这笔生意了，还好没真把人送到下界。他立马就御剑离开了现场，可不想招惹上世家的事。

"You're welcome, Perfected One." The man smiled and glanced around at everyone else. If he had known that they were people from the Yu Family, he would not have taken up this business deal. Thank goodness he did not really bring them to the Lower Realm. He immediately rode his sword and left the premises, not wanting to be involved with this Upper World aristocratic family's business.
“真人，人我已经带来了。我……可以走了吧？”那个带路的男子朝着振祥行礼道。
"Perfected One, I have brought them here so I… can leave now, right?" The man who had led the way for the girls bowed towards Zhen Xiang.
“真是死不悔改！”孤月刚要动手结果了它。
"You truly have no remorse!" Lonemoon was about to end its life.
“真没有啊，大仙！”魔王要哭了，敢情你是来找人的，你早说啊！他又没说不讲。
“Realllyyy, Great Immortal！”The Demon King was close to weeping. If she was here to find someone, why not say earlier! What was all these for when he didn't plan to hide what he knew anyways!
“真没看到？”沈萤继续问。
“Really?”Shen Ying continued to question.
“真的是背云兽！”易峰也有些愣住了，没想到他们遇到的第一只妖兽就是背云兽，这也太背了点。
"It really is a 背云兽!" Yi Feng stared in amazement. He did not think that the first beast he would come across would be a 背云兽. It was incredible.
“真的真的。”他直接掏出了灵石，“掌柜的莫怪，我们是真的忘了。”
"I'm serious, I'm serious," Lonemoon answered as he took his spirit stones out of his bag. "Forgive us, Owner, we really just forgot."
“真的真的！”它狂点头，“我修的素食道，您看我身上的毛，没有半点腥血怨气。”
"Yes, yes!" The Rabbit Monarch nodded its head frantically. "I cultivate in the Way of the Herbivore. Look at my fur, there isn't the slightest bit of blood or grievance on it."
“真的还有一只八阶狐妖？”
"Are you certain that there is another demon, an eighth-level fox demon?"
“真的！”他以为她不信，带些着急的道，“我以后……也不会再给别人了，你相信我。”那是神族最重要的信物。
"Really!" He insisted, thinking that she did not believe him. "I will never... never give it to another person. Believe me." That was the most important momento among those in the divine race.
“真的！”沈萤一喜，“那好吃吗？”
"Really!" Shen Ying exclaimed, "Are they delicious?"
“真的？”枫影眼神一亮，带些怀疑的扫了他一眼，“你不会骗我吧？不后悔？”
"Really?" Feng Ying's eyes lit up, scanned over at him with a tinge of suspicion, "Are you lying to me? You won't regret?"
“真的？”沈萤有点好奇凑近了点，“你复活一下看看。”
"Really?" Shen Ying grew more curious as she moved in closer. "Go revive it."
“真要出事……叛出门派跑了就是。什么正道仙门，也不是什么干净的地方。他们若真想为玉鼎老贼报仇，只管邀众派一起攻来我冥阴山。”她冷笑了一声，似是想到什么事，眼睛缓缓变成了血红色，手下意识的抓紧了衣衫，“我到想问问这些名门正派，五百年前玉鼎破我元阴之身，毁我百年修为，囚禁在地牢做炉鼎之仇，我怎么就报不得了？”

"If anything goes wrong… abandon the sect and escape. This so-called orthodox and immortal sect is not the godly place you think it is. If they really want to avenge the old thief, just invite them to come and attack me in Ming Ying Mountain." She laughed coldly, then seeming to think of something, her eyes slowly turned blood red and her hands grasped her dress unconsciously. "I want to ask these famous orthodox sects this. Five hundred years ago, Yu Ding defiled my Nascent Soul body, destroying my hundred years of cultivation and imprisoning me in the dungeons to use as a cultivation sex slave. Why can't I take revenge?"
“知道你舍不得老乡。”他拍了拍她的肩膀，笑道，“飞升之劫凶险万分，不到万不得已，我也不想轻易引动劫雷。能不能渡过还不一定呢。”

"I know that you can't bear to leave a fellow compatriot." He patted her on the shoulder and smiled. "The Lightning Tribulation is so dangerous that I won't activate the tribulation unless I have no other recourse. I'm not sure whether I can make it through the transcendence successfully."

"Form your contract!" Bai Ze instructed.
“给你疗伤的人在这里！”坐在床沿还把着脉的孤月翻了个白眼，明明坐得最近的是自己，他到底哪来的技能，一睁眼锁定的就是沈萤啊。

"The person who nursed you is here!" exclaimed Lonemoon, who was sitting on the edge of the bed taking Yi Qing' s pulse. He was obviously the one sitting closest to Yi Qing, yet Yi Qing's gaze had uncannily locked on Shen Ying first.
“给你，烤鸡妹子跟我们挺熟的，把这个给她，她应该会收留你们的。”
"This is for you. Roasted Chicken Gal knows us very well, so take this to her. She’ll definitely take you in."
“给我？”沈萤瞅了瞅眼前瑟瑟发抖的小动物，愣了一下。
"For me?" Shen Ying glanced at the animal trembling before her and hesitated.
“给！”他掏出个灵石袋递给她，“今天我高兴，赏你了。”
"Here!" Lonemoon passed a few bags of spirit stones to her, saying, "For you. I'm in a happy mood today."
“绸缎庄那天丢了只大公鸡。”
"The textile shop lost a big rooster."
“缠丝手！”
"Silk Hand!"
“罢了罢了……要不就试试吧，虽然大爷爷经常告诫我功法在没确认可靠程度前不要乱练。”

“Forget it, forget it! Hmmm… How about I give it a try? Grandfather always chides me not to practice any random cultivation technique before I have fully confirmed the potential of my abilities, but this is a special situation…”
“罢了！”那游仙却直接截下了他的话头，“竟然此事已经宣扬出去了，其它人要进就让他们进吧。只是里面的风险我等已经提醒过你们了，你们自己好自为之吧！”

"Forget it!" The Traveling Immortal cut him short. "The news has already spread. We can no longer stop people from entering. I have already warned all of you of the risks present here. From here on out, you're on your own!"
"Yi Qing..."
“羿清也好，其它人也好。修为都在提升，却只有我……一个人没有寸进，换成是你，你想得通！”
"Whether we're talking about Yi Qing or other cultivators, everyone seems to be improving, yet I... I'm the only one whos stagnant. If you were in my shoes, wouldn''t you be upset!"
“羿清此心日月可召，天地可鉴！”
"The Sun and Moon, along with the Heaven and Earth can testify my sincerity!"
“羿清长老说过，任何人任何情况下，都不能违反这一条，即使天塌下来！”
" Yi Qing said that no one should violate this rule under any circumstances, not even if the sky falls!"
“羿清！”奚秋一惊，再次从椅子上站了起来，“你就是那个散修羿清。”
"Yi Qing!" Xi Qiu exclaimed in surprise, rising from his chair once again. "You are that itinerant cultivator Yi Qing."
“羿清！”孤月睁大了眼，“你这是干什么？”
"Yi Qing!" Lonemoon's eyes widened. "What are you doing?"
“羿清！”孤月连忙退了回来。
"Yi Qing!" Lonemoon quickly retreated.
“羿清！”对方又是一惊，似是想到了什么，脸色一白，“你，你……你就是杀了芮糜那个剑修！”他神情一变，也顾不是对方的回答了，用力挥出一掌，化出一团骷髅样的黑气攻了过来，自己却转身往后遁逃。

"Yi Qing!" The other party was shocked, seemingly recalling something as his face turned white as sheet. "You, you… You are the one who killed Rui Mi!" His expression changed and without caring for a response, he made a move with all his strength, manifesting a skull-shaped cloud of black smoke to attack forwards as he turned and ran backwards.
“羿清！你……你TM也太狠了吧？！”这么一剑，会死人的吧，一定会的吧。
"Yi Qing! You... you're f*cking ruthless!" You were clearly out to kill me with that move.
“羿清，攻击它脚下！”血祭大阵下万物不生，虽然这阵还没有完成，但血狐站在阵眼处，那些血雾自会保护主人，他们是伤不到它的，除非逼它出阵。

"Yi Qing, attack its feet!" No living things could survive within the Blood Sacrifice Array. Although the array was not yet complete, because the blood fox was standing at the eye of the array, these blood clouds would still protect their master. They could not touch him, unless they forced him out of the array.
“羿清，真的叫羿清，人呢，他现在在哪？！”孤月却越加激动，一把拉住了人急声问。
"Yi Qing, his name is really Yi Qing. Where is he now!?" Growing increasingly excited, Lonemoon urged Xi Qiu for an answer.
“羿真人听闻你除魔卫道已久，对魔修的阴气最为熟悉，可否请你探查全派上下，找出那个魔修。”奚秋沉声请求道。

"Perfected Yi, we heard that you have been spending a lot of time in slaying fiends and defending the Dao, hence you are the most familiar with the Yin Qi of fiendish cultivators. Can we get you to investigate the entire sect to search out that fiendish cultivator?" Xi Qiu lowered his voice and pleaded.
“羿真人果然敏锐！”奚秋用力一把推开了前方的一扇房门，“这里的确来过魔修。”
"Perfected Yi is indeed sharp!" Xi Qiu pushed open the door in front with much force. "A fiendish cultivator did come by."
“羿道友。”印风有些惊讶的看着沈萤，没想到对方来得这么快？
"Fellow Daoist Yi," Yin Feng looked surprised when he saw Shen Ying. How did you make it so quickly?
“羿道友不必自谦，此人祸害一方，早已被各派联合通缉。”奚秋笑得更加开心，指了指他手上的幡旗道，“如今他既在我派管辖之地伏法，那超渡噬魂幡的事，本门自当责无旁贷。”

"You don't have to be modest. This man has been wanted by all factions for a long time." Xi Qiu smiled even more happily, pointing to the flag in his hand. "Now that he is in my sect's jurisdiction, it is our duty to release the souls from the Soul Devouring Gonfalon."
“羿道友既然已有师门，我等当然不会勉强您另择良师。”他笑了笑，继续劝道，“不过，我派素来有客座长老一职，道友已经是金丹道君，不如在我派做位客卿如何？”

"Since you already have a master, I will certainly not force you to choose another." He smiled and continued to persuade him, "But there is always the position of guest elder in my sect, and since my Fellow Daoist is already a Golden Core Dao Lord, how about becoming a guest elder in my sect?"
“羿道友，不知你此次前来玄天宗，所为何事？”奚秋问。
"Fellow Daoist Yi, what brings you to Blackheaven Sect?" Xi Qiu asked.
“羿道友，不知那魔修芮糜……”
"Fellow Daoist Yi, is the Soul Devouring Gonfalon..."
“羿道君，你这师……”暗挫挫挪到了羿清旁边的陆修士，刚想开口问问，却发现对方正双眼放光看着前面的人。咦？你这是兴奋庆幸加崇拜，似乎控制不住想满世界得瑟的眼神是肿么回事？他到底找了两个什么护卫啊喂！

"Dao Lord, your Master…" Cultivator Lu, who had silently moved over to Yi Qing, was about to ask him something when he realized that Yi Qing was looking at the person in front with star-gazed eyes. Huh? That look of exaltation, joy and hero-worship. His smug expression seemed to say that he wanted the whole world to envy him. What was this about? Just what kind of guards had he picked?
“老不死，你是知道我的寿命无多，所以心急火燎地赶来要送我一程么？”无名笑眯眯地问。
"Old Fart Undying, are you that anxious to send me to my death?” Wu Ming asked smilingly. “Is it because you learned that I don't have much longer to live?"
“老头们说他跟上青界的某个人，沾亲带故，所以才破例放进去的。名义上是悟剑峰的守山弟子，等他升上化神，就可以直接去上青界。”

"The old folks said that he was related to someone in the Azure World, so he was allowed inside as an exception to the rules. In name, he was a disciple who guarded Sword Comprehension Peak. Once he reached the realm of Soul Formation, he could directly head to the Upper Azure World."
“老子干嘛自己做饭？”
"I have never had to cook for myself."
“老子问你了解些啥？没问你食谱啊喂！”敢情这几个月你全用来吃吃吃了，还有猪食是什么鬼？信不信我翻脸，“算了！你只要知道，他现在这种情况，除非把剑气收回去，不然我们最多只能停在这里就行了。”

"I am asking about what you understand? Not asking for your recipes!" Of course you spent these few months eating away, and what pig's feed? I am going to flip out. "Forget it! You only need to know that in his current situation, unless the Sword Qi is contained, we can only stop here."
“老实说，你身上到底有什么？”
"Tell me the truth, what are you carrying with you?"
“老朋友，今生没能带你进入仙域，我很抱歉……”
"Old friend,” Wu Ming muttered, “my apologies, but I cannot bring you to the immortal realm today…”
“老朽等了五万年，强撑着一缕残魂就为传承我丹阳宗的练丹之术。自然是能者接之，我看此人甚好。”

"I have waited 50,000 years for this, and have hung in here as a remnant soul, all for the sake of handing down the pill refining techniques of the Dan Yang Sect. This man here is perfectly capable to take over the heritage, so I'm handing it down to him.”
“而且当时快到中午了。”错过了饭点多可惜啊，“所以我完全是……”
"Moreover, it was almost noon at that time." Missing lunch would have been such a pity. "So it was all because…"
“而且我们发现，城内靠近外侧这样的地方还很多，几乎每隔十几丈左右就会出现一处，也不知是何原因？可否与孤月兄所说的魔界之门有关？”

He added, "Also, we found out that such places are common near the borders of the city. For some reason, almost every hundred feet such an area would appear. But I'm not sure if this is related to the Door of Demon Realm that brother Lonemoon mentioned."
“而且我的剑意早已成形，闭关只为稳定修为，不会出什么事的。”
"What's more, my sword intent has already taken shape. I'm only locking myself up to firm up my cultivation, so I'll definitely be alright."
“职责所在，不必客气。”羿清看了看四周，“此处林深恐有危险。”
"It is my responsibility, you are welcome." Yi Qing looked at the surrounding and said, "I'm afraid this deep forest might be looming with danger."
“聚珍阁果然不凡！”
"The Pearl Gathering Pavilion is definitely special!"
“聚珍阁！”
"The Pearl Gathering Pavilion! "
“肉啊。”她回得一脸理所当然，转头就看向羿清道，“都没吃午饭吧，来来来厨子，你看看哪个部位肉好，随便选。”
"It's meat,” she replied matter-of-factly. Turning to Yi Qing, she said, "You haven't eaten lunch, have you? Go ahead, Chef, pick the choicest part of this beast."
“肉，很多很多的肉。”
"Meat, lots of meat."
“肤浅的妇人！”振祥横了她一眼道，“我这都是为了除魔卫道，麻痹那群魔修！”
"Shallow woman!" Zhen Xiang glanced at her, saying, "All I did was to annihilate fiends and protect the Dao to paralyze that bunch of fiendish cultivators!"
“胡……胡说，也没多少……”
"Ru... rubbish, it's not alot..."
“胭脂铺家的兔子不见了。”
"The rabbit in the rouge store is missing".
“胭脂铺掌柜的老寒腿都好了。”
"The rouge shop owner is cured of the rheumatism in his legs."
“能困住半个时辰就行。”羿清又转向另外两个人道，“印家主和轩辕家主从旁协助。无论是谁，困住一个游仙就好，其它人交给我。”
