"We just need to hold them off for half an hour." Yi Qing turned to two other men. "Patriarch Yin and Patriarch Xuan Yuan please back him up. Just hold off any one of the traveling immortals, as for the others, leave them to me."
“能干嘛，当然是去收弟子啊！”孤月翻了个白眼道，“我已经打听过了，明日就是上青界各大世家门派，一年一次收徒的日子，到时所有想要修道的人都会去各仙城报名，离我们最近的就是上青城了。”

"What for? Why, to recruit disciples of course!" Rolling his eyes at her, Lonemoon explained, "I’ve already inquired about it. Tomorrow is the day when the Upper Azure World’s aristocratic families and major sects conduct their annual recruitment of disciples. Those who wish to practice cultivation will all head to the various towns to register and the closest town to us is Upper Azure Town."
“能用，能用！”兔王连忙点头，何止是能用，简直是太能用了。这么多妖丹，连它都激动得有些手抖了。要知道妖类之间从来都没有什么和平共存，素来也是相互撕杀的，为的就是对方的内丹。吃了对方的内丹对它们的修为可是太有益处，可一般妖类大多性烈，宁愿自爆也不会留下妖丹，而且妖体死亡一刻钟之后，如不赶紧取出，内丹也会直接损坏。而它却在这里看到了满地完整妖丹……这么多……这么多！

"Useful, useful!" The Rabbit Monarch immediately nodded. It was way more than just useful. These many demon cores made even the Demon Monarch stir with such excitement that its hands trembled. Demons had never exactly lived in peace with each other; killings amongst each other were commonplace, all just so that they could obtain the other's internal core. Consuming another's internal core was extremely beneficial to their cultivation, but most of the demons would much rather self-implode and not leave their demon cores lying around. Moreover, once a demon was dead, its core would be damaged if it was not retrieved from its body within 15 minutes. Yet, the floor here was full of intact demon cores… so many… so many!
“能能能！”总算恢复了说话能力的家主，用力的点头，“大仙看得上，是轩辕家的福份！”
"Yes, yes, yes!" The Master had finally regained his ability to speak. Nodding furiously, he said, "Great Immortal, it is our honor to offer to you something that you like!"
“能问个问题不？”
"Can I ask a question?"
“脱掉衣服，放在胸口就可以。”
"Take off his clothes and place the core on his chest."
“自然。”说到自己的专业，他像是背书似的脱口而出，“御兽之术，从寻踪、观气、运法、立阵到后面的，扬威、结印，乃至最后的契约，一样都不能少。”

"Naturally." This was Yi Feng's expertise. He began to recite the techniques from memory, "Every stage of beast control - from the pursuit, the observation and the movement, to the battle, the domination, the sealing and the contract - is equally important."
“自然是你们都不能成仙的意思。”那人眼神全都是嘲弄，似乎一点都不担心自己的处境一样，“只是一方小世界，也枉想登仙？真是可笑！没说只是让你受八十三道天雷，就算再多受一倍，你们也没有飞升的资格。此界根本没有天门。”

"It means none of you can ascend," the man mocked. He did not seem worried about his own situation at all. "You're just part of a small world, yet you dream of achieving immortality? What a joke! Let's not talk about going through 83 bolts of divine lightning - you won't even be fit to become an immortal even if you go through double of that. There is simply no such thing as an Heavenly Gate in this realm."
“自然！”杨管事看出了江逸的担忧，笑道：“我们武殿最重声誉，做事情也绝对公平公正，说一不二，这一点你放心。”

"Of course!" Manager Yang had spotted Jiang Yi's concerns and, smiling, he replied, "Our Martial Arts Hall takes our reputation most seriously, and when we do things we're definitely fair and impartial. We keep our word - that, you can be rest assured about."
“臭死了！”
"It stinks!"
“至于你父亲，按夫人的说法，你……没有父亲！”
"As for your father, according to My Lady, you... you don't have one!"
“芮糜……”掉在院里的人挣扎着想要爬起来，却伤得太重，努力了半天才撑起了半边身子，“你这魔头，用活人灵魂祭噬魂幡，我等正道修士……人人得而诛之！”

"Rui Mi… " The man who had fallen into the yard struggled to stand. The severity of his injuries made it almost impossible for the man to support his body upright, "You fiend, the use of living human souls to sacrifice to a Soul Devouring Gonfalon is condemned by us orthodox cultivators!"
“芮糜已死！”
"The Soul Devouring Gonfalon is dead!"
“苍狼！”
"Lone Wolf!"
“苍狼，你去哪？”
"Lone Wolf, where are you going?"
“苍狼，出战吧！”杨管事咧嘴一笑，朝江逸招了招手，这翊凌雪本就是他通知的，否则怎么会来得那么快？
"Lone Wolf, head out for combat!" Manager Yang grinned widely and waved his hand towards Jiang Yi. He was the one who informed this Yi Lingxue, after all, otherwise how could she arrive so soon?
“苍狼，出战！”
"Lone Wolf, it's time to do battle!"
“苍狼，出来对战了！”
"Long Wolf, come out and battle!"
“苍狼？怎么还不进来？”
"Lone Wolf? Why are you not coming inside?"
“若是再留一刻，恐怕不止是金丹碎裂，我俩都要死在那里！”
"If we stayed any longer, I am afraid not only would my Golden Core have been shattered, the both of us would have died there!"
“若是大仙不方便，改日也行。大仙放心我并没有向他透露您的任何信息。”怕她生气，轩辕禹立马又接了句，“我这就去通知印家主，取消明日的宴席。”

"If it's not convenient for you, Great Immortal, we can always postpone it. Rest assured that I have not told him anything about you." Afraid that Shen Ying would get mad, Xuan Yuanyu quickly added, "I will go and inform the Yin Family Master to cancel tomorrow's banquet immediately."
“茶水还是热的。”
"The tea in your room is still hot."
“草木灵不可能在人修的地方生长，又需要浓郁的木灵气。”羿清接口道，“所以他才认为这个秘境里会有。”

"The vegetation spirit cannot grow amongst human cultivators. It needs thick wood Spirit Qi to survive,” Yi Qing explained. "That's why the family thinks that they can find more in this mystic realm."
“草木灵就是草木灵气汇聚而成的生灵。”孤月解释道，“灵草灵植虽然身附灵气，生命也比妖兽更长久，却不能生出灵智。但若是在灵植特别多的地方，浓郁的木灵气有可能会在灵植中催生出草木灵。但这种机率低到可以忽略不记，我也是第一次见到草木灵。”

"A vegetation spirit is a spirit formed from vegetation Spirit Qi," Lonemoon explained. "Although spirit herbs contain Spirit Qi, they have no way of gaining sentience. But if they grow in a place with an exceptional population of spirit herbs, the thick wood Spirit Qi can cause the spirit herbs to turn into a vegetation spirit. The chances of that happening are negligible, though. This is the first time I'm coming across one myself."
“草木灵植的生命向来极为坚韧，没准还真能起死回生。”
"The lifeforce of Vegetation Spirits has always been resilient. Perhaps it can really be revived."
“草木灵！”
“A vegetation spirit!"
“荒唐！草木灵是应天地灵气而生，虽然生有灵智，但向来孤高，怎会随意回应。就算是它认定的主人也无法……”
"Ridiculous! The Vegetation Spirit is formed by the Spirit Qi in the Heaven and Earth. Although it has sentience, it has always seen itself as superior. Even if it had chosen a master, it wouldn't-"
“药力的确增强了很多！”
"Their medical efficacy did indeed increase by a lot!"
“莫非是那只狐妖来了，沈萤你帮……咦？人呢？”孤月刚要交待她看着其它弟子，却发现刚刚还在旁边打嗑睡的某人，已经不见了身影，而且……还顺走了那只狸猫！

"Could this be the fox demon? Shen Ying, can you help… Huh? Where did she go?" Lonemoon had wanted to instruct her to look after the other disciples, but realised that Shen Ying, who had been dozing next to him until this moment, had disappeared. And… she had taken the civet cat along with her!
“萝卜。”沈萤看了一眼地上的草木灵，指向对面的众人道，“听说你是他们家的？”
"Radish," Shen Ying called out again, staring at the radish on the ground. She pointed to the people on the Lotus Flower and asked, "They say you belong to them?"
“萝卜变个身，带沈萤回去！”
"Radish transform and take Shen Ying back!"
“萝卜啊，老蹲坑里干嘛，早点变回人形吧。”沈萤一边浇水一边语重心长的劝。
"Radish, why do you keep staying in that hole, quickly transform into human form." Shen Ying persuaded earnestly as she watered him.
“萝卜，开几朵花。”沈萤道，总不能白拿人家的东西。
"Radish, make some flowers bloom," Shen Ying said. They could not receive things for free.
“萝卜？”
“Carrot?”
“萝卜？”沈萤愣了愣，这个世界植物都是同模的吗？为什么长得都像萝卜，而且这棵居然还会动。她忍不住朝它叶子上戳了戳，“喂，你干嘛呢？”

A radish? She stopped in her tracks. Was everything in this world made from the same mould? Why did everything look like moving radishes? She couldn't help but prod at the carrot saying, "Hey, what are you doing?"
“蒲公英！”你一个萝卜长出蒲公英是什么鬼？变异了吗？
"A dandelion!" How did this dandelion come out of the radish? Is it mutating?
“薄城主。”孤月瞅了瞅，“你们这是……”
Lonemoon looked upon the trio again and said, "City Lord Pu. This is..."
“薄城主。”孤月突然开口问道，“可有暂时屏蔽仙气的法子？或是能透视仙脉的仙器？”
Lonemoon broke the silence and asked, "City Lord Pu, is there a way to temporarily screen the immortal Qi away? Or a divine tool to examine the immortal pulse?"
“薄城主好意我们心领了，只不过我派中弟子皆为低阶的地仙，这里的仙气对他们来说，已经够用了。”孤月道。主要是不想再跟男主扯上关系了。

Lonemoon explained, "We appreciate your kindness City Lord Pu. It's just that my disciples are mere low level Earth Immortals. The Immortal Qi here is more than enough for them." But the main point is still that we do not want to have anything to do with you.
“薄城主过奖了……”孤月笑得更深，挂起经商专用表情。
Lonemoon smiled even more awkwardly and replied, "Oh that's too nice of you City Lord Pu..."
“薄某到这才发现，这无敌派果真是个好地方。”薄飞平笑了笑道，“门下弟子也各有所长，比起我那曲双城可是要鲜活热闹多了。”

Pu Fei Ping laughed and said, "I only realized when I arrived here that Invincible Sect is actually a nice place to stay in. Each of the disciples of your sect have their own capabilities, and as compared to my Qushuang City, it is so much more lively here!" as
“虎哥！”
"Brother Hu!"
“虽然不像数码产品那样，一天一个变化那么夸张，但几年……或是几百年一变也是有的吧？毕竟这五万年的时间，都够从石器时代走到社会主义了。”

"Although your heritage doesn't contain digital products, which rapidly become obsolete, but a few years… or a few hundred years would certainly be enough to make the recipes obsolete, right? Afterall, 50,000 years is enough to progress from the Stone Age to when socialism became popular."
“虽然是正派大比，但也不能保证没有心胸狭隘之辈，会下死手。”孤月解释道，“这防御法器你们比赛时带在身上，以防万一。”

"Although this is a competition amongst decent sects, there is no guarantee that there won't be people who are narrow minded and are out to kill," Lonemoon explained. "Take these defense Dharma artifacts with you guys during the competition, just in case."
“蛇鞭腿！”
"Snake Whip Leg!"
“蛟龙并不算是真正的龙族。”易峰带些着急的解释道，“只是快要化龙的蛟族，虽也称得上神兽，只不过这只……”怎么看都不像是象征祥瑞的神兽啊。

"Flood dragons do not really belong to the dragon family," Yi Feng explained nervously, "They're just wyrms that are turning into dragons. We call them divine beasts but this is just..." No matter which angle Yi Feng took, the flood dragon did not look like a divine beast.
“蠢货，快去取黑石，生火！”
"Idiot, quickly get me some coal and start the fire!"
“血狐，你杀了这么多人，剖心挖腹就是为了布这血祭大阵？”孤月皱着眉扫了四周一眼，“你到底想干什么？”血祭大阵是出了名的邪阵，需要以人心为祭，万千生灵的鲜血为引才能启动。威力十分巨大，传闻阵成之时，会形成血云绵延万里，血云之下万物寸草不生。

"Blood Fox, the reason you killed so many people, eviscerating them, was just so you could set up this Blood Sacrifice Array?" Lonemoon frowned and scanned his surroundings. "What are you planning to do?" The Blood Sacrifice Array was a notoriously evil formation array which required the sacrifice of a human heart and the blood of thousands of humans before it could be activated. The array held enormous power. It was rumored that once the array was completed, a blood cloud would form which would drift for thousands of miles, under which no living thing would survive.
“行了你走吧，你直走就可以进城，入城后沿大街走到底再右转，就能看见传送阵。”
"All right, you can proceed from here. Go straight and you will enter the city. After that, walk down the main road to the end and turn right, you will see the transportation array."
“行了思羽，继续去演武场教你师妹们吧！”孤月朝某个变身的人挥了挥手，一脸淡定的捏了个风诀，打扫现场。
"That's enough Si Yu. You can go back to the arena to teach your Junior Sisters!" instructed Lonemoon. Lonemoon waved at her and calmly produced a hand seal which cleaned the area up.
“行了行了，你们差不多得了。”他推了推旁边的沈萤，实在是不想在屋顶上趴着了，都说了这样的脑残计划不行，那些筑基弟子压根不会收敛气息，十几个满气灵气的修士，那妖怪是瞎才看不到，“都怪你出的馊主意，那妖怪会来才有鬼。”

"Enough, you all should call it off." He nudged at Shen Ying, who was next to him. He really didn't want to continue lying on the roof. He had told them that such a harebrained idea wouldn't work. Those Foundation Establishment disciples did not know how to rein in their aura; only a blind demon would be unable to detect a few dozen cultivators full of Spirit Qi. "You and your asinine plan, it would be a miracle if a demon came!"
“行了行了，我们不想管你的喵事。”孤月不想再跟这只小狸猫妖纠缠，挥了挥手，“念在你的确没有伤人的份上走吧，以前不许晚上出去吓人了！至于那只狐妖，我等自会去找它算账，你等几日再出镇，省得又被抢了。”

"Okay, okay, we are not interested in your kitty affairs." Not wishing for further entanglements with this little civet cat demon, Lonemoon waved his hands, saying, "On account of the fact that you really did not harm anybody, we will let you go. But from now on, you are not to go out at night to scare people. As for the fox demon, we will settle our scores with it in due course. You better wait a few days before leaving the town to avoid being robbed again."
“行了行了，收起你的粉丝逻辑，你师父这属性没得治！”他转头瞪了沈萤一眼，“管管你的脑残粉啊喂！”
"Alright, alright, keep your fan logic, your master's nature cannot be treated!" He turned and glared at Shen Ying. "Can you manage your brain damaged fan?!"
“行了行了，起来吧，一家人不用客气！”她呵呵笑着扶起人，“我有点饿了，先去做饭吧？”
"Okay, okay, get up, no need to stand on ceremony, we are family now!" she laughed, helping him up. "I'm a little hungry now. Can you prepare a meal first?"
“行吧，辛苦你了。”连忙挥了挥手放他们进来。
"Alright, that's tough on you," she promptly waved her hand to bring them in.
“行行行，你们教。我不说话行了吧？”最终孤月只好退后一步，横了后面的沈萤一眼，“不是要教徒吗？你教你教！”他到要看看，她能教出什么来。别以为他看不出来，她就是个凡人，会仙术剑法才怪。为了让剑仙拜她为师，肯定是乱说了什么，现在是现成的拆穿机会，等羿清看清她的真面目，他再来收徒不迟。

"Alright, alright, alright, you teach. I will just remain silent okay?" Finally, Lonemoon stepped back and glared at Shen Ying. "Aren't you going to teach your disciple? You teach, you teach!" He wanted to see what she could actually teach. Don't think that he did not know, she was just a mortal, so how could she know the Immortality Sword Dharma. She must have uttered some nonsense to get the Sword Immortal to come under her wing. Now was the perfect time to expose her. Wait till Yi Qing saw her true colors, then he could still get him to become his disciple.
“被妖怪深夜闯入，那些人家当真一点损失都没有。”
"The residents whose houses were broken into didn't really lose anything much."
“要不……顺便再盖个房子吧？反正你有经验。”
"Why not… build a house while you're at it? You have experience in any case."
“要不师父您先在城中逛逛，五十灵珠不多。我去城中找份短工，想必天亮之前，便能赚足传送费用。”他一本正经的提议。

"Why not Master shop around in the city first. 50 spiritual pearls is not a lot. I can find a temporary job here, and I will be able to earn enough for the transportation fees before the sun rises." He suggested solemnly.
“要不我们现在就回去准备吧？”
"Why don't we head back to prepare dinner right now?"
“要不我来？”沈萤习惯性的抬起脚。
"Do you want my help?" Shen Ying habitually raised her leg.
“要不随便加点药粉试试？”
"Why don't I just add some medicinal powders and experiment?"
“要不，我带她们回去吧！我不是掌门吗?”沈萤举爪提议，“反正我也困了。”
"How about I bring them back! Aren't I the sect master?" Shen Ying raised her hand in suggestion. "I’m sleepy anyway."
“要元婴才能进。”奚秋惊讶的瞪大了眼睛，那秘境居然只有元婴以上的人才能进去，玄天宗元婴以上修士虽然不少，但是绝对比不上上青界的。而且听他的口气，元婴修士就算进去，估计也深入不了秘境里面。

"Only Nascent Soul stage cultivators can enter," Xi Qiu repeated, his eyes widening in surprise. To think that one had to at least be at the Nascent Soul stage to enter the mystic realm. The Blackheaven Sect didn't lack Nascent Soul stage cultivators, but the Upper Azure World had many more. Even if those at the Nascent Soul stage could enter, they probably wouldn't even be able to make it into the mystic realm.
“要劈多久啊？”沈萤边嗑瓜子边问。
"How long will it take?" asked Shen Ying, munching on her melon seeds.
“要厉害的吗？”
"Do we want to sound formidable?"
“要帮忙吗？”沈萤突然问。
"Do you need help?" Shen Ying suddenly asked.
“要怎么做？”沈萤问。
"How should it be done?" Shen Ying asked.
“要怎么治？”
"So how can it be cured?"
“要考些啥？”
"What should I test them?"
“要这样啊。”沈萤点了点头，转身往后看去。
"As you wish." Nodding, Shen Ying turned and looked behind her.
“见过不讲理的，没见过这么不讲理的。”孤月实在忍不住上前，“明明是你们轩辕家贪得无厌，妄想独占上古秘境。结果独占不成，还想在秘境伺机报复。秘境之中向来凶险自负，他们技不如人自食恶果。你们居然还有脸来讨公道？堂堂轩辕世家居然是这样输不起的人。”

"I have seen people who do not reason, but I have never seen such an unreasonable person." Lonemoon could not hold himself back. "It is clear that your Xuan Yuan Family is greedy of gain and wanted to claim the ancient mystic realm. Now that you could not claim it, you even want to use this opportunity to exact revenge for what happened in the mystic realm. One always has to be responsible for the dangers they encounter in a mystic realm. If you are not skillful enough then you would have to pay the price. How can you come here to seek justice? The Xuan Yuan Family is such a sore loser."
“见过两位师叔。”众人齐齐行了个礼。
"Greetings to you both, Uncle-Masters." Everyone saluted them.
“见过两次，不熟。”她随口道，说完状似不经意的往桌外，默默扒了扒那碗肉。
"We met twice. I don't know him well," replied Shen Ying, her hand stealthily pushing the piece of meat over the table.
“见过了？！”众人面面相觑，“掌门何意？”她们什么时候见过了。
"Already seen?!" Everyone looked at each other at a loss for words. "What do you mean, Sect Master?" When had they met them?
“见过大仙！”游仙轩辕勇也连忙战战兢兢的行礼。
"Greetings, Great Immortal!" With great trepidation, Traveling Immortal Xuan Yuanyong also rushed forward to greet Shen Ying.
“见过孤月师叔！”四人齐齐起身行礼。
"We pay our respects to Uncle Master Lonemoon!" The four men got up and saluted.
“见过羿掌门！”那人向她行了个礼。
"Greetings, Sect Master Yi!" the person bowed.
“见过荣管事！”
“Greetings, Chief Rong!”
“见鬼！”
"Holy cow!"
“解决了……吧！”
"Settled... I think!"
“解决了吗？”孤月上前问道。
"Is it all settled?" Lonemoon went up and asked.
“言情小说？”
"A romance novel?"
“认主？没有啊！”
"Acknowledge me as its master? No!"
“认识啊。”沈萤眼神眯了眯，“那就没错了。”
"Oh, so you know them." Shen Ying narrowed her eyes. "Then there's no mistake."
“认识我？”思羽一愣，一脸莫名的看了郁红一眼，“是谁？”
"Know me?" repeated Si Yu, looking to Yu Hong with a perplexed expression on her face. "Who is it?", she asked the rabbit demons.
“让她们自己说。”孤月沉声打断道，“修习过什么功法，她们自己应该最清楚。”
"Let them speak for themselves." Lonemoon interrupted with a serious tone. "They should be clear on what cultivation techniques they have learned and practiced."
“让开！”沈萤上前一步，一把拔开挡在前面的孤月，抬起腿朝着那个阵法上，用力踹了过去。
"Move aside!" Shen Ying stepped forward and pushed Lonemoon, who was blocking her, to one side. Raising her leg, she directed a powerful kick at the array.
“让道友失望了，几百年内都不会了。”
"Sorry to disappoint you, Fellow Daoist, I will not go into seclusion for the next few hundreds of years."
“记得多放点肉啊。”
"Remember to add more meat."
“许是去安排大比的事了，这次来了这么多门派，够他忙的。”郁海衍眉头皱得更深，带些不屑的扫了坐在下方的各门派高手，完全没有点半顾忌的样子，“现在大比真是一届不如一届，什么样的破落门派都敢来参加了，这印家也是，参赛的门派怎么也不限制一下。”

"Perhaps he has left to attend to matters of the competition. He must have his hands full, what with so many sects taking part this time." Frowning even more, Yu Haiheng swept a a disdainful glance at the other sects below. He was confident that they stood no chance against his sect. "Each competition is worse than the last. All kinds of downtrodden sects now dare to take part. The Yin Family were amiss in not putting in some form of restriction."
“许是旗上那个封印阵法的原故。”孤月皱了皱眉，抬头细细的打量了一遍那个幡旗，半会才道，“不知何人布下此阵，看似残缺却有如此威力。”

"Maybe it's because of the seal formation on the flag." Frowning, Lonemoon looked up at the flag, scrutinizing it closely. After a while he commented, "I do not know who laid this formation. It seems broken, yet it wields such great power."
“试试手肘！”
"Time to try my elbow!"
“试试！”
"I'll give it a try!"
“话说……你都安利了一路了，到底传承是个啥？”沈萤问道。
"Now that you mention it... you've alreaady tried to hand your heritage down for so long. What exactly does it contain?" Shen Ying questioned.
“话说你到底见没见过厨子？他大概这么高……”她比了比身形，开始形容起来，“双眼皮，长头发，穿白色的衣服，哦对了……他是个剑修。”

"So, have you seen my chef? He's about this tall..." she gestured slightly above her head and continued describing Yi Qing, "he has double eyelids and long hair. He's wearing a white robe, and- Oh yes! He's a Sword Cultivator."
“话说，临时……”
"I say, temp..."
“说不了，就别说话。”沈萤叹了口气，蹲在他旁边，拍拍他的背，帮他顺了口气。突然想到了什么看向兔王道，“兔子，你们那内丹长啥样子？”

"If you can't talk, then stop talking." Shen Ying sighed and squatted beside him, patting his back to help him regulate his breath. She suddenly thought of something and directed her gaze at the Rabbit Monarch and asked, "Rabbit, how does a demon core look like?"
“说什么混账话？我不管你，谁管你？”
"What kind of rubbish are you saying? If I stop caring about you, who else will?"
“说什么连累不连累的？”
"Don't say that—this isn't a matter of burden or not!"
“说吧……”沈萤顺手把他按在了椅子上，转身在上首坐下，顺手抓住块糕点道，“干嘛突然跑后山去踩我的萝卜地？”她浇了半天的水了，虽然不爱吃蔬菜，好歹是劳动成果，却被他踩了一半。

"Talk..." Shen Ying pushed him onto the chair and sat down at the top. With a casual sweep of her hand, she picked up a pastry. "Why did you suddenly go to the back of the mountain and trample all over my radish land?" She had spent half a day watering the radishes. She did not like to eat vegetables but she did care about the fruits of her labour. He single-handedly ruined the fruits of her labour.
“说吧，啥事？”等人走远，她这才看向思羽。
"Go ahead. What's the matter?" Shen Ying asked after waiting for Yi Qing to reach a distance away from the room.
“说得好！今日我们聚在这里不就是为了这个吗？管他是谁，杀出去为死去的同类报仇。”连胆子最小的兔王也站起来响应，兔族可是死得最多的。

"Well said! Isn't that the very reason why we are gathered here today? Regardless of who the culprit is, we have to slaughter our way out to exact vengeance for our brethren!" Even the timid Rabbit Monarch also stood up and echoed in agreement. After all, the races that had suffered the greatest losses was the rabbits.
“说起来若不是你将这一代的家主逼入生死绝境，我当年在郁家子孙身上种下的血缘咒，也不可能触发。导致我提早现世。”

"Speaking of which, if you hadn't forced this generation of family masters into such a desperate situation, the curse that I planted on my own descendants would not have been triggered. That's the reason my resurgence came early."
"Speak!"
“说，为什么害人？”尽量无视那堆金子，孤月上前一步，直接用手里的玉笛指向地上的狸猫。
"Tell us, why are you killing people?" Trying to ignore the pile of gold, Lonemoon stepped forward, and pointed the jade flute in his hand at the civet cat.
“说，那小孩哪去了？”沈萤一脚踩在魔王的胸口，沉声问道。
"Speak! Where did that kid go to? “ Shen Ying asked curtly as she stomped right onto the Demon King's chest.
“请。”易峰刚要转身，却看到旁边的人动都没动一下，“灵主？”
"Please," Yi Feng turned around. Then, he noticed that the person beside him had no intention of moving. "Spirit Master?"
“请大仙手下留情，我以后都不入魔了……不入了！”它用力的摆了摆头，眼泪下雨似的往外滴，见沈萤不为所动，转而看向易峰道，“我再也不敢做坏事了，我愿意……愿意结主仆契约，做这位道友的宠物，很乖很乖的那种！”

"Great Immortal, please show me mercy. I will not train to be a demon anymore... no more!" It shook its head furiously as tears continued to flow. Getting no response from Shen Ying, the demonic wyrm turned to Yi Feng and pleaded, "I will not do bad things again. I'm willing to... willing to enter a master-servant contract with you to become your pet, Fellow Daoist. I will be a very very obedient pet!"
“请尊者发落！”沈萤已经帮了她这么多，所以决不能让她再难做了。她深吸了一口气，艰难的抱拳行了个礼，一脸安心赴死的坚定神情。

"Supremacy, please mete out your punishment!" Shen Ying had already given her enough hope; therefore, she absolutely could not put her into a difficult spot again. She took a deep breath and cupped her fists with great difficulty. She had a determined expression, one that was prepared for death.
“请师父成全！”羿清却看都没看他，直直的望向沈萤。孤月对付青尹，师父对付青岚，他对青亦，这本就是安排好的。如今青尹青岚都已经伏诛，唯有青亦……他是师父唯一的弟子，无论如何，他都要完成这个任务。

"Master, please give me permission!" Yi Qing's gaze was fixed on Shen Ying. He did not even glance over at Lonemoon. Lonemoon would tackle Qing Yin, Master would tackle Qing Lan, so I should tackle Qing Yi. That was how they had arranged it from the beginning. Qing Yin and Qing Lan had already succumbed to them, and Qing Yi was the only one left… Yi Qing was his master's only disciple. No matter what, he had to complete his task.
“请掌门收我等为徒！”*8
"Please accept us as your disciples, Sect Master!"
“请掌门收留！”
"Sec Master, please accept us!"
“诸位未到，我等哪敢开席。”印风退开一步道，“这次多谢道友赏脸赴宴，来，里面请。”
"How could I have started the banquet before my guests arrived?" replied Yin Feng, stepping back. "Thank you for coming, Fellow Daoists. This way please."
“谁叫你多管闲事。”芮糜冷笑了一声，“只是杀几个凡人而已，连玄天宗都不闻不问的事，你狗拿耗子管什么闲事？”
"Who asked you to be a busybody." Rui Mi sneered, "It was just the killing of a few mere mortals. Not even the Blackheaven Sect would question it, so who are you to meddle and interfere?"
“谁哭了？”枫影恼羞成怒的吼了回去，一抹脸才发现自己的眼泪，正如滔滔江水般莫名其妙往下掉。
"Who's crying?" Feng Ying's shame turned to anger as he snarled back before realizing his own tears were surging out like waves and was baffled as it fell down.
“谁坑了！”孤月瞪了她一眼，“三青界中，我提供下中两界的信息给他，三成之中占两成不是很公平的吗？”
"I did not con him!" Lonemoon glared at her. "I'm the middle man of the three Azure Worlds, providing him with news from both the lower and middle worlds. Taking a two third cut is only fair."
“谁拿你的了。”沈萤横了他一眼，“你自己显摆的时候忘了收，我才捡起来的。”
"Who took your things." Shen Ying glared at him. "You obviously forgot to kept it, that's why I picked it up."
“谁耍流氓了，不是要花吗？不脱怎么开啊？”
"Who is playing hooligan? Didn't you want flowers? How am I going to make them bloom if I don't take off my pants?"
“谁要蹭你饭了？”孤月瞪了她一眼，“我早就僻谷了，这么久了，老子吃过你一滴米没有！”
"Who says I'm here to freeload?" Lonemoon glared at her. "I have long been practicing Grain Liberation. Have I ever eaten a grain of your rice!"
“谁让你白呢，这样写字才看得见！”
"It's your own fault for wearing white. It'll be much easier to see the ink!"
“谁说它认了主？”拧起地上的萝卜，沈萤直接转了一圈，果然那雪白的身子上真的没有任何契约的痕迹。
"Who said it has acknowledged an owner?" Shen Ying picked up the radish and turned around in a circle, presenting the radish. Its snow white body had no hint of a contract on it.
“谁说我一个人进来的？”沈萤突然停下脚步。
"Who said that I came alone?" Shen Ying suddenly paused in her steps.
“谁说我们掌门不在！”郁红也是一脸莫名，应战的是羿清长老跟掌门有什么关系。
"Who says my Sect Master isn't here!" Yu Hong had a shocked expression as well. Elder Yi Qing was the one who was invited to the duel, what does that have to do with the Sect Master?
“谁说我们是游仙？”那人继续道，“承老祖护佑，这升仙塔已经恢复了我们的修为，就连仙骨都已养好了。哪是游仙可比，我等已是真仙之身！”

"Who says I'm a traveling immortal?" the person continued. "Our ancestors have blessed us with this Immortal Ascension Pagoda which allowed us to restore our cultivaation. Even our immortal bones have been repaired. Traveling immortals can only dream of having our bodies - we are now Perfected Immortals!"
“谁说我要去救人了？”
"Who told you that I was going to their rescue?"
“谁跟你说是体修门派了！”是你们自己转的体修好吗？
"Who said we're a sect of body cultvators!" You chose to turn into body cultivators yourselves, right?
"Who goes there?"
“谁？”枫影一惊，这才发现站在众多灵植间，有个拿着水壶样子呆呆的女子。
"Who?" Feng Ying was shocked before he realized a girl in a daze holding onto a bottle and standing amongst all the spirit herbs.
“谁？”沈萤愣了一下，夹起一块肉放到嘴里，脸色顿时垮了下去。
"Who?" asked Shen Ying. The name did not ring a bell. She picked up a piece of meat, put it into her mouth and immediately grimaced.
“谁？！”郁红吓了一跳，唰的一下抽出了剑，这才看到前面的人，“掌门！你……你怎么会？”
"Who's there?" Yu Hong cried out. Startled, she drew her sword instinctively. That was when she turned around and then recognised the person in front of her. "Sect Master! Why… why are you…"
“谢师父教诲！”
"Thank you for Master's teachings!"
“谢掌门。”思羽恭敬的行了个礼，带些兴奋的坐在了旁边。
"Thank you, Sect Master," Si Yu respectfully bowed and excitedly sat down.
“谢谢。”沈萤直接跳到了剑上，又朝着戚橙雨道，“妹子，你前面带路呗！”
"Thank you." Shen Ying immediately hopped onto the sword, and looked towards Qi Chengyu. "Sister, you lead the way!"
“谢谢你了，小哥！”沈萤朝他笑了笑，出了妖界后，她转了半个月了，都没找着什么升仙塔。还好遇到了好人，愿意送她一程。这个世界还是好人多啊。

"Thank you, little brother!" Shen Ying smiled at him. After leaving the Demon Realm, she had wandered around for half a month but still could not locate the Immortal Ascension Pagoda. Fortunately, she met a man who was kind enough to take her there. The world was still filled with many good people.
“谢谢你啊，毛团。”沈萤拍了拍眼前这个，一边帮她端着盘子，一边还把生鱼片摆得更好看的人。
"Thank you, Furball," Shen Ying patted the man in front of her, who was plating her sashimi and arranging them nicely so that they looked more appetizing.
“谢谢几位大仙。”狸猫乖巧的点了点头，“各位放心，贺礼我早就藏起来了，狐妖就算是进镇也找不……”
"Thank you, great Immortals." The civet cat nodded complaisantly. "You can rest assured that I have already hidden it. Even if the fox demon enters the town, it won't be able to find it…"
“谢谢啊！”她道了谢，瞅了瞅眼前这只抖着抖着就晕过去了的灵兽，顺手拎起一只蹄子，下意识的转头看易峰，“园长，你会烤肉吗？”

"Thank you!" she thanked him and began to study the beast. It was so afraid that it looked like it was about to pass out. She picked it up by its hoof and looked at Yi Feng, "Director, do you know how to roast meat?"
“谢谢啊，贵人。”一只兔妖接过他手里的房梁，一脸的感激，嫣然把他当成了共患难的友人一般。
"Thank you, Benefactor," a rabbit demon took over the cottage beam from his hands with a face filled with gratitude, obliviously treating him like a friend who had shared adversity together.
“谢谢掌门！”
"Thank you Sect Master!"
“谢谢牛爸爸！”沈萤一喜，“不过，能问一下……我到底帮你啥了？”
"Thank you Father Niu!" Shen Ying was delighted. "But, can I ask… what exactly did I do to help you?"
“谢谢，我知道了。”他笑了笑，转手却把她手里的碟子抢了过来，抓起上面最后三块糕点，以迅雷不及掩耳之势，一把塞进了嘴里。
"Thanks, I get it now." Thanking her with a smile, Lonemoon grabbed the plate from Shen Ying and stuffed the last three pastries into his mouth.
“贵人您别怕，我们都是吃草的好兔子。”似是看懂了他的心思，妖王兔有些着急，生怕他误会似的解释，“真的，我们跟别的妖不一样，从来不吃人。”说完缩了缩爪子，坐得更乖巧了。

"Benefactor, fear not. We are all nice herbivorous rabbits." Seemingly understanding his thoughts, the Rabbit Monarch was slightly anxious and afraid that he would misunderstand and so continued to explain, "It's true, we are different from the other demons, we never eat humans." At the end of its words, it clenched its claws and the rabbits became even more well-mannered.
“贵人？”沈萤愣了一下，才明白兔子说的是羿清，“还能怎么着，想不开呗！”自那天后，这人还真就跟她耗上了，死活要做她徒弟不可。无论她怎么苦口婆心的劝他，甚至连忽悠都用上了，他就是坚持拜师决心不动摇，整整在院子里跪了三天，死活不起来。害她最近睡眠质量都不好了。

"Benefactor?" Shen Ying took a while before she realized that the rabbit was referring to Yi Qing. "What else could it be, probably because he takes things too hard!" Ever since that day, this person had been truly pestering her, wanting to become her disciple desperately. No matter how patiently she coaxed and persuaded him, even when she resorted to trickery, his determination to become her disciple never wavered. He had been kneeling in the yard for three days and did not want to get up in spite of everything; this had reduced her quality of sleep recently.
“贺礼……”狸猫条件反射的想去接，却被阵法压制得爬都爬不起来。
"My gift…" Instinctively, the civet cat wanted to retrieve the box, but it could not get up as it was pressed down by the formation.
“贺礼！”第一次去，自然要带礼物。
"It's a gift!" Naturally I have to bring her a gift on my first visit.
“走了。”
"He left."
“走了？哎呀！”
"He left? Oh no!"
“走吧。”沈萤突然出声，瞬间将她从那种疯狂中打断，拍拍屁股站了起来，仍是懒懒的道，“帮你干死他！”
"Let's go." Shen Ying suddenly spoke up, immediately interrupting Qi Chengyu in her madness. Patting her backside, she stood up and, still in that lazy tone, volunteered, "I'll help you kill him!"
“走吧走吧。”她边说边从裂缝那头跳了过来，“抓紧时间，回来还能赶个早饭！”
"Come on, let's go." She jumped out from between the cracks in the ground as she said this. "Let's hurry up so that we can still make it in time for breakfast!"
“走吧！”沈萤拍了拍袖子，一脸淡定的回过头来。
"Let's go!" Shen Ying patted down her sleeves and turned away calmly.
"Let's go!"
“走！”沈萤拉了后面的厨子一把，直接朝那个缺口钻了出去，其它两人也连忙跟上。
"Go!" Pulling the chef behind her, Shen Ying burrowed straight into the gap. The other two quickly followed behind.
“走，去净清殿！”他朝那弟子挥了挥手，正打算御剑，想了想转身一把把沈萤也拽了上去，“不准睡！那幡不是你带来的吗，跟我一块去看看。”

"Let's go to Jing Qing Hall!" He signaled towards the disciple. Just as he was about to ride his sword, he thought for a bit before turning around and grabbed Shen Ying aboard. "No sleeping! Didn't you bring that gonfalon over here, come and take a look with me!"
“走，迷魂阵拖不了他们多久。”枫影看了前方开始胡乱攻击的众人一眼，转身拎起三人就朝着山顶飞了过去。

"Let's go. The Soul Confundus Array can't hold them back for long." Feng Ying looked at the group of men who were now hitting out chaotically. He turned and carrying the three of them, started flying towards the mountain peak.
“起来起来。”沈萤一把把人拉了起来，早说你认识路啊。在这破林子住了几个月了，要不是那个猎户，死活不肯带她出去，再加上自己严重路痴，怕到时连个睡觉的茅屋都找不着，她早出去浪了。果然收个徒弟还是有好处的。

"Stand up, stand up." Shen Ying held him up. He should have said that he knew the way long ago. She had stayed in this old forest for a few months, and if not for that hunter who did not want to bring her out no matter what, in addition to her terrible sense of direction that might have gotten her lost with no roof over her head to sleep under, she would have long left to wander about. Getting a disciple was indeed beneficial.
“跟厨子什么关系？”他不是元婴吗？
"What has that got to do with Chef?" Isn't he a Nascent Soul cultivator?
“躲？”孤月一愣，半会睁大了眼睛，“你说是镇上的防护阵还在！”想到这他当即捏了个诀，一道亮光从指尖飞出，冲到了上空，不到片刻镇子上空出现了一个透明的防护罩，笼罩住整个镇子。还真的在啊！

"Hid?" Lonemoon repeated, deep in thought. Then his eyes widened in sudden realization. "You mean that the protection array formation in the town is still in place!" He immediately produced a hand seal and a ray of light flashed from his fingertips and beamed into the sky. Moments later, a transparent shield that covered the entire town came into view. It was really there!
“轩辕兄？你这是……”化神期的高手也会平地摔？
"Brother Xuan Yuan? What happened to you…" How could a Soul Formation expert fall from a flat surface?
“轩辕家的人！”羿清脸色一沉，猛的站了起来，这就是刚刚那莲座上的五个游仙，正打算召出灵剑。

"They're from the Xuan Yuan Family!" Yi Qing's expression darkened as he stood up aggressively. They were the Traveling Immortals who were standing atop the Lotus Flower earlier on. Yi Qing made to summon his spirit sword.
“轩辕禹求见沈大仙，不知大仙可否方便？”门外突然传来了熟悉的声音。
"Xuan Yuanyu has come looking for Great Immortal Shen. Is it convenient for the Great Immortal?" A familiar voice sounded out from just outside the door.
“轩辕禹！”郁海珩气急，不懂为何他宁愿得罪郁家，也要处处帮着无敌派。
"Xuan Yuanyu!" Yu Hai Heng was fuming, not sure why he would rather offend the Yu Family and stood by the side of the Invincible Sect.
“转生印？”魔王一惊，下意识开口念了一句，眉头也皱了起来。下一刻却发现他拿出了一朵金色莲花，也打入了那团黑色之中，又是一愣，“清心莲，原来如此！”

" The Rebirth Mark?" The Devil King was stunned and let out a charm subconsciously. He frowned but retrieved a Golden Lotus at the next instant, throwing it towards the black matter. He froze yet again and murmured, ” The Purity Lotus, so that's what it was!"
“轮空？”羿清都愣了愣，怎么都没想到是这原因。
"A walkover?" Yi Qing hesitated. He did not think this was the reason.
"Boom!"
“辛苦你了。”
"I will be troubling you then."
“辰戈，你想干什么？住手！”他脸色再次狰狞，仿佛身体内有另外一个人，在跟他抢夺什么一样，“魔界之门已毁，你已经关不上了。”

“Chen Ge, what are you trying to do? STOP!” His facial expression turned eerie once more, as though there was someone else in his body, fighting over something with him," The Door of Demon Realm is already destroyed, there;s no way for you to close it!"
“辰戈？”沈萤愣了一下，“谁啊？”
"Chen Ge?" Shen Ying paused and pondered for a moment. "Who's that?"
“过了那条河，再穿过树林就是海！”
"You have to cross the river, then go through the woods before reaching the sea!"
“过来一起啊。”沈萤朝他招了招手。
"Come, join me," Shen Ying waved at him.
“过来坐啊！站着说话很累的。”说着，她还拍了拍身侧的位置。
"Come and sit over here! Chatting while standing is very tiring." She then patted the space beside her.
“还不知您的称号是？”
"May I know how I should address you?"
“还以为他也是来捉小动物的。”似是知道他想法，她又加了一句，“你们没看到吗？”
"I thought he was here to catch small animals as well," she explained, as if she could read his mind. "Didn't you see him?"
“还以为能上三层来的是谁，这不是那妖女身边的那个剑修吗？”最中间的人，带些诧异的开口。
"I was wondering who I'd see at the third level. isn't this the Sword Cultivator who follows that demoness around?" the person in the center asked in a weird tone.
“还在狡辩！你敢说三日前闯入追魂楼，无原无故打伤我数百门人的，不是你！”
"You are still denying! Do you dare say that the person who broke into the Soul Chasing Tower and beat up hundreds of my men was not you!"
“还在说丧气话！”虎王怒了，大吼了一声，“信不信我吃了你个小妖。”
"More of these demoralizing words!?" The Tiger Monarch became incensed as he roared, "Do you think that I'm afraid of devouring a lesser demon like you?"
“还好……暂时没发现什么不良影响。”
Jiang Yi let out a pent-up sigh. “Thankfully… well… at least for now, I haven’t discovered any negative impacts.”
“还好。”他心里更暗，心如死灰的暗。
"It's alright." It's darker in my heart - it feels like death inside.
“还好你侄女看的不是耽美！”不然还不定出什么事。
"Thank goodness your niece wasn't reading about gays!" Who knows what might have happened then.
“还愣着干什么？滚出去，别影响老夫炼丹……这江松看来是活腻了，上个茅房也上那么久？这回火竟还要老夫亲自动手……”

"What are you still standing here for? Get out! Don't disturb me from refining elixirs... This Jiang Song evidently wants to die—why is he taking so long in the toilet? I even have to temper the flames myself..."
“还愣着干什么？耽误了大少爷去武殿修炼，你这废物担待得起？”
"What are you still standing here for? You good-for-nothing, can you bear the responsibility of delaying Great Young Master's training at the martial arts hall?"
“还愣着干什么？还不抬着我和虎哥下山治疗，虎哥死了，我们都要死！哎哟，江逸，我要把你碎尸万段……”

"What are you waiting for? Hurry up and carry Brother Hu and I off the mountain for medical treatment! If Brother Hu dies, we would all have to die with him! Ouch... Jiang Yi, I am going to rip you to shreds..."
“还是不要这么麻烦了吧。”
"There’s no need to go through this much trouble."
“还是小心为上，只怕万一。”
"It's still better to be safe than sorry."
“还是用江水诀疗伤吧！咦——”
“Might as well use the Jiang Water Art to heal up! Huh…?”
“还有一个女的！”到是身后的任翼上前上步，那淫秽眼神顿时移到了沈萤身上，“哈哈哈哈……太好了，师兄这人就归我了！”
"There's one more girl!" Ren Yi took a step forward as his lustful eyes moved over to Shen Ying. "Hahaha… This is great. Senior Brother, this one is mine!"
“还有他师父。”
"And his master."
“还有那朵玄灵花……”他看了孤月一眼，“那是灵主唯一从神族带来的东西，传闻那花有连接三界的功效，也是灵主回去的唯一希望。如今他将这么重要的东西送给沈掌门，可见它的真心。”

"And that Black Spirit Blossom..." he glanced at Lonemoon, "That is the only thing Spirit Master has with him that is of the divine race. It is said that the flower can connect the three realms. That is Spirit Master's only hope of returning home. He has given such an important item to Sect Master Shen... that proves his sincerity."
“还有，去把沈上仙的旧居打扫一遍，对！要一尘不染的那种！”
"Also, clean Exalted Immortal Shen's house while you're at it! That's right! Make sure that there's not one speck of dust left behind!"
“还未。”清韵摇了摇头，“不过他既然进来了，不久便会上山来的，到时便知了。”
"Not yet." Qing Yun shook his head. "But since he is here, he will come up the mountains soon and we shall know then."
“还没回来！”男子更加的着急，“偏偏是这种时候，快通知族中所有的化神修士，都过来，拖住那两个剑修。”
"Not back yet!" The man grew more impatient. "And at a time like this. Quickly inform all of our Soul Formation cultivators to come over here and stall those two sword cultivators."
“还真有这么邪门的事情？难道是黑色元力的缘故？”
"Could such a bizarre thing really happen? Is it due to the black essence force?"
“还要多久？”
"How much longer?"
“还要渡劫，要不算了？”这里也挺好的。
"We'll still have to undergo Tribulation Transcendence? Why don't we just forget it." This place was pretty good.
“还要站多久？好困啊！”沈萤有些坚持不住了。
"How much longer must I stand for?" Shen Ying could not take it any longer.
“这……”两人对视了一眼，摇了摇头，“魔气隔绝了我们与四周仙气的感应，要突围出去，怕是很难。况且……”

“Erm……”The two shook their head after exchanging a glance, “With the demonic aura around, we are isolated from the Immortal Qi all around us. If we wish to break through, it will be very tough. Moreover... ”
“这……”他下意识的朝旁边的白影看去，立马又收回，只得试探的向对方传音道，“多谢灵主相助，只是我等还需继续深入幻海寻找灵兽，不知……”

"Well..." Yi Feng subconsciously glanced at the white figure beside him and quickly looked away. He had no choice but to try talking to the man. "Thank you, Spirit Master, for your help earlier. The two of us have to continue exploring the Mirage Sea to search for spirit beasts. I wonder if..."
“这……”兔王有些为难的抖了抖耳朵，“妖气对修士原本就是巨毒，贵人妖气入体已久，想要驱散体内的妖气除非……用妖类的内丹，才能吸出他体内的妖气。”

"This…" The Rabbit Monarch was perplexed as it shook its ears and replied, "Demonic aura has been known to be extremely toxic to cultivators. The aura has been circulating in benefactor's body for a long time, so it will be difficult to expel it unless… we use the internal core of a demons to suck it out of his body.”
“这……”印风来回的看了看轩辕禹和郁海珩，不是郁家跟无敌派的事吗？怎么他们两个先争上了？一时有些犹豫不知站哪边，最后看了自家一脸期待的儿子，才叹了一声道，“我也相信羿掌门的人品。若郁家真的有人做下此等恶事，想来郁家主还要感谢羿掌门帮你清理门户。”

"This..." Yin Feng glanced back and forth at Xuan Yuanyu and Yu Hai Heng, wasn't this problem between Yu Family and Invincible Sect? Why did the two of them began fighting first? He had some hesitation, not knowing which side to stand on, in the end he looked over at his son's anticipating facesaid with a sigh, "I also believe Sect Master Yi's character. If there really was someone in the Yu Family doing such evil deeds, Master Yu should really thank Sect Master Yi for helping you to clean your sect."
“这……”易峰瞅了瞅背过去的人，有些犹豫。
"Welll..." Yi Feng glanced at the man's back. He hesitated to speak.
“这……不知道。”孤月一脸茫，“你先撑一会，我仔细看看。”他飞近细细把那个法阵看了一遍，可怎么看都没看出来这到底是个什么阵。

"This… I don't know." Looking baffled, Lonemoon said, "You hang on here for a while. I'm going to take a closer look." He flew nearer to the formation and gave it a thorough once over. But try as he might, he could not make out what kind of formation it was.
“这……很重要？”
"Is that... important?"
“这……这……”印元飞顿时脸色一红，一脸的不舍，却半天都没有挤出个理由来。
"This... this..." Yin Yuanfei blushed. He couldn't bear to let Si Yu go, yet he couldn't think of any reason to ask her to stay.
“这……这也可以吗？”感觉打开了新世界大门。
"This... Is this possible?" Si Yu felt like she was seeing a whole new world.
“这……这怎么可能！”青亦一脸不敢置信，神情中全是慌乱，似是想留住自身那不断下降的修为，但无论怎么阻止，那些灵气仍是散了个干净，片刻之间他的修为已经恢复了原样，“不……不……这不可能，这明明是升仙丹，这明明就是！”

"How… How can this be!" Qing Yi's expression was one of utter disbelief and confusion. It was almost as if he wanted to escape from his own body, which was helplessly deteriorating in that moment. No matter how hard he tried to stop his Spirit Qi from dissipating, he could not. In seconds, his cultivation level dropped to its original state. "No… no, this can't be. That was clearly an Immortal Formation Pill… it clearly was!"
“这……这是……”印风惊恐之色未褪，还染上了些许迷茫，“孤月尊者？”
"This... this is..." Yin Feng still looked terrified, but the fear was now mixed with a tinge of confusion. "Supremacy Lonemoon?"
“这……这是……”奚秋也吓了一跳，“发生了什么事？”
"This... this is..." Yan Qiu was also shocked. "What happened?"
“这……这是……”易峰更加震惊的看着直冲向空中的身影，“蛟龙！这是蛟龙！”没想到青界的幻海中，也会出现这种传说中的生物，而且看它周身的气息，莫非……

"This... this is..." Yi Feng stared at the figure in panic, "a flood dragon! This is a flood dragon!" He did not think that the Mirage Sea of the Upper Azure World would also contain this legendary beast. Looking at its aura...
“这……这是你房间？！”怎么可能。
"This... this is your room?" How could that be?
“这……这是怎么回事？”地上的人还没从突然被拽下来的惊吓中回过神来，想要起身却发现身上踩着的那只脚，重如千斤，根本动弹不了。
"What... what is going on?" Lonemoon had not recovered from the initial shock. He moved to stand up but found that his leg felt like it weighed a thousand kilograms. There was no way he could move.
“这……这话又不是我说的，是上界的……”那人退了一步，却仍是不死心的念了一句。
"This... I wasn't the one who said this. It's the Upper World's..." The Hall Master stepped back reluctantly, refusing to give up that thought.
“这上青界四大世家，看似一团和气，实则指不定相互之间多少明争暗斗，人家没说出全部事实就是为了自保，脑抽才会告诉大家，全族所有高手都被揍过了！”

"The four aristocratic families of the Upper Azure World may seem at peace with each other, but in actual fact, there are lots of overt and covert fights amongst them. Not telling the whole truth is to protect themselves. Only an idiot would tell everyone that all their experts were defeated!"
“这上面是个阵法！”孤月大声道，这石板上的纹路，分明就是印刻阵法的痕迹，只是因为没有灵气启动，所以他一时才没看出来。

"This is an array formation!" Lonemoon cried out loudly. The lines on the slate were clearly the imprints left by an array formation. He had not made the association earlier because his Spirit Qi was not activated.
“这不一样。”
"This is different."
“这不可能。”他刚刚受完八十一道天雷时，就已经感应到了接引之光，只是后来不知为何一直没有降下。
"That's impossible." He had just survived 81 bolts of divine lightning and felt the Heavenly Beam. He just didn't know why the beam hadn't shone down onto him.
“这不废话吗？”谁看不出他精神分裂，“我问那魔种哪来的？”
Cut the crap! Anyone can tell that he's demented, " What I'm interested in, is where did the Demon Seed come from?
“这不是熟不熟的问题。”孤月眉头皱得更紧了，“你又不是不知道，妖界遍地都是妖气，修士在妖气中根本没法修练。”

"This isn’t a matter of knowing it well or not." The frown on Lonemoon’s face deepened even more. "You should know that the Demon Realm is full of demonic aura. Cultivators can't practice in a place with demonic aura."
“这个……我也不知道。”羿清愣了一下，脸上闪过一丝疑惑，“虽说叫九九雷劫，但听以往历过劫的游仙说，的确有八十二道劫雷。而且最后一道才是考验的关键，很多游仙都是败在此雷之下。”

"This... I'm not sure," replied Yi Qing, looking perplexed. "Although it is called the Nine Nine Lightning Tribulation, according to the traveling immortals who have undergone the tribulation, there are indeed eighty-two strikes. And the last one is the key of the test. Many traveling immortals failed at this last strike."
“这个……挺好的。”果然沈萤僵了一下，左右瞅了瞅，半会才挤出一句，“不足的话，可能是……力量？”
"It… was pretty good." As expected, Shen Ying froze for a moment and she looked left and right before squeezing out, "Perhaps what you’re lacking is in… strength?"
“这个……解释起来有点麻烦。”沈萤皱了皱眉，半会才道，“你可以理解为……他以前跟我是一个村的老乡。”
"This… explaining might be a little troublesome." Shen Ying furrowed her brows before continuing, "You can understand it as… that he came from the same hometown as me."
“这个世界不好混啊，除非是轩辕家脑抽请我们回去，不然无论是门派还是世家，怕是都容不下我们。”
"It's not going to be easy for us to survive in this world unless the Xuan Yuan Family stupidly invites us back. No family or sect would dare to take us in otherwise."
“这个可不一定。”兔王心惊胆战的往后缩了缩，“我们妖类，种类不同，属性不同，内丹长得都不一样，虽然都是圆的，但颜色一般随各妖的属性和功法而变。”

“It may vary." The Rabbit Monarch shrunk backwards in fear. "There are different kinds of demons among us and our innate natures differ, making it so that our internal cores differ as well. Although they are all round in shape, the colors usually change according to the innate nature and powers of a demon."
“这个吗？”她突然掏出了一只白玉笛。
"Do you mean this?" Shen Ying suddenly pulled out a white jade flute.
“这个女子的来历无人知晓，她被江别离带进王府住了两年，王府却没有给她任何名分，在江别离登上镇西王之位后还突然离开了。而在她离开后，江云海也告病回到了老家天羽城，据我们安排在镇西王府的内线传回的消息，那女子离开时肚子里已经有些孩子！江云海回到天羽城后一直呆在江家，三年后才突然离去抱回来两个婴儿，那就是你和你的侍女！既然江云海认你为少主，那么你的身份就再明显不过了……”

"No one knew of this lady's background. She was brought into the household by Jiang Bieli and lived there for 2 years, but the Lord's family did not give her a status and she had even disappeared after Jiang Bieli ascended the throne of the Western Garrison Liege Lord. After her departure, Jiang Yunhai had also left his place due to apparent illness and returned home to Skyplume City. According to the insider we had planted in the Lord's household, the lady was already pregnant when she left! Moreover, after Jiang Yunhai had returned to Skyplume City, he did not leave his house until 3 years later when he suddenly left and came back with 2 babies. They were you and your maidservant! And since Jiang Yunhai acknowledges you as his young master, your background has been made pretty obvious..."
“这个问题解释起来比较复杂。这样吧你跟我去趟书房，我边给你出个策划，一边说怎么样？”
"This question is a little complicated. How about you come to the study with me and discuss about it?"
“这么久了……不会过期吗？”
"It's been so long... wouldn't it have expired?"
“这么久啊……”
"That's really long..."
“这么厉害？！那郁家是为何，要招惹这么个门派？”
"Are they that powerful? What did the Yu Family do to offend this sect?"
“这么多海鲜，要是能带回去给厨子处理就好了。”她下意识的念了一句。
"There's so much seafood. It'll be great if I can bring some back so that Chef can cook for me," she muttered to herself.
“这么快就送拜贴过来了？他们到是挺着急的。”这才刚回来，孤月有些惊讶。以为是普通的礼尚往来，顺手接了过去，也没细看，想想刚谈成的生意，交待了一句道，“你去回个贴，就说我无敌派随时欢迎。”

"A visiting card so soon? They are really in a hurry." Lonemoon was a little taken aback. They had just arrived back to their sect. Thinking it was just the usual exchange of visits, he took the card from her but did not read it, his mind being preoccupied with the deal he had concluded earlier. He instructed, "Write them a reply, say that our Invincible Sect is always ready to receive them."
“这么快？”沈萤歪了歪头，扫了他一眼，“你领的菜呢？”不是去领食材了吗？怎么两手空空的回来了。
"So fast?" Shen Ying tilted her head, glanced at him and asked, "Where's the vegetables you collected?" Didn't he go to pick up the ingredients? Why did he return empty handed?
“这么说，他的确死有余辜！”孤月皱了皱眉，“可他为什么会在悟剑峰？”虽然养炉鼎在中青界很常见，但专程收徒培养成炉鼎这种事，太过恶劣。他的徒弟不可能全是纯阴之体，三宗六派，不会允许这样的行为。更别说是庇护于他了。

"If that's the case, he deserved death!" Lonemoon frowned. "But why was he at Sword Comprehension Peak? Although rearing human cauldrons is common in the Azure World, specially recruiting disciples to rear them into human cauldrons is just too vile. It's impossible that all his disciples had pure Yin bodies. The Six Schools Three Sects would not permit such actions, much less shelter him."
“这么说，你承认自己是郁家的逃奴了？”郁海珩冷笑了一声。
"In that case, you admit that you are the escaped slave of the Yu Family?" Yu Hai Heng sneered.
“这事我自然听说。”奚秋点头，“可此事与他来这有何关系？”
"Of course I heard about it." Xi Qiu nodded. "How is he connected to this matter?"
“这事还用猜吗？”虎王冷哼了一声，“除了六派三宗里那些修士，谁会干这种事。这些年我们被他宰杀的妖还少吗？”

"Is there even a need to guess?" The Tiger Monarch snorted coldly. "Other than the cultivators from the Six Schools Three Sects, who else would do this? Just think about how many of us demons they have slaughtered over the years!"
“这些你别管了，还有这些事别和外人说，你就等着过好日子吧。”
"Don't you worry about that! Additionally, don't tell anyone else about these things. Just wait for the good times to come."
“这些年来，灵主一直在想办法回去。但三界之中的界限，就算是神族也不能轻易逾越。易家曾想了很多办法，却始终打不开界门。”

"All these years, Spirit Master has been thinking of a way to get back to his world, but the boundary between the Three Realms cannot be easily surpassed, even by those of divine race. The Yi Family has though of many ways before, but we still are unable to break open the realm gate."
“这些弟子新入门，你做为掌门，不想了解一下门下弟子的具体情况，考验一下门人的水平之类的吗？”
"These disciples have just entered the sect. As the sect master, don't you want to understand your disciples' overall conditions and test their standards or something like that?"
“这些都是这个世界的常识，也不知道你怎么活的，这么久了也不知道。”孤月再次嫌弃了一遍她的无知，“你还有啥要问的，看在老乡的份上，我再帮帮你。”

"These are some of the general knowledge in this world. How did you survive here for so long without knowing them?" Lonemoon expressed disdain for her ignorance once again. "What else would you like to know? On account of us being from the same hometown, let me help you a little."
“这位……疯楼主？”沈萤那货难道又是吃饭忘了给钱？“不知我们掌门哪里得罪你了？”
"This... Tower Master Feng?" Did Shen Ying forget to pay for her meal again? "How did our sect master offend you?"
“这位妹……姑娘，在下眼掘，不知道您的修为是？”
"Little sister… Miss, pardon my ignorance, may I know what your cultivation level is at?"
“这位师妹，好办法！”呈安眼睛刷的一亮，一脸激动的看向沈萤。
"Good idea, Junior Sister!" Cheng An's eyes brightened, turning to look at Shen Ying with an excited expression on his face.
“这位是……”羿清眉头皱得更深了，这样忍残的手段，确实只有魔修能做得出来，而且这尸体里，没有灵魂的气息，要么已经元神出窍遁走，要么就是魂飞魄散了。

"This is…" Yi Qing's brows furrowed deeper. Such cruel methods could only have been used by a fiendish cultivator. The soul within the corpse was also absent; either the primordial spirit had escaped or the soul was already totally destroyed.
“这位道友还有事？”孤月停在传送阵处，回头看了看某个莫明其妙跟了他们一路的人。原本还以为是易家派来送他们的弟子，但这也送得太远了点。而且他居然看不穿他的修为。

"Fellow Daoist, do you have any other matters?" Lonemoon asked Bai Zhe. They had stopped at the transportation array and Lonemoon had turned to look at this oddball who had been following them. At first Lonemoon had thought that he was a disciple sent by the Yi Family to send them off but this seemed unlikely given the distance they had covered. Moreover, he was unable to detect this man's cultivation level.
“这位道友，说话可要有凭证。”孤月沉声道，“你说你们带了宝贝进了秘境就带了？”
"Fellow Daoist, you need to show proof for what you're asserting," Lonemoon said. "You expect us to believe that you brought your treasure into the mystic realm just because you said so?"
“这你都不知道？”翊凌雪白了江逸一眼，眉眼中不经意流露出来的妩媚，加上惹火的娇躯大汗淋漓衣袍贴肉，看得江逸浑身燥热不已。

"You don't know?" Yi Lingxue rolled her eyes at him, her features a picture of unconscious seduction and allure, and with her sensual body hugged tightly by sweat-dampened robes, made Jiang Yi feel hot and bothered.
“这元力丹药力也太弱了吧？咦……”江逸无语了，正准备把黑色元力撤回来的时候，却发现了一丝不对。

"The medicinal power of this essence force elixir can't be this weak, can it? Huh..."
Jiang Yi was rendered speechless, as he found something wrong with a strand of blank essence force right when he was prepared to withdraw it.
“这内丹到是好东西，十二阶的毒兽内丹可解百毒。”他顺手捏了个火系术法，顿时山高一样的兽尸就被烈火吞噬化为灰烬，“对了，你在哪发现这毒兽的？”

"This internal core is valuable. The internal core of a twelfth-level beast acts as an antidote for hundreds of poisons." He wielded his fire-elemental sorcery. In seconds, flames engulfed the huge beast. "Oh yes, where did you find this beast?"
“这几块石头，浮起来了喵。”猫族夜间视力最好，狸猫一下就看出了不同。
"These stones are floating up." Cats having the best night vision, the civet cat had spotted the discrepancy.
“这可如何是好！”奚秋越想就越纠结，进当然是要进，而且不能晚，谁知道上界还会不会再派人来，这毕竟是上古秘境！但玄天宗的元婴修士有限，也不能全派进去，而且三位化神修士，有两位还在闭关当中，根本不能出来。

"What should we do?" No matter how hard he racked his mind, Xi Qiu couldn't figure a way out. Of course they had to enter the mystic realm — and they had to do it soon. However, they didn’t know whether the Upper Azure World would send reinforcements. This was an Ancient Mystic Realm afterall! The truth was that the Blackheaven Sect didn't have that many Nascent Soul stage cultivators, so surely they couldn't send every one of them into the Ancient Mystic Realm. Moreover, three of their Soul Formation stage cultivators were still held in seclusion and weren't allowed to come out.
“这可如何是好？继续这样下去，这幡内的鬼气只会越来越浓。”
"What to do now? If it goes on like this, the Ghost Qi will only grow stronger."
“这啥？”沈萤好奇的接过，那纸鹤却突然翅膀一挥朝着旁边的羿清飞了过去，绕着他飞了一圈。
"What's that?" Shen Ying took it from her, her curiously aroused, but the paper crane suddenly flew over to Yi Qing and started encircling him.
“这啥？”沈萤问。
"What is this?" Shen Ying asked.
“这墙上的……好像是上古阵法，需要令牌才能进去。”孤月想起刚刚青亦掏出的那个东西，再次细细研究了一遍眼前的阵法，“此阵阵眼时刻在变换，而且与整座仙宫相连，若是没有正确的破阵之法，强行破阵可能会连着这仙宫一起毁掉。可惜这阵法早已失传，根本无人知道方法。”

"It looks like… an ancient array formation. We need a token to get in." Lonemoon recalled the item which Qing Yi had taken out just then, and took a closer look at the array formation in front of him again. "The eye of the array is constantly changing. Moreover, without the correct way of undoing it, the entire Immortal Pavilion connected to it could be destroyed if we break in by force. Unfortunately, this array formation has been long lost, so nobody knows the method."
“这声音难道是……背云兽！”他猛的睁大了眼睛，脸色都白了一下，连忙转头看向沈萤道，“不能呆在这里，这地面可能是……”
"This sounds like... 背云兽!" His eyes widened and his face went pale. He hurriedly turned to look at Shen Ying, "Don't just stand there, this ground we're standing on may be..."
“这就是噬魂幡。”
"This the Soul Devouring Gonfalon."
“这就是紫金？”
"This is purple gold?"
“这就要看几位家主怎么想了？”羿清意有所指的看向坐在地上调息的几人。
"It depends on what these patriarchs think?" Yi Qing pointed to the men sitting on the ground who were regulating their meridians.
“这已经是第五天了。”羿清继续道，“他日日站在门口，却又不进来，也不知是为何。”站就站呗，还一下下的拽着笆篱上的叶子，门口那片都快被他扯秃了。

"It has already been the fifth day." Yi Qing continued, "He stood by the door everyday, but for some reason does not come in." If he wanted to stand, let him be. The plant at the entrance was already balding because of him plucking its leaves.
“这怎么可能……”任翼满脸的惊骇，“莫非……戚橙雨是装的，她根本没受伤？”
"How is that possible…" Ren Yi was frightened. "Unless… Qi Chengyu was faking it, she was not actually wounded?"
“这怎么可能？！”怎么会有人可以免疫能吸吞食所有生机的魔气？！
"How can this be?" How could anyone be immune to a demonic Qi that can swallow up every living thing!
“这怎么可能？！”男子一脸的震惊。
"How is that possible?!" The man's face was filled with shock.
“这怎么可？他……咦？”他细看萝卜紧抓着的那株草木灵，神识一探，才发现那株灵植里没有任何灵识的痕迹。这草木灵居然早就枯死了！前后一联想，瞬间明白了为何轩辕家为何一定要抢萝卜。

"How is that possible? He… huh?" He took a closer look at the Vegetation Spirit that the radish was grasping tightly onto; upon inspection with his Divine Perception, he realized that the spirit herb showed no signs of spirit perception — this vegetation spirit had already withered! Connecting the dots, he immediately understood why the Xuan Yuan Family had wanted to get their hands on the radish so badly.
“这悟剑峰虽然不大，但找个人还是不容易，你们最好分开找。对了……”他转头看向旁边戚橙雨，“你说的那人长什么样？可有影像。”

"Though Sword Comprehension Peak is not big, it is still not that easy to search for a person. You all better split up. Right…" He turned his head and looked at Qi Chengyu. "How does that person look like? Do you have an image of him?"
“这我就不清楚了，君上是本国修为最高的人，而且又是仙帝！应该会有解决的办法吧？”他猜测。
Pu Feiping replied, "That I am not sure. The Lord has the highest cultivation in the realm, and he is also the Immortal Emperor! I bet he has a solution for this matter."
“这掌门如此厉害？不知是何许人也。”
"Is this sect master reallyl that powerful? What kind of person is this?"
“这是……”孤月都不禁上前了一步，他还从未见过，可以散发这种灵气的花。
"This is..." Lonemoon could not help but step forward toward the flower. He had never seen a flower that could emanate Spirit Qi before.
“这是……千叶草木灵!”羿清越加的惊讶，如果说普通草木灵可以提高丹药品阶的话，那么千叶草木灵的花，简直就是极品丹药的代名词，凡是加入它的花练成的丹药必是极品丹药。

"This is… a Thousand Leaves Vegetation Spirit!" Yi Qing was now even more excited than before. Regular vegetation spirits could upgrade pills, but the flower of a Thousand Leaves Vegetation Spirit was synonymous with a supreme-grade pill. Any pill that was refined with this flower would automatically be upgraded to a supreme-grade one.
“这是上古灭灵阵！”他一脸惊讶的睁大了眼睛。
"This is the ancient Spiritual Annihilation Array!" He widened his eyes in surprise.
“这是上古秘境的入口！”孤月一脸不可思异的瞪大了眼睛，难怪那个坑底会有上古灭灵阵，原来地下还隐藏着一座上古秘境。在青界中，上古时代早已经是传说的存在了，虽然留下了无数典籍，但是否真实存在过，没有人知道。没想到他们居然在这里发现了一座完好的秘境。

"This is the entrance of the ancient mystic realm!" Lonemoon's eyes widened in disbelief. No wonder they came across the ancient Spiritual Annihilation Arrays in the pit; there was a whole ancient mystic realm underground. In the Azure World, there were plenty of stories about the ancient times. Although there were plenty of classical texts on the ancient mystic realm, nobody seemed to know anything about it. Who would've thought that they would discover a whoe mystic realm?
“这是九九雷劫，一共八十二道天雷，还剩一半多呢？”
"This is the Nine Nine Heavenly Tribulation, forming a total of eighty-one divine lightning. There are more than half to go?"
“这是什么法阵？”羿清一边用剑气逼退四周越发猛烈的火苗，一边道。
"What is this array formation?" asked Yi Qing as he wielded his sword to ward off the fire, which was growing increasingly fiercer.
“这是什么鬼功法？这是老天爷故意在玩我吗？”
"What kind of stupid cultivation technique is this? Are the heavens trying to mess with me?"
“这是啥？！”孤月看了看她身后高不见顶的巨兽，刚刚听到的吼声，不会就是这个吧，“你把这东西拖过来干嘛。”
"What is this?!" Lonemoon studied the towering beast behind Shen Ying. Surely the roar they had heard earlier didn't come from this beast... "Why are you dragging this thing around?"
“这是天地法则，我若成功渡劫，自然不会继续待在下界。”他解释，看了看沈萤纠结的表情，顿时又有些心软，安慰了一句道，“我们迟早都是要渡飞升之劫的，我是这样，羿清估计也用不了多久。”

"This is the law of heaven and earth. If I succeed in overcoming the tribulation, I will naturally not stay in the lower realm," explained Lonemoon. Then seeing Shen Ying's conflicted expression, his heart immediately softened and he tried to comfort her by saying, "We will have to face the Tribulation Transcendence sooner or later. Like me, Yi Qing will also face it soon."
“这是怎么了？”孤月看向最前面的一个弟子，他记得这好像是奚秋的大弟子，“呈安，你们查到些什么了？”
"What's wrong?" Lonemoon looked at the disciple nearest him. He seemed to recall him as being the most senior disciple of Yi Qiu. "Cheng An, what have you found?"
“这是怎么回事？”
"What is going on here?"
“这是木草气！看来真的可以。”孤月心中一喜，紧紧的盯着桌上的萝卜，还是第一次看到复活技能。
"That's Wood Spirit aura! Seems like it's really possible." Lonemoon was delighted as he stared at the radish on the table; it was his first time witnessing a resurrection technique.
“这是本派最……杰出的弟子。”孤月咳了一声，示意思羽站到山壁那头去，才一本正经的道，“思羽，薄上仙与城主想看看你的实力，你展示一下吧。”

Lonemoon continued, "This is our sect's most... most outstanding disciple."
He then coughed, which signaled for Si Yu to stand at the mountain, before instructing solemnly, "Si Yu, Immortal and City Lord Pu would like to see your abilities. Do demonstrate."
“这是狮吼兽。”他解释了一句。
"It's a Lion Roaring Beast," Yi Feng explained.
“这是玄天宗？”沈萤抬头瞅了瞅城门前的字，却发现看不太清。
"This is Blackheaven Sect?" Shen Ying raised her head and glanced at the words above the city gates, but she could not see them clearly.
“这是门规！”她们却一脸坚决，“无敌派门规第一条：任何人不得打扰掌门睡觉，违者……后果自负！”
"This is the sect rule!" The girls were resolute. "Invincible Sect's first rule: No one can disturb Sect Master's sleep, offenders... do so at their own risk!"
“这柳长老也真是的，我消耗了那么多元力，也不给我一两枚高级的灵神丹补充下元力……”
"Elder Liu can be so mean," he grumbled in a low voice. "I used up so much essence force, yet he refused to give me one or two high-grade Spirit Pills to supplement my essence force..."
"In that case..."
“这样……”沈萤意味不明的看向兔子的肚子。
"This…" Shen Ying looked at the rabbit's stomach, subtly implying something.
“这样下去，那五个不争气的东西，估计还真会栽在他手上。”他笑容越来越深，周身的黑气也越来越盛，“呵呵……就不知等他九死一生，来到这顶层得知升仙真相之时，又是怎样一副表情。”

"If this carries on, those five useless bums will die in his hands," his smile widened as the black Qi around him got thicker and thicker. "Heh heh... I wonder how he will react when he achieves a narrow escape from death, arrives here, and finds out the truth behind Immortal Ascension."
“这样啊……”
"In that case..."
“这样啊……”她脸上闪过了什么，突然转身钻进了旁边的床底，整个上半身都埋在了里面，只余两只脚丫子在外头。里面一阵啪啦啪啦响，半会才见她吭哧吭哧的拉出了一个大麻袋，直接往兔子跟前一扔。

"In that case…" An idea seemed to flash across her face. All of a sudden, she turned to the bed beside her and dug beneath it, leaving only two of her feet dangling outside. Rummaging noises were heard for a while until she stumbled out with a huge gunny sack and threw it directly to the rabbit.
“这样啊……”敢情这还是个蔬菜版的GPS。
"Well…" It seemed that what Shen Ying was holding was a special GPS for vegetables.
“这样啊……”沈萤沉默了半会，觉得有点不好意思。突然似是想起了什么，眼睛亮了亮，“你等一下。”
"Well...” Shen Yin fell silent. She felt bad. Suddenly, her eyes widened as if she thought of something brilliant, "Wait for awhile."
“这样啊。”沈萤突然像是想起什么，“牛爸爸你身上带纸笔没有？”
"I see." Shen Ying looked as if she had an idea as she said, "Father Niu, do you have pen and paper with you?"
“这样看我干嘛？怎么？不相信一派堂主会做这种事？”
"Why do you look at me like this? What? You don't believe that a hall master of a sect would do such a thing?"
“这次出来急，又没带吃的，难道你有？”
"This time I came out in a rush and didn't bring anything to eat. Don't tell me you have food?"
“这次君上念我等发现魔界之门有功，赐了靖邢城给薄家。”薄飞平看了已经收拾完，走出厨房的羿清一眼，继续说道，“靖邢城虽然不及曲双城是在仙脉之上，但却是内陆之地，靠近上都城。我与家父都觉得……这魔界之门的事，全靠三位提醒，并非我等之功。若是不弃，想邀贵派一起前去靖邢城，共享仙城。”

Pu Feiping replied, "The Lord rewarded my family with Jing Yan City as he said that we had done a good job in finding the door of Demon Realm." He paused and looked at Yi Qing who just came out of the kitchen after cleaning it up.
He continued, "Even though Jing Yan City is not like Qushuang City which was on top of the Immortal pulse, but it is still part of the mainland, near Shang Du City. My father and I both feel that the door of Demon Realm could only be found due to the help of you three, and not me alone. If you don't mind, we would like to invite you and your sect to come with us to Jing Yan city and share the city with us."
“这次大比参赛的门派，到是比往年多了很多。”郁家家主郁海珩皱了皱眉，看着下方密密麻麻的人群道。
"The number of sects competing this time is much greater than in the previous years." The Yu Family’s patriarch, Yu Haiheng, commented with a frown as he looked at the huge throng below.
“这江家少年力量竟比我还要大一些，不好公子危险了！”
"This youth of the Jiang Clan is even more powerful than me. This is bad, the Young Master is in danger!"
“这灵气……”孤月转身看向旁边的人道，“沈萤你厨……啊呸，羿清顿悟成功了。”说完拉起人就出门而去，“快，看看去！”

"This Spirit Qi…" Lonemoon turned and looked at the person beside him. "Shen Ying, your chef… pooh, Yi Qing's epiphany was a success." He then quickly pulled her out of the door and said, "Quick, look at that!"
“这炉里的火……”沈萤刚要开口。
"The fire in this cauldron..." Shen Ying began.
“这炼丹师好厉害！”
"This alchemist is so powerful!"
“这牌子也立了一年多了，不值一提的旧事而已，诸位里面请！”印风仍是和气的笑着，并没有察觉几人的异状。一步跨进店内，突然似是想到了什么，看向沈萤道，“对了，只知几位来自无敌派，还未请教道友高姓大名？”

"This sign has been put up for more than a year. It is an old matter not worth mentioning. Please step inside!" The still smiling Yin Feng was unaware that something was amiss with his guests. But just as he stepped into the restaurant, he suddenly seemed to recall something. Looking at Shen Ying, he asked, "By the way, I only know that you are all from Invincible Sect. May I know the names of my Fellow Daoists?"
“这玉牌识主，若是没有持有者的随身灵器，仍是无法催动……”
"This passage jade token is able to recognize its owner. If the token holder does not have the Spirit Artifact with him, he will still not be able to activate it…"
“这真……真的可以吗？”狸猫呆呆的接过盒子，仍是一脸的担忧。
"Are... you sure?" The civet cat gingerly held the box, its face a mask of worry.
“这种情况不能维持很久，顶多十五分钟左右。”他话音刚落，四围的浓郁的剑气和灵气，突然一收，不到片刻的时间就完全回到了羿清体内，他的额心之间，也慢慢浮现出了一道金色剑痕印记。

"This kind of situation cannot last for long. Roughly 15 minutes is the longest." At the end of his words, the dense Sword Qi and Spirit Qi in the surroundings became reduced and were sucked into Yi Qing's body in a moment's time. A scar in the shape of a golden sword slowly surfaced between his brows.
“这种法阵，我从来没见过，只是这些法符……好像是封绝的意思？”他回想了一遍所有听过或是见过的阵法，却没有一个对得上号的，“我攻击这个阵法试试。”

"I have never seen this kind of array formation before, but these Dharmic talismans… seem to be a kind of encapsulation seal?" He tried to recall all the array formations he had heard of or seen before, but none of them fitted the bill. "Let me try attacking this array."
“这等好事，我当然同意。”枫影一脸的兴奋，又有些担心的看了一眼，“你有什么要求？”
"Of course I agree to such a good deal." Feng Ying was excited but looked a little worried, "What do you want in exchange?"
“这算什么热闹！”旁边一人回了一句道，“这塔都出现半个多月了，刚出现那几天才热闹呢。听闻各大门派和世家的化神修士以及游仙全都来了。汇聚了上青界大部分高手，现在外面这些，修为最高的也只是元婴而已。比不上那几天。”

"This is nothing!" said a man next to her. "When this pagoda appeared more than half a month ago, there was an even bigger crowd. All the Soul Formation cultivators and Traveling Immortals from the major sects and aristocratic families came here as well - it was a gathering of almost all of Upper Azure World's experts. Whereas these people outside the pagoda now are no higher than Nascent Soul level.
“这群人问题不小。”直到完全看不到众人的身影，羿清才出声道。
"The problem with this group can’t be overlooked." Yi Qing finally said after all of their figures were out of sight.
“这行吗？”她又掏出了一把扇子。
"Will this do?" She pulled out a fan.
“这谁？”沈萤看向旁边的厨子。
"Who is he?" Shen Ying asked the chef next to her.
“这货谁啊？”孤月推了推她，压声音问，“你认识？”
"Who's he?" Lonemoon nudged her and whispered, "You know him?"
“这辰戈就是想夺舍，所以……”
"This Chen Ge... All he knows is to take everything by force, so..."
“这速度……”
"This speed..."
“这里与中青界不同，世家向来对魔修毫不留情，想要找处灵气充裕地方修练，就得以宗门或是世家的名义，否则以魔修论处，所以几乎没有散修。”

"This place is different from the Middle Azure World. The aristocratic families have never been kind to fiendish cultivators. If we want to find a place with thick Spirit Qi to train at, we have to go under a family or sect's name. Otherwise, we’ll make ourselves out to look like fiendish cultivators."
“这里好臭啊喵！”一跳下来，狸猫就捂住了鼻子，下意识的往沈萤身后躲了躲。
"It's so stinky here!" The civet cat had covered his nose as soon as he landed, reflexively hiding behind Shen Ying.
“这里已经没有什么别的宝贝了。”孤月回头看了看那练丹炉，仙宫已经塌了，那一宝库的丹药也已经失去了效用，这个上古秘境中，最值钱的估计也就那个草木灵，他们已经没有必要再继续下去，“进炉内再看看，等三个月时间一到我们就回去吧。”

"There's nothing valuable left here," Lonemoon answered as he looked at the elixir-refining cauldron. The Immortal Pavilion was in shambles and the pills in the treasury had lost their effectiveness. The Vegetation Spirit was the only valuable thing left in this entire ancient mystic realm. They had no reason to remain there. "Let's go inside the cauldron to take a look. Once three months is up, we'll go home."
“这里有化仙丹！”他一惊。
"There's an Immortal Formation Pill in the Pill Storage Repository!" Lonemoon exclaimed.
“这里灵气充裕，绝对适合大仙修行。又是妖界灵植最密集之所，以往送到大仙府上的灵植就是这里采的。”

“There is ample Spirit Qi here which is absolutely ideal for Great Immortal's cultivation practice. It is also the place in the Demon Realm where spirit herbs are most abundant. The spirit herbs that I used to deliver to Great Immortal's residence were gathered from here."
“这里的灵气有点奇怪。”羿清皱了皱眉突然出声道。
"The Spirit Qi here seems a little strange." Yi Qing frowned.
“这里这里……”那个声音再起，“左边左边，不对……过了过了，右边一点，错了，看这里，看这！”
"Here, here…" That voice sounded once more. "To your left, left… That's too much! Right, a little more to the right… You missed it again! Over here, look here!"
“这阵法是做何用处的？”羿清问，对于阵法沈萤和他都是门外汉。
"What is the use of this array formation?" asked Yi Qing. He and Shen Ying were laymen when it came to array formations.
“这黑色元力真是太难练了，两个时辰也才勉强提炼出六缕……”
"These black essence force strands are too difficult to extract. I barely obtained six wisps after four hours of extraction…"
“这黑色元力竟然如此神奇，还能让视力增强！”
"This black essence force is just miraculous; it can even enhance one's vision!"
"Here!"
“This… this…”
“这，这丹药……”
"This... this elixir..."
“进去吗？”沈萤指了指后面的仙宫道。
"Going in?" Shen Ying pointed to the Immortal Pavilion behind her..
“进来看看我家厨……呃徒弟。”她招了招手。
"Come in to the kitchen… Uh it's the disciple," she beckoned it to come over.
“迷幻步！”
"Psychedelic Steps!"
“追魂楼主……罢了，算你倒霉。”郁海珩话音一转，看向四周的化神修士道，“一个不留！”
"Soul Chasing Tower Master... sorry, you can only blame your bad luck." Yu Haiheng looked at the surrounding Soul Formation cultivators and instructed, "No one leaves here alive!"
“追魂楼！”孤月有些吃惊的站了起来。
"Soul Chasing Tower!" Lonemoon exclaimed, standing up immediately.
“追魂楼？”怎么觉得有点耳熟，“厨子，你听过吗？”
"Soul Chasing Tower?" Why did this name sound familiar? "Chef, have you heard of them before?"
“追魂楼？”沈萤呆了呆，下意识转头看向旁边两人，“他啥意思？”
"Soul Chasing Tower?" Shen Ying paused. She turned to Lonemoon and Yi Qing and asked, "What is he talking about?"
“追！”沈萤说了一声，第一个拔腿就朝着狐妖的方向跑了过去，只见她身形一闪，反应过来时，只剩下一路尘土飞扬。
"Go after it!" cried Shen Ying. She was the first to run in the direction of the fox demon. She had flashed past them before they could react, leaving behind a trail of dust.
“退……别伤了虎哥！”
"Retreat... Don't you dare hurt Brother Hu!"
“退不退？”
"Retreat or not?"
“退后！”枫影高喊了一声，临时布下个防御的阵法，一咬牙冲了上去。硬着头皮对上了七八个化神修士。郁红和思羽也冲了进来。
"Retreat!" Feng Ying shouted as he set up a defense array. Gritting his teeth, he rushed forward and tackled seven to eight Soul Formation cultivators. Yu Hong and Si Yu rushed forward behind him.
"Retreat!"
"Retreat, fall back! We retreat!"
“透视仙脉？你是说……”薄飞平一惊，心底猛的一沉，顿时涌上一个可怕的想法，连忙点头，“有！遮天诀就可。”

Pu Feiping asked carefully, "Examine the immortal pulse? Do you mean..." His heart skipped a beat as a terrifying thought crept into his brain. He hurriedly nodded and said, "Yes! You can use Overshadow spell."
“通宵玩网游睡着，醒来就在这里了。”
"I played an online game overnight, and when I woke up I was here."
“道侣？”沈萤愣了愣，才想起他说的是对象，“这我到没想过……不过我都这个年纪了，就算谈个恋爱也没什么吧？”

"A Dao partner?" Shen Ying stared blankly at Yi Qing and remembered who he was talking about. "I have not thought about it... But I am getting on in years. Even if I do want to date him, it isn't that big of a deal, right?"
“道友且慢。”奚秋快速在噬魂幡上打了几个封印法阵，收起幡旗道，“我看道友天姿卓越，满身剑气，想必不日便会凝聚出剑意。但领悟剑意向来凶险，受不得半点打挠。道友孤身一人想来更加艰难，可曾想过，加入宗门，受门派庇护。”

"Fellow Daoist Yi, wait a moment." Xi Qiu quickly stamped a few seal arrays on the flag before keeping it away. "I can see that my fellow Daoist is naturally outstanding and full of Sword Qi. I think it is only a matter of time before you condense sword intent. But the process of understanding sword intent is always dangerous, and cannot be interrupted. No doubt you will find that going at it alone will be much harder. Have you ever thought of joining our sect to receive our protection?"
“道友先别忙拒绝。”奚秋继续劝道，“我玄天宗虽然不甚出名，但也算是三宗四派之首。三宗四派中，也就我派对剑修知之甚深，我等的师叔便是一位化神剑修。这么多年来，他一直想收一名嫡传弟子，以道友的资质，若是留在我派，想必定会被他看中。”拜入化神门下，这是多大的荣耀，是修士就不会拒绝。

"Fellow Daoist Yi, don't refuse so hastily." Xi Qiu continued to try and persuade him. "My Blackheaven Sect, though not very well known, is the leader of the Three Sects Four Schools. Among the Three Sects Four Schools, my sect possesses the deepest knowledge regarding sword cultivation. My sect's senior master was a Soul Formation sword cultivator. For many years, he has been wanting to get a disciple of his own. If you remain at my school, with your qualifications, he will definitely select you." It was a great honor to come under the tutelage of a Soul Formation cultivator. No cultivator would be able to refuse this offer.
“道友好。”印风看了她身后的众人一眼，继续道，“白日事忙，还未恭喜贵派弟子，获得大比金丹魁首，果然是名师出高徒啊。”

"Good evening, Fellow Daoist." Yin Feng glanced at the people behind her and continued, "I was busy during the day and did not have the chance to congratulate your disciples for winning the first prize in the Golden Core division. Truly, great masters turn out skilled disciples."
“道友慢走！”
"Take care, Fellow Daoist!"
“道友真是好打算，空口白话就想拿走我们发现的千叶草木灵，先不说这草木灵自有灵性，跟不跟你们走还难说。恕我直言……”他看向对方那仿佛施恩似的嘴脸，一字一句的道，“你TM要不要点B脸！”

"You have it well planned, don't you, Fellow Daoist? You expect us to give up the Thousand Leaves Vegetation Spirit to you in exchange for just a few empty words? I'm sure you're aware that the Thousand Leaves Vegetation Spirit possesses a sentient spirituality. I don't even know if it would follow you. And honestly…" He looked at their desperate expressions and emphasised each of the following words, "Have some freaking respect!"
“道友，你怎么……”
"Fellow Daoist, why are you..."
“道友，听说过剑修羿清与孤月吗？”
"Fellow Daoist, have you heard of Sword Cultivators Yi QIng and Lonemoon?"
“道友，请。”羿清直接开始赶人。
"Please, Fellow Daoist." Yi Qing was getting impatient.
“道友，这千叶草木灵虽然是个宝贝，但只对丹修来说是至宝。阁下是剑修，此物于你并无何意义，不如让于我轩辕家如何？”游仙青岚神情一换，笑着上前道，“道友放心，在下保证只要你将此物让于我们，之后无论在这仙宫之中发现任何宝物，都好商量。绝不与诸位为难。”

"Fellow Daoist, this Thousand Leaves Vegetation Spirit may be valuable, but it’s only so to core cultivators. It's useless to you. Why don't you hand it over to the Xuan Yuan Family?" The Travelling Immortal Qing Lan suddenly had a friendly smile on his face. Stepping forward, he continued, "Rest assured, Fellow Daoist, I promise that I'll hand over any treasures that I find in this Immortal Pavilion as long as you hand me the Thousand Leaves Vegetation Spirit. I won't hold anything back."
“道友？”
"Fellow Daoist?"
“道君不必担心。”陆修士不在意的出声道，“这顺于城虽然是偏远小城，但向来太平，不会出什么事的。”
"Dao Lord, fret not." Cultivator Lu paid no attention to it and voiced out, "Shunyu City may be a secluded little city, but it has always been peaceful. Nothing much is going to happen."
“道君小心！”陆修士惊呼出声。
"Dao Lord, be careful!" Cultivator Lu cried out.
“道君说笑了，这林子虽然不能御剑，但我经常走，也没出过什么问题。”陆修士仍是不在意的道，“皆因那珍宝阁掌事想太多，非要找人来送我。四阶法器在这里虽难得一见，外面来说却很寻常，莫非还真会蹦出个人来……”

"Dao Lord must be kidding. Although it is not possible to traverse this forest by sword-riding, I travel this route often. There shouldn't be any problem." Cultivator Lu still felt carefree as he said, "It's all because the Treasure Pavilion's steward is too worrisome, insisting that someone must escort me back. While fourth stage Dharma artifacts are rare over here, they are actually pretty common outside, it can't be that someone will really jump out…"
“道君，出了这林子，就到陆府了。”姓陆的修士指了指前方道，“一路有劳道君了。”
"Dao Lord, once we get out of the forest, we will reach the Lu residence." The Lu cultivator pointed ahead. "Thank you for your protection on this journey, Dao Lord."
“道君，这位陆道友就是今日要护送的顾客。您只需送他到西边的陆府即可。”
"Dao Lord, Fellow Daoist Lu is the customer that you need to escort back today. You just need to bring him to the west side of the Lu residence."
“那……”沈萤眼神眯了眯，“你叫它一声，看看它答应不？”
"Then..." Shen Ying narrowed her eyes. "Call it and see if it responds."
“那……不如我去轩辕家，让他们出来说个清楚。”这样大家总会信了吧。
"Then… how about letting me go to the Xuan Yuan Family and get them to clear things up." Then people should believe in it right?
“那……不知前辈您的修为是？”
"Then... how about you, Senior?"
“那……化神再往上呢？”
"What... about above Soul Formation?"
“那……和那！”沈萤又随意指了几个方向，“都是。”
Shen Ying casually pointed in a few directions and said, "This... and that! They all are."
“那……掌门可需要，唤人带我等前去熟识派中的同门？毕竟我们刚刚加入，怕冒犯了哪位前辈。”
"Then… does Sect Master need to get people to bring us to meet the rest of the sect? Since we have just joined, we are afraid of offending the seniors."
“那……那这几人又怎么回事？”他指了指地上晕迷不醒的五人，“你明明打得过轩辕家那些人的，却不直接在玄天宗动手，不就是看在我的面子，怕伤及那些低阶弟子吗？”

"Then… then what is with those people?" He pointed at the five people on the ground who were in coma. "You obviously had the ability to defeat those people from the Xuan Yuan Family, yet you did not directly do so in the Blackheaven Sect. Wasn't it to give me face, and afraid of hurting those lower level disciples?"
“那……那都是之前那只八阶狐妖干的。”狸猫似是想到了什么，浑身抖了抖，“我十几天前路过这里，看到它在害人，它还想抢喵的东西，喵打不过。只好躲在镇子里了。”

"That… that was the work of the eighth-level fox demon." The civet cat seemed to think of something, and shivered. "I passed here ten days ago and saw it harming people. It even wanted to grab my things. I wasn't his match so I hid in this town."
“那三位觉得我们几人如何？”她指了指身后几个都穿得灰扑扑，裹得严严实实的妹子道。
"What do the three of you think of us?" She pointed at the group of girls behind her who were wrapped up in plain and rustic outfits.
“那不如我们现在就……”
"Then why don't we leave now..."
“那个……”他只能硬着头皮道，“您看这样如何？刚刚那一桌，我赔双倍的灵石？”
"That…" He plucked up the nerve to ask, "What do you think about this. I'll pay you double in spirit stones for the meal we had earlier on."
“那个……”她就是觉得有点挡视线而已。
"Well..." The only thing that was affected was her sight.
“那个……”沈萤嘴角抽了抽，实在忍不住戳了戳地上跪了半天的人，好心的提醒道，“你们商量好了没有？”
"That..." Shen Ying's mouth twitched, she could not help but poked at the person who had been kneeling for so long and reminded kindly, "Are you guys done with the discussion?"
“那个……”沈萤实在忍不住拍了拍那个自言自语了半天的小孩，“你一个人挺嗨啊！”小小年纪就分饰两角？
“Uhhh……”Shen Ying could not help but to pat that kid who has been murmuring to himself for a long time, "You're having fun by yourself huh! Playing dual roles at such a young age？
“那个……”沈萤愣了愣，“你说的万妖王，不会刚好是只兔子吧？”
"Well..." Shen Ying hesitated, "Does this Myriad Demon King that you speak of happen to be a rabbit?"
“那个……不是我们干的！”两兔子连忙着急的解释，“我们都是好兔兔，捡到他的时候就这样了。”
"That's... not caused by us!" The two rabbits hurriedly explained. "We are all good rabbits. He was like this when we carried him in."
“那个……不用这么急吧？”
"That... isn't so urgent right?"
“那个……我有个疑问。”
"Well... I have something to ask."
“那个……清啊，送完他，我们的路费就够了吧？”
"Hey… Qing… After sending him back, will we have enough to pay for the travel fare?"
“那个亲（清），你好了没有亲？”

“Hey 'Qin', are you finished, 'Qin'?" [1. Qin is a respective word in contemporary Chinese to address someone akin to sir. It also is a homophone to Yi Qing. This becomes a running joke that she can never remember her disciple's name.]
“那个什么楼……”不是说过了吗？
Shen Ying replied hesitantly, "That building... uh..." She thought she had mentioned it before.
“那个，小说里的系统好像都是不开公放的哦？”
"That, novel seemed to say that the system was not public right?"
“那个，道……”连陆姓修士都有些不忍的开口求情。
"Er, Lord Dao..." Even Cultivator Lu could not help interceding on behalf of the Ghost King.
“那丹药？”
"Elixirs?"
“那为何抓我派弟子？”羿清皱了皱眉。
"What did they capture our disciples for?" Yi Qing frowned.
“那主持阵法呢？”
"Then are you good at abboting or array formations?"
“那么大仙，能问一下，那个小孩是怎么过来魔界的？又是从哪消失的吗？”
“Then the Great Immortal, may I know how did the kid enter the Demon Realm, and where was he last seen at?”
“那也不一定。”沈萤扒了两口饭，顺口回了一句，“我认识的人又不多。”
“That may not be the case.”Shen Ying continued as she scooped some rice into her mouth,“My social circle is rather limited.”
“那他上哪去了？”明明进来了。
“Then where did he go？”He obviously came in.
“那他们能找到人？”
"Then who are Lonemoon and Yi Qing going to find?"
"Then what are you..."
“那你从哪个门来的？”沈萤突然开口道。
"Then which gate did you come from?" Shen Ying asked.
“那你可以驱逐我试试？”
“Well, then you can try and cast me out？”
“那你可是擅长术法剑术？”
"Then are you good at sword techniques?"
“那你大可试试！”它冷哼一声，突然扬手一挥，顿时脚下的海水像是开水一样沸腾了起来，水面上出现了大片大片的黑影，不到片刻破水而出。

"We'll see!" Snorting coldly, he suddenly waved his hand. The sea water beneath his feet started to bubble and seethe, and suddenly, huge black figures could be seen breaking through the water surface.
“那你大晚的出来吓人，不会是……为了阻止别人出镇，以防遇到那只狐妖吧？”
"So when you appeared in the night to scare the residents, you were actually trying to… prevent them from leaving the town, in case they encountered the fox demon?"
“那你干嘛告诉沈萤？”不问你就不说是吧？
"Then why are you telling Shen Ying about it?" If I did not ask, you would take the initiative to say, right?
“那你怎么确定她说的就是真的。”孤月瞄了她一眼，沉声道，“别忘了，她还杀了我派的玉鼎真人。”
"Then how are you so sure that her words were true." Lonemoon took a quick look at her, and lowered his volume. "Don't forget, she even killed my sect's Perfected Yu Ding."
“那你觉得……他们会留我们吃饭吗？”
"Then do you think... they will invite us to stay for dinner?"
“那便奇怪了，雪银还从来没听过别人的话呢，难道病了？”
"Then that's even weirder. Xue Yin has never listened to others before unless… maybe it is sick?"
“那倒个茶。”
"Then get me some tea."
“那到不是！也出了点事？”
"That's not it! Did something else happen?"
“那剑修呢？”你让思羽那个金刚芭比试，能试出剑修来，我算你赢！
"What about sword cultivators?" You let Si Yu pick out all the barbie cultivators. If her way of testing picks out the sword cultivators, then she wins!
“那只猫？”沈萤转头看了他一眼。
"That cat?" Shen Ying turned to look at him.
“那可是升仙之塔，修为没到化神，谁敢轻易偿试。”那人继续回道，“听闻这塔内有三层，每一层都风险万分，只有闯过三层到达塔顶，才能飞升成仙。目前进去的，也就只有各世家和门派的高手了。”

"This is the Immortal Ascension Pagoda you are talking about. Cultivators below Soul Formation level do not dare to enter it." The man continued, "It's said that there are three levels in the pagoda, every level is filled with danger, and only those who can make it pass the third level can ascend to become an immortal. So far, only the experts of the aristocratic families and sects have entered."
“那咋办？”她不想一直带个腿部挂件，很重的说。
"What should we do then?" Frankly, she did not want the vegetation spirit hanging onto her leg anymore.
“那啥……”一个细细的声音突然在妖群里响起，“我觉得不用去了吧。”
"Hey…" A faint voice suddenly sounded amid the demon horde. "I don't think there is a need for you to proceed."
“那啥……”突然一个声音响起，阵中一只没说话的沈萤，举起了一只手，“你好像忘了我。”
"Hey…" Suddenly, a voice rang out. Shen Ying, who had been silent till that point and was within the formation array, raised her hand. "You seem to have forgotten about me."
“那啥……毛团你这次来，到底找我有啥事？”大老远过来不会真的只是为了玩吧。
"That... Furball, what did you come here for?" You couldn't have come all this way just to play.
“那啥家长……你找我是有事吧？”沈萤出声打断了这越发诡异的气氛。
"You… Whatever Family Master, why were you looking for me?" Shen Ying suddenly broke the heavy silence..
“那啥，冒昧问一句，你……还有朋友吗？”
"Hey, may I ask, do... you still have friends?"
“那啥，这墙上的阵到底怎么解？”沈萤直接打断他的话。
"Hey Mr Whatever, how do we crack that array on the wall?" Shen Ying interrupted him.
