“那多不好意思……”女子突然脸一红，有些别扭的抓了抓头，“太麻烦你了吧？”
"But that will be too embarrassing…" The woman's face blushed suddenly as she scratched her head awkwardly. "Won't it be inconveniencing you greatly?"
“那天我陷入心魔的时候回到现代了，三百多年了，我还以为我早忘了那边的一切，没想到原来记得那么清晰，或许我根本就不属于……唔唔。”

"When I was trapped with my mental demons the other day, I returned to the modern age. It has been 300 years. I thought I already forgot what that world was like. I didn't realise that I still remember everything so clearly. Maybe I just don't belong to... Wu... Wu..."
“那好，你去吧，安心在炼丹房做事，家族不会亏待你的，我会上报大总管的，给你的月例提高一倍。”
"Alright then, off you go. Work at the alchemy lab in peace. The family will not treat you unfairly either—I will report this to the chief supervisor and grant you a salary increase of one fold."
“那就交给你了！”沈萤用力拍了拍对方的肩，“去吧，我等你。”
"Then I'll leave that to you!" Shen Ying patted his shoulders. "Go on, I will wait for you."
“那就做些糕点？”
"Then can you make some pastries?"
“那就先测一下灵根吧。”孤月拿出测试灵根的法器，让她们一一上前测试。结果却吓了一跳，这些人中，最差的也是三品的木水金三灵根。这样的资质，别说去各门派，就算是去各世家也是有资格的。干嘛要来他们这个刚冒出来的新门派，难道眼瞎了？

"In that case, let's test their Spirit Roots." Lonemoon took out the Dharma artifact for testing Spirit Roots and got them to come forward one by one. The result was shocking, however; the even the lowest quality Spirit Root possessed amongst these people was a third-grade Wood, Water and Gold - Triple Spirit Root. With such qualifications, they were qualified to join even the aristocratic families. Why would they join a newly established sect? Were they blind?
“那就奇怪了，他干嘛突然给你下贴子。”孤月掏出一张红色的请贴，递给她道，“今天早上刚收到的，说是邀你去易家一叙，讨教御兽之法，写的还是你的名字，而不是无敌派掌门。”

"That's weird. Why did he suddenly send you an invitation?" Lonemoon pulled out a red invitation card and passed it to her. "I just received it this morning. It says you are invited to Yi Family for a discussion on beast riding. It's addressed to you and not the sect master of Invincible Sect."
“那就好！”郁红松了口气，仍是紧张的看着几人道，“但也不能放心得太早，别忘了这里地处妖界，之前那些高阶妖类你们也看到了，不是我们能对付的。”

"That's good!" Yu Hong heaved a sigh of relief, but still looked at them nervously. "We cannot let down our guard too early. Don't forget this place is within the Demon Realm. You guys also saw those high level demons from before. They are not opponents that we are able to handle."
“那就是会罗！”沈萤一喜，噔噔噔的跑了出去。
"That means you do know! Shen Ying skipped outside in delight.
“那就要感谢印少主了。”他轻轻一笑，转头看向奄奄一息的印元飞，“没有他的带路，这茫茫妖界之中，我们还真闯不进来。”
"For that I have to thank Young Master Yin." He smiled and turned his head to look at the severely injured Yin Yuan Fei. "Without him leading the way, we couldn't have entered."
“那当然。”他一脸的骄傲，“不是我吹，只要我愿意，就算想知道四大世家家主晚上穿什么样的亵裤，我都能给查出来。”
"Of course," he replied cockily. "I'm not bragging but as long as I want to, I can find out what undergarments the masters of the four aristocraic families are wearing tonight."
“那当然！”沈萤还没回话，萝卜就一脸骄傲的回答，“我们家的小姐姐们，都是很厉害的。”
"Of course!" The radish answered with pride before Shen Ying could reply. "Our Little Missys are all very formidable."
“那当然，听闻这塔直通仙界，自然不同凡响。”旁边的人一脸兴奋的解释道，“塔中虽然只有三层，但听闻内里玄机无限，自成天地呢。姑娘，我只能送你到这里了，前面得你自己进去了。”

"That goes without saying, they say that this pagoda leads directly to the Immortal Realm, so of course it's unique." The person next to her explained excitedly. "There are only three levels in the pagoda, but it's said that there are many mysteries within, and it is a world unto itself. Miss, I can only bring you so far, you have to go ahead by yourself."
“那御风？”
" Then how about wind-riding?"
“那怎么办？这也没有别的路了。”孤月皱了皱眉道，“总不能让那妖狐练成结婴丹，否则它吃了后成了妖王，更难对付了。”

"Then what should we do? There is no other way in." Frowning, Lonemoon countered, "We can't let the fox demon refine a neonate formation pill, otherwise it will become a demon monarch after consuming it, and then it will be even harder to deal with."
“那我们就先行告辞了。”孤月点了点头，还特意朝着右侧的易家主管笑了笑。
"Then we'll take our leave." Lonemoon nodded in acknowledgement, and even turned to smile at Yi Feng's housekeeper.
“那我到底穿越到这个世界来干嘛？有什么意义！”
"What exactly did I transmigrate into this world for? What's the meaning behind all of this!"
“那是一个亦正亦邪的组织。”孤月皱了皱眉道，“里面的人擅长一些隐藏行踪的功法，就算是高阶修士，轻易也不能察觉。听闻他们的信息网遍布三青界，专门贩卖各门派的私密为生。只要花得起钱，就能打听到想要的消息，他们的总楼就在城西。”

"They're an organisation that's neither good nor evil," Lonemoon frowned. "The people in the organisation are proficient at a hidden walking technique. Even high-level cultivators cannot easily detect them. I've heardthat their information network expands across the Three Realms and they specialise in the private sale of secrets from various sects. As long as you can afford it, you can find out what you want to. Their main building is located in the west of the city."
“那是什么声音？”青尹一顿，瞅了瞅远处，“前方出了何事？为何突然黄沙满天？”
"What was that sound?" Qing Yin paused and surveyed the surroundings. "What happened in front? Why is the air ahead filled with sand?"
“那是啥？”两人正打算仔细再搜一遍，沈萤却突然指着一处问。
"What is that?" The two of them were planning to search again when Shen Ying suddenly asked them, her hand pointing to a particular spot.
“那是啥？”沈萤指了指前面道。
"What’s that?" Shen Ying pointed at something ahead.
“那是因为我闭关了！”
"That's only because I was in seclusion!"
“那是我侄女的书，小女孩看的东西还能写些啥？”他哼一声道，“还不就是……男男女女那些事。”
"That's my niece's book, what else is in there for books that little girls read?" He groaned, "Isn't it just some… stuff about girls and guys."
“那是我的本命法器，你丫本命法器随便借人的。”孤月瞪了她一眼，转而掏出一片叶状的法器，往空中一扔，顿时变大了十几倍，“上去吧，用这个。”

"That's my intrinsic Dharma artifact. People don't just lend those out easily." Lonemoon glared at her, then took out a leaf-shaped Dharma artifact and threw it into the air. The Dharma artifact immediately became dozens of times larger upon being thrown. "Get on. Use this instead."
“那是那是。”孤月连连点头，“但可惜，追魂楼虽然对上青界的信息无所不知，但对于中青界和下青界的消息，终还是缺了一点，称不上完美。楼主为何不干脆补全这一块，到时追魂楼别说是一流仙门，甚至可以直接超越世家。”

"That sure is." Lonemoon quickly nodded, "But it is such a pity, although the Soul Chasing Tower has information about the Upper Azure World, it is still a little lacking in the network with the Middle and Lower Azure World, leaving it imperfect. Tower Master, why not fix this piece and Soul Chasing Tower can surpass even the aristocratic families."
“那是！”说到自己的专业，枫影一脸骄傲，“你都不知道，这里面我花了多少心思和心血，不是我吹，追魂楼完全不输一流的仙门。”

"That sure is!" Talking about his profession, Feng Ying was full of pride, "You don't know how much effort I have out into this, I am not bragging but the Soul Chasing Tower does not lose to the top immortal sects."
“那是？”
"Then?"
“那渣男逼人做炉鼎，用人试药偿毒，还用活人练丹。的确不是什么好人！”沈萤实话实说。

"That scum forced people to become human cauldrons, used them to test medicine and poisons, even used people who are still alive to refine pills. He was indeed not a good person!" Shen Ying spoke the truth.
“那照你们的说法，我到底要找个什么样的？”
"So according to you guys, what kind of partner should I look for?"
“那狐妖到底要抢你什么？”蹲在旁边看戏的沈萤，突然戳了戳旁边的狸猫问。
"What did the fox demon want to rob you of?" Shen Ying, who had been watching the proceedings by Lonemoon’s side, suddenly poked the civet cat next to her.
“那等宝物，谁不眼红。我看他之前还是元婴，一出那秘境就是化神了。不是身怀异宝，谁信啊！”
"Who wouldn't want a treasure of that grade? He entered the mystic realm as a Nascent Soul, yet came out as a Soul Formation. Who would believe that he's not holding on to any treasure?"
“那缔结契约……”
"Then how about concluding a contract..."
“那自然……”
"Of course."
“那谁……你就是他们的家长吧？我们聊聊呗？”
"Hey… you are their parents right? Let's talk?"
“那谁……再见了。”沈萤连忙止住闲聊，转身往台下走。
"Mister, er… Goodbye," Shen Ying quickly ended the small talk and turned around to leave the viewing stands..
“那走吧！”
"Let's go!"
“那跟厨子有关？”
"So it has something to do with Chef?"
“那边啊。”沈萤指了指后面，“问这个干嘛？”
"Right there," Shen Ying pointed behind her. "Why do you ask?"
“那边还晾着我好几条鱼干呢！”上次带回来的海鲜，很大的那种，“厨子，救货啊！”
"I aired several dried fish in that place!" The seafood brought back the previous time were HUGE. "Chef! Go save our goods!"
“那还不快走？等着被人抓啊！”他样子更加的凶狠，“这事还不都是你惹出来的？要不是看在老乡的份上，以为老子想管这破事啊！”他堂堂玄天宗化神尊者，假公济私一次容易嘛！

"Then why aren't you leaving? Are we waiting to be caught?" His expression turned even more ferocious. "Isn't this all because of you? If not for us being from the same hometown, do you think I would have given a damn about this!?" He was a mighty Soul Formation Supremacy of Blackheaven Sect, so how could it be easy for him to close one eye on this matter?
“那遁行？”
"What about the stealth advancement?"
“那都是你们轩辕家的人，不能做为凭证。而且就算有人带出千叶草木灵，你又如何证明它就是你轩辕家的，而不是秘境中原本的机缘。”

"All of whom are from your Xuan Yuan Family. They're not fit to be witnesses. Even if someone really had brought the Thousand Leaves Vegetation Spirit out, how are you going to prove that it belongs to your Xuan Yuan Family, and was not originally from the mystic realm?"
“那里有可能是退路！”孤月沉声道，“但是……”他们被困在中间根本就过不去，这些是异火，普通的防御法衣可没有什么作用。

"There may be a way out over there!" Lonemoon said in a low voice. "But…" They were trapped by the flames and couldn't go over. This was Deviant Fire. Ordinary defensive Dharmic vests offered no protection whatsoever.
“那闯入的人自称剑修羿清。我已经打听清楚了，羿清就是你无敌派掌门。”枫影越说越加的气愤，扫了在场的众妖一眼，又看向化神期的两人，带些忌惮的道，“今日只为寻仇，与它人无关。还请两位告之，无敌派掌门，现在何处？”

"The person who invaded our Tower called himself Sword Cultivator Yi Qing. I've asked around and I am sure that Yi Qing is the Sect Master of your Invincible Sect," Feng Ying got more agitated as he spoke. He scanned the demons in front of him and studied the two Soul Formation cultivators. Suppressing his anger, he said, "I am only here to take revenge. It has nothing to do with the rest of you. Please tell me, where is your Sect Master?"
“那魔修还在玄天宗！”孤月接口答道。
"The fiendish cultivator is still in Blackheaven Sect!" Lonemoon continued his sentence.
“邪门了，再看招……”
"This is so strange... Try to take this!"
“邪门了，这易公子难道深藏不露？”
"This is so strange, could it be that this Young Master is secretly concealing his great power?"
“郁……红。”他一头黑线的拉过红衣妹子，“这些……就是你选的精英？”
"Yu... Hong," he frowned as he pulled a red-clothed girl aside. "Are these... the best of the people you've met?"
“郁家主可不要胡说！”轩辕禹越听越是心颤，连忙上前一步，赶在某人作死前大声道，“你自己也说郁家逃走的都是炉鼎，可你看看思羽姑娘，她可是金丹魁首，炉鼎是些什么资质谁不清楚，怎么可能赢得了大比？你一定是认错了！”

"Master of the Yu Family, do not spout nonsense!" The more Xuan Yuanyu heard, the more he shivered, he quickly stepped forward and rushed before someone seeked death, shouting, "You said that those that escaped from the Yu Family were human cauldrons, but look at Si Yu, she is the best Golden Core, everyone knows the qualifications of human cauldrons, how could she win the competition? You must have made a mistake!"
“郁家主这就是个误会，快把无敌派弟子放了吧？”我这是要救你啊老弟！
"Master Yu, this is a misunderstanding, quickly let go of the Invincible Sect's disciples?" I am trying to save you dude!
“郁家主这话就不对了。”轩辕禹见缝插针的道，“振祥真做了如此恶事，就不能再算是名门正派，自然也不能再是郁家的人。那他门下的炉鼎，也不是郁家家奴了，又哪来的逃奴？”

"Master Yu, that's not right." Xuan Yuan Family interrupted, "Zhen Xiang really did such evil deeds, then he cannot be considered to be of a decent sect and naturally would not a Yu Family's people. The human cauldrons under him are also no longer the family slaves of the Yu Family, so how is there still escaped slaves?"
“郁家主，还是查清楚比较好。”轩辕瞅了瞅沈萤越来越沉的脸色，一边劝一边拼命给郁海珩使眼色，“况且她还是个金丹，如何敌得过一个元婴真人。”

"Master Yu, it's best to check thoroughly." Xuan Yuan Yu glanced over at Shen Ying's gloomy face, and tried to persuade as he desperately signaled Yu Hai Heng, "Moreover, she's a Golden Core, how can she defeat a Perfected Nascent Soul."
“郁家家主带着十几个化神修士杀进来了！”枫影解释了一句，转身就往偏殿走去，“我去叫沈萤。”

"The Yu Family Patriarch and a group of Soul Formation cultivators broke into our sect and started attacking!" explained Feng Ying. He turned and walked in the direction of the palace wing. "I'm going to call Shen Ying."
“郁家说是元飞阻扰他们抓捕族中的逃奴。”印风皱了皱眉，抬了看了沈萤一眼，沉声道，“现在元飞和思羽、郁红两位姑娘都在里面，事关贵派，所以我才通知了羿掌门，具体什么情况还要进去才知道。”

"The Yu Family said Yuanfei stopped them from catching the slaves who escaped from their family," Yin Feng frowned. He raised his head to look at Shen Ying, then lowered his voice and said, "Now, Yuanfei, Si Yu and Yu Hong are inside. This concerns your sect, so I sent someone to inform you, Sect Master Yi. We'll only find out what is going on when we go inside."
“郁家？”她呆了呆，“去哪干嘛？”
"The Yu Family?" Her expression went black. "Go where and for what?"
“郁海珩！”郁红惊呼出声，退后一步，不敢置信的看着阵法中心的人。
“Yu Haiheng!" exclaimed Yu Hong in a shocked voice. Backing away, she looked incredulously at the men at the center of the array formation.
“郁海珩！”郁红瞪向对方，沉声道，“你胆敢闯入我无敌派，就不怕我们掌门再揍你一次吗？”
"Yu Hai Heng!" Yu Hong glared at him and said, "You dared to invade our Invincible Sect. Aren't you afraid that our Master would beat you up again?"
“郁红姐。”那灰袍的女子连忙摇了摇头，带着点惊慌的看了看四周。下一刻那店里又走出了七八个，跟她一样穿着灰扑扑的人。

There is wotou and meat porridge in the pot! Xiaonu has left for a relative’s house and will return tomorrow! Don’t worry about me! Do your best, Young Master!

"Shut up!" Lonemoon's mouth twitched. To hell with her! After just five minutes with her his blood pressure was already rising. "Either eat up or scram!"

"This is going to be troublesome..."
“麻烦你妹啊！”他忍不住把桌上那摊烂泥又扶了起来，“你好歹客气一下，找个正经点的理由吧！麻烦是什么鬼？”
"Troublesome my foot!" He reached out and pulled the slob to her feet. "You had better have a better reason than that! What kind of lousy reason is 'it's troublesome'?!"
“黑色元力怎么会颜色变浅？”
"Why did the colour of the black essence force become lighter?"
“黑色元力！”
"Black essence force!"
“黑色元力，一定又是黑色元力搞的鬼！”
"It’s the black essence force! It must be due to the black essence force!"
“黑色元力，一定是黑色元力！”
"Black essence force, it must be the black essence force!"
“黑色元力，出来！”
"Black essence force, I summon you!"
“黑色元力，就看你的了！”
"I'm counting on you, black essence force!"
“黑色元力，融合！”
"Black essence force, merge!"
“黑色元力？”
"Black essence force?"
“黑色？两枚？”
"Black? Two pills?"
“龙哥？”
"Brother Long?"
“龙？”沈萤愣了一下，“龙不是应该有两只角吗？”神话故事里都是这么说的。
"A dragon?" Shen Ying hesitated. "Isn't a dragon supposed to have two horns?" That was how all the stories described dragons.
"And?"
……总感得应该假装不知道。
... He felt that it would be best if he pretended he had not heard it.

一下一下又一下……
Again and again and again...
一个一身蓝底白衣满身威压的男人被推到了她面前。
A man clad in a blue gown over a white outfit was pushed over to her.
一个全身被黑雾掩盖的身影，发出一声惊叹。
A figure completely covered by black fog exclaimed in surprise.
一个多时辰后……
About two hours later…
一个字，一个笔画，一个标点符号都没有！
Not a word, a letter, or even a punctuation was dedicated to her!
一个小时……
An hour...
一个小时后……
An hour later...
一个巨大的阵法，突然浮现出来，瞬间就盖住了原本的血阵。他们只觉得全身一重，直接被阵法压制得单膝跪了下来，连着身上的灵气也开始源源不断的涌入阵中。

A huge array formation suddenly emerged and instantly covered the original blood array. They felt their whole body become heavy; the array was pressing down on them until they were forced to kneel down on one knee. The Spirit Qi began to flow out from their body continuously into the array.
一个打二十个？
One person fighting twenty others?
一个时辰过去了……
Two hours passed.
一个熟悉的身影，心无旁骛专心致致的吃饭，若不是桌上的饭菜肉眼可见的减少着，整个画面像是循环播放的一样。直到上面的碗碟全空，那影像才有了新变化。一个浑身是血的人突然掉了下来。身着一袭红衣，发丝缕乱，脸被血迹糊了一半，但隐隐可以看出是一名绝色女子。

A familiar figure was eating, her whole attention on the food. If one could not fail to see the food on the table visibly diminishing, one would have mistaken it for a looping movie clip. It was not until the dishes were completely empty that the scene changed. A figure covered in blood suddenly came crashing down. Wearing a red dress, her hair was dishevelled and half her face was smeared in blood. But even so, one could still make out that she was a stunning woman.
一个结丹，四五个涨了小境界，她们已经有了体修的根基，再也转不回来了。尼玛，要不要这么杯具啊？！他明明教的是剑修，为什么她们一个个的，全练成了体修啊喂？

One was completing Core Formation while another four or five of them were advancing by another minor realm. With the foundation of a Body Cultivator, there was no turning back. What the hell, did it have to be so tragic?! He had undoubtedly taught sword cultivation, so why had they all practiced body cultivation?
一个身影从坑里手脚并用的爬了出来，那是一个看着只有十五六岁的少年（女？），一身绿色的衣衫，长发及地，带着点稚嫩的脸，美得惊心动魄。仿佛上天最完美的杰作，连着满地的鲜花都瞬间失去了颜色，就连当初戚橙雨也不及它绝色。

A figure emerged from the pit, using its hands and legs to crawl out. It looked like a fifteen to sixteen-year-old teenage girl who wore a green robe, her long hair reaching the ground. She had a gentle face and was strikingly beautiful, looking like she was a perfect creation of heaven. The flowers around her suddenly seemed pale in comparison. Even Qi Chengyu couldn't compare to her beauty.
一个身影出现在一处屋檐下，正紧张的四下张望着。
A silhouette of a person appeared at an area beneath a roof and was checking out the surroundings nervously.
一个身着朴素长袍，双手拄着一把华丽狭长的七彩神剑，很随意地坐在石梯上的老人。
Decked in a simple long robe, an old man wielded an opulent, narrow rainbow-colored longsword in his hands. He was seated casually on the stone steps.
一些家族子弟暗暗放松警戒大笑不停，在他们看来江逸这个废物怎么敢反抗，就算反抗他凭什么反抗？凭他铸鼎境一重的实力吗？对于江豹和江松被江逸伤了之事，众人原本就不相信，此刻更是彻底不信了。

Some of the familial descendants sliently let their guard down and started laughing uncontrollably. In their eyes, how could a useless good-for-nothing like Jiang Yi ever dare to resist; and, even if he chose to resist, on what basis could he rely on to fight back? Could he just rely on his power level alone, being only at the first stage of the Cast Tripod Realm? Regarding the events in which Jiang Bao and Jiang Song were injured by Jiang Yi - everyone had initially disbelieved the stories, and at the moment they were even more so in completely disbelief that such events even happened.
一些江家子弟被吓到了，对付江逸这样的小角色，还需要如此高级的武技？江如鹰这铸鼎境三重的武者全力一击，确定不会活活把江逸劈死？有两个胆子小的甚至把眼睛闭上了，避免看到血肉模糊内脏横飞的场面。

Some of the Jiang Clan descendants were shocked. Surely one did not need such high-grade martial arts skills to deal with a small character like Jiang Yi? Was Jiang Ruying certain that, being a martial artist with a power level at the third stage of the Cast Tripod Realm and applying all this power in a single attack, he would not simply chop and split Jiang Yi to death? Two of the descendants, both having very little courage, even closed their eyes, to avoid seeing the spectacle of bodily mutilation and bloody splatter being inflicted.
一代无敌天帝的传奇历史自此终结，新的轮回缓缓拉开了序幕……
The legend of a generation, the invincible Nine-Yang Celestial Thearch, had come to an end. The cycle of Samsara slowly pulled opened the curtains of a new beginning…
一分钟之后……
One minute later...
一分钟后。
After a minute...
一分钟后，郁昊天——扑街！
On minute later, Yu Haotian kicked the bucket!
一切都不同了！
the condition had changed completely!
一刻钟后他就再也笑不出来了。
A moment later, his smile was wiped off his face completely.
一名导师走了过来，江逸连忙将包裹内的令牌全部取了出去，那导师又询问了江逸的名字年龄，这才朝导师群中沉喝道：“学员江逸，得到令牌总四十七枚，通过血炼，目前排名第十八。”

Jiang Yi hastily retrieved all his tokens from his baggage as a mentor walked over. The mentor then inquired for his name and age, before calling out to the group of mentors in a booming voice," Apprentice Jiang Yi, obtained a total of 47 tokens, cleared the Blood Alchemy, currently ranked 18th,".
一名带着野猪面具的武者，立即起身朝练功房内走去，很快房门关闭，里面隐约响起打斗声，还有那少女的娇喝声。

A martial artist wearing a mask of a wild boar immediately stood up and walked towards that technique practicing room. It was not long before the doors to the room sealed shut. The sounds of combat and the teenage girl's delicate voice vaguely rang out from inside.
一团混乱的弟子这才退了回去，可恰恰是这么一退，那团黑气瞬间从人群中钻了出来，抓紧机会凌空而起，朝着右边的方向冲了出去。

The chaotic crowd of disciples started retreating at his command, but at the exact moment that they retreated, the Black Qi suddenly burrowed out from the crowd, shot up into the sky and headed to the right.
一声怪叫划破长空。
A weird scream cut the air.
一声惨叫顿时划破长空，那团东西啪的一下掉在了屋顶上，身上的黑气尽散，露出个一身黑衣的少年，只是头上顶着两只黑色的耳朵，背后甩着两根胖乎乎的大尾巴。

There was a piercing scream and the blob fell onto the roof with a thud. The black Qi around its body dissipated, revealing a young boy dressed in black, with two black ears on his head and two fat tails behind him.
一夜修炼无话。
A silent night of cultivating.
一年！沈萤嘴角抽抽了一下，脑海里顿时浮现了一个公式：历练=没有厨子=没人做饭=即将断粮！转头瞅了瞅旁边的孤月，还等于一年猪食！

One year! Shen Ying's mouth twitched a bit, and suddenly a formula appeared in her head: training expedition = no chef = no one to cook my meals = pending food crisis! Turning back to look at Lonemoon, she thought to herself: this means one year of eating pig swill!
一开始还以为只是沈萤同情心泛滥，可怜那魔修所以硬拉着他们一块去的。没想到后面居然藏着这么大一个惊喜！沈萤平时看起来哪哪都不靠谱的样子，心思却这么敏税，一针见血。

At first, he thought that it was Shen Ying's sympathy working overtime, that she had dragged them along on her escapade because she pitied the fiendish cultivator. He certainly did not expect such a pleasant surprise in store! Shen Ying did not usually give the impression that she was the reliable sort, so he had been surprised by her being so alert and sharp; she had immediately grasped the crux of the matter.
一念至此，江逸脸上露出一丝狠色，既然把对方打伤了，那么一不做二不休，他也就干脆光棍起来。
With that, a ruthless expression suffused Jiang Yi's face. Since he’d already thrashed Jiang Bao, he might as well stick it out to the end and act like a hoodlum.
一想到小奴，江逸脸上狰狞的表情终于平和下来，似乎身上也没那么痛了。日子虽然艰苦，但他一直没有放弃，一直觉得自己还有继续搏下去勇气的最重要原因，便是这个和他一道长大，情同兄妹，对他始终不离不弃，平日里各种鼓励打气的小侍女了。

When Xiaonu came into his mind, Jiang Yi’s ferocious glare finally lost its edge, and his body seemed to stop throbbing for a moment. The days might have passed painfully with much difficulty, but he never gave up completely.
He always felt that the greatest motivation for him—the reason why he could endure day after day of torment—was this little servant girl. Xiaonu had grown up with him, and they were as close as peas in a pod. Despite his situation, she had neither given up on him nor left him behind. Instead, she tried all methods to motivate and encourage him daily.
一想到这点，他就止不住兴奋，这回一定一定要看好了，隔绝新弟子们跟沈萤任何接触的可能。这回他定要陪养出一批纯粹的剑修。

Lonemoon got excited just thinking about this. They were going to make it this time. He was going to make sure that his new disciples would not get distracted by Shen Ying anymore. This time, he was going to train them to become pure Sword Cultivators.
一手带着青尹，没有说过什么话的青亦，却突然神情一沉，身上瞬间暴发出一股比之前庞大数百倍的气势，攻上去的灵剑突然在他两尺前的地方停住，哐当一声瞬间全被震成了碎片。

Qing Yi did not say much as he pulled along Qing Yin, but his expression suddenly became solemn and his body released an imposing aura hundreds of times greater than before. The spirit swords that were attacking Qing Yi stopped in front of him and they all shattered into pieces.
一把抓起包子，啊呜几口吃完，转身就朝着满地废墟的偏殿走去，一路走到了床边，掀起被子躺了进去。

She picked up the bun and swallowed it in a few mouthfuls, then turned and started walking towards the ruins of the palace wing until she reached her bed, whereupon she lifted her blanket and laid down.
一把抱住了他旁边的沈萤，飞上了天空。
He put his arm around Shen Ying and flew into the sky.
一拳比一拳重，一拳比一拳不能反抗，几息过去，印天飞彻底失去了意识。
Each punch was heavier than the last, making it harder for Yin Yuanfei. After a while, Yin Yuanfei completely lost consciousness.
一挑五！有点牛逼！
One against five! Impressive!
一探鼻息，得，又没气了！
Let's check his breath… Oh no, he's not breathing again!
一时有些犹豫，这么大的恩情，也不知该如何报答，但他现在的情况，确实需要。想了想终是点了头，“谢谢。”

He hesitated to accept it, as he felt he could not repay this great act of kindness. However, in his current sorry state, he really needed it. After thinking it over, he finally nodded and said, "Thanks."
一时间十几个化神修士就冲了出来，一道剑气直接斩向思羽，瞬间把她逼退了好几丈。眼看着满天各式法器就要落在三人身上。

Immediately, a dozen or so Soul Formation cultivators rushed out, and a stream of Sword Qi headed directly towards Si Yu, instantly forcing her to stagger backwards. All kinds of Dharma artifacts were about to rain down on the three of them.
一时间只看她一截接一截的从里面拿出各式各样，死透透的兽尸，而且还全都是半截的，品种之丰富，类型之齐全。比任何一本灵兽书上写的都要完全。

Shen Ying retrieved sections after sections of dead beast corpses from her bag. All the beasts had been severed in two and came from a wide variety of species that were more comprehensive than could be found in any spirit beast encyclopedia.
一时间四周灵气大涨，疯狂的朝着思羽涌了过去。
Suddenly, the level of Spirit Qi in the surrounding spiked as it was all drawn towards Si Yu.
一时间所有的目光，齐唰唰的看向了羿清。
Suddenly, all the surrounding gazes were turned onto Yi Qing.
一时间所有门派全把矛头对准了郁家，之前有多追捧，现在就有多唾弃。原本位于四大世家之一的郁家，已呈分崩离兮之势。门下弟子门人或是出走，或是改名换姓，不到半个月的功夫，实力已经不如三流的小门派。

At once, all the sects and families became enemies of the Yu Family. As much as they held the Yu Family in high esteem earlier, they now hated the Yu Family. While it was originally one of four aristocratic families, it had now fallen from glory. All its disciples either left or changed their names. Within half a month, they became worse off than a small sect.
一时间满场都是思羽伤心欲绝的哭声。
Suddenly, the place was filled with Si Yu's grieved wails.
一时间满天的术法亮起，羿清和孤月虽然都是剑修，超阶对付一两个游仙没问题，但顶不住对方人多啊。当初三大世家进来的时候，除了轩辕家有几个游仙伤重未愈外，其它两家几乎带上了家族所有的游仙。

Sorcery filled the air in seconds. Yi Qing and Lonemoon were sword cultivators and could handle one or two Traveling Immortals, but there were simply too many of them. When the three masters of the aristocratic families entered the pagoda, they brought along all the Traveling Immortals from their families. Only the master of the Xuan Yuan Family did not do so, and that was only because the Traveling Immortals from his family were all seriously wounded.
一时间那高高在上的众，脸色一时青一些黑，特别精彩起来，都有种搬起石头砸自己脚的感觉。

Within a moment, the crowd came down from their moral high horse. Some of their expressions remained dark, while others seemed to look uncomfortable. The crowd felt as if they had just shot themselves in the foot.
一时间，仿佛日月都失去了光辉，天地间只余那缓步走来的人。
The sun and the moon seemed insignificant compared to this girl—she was now all that mattered.
一时间，众人都沉默了，三个家主相互交换了个眼神，半会才似下定了什么决心似的，点了点头。
For a time everyone was silent and the three patriarchs exchanged looks. After a while, they seemed to come to a decision and nodded.
一时间，整个上青界的修士，都激动了！那两名下界来的剑修之名，更是火遍了大街小巷，各座仙城。成为了修士们日常聊天的必备话题。

Suddenly, all the cultivators in the Upper Azure World were on their toes! The two sword cultivators from the Lower Realm became the talk of the town. Their names spread like wildfire throughout all the towns in the Upper Azure World, and they were also the topic in all daily conversations.
一时间，整个林内都是地震一般嘭嘭嘭的砸地声，和她那一句句愤怒质问，“知道不知道在睡觉，知道不知道，知道不知道……”
For a time, the whole forest was filled with earthquaking crashing sounds mixed with her angry questioning, "Didn't you know I was sleeping, didn't you know, didn't you know…"
一枚人阶上品丹药十两银子，十枚就是一百两，也就是一两紫金。要是能在一个月内炼制出一百枚人阶上品丹药，他欠下风月楼的巨额债务不就可以轻松还上了吗？万一再炼制出一枚刚才这种地阶丹药，那说不定只要几枚就能变卖十两紫金了……

A Man-tier superior-grade elixir pill was worth ten taels of silver. Ten pills were worth a hundred taels—or one tael of purple gold. If he could produce a hundred Man-tier superior-grade elixirs within a month's time, wouldn't he be able to easily return the enormous debt to the people of Fengyue Brothel?
一步，两步，三步！
One step, two steps, three steps!
一炷香之后，他来到了天羽城的城中心广场内，广场内人来人往，车水马龙很是热闹，江逸全身笼罩内黑袍内，引起了一些人注意，不过城内人多嘈杂，大家倒是没怎么在意。

After five minutes, he arrived in the City Plaza in the middle of Skyplume City. People came and went in and around the plaza, with much heavy traffic that made the square bustling with activity. With his entire body enveloped in pitch-black robes, Jiang Yi did attract the attention of some people; however, as the city was crowded and noisy, most people did not seem to take notice.
一炷香时间后，江逸抵达了丹药房，在门口他有些畏缩的朝内堂望去，想看看丹药房的长老在不在？这个负责给江家炼丹的外姓柳长老脾气可是异常古怪的。

After five minutes, Jiang Yi arrived at the Elixir Room. He flinched at the door, cowering as he looked into the room, wondering if the elder of the Elixir Room was there. This man in charge of producing elixirs for the Jiang Clan, Elder Liu, had a bizarre temperament.
一片死静。
Dead silence.
一直以为自己带的是剑修的孤月——MMP！
Lonemoon who had always thought that he had been teaching Sword Cultivators — Son of a b*tch!
一直修炼到黄昏时分，江逸才停了下来，内视了一下丹田内的元力，他眼中都是火热。只是修炼了一下午，他积累的元力就可比以前的一个月，武殿内修炼速度的增幅，加上黑色元力丹药，还有他本身封印符文的破解，让他修炼速度呈火箭般快速增长。

Jiang Yi continued power cultivation until dawn, when he finally decided to stop. Using his inner vision to observe the essence force in his dantian, his eyes were filled with fiery passion. He had only done power cuultivation for an afternoon, yet the amount of essence force he had collated was equivalent to what he used to produce in an entire month. With the increase in the speed of his essence force cultivation in the Martial Arts Hall, plus the effects of the black essence force and the medical efficacy of the elixir, on top of the gradual removal of more runic patterns on the seal on his person, allowed his power cultivation speed to to become faster and fast longer, akin to a flying fire arrow.
一直到第二天破晓时分，江逸才停止了修炼！
It was only until the break of dawn the next day that Jiang Yi stopped his cultivating practice!
一直期待发大招的孤月：“……”
Lonemoon, who had been eagerly looking forward to an awe-inspiring move from Yi Qing: "…"
一直站在旁边的羿清脸色一黑，直接插到了两人中间，挡住他那越发火热的视线。
Yi Qing, who had been standing by the side the entire time, suddenly looked upset. He put himself between the two of them, blocking the passionate gazes from Bai Ze.
一直观战的郁海衍眉头紧了紧，眼神瞬间沉了下来，突然双手结印，转瞬间道道白色的风刃攻击向两人，比之前的剑雨还要密集。

Yu Hai Heng, who had been watching from the side, frowned. His expression became more focused as he suddenly conjured up white wind blades with both hands and threw them toward the two girls. There were far more wind blades than there were spirit swords in the rain of swords.
一看之下，江逸傻眼了，小树林一个满脸横肉的胖少年缓缓走出，满脸都是凶光和戏谑之色，不是江如虎是谁？而他身后却不断冒出人头，密密麻麻的，最少有二十人！

After one look, Jiang Yi was completely dumbstruck. A fierece-looking plump youth slowly walked out of the small forest, his face giving off an expression of feorcity, animosity and a desire to ridicule - who else could it be but Jiang Ruhu? On top of that, an endless number of heads appeared behind his back. This densely packed group had at least twenty people!
一瞬间在场三人的眼光，齐唰唰全集中在他身上。
The three of them immediately focused their gazes on him.
一行三人这才飞出了刚刚的岛屿，易峰一直跟在白泽大概五步远的位置，抑制不住满心的激动。有灵主在，别说是背云兽，就是再高阶的灵兽，他都不用担心了。突然有些迫不及待想要见到下一只灵兽了。

The group of three flew out of the island, with Yi Feng following about five feet behind Bai Ze, hardly able to contain his excitement. With his Spirit Master around, not only would they not have to be worried about the Cloud-Bearing Beasts, they would not have to worry about even higher level beasts. Suddenly, he could not wait to find the remaining spirit beasts.
一行人是掐着点来到比赛场地的，进去的时候，里面已经聚焦了大片的各门派修士，人山人海，粗粗看上去，许是有上万人。

Shen Ying's group arrived at the competition venue just in time. When they entered, the cultivators from the different sects had already congregated there. At a glance it could be seen that there were perhaps about a thousand people there.
一行人飞了半日，才到了委托上的那个小镇，镇子不大，一眼望得到头。他们直接找了一家客栈住下，羿清便让那些弟子自行去打探消息了。毕竟是他们的历练，他自然不便插手太多。

The group flew for half a day before arriving at the small town they were assigned to. The town was not big, everything in it could be taken in at one glance. After settling down at an inn, Yi Qing let the disciples go by themselves to scout for information. After all, this was meant to be their training, so he could not intervene too much.
一路上的魔：为什么打我，我们只是路过的？
Fiend along the way,"Why were we attacked when we were just passer-by？"
一身白衣胜雪，面容如刀削，脊背如剑，嘴角含着淡淡笑意，风度翩翩，这是一个能让所有花痴少女尖叫的美少年！

One was dressed in a shirt whiter than snow. His face was sharp like a knife, his back straight like a sword, and the corners of his mouth shaped in a faint smile. This was a youthful man so handsome that he would make any girl scream!
一边的孤月却笑了，兴灾乐祸的道，“是呀，你给指导指导呗。”
Noticing her predicament, Lonemoon smirked. "Yes, guide him, guide him."
一道充满怨毒的声音将江逸的思绪拉了回来，他目光一扫看到江豹一边痛嚎，一边恶狠狠的盯着他，那肥嘟嘟的胖脸一片狰狞之色，清晰地写着仇恨二字。
An enraged roar pulled Jiang Yi back from his thoughts. He looked at Jiang Bao and saw him howling in agony; his eyes met with Jiang Bao’s dark, furious gaze.
一道冰冷的声音惊醒了众人，江逸的身子如利箭般从地上射去，直冲江如虎而来。
A cold voice roused the group of people from their shock, as Jiang Yi's figure shot up from the ground like a sharp arrow and rushed straight for Jiang Ruhu.
一道冷哼声响起，两名护卫倒飞出去，反而把路让开了，那名铸鼎境三重的武者化作一道残影冲了进来，抬手对着江逸的胸口就是一掌！
The two guards who were sent flying out opened up a path for the third-stage guard to dash in. He raised his palm and aimed at Jiang Yi's chest!
一道如炸雷般的声音响起，十多人鱼贯而入，一名穿着黑色锦袍中年人虎目森森率先走了进来，身上狂暴的气势瞬间笼罩了整个演武殿，他目光如电一眼锁定江逸，爆喝一声双手元力环绕，很明显……江逸再不停手他就要出手了。

An exploding voice resonated as a dozen individuals penetrated into the Martial Arts Demonstration Hall. A black robed middle-aged man walked in with severe eyes. His violent and imposing aura shrouded the entire Martial Arts Demonstration Hall. His sights locked on Jiang Yi like lightning, the sound of essence force circulating could be heard from his hands. It was obvious... if Jiang Yi didn't stop, he would have made his move.
一道惨绝伦寰叫声响起，江豹在地上不断的翻滚起来，他刚才击出的右手以一种奇怪的形状软绵绵的耷拉着，好像……被他的左手那一格挡，给反推得手肘脱臼了？

An extremely tragic scream pierced the air as Jiang Bao rolled around the ground in severe agony. The right hand he had used to attack was pushed away by a mysterious force. He had used his left hand to block the attack that came after, but the sheer force dislocated his elbow.
一道惨绝伦寰的尖叫声很快响起，马飞全身都颤抖起来，不是因为小腹传来的剧痛，而是因为惊恐，这江家杂碎竟敢废了他，竟真的废了他？

A harrowing scream soon spilled out. Ma Fei's body shook all over, not because of the agonizing pain coming from his stomach, but because of the panic and fear that filled him: the Jiang Clan rascal dared render him useless... he actually, really did it?
一道愤怒的男声传来。
An angry male voice sounded out.
一道沉声的声音响起，却不是江豹击中了江逸，而是江豹那矮壮的身躯竟如破麻袋般倒飞了出去四五丈，这才重重砸落在地上。

A loud, low sound rang through the air. It was not that Jiang Bao successfully hit Jiang Yi, however, but Jiang Bao’s stocky body flying a full fifty feet, like a broken cloth bag. After landing, he crashed heavily onto the ground.
一道清脆的骨头碎裂声响起，他融合了黑色元力力量增大两三倍，只比这铸鼎境护卫弱上一份，这全力一记实实在在的手刀，劈裂对方的腕骨也是正常之事。

A crisp sound of bones breaking rang out. The combined black essence force increased Jiang Yi's strength by two to three times, such that he was weaker by this Cast Tripod Realm guard by just a bit. It was thus a normal phenomenon that this knife hand strike, in which he literally applied all his power to, was able to split open his opponent's wrist bone.
一道焦急的呼声，让修炼中的江逸惊醒过来，他举目一望，发现四周一片漆黑天已经完全黑了。他拍了一下脑袋，暗暗责怪自己一心修炼竟然忘记时间了，连忙把炼丹房大门一关，朝声音的源头快步走去。

An anxious cry roused Jiang Yi from his refining practice. He lifted his head and looked around, quickly realizing the sky around him was already completely dark. He slapped himself in the head, silently blaming himself for being focused entirely on refining and ending up actually forgetting the time. He hurriedly closed the main doors of the alchemy lab, before walking speedily in the direction of the cry.
一道熟悉的女声，先一步响起，带着满腔暴走般的愤怒。瞬间就把鬼王到口的吼声给压了回去。
It was a familiar female voice. The rage in her voice was so devastating that it caused the Ghost King to immediately swallow the scream he was about to let out.
一道白色的身影顿时出现在了空中，他凌空而立，一身白衣洁白得似是不染凡尘，缓缓而落，仿佛整个人都散发着淡淡的白光，在有些暗昏的幻海之上，格外明显。

A white figure appeared in the sky. He was in hanging in mid-air, dressed in a white robe. He began to descend toward Shen Ying as his body seemed to emit a faint light. This light was especially obvious against the dark seas.
一道破坏气氛的冷哼声响起，接着一个让江逸很不爽的声音传来：“江逸，你算什么东西？大少爷的名字也是你能叫的？遇到大少爷你不行礼就罢了，还敢直呼其名？你有这个资格吗？废物！”

A cold snort rang through, breaking the atmosphere. This was followed by a voice that left Jiang Yi disgruntled.
"Jiang Yi, who do you think you are? You think you can say Great Young Master's name? Nevermind that you don't bow to greet Great Young Master, you dare to call him by his name directly? Do you have that privilege? Useless idiot!"
一道褐色的身影从偏厅内爆射而出，身上暴戾的气息压得江逸透不过气来，柳长老一双鼓起牛眼内都是怒意，狠狠瞪了江逸一眼，单手一抓把丹炉的丹盖揭开，立即查探起来。

A brown-colored figure explosively shot out from within the side room, the violent air surrounding that figure bearing down on Jiang Yi so much that he could not breathe. Elder Liu's large, bull-like eyes were filled with rage as he stared viciously at Jiang Yi. With one hand, he grabbed the cauldron lid and lifted it up, revealing the contents of the cauldron. He immediately started investigating the dregs.
一道道人影横飞出来，全躺在地上“哎哟”叫个不停，眼中却都是惊愕，他们自然不是全受了重伤，而是佯装受伤不敢继续上了。他们很多人根本没看清楚江逸的招式，就被击飞出去，还敢冲上去只有自找苦吃。

One by one, bodies were thrashed all over and they were all constantly crying "Ouch!", but their eyes were actually filled with fear instead. Not because they were injured but because they were acting injured so they wouldn't need to attack anymore. Majority of them couldn't even discern the technique used by Jiang Yi and got blown away by him. To carry on rushing him would be to seek trouble for themselves.
一道道清脆的声音响起，江逸的右腿如毒蛇附骨般不断抽打在江松的小腿上。江松哪料到江逸反应的这么快？还没等醒悟过来，小腿已经被抽打了三腿了，一阵剧烈的痛苦传来，他暗道不妙连忙抽回右腿，准备暂时先退后避其锋芒再反扑。

Crisp sounds rang out one after another, as Jiang Yi's right leg continuously whipped Jiang Song's lower leg like a poisonous snake. How could Jiang Song know that Jiang Yi would respond so quickly? Before he realized, his lower leg had already been hit three times, releasing a burst of severe pain. Sensing something was wrong, he hastily moved his right leg back, ready to temporarily retreat and evade attacks first before counter-attacking.
一道重重的冷哼声响起，此刻本弯下腰的江逸似乎早就料到了般，猛然抬起了头，一直藏在衣袖中的拳头上蓝色元力流转，傲然不惧的对着江如鹰破空而来的那条重腿砸去。

A deep and cold snort rang out. Jiang Yi, who at the moment had his waist bent downwards, suddenly raised up his head, as though he had already anticipated the incoming attack. The fists he had hidden within his long robe sleeves had been circulating blue essence force. He proudly and without fear smashed his fists onto Jiang Ruying's incoming heavy leg.
一道长笑声打破了四周原本无比诡异的气氛，在其中一条虚空裂缝消失之前，一名全身笼罩在黑红长袍内的老者从中缓缓走出。这老者面色苍白，没有一丝血色，同时还褶满了皱纹。他的两条长眉垂落到耳际，一双阴鸷的眸子内呈现出一种最深最彻底的红。

Shrill laughter pierced through the abnormally strange ambiance, and out of the closing cracks emerged an elder, shrouded in blackish-red robes. His face was pale white without a tinge of blood and covered in wrinkles. His long brows drooped down to his ears, and his eerily piercing eyes glowed a deep cherry red.
一道闪光劈了下来，直接在茅屋顶上劈开一个大洞，随着唰啦啦的一阵倒塌声，草屑飞溅，历经风雨的小屋塌了大半，只余下她小床上方的方寸之地。

A bolt of lightning struck the cottage roof and tore open a great hole. Rustling noises followed as the hay flew everywhere. Most of the cottage had fallen apart after suffering the lightning strike, leaving only a tiny portion above her bed intact.
一道骨头断裂的声音响起，江逸这一腿全力劈下，没有半点留情面，轻松把铸鼎境二重的江松双手劈断，还重重的把他砸飞出去。

The snapping sound of the bone could be heard. Under the full force of Jiang Yi's kick, he left no mercy and easily broke both the arms of Jiang Song who was second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. At the same time, Jiang Song got blasted off by the heavy forces from Jiang Yi.
一阵带着浓烈腥臭味的风，顿时喷了她一脸。巨兽再次张大口咬了过来，似是想连着沈萤一块吞下去。

A gust of smelly air blew past Shen Ying's face. The beast opened its mouth once again and made another move for the radish. This time, the beast seemed intent on swallowing Shen Ying together with it.
一顿饭后，这个原本美轮美奂的仙宫已经塌得差不多了，沈萤那一剑已经塌了这个仙宫的根基，整个仙宫现在塌得只剩下练丹炉周围一小块完整的地方。

After they finished their meal, they surveyed the once beautiful Immortal Pavilion. It had been completely destroyed. Shen Ying's sword had struck the Immortal Pavilion's foundation so that all that remained was the elixir-refining cauldron.
七岁开始修炼江水决，他修炼到十五岁才铸鼎境一重，此刻只是花费了不到十天就突破到铸鼎境二重，尽管有丹药的辅助，但也足够让江逸激动不已了。最重要的是，他的封印能不断破解，修炼速度能不断增加，这让他看到了希望，有希望的人生才能让人充满斗志。

He had started practising the Jiang Water Art technique at age seven, and it was only when he was fifteen that he managed to cultivate his power up to the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. Even though this was achieved with the help of elixir pills, it was good enough to leave Jiang Yi feeling endlessly excited. Most important of all was that his seal could be continously broken and his power cultivation speed could be continously increased - this allowed him to see a ray of hope, a hope that allowed one to be filled with fighting spirit and the will to endure.
七阶妖经过：“大仙中午好！”
A seventh-stage demon went past: "Good afternoon, Great Immortal!"
All the demons: "…"
三个半时辰之后，天还没亮，江逸却停止了修炼。他睁开眼睛时，眸子都是不解和郁闷。因为——这黑色元力在修炼出十缕之后，无论他怎么运转无名决，丹田内竟不再产生黑色元力……

Six hours later, while the sky was still dark, Jiang Yi stopped the extraction process. He opened his eyes, revealing a look of non-comprehension and melancholy. Because... after extracting ten strands of this black essence force, no matter how much he circulated the nameless cultivation technique, his dantian no longer produced any more black essence force...
三个时辰过去了……
Six hours passed.
三个月后。
Three months later.
三人一头黑线：“……”
The three of them frowned: "..."
三人一怔讪讪的退了回来，他们中实力最强的就是刘管事，他都不是江逸的对手他们追去也没用，一群人立即手忙脚乱的把马飞抬进了房间止血疗伤。

The three men was startled slightly and retreated in embarrassment. Out of all of them, Housekeeper Liu was the strongest. If he was no match against Jiang Yi, it was pointless for anyone else to give chase. A bunch of them carried Ma Fei post-haste into a room to staunch the bleeding and heal his wounds.
三人一路急飞，路经了好几个传送阵，才到了曲双城。再次来到这座仙城，很明显感觉跟上次的热闹截然不同。城内显得有些冷清，城门口只有极少的仙人进出。

The trio flew in a rush, and passed by quite a few transportation array before finally arriving at Qushuang City. Having been here the second time, the city is really different from the bustling scene the first time. The city is quiet and there are only a few immortals coming in and out of the town.
三人一路飞了四五天，才总算出了那片一眼看不见头的森林，眼前顿时出现了片荒原。比起之前的森林来，这里仿佛是另一个极端，到处都是悬崖峭壁，怪石遍地，看不到半点绿色。

The three of them had flown for four to five days before they finally made it out of the dark forest. A huge wasteland lay in front of them. It was the direct opposite of the forest that they had just come out from — there were cliffs and strange rocks at every turn, and there was not one bit of green.
三人不得不退到了十几米开外，此时中间已经看不到萝卜的身影了，只剩下一个由树木形成的茧密不透风。天空骤暗，云层之间开始电光闪耀。

The three of them were forced to retreat about ten meters. From where they stood, they could no longer see the radish's body. They could only see the plants around it forming a dome that they could not look into. The sky began to darken, lightning flashing across it.
三人又退了一步道，“我等，要是不坐呢？”
The three of them stepped back again. "What if we do not want to sit?"
三人吓了一跳，转头一看，才发现，不知道什么时候清韵的旁边坐了一个青衣女子，正跟他们一样盘脚坐着，一手撑着下巴，带些无聊的看着他们。

The three of them got a scare and turned to look before realizing a girl in green had unknowingly sat beside Qing Yun with her legs crossed like them, staring at them in boredom with a hand propping her chin.
三人愣了一下，一脸莫名，“尊者是何意？”
"The three men looked at him in surprise, "What do you mean, Supremacy?"
三人来到森林，刚一落地萝卜身上红光大亮，整个身子开始抽长拉伸，四周的木灵气疯狂的涌了过来。孤月连忙在森林四处布下了防御与凝聚灵气的阵法。萝卜整个已经变成了一团红色，周身的木灵气越来越盛，浓郁的灵气使得它周围几米范围内的树木都开始疯长，团团把它圈在里面，而且越来越密。

The three arrived at the forest. The moment they landed, the radish's entire body began to emit red light and elongate. The Vegetation Spirit Qi around it began to surge. Lonemoon quickly set up a defensive array formation and a Spirit Qi condensing array formation. The radish's entire body had become red and the Vegetation Spirit Qi around it was becoming thicker. The rich Spirit Qi had already caused the plants within a radius of several meters to mature at rapid speed, growing into a dome surrounding the radish.
三人正要御剑而起，突然身后却传来一道愤怒的吼声。
Their small group was just about to ride their swords when suddenly, an angry sound came from behind them..
三人的脸色齐齐白了，瞬间明白他的意思，沉陷心魔，失去自我，他们现在的情况，也没有时间继续耗下去，如果唤不醒，那就只能生死不计了。

Turning pale, the three men immediately understood his meaning. Trapped by their mental demons, the traveling immortals had lost their self-identity. In their current situation, there was no time to lose, if they could not be be awakened, then they were as good as dead.
三人直朝着峰顶殿宇的后方飞去，还未落地羿清就隐隐察觉空气中有股异样的气息，身形一顿，浓眉紧皱道，“这里有魔修的阴气！”

The three of them flew directly towards the back of the house at the top of the peak. Yi Qing could sense that there was something strange with air in the hall even before landing; he paused as his brows furrowed. "There is Yin Qi that belongs to a fiendish cultivator here!"
三人神情越加的警惕，此人不声不响就坐在他们身边这么久，想来绝对不简单，偏偏怎么努力都看不穿对方的修为。

The three of them grew increasingly alarmed. This person had silently sat by their side for so long; she could not be a simple person, but no matter how they tried, they could not see through her cultivation.
三人脸色顿时全黑了。
The expressions on the three’s faces suddenly darkened.
三人脸色齐齐一黑，青尹冷哼一声道，“敬酒不吃吃罚酒，我到要看看你们有什么本事？师兄用不着跟他废话，拿下再说。”

Their faces fell immediately. Qing Yin snorted, "We tried to ask you the nice way, yet you insist on making things difficult. I, for one, want to see exactly what you guys can do. Senior Brother, there's no need to waste anymore time talking to them. We can take them down."
三人转身直接朝着那仙宫而去，还没来得及走到门口，身后的练丹炉却突然传来咚咚咚的三声。

The three of them turned and headed straight to the Immortal Pavilion. But before they even got to the entrance, they heard the sound of three sets of footsteps coming from the elixir-refining cauldron behind them.
三人这才从上空落了下来，停在大殿门口，看向奚秋眼神仍是那般目下无尘的轻视样，只是在看到旁边的孤月时，愣了一下，眼神转了转，这才有了些许警慎的貌样。

The three people had finally descended from the air to land and stopped at the entrance of the hall. They looked over at Xi Qiu, still with much disdain, but when they saw Lonemoon at the side, they were surprised and began to look more alert and careful.
三人都惊住了，连呼吸都齐齐一滞，震惊于这天地灵气所化的样貌。只见他微微一笑，仿佛千万树鲜花绽放，丝竹之声萦绕耳际。

The group of three was stunned, their heavy breathing in sync. All of them were amazed at the human form that the Heaven and Earth’s Spirit Qi took. Her smile was sweeter than a thousand flowers and her giggle sounded extremely pleasing to the ears.
The three of them: "..."
三人：“……”自己吃了过期药，怪我罗？
The three people remained in silence. You ate the expired pill and now you're blaming us for it?
三人：“……”这是一只‘懂事’的狸猫。
The three of them: "…" This is one savvy cat.
三位化神尊者，正围坐在太殿中。三人中间一束白色的亮光，直冲天际。亮光之中隐隐还映照着有仙山祥云的影子。正是中青界唯一通向上青界的通道。

The three Soul Formation Supremacies were seated together in the hall. There was a beam of white light in their midst, shooting towards the sky. Within the bright light, there was a faint reflection of the immortal mountains and magical clouds. That was the only passageway linking the middle and Upper Azure World.
三分钟后……
Three minutes later…
三十分钟……
Thirty minutes...
三名护卫顿时大怒就要追去，刘管事却爆喝起来：“追什么，你们这点实力想去送死？”

Three of the guards were instantly enraged and about to give chase. Housekeeper Liu however, yelled, "There's no use in chasing. With so little power, aren't the three of you digging your own graves?"
三天前……追魂楼……找人？
Three days ago... Soul Chasing Tower... looking for someone?
三天后。
Three days later...
三天后，妖王殿。
Three days later, in the Demon Palace...
三小时后，上青城。
Three hours later, in the Upper Azure Town...
三秒后……
Three seconds later…
三青界中有着不少的秘境，由于很多秘境对进入的人有所限制，所以秘境里都是公认的法外之地。而秘境里的法宝又全都是无主之物，发生几人同时发现一处机缘的事，也很平常，所以抢夺资源的事，在秘境中是很常见的，结果自然是能者居之。秘境里发生的恩怨，不牵连到秘境外，至于表面上各派之间都保持着这样的默契。

There were several mystic realms in the three worlds, but many of them had restrictions on the people that were allowed to enter, hence mystic realms had been deemed as not under the jurisdiction of laws. Moreover, since the Dharma treasures inside were all without owners, it was common for a few people to discover them at the same time, and fighting for the resources in a mystic realm was prevalent. The outcome would of course be that the fittest would survive. All the resentment inside a mystic realm would not implicate anything outside of it, thus the sects remained a certain mutual understanding.
上下打量了她一眼，发现她全无修为，这才放了心，只是凡人。
He gave her a good look and then realized she was void of any cultivation. He was relieved that she was only mortal.
上前一把抱住了沈萤的大腿道，“大佬！我错了大佬，我不该自不量力挑战无敌派，求你让这破系统停下来吧？你叫我干啥都行，我眼睛快瞎了。”

He came forward to hug Shen Ying's thigh and said, "Big guy! It's my fault, I should not have overestimate myself to challenge the Invincible Sect, please let this stupid system stop? You can get me to do anything, my eyes are going blind."
上课第一天，他就挨个仔细检查了一遍众人的修为术法，一查之下自己都吓了一跳。这九个人的灵根居然没有一个是完整的，虽然可以看出以前的确有很好的姿质，但由于数股灵气的强行突入采补，导致根基都毁了大半。而且体内经脉错乱不堪，有的甚至身中剧毒。说是修练了，能活到现在都已经是个奇迹了。

On the first day of lessons, he examined all of their cultivation sorcery carefully and was shocked upon inspection. The Spirit Roots of all nine disciples were not complete. Although it could be seen that they did have great potential, the forceful infiltration of much Spirit Qi for harvesting had caused their foundations to be greatly damaged. Moreover, the meridians in their bodies were very messy, some even containing poison. Putting cultivation aside, it was already a miracle that they had been able to live till today.
上青城人不少，一到各门派招收门人的日子，就越加的热闹。大街小巷挤满想要加入门派或是世家的凡人，特别是城中的广场之上更是人满为患。四大世家向来有自己固定的招收地点，所以前来这广场上的，都是想要加入其它门派的人。

There were many people in Upper Azure Town and the place where the sects recruited disciples was much more crowded. The alleys and streets were filled with mortals who were looking to join a sect or a family and the public square was simply overflowing with people. The four aristocratic families had their own designated spots in the public square where they could recruit disciples. The mortals in the public square were mostly looking to join these aristocratic families.
上青城是位于上青界南边的一城仙城，此城位于各家势力的边沿地带，不属于任何世家与门派。是为数不多的中立仙城。城中人员混杂，只要是修士都可以进入，十分热闹。大半刚刚上界的修士，或是有意加入世家的弟子都会来此城打探消息。

Upper Azure Town was an Immortal Town in the south of the Upper Azure World. Upper Azure Town was located beside several districts where aristocratic families lived, but it did not belong to any one aristocratic family or sect. It was one of the few neutral Immortal Towns. There were many types of people in the bustling town as anyone who was a cultivator could enter. Most of them were cultivators who had just arrived at the Upper World or cultivators who were looking to join an aristocratic family.
上青界最近出了一件大事，听闻四大世家之一的轩辕家，有族人在下界惹到了两名剑修。结果人家气不过，直接追到上界不说，还直捣黄龙的杀到了轩辕主家。

Something had shaken the Upper Azure World recently. Word was going around that a group of people from one of the four aristocratic families, the Xuan Yuan Family, went to the Lower Realm and offended two sword cultivators. The sword cultivators got upset and followed the group of people all the way back to the Upper Azure World. They even managed to attack the master of the Xuan Yuan Family.
上青界最近出了件大事，传闻化神魔修虞蒙被人杀了。就连他手下那群血债累累的魔修，也被人一锅端了。一夜之间，困扰上青界已久，连四大世家都没有办法的魔窟断空涯被清了个干净。

Something big had happened in the Upper Azure World recently: word was going around that the Soul Formation Fiendish Cultivator Yu Meng had been killed. Even his subordinate Fiendish Cultivators who had killed many people were gone. Sky Severance Cliff, the Fiend Den which even the aristocratic families had trouble getting rid of, had been wiped out overnight.
上青界的人为什么会来中青界宗门？
Why were people from the Upper Azure World at a sect in the Middle Azure World?
上青界的资源就这么多，对于世家而言，这样的新生力量，无非就是两种处理方式，交好或是打压。很明显印郁轩辕三家，都是采取的拉拢交好的方式。而郁家失了先机，于是选了另外一种。

The Upper Azure World had an abundance of resources. For the aristocratic families, there were only two ways to handle such new arising power; either to befriend or suppress. It was obvious that all three Yin, Yu, and Xuan Yuan Family were trying to pull strings and befriend them. Since the Yu Family had missed out on the first strike, they chose the other approach.
上青界顿时傻了眼，莫非……那两个剑修真有这样的本事，连世家的游仙长老，都不敢轻易招惹？
The Upper Azure World was left confused. Could it be… that the two sword cultivators were so capable that even a Traveling Immortal Elder of an aristocratic family did not dare to provoke them?
上青界，轩辕世家。
Upper Azure World, Xuan Yuan Family.
下一刻。
The next moment...
下一刻两人的身影同时一闪，直接交战了起来。印元飞是难得一见的雷灵根，每一招都带着电光，加上他本身修为就高，不到片刻间，场上到处都是他招出来的雷鸣之声。逼得思羽几乎没有立足之地。

In the next moment, both of them moved to start the fight. Yin Yuanfei had a rare lightning-elemental Spirit Root. Each of his moves generated a flash of lightning. Given his high cultivation level, the stage was filled with the sound of his lightning bolts in seconds. Si Yu had almost no space left to stand in.
下一刻只见他身上灵气暴涨，连着四周迷蔓的仙气都涌动了起来，他的修为肉眼可见的开始极速飚升。
The next moment, his Spirit Qi surged, and the Immortal Qi around him began to stir as well. His cultivation level began to soar visibly.
下一刻羿清化出满天灵剑朝着两人追了上去，瞬间阻断他们的所有退路，铺天盖地的往两人攻了上去。
The next moment, Yi Qing manifested a sky full of spirit swords and chased after the two of them, blocking off all roads of escape and going for a full on attack.
下一刻，一道男音就传了出来。
The next moment, a male voice rang out.
下一刻，一道黑色的风刃，带着糜烂的气息，咚的一声砸到了易峰头上。倾刻间直接把他撞飞了出去。落叶一般在空中翻了好几个跟头，若不是他反应快，及时御剑而起，顺手布下了防御阵。否则就被下方接连不断的黑色风刃贯穿了。

The next moment, a black wind blade with a fast dissipating aura flew toward Yi Feng's head. Yi Feng flew backward on impact, turning several rounds in the air like a fallen leaf. He quickly mounted his flying sword and summoned a defensive array. If not for his quick reaction, he would still have been attacked by the black wind blade.
下一刻，他听到了浅浅的呼噜声。
The next moment, he heard a faint snore.
下一刻，地上的阵法转成了红色，那些被砍落的荆棘藤蔓里突然散发出大量的黑气，倾刻间迷蔓整个竹林，一股刺骨的寒意侵蚀着四周。

The next moment, the array formation on the ground turned red, and those thistles and vines that were chopped off suddenly disintegrated into copious amounts of black smoke. In the blink of an eye, the whole forest was engulfed in the smoke and the surroundings became extremely chilly.
下一瞬间让他更加吃惊的是，那无名口诀修炼的出来的黑色元力，和江水决修炼出来的蓝色水系元力碰撞在一起，却没发生他想象中的絮乱，反而水乳交融般完美融合到了一起，在经脉内自由游走。

in the next instant, he was astonished to see that the black essence force cultivated from the nameless chant collided with the blue essence force cultivated from the Jiang Water Art. However, instead of throwing his body into disorder as he imagined, the two types of essence force mixed perfectly together like water and milk. They freely circulated through his arteries without even a tussle.
下方是整个曲双城的全貌，仙脉之上的曲双城仙气缭绕，城中满是仙气。城外却相对要稀薄一些，以致于整个曲双城从上方看起来隔外突出。更突出的是它的形状，原本仙城是没有固定的样子的，入了仙城若想长住，得了城主允许，便可在城内建房，所以城中地域很广。

Below is the full view of Qushuang City. Being on top of the immortal pulse, Qushuang City was enclosed by a thick mist of immortal Qi. There were much immortal Qi inside the city but outside the city, the immortal Qi is much lesser comparatively, which makes the entire Qushuang City stand out more from above. The thing that stands out the most is the shape of the city. Originally, immortal cities do not have a fixed look. If one wants to stay in the city for good, he or she needs to ask the City Lord for permission before building their house in the city. Hence the city's land is very extensive.
不不不，羿清立马甩开了这个可笑想法，师父这么强大，怎么可能只会这种小孩打架的招式，不可能的？！
No, no, no. Yi Qing immediately dismissed this ridiculous idea. Master was so strong, how could she know only this style of kid-fighting. Impossible!?
不会是做梦吧？说好的没修为呢喂？一拳打暴整个城什么的，这修为破天了吧！
This isn’t a dream, is it? Where's the lack of cultivation? One punch to destroy the entire town—that cultivation is off the charts!
不出江逸的意料之外，丹炉又是一声炸响，而在他不抱任何希望揭开炉盖的时候，却意外发现有三枚丹药竟然没炸，安静的躺在丹炉内。上面黑光流转，隐隐还有纹路，看起来异常漂亮。

As Jiang Yi expected, an explosive sound rang out of the elixir cauldron. Yet when he lifted the cauldron lid without any prior expectations, he unexpectedly discovered three of the elixir pills had actually not exploded at all, but were instead lying silently in the cauldron. The top of the pills had black light circulating about, with the pills having a faint vein-like pattern - the pills looked strangely pretty.
不出江逸的意料之外，风月楼的刘管事很快得到了他和江小奴的资料，马飞的父亲也暴怒无比，下令让刘管事派人探查江逸行踪，一有机会直接做了他。

Just as Jiang Yi expected, Housekeeper Liu of Fengyue Brothel had soon obtained his and Jiang Xiaonu's information. Also as Jiang Yi predicted, Ma Fei's father was livid and ordered Housekeeper Liu to send someone on Jiang Yi's trail, and to take him out at the first opportunity.
不出江逸的意料之外，黑色元力融合元力丹药力后，他提炼江水决的速度果然快了数倍。感受这丹田内的蓝色元力不断快速产生，江逸暗暗激动起来。如果他有大量的丹药，依靠着黑色元力增幅，就算有这鬼封印，他依旧可以快速修炼了。尽管他未来的成就还是有限，但最少修炼到铸鼎境四五重什么的不是难事。

As expected, after the black essence force merged with the medicinal power of the essence force pill, the speed at which he was refining with the Jiang Water Art did indeed increase severalfold. Jiang Yi grew excited as he felt the blue essence force in his dantian continuously and speedily get produced.
If he had a large number of elixirs and continued relying on black essence force to expand the power of the elixirs, even with this stupid seal, he could continue to speedily refine essence force. Even though his future accomplishments were limited, at least it would not be difficult for him to reach the fourth or fifth level of the Cast Tripod Realm.
不到一会，只听到咚的一声，他再次出现，随手把手里的人扔在了地上，倒在了沈萤的旁边。
Within a moment, with a ploping sound, he appeared again as he threw a person on the ground to lay beside Shen Ying.
不到三息时间，他们就到了一片完全陌生的密林之中，空中充斥比外面浓郁几十倍的灵气，令人精神一震。他看了看四周却没有发现先一步进来的青尹一行，也没有其它修士的踪影。

In less than ten seconds, they found themselves in a completely foreign forest. The air in the mystic realm was filled with Spirit Qi, tens of times denser than the air outside. It was shocking, to say the least. Surveying his surroundings, Lonemoon couldn't find any sign of Qing Yin or the other cultivators who had entered just minutes before them.
不到两刻钟的功夫，它已经脱去了魔骨变成了一条小青蛟。只是额头那只黑色的蛟龙角不见了。修为也直接掉落了大半，跟之前那只背云兽一样，是十三阶。

Within two minutes, the wyrm had gotten rid of all of its demonic bones and had become a little green wyrm. It no longer had the black horn on its head. Its cultivation level also dropped nearly by half - it was now a thirteenth-level beast, just like the Cloud-Bearing Beast.
不到半个时辰的功夫，印风一点消息没得到，反而被对方掏了个底朝天，还初步定下了，以高一倍的市场价格，长期购买无敌派灵植，并由轩辕家免费炼制成丹的约定。

Within the space of an hour, not only did Yin Feng not manage to get any information out of his counterparts, but was instead completely out-foxed by them. Both parties had settled on terms of an initial deal whereby Yin Feng would pay twice the market price for the long-term purchase of spirit herbs while the Xuan Yuan Family would refine the herbs into elixir pills for free.
不到半个时辰，孤月已经整整抗过了八十道劫雷，全身已经不成人形了。虽然雷劫落下后，带着的仙气可以修复他的身体，但修复的速度明显赶不上雷落下的速度，他已经是个血人了。

In less than an hour, Lonemoon had withstood eighty bolts of lightning tribulation. His entire body was so battered that he was almost unrecognizable as a human being. Although the immortal Qi that followed each strike could mend his body, the rate of healing could not keep up with the frequency of the strikes; he was totally covered in blood.
不到半会两个黑影缓缓从里面走了出来，皆是一身灰袍，走在前面一个人呵呵一笑，露出半张瘦得皮包骨般的脸，“呵，原来是无常魔尊在此，毕浩打扰了。”

A moment later, two black shadows slowly came out of from the forest, both donned in grey robes. The person walking in front smiled, revealing half of their bony face. "Heh, so it was Fiend Supremacy Impermanence over here. Sorry to intrude."
不到半会的功夫，刚刚还硬气得不得了的仙人，已经被打得不成人形了，嘴里的血像是小喷泉似的，时不时噗噗噗的往外喷。
Within minutes, the immortal who had been so cocky before was beaten beyond recognition. He spat blood out of his mouth so that his mouth began to look like a blood fountain.
不到半会的时间，孤月身上已经出现了数道伤口，但就算被逼入了绝境，他眼神仍是没有焦距，连神情都没变动一下。直到羿清突然召出剑意，一把熟悉的金色巨剑出，瞬间朝着他劈了下去。

Lonemoon's body was covered in wounds after just a few moments and looked like it was in a critical state, yet his eyes still did not focus and his expression remained the same. Yi Qing suddenly summoned his sword intent and drew a familiar Great Golden Sword, thrusting it in Lonemoon's direction.
不到半会，之前那道天光再次出现，比之刚刚孤月出现的时候，这次出现了数十道。只是不知为何，刚刚那个声音却没有再出现。

The bright light from before suddenly appeared again after a moment. Except, when Lonemoon appeared earlier there was only one flash of bright light. Now, there were ten. However, the voice that sounded out before no did not say a word this time.
不到半会，地面就出现了一个大坑，坑深不见底，隐隐还有着浓烈的腥臭味从里面散发出来。
Within moments, a huge pit appeared on the ground. The pit was so deep that one could not see to the bottom and there was a pungent smell emanating from within.
不到半会，就传来熟睡的呼噜声。
Moments later, a familiar sound of snoring could be heard.
不到半刻的功夫，眼睛动了动，醒了过来。
Moments later, his eyes moved a little and he came to.
不同人体之间，力气难免会有误差，但在元力的绝对优势面前，这种差距一般是微不足道的。
Between two individuals, there would no doubt be some difference in strength but the difference would normally be negligible.
不同系别，不同颜色的元力之间要想融合，有着苛刻的条件。至少在铸鼎境这种境界，不同系别的元力之间就算轻轻碰触一下都会出大问题，轻则元力絮乱走火入魔，重则经脉断裂受重伤，丹田爆裂成废人，这是天星大陆人尽皆知的常识。

there were strict criteria in order for two different techniques or two different colored essence force to fuse. At least within the Cast Tripod realm, different essence force clashing lightly was enough to create a big problem. The repercussions spanned from the minor problem of having a Qi deviation due to chaotic essence force to the major problem of being seriously injured due to cracked meridians. The explosion of a dantian might even reduce a person into a cripple. This was common knowledge for all on the Stellarsky Continent.
不好！
No good!
不对！那不是灵气，是仙气！
Wait, that wasn't Spirit Qi - it was Immortal QI!
不对，他们沉下心一感应，发现火焰最猛烈的地方，居然迷蔓几乎要凝成实质的灵气，这是……仙气！

No, something was not right. Stilling their minds, they used their senses to probe their surroundings, and discovered that, at a spot where the fire was most intense, swirled a miasma of Spirit Qi that was so dense as to be almost palpable. It was… Immortal Qi!
不对，那羽毛真的在发光。
Something was not right; the feathers were actually emitting light.
不带这么开挂的，师父开挂就算了，为啥徒弟也这么挂。这才多久啊，就从一个金丹修士，直接升上了化神。这太尼玛不仙法了。

He hadn't known he had brought along two cheats. It was enough that the master was a cheat. Who knew that the disciple would be such a cheat as well? It had only been a while, yet he had grown from being a Golden Core stage cultivator to a Soul Formation stage cultivator. This was ridiculous.
不得不说沈萤今晚发的这顿飙，飙得大了点。一下折了对方五个游仙的修为不说，连郁家家主都被废了。这对世家而言不止是伤筋动骨，简直就是粉碎性骨折，这事要是传开了这上青界恐怕就只剩三大世家了。虽然不知道那救人的是谁，但必有后招。

Shen Ying's rampage tonight was too extreme. In one move, she not only seriously injured five Traveling Imomortals from the Yu Family, she even injured the Master of the Yu Family. They didn't just suffer from torn ligaments and minor fractures - all their bones were nearly shattered. If word goes out in the Upper Azure World, there might only be three aristocratic families left. Although they still don't know exactly who saved the Yu Family, it seemed like the Yu Family had something up their sleeves.
不得不说牛爸爸为了打消两人的念头，也是蛮拼的。唯一一点不好解释的是，为什么他们会有这么多体修？但很明显心灵受到了重大创伤的薄家父子，并没有想到这一点。不过门下弟子们的实力确实应该提升了，至少要先生出仙骨。

Speaking of this, Father Niu really deserves a mention for how hard he tried to get those two to give up on their plans. The only question that would be hard to explain, was 'How will they have so many Body cultivators'. Clearly, this question did not ring a bell and was not asked by the deeply saddened Pu father and son. Indeed, some improvements should be of abilities should be observed from the disciple, or at least some sight of immortal bones.
不得不说，做为一个无神论者，她一开始真的被吓了一跳。但饿得狠了，也就顾不上管这种怪力乱神的事了，再说她人都已经穿越了，世界不同，还不许动物有些变异了？

Being an atheist, she was utterly shocked in the beginning. Yet, as her hunger persisted, she could not care less about strange powers and deities. She had already transmigrated to a different world, how was it hard for her to accept that some animals were a little different?
不愧是他的师父，他果然拜对了师门！
She was indeed worthy to be his Master, he had chosen the right teacher!
不愧是大仙，收小弟都是最强的，就算不强创造条件也要变成最强。
No wonder she was a Great Immortal—even her followers were the strongest of the strong. Even when conditions were not favorable, one had to create the conditions and emerge as the strongest.
不明真相的众弟子：“……”化神尊者加元婴真人带队，这次历练的难度是突破天际了吗？

The disciples, still in the dark: "…" The Soul Formation Supremacy and the Nascent Soul Perfected One are leading the team. This must mean that the level of difficulty on this experiential training mission is off the scale!
不是好人的易峰：“……”
The so-called bad Yi Feng: "..."
不用想他们定是去了秘境。
Needless to say, they were headed for the mystic realm.
不知过了多久，有个身长数十丈的猪首冥将终于忍不住问。
After a long while, a Netherworld general in the form of a dozen-foot-tall pig-man could not help but ask,
不知过了多久，院外突然响起一声怒意十足的大喊，江逸听到那个声音立刻心头一震，从打坐中清醒过来，暗道不妙。

He had no idea how long had passed when he heard an enraged roar ringing from the courtyard outside. Upon hearing that voice, Jiang Yi was immediately startled awake from his meditation. His heart beat rapidly; he knew something was amiss.
不知道是不是受伤太重，她居然没有推动，反到是自己退了两步。拼命压下心头涌上的气血，这才沉声看向那人。

Qi Chengyu didn't know if it was the lack of strength caused by her severe injuries, but she was unable to push the person away. Instead, it was she who staggered a couple of steps back. She had to use all her strength to suppress the blood from rushing to her heart. She then turned to look at Shen Ying.
不知道，看来她还真没修过仙！
She doesn't know, it seems that she really hasn't practiced immortal cultivation!
不管这个所谓的无敌派在哪里，以她们现在的情况，进入妖界反到对她们有利。况且眼前这个女子，看起来完全没有任何修为，真要打起来她们自然不惧。唯一要提防的是那个笑得一脸讨好，拼命想往女子身边蹭，一个眼神都没给过众人，名唤萝卜的男子，看他刚刚变身的情景，难道也是只妖？

No matter where this so-called Invincible Sect was located at, with the current situation they were in, entering the Demon Realm might be beneficial instead. Moreover, this girl leading them did not seem to have any cultivation. If they were to fight, they did not need fear her. The only thing they needed to be wary of was that man going by the name of Radish who kept trying to stay by that girl's side with a fawning smile and did not even look at the rest of the people. Having witnessed his transformation, they wondered: could he also be a demon?
不能炼制丹药，他的黑色元力怎么注入丹药内？
If he could not even refine any elixirs, how could he inject any black essence force into the elixirs?
不行！
No way!
不过三位公子很快醒悟过来，认为这是姬听雨在在刻意躲开他们，也不好多说讪讪的站在原地。

However, the three gentlemen quickly woke up from their astonished trances. They all thought that it was Ji Tingyu's attempt to deliberately avoid them and as such was unwilling to comment any further. Instead, feeling embarrassed, they stood around at their original spots.
不过他倒是不敢出声，老老实实的站着，内心期望这柳长老心情大好，可以放他一马。
However, he did not dare to make a sound. Instead, he merely stood there like he was well-behaved, hoping in his heart that with his excellent mood, Elder Liu would let him off the hook.
不过他倒是很聪明，知道此地不宜久留，否则伤的将会更加严重。他惦着一条腿朝外面艰难逃去，走到外面见江逸没有追来，才满眼怨毒的咬牙切齿说道：“江逸，你竟然敢伤我？你死定了，我一定会让虎哥打死你的，你有种一辈子不出江家大院，嘶……”

Nonetheless, he was very smart. He realized that it was imperative to leave, otherwise his injuries would worsen. He thought of relying on one leg alone to escape, and did so with much difficulty.
When he reached the door and saw that Jiang Yi wasn't pursuing him, he gritted his teeth in bitter resentment. "Jiang Yi, how dare you injure me? You're dead. I will definitely let Brother Hu beat you to death. If you have the balls, don't think of leaving the central court! Hiss..."
不过他到是不担心门现在会打开，毕竟在剧情之中，想要打开界门，需要极大的代价，且需要魔族血脉为引。

However, Lonemoon was not that worried about whether the door would open now as according to the storyline, if one wishes to open the door of the realm, he or she would need to pay a huge price, and would even need the Demonic tribe bloodline to lead.
不过他转念想到江小奴那瘦弱的身躯，他很快摇头道：“姬小姐，你是高高在上的小姐，你永远不会了解我们这种人的生活，嗯……长不说这些了，你找我是有什么事吧？”

However, once he thought of Jiang Xiaonu and her scrawny figure, he shook his head quickly, "Young Mistress Ji, you stand high above the masses and will never understand the lives of people like us. Mm... let's not dwell on this topic any more. You must be looking for me for some reason?"
不过传承嘛，传给谁都一样，反正他早就已经死了，现在只是一片残魂而已。
It was just a heritage — he could hand it down to anyone. He was going to die anyway; he was only a remnant soul now..
不过姬听雨这次却并没有内疚之色，反而摇头轻笑，一双如宝石般的眸子内都是慑人光芒，她款款而谈：“易公子，不遭人妒是庸才，这个世界有很多美好的东西，值得我们去追求。而这些东西人人都想要，那势必会有竞争，麻烦肯定也会不断，没有追求的人生，那是不完美的人生。人的一辈子匆匆数十载，红颜易老，刹那芳华！你想庸庸碌碌过一辈子，还是想轰轰烈烈，风风光光的过上十年？”

However, Ji Tingyu did not express any remorse this time. With her gem-like orbs shining with startling beauty, she shook her head and smiled, speaking slowly but pointedly, "Young Master Yi, only the mediocre does not attract the jealousy of others. There are so many wonderful things in this world that are worth pursuing, things that everyone wants. Certainly, it creates competition and incessant trouble, but imagine how imperfect life would be without a cause. A lifetime lasts but a fleeting handful decades; beauty and youth fade away in an instant! Do you prefer a lifetime of mediocrity, or a zealous, glorious decade?"
不过对于这些他倒是并不在意，那群公子小姐和他的人生太过遥远，他也不想和她们有什么交集，他目光投向翊凌雪道：“翊小姐也不错，这段时间我感觉你战力是飞快提升，你所有的武技都大成了吧？境界也快提升到铸鼎境五重了吧？”

Nevertheless, Jiang Yi did not care too much about any of that. Those young masters and young mistresses were living a life far different from his, and he did not wish to cross paths with them. He cast a look at Yi Lingxue, "Young Mistress Yi is not doing too bad yourself. I can feel your powers rising fast during this period, haven't all of your martial art techniques attained phenomenal success yet? You must be elevating to the fifth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm too?"
不过江逸既然开口了，她也不好抹他的面子，而且进了练功房不随便对练一场也会引起别人怀疑的。江逸能带来拥有丹纹的丹药这事，姬听雨可不想别人知道，于是含笑道：“易公子请放手一战！”

However, since Jiang Yi offered, she did not feel it was right to be so impolite and let him lose face that way. Besides, having already entered the Technique Practising Room, not having a martial arts combat match with a sparring partner would raise suspicions over what happened. Ji Tingyu had no wish to let others know the circumstance that Jiang Yi could bring in elixirs with vein patterns. As such, she smiled and replied, "Young Master Yi, please do not spare me either, and let's fight!"
不过贺礼她拿就拿了，为啥……为啥要写血书啊喂？！
"But she could've just taken the gift. Why... why did she have to leave a note written with blood?"
不过转头想到，在这做事似乎就不用外出上西山了？江如虎等人也不敢明着来这或者去他院子内动手吧？他正好有时间可以好好研究下黑色元力了。

However, he switched his thinking. If I take this job, I no longer have to go out to the Western Hills? Additionally, Jiang Ruhu and his gang would not dare to come here or go to my house and fight me, right?
He had just the right time to carefully research the black essence force.
不过转念江逸就明白了，这翊龙宇既然是翊家年轻一代的最强者，对于江家的武技显然也很是了解，轻松看出他用了江家的武技也正常。

Jiang Yi mulled it over for a moment before comprehension dawned: as the strongest martial artist among the younger generations in the Yi Family, he obviously would know a thing or two about the Jiang Clan's martial art techniques, and it would be easy for him to tell that the techniques Jiang Yi used belonged to the Jiang Clan.
不过铸鼎境二重突破三重需要的元力是原先的一倍，他原来停留在铸鼎境一重也有一年多了，此刻要想突破铸鼎境三重，就算有如此恐怖的修炼速度，没有大半个月也是不可能的。

However, the amount of essence force needed to break through from the second to the third stage of the Cast Tripod Realm was double that of the original. His power-level had already been stuck at the first stage of the Cast Tripod Realm for over a year. To be able to break through to the third stage of the Cast Tripod Realm there and then, even if he had such obscenely fast essence force cultivation speed, it would be impossible to accomplish this breakthrough without spending more than half a month in cultivation practice.
不过铸鼎境前四重好突破，要想突破后面的境界就非常困难了，铸鼎境五重是道坎，需要的元力差不多是前面所有境界的总和。所以很多纨绔子弟，天资不行的武者境界都停留在铸鼎境四重，毕竟他们家族再富有也不可能用无尽的丹药让他们强行突破到铸鼎境五重，比如江如虎，又比如马飞。

On the other hand, while it was easy to achieve the first four stages of the Cast Tripod Realm, making a breakthrough to each of the subsequent stages was much more difficult. The fifth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, in particular, was a bottleneck, the essence force needed was roughly the sum of all the previous stages. As such, many wastrel playboys and inept martial artists like Jiang Ruhu and Ma Fei, were permanently held up at the fourth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. After all, it would be impossible for their families, however rich they might be, to keep supplying them with elixirs to forcibly elevate to the fifth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm.
不过！
However!
不重要的被揍追魂楼众人：“……”感觉日了狗！
The unimportant people from the Soul Chasing Tower that got beaten: "..." Damn it!
不重要！
Not important!
不，重要的是：
No, the important thing is...
与之前第一道不同，这次是接连劈下来，都不带歇气的那种。似是要将孤月全身劈开，再重组成一般。一道比一道凶狠。

Unlike the first strike, this time the lightning struck down one after another without a break. It was as if it wanted to split Lonemoon's body apart to reorganise it. Each strike was more devastating than the last.
与此同时正在梦乡中的高人萤，砸吧砸吧了嘴，突然无意识溢出一串梦呓，“呵呵，红烧肉……辣子鸡……麻婆豆腐……”

At the same time, the soundly asleep Expert Ying smacked her lips together and all of a sudden, she began to unconsciously talk in her sleep, "Heh heh, braised meat in brown sauce… Chicken with Szechuan pepper… Szechuan-style bean curd…"
与此同时，万妖殿。
Meanwhile, at the Myriad Demon Temple.
与此同时，整座天庭剧烈摇晃起来，在天庭所有建筑上浮现出无数与刚才那九天锁星阵七彩符文截然不同的另一种金色符文，整座天庭仿佛披上了一层金色的外衣。

At the same time, the whole Heavenly Court also shook violently. The countless runes that surfaced on the buildings of the Heavenly Court were completely unlike the rainbow-colored Empyreal Star Lock Array runes. They were golden in color and made it seem like the entire Heavenly Court was draped in a golden cloak.
世间修士这么多，谁都知道修仙修心才是正统，就像他入道之时，以扫平天下邪祟为道心一样。他是散修，见过大多德高望重，私底下手段却阴狠毒辣的。往往修为越高就越发忘了当初心之所向，以致心魔缠身。但世间谁又没有私心，谁能一直保持着良善。他也不能保证，自己有迷失的一天。所以他宁愿自己苦修，也不愿拜入任何人门下，就为不牵扯上这一份因果，即使他天生剑体。

Among all the cultivators in the world, it was universally known that cultivating the heart and mind to achieve immortality was the orthodox way; just like the time when he stepped into the Dao and set his determination to eliminate all heretic spirits in the world as his Dao Heart. He was an itinerant cultivator, and he had seen numerous individuals, who had public respect and were viewed with high prestige, commit sinister and atrocious deeds in secret. More often than not, the higher one progressed in cultivation, the more easily one forgot their heart's original purpose, and become burdened by mental demons. But who in the world could truly be void of any selfish motives, and who could maintain such kindness? Even he could not guarantee if there would come a day when he would deviate from his path and become lost. Hence he preferred to suffer hardships through solitary cultivation rather than to follow under the wing of any other just so that he would not be implicated with such karma, even if he possessed an Innate Sword Embodiment.
两个声音：“……”
2 sounds, "..."
两个时辰之后！
Two hours later...
两个时辰过去了……
Four hours passed.
Both of them: "..."
两人一愣，却见她突然转身朝着殿中招了招手，“那谁……阿飘你过来一下。”
The other two faltered as they saw her turning and waving towards inside of the hall. "Hey… floaty come over here."
两人一愣，顿时齐齐瞪大眼睛，异口同声的道。
The two of them stared at the radish in amazement. Together, they exclaimed:
两人不禁感叹这个升仙塔的神奇，怪不得那郁家说，只要上到这升仙塔的三层登顶就可以飞升成仙。可成仙哪有这么容易，这塔里关卡重重，入塔就要过心魔关，第一层就是问道，考验修士的道心，后面只有可能更加凶险。

They could not help but sigh in amazement at the Immortal Ascension Pagoda. No wonder the Yu Family said that whoever made it to the third level would be able to achive Immortal Ascension. It was not easy at all to achieve Immortal Ascension. Each stage in this pagoda was extremely challenging. The moment they entered the pagoda, they had to defeat their mental demons. The first level already tested their Dao Heart. It would definitely only get harder from here.
两人交换了一个眼神，异口同声且斩钉截铁的回答。
The two exchanged a look, and answered resolutely in unison.
两人低头一看，瞬间明白过来，脸色双双一白。
Both of them looked down and realization struck them. Their faces instantly paled.
两人你来我往的进行起商业互吹，时不时还加上旁边抱着孙子的薄仪。
The two of them then carried on with their bantering for a while, with occasional chipping in from Pu Yi who was carrying his grandson.
两人又相斗了两柱香的时间，虽然都没讨到好处，但思羽毕竟只是金丹初期，慢慢已经开始不敌起来。就连躲闪雷光的身影也越发迟钝。

The both of them fought for two incense sticks' length of time. Although neither did not hold any advantage over the other, Si Yu was only an early-stage Golden Core; thus, she was beginning to grow weaker and she also became slower in dodging the opponent’s lightning bolts.
两人只好收敛心神，专注看着场中的比赛。郁红还好，好歹是金丹中期，偏偏是思羽，这绝对会是一场恶战。孤月都想好，一会要怎么安慰人家妹子，才能不打击对方的自信心了。

The two of them calmed down and meditated, focusing on the fight before them. It would have been fine had it been Yu Hong up on the stage as she was at least a mid-stage Golden Core cultivator, but it had to be Si Yu… This battle was going to be a tough one. Lonemoon had already thought about how he would comfort the sisters so that their self-esteem would not be hurt.
两人啃完肉干，江逸再次给小奴检查了一遍伤势，确定没有伤到骨头后，让她自己回房找春芽帮她敷上药膏，还交代几句，今日之事千万别给家族的人知道了。

Both having finished their jerky, Jiang Yi once again checked Xiaonu's wounds. Confirming that she did not have any injured bones, he got her to return home to find Chunya to help her apply ointment, while instructing her not to let any of the family members know what happened that day.
两人商业互吹了一波，易峰这才侧开一步，带人进了山门。与其它三家不同，易家的主家并不是在仙城里，而更像是宗派，由一座座浮峰组成。一入山门就听到各种灵兽的低鸣声。

Both of them praised each other politely for a while before Yi Feng stepped to the side and brought them to the entrance of the mountain. Differing from the other three families, Yi Family's main house was not in
两人如此一路配合，直接朝着那处萦绕着仙气的地方而去，不到半会就已经冲入火海的最深处，他们这才看到，中间亮着一个法阵，四周浮动着一些上古文字。

Coordinating in this fashion, the two men headed towards the place swirling with Immortal Qi. Within a short time, they had made their way into the heart of the inferno. It was then that they saw an array formation shining in the centre. Around it shimmered some ancient script.
两人对视了一眼，同时飞身而起，朝着那阶梯的方向飞了上去。
The two of them glanced at each other, then flew up the stairs at the same time.
两人往内一看，都不禁眼睛大睁。屋内布着一个隔绝的阵法，而阵法内却是一片血光，红色刺目的液体涂满了整个房间，桌上，地上以及墙上已经被染红，上面还粘着一些不明血糊。而一个赤裸的人正躺在正中间，已经没了气息，面目格外狰狞，眼睛暴睁，仿佛生前经历了极为恐怖的事情，嘴里已经血糊一片，舌头不见踪影。上身一只手还插在地砖里，另一只手僵直着，可能是因为死前拼命挣扎的原因。而下半身，已经完全消失了，只有半截尸体。

Yi Qing and Lonemoon looked inside and their eyes widened. Within the house was an isolated array formation, but inside it was a splash of blood. The glaringly red liquid was smeared across the entire room, tables, floor and walls, and there was also some unknown bloody paste-like substance stuck on them. A naked person laid right in the middle of the room, already without any signs of life. The person’s expression was extremely eerie, eyes wide open as if he had experienced something utterly frightening before he died. His mouth had long been turned into a bloody gash and there was no sign of his tongue. One of his hands was still stuck in the tile on the ground while the other was stiffened probably because he used all his might to struggle before his death. His lower torso had completely disappeared, leaving only half of a corpse.
两人性子很稳重，站在门口不远的一名铸鼎境三重的旁系子弟脾气却很是火爆，不等江如虎开口，伸手指着江逸鼻子骂道：“你算什么东西？滚出去！”

人数还不少，看上去有几百人。服装各异，修为更是从刚刚练气到元婴修士都有。而且个个身材壮实，神采奕奕，一个比一个精神，甚至还能见到衣下那隐隐跳动的肌肉。

There were a lot of them - the group of new disciples contained hundreds of people. They were dressed in a multitude of colours and their cultivation levels ranged from beginners to Nascent Soul. Each of them were of different body types but all of them looked equally strong - one could practically see the outline of their muscles which threatened to burst their sleeves.
人渣！
Scumbags!
人的丹田最好只运转一种元力，否则容易引发元力冲突絮乱，这是天星大陆人人皆知的常识，不过当江逸将通过无名口诀修炼出来的元力排出丹田，准备改练江水诀时，突然发现那缕新修炼出来的元力竟是黑色的？

It was common knowledge on Stellarsky Continent that one should only transfer of one type of essence force through the dantian, otherwise difference essence force could very easily clash and get mixed up. However, when Jiang Yi transferred the essence force produced from this nameless formula through his navel in preparation for practicing the Jiang Water Art instead, he quickly realised that the newly distilled essence force was black!
人群中走出两个中年人，一个一身蓝袍，一个一身青色长衫，两人衣角都纹着三个铜钱的花样，满脸怒气的看着三人。青衣的手里拿着一个算盘，看起来还有点眼熟。

Among the strangers were two middle-aged men. One was in a blue robe while the other was in a green one. Both of their robes had a symbol of three coins. Their expressions were filled with rage as they stared at Lonemoon, Yi Qing and Shen Ying. The one in green pulled out an abacus. He looked familiar.
人阶上品武技，劈山腿。
This was the Man-tier superior-grade martial arts technique, Mountain-Splitting Leg.
人，还有人，真的还有人，太好了！
People, there's still people, that's great!
亿万冥界大军每一个的心中都感到强烈震撼，那人虽然没有发出一丝威严强悍的气势，那人虽然看起来红光满面，剑眉星目，脸如刀削，但其实外表很老，白须飘飘，然而……那人带给他们的心灵震慑感，丝毫不亚于，甚至还要隐隐超过自己的主人，不死冥皇。

Every one of the hundreds of millions of Netherworld soldiers were astounded. Although he did not manifest an air of majestic might, he looked to be in good health. He had a chiseled face, ruddy cheeks, a long white beard, sword-like eyebrows, and star-like eyes. Despite the fact that he looked very old on the surface, he sent reverberations down their souls for he was in no way inferior to their master. It was even possible that he surpassed their master, the Undying Netherworld King.
