亿万年来，一向关得死死的魔界之门，第一次直接敞开，那边就是仙界。就是魔界这么多年来，一直想要进入，却碍这扇界门永远都去不了。偶有幸运的，也只是分出一两丝的神念，能从门缝中钻出去，或是靠着特殊的法子侵入而已。

For hundreds of millions of years, the Gates of Devildom, which has always been shut airtight, was opened wide for the first time. There, laid the World of the Immortals. For countless of years, the Devils have longed to breach the World of the Immortals, only to be denied by this Gate. The occasional lucky ones either only managed to enter through the cracks between the Gates or through special means.
什么乱七八糟的，都够演上一部前世今生的电视剧了。
What a mess! This messy plot is enough to warrant a drama series on the television program!
什么情况？为什么赢的人先哭上了？该哭的是那个被打的吧？
What was with this situation? Why was the winner crying first? Shouldn't the one who was beaten up be crying?
什么情况？这……这些真的是妖吗？为什么见到她们，不攻击不说，反而越是高阶就越发的……客气？
What was this scenario? Were… were those really demons? Why did the demons not attack them and why was it that the higher their level, the more… courteous they became?
什么都没有发生。
Nothing happened.
什么鬼！
What the hell?
什么鬼？这是……在录什么美食节目吗？为什么每次回来，她都能把身边所有人变成厨子啊喂？！
What is this? This… are we filming some gourmet program? How does she always manage to turn everyone around her into chefs each time she comes back?
什么鬼？！
What the hell? !
仇人见面，分外眼红！
When the two enemies spotted each other, they locked eyes in mutual fury.
今天到底什么运气！易峰脸色瞬间惨白，连忙唤出了灵剑，死死的抓在手里，心惊肉跳的看着前方密密麻麻的灵兽群。

Today was not his lucky day! Yi Feng's face turned pale and he quickly summoned his spirit sword and gripped it tightly in his hand. Then he turned to face the dense waves of spirit beasts that were advancing towards them.
今日给这马家公子一闹，他已经没有退路了，亦如在西山遭遇江如虎般，没有退路他唯有不退，杀出一条血路！

This fiasco caused by the Ma Family young master had left Jiang Yi with no other option. Yet, just like the time when he encountered Jiang Ruhu at the Western Hills, he would stand firm if there was no other way to turn; he would fight his way out and leave a blood path in his wake!
从一刻钟前开始，他就在做梦，对！一定是梦！没有修士会把灵兽当成食物，就算有，也不可能专程跑到幻海来吃！

Everything that happened in the last minute was a dream. Yes! This must be a dream! No cultivator would treat spirit beasts as food. Even if they did, they would not come all the way to Mirage Sea to look for them!
从昨天到现在，发生的事情太多太多了，让他脑袋都变成了一团浆糊，他摇头摇头，准备迟些疗伤后要好好理一理。

From yesterday until now, an overwhelming number of things had happened to the point that his brain had become a melted mess. He shook his head and prepared himself to fix himself mentally after healing his wounds.
从此，曾经中青界的第一剑修孤月尊者，开始了他一边给人治病，一边教人练剑的完全老妈子生活。一时间原本冷清的无敌派，也热闹了起来，时不时可以看到有人挥剑的身影。

From then on, the once top Sword Cultivator of the Middle Azure World, Supremacy Lonemoon, began his journey of treating illnesses and teaching sword moves. It totally the life of a babysitter. Suddenly, the quiet Invincible Sect became more lively as the figures of people waving their swords could be spotted from time to time.
从江家大院南门走了出来，江逸确定背后没人跟踪后，戴上斗篷直奔城中广场而去。小半个时辰后，他来到了广场东边一家很大的丹药店铺内。

Walking out from the south gate of the Jiang Residence, after confirming that no one was tailing him, he put on his cloak and ran non-stop all the way to the city plaza in the middle of the city. After an hour, he arrived at a large elixir store on the eastern side of the plaza.
从绝世天才到废物，还连带让家族的最强供奉失踪，让江家实力大损。
The fate of Jiang Yi—from an incredible genius to a completely useless person who had directly caused the strongest member of the family clan to disappear—led to his reputation plummeting.
从被抓到倒地，短短不过三息。
Not more than ten seconds had passed from the moment he was caught to the moment he landed.
从西山回来和荣管事复命后，江逸溜出了江家大院，开始在城内转悠，寻找赚钱的办法。

Returning from the Western Hills and having reported to Chief Rong, Jiang Yi secretly slipped away from the Jiang Residence Central Courtyard and started wandering around the city in the search for ways to make more money.
从这铸鼎境三重的武者冲进来，到现在被江逸踹出去，其实只是短短十几息时间。
Only a short duration of several seconds had passed, from the time the martial artist at the third stage of the Cast Tripod Realm rushed in, to the time Jiang Yi kicked him out.
从马黑旗和柳河的目光中，他心里再次产生一种危机感。对于这种朝不保夕，时刻都可能被打死的日子他受够了，他很清楚要想过上安逸的日子，要想再也没人敢招惹自己，那唯有变强，变得比他们任何人都要强……

He had sensed danger from the way Ma Heiqi and Liu He looked at him. He had had enough of such a precarious life, in which he could be beaten to death at any moment. It became clear to him that in order to live a peaceful life that no one dared to disturb, the only way was to become strong, stronger than anyone could ever be...
仔细检查了一遍，确保劫雷不会涉及无敌派，这才走向广场中的阵眼，正打算盘腿坐下渡劫，却还是忍不住回头警告道，“沈萤，飞升雷劫非同小可，你们不要靠……”

After checking that all measures had been taken to protect the Invincible Sect from the Lightning Tribulation, Lonemoon walked towards the eye of the array and sat down cross-legged to await the Tribulation Transcendence. However, he could not help turning around to issue a warning, "Shen Ying, the Lightning Tribulation of the Immortal Ascension is truly formidable, everyone don't come near..."
他……是不是眼花了？
Was he… seeing things?
他……没想回去啊？
He... doesn't want to go back?
他一个五行废灵根，能平平安安到金丹大圆满，并在这么多魔头中保持一席之地，靠的就是他那超人的敏锐，总是能第一时间感觉到危险的来临。而就在刚刚戚橙雨旁边女子抓住他的瞬间。他感觉到了从未见过的恐怖杀气，那样铺天盖地，密不透风。一瞬间他只觉得整个脑海里只余下了一个字——死！

As someone with a Five Elements Maimed Spirit Root, he had always relied on his acute awareness and ability to sense imminent danger to safely perfect his Golden Core and maintain a position amongst all the fiendish cultivators. Yet, from the grasp of the girl who had been beside Qi Chengyu, he was able to sense a kind of frightening murderous intent he had never experienced before, the kind that was overwhelming and could not be escaped from. All he felt at that moment was — death!
他一咬牙，当机立断直接唤出本命法器，一把三尺长的金剑，直接插着对方胸口飞了过去。
He gritted his teeth, and he made a sudden decision to summon his intrinsic Dharma artifact. A dagger, three feet long, pierced straight through the woman's chest.
他一回头，却发现刚刚懒洋洋听情况沈萤已经不见了影踪。
He turned around and saw the lazy Shen Ying missing.
他一夜没睡，天一亮匆匆吃了两个窝头就朝炼丹房跑去，昨日他忘记看《药草简录》了，万一今日柳长老要炼其他丹药，需要别的药草，他取药草的速度还是如此之慢，肯定会被训斥的。

He did not sleep for an entire night. Upon daybreak, he hastily ate two wotous before running in the direction of the alchemy lab. He had forgotten to read the "Record on Medicinal Herbs" yesterday. In the untimely event Elder Liu wanted to refine other medicinal elixirs and needed other medicinal herbs, should the speed at which he collected the required medicinal herbs still be extremely slow, he would definitely be scolded.
他一开始让大家转剑修，除了给大家一个希望外，也是让她们以后遇到敌人的时候，能多个应对的手段。
He began by getting them to switch to Sword Cultivators. Apart from giving them hope, it was also to impart them another method to handle enemies in the future.
他一时没注意，顿时脚下一重，单膝跪了下去，张口吐出一口血，完全没有抵御之力，这不是游仙的威压，这些人……

He lost focus for a moment and before he realised, his weight became too much for him to bear. He fell down on one knee and began to spit blood out of his mouth. He had no energy to defend himself at all. This suppressive force didnt come from traveling immortals, these people...
他一脸的不敢置信，伸手想拿过萝卜叶子间的咸菜细看，却被萝卜一叶子抽开了爪子。
In disbelief, he stretched out a hand and tried to grab the pickle that was between the leaves of the radish to have a closer look, but claws emerged out of the radish's leaves.
他一路而上，直到飞到阶梯的尽头，四周景致一换，他到了一片茂密的山林，耳边隐隐传来虫鸣鸟啼，连刚刚上来的阶梯都不见了。
He made his way up the stairs steadily until his surroundings changed. He reached a dense forest and heard the sound of insects and birds all around him. The stairs were gone.
他七岁那年，家族照惯例调教年满七岁的子弟们修炼元力，其中还专门赐给江逸只有直系子弟才能修炼的人阶上品水系心法，“江水决”。

When they were seven, the clan typically taught descendants how to cultivate essence force, and the seven-year-old Jiang Yi was no exception. Jiang Yi was even specifically trained in the superior-grade Jiang Water Art, a Man-tier water-element technique usually taught only to direct bloodline descendants.
他上前一步，话还没说完，那边发呆的人，却突然双目赤红的转过头来，满身的杀气迎面扑来。

He took a step forward but before he could finish his sentence, his opponent who had been in a daze suddenly turned around with bloodshot eyes and exuded a murderous intent as she pounced towards him.
他上前几步，小心翼翼的把怀里的人，放在了易峰剑上，交代道，“护好她！”
He floated forward and carefully sat Shen Ying down on Yi Feng's sword. He instructed, "Protect her!"
他下意识的摸了摸自己空荡荡的额心，主仆契约，主死仆从，主伤仆受，炮灰一样的契约。别说是高阶灵兽，就算一般灵兽都不会接受主仆契约。

He subconsciously felt his warm forehead. A master-servant contract: If the master dies, the servant follows; the master's injuries would be borne by the servant. It was a destructive contract that even low-level spirit beasts were unwiling to enter into, much less high-level ones like the green wyrm.
他不就晚回来了一个时辰吗？这中间到底发生了什么？为什么好好的新弟子，一眨眼全变成厨子了。
Hadn’t he come back only two hours late? What had happened during this time? Why had all the new disciples turned into chefs in the blink of an eye?
他不急不缓的拂了拂手中的剑道，“羿清那个妖女，早已经被我派人发的战贴引出去了。就连那个叫孤月的，此时怕是与其他人一起被锁入了升仙塔之中。我们既然敢闯进来，自然就做好了充足的准备。”

He calmly fiddled around with the Sword Dao in his hands and said, "That demoness Yi Qing has already been lured away with an invitation to a duel that I've asked someone to send earlier. Even that man, Lonemoon, has been locked away with the others in the Immortal Ascension Pagoda. Of course, the fact that we're here shows that we've done ample preparation."
他不敢置信的喃喃一声，再次闭上眼睛内视了一遍又一遍，他的身体颤抖的越来越厉害，眼泪开始无声无息的从他眼角淌下，滑过他清秀的小脸，打湿了他的衣裳……

he muttered to himself in complete disbelief.
Jiang Yi shut his eyes again and looked inward. He trembled more and more violently as tears silently trickled from the corners of his eyes, rolling down his delicate face and splattering onto his robes...
他不禁一阵后怕，还好，还好发现及时。没想到一个魔修，居然牵扯出这么一大堆的事来。
A belated feeling of fear kicked in, but still, it was fortunate that he had discovered this in time. He hadn't expected this matter of the fiendish cultivator to bring so many other issues to light.
他也是听说印风通知了她，才急忙赶过来的，就怕出事。好歹都是四大家族之一，想起自己家的教训，他便事先帮郁家求个情。

He heard that Yin Feng had informed her and hurried over in case something happened. They were fellow aristocratic families afterall. After what Xuan Yuanyu's family had been through, Xuan Yuanyu thought it appropriate to come down and plead onbehalf of the Yin Family.
他五岁那年，和族里的其他孩子一样锻炼基础武技。那时候的他显露出惊人的武学悟性，各种复杂繁琐的基础招式一看便会，打得还有模有样，这让他一跃成为江家声名远播的天才童子。

At the tender age of five, Jiang Yi began basic training in martial arts, just like the other children in the family clan. Back then, he demonstrated astonishing prowess in martial arts; he was capable of learning and accurately replicating any technique with frightening ease, no matter how intricate or complex it was. It was this ability that instantly propelled him to fame, and people dubbed him “the Jiang Clan’s genius child”.
他从小瓷瓶内取出一枚黄色的小药丸对着清水吞服下去，这是江家自己炼制的最低级的疗伤药，人阶下品，黄参丹。

He took out a new yellow tablet from the small porcelain vase and gulped it down with some water. This was the lowest-grade healing medicine the Jiang Clan refined and produced themselves—the Man-tier inferior-level product Yellow Ginseng Elixir.
他从药材房内随便取了一些药粉就洒落进去，然后丢进去三枚废丹，等加温足够后再注入蓝色元力，最后一狠心注入了两缕黑色元力。

He retrieved some randomly-chosen medicinal powders from the ingredient storage room and sprinkled them into the cauldron, before throwing in the three useless elixir pills. After heating them to the right temperature, he injected blue essence force. Lastly, he callously injected two wisps of black essence force.
他们一路到了主峰大殿，有弟子上了茶与灵果，沈萤眼睛这才亮了几分，专心吃起了果子。经过几个月猪食的摧残，连果子都芳香四溢起来。

After they arrived at the main peak's hall, Shen Ying's eyes finally brightened up a little only after some disciples served tea and spirit fruits. She concentrated on eating her fruits. After a few months of pig's feed, even fruits became a delicacy.
他们举派飞升已经过去快半年了，可是除了郁红和思羽修为大涨，隐隐有仙骨生成的征兆。其它弟子的修为虽也有增涨，却因根基太浅，半点没有生成仙骨的迹象。

Even though it had already been close to a year since they advance to Immortal Ascension, but other than Yu Hong and Si Yu whose cultivation increased largely, with little signs of their immortal bones forming, the other disciples did not have such signs. Their cultivation levels merely increased, but because their foundation is too weak, there are totally no signs of their immortal bones forming.
他们出来的那个缺口还在，但此时看过去却不是个缺口，而是一扇门，一个四六米高的练丹炉的门。
The opening they had come out from was still there, but now it was not a gap, but a door; measuring four by six meters, it was the door of an elixir-refining cauldron.
他们到达城主府的时候，薄飞平已经在门口等着了。
When they arrived at the City Lord's household, Pu Feiping was already waiting for them at the door.
他们午饭吃的是灵兽烤肉，不知道什么时候起，羿清已经养成了捡灵兽尸体的习惯，还就地取材用地上残余的红莲业火烤的。

They had roasted beast meat for lunch. Yi Qing had somehow learned how to inspect spirit beast corpses along the way. He picked up some materials from the surroundings and used the leftover flames from the Red Lotus Karmic Fire to roast the beast meat.
他们去的地方并不远，就在镇子的东头，那边本是一片荒废的地方，野草丛生，只是中间有着一口枯井。
They were not far away, just at the east end of the town. It was originally an empty place, covered with wild grass, except for a dry well in the middle.
他们又去了城中把那些仙气有异的地点，也通通看了一遍，也是同样的没有任何结果。
They then went to check out the places in the city that was said to be suspicious, but the results were still the same.
他们又飞了几个小时，触目所及已经完全看不到石头以外的东西了，却没有发现任何异常。
They continued to sword-ride for a couple more hours. All around them, there was nothing but rocks. There didn't seem to be anything unusual either.
他们在哪，刚刚都干了什么？
Where are we? What did we do?
他们来之前……也就是说是那个魔族逃走的时候？他是直接逃回魔界，所以才消失得这么干净？
Before they came.. which means it was when the Demonic beast escaped? Was it because he directly escaped back to the Demon Realm, thus he could disappear without a trace?
他们看到了什么？体……体修！女的！活着会喘气的那种。
What had they seen? A Body… Body Cultivator! A female one! One that was alive and kicking.
他们能问一句，谁生的吗？
Are they allowed to know of the conceiving mother's identity?
他们走过一看，果然是一个巨大的储物空间，灵气探进去都找不着边际，隐隐还能探到里面树木丛生，一眼看不到头的绿色。

They walked over and saw that it was indeed a huge storage compartment. Using their Spirit Qi to probe inside, they found that it was so vast that its boundaries could not be detected. However they could detect trees and shrubs inside and endless greenery.
他们这一等，就等了近三个小时。天已经黑了，外面的喊价声才慢慢停歇，陆续有人离开。掌事带着他们到一个修士的面前。
They waited for nearly three hours. The sky had already turned dark, and the bidding voices gradually subsided as people began to leave. The steward brought them before a cultivator.
他们这才看清，那全是一只只高阶灵兽，全部飘浮于魔蛟身后的海面上，像是一群灵兽大军一般，一眼看不到头。
Now they could see clearly that these creatures were all high level spirit beasts, and all of them were floating on the sea behind the Wyrm Demon, like a huge army of spirit beasts.
他们这才看清，那是一座巨大的石峰，看起来比玄天宗的主峰都要大，只是整个石峰四周飘浮着各种古怪的法符，仿佛被层层阵法围绕其中。

It was at that moment that they saw it. It was a huge peak - even higher than the Main Peak of Blackheaven Sect. Surrounding the peak were different types of strange Dharmic talismans. It was as if there were layers of array formations surrounding the peak.
他们这是修仙门派，不是修仙饭店啊喂！
This was an immortal cultivation sect, not an immortal cultivation restaurant!
他们这是已经决定了吗？
So they have made up their minds?
他们这是跟他一样，迷失了心智，被控制住了吗？这升仙塔到底是个什么东西？
Had they lost their consciousness like he did before? Were they now being controlled? What exactly is this pagoda doing to people?
他们需要时间调息。
They needed tme to rest.
他佯装打扫炼丹房，等了一会见柳长老没有回来，利马动手了。取出三枚丹药丢进一个小丹炉内学着用黑石加温，等了一会才缓缓注入蓝色元力，并且通过元力感应丹炉内的情况。

He pretended to clean up the alchemy lab. After waiting for some time, and seeing that Elder Liu had not returned, he immediately took action. He retrieved three elixir pills and threw them into a small cauldron, before copying Elder Liu by heating up the small cauldron with coal. He slowly injected blue essence force after waiting for a while and, through this essence force, sensed the conditions in the cauldron.
他倒出一粒丹药，放开神识一探，果然发现丹中萦绕着一股若隐若现的黑气。
Lonemoon poured out an elixir pill from a bottle and probed it with his perception aura. As expected, he found an obscure black Qi surrounding it.
他倔强地高扬着他那隐隐觉得越来越沉重的头，无视旁人怪异的眼神，一步一挨、一瘸一拐地往家里走。一路上巨大的疼痛让他原本清秀稚嫩的脸庞痛得无比扭曲，眼中满是怨恨……

Despite feeling even more lightheaded, he stubbornly kept his head held up high. Step by step, Jiang Yi limped back home, ignoring his surroundings. All throughout the long, painful journey, his dark eyes smoldered with fire and fury, and the immense agony left his delicate, supple face distorted in a frightening grimace.
他全身一颤，脑海顿时升起一个硕大的死字，四身冷汗哗啦啦的流了出来。
His entire body stilled. Thoughts of death filled his mind as he began to break out in cold sweat.
他内心一阵激动，只见羿清的剑招再换，右手猛的举起，神情肃穆气势如虹的高吼一声，“破！”那把巨剑顿时直挺挺的砸了下来，轰隆一声直接把眼前的山洞劈成了两半。巨剑却没有停下，反而换着各种方向，侧切竖切斜切，像是切菜般，一下……一下……又一下……

Lonemoon's heart leaped in excitement. He saw that Yi Qing was changing his sword move. Lifting his right hand, a solemn expression on his face, Yi Qing let out a formidable roar, "Break!" The gigantic sword immediately slammed itself down directly onto the cave. There was a loud bang and the cave in front of them was sliced in two. The giant sword did not stop here, but instead attacked in different directions; making a side chop, a vertical chop, an oblique chop, like chopping vegetables, one here.. another there… yet another…
他内心暗暗叫苦，虽然对方认出他是江家的子弟，今日绝对不敢打死他的。但这事要是闹开了，被家族刑堂知道了，他被责罚一顿是小事，小奴败坏家族声誉怕是要被活活打死啊……

He grumbled bitterly in his mind. Although the housekeeper recognized that he was a member of the Jiang Clan and was certainly didn't dare to beat him to death; however, should the incident that day get publicized, and should the Jiang Clan Disciplinary Court find out... It was a small matter for him to get punished, but he was afraid that Xiaonu would be beaten to death for damaging the family's reputation...
他内心沉喝一声，下意识的去调集黑色元力，让他震愕的是，一缕黑色元力瞬间从丹田内运转出来，流转到经脉。

he shouted loudly in his heart, setting his mind to summon and assemble his black essence forces.
What left him excited and bewildered was that a wisp of black essence force circulated out of his dantian in an instant, and flowed towards his meridians.
他内视了一下伤口，心情很快多云转晴。就这么一点时间，伤口恢复的速度已经赶上了他打坐运功疗伤两三个时辰了。如果此刻有足够的黑色元力，估计半炷香时间就能把伤势恢复个七七八八……

He used his inner vision to check on his wound and his emotions quickly improved. In such a short amount of time, the wound-recovery speed had already overtaken the amount he had healed through meditation by four to six hours. If at that moment he had enough black essence force, he estimated that within two and half minutes he would be able to heal his wounds by seventy to eighty percent...
他再次奔走了数十丈距离，速度一下慢了下来，那黑色元力已经消耗完毕了，他刚想调动一丝黑色元力，继续加快速度却很快醒悟过来。

after running a few hundred feet, his speed rapidly dropped. The black essence force was exhausted. He wanted to use another wisp of the black essence force to boost his speed again, but he came to his senses quickly.
他再次睁开了眼睛，感受着丹田角落内的存放的六缕黑色元力，他是越“看”越可爱，这可是他的宝贝呀，如果不是这黑色元力，今日绝对要坏事了。

He opened his eyes once again and could feel, in the corner of his dantian, the six strands of black essence force currently stored there. The more he "looked" at them, the cuter they seemed. After all, they were his babies, and if not for this black essence force, there would be much worse things happening today.
他刚刚听到了什么，灵主居然真的要去找那个恐怖的沈掌门，难道是因为之前在海上，被她手撕群兽的举动打击到了，心理不平衡，所以想去找回场子？

What did he just hear? The Spirit Master actually wanted to visit the frightening Sect Master Shen. Was it because he was disturbed by the way she had defeated the beasts and wanted to win his pride back?
他刚刚是故意的，假装被剑阵所困，扔出魔音铃偷袭他。目的居然是他身上的噬魂幡！
He had purposely acted as if he was trapped by the sword array so as to throw the fiendish bell at him for a sneak attack. His target was actually the Soul Devouring Gonfalon on him!
他刚想上去帮忙，却又看到捧着一大堆古籍，一名身材修长高大的白发老人走进了屋子，将怀中的书堆到桌上，表情严肃地告诉他，这些秘籍里面绝对有一本适合他修炼。

Just as he made to assist her, a white-haired old man with a lanky frame entered the house carrying a large stack of ancient texts. Placing the books onto the table, the elderly man told Jiang Yi with a serious look on his face that these secret manuals were sure to have a martial art style he could practice.
他刚想伸手拿起筷子，只见沈萤手一伸，瞬间插起了碗里最大一块肉，只剩下一碗汤汁。
He was just about to pick up his chopsticks, but Shen Ying reached out and grabbed a big piece of meat for herself. All that was left behind was a bowl of gravy.
他刚想开口问，手上却突然被刺了一下，低头一看，只见刚刚还安静趴在旁边的十阶妖兽，突然毛发根根直立，四只爪子都伸了出来，全身开始小幅度颤抖起来，仿佛遇到了什么可怕的事情一样。

But just as he was about to give voice to his questions, his hand was suddenly pricked. Looking down, he saw that the tenth-stage demon creature which had previously been lying down quietly at the side had suddenly jumped to its feet, limbs stiff straight and its fur standing on end. Its whole body began to tremble slightly as if having encountered something frightening.
他刚才只修炼了一个多时辰，黑色元力只提炼出五缕，现在已经消耗了一缕，万一在风月楼发生冲突，他拿什么护身？

He had only cultivated for slightly more than two hours and had only extracted five wisps of black essence force. Now that he had expended one wisp, how was he to protect himself when conflict arose in Fengyue Brothel?
他刚要开口，却见她突然高喊了一句，“为了联盟！”
As Yi Feng was opening his mouth to speak, Shen Ying shouted at the top of her voice, "For the alliance!"
他刚要问青尹的事，却突然感觉脚下一动，整个玄天宗都一阵晃动，外面亮起了一道红光。

He wanted to ask about Qing Yin, but before he could finish, he felt the ground shake beneath his feet. The entire Blackheaven Sect began to shake as a blinding white light shone from outside of the main hall.
他午饭都顾不上吃了，先是把十几枚废丹收集起来，上午由于是试验，柳长老倒是没有过多浪费药草，所以每一炉丹药也就三四枚。

Without eating his lunch, he decided to first gather the ten or so pills of the useless elixirs. As Elder Liu had been doing trials all morning, he did not waste too much of his medicinal herbs; thus every cauldron contained just three of four elixir pills.
他却契约了一头蛟龙！
Yi Feng formed a spirit contract with a flood dragon!
他却越发的叫得大声，眼看着沈萤的刀就要落在他头上，突然周身一道白光闪过，刚刚还在痛哭流涕的身影，瞬间消失在原地。

Yu Haiheng's screams grew increasingly louder, but just as Shen Ying's knife was about to make contact with his head, a white light flashed past and the previously screaming Yu Haiheng vanished into thin air.
他却转头直接看向沈萤，满脸都是讽刺的道，“还真是巧，我郁家一共就逃了九个炉鼎，你无敌派这次来参加门派大比的，也刚好是九名弟子，这位掌门……不觉得应该给郁家一个交代吗？”

He then turned and looked directly at Shen Ying and said in sarcarsm, "That's such a coincidence, our Yu Family have nine escaped human cauldrons, your Invincible Sect came to this competition with nine disciples, this Sect Master... don't you think that you should give Yu Family an explanation?"
他又把丹田内唯一剩下的一缕黑色元力运转去了右手，他今天后面修炼出来的五缕黑色元力已经全部用完，如果这次还不能击退这铸鼎境三重的护卫，那么他和小奴只能等着受罪了……

he once again transferred black essence force, the last remaining strand in his dantian, towards his right hand.
He had consumed all five strands of black essence force he had previously cultivated that day. If he still could not beat back that guard with power at the third stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, there was nothing Xiaonu and himself could do but to endure more incoming attacks...
他双眼如电，死死锁定成扇形朝他掠来的三人，根据对方的动作，提前预算出对方要出的招式，要攻击的轨迹和速度，先一步踩着奇异的步法，朝左边绕去。

His two eyes were like electricity, firmly locking on to the three people who were sweeping towards him in a fan-shaped formation. Based on his opponents' actions, he predicted in advance the martial arts techniques to be taken by his opponents, their attack trajectories and their attack speeds. He then used a few fantastic foot movements in advance, moving towards the left to bypass their attacks.
他双腿元力灌注，全力朝西门奔去同时侧耳聆听，背后那人果然快步追来。江逸狂奔一阵身形一转，陡然进了旁边的一个小巷内隐藏起来，等到身后的那人如一道狂风朝前方掠去，才快速转头朝江家南院狂奔而去。

Concentrating his essence force in his two legs, he raced towards the western gate with all his strength. At the same time, he strained his ears to listen for it. Sure enough, the person behind him had started chasing after him with quick footsteps.
Jiang Yi ran like a madman for some time, before changing his direction and turning his body to abruptly enter a small alleyway to the side. He hid inside the alleyway. He waited for the person behind him to race past him like a strong gale, before hastily turning around and running crazily towards the southern courtyard of the Jiang Residence.
他取出一个白色的小瓶，浑身都兴奋起来，这灵神丹可是人阶上品丹药，能辅助人快速修炼元力。而他的黑色元力能增幅药力，和药力融合后这灵神丹绝对可比地品丹药，把这十枚灵神丹全部炼化，足够他修炼到铸鼎境二重。

His entire body quivered with excitement, as he retrieved a small white bottle. The Spirit Pills inside were Man-tier superior-grade elixirs, after all, and could help one speed up the cultivation of essence force. On top of that, his black essence force could increase medical efficacies of any elixir - once it was merged with the medical efficacy of the Spirit Pill, that elixir would definitely be on par with an earth-tier elixir. Melting down all ten Spirit Pills would definitely be enough to help him cultivate his power level up to the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm.
他只想一口老血喷她一脸，郁气瞬间凝结在胸口，上不来下不去。气得连全身的灵气都躁动起来，仿佛下一次就要喷涌而出来。
Lonemoon was so disgusted that he wanted to spit at her. His pent up anger accumulated at his chest, causing his entire body's Spirit Qi to surge. He felt as if his Qi would erupt any minute.
他只是沉默了一会，果断的拒绝道：“多谢翊公子好意，在下身份低微怎么配得上凌雪小姐？”

After a moment of silence, Jiang Yi firmly turned him down, "I'm grateful for Young Master Yi's kindness, but as someone of humble birth, I couldn't possible be a good match for Young Mistress Lingxue."
他只能咬牙死撑着，冷喝道：“你管我是谁家子弟？你们今日敢毒打我的侍女，这道理就算说到哪去我都不怕。”

He could only clench his fist and restrain himself. Instead, he coldly retorted, "Why do you care whose son of which family I come from? You people viciously beat up my maidservant today—anywhere you go to seek any justice, I will not be afraid to counter you."
他只能疯狂的运转蓝色元力，咬牙全力朝风月楼冲去，一路上因为奔走得太快，都差点撞到几个人。
He could only crazily circulate the blue essence force as he clenched his teeth and rushed towards Fengyue Brothel. He nearly collided into a few passersby due to his hurry.
他只花了三千年便成就帝位，号称史上耗时最短，同时也是最具武学智慧的大帝。
He only spent three thousand years to attain the throne. He experienced the shortest rise to power in history, and at the same time, he was the thearch with the best martial intelligence.
他只要想想上青界那三人扑空后的反应，就觉得这趟来得实在是太值了。他们整整花了一个多月的时间，直到把储物袋都装满了，才放弃了采集的工作，专心朝着秘境中心飞去。

Just thinking about the reaction that other group of three would have made him glad that he came on this trip. They spent over a month collecting spiritual herbs and only stopped when their storage bag was filled to the brim. Then, they headed toward the centre of the mystic realm.
他可能……要飞升了！
He had a chance... to achieve Immortal Ascension!
他向相熟的各派修士打了声招呼，也没有多停留，带着羿清和沈萤也飞了进去。穿过水镜的一瞬间，只觉得四周突然一静，眼前瞬间白茫茫的一片，视线被阻隔了一下。

He quickly exchanged greetings with his acquaintances and wasted no time in flying into the mystic realm, with Yi Qing and Shen Ying in tow. As they crossed through the crystallic-looking entrance, he suddenly noticed that everything around him had gone quiet. Then, all he saw was a blinding light.
他呆了一下，像是确认了什么似的，拉开嘴角冲她扯出一个惨兮兮的笑容，仿佛终于卸下了全身的气力一样，手间一松，一头往前栽了下去。

Yi Qing seemed stunned, then as if reassured, his mouth curved into a pitiful imitation of a smile. Looking as if he had used up his last reserves of energy, his tensed hands relaxed and he toppled forwards.
他咋知道啊，“要不，我召集魔众，帮您找找？”
How was he suppose to know,"How about, I gather all my fiends to help you in the search? ”
他咬了咬牙，游仙本就是飞升失败的人，他们的心魔只会比其它人更重，又怎么可能轻易出得来。

He gritted his teeth. Traveling Immortals were, by definition, cultivators who failed to achieve Immortal Ascension. Their mental demons were bound to be greater than most people. It would not be so easy for them to defeat their mental demons.
他咳了一声拉回了理智，沉声道，“上古秘境现世，这个入口也不知道能维持多久。如今秘境中的情况不明，此事必须尽快通知宗门，商议好对策再行入内探查。”孤月回头看了看那个横在石峰顶上，仿佛一面水镜般的入口，这秘境出现在玄天宗附近，也不知道是好事还是坏事，“事不宜迟，我们直接回宗门吧！”

Clearing his throat, he regained his composure. He lowered his voice and said, "Ancient mystic realms have resurged. We don't know how long this entrance will be here. Since we're still unsure of the mystic realms, we should inform the sect of these things as soon as possible. We should also formulate a plan before we venture enter into the realm." Lonemoon turned back around to look at the crystal-like entrance on the peak. He didn't know what to make of the fact that the mystic realm made its appearance near the Blackheaven Sect. "We shouldn't delay any further. Let's head back to the sect now!"
他唯一的选择，只有安排好江家的事情，然后去武殿内潜伏数月，在武殿内虽然也有马家子弟，但他带着面具，本身还是江家一位不足轻重的子弟，谁能认出他？

His only choice was to sort out his affairs in the Jiang Clan, before hiding for a few months in the Martial Arts Hall. The fact that there were Ma Family descendants in the Martial Arts Hall notwithstanding, who could have recognized him, an insignificant member of the Jiang Clan, especially when he had a mask on?
他嘴角抽了抽，用神识一扫才发现萝卜的灵气少了四分之一，似是被逼回的原型。
Lonemoon's mouth twitched. Scanning the radish with his Divine Perception, he discovered that its Spirit Qi had decreased by a quarter, regressed to the same level before its manifestation.
他回来的路上已经想清楚了，他必须安排好所有事情，然后潜伏数月，等实力强大了有自保之力才能四处行走。江家大院内很安全，但他和武殿有过约定，必须在那做陪练五年，一旦违约后果可比得罪马家严重多了……

He had thought things through on the way back: he had to get his affairs in order and go into hiding for several months. Once he had become strong enough to protect himself, only then would he be able to go wherever he pleased. Although he would be safe in the Jiang Clan courtyard, he had an agreement with the Martial Arts Hall and had to work as a sparring partner for five years. Turning back on that agreement would result in consequences far more severe than offending the Ma Family...
他回过了头。
He turned back.
他在江逸那呼啸而来的六个拳影上感受到危险，马飞就在身后，他不敢乱来只能先抵挡一下。等所有护卫围上来，江逸就再也无法伤到马公子了。只要马公子安全，他们就能全力对付江逸。

He had sensed danger from the six fist silhouettes that Jiang Yi hurtled at them. As Ma Fei was behind him, he dared not act impulsively and could only try to temporarily ward off the attack. When all the guards came forth, Jiang Yi would no longer be able to harm Young Master Ma, and when Young Master Ma's safety was secured, they could then give their all to deal with Jiang Yi.
他坐镇天庭，统治诸界长达七千年，只因天帝无名，故世人根据他的武学境界至阳至极，在他的晚年尊称他为九阳天帝。

He presided over the Heavenly Court, ruling the various worlds for as long as seven thousand years. As the Celestial Thearch was nameless, people eventually addressed him as the Nine-Yang Celestial Thearch in his twilight years due to his extreme attainment in the martial realm of Yang.
他大摇大摆的走进去，取出身上唯一的一片紫金叶子，在柜台上一拍，沉喝起来：“店家，给我来十枚灵神丹！”

He swaggered boldly into the store. Retrieving the one and only piece of purple gold leaf on his person, he slammed his hand on the counter-top and ordered loudly, "Storekeeper, bring me ten Spirit Pills!"
他定了定心神，直接就朝着那边飞了过去，久违的听到了自己嘭嘭的心跳声。三百年了，整整三百年，他终于等到人出现了。

After taking a moment to settle his mind, he made a beeline for his target. He heard the beating of his heart which he had not heard in a long time. It had been three hundred years, a full three hundred years. The person he had been waiting so long for had finally appeared.
他家院门被一名穿着粗布长裙的少女跌跌撞撞的撞开了，那少女满脸的惊慌，一冲进来就大叫起来：“江逸少爷，江逸少爷！快出来，你家小奴被人打了，你还不去，怕是她命都没了……”

His yard's door had been slammed open by a young lady wearing a dress made of rough sackcloth. Her face was panic-stricken and the moment she charged in, she shouted, "Young Master Jiang Yi, Young Master Jiang Yi! Quick, come out, your Xiaonu is being beaten up! You had better come quickly before she loses her life…"
他对这位沈掌门了解得不多，唯一的印象，还停留在轩辕家主对她毕恭毕敬的态度上。大比过后，就连印家家主好似也变成了那样。虽然不知道发生了什么，易峰也能猜到她必有不凡之处。况且她还是羿清尊者的师父。

He did not know much about Sect Master Shen. All he knew was that the Family Master of the Xuan Yuan Family was extremely respectful toward her. After the competition among the sects, even the Master of the Yin Family began to hold this Sect Master Shen in high esteem. Although he was not sure what was going on, Yi Feng guessed that she was no ordinary cultivaator. What's more, she was Supremacy Yi Qing's master.
他小心翼翼的将这丝黑色元力运转到左手的手少阴心经内，再缓缓运转丹田内的江水诀元力，朝左手涌去。
He carefully transferred the black essence force to the Shaoyin meridian in his left hand before slowly circulating the Jiang Water Art in his dantian and also sending it to his left hand.
他就看到了那五个叠罗汉一样，叠趴在旁边的游仙。
He saw what looked like five stacked Luohans[1. a type of fish] — the Traveling Immortals were stacked atop one another just next to Shen Ying and Yi Qing.
他屈身将小奴背上就大步朝屋子外冲去，准备直接从后院逃走。只要回到江家，这风月楼的人就算胆子再大也不敢去闹事的，怎么说江家是天羽城五大家族之一。

He bent down, lifted Xiaonu onto his back and charged out of the room with wide strides. He planned to escape from the backyard. Once he returned to the Jiang Clan, the people from Fengyue Brothel would not dare to cause a fuss in the family grounds no matter how gutsy they were. After all, the Jiang Clan was one of the top five great family clans in the Skyplume City.
他左右找了找，还转了几圈看了看，仍是没有看到那个吃货的身影。
He turned in circles, scanning the area around him. However, the foodie was nowhere to be found.
他左眼中黑光一闪，这个世界再次变样了，一切都变得那么清晰，而且……似乎时间真的变慢了。他看到眼前那只手掌还在拍来，不过速度明显慢了几倍，他还看到那护卫察觉到脚上的小奴，左脚一动正准备运转元力一把将小奴踹飞出去。

A flash of darkness flickered in his left eye as everything in his vision became very clear and vivid, as though the world had changed once again. On top of that… it seemed as though time had indeed slowed down.
He observed the palm in front of his eyes still in the midst of slapping downwards, but moving at a speed several times slower than before. He also witnessed that guard realizing that Xiaonu was on his leg, and that his left leg was in the process of moving as he got ready to transfer his essence force there for a strong kick that would send Xiaonu flying.
他左眼此刻视力变得恐怖，连带时间似乎也变慢了几分，所以他能轻松的看清楚对方手掌扫动的轨迹。也就能提前判断躲避开去，并且……寻找角度攻击！

The vision of his left eye changed an obscene amount, to the point that even time seemed to have slowed by several moments. As such, he was able to see clearly and with much ease the trajectory of the sweeping motion of his opponent's palms. This meant that he could determine in advance how to avoid the blow and, on top of that, even find the right angle to counter-attack!
他带着各堂主，一路追寻居然回到了他住的小屋。还未靠近，隐隐就闻到了浓郁的血腥味，他心下一紧，快步走了进去。只见院内的石桌上，一片狼籍，桌上的碗碟碎了一地，菜汁混合着鲜血流得满桌都是。

With Yi Qing leading the hall masters, they followed the trail which led right back to the hut where Yi Qing lived in. Even before nearing the hut, they could already detect a pungent whiff of blood. Feeling his heart quickening, he quickly walked inside. What he saw was a big mess. Plates which had been on the stone table were scattered in pieces all over the ground and the gravy from a dish mixed with fresh blood covered the whole table.
他强烈抑制内心的激动，运转那缕丹田外的黑色元力环绕在龙形封印上。让他狂喜的不能自己的是——黑色元力开始缓缓消失，在龙形封印上的一枚符文也缓缓的消融，最终在黑色元力完全消耗后，符文再次少了一枚！

He strongly controlled the excitement in his heart and tried to circulate the strand of black essence force outside his dantian to surround the dragon seal. What left him in complete ecstasy was that as the black essence force gradually disappeared, a runic character on the dragon-shaped seal slowly dissipated as well. In the end, when the black essence force was completely consumed, the runic pattern had once again lost a single character!
他强装的镇定，很快在黄裳小姐走进来后消失殆尽了，他扫了一眼这少女后目光立即移不开去了。江家有很多漂亮小姐，大小姐二小姐也长得人比花俏，但此刻和这黄裳小姐相比就感觉鲜花绿叶般，根本不是一个档次。

The calm demeanour he put on quickly disappeared to nothingness after the young lady dressed in yellow walked into the booth. Upon giving this young lady a glance, his gaze froze immediately. There were many pretty ladies in the Jiang Clan. The Eldest Young Mistress and the Second Young Mistress were as beautiful as flowers. However, at that moment, in comparison with this young lady wearing yellow robes, it was akin to comparing between fresh flowers and green leaves - they were at two completely different levels.
他很快就反应过来，顿时恼羞成怒，他竟被一个小孩子吓到了？当下抬手就是一拳，朝江逸冲去。

He responded very quickly to Jiang Yi; his shame immediately turning to rage. How could he be frightened off by just a small child? He raised his hand at once, posed in the shape of a fist, and swung it in the direction of Jiang Yi.
他很清楚今日要想安然无恙的下山，只有拿下江如虎威慑众人，他的黑色元力已经用了三缕，一旦完全消耗干净就只能坐以待毙了。

He was well aware that if he wanted to come out of the Western Hills completely unscathed that day, he had no other option but to take down Jiang Ruhu and thereby deter the rest from attacking. He had already used up three wisps of his black essence forces. Once he completely consumed all of his black essence forces, he would have no other ending but be resigned to being hit to death.
他心下大惊连连退开，没想到她居然还懂阵法。手心顿时有些发麻，剑修的力气都这么大的吗？一时间越加警惕的对战起来。

He was taken aback as he retreated. He had never expected her to know how to use array formations. His palm began to feel numb. Were all Sword Cultivators this strong? His senses sharpened and he grew vigilant in this battle.
他心下有些诧异，脸色沉了沉，才高声道，“你就是无敌派掌门？”
He was astonished, his face grew solemn before speaking in a high pitch, "You are the Sect Master of the Invincible Sect?"
他心底猛的一沉，半会似是想到了什么，又是几口血喷出，使尽了全身力气才颤微微的拉出身侧的灵兽袋。
His heart sank, and after a moment he seemed to recall something. Spitting out a few mouthfuls of blood, he weakly pulled out a spirit beast bag beside him using all his strength.
他心神一动，立即快速运转一缕黑色元力和经脉内的蓝色元力融合，朝左眼角的经脉运转而去。

With that thought, he hastily transferred a wisp of black essence force to his meridians, merging it with the blue essence force within them before circulating them towards the meridian at the corner of his left eye.
他心里想着师父的事，也不知道准备的食物够不够？匆匆调息完毕，就往门派飞。才一入山门，却刚好遇到正迎面飞出来的两人。

His mind was still lingering on his Master's matters, he wondered if the food prepared was enough. After regulating his meridian hastily, he went straight to the sect. Once he stepped into the mountain entrance, he met two people flying out of the mountain.
他忘记了一点，他的双手此刻被江逸的缠丝手缠住了，他脚步一退双手又被缠住的，身体重心自然就不稳了，身子一晃差点摔倒，这下心神完全慌了。

He forgot that both his hands were entangled in Jiang Yi's Silk Hands. He tried to take a step back but his hands were still entangled, resulting in him being thrown off his center of gravity and losing his balance, almost falling down with a shake of his body. At this moment his mind was completely flustered.
他快速转身，不退反进，双腿朝前方滑去，身子却突然后仰，双手如两根海藻般朝江松的双手缠去。有这黑色元力辅助，他能轻松判断出对方的攻击轨迹和速度，从而提前判断，躲避，回击。

He hastily turned around, not retreating but moving forward instead. With both legs aimed to the front, he slipped forward. However, his body suddenly bent back while both his hands moved in the direction of Jiang Song's hands and coiled around them like two pieces of seaweed. With the aid of black essence force, he could easily determine the opponent's attack trajectory and speed, and in turn use this information to judge, avoid or counter-attack in advance.
他怎么觉得这一招有点眼熟……
Why did he feel that this move looked a little familiar?
他怎么觉得那个浮峰有点眼熟？
Why did he feel that the mountain peak looked a little familiar?
他想了半天也没想出来，只好在每天上课的时候，提醒她们要劳逸结合。但她们似乎没有放弃这种拼命修练的势头。招式越来越熟练，身体越来越强键，力量也越来越强，模样越来越……不像剑修？

He thought for a long while but just could not put his finger on it. All he could do was to remind them to strike a proper balance between practice and rest during his lessons. However, they did not seem to give up that momentum of using all their might to practice. Their techniques became more proficient, their bodies grew stronger, their strength also grew and the atmosphere around them became… less like Sword Cultivators?
他想了半天，仍是想不通其中的关节，只好放弃。转身把糊成一团的菜扔到了沈萤的面前，“赶紧吃，吃完还得去岛上看看你那徒弟顿悟得怎么样了。”唉，怎么感觉自己给自己找了两个大麻烦，还是操碎了心那种。

He thought for a long time, but as he still couldn't connect the dots, he gave up. Turning around and throwing a plate of mushy food in front of Shen Ying, he said, "Hurry up and eat. After eating, you have to go to the island to see how your disciple is getting on with his epiphany." Why do I feel like I have let myself in for unnecessary trouble? Or rather two big troubles, of the type that fills the heart with worry.
他想起这个月丹药还没领，连忙爬起来胡乱整理了一下衣裳朝外面走去，一边走一边活动了左臂，发现伤势虽然没昨天那么严重了，不过还在隐隐作痛。

He remembered that the elixir for that month had not been received. He hurriedly got out of bed and absent-mindedly tidied up his robes before heading outside. As he walked, he moved his left shoulder, noticing that, while the conditions of his wound were not as serious as the day before, it was still stinging with pain.
他愣了一下，居然是转生印。
He froze for a moment. It was actually a Reincarnation Mark!
他慌忙爬起来，揭开炉盖一扫却苦笑不停，里面的两枚废丹……全炸了！

He hastily got up and opened the cauldron lid, giving the interior a glance. However, he could not help but laugh bitterly without stopping. The two useless elixirs in the cauldron... had complextely exploded to smithereens!
他才不要别的兽兽！白泽觉得心口被扎了一刀，一肚子都是酸涩的味道，越发的委屈。

He did not want a beast! Bai Ze felt like he had been stabbed in his chest. There was a sourness at the back of his throat and his entire gut felt like it was clenching up. He was so unwilling to leave.
他才出门拔根葱的功夫，到底发生了什么？
He had merely went out to pluck shallots. What exactly happened?
他扫了他一眼，“你天生剑体，的确最是适合修剑。”
He swept his eyes at him. "You are an Innate Sword Embodiment. You are indeed most suitable to be a sword cultivator."
他扬手一挥，化出一道风刃，直接从那巨兽的头顶劈了下去，顿时破开一道大口子，只见里面绿光一闪，一颗翡翠一般的珠子顿时浮了出来。

With a wave, Lonemoon pulled out a wind blade. He sliced through the beast's head and broke open its huge mouth. A green light flashed from inside the beast. An emerald-coloured pearl floated out of the beast.
他扬手就在空中幻化出一张城中的图样，边指着上面边说明起来。自那个魔族盯上安儿后，这样的排查以前也有过，从来没有发现过任何问题。这次也一样，他们并没有在城中发现任何与魔族相关的事物，更别说是残余的魔气了。

He waved his hand and produced an image of the city. He pointed at the image as he explained. Since the Demonic beast started eyeing on An Er, they did conduct such searches before, but they never found any problem. This time was no different. They did not find anything related to the Demonic beast in the city, let alone finding the remains of the Demonic Qi.
他扬起手里的旗，瞬间电光闪耀……
He raised the gonfalon in his hand which instantly sparked with lightning…
他抬头一看，只见原本石块一块块的挪开，自动堆积成一层层叠起，不到半会就变成了台阶，直接通往上空。

He raised his head and saw the neatly arranged bricks from the wall moving out one by one. The bricks automatically stacked themselves atop one another, forming a flight of stairs that led directly into the sky.
他抱拳突然朝着她跪了下去，“弟子斗胆，能否请师父与我同行，前去玄天宗。”
He cupped his fists and suddenly knelt in front of her, "Pardon my boldness, but may I ask that Master accompany me on this journey to the Blackheaven Sect?"
他拼了命的挤眼睛，郁海珩这回总算看懂了他的意思，有些不甘冷哼了一声，这才压下了心底的火气，朝旁边的一个游仙长老使了个眼色。对方点了点头，身形一闪，顿时消失在大厅。

He desperately winked and Yu Hai Heng finally understood what he meant. With a begrudging sneer, he finally suppressed his anger and signalled the traveling immortal Elder beside. The other party nodded and with a flash, disappeared from the hall.
他捏了个诀，手里的玉笛化出剑招，数十道剑气瞬间打在了石壁上。只听轰隆一声，前方的山壁瞬间塌了下来，露出一片更加广阔的空间。

Lonemoon produced a hand seal and the jade flute in his hand at once transformed into a sword. Numerous beams of Sword Qi struck the stone wall. There was a huge bang, and the mountain wall in front collapsed instantly, revealing a wider space.
他捏了个诀，用力一挥手上的武器，用了九成的法术打在那阵法上。只听见天地间咚的一声回响，声音极大，瞬间仿佛传遍了整个秘境，但那阵法却安然无恙，一点都没有缺角少边的意思。

Producing a hand seal, he swung down the weapon in his hand forcefully, striking the array using ninety percent of the power of his Dharmic spells. Bang! A thunderous sound echoed through heaven and earth. The sound was so loud that it seemed to reverberate throughout the mystic realm, but the array itself was untouched; there were no signs of damage anywhere.
他提醒的话还没说完，却看到沈萤轻轻抬手一抓，那来势汹汹的鬼爪瞬间就停在了她的胸前。
But before he could complete his warning, he saw Shen Ying deftly raising her hand to catch something. Those ferocious ghost claws stopped in front of her chest in an instant.
他收了收下巴，这才走了进去。
He closed his gaping mouth and walked in.
他放下灵神丹盘坐入定，三个多时辰后准时清醒过来，立即吞服了一枚灵神丹，开始转修江水决。

He put down his Spirit Pills, sat cross-legged and started meditating. After more than six hours, he woke up punctually and, after immediately swallowing a Spirit Pill, started to practice the Jiang Water Art technique.
他救人心切，也没想那么多，直接就入了塔。
He was rushing to rescue people and could not afford to hesitate any longer. Pushing the thought aside, he rushed into the pagoda.
他整个人都呆住了，小眼圈都红了，满满都是委屈。
He was shocked and did not know what to do, while his eyes reddened with indignance.
他整整图谋了六千六百年，只为进入天庭的这一天！
He had conspired for 6600 years just for this day, the day he would enter the Heavenly Court!
他整整在院前站了一刻钟，直到厨房那个身影，端着菜快步走进了屋内。他才想起自己的目的。想想现在的时间，羿清还是一个金丹修士，并不是将来那个三界闻名的仙人，有所不同也是正常的，正常的。

He stood in front of the yard for a whole quarter of an hour, until the figure in the kitchen walked into the house at a brisk pace with his vegetables. Then he remembered his purpose. At present, Yi Qing was still a Golden Core cultivator and not the future immortal of the Three Realms. So if Yi Qing was not quite what he had imagined him to be, it was reasonable. Totally reasonable.
他整整想了五天，勉强接受了这个事实。这才慢慢回过味来，很明显这个叫沈萤的跟他一样，也是知道剧情的，而且还先一步做了跟他一样的打算。也就是说，他TM被截胡了。

He had fallen into contemplation for five full days before reluctantly accepting this fact. Finally recovering from shock, it was obvious that the individual named Shen Ying was just like him, and also knew about the storyline. Moreover, she had been one step ahead in making the same decision as him. This also meant that his plan was freaking intercepted.
他早早运转一缕黑色元力去了眼中，马飞那把剑刺来的速度和轨迹他预算得清清楚楚，自然不会傻乎乎的朝他拳头砸去。

Jiang Yi had already transferred a wisp of black essence force to his eyes earlier, and could hence clearly predict the speed and trajectory of Ma Fei's sword. He certainly was not foolish enough to take it on with his fist.
他是ZZ才会担心她们会被自己的劫雷波及，劈死她们才好！
He must have been crazy to worry that they would be injured by the Lightning Tribulation. Let the Lightning Tribulation strike them!
他是江家子弟，万一给人看到他进出聚珍阁，还是去卖丹药！这很容易给人怀疑他偷炼丹房内的丹药出来卖的，所以他不得不小心些。

He is a descendant of the Jiang Clan. What if someone spotted him going into the Pearl Gathering Pavilion and, moreover, going to selling elixirs! This would easily raise people's suspicions of him stealing the elixirs from the alchemy lab and selling them outside. As such, he had to be more careful.
他暗暗告诉自己要镇定，抬头望着那管事，漠然说道：“你要什么说法？”
He silently told himself to remain calm. He raised his head to look at the housekeeper and coldly asked, "How do you want to settle this?"
他有些不敢置信的睁大了眼，原来这座上古秘境之中，居然隐藏着一座上界的仙宫！
Lonemoon widened his eyes in disbelief. So an immortal pavilion from the upper world was actually hidden inside the Ancient Realm!
他有些为难的笑了笑道，“那个……郁家家主一向冲动，又不知大仙的本事，一会进去可能多有冒犯。还忘大仙能多多包含。”
He forced a smile and said, "Well.. The Yu Family Family Master has always been rash and he is unaware of your capabilities. He might offend you inside. Please be patient with him, Great Immortal."
他松了口气，“请师父教导。”
He breathed a sigh of relief, "Master, please give me your guidance."
他果然瞎了，会认为这么个吃货，是个顾全大局的人。还有，剑仙你已经坦然接受厨子的称号了吗？要不要这么快啊喂！
I must have been blind, to think that a foodie like her could think of the big picture. And Sword Immortal, have you so readily accepted the title of chef? Do you really have to be so quick about it?
他正打算细问，转眼却见到站在了沈萤身后的羿清，瞬间明白了他们的打算。
Just as he was planning to ask about it in detail, he turned and saw Yi Qing standing behind Shen Ying and instinctively understood what they planned to do.
他正要问，沈萤已经转身打算从那门跳回去了。
Shen Ying had already turned and prepared to jump back through that Gate before he was could even ask.
他此刻经脉内的元力全是由江水诀形成的蓝色，再无一丝黑色存在。
At this moment, his meridians were all filled with blue essence force from the Jiang Water Art; not a sliver of black essence force remained.
他沉吟一会，放下江如虎的腿，抬腿对着江如虎血肉模糊的脑袋踩去，身子凑过去，压低声音说道：“江如虎，你可知道我现在是什么境界？你可知道我为何能一拳砸飞江如鹰？你可知道为何我敢如此对你？实话告诉你把，我就是想把事情闹大，让整个江家都知道……我江逸不是废物！你们才是废物！”

He muttered deeply to himself for a moment, before letting go of Jiang Ruhu's leg. He raised his own leg and stepped down onto Jiang Ruhu's badly mutilated head. Moving his body close to Jiang Ruhu, he lowered his voice and quietly said, "Jiang Ruhu, do you know what power level in the Cast Tripod Realm I am at right now? Do you know how I was able to sned Jiang Ruying flying with just a single punch? Do you know why I dare to do this to you? To tell you the truth, I want to make things big, and let the entire Jiang Clan know that... I, Jiang Yi, am not a useless good-for-nothing! You guys are the good-for-nothing wastrels!"
他沉吟了一阵，最终下定决心弄一弄，抵押在风月楼那块令牌，如一把悬浮在他头上的利剑般压得他透不过气来……

He heaved a deep sigh for a moment before finally making up his mind to give it a shot. The command token he had given to the Fengyue Brothel as collateral was etched in his mind like a sharp sword floating over his head, pressuring and stressing him out until he could not breathe...
他沉吟了一阵，调集了一缕黑色元力去辅助疗伤，等那缕黑色元力消耗完后，他才连忙打坐运转无名功法。

He muttered to himself for a short moment before collecting a strand of black essence force to facilitate the healing of the wound. Only after consuming that strand of black essence force did he hastily sit cross-legged to work on the nameless cultivation technique again.
他沉喝一声，拳头幻化出三个拳影，分别朝江如虎的脑袋，左肩，小腹砸去。
He shouted deeply and loudly as his fists transformed into three fist-like silhouette images, with each individually hitting in the direction of Jiang Ruhu's head, left shoulder and lower abdomen.
他沉默了一会，似是不知道怎么开口，半会才道，“是这样的，印家家主对大仙有几分好奇，听闻大仙到此，所以托我前来请示一下，看能否与您见上一面。”

He then fell silent, however, as if he did not know what to say next. After a few seconds, he said, "It's like this. The Yin Family Master is extremely curious about you, Great Immortal. He has heard that you have arrived here, so he asked me to come down and ask if you would be willing to meet him."
他沉默了很久，再次问道：“杨管事，如果我和你们合作，是否就……失去了自由之身？”
He remained silent for a very long time, before finally asking once again, "Manager Yang, if I work with you, will I... lose my freedom?"
他没有回答，反正笑得越来越张狂，眼神又恢复到刚刚轻蔑的样子，看她们如同在看一群死物一般。
He did not answer her, but began to laugh maniacally. His eyes were once again filled with disdain as he began to imagine them lying dead on the ground.
他没有说下去，这么多魔气，要是再从魔界出来一两只魔族，他们必死无疑。唯一的指望是现在还在曲双城中的仙帝戈尤，但这会也没办法传讯出去啊？

He did not complete his sentence. With all these demonic Qi around, should they encounter any more demonic beast, there is no doubt that they will be dead. For now, they can only put all their hopes on the Immortal Emperor Ge You, who is still in Qushuang City. However, there is no way for them to pass any message out?
他没跟游仙交过手，但沈萤最少也能跟他打个平手吧？再加上他和羿清，不说稳赢，也不至于输。他打算好了一切，以他跟沈萤的交情，这个忙……

He had never fought against a Traveling Immortal before, but Shen Ying had seemed to tie with the Traveling Immortal. If he and Yi Qing fought alongside her, even if they didn't win, they surely wouldn't lose. They had a strong relationship, so surely she would help…
他深吸了一口气，哼！算了，不跟女人计较。
He took a deep breath. Forget it. I won't quibble with a woman.
他点了点头，“我轩辕家向来擅长丹药，在下于练丹一途也算是略有小成，他们这种情况，其实算不上大事。只需一粒八品的养神丹便可恢复，损伤的容貌也能恢复。刚巧我前些日子练了一炉养神丹，可赠与贵派。”

He nodded and said, "My Xuan Yuan Family has always been skilled when it comes to elixirs, and I have some minor achievements in the path of refining pills. Their situations are actually not too big of a problem. With an eighth-grade nourishing elixir, they should be able to heal their wounds and recover their looks. It just so happens that I have just refined a batch of nourishing elixirs which I can gift to your sect."
他点了点头，羿清已经上前一步开口，“你是何人，为何擅闯无敌派？”
Yi Qing nodded and walked toward the man, "Who are you and why are you invading Invincible Sect?"
他爆喝一声，元力从掌心运转而出，那把青色的短剑立即青光大盛，寒意逼人，他化掌为爪，那把短剑竟在他手心快速旋转起来，朝江逸拳头直刺而去。

Ma Fei roared, essence force flowing out from his palm. The teal-colored sword immediately shone even brighter, emitting a chilling aura. He drew his hand into a claw; the short sword began spinning rapidly on his palm before piercing through the air, aiming directly at Jiang Yi's fist.
他猛然醒悟过来，吓得差点魂飞魄散。在他现在这个阶段，不同属性的元力是绝对不能同时运转的，否则一旦冲撞起来，不同属性元力在体内絮乱暴动的话，他全身经脉和血脉都有可能因此爆掉……

He abruptly realised his mistake and was scared out of his wits. In the condition he was in right now, essence force of different elements couldn’t be circulated together at the same time, otherwise they would clash and create disorder in the body. The meridians and blood vessels in his body would simply explode from the collisions…
他猜测自己绝对不是什么狗屁灵体，自己修炼如此之慢是因为那个鬼封印的缘故。他能拥有如此变态的反应能力，也不是灵体之缘故，而黑色元力能让他视力变得极其恐怖，能让和他对练的武者武技快速大成，也很有可能是因为这黑色元力的缘故。

He guessed that he himself was certainly not some silly superpower soul, and he knew that the reason why his own cultivation speed was that slow was due to that damned seal. The fact that he possessed such obscenely powerful ability to react was not caused by his soul, but his black essence forces that allowed his ability of sight to become horrendously powerful; that the combat abilities of the martial artists that sparred with him were able to improve so quickly, was also very likely a result of using that black essence force.
他现在恨不得每时每刻都修炼，恨不得一天之内就把那封印解开了，看看他的修炼速度是否能如大长老估计般，比大少爷江恨水还要快？不说比江恨水快，就算比他慢上一丝，江逸也有信心凭借黑色元力，让自己实力突飞猛涨。

He itched to spend every available second of his time refining essence force and wished with all his heart that he could break that seal within a single day. He wanted to see if his refining speed was indeed faster than that of Great Young Master Jiang Henshui, as the grand elder predicted?
To say nothing of being faster than Jiang Henshui, even if he were slower than Jiang Henshui by just a smidgen, Jiang Yi was confident that he could borrow the power of the black essence force and allow his own abilities to advance by leaps and bounds.
他现在有变态的修炼速度，有黑色元力如此神奇的能量，那么多有利的条件还不努力修炼，那么他就是真的是废材了。
With a godly cultivation speed and mystical powers from the black essence forces, not working hard to cultivate his abilities would be an utter waste with so many favorable conditions on his side.
他甚至能感觉到，从回院子的这一路行来，各门派看他们的眼神都不一样了。有忌惮的，羡慕，也有震惊的，就是没了之前的那种轻视。孤月广告宣传的目的已经达到了，他仿佛看到，下回去上青城收徒时，排在自己前面的人山人海了。

On their way back, Lonemoon noticed that the way people looked at their sect had changed. Some looked at them with jealousy, others with envy, and yet some others with pure shock. No one was looking down on them like they did before. Lonemoon had achieved his marketing goal. He could already imagine the long queue in front of their recruitment stand at Upper Azure Town.
他生来就是印家家主之子，而且又是百年难出一个的雷灵根。修行顺畅，天赋极高。自小就是青年这一辈中最杰出的弟子，无论是在各派还是四大家族中，很少遇到过敌手。这是他第一次，第一次被人辗压，而且对方还是个女修。恰又是情窦初开的年纪，自然也就将对方放在了心上。偏偏对方性子看着柔弱，对他却好似没有半点那方面的意思。

He was born into the Yin Family, and was the son of the Yin Family Master no less. He also had a rare lightning-elemental Spirit Root. His cultivation journey had been smooth and he was truly talented. He had always been the best disciple - there was hardly anyone who was his match in his sect and even among the four aristocratic families. That was his first time being on the lower hand, and the one who put him in that position was a female cultivator who was at the age when she was ready for romance. Naturally, she moved his heart. Yet, she looked frail and not at all interested in him romantically.
他用力的揉了揉额头，深吸了一口气才压下满心的槽点，“今天就先到这里了，你们先下去休息吧，修行的事明日再说。”

Lonemoon rubbed his forehead and took a deep breath before suppressing all the curses in his heart. "That's it for today. You guys can go and take a rest. We will talk about cultivation matters tomorrow."
他的意思很明显，江逸在这，他不方面下手偷药……
His intentions were obvious: with Jiang Yi around, it was not convenient for him to grab the herbs as he pleased…
他的拳头又一次没入到青石板下面的土里。
His fist did not reach the ground below the limestone slab again.
他的拳头顷刻间化作三道残影，给人感觉他的拳头这一刻分成了三个般，每个都无比真实，分别对着冲进来的那护卫的左肩，右肩，脑门砸去。

His fist instantly transformed into three phantom shadows, giving an illusion that his fist had split into three, each no different from the real one. He smashed the fists into the attacking guard's left shoulder, right shoulder, and forehead.
他的灵气……
Hi Spirit Qi...
他的眼眸突然泛红起来，盯着钱万贯恶狠狠的说道：“小胖子，你给我听着，我江逸是孤儿，我没有父母，这件事情你要是敢外传，我就算拼了命也会诛杀你的！”

His eyes suddenly turned red, and stared fiercely at Qian Wanguan. He said, "Fatty, you better listen to me. I, Jiang Yi, am an orphan. I do not have a father. If you dare leak any of these news to anyone, mark my words, I will murder you!"
他的眼神这才猛的一睁，原本一片迷雾般的眼里瞬间清明，条件反射的大喊了一声，“卧槽！”
Lonemoon's eyes suddenly widened. The mist that was once in his eyes were now gone. Then, Lonemoon exclaimed, "Holy shit!"
他的脸色却越加的愧疚，犹豫了一会才一咬牙道，“徒儿的确有一事相商，还忘师父成全！”
But his face showed the increasing guilt within him. He hesitated for a while before saying with conviction, "Indeed, I have a matter to consult with you, and I hope that Master will allow it!"
他的身世必须掩藏，一旦曝光或者被有心人知道，他和江云海的处境将会变得极其危险，要知道镇西王还有一个儿子叫江逆流。

His background must be hidden. Once his secret is exposed, or someone with ill intent finds out that Western Garrison Liege Lord actually had another son called Jiang Yiliu, Jiang Yunhai and his situation would become very precarious.
他皱了皱眉，似是想到了什么才继续道，“后来我找到一个方法，就是制造一个仙胎，投生其中，虽然需要暂时封印住全部的修为，记忆，但却能以轮回之力，慢慢洗净身上的魔种。最多只需几千年的时间，我的修为就可以完全恢复无忧。所以……”

His eyebrows furrowed, as if he recalled something and continued, " Afterwards I found a solution, which is to create an Immortal Foetus and be reborn as that. Even though I'll need to seal all of my Cultivation and memories for the time being, I could make use of the Power of Rebirth to rid myself clean of the Demon Seed. Within a thousand years of Cultivation, my powers will be back to normal, so..."
他皱眉想了想，心底已经有了对策，但想到这毕竟是下面弟子的历练，除非遇到他们应付不了的局面，不然他也不好插手，只好压下猜测扫了一眼前面的人。

He frowned and pondered over it. He came up with a strategy, but then remembered that this was the experiential training of the disciples. Unless they met with a situation they couldn’t deal with, otherwise he should not intervene. So he kept his thoughts to himself and swept his gaze over the people in front.
他目光一冷，朝左边的小树林内扫去，暗道难道是江如虎等人来堵他了？
He froze his gaze and swept his gaze towards the small forest to his left. He muttered to himself and wondered if it were Jiang Ruhu and his gang of cronies who had come here to block him.
他目光在偏厅内一扫，看到左边墙边书柜上有很多书册，连忙走过去查看起来。很快他找到了一本关于药草简介的书籍，里面竟还有简易的图画，立即大喜的捧着书册朝药材房内走去，准备对着书册取出柳长老所需的药草。

He swept a glance across the side room and saw many booklets on the bookshelf next to the left-side wall. He quickly walked over to check them out. He quickly found a book containing summaries and brief introductions to various medicinal herbs, as well as some simple-to-understand pictures inside. Delighted, he immediately carried the book over to the ingredient storage room, prepared to cross-reference with the book and retrieve the medicinal ingredients required by Elder Liu.
他目光在广场上一扫，突然被广场北方的一座宏伟大殿吸引了，主要是此刻大殿外围满了人，很是热闹，让他有些好奇。

He swept his eyes across the city plaza and was suddenly attracted by a huge, imposing grand hall to the north of the plaza. What caught his eye was that the grand hall was surrounded by throngs of people. This atmosphere was very noisy and exciting, which made him somewhat curious.
他直接冲了过去，化出剑意，同一时间羿清也出了手，两道剑意全力朝着对方攻击了过去。
He immediately rushed over and manifested sword intent, and at the same time, Yi Qing also put in his attack. Both of their sword intents were sent fully blasting towards the other party.
他直接捏了个诀，顿时纸鹤瞬间化为白光，在空中形成巴掌大的一个“战”字，隐隐还透着些杀伐之意。
He immediately produced a hand seal and the paper crane instantly turned into a stream of white light, forming the character "Duel" in the air. A faint killing vibe emanated from it.
他直接调动灵气，顿时围身出现了数把灵剑，齐齐对准了沈萤：“别以为丈着自己修为高就可以横行上青界，今日我枫影就要讨回这个公道。”紧接着他直接在神识中传音，“系统，马上帮我筛选可以致胜的功法，激发我全部潜能，今日我非要教训教训这个无敌派掌门不可。”

He immediately mobilized his Spirit Qi and tons of spirit swords appeared around him, all aiming right at Shen Ying, "Don't think that just because you have a high level of cultivation, you can do whatever you want in the Upper Azure World. Today, I, Feng Ying, am going to seek justice." He then transmitted his thoughts through divine perception, "System, immediately pick a sure win cultivation technique and stimulate all of my potential. I must teach this Invincible Sect's Sect Master a lesson today."
他看了半天也没看出这花除了灵气有些特殊外，有什么特别的地方。况且白天的时候，就连萝卜也没有看出什么问题。

Lonemoon studied the flower, but no matter how long and hard he looked, he could not find anything special about it apart from its emanation of Spirit Qi. Even Radish could not tell it was that special.
他看了沈萤一眼，嘴角不受控制的抽了抽，他现在都有些不敢相信，灵主的口味，这么奇特。
He glanced at Shen Ying and subconsciously pursed his lips. He still could not believe that his Spirit Master had such a strange taste in partners.
他看了看众人离开的方向，“看样子，应该是惹到了什么麻烦，才顺势躲到了这里，而且还是个不小的麻烦。”

He looked in the direction which they had left. "From the look of things, they probably met with some trouble which is why they seized the opportunity to hide here, and that trouble must be pretty huge."
他看了看屋子里已经变得惨不忍睹的地面，失笑着摇摇头转身跃出屋门，来到后院站定，将一丝黑色元力输送到右脚的足少阴肾经处，对着地面一块青石板踩下。

Looking at the terrible state of the room, Jiang Yi shook his head and walked out to the back yard. He channeled a sliver of black essence force into his right foot and stomped down on a limestone slab on the ground.
他看到江恨水虽然面色微微变幻了一下，却没有出声阻拦，更别说训斥了，内心更加黯然了。原本孩童时和江恨水结下的一丝情谊也烟消云散了，他自嘲的笑了笑，弯身拱手道：“江逸拜见大少爷。”

Jiang Yi sighed in his heart. When he saw Jiang Henshui's face slightly change color, yet say absolutely nothing to stop Jiang Ruhu or even chide him, Jiang Yi felt sad.
The threads of friendship he had formed with Jiang Henshui when they were children seemed to have disappeared completely. Smiling in self-mockery, he bent down in a bow, cupped his hands and said, "Jiang Yi greets Great Young Master."
他看到江逸当着他的面断了江如虎的腿，顿时睁目欲裂，浑身杀气如虹，双腿一瞪整个人如一头疯牛般横冲直撞而来。

Witnessing Jiang Yi breaking Jiang Ruhu's leg, his eyes instantly broke wide opened as a killing aura cloaked his body. With a burst of his leg muscle, his entire body rushed towards Jiang Yi like a frenzied bull.
他看江逸这样子，也不敢过于劝说，点了点头道：“行，这事我保证不外传，不过你的情报太明显了，随便一个人去天羽城查查就能知道，你想隐瞒身份除非把天羽城的人全杀了，要是江麒麟去查了你的资料，再上报给镇西王……”

He saw Jiang Yi's behaviour and did not dare say much, but merely nodded and mentioned, "Sure, I assure you that this would not spread to anyone else. However, your information is too obvious and easy to obtain. Just by sending someone to Skyplume City to check and they would know. Unless you kill the entire Skyplume city, it would be impossible for you to hide your identity. If Jiang Qilin checked up on you and presented his findings to the Lord..."
他眼睛越睁越大，突然觉得这些相处了几百年宗门，有些陌生起来。
His eyes kept widening. He suddenly felt like a stranger in the sect which he had been a part of for hundreds of years.
他眼神一沉，突然从怀里掏出个什么，四下一看转身往后殿的方向飞去，把手里的东西往墙上一拍，顿时整面墙咔吱一下，裂出一个通道来，“果然是这里。”
He looked down, suddenly took out something from a pocket and flew to the back of the hall. He tapped it on the wall, and the wall immediately opened a pathway. "It is indeed over here."
他眼神有些不受控制的看向萝卜。
His gaze uncontrollably turned towards the radish.
他眼里的光顿时一暗，越加委屈了。紧了紧身侧的手，朝她走近两步，脸瞬间涨得通红，深吸了一口气，才似找到声音般道，“萤……萤，玄灵花我……我只给过你一个人。”

His eyes dimmed and he looked even more unwilling. He clenched his fists by his side and stepped foward toward her, his face flushing a deep red. He took in a deep breath and finally found his voice, "Shen... Ying, you are the only one I have ever given the Black Spirit Blossom to."
他睁开眼睛大笑起来，笑着笑着又开始流泪，整个人疯子般完全不能自己了。多年的压抑，多年的苦闷，在这一刻似乎完全发泄了出来。

He opened his eyes and started laughing aloud. Despite this, he shed tears as he laughed. It was as if he had gone mad. So many years of cruel oppression, so many years of bitter depression. At that moment, he could finally and completely release it all.
他瞬间猜到了怎么回事？无非是为了那个千叶草木灵，不过……这才过了多久啊，五个游仙就这么趴了，而且那惨不忍睹的样，你到底做了什么啊喂！

Immediately, he understood what was going on. They were after the Thousand Leaves Vegetation Spirit. Yet… it had only been awhile and the five of them were already lying motionless atop one another. It was a tragic sight. What exactly did you do to them?
他突然想到什么，有些犹豫转头看了沈萤一眼，“此去玄天宗，路途遥远，弟子才疏学浅，万一要是此幡出现了什么变故，怕是有心无力。”

He suddenly thought of something as he turned his head hesitantly towards Shen Ying to look at her, "This trip to the Blackheaven Sect is going to be a very long journey. My knowledge and ability is very limited. If anything were to happen to the gonfalon, I'm afraid that it would be beyond my capabilities to salvage the situation."
他突然想到什么，眼睛一亮，一脸激动的看向沈萤道，“师父是想提醒我，无论什么样的任务，对我说其实都是一种修行方式，不可小看，凡事都要做好万全的准备？师父放心，这点徒儿明白的。”

Struck with a sudden thought, Yi Qing's eyes lit up, and with a face filled with emotion, turned to look at Shen Ying. "Master is trying to remind me that no matter what kind of task, they are all a form of cultivation practice, so I must treat it seriously and be fully prepared. Have no worries, Master, disciple fully understands your point."
他立马扫视了在场的所有妹子一周，还好还好，没有人顿悟。
He immediately swept his gaze across all the girls present. Thank goodness, no one had an epiphany.
他立马换上可怜兮兮的表情，用十二万分的认真神情看向沈萤道，“大仙，我真的真的真的真的没有入侵仙界的想法，您放心，我保证马上通知所有魔族，绝对不会有一只魔敢跨出这个大门的。谁跨……我就跺了他的脚！您要相信我啊……”

He immediately put up a pitiful front and looked towards Shen Ying with a dead serious face. " Great Immortal, I have no intents to covet the Immortal World at all. Rest assured, I promise to impose an order on the Devils and make sure that no Devils will dare to step out of this Gate. Whoever dares to... I'll chop off his legs! You've got to believe me..."
他立马站了起来，脸上仍是带着那副惊喜过后，不敢置信的表情，脚步带飘的走进了厨房。
Still wearing an expression of delight and disbelief on his face, he stood up immediately and entered the kitchen with light-hearted footsteps.
他等了半会，才传来一声清冷的传音，“走。”
He waited for a moment, then a cold voice said, "Go."
他紧紧的盯着地上的灵草，没看到还好，看到了现在就算是硬抢，也不能让这宝贝从眼前溜走。

He stared at the Vegetation Spirit standing on the ground. Now that he knew they had a Vegetation Spirit, he couldn't leave without it. Even if he had to snatch it from the Blackheaven Sect, he would.
他细看了一眼毫无形象趴在石桌上，流着口水睡得呼噜噜响的人。她身上仍是没有半点灵气的痕迹，看起来就是个弱不经风的凡人。出现这种情况有两种可能，一，她就是个凡人；二，她的修为过高，可能已到化神，甚至更高的境界。所以达到了返朴归真的程度，灵气收放自如，等闲之人根本看不出来。

He took a closer look at the person laying on the stone table, dripping saliva and snoring soundly, who did not seem so impressive. She still did not show any signs of possessing Spirit Qi, appearing just like a feeble mortal. Such a situation could only be possible under two conditions — one was that she truly was just a mere mortal; the second possibility would be that she had already achieved an extremely high level of cultivation, possibly Soul Formation or higher, allowing her to return to the simplest and purest of forms, able to control Spirit Qi with such ease that ordinary people would not be able to tell.
他终于静下心来，聚精会神地运转江水诀疗伤。
He was finally able to calm himself down enough to focus all his attention on circulating essence energy with the Jiang Water Art to heal his injuries.
他绝不能死，也不能伤，否则在床上躺上半月，风月楼找上门来，小奴就危险了。所以今日他必须赢，至少要毫发无损的走下西山。

He must not wind up dead or severely injured; otherwise should he end up lying in bed for half an entire month, Xiaonu would be in danger should people from the Fengyue Brothel come to find them directly. As such, he had to win that day at all cost, or at least leave the Western Hills completely unscathed.
他胸口之上，不知什么时候，突然多了一只手爪。那爪子没有实形，是黑气组成，却直接穿透了他的胸膛，手心正握着颗还未停止跳动的心脏。

Out of nowhere, a claw appeared above his chest. The claw did not have a solid form. It was formed out of black smoke yet it directly punctured his chest, the palm of the claw holding onto a heart that was still pumping.
他脑海一转，内心已经猜到了几分，估计这几天他没出江家大院，所以江如虎没办法截他，这才怂恿江恨水来炼丹房。有江恨水在，他就算动手了，刑堂也会给江恨水面子当做不知道的……

His mind raced as he guessed what had happened in his heart. He estimated that, as he had not left the central courtyard over the past few days, Jiang Ruhu was unable to intercept him and had no choice but to encourage Jiang Henshui to go to the alchemy lab with him.
With Jiang Henshui around, even if he did attack Jiang Yi, the disciplinary court would give Jiang Henshui face and pretend to not know what had happened...
他脑海内又浮现那个美丽得让人窒息的黄裳少女，却很快摇了摇头，那个什么学院招生在即，姬听雨既然和江恨水般去武殿闭关了，短时间内肯定不会出来的。

That breathtakingly beautiful young girl in a yellow dress emerged in his mind again. However, he quicly shook his head, rememebering that with that college imminently about to recruit new students, since Ji Tingyu would have gone into seclusion at the Martial Arts Hall like his relative Jiang Henshui, she would certainly not be out and about in the near future.
他脑海内莫名出现一部无名功法，修炼出变态的黑色元力，如此诡异的事情他根本就不想所有人知道。最重要的是柳长老的死，让他有种淡淡的忧虑，生怕家族牵连重罚他，一名炼丹师对于一个小家族可是至关重要的。

That a nameless martial arts technique mysteriously appeared in his mind, a technique which could refine the obscenely powerful black essence force - such a bizarre circumstance was something he had absolutely no desire of letting everyone find out. Most importantly, Elder Liu's death had left him with a stinge of anxious concern. He was scared that the Family clan would implicate and severely punish him. After all, an aclhemist was vitally important to a small family clan.
他脑海里顿时出现两个字，想后退却已经来不及了，只觉得领口一紧，直接被狠狠的摔在了地上，下一刻雨点般的拳头哗啦啦的落在了他的脸上，伴着一声声的质问。

One word immediately surfaced in his mind. He wanted to retreat, but it was too late. He felt his collar tightening and then he was directly slammed ruthlessly onto the ground. The next moment, a series of punches fell upon his face like raindrops along with a string of interrogations.
他脚下又是一颤，这回是真的栽了下去，半会才险险稳住剑，不敢置信的看向沈萤，“你……你怎么知道？”
Yi Feng lost his footing once again and his bottom really slipped off the sword this time. He caught himself after awhile and turned to Shen Ying in disblief, ”How... how did you know?"
他脚步一滑，快速朝后面退去，但对方是铸鼎境六重武者速度何等的快？身子一闪已经贴了上来，那掌刀划破长空朝江逸的脖子切来。

Jiang Yi's steps quickly swept backwards, but the speed of a martial artist at the sixth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm was unbelievably fast. Yi Longyu's figure flickered and the materialized near Jiang Yi in an instant, his knifehand sliced through the air and about to strike Jiang Yi's neck.
他脸上虽然没有任何情绪波动，但内心苦涩不已——这管事算是戳中了他的死穴了，一个月他要是拿不出钱，这风月楼一上门，江家刑堂肯定会打断他和江小奴的腿……

His face revealed no great emotional change, but inside he felt extremely bitter—this housekeeper had hit him right on his Achilles' heel. If he could not deliver the money in a month's time, should the people from Fengyue Brothel pay the family a visit, the Jiang Clan’s Disciplinary Court would undoubtedly break both his and Jiang Xiaonu's legs...
他自言自语的话还没说完，突然头顶一声巨响，一个身影哗啦一下摔了下来。半会才爬了起来，一边拍着身上的灰，一边扬手朝着他的方向打了个招呼。

Before he could finish speaking to himself, he was hit in the head. A figure fell to the ground. After a moment, the figure crawled back up. The figure began to dust itself and waved in his direction.
他苦苦等待了六千六百年，只为坐在帝位上的那个人！
6600 years of bitter waiting, just for that man who sat on the throne!
他落寞的是，如此时刻他的娘亲却不能看到，大长老也生死未卜，如果能亲眼看到他封印有希望解开那该有多少好啊。

What made him feel lonely was that at this moment his mother could not see him, while Grand Elder remained missing. He thought how good would it be.
If only they could see for themselves that there is hope of breaking the seal.
他被堵得一愣，错觉吗？怎么觉得未来剑仙对他有着杀意？都怪姓沈的，一定是她说了啥，剑仙才会对他有误会，这个心机婊。

Lonemoon was taken aback by his interference. Was this an illusion? Why did it feel like the future Sword Immortal had murderous intent towards him? It was all Shen Ying to blame. She must have said something to cause this misunderstanding between the Sword Immortal and him, this scheming bitch.
他被那铸鼎境三重护卫拍了一掌，尽管他用“摔碑手”挡了一下，但估计骨头被拍裂了，后面又强行动武加上走了这么长一段路伤口被触动，此刻痛得他额头冷汗直冒。

He was slapped by the guard at the third stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. Even though he blocked the attack with his Wrestling Hand, one could guess that his bones were shattered by the slap. Furthermore, he had to forcefully conduct martial arts techniques, not to mention the long route he had to walk home—all these irritated his wound, leaving him in so much agony that cold sweat kept rolling down his forehead.
他要是回去了，以后不单是物种不同，连世界都不同了。兴许从此再也见不到了，那他……
If he went back now, they would not just be of different species; they would be of complely different realms. They might never meet again, then he...
他要是进去了，就再也回不来了。再也见不到……
If he went through the gate, he would not be able to come back. He would never get to see...
他要继续修炼那梦中得到的无名口诀，提炼更多的黑色元力来研究！
He wanted to continue cultivating the nameless formula from his dream and extract more black essence force for research!
他要见姬听雨其实没特别重要的事，那一日他感觉姬听雨对他似乎有些看重？所以冒然的前来，想看看能不能找她借十两紫金先去风月楼赎回令牌！在他想来，身为姬家的小姐，聚珍阁如此富有，十两紫金对于她来说肯定是九牛一毛，却没想到她竟然不在。

In truth, he did not have any particularly important reason for wanting to meet Ji Tingyu. That day, he felt that Ji Tingyu regarded him with some importance.
As such, he risked coming here, in the hopes of seeing if he could possibly find her and loan ten taels of purple gold so that he could return to the Fengyue Brothel and redeem his command token. From his point of view, being the young mistress of the Ji Family, and with the Pearl Gathering Pavilion being so successful, ten taels of gold would certainly be worth peanuts to her.
他视线突然定在了孤月身上，似是想到了什么，眼里刹时清明了一会，换成了贪婪的眼神，“对了，草木灵，还有千叶草木灵。只要有了那个，就可以再练出升仙丹。”

Qing Yi's glare focused on Lonemoon. As if he had suddenly realised something, his eyes reflected clarity. Then, they reflected greed. "Oh yes, the Vegetation Spirit… You still have the Thousand Leaves Vegetation Spirit. With that, I can refine an Immortal Formation Pill."
他觉得自从这两师徒出现后，他原本还觉得一帆风顺，天赋超绝的仙途，越来越扯蛋了。感觉自己像老天爷捡来的。

Ever since Lonemoon met this master and disciple, his neat and clean idea of the immortal future was becoming increasingly messed up. Lonemoon felt as if he had only come this far because heaven was on his side.
他记得那本书是自己十六岁小侄女的，小女孩从小就安静话不多，公主般的小女孩。有阵子却时时刻刻抱着那本书不离手，看了还不止一遍。他好奇之下，就瞄了一眼。

He recalled that the book was his 16 years old niece's. She had always been a quiet girl from young, a princess-like little girl. There had been a period when she was always hugging that book, reading it countless times. Curious, he had taken a peek.
他话到一半又停住，脸色突然一阵扭曲，眼里闪过满满的挣扎，不到半会脸上的魔痕消退，出现了与之前截然不同的神色，眼里满满都是担忧，看了敞开的大门一眼，似是决定了什么，突然开始双手结印。

He spoke and stopped. Struggle flickered in his eyes, and his face twisted. The demonic mark on his face soon subsided, and the struggle in his eyes was replaced with deep concern. Glancing at the door that was opened wide, he started to craft a conjured seal with his hands.
他话还没说完，一道烈火突然从地面冲天而起。
Before Lonemoon could finish speaking, a ball of fire suddenly shot out from the ground.
他话还没说完，下一秒身上却立马响起了一串，只有两人能听到的机械音。
Before he could finish, his body sounded. Only he and Shen Ying could hear what the system said next.
他话还没说完，却发现刚刚还坐在前面的人，不知道什么时候已经坐回屋里了，正一脸嫌弃的夹着一片绿油油的叶子。
Before he finished speaking, he realized that the person who had been sitting in front of him had already returned to the house. She was peering at a green leaf in her hand with a look of disgust.
他话还没说完，却感觉身边的身影一矮，下一刻地面咔嚓一声，突然下陷了好几尺。刚还站在他旁边的女子，蹲身一跃，顿时像只离弦的箭一般，瞬间窜上了上空。

Before he could finish his sentence, he felt the figure beside him crouch down. The next moment he heard a loud boom and the ground subsided a few inches. The woman who was beside him a moment ago had sprung up into the air like an arrow.
他话还没说完，只感觉领口一紧，熟悉眩晕感传来，下一刻浑身巨痛，全身经脉顿时炸裂，地面响起轰隆一声巨响。

Before he could finish his sentence, he felt his collar tighten and a familiar feeling of dizziness came over him. The next moment he felt terrible pain course through his whole body and all the meridians in his body burst. Then a loud boom came from the ground.
他话还没说完，只见眼前妹子全身暴出大块的肌肉，高形顿时高了好几尺，碗大的拳头直接往他腹部砸了下来。
Before he could finish, he saw a flurry of muscle before his eyes and found himself flying through the air. Her fist had hit him straight in his core.
他话还没说完，回头却看到众人早已退到了百米开外，还搬出了桌椅，上面隐隐还能看到花生，瓜子，水果之类的物品。一边嗑一边看着这边。

Before he could complete his sentence, he saw that everyone had already retreated by a hundred meters. They also started carrying out tables and chairs. Spread on the tables were food like peanuts, seeds, fruits. Everyone then sat down to look at him while munching on their tidbits.
他话还没说完，孤月和羿清齐齐后退了一大步。
Before he could finish, Lonemoon and Yi Qing both took a huge step backward.
他话还没说完，对方却已经凌空飞到了前方，耳边只传来一道清冷的声音，“跟上！”
Before Yi Feng could finish speaking, the white figure flew forward and shouted, "Follow!"
他话还没说完，就听见哐嚓一声，沈萤手心一紧，那朵晶莹剔透的花朵，瞬间被她捏了个粉碎。
Before he could finish, he heard a crack. Shen Ying had clenched her fist. The pure, white, delicate flower in her hands was crushed into powder.
他话还没说完，旁边一直没有说话的轩辕家主，轩辕禹突然脚下一软，从椅子上滑了下去，摔在了地上。

But before he could complete his sentence, the Xuan Yuan Family Patriarch, Xuan Yuanyu, who had been silently sitting beside him all the while suddenly felt his legs go weak. He slipped from his chair and landed on the ground.
他话还没说完，沈萤突然站了起来，一脸认真的道，“历练让带家属的吗？”
Before he could finish speaking, Shen Ying suddenly stood up, and with a serious expression on her face, she asked, "Can relatives come along on a training expedition?"
他话还没说完，沈萤突然脸色一变，咚的一下放下碗，站了起来。
Before he could complete his sentence, Shen Ying's facial expression changed. She slammed her bowl down and stood up.
他话还没说完，眼前的人似风一样的刮了出去，消失了。
Before he could finish speaking, the man in front of him had flown off like a gust of wind.
他话还没说完，突然地面一动，岛屿开始剧烈的摇晃起来，身上一沉，整个地面开始往上拔高，四处都是树木倒塌，滚石掉落的声音。脚下也开始开劈，仿佛地表开始滑落一般。

Before he could finish, the ground, along with the entire island, began to shake violently. His body suddenly felt much heavier as the whole ground began to rise upwards, into the sky. All around them, trees were falling to the floor and rocks were rolling around. Their legs began to split apart as the ground beneath them began to crack open.
他话还没说完，突然屁股一疼，重心不稳，一头就扎进了界门里，瞬间不见了身影，被触动的界门也迅速合上，消失在眼前。

Before he could finish, he felt a pain in his butt. He lost his balance and fell headfirst through the realm gate. The next second, he was gone. The realm gate sealed up after he went through it. Bai Ze and the gate disappeared before their very eyes.
他话还没说完，突然脚下白光大盛，阵法瞬间成形，地面一阵晃动，钻出大片的荆棘，朝着陆姓修士拍了过去。

He had not completed his sentence when all of a sudden, a white glow emerged from beneath him; an array formation took form and the ground shook as a large patch of thistles and thorns grew out and targeted Cultivator Lu.
他话还没说完，突然被塞了满口糕点，刚要瞪旁边的人，额头却被敲了一下。
Before he could finish speaking, Shen Ying stuffed a pastry into his mouth. He turned to glare at the person beside him, but she knocked his forehead.
他话还没说完，系统音再次响起来。
Before he could finish, the system sounded once more.
他话还没说完，羿清如离弦的箭一样，就冲向了孤月，连犹豫都没有，招招落在实处，没留半点余地。
Before the voice could finish, Yi Qing flew toward Lonemoon like an arrow being shot out of its bow. He rained punches and blows onto Lonemoon without hesitation, leaving him no time to retaliate.
他话还没说完，脸上一疼整个仙魂直接被一拳揍了出去，咸鱼一样在地上反复翻滚起来，口里还带着那句未尽的话，“于……于……于……于……”

Before he could finish, he felt a blow to his face; the immortal soul had received a huge punch. He was sent flying across the room, just like a flying fish. He was still mumbling the remainder of his sentence, "and… and… and…"
他话还没说完，脸色一变，声音尖锐，急喊道，“沈掌门，你别听他的，我才宁子安啊！他都是骗你的……你还记得吗？上次你吃饭还问我要不要吃糕点呢？你相信我，辰戈是真的想夺舍……”

His face changed and voice became shrewd, shrieking out, " Sect Master Shen, do not believe in his words. I am the real Ning Zi An! He's lying to you! Do you remember asking me whether I wanted desserts when we ate together the other time? Believe me, Chen Ge really wants to take...by force..."
他话还没说完，顿时觉得三道冷嗖嗖的视线齐唰唰戳向他的心口，顿时一僵。
Before he could finish his sentence, however, he suddenly felt three cold and piercing glares shoot directly towards him, freezing the words in his mouth.
他话音一落，全身的黑气再次暴发，四周瞬间一片漆黑，只余两只赤红的眼睛飘在半空中。
Just as he finished finished speaking, the black Qi in his whole body erupted again, and the surrounding suddenly turned dark, leaving only two red eyes floating in the air.
他话音一落，突然一道天光从天而降，天光之中缓缓出现一个人影，“只有打败你眼前这个人，方可进入第二层。”
As soon as the voice finished speaking, a bright line shone down from the sky. A human sillhouette appeared, "If you defeat the person in front of you, you can progress to the third level."
他话音刚落，刚还一脸担心的众妹子，脸色一变，突然齐唰唰的挡在了他面前，异口同声道，“不行！”
Just as he said this, the expressions on the group of worried girls changed. All of them suddenly stood in front of him, blocking his way, and shouting in unison, "You can't!"
他话音刚落，突然身后却响起个声音。
But just as he finished saying this, a voice suddenly rang out from behind him.
他话音刚落，迎面半块桂花糕就喷了过来。他一时没注意，被砸了一脸。
Just as he finished his sentence, half a piece of chrysanthemum cake was spat over. He wasn't alert for a moment and was hit by it right in his face.
他话音刚落，那两面水镜之上就出现了影象，一个是青尹死前的，一个是青亦死前的，可两面水镜出现的都是同一个人的身影，只是一个站立原地脸带惊讶，一个是手握着金色长剑杀气凛然。那是……羿清！
