An image appeared above the two crystallic mirrors; one depicted the moment before Qing Yin's death and the other before Qing Yi's death. But both showed the same person's silhouette, the only difference being that one was standing in shock while the other was holding a long, golden sword with apparent murderous intent. That was… Yi Qing!
他调动灵气再没保留，使出全力，攻击了过去。一时间只见满地的雷光开始汇聚，不到半会，一条雷光组成的长龙出现在了场中。随着对方一动，顿时乱石翻飞，雷光四溢，带着惊人的气势直接冲向了思羽。

He activated his Spirit Qi, not holding anything back as he attacked. All of a sudden, all that could be seen was a mass of lightning gathering. Out of that lightning formed a long dragon, appearing on the stage. Bits of stone from the stage was blasted everywhere and tongues of lightning lashed the surroundings as the other party moved, making a beeline for Si Yu in an imposing manner.
他走出练功外，却看到所有陪练看他的目光都如看怪物般，似乎很惊疑他能毫发无损走出来。

He walked out of the technique-practicing room, yet all he saw were the gazes of all the other sparring partners who were staring at him as if they had just seen a monstrous creature. It was as though they were truly shocked to see him walk out without a single injury.
他走回主位上坐下，不到一刻钟，就见一男子从门口而来，身穿一件白色长衫，观骨龄不到二十多岁的样子，浑身带着凌厉的剑气，细一看居然是一名金丹剑修。右手拿着一面黑色的幡旗，隐隐还可以看到里面涌动的鬼气，的确就是传说中的噬魂幡。

He walked back to the main seat and sat down. Within a quarter of an hour, he saw a man in white robes approaching from the entrance. He looked no more than twenty, his entire body exuding powerful Sword Qi. A closer look revealed that he was actually a Golden Core sword cultivator. He was holding a black flag in his right hand. One could faintly see the Ghost Qi swarming inside the flag. This flag was indeed the legendary Soul Devouring Gonfalon.
他走进屋子内取出上次购买的那身黑袍，套在身上就匆忙出了院子，刚走出去数十丈，他脚步一顿猛然回头，看到远处一个拐角内一道身影一闪后，立即冷笑起来。

He walked into the house to retrieve the black robes he bought the previous time. Putting the robes on, he hastily dashed out of the courtyard of his house.
He had only left his house and walked for several tens of feet when he froze and suddenly turned his head around to look behind his back. Seeing the flash of a figure dart around a corner at a long distance away, he immediately gave a cold laugh.
他越加惊讶，就连在场的各位堂主都频频转头看向殿中的人，实在是因为羿清这个名字，在散修里面，甚至是魔修中太出名了。

Yi Qing's reply surprised him even further; even the hall masters present all turned to look at the person in the center of the hall. It was no wonder as Yi Qing was such a well-known name among itinerant cultivators and even among fiendish cultivators.
他越加的惊恐，似乎拼尽全力想躲开她的手，偏偏半步都移动不了，只能惊声大叫起来，“不，不要，住手！”
Yu Haiheng grew even more terrified and attempted to struggle with all his strength to avoid her hand; however, he could not move an inch. All he could do was scream in terror, "No, don't, stop!"
他越想越觉得可能，忍不住频频回头看向沈萤，师父……真是太善良了。
The more he thought about it, the more plausible it seemed. He could not help but turn back to look at Shen Ying. Master… was indeed too kind.
他跟羿清已经化神，对皮相早就已经看淡了，况且结婴时就有一次重塑身体的机会，以至于高阶修士很少有人看重外貌。所以从来没有想过，专门解决这个问题，而且这么久也已经习惯了她们的样子，并不觉得有哪不对。

Being Soul Formation cultivators, both Lonemoon and Yi Qing had long lost their attachments to their physical forms. Moreover, there was a chance to reshape the body during Neonate Formation, so few high-level cultivators valued their appearance. Therefore, Lonemoon had never turned his mind to solving this problem and he had also become so used to the girls' appearances that he had not thought there was anything wrong with how they looked.
他踏着迷幻步，不退反进朝前方冲了三尺距离，双膝猛然弯曲，身子后仰，整个人朝左前方滑去，轻松避过了翊凌雪的攻击。

He used his Psychedelic Step technique and, instead of retreating, ran in a forward direction for a metre before suddenly bending his knees and bending his back backwards. This allowed his whole body so slide in the direction of his forward left-hand side, easuly avoiding Yi Lingxue's incoming attacks.
他身子从地上一跃而起，一个箭步就朝江豹冲去，人在半路一条腿如蛇鞭般扭动，化作残影朝江豹的身子重重的扫去。
He jumped up from the ground and pounced at Jiang Bao. His leg slithered like a snake whip and swept towards the pathetic figure of Jiang Bao, leaving behind various afterimages.
他身子应声被拍飞出去，重重的撞在了墙上，还连带着把小奴也给推到在地。
Jiang Yi’s body flew up and slammed heavily into the wall, taking Xiaonu down to the floor with him.
他运转了黑色融合元力的右手提前朝左上角移动了一丝，轻松避过了对方的手掌，化爪为手刀，对着他的腕骨狠狠切去！

He moved a thread of the combined black essence force, circulating around his right hand, towards the direction of his upper left corner. As such he easily avoided his opponent's palm. Manifesting his fingers like claws and using them in a knife-hand strike, he viciously moved his right hand downwards in a chopping move towards his opponent's wrist!
他还没反应过来，只见本已经力尽的对方身上，突然鼓出一块块健壮的肌肉，连着衣袖都被撑破了，原本娇小的身影，顿时高大了好几圈，一双似是燃着滔天怒火的眼睛，利剑一样戳在了她的身上。

Before he could react, his opponent who had no more Spirit Qi suddenly flexed her powerful muscles which tore through even her shirt. Her originally petite figure grew larger by a few times. It was as if she was shooting sharp blades from her eyes, fueled by burning fury.
他还没问，一旁的羿清脸色刷的一下就冷了，“不劳白道友了，师父的膳食向来是由我负责的。”
Before he could ask anything, Yi Qing interrupted with a cold expression, "Not to trouble you, Fellow Daoist. I have always been in charge of Master's meals."
他这也是无奈之举，没有高级丹药依靠他的修炼速度，短时间内根本不可能修炼到铸鼎境二重，敢上西山只有爬着回来。那一日他和江如虎约定十天后西门外见，就是打定主意准备借助高级丹药配合黑色元力快速修炼的……

However, he committed his act without any other options. Without high-quality elixirs and depending solely on his cultivation speed, he could never practice and reach the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm within a short amount of time.
Should he ever dare to head up the Western Hills, he would have no other future than crawling back home. He arranged to face Jiang Ruhu ten days later at the Western Gate with the predetermined intention of borrowing the power of high-quality elixirs coupled with the black essence force to speedily increase his power...
他这才飞了出去，一边飞向那巨兽的上空，一边双手结印。顿时地面出现了人一般粗壮的滕蔓，朝着背云兽身上捆了上去。
He flew outtoward the beast and began to form a sea with both of his hands. Suddenly, a vine as thick and sturdy as man flew toward the 背云兽's body.
他这是……被赶出来了吗？
Had he just been... chased out?
他这话一出口，其它九位妖王顿时露出了赞同的表情，确实与其担惊受怕，不如主动出击。
Those words immediately gained the approval of the other nine Demon Monarchs. Indeed, rather than to cower in fear, they might as well take the initiative to strike.
他这话一出口，其它弟子纷纷点头补充。
When he said this, the other disciples nodded and chipped in with their own accounts.
他这话一出口，沈萤和羿清也忍不住转头看向桌上的萝卜。
The moment he said that, Shen Ying and Yi Qing could not help but look upon the radish on the table.
他这话一出口，那莲花上的几位游仙，齐齐愣了一下。
As soon as he had spoken, the few Traveling Immortals on the Lotus Flower became dumbfounded..
他连忙从怀中掏出一个绿色的小瓷瓶，倒出一枚绿色元力丹吞服下去，立即盘坐入定起来。

He hastily retrieved a small green porcelain vase from within his robes. He poured out a single green essence force pill, which he swallowed. Upon doing this, he immediately sat cross-legged to begin meditating.
他连忙双手结印，顿时眼前一道水影闪过，一个高阶迷魂阵瞬间成形。来势汹汹的化神修士，扑了个空，几人的身影顿时消失了。

Feng Ying quickly clasped both hands in an imprint, and at once a stream of water flashed past, and a high-level Soul Mystification Array instantly took shape. The Soul Formation cultivators, who were charging towards them, found themselves attacking empty space, their opponents had vanished.
他连忙闭上眼睛，再次睁开，眼前的画面却依然清晰。换个角度，只见远处昏暗的角落内，一只米粒大的爬虫，它的背上有七个黑点，它爬走的动作缓慢如蜗牛……

He quickly shut his eyes and opened them again; the scene in front was just as distinct and clear as before. Turning his head, he gazed at the dark corner far away. A bug as big as a grain of rice was crawling slowly like a snail. It had seven black spots on its back…
他连续不停的质问起来，每问一声就抡起江如虎的身子朝地面砸一下，这几轮乱砸之下，江如虎顿时头破血流，脑袋也被砸晕了，惨叫声都没有了，口鼻也只有入气没有出气了……

He continuously questioned without stopping, with each question being followed by him swinging Jiang Ruhu's body and smashing it onto the ground. As a result of these few rounds of random ground-smashing, Jiang Ruhu immediately started bleeding from the wounds on his head. He had also fainted from the multiple crashes onto the ground - the cries of agony had stopped, while there were only acts of breathing-in through his mouth and nose, without any act of breathing-out at all...
他遇见熟人了，而且还是两个！
He met people he was familiar with, and not just one person but two!
他隐隐有种，以后全门派上下，遍地都是金钢芭比的即视感。
He suddenly saw an obscure vision of the entire sect being filled with iron barbies in the future.
他顺势一个剑招挥了过去，化出数十把灵剑直接穿体而过，把妖狐钉在了石壁上再无处可逃。
He conveniently used a sword move to transform and direct dozens of spiritual swords to pin the demon on the stone wall so that there was nowhere for him to escape.
他顺口问了句，“依姑娘看它得了什么病？”
He conveniently asked, "In your opinion, what illness do you think it has contracted?"
他，真的不是废物。
He, was not a good-for-nothing.
The Immortal: "..."
仙界从来没有出现过飞升成功的体修，靠着修体上界的只有妖仙！成仙的体修叫啥？体仙？

There has never been a body cultivator that could advance to immortality. The ones that actually make it to the upper world are only the demons. What do you call a body cultivator that had achieved immortality? A body immortal?
仙魂仍是不敢置信的瞅了瞅自己的手，怎么会这样？抬头细细看了一遍眼前的人，突然猛的睁大了眼睛。
The immortal soul didn't dare reply. He studied his own hand. How could this be? As he faced the woman in front of him, his eyes widened.
仙魂嘴角一抽，差点就要维持不住仙风道骨的貌样，还不都是因为你突然冲进来打断的，我怎么知道还有一个人啊喂？！
The corner of the immortal soul's mouth twitched. He almost lost his sage-like demeanour. I wouldn't have to do so if not for you, how would I know that you'd come in?
仙魂正打算修复对方的伤势，突然有什么冲了进来，刚升起半截的人，扑通一下被一脚又踩了回去。

The immortal soul had just begun to heal the wounded Qing Lan when something burst into the Immortal Pavilion. Qing Lan, who had been floating, was thrown back onto the ground by a foot, which pressed him down.
仙魂猛的睁大了眼睛，一脸的狂喜，大腿也不抱了，转身就朝着最近的羿清飘了过去，“哈哈，年轻的修士你我有缘……”
The immortal soul's eyes widened in delight. He stopped hugging onto Shen Ying’s leg and floated over to Yi Qing who was nearest to him. "Haha, young cultivator, we have affinity…"
仙魂的整个魂体都抽畜了一下，怒气冲冲的道，“你这个小娃娃，好生无礼，我乃金仙碧涛！虽然只是一丝残魂，但也是仙魂好吗？！”阿飘是什么鬼？他是只普通的阿飘吗，他是一只仙飘！

The immortal soul's body twitched as he began to burn with anger. "You, little girl, have absolutely no manners. I'm the Golden Immortal Bitao afterall! Although I'm now a remnant soul, I'm still an immortal soul, alright?" A ghost is still a ghost… Fine, he's an immortal ghost!
仙魂瞅了瞅地上那个已经没动静的人，从善如流的改了口，“唯……二进入仙宫的人，但凡是能看破那炉内乾坤者，皆是悟性上佳之人，你能来此也算是你我有缘。”

The immortal soul glanced at the unconscious man lying on the ground. He smoothly corrected himself, "The second to enter this Immortal Pavilion. But whoever sees through the fiery furnace has the best acumen in town. Fate has brought you and I together."
The immortal soul remained quiet.
以前还不觉得，这会特意飞这么高一看，整个曲双城的地貌看起来就像是……门！一扇巨大的门。薄飞平细一回想那些仙气有异的地点，再一一对应上去，那些地方简直就像是门上的门钉一般。

They did not think of this before, but after specifically flying up high to take a look, the whole city looks just like a... a door! A gigantic door. Pu Feiping recalled the suspicious places with lesser immortal Qi and realized that those places are exactly like the nails on the door.
以后？什么以后？
Future? What future?
以她这不识路样子，要回了冥阴山，她一个人在这里，不会被饿死吧？
With her lacking sense of direction, if I were to return to Ming Yin Mountain, wouldn't she die of hunger alone?
以往他遇到江恨水都会远远的躲开，避免尴尬，此刻既然遇到了，也只能勉强笑道：“恨水，好久不见。”

Usually, when he saw Jiang Henshui, Jiang Yi would try to hide or move far away from him to avoid awkwardness between them. At that moment, since the two had met eyes, Jiang Yi had no choice but to force a smile and greet him by saying, "Henshui, long time no see."
以无敌派的实力，如今已经不需要全派出动去捡弟子了。就连孤月也没打算出派，而是把这事全权交给了郁红。郁红是九个女修中最年长的，也是性格最为稳重的一个。当日他教授几人的时候，她的修为最高，理所当然就成了几人中的大师姐。虽然这两年多中，思羽的实力已经超过了她，但她仍是众人最信服的一个。

Given the Invincible Sect's current prowess, they no longer had to mobilize all the members to move oout to recruit disciples into the sect. Even Lonemoon had no intentions of leaving the sect's grounds. He outsourced everything to Yu Hong. Yu Hong was the oldest of the nine female cultivators, and she was the most reliable one as well. When he recruited the female cultivators, she was of the highest cultivation level. Naturally, she was the Senior Sister of the group. Although Si Yu had overtaken her in terms of cultivation after two years, Yu Hong still remained the leader of the group.
以赤练毒蛇为药引，在黑砂中磨练，练成后中招者心脉滞涩如中赤练剧毒，肉体溃烂如被铁砂贯穿，是一门可以速成的人阶中品功法。

The attack used red-band poisonous snakes as a medicinal ingredient, which was subsequently tempered in black sand. After tempering, anyone who received the attack would suffer from slow blood circulation and lag like one had received red-band poisoning. Their physical body would fester like it was penetrated through by multiple metallic pellets. This was a Man-tier medial-grade attack that could be achieved instantly.
仿佛风雨欲来……
The wind and rain approached...
众人一惊，仔细一看，果然他周身围绕的都是仙气。
Everybody was stunned. They looked closely and found that his body was indeed surrounded by Immortal Qi.
众人一惊，纷纷转头看向思羽。
Everone was shocked as they turned over to look at Si Yu.
众人一惊，齐唰唰的转头看向她。郁家更是直接冷笑了一声。
Eveyone was shocked as they turned to look at her in unison. The Yu Family sneered.
众人一脸激动的将沈萤分发的铃铛小心翼翼收进了怀里，似是收到了什么稀世珍宝一样，兴奋得仿佛一不小心就要蹦起来一样。眼睛瞬间闪亮无比，朝着她齐齐行礼，个个开始一脸坚定的表决心。

The faces of the girls were all filled with excitement as they carefully put away the small bell that Shen Ying gave into their sleeves as if having received some rare treasure. They were so excited that they looked like they were about to leap in joy and their eyes sparkled so brightly as they bowed in unison towards her and showed a face of hard determination.
众人一顿，纷纷回过头来。特别是思羽下意识的就皱了皱眉，“还有事？”
Everyone paused and turned around. Si Yu subconsciously frowned, "What else?"
众人不敢置信瞪大了眼睛，这人是不是傻？哪有得到宝贝后，不认主的？众人的脸更黑了，再也说不出一句，这宝贝属于他们的话。谁会相信，一个没认主的物品，是轩辕家传世之宝。

The crowd couldn't believe their ears, and everyone's eyes widened. Is this person stupid? Anyone who found a treasure would make it acknowledge themselves as the owner. The crowd's expressions darkened. The crowd could no longer insist that the treasure belong to them. Who would believe that a treasure which had not acknowledged any owner belonged to the Xuan Yuan Family?
众人也是一脸茫然，孤月皱了皱眉，上前一步沉声道，“师兄，我想这群人是来找我的。”
Everyone present had blank looks, but Lonemoon furrowed his brows, stepped forward and said, "Senior Brother, I think they are here for me."
众人内心一凛，暗暗点头，这龙哥是江如虎的亲哥江如龙，实力在家族年轻一代排名第二，已达到铸鼎境七重，最近和大少爷江恨水去武殿闭关了。要是他出关听说江如虎被打成这样，肯定会暴怒出手弄死江逸的。

The hearts of all the people around turned coldly stern as they silently nodded their heads. That "Brother Long" was none other than Jiang Ruhu's older brother Jiang Rulong. Positioned second in the list of most powerful persons within the young generation of the Family, his power level had reached the seventh stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. Recently, he had left for seculsion and training with the Great Young Master Jiang Henshui at the Martial Arts Hall. Should he return and find out that Jiang Ruhu had been beaten to this terrible state, he would definitely intervene in a fit of rage and kill Jiang Yi.
众人又是一阵惊呼，果然是他！魔修芮糜一直是玄天宗的心腹大患，他作恶多端，却行踪隐秘，没人知道他的老巢万魔窟在哪。修为又是金丹大圆满，加上有噬魂幡的原因，即使是元婴修士出手也讨不到好处。玄天宗多次想要围剿却遍寻不着他的影子，没想到却被他解决了。他居然可以越阶打败他，不愧是剑修。

A chorus of amazed exclamations erupted yet again. It really was him! The fiendish cultivator Rui Mi had always been a big headache for the Blackheaven Sect. Although he committed many acts of evil, he managed to keep his whereabouts a secret. No one knew where his old hideout, the Myriad Fiend Den was. Also, he had perfected his Golden Core cultivation and possessed the Soul Devouring Gonfalon. There was no real chance of defeating him even with the help of a Nascent Soul cultivator. Many times the Blackheaven Sect had wanted to besiege his hideout but could not find any trace of him. And to think that Yi Qing had managed to solve this problem. He had actually defeated the Soul Devouring Gonfalon, whose cultivation level was higher than his. He definitely lived up to the high standards expected of a sword cultivator.
众人哪肯退去？谁敢退日后被江如虎知道了，还不得扒了皮啊？而且全部人看到江如虎样子惨不忍睹都有些害怕了，纷纷相劝，生怕出大事。

How could that group of opponents even consider retreating? Who dares escape - should Jiang Ruhu find out the identities of those individuals, would he not suffer a severe and deadly punishment as a consequence? On top of that, everyone in that group were all experiencing some fright in seeing Jiang Ruhu's appalling and agonising state. Each of them was discouraging one another from taking action, all of them fearful of making a big mistake.
众人在原地等了一会，不久便听到一道男音响起。
The group waited where they were and a few moments later, they heard male voices.
众人开始你一言我一语的，把昨晚的事说了一遍。
The group began to recount the events of the previous day, taking turns to speak.
众人忍不住把眼光齐齐的聚集在了女子身上，可无论怎么查看，她身上仍旧没有丝毫灵力，明明是个凡人啊？是他们修为太低看不出来吗？就像之前那两位也是，连郁红姐也探不出那两人的修为。

Everyone could not help but look at this girl, but no matter how they scrutinized her, she did not show any signs of Spirit Qi and was obviously a mortal. Were their cultivation levels too low to notice anything? It was just like the two people from before whose cultivation levels even Sister Yu Hong could not detect.
众人怀着忐忑的心情，随着浓萤和萝卜落下了云头。一路跟着他俩走过大殿，穿过后堂，来到一处庭院，并步行一张躺椅前。

All of them were anxious as they followed Shen Ying and the radish off the transport Dharma artifact. They followed the both of them through a big hall, and then through the rear of the hall. They passed by the courtyard and then stopped by a bed bench.
众人愣了一下，也不知道是谁带头回了句，“为了无敌派！”于是众人再次高喊，“为了无敌派！”
Everybody hesitated. A voice sounded out from the crowd, "For Invincible Sect!" Everyone echoed, "For Invincible Sect!"
众人愣了一下，面面相觑了会都看向了前方的郁红。
All the girls were shocked and they looked at each other at a loss for words before looking toward Yu Hong who in front.
众人手慌脚乱的抬起江如虎和江如鹰朝山下走去，全都义愤填膺的叫嚣不停，恨不得将江逸这个穷凶极恶的狂徒千刀万剐才能解恨。

In a flurry, the large group of people carried Jiang Ruhu and Jiang Ruying as they left the Western Hills. All of them clamoured incessantly as they felt indignant with the injustice just inflicted on them, each of them itching to make mincemeat out of that viciously evil and violent criminal Jiang Yi so that they can be relieved of their bitter hatred.
众人有些茫然的看了郁红一眼，见她点头才纷纷行礼，退了下去。
Everyone was a little stunned as they looked at Yu Hong. Seeing her nod, all of them then saluted and took their leave.
众人沉默了，面面相觑了半天，也没有人站出来说个主意。
Everyone was silent and looked at each other for a long time. No one came forward with any ideas.
众人没有回话，只是眼神更加的丰富了。
Nobody replied, but the expressions in their eyes said it all.
众人点了点头。
They all nodded.
众人的脸色更沉了，看来这个郁家的底牌还挺多。孤月扫了屋内的众弟子一眼，沉声道，“今天晚上大家都去收拾一下，我们明日就回无敌派。”

Everybody's expressions darkened. The Yu Family seemed to have many hidden cards... Lonemoon scanned the room and studied each of his disciples. Lowering his voice, he said, "Everybody, pack up your things tonight. We'll return to Invincible Sect tomorrow."
众人看了看她空无一物的脚下。
Everyone looked at where she pointed, but saw absolutely nothing.
众人眼睛更亮，再次齐齐回答，“掌门好！”
Everybody's eyes brightened and they responded together, "How are you, Sect Master?"
众人眼睛顿时更亮了，那个中年游仙更是上前几步，似是压住不住激动的道，“正是此物。”
The group's eyes lit up. The middle-aged Traveling Immortal took a few more steps forward. He couldn't hold in his excitement as he replied, "Yes, this is it."
众人神色一喜。
Everyone of Invincible Sect was delighted at this.
众人纷纷打起了十二万分的精神，注意着四周的情况。可接下来的情形，却令众人有些不知所措。
Everyone became alert and took note of what was happening around them. However, the scenario that came next made them all go speechless.
众人脸色一变，他却直接把自己的玉牌递还给了奚秋，转身就御剑就追了出去。
The crowd's expression changed. Nevertheless, he handed his jade token back to Xi Qiu, turned around, and rode on his sword after Yi Qing.
众人脸色一变，面面相觑，她到底从哪冒出来的，她们居然没有一个人察觉。
All of their expressions changed, showing confusion. Where did she come from? How was it that none of them had noticed her?
众人脸色顿时分外复杂起来。真相是什么，轩辕家这伙人最清楚。本来他们就是来拿玄天宗出气的，没指望那秘境里真有千叶草木灵，但谁想得到这里真的有。

The crowd's expressions reflected absolute confusion. The Xuan Yuan Family was clearest about what the truth was. They had originally come to give the Blackheaven Sect trouble. They hadn't expected that they really found a Thousand Leaves Vegetation Spirit in the mystic realm. Yet, there really was one here.
众人脸色顿时沉重起来，“郁红姐，我们真的……能平安逃到下界去吗？”
Everyone's expressions became grave. "Sister Yu Hong, can we really… escape to the Lower Realm safely?"
众人赞同的点了点头，轩辕家已经经不起再聊一次的折腾了。
The other five nodded in agreement. The Xuan Yuan Family definitely would not be able to withstand another blow.
众人还没反应过来，机械似的开口，“走？”
The group of girls had yet to recover from shock as they opened their mouths mechanically to ask, "Go?"
众人还目送着江逸离开，一道暴怒无比的怒吼响起，竟是一开始就被江逸砸断腿的江如鹰。

The group of people were still sending Jiang Yi off with their stares of horror, when a bellow fulled with incomparably violent rage rang out. The shout actually came from Jiang Ruying, whose leg had been broken by Jiang Yi right from the start.
众人这才反应过来，对啊，既然仙人都可以来到下界，那怎么可能会没有仙门。这人明显就是在骗他们！
The crowd began to react. That's right, if an immortal could come down to the Lower Ralm, how can there be no Heavenly Gate? This man was lying!
众人这才发现，他的尾巴上正托着一个婴儿，婴儿裹着厚厚的皮毛，只露出半张脸，脸色看起来还泛着黄，像是刚刚出生的一样。而他身后的祭坛上正放着一个已经打开的盒子。

It was only now that they saw he had a baby on his tail. The baby was wrapped in thick fur, with only half of his face revealed; his face looked yellow, like he was just born. And on the altar behind him was an open box.
众人进了酒楼内，才发现里面另有一番天地，仙雾缭绕，灵气逼人。每走一段眼前就是另一番景象，不像是在酒楼，而像是到了什么风景名胜一样。

On entering the restaurant, they found themselves in another world. The interior was swirling with immortal mist and oppressive Spirit Qi. The scenery continuously changed as they strolled along. It was as if they had come to a famous scenic spot rather than a restaurant.
众人迟疑起来，进退为难，江逸双手又是一动，江如虎的身子在半空滑过一道美妙的弧度，又重重砸落在地。

The group of opponents hesitated in their response, as they were stuck between a rock and a hard place. Jiang Yi's hands moved again, sending Jiang Ruhu's body flying in mid-air in a splendid upwards arc before smashing it heavily on the ground once again.
众人顿时脸色一变，奚秋立马转身唤过一名弟子大声道，“快去，敲响主峰的彻鸣钟，封锁玄天宗所有出口，捉拿魔修！”

Everyone's face changed immediately. Xi Qiu turned around and straight away shouted towards a disciple, "Quick, sound the main peak's Che Ming Bell. Seal all of Blackheaven Sect's exits, capture the fiendish cultivator!"
众人齐齐倒吸了一口气，瞬间坚定了一个想法。这些哪是什么小仙门可以有的。
Everyone sucked in their breath and immediately reinforced their prior train of thought. These things were not possible for a small immortal sect.
众人齐齐回答。
Everyone answered in unison.
The group: "…"
众人：“……”心口有点塞。
Everyone："..." Something was stuck in their throats.
众人：“……”说好的世家兄弟呢？
Everyone: "…" What happened to the brotherly bond among aristocratic families?
All the body cultivators: "..."
Hall masters: "…"
众多弟子集合不到五分钟，之前冲进去的羿清和沈萤回来了，羿清一手拎着一个人，而沈萤一手拎着……一条鱼？！

Yi Qing and Shen Ying that rushed in previously came back five minutes after all the disciples gathered. Yi Qing had 1 person in each side of his arms, and Shen Ying had 1... fish in each side of his arms？！
众妖四下寻找，明明是五感最为敏锐的妖类，却找了半天也没找着这发声之人。
Despite possessing keen senses, the demons failed to find the person who had said those words.
众妖脑海里同时浮现出了一个字“弱”，太弱了！就连身上的妖气都弱得可怜，仿佛随便一个妖呼口大气，都能把她吹跑了。
Instantly, a single word emerged in the minds of every single demon: "Weak!" She was way too weak! Even the weakest, most pathetic demon present could blow her away with a single puff.
众妖跟着那声音左右看了好几遍，仍是没有找着出声之人。
The demons followed the instructions of the voice, but they still failed to find the person.
The demons：“……”
众妹子纷纷点头，看向沈萤的眼光，再没了昨天那种警惕，反而亮得有些可怕，像极了前世那些舔屏偶象的疯狂粉丝。

The girls nodded and looked at Shen Ying. The suspicion that was once in their eyes was gone and was replaced with pure freaky admiration. They looked so much like the crazy fans Lonemoon had seen in his previous life.
All the disciples: "..."
传闻悟剑峰可是上青界的一个顶级宗门所建，也是唯一一处可以从中青界进入到上青界的地方。
It was rumored that Sword Comprehension Peak was built by a top sect of the Azure World and it was the only place through which one could enter the Upper Azure World from the Middle Azure World.
传闻有一种极为阴损的法子，将活人修士的身体直接练制成丹，丹中可以保存修士生前百分之十的修为，吃了可以直接提升修为。但这种方法极为麻烦，但凡修士都不愿自己的修为被人所盗取，所以就算是成丹，丹里蕴含的狂虐灵气很有可能反噬食用的人。除非被练制的人，本身灵气就是极为柔和的属性。像是水灵根，或是木灵根。

It was rumored that there was a depraved method of making elixir pills, which was to use the body of a living cultivator. These pills could preserve ten percent of the victims’ cultivation level before their death. Anyone who took the pill would directly experience an improvement in cultivation level. However, this method was extremely troublesome. No cultivators would willingly allow their cultivation level be extracted, so although it was an elixir pill, the malevolence contained in the pill could turn on the consumer, unless the cultivator used in the making of the pill possessed Spirit Qi of an extremely gentle attribute, such as a Water Spirit Root attribute or a Wood Spirit Root attribute.
伴随着一道骨头断裂声，一道沉闷的元力爆炸声乍起，元力对撞引得四周空气一震，吹起了地面的烟尘，迷了众人的眼。但这一刻所有人都忘记了闭眼，全部眼眸睁得滚圆，不敢置信的望着江如鹰身子如断线的风筝般朝远处飞去……

Alongside the sounds of bones breaking rang aloud the deep noise of essence forces exploding. The collision of essence forces caused a shockwave to reveberate across the surrounding air, blowing up smoke and dust from the room and blurring all the gang-members' visions. However, at that moment, all the members had forgotten to close their eyes. Instead, their eyes were bulging out and opened wide, as they simply could not believe what they were seeing - the figure of Jiang Ruying being sent flying out in a faraway direction, akin to a kite with a broken string...
伴随着冥皇的命令，阴兵、骸骨巨人、尸人、尸兽和尸将们全部仰天狂吼，无数暴虐、凶残、邪恶、腥臭和腐臭的气息顷刻便全部释放了出来。

Following the orders of the Netherworld King, the skeleton giants, zombies, zombie-beasts, and zombie generals surged forward with a crazy roar. Immense amounts of violent, brutal, and festering smells were all released instantly.
伸手摸了摸额头上那个肿得如鸡蛋一般的夸张肉包，江逸心中顿时充满了难以抑制的愤怒。今天一大早，当他赶去清点家族西山药田的收成时，正好遇到江如虎等几个家族旁系少爷偷药，想换零用钱花。这种纨绔子弟的行为一般只要不太严重，家族管事都是睁一只眼闭一只眼，权当没看见。

Jiang Yi was overwhelmed by uncontrollable rage when his hand brushed over the large, egg-shaped swelling on his forehead. That morning, he’d rushed to check on the plantation’s herb harvest. Unfortunately, he ran into Jiang Ruhu and some other members of a side branch. They were looting the fields of their medicine, which they planned to sell for some extra money. Normally, the family would turn a blind eye to what these wastrel playboys did, as long as their activities were not irredeemable.
似是极力避免他们跟他扯上关系一样。
It looked as if Lonemoon was doing everything he could to avoid having to come into contact with Bai Ze.
但……他有退路吗？
However... did he have any way to retreat or escape?
但也不能总这么下去，看来是时候找点赚钱的路子了。早知今日之前狸猫掉的金子，她就应该捡起来的，都怪那个临时厨子。

However they could not continue on like this; it seemed like it was time to find ways to earn money. If she had known earlier, she would have picked up the gold that the civet cat had dropped earlier on. Her temporary chef was to blame for it.
但奇怪的是，众人对成为体修的事，半点都没有排斥，反而……有些惊喜？！甚至从第二天起，就直接开心的扔开了剑，齐齐开始单纯的练拳粹体，就好像……终于捅破了什么窗户纸似的。

The odd thing, however, was that all of them were not against becoming Body Cultivators, but they were instead… pleasantly surprised?! From the second day onwards, they happily tossed aside their swords and began to purely practice their body and fists as if… finally affirming an open secret.
但是……兔兔到底做错什么了？上仙为啥不明说！
"But... but what has Rabbit done wrong? Why didn't Exalted Immortal make it clear?"
但是……没有沈萤！
Yet... no one mentioned Shen Ying!
但是下一刻，那团黑气与莲花却慢慢汇合成一体，不到半会已经开始凝聚成形，一刻钟的功夫后，黑气和莲花都不见了，而地上多出了一个熟睡的婴儿。

The next moment, the lump of black matter fused with the Lotus and became one with it in no time. In an instant, the black matter disappeared along with the Lotus. And there, on the ground, laid an infant in deep sleep.
但是因为浮得不高，所以刚刚没看出来。孤月心下一惊，当即捏了个风诀，扫开了四周的碎石，下方居然是一块完好无损的石板，在刚刚羿清那顿打砸中，居然没有半点划裂。而且这石板上……

But because the stones had not floated up much, they did not spot it just now. Alarmed, Lonemoon immediately formed a hand seal to sweep away the surrounding gravel. A completely intact stone slate could be seen at the bottom; despite Yi Qing's battering, it had not suffered the slightest crack. And this stone slate…
但是没有浑厚的元力，身上的伤势也没好，在相差了一倍的巨大力量面前，应该极为勉强才对。更何况这仓促的一招就把江豹的手肘给推得脱了臼？

But Jiang Yi was injured and lacking essence force, so there was no need to stress the vast difference in strength between them. Despite this, the unexpected blow managed to dislocate Jiang Bao's elbow.
但是！
But!
但此时从上空看下去，不知道什么时候起，整个曲双城的排列变得四四方方如同丈量好一般的一座仙城，不多一分一毫。而且整个城中最大的一条主街，刚好就纵贯其中，把整个城分为东西两个完美半城。

However, looking down from above this time, the city's appearance had changed. The whole Qushuang City's layout is now neatly arranged, and the sides of the layout looked as if it was measured precisely. Moreover, the largest main road of the city just nice cut the whole city in the middle, separating the city perfectly to have an east wing and a west wing.
但江逸却不敢动手，因为这江豹虽然天资不行，也无心修炼，但毕竟修炼了那么多年，资质再怎么普通也有铸鼎境二重的实力。而他自己只有铸鼎境一重的实力，昨日还受了伤，此刻若是逞强，恐怕又会打输。

However, Jiang Yi did not dare to take action against Jiang Bao. Even though Jiang Bao had neither the talent nor the spirit to focus on his essence force training, he had nonetheless practiced for so many years that he was—despite slow progress—at the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. Jiang Yi, on the other hand, was only at the first stage of the Cast Tripod Realm; furthermore, he was still injured. If he had chosen to stubbornly lock horns with Jiang Bao at that moment, Jiang Yi was afraid he would lose the ensuing struggle.
但沈萤不同，她明明修为已经达到他人只能望其项背的程度，却宁愿隐居在这深山老林，甚至是妖界的入口处。不逐名利，不畏生死，更难得的有着颗不动摇的良善之心，对毫无关系的他伸出援手。能坚持初心至此，成仙又算得上什么？

However, Shen Ying was different. Her cultivation had reached a level that others could only admire from a distance, yet she preferred to live in seclusion within these deep old forests, and by the entrance of the Demon Realm at that. Neither pursuing any fame nor fortune, having no fear of death — the rarest thing was to have a kind heart that did not falter, to extend a helping hand to strangers. To hold on to one’s heart's original purpose up till now — what was Immortal Ascension compared to this?
但没想到，他又一次失算了。
But he didn't expect that he miscalculated again.
但没有想到，这完美的方案，会被人截胡。而且对方还是跟他一样穿越过来的同类。说实话，一开始他是真的讨厌这个姓沈的妹子，甚至不顾一惯的绅士风度，想从对方手里抢人。论实力论修为论机缘，他都不输半分。修仙以来顺风顺水，简直可以称为穿越界的RMB玩家。可没想到，虽然他充了RMB，人家却开了挂！岛上那一剑劈开的不单是海，还有他脆弱的自尊心。

Yet he did not expect his perfect plan to be intercepted by someone else. More so by the same kind of person who had also transmigrated here. To be honest, in the beginning, he really hated this girl named Shen. He even dropped his gentlemen demeanor, wanting to snatch Yi Qing over from her. In terms of strength, cultivation or luck, he would not lose out any bit. His immortal cultivation had been such a smooth journey, he could totally be considered a transmigration P2W player[1. Players who pay real cash to gain an advantage in game.]. Little did he know that even though he could fake being a P2W player, someone else used a cheat! That slash by the sword not only cut open the sea, but also his fragile self-esteem.
但现在……它终于打开了。
But now... it's finally opened.
但轩辕家今天这样的举动，未免就有些可笑了。敢情只准你们上青界在秘境里杀人，其它人反抗一下都不行了？

Yet these actions of the Xuan Yuan Family today seemed ridiculous. Was this to imply that only the people from the Upper Azure World were allowed to kill people, while the rest could not even retaliate?
但这一时半会的，他们也找不着出口在哪。唯一的办法，就是硬拼，把这些人唤醒。
They had no time to look for the exit. The only solutiion was to fight their hardest and wake these people up.
但这东西根本无法解释，他也不会傻乎乎的告诉杨管事。最终他想了一个办法，请假五天，然后找杨管事求助，想在武殿学习几种武技。

However, he had no idea how to explain this thing, nor was he going to blindly tell Manager Yang about it. Finally he came up with a plan - to ask for a leave of absence for five days, before asking Manager Yang for some help in the hopes of learning some martial arts techniques at the Martial Arts Hall.
但魔界之门兹事体大，不仅关乎曲双城，更是关乎于整个仙界。得到同样的结果后，他父亲薄仪不放心，又亲自去查看了一遍。这一看还真就看出一些小问题。

However, the Door of Demon Realm is a very serious matter. It does not only concern Qushuang City, but also concerns the whole Immortal Realm. Thus after receiving similar results, his father, Pu Yi, was still worried, and personally went to check the city once more. This time he did find a small problem.
体修是什么？体修TM就是一群用拳手说话，完全没有技巧可言，专门练体的糙汉啊！你们不是群妹子吗？为什么要跟那些妖类和异兽一样，走这么一条凶残的路，皮糙肉厚的体修有什么好的啊喂。整个三青界，别说是女体修，男体修都没有几个好吗？

What were Body Cultivators? They were a bunch of people who only knew how to talk with their fists and had no skills whatsoever, training only their bodies! Aren't you guys a group of girls? Why did they all want to be like those demons and creatures treading such a ferocious path? What was good about having rough skin and thick muscles as a Body Cultivator? Were there not only a few male Body Cultivators in the entire Three Realms, much less females?
余下的四人面面相觑，半会才想起正事。
The remaining four looked at each other wonderingly for some time before they finally returned to the matter at hand.
余阳却上前一把拦住了他，“师弟！他们正是为了宗门大义，才离开的，莫辜负他们一片苦心。”
Yu Yang stopped Lonemoon. "Junior Brother! They are doing a favour for our sect by leaving. Don't waste their efforts."
余阳点了点头，皱眉看向空中众人道，“这到底是怎么回事？为何上青界轩辕家的人会突然来此？”还一副开战的架式。

Yu Yang nodded and with furrowed brows, asked the people in the sky, "What is going on? Why would the Xuan Yuan Family from the Upper Azure World be here all of a sudden?" Especially with a stance ready to battle?
余阳看了上方的众人一眼，低声道，“你该明白，大敌当前，保住宗门要紧，真相如何并不重要！”

Yu Yang looked at the crowd above them, floating on the Lotus Flower. He lowered his voice and replied, "You should understand that protecting the sect should be our priority. It's not important what the truth is!"
作为亿万位面中最为强大，强者最为集中的天界，作为整个辽阔天界中最神圣最强大，平素里总是显得无比威严神圣的天庭，今夜竟然如此的漆黑？如此的安静？

As the most powerful dimension among the hundreds of millions dimensions where the formidable convened, the Heavenly Court was exceptionally quiet. How could the Heavenly Court, which was usually the most divine and stately in the Heavenly Realm, be so dark and silent on this night?
作为家族的三公子，江顾水不得不出声了，否则江松的一条腿将会活活劈得骨头碎裂，很有可能变成残废。江如狼的老子就是刑堂副长老，以前他经常用刑堂压家族子弟，现当着那么多人的面也不好沉默了。

As the family's Third Young Master, Jiang Gushui had to step in, if not Jiang Song's leg would be forcefully shattered and possibly crippled. Jiang Rulang's father was the Deputy Elder of the Disciplinary Court. He used to frequently bring up the Disciplinary Court to oppress other clan descendants, which was why he couldn't stay silent in front of so many people.
作为罪魁祸首的江逸自此不再受到江家高层待见，即便他始终坚持修炼，在大长老失踪这六年里将自己的元力从零苦苦提升到铸鼎境一重，他在族里的地位依旧是一降再降。不但在两年前被挤兑搬出江家后院，住进家将仆人所在的西院，甚至前些天还让他提早半年就接手只有年满十六周岁，最终确认不能修炼到铸鼎境三重的家族废材子弟才会负责的比如清点家族药田收成这样的杂活工作。

As the “main culprit” behind these unfortunate circumstances, Jiang Yi was no longer favored by the elders of the Jiang Clan. Even though he continued to persevere and cultivate throughout the six years of the Grand Elder’s disappearance and had painstakingly boosted his cultivation from nothing up to the first stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, his position in the family continued to deteriorate.
Two years ago he was forced to move out from the Jiang Residence’s rear court into the servants’ complex situated in the west court. Just a few days ago, he was also made to take up the responsibility of handling the family's herb plantations half a year earlier than normal. This was a job that sixteen-year-old descendants who were deemed useless for not being able to cultivate to the third stage of the Cast Tripod Realm would usually take on.
你TM在逗我！
You must be kidding me!
你TM在逗我，没有灵根，你到底是怎么进到这来的啊喂！
"You're freaking killing me. Without a Spirit Root, how in the world did you make it into this pavilion?"
你TM才知道啊！
How would we freaking know?
你个脑残粉要不要也加入进去啊喂！
You retard, would you like to join them?
你们到底是哪里想不开，到底哪、里、想、不、开、啊喂！？
Why did you guys take things so hard?!
你们是不是对门派的风格有什么误解？！
Do you all have a misunderstanding about the way our sect is run?
你们还没付灵石啊喂？
Hey you guys haven't paid the spirit stones?
你到底是怎么听见别人传音的啊喂？
How exactly dd you hear messages sent through voice transmission?
你到底是谁的系统啊喂！不带这么拆台的！感觉自从来到无敌派后，自家系统就换了一个主人啊喂！
Whose system are you? Why are you making me look bad? Feng Ying felt as if the system no longer recognised him as its host ever since he came to Invincible Sect.
你大爷！
You asshole!
你已经打扰了！
You’re disturbing me already!
你自己抱错了大腿，怪我罗？
Is it my fault that you got the wrong leg?
便宜你了。
You lucked out.
修士加入门派后，在门派都会有一块命牌，并在神识中留下门派印记。除非修为高过设立命牌的人，不然这个印记是消除不了的。而各派的立牌之人，最少都是元婴修为。孤月神识扫了过去，这几个人确实没有任何印记。

Cultivators would leave a life token in the sect they joined and the transmission mark of that sect would be imprinted in their Divine Perception. Unless one's cultivation was higher than the person who designated the life token, the transmission marks could not be removed. The people in charge of allocating life tokens were at least of Nascent Soul cultivation. Lonemoon glanced over with his Divine Perception and realized this group of people really did not have any transmission marks.
修炼了一会，江逸觉得太慢太慢索性停了下江水决，转练无名决。准备趁着药力还没完全消融，再次提速修炼一番，他刚才虽然仅仅是提速了片刻，但提炼出来的蓝色元力可是能比以往修炼两个时辰了……

After refining for a while, as he felt the refining was getting too slow, he simply decided to stop practicing the Jiang Water Art and shifted to practicing the nameless technique. Prepared to take advantage of the time before the medical power dissipated fully, he wanted to speed up the refining process by another notch. Even though he would likely only speed up the process by a few seconds, the blue essence force that would be refined was as much as what he could refine within four hours...
修炼了两个时辰，提炼了六缕黑色元力，时间已是日上三竿了。他连忙爬了起来，匆匆抓起两个窝头，朝江家东院管事房走去。

It was already late morning, by the time Jiang Yi finished cultivating for four hours and refining six wisps of black essence forces. He hastily crawled up, hurriedly grabbed two wotous and walked in the direction of the Housekeeping Chamber in the Jiang Residence Eastern Courtyard.
修炼了这么多年，江逸从没有这一刻那么痛快过，他全神贯注的沉寂在修炼中，连晚饭都没有去吃，一直盘坐修炼，黑色元力没了提炼黑色元力，灵神丹药力没了吞服灵神丹。

Not once had Jiang Yi experienced such a high level of thrill and delight throughout his many years of practising cultivation until that very moment. With his full attention focused, he was alone in his power cultivation - sitting cross-legged in meditation and cultivating essence force throughout, refining black essence force once it had been consumed and consuming Spirit Pills once the medical efficacy of the pills had run out, without even bothering to eat dinner.
修炼，修炼！
Cultivate, cultivate!
倾刻之间，全灭！
In the blink of an eye, the entire Beast Tide was extirpated!
倾刻血溅三尺高。
The blood spurted out from his body, three feet into the air.
假的？
Is he real?
偌大的演武殿数十人，除了江松江豹江如虎还在惨叫个不停外，唯有江如龙暴怒的大吼不断的响起，那如雷的声音震得所有人耳膜作痛，也让所有人感觉是……那么的嘲讽！

In the massive Martial Arts Demonstration Hall, apart from Jiang Song, Jiang Bao and Jiang Ruhu who were screaming miserably, there was only Jiang Rulong who continually roared with wrath. His thunderous voice hurt everyone's eardrums and at the same time caused everyone to feel... the irony!
偏偏为了方便在场的众人理解，系统说一句，沈萤就同步大声念一遍。
Shen Ying had been repeating after the system, word for word, so that everyone else who was present could understand what was going on.
偏偏他们还真就有那东西。
And as it turns out, they really did have a Thousand Leaves Vegetation Spirit.
偏偏他细查了一遍各人的资质，除了一两个灵根属性较差的，其它人还……真的不错。确实都经过仔细挑选过的，就是挑的方向有些歪。

He scanned each of their qualifications. Other than one or two of them who did not have good spirit roots, the rest of their spirit roots were... not bad. The sisters really picked carefully. They just went off-tangent in their selection process.
偏偏沈萤还一脸正经的问了一声，“那啥，你确定是那孩子的……亲爹？”
Nevertheless Shen Ying continued to ask with a serious look, "Hey, are you sure… you are the biological father of that kid?”
偏厅内的书架上可是有不少关于炼丹的书籍，说不定能找到丹药回炉再造的方法。
There were many books on elixir-refining on the bookshelf in the side room. Perhaps he could find the method on how to reheat and refine elixirs.
偏厅里面柳长老侧对着江逸盘坐在地上，手中冒出火红色元力将剩下那枚黑色丹药包陇，全神贯注研究着，完全没有理会江逸。

Elder Liu sat on the ground in the side chamber, his back facing Jiang Yi. He wrapped the remaining black elixir pill in the red essence force released from his hand. With his full attention on research, he completely ignored Jiang Yi.
做为一界之主，为了魔界的尊严他是想反抗来着，但关键是完全反抗不了啊！他甚至都不怕丢脸的想招座下的众魔帮忙，心念一动之下，通知了十方天魔。

Being the ruler of a realm, he did want to resist in order to defend the dignity of the Demon Realm, but was absolutely incapable to do so! At times like this, his image became secondary. He was ready to give it up to ask for help from his fiend subordinates. After consideration, he informed the Demons of the 10 district to come for his rescue .
做为曾经的散修，羿清没少与魔修打交道，对他们的气息最为熟悉，但对方能潜入玄天宗，并且杀死一位元婴真人，也是做足了准备。即使他对灵气的感应十分敏税，也整整花了半个时辰，才搜寻到阴气的痕迹。奇怪的是，这气息出现的位置，并不在任何一个出口，而是在不远处的迎缘峰底。

As a former itinerant cultivator, Yi Qing had had more than his share of dealings with fiendish cultivators and was very familiar with their scent, but the fact that one could infiltrate Blackheaven Sect and kill a Perfected Nascent Soul cultivator meant that they must have been fully prepared. It had taken him one full hour to find traces of Yin Qi, even though he was very sensitive to it. Strangely, this Qi was not found at any of the exits, but at the base of the nearby Yingyuan peak.
做客两天，赶路半个月。
She had stayed at the Yi Family for two days but had been on the road for half a month.
像是砸地鼠一样，一锤一个，一锤一个，把十几个化神修士，生生锤进了土地里，抠都抠不出来。而她手里的锤子就是——郁家家主！
One by one, as if smashing hamsters, she hammered them deep into the ground. And the hammer in her hand was - the Yu Family Patriarch!
元力刚刚融合，两个拳头就对撞而上，江逸身子一震倒退了三四步，没事！
No sooner had the essence force merged did the two fists collided. Jiang Yi jolted and retreated about three to four steps back, but was fine!
先不说那几个奇葩的名字是怎么回事？
Putting aside the weird names, what was this about?
兔子到是来得快，不到十分钟就蹦过来了。
The rabbit was rather quick as it had hopped over and arrived under ten minutes.
兔子，猫送的萝卜我拿走了，你别怪它！沈萤留。
"Rabbit, I took the carrot that the cat meant to give you. Don't blame him! Shen Ying"
兔子？
A rabbit?
兔王一愣，呆呆的看着手里数十颗品阶各异的珠子，兔心一暖，顿时有点想哭。
The Rabbit Monarch was stupefied. It stared blankly at the dozens of demon cores that came from demons of various levels. The rabbit's heart felt warm and fuzzy, and it almost broke into tears.
兔王一抖，只觉得心底一凉，不会吧，这也被看出来了。
The Rabbit Monarch quivered as its heart sank. That can't be, how was it even possible to tell?
兔王一抖，头摇成了波浪鼓，“我是吃草的！从来不做饭。而且我……我怕火啊！”
The rabbit gave a shudder, shaking its head vigorously. "I eat grass! Never done any cooking. What's more, I... I'm afraid of fire!"
兔王仍是不敢相信，自己就这么轻易的捡回来一条命，看了看满地的其它妖尸，“您……真的不杀我了？”
The Rabbit Monarch found it unbelievable to be so easily spared. It glanced at the demons carcasses scattered across the land, "A-are… you really not going to kill me?"
兔王只觉得心底涌起一股心酸泪，敢情兔族这么高的伤亡率，是因为肉质！它一点都不想好吃！
The Rabbit Monarch felt bitterness rise up in it. So the reason why the rabbits had suffered such great casualties was because of the quality of their meat! It didn't want to be delicious at all!
兔王四腿一软，直接从王座上滚了下来，不敢置信的看着眼前的人。
The Rabbit Monarch's legs went jelly and it rolled down from its throne, unable to believe its eyes
兔王带他们来到这座灵峰后，第二天就招了大群的妖类火火风风的盖起了房子。短短几个月后，这个只有灵植的浮峰，已经盖出了大片的殿宇，其精致承度比之妖王殿都有过之无不及。

After the Rabbit Monarch brought them to this spiritual peak, it brought a huge group of demon beasts to build the palace. Within mere months, the mountain which previously had nothing but spirit herbs suddenly had a palace built atop it. The palace looked far more magnificent than the one in which the Demon Monarch stayed.
兔王抖得更加厉害了，“上仙饶命，我只是一只小兔王，跟它们不一样。我吃草的，从来没吃过人啊。我上有老兔，下有小兔，肚子里还怀着一窝，不能死啊。求求您放我一条生路。”

The Rabbit Monarch trembled even more vigorously. "Exalted Immortal, please have mercy on me! I am just a mere rabbit monarch. I'm not like them. I only eat grass and have never eaten a human before! I have elderly rabbits and young rabbits to care for. I am even pregnant with a whole fluffle of them. I can't die now! Please, spare me!"
兔王抖得更加厉害了，瞬间就觉得被摸的耳朵都没知觉了。几次想坐回王座，却还是脚软的滑了下来，“大……大仙，请……请您吩咐。”

The Rabbit Monarch shook even more and its ear which had been stroked by Shen Ying suddenly felt numb. It tried several times to sit back down on its throne but kept sliding down, let down by its wobbly legs. "Great… Immortal, please… please give me your orders."
兔王指了指前方，沈萤转头一看果然满山遍野都是萝卜。还真的是块萝卜地啊。
The Rabbit Monarch pointed ahead. Shen Ying turned her head and saw that the whole mountain and the surrounding land were covered with radishes—it was really a radish land.
兔王点头，“一般都在丹田的位置。”
The Rabbit Monarch nodded, "Yes, they usually located in the Dantian region."
兔王疑惑的拉开袋子，却一下没提稳，哗啦一下倒出了大半，一时间一颗颗或大或小的珠子，噼里啪啦的滚了一地，红色白色黑色蓝色，啥色都有。

Puzzled, the Rabbit Monarch tried to open the sack but lost its grip and almost half of the contents in the bag fell out. 'Pearls' of different sizes and colors of all sorts including red, black, blue and so on, dropped out and rolled onto the ground.
兔王的小心脏瑟瑟发抖，再次感受到了万妖大会那夜，被吃货统治的恐惧。完了完了完了……怎么办？

The Rabbit Mornach's tiny heart was thumping. Once again, he felt the all-consuming fear that he felt that night at the Myriad Demon Congregation. "I'm doomed, I'm doomed, I'm doomed... What should Rabbit do?"
兔王脑海中冒出来了一个几乎荒唐的答案，“所以，上仙您杀那些妖是为了……”
A nearly ludicrous answer surfaced in the Rabbit Monarch's mind. "So, Exalted Immortal, the reason why you killed those demons was to…"
兔王被这个残酷的事实打击到了。眼看解释完后，女子转身要走，兴许是她那跟武力值完全相反的随意语气，让它有了勇气，兔王突然有个大胆的计划。

The Rabbit Monarch felt taken aback by the harsh realities of the world. It realized that the woman was about to turn and leave after having explained herself. Perhaps it was due her casual tone that stood in contrast to the power she possessed, that the Rabbit Monarch suddenly mustered the courage to carry out a bold plan.
兔王这才转身走出了屋，拼命忍住瞄向地上的眼光，打住打住，这是上仙的东西，它有命看，也是没命享的。

Just as the Rabbit Monarch was about to leave the house, it used all its might to hold back from glancing at the floor. Hold it, hold it, thought the rabbit. These were items of the Exalted Immortal — it might live to see it but might not live to enjoy it.
兔王这才领着众兔走进了院子，也不知道是不是错觉，羿清总觉得每只经过恩人旁边的兔妖，都下意识的抖了一下。

The Rabbit Monarch then led the colony of rabbits into the yard. He was unsure whether if it was an illusion, but Yi Qing kept getting the feeling that every rabbit that passed by the Benefactor seemed to quiver subconsciously.
兔王连忙变作人形跟进了屋，一扫地上已经只剩一口气的人，和旁边鬼气森森的旗子，立马就猜到出了什么事。

The Rabbit Monarch quickly manifested a human form and followed suit. A person who barely had any breath left laid on the ground with an eerie-looking flag beside them, and what happened could be immediately inferred.
兔王都不禁眼红了，要是能有一两颗也好啊。它强行压下心底的贪念，顺手捡起一颗八阶的妖丹走了过去，“上仙，用这个就可以了。”它一本正经的道，眼角的余光却忍不住瞄向满地的妖丹。这诱惑……也太大了点。

The Rabbit Monarch could not help but feel envious; if only it could have one or two, that would be great. It forced itself to bury such a greedy thought, picked up a level eight demon core and walked over. "Exalted Immortal, this will do the trick," said the rabbit earnestly, even as it could not help but glance out the corner of its eye at the demon cores on the ground. This temptation… was just a little too great.
兔王顿时菊花一紧，“是化做人形，用蚌妖给的珠子换来的，没有惊动人。”
The Rabbit Monarch was immediately panic-stricken and said, "They manifested into human forms and used the pearls given by the clam demons to exchange for them, so they did not scare anyone."
兔王：“……”你到底是杀了多少妖啊喂！
The Rabbit Monarch: "…" How many demons did you actually kill!
入秋后的夜晚格外寒冷，凡界各家各户早已闭门息灯，
The autumn night was especially chilling. The various residences in the Mortal Realm had long shut their doors and snuffed out their lights to rest.
全场一阵诡异的安静。
The whole area was in a spooky silence.
全场整整安静了三秒，鸦雀无声。
The entire area fell silent for three seconds.
全场死一般的寂静。
The entire place was filled with dead silence.
全场顿时一静。
All at once there was silence.
全场顿时一静，果然一道细小声音在屋内响起，声量极小，仿佛刻意压制似的，断断续续的滑过一声声的：嘤……嘤嘤……嘤嘤……
Everyone present became silent; there was indeed a tiny sound ringing within the house. It was extremely soft, as if holding back on purpose, and the sound was heard on and off: Waa… Waawaa… Waawaa…
全场鸦雀无声。
There was total silence.
Everyone: "..."
全是一群高阶兔妖！
All of them were a group of highly powerful rabbit demons!
全程围观的戚橙雨：“……”带着这些人，真的能报仇吗？
Qi Chengyu, watching from the sidelines: "…" Having these people with me, can I really take my revenge?
全程懵逼的印风：“……”
Yin Feng, who had been dumbstruck during the entire proceedings: "…"
八阶妖经过：“大……大大……仙。”
An eighth-stage demon came by: "Great… Great… Immortal."
六人脸上满满都是复杂，这个叫沈萤的……到底是什么人？
The six Traveling Immortals were thoroughly confused. This Shen Ying… what kind of person was she?
六千六百年！
6600 years!
六缕黑色元力能干什么？或许他可以重创几人，但一旦黑色元力没了，他必会被恼羞成怒的众人痛殴，运气好打断几根骨头，运气不好在混乱中被活活打死也不是没可能。他太了解这群纨绔子弟了，一旦冲动起来，绝不会在意后果的。

What could he possibly do with just six wisps of black essence forces? Perhaps he could inflict serious damage on some people, but once he ran out of black essence force, he would surely be severely beaten up by the crowd of people who would definitely be flying into a rage out of humilitation. If he were lucky, he would only have a few bones broken; if he were unlucky, it was not impossible that he would be beaten to death amidst the chaos. He knew too well that bunch of wastrel playboys - once they got rash and impulsive, they would definitely not care about the consequences of their actions.
关于神秘掌门‘羿清’，一夜就端了郁家的事，更是名震青界。孤月也因为那几天出去谈生意的原因，被各门各派熟识，人人一谈起无敌派就会提到这个做生意比印家还厉害的化神尊者。就连九个参加大比的妹子们，也因为思羽得了冠军的关系，一跃成为年轻一辈修士中，最闪亮的新星。

The story of the mysterious sect master "Yi Qng" and how she defeated the Yu Family spread throughout the Upper Azure World, shaking everyone. The different families and sects were also familiar with Lonemoon, who had been vising them over the past few days to clinch deals. Each time people talked about the Invincible Sect, Lonemoon's name would come up as the businessman-cum-Soul Formation Supremacy who was much better at doing business than the Yin Family. Even the nine sisters became famous overnight after Si Yu won the competition amongst the sects. Everyone ssaw them as the rising stars of the younger generation of cultivators.
关键时刻，马飞终于醒悟过来，手一抖一把青色短剑从他袖中滑落下来，上面青光流转，明显是一把高级的神兵利器。

At this crucial juncture, Ma Fei finally came to his senses. A teal-colored short sword fell down from within his sleeve with a light jerk of his hand. Judging by its gyrating teal radiance, this was clearly a high-rank divine weapon.
关键是……
But the most important thing was…
兴许是觉得骗……吹……聊得差不多了。孤月在收到了高出十几倍的住宿费用后，终于开始切入正题了。
Perhaps it was tricking, lying or well, they talked enough. After receiving rental fee that was tenfolds its original value, Lonemoon finally went into the main topic.
其他堂主也纷纷声援。
The rest of the hall masters supported this in succession.
其余人也醒悟过来，跟着弯身行礼道：“参见武堂长老。”
Everyone awoke from the realization and followed up with a respectful bow, "Greetings Martial Court Elder."
其余人江逸不管，这江麒麟可是认出了他。以江麒麟的本事，他进了学院很快就会找来吧？那可是神武国第二世家的公子啊！姬听雨让他低调些，没想到还没进学院就已经得罪了一个大人物。

Jiang Yi did not care about the rest, but Jiang Qilin did recognize him. With Jiang Qilin's ability, is it even a question that he will come for me quickly after entering collage? He is the Young Master of number two clan in the Divine Martial Kingdom! Ji Tingyu reminded him to stay low-key, yet he never expected to offend an important figure before even entering collage.
其余四位堂主神情一紧，也退开了一步，纷纷在周身亮起了一圈金色的防御结界，奚秋一边结印还一边解释，“鬼王的声音，直接攻击元神，此声非同小可！”

The rest of the four hall masters' expressions tensed up and they stepped back. One after another, they lit up the golden defensive barrier surrounding them. Xi Qiu explained while he removed the seal, "The Ghost King's sound attack targets the primordial spirit directly. It is not to be belittled!"
其余的冥将也不敢多言，纷纷发出最强大的神通，督促手下的尸兵尸兽阴兵等全力开始进攻。

The other Netherworld generals did not dare utter another word. They pumped themselves up and ordered their subordinate zombie soldiers, zombie-beasts, and yin soldiers to begin attacking at full force.
其它两人也立马看了过去，脸色顿时就变了。
The other two immediately looked in Lonemoon's direction, their expressions changing at what they saw.
其它两人细一感应，也是一惊，“果然是魔修的阴气，难道有魔修趁机闯入？不知这次进来的到底是何人？”

The other two tried to sense it and were also shocked. "It is indeed the Yin Qi of a fiendish cultivator, could a fiendish cultivator have broken in here? Who exactly is the person that is coming in this time?"
其它妖王也纷纷站起来响应，就连四周待命各族各妖们，也纷纷现形的现形，亮爪的亮爪，激动的大喊起了报仇的口号，嫣然一副整军待发的样子。一时间各种妖吼狼嚎，响彻云霄，久久不息，直到……

The other Demon Monarchs stood up in support, and even the demons gathered in the area returned to their true forms. They bared their claws as they cried out for revenge. They were the very picture of an army that was prepared to march to war. All sorts of roarings from the demons swept through the area and reverberated through the clouds endlessly until…
其它弟子也纷纷围了上来。
The other disciples also gathered around Shen Ying.
其实从出发来悟剑峰开始，她就没打算再活着回去。剑修羿清先不说，孤月更是玄天宗的化神尊者，他们没理由放过她！只是……没机会再还沈萤人情了。

In fact, ever since she set off for Sword Comprehension Peak, she had no plans on returning alive. The sword cultivator, Yi Qing, had said that Lonemoon was a Soul Formation Supremacy of Blackheaven Sect. There was no reason for them to let her off! It was just that… she had no means to repay her debt to Shen Ying.
其实他也没想过会这么快，从那场顿悟开始，他就发现自己的修为一直在缓慢的上涨。之前白泽那朵玄灵花，也放在他这有一段时间，那种特殊的灵气，好似也对修为有益。他才在这几天终于达到了大圆满境界。

In fact, he had not thought that it would be so fast. Ever since his epiphany, he found that his cultivation had been slowly rising. Bai Ze's Black Spirit Blossom had been placed near him for a while and its special aura seemed to have been beneficial to his cultivation, resulting in him finally attaining the Perfected State.
其实在场的三家都知道，这郁家的目的，根本不是为了抓什么逃奴。只是无敌派突然出现，而且实力强悍，郁家跟其它世家一样动了心思而已。

Actually all three families present knew the motive of the Yu Family was not to capture some escaped slave. It was just that the sudden entrance of Invincible Sect whom had such formidable capabilities caused the families to devise some plans.
内视了一阵，江逸生怕元力丹的药力挥散过多，连忙不敢多看，让黑色元力融合绿色药力包裹整个丹田，然后收回心神，一心一意的运转江水决提炼元力。

Observing for a moment, Jiang Yi started feeling worried that the medical power of the essence force pill was overly disseminated. He anxiously decided to stop observing any further, and instead allow his black essence force to merge with the green medical power and envelope his entire dantian. Subsequently, he focused his mind, putting all his thoughts and attention towards circulating the Jiang Water Art to refine more essence force.
内视到丹田外被淡淡的绿色药力环绕，江逸收回思绪，运转一缕黑色元力出了丹田，通过经脉朝丹田之外的绿色药力流转而去。

Observing a faint green light revolving around his dantian, Jiang Yi cut off his stream of thoughts. He circulated a thread of black essence force out of his dantian and transferred it through his meridians out to the exterior of the dantian in the direction of the green medical power.
再三保证三月内绝对回来，江逸告别了荣管事，从江家南院快速出门，一走出江家大门他立即带上了斗篷，快步朝武殿内走去。

Jiang Yi bid Chief Rong farewell after repeated promises to return in three months' time. He swiftly exited the Jiang Clan from the north gates and wrapped himself up with a cloak the moment he was out the door, striding briskly towards the Martial Arts Hall
再加上三大世家家主从塔内逃出后，纷纷宣布与郁家决裂，并道出了塔内的真相。那根本不是什么升仙塔，而是专门吸食人肉体，修为，乃至元神的魔塔。若不是无敌派羿清尊者，拼死相救破塔而出，强行唤醒了塔中的众人。整个上青界的化神修士，怕都要折在这塔中。

After the remaining three arisoticratic family family masters escaped from the pagoda, they announced that they would cut ties with the Yu Family. They also told everybody the truth behind the pagoda. It was not an Immortal Ascension Pagoda - it was a fiendish pagoda that specialised in sucking the power, cultivaion and primodial spirit of all the cultivators. If it had not been for Invincible Sect's Supremacy Yi Qing, who fought to break the pagoda with all his might, all the Soul Formation cultivators in the Upper Azure World would still be trapped in the pagoda.
再想试，才注意到体内已经没剩有黑色元力了——辛辛苦苦修炼了两个时辰才积攒的六丝黑色元力，已经被他在半柱香的时间里挥霍完了。

He wanted to try again but realized that he no longer had any black essence force within his body. The six slivers of black essence force that he painstakingly took four hours to cultivate were gone in minutes.
再次摸了摸小奴的脑袋，江逸起身道：“行了，我先和荣管事去说一声，小奴，等我回来。”
With another stroke of Xiaonu's head, Jiang Yi got up and said, "All right, I'll go inform Chief Rong. Xiaonu, wait for my return."
再次看了一眼两半的海岛，现在还分开着的海水，和玄天宗那被劈成两半的浮峰……
Lonemoon looked once again at the two halves of the island, at the sea that was still parted, and at Blackheaven Sect's mountain peak that had been split in two.
再次过了小半个柱香时间，翊飞儿气鼓鼓的朝大门外走去，打开大门快速消失在走廊内。
After several minutes, Yi Fei-er petulantly headed towards the doors and disappeared swiftly down the hallway.
再看那朵玄灵花，顿时觉得四周灵气都猥锁了起来。
They glanced at the Black Spirit Blossom and suddenly began to feel the Spirit Qi around them go still.
再翻看了五六本书册之后，他终于找到一本炼丹术简录，翻看了几页找到了丹药回炉的方法。

After scanning through five or six manuals, he finally found a simplified manual on the alchemy-refining process. Flipping through a few pages in the book, he found the correct method for the elixir reheating process.
再说凭什么让他去啊？大敌当前，沈萤那个当掌门都在睡觉，他一个来讨债的却要来帮忙，这是什么道理。这个任务他拒绝接受！拒绝！说什么都得把人给叫起来。

Who was he to attempt to defend the sect by himself anyway? Shen Ying, the Sect Master, was sleeping while enemies attempted to invade her sect. He was here to take revenge, yet he was expected to defend her sect on her behalf? What kind of logic was that? He refused to take on this mission! Refused! He had to wake Shen Ying up no matter what.
再说身为上仙门的玄天宗，怎么可能不管这种事，只是未曾发觉而已。
As a sect with an exalted immortal, it was impossible for the Blackheaven Sect to ignore such matters; it was only because it had yet to discover those deeds.
冥皇冷冷道：“如今四皇大军远在天边，而且各怀鬼胎，百万天庭神兵神将也随着这场战争的继续，军心涣散，死的死，散的散。”

"The four imperial troops are now deployed in remote places. Besides, each of them has their own evil schemes. Millions of Heavenly Court troops will perish, scatter, or lose their morale because of this long war."
冥皇冷然训斥了一句，那红眸在四周将领身上一扫，看得他们浑身一颤，才冷幽幽的说道：“九天锁星阵不过是九阳老儿花了三千年研究，再花两千年才布置出来的新阵。成阵距今也就一千六百年。它再能吸纳，又能吸纳多少星辰能量转化为护阵法力？本座给你们十二个时辰，此刻天庭内外只剩下九阳老儿一个人，一天之内无视伤亡，不计数量，不惜代价，给本座攻破此阵！”

The Netherworld King then swept his cold, red-eyed eyes across the surrounding generals. Upon seeing them tremble, he uttered coldly, "The Empyreal Star Lock Array is just an array which took Fogey Nine-Yang three thousand years to research.
“He spent another two thousand years setting it up. Ever since it was successfully set up, it has only been 1600 years. How much energy can it absorb from the stars to turn them into an array formation forcefield? Now that Fogey Nine-Yang is the only one left inside the Heavenly Court, you will be given twenty-four hours to destroy this array formation regardless of the cost or number of casualties we suffer!"
冥皇手中的镰刀微微一动，但还是没有出手，因为他明白无名垂死一击的意念已经锁死了自己，倘若自己想要出手拦下那些碎片的话，无名的亡命攻击会让他付出足够惨痛的代价。

The sickle in the Netherworld King's hands jolted a little, but he chose not to attack. This was because he knew Wu Ming's dying intention had shackled him. If he took action to shield off the numerous shards, Wu Ming's final attack would make him pay a tragic price.
冥皇没有理会部下的狂热，只将目光凝视着下方这座宏伟的巨城，暗红的眸子内闪过一丝火热的亮意。
The Netherworld King ignored his fanatical subjects. Instead, his vision was fixed on the grand city in front, his dark red eyes burning bright.
冥皇没有看这冥将一眼，只是一声冷哼，那冥将的身子立即了飞出去，身上血肉甚至黑甲尽数化为飞灰。

Not batting an eye at the Netherworld general, the Netherworld King gave a cold snort. The Netherworld general immediately flew into the air as his flesh and blood, as well as his black armor, disintegrated into flying ash.
冥皇身边一名全身笼罩在华丽黑甲中的冥将发出一声无奈的叹声，随即朝冥皇拱手禀道：“陛下，这九天锁星阵平素吸收九天星辰散发出来的能量，沉淀在天庭中的每一处角落，其容纳力据说没有上限。只怕是在这些长年累月积攒下来的能量消耗殆尽前，我军很难攻入其中。”

A Netherworld warrior with ornate armor let out an exasperated sigh.
He turned to the Netherworld King next to him and said, "Your Majesty, this Empyreal Star Lock Array absorbs the energy from the Ninth Heaven Star, scattering it throughout every corner of the Heavenly Court. Its capacity is limitless. I am afraid our army is unable to penetrate the barrier before the energy which has accumulated for eons wears off."
冥皇那头灰色的长发无风自动，阴鸷的眸子内红光时明时暗，无不显露出他此刻内心再也压抑不住的的情绪。蓦然，从冥皇的身体内腾起无尽的杀气，随后他将手缓缓抬起，食指指向天庭。

The Netherworld King's long grey hair fluttered despite the lack of wind. Red light flickered in his lifeless eyes, unable to conceal the brimming emotions that were running through his heart. Suddenly, boundless killing intent arose from the Netherworld King's body. Following which, he slowly lifted his hands and pointed at the Heavenly Court with his index finger.
冥皇，不，现在应该称之为冥帝的存在，在没好气地留下一句话后，撕裂虚空，转身离开了天界。
The Netherworld King—no, he was now an existence worthy of the name Netherworld Emperor, delivered those words in a peeved manner. He then tore open the void and turned to leave the Heavenly Realm.
决赛采用的是两两对决，胜者进入下一轮，再以抽签的方式决定一人轮空，再决出前三名。孤月昨晚就已经跟进入决赛的四人说过了，进入十强的小目标已经达到，不必太过拼命，特别是金丹的两人。十强中其它门人可全都是金丹大满圆的世家弟子。

The finals were to be conducted in pairs. The winners would proceed to the next round and draw lots to decide who would be given a walkover. The top three would be selected from this process. Lonemoon had already briefed the four disciples who made it to the finals the night before. They had already achieved their mini goal: to make it to the top ten. He told them that there was no need to fight to their death, especially for those who were still at the Golden Core stage. After all, their competitors were all disciples from the aristocratic families who had already achieved the Perfected Golden Core stage.
况且还留了众人一命，除了一开始打了他一顿，还尽打脸外。说来聊聊，还真就聊了聊。
What's more, she had let all of them live — although she did hit their master in the face. She said she came to have a chat and that was really all she did.
况且这事明显就是轩辕家故意找茬，怎么可以怪到羿清一个人身上。他只是倒霉被那三人死前的影象捕捉到而已。

What's more, the Xuan Yuan Family was clearly stirring trouble. How could they blame everything on Yi Qing? He was just unlucky to have been captured by the three Elders' vision just before they had died.
冷静！冷静！
Calm down! Calm down!
净清殿内，阵法遍布，金色的阵法中间，正飘着一面黑色的幡旗，无风自动。大量的鬼气在上面涌动着，中心绘着一个残破的阵法，上面却没有一丝鬼气露出。

The array formation was spread throughout the Jing Qing Hall. In the middle of the golden array formation, a black flag fluttered in the windless air. A great mass of Ghost Qi was surging inside the flag. There was a broken formation in the center, but not a trace of Ghost Qi could be seen outside.
几人一起走进了阵法之中。
The few of them walked into the array formation,
几人几乎是用尽了全力，才终于制服了八个入魔的游仙。虽然羿清提议的方向，中途还是出了问题。孤月引走那些游仙一刻钟后。那些人似是察觉了什么问题一般，放弃了孤月转身又回去了。

They had almost exhausted all their energy before they finally managed to subdue the traveling immortals who were trapped in their trance. Despite following the plan Yi Qing had suggested, they had hit a snag along the way. Not long after Lonemoon had lured them away, the traveling immortals seemed to have discovered something amiss. They had abandoned their pursuit of Lonemoon and turned back.
几人出来一看才知道，不止是坑内，连着方圆七八里的地面都在开裂，裂痕处一条条刺目的白光直冲天际，整个大地瞬间突出一块，地动山摇，有什么巨大的物体，正从地下升上来，而且越来越高。半会终于脱离了地面，升上了半空。

As they emerged from the pit, they realised that the cracks went on for a three to four kilometre radius. All the cracks had the same blinding white line shining through. A great piece of the land suddenly shot upwards as the ground continued to shake vigorously. A huge object seemed to be rising from underground. It was growing taller and taller. Soon, it fully emerged from underground and stood halfway to the sky.
几人刚要走上法器，一晚上都在围着思羽妹子打转的印元飞，突然下意识的开口喊了一句，“思羽姑娘。”
The few of them were just about to walk to the Dharma artifact. Yin Yuanfei, who had been circling Sister Si Yu the entire night, suddenly exclaimed, "Miss Si Yu!"
几人点了点头，也不知是有意还是无意的瞅向旁边的沈萤，眼神那叫一个闪亮。孤月也下意识的转头看了过去。
A few of them nodded as they glanced over at Shen Ying and their eyes lit up. Lonemoon subconsciously turned to look over at her as well.
几人等了一会，见沈萤和萝卜半天没有挪动的意思，郁红不得不上前一步，试探的开口道，“仙师，仙师……掌门？”

Their little group waited for a while, but seeing that Shen Ying and radish did not seem like they were going to move, Yu Hong had no choice but to go ahead to sound her out. "Immortal Master, Immortal Master… Sect Master?"
几人走进去一看，此时室内已经倒了好几个丹药架，地上滚落了好些瓶瓶罐罐。而半空之中青亦正抓着一个瓶子，笑得分外张狂。

Their small group walked in. A few shelves in the room had already fallen over. A few bottles were rolling around the floor. Qing Yi, who was in mid-air, was holding onto a bottle and laughing maniacally.
凡人？
A mortal?
凡是受玄天宗庇护的城镇，宗门都会在镇内布下防护阵法，以防身带煞气的，妖，兽，魔修进入祸害凡人。所以不先突破这层防护，根本没法进入镇里。当初接到这个镇的求助，说镇内有妖做乱，所以他下意识的就认为，这个防护阵早就已经被破了，所以谁都没想到去检查，却没想到它居然还在。

It was standard procedure for Blackheaven Sect to set up a defensive array formation in every town under their protection to prevent demons, beasts, and fiendish cultivators from entering and harming the town's mortals. So without breaking through this layer of defense, they had no way of entering the town at all. When Lonemoon first received the message for help from this town saying that there was a demon creating havoc, he had assumed that the defensive array formation had already been broken, so no one had thought of checking it. Yet, here it was.
凡间的修士都是用灵气修练，无论什么剑术术法，都需要灵气支撑。他有仙气护体，灵气根本伤不到他分毫。但……体修是不用灵气，专靠拳头的啊！再加上刚刚他仙骨被踢断，用不了任何仙法，这会根本使不出任何法术，只能纯抗。

The cultivators in the mortal world all trained using the Spirit Qi. No matter what sword techniques they used, they needed Spirit Qi to sustain their training. He had Immortal Qi to proect his body, so Spirit Qi could not harm his body. But... body cultivators did not need Spirit Qi to train. They relied purely on their strength. What's more, his immortal bones had been broken and there was no immortal spell or technique he could use to defend himself against their attack.
凸(艹皿艹)
凸(艹皿艹)
出……出来了！
It... came out!
出乎江逸的意料之外，那荣管事很是大度的摆手道：“没事，这两天记得送过来就行，江逸你快去吧，省的柳长老等着。在炼丹房好好做事，千万记住别惹柳长老不高兴了！“

Beyond Jiang Yi's expectations, Chief Rong waved his hands with magnanimity and replied, "No problem. Just remember to send it over within the next two days. Jiang Yi, leave quickly and don't keep Elder Liu waiting. Do a good job at the alchemy lab, and remember to not make Elder Liu upset!"
出于掌门的吩咐，思羽揍得很认真，简直拳拳到肉。足足打了半个时辰，才气喘咻咻的停了手，学着沈萤的样子，一脚踩在那张猪头一样的脸上，扬手拍了拍旁边的人。

Si Yu followed her Sect Master's instructions very strictly. She punched him continuously for half an hourbefore she finally stopped and stomped her leg down on his face as Shen Ying had done earlier. She nudged the person next to her.
出门一趟好麻烦啊。
It's so troublesome to leave the house.
刀下一空，叭的一下落在地上。
The knife struck nothing but air and it fell onto the ground with a clang.
刘管事一张脸如死了亲爹般，等马飞伤势暂时压制了，立即拔腿就要往外跑，刚出门却听到一道冰冷到了极点的声音：“等等！”

Housekeeper Liu's expression was as grim as if his own father had expired. He waited until Ma Fei's injuries were under control before scrambling out the door. Yet just as he was stepping outside, an extremely cold voice was heard: "Wait!"
刘管事一直退了七八步才站稳身子，看到江逸一拳带着无可抵挡之威朝马飞脑袋砸去被吓坏了，元力疯狂运转朝江逸再次爆射而去，大吼起来：“江家小儿，你敢伤我家公子，今日你必死无疑。”

Housekeeper Liu was forced seven or eight steps back before he could steady himself. Upon seeing Jiang Yi's fist, which carried an irresistible strength, about to hit Ma Fei in the head, he was scared out of his wits. Circulating his essence force in a frenzy, Housekeeper Liu shot towards Jiang Yi with a roar, "Brat Jiang, you would certainly die here today if you dare harm my Young Master!"
刘管事却是知道江逸的厉害，那日他只是铸鼎境一重都把一名铸鼎境三重的护卫给伤了，虽然不知道江逸是怎么隐藏实力的，但他很谨慎的朝四周的护卫打了个眼色，身子朝马家公子靠近两步。

Housekeeper Liu however was aware of how strong Jiang Yi was. Jiang Yi, despite only having power level at first stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, was able to defeat a guard that day who was at the third stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. Although Housekeeper Liu did not know how Jiang Yi managed to conceal his true strength, he cautiously signaled with his eyes for the surrounding guards, while moving two steps closer to the Ma Family young master.
刘管事和几名护卫惊恐的大叫起来，却只能眼睁睁的看着那把青色短剑没入了马飞的小腹内，然后所有人宛如听到一个皮球破裂漏气的声音……

Housekeeper Liu and several guards cried out frantically, but they were unable to do anything except watch the teal-colored short sword being plunged into Ma Fei's stomach. It was then that everyone heard a hissing noise, as if air was leaking from a ball...
刘管事咬牙沉喝一声开始缓缓后退，其余护卫也脸色阴沉的不断退后，还好此刻姑娘们还在楼上，风月楼也没开张，否则一定会引起一片骚乱的。

Gritting his teeth, Housekeeper Liu issued the order and began moving back slowly. The other guards too shuffled backwards sullenly. It was fortunate that Fengyue Brothel had not yet opened for business and the ladies were still upstairs. Otherwise, it would have caused quite a commotion.
刘管事沉喝一声，双手结了一个古怪的手印，双掌外突兀凝聚出一个五角星模样的元力护罩，他双掌朝前方连续拍出，将他前方的空间全部笼罩进去。

Housekeeper Liu shouted in a booming voice. He formed a strange hand-seal with his hands, both palms facing outwards and producing a pentagram-shaped essence force shield. He repeatedly shoved his palms forward, enshrouding the space in front of him with the force shield.
刘管事沉声应道，心里却是松了一口气，这事既然马飞不想让家族知道，他们几人至少不会被家族重罚了。查江逸的资料？这虽然有些麻烦，但江家如此多下人，他们找人画出江逸和江小奴的画像，大把银子撒出去还是能打探到的。

Housekeeper Liu answered in the affirmative in a low voice, feeling relieved internally. Since Ma Fei preferred not to inform the family clan, that meant the lot of them would not be punished by the family clan. As for digging for information on Jiang Yi? Granted, it could be somewhat troublesome, but once they had the paintings of Jiang Yi and Jiang Xiaonu, and with so many servants in the Jiang Clan, they could still obtain the information if hey offered taels of silver pieces in exchange.
刘管事浑身瘫软下来，身子一晃险些摔倒在地，他万万没想到这江家少年竟然如此狠，马飞这丹田一被废，这辈子注定是个废物，而他和在场所有护卫下场也绝不会太美妙！

All the strength had left Housekeeper Liu; his body swayed and almost dropped to the floor. He absolutely failed to consider how this youth of the Jiang Clan could be so ruthless. With his dantian ruined, Ma Fei was doomed to be useless for the rest of his life, and the fate awaiting for the rest of them would in no way be good!
刘管事满眸的凶厉之光，盯着江逸爆吼起来：“江家小贼，立刻放了我家少爷，否则今日你必死无疑！”
Housekeeper Liu had a ferocious glint in his eyes. He roared at Jiang Yi, "Jiang Clan scoundrel, release my young master right now, or you would certainly die today!"
刘管事的身体已经距离江逸两尺距离了，旁边两边护卫也即将击中江逸，但此刻所有人立刻顿住身子，还快速的后退一步。这马飞在马家地位尊荣，马飞一死，他们全部人都要死，他们自然不敢赌。

Housekeeper Liu was just two-third of a meter away from Jiang Yi, while the guards from both sides were similarly about to strike Jiang Yi. At that moment however, all of them stopped their movements at once and even hastily took a step back. Considering Ma Fei's high standing in the Ma Family, all of them would be sentenced to death if Ma Fei were to die here. Naturally, they could not afford to take that risk.
刘管事立即屁颠屁颠的朝马家公子走去，附耳把那日的事情解释了一遍，最后还低声说道：“马飞少爷，那天我们的人也没怎么伤着，我想着是江家的人，我们这是做生意的就没大闹，也没上报家族……”

Housekeeper Liu went to the Ma Family young master promptly and eagerly, recounting the events occurred on that day in an undertone and ending his story with a deliberate remark: "Young Master Ma Fei, our men weren't hurt too badly that day, and since it was the Jiang Clan, we businessmen did not want to make a scene, so we did not report the incident to the family clan either... "
刘管事被江逸一喝更慌了，连忙从怀中取出江逸给他的金叶子丢了过去，江逸单手快速抓住收入怀中，这才挟持着马飞一步步朝大门外走去，在大门口才一脚将马飞踹了进去，拿着马飞的宝器短剑大步朝远处狂奔而去。

Jiang Yi's pronouncement made Housekeeper Liu even more frantic. He hurriedly took out from the chest pocket the gold leaf Jiang Yi gave to him and threw it over. Jiang Yi caught it with one hand and swiftly put it away in his own chest pocket, before moving towards the gates step by step with Ma Fei in tow. When he went out of the gates, he kicked Ma Fei back in and bolted far away with Ma Fei's Treasured Artifact, the short sword, still in his possession.
刘管事面色一僵，做生意的确讲究个信誉，他作为风月楼的管事，也算是有头有脸的人物，被传出去为难一个少年总是不好的。只是这位马飞少爷可是直系少爷，他父亲在马家权势极大，他也不敢冒然开口得罪，只能沉默。

Housekeeper Liu's expression turned rigid. Indeed, in doing businesses, credibility was of paramount importance. As the housekeeper of Fengyue Brothel, he was considered to be someone of reputable standing. It would do him no good if word got out that he had bullied a youth. However, Young Master Ma Fei was a direct bloodline descendant and his father held a great deal of power in the Ma Family, therefore making him someone Housekeeper Liu could not afford to offend. As it was, Housekeeper Liu could only remain silent.
刘管事面色一变，慌忙护着那公子朝后面退去，那两名护卫也立即退后。其余方向的护卫则爆射而来，甚至还有两名护卫取出一把黑色匕首，准备给江逸放血了。

Housekeeper Liu's facial expression changed; he hastily shielded his young master and moved him backwards. The two guards too retreated at once, while guards from the other directions swarmed forth. There were even two of them who took out a black dagger, ready to shed Jiang Yi's blood.
刘管事面色为难起来，摇头道：“公子，实在抱歉！小姐前天去了武殿修炼了。你要是有要紧的事，要不……我请示一下大总管？”

Housekeeper Liu's face betrayed a mixture of embarrassment and awkwardness.
"My deepest apologies, Young Master!" he said, shaking his head. "Young Mistress left for the Martial Arts Hall on the day before yesterday. If you have an urgent matter to discuss, perhaps... I can speak with the chief supervisor?"
刚一动封口，一道绿影瞬间就从袋里闪了出来。
Just as the seal on the bag was opened, something green suddenly emerged from it.
刚出门的羿清却一脸纠结的回来了。
Yi Qing, who had just went out, came back looking conflicted.
刚刚……发生了什么？
What... just happened?
刚刚他见到的那片黑暗是心魔劫，他是剑修又立志扫平天下邪祟，所以才看到那片黑暗，好在他及时醒悟才能破障而出醒过来，而地上这些人显然还未看破其中关节。

The darkness he was in earlier was part of the Mental Demon Tribulation. He was a sword cultivator who had sworn to defeat all the evil under the sky. That was why all he saw was darkness. He was fortunate to have realised and broken out of the darkness. The people on the ground were not so fortunate. They were still stuck in their Mental Demon Tribulations.
刚刚修炼了一个时辰，江逸却惊醒了过来，他是被一道轻微的脚步声惊醒的。
Jiang Yi practiced for around two hours when he was roused awake suddenly. He was awoken by the soft sound of footsteps.
刚刚朝楼上走去的马家少爷突然脚步一顿，目光如电般扫了过来，看到一名护卫拿着的一块令牌上有一个龙飞凤舞的“江”字，立即沉喝道：“等等！”

The Ma Family young master, who only a second ago was making his way up, paused his steps. His gaze swept over lightning-fast, and spotted a single character, written in exquisite calligraphy on the command token: "Jiang". "Halt!" He bellowed immediately.
刚刚的感动一定是幻觉！是幻觉！
That moment of gratitude must have been an illusion! It was an illusion!
刚刚自己说什么了？
What did I just say?
刚刚转身，他却被两个少年武者的谈话吸引了。
just as he was turning around to leave, his attention was attracted by the conversation between two young martial artists.
刚刚还极度暴躁的巨兽，似是见到了天敌一样，咽呜了一声，拼命的缩成一团，颤抖着直往后退，直到完全退下了这片岛屿，卷缩在了海面上，只露半个脑袋战战兢兢看着刚出现的人，一副想逃又不敢的样子。

The beast, which was extremely violent a moment ago, shrunk back into its shell as if it just met its natural enemy. Trembling, the beast retreated until it stepped off the island. The beast hid under the water and raised only half of its head above the surface, just so it could look at the person who just appeared. It looked like it could not decide whether to escape.
刚刚进来时，被羿清炒菜的样子惊到，没听清他们的对话，没想到这个没有一点灵气的女人，居然是他师父。剑仙原来是有师父的吗？剧情没说过啊！

When Lonemoon first came in, he had been so shocked by the sight of Yi Qing stir-frying food that he had missed what they were saying. He would never have thought that this woman without any Spirit Qi was actually Yi Qing's teacher. The Sword Cultivator has a master? This wasn't in the script!
刚刚那表情是嫌弃吧？绝对是嫌弃吧？！
Did he just give me a disgusted look? I'm sure he did!
刚刚？这怎么可能，明明没有看到其它人进来，他心下一沉，突然想到了什么。
Just now? How was that possible? He did not see other people coming in. His heart sank, suddenly thinking of something.
刚幡上那些水，不会是眼泪吧？鬼王的眼泪！！(⊙_⊙)
Could the water from the gonfalon be tears? The Ghost King's tears!! (⊙_⊙)
刚想搭把手，离她最近的一只兔妖，也不知道怎么了，突然手一抖，抱着的房梁叭的一下倒了下来。沈萤连忙伸手接住，才避免砸到另一只兔。

Just as she was going to lend them an extra pair of hands, the paws of a rabbit demon that was closest to her suddenly shook and the beam it was hugging onto fell to the ground with a loud thud. Shen Ying immediately caught it with her hands — just in time before it crashed down onto another rabbit.
刚才修炼时江逸储存了两缕黑色元力备用，此刻能支持一小会时间，正好试试和强者之间的差距。

Whilst cultivating power just now, Jiang Yi had been able to store two wisps of black essence force for future use. At the moment, he could potentially withstand attacks for a short amount of time, just enough distance and duration to test the use of the black essence force on a much-more powerful martial artist.
刚才江如鹰偷偷溜了他看在眼里，他最后一个动江如虎，就是为了等此人来！当着他的面断江如虎的腿，也是……为了激怒他！

When Jiang Ruying slipped out earlier, he had already noticed it and decided to save Jiang Ruhu for the last just for Jiang Rulong! It was to allow Jiang Rulong to witness him breaking the leg of Jiang Ruhu and to... Enrage him!
刚才江逸看到的是漫天拳影，此刻一扫却能轻松锁定两只真实的拳头，他脚步一滑，运转江家的迷幻步朝旁边退去。

What Jiang Yi had seen just now were the silhouettes of fists in the Vast Sky Fists technique; yet at the moment what he managed to easily lock his gaze on were two real fists. His feet slipped as he circulated the Jiang Clan Psychedelic Steps and retreated to the side.
刚才险些被江逸刺死马飞被吓到了，此刻醒悟过来立即满脸羞怒的大吼道，在一群下人面前被挟持，马飞心里别说有多暴怒了。

Having been scared senseless earlier by the fact that he was almost killed by Jiang Yi, Ma Fei had just recovered and immediately roared in equal measures of rage and embarrassment. Being held hostage in front of a bunch of servants - to say Ma Fei was inwardly fuming would be an understatement.
刚打算离开再说，沈萤这个久寻不着的人，却这么毫无征兆的出现在了他面前。
Just as they were about to leave, Shen Ying whom they had not managed to find, appeared out of nowhere in front of him.
刚要收回手，毛团不着痕迹的抬了抬头，再次贴到了她的手心。
The furball looked up at her and pressed its head into her palm once again, without hesitation.
刚要问，羿清已经追上来了。
Before he could ask, Yi Qing had caught up.
刚还以为是她受伤太重才探不到她的修为，没想到她真的是个没有丝毫灵气的凡人。玄天宗就算是婢女都是有修为的，她居然一丝灵气都无，看来必是天生就没有灵根。身在全是天之骄子的顶级宗门，却不能修练，也是个可怜人……

Assuming that it was her injuries that had prevented her from detecting Shen Ying's cultivation level, it never occurred to Qi Chengyu that Shen Ying was a mortal without the slightest Spirit Qi. Even a maid in Blackheaven Sect practiced cultivation, yet she did not have a hint of Spirit Qi. It seemed that she was born without any spirit roots. To be in the elite Blackheaven Sect, yet be unable to practice, she was also a pitiful person…
到底啥来着？
What was it?
到底系统所谓的大佬，是啥意思？
What exactly did the system mean by "big guy"?
到是刚刚还不为所动的羿清，突然像是想起了什么，一脸懊悔的表情。他居然忘了师父还没吃早饭，做为徒弟他太不称职了。

A thought suddenly struck Yi Qing, who had been unmoved by Xi Qiu's speech until that point. There was an contrite expression on his face. He had forgotten that master had not had breakfast yet. This reflected badly on his competency as a disciple.
到是印风有些气愤的看了上首的人一眼，“郁家主不应该给我们一个解释吗？我印家何处得罪了郁家，要将我儿绑到此处？”

Yin Feng angrily glared at Yu Hai Heng and said, "Family Master Yu, are you not going to explain what happened? How has my Yin Family offended your Yu Family, that you would put my son in such a situation?"
到是地上的草木灵，似是听懂了两人的话，突然开始着急的挥着叶子，“叽叽叽叽……”一萝卜的不情愿。
The vegetation spirit seemed to have understood their conversation. It nervously began to wave its leaves around. "Ji ji ji…" — it was so unwilling.
到是对方拍了拍落在身上的金剑碎沫，一脸不耐烦的眉了眉皱，“我再说一次，你最好配合一下，不然……”她眼神一眯，抓着他的手突然用力一甩，直接把人给扔了出去，“揍你哦！”

The woman patted the golden shards on the ground. Frowning in impatience, she said, "I'll say this again: You'd better co-operate or…" She stared him right in the eyes as she grabbed his hand and flung it with great force. His entire body went flying. "I'll hit you!"
到是戚橙雨突然捡起地上的剑，撑着剑柄挣扎着站起，摇摇晃晃朝这边走了过来，每走一步，脚下的绿地就被染成血色，好不容易走到距离她们五步远的位置，直直的跪了下来。

At that moment, Qi Chengyu suddenly picked up the sword on the ground as she struggled to stand up with the aid of the sword hilt. She stumbled over, each step dying the green ground a blood red. It took her great difficulty to arrive at a spot five footsteps away from them before she knelt down.
到是旁边的羿清听话的唤出了灵剑，伸出手，“师父，徒儿载你吧。”
Instead, it was Yi Qing at the side who heard and responded to her instructions. He summoned his spiritual sword, and stretched out his hand. "Master, do let me give you a lift."
