到是无敌派之名，再次名震上青界，而支身救了整个上青界的羿清，更是成了公认的第一剑修。

The Invincible Sect, on the other hand, rose to fame in the Upper Azure World. Yi Qing, who had sacrificed himself to save all of the Upper Azure World, similarly became recognised as the top Sword Cultivator.
到是易峰对旁边懒懒坐着的小姑娘有些好奇，这女子是谁，为何能让轩辕家如此礼遇？
It was Yi Feng who was curious about the young lady seated lazily beside him. Who was this lady? Why the special treatment from the Xuan Yuan Family?
到是某个萝卜挂件，十分不配合的动了动，发出一个熟悉的音节。
However, the uncooperative radish pendant twitched and let out a familiar sound.
到是羿清习惯性的退后她半步，带些骄傲的挺了挺腰杆，一本正经的介绍，“家师，沈萤。”
Yi Qing instinctively stood half a step behind her. He straightened his back a little haughtily, and pronounced in a grave tone, "My master, Shen Ying."
到是羿清，脸色变都没变，似乎早就已经猜到了这种结果。就是因为这个，他之前宁愿做一名散修，也不想加入宗门。明明这么多人，却也是最无情的地方。

Yet despite all this, Yi Qing's expression remained calm. He seemed to have expected this outcome. This was precisely the reason he chose to remain an itinerant cultivator and refused to join a sect. A place with so many people was ironically devoid of heart.
前两天他才打了江豹，此刻又打了江松，怕是江如虎知道后肯定会恨得牙直痒痒吧？
Two days ago, he had just beaten up Jiang Bao; at that moment, he just struck Jiang Song. Surely, should Jiang Ruhu find out, wouldn't he feel so much hatred that he would be itching to fight?
前后不到半刻钟的功夫，不得不说这是易峰完成得最快，最顺利，而且是最为简单的一次契约。结契的对象还是十三阶灵兽，以后有可能会化龙的蛟族。结的还是……主仆契约。

The entire process had taken Yi Feng less than ten minutes. This was the fastest, smoothest and simplest contract-formation process Yi Feng had been through. What was more amazing was that he had contracted with a thirteenth-level spirit beast which ahd the potential to turn into a dragon in future. And the contract was a... master-servant one.
前方的江如虎本想躲开，继续招呼人围攻，摸清楚江逸的真实实力再做打算，此刻却顿住身子哈哈大笑起来，眼中凶光暴涨，身上元力倾泻而出，两个拳头如铁锤般朝飞来的江逸砸去。

Jiang Ruhu, standing in the frontal direction of Jiang Yi's movement, had initially thought of avoiding the incoming attack while continuing to direct his cronies to attack from all sides, such that he could clearly grasp Jiang Yi's actual level of power before deciding on his next plan of action. At that moment however, he suddenly stopped his bodily movements and began to burst into loud laughter. With his eyes filled sharply with a strong ominous glint, the essence forces poured out in torrential waves from his body as his two fists smashed forward like metal hammers in the direction of the incoming Jiang Yi.
前院一道沉喝声，将江逸的思绪拉了回来，他一听声音暗道不妙，荣管事终于找上门来了。他身子一缩，立即躲进了后院的茅草堆中，大气不敢吐出。

a deep, loud voice rung from the front courtyard, rousing Jiang Yi from his thoughts.
Upon hearing the voice, he thought to himself that trouble had finally caught up to him. Chief Rong had come. Curling his body into a ball, he quickly hid in the pile of weeds in the backyard. He dared not breathe or release any air.
剑修修的是剑道，重在手中之利刃，心中之剑意。不依靠任何术法以及丹药，以修练已身为主。所以向来比同阶的修士要强一些。因此进阶比别的修士，要难上百倍不止。以至十分少见，没想到让他给撞上了，而且还是一个金丹期的剑修。

Sword cultivation was about the cultivation of Sword Dao; the focus was on the sharp sword in hand, heart and sword as one. Without relying on any spells or alchemy, this cultivation was focused on the cultivator himself. Hence, they were always more powerful than cultivators of the same level. Other cultivators thereby found it difficult to measure up to the sword cultivators of the same level. They were very rare to come across, so little did he expect to meet one, and one that was a Golden Core sword cultivator at that.
剑修虽然可以越阶挑战，但向来少见，而且对方还是化神剑修，一上界就挑战了四大世家之一的十几名化神修士，可见剑术修为厉害到了什么地步，怕是遇到游仙，也不一定有赢的把握，怎能不令人震惊。

Sword cultivators could challenge others regardless of their cultivation level, but it was rare to find a sword cultivator who would dare to travel up to the Upper Azure World and immediately take on ten Soul Formation cultivators from an aristocratic family. These two sword cultivators' sword techniques and cultivation levels must have been so advanced that even a Traveling Immortal could not have been confident of winning against them. This was indeed shocking.
剩下就是一些修仙门派，虽占据一方灵脉，门下弟子也有不少，但还不足以与世家争锋。奇怪的是，上青界很少有散修。由于世家的原因，上青界除去一些危险之地，或是阴气浓重的地界，很少有无主地盘。无论是出生在此界的人，还是下界上来的人，都会选择加入一方势力。

The rest of the sects were regular immortal cultivator sects. Although they occupied a part of the spirit veins and had many disciples under them, they were still no match for the aristocratic families. The strange thing was that there were very few itinerant cultivators in the Upper Azure World. The aristocratic families often claimed all the land where danger had been expelled from or that had dense Yin Qi. Seldom would one find land with no owner. Regardless of which realm one was born in—the Upper World or the Lower Realm—people sought to join a family or sect in the Upper Azure World.
剩下的两人这才御剑追了上去，隐隐还能看到前方那个快得几乎追不上，像是瞬移般的身影。

Only then did the other two men follow after her on their swords. They could barely catch up with the indistinct figure in the distance; she was moving so fast that that it seemed like she was teleporting.
力求声声震撼，传遍整个门派，特别是某处偏殿。
He strove to send these heartshaking voices through the entire sect, especially to that Palace Wing
化形的狸猫，看起来十多岁的样子，兴许是摔得疼了，可怜兮兮的抱大尾巴吹气，一双绿色的坚瞳泪眼花花的，仿佛下一秒就要哭出来。

The human manifestation of the civet cat looked like a teenager. Probably due to the pain from the fall, he hugged his tails pitifully and blew at them. His green eyes were brimming with tears, looking like he would burst out crying at any moment.
十二年前，当年仅三岁的江逸被大长老抱回江家，成为江家实力最强大的外门供奉，大长老的干孙子时，他的地位尊荣，是名正言顺的旁系少爷。

Twelve years prior, a three-year-old Jiang Yi was brought back to the family by the Grand Elder and consecrated as the Grand Elder’s god-grandson. It was then that Jiang Yi acquired his respectable standing—by being made a legitimate descendant of the Jiang Clan, despite not having the Jiang Clan’s blood flowing through his veins.
十二年前，当朦胧记忆中他的娘亲病逝时，他被大长老用右手抱到了这座天羽城，而当时大长老左手抱着的另一个小孩，就是小奴。他和小奴在天羽城除了江家的族人外，根本就不认识其他人，又是哪里冒出来的亲戚？

Jiang Yi probed the murky depths of his memory with a thoughtful expression. Roughly twelve years ago, after his mother died from an illness, Jiang Yi was carried to Skyplume City in the Grand Elder’s right arm. At the time, there was another kid carried in the Grand Elder’s left arm: Xiaonu. Xiaonu and Jiang Yi both did not know anyone else in Skyplume City besides the members of the Jiang Clan, so where on earth could she have magically found some relatives?
十几个弟子打探了一下午，日暮才回来，但表情却十分奇怪，似乎都带着点茫然？
About a dozen disciples came back in the evening after having gone scouting for a whole afternoon, all wearing a strange expression on their faces. Their expression seemed to be one of bewilderment?
十几息时间后，正当他莫名惊诧的四方扫视时，突然感觉左眼看到的物体一下子变得模糊了起来。再眨依然如此，视力已经回复了正常。这回墙角那只蜘蛛虽然还能看到，但怎么都看不清他腿上有没有毛了……

About half a minute later, after sweeping the surrounding with a baffled glance, he suddenly realized that his left eye viewed things in a blur. It was the same when he blinked. His vision had returned to normal—this time he could still see the spider on the wall but could not make out whether there were hairs on its legs…
十几息时间后，黑色元力消耗完，江逸只能停下运转江水决，调集一丝黑色元力继续增幅药力。如此周而复始，在十缕黑色元力消耗完毕后，他才停下了修炼。

Some twenty or thirty seconds later, the black essence force had be completely consumed. Jiang Yi had no choice but to stop circulating the Jiang Water Art technique, and instead assemble a wisp of black essence force to continue increasing the medical efficacy. In such an established cycle, only when he had consumed all ten wisps of black essence force, did he reach his "ending point" and thus stop his power cultivation.
十分钟过去了……
Ten minutes passed...
十强进了四个，而且有两个人还是金丹境界的决赛。最欣尉的莫过于孤月，这一年的辛苦没有白废啊，虽然修练的方向有点歪了，但结果还是喜人的。他顿时对门派又有了信心。

Four of their disciples had placed among the top ten while two of them had qualified for the finals for the Golden Core group. Lonemoon was the most satisfied of all of them. The past year of training had not gone to waste. Although their training direction had gone off track, the result was still pleasing. He suddenly had renewed faith in the sect.
十方天魔来是来了，而且来得还很快，然后……
And so they did, really quick, and then.
十枚灵神丹用了九枚，而他……也终于修炼到了铸鼎境二重！内视到丹田内多了一倍，颜色也更深了一分的蓝色元力，江逸恨不得仰天一声长啸，释放内心的快意。

Out of the ten Spirit Pills, he had consumed nine of them, and he... had also finally cultivated his power up to the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm! He used his inner vision to see that, within his dantian, he acquired twice the amount of blue essence force as before, with its colour being darker by a grade. Jiang Yi could not help but release a loud holler towards the sky, releasing the happiness in his heart.
千叶草木灵！
A Thousand Leaves Vegetation Spirit!
升仙丹的丹方在青界并不是什么秘密，只是因为它的练制需要的材料不是灵植，而是仙植！如今的三青界早已经找不到仙植，所以他一开始看准就是仙宫的储丹室。但千叶草木灵可以感应到世间所有的灵植仙草，兴许还真能找出他要的材料。

The Immortal Formation Pill's recipe was no secret in the Azure World. It was only rarely used because what it required was no ordinary spirit herb — what was required was an immortal herb! Since immortal herbs could not be found in the Azure World, the first thing Qing Yi thought of was the Pill Storage Repository in the Immortal Pavilion. He hadn't realised that the Thousand Leaves Vegetation Spirit could detect all the spirit and immortal herbs in the vicinity. The Thousand Leaves Vegetation Spirit could help him get exactly what he was looking for.
升仙塔的事后，郁家算是彻底的落败下去了。
After what happened with the Immortal Ascension Pagoda, the Yu Family was completely defeated.
半个小时后，他才一脸复杂的回来了，手上拿着几个瓶瓶罐罐，往沈萤身前的桌上一放，眉心打成了死结。
Half an hour later, he returned wearing a conflicted look. He held several bottles and urns in his hand as he placed it on a table in front of Shen Ying. His brows were crossed.
半个时辰之后便抵达了西山。
He reached the Western Hills in an hour.
半个时辰之后，江逸的身子被重重的拍飞出去，翊龙宇也累得气喘吁吁，江逸呲牙咧嘴的爬了起来，拱手道：“翊公子实力强大，在下甘拜下风。”

An hour later, Jiang Yi took a heavy hit as his body was tossed to the side. At this point, Jiang Longyu was already panting with exhaustion. Jiang Yi grimaced and climbed to his feet, cupping his hands in salutation, "Young Master Yi was indeed strong, yours truly humbly admit defeat."
半个月没好好吃饭，实在是有点想念啊！
I haven't eaten properly in half a month. I really miss his food!
半会……
A while later…
半会。
A while later…
半会发出熟悉响亮的一声：
After a while, a loud, familiar sound was heard:
半会后。
A moment later...
半会才僵硬转过头，眼睛顿时暴睁。
After a while, he turned around stiffly. His eyes suddenly widened in consternation.
半会才反应过来她是在问话。
After a while, Yu Haiheng finally realized that she was asking him a question.
半会，一红一绿两道身影就出现在门口。
After a moment, two figures, one red and one green, appeared at the entrance.
半会，一道低沉的声音才如风般飘了出来。
A moment later, a low voice drifted toward her.
半会，立马又转了回去。
After a moment, he turned back around.
半分钟后，齐唰唰的回头看向山壁上的某妖，突然觉得它的皮毛有点绿啊。
After half a minute, everyone turned back to look at the fox demon on the wall, and suddenly his fur seemed to look a tinge greenish.
半夜时分，等他提炼满了十缕黑色元力立即运转去丹田外，轻松的消融了十枚龙形封印上的红色符文。让他惊喜的是，随着符文不断的消失，他修炼江水决的速度再次增快，达到了原先的三倍。

At midnight, once he had refined ten full strands of black essence force, he immediately transferred them to the exterior of his dantian and smoothly removed ten runic characters off the dragon-shaped seal. What made him pleasantly surprised was that, as the characters continued to vanish, the speed which he refined essence force using the Jiang Water Art increased further, reaching speeds three times the original level.
半柱香时间后，他无奈的睁开眼睛，却很快满脸惊异起来。因为他发现这个世界还是那么的清晰，这都半柱香时间了，这黑色元力竟还没消耗完？

Two and a half minutes later, he helplessly opened his eyes. Yet his facial expression very quickly changed to one of amazement. This was because he realised that, seen through his eyes, the world around him was still so clear. It had already been two and a half minutes, yet how could it be that the black essence force had not been consumed fully?
华元城……在哪？
Where's... Huayuan City?
华元城外。
Huayuan City.
占了人家炼丹房弟子的位置，虽然并不是他有意的，江逸还是有些尴尬的饶头道：“柳长老不在，嗯……昨日你走了之后，我正想跟着离开，却被柳长老叫住了，让我以后留在这帮忙了。”

Taking over someone else's position as the assistant in the alchemy lab... even though it was not his intention to do so, he felt awkward.
"Elder Liu is not here," Jiang Yi replied. "Erm... yesterday, after you left, I was just thinking of leaving with you, but I was called back by Elder Liu, and he let me stay here to help him out in the future."
卧了个槽！
Holy shit!
卧槽。
Holy shit.
卧槽！
Holy shit!
卧槽！孤月瞬间明白了他们的目的，MD这轩辕家空手套白狼的手段，还真是一个使得比一个溜。
Holy shit! Lonemoon suddenly understood their motive. Damn it, this Xuan Yuan Family would risk anything to gain something; each one of them was slier than the last.
卧槽！居然忘了给门派取名字了！
Holy shit! We forgot to think of a name for our sect!
卧槽！还真有瞎妖！
Holy Shit! It's really the demon!
卧槽，不会吧，这么快？
Holy shit. It can't be, it's way too soon!
卧槽，你们还真傻啊！
Holy Shit, you are all really dumb!
卧槽，你还真的有啊！0ДQ
Holy shit, you really do have food! 0ДQ
卧槽，到底什么时候走的！
Bloody hell, when did she leave?!
卧槽，外挂丢了！他明明绑了随影术啊喂！
"Holy shit, we've lost the cheat!" He clearly remembered setting up the shadow imitation on her as well!
卧槽，终于想起追魂楼是啥地方了。那天晚上被错误情报误导，而砸掉的那个楼。
Holy shit, they finally remembered why Soul Chasing Tower sounded so familiar. It was the place they destroyed when they misunderstood who had kidnapped Yu Hong and Si Yu.
卧槽，该情只要是千叶草木灵，天生就该姓轩辕吗？
Holy shit, are they saying that any Thousand Leaves Vegetation Spirit automatically belongs to the Xuan Yuan Family?
卧槽，还真是！难怪那些见到妖的不是商家就是猎户。
Holy shit! No wonder those who saw the demon were either merchants or hunters.
卧槽，还真的打开了啊喂？
Holy shit, has she really opened it?
卧槽，还真的来了！
Holy shit, it's really here!
卧槽，这不就是沈萤劈海的那一剑吗？你丫还真的是学以致用啊！
Bloody hell, isn't this the sword move that Shen Ying used to part the sea? It seems like you are really applying what you have learned!
卧槽，这也可以！
Holy shit, this method actually works!
卧槽，这群没义气的。
Holy shit, they lacked loyalty.
卧槽，这都可以！还真是个傻叉啊喂！
Holy shit! I don't believe it! He really is an idiot!
印元飞一愣，脸红得更加彻底了，有些着急的抓了抓头，半会才似找到了一个合理的理由道，“那个……印家不是要买无敌派的灵植吗？我……我明天去送定金！”

Yin Yuanfei hesitated and flushed even redder. He nervously scratched his head, then thought of a reasonable excuse. "Well... isn't the Yin Family going to buy Invincible Sect's spirit herbs? I'll... I'll go down tomorrow to deliver the deposit!"
印元飞有些不舍的追了两步，“思羽姑娘！”
Yin Yuanfei ran after them and called out in a tone of longing, "Miss Si Yu!"
印元飞继续举高那块命牌道，“父亲入塔没多久，它就变成了这样，这分明是命在旦夕之兆。况且不止是他，家父为防万一，在入塔之时为其它两家的人也设了一块，交待我时刻注意变化。就在昨日晚上，所有人的命牌或直接碎裂，或变成这种貌样。就算塔内再凶险，也不可能同时这么多人都……”

Yin Yuanfei raised the life token up and said, "Shortly after my father entered the Immortal Ascension Pagoda, my token became like this. Clearly, his life is in danger. He's not alone. My father took precautions before he entered the pagoda and handed a similar Life Presenting Token to the other two uncles who followed him. He instructed me to look out for any changes on the token. Yesterday night, everybody's tokens either fell apart or became like this. No matter how dangerous the pagoda is, it can't be that everybody's token..."
印元飞脸色顿时一白，“你……你在我身上下了束魂咒！”说完，他直接张口喷出了一口血，刚刚有缓和的金丹，再次裂开晕了过去。

Yin Yuanfei face suddenly turned pale. "You ... You put a Soul Binding Spell on me!" He exclaimed, spitting out a mouthful of blood. His Golden Core which had shown signs of healing, cracked once again and he fainted.
印元飞舒了口气，正打算给对方最后一击，赢下这场比赛，却隐隐背后一凉，丰富的对战经验，另他下意识执剑往后一挡，哐当一声。他只觉得手间一重，刚还被困在雷光中的思羽突然出现在他身后。

Yin Yuanfei heaved a sigh of relief. But just as he was about to deal the final blow to his opponent to win the competition, he felt a slight chill on his back. Having a rich experience in battle, he subconsciously used his sword to defend his back and then, with a clashing sound, he felt a weight in his hand as Si Yu who had been trapped in the barrage of lightning suddenly appeared behind him.
印元飞顿时松了口气，召唤的雷光越来越密集。思羽皱了皱眉，虽然不甘心，但这一战她确实赢不了，直到用尽了最后一丝灵力，思羽周身的防御瞬间消散。满天的雷光，顿时打在了她的身上。

Yin Yuanfei heaved a sigh of relief and he further concentrated on summoning forth lightning bolts. Si Yu furrowed her brows at this. Although she felt indignant, she could not win this battle. She used up all her Spirit Qi and the protection around her body disappeared, and then the skyful of lightning struck her body.
印天城位于上青界以东，算是东边最大的一座仙城。沈萤一行花了一整天的功夫才在天黑之前赶到了城中。

Yin Tian Town was situated at the east of the Upper Azure World and it was considered the largest immortal town in that region. Shen Ying took an entire day's effort to rush to the town before nightfall.
印家不愧是上青界首富，安排的宴席就在印天城最大的酒家正丰楼。而且天一黑就派了弟子来请人，早早的清了场。

True to their reputation of being the richest family in the Upper Azure World, the Yin Family had arranged for the banquet to held in Zheng Feng Restaurant, the largest restaurant in Yin Skycity. Moreover, as soon as it had turned dark, they had sent their disciples to personally invite their guests after having cleared the restaurant of all its customers.
印家不愧是四大家族中最有钱的。自他们亮出参赛的令牌开始，就有人领着一行人到了专门供参赛者休息的独立院落，院子虽然比不上无敌派那么宽广，但供十几个人休息到是绰绰有余。而且每个门派之间都是独立分开的，据孤月打听到的结果，单是来参加门派大比的大小门派，就有上千家。可见印家的财大气粗。

It was no wonder the Yin Family was the richest amongst the four aristocratic families; from the moment they showed their participation token, there was already someone leading the line of people to the independent courtyards specifically catered for the participants. Although the courtyard was not as wide as Invincible Sect's, accommodating roughly a dozen people to rest was more than sufficient and every sect was separated. According to what Lonemoon had found out, just the number of sects, big and small, that had come to participate in the competition were already in the thousands. Evidently, the Yin Family was truly wealthy.
印风一急，直接冲了进去一把扶住两人，着急的查看了一遍自己儿子，才带些怒意的看向上首之人，“郁家主，你这是何意？”

Yin Feng rushed forward and pulled the two youngsters to their feet. He anxiously checked that his son was unharmed, then angrily turned to the man opposite from them. "Yu Family Family Master, what do you mean by this?"
印风却是一惊，羿清，孤月！这不是一年前闯入轩辕家的那两位剑修吗？他顿时明白为何轩辕禹对这几人这么热情了，原来如此！

Yin Feng was stunned. Yi Qing, Lonemoon! Weren't these the two sword cultivators that had broken into the Xuan Yuan Family's home a year ago? He suddenly understood why Xuan Yuanyu was treating these people so well!
印风只好起身送客，反悔已经来不及了，只能陪着笑脸一路将众人送到了门口。
Yin Feng had no choice but to send his guests off. There was no use regretting. He could only put on a smile and walk his guests to the front door.
印风本是想套套几人的话，弄清一下来历，外加打好关系。他虽然是修士，但也是半个商人。原本以为很容易就可以套出几人的来路。却不想遇到了孤月。半个现任奸商，遇到一个前任国民奸商，可想而知结果怎么样。

Yin Feng had originally intended to pry some information out of these people as well as build a good relationship with them. Although he was a cultivator, he was also half a merchant. He had thought it would be easy to find out about their background, but he hadn't counted on dealing with someone like Lonemoon. When an unscrupulous half-merchant met an unscrupulous former merchant citizen, the outcome of such a face-off was not hard to predict.
印风见他们突然停住，顺着两人的视线看了一眼，立马笑着解释道，“哦，这是为几个无赖修士立下的，前些年印家门下一个酒楼来报，有三个修士不单吃霸王餐还意欲逃跑，所以为了惩罚和警告才立了这牌子。牌上那人就是主谋之人。”

Noticing that they had halted suddenly, Yin Feng's eyes followed the direction of their gaze to the sign. With a laugh, he immediately explained, "Oh, this sign was put up especially for a few rogue cultivators. A few years ago, a restaurant under our Yin Family’s name reported that these three cultivators not only left without paying their bill but also tried to escape pursuit. So this sign was put up to serve as their punishment and warning. The person whose name is on the sign is the main culprit."
印风领着众人来到一片桃林中央，这才看到前方摆了很多桌椅，上面已经摆满一桌桌各色的食物，沈萤眼睛顿时就亮了。

Yin Feng led the group to the center of a peach forest. They saw that many tables and chairs had been set up at the spot in front of them. The tables were laden with a variety of food—Shen Ying's eyes lit up immediately at the sight.
Yin Feng: "…"
危险！
Danger!
危难关头，他脑海似乎也运转得特别快了，突然他灵机一动，好像……下午研究时，黑色元力运转到眼睛时，时间流转慢了一丝？

His mind seemed to move particularly quickly during such a greatly dangerous moment. An idea came to him suddenly. It seemed as though... during his research that afternoon, when some black essence force was transferred to his eyes, time had slowed down by a smidgen.
即便小江逸将那数十部秘笈，每一种系别的心法全都试验了一遍，耗时接近一年，却依旧没有出现奇迹——他提炼一个月元力积攒出来的成果，甚至比不上某些天才子弟修炼一天来得多！

The young Jiang Yi spent almost an entire year trying out every single technique of mental cultivation available in the stacks of secret tomes. Despite this, he did not experience any miracle at all. The amount of essence force collected over a month of cultivation remained less than what some genius disciples extracted in a single day.
却被羿清直接一把提了起来，“师父，您觉得晚上做萝卜羹怎么样？”
Yi Qing raised up his sword and turned to ask Shen Ying, "Master, what do you think about having radish for dinner tonight?"
却见那只兔子眼圈一红，哗啦一下就跪了下来，“上仙饶命，我不是故意的，对不起，对不起，对不起！”
Yet all the rabbit did was to well up in tears and dropped to its knees sobbing, "Exalted Immortal, please spare my life. I didn't mean it. Sorry, sorry, sorry!"
历练的第一天，妖抓了，事却还没有解决。
Although the demon was caught on the first day of the experiential training, the matter had yet to be resolved.
压下心底的吐槽，孤月快速结印，在羿清周身布下重重防御阵法。顿悟时间有长有短，而且看他周身这浓郁的灵气跟剑气，估计还是一次大的顿悟，也不知道要多久？顿悟时最忌被打断，这阵法是必须的，看来为保险起见，一会还要回去让掌门派些人来守着。

Suppressing his urge to complain, Lonemoon quickly conjured a seal, setting up a heavy defensive array formation around Yi Qing. Epiphanies could be long or short, and judging by his strong Spirit Qi and Sword Qi, it was probably a major epiphany. How long was it going to last? The worst thing to do during an epiphany was to interrupt it. This array formation was necessary, and to be on the safe side, he should get back to the sect and ask the sect leader to arrange for some men to guard over him.
原本他们还没有在意，直到旁边议论声越来越大，一路行来越来越多的目光聚集在九人身上，还伴着越来越不加掩饰的指指点点。

They had initially not been bothered by the attention they attracted until the chattering among the crowd grew louder and louder, and an increasing number of eyes were focused on the nine girls accompanied by more and more pointing fingers.
原本他们邀她一起下山的，但想着兴许还能穿回去，她就拒绝了，回到了这个茅屋，等着看啥时候能突然回去。这个茅草屋，虽然破旧得好像随时都可能倒掉，好在可以遮风癖雨，住了几天后，她宅废属性暴发，更不想动了。

At first they invited her to leave the mountain together, but holding the hope that she might transmigrate back with some sheer luck, she rejected their offer. She returned to the straw cottage hoping that it would happen sometime. Despite looking old and shabby like it could collapse any moment, this straw cottage managed to keep the wind and rain out. After staying there for a few days, the homebody in her erupted, and she lost all her desire to move.
原本他还有以为，兔妖们所说的，师父一人灭了九大妖王的事，其中定有别的原故。加上原本拜师，也并不是因为对方修为高而已，所以也一直没问师父修为到底什么境界。但没想到，师父竟然……竟然真的如此厉害！

He had thought that there must have been other explanations for what the rabbit demon had said, that the Master had destroyed the nine great demons by herself. Moreover, when he had sought apprenticeship under the master, her high cultivation had not been his main consideration, so he had never asked Master what level she was at. But he did not expect Master to be so… so amazing!
原本以为几人至少会兴奋一下，却发现他夸了半天，几人一点回应都没有，眼神只齐唰唰看着沈萤，仿佛期待着什么似的。那专注的样子，就连缺条筋的某人都感觉到了，她愣了一下，半会才转头从善如流的也夸了一句。

He had originally thought that the few of them would be excited. Only after he had spent a significant amount of time praising them did he realize that they were not showing any type of response. Their eyes were fixated on Shen Ying as if waiting for her to say something. Even Shen Ying, who was missing a part of her meridians, could tell that they were focused on her. She hesitated before turning around, and then smoothly praised them as well.
原本只有一百二十斤力气的江逸仓促运转江水决元力，竟然在融合了无名口诀修炼出来的那一丝黑色元力之后，一招便将江豹反推出去四五丈远？

when Jiang Yi hurriedly circulated the Jiang Water Art essence force which only had about 72 kilograms of force, it unexpectedly fused with a cloud of black essence force from the nameless formula. One blow was enough to sent Jiang Bao tumbling back fifty feet away.
原本喧闹的密林，已经安静得连虫鸣鸟啼都消失了个干净。
The rowdy forest had turned so silent that not even the sound of critters could be heard.
原本带着九个妹子来参加大比时，他事先就交待过，对战之时只用学到的剑法就好。一是因为她们确实精通剑术，二就是为了隐藏她们体修的身份。就算有人觉得她们身体比一般人要强壮，顶多以为是剑修而已。

Originally, he had instructed the nine girls in advance to only use sword techniques in battle when he brought them to compete. For one, it was because they were indeed proficient in sword techniques, and two, it was to hide the fact that they were Body Cultivators. Even if someone realized their bodies were stronger than the normal, they would still only think that they were Sword Cultivators.
原本想打算下山的沈萤：“……”
Shen Ying, who originally had the intention of leaving the mountain: "..."
原本晴朗的天空，也突然灰暗起来，天空风起云涌，云层闪电光闪耀，仿佛正在酝酿着什么。而身后的玄天宗众峰顶，突然亮起了光点凝结成阵，直接形成一个巨大的透明屏障，把整个门派笼罩其中。

The previously sunny sky suddenly turned dark. As a storm began to rage, glaring crackles of lightning could be seen among the clouds as if something was brewing. The mountain peaks of Blackheaven Sect behind them lit up and formed an array, turning into a huge invisible shield, enveloping the entire sect within it.
原本蹲着一个马步的江如鹰眼中寒光一闪，双腿一曲身子突兀朝前方跃去，右腿上黄色元力环绕带着赫赫风声如一把锋利斧头般，对着跪着的江逸后背狠狠劈下。

A glimmer of coldness flashed past Jiang Ruying's eyes. Originally squatting in a horse stance, both of his legs bent downwards as his body suddenly leaped forward. The yellow essence force revolving around his right leg produced a brilliant windy sound as the leg cut down ruthlessly onto a kneeling Jiang Yi's back like a sharp axe.
原本还在怒吼着的灵兽，声音渐小，越来越弱。就连那双巨大的赤红双眼，也开始缓缓合拢。阵法越压越低，眼看着背云兽就要完全闭上眼睛，阵法也降到了它的眼睛周围。

The beast, which had been roaring angrily, slowly became quieter and weaker. Its eyelids began to close over its red eyes. The array got closer and closer to the beast until the eyes of the beast closed completely. The array landed on its eyes.
原本这些人便是从小被当做炉鼎培养，学习的全是偏阴柔的术法。他对其它类型的修士也了解的不多，若她们根基还在，或许也教不了太多。不如趁这个机会转为剑修到是正好，剑修与法术不同，凭的是技巧与对剑意的领悟。所以即使她们根基已损，或许能在剑修路上走得更远也不一定。

Originally, those disciples were cultivated as human cauldrons from young and so all they had learned were the more gentle types of sorcery. He was also not familiar with the other types of cultivators which was why if their foundations had still been intact, perhaps he could not have taught much. But why not make use of this opportunity to switch to become Sword Cultivators? Sword cultivation and sorcery were different as sword cultivation relied on technique and the understanding of Sword Intent. So while their foundations were damaged, perhaps they could walk further on the path of Sword Cultivators.
原来之所以布血祭大阵，是为了以阵中可以逆转天地的血煞之气，治好他的狐崽子。却中途发现了更好的东西：狸猫的紫霞玄芝，所以才废尽心机的抢过来。

The reason the blood fox had set up the Blood Sacrifice Array was to reverse the baneful Qi of heaven and earth so that he could cure his fox cub. But along the way he had found something even better — the Splendor Lingzhi of the civet cat — so he had devised all ways and means to steal it from the civet cat.
原来只要捏碎就可以了吗？那他们易家这么多年的努力，到底都在干什么啊？
So all they had to do was crush the flower? Has the Yi Family been working so hard for nothing all these years?
原来她们刚刚站的地方，就是这只龟的背上。
She had been standing on the turtle's shell!
原来如此，所以那些妖气才只徘徊在几公里之外吗？
So that explained why the demonic aura could only linger a few kilometers away from the mountain.
原来真的有魔界之门，不是在曲双城某一处内，而是整个曲双城本身就是界门。
So there really is the door of Demon Realm. Just that the door is not inside a part of the city, but the entire city itself is the door!
原来蔬菜这么重要，“只要萝卜种得多的地就行了吗？”
So that’s why vegetables are important. "Any place where radishes grow would be acceptable?"
原来这一个多月，他们都只在那练丹炉中打转了。
So it turned out that for more than a month, they had all been running circles inside that elixir-refining cauldron.
原来，这就是传送阵啊！沈萤顿时有了些穿越的实感。
So this is the transportation array! Shen Ying felt that her transmigration had become more surreal.
厨子！
Chef!
厨子，你再不出关，我就要失去味觉了。
Chef, if you don't come out of seclusion soon, I'm going to lose my sense of taste.
去你妹的交情！
So much for good relationship!
又一个袋子砸在了桌上。
Another bag landed on the table with a thud.
双方都拿出了全力，胜败在此一击。
The two had truly gone all out — this moment would decide the winner and loser.
反应过来的万妖，同时朝着女子扑了过去。
As soon as they snapped to their senses, the demons simultaneously pounced at the woman.
反正反应过来时，他已经在厨房了！
In any case, by the time he had reacted, he was already in the kitchen!
反而玄天宗的众人瞬间炸开了锅，纷纷眼带不善的转头看向羿清，特别是一些不明真相的弟子们，质疑的声音不断传过来。

On the other hand, everybody in the Blackheaven Sect seemed to burst with anger. All of them turned to face Yi Qing with hostile expressions, especially the disciples who did not yet understand the truth. Voices of doubt sounded from all around.
发财大计眼看泡汤了，肚子又饿得贴后背，江逸内心沮丧了到了极点。
Seeing the grand scheme to get rich go down the drain, while at the same time feeling so ravenous that he could eat a horse, the frustration in his heart reached close to breaking point.
另一个身影快速闪过，拉起地上的人飞了起来，躲过那一波攻击。正是另一个上青界来的修士。
A shadow flashed past, picking up the person on the ground and flew into the air, avoiding the next wave of attack. That shadow was the other cultivator from the Upper Azure World.
只余比赛场内，那一声声嘭……嘭……嘭……的拳声。
As for the competition stage, there was only the sounds of punches—Bam… Bam… Bam…—echoing.
只可惜院门口有个大煞风景的华袍中年人正负着手，背对大门而立。当他听到江逸的脚步声时也不回头，反而重重的冷哼一声。

Unfortunately, Jiang Yi’s spirits were dampened by a middle-aged man in Chinese robes standing at the doorway to the courtyard, his back facing the door and arms folded. Upon hearing Jiang Yi’s footsteps coming from behind him, not only did the man refuse to turn around, he released a cold snort.
只听得哗啦一声，海面的巨浪顿时遮住了半边天空。层层叠叠的水族灵兽铺天盖地般的，朝着两人扑了过来。
Boom! A gigantic surf rolled up from the sea until it covered half the sky. Waves upon waves of marine race spirit beasts charged towards the two of them.
只听见叮铃铃一声，游仙手中的剑寸寸折断，直接全数碎在了她的手心里，连着剑柄一快。
All they heard was a clinging and the Traveling Immortal's sword began to fall apart. It broke into pieces within the palm of her hand, leaving behind its hilt.
只听见哐当一声，那个阵法顿时一暗，空中突然往里凹进去了一块，哗啦一声打开了一个四四方方，像是柜门一样的缺口，清新浓郁的仙气，顿时扑面而来。

Bang! The array immediately darkened. The surrounding air suddenly seemed to collapse inwards. Following a clanging sound, a square, door-like gap appeared, and the scent of a rich and refreshing Immortal Qi wafted towards them.
只听见啪的一声，怪兽的头像个铁球似的轰隆一下栽进了土里，砸出一个更大的坑，巨大的撞击连着地面都跟着颤了颤，巨兽的半个身子瞬间入了土，拔都拔不出来那种。

There was a loud slap. The beast's head was driven into the soil with the momentum of a metal ball, and the huge impact created an even bigger pit. Half of the beast's body had disappeared into the soil along with his head. It didn't seem like it could get out easily.
只听见，嗞啦啦的一声裂响，只见那个原本只有一指宽的裂缝，瞬间像被撕破的纸一样，拉开了个两三尺宽的口子。
They heard a series of loud cracking sounds. It looked as effortless as tearing a piece of paper. In place of the small crack was now an opening, two- to three-feet wide.
只是……
However…
只是不等他迟疑，门口的一名黑甲护卫立即抓住他的手臂，热情的带着他朝里面走去，一边走还一边宽慰道：“别担心，武殿是绝对不允许打死人的，就算你陪练时不小心受伤了，武殿内也会有疗伤药奉上……”

However, not allowing him to hesitate any further, one of the guards wearing black armor at the door immediately grabbed his arm and enthusiastically brought him into the interior.
As they walked, the guard consoled him by saying, "Don't worry; the Martial Arts Hall would never allow anyone to beat others to death. Even if you accidentally get injured during sparring practice, the Martial Arts Hall will offer some medicine for your wound recovery..."
只是他没想到，还没等到郁家上门，到是等来了一个意想不到的人。
He didn't think that an unexpected visitor would turn up before the Yu Family did.
只是他现在伤成这样……还能做饭吗？
Just that in his condition... Could he still cook?
只是半个时辰之后，他的修炼又被打断了，江家大院内响起一阵沉闷的钟声，竟是家族大人物去世才会响起的丧钟。

It was only after an hour that his practices were interrupted once again. A low, loud bell-ring came from within the central courtyard. It was the ringing sound for sad events, released only when important persons in the family clan passed away.
只是它估计没有算到，来这的还有元婴，甚至是化神修士，所以才被发现了踪迹。
It was just that the demon had not counted on the arrival of a Nascent Soul and even a Soul Formation cultivator; that was why they had managed to uncover its tracks.
只是对方既然找上门来了，他也不能不打，好在随着他境界的提升，黑色元力再次被凝练了，颜色也变浅了一些。虽然上限还是十缕，但每一缕能让视力增强时间又变长了，此刻都能达到一炷香时间了，他对战起来也轻松无比。

Now that someone came to him, Jiang Yi did not have it in him to refuse. Fortunately, as he elevated through the stages in the Cast Tripod Realm, the black essence force became more condensed as well. Its color turned a shade lighter. Even though he could still cultivate ten wisps at most, the duration that each wisp could strengthen the vision became longer, reaching as long as five minutes. Thanks to this, he could fend for himself in a fight without breaking into a sweat.
只是比起普通的修士，甚至是剑修来说，她们更加艰苦百倍。孤月瞅了瞅眼前一水娇滴滴的妹子们有些犹豫。
It was just that they would have a much harder time compared to normal cultivators, even other Sword Cultivators. Lonemoon glanced at the delicate-looking girls with some hesitation.
只是片刻，江逸的身子再次一震，眼睛猛然睁开，这次他没有流泪而是站起了身子，仰天一声长啸，长啸声洪亮激昂，里面都是快意和兴奋！

It was only seconds before Jiang Yi's body shuddered. Abruptly opening his eyes, he did not shed more tears, but rather stood up and whistled loudly towards the sky. The long whistle was loud, clear, and impassioned. It was full of elation and excitement!
只是短短几个时辰不见，郁红原本红艳亮丽的衣衫，此时已经糊了半身暗色干涸的血渍，身上手上脸上全是一道道深可见骨的伤口，原本精致的发髻更是乱成一团，狼狈非常。

For the few hours that she had been gone, Yu Hong's original bright and beautiful clothing had been stained in dark red blood, her body and face had wounds so deep that the bones could be seen. The previously intricate hair style had been totally messed up, looking extremely miserable.
只是等他调集一缕黑色元力去伤口附近准备和药力融合时，却发现经过三个多时辰后，那药力已经全部消耗掉了，这黄参丹不愧是最低级的丹药，药力弱得可怜……

It was just that when he had collated a strand of black essence force and moved it near the wound area and prepared to merge with the medicinal power, he discovered that, when more than six hours had passed, the medical efficacy had been completely consumed. This Yellow Ginseng Elixir had proven itself to be the lowest-grade elixir with a pitifully weak medical efficacy...
只是这一切都只是猜测，无论是各仙门还是四大家族，都无人出来解答这个疑惑。
These were all wild guesses, however. Nobody from the immortal sects or the four aristocratic families were able to solve this mystery.
只是，她刚刚追出来，就看到江逸的身影已经消失前数十丈之外，拐进一条弯道内消失不见了。
However, just moments after chasing after him, she saw Jiang Yi disappear tens of feet away around the corner.
只有他才明白柳长老为何猝死，这柳长老是个典型的偏执狂，炼丹狂人！肯定是因为探查不出那枚地阶丹药内莫名多出来的成分，这几天没日没夜的研究，走火入魔而死……

Only he knew why Elder Liu had suddenly died. This Elder Liu was the textbook example for a paranoiac and a person crazy for refining elixirs.
It was definitely the case that as he could not identify the additional ingredients mysteriously included in that earth-grade elixir pill, he had spent several days researching non-stop without any rest and, as a result, died from over-exertion...
只有轩辕禹一脸懵逼，什么情况？怎么就突然集体改名字了？大仙改的还是自己徒弟的名字？难道她对今天的宴席有什么不满，特意不告知印家真名？

Xuan Yuanyu was the only one who looked bewildered. What was happening? Why did they suddenly change their names collectively? The Great Immortal even changed her name to her disciple's? Was she dissatisfied with today's banquet and thus deliberately withheld her real name from the Yin Family?
只见一只六阶妖经过……
A sixth-stage demon went past them, saying…
只见一直低着头打呼的某人，已经抬头瞪向前方那个巨大的鬼影，正一字一句中气十足的大声道，“闭、嘴！”
The person who had been snoring, her head bowed, now looked up, glaring at the huge ghost in front of her. "Shut. Your. Mouth," she boomed.
只见几天都没动一下的幡，突然在沈萤手里一抖一抖的摆动起来，仿佛突然被强风吹得风中凌乱一般。
The gonfalon that had not budged for the past few days suddenly trembled and started to sway in Shen Ying's hands, as if flapping wildly from being blown by a strong wind.
只见大街小巷，半数的店门口高高挂起同样一块木牌，上面一行烫金的大字亮瞎人眼：
At every street and alley, the shops had the same wooden signboard hanging beside their doors. The words on the wooden board were painted in gold and they were extremely eye-catching:
只见她一字一句的道，“大半夜的……吵什么吵？！”
Spitting out her words one at a time, Shen Ying asked, "What's with this commotion... in the middle of the night?!"
只见整个玄天宗已经被启动的护山大阵包围，而在阵外不远的空中，停着一朵巨大的莲花，莲花之上，上百个陌生人的修士站在上面，人人都穿着一身绿白相隔的长衫，个个一脸不善的看着下方。

The entire Blackheaven Sect was now being protected by the Protective Mountain Array. Not far from the array, a huge lotus flower was parked in the air. Atop the lotus flower stood hundreds of unknown cultivators. Each of them were donned in green and white checkered robes, all of them looking down with hostility.
只见林中，一跳一跳的蹦来一个巨大的白色身影，长耳红唇三瓣嘴。居然是一只兔妖，而它那周身浓郁得化不开的妖气，至少有八阶，不！兴许更高！妖气浓郁到这种地步……这是一只妖王！

A huge, white figure with long ears, red lips and rabbit’s mouth came hopping out from the forest. It was a rabbit demon, its whole body exuding an almost palpable demonic aura. At least level eight, no, perhaps even higher! A demonic aura that had reached such an unbelievable level… this was a Demon Monarch!
只见萝卜身上的莹光越来越亮，不到一会已经包裹住了它的小身子，白胖的身子缓缓裂开了一条横线，头顶的叶子突然开始伸长，蔓过白胖的身子，它卷起那株枯叶放了下来。叶间几番搅动，把整植枯死的草木灵整齐的叠成了方块状，凑近了那条横线，然后……

The radish's body glowed brighter and brighter; soon enough, the glow had already completely enveloped the radish. It’s fat body slowly cracked open, and the leaves on its head suddenly grew longer, growing beyond its body. It then rolled up the withered plant and placed it down. After some stirring, the leaves folded the withered vegetation spirit neatly into a square, brought it near to the line, and…
只见那团黑气落地就直接朝着笼中的鸡扑了过去，院中顿时响起了几声鸡呜，两息之后鸡不见了，笼里一地鸡毛间似乎多了一团黄色的东西。

The cloud of black Qi flew directly towards the chickens in the cage. The court yard immediately resounded with the clucking of chickens. Within moments, the chickens disappeared. A stack of golden objects could be seen among the chicken feathers in the cage.
只见那布料上写道：
That was when he noticed the words written on the cloth:
只见那牌上用烫金的大字写着：沈萤与狗，不得入内！
Written on the sign in gold lettering were the words: Shen Ying and Dogs Denied Entry!
只觉得脑海里顿时叮的一声响。
Suddenly a bell rang in her head.
只闻得嘭的一块巨响，振祥整个人直接被打进了地里，挖都挖不出来的那种。
All that was heard was a loud crash and Zhen Xiang's entire person was directly beaten into the ground in such a manner that it would not be possible to even dig him out again.
叭叽一下，巨兽一条腿就被啪了回去，瞬间失了平衡，轰隆一声就倒了下去。
With a loud clap, Shen Ying's palm landed on the great beast's leg. The beast lost its balance and fell to the ground with a loud crash.
可一会他就发现，还真会！
But very quickly, he came to a realization that they indeed would be willing!
可不到一会他就发现，这些人跟他之前的情况不同，那一双双呆滞的眼里，别说是意识，就连元神好似也……

It did not take long for Lonemoon to realise that these people's situations were different from his before. Their blank looks revealed that they were not merely missing their consciousness - even their primordial spirits were...
可为什么是现在，这个时候！
But why now, at this time!
可她修为毕竟低于对方，这样抵御也只是一时，时间越久消耗的灵力就越大，不到半柱香的时间，她的灵力已经不继，偶有雷光时不时突破剑阵进去，打在她的身上，剑阵已然有溃散的趋势。

However, due to her cultivation level being lower than her opponent, this kind of defense could only last a while. More and more of her Spirit Qi would be consumed the longer this continued. Already, her Spirit Qi could not take the burden as evident from some of the lightning bolts managing to break into the sword array and striking her body. This was a sign that the sword array was about to collapse.
可如果自己不是在做梦的话……
But if it wasn’t a dream…
可当她真的乖乖束手就擒时。他却突然觉得这事有些扎手起来，他竟……有些下不去手！
Now, with Qi Chengyu submitting to him obediently, he suddenly found the matter troubling. He… was actually unable to do the deed!
可惜……
Unfortunately...
可惜……最近两年他越来越不受江家待见，不仅月例一扣再扣，就连丹药也变成最低级的人阶下品“元力丹”和“黄参丹”，数量还都变成了一枚。

Unfortunately, as he had been increasingly disfavoured by the Jiang Clan over the past two years, not only had his monthly salary been cut again time and time again, even the elixirs had been replaced with the lowest of grades—the human-grade inferior-grade "essence force elixir" and "yellow ginseng elixir". Worse still, the quantity had even been reduced to just one pill.
可惜他们挑错了成名对象，被下面子的可是四大世家之一的——轩辕家！
It was a pity that they picked the wrong family to fight with. The family whose reputation was on the line was one of the four aristocratic families after all — the Xuan Yuan Family!
可惜厨子不在身边，她想了想，决定还是放弃，先找到厨子和牛爸爸再说。于是转身随便找了个方向打算找人。

It's a pity that chef isn't beside me, she thought. I'd better find chef and Father Niu first. She gave up the thought of eating the beast and turned around, thinking of which direction she should head in to begin her search for the way back.
可惜还是晚了，两人根本来不及回来，思羽身体经受过金丹雷劫到是没什么，拳头直接一扫，就打落了射向她的剑雨。郁红就没那么轻松了，一道道灵剑瞬间在她身上划出无数伤口，血流如柱。

Unfortunately , it was too late. The two girls could not run back to the array in time. Si Yu had undergone the Golden Core Lightning Tribulation, so this rain of swords were nothing to her. With a sweep of her fist, she shielded body from the swords. Yu Hong, on the other hand, did not have it so easy. The spirit swords cut her body one after another. Blood began to flow out of the wounds.
可惜除了事后骂两句娘，并在心里默默增加一次秋后算账的誓言外，他又能如何呢……
Unfortunately, besides cursing them under his breath, and once again vowing to take revenge in his mind, what else could he do?
可惜！
Too bad!
可是他没有想到，还没有等到三宗六派的回应，却迎来了几个意外来客。
However, he did not expect surprise visitors even before the Six Schools Three Sects responded.
可是已经来不及了，对方已经完全凝结成了实体，下一刻一声鬼叫破空而来，那声音尖税刺耳，分不清是男是女，明明只有一声，却仿佛万鬼齐呜，直接在脑海中炸开一样。四周更是带起一阵阴风，扫荡方圆方里，连着地面都是一阵晃动。

But it was too late, the apparition had completely condensed into a material form. The next moment, a sharp, ghostly scream pierced the air. They were unable to make out its gender. Although there was clearly only one sound, it was like the combined wail from a cacophony of ghosts. Their brains felt like exploding. Gusts of Yin winds whipped up the square, and even the ground was shaking.
可是接管这份工作才几天的江逸并不知道其中内幕，遇到时便忍不住劝了一句，没想到竟然被对方几人给狠狠围殴，一直昏迷到现在才苏醒过来。

However, Jiang Yi, inexperienced as he was, knew nothing of such clandestine “management practices”. As such, he could not help but berate them for their actions. Unexpectedly, the group responded by joining forces and thrashing him. They had left him knocked out cold—until now, that was.
可能是因为印家和轩辕家的家主都来了，三人到是没有遇到什么阻碍，一路走到了前厅。
Perhaps because the Family Masters of the Yin Family and Xuan Yuan Family were both present, the three of them entered without any obstacle. They walked straight into the front room.
可虽然风刃已经消失，但是四周仍是一片昏暗，就连着天空也开始乌云密布，海面开始翻滚起来。白泽从岛中退了出来，再次出现在不远处的天际。

Although the wind blades were gone, there was still a patch of darkness covering the island. Even the sky above them began to fill with dark clouds and the waves in the sea began to grow bigger. Bai Ze retreated out of the island and appeared in the sky not far away from them.
可谁知道这一宅，就宅了近四个月。回到是没回去，老乡给的红薯却早早的吃完了，她没办法下，只能出去找吃的。

Who would have known that once she started to shut herself inside the cottage, it would last four months. Since she could not return and had long finished the sweet potatoes that were given to her, she had no choice but to go out and search for food.
可还来不及心喜，转头却看到每天按时按点醒来做饭，照样练化完了异火，还趁着他入定的这段时间，打算在周围给沈萤盖个房子的羿清时，一口老血涌了上来。

He had no time to celebrate. He turned around to look at Yi Qing, who had also managed to cleanse the Deviant Fire. Yi Qing woke up early every day to fix their meals and even planned to build a house for Shen Ying while they were here. Lonemoon wanted to vomit blood just thinking about it.
可重广楼那里他们已经查看了很多遍，与其它有异样的地方相反，那里反而是薄家仙气最盛的地方。
However, they had checked Zhong Guang building repeatedly. Contrary to the rest of the suspicious places, the building is the place with the most amount of Pu Family's immortal Qi.
叽叽是什么鬼？沈萤抖抖腿，把它的叶子抖了下去，“去去去，好好的蹲你的萝卜坑去。”她又不喜欢萝卜。
What does ji ji even mean? Shen Ying shook her leg to get rid of its leaves. "Run along and dig your little radish pit." She didn't even like radish.
吃一堑，长一智！
One became wiser after learning from one’s past mistakes!
吃完，还特意打了个饱嗝。
After eating, she had even purposely let out a burp.
吃瓜群众羿清：“师父，你觉得他会丢了几成追魂楼？”
As a confused audience, Yi Qing said, "Master, how many percent of the Soul Chasing Tower will he lose?"
吃饱了的沈萤却已经转头看向满沙滩半截的海鲜了，一边看还一边叹声道，“扔这里好浪费啊，园长，你有那种可以装很多东西，还能保鲜的袋子吗？”

Shen Ying was full. She turned and scanned the seafood on the shore, then exclaimed, "It's such a waste to leave all of this here. Director, do you have those bags that can store many things and keep food fresh?"
各族首次抛开恩怨同时出现，虎兔狐蛇……各种各样的妖类都到齐了。一时间整个森林都是各种妖类或大或小或娇柔或妖媚的声音。上首更是坐着十位妖王，这十位妖界的顶尖强者，此时眉宇间却出现了同样沉重的神情。

The many races had made an unprecedented attempt to come together after casting aside their differences, be they tigers, rabbits, foxes, or snakes… All kinds of demons were present. At this moment, the entire forest was filled with voices from the various demon races, some loud, some soft, others even charming. Seated right at the top were ten Demon Monarchs. These ten experts stood atop the Demon Realm, but they were wearing heavy frowns between their brows.
同一时间！
At the same time!
同一时间，那座雄奇天庭建筑上雕刻的千万花草虫鱼、飞禽走兽们竟然也仿若活了过来，各种游动、伸展，散发出生命的气息，一股股朝天庭之上汇聚而去，在那些建筑符文光芒的映照下，于半空中凝聚成一个光芒四溢的护罩，将整座天庭都笼盖了进去。

At the same time, thousands of carvings of flowers, grasses, fish, insects, avians, and land creatures from the Heavenly Court's complex came alive. As they moved around and extended themselves, they released a vigorous aura which converged towards the Heavenly Court. Under the illumination from the glowing runes, a dazzling dome formed in midair, encompassing the entirety of the Heavenly Court.
同时江云山秘密派人购买奇珍异宝，准备在镇西军军官来到天羽城之后好好拉拢一番，这样能多安排几个子弟进镇西军中。也只有江家能和镇西军军官攀上交情，因为神武国镇西军的统帅镇西王也姓江，江家勉强能算是镇西王家族的偏支，大长老江云海年轻时候还在镇西王府当做下人，也算是有些渊源。

In the meantime, Jiang Yunshan privately instructed his men to buy in as much rare treasures and artifacts as possible, in preparation of bribing the Western Garrison Army officers when they came to Skyplume City. He had hoped that with the bribery, more descendants of the Jiang Clan would be allowed enrollment in the army. Indeed, of all the families, the Jiang Clan was most entitled to pull strings with the Western Garrison Army officers, because the commander of the Western Garrison Army, the Western Garrison Liege Lord, also held the surname of 'Jiang'. By this logic, the Jiang Clan was, in very loose terms, a side branch of the liege lord's family clan. In addition, in the early years of his life, Grand Elder Jiang Yunhai used to work in the household of the Western Garrison Liege Lord as a servant, which served as another layer of association.
同样的地点同样的位置，沈萤仍旧一脸淡定的坐在看台的最上层。今天是大比的第二天，主要是两两对决，选出各境界的前十名。四大家族弟子众多，冲进前十几乎是肯定的。所以印郁两家家主都没来，高台上空位很多，轩辕禹这回总算是有地方坐下了。

At the same time and place as the day before, Shen Ying sat to watch the competition. She was on the highest level of the viewing stand wearing a calm expression on her face. It was the second day of the great competition and the battles were to be carried out in pairs. The top ten fighters would be picked from each cultivation level. There were so many disciples from the four aristocratic families which made it very easy for them to get into the top ten. This was why the Family Masters of the Yu Family and Yin Family were not present. There was much more space on the viewing stands today and Xuan Yuanyu could finally sit down this time.
同样的，青石板裂开，江逸半条腿都踩穿了青石板，没入到下面的土里——这一腿的威力似乎比拳头还要大上一分！
The limestone slab split like before. Jiang Yi's legs went through the slab but did not reach the ground; the strength of his kick seemed to exceed that of his fist!
后院很宽敞，也有几个老妈子正对着木盆洗着衣物，却没有小奴的身影。不过他看到那几个老妈子神色明显不对，脸上有些畏惧之色，目光正不断的对着后院角落内的一个屋子内扫去。

The backyard was spacious. A few old chambermaids were washing clothes with wooden basins in front of them, but there was no sign of Xiaonu. But he sensed things were not right from the expressions on the old chambermaids' faces. There was fear written on their faces and they kept glancing towards a building in the corner of the backyard.
后院角落内屋子内传来一道隐隐的哭泣和求饶声，江逸浑身一震，顿时大叫起来：“是小奴！”

A sobbing plea for mercy sounded from the building by the corner of the yard.
Jiang Yi shuddered and immediately shouted, "Xiaonu!"
向荣管事复命后，江逸匆忙的回到自己的院子。院内依旧冷清，看样子小奴还没回来。不过江逸也管不上那么多了，一头钻进屋子跳上床，盘坐入定起来。

After reporting to Chief Rong, Jiang Yi hurried to his compound. The yard was as quiet and deserted as ever. From the looks of it Xiaonu was not back yet. However, Jiang Yi couldn't be bothered. He jumped onto his bed and sat down cross legged to meditate.
吓了众人一跳。
Everyone got a shock.
吓得裁判都是一顿。
The sight of this frightened the judge.
听到江逸的脚步声，旁边一个房间内钻出一个小脑袋，发黄的头发蓬松松的，一双睡眼朦胧的大眼睛下隐隐还有泪痕，看到江逸一大早就要出去，小脸上很是不安。

Upon hearing Jiang Yi's footsteps, a small head emerged from the next room. With yellowing fluffy loose hair and a pair of puffy big eyes that still had some tear stains hidden underneath, the face showed a look of unease as she saw Jiang Yi heading out early in the morning.
听到附近围观众人议论话语，倒是解开了江逸心里的一个疑惑——几个月之后，据说一个大学院要来天羽城招生，所以城内的顶级公子小姐们才全部进了武殿闭关修炼，想在招生比赛中取得好名次进入那个学院。如此多顶级公子小姐进入武殿修炼，里面的陪练自然短缺了……

After listening to the chatter and discussions from the throngs of people nearby, Jiang Yi did indeed have one doubt in his heart resolved, though. It was said that a few months later, a famous martial arts training college would be making a journey to Skyplume City to recruit new students.
As such, the best and brightest upper-class children in the city had all entered the Martial Arts Hall and gone into seclusion to train, in the hopes of acquiring a high ranking during the recruitment competition and enrolling themselves in the college.
With so many strong upper-class children entering the Martial Arts Hall for cultivation training, there was naturally a shortage of sparring partners...
听力和嗅觉增强，这两项能力并没有太大的作用，而且黑色元力运转到耳朵，他耳边立即闹哄哄的，一阵轰鸣让他异常不舒服。还有嗅觉一变强，不远处茅房内的臭味都能清楚闻到，让他很是恶心，所以也就在意这两项新的能力。

Both his hearing and sense of smell had gotten stronger, but these two senses were not of much use; on top of that, when the black essence force was circulated to his ear, the side of his ear immediately became uncomfortably noisy, as a loud booming noise left him abnormally unwell.
Additionally, once his sense of smell became stronger, he was able to smell even the foul stench coming from the lavatory nearby, leaving him feeling nauseous. As such, he wasn't exactly overjoyed with these two new abilities.
听完马飞放出的狠话，江逸不仅没有半丝害怕，反而长长一叹，看着马飞的目光就像看着一头蠢猪般，他摇头轻叹道：“你们这些纨绔少爷脑子内都是屎吗？到了如此地步还不忘威胁我？都被挟持了竟还敢出言不逊？好吧……既然你迟早要废了我，那我不如先废了你！至少以后被你废了，小爷不吃亏是不是？”

Ma Fei's harsh words did not unnerve Jiang Yi even a little. Rather, he breathed out a long sigh and regarded Ma Fei the same way one would an unintelligent swine. Shaking his head, he exhaled softly, "Are the brains of you wastrel descendants made up of sh*t, trying to intimidate me even now? You are bold enough to utter such impertinent words even when you are being held hostage? Fine then... Since you are going render me useless sooner or later, I might as well do it to you first! If you ever do make me useless in the end, at least this young master would not get the short end of the stick, am I right?"
听着少女如黄鹂鸣唱般的声音，江逸心神一荡，脑海却一转，强装镇定的说道：“姬小姐好，在下易剑。”

The young lady's voice was as sweet-sounding as the singing of a yellow oriole. Jiang Yi's spirit was distracted, but his mind shifted quickly. He put on a calm voice and said, "Pleasure to meet you, Miss Ji. My name is Yi Jian."
听闻这个消息，江逸整个人都懵了，脸上都是内疚和慌乱。
Upon hearing of this information, Jiang Yi was in a complete state of shock and loss, his face filled with remorse and anxiety.
Roar!
呃……初次见面，用不着行这么大的礼吧？
Uh... Meeting for the first time, no need to do such a big greeting?
呃……她好像是迷路了！
Ughhh,She seems lost！
呃……猫系COS？
Er… Cat-style COS?
呃……突然就不想问了，她对魔王做了什么是肿么回事？
Urgh... she did not have the mood to continue asking any other questions. But, what has she done to the Devil King?
呃……这是便秘了吗？
Er... is it constipated?
呃，她刚是被袭胸了吗？
Er, did I just get attacked in the chest?
呈安脚步一顿，又想起这是他们的历练，当即立断冲着沈萤大声道，“那位师妹，拦住它！”
Cheng An paused for a moment, remembering that this was their experiential training. Making a snap decision, he immediately rushed towards Shen Ying. "Junior Sister, stop that demon!"
呈安脸色抽了抽，神情越加的纠结了，“他们……没受伤。”
Cheng An's face twitched a little, and the conflicted expression on his face deepened. "They… have not been harmed."
周围的议论声越来越大，九人都下意识的低下了头，又是羞又是恼，有意无意的遮掩起脸上的伤疤。刚刚入场的士气，顿时散了个干净。

The commotion in the surrounding grew louder and louder. The nine girls bowed their heads, ashamed and annoyed, subconsciously covering the scars on their faces. Their previous high morale had vanished completely.
呵呵……总觉得经历了昨晚那一遭，他对自己的丹修大道产生了怀疑，再也无法直视那些练丹药材了。
Heh heh… After what he had experienced last night, he began to doubt his own core cultivators' Great Dao. He did not think he could look directly at the ingredients for refining pills again.
呵！孤月忍不住又笑了一声，看着沈萤用力挥下了剑，坐等她掉马。
Oh! Lonemoon couldn't help laughing again, watching as Shen Ying was about to swing the sword down forcefully. He was waiting for her to make a fool of herself.
呵！果然还是那只萝卜。
Ah! It's indeed the radish.
呸！
Pui!
咋了这是？
What was it with these guys?
咋办？人家老板居然找上门来了！到底是怎么找到这的啊喂？
What shall we do? Their Master has come up to settle the score! How did he even find this place?
咔嚓咔嚓四周又传来一连串的声响，地上、仙宫就连天空，都出现了一道道的裂缝，开始朝着四面八方延伸。整个秘境仿佛都要碎裂一般。

Loud cracking noises began to sound from all directions. Large cracks began to form in the ground, the Immortal Pavilion and even in the sky. The ground all around them began to part as the entire mystic realm started to fall apart.
咚咚咚，心口隐隐传来连中数刀的声音，突然觉得心好痛是怎么回事？
Dong dong dong, the numerous sounds of knifes to his heart were faintly heard, he suddenly felt a heartache, what was going on?
咚！
Dong!
咦!啥意思？贿赂他们吗？
Hey! What do you mean? Are you trying to bribe us?
咦！
Huh?
Huh! Huh? Huh?!!
咦，等等……
Hey, wait.
咦，等等。
Hey, wait.
咦？
Huh?
咦？你们TM还真信啊！智商呢？！
Huh? All of you really freaking believed it! Where's your intelligence?!
咦？剑阵？！还有这种剑阵吗？
Huh? Sword array?! Is there such a sword array?
咦？有故事！
Huh? There's a story!
咦？沈萤一呆，她有救过吗？
What? Shen Ying was confused. When did she save him?
咦？等等，她好像还真不需要？！
Eh? Wait, she really doesn't need it!
咦？！他怎么觉得这声音……那么像是哭声？！
Huh?! Why did he feel that this sound… sounded like sobbing?!
哇噢……她还真……真飞上去了啊喂！
"Holy cow... She really... really flew straight up!"
哇，高科技啊！
Wow, high technology!
哈？
Huh?
哎哟，还有这种猪队友，孤月一喜，虽然一开始没打算要的，连忙上前一步道，“那明日我等就恭候印公子大驾了。”

Wow, they still had this silly teammate. Lonemoon celebrated inside his heart. He hadn't intended to charge a deposit, but now he rushed forward and said, "I'll get ready to host Young Master Yin tomorrow then."
哐当……
Thud...
哐当，妖掉下去了……
With a bang, the demon fell down…
哦你妹啊！把你们那怀疑的波浪线收回去！
Oh, my foot! Stop giving me that accusing look!
哪个门派是一整个后殿都做厨房的！这到底是个什么鬼门派。
Which sect would use the entire back section of a hall as their kitchen? What kind of bloody sect is this?
哪知那柳长老沉喝一声，目光一下锁定了江逸，江逸只能苦着脸停下脚步：“长老还有什么吩咐？”
Who knew that Elder Liu would call him loudly in a low voice, his vision locked on to Jiang Yi? Jiang Yi could only bitterly stop and ask, "Elder, do you have any more instructions?"
哼，小婊砸，又想来跟我抢师父！
Hmph, b*tches. Trying to snatch my Master again!
哼，脑残粉！
Hmph, brain damaged fans!
唉……欺负小孩什么的，果然会上瘾！
Hey... bullying kids is actually really addictive!
唉，早知道她应该少喂他几口萝卜的，瞧这过敏后遗症给整的。
Sigh, if she had known, she would not have fed him so many carrots. Now look at what the post-allergy symptoms had made him become.
唯一让她不满的是，这群人明明是自己教出来的。每次看沈萤的眼神，却比谁都敬重。甚至在她恰巧出来溜萝卜的时候，一众妹子的眼神，就像是不受控制一般，唰啦啦的就跟着移动了。那一张张狂热崇拜的脸，若不是他在前面站着，估计早冲过去求签名求合影了，越来越有一秒变身脑残粉的趋势。

The only thing that he was unhappy about was that even though they were taught by him, every time they looked at Shen Ying, their gazes was more respectful than towards anyone else. Even when she coincidentally brought radish out for a walk, all the girls' gazes would uncontrollably turn towards her. If it had not been for him standing in front of them, they would have rushed over to get signatures and pictures taken together with faces of admiration, a sign of becoming brain damaged fans in a second.
唰！又一把剑拔了出。
Shing! Another sword was drawn.
Ah...
啊呜一声，吃了进去！
With a munch, ate it!
啊？啊！
Ah? Ah!
啥大？
Which university?
啥意思？听不懂啊。
What did that mean? She did not understand a thing.
啥禁制？

啥？
What?
喂喂喂，你们还真信啊！
Hey, you guys really believed it?!

嗯，有可能，毕竟神兽是最为高傲的种族。
Yes, this could be it. Spirit Beasts are the most arrogant of species.
嗯，看起来好像真不错的样子。
Hey, that looks really yummy.
嗯，这一定是什么高深的道法，一定是！
Oh, it must be some kind of extremely advanced Dharmic Dao, it must be!
