Eh?
Arh!
Arrh…
嘤嘤嘤，好想哭……
Wa wa wa, wanted to cry...
Bam!
嘭！
Bam!
嘴里恶狠狠地嘟囔了几句，江逸想要站起来，却没等站稳身形又痛得一个趔趄，差点再次摔倒。他身上大大小小布满了伤口，抽搐得让他那张清秀的小脸几乎都变了形，脑袋至今也是昏昏沉沉的。

Yet, before he could stand firmly on his own two feet, a searing pain made him stumble and almost fall back onto the ground again. Large and small wounds littered his body, leaving him in constant physical agony. His thoughts were muddled by the pain, and his delicate face was twisted in a constant, involuntary wince.
Pu...
四下看不到半个人影，就连往常半夜巡视的店小二都不见踪影，可若细看就可以发现，房顶上，屋檐下，门背后，甚至是院中的花草丛中都趴着几个人影。个个全神贯注一动不动的盯着院中几只打盹的鸡。

There was nobody in sight, not even the waiter who normally patrolled the inn in the middle of the night, but a closer examination would reveal a few shadowy figures lying on the roof, under the eaves, behind the door, and even in the shrubs in the courtyard. Every one of them was concentrating on the chickens dozing in the courtyard.
四位元婴长老围坐四周，正一脸震惊的看着上面的幡旗。
Four Nascent Soul elders sat nearby, looking at the flag in shock.
四周一片寂静，连虫鸣鸟啼都听不到了。
Everything around them was quiet. They couldn't even hear a bird.
四周所有冥将悉数下跪称是，其中一名数百丈巨大的骸骨将领率先站起，他那白骨上的符文暗灰色符文闪耀，整具身体激发出一道冲天暗芒，从其颅腔内传出一声惊天怒吼：“全力进攻！”

All the surrounding Netherworld generals knelt and replied in the affirmative. One of the skeleton generals who was thousands of feet tall stood up first. His skeletal body shimmered with greyish glowing runes as his entire body emitted a dark glow that shot towards the sky. From his cranial cavity came a sky-shattering roar, "All forces, attack!"
四周的众人也反应过来，所有人疯狂的朝这边冲来，眼中都是凶光，老大被偷袭了，他们岂敢坐视不理？要是事后被江如虎知道了，可没好果子吃。

The surrounding crowd of people had also started responding - every single person frantically raced towards that side, their eyes filled with an ominous glint. Their boss had been ambushed in a sneak attack, how could they dare to gawk and remain indifferent? Should Jiang Ruhu find out after the incident that happened that day, they would have to suffer some severe consequences.
四周的鬼气浓郁的看不清，一个巨大狰狞的黑影出现在前方，看不清具体样子，周身围绕着全是浓郁到快要化成实质的鬼气。

It was difficult to see through the miasma of Ghost Qi. A huge, hideous looking black apparition appeared in the distance. They could not make out its features, but could sense its Ghost Qi, which was so dense that it was almost tangible.
四周立即响起一片哄笑声，全部兴奋的望着江逸，等着看江逸承受胯下之辱的好戏。

The sounds of mockery and laughter immediately rang from all four corners. All were observing Jiang Yi with much excitement as they waited to see the entertaining sight of Jiang Yi bearing the humiliation of crawling underneath people's groins.
四大世家各有所长，实力相当各踞一方，除了主家外，还有各大大小小的分家。几乎把控住上青界百分之七十以上的修仙资源。

The four aristocratic families each had their own strengths and their talents largely didn't overlap. Apart from the main family, they also had several smaller families under them. It seemed that more than 70% of the immortal cultivators' resources were under their control.
四大世家收弟子向来严格，又一向不看重外姓之人，所以选择加入其它门派的人还是很多，个个排起了长队，除了……最右侧一处地界无人问津。

The criteria to join the four aristocratic families had always been strict and they were never interested in recruiting strangers. Therefore, many people looked to join other sects instead. The queues in front of other sects were long, all except… one on the far right side from the Lower Realm which nobody cared much about.
四面八方数道身影已经冲来，凌冽的杀机锁定了他，江逸却面不改色，眸子死死盯着马飞，嘴角都是残笑，他大笑说道：“一百两紫金小爷没有，只有贱命一条。不过要想拿走小爷的命，就拿……你们公子的命换吧！”

Multiple enemies were charging towards him from all directions, locking in on him with chilling intent to kill. Yet, Jiang Yi's face betrayed nothing. His gaze never wavered away from Ma Fei and the corners of his mouth were lifted up in the remnants of a smile. Laughing loudly, he said, "This young master does not have a hundred taels of purple gold, he has nothing except for this humble life. However, if you want it, you can... exchange for it with your Young Master's life!"
回到大殿内盘坐下来，江逸很快又暗暗兴奋起来，卖身五年至少短时间他的危机解除了，十天之后在这预支十两紫金，去风月楼赎回令牌就万事大吉了。至于江如龙？江逸已经不放在心上了，此刻有武殿提供丹药，他有强大信心，在短时间内将境界不断提升，只要达到铸鼎境四重，江如龙不足为惧。

Returning to the Great Hall, Jiang Yi had very quickly felt silently excited in his heart as he sat down cross-legged. The five-year sale of his person has at least relieved him of his crisis in the short term. With the advance of ten taels of purple gold coming after ten days, which he could bring to the Fengyue Brothel and redeem his command token, all will be well at long last. As for Jiang Rulong? Jiang Yi no longer took him to heart. With the Martial Arts Hall presently providing him with elixirs, he had great confidence; furthermore, with his power-level stages of the Cast Tripod Realm continuously increasingly in the immediate short term, so long as his power level reached the fourth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, he would have no need to fear Jiang Rulong.
回到房间后，江逸直接闭关了，他现在迫切需要变得强大，变强之心从所未有的强烈。他明白一个道理，要想主宰自己的人生，要想随心所欲的过自己的生活，那就必须成为强者。

Jiang Yi immediately went into seclusion after he went back to his room. It was of pressing importance for him to become stronger, as the urge of getting stronger reached an unprecedented "all-time high". It was a clear theory to him that he needed to be strong in order to be the Master of his own life and live the life that he wants to.
回到江家南院炼丹房内，江逸还感觉在做梦般，他一下偷偷取出怀中的紫色金叶子看上几眼，细细摸几把，一下又藏进怀中，整个人都沉寂在喜悦当中。

Jiang Yi returned to the alchemy lab in the Jiang Residence Southern Court, still feeling as though he was dreaming. He secretly retrieved the purple gold leaf kept in his robes to look at it and gently touch it several times, before storing it back in his robes again. He was completely lost in euphoria.
回到江家西院，已经是黄昏时分了。此刻西院很是热闹，这里住着的是江家的家将和仆人，天黑都各自回家了。一路上两人遇到很多家将仆人，不过没有人理会她们，最多只是看上两眼，甚至还有人露出嘲弄的笑意……

By the time they returned to the western court of the Jiang Residence, it was already evening. The western courtyard was crowded and full of noise, as the Jiang Clan servants who lived there were just returning home as the sky turned dark. However, no one bothered them—at most taking a quick glance or so, some even giving a look of mockery and laughter...
回去……要走哪边？
Which direction is... home?
回复了荣管事之后，江逸回到了自家小院，让江小奴去找春芽打探消息。半个时辰之后江小奴就回来了，得到了江如虎等人的消息。

After returning to report to Chief Rong, Jiang Yi returned to the small courtyard of his own home and sent Jiang Xiaonu out to find Chunya and gather some news. An hour later, Jiang Xiaonu returned home, having gathered information about Jiang Ruhu and his gang of cronies.
回头一想万妖会那天的情况，顿时又淡定了。
But after recalling the situation at the day of the demon gathering, it regained its composure again.
回头一看，原本的密林已经塌了个彻底，岛上三分之二的地界凌空升了起来。地面出现了四根粗大的柱子，随着又一声雷鸣般的吼声，一个巨大的黑色脑袋从那三分之二的浮岛里伸了出来，张口露出满嘴的尖牙。而原本的地界开始刷啦啦的出现了一排巨大的尖刺，遍布其上。

Turning back, the two of them saw the entire dense forest collapse. Two-thirds of the land was in the air. Four huge pillars appeared under the floating island. They heard another roar and saw a great, black head stretch out of the floating island. It opened its mouth to reveal a row of sharp teeth. A row of spikes grew out of what had originally been the ground.
回头一看，那剑阵中已经没有人了，“幻阵！”
Turning back to look, he saw there was no one in the sword array anymore. "Illusion array!"
回头瞅了瞅她身后，果然看到了另外两个修士，羿清贵人它见过，只是没想到不过短短的时日，对方已经是化神修士了。而且另外一件居然也是个化神，心下对沈萤越加的恭敬起来。

The Rabbit Monarch looked behind Shen Ying and, as expected, saw two other cultivators. One was Benefactor Yi Qing whom it was acquainted with, though it had not expected Yi Qing to already have become a Soul Formation cultivator in such a short period of time. Incredibly enough, the other one was a Soul Formation cultivator as well. The Rabbit Monarch felt more respect than ever for Shen Ying.
回头瞅了瞅还一脸茫然的沈萤，嘴角顿时一抽，突然不想收徒是肿么回事？
Turning around, Lonemoon took a glance at Shen Ying who was still wearing a blank look on her face. All at once his mouth twitched. Why did he suddenly feel that he did not want a disciple after all?
回头瞅了瞅，仍旧懒洋洋一脸废柴样弱鸡似的沈萤，那个疑问再次冒出来，“喂沈萤，说认真的……你身上那恐怖的能力到底哪来的？”那一剑简直……简直就像开天劈地一般。

Turning back, Lonemoon saw that she still looked about as alive as a half-dead chicken. The question in his mind surfaced again. "Hey Shen Ying, seriously… where does that terrifying ability of yours come from?" That blow from her sword… almost hacked heaven and earth apart.
回应江逸的话是四名爆射而来的身影，还有几个破空而来的拳头。
What he got in response was the shadows of the four guards that darted towards him. A few fists came tearing through the air as well.
回来的路上，江逸检查了小奴的伤势并不算太严重，此刻也就不去管她了，望着摇曳的烛火，心里犯愁起来……

On the route home, Jiang Yi observed that Xiaonu's injuries were not that serious. As such, he chose not to be too concerned for her, instead staring at the flickering candlelight flame. It was then that he became increasingly anxious and worried...
回答两人的是一道清脆的骨头碎裂声，还有江松惨绝伦寰的尖叫。江逸似乎没有听到两人的喝声，砸断江松一条腿后，大腿高高抬起对着江松的另外一条腿狠狠跺了几脚，将他另外一条腿废掉，才面无表情的转头过来望着江顾水说道：“江家有一条隐藏的族规，叫祸不及家人是吧？江如虎他们和我有仇，要打要杀我认！但为何要欺负我那没有半点武力的小侍女？今日别说你们，就算天王老子来了，我也要废了这三人。”

The reply to both their statements was the crisp and clear sound of bone cracking, followed by the miserable scream from Jiang Song. Seemingly deaf to the shouts from Jiang Gushui and Jiang Rulang, Jiang Yi raised his leg again, this time targeting Jiang Song's other leg. After trampling on Jiang Song's other leg and crippling it too, Jiang Yi then turned around and spoke to Jiang Gushui indifferently, "The Jiang Family has an unspoken rule. That is to not get the other family members involved in one's own conflicts right? If Jiang Ruhu and his group has any vengeance against me. I will make no complains if they come for me! But why do they need to bring this onto my servant girl who doesn't know an ounce of martial arts? Today, don't even mention the two of you, even if God is here, I will still cripple the three of them."
回答众人的是——江如虎的身子又被高高抡起，然后重重朝地面砸下，江逸嘴角都是残笑，似乎豁出去，冷然道：“退不退？”

What responded the group's threats was -- the scene of Jiang Ruhu's body being once again swung a high distance upwards, before subsequently being smashed downwards into the ground. A cruel smile formed on the corner of Jiang Yi's mouth, as though he were pressing his luck. He shouted coldly, "Are you going to retreat or not?"
回院后，孤月里里外外把九人挨个夸了一遍，特别是四个晋级的人。再顺便安抚了一下她们即将决赛的紧张心情。

When they returned to the yard, Lonemoon took the time to praise each one of his nine new disciples, especially the four Foundation Establishment disciples, and he also calmed their post-competition nerves.
因为上青界要交待，所以为了宗门，他们决定把羿清推出去！因为一个人牺牲，总比起灭门要强？
The Upper Azure World had given the command. To save their sect, they wanted to give Yi Qing up! Was it really better to sacrifice one person than to see the entire sect be destroyed?
因为他的丹田被封印了，他修炼的速度一直慢如蜗牛。虽然他有黑色元力使用丹药辅助修炼，能在短时间内让修炼提速，但越修炼到后面境界需要的元力越来越多，除非天天没事把圣品丹药当糖嗑，否则江逸这辈子注定成就有限！

As his dantian was sealed, his refinement speed had always been as slow as a snail. He had black essence force that could be used with elixirs to facilitate his refining practice, which could in turn speed up his refining. However, as the amount of essence force needed to refine higher realm levels increased, unless he ate saint-grade elixirs daily like candy, Jiang Yi would forever be limited in what he could do!
因为思羽那一战，让整个上青界都知道，无敌派上下全是体修。本来就没有几个人喜欢修体，这一波宣传下，算是彻底的堵死了，别人想拜入无敌派的想法。毕竟有更轻松的练修方法，谁也不会想不开，去做动不动就会被劫雷劈死的体修啊。

The reason was because with Si Yu's battle, the entire Upper Azure World knew that all of Invincible Sect's disciples were Body Cultivators. There weren't many who liked Body Cultivators for starters, and now with this kind of promotion, their road to success was completely blocked. There was no need to have hope that anyone would want to join the Invincible Sect; after all, there were easier paths of cultivation. Nobody would want to do things the hard way and get struck dead in the process of body cultivation.
因为这一刻，他骤然发现自己的脑海里竟多了几十个黑色的小篆字符！？
At that moment, he found his mind suddenly filled with countless tiny black symbols and words.
在他丢进三枚丹药，注入一缕黑色元力时，丹炉内再一次传来一阵沉闷的爆炸声，而在他将炉盖揭开的时候，却发现里面的三枚丹药又全炸了……

When he threw in three elixir pills and injected a wisp of black essence force, a deep explosive sound rang out from within the cauldron. When he lifted the cauldron lid and revealed its contents, he discovered the three elixir pills in the cauldron had once again completely exploded...
在他刚想询问几句陪练的规矩，后面走廊内传来一道脚步声，那管事立即撇下他笑着迎了上去。

Just as he thought of inquring a few queries regarding the rules of sparring partnerships, the sound of footsteps rang from the corridor behind him. That manager immediately cast him away by sending him off with a smile.
在他花费了大半个时辰提炼出两缕黑色元力，准备去增幅药力时，却发现笼罩在丹田外的绿色药力已经消耗干净了。

after he spent two whole hours refining two strands of black essence force and was prepared to increase the medical power, he realized the green medicinal power wrapped around the exterior of his dantian had already been fully consumed.
在南与北两个方向间，来来回回了十几趟后，那人拽出了深藏于地下几百米处的，刚刚成魔的小梦魔，问到了需要的信息。终于朝着大陆中部的魔王殿进发了。

After going back and forth between the North and the South for many rounds, that person dragged out the recently demonized Dream Fiend hiding hundreds of meters beneath the ground. The person got all the necessary information from the Dream Fiend, and headed towards the Demon King Palace, located in the center of mainland.
在场的人每人都欺负过人，都打过家族的低级子弟，他们打人的时候也很凶残，但此刻却都被江逸的手段吓到了，脑海内浮现的唯一念头就是，以后千万不能招惹此人……

Everyone here had once bullied someone, or beaten the lower classed clansmen. They were also extremely ruthless when they were beating people up, but right now they were all shocked by the measures of Jiang Yi. There was only one thought in their minds, that was to never incite the wrath of this man in the future...
在场的六人，顿时脸色一变。
The six other men's expressions changed.
在天星大陆，人人都能借助金木水火土等等最基本的天地元气来提炼元力，因为只有体内拥有浑厚的元力，才能施展出各种威力强大的武学神通，开山裂石，飞天遁地都不在话下。但要是没有元力，哪怕武技神通比划得再精妙，哪怕掌握了几万种武技的口诀，你也施展不出来，只能做个废物！

The inhabitants of the Stellarsky continent regularly borrowed the powers of the basic elements—metal, wood, water, fire, and earth—to cultivate and expand their essence force, as only those with a great amount of essence force could put various techniques of great might to use.
Even splitting entire mountains, flying freely in the sky, and becoming virtually invincible was possible with enough essence force. However, without any essence force, no matter how skilled one was in martial arts and regardless of how many techniques one had mastered, it would all be rendered useless. Without essence force, one couldn’t execute even the most basic martial art!
在天羽城内，姬家就是土皇帝，没有家族敢招惹姬家。姬家子弟倒是也很自律，很少欺压各家族子弟。其余家族则不同了，为了各家族的利益经常明争暗斗，数百年下来四大家族积怨颇深，家族子弟在天羽城内斗殴那更是家常便饭。

Within Skyplume City, the Ji Family was akin to a royal family. No other family clan dared to provoke the Ji Family. For their part, Ji Family descendants were themselves very disciplined and rarely bullied or oppressed the descendants of other family clans. The other remaining family clans acted differently. The clans regularly fought with each other openly and maneuvered against one another covertly to attain advantages in their own interest. The four great families had deep grudges for each other, developed over centuries of conflict, and fights between descendants of each family clan were truly commonplace and not out of the ordinary.
在昨夜突破了铸鼎境二重之后，江逸心里不仅不再畏惧江如虎，反而大摇大摆的上山，希望江如虎会来堵他，他好狠狠出一口恶气。

After making a breakthrough and reaching the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm the night before, not only did Jiang Yi not have any fear nor dread for Jiang Ruhu in his heart; he instead swaggered up the mountain, hoping that Jiang Ruhu would stop him. He hoped to take the opportunity to ruthlessly get his revenge.
在杨管事请示了费老后，武殿做了一个决定，将江逸命名为最顶级的紫金陪练，同时通告整个武殿，苍狼陪练每天只陪练三场，每一场陪练需要——百两紫金。

After Manager Yang asked Elder Fei for instructions, the Martial Arts Hall made a decision to designate Jiang Yi as the highest-level purple gold token-grade sparring partner. At the same time, they announced throughout the entire Martial Arts Hall that the sparring partner "Lone Wolf" would only spar in three matches every single day, and each sparring match would require - one hundred taels of purple gold.
在武殿内闭关第十三天，江逸照例和翊凌雪对战了半个时辰，这次翊凌雪却没有匆忙离去换衣裳，反而好奇的询问起来。

On the 13th day of seclusion at the Martial Arts Hall, Jiang Yi finished his customary sparring practice with Yi Lingxue. Afterwards however, instead of hurriedly leaving to change like she usually did, Yi Lingxue stayed behind and questioned Jiang Yi curiously.
在江家，江逸小时候因为自身体质以及大长老的关系，尝试过不少心法，也见识过很多种颜色的元力。除了水系功法大多是蓝色，火系功法大多是红色外，比如木系功法多数绿色，土系功法多数黄色……但他从没见到过能练出黑色元力的功法！

In the Jiang Clan, due to his relationship with the Grand Elder as well as his personal physical condition, Jiang Yi had been trying many methods of spirit training and had similarly witnessed essence force of numerous colors. Water-element techniques usually produced blue essence force, and fire-element techniques usually produced red. There were also wood-element techniques, which produced green and earth-element techniques which produced yellow. Yet he had never observed a technique that could produce black-colored essence force!
在江豹的两条腿被江逸活生生的踩断，他目光锁定江如虎后，江顾水两人终于忍不住了，身上元力疯狂运转，气势腾起，江顾水爆喝起来：“江逸，最后给你一次机会，现在罢手，等候刑堂处理，否则别怪我们两人不客气！”

Once Jiang Bao's legs were forcibly broken by Jiang Yi's trample, his sights were locked on Jiang Ruhu. Jiang Gushui and Jiang Rulang couldn't hold back any longer and began circulating their essence force. Putting on an imposing aura, Jiang Gushui roared, "Jiang Yi, this is your last chance. Stop right now and wait for the Disciplinary Court to serve your punishment. If not, do not blame us for being impolite!"
在江逸离开之后，那满头灰白头发的柳长老却突然走出偏厅进了丹房内查看了一遍，出来后很是满意的点了点头呢喃一声，再次走进了偏厅研究他“意外炼制”出来的地阶丹药……

After Jiang Yi left, Elder Liu, the man with a head full of grayish white hair, suddenly walked out of the side room and entered the Elixir Room to check. When he left, he nodded his head with satisfaction and, muttering to himself, once again entered the side room to research on his "accidentally refined" Earth-tier elixir...
在江逸踢出第六腿的时候，江松的右腿小腿终于传来一道骨头碎裂声，江松也跟着惨叫起来，再也无法支撑身体重心，一下摔倒在地，抱着右腿痛嚎起来。

On the sixth attack that Jiang Yi released, Jiang Song's right leg finally released the sounds of bones being broken. Jiang Song's agonized screams followed suit. No longer able to hold up his body weight, Jiang Yi's body crashed to the floor. He held his right leg and cried in bitter pain.
在没有元力的情况，武者对战只能完全依靠战斗本能和反应速度，以及武技了。这样对练起来能大大的增强武者反应速度，和武技的熟练度。

In a circumstance where there was no available essence force to use, martial artists seeking combat could only rely completely on the combat instincts and response speed, as well as their skills in martial arts. In this way, during sparring training, a martial artist's reaction speed and level of proficiency could be greatly increased.
在知道真相的那一刻，他的内心是激动的，此人仿佛是这污秽世间中，唯一的一股清泉。他也想像她一样，永远保持这份本心，更想像她一样强大。生平第一次有了拜师的想法，拜她为师，是他除了修行以外，首次想要执着的事。只是担心她不愿而已。

His heart had been surging with emotions in the moment he realized the truth. Such a person was like a clear spring in this filthy world. He wanted to be just like her, to forever stay true to his heart, and even more so to become as strong as her.
在确定江逸不能修炼后，收养他的大长老瞬间便苍老了十岁有多，他从此整日闭门不出，翻阅各种符箓古籍，四处寻访符文高手，希望有朝一日能够破解封印。

When he confirmed that the Jiang Yi could no longer cultivate essence force, the Grand Elder spent entire days indoors, reading all kinds of ancient texts and old talisman books in an attempt to find a solution to his god-grandson’s problem. He went to the edges of the world in order to seek the assistance of linguists and masters in talisman magic, all in the hopes of being able to break the seal one day. The poor Grand Elder... in mere months, he looked as if he had aged ten years!
在管事房被荣管事骂了个狗血喷头，江逸快步走出西门上了西山清点药草，好在这次还是在西山药田做杂物，荣管事没有提及令牌的事情。而且上西山时，山下的家族护卫都认识他，倒是没有要他出示令牌。

After being viciously scolded by Chief Rong at the Housekeeping Chamber, Jiang Yi walked out of the Western Door in a quick pace and headed up the Western Hills to take stock of the medicinal plants there. Thankfully, this time he was once again tasked with doing odd jobs around the medicinal plantations of the Western Hills, and Chief Rong had not mentioned anything about the command token. Additionally, while he was heading up the Western Hills, as the clan guardsmen at the foot of the hills recognised him, they did not require him to reveal his command token.
在这护卫看来，绝对的力量可以碾压一切武技，更别说江逸这实力根本不能发挥武技的威力，就如刚才江逸使出“摔碑手”一样被他轻松荡开般。

As that guard saw it, his absolute power could crush all martial arts techniques—let alone Jiang Yi's abilities which could not even manifest the innate power of any martial arts techniques. As an example, the Wrestling Hand technique that Jiang Yi used earlier was easily deflected by him.
在这武殿内修炼速度果然快了两倍，达到铸鼎境二重黑色元力凝练了，增幅药力的时间也增长到大半柱香时间，感受到丹田内井水般喷出的蓝色元力，江逸整个人都兴奋的不得了。

The power cultivation speed in this Martial Arts Hall was indeed faster by two times. Having reached a power-level at the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm and producing condensed black essence force, with the time that the elixir medical efficacy lasted also having extended up to more than two and half minutes of time, as well as sensing that blue essence forces were splurting out of his dantian like a well of water, Jiang Yi felt completely and uncontrollably excited.
在那些巍峨的城墙宫壁上，在那些华丽的宫殿阁楼内，在天庭的地面、街角，突兀地浮现出谁也数不清的七彩符文。
The towering palace walls, the insides of the majestic palace lofts, and the surface and road corners of the Heavenly Court all lit up, and countless multi-colored runic patterns suddenly appeared.
在院里的石椅上坐下，身体前倾，习惯性像摊烂泥一样趴在了石桌上。算了，既然不用帮忙，她也懒得动。阳光这么好，最适合……睡觉了。

She sat down on the stone bench in the yard and leaned forward, habitually lazing on the stone table like a slob. Forget it, she thought to herself; since help was not needed, she was also too lazy to budge. The sunshine was especially great for… sleeping.
地上十四五岁的小丫头也惊醒过来，看到暴怒冲来的江逸，一张小脸完全吓坏了，拼命的大喊起来：“少爷你不是他的对手，别管我，快走！”

The fourteen-year-old girl on the ground snapped to her senses. When she saw the wrathful Jiang Yi rushing over, she was scared out her wits.
"Young Master,” she screamed with all her might, “you are not his match! Ignore me! Leave quickly!"
地上的几人齐齐一缩，点头如葱倒。
The people on the ground suddenly stood upright and nodded in response.
地底！
Underground!
地面一震，坚硬的青石板瞬间裂成两瓣，他的左拳深深的砸了进去，整个拳头都没入到石板下面的土里。
The ground shook. His left fist smashed right into the limestone slab and split it into two halves. His fist did not even hit the ground below the slab.
场上的人一顿，秒停。
Everyone present were stunned and immediately froze.
场上那场血腥的殴打，整整持续了十分钟，场外的裁判这才反应过来，连忙大声道，“无……无敌派，思羽胜！”
The bloody beating of a match lasted for ten minutes before the judge managed to react and shout, "Invincible… Invincible Sect, Si Yu wins!"
场面一度十分尬尴。
This became a really awkward situation.
场面一度十分尴尬……
It was an extremely awkward scene...
坑里的人一僵，脸色顿时一白。
The man in the pit suddenly paused and turned pale.
城池北方的虚空之上异常诡异地裂开了一道裂缝，一双数丈长的白骨大手无声无息地自裂缝中伸出并把住裂缝的两边，将裂缝进一步撕开。
out of the the void in the north of the city, a strange crack appeared. From the crack a pair of long, skeletal hands stretched out and pushed the crack wider.
塔内。
Inside the pagoda.
塔内漆黑一片，根本看不见第二个一同入塔的身影，与外面的仙气渺渺不同，里面到处都是阴气，而且时不时还会化为实体，攻击入塔之人。

It was pitch black inside. Yi iQing coul not see anyone else in the pagoda. Yin Qi, not Immortal Qi, filled the air inside. The Yin Qi periodically condensed into a material form and attacked the people in the pagoda.
塔顶。
At the top of the pagoda.
声音之大，甚至用上了灵气，连着殿宇都震了震。
Their voices were loud - some of them even made use of their Spirit Qi to shout. The walls of the hall seemed to vibrate.
声音响起的那一刻，羿清明显听到全体兔妖齐齐舒了口气，一副劫后余生的样子。连着盖房的速度都加快了不少。

Once those sounds reached their ears, Yi Qing clearly heard the entire cohort of rabbit demons heaving sighs of relief appearing as if they had just survived a disaster. Even their speed of rebuilding the cottage increased quite a bit.
声音那叫一个此起彼伏，连绵不断，跟循环广播似的。
The voices sounded out continuously, one after another. It sounded just like a soundtrack on repeat..
处于视觉盲区的易峰，顿时一喜，虽然不知道这背云兽怎么绊倒的，但这是个机会！
Yi Feng, who could not see Shen Ying from where he was, celebrated. He was unsure of how the beast collapsed, but this was his chance!
处处怪石矗立，熔岩遍地，天际都是一片灰蒙蒙。
Strange rocks aloft every area, lava lurking every inch of ground. Grey is the only color seen for as far as visible.
外卖什么鬼？
What the heck was food delivery?
外药，也就是上药和服药，内调则是通过运转体内元力，对伤处进行气血疏通和修补调节。所以江逸在上好药后，还要通过修炼江水诀，运转体内铸鼎境一重的元力，来帮助伤口更快复原。

In other words, one had to consume or apply any necessary medicine and direct the essence force in the body towards the wound. This would ensure the smooth circulation of blood and life force around the body to aid in regeneration. Thus, after applying medicine, Jiang Yi still had to practice the Jiang Water Art to circulate the essence force from the first stage of the Cast Tripod Realm and help his wounds heal faster.
外面出来一阵沉重的脚步声，将众人的思绪拉了回来，江顾水等人很快醒悟过来。
A sounds of heavy footsteps could be heard from the outside which brought everyone by to their senses. Jiang Gushui and the others came to realization quickly.
外面的两位龟公正在拉客没注意江逸，让他一下冲进了内堂，里面一位半老徐娘老鸨倒是看到有客上门，扭着蛇腰，媚笑迎了上来：“哟，这位小哥那么猴急干什么？我家的姑娘……”

The two pimps were busy hustling customers and did not notice Jiang Yi, allowing him to dash into the inner hall. Inside, a middle-aged mamasan gyrated her hips and greeted him with a smile. "Oh my! Young man, why are you so impatient? Our ladies…"
夜色如浓稠的墨汁，深沉的化不开，一丝光都没有，四野寂静的令人可怕、心慌。
The night was as dark as thick black ink, without even a ray of light. The surroundings were eerily quiet and nerve wracking.
夜黑风高，捉妖夜。
It was a dark and windy night. A night for catching a demon.
够了！你两到底是来降妖的，还是来敲诈的啊喂！
Enough! Are both of you here to capture the demon, or to extort?!
大仙的心思好难猜！
The Great Immortal's mind is a mystery!
大仙的眼神突然好可怕？他说错什么了吗？
Why was the Great Immortal's gaze suddenly so terrifying? Did he say anything wrong?
大家族之间都有潜规则，家族子弟之间冲突，可以伤，可以废，但不得出人命，各家族最重要的天才子弟也绝对不能废！否则将会引起两大家族撕破脸皮火拼。所以江逸明知如果今日杀了马飞，刘管事和那几名护卫绝对会被处死，但他还是不敢动手。

There were unwritten rules among the great families: the descendants could hurt and render one another useless in a conflict, but they must not take lives; in addition, the genius descendants, who were most important to the families, must never be rendered useless. To do so otherwise would trigger a duel between families that would throw all pretenses of cordiality into the wind. Jiang Yi hence knew that if he had killed Ma Fei, Housekeeper Liu and the guards would definitely be sentenced to death, yet he did not dare to make the move.
大殿三面都有数条走廊，黑甲护卫带着江逸走到左边的走廊，交代道：“你顺着这走廊朝里面走就是了，去找杨管事，他会安排好你的。”

Three sides of the central hall had multiple corridors.
The guard clad in black armor brought Jiang Yi into a corridor on the left-hand side. "All you need to do is to follow this corridor and walk into the building. Go and find Manager Yang; he will properly arrange your position."
大群的兔妖，已经风风火火的修起了房子，砍树的砍树，盖草的盖草，扶梁的扶梁，那叫一个分工明确，配合默契，好似事先早已练习过数遍。

The colony of rabbit demons had already hastily begun fixing the cottage, each working on their allocated tasks - chopping trees, laying hay, building beams. With a clear division of labor, they exhibited an impeccable sense of cooperation as if they had practiced this numerous times before.
大长老烦恼之余，终于想到用元力检查江逸的身体，这才发现一个惊天秘密——在江逸丹田的外围，竟然包裹着一层封印，如同一张纹路精致的薄膜一般，完美裹住了江逸的整个丹田空间，过滤内外，大大降低了他体内元力进出丹田的速度！

With mounting frustration, the Grand Elder finally thought to use essence force to check Jiang Yi’s physical body. It was then that he made a shocking discovery—surrounding Jiang Yi’s dantian was a layer of seals, thinner than a sheet of paper. This layer completely covered Jiang Yi’s entire dantian. It was akin to a filter blocking an entrance and exit alike, greatly reducing the speed at which essence force could enter his naval area!
大长老随后通过内视画出了那道封印的图案，竟似一幅神秘古怪的龙形符文组合，只是所有人都看不懂那符文组合到底是什么东西，就更别说破解了……

Following this revelation, the Grand Elder used his inner vision abilities to draw out the image on the seal, revealing a mysterious dragon-shaped talisman. The problem was that no one could read and understand the words that formed the talisman image, let alone break the seal…
天上的雷云开始散开，孤月一边修复自己的身体，正等着接引天光落下。
The thunder clouds began to disperse. While healing his injuries,Lonemoon prepared himself to receive the Heavenly Beam from the sky.
天份个毛啊！他只看到了肌肉啊！
Talented my foot! All he sees are muscles!
天光慢慢消散，十几身影出现在眼前，直到看清最中间三个身影，两人齐齐一惊。
The light slowly faded and over ten figures appeared before them. When they recognised the three figures in the middle, the two of them exclaimed in shock.
天帝辰戈：“……”好歹是这方大陆的主人，知名度这么低的吗？
Celestial Emperor Chen Ge murmured, "..." After all, how is it possible for the Lord of the Land's popularity to be so low?
天底下为何会有这样两种极端并存的情况呢？
How on earth could there possibly exist such a condition of two polar opposites?
天庭再度恢复了寂静，依旧漆黑。
The Heavenly Court returned to its calm and quiet state, still as dark as before.
天庭南天门前的石梯上，再无一丝九阳天帝存在过的痕迹。
On the stone stairs on the south gates of the Heavenly Court, there was no longer any sign of the Nine-Yang Celestial Thearch's existence.
天庭整个又恢复了原先的黯淡安然，唯一的不同，就是在那天庭的南天城门前，不知什么时候出现了一个人。
The Heavenly Court was restored to its original dim and dark state. The only difference was that in the southern city entrance to the Heavenly Court, a figure had appeared undetected.
天星大陆几乎人人练武，武学体系有着泾渭分明的森严等级，根据武学特征的不同并按照从低到高排列的话，依次是铸鼎境、紫府境、神游境等等……这其中，每个境界又根据元力分为九重，不同境界的力量标准也是截然不同的。

In the Stellarsky Continent, almost everyone practiced martial arts, and the school of martial arts had a well-distinguished hierarchical system. From the lowest level to the highest, it went like this: the Cast Tripod Realm, Purple Mansion Realm, then Soul Travel Realm. Among all these, each realm was split into nine stages according to the essence force accumulated. The strength standards of each realm were also very different.
天星大陆好武，各家族子弟在族中斗殴都不管，更别说在外面斗殴了，只要不出人命，一律无视，在外面打赢了还会受到嘉奖。

Martial arts was popular in Stellarsky Continent. Few cared about their familial descandants fighting amongst each other within their clans, to say nothing of inter-clan fighting outside. So long as no one was killed, all fights were disregarded - and better still, if one won an inter-clan fight outside, he might even be granted a commendation or award.
天星大陆，武学体系发达，丹药、兵器、功法、武技都有着泾渭分明的等阶，全部从弱到强都按人阶，地阶，天阶区分，每一等阶又分为上中下三品。

Systems related to martial arts research and development were advanced on Stellarsky Continent. Elixirs, weaponry, cultivation techniques, and martial arts techniques all had distinct grading levels. All of them were divided from weak to strong and classified as Man-tier, Earth-tier, or Heaven-tier, with each grade being further divided into three sub-grades of superior, medial, and inferior.
天星大陆，武者因为修炼功法的不同，会产生各种颜色的元力，这些元力的颜色一般和功法的种类有着最直接的关系。

The martial artists of Stellarsky Continent practiced different cultivation techniques, with each technique producing essence force of different colors. The colors of the essence force was usually directly connected with the elements channeled by the cultivation style.
天星大陆，神武国，天羽城。
The Continent of Stellarsky, Kingdom of Divine Martial, Skyplume City.
天界，天庭。
Heavenly Realm, Heavenly Court.
天空一团黑气突然直直的降了下来。
A cloud of black Qi descended from the sky.
天空白云一分为二，而整个海面突然下陷，海水从中间分开。底下一条深不见底的裂缝延伸到远方。整个天地间仿佛生生被切了一刀一般。耳边只有哗啦啦海水填入裂缝的声音。

The white clouds in the sky split in two and the entire surface of the sea suddenly sank. The waters of the sea parted, revealing a deep, bottomless crack that extended into the distance. The earth and sky seemed to have been sliced open by a sword. Everything was silent except for the sound of water rushing through the cracks.
天空瞬间暗了下来，雷云迅速在上空汇聚，演武场中间的灵气节节攀升，隐隐有天地之威传了过来。
The sky immediately turned dark as thunder clouds gathered above. The Spirit Qi in the center of the arena was rising and the might of the world was faintly transmitting over.
天羽城姬家为首，之下就是柳家，马家，江家，冷家四大家族。其余倒是有些小家族，比如翊凌雪所在的翊家，杨家等等，不过和五大家族完全不能比。

In Skyplume City, the Ji Family was positioned at the top; below them were the four great family clans the Liu Family, the Ma Family, the Jiang Clan and the Leng Family. The remaining were smaller family clans, such as the Yi Family, from which Yi Lingxue hailed from, and the Yang Family; however, none of these smaller family clans could compare with the five great family clans at all.
天羽城姬家之下，原本是江家排名第一的，马家第二，不过在大长老江云海失踪后，江家失去了一名紫府境巅峰强者，声势立即大弱。而在三年前马家一位小姐嫁给了姬家大少爷姬怒剑后，马家立即声势大盛，这两年来隐隐有压江家一头的趋势。

In Skyplume City, the Jiang Clan supposedly ranked right below the Ji Family, but above the Ma Family. However, with the disappearance of Grand Elder Jiang Yunhai, the Jiang Clan lost one of their most formidable martial artists who attained the top level of the Purple Mansion Realm, depriving them of significant prestige and power. The status of the Ma Family on the other hand skyrocketed three years ago, when Ji Nujian, the Great Young Master of the Ji Family, married one of the young ladies in the Ma Family. Over the last two years, the Ma Family seemed to be growing into a force that might surpass the Jiang Clan.
天色已经大亮，早晨的空气很清新，江逸感觉经过一夜的打坐疗伤，伤势恢复了不少，连带着精神也足了几分。

By then, the sky was already brightly lit. The morning air was crisp and fresh; Jiang Yi could feel that, after a long night of meditation, his wounds had healed greatly. His vitality also seemed to have improved a few notches.
天色已近黄昏，江逸却全然忘记了时间，全神贯注的开始提炼黑色元力，此刻他恨不得直接修炼出一万八千缕黑色元力，把这鬼封印全破开，再看看他的修炼速度是否如原先这般废材？

The sky was turning orange as the evening hours drew near. However, Jiang Yi completely forgot about the time as he had completely focused his attention on refining black essence force. At that moment, he wished he could directly refine eighteen thousand strands of black essence force at once to break his seal completely. Then he would see if his refining speed was as terrible as it originally had been.
天色还早，江逸准备修炼两个时辰江水决补充下蓝色元力，恢复回炉所消耗的元力。本身他修炼就慢，回炉吸收了他太多的元力，如果不及时补充怕是持续半个月下去，他积累了那么多年的元力都会消耗完……
The day was still young. Jiang Yi was ready to spend four hours practicing the Jiang Water Art to refine his blue essence force and replenish the essence force consumed by the cauldron.
太TM好吃了，虽然只是些家常菜，但谁被喂了半年的猪食和萝卜，遇到一块腐乳都会觉得芳香四溢的。更何况这几道菜，确实炒得不错。

Damn! The food was delicious. Although it was just simple, home-cooked fare, for somebody who had been fed pig food and carrots for half a year, even a piece of fermented tofu would smell heavenly. Moreover, the food was very well-cooked.
太……太可怕了！这世上居然有比魔族更可怕的人，关键他到现在都不知道对方究竟想干嘛？
Terrifying... too terrifying! There are actually people in this world more fearsome than the Demon Realm. What is more pressing is that her ultimate aim still remains a mystery to him?
太可怕了……太可怕了……
Terrifying… just too terrifying…
太好了，看他们还怎么装逼，顿时浑身舒畅，觉得某个吃货都顺眼了不少。
This is great, I can't wait to see their reaction. At that moment, Lonemoon felt completely at ease. Even the foodie became more pleasing to the eye.
太幸福了，感觉胃活过来了，她这绝对是捡了个宝啊。
This was sheer happiness. Her stomach felt revived. She had definitely picked up a treasure.
太恐怖了，它从来没有见过修为如此之高的人。明明看着比凡人还弱，却在转瞬间灭了上万只妖类，甚至其中还有九个十阶妖王。明明招式看不出半点章法，一巴掌却能呼死十几只大妖。众妖连她的深浅都没探出，就直接命赴黄泉。

She was just too horrifying. It had never seen anyone with a cultivation so high. Despite looking weaker than a mortal, she was able to vanquish over ten thousand demons in the blink of an eye. Furthermore, nine of them were tenth-stage Demon Monarchs. Despite the complete lack of methodology in her movements, she had wiped out more than ten great demons with a single swat. The demons were all dead before they figured anything about her strength.
太虚派。
Grand Vacuity Sect.
头顶瞬间肿起好大一块，他下意识的转头一看，灵主正抱着完好无损的沈萤，站在身后几丈的空中。

A big bruise began to form on his forehead. He turned around and saw his Spirit Master still holding onto Shen Ying, who remained unharmed. Both of them were floating in the air about fifty feet from Yi Feng.
奇怪的是玉鼎这么多年来修为并没有大涨，可见他自己并没有碰这些丹药。也就是他上头还有其它人，再结合沈萤之前所说的，他们两人背后的人肯定是来自上青界！

The strange thing was that Yu Ding had not improved his cultivation much during all these years, so it was obvious that he had not touched those pills. That meant there were other people pulling the strings from the shadows. Therefore, combining this conclusion with Shen Ying's earlier deductions, the people behind Yu Ding and Gan Zhirui had to be from the Upper Azure World!
奇怪的是，妹子们的学习热情却没有因为见不到爱豆而降低，反而更加的努力起来。剑招越来越凶狠卖力，连平日休息的时间都自动缩减了。甚至有时晚上，他无意识的放开神识，都能发现她们偷偷起来，赤手空拳对着石壁修练的样子。

The strange thing was that the girls' enthusiasm in learning did not diminish due to not seeing their admired idol, but instead they became even more hardworking. Their sword strokes became fiercer and tougher, and they even shortened their break times on their own accord. Sometimes even in the night, he accidentally spread his Divine Perception only to realize that they had secretly gone to practice with their bare hands facing the stone walls.
契约完成！
The contract was formed!
奚秋吓了一跳，猛的退后了一步，“你是谁……从哪冒出来的？”
Startled, Xi Qiu took a step back. "Who are you… where did you come from?"
奚秋呆了一下，不明白为何师叔如此惊震，却还是重复了一遍，“剑修羿清。”
Xi Qiu was puzzled. He could not understand why Uncle Master was so shocked, but he repeated it nevertheless. "Sword Cultivator Yi Qing."
奚秋心下一惊，上前一步道，“在下玄天宗掌门奚秋，不知上青界的尊者到此，所为何事？”
Shocked, Xi Qiu stepped forward and said, "I am Xi Qiu, the sect master of the Blackheaven Sect. For what matter have you, Supremacies from the Upper Azure World, come here for?”
奚秋愣愣的指了个方向，“迎缘峰的……”
A bewildered Xi Qiu pointed the way. "At Yingyuan Peak…"
奚秋更加的吃惊，轩辕氏！中青界对上界了解得不多，但也是听过这个姓氏的，那可是上界四大世家之一，说一不二的顶级世家。他们为何会突然派长老来下界宗门，而且一次还来了三位。

Xi Qiu was even more shocked. The Xuan Yuan family! The Middle Azure World did not have much information regarding the Upper Azure World, but they certainly had heard of this family; it was one of the four aristocratic families, the top notch families. Why would they suddenly send three of their members to a sect in this world, one of them even an elder at that?
奚秋松了口气，想来刚刚是太惊讶芮糜伏诛的事，才没注意以此人。但是……羿清一个金丹剑修，居然拜了一个凡人女子为师，这到是稀奇。按说剑修修行虽然艰难，但只要结丹，前途不可限量。他却为何拜了这么一个师父。

Xi Qiu breathed a sigh of relief, thinking that he had not noticed her because he had been overcome by surprise. But… it was certainly strange that Yi Qing, a Golden Core sword cultivator had actually sought a mortal woman as his master. Although the path of a sword cultivator was arduous, once his Core reached fruition, his future would be limitless. Why had he chosen such a master?
奚秋眼前一亮，怒气尽消，反正带了点激动的看向堂中的弟子道，“快，请那人上来。”
Xi Qiu's eyes lit up and his anger dissipated. He looked at the disciple in the hall and instructed excitedly, "Quickly, ask the man to come up."
奚秋瞅了瞅中间的鬼王，错觉吗？怎么感觉师叔这一走，鬼王都好像松了口气？这会连眼泪都不流了？！

Xi Qiu squinted at the Ghost King in the middle of the hall. Was he seeing an illusion? Why did it feel like after Uncle Master left, even the Ghost King heaved a sigh of relief? Even the tears stopped flowing out?!
奚秋立即又道，“客卿长老，虽然名义上是我派中人，但我们向来对客卿不多加约束，道友照样可以向往常一样游历。只是以后在外会多些照应，遇到此等需要超渡噬魂幡之事，就不需如此麻烦。直接让弟子带回门派便是。”

Xi Qiu immediately added, "Although guest elders are nominal party members, we usually don't impose any restrictions on them. Fellow Daoist can still travel like you did before. Only, you can expect help from my sect during your travels. For instance, we can assist in matters such as releasing souls from Gonfalons, saving you much trouble. Just instruct my disciples to bring them back to our sect."
奚秋紧了紧身侧的手，这才看向奚辰道，“还是请师叔来一趟吧，他对阵法向来最有研究。”
Xi Qiu flexed his hands tensely, before looking to Xi Chen and saying, "I'd better ask Uncle Master to come, he was always the expert in array formations."
奚秋脸色一白，这群人居然一来就直接攻击护山大阵，大有大开杀戒的架式。一时间玄天宗弟子都飞出来了，聚集在大殿前，脸带惊慌的看向空中，就连各堂堂主也到齐了。

Xi Qiu's face turned white as a sheet. This group of people had the audacity to directly attack the Protective Mountain Array, with intent to slaughter. The disciples of the Blackheaven Sect all flew out and gathered in front of the hall. They were flustered looking at the sky, while all the hall masters had also arrived.
奚秋脸色一黑，敢情他们也是被那上古秘境引来的，说什么相助，明显就是想分一杯羹嘛！而且听他们这口气，还想先一步进去捡便宜，这怎么可能？！

Xi Qiu's face turned black. They were also attracted by the Ancient Mystic Realm — they were not here to help, they were obviously here to take their share of the loot! From the way they spoke, they even wanted to enter first to gain some spoils. How could this be allowed?!
奚秋顿时想到了什么，立马道，“这阵，可能是那剑修布下的。”
A thought struck Xi Qiu and he immediately said, "This may be caused by the Sword Dao."
Xi Qiu: "…"
奚辰立马掏出一道法符，捏了个诀，法符顿时化为一道流光飞了出去。不到半会，殿内就响起了一道男音，“何事这么急着唤我？”

Xi Chen immediately took out a Dharmic talisman and formed a hand seal. In the blink of an eye, the Dharmic talisman turned into a stream of light and flew outside. It wasn’t long before the hall rang with the sound of a male voice. "What is it that you urgently need to see me about?"
Xi Chen: "…"
女人？！
A woman?!
女子仍是没有动，眼看着那把金剑就要贯穿对方，只听得咔嚓一声，金剑在碰在对方身体的一瞬间，突然连根折断碎成了千万片，对方身上却一点痕迹都没有。

The woman remained in her place. The dagger seemed to have gone almost right through. Yet, moments later, the golden dagger cracked and disintegrated into a thousand pieces. There was not a scratch on her body.
女子却一改之前懒洋洋的样子，认真的念叨起来，“你看啊……鹿肉太老，狐肉有骚味，老虎毕竟是保护动物，有点不敢吃，蛇肉嘛又骨头多……”她掰着手指一项项的数过去，最后才总结道，“所以说，还是你们兔子好，嗯……好吃！”

However, the woman maintained her languidness as she babbled on in all seriousness, "Look… Deer meat is too tough; fox meat has a stench; tigers are protected animals, so I don't really dare to eat them. As for snake meat, it has too many bones…" She began counting with her fingers, one animal at a time before concluding, "That's why, you rabbits are still the best. Yes… delicious!"
她……可以碰到它？
She... can feel it?
她上前一步。
She took a step forward.
她上前瞅了一眼，发现那居然是个女婴，额心还有一朵红色的莲花印记。顿时嘴角抽了抽，这转生技术是泰国引进的吗？还自带变性功能。

She went up and glanced at the infant, only to find out that it was a girl, with a red Lotus birthmark on her forehead. He wondered ad murmured to himself, did they import this Reincarnation technology from Thailand? It still comes with the ability to change the infant's gender.
她下意识的就伸手撸了一把，刚还睡得正香的灵兽，突然睁开了眼睛，带着愤怒的瞪向来人，身上的白毛像是利刺一样炸开，立马就站了起来，警剔的看向她，嘴里还发出低吼声。

She subconsciously reached out toward the beast, which was sound asleep. Suddenly, the beast's eyes burst open. It was enraged by the intruder. Its white fur stood, looking as tough and sharp as needles. It looked at Shen Ying with extreme caution, as it began to growl.
她不挥那一剑，厨子徒弟就不会顿悟，不顿悟就有人给她做饭，有人做饭自然不用吃他做的猪食了。
If she hadn't wielded that sword, the chef wouldn't have had an epiphany. If he hadn’t had an epiphany, he would have been able to cook for her and she would not have had to eat Lonemoon's pig swill.
她们一个个报完了功法，又立马退回郁红身后。
After they finished reporting their cultivation techniques, they immediately went back to stand behind Yu Hong.
她们不会也要……
Would they also...
她们就这么一路畅通无阻的回到了上青城，郁红找了一处偏僻的地方，才掏出一个玉牌捏了个诀，顿时玉牌发出一道白光，飞入上空，不到片刻就消失了踪影。

Just like that, they smoothly and safely made it to Upper Azure Town. Yu Hong searched high and low before she took out her jade token and formed a hand seal. The jade token glowed momentarily before it then flew up into the sky and disappeared into thin air.
她们这才像是被解穴似的，齐齐大声回应，众人顿时笑成了一团绣球花。
The girls looked like they got just what they wanted. They shouted in unison as they each broke into a huge grin.
她内心的傲气被激起了，双腿一点，速度加快几分，再次运转幻灵手朝江逸点去。

The pride in her heart was greatly aroused. With a leap of both her legs, she increased her movement speed by several notches before once again circulating her Fantasy Spirit Hands technique and attacking in the direction of Jiang Yi.
她再次叹了一声，论厨子的专业素养，这个可以打满分了。
Shen Ying sighed once again. When considering the professional qualities of a chef, this one scored full marks.
她刚刚缓和的脸色，顿时又沉了下去，低头看了脚下还在颤抖的人一眼，转身对着全程围观的轩辕禹道，“素菜家长，有刀吗？”

Shen Ying's expression hardened again. Looking down at the man who was still trembling, she turned to Xuan Yuanyu, who had been watching from the sidelines, and asked, "Vegetable Family Patriarch, do you have a knife with you?"
她刚想回头，又顿住。
Just when she decided to turn back, she paused.
她到底啥时候走的？
When exactly had she left?
她却一本正经的继续道，“小动物不听话，多半是惯的，揍一揍就听话了！再不行，还可以吃的嘛。”
She continued seriously, "Small animals don't listen because they're spoilt. They'll listen to you if you beat them into submission. If that doesn't work, you can eat them."
她却伸出手，一下下的点着洞口道，“有陷阱，速来！”
She reached out her hand and pointed at the cave entrance. "Trap inside. Please enter quickly!"
她却没有停下，反而像是砸西瓜似的，抓着他的头一下下的往下砸，发出一连串咚咚咚的声音，震得整个升仙塔，哗啦啦的一阵晃动。
Shen Ying didn't stop here, but kept slamming his head down against the ground like she was smashing a watermelon. Bang! Bang! Bang! The whole pagoda shook at the force of the impact.
她后悔了，刚刚就应该杀了这个吃货！
She really regretted it now. She should have killed this foodie earlier!
她向众人使了个眼色，那些一直没怎么说过话的女子，才一个接一个的上前，报出自己学习过的功法，声音仍是压得很低，若不是在场的都是修士，几乎都听不清楚。

She signaled them with her eyes and then those girls who had been quiet came forward one by one to report on what cultivation technique they had learned. They spoke very softly to the point that if everyone present had not been cultivators, it would not have been possible to hear clearly.
她呆了一下，一脸的茫然。
Yu Hong was stunned, her face blank.
她在山顶转了四五圈，才在妹子们的指路下，找到坐山坡上，看着满地萝卜发呆的牛爸爸。

She made several rounds around the top of the mountain before she found the hillside which the other sisters had guided her to. At the hillside sat Lonemoon, who was staring blankly at the radish field.
她好不容易才打听到，上青城里有修士在做通往两界的生意，所以才来到了这里。一路吃了那么多苦，受了那么多罪，如今总算看到了希望。

She had waited so long before she heard of a cultivator in Upper Azure Town who had set up a business to send people to and fro between the two realms. That was why she had come here. She had suffered for so long and fought so hard—finally, there was hope.
她好奇的捏着叶子提了起来，除了是紫色的外，这哪里都是根萝卜啊。
Curious, she picked the herb up, holding it with just her forefinger and thumb. Apart from the fact that the herb was purple, it looked exactly like a carrot.
她张口吐了出来，呸呸呸，好难吃。以前为了充饥，随便煮着吃还不觉得。现在有了兔子，解决了温饱问题，怎么就觉得这么难下口了？

She opened her mouth and spat it out. Bleh, bleh, bleh. Disgusting. It had not bothered her much in the past as she had cooked simply for the sake of satisfying her hunger. But now that the rabbit had taken care of her food problem, why did she find the food so unpalatable?
她心下一喜，也不一阶阶爬了，直接从中间就跳了下去。下一刻眼前景致一换，就到了一个跟塔顶差不多的房间，熟悉的身影直挺挺的站立在正中间，周身似乎围绕着什么。

Shen Ying spirits lifted immediately. Ignoring the stairs, she jumped straight down. She found herself in a room similar to the one above. A familiar figure stood stiffly erect in the center, his entire body seemingly covered with something.
她心下猛的一沉，瞬间从即将成功的欣喜中回过了神，直接唤出灵剑就朝着前方的男子攻击过去，“你骗我们！”
Her heart sank and she immediately woke up from the joy of nearing success. She directly summoned forth a spirit sword to attack the man in front of them. "You lied to us!"
她手心一握，瞬间就抓住了他刚刚还持剑拳头，灵气带起的狂风，瞬间就停了下来。
She turned her palm quickly and grabbed the Traveling Immortal's fist, which was just holding onto the sword a moment ago. At that moment, the Spirit Qi and the wind in the surroundings disappeared.
她扬手施法解开了对方身上的禁固，刚一催动灵气，全身的经脉再次传来巨痛，血气翻涌而出，她却生生压了下去，带些暴躁的吼了一句，“赶紧走，趁我还没有改变主意。”

She raised her hand and tried to release the immobilizing lock she had put on the hostage. But just as soon as she activated her Spirit Qi, she felt great pain coming from the meridians of her whole body. Blood Qi started to surge up from within her, but she suppressed it once again. In an aggressive tone she growled, "Hurry up and leave, before I change my mind."
她抓爪的手突然一扬，那巨大的如山岳一般的鬼影，顿时被举得离地十几丈，紧接着她直接往下一摔，大地一阵震颤，嘭的一声砸到了地上。然后再次举起砸下，举起砸下，举起砸下……

Suddenly her hands, which had been gripping the claws, shot up, and the huge mountain-like ghostly figure was raised a dozen feet off the ground. She flung it over her shoulders. The earth trembled from the crash that followed. She then repeated the cycle over and over and over…
她拍了他半天脸，也没见他醒过来。四下一看，这才发现，四周躺了五个人，已经没了气息。看脸还有些眼熟，细一回忆才想起是郁家的那五个游仙，突然明白他为什么整成这样子。

She patted him on the face, trying to rouse him but to no avail. Looking around, she saw that there were five lifeless men lying on the ground. Their faces looked familiar. Then she realized that they were the five immortals from the Yu Family. She suddenly understood how he came to be in this condition.
她摸着摸着，却发现它原本纯白的毛，像是被染了色一样，从鼻尖开始慢慢的变红了，渐渐有遍布全身的趋势。
As she patted the beast, the pure white fur at the beast's nose tip became red, as if somebody came and dyed its fur right under her nose. Slowly, its entire body began to turn red.
她有一双漂亮的丹凤眼，黑如珍珠的眸子内闪耀着能洞悉一切的光芒，她发现有人匆匆走上来，柳眉微微一簇，放下书望了过来，浅浅一笑道：“鹤爷爷，您走得如此匆忙，难道出了什么事？”

She had a pair of pretty red phoenix eyes, with pearl-black pupils that sparkled and gave a penetrating stare. Realsiing that someone was hurrying towards her, she raised her long shapely eyebrows slightly and set her book down. Looking over, she gave a light smile and asked, "Grandfather He, you're walking ever so hurriedly, could it be that something went wrong?"
她果然脚步一顿，回过头，“还有事？”
The woman stopped in her footsteps and turned around, "Is there anything else?"
她正要打消他回家啃萝卜的想法，突然一道威压朝着两人袭了过来，灵风顿起掀起满天落叶，五道白绿相间的身影从天而降，瞬间落在了两人的面前。

She was just about to quash his plan to return home and munch on more carrots when suddenly, a strong suppressive force came over the two of them. Spirit wind stirred a bunch of leaves into the air. Five figures clothed in green and white suddenly fell from the sky, landing in front of the two of them.
她歪了歪头，她的食材是够了，“可是，你宠物还没找到啊？”
Shen Ying tilted her head. She had enough food. "But you haven't found a pet."
她气鼓鼓的朝大门走去，伸手在门边上一个突出的石砖拍下，练功房内顿时光芒一闪，大门打开了。

Fuming, she walked towards the door. She extended out her hand and punched the stone slab protruding out of the wall next to the door. The technique-practicing room was suddenly filled with the flash of bright light as the door opened up.
她沉默了半会，才点头，“猜得到。”
She went briefly silent before nodding and answering, "I can guess what it means."
她没听见一般，仍是一步步靠近。
Shen Ying kept walking towards him as if she had not heard him.
她没有回，只是眼神一沉，眉头瞬间拧了起来，抓着那道闪电，用力往下一扯道，“下来！”
Shen Ying did not reply him but her expression hardened and she frowned deeply. Tugging forcefullly at the bolt of lightning, she commanded, "Come down!"
她深吸了一口气，压下满心的火气，用力一指右边道，“那边！”
Taking a deep breath to suppress her boiling anger, she pointed to the right, "Over there!"
她点了点头，“嗯，我挺喜欢小动物的。”喜欢吃。
She nodded. "Yeah, I do kind of like small animals." I like eating them.
她特意加重了后两个字，眼睛瞬间赤红，满脸都是嘲讽的笑容，一字一句的道，“纯阴之体……就因为发现我是所谓的纯阴之体，我这位恩师，就能毁我百年修为，并亲手将我送到别人的床塌之上，眼睁睁看我受尽屈辱数十年。”如果不是因为她狠心转为魔修，或许现在都还在那般地狱中吧！

She deliberately emphasized the last few words, her eyes instantly turning red. She smiled mockingly as she spat out the words, "A pure Yin body… just because he found out that I had the so-called pure Yin body, my benefactor and master felt he had the right to destroy my century-long worth of cultivation and personally send me to someone else’s bed, witnessing my humiliation for decades." If she had not forced herself to become a fiendish cultivator, maybe she would still have been languishing in that hell!
她的身体已经要撑不住了，再不调息估计命都要填进去。她只得寻了一处隐蔽的场所，停了下来。这才放开了手上的人，顺势把人推了出去。

Her body was at the brink of collapse; she had to regulate her meridians, otherwise she would die. With no options left, she found a secluded place and stopped. She released her grip on the hand of the hostage, preparing to push her away.
她直接单手举剑，高过头顶。就像是举着个哑铃似的，看着毫无章法，更别说是招式了。
She lifted the sword directly with one hand and raised it above her head, like she was holding a dumbbell. One couldn't discern a method behind her move, let alone a technique…
她直接取出兽丹，如此完整的内丹是很是少见的，转手扔给了旁边的人，“接着，好好收着。”
She took out the beast pill directly. Such a complete internal pill was very rare. Throwing it at Shen Ying, she instructed, "Take it, keep it carefully."
她直接在她旁边坐下，眼神似是蒙上了一层灰，像看着前面，却没有焦距，“没错，我当日金丹被碎，被玉鼎当成炉鼎囚于密室，后来更是像玩物一样被送给别人玩弄，都是拜此人所赐。可笑的是……”她话音一顿，声音更加的低沉，似是咬着牙挤出一般，“他就是一手带我走入仙途，教导我修行的‘恩、师’！”

She sat down next to Shen Ying, the memories of the past misting her eyes, her eyes gazing ahead without focus. "Yes, my Golden Core was destroyed on that day, and I was imprisoned in a secret chamber by Yu Ding, who used me as a cultivation sex slave. Later, I was even passed on to others like a plaything. It was all because of this person. The ridiculous thing is…" She paused, then her voice deepened, as if she was talking through clenched teeth. "He was the one who led me onto the path of immortality, who guided my cultivation practice — my master and benefactor."
她眼睛满是绝望，眼看着那只手越来越近，突然另一只手猛的抓住了那只爪子，一道清冷无波的声音顿时响起。
Her eyes were filled with despair as she watched Bi Hao’s hand draw closer, when it was suddenly and violently caught by another hand as a toneless voice rang out.
她神色变了变，立马又恢复，深吸一口气，恭敬的上前行了一礼道，“掌门，我等虽然没有加入过仙门，但也是听闻过各派规矩的，绝对不敢逾越。我等皆是为求仙问道而来，无论是怎么样的入门考验，都不会畏惧。还请掌门吩咐，我们必当全力以付。”

Her expression shifted for a fleeting moment before turning back to normal. Taking a deep breath, she respectfully gave a salute. "Sect Master. Although we have never joined an immortal sect before, we have heard of each sect's rules and dare not overstep them. We are all here to pursue immortality and seek the Dao, so no matter the challenge for our acceptance, we will not be daunted. Sect Master, please give us your instructions. We will certainly go to all lengths to complete them."
她秒起，转身就往山顶走，刚走开几步，却听见孤月又加了一句。
Shen Ying got up and started walking towards the summit. After just a few steps, she heard Lonemoon's voice calling out after her.
她穿越到这里已经快四个月了，也不知道这是什么地方，到处都是奇怪的树。由于有些路痴，一开始她在这林子里转了好几天都没看到半个人影，很是过了几天风餐露宿的生活，在饿得前胸贴后背的时候，终于遇到了几个上山的猎户，给了她几个红薯，暂时安慰了她起义的胃。

It had already been four months since she had transmigrated into this world, but had no idea where this place filled with weird-looking trees was. Having a poor sense of direction, she had spent several days wandering within the forest where no other humans could be seen. She had been starving after braving the wilderness for a few days, when she finally met a couple of hunters that had scaled the mountain. The sweet potatoes that they gave her comforted her protesting stomach temporarily.
她突然一步步朝他走了过来，身上的杀气不减反增。
She suddenly started walking towards him, the murderous aura emitted from her body increasing with each step.
她突然倾身靠近，看着他的眼睛，一字一句的道，“矫情！”
She suddenly leaned in and looked him in the eyes. She only had two words for him: "A brat!"
她突然灵光一闪，转身往大厅跑，一把推开了门，冲着院里跪着的那个人大声道，“喂，那谁……”
Suddenly, an idea struck her. Turning round, she ran towards the hall, pushed the door open and rushed towards the man kneeling in the yard. "Hey, whoever you are..."
她立马沿着阶梯走了下去，前方就传来轰隆隆的声音和术法光芒，隐隐还带着几分熟悉的剑意。
She immediately walked down the stairs. She could hear rumbling sounds ahead. Then she saw a beam of sorcery light, from which she could detect a familiar sword intent.
她笑了一声，“帮我？你一个宗门弟子要帮魔修对付正派修士不成？”
Qi Chengyu laughed. "Help me? Are you saying that you, a Blackheaven Sect disciple, want to help a fiendish cultivator deal with a cultivator from an orthodox sect?"
她终归是魔修，正邪不两立，况且她还杀了玄天宗一位堂主。无论原由为何，他们做为正派修士，于情于理都得抓她回去。

She was ultimately a fiendish cultivator, and since good and evil were on opposing sides, as well as taking into account her murder of a hall master of Blackheaven Sect, it was only right that as orthodox cultivators, they would capture her regardless of her reasons.
她脸色顿时煞白，没了一丝血气，也顾不得四周的雷光了，眼睛暴睁的盯着地上，“我的……铃……铃……”
Si Yu turned as pale as a sheet, showing no sign of blood on her face. She could not care less about the lightning bolts falling around her as she stared at the ground. "My… bell… bell…"
她要去哪？
Where is she going?
她觉得这应该是异世界与地球的地域差，属正常现象，人家地球与月球的重力还不一样呢。
She felt that these differences between this other world and Earth was absolutely normal, just like how Earth and the moon had different gravities.
她话还没有说完，孤月和羿清已经消失在了城西的方向，找人算账去了。
Before she could finish, Lonemoon and Yi Qing disappeared out the door and headed for the west of the city. They were ready to sort things out.
她话音一落，众人也纷纷掀开了灰色的长袍，没了法衣的掩盖，在场的八个人都露出了原本的样子。只见她们身上爬满各式各样恐怖的伤疤，有的在手上，有的在脚上，甚至还有的在脸上。单可见的肤肌上就这么多，可见衣服下还有多少。

As she spoke, all of them pulled up their long grey robes. Without the Dharma clothing to cover them up, all eight of them revealed their original looks. Their bodies were crawling with all kinds of scary-looking scars, some on the hands, some on the feet, and some even on their faces. And that was only ones that were visible on their skin—there had to be much more hidden under their clothes.
她话音一落，众人眼神顿时一亮，像是重新燃起了希望，“没错，听闻她曾经跟我们一样……同为女子，她……她一定会帮我们的。”
As she spoke, everyone's eyes lit up as if gaining new hope. "That's right. I have heard that she was just like us… As a woman, she… she will definitely help us."
她话音刚落，只见一道白光从孤月脚下钻了出来，身形一闪就到了沈萤面前，白白胖胖的一根，头上还顶着长长的青叶子，其中两片叶子中间还捧着一大把的蒲公英，正奋力的举起来，“叽叽叽叽叽！”

She had just completed her sentence when the crowd saw a white ray of light appear from below Lonemoon's feet. Its body flashed in front of Shen Ying. Out of its fat, white body grew several green leaves, and between two of these leaves sprouted several dandelions. It raised the flowers up, shouting, "Ji ji ji!"
她说的吃，指的应该是御兽吧？嗯，一定是！
What she means is suitable for beast control, right? Yes, I'm sure that's what she meant!
她走近一看，眼睛瞬间一睁，“印元飞！他怎么会伤成这样？”
She went forwards to take a look and her eyes widened in surprise at what she saw. "Yin Yuanfei! How did he get such injuries?"
她趴在了上面！
She laid down on it!
她蹲下身，正打算仔细瞅瞅，突然前方却传来一声大吼，眼前顿时一暗。
She squatted down to study it from a closer distance. Suddenly, she heard a loud roar coming from her front. Something flashed before her eyes.
她这一生被仙修所毁，受尽凌辱，所以她才亦然弃道入魔，但没想到，到头来帮她的却也是仙修。

Her entire life had been destroyed by immortal cultivation and she had suffered utter humiliation. Therefore, she had abandoned the orthodox path to turn fiendish; yet, she never expected that the ones who would ultimately help her would be orthodox immortal cultivators.
她这到底是给自己绑了个人质，还是个包袱啊！
Did she kidnap a hostage or a burden!
她这才沉声开口，“说吧，我家萝卜呢？”
She asked quietly, "Tell me, where's my radish?"
她这是……被嫌弃了？
Am I... being despised?
她这是想把兽丹送给她疗伤吗？为什么？明明自己挟持她到此，她却要帮助一个敌人？
Is she giving me the beast spirit pill to heal my injuries? Why? I was the one who took her hostage, yet she wants to help her enemy?
她这样想着，刚闭上眼，突然耳边轰隆一声巨响。
With such thoughts in mind, she closed her eyes. Yet at that moment, a sudden rumble jolted her.
她顺手接住，小声嘀咕了一句，“还不如猪食呢。”细一看，才发现那是一个锅铲，连忙扔了回去，“快翻翻，锅要糊了!”
She caught it deftly and muttered, "It's worse than pig swill." Seeing that it was a spatula, she threw it back quickly. "Hurry up and stir, the food is turning mushy!"
她默默的转头看向新上任的生活担当兔，“你会做饭吗？”
She silently turned her head to look at her newly appointed gofer. "Do you know how to cook?"
好……好可怕！终于明白，为什么无敌派门规的第一条是不准吵她睡觉了，后果……还真没人负得起。

She's... She's so scary! Yin Feng finally understood why the Invincible Sect's first rule was that she should never be disturbed during her sleep; the consequences... were truly something no one could bear.
好一会他才平复内心的冲动，咬牙抬头道：“你想怎么样？”
It was several minutes before he could quell the urge burning within. Biting his teeth hard, he asked, "What is it that you want?"
好不容易吃了顿好的，沈萤觉得人生都圆满了，全身再次懒了下去，连骨头都软了。整个人像只无骨虫一样，毫无形象的趴在了桌上，眼神一眯眯的犯起了困。

Having finally eaten a good meal, Shen Ying felt that her life was now complete. She felt lazy and lethargic. Like a spineless insect, she lay on the table in an unbecoming posture, her eyes gradually losing their focus on the surroundings.
好不容易吃完饭，孤月正打算把这砣懒货拖去海岛，一个弟子却匆匆赶了过来，急忙朝着他行了个礼，“见过尊者！”
Finally finished with the meal, Lonemoon was about to drag this lazy bum to the Sea Island when a disciple rushed over and greeted hurriedly, "Greetings to the Supremacy!"
好久没有见到过，这么抗揍的沙包了，按秩序排队，不要抢！
It had been long before they trained on a punching bag with such great resistance. Line up, everyone, no shoving!
好像……揍错魔了？！
Seems like……she punched the wrong demon？！
好像忘了点什么？唉，算了，不重要。
Did I forget something? Ah, whatever. It's not important.
好厨子啊！
Great chef!
好厨子啊！沈萤叹了一声，她做为师父，居然穷得连顿饭钱都拿不出，还要让徒儿去打野味，实在是……太方便了！
Great chef! Shen Ying sighed. As the Master, she was so poor that she could not even afford a meal, and she still needed her disciple to go hunt for meat. This was… so convenient!
好可惜……
Such a pity...
好吧，她绝望了，看来是吃不到一顿正常的饭菜了，果然一技之长很重要，她大学应该上新东方的。沈萤整个人都萎了下去，现在怎么办，肉也浪费了，这里又没别……

Okay, she finally gave up. It seemed that she would not be able to enjoy a normal meal. This just went to show that having a skill was indeed important. Her university should have taught the culinary arts. Shen Ying slumped her shoulders in despair. What to do now, the food was wasted and there was nothing else...
好在多年来的压抑生活，造就了他远非同龄人的心理承受能力。他强迫自己冷静下来，冷眼一扫，目光锁定那管事，咬牙爆喝道：“等等！我无心在风月楼闹事，你们不毒打我侍女，我也不会动手的！这事就算闹到城主府，我也不怕！要动手你们尽管放手过来，看我是否会惧怕？”

Years of oppressive living had conditioned his mind. His mental resilience far exceeded that of his peers. He forced himself to calm down. He swept those gathered with a cold glare before locking onto the the housekeeper.
"Wait, wait!” he said, clenching his teeth. “I have no intention to cause trouble in Fengyue Brothel! If you had not beaten my maidservant, I wouldn't have attacked either! I won't be afraid even if this matter is brought up to the city lord! If you want to fight, go on! Let's see if I'm afraid!"
好在无敌派别的没有，灵草灵植满山遍野都是，要治好她们身上的伤也只是时间问题，只不过他跟羿清都不擅长练药，她们被破坏的根基到底还是补不回来，以后修炼术法会格外的困难，甚至再不能寸进，到是正好适合转剑修。

Fortunately, the Invincible Sect had an abundance of spirit herbs all around the wild mountains, so nursing their health back was only a matter of time. The only problem was that neither he nor Yi Qing were experts in concocting medicine and so they would not be able to restore the girls’ damaged foundations. Learning cultivation techniques would be more difficult for them in the future and they would not be able to further improve on them, so this was a good opportunity to switch to sword cultivation instead.
好在灵兽山学院招生在即，加上这次恰好碰到镇西军也准备来天羽城招人，所以各家族没在意马家的异常举动，都各自在培养家族的子弟，争取让他们成为灵兽山学院的特招生，再不济也要被镇西军军官看重，加入军中。

It was fortunate that the Mt. Spirit Beast College would be starting its recruitment of students soon; in addition, it coincided with the recruitment of the Western Garrison Army. With these two events around the corner, the odd behaviors of the Ma Family largely went under the radar of the other families, which were all busy grooming their descendants in hopes of having them either enroll into Mt. Spirit Beast College as special students, or at the very least win the favor of the Western Garrison Army commanders and being taken in by the army.
好在那孩子还小，这几天不是跟在薄家父子身边，就是由郁红帮忙照顾，跟羿清到是没什么接触。
Luckily, the kid was still young, so he was either taken care of by the Pu's or Yu Hong, and had no opportunity to even get in contact with Yi Qing.
好在黄裳少女身后的鹤大师跟着走进来，惊醒了江逸，他连忙假装咳嗽低下头不敢多看。他是来卖药的，这黄裳少女明显非富即贵，这样冒然盯着人家说不定会触怒对方。

Thankfully Master He walked into the booth, following behind the young lady in yellow robes, which startled Jiang Yi. He hastily pretended to cough and lowered his head down, not daring to stare any further. He was there to sell his medical elixirs, whereas this young lady in yellow robes was evidently wealthy and respectable. It was likely that taking the liberty to stare at his counterpart would end up infuriating her.
好多的……钱啊！
There's so much... money!

好歹一起吃了那么多天的烤鸡，“恩怨什么的，大概猜也能猜出来了。”她突然一屁股在旁边的枯树上坐了下来，“你修魔跟他有关吧？”动脑好麻烦啊！

Well, we have been eating roast chicken together for so many days. "As to what grievances you have, I think I can guess it." She suddenly sat down on the withered tree trunk next to her. "You being a fiendish cultivator has something to do with him?" Using her brains really was a chore!
如果……他在这干活，那不是可以偷偷的炼丹？借助黑色元力炼制出高级的丹药，再人不知鬼不觉拿出去卖！

If... he started working here, did that mean he could secretly refine elixirs? He could borrow the power of the black essence force to refine and produce high-grade elixirs, before selling them outside without anyone knowing!
如果……它不是跪在地上的话。

如果他们真的搬去了那个什么靖邢城，到时反正都在一个城里头，抬头不见低头见的，做为剑仙的羿清偶尔指点几句后辈也是理所当然的事，就不存在什么收徒不收徒了。

If they really do move to Jing Yan City, at that time because they would be in the same city, they would be seeing each other everyday. It would then be normal and rightful of Yi Qing to give some advice to the juniors from time to time. so there would not be a need for him to accept any disciples.
如果小胖子没有骗他，钱家的情报没错，那么他真的很有可能是镇西王的私生子，所谓的世子殿下！
If Fatty was not lying to him, and the Qian's intelligence is not wrong, then he really might be the Wstern Garrison Liege Lord's illegitimate son, the so-called prince!
如果师父与他是同乡的话，师父这么厉害的人，孤月一定是听过的。之前他想收他为徒，可能一时没有认出来，现在已经点破，那他现在这般的行为，莫不是……想起往事心生崇拜，想要……也拜入师父门下吧？！

If he were from the same hometown as Master, Lonemoon must have heard of how formidable Master was. Previously he wanted to get him as his disciple, so perhaps did not recognize her, but now that it was out in the open, could it be that… recalling the past events gave rise to his admiration and worship of Master, and made him want to… also become Master's disciple?!
如果是刚才，或许对方手掌一扫，他双手肯定会被荡开还会被震伤，因为对方境界高两重，速度太快了，根本看不清他的手掌扫来的轨迹！

If it happened much earlier, or if the opponent moved his palms in a sweeping motion, his own hands would have been deflected away and injured by the shockwave of that sweep. As the opponent's realm level was two times greater than Jiang Yi's, his speed was too fast, leaving Jiang Yi completely unable to clearly see the trajectory of the sweeping motion of his palms.
如果此刻和他谈交易的不是武殿管事，江逸绝对会扭头就走，认为对方是个疯子。问题就在这里，武殿作为大陆商号中的无冕之王，数十万年来从没传出过丑闻，更从没有听说过武殿有过恶行。况且……他只是一个小人物，武殿又怎么会处心积虑对付他？

If the person discussing this business deal with him at the moment was not been a manager for the Martial Arts Hall, Jiang Yi would have definitely turned around and left, thinking that the other party was a madman. This was where the question lay - the Martial Arts Hall was the uncrowned king amongst the major mercantile businesses on the continent and had never experienced a single scandals in over tens of thousands of years, to say nothing of getting any hearsay of corrupt deeds conducted by the Martial Arts Hall. Besides... he was only a small character, why would the Martial Arts Hall deliberately scheme and plot against him?
如果自己不断提炼，当黑色元力越积越多，他的实力会不会越来越强大？

如果说孤月是无敌派管家的话，那郁红就是管家助理。孤月忙不过来的事，大多都是她帮忙处理的。所以收徒的事，交给郁红，他很放心。

If Lonemoon was the manager of the Invincible Sect, Yu Hong could be considered his secretary. Whatever Lonemoon had no time to handle would be managed by Yu Hong. Therefore, it was only right to put Yu Hong in charge of the recruitment. Lonemoon's mind would be set at ease this way.
如果郁海珩认为，这样的人好欺负的话，那郁家也太可怜了！
If Yu Hai Heng thought that such a person was a good choice for bullying, then it would be so pitiable for the Yu Family!
如此大的力量，结局不言而喻，江如龙的脑袋一下头破血流，鲜血染红了半面墙壁。
With such forces, the results needed no description. Jiang Rulong's head was bleeding profusely and painted half the wall in fresh blood.
如此好的机会，江逸还不知道痛打落水狗，他就是白痴了。他右手早早松开对方的手臂，目光朝地下的小奴一扫，大喝起来：“小奴！”

With such a good opportunity placed before him, Jiang Yi would be an utter idiot if he did not know to take the chance to completely pulverize his opponent. With his right hand having already released his opponent's arm earlier on, he glanced down to see Xiao Nu who was lying on the ground and shouted loudly, "Xiaonu!"
如此诡异的情况，除了黑色元力和蓝色的水系江水诀元力完美融合并让后者威力增大，从而导致力量暴增外，根本就无从解释！
The only explanation for this bizarre situation was that the two essence force had fused perfectly, greatly increasing his strength. Other then that there was no other reasonable explanation!
如沈萤说的一样，那是座巨大的黑色之门，门上还有两个红眼蛤蟆状的拉环，四周魔气缭绕，仅仅只是隔着术法看了一眼，就能感受到那仿佛要渗入骨髓的阴冷气息。

Just like what Shen Ying mentioned, it was a gigantic black door, and on the door, there were still two rings shaped like a red-eyed toad. Demonic Qi encircled the surroundings, and even looking at it behind the water mirror, one could feel the demonic aura lingering around, as if it was going to creep into one's bone.
妈的中计了！
Damn it, they had been tricked!
妈的！不想跟这对智障玩了！
Holy shit! I don't want to play with this pair of dumb wits!
妖僵了……
The demon froze...
