The demon flew away...
妖飞走了。
The demon flew away.
姬听雨不再多问，转头和刘管事交代起来：“你去取一两紫金，这三枚丹药我们聚珍阁收了。”
Ji Tingyu did not ask any further. Instead, turning to Chief Liu, she instructed, "You go fetch one tael of purple gold, the Pearl Gathering Pavilion will accept these three pills."
姬听雨也不矫情了，单腿一点，如一只花蝴蝶般飘了过来，一双手如在空中拨弄琴弦般舞动起来，幻化出道道残影，让人一阵眼花缭乱，银铃般的声音响起：“易公子小心哦，这是我们姬家的人阶上品武技幻灵手。”

Ji Tingyu decided not to be affectionate any longer. Skipping a beat with one of her legs, she fluttered over like a flowery butterfly. Her hands danced about in the air, as though they were fiddling with the strings of a guqin, producing multiple images of figures made from the traces of her hand gestures, the figures of which left one bedazzled and confused. In the midst of doing these actions, like a silver bell her voice rang out, saying, "Watch out, Young Master Yi, this martial arts technique is from our Ji Family - it's the Man-tier superior-grade technique Fantasy Spirit Hands."
姬听雨也是微微一怔，不过很快浅浅的笑了起来，微微颔首道：“丹药自然是收的，易公子，你准备卖多少钱一枚呢？”

Ji Tingyu was slightly stunned for a moment, but she quickly gave a faint smile. Nodding her head slightly, she responded, "We will naturally accept the elixirs. Young Master Yi, what is the price you are prepared to see one pill for?"
姬听雨再次一怔，江逸这点实力竟还准备和她打一场，尽管两人元力被封，但是差距还是太大了吧？难不成她站着不动给江逸攻击？给他做陪练？

Ji Tingyu was once again stumped for words. Jiang Yi, with such a tiny amount of power, was actually ready to spar with her in a match. Even though both their essence forces had been sealed off from use, surely the difference between their power was too wide? Was it possible for her to just stand her ground, not move and allow Jiang Yi to attack? Did this mean allowing him to be her sparring partner?
姬听雨再次出关了，而出关之后却径直来到练功房，点名要江逸陪练对战。
Ji Tingyu had once again left for seclusion, and the first thing she did was making her way directly to the Technique Practising Room, deliberately ordering Jiang Yi for a sparring match.
姬听雨和那个冰山美人苏若雪导师美眸亮了起来，战无双和旁边的黑衣少女微笑颔首，几人对于江逸能获得足够的令牌一点不觉得奇怪，江逸的实力在他们眼里可是很强横的。

The beautiful eyes of Ji Tingyu and the Ice Beauty-Mentor Su Ruoxue lit up brightly, while Zhan Wushuang and the Girl in Black next to him smiled and nodded slightly. They were not at all surprised by the fact that Jiang Yi could obtain enough tokens,to them, his strength was considered to be extremely dominant. "
姬听雨和鹤大师对视了一眼，两人眼中都闪过一丝愕然，炼出丹纹的丹药竟然卖二十两银子一枚？能炼制出这样丹药的炼丹师会在意这点小钱？难道这少年是偷了别人的丹药？

Ji Tingyu and Master He exchange a look, both of their eyes flashing a thread of amazement. Was an elixir pill with vein patterns refined onto it actually being sold for only two taels of silver each? Did the alchemist who could produce such kinds of elixirs care for only so little money? Could it be possible that this young man stole the elixir from someone else?
姬听雨在聚珍阁地位显然非常高，她沉吟起来，别人也不敢开口，片刻之后她再次问道：“易公子，听雨想冒然问问，这炼制丹药的大师……知道你出来卖丹药吗？”

It was evident that Ji Tingyu's status in Pearl Gathering Pavilion was exceptionally high, no one would raise any objection even if she muttered anything. After a brief moment, she once again asked, "Young Master Yi, I would like to take the liberty to ask - the alchemist who refined this pill... Does he know that you brought it out to sell?"
姬听雨如花的脸庞顿时变色，目光灼灼的盯着江逸，沉声问道：“易公子，此话当真？”
Ji Tingyu's beautiful face instantly lost its color. She fixed keen eyes upon Jiang Yi and asked somberly, "Young Master Yi, do you speak of the truth?"
姬听雨心里暗叹一声可惜，江逸如此年纪了才是铸鼎境二重，除非超级大家族用大量资源培育，否则这辈子成就有限。武者越修炼到后面越困难，凭借丹药不可能铸就一名强者，一般家族也消耗不起，至少天羽城内的家族没这个能力。

In her heart, Ji Tingyu sighed silently about how, unfortunately for Jiang Yi, he was already so old, yet his power level was only at a measly second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. Unless greatly large powerful family clans invested a great amount of resources on training him, otherwise his accomplishments would forever remain severely limited. The higher a martial artist cultivated his power level up to, the more difficult it got to increase his power level further. Relying on elixirs alone also could not instantly produce a powerful martial artist. The resources needed were something ordinary families could not afford to spend and consume on - at least, the family clans within Skyplume City did not have such an ability.
姬听雨打开房门走了出去，江逸却满眸迷茫，让他跟着炼丹师学习炼丹术？跟哪个炼丹师？难道是柳长老？可他已经死了啊，而且他只是一品炼丹师能强大到哪去呢？

一品Ji Tingyu opened the room door and walked out, leaving Jiang Yi whose pupils were revealing a look of perplexed bewilderment. He wondered to himself about her suggestion to continue following "that alchemist" to learn the art of alchemy. With which alchemist? Could she be talking about Elder Liu? What could he do, considering that he's already dead? Besides, how great a life could he have by being just a first-rate alchemist?
姬听雨摇了摇头道：“谁生下来就注定是王侯将相？我们的出身谁也无法决定，但我们的命运可以自己去主宰。我尊称你一声公子，并不是因为你的出身，天羽城青年俊彦多如牛毛，一般人我都懒得他们说话，你能懂我的意思吗？”

Ji Tingyu shook her head and replied, "Which person, upon birth, is immediately destined to be a great person? No one can ever determine one's own family background, but we can dictate and control our own destinies. I call you 'young master' with respect, not because of your birth or background. The number of youth in Skyplume City that are handsome and talented is virtually countless, yet I'm usually too lazy to even speak to most of them. Do you get what I mean?"
姬听雨暗暗惊疑，再也不保存实力了，双腿连连点在地面，速度如一阵狂风般朝江逸掠去，双手十指如在虚空弹琴，幻出一片残影，将江逸全身都笼罩进去。

Ji Tingyu was silently bewildered by what she had just witnessed. Deciding not to reduce and conserve her power any longer, she tip-toped and continuously stepped point by point on the ground as she moved in a sweeping motion towards Jiang Yi at a high speed, akin to a strong gale. The ten fingers on both her hands gestured like they were playing a magic guqin in mid-air, conjuring up an image figure of made from her hand gestures within which she entangled Jiang Yi's whole body.
姬听雨本怕一招就把江逸击飞了，所以没敢动用全力，还只是用了人阶的武技，那料到江逸竟轻松躲避开去？动作如行云流水，轻松自如。

Ji Tingyu was originally afraid that she would send Jiang Yi flying with just one move and, as such, did not dare to apply her full force in this initial attack. She had even used a Man-tier martial arts technique. Who could expect Jiang Yi to actually avoid the attack with such easy. His movements were relaxed and smooth, natural like moving clouds and flowing water.
姬听雨淡然一笑，解释道：“在外面你看了我一眼，立即潜藏身形，我只是有些惊疑。进来之后看你这体型又让我觉得隐约有些熟悉，最后看到你的鞋子，我才猜到的。”

Ji Tingyu calmly laughed and explained, "I was just somewhat startled how you took a look at me outside this room and immediately tried to hide your body. After we entered the room, upon seeing your build, I couldn't help but feel you seemed somewhat vaguely familiar. Finally I was able to guess after taking a look at your shoes.
姬听雨盈盈一笑，美得让人炫目，她美眸中光波流转，望着鹤大师笑道：“鹤爷爷，偌大的天羽城，炼丹没人比得上你，但论做生意……却没人比得过我。就凭这丹纹，要不是怕吓到这少年，我都会出十两紫金收购。如果用一点小钱，就能交好一位可能成为……丹王丹圣的炼丹师，这生意就太划算了。对了！鹤爷爷你千万不要派人去跟踪，否则激怒了那位神秘的炼丹师就得不偿失了。放心吧，这位少年很快又会上门的……”

丹王Ji Tingyu was full of laughter, her giggles making her beauty ever more dazzling. Moving the pupils of her heautiful eyes around to look at Master he, she smiled, saying, "Grandfather He, in a place as vast as Skyplume City, there is no alchemist on par with you, but when it comes to doing business... no one is on par wth me. Just based on this elixir vein pattern alone, if not for the fear I have of scaring away the young man, I would even be willing to purchase the elixirs from him for ten taels of purple gold. If I only have to use a little amount of money, and in turn receive someone who might become... an alchemist worthy of being an alchemist master or alchemist saint, such an exchange is truly value-for-money. Oh, right! Grandfather He, no matter what, do not send someone to follow him, otherwise, should we infuriate that mysterious alchemist, we would never be able to replace that potential loss. Don't worry, that young man would certainly return soon enough..."
姬听雨眼中带着淡淡的笑意，好奇的盯着江逸看，直到看得江逸忍不住了，才开口道：“易公子，好久不见！”

Ji Tingyu's eyes revealed a faint expression of happiness. She stared at Jiang Yi with much curiosity until she could hold it in no longer - it was only then that she opened her mouth to say, "Young Master Yi, long time no see!"

姬听雨眼中闪过一丝失望，沉默一阵才轻声说道：“我这次出关，听说你还在这当陪练所以过来看看。和你明说了吧，易公子，你上次送来的丹药很了不起，那位炼丹师以后会非常强大，所以希望你一心一意去追随那个炼丹师，不要在这浪费时间，在武殿内虽然修炼速度能加快一些，但你已经过了修炼的黄金年龄了，这辈子不可能有大成就。当然，我也想通过你认识那位炼丹师，从而建立某种交情，如果你能帮我，什么条件都好说。嗯……或许我的话有些直，希望易公子不要介意。”

Disappointment flashed in Ji Tingyu's eyes. She was quiet for a moment before speaking softly, "I came out of seclusion and heard that your are still here as a sparring partner, so I decided to drop by to pay you a visit. To be frank with you, Young Master Yi, the elixirs you delivered the last time were amazing. The alchemist who made them would become very powerful in time to come. It is my wish for you to commit yourself to the alchemist, rather than wasting your time here. The cultivation speed is indeed faster in the Martial Arts Hall, but you are already past the ideal age for cultivation, which means you may never amount to anything great in this lifetime. Of course, I would also like to acquaint myself to the alchemist through you, and establish some relations with him. If you could help me with that, any request you have could be easily arranged. Ah... perhaps my words are too candid, I hope Young Master Yi would not mind."
姬听雨走进了练功房，看到江逸还没进来，淡淡回头问了一句，目光在马黑旗和柳河脸上扫过，如画的眉头微微蹙了起来。

Ji Tingyu went into the Technique Practising Room; when she saw that Jiang Yi did not follow suit, she turned and asked in a dispassionate tone. With a glance at Ma Heiqi and Liu He, her eyebrows, as pretty as a painting, furrowed lightly.
姬听雨起身朝外面走去，走到门口时，才转身说道：“公子，我还是觉得你还是跟着那名炼丹师学炼丹术的好，那炼丹师……很强大，以后前途也无量，你跟着他这辈子荣华富贵无忧……”

Ji Tingyu stood up and walked towards the exterior of the room. She only turned her body around once she reached the door to say, "Young master, I still think it's best for you to continue learning alchemy from that alchemist. That alchemist... is very knowledgable and powerful, with an immesurable great future prospect. If you continue following him, you'll be prosperous and without worry for the rest of your life..."
姬听雨轻笑摇头，不予置否，她目光透过雅阁的窗口缝隙，望向远方的天空，微微一叹喃喃道：“神武国第一大商号有什么意思？我姬听雨将来可是要成为帝后的女人，怎么会一直行这充满铜臭的商贾之事？”

Ji Tingyu smiled faintly and shook her head, unwilling to comment any further. Through the small gap in the window in the elegant booth, her gaze turned to look at the faraway sky. She sighed slightly and muttered, "What's the point of being the number one merchanthouse in all of Divine Martial Kingdom? I, Ji Tingyu, am going to become the future wife of the king. How can I continue doing this greedy money-grubbing business of mercantile trading?"
姬听雨轻笑摇头，美眸内异彩涟涟，真诚赞道：“易公子才给了听雨一个惊喜呢，听雨刚才可是全力攻击的，别说你就算这里的金牌陪练怕是也挡不住吧？唉……可惜公子境界太低了，否则一定有一番大作为的。当然，公子也别泄气，这个世界不乏大器晚成之辈。“

Ji Tingyu smiled faintly and shook her head, her pretty eyes revealing a look of extraordinary splendor. She praised him with much earnestness, saying, "It was Young Master Yi who gave Tingyu a big surprise! I had after all just attacked with full force just now; to say nothing of you, even the gold token-grade sparring partners would be unable to block off my attacks, no? Sigh... unfortunately, Young master, your Cast Tripod Realm stage power-levels are too low, otherwise our match would definitely provide much assistance to my training. Of course, you don't have to feel discouraged or dejected, Young Master, there are many late-bloomers in the world who still end up accomplishing great things.
威胁吗？这是赤果果的威胁吧！
"Was this a threat? This was clearly a threat!"
存放丹药的丹房很宽敞，里面有两个三层大柜台，全部摆满了瓶瓶罐罐，都是丹药。
The storeroom where the elixirs were kept was very wide, containing two large three-tiered counters inside. The counters were filled to the brim with bottles and containers, all holding elixirs.
孙女？安儿才八岁啊喂？
Granddaughter? Is Lil An only eight years' old?
孤儿：“……”MD，一对智障！
Lonemoon: "..." Damn it, a pair of retards!
孤月&羿清：“……”原来河对岸那只五阶灵兽是她留下的？还以为哪个傻叉猎了灵兽居然不带走！
Lonemoon and Yi Qing: "…" So it turned out that the level five spirit beast on the opposite shore was left by her? They had been thinking which idiotic hunter had forgotten to take his spirit beast!
孤月&羿清：“……”突然想去检查一下自己是不是瞎。
Lonemoon and Yi Qing: "…" They suddenly felt like checking if they were blind.
孤月and羿清：“……”
Lonemoon and Yi Qing: "..."
孤月、羿清和一旁的郁红，瞬间想起了某项生物知识，一起上前齐齐压住了他的手，脸色刷的全黑了。
Lonemoon, Yi Qing and Yu Hong suddenly recalled some biological knowledge and stopped Radish at the same time. All their expressions were dark.
孤月一僵，隐隐觉得膝盖又中一箭。
Lonemoon froze at this comment, feeling as if someone had shot an arrow through his knee.
孤月一喜，果然还是有明白人的，顿时松了口气，不愧是剑仙，快劝劝你那外挂师父。只见羿清转身朝着沈萤行了个礼，一脸严肃的开口道，“师父，此时眼看着就要午时了，您……还没吃午饭呢！”

Lonemoon was relieved by his reply. At least there was still someone who could read the situation; Yi Qing certainly deserved to be a Sword Immortal. Quickly advise your bogus master. But then he saw Yi Qing turning to Shen Ying with a serious look on his face, saying, "Master, it’s going to be noon time, you… haven’t had lunch yet!”
孤月一塞，见他一脸再说一句就翻脸的样子，连忙改口，“是我失言。”转头看向还在淡定扒饭的沈萤，眼珠一转，只好曲线救国，“那个妹子……羿清的确是不可多得的人才，要是拜我为师，将来一飞冲天不是梦。如今他念及旧情不愿意，不如你帮我劝劝他。”

Lonemoon was dumbfounded. Sensing that Yi Qing would turn against him if he said another word, he quickly changed his tune. "My apologies, I spoke out of turn." Turning around, he saw Shen Ying still calmly eating her food. Another idea came to him. He would have to throw a curveball to save the situation. "Sister… Yi Qing is indeed a rare talent. If he accepts me as his master, his future will know no bounds. I know his reluctance is due to his loyalty to you. Maybe you can help me to persuade him."
孤月一头黑线，忍不住推了推旁边的羿清，“喂，这兔妖你们到底怎么认识的？干嘛对沈萤这么好？”简直就是言听计从。

Perplexed, Lonemoon could not help but nudge Yi Qing who was standing next to him. "Hey, how did you come to know this rabbit demon? Why is it so good to Shen Ying?" Why, it was taking orders from Shen Ying like an obedient child.
孤月一开始对这些弟子是没抱什么希望的，毕竟剑修之所以少，就是因为对修练的人要求极高。特别是对剑道的领悟超乎常人。羿清这种天生剑体除外，单看以前整个中青界只有他一个化神剑修，就连人才济济的上青界，能达到元婴的剑修也是屈指可数的。可见剑修修练有多困难。

Lonemoon did not carry much hope for these disciples in the beginning; after all, the reason that there were very few Sword Cultivators was because the requirements for people to learn in this way of cultivation was extremely high. In particular, their understanding of the Sword Dao had to be beyond the ordinary. In Yi Qing’s case, he was born with an Innate Sword Embodiment, but it was very rare to come by those who could even achieve the Nascent Soul stage as a Sword Cultivator as seen in the entire Middle Azure World in which there was only one Soul Formation Sword Cultivator. And this went true even for the Upper Azure World where talents were abundant. It needn’t be said that the path of a Sword Cultivator was extremely difficult.
孤月一惊，也顾不得生气了，转身就冲出了前殿。看着天上的劫雷，感应了一下全身开始暴涨的灵气。连忙双手结印布下了重重法阵，并启动了护山大阵。

Lonemoon was so shocked that he forgot his anger. He turned and rushed out of the front hall. Looking at the lightning tribulation in the sky, he felt the Spirit Qi in his whole body surge. Quickly conjuring a hand seal, he set up many layers of array formations and also activated an array to protect their mountain.
孤月一惊，到是没有想到薄家居然是这么厚道的人。魔界之门的确是她们发现的没错，但曲双城本就是薄家的地盘，现在被封禁，此方仙帝还他一块地方也是正常的事。就算他半点不提他们在其中起到的作用，别人也说不得什么。没想到他们得到新仙城的第一时间，居然是分他们一半？！

Lonemoon was surprised. He did not expect Pu Family to be such kind people. Yes, the door of Demon Realm was found by them, but Qushuang City was originally the Pu Family's. Now that the city is closed, it is normal for the Lord to grant him another place to stay. Even if he did not mention the rest that helped out in the process, other people would not comment much. Who would expect that their first reaction after receiving their new city, was actually to give half of it to them?
孤月一愣，她不会说的是兔王吧？
Lonemoon paused for a moment, could she be talking about the Rabbit King?
孤月一愣，眉头顿时又拧了起来，张口又闭上，犹豫了半天才回头继续看向前面道，“你那徒弟……这次闭关出来，修为最少也会到化神中期吧。”

Lonemoon hesitated and frowned once more. He opened his mouth to say something, then closed it again. He hesitated for a long while. Then, he explained, "That disciple of yours... After he comes out of the lock-up, he will at least be a mid-stage Soul Formation cultivator."
孤月一愣，突然想到了什么，嘴角一抽抽，莫名就不想问她干了啥是肿么回事？
Lonemoon paused and seemed to think of something. His mouth twitched and for some baffling reason, he did not feel like asking her what she had done.
孤月一愣，突然想到了什么，猛的睁大了眼睛，“你是说……”
Lonemoon was taken aback, his eyes widening abruptly as he suddenly thought of something. "Are you referring to…"
孤月一愣，突然想起个事，花好像就是植物的……那啥？
Lonemoon faltered, suddenly remembering something. Flowers seemed to be a plant's… something?
孤月一愣，突然明白了什么，猛的睁大了眼睛，不敢置信的扫向身边的众堂主们。众人纷纷回避，就连奚秋也转过了头去。

Lonemoon hesitated. Suddenly, he understood something. He opened his eyes even wider and turned to look at all the Hall Masters standing behind him. Everyone took a step back. Even Xi Qiu turned away.
孤月一愣，转头看向后面突然出现的人，呆了一下，猛低头看向圆石的影像，再低头，再看……

Taken aback, Lonemoon turned around to look at the person who had suddenly appeared behind him. For a moment he seemed perplexed, then all of a sudden he lowered his head down to look at the image on the round stone. Incredulous, he dipped his head still further, peering at the image again…
孤月一愣，还没反应过来，却听得背后突然传来咕噜噜的一阵古怪的声音，刚刚修为还在急速飚升的青亦，身上灵气顿时一泄千里，散得干干净净。

Lonemoon was stunned, unable to think of a response. Behind him, he heard a strange rumbling noise. A moment ago, Qing Yi's cultivation level had been increasing, yet now all his Spirit Qi was dissipating.
孤月一愣，这却发现，四周的景象起了变化，好像正被什么打散重组一样，不到半会一层层的石阶就出现在了两人脚下，直通向上空。

Lonemoon followed his gaze and realised that the surroundings were changing. It looked as though everything was being taken apart and re-organized.. After a few seconds, a flight of stone steps appeared before the two people, leading straight into the sky.
孤月一愣，顿时明白过来，“你的意思是说……如若他不懂得压制剑气，那你的仙气入他丹田中，即使他不知道方法，本能也会奋力反抗。若是他知道，又不可能任由剑气暴发？”

His word pulled Lonemoon up short, only for a quick second before she understood the situation, "You mean... if he is incapable of suppressing the Qi of sword, h will instinctively resist your Immortal Qi when you tried to enter his elixir field, no matter what. But if he knew how, why will he let the Qi break out?"
孤月一脸深意的拍了拍他的肩，“听我的没错，你将来会懂的。”
Lonemoon patted his shoulder with a knowing look. "Just listen to me. You will understand in future."
孤月上前一步，这才开口道，“你既已入我玄天宗，你剑体之事我当然不会说出去。剑修修行不易，今日起，你便拜入我门下，做我孤月的亲传弟子吧。”

Lonemoon took a step forward before answering, "Since you have entered my Blackheaven Sect, of course I will not tell reveal to others about your Innate Sword Embodiment. Sword cultivation is no easy task. From today onwards, I would like you to join our sect to become my personal disciple."
孤月不喜欢这群弟子，非常不喜欢。为了不让门派变成体修门派，他操碎了心，这群弟子要是收下了，那无敌派就彻底扭不过来了。

Lonemoon did not like the new disciples; he detested them. His heart was incredibly troubled over the future of the sect. He did not want them to become a sect of body cultivators. But If he accepted these disciples into the sect, there would be no hope for Invincible Sect to change its path.
孤月不禁打了个寒颤，单瞧这些丹药的数量来看，死在他们手上的人还不知道有多少。
Lonemoon could not help but shudder. Looking at the amount of elixir pills, the number of people who had died in their hands must have been considerable.
孤月与沈萤不得不退了出去，回到了那片放着炉鼎的草地上。刚一出来，就听得轰隆一声巨响，仙宫已经塌了大半，两个身影从里面飞了出来，冲向上空。

Lonemoon and Shen Ying had to step outside. They observed the duel from the field where the human cauldron was. The moment they stepped out, they heard a huge explosion behind them; half of the Immortal Pavilion had collapsed. Qing Yi and Yi Qing flew up from inside the Immortal Pavilion into the sky.
孤月与羿清交换了个眼神，看了看满满当当的高台才回道，“有劳轩辕家主。”
Lonemoon exchanged a look with Yi Qing, and after looking at the packed viewing stands, he replied, "Thank you for your trouble."
孤月与羿清在城内打听了一圈，算是把上青界的情况摸了个大概。
Lonemoon and Yi Qing asked around and began to get a good picture of the situation in the Upper Azure World..
孤月与羿清对视一眼，都是一副一言难尽的样子。
Lonemoon and Yi Qing exchanged looks, both not knowing what to say.
孤月也明白过来，顿时十几个人的视线，齐唰唰的看向了某个素菜。
Lonemoon understood and suddenly, the gazes of everyone settled on a certain vegetable.
孤月也注意到了地上的挺尸，转头看了沈萤一眼，默默的伸出了大拇指，这效率……不愧是友方外挂，值两袋灵石的价。

Lonemoon also noticed the stiff corpse on the floor, then he turned and looked at Shen Ying, silently giving her a thumbs up. This efficiency… She was indeed a cheater friend, worth two bags of spirit stones.
孤月习惯性的唤出了防护结界，沈萤刚皱了皱眉，羿清却上前一步挥出一剑，身上剑气顿时全数暴发出来，形成一把巨剑直接截断了那条火龙。

Lonemoon instinctively summoned his defensive shield. Shen Ying frowned while Yi Qing stepped forward and waved his sword. The Sword Qi surrounding Yi Qing's body erupted and formed a powerful sword, which Yi Qing used to slice the inferno dragon's body into two.
孤月仿佛习惯了他人惊讶的神情，淡淡的开口道，“你便是他们所说的那位金丹剑修？”
As if accustomed to the surprise of others, Lonemoon asked coolly, "You are the one they call the Golden Core sword cultivator?"
孤月全身仙气都散了，不可能再挡住这多余的一道天雷。
Lonemoon's Immortal Qi had all dissipated. There was no way he could withstand another strike of the divine lightning.
孤月再次低头看了眼曲双城，魔界之门虽然没有打开的迹象，但上面附着的魔气已经十分惊人了。特别是那些仙气浅薄的点，很明显就是仙脉快要压制不住魔门的趋势，之前那个闯入城主府里的魔族，可能就是钻空子出来的杂鱼，或根本还不是完整的魔族本体。

Lonemoon once again looked down at Qushuang City. Even though there are no signs of the door of Demon Realm opening, but the dense demonic Qi surrounding it is already enough to terrify them. It is obvious that especially at the places with significantly lesser immortal Qi than others, the immortal pulse cannot keep the door of Demon Realm shut any longer. Previously the demonic beast that had invaded the city had probably luckily entered the city through a gap, or it might not even be the complete true form of the demonic beast itself.
孤月几乎是用生平最快的速度飞到了迎缘峰，这才想起，没有问奚秋对方住在哪座洞府。他不得不用神识直接探查过整个山峰，才在峰底的一座小院里，发现了一道陌生的身影。

Flying at record speed, Lonemoon soon reached Yingyuan Peak. It was only then that he realized that he had not asked Xi Qiu which cave it was. He had to scan the whole mountain peak using his Divine Perception before finding an unfamiliar figure in a small yard below the mountain peak.
孤月出剑挡住最前面青尹的攻势，两道剑气相撞，残余的剑气瞬间就在四周劈出一道道的裂痕。两人修为相当，但孤月毕竟是剑修，剑气自然不同于普通修士，直接把青尹逼退了几米。

Lonemoon took out his sword and blocked Qing Yin's attack. The collision of the two swords released Sword Qi, creating slash marks in the surroundings. The two of them were almost equals in terms of cultivation, but Lonemoon was a sword cultivator afterall. His Sword Qi was different from ordinary cultivators. Qing Yin staggered backward from the impact.
孤月切了一声，直接翻了个白眼，他们这么多修士在这里，那妖怪又不瞎，引得出来才怪？傻子才会……
On hearing this, Lonemoon let out a snort of derision and rolled his eyes. There were so many cultivators here, the demon was not blind, why would it fall for this ruse? Only a fool would…
孤月刚一剑逼退了青尹，身前却迎来青岚带着游仙威压的一击，眼看着那一剑就要落在对方的身上。
Lonemoon had just overpowered Qing Yin with one move, when from beside him came a formidable attack from the Travelling Immortal Qing Lan. He braced himself for the sword to strike him.
孤月原本以为，凭着世家的地位，郁家怎么着也会要闹上一二回的，或是发动舆论威逼一下之类。却没想到他们认怂得这么彻底。

Lonemoon initially thought that the Yu Family would retaliate or at least argue with them at least once, given their reputation as an aristocratic family. Yet, it seemed that they had been beaten into full submission.
孤月原本是想厚着脸皮蹭顿饭，试试味道的。可惜最终还是没试成。奚秋突然急匆匆的赶过来，原本以为他是代表门派祝贺羿清结婴成功，他却直直朝着他行了个礼，满脸沉重的道，“师叔，出大事了！”

Lonemoon originally wanted to be thick-skinned and get a free meal to try out the dishes. However he still did not manage to try; Xi Qiu had suddenly rushed over. At first he thought that he was representing the sect to congratulate Yi Qing's successful Nascent Soul Formation, but Xi Qiu bowed towards him with a solemn face as he said, "Uncle Master, something bad has happened!"
孤月又说了一堆鼓励的场面话，这才沉声道，“近段时间你们可以先跟着我学些基本的术法，只是你们原本就有修为，我得先知道你们的具体情况才能开始教授。说说你们之前都学过些什么，修练的什么功法吧？”

Lonemoon continued with some more encouraging words before switching into a grave tone, saying, "All of you can learn some basic sorcery from me first, but since everyone already has some cultivation, I need to know your specific situations before beginning my teachings. Do share what have you learned before and what kind of cultivation technique you have practiced previously."
孤月只觉得一滴冷汗从额间滑了下来，还好醒得快，这一剑刚刚是要打在他身上吧？是要砍他的吧！
Lonemoon felt drips of cold sweat drip down his body. Thank goodness I regained conciousness. This sword was clearly headed straight for my body. It would have gone right through me!
孤月只觉得血压直线飙升，有种想把眼前人掐死的冲动，深吸了几口气冷静了下来，想了想，直接从身侧的储物袋里掏出一袋灵石咚的一声砸在桌上。

Lonemoon felt his blood pressure continue to rise. His head began to fill with images of him strangling her. He began to take deep breaths to calm himself down. Pausing to think, he then reached into the storage bag at his side, pulled out a bag of spirit stones and tossed them onto the table. They landed with a solid thud.
孤月叹了口气，眼看比赛快要开始，“我等不能在这久留，放心我们会在外面看着你们的，加油。”
Lonemoon sighed, then seeing that the competition was about to start, he said, "We can't stay here for too long. Don't worry though. We’ll be watching you guys from outside, so do your best."
孤月和奚秋都惊了一下，一时没反应过来，半会才意识到——这是上青界的人！
Lonemoon and Xi Qiu were momentarily perplexed before they finally came to a realisation — these were people from the Upper Azure World!
孤月和羿清是在找人的半路上听到这个消息的，几乎是在郁红那群人离开门派的一瞬间，他们就已经感觉到了。虽然早猜到这几人有问题，却没想到她们会走得这么急。孤月原本不想管，走了就走了，他们可以再招人。可是羿清却发现……沈萤也不见了！

Lonemoon and Yi Qing had heard about this news as they were looking on the streets for Shen Ying. They had felt it the moment Yu Hong and her group of ladies had left; they had known there was something suspicious about the group of ladies. However, they had never guessed that they would leave in such a hurry. Lonemoon wasn't bothered at first. They could leave if they wanted to as they could always find other people. But Yi Qing then realized… Shen Ying was missing too!
孤月和羿清脸色一白，齐齐上前一起捂住她的嘴。
Lonemoon and Yi Qing's faces turned pale. They both moved to cover her mouth.
孤月嘴角一抽，“你TM又变成人干嘛？”说好的乖乖待在坑里呢？！
Lonemoon's mouth twitched as he asked, "Why the hell did you transform into a human?" Where did your promise to stay in the pit hole go?!
孤月嘴角一抽，“啥意思？”魔界之门是老鼠洞吗？满地都是？“到底在哪里？说清楚点喂？”

The corner of Lonemoon's mouth twitched and he asked puzzledly, What does that mean?" Is the Door of the Demon Realm the rat holes? Is that why it is everywhere? Lonemoon asked persistently, "Where exactly is it? Could you be more specific?"
孤月嘴角一抽，“喂喂喂，搞清楚到底谁救的啊？再说她这些天，除了在旁边啃水果，什么都没干啊！”
Lonemoon's mouth twitched. "Hey, hey, hey, make sure you know who saved who! And besides, she has done nothing these few days except munch on fruit!"
孤月嘴角一抽，“现在是春天！”
The corner of Lonemoon's mouth twitched. "It's autumn!"
孤月嘴角一抽，“算了，我又不是丹修，而且它认定了你，就算我想跟它结契也会失败的。”
The corner of Lonemoon's mouth twitched. "Forget it, I'm not a core cultivator anyway. It's got its mind set on you. It wouldn't work even if I wanted to take it in."
孤月嘴角一抽，你丫是个饭桶吧？只记得吃。(╬◣д◢)
The corner of Lonemoon's mouth twitched. Do you know nothing but eating? All you care about is food. (╬◣д◢)
孤月嘴角一抽，喂喂喂，他啥时候是沈萤的下属了！不过这份传承确实很诱人。
The corner of Lonemoon's mouth twitched. Hey, hey, hey. When did he become Shen Ying's subordinate? In any case, this heritage did sound really attractive.
孤月嘴角一抽，想吃肉的只有你吧！果然是个吃货，什么时候都忘不了吃。
The corner of Lonemoon's mouth twitched. You're the only one who wants to eat meat! You're a foodie indeed — all you can think about is food.
孤月嘴角一抽，才明白他说的啥事。隐隐觉得额头升起一堆黑线，拍了拍他的肩膀道，“奚秋，你想多了。”凌云峰怎么没的，没人比他更清楚好吗！这还不是来不及解释嘛……绝对不是觉得太丢脸才没说的。

Lonemoon's mouth twitched as he understood what was being talking about. He faintly felt his forehead gathering wrinkles as he patted Xi Qiu’s shoulder and said, "Xi Qiu, you think too much." Nobody was clearer as to how Ling Yun Peak was gone! It was certainly because he did not have time to explain… absolutely not because it was too embarrassing to mention.
孤月嘴角一抽，拜托那些阵法是他布的好吗？说好的灵气感应强呢！剑仙你瞎吗？
Lonemoon's mouth twitched. Oh please, those arrays were set up by me. Where's the strong sensing powers of Spirit Qi! Sword immortal, are you blind?
孤月嘴角一抽，敢情自己说这么多，还比不过人家一句是吧！
Lonemoon's mouth twitched; despite all that he said, his words weighed less than one line from someone else.
孤月嘴角一抽，看着地上还眼泪汪汪瞅着他们的人，解释道，“他刚刚化形，还不习惯走路，所以才会这样，过两天就好了。”说着他忍不住上前一步，伸出手，“起来吧。”

The corner of Lonemoon's mouth twitched as he looked at the human-radish in front of them whose tears were now flowing. He began to explain, "It just took form and it's not used to walking, so that's why it’s behaving this way. It’ll be alright in a few days." He couldn't help but step forward. He offered a hand to the radish and said, "Stand up."
孤月嘴角一抽，瞪了她一眼道，“你不是有东西要给她们吗？”
Lonemoon's mouth twitched. Glaring at her, he said, "Don't you have something to give them?"
孤月嘴角一抽，突然想起了什么，“糕点不算饭！”他这不是太久没吃，偿了几口吗？要不要记这么久。

Lonemoon's mouth twitched. Suddenly he remembered something. "Pastries cannot be counted as rice!" He had tried a few mouthfuls as he had not eaten them for such a long time. Do you have to carry such a small matter in your memory for so long?
孤月嘴角一抽，脑海有什么叭叽一下断了，扬手就把锅铲扔在了地上，“你刚说啥？有种再给我说一遍。”他哗的一下扯下了身上的围裙，怒气冲冲朝她走过来，“老子堂堂一个化神尊者，上辈子加这辈子都没给人做过饭，以为我稀罕给你做啊！谁爱做谁做去，老子不干了！”

Lonemoon's mouth trembled and something in his brain snapped. He raised his hand and flung the spatula to the ground. "What did you just say? I dare you to repeat it." He tore off his apron in a huff and stormed toward her. "I am a Soul Formation Supremacy who has never cooked for anyone, whether it be in my past or present life. You think I like to cook for you! Whoever wants this job can have it, I quit!”
孤月嘴角一抽，转头瞅了瞅地上的‘罗汉’们，“他……他们这是？”
The corner of Lonemoon's mouth twitched. He turned around to frown at the Luohans. "They… What happened to them?"
孤月嘴角一抽，这丫还真TM是去收鱼干了啊喂！
Lonemoon's mouth twitched, She actually went to collect her dried fish！
孤月嘴角一抽，连忙转手把萝卜往沈萤的方向递了过去。
Lonemoon's mouth twitched. He hurriedly moved to pass the radish over to Shen Ying.
孤月嘴角抽了抽，两秒后……
Lonemoon's mouth twitched once again. Two seconds later...
孤月嘴角抽了抽，他是真的没有想到，羿清会已经有了师父。而且看样子，感情还很深。上下打量了眼这个还在狂吃狂吃的妹子，一时又探不到对方的深浅，只能试探的问。

Lonemoon's mouth twitched a little. He really had not expected that Yi Qing would already have a master and that their relationship would be so strong. He looked up and down at the girl who was still eating like crazy, but he was still unable to assess the depth of her skills. He decided to probe subtly.
孤月嘴角抽了抽，尼玛名字都说光了，让他说什么啊喂？转头瞪了两人一眼，半会才咬牙切齿的道，“牛化云！”还好他还有个本名，这两不讲义气的混蛋！

Lonemoon's mouth twitched. Bloody hell! All the names had been taken up, so what was left for him to say? Turning his head to glare at his two fellow mates, he replied through clenched teeth, "Niu Huayun!" Fortunately, he still had a real name. These two disloyal scum!
孤月嘴角抽了抽，脸色像个调色盘似的变好几番，半会才深吸一口气，顺手掏出一件扇子法器，抛出变成一个巨大的扇面，这才把她拉上去坐下。

Lonemoon's mouth twitched, and his complexion changed several times like a palette for blending colors. It took him a while before he took a deep breath and took out a fan Dharma artifact which turned into a gigantic fan, and he got her to sit on it.
孤月嘴角止不住的抽搐着，半天都没从这副热闹得，宛如年夜饭般的场景中反应过来。
Lonemoon's mouth could not stop twitching. He took a long time before reacting as it had not been so lively for a while; it was like a scene from a reunion dinner.
孤月回头看了她一眼，掩不住内心的激动解释道，“秘境就是独立于青界外的另一个小世界，里面的地图除了小一点，但自成一个天地。传说只有上古之时，才有开劈秘境的术法。现在的青界中，已经很少有秘境出现了。何况……何况这还是上古秘境。”

Lonemoon turned around to glance at her, barely able to contain his excitement. "The mystic realm is a small world that exists outside of the Azure World. Although the maps of mystic realms are smaller, they form entire worlds on their own. Legend has it that sorcery that can unlock the mystic realms only existed in ancient times. In the Azure World today, we hardly come across mystic realms. Much less... much less a mystic realm of the ancient times.
孤月回头看了她一眼，翻了个白眼，又回过头去了。
He turned to glance at her, rolled his eyes, and turned back to the radish field.
孤月在药丹峰发现一个密室，那密室极为隐密，若不是他精通阵法，怕是也发现不了。可那密室内却只是一个普普通通的练丹房。玉鼎身为药丹峰堂主，执掌整个药丹峰，本身就是八阶练丹师，玄天宗的丹药九成以上都出自药丹峰。身为堂主，他开炉练丹本来就是常事，根本没必要弄这么一个练丹密室。孤月心中疑惑，直到他看到密室内那几瓶还未来得及收起的成品丹药。

Lonemoon found a secret chamber in the Elixir Peak which had been so deeply hidden that if he had not been proficient in array formations, it would never have been discovered. However, this secret chamber was not just an ordinary room for refining elixir pills. Yu Ding, who was the hall master in charge of the entire Elixir Peak, was also an eighth-level alchemist; ninety percent of Blackheaven Sect's elixirs originated from Elixir Peak. As a hall master, refining pills had been part of his job, so there was no need to set up such a secret room for elixir refinement. Lonemoon was deeply puzzled, until he saw the bottles of completed elixirs in the secret room that Yu Ding had not managed to stash away in time.
孤月头上的青筋叭叽一炸了，“尼玛，有种以后你到是自己走？别变成萝卜抱我脚上啊！”老子都没嫌弃你重呢？！

The blue veins on Lonemoon's temples exploded. "Holy shit, how about you move around by yourself in the future? Don't turn into a radish and cling onto my leg!" I haven't even complained about your weight!
孤月实在是被这群明目张胆的强盗恶心到了，这些人根本就是为了那千叶草木灵来的，他们根本不关心那三位长老怎么死的，只是想趁着这个由头对玄天宗发难而已。

Lonemoon was absolutely disgusted by these audacious bandits. These people were clearly here for the Thousand Leaves Vegetation Spirit. They didn't really care how the three elders had died; they just wanted to use them as an excuse to make things difficult for the Blackheaven Sect.
孤月对这个即将转变成厨仙的剑仙彻底的绝望了，偏偏又不能让沈萤帮忙，不然这个吃货，一准直接带出个新东方厨师班来。他也只能咬牙接过了这几个人。

Lonemoon lost all hope with this Sword Immortal turned Chef Immortal, and he also could not let Shen Ying help out either; otherwise, this foodie might just teach a whole new oriental chef class. All he could do was to grit his teeth and take over the disciples.
孤月带着沈萤，直接朝着那个孤岛飞去，越是靠近附近的剑气就越浓，岛上方圆三里之内，已经完被剑气包围住了，再不能寸进，他只好停在半空看着前方那个被强大剑气与灵气包围的岛屿。空气中的灵气越来越浓郁，似是受到了什么吸引一样，混合着剑气一起朝着岛中压缩涌去，仿佛要化为实质一般。

Lonemoon brought Shen Ying along as they flew directly towards that lone island. As they got closer, the Sword Qi became denser; the Sword Qi had enveloped the island within a radius of 1.5 kilometers. He could only stop in midair to look at the island ahead that was engulfed in the strong Sword Qi. The Spirit Qi in the air was becoming denser as if attracted by something. They were combining with the Sword Qi and heading towards the island, seemingly compressing to become something solid.
孤月心下一喜，顿时明白了他的想法，“你走前，我殿后！”
A delighted Lonemoon at once realized Yi Qing's intentions. "You take the front, I'll guard the back!"
孤月心下一定，眼里闪过一丝欣赏之意，不愧是将来的剑仙，只是金丹就能一眼看出他修为，看来对灵气感应十分敏锐。瞬间觉得刚刚幻灭的东西，又补回了一点。

Lonemoon felt a little more settled, and a hint of appreciation crossed his eyes. Yi Qing was only a Golden Core cultivator, yet he could tell Lonemoon's cultivation level with a look, indicating that his Spirit Qi was highly developed. All at once, he felt the pang of his disappointment lessen a little.
孤月心下一惊，这么冲天的剑气，就算他也一不定能有，不愧是剑仙，这才短短数日，他已经完全领悟溶合了自己的剑意。
Lonemoon was stunned. Such surging Sword Qi was something even he might not be capable of summoning forth. In just a few days, Yi Qing had mastered and become one with his sword intent.
孤月心下一沉，顿时有种不详的预感，“拦住他！”
Lonemoon's heart sank with an ominous feeling. "Stop him!"
孤月心下沉，只想骂一句。
Lonemoon’s heart sank; he felt like cursing.
孤月心中一动，差点忘了还有这个仙魂了，这可是上古仙门的传承，也不知道有多少失传的丹方。
Lonemoon's heart skipped a beat. He had almost forgotten about the immortal soul. This was a heritage belonging to an immortal sect afterall — there could be many long-lost recipes.
孤月心口一塞，忽悠觉得脸好疼……
Lonemoon's heart seemed to pause and his face began to hurt all of a sudden...
孤月心口一滞，只觉得一口老血喷涌而出。他瞎了，一定是瞎了！
Lonemoon felt as if something was blocking his throat. A stream of blood suddenly spewed out from his mouth. He was blind. He must be blind!
孤月心底一喜，全身一松，整个人都倒了下去。虽然已经没了一丝余力，但觉得整个人都不同了，仿佛新生一般。原本还浓郁的灵气，莫名就觉得少得可怜起来，就连羿清原本让他觉得深厚修为，也浅薄了起来。

Lonemoon was overjoyed. His entire body slackened and he toppled forwards. Although he did not have a shred of energy left, he felt like a whole new person, as if he had just been reborn. The Spirit Qi which had seemed dense previously, now curiously felt pitifully thin to him. Even Yi Qing's cultivation, which he had highly regarded, now seemed weak to him.
孤月心底一紧，“难道他的元神有问题？”
Lonemoon's heart wrenched, "Could there be something wrong with his primordial spirit?"
孤月心底咯噔一下，“他也是游仙！”
Lonemoon came to a realisation. "He is also a Traveling Immortal!"
孤月忽悠了一圈回来时，戚橙雨这边已经结束了。刚刚还气熄嚣张的甘子睿已经彻底没了气息。戚橙雨也已经浑身是伤。她到是说到做到，拼着一股子气硬生生独自报了仇，没让别人帮半点忙。等到对方落下最后一口气，她本就摇摇欲坠的身体，仿佛终于懈下了最后一口气一般，直接瘫在了地上，手中染血的长剑也掉了下来。

Lonemoon came back from causing a distraction outside, and Qi Chengyu's battle had already ended. The originally arrogant Gan Zirui was completely devoid of breath. Qi Chengyu was also covered in wounds all over. She had indeed held to her word; she had fought on with all her might as tough as it might be to avenge herself, and did not allow anyone to help her. At the moment he took his last breath, her unstable body seemed to finally relieve its last breath and fell flat on the ground. The long sword stained with blood also dropped from her hands.
孤月想了想，转身去了凌霄峰，这毕竟是大事，也需要让其它两位尊者知道，以便尽快决定入秘境的人选。待各门各派的人聚齐再一起进入秘境。

Lonemoon pondered about something for a bit and then went to Ling Xiao Peak. This was a huge matter after all, so there was a need to inform the other two Supremacies so as to quickly decide on the members to be sent and wait for all the people from the sects to gather and enter the mystic realm.
孤月想得很好，那个游仙看起来不好对付，而且谁都不知道秘境里有啥？这种情况，只能开挂！以沈萤那变态般的实力，带个她比带上一打的化神修士都管用。虽然她懒了点，路痴了点，变态了点，麻烦了点，说话还气人了点，但在安全方面，的确管用。

Lonemoon had it all figured out. The Traveling Immortal looked strong and they didn't know what lay before them in the mystic realm. Given their situation, they had no choice but to play dirty. Shen Ying was disgustingly powerful. She would be far more useful than a Soul Formation stage cultivator. She might be lazy, lousy at navigation, a little perverted, troublesome, and annoying, but she was still a safe choice.
孤月想得很清楚，他们这浮峰灵植遍地，想要培养出一批弟子来还是很方便的。
Lonemoon had a clear plan in mind. It would be easy for them to nurture an entire sect using this land of spirit herbs.
孤月愣了一下，“我干嘛要让人破产？”
Lonemoon hesitated, "Why would I want to bankrupt anyone?"
孤月愣了一下，脸色变了变，咳了一声道，“没什么？就是想起了一些以前的事。”心魔的可怕之处，就是因为他利用人心的弱点，找到最软弱的一块，编织最好的梦境让人沉迷。所以入魔的人，即使看出这是自己的心魔，也不愿意出来。而他刚刚……回到了现代。

Lonemoon hesitated. His expression changed and he cleared his throat, "Nothing? I just remembered something that happened a long time ago." The scary thing about mental demons was that they made use of a person's weaknesses. Once they had a hold on the person's weakness, they would conjure up the perfect imaginary world to trap the person in. People who were trapped with their mental demons would not realise it even after they come face-to-face with their biggest weakness. Lonemoon had just... gone back to modern times.
孤月愣了愣，接了过去，像往常一样坐在了她旁边，想起之前的事，内心像是梗了什么，想说点什么，又不知从何说起。

Lonemoon hesitated, took the meat, and sat next to her like he always did. His heart felt heavy thinking about what happened earlier in the day. Lonemoon wanted to say something, but he didn't know where to begin.
孤月扫了他一眼，似是想说什么，却没有开口，半会又坐了回去，继续扒饭。
Lonemoon scanned him and started to say something, but he changed his mind and sat down. He continued to eat.
孤月抬头一看，只见前方不远处，一座高大的殿宇出现在眼前，整个殿宇纯白如玉，隐隐还散发着淡淡的荧光。
Looking up, Lonemoon saw a towering temple appearing in front of him a short distance away. The entire temple was as white as jade, emanating a faint fluorescent glow.
孤月抬头一看，果然上空还飘着那面鬼气森森的幡旗，浓黑如墨，跟三天前没有半点变化。地面之上他布下的净化大阵仍亮着白光，而其它几位堂主也坐在四周的阵眼处催动着灵气。

Lonemoon looked up and saw that the eerie gonfalon was indeed still floating above, looking as black as ink; it had not changed a single bit since three days ago. The huge purge array he had set up on the ground was still gleaming with a white glow, while the rest of the hall masters sat around the array powering the Spirit Qi.
孤月抬头看着眼前那座高耸入云的浮峰，半天没有回过神来。只见那峰上霞光满天，云雾缭绕宛如仙境，峰上灵气满溢，隐隐还能感觉到峰内数条灵脉涌动的气息。这样鲜活的灵脉比起玄天宗更强上数倍。

Lonemoon was lost in awe as he looked up to see a towering, floating mountain, so high that it reached all the way to the clouds, appear before him. The mountain was bathed in a beautiful afterglow and was encircled by swirls of mist like a scene from an immortal fairyland. Spirit Qi gushed out from the peak of the mountain and one could faintly feel the aura of several spirit veins throbbing within it. These vibrant spirit veins were several times stronger than those at the Blackheaven Sect.
孤月抬头瞅了瞅仍立在空中的大门，又转头看了看四周仍是没有散尽的魔气，“就算不过来，这里接下来可怎么办？”总不能让这些魔气，一直围在无敌派四周吧。

Lonemoon raised her head and peered at the Gates, still standing high above ground. She turned her head and looked around, still sensing the presence of demonic aura. "Even if they won't step foot, what are we to do next?" We can't just allow this demonic aura to loom around the Undefeated Sect!
孤月拂了拂衣衫，在她对面坐下，带些幸灾乐祸的道，“每年这个时候，金丹以下的弟子，都要分批出去历练，以提高弟子的对战实力，大致都是完成些凡间处理不了的委托，或是降服些做乱的妖兽之类的，相当于分组演习。”

Lonemoon patted delicately at his robes before sitting down opposite her. He could not help gloating as he informed her, "At this time of the year, the disciples below Golden Core level must go out in batches on an experiential training expedition to improve their battle readiness. It mostly involves taking on requests that those in the mortal world cannot handle, or subduing demons and beasts and the like, similar to a group training exercise."
孤月接过丹药，脸色沉了沉问，“这个多少灵石？”好歹也砸过他的场子，不好白拿人家的东西。
Lonemoon received the elixirs and asked in a serious tone, "How many spirit stones for these?" After all, Lonemoon did smash up his place. It wasn't nice to take the things of others for free.
孤月接过了自己的法器，怀疑的探试了一遍，发现并没有问题才收了起来。心底的疑问，却越来越多。这个魔修是谁？沈萤为什么要帮她？

Lonemoon received his dharma artifacts and inspected them with suspicion before putting them away. The number of questions in his mind only kept growing. Who exactly was this fiendish cultivator? Why did Shen Ying want to help her?
孤月接过她手上的圆石，捏了个诀又掏出几张符道，“拿着，这是寻踪符，刚刚我已经锁定了这人的气息，你们一会用这个找要容易些。”说完又不放心的加了一句，“记住……千万别暴露你们玄天宗的身份，我可不想背个串通魔修的罪名。”

Lonemoon took the round stone from her hand, produced a hand seal and then took out a few Dao talismans. "Take these, they are tracking talismans. I just locked in the aura of that person. You can use this later to find him. It’ll be much easier." But even after saying this he was still worried and so added, “Remember… don’t expose your Blackheaven Sect identity. I don’t want the crime of colluding with fiendish cultivators on my head."
孤月摇了摇头，正想叹一口果然年轻，顺便再提点两句。旁边啃了一天零食，现在还在啃着的沈萤却突然开口插了一句，“它喜欢吃鸡，你们可以抓几只鸡引它出来啊。”

Shaking his head, Lonemoon was about to say that they were indeed a green lot and then present his own views. But suddenly, Shen Ying, who had been sitting next to him eating her snacks, interrupted, "It likes to eat chicken. You can catch a few chickens and use them to lure it out."
孤月整个人都懵住了，怎么也没想到会有第八十三道天雷，“沈……萤？！”这到底怎么回事？
Lonemoon was overwhelmed with shock. He had never expected there would a eighty-third bolt of divine lightning. "Shen... Ying? !" What the hell was going on?
孤月是真的生气，他在这个世界几百年了，一路也算是顺风顺水，运气好到爆炸，随随便便修仙都能到化神。还以为一生都会这么顺下去，心底都快把自己当成了那些穿越主角了。虽然后来发现这个世界的真相，但好在跟他没什么关系。

Lonemoon was truly angry. He had lived in this world for a few hundred years, and the journey had been rather smooth sailing. He was also extremely lucky, as his cultivation of Immortality easily led him to Soul Formation level. He even thought that his whole life would continue to be as smooth. In his heart, he almost thought of himself as the main lead of a transmigration story. Although he later found out the truth of this world, that wasn't much of a concern to him.
孤月更想骂娘了，早知道刚刚就该把练丹炉上的门堵上了。
This increased Lonemoon's desire to curse at him. He should have blocked the entrance to the elixir-refining cauldron.
孤月有些头疼，八阶狐妖，相当于金丹后期，很明显这批历练的弟子对付不了。那妖只能是他，或是羿清来解决了，可外面这么大，他们上哪找狐妖去。

To Lonemoon, this matter was getting to be a bit of a headache. An eighth-level fox demon was equivalent to a late stage Golden Core cultivator. It was obvious that this group of disciples wouldn’t be able to deal with it. Only he or Yi Qing could handle it, but the area outside was so vast, he did not know where to start looking for it.
孤月条件反射的想接住萝卜，却发现它仿佛习惯了似的，瞬间从他怀里滑下去，抖了抖叶子缠到了他脚上，中途都没醒一下。
Lonemoon tried to hold onto the radish, but the radish reflexively slid down from his arms. Shaking out its leaves, it wrapped itself around his foot, never once waking up during the entire process.
孤月松了一口气，还好剑仙的智商还在。
Lonemoon heaved a sigh of relief. Fortunately, the Sword Immortal still retained his smarts.
孤月正打算御剑而起，只觉得腿上一重，低头一看，巧好撞进某只腿部挂件的视线里。
Lonemoon was just about to sword-ride when he felt a weight on his leg. Looking down, he saw something hanging onto his leg.
孤月气急，头一次感觉到说不出口的憋屈。轩辕家本就来者不善，根本没想过轻易放过玄天宗，这会只是借着草木灵的事，找个发作的理由而已。

Now Lonemoon was hopping mad. This was the first time he had ever felt this indignant. The Xuan Yuan Family did not come with good intentions. It was clear that they were not about to let the Blackheaven Sect off that easily. They were only using the Vegetation Spirit as an excuse to find trouble with them.
孤月没了办法，这不收也得收了，最终他也只刷下去了几个元婴期的修士。并不是她们资质不好，而是修为到了元婴期，都可以做个客卿了，没必要屈才做个弟子门人。而无敌派建派不久，还真不需要招收客卿。

Lonemoon had no choice but to accept them into the sect. In the end, he only sent a few Nascent Soul cultivators home. It was not that they had poor qualifications, but Nascent Soul cultivators could practically be guest elders in the sect. There was no need for them to join as disciples. Invincible Sect had only been established awhile ago - they really did not need to recruit guest elders just yet.
孤月没有犹豫，拎起受伤的印风，追了上去。
Lonemoon wasted no time. He helped the injured Yin Feng up and followed Yi Qing.
孤月浑身一僵，这是要加他入黑名单吗？半会干脆利落的答道，“我叫沈萤！”
Lonemoon stiffened. Was he going to add his name to the blacklist? After half a second, he said firmly, "I'm Shen Ying!"
孤月深呼吸了好几次，才压下满心卧槽，放开神识开始在眼前满山的碎石中搜寻起狐妖来，奇怪的是刚刚还十分明显的妖气，此时却突然没了踪迹。

It was only after taking a few deep breaths… that Lonemoon managed to suppress the curses in his heart. He activated his divine perception and started probing for the fox demon among the mountain of gravel in front of him. The strange thing was that the demonic aura which had been very pronounced until just now, had suddenly vanished without a trace.
孤月满脸怀疑的瞄了她一眼，却还是取下了身侧的储物袋，想了想从里面拿了个全新的绿色储物袋递给她，“喏，给。”

Lonemoon looked at her questioningly but nevertheless took out a storage bag beside him. After giving it some thought, he dug out a brand new green storage bag and passed it to her, saying "Here. Take.",
孤月点了点头，“嗯，我们无敌派刚刚成立，的确是在招收门人。”
Lonemoon nodded. "Yes, our Invincible Sect has just been established and we are indeed recruiting disciples."
孤月点了点头，放慢了御剑的速度，往前飞了出去。
Lonemoon nodded slightly, slowing down his sword.
孤月点了点头，看向那座高大的仙宫，光放在外面的一个练丹炉，就可以化成那样一番天地，那这仙宫之中，还不知道藏着多少他们未曾见过的东西。

Lonemoon nodded, looking at the towering Immortal Pavilion. If just that one elixir-refining cauldron could transform into such an amazing world, then heaven knew how many other things were hidden inside the pavilion that they had never seen before.
孤月点了点头，躲开身侧的游仙，转头集中对付起了印风来。
Lonemoon nodded as he dodged the Traveling Immortal's side attack. He turned around and focused his attention on Yin Feng.
孤月点头，再次探查了一番，仍是没有结果，都有些怀疑沈萤那天是不是眼花了，忍不住推了推旁边的人，“喂，你发现什么没有？”

Lonemoon nodded and conducted a search once more, but there were still no results. He even started suspecting if Shen Ying was hallucinating that day. He pushed the person beside him and asked, "Hey, did you find anything yet?"
孤月点头，转头看向旁边的人道，“郁红，你把思羽叫来。”
Lonemoon nodded and turned to the person beside him and said, "Yu Hong, get Si Yu over."
孤月猛的睁大了眼睛，顿时反应过来，大声朝着旁边的人喊道，“羿清，他们大半已经彻底入魔了，是唤不醒的。”
Lonemoon's eyes widened. He shouted at Yi Qing who was beside him, "Yi Qing, most of them are completely enchanted by their mental demons. We can't wake them up!"
孤月用力的拍胸保证。
Lonemoon patted his chest and made a guarantee.
孤月白了她一眼，“这是毒属性的凶兽。浑身都带着毒，你要不想死，可以试试！”说着上前一步，细细看了这头凶兽一眼，“不过……”

Lonemoon rolled his eyes and replied, "This beast is clearly toxic. It has poison all over its body. If you want to die, you can help yourself!" He stepped forward to take a closer look at the beast before he continued, "But…"
孤月的脸色瞬间就黑了，郁红几人被伤了根基，无敌派虽然灵植遍地，但单靠这些不足以治好。所以或多或少都会留下些隐患，虽然对修行的影响不大，但毁掉的容貌却一直没有修复。

Lonemoon's expression darkened immediately. Yu Hong and her fellow disciples’ Foundation Establishment had been damaged. Although there were spirit herbs growing all around the Invincible Sect, herbs alone could not heal the girls completely, so remnants of old injuries still lingered in their bodies. While these lingering injuries had not posed any great impact to their practice, their scarred faces showed no signs of improvements.
孤月皱了皱眉，事情已经很清楚了，沈萤说得没错，那个魔修并没有撒谎，这个甘子睿的确是个人渣中的人渣。想了想，他捏诀布阵，把这一片地区暂时隔绝了起来，以免让人发现，但这样也撑不了多久。

Lonemoon furrowed his brows. The matter had already become very clear; Shen Ying was right, that fiendish cultivator did not lie, and this Gan Zirui was indeed a scumbag amongst all scumbags. He fell into thought for a moment, then went ahead to form a seal and set up an array to isolate the whole area to avoid being discovered by others, but this would not last too long either.
孤月皱了皱眉，看来这个叫青尹的，是记恨上了刚刚在玄天宗时，他用威压逼退他的事。而且还打定了主意，会在里面为难他，还好他带了外挂。

Lonemoon frowned. From the looks of it, Qing Yin was a vengeful man. He still seemed to be hung up over his inability to force Lonemoon to step down back at the Blackheaven Sect. He also seemed to have made up his mind about making things difficult for Lonemoon in the mystic realm. Lucky for Lonemoon, he had the cheat with him.
孤月皱了皱眉，能将大海一剑劈开的实力，据他所知没有任何一个术法可以做到，就算是这个世界最强的化神大圆满的人，都做不到。看起来明明是个普通人，全身一点灵气都没有，甚至连修士最基本对灵气的感应都没有，为什么会有这样的实力。更离谱的是，她自己居然也不知道原因。

Lonemoon frowned. As far as he knew, no one could part the sea at one blow with a sword. Even the most powerful Soul Formation cultivator in the world could not do it. She seemed like an ordinary mortal without any Spirit Qi in her entire body. She didn't even possess a cultivator's basic response to Spirit Qi. Why did she have such strength? What was more outrageous was that she herself did not know why.
孤月皱了皱眉，能让仙气退避的，确实只有魔界之物了。
Lonemoon frowned. The only thing that can cause the immortal Qi to retract, is only things related to the Demon Realm.
孤月皱了皱眉，诧异的看向两人，犹豫了一会，才把萝卜从脚上拔了下来。
Lonemoon frowned, looked at the two of them in surprise and hesitated for a moment before taking the radish off his leg.
孤月皱头紧了紧，原来只是嫉妒，嫉妒自己的徒弟太厉害，并且超过了师父，所以才想毁了她？神经病吧，这人！
Lonemoon furrowed his brows — so it had been jealousy. Jealousy of his own disciple becoming so formidable, even surpassing her master, leading to him wanting to destroy her? This person is crazy!
孤月直接就扔挑子不干，却意外收到了一条消息，直接压下了他想辞职的想法。
Lonemoon was about to throw away his responsibility and quit, but upon receiving a certain unexpected news, he immediately suppressed the urge to do so.
孤月直接就累摊在了地上，看了眼现场唯一还站着羿清，还有那再次出现的，通往下一层的阶梯。喘了半会，再道，“我已经动不了了，接下来怎么办？还要上去吗？”

Lonemoon was so exhausted that he flopped himself down onto the ground. He looked at Yi Qing, who was the only one still standing and at the flight of staircase leading to the next level, which had reappeared. After panting for a while, he said to Yi Qing, "I'm bushed. What's our next move? Do we go up?"
孤月直接撕下半截被点然的衣袖，震惊的看着这片火海，这火居然连他的法衣都可以点燃。

Lonemoon immediately tore off the part of his sleeves that had been ignited by the flames. He looked with shocked eyes at the fiery inferno before him; the flames were so powerful that they could even set his clothes alight.
孤月眉头一紧，心底有个不好的猜测，一边把沈萤拉开，一边道，“退后，这山壁后面可能有东西。”
Lonemoon frowned. A terrible suspicion formed in his mind. Pulling aside Shen Ying, he said, "Get back, there may be something behind this mountain wall."
孤月眉头松了松，重新扫了众人一眼，到是他小看这些妹子了。能从那样地狱一般的境遇中爬出来，没有放弃，并且坚守着本心，又怎会畏惧这点苦难。

Lonemoon's brows relaxed as he scanned them again. It turned out he was the one belittling these girls. As individuals capable of surviving through such hellish situations and not giving up, staying true to their hearts, how could they fear a trial of this level?
孤月眉头紧了又松，看着眼前这个只剩一口气的魔修。做为正道修士，他确实从一开始就应该抓她回去扔给奚秋处置的。甚至莫名其妙的被沈萤拉来了悟剑峰，他也是打着，等事了结再动手的打算。

Lonemoon's tightly-knit brows eased as he looked at the fiendish cultivator who was on her last legs. As an orthodox cultivator, he did have the intention to capture her and throw her over to Xi Qiu for punishment. In addition, he had been brought to Sword Comprehension Peak by Shen Ying for some baffling reason. He had planned on taking action after all was over.
孤月眉头紧皱，险些要挡不住，有些惊讶的看向对方，这不是化神期的威压，这个人是……兵解的游仙！

Lonemoon furrowed his brows, almost unable to withstand it. He looked at the other party in shock; this was not the suppression from a cultivator at the Soul Formation stage, this person was… a Disintegrating Traveling Immortal!
孤月看了看那瓶子，发现的确是一般五品的丹药，也没有推辞，顺势收下了这个善意，“那就多谢轩辕家主了，以后若是急需什么难寻的药草，尽管来无敌派，我们也当尽力。”

Lonemoon eyed the bottle and realized that they were indeed fifth-grade pills. He did not go out of his way to turn down the gift and graciously accepted the Family Master's kind intentions. "Well, thank you, Xuan Yuan Family Master. If you have any urgent need for any rare herbs in future, feel free to come to Invincible Sect. We will try our best to assist you."
孤月眼光一转，得到了跟奚秋同样的答案，这个妹子一定是羿清没修仙前拜的师父，所以真的是个凡人，顿时放了心。

Lonemoon’s thoughts took a turn, coming to the same conclusion as Xi Qiu. This girl had to be Yi Qing's master from before he started immortal cultivation. So she really was a mortal. With that thought in mind, he felt reassured.
孤月眼里的怒火眼看着就要喷出来，却转瞬一冷，平静得有些诡异。突然一掀嘴角，朝着枫影缓缓一笑，如沐春风……

Lonemoon's fumes from his eyes were spewing out yet it turned calm all of a sudden, a little too spooky. Suddenly the corners of his mouth went up and he smiled at Feng Ying as if in a spring breeze...
孤月瞄了一眼，正疑惑小绿妹子是谁？转头却发现那个叫思羽的弟子，穿着一身绿色衣裙……
Lonemoon took a glance, thinking: who was Sister Little Green? Upon turning around to look, he realized that the disciple named Si Yu was wearing a green dress…
孤月瞅了瞅妖气的方向，只好扬手布下几层阵法，把整个客栈保护起来，这才回头对着众弟子道，“你们在此稍候，记住轻易不要走出阵外，我们去去就回。”

Looking in the direction of the demonic aura, Lonemoon had no choice but to set up several layers of array formations to protect the entire inn. Having done this, he turned back to the disciples and said, "You all wait here, remember not to step outside this formation. I will return in a while."
孤月瞪了她一眼，拿起桌上另一双筷子，扬手就朝她手上敲了上去，“不许扔，吃掉！说好了，三天才能到外面下一次馆子。这顿你给我好好吃下去，不许浪费。”

Glaring at her, Lonemoon picked up another pair of chopsticks on the table and rapped them on her knuckles. "Don't throw it away, finish it! You know you can only dine at a restaurant every three days. You make sure you finish up your food. Don't waste it."
孤月神情一冷，这才想起这个问题。对哦，狸猫说进镇子是为了防妖狐抢它的东西。到是什么特别的东西，连八阶狐妖都非抢到不可。

Lonemoon's expression hardened as he remembered about this matter. Yes, the civet cat had said that it entered the town to prevent the fox from robbing it. What was so special about this item that even an eighth-order fox demon had to have it?
孤月神识细细扫了一遍那株枯萎的草木灵，除了残留的灵气外，这枯叶的药用价值还比不上它那一把蒲公英呢？

Lonemoon used his Divine Perception to scan the withered Vegetation Spirit. Apart from the remnants of Spirit Qi, how could this withered plant's medicinal value not be comparable to those dandelions?
孤月穿越到这个修仙的世界已经三百多年了，漫长的时间他都快忘记自己曾经生活的那个世界。直到发现自己穿越到了一本书中，那些遥远的记忆才慢慢的浮现出来。

Lonemoon had already transmigrated into this world of immortal cultivation for 300 years. The long time that he had spent in this world almost made him forget about his previous life in the other world. It was only after realizing that he had transmigrated into a book that those faraway memories began to surface.
孤月突然有种有想它做成咸菜的冲动。
Lonemoon suddenly felt like turning it into a pickle!
孤月立马拆穿：“判断个毛，你丫就是迷路了吧。”
Lonemoon called her bluff: "Error in judgement, my foot. You obviously lost your way."
孤月立马捏了诀，一道法诀打了过去，那颗珠子挣扎了几下，半会才飘回了他的掌心中。
Lonemoon immediately casted a Dharma spell. The pearl seemed to vibrate in the same spot for a while before it finally floated into Lonemoon's palm.
孤月站到了一边，沈萤和兔王却已经准备出发去看地盘了。他只得跟了上去，就不信了，妖界这种地方，怎么可能找得出一处，没有妖气，灵力充裕的，还有灵脉灵植的……

Lonemoon stood aside. Shen Ying and the Rabbit Monarch were already making preparations to examine the site. He had no choice but to follow them as he didn't believe that they would succeed in their quest. How could there possibly be a place within the Demon Realm which had no demonic aura yet had plenty of Spirit Qi, a spirit vein and spirit herbs…
孤月第一时间将玉鼎的事告诉了掌门奚秋，对方也是一阵后怕，还好发现得早，才没有酿成什么大祸。但毕竟是上青界，再加上他们并不知道背后之人是谁，这个亏也只好和血吞了，表面只当什么事都没有发生。只是关于戚橙雨的追捕到底还是停了下来。

When Sect Master Xi Qiu was informed of the matter of Yu Ding by Lonemoon, he too felt the same sense of fear, but fortunately they had discovered the matter in time before it resulted in a major disaster. But after all, it involved the Upper Azure Sect and they had no idea who the mastermind behind it was. They had no choice but to accept their loss and act as if nothing had happened; it was only now that they called off their pursuit of Qi Chengyu.
孤月精神一震，神情格外专注，瞬间把刚刚一直暗自收敛的仙气，全释放了出来。原本残破的身体在仙气的激发下，迅速恢复，仙骨已成，直接迎上了最后一道劫雷。

His senses jolted, Lonemoon felt mentally focused. In an instant, he released his entire store of Immortal Qi that he had secretly converged within his body. Under the stimulation of this Immortal Qi, his damaged body was quickly restored and his immortal bones were formed. He was ready to face the last bolt of Lightning Tribulation.
孤月紧了紧身侧的手，深吸了一口气，寻回平常淡定的神情，才走入那个小院落。终于要见到未来三界第一强者，剑仙羿清了。抬头寻着剑气的气息看了过去，也不知道他实际上长什么样子，现在又在干什么，是练习剑法，还是参悟剑意，又或者是在炒菜呢？！

Flexing his hands, Lonemoon took a deep breath in an effort to restore his usual placid expression before entering the small courtyard. Finally, he was going to see the person who was going to become the greatest fighter of the Three Realms, the Sword Immortal Yi Qing. Raising his head, his eyes followed the trail of the Sword Qi. He had no idea what Yi Qing actually looked like and what he was doing at this moment. Perhaps he was practicing his swordsmanship, or perhaps he was trying to fathom sword intent, or perhaps he was cooking?!
孤月细一看，发现那居然是一碇金子！
Looking closely, Lonemoon saw that it was actually a piece of gold!
孤月细细把那阵法看了一遍，半会才开口道，“这看着像是一个隔绝阵，但这上面的法符跟普通的阵法又不同，看着挺古老的。”他皱了皱眉，“不过，那妖狐定是藏在这下面。”

Lonemoon looked at the array formation closely before replying, "It looks like an isolating array formation, but the Dharmic talisman on it is different from the normal ones. This looks ancient." Wrinkling his brows, he added, "But the demon fox is definitely hiding underneath it."
孤月细细查看那份传承，跟沈萤那张乌鸦嘴说的一模一样，除了部分已经失传的丹方以外，这份传承里有百分之八十以上的丹药，早就已经过时了。现有的丹方不仅出来的丹药效果更好，而且材料也更容易找到。

Lonemoon studied the heritage closely. It turned out to be just as Shen Ying, that jinx, had said. Apart from some long-lost pill recipes, 80% of the recipes in the heritage were for outdated pills and elixirs. The current pills and elixirs were far more effective and the ingredients required to make them were far more accessible.
孤月脱口而出，“血祭大阵！”果然。
Lonemoon blurted out, "Blood Sacrifice Array!" It had turned out as he had suspected.
孤月脸色一沉，偏偏身上像压着千斤重，根本动不了，连捏了好几个诀都没用。这到底是什么阵法，为什么连他都突破不了，而且好似还能吸收他们身上的灵气。他细一看阵法上的纹路，却发现上面都是些看不懂的法符，看着像是……上古的文字！

Lonemoon's face darkened in anger, but his body felt like it was being weighed down by a ton of bricks; he couldn't move at all. He tried producing a few hand seals but to no avail. What was this array formation that even he couldn't break through? And it also seemed capable of absorbing their Spirit Qi. He looked at the markings on the array formation closely, but found that they were inscribed in some incomprehensible Dharmic talisman characters; they looked like… ancient words!
孤月脸色一沉，见过不要脸的，没见过这么不要脸的。这话里话外的意思，就要他们将千叶草木灵白送他们。

Lonemoon’s expression darkened. He had met thick-skinned people before, but he had never met anyone as thick-skinned as Qing Lan. No matter how nicely he tried to word it, Qing Lan ultimately wanted them to give up the Thousand Leaves Vegetation Spirit to him.
孤月脸色一白，连忙布了个绝音阵，立马拉过了旁边的两人，“忘了取名字这种事，你们怎么也不提醒我？”
Lonemoon's face lost its color. He quickly set up a sound-proof array and turned to his two companions. "Why didn't you remind me that we hadn’t come up with a name?"
孤月脸色更沉了一些，似是在犹豫什么，半会道：“你们的情况我大致了解了，天色不早，修练可以从明日再开始。”眼神扫过旁边，一个拼命扒饭，一个帮忙递碗，还时不时发出叮叮当当声音的两人，顿时嘴角抽了抽。

Lonemoon's expression grew slightly graver and hesitated for a moment before saying, "I’ve gained an overall understanding of your situations. Since it's late now, let's begin practice tomorrow." As he spoke, his gaze swept to a certain person at the side who was desperately scooping up rice and another who was helping to serve it, both making the occasional clanking noises, and his mouth twitched.
孤月脸色更纠结了，“沈萤，你知道什么叫炉鼎吧？”
Lonemoon looked more perplexed. "Shen Ying, do you know about human cauldrons?"
孤月脸色更黑了，脑残粉果然没救了，“你昨晚到底干嘛去了？”
Lonemoon's face turned dark. That retard is hopeless. "Where have you been the entire night?"
孤月脸色沉了沉，半会才道，“化仙丹是一种可以修复仙骨的仙药，只有在仙界才会有。上古之时，三界还没有分开，那时的成仙之人也在同一片大地。这里是上古仙宫，所以才会有……”

Lonemoon's face fell. Only after a moment did he reply, "Immortal Formation Pills are Immortal PIlls that can heal immortal bones. They can only be found in the Immortal World. In ancient times, before the Three Realms broke apart, all the mortals who had achieved immortality remained in the same place. This is the Immortal Pavilion of the ancient times, therefore there are-"
孤月自认把一切都想好了，更是连夜制定出了厚厚一叠，整套的策划方案，包括如何培养弟子，提高门派整体水平，如果推广扩大门派影响力等等。自认为完全没有任何遗漏了，可等三人赶到上青城，摆好了架式，正准备收门人的时候，却遇到了一个严重的问题。

Lonemoon knew he had thought everything through. He had compiled a thick book of documents which detailed his plan. This compilation included manuals on how to train their disciples, how to improve the sect's quality as a whole and how to expand the sect's influence. In his mind, everything was in its place—it was fool-proof. All that was left was for the three of them to get to Upper Azure Town and set up their stand. The three of them proceeded to do all they needed to. Just as they were about to begin their recruitment drive, however, they met with a huge problem.
孤月花了好大一番功夫，才将这些疑似走上歪路的新进弟子拉了回来。
Lonemoon had spent a lot of effort to finally pull back those new disciples who were seemingly straying into the wrong path.
孤月被瞪得心一凉，一肚子心酸，剑仙现在这是连尊者都不叫了，这落差也太大了？
Somewhat shocked by Yi Qing's hostile glare, Lonemoon felt a pang in his heart. Now the Sword Cultivator did not even bother to address him as Supremacy. The difference in his attitude was glaring.
孤月走了过去，看了看那个已经打开的盒子，盒中原本的灵草已经干枯，叹了一声道，“这药草里的灵气已经被吸食干净了，你想开点。”原本以为那狐妖是用来练丹，不会这么快使用，没想到他却是为了救儿子，到底是晚了一步。

Lonemoon walked over and glanced at the half-open box. The spirit herbs in the box were all dried up. Sighing, he said, "These herbs have been sucked dry of their Spirit Qi. Take it easy..." He had thought that the demon was keeping these herbs to refine pills and wouldn't finish them so quickly. Little did he know that the demon was intending to use them all to save its son. Lonemoon was a step too late.
孤月赶到秘境门口的时候，各门各派已经来齐了。那座石峰外，密密麻麻的站满了修士。由于事先不知道，来的修士什么修为的都有。

As Lonemoon hurried to the entrance of the mystic realm, he quickly realised that the representatives from every other sect were already there. Cultivators of every cultivation stage had gathered around the peak. Clearly, they hadn't heard of the entry requirements.
孤月越加诧异的看了她一眼，“没看出来啊，你还是个这么有正义感的人？”居然不犯懒了，这完全不是她的风格。
Lonemoon grew more curious and surprised as he glanced at her. "I couldn't tell that you were such a righteous person?" She was actually not lazing around, totally different from her usual self.
孤月越听就越气，只想冲进人群缝上这些白痴的嘴。
The more Lonemoon heard, the angrier he became. All he wanted was to rush into the crowd and shut all of them up.
孤月越听就越纠结，这些剧情里都没有提过啊，宁子安这个主角一出场就是高大上，伟光正的正面角色，并没有提到他有什么特别的身份，后期甚至成了一方天帝，难道是他漏看了什么章节？

The more Lonemoon heard about it, the more confused he got. All these were not mentioned in the storyline. Ning ZiAn's entry was grand and glorious as a main protagonist, without any special identities. He even became a Heavenly Lord in the later part of the story. Could it be that she missed out on a chapter?
孤月越看就越惊奇，这就是剑仙成名的剑法，还只是纯粹的招式就有了如此威力，若是加上灵气想必会厉害十倍不止。而且这一招一式里居然已经有了剑意的影子，难怪他可以越阶打败芮糜。

Lonemoon became more intrigued as he watched. This was the sword dharma that the Sword Immortal was famed for. These simple strokes by themselves contained so much power, so the addition of Spirit Qi had to be able to make them at least ten times more powerful. Within every sword move, there already existed a shadow of sword intent; it was no wonder he was able to defeat Rui Mi despite the difference in their levels.
孤月跨出的脚一顿，半会还是收了回来。
Lonemoon paused the step he was about to take and then retracted it.
孤月身侧的手一紧，什么宗门大义，沈萤那家伙根本不会在意这些东西，轩辕家来再多的游仙又能将她如何。她特意带着千叶草木灵离开，只不过……只不过为了不让他为难罢了，因为他是玄天宗的孤月尊者！

Lonemoon clenched his fists by his side. So much for doing a favor for the sect. Shen Ying cared nothing for the sect. The Xuan Yuan Family's Traveling Immortals definitely wouldn’t be able to do anything to her. She brought the Thousand Leaves Vegetation Spirit away on purpose, but…. but she only did it so that Lonemoon wouldn't be put on the spot. Afterall, he was Supremacy Lonemoon of the Blackheaven Sect!
孤月转头看了众人一眼，半会才沉声道，“算了！看在你们也算是受害者的份上，我可以不计较你们混入我无敌派的事。如今事情已经解决了，你们该上哪就上哪去吧？”

Lonemoon turned to assess the group. A moment later, he lowered his voice and said, "Forget it! Since you girls were victims, I won't hold it against you for infiltrating my Invincible Sect. Since everything is solved now, you girls can go ahead to wherever you need to be."
孤月转身打算御剑，却撞进两双意味深长的眼里，“看什么看？”他顿时心底一梗，转头就瞪了回去，“你们对本尊的处理方式有意见吗？”

Lonemoon turned around and prepared to fly off on his sword, but his eyes met two deep, meaningful eyes. "What are you looking at?" His heart skipped a beat as he turned his head to stare back. "Are you unhappy with the way I handled things?"
孤月还来不及解释，羿清已经拎着清醒的另外两位家主飞了过来，比起印风来，另外两个人伤得更重，可见他刚刚没有留什么手。

Lonemoon had no time to explain. Yi Qing was already helping the two other family masters - now conscious - fly over to meet them. Compared to Yin Feng, the two other family masters were much more seriously injured. Clearly, Yi Qing did not hold back.
孤月还没反应过来，就被拖走了，下一刻他被推到了一个女子跟前，元婴修为，倾国倾城之姿，只是浑身的阴气四溢。
Lonemoon could not react in time and was dragged away. The next moment he was shoved in front of a lady of Nascent Soul cultivation, a beauty of the finest degree who also emanated Yin Qi all around.
孤月这会是真想骂娘了，“行了，现在说这些也没用了，两位还是想想有什么办法可以解决现在的情况吧？”整个无敌派，现在已经变成一片漆黑了，除了他们站立的地方外，到处都是魔气。

Lonemoon really wanted to swear now, “There is no point talking about it now. Why not you think about how to better the current situation?" The entire Invincible Sect, other than that very spot they were standing on, was pitched black with the Demonic aura.
孤月这才唤出了飞剑，拉着沈萤走了。
Only then did Lonemoon summon his flying sword and left with Shen Ying.
孤月这才回过神来，心底的充斥着满腔的怒火，快步跟上，“对，羿清，快说说你这不着调的师父！”
Lonemoon finally recovered from his daze. Filled with rage, he followed up quickly, "Right, Yi Qing, quickly reprimand that nonsensical Master of yours!"
孤月连忙回头一看，却不禁倒吸了口气。
Quickly turning his head to take a look, Lonemoon could not help but suck in his breath in surprise.
孤月连忙扶好桌上的杯子，“喂喂喂，干嘛突然站起来？”
Lonemoon quickly picked up the cups that had been knocked over, saying, "Hey, hey, hey. Why did you stand up all of a sudden?"
孤月追上两个人的时候，已经是正午了。离开玄天宗后，他是一路寻着羿清气息飞过来。他飞得很急，心底压着多种情绪，感动，愧疚，担忧什么都有，一心只想着赶紧追上那两个人。

By the time Lonemoon caught up with Shen Ying and Yi Qing, it was late in the afternoon. After he left Blackheaven Sect, he followed Yi Qing's aura until he found them. He had rushed all the way. In his heart, he felt a thousand different emotions: touched, guilty, worried… All he wanted was to catch up with Shen Ying and Yi Qing.
孤月都有些懵，刚刚明明没有看到她出场啊，怎么突然就进入三强了。一打听才知道，居然是因为……
Lonemoon was shocked. He had not even seen her fight. How did she suddenly make it to the top three? He only found out the reason after he asked around…
孤月长叹了一口气，“我们认识多久了？”
Lonemoon sighed loudly, "How long have we known each other?"
孤月随手捡起一个丹药瓶看了看，这才发现瓶上的封存阵法早已经消失，没了阵法的保护，年岁时长，里面的丹药自然就慢慢没了应有的效果。

Lonemoon picked up the pill bottle from the floor. On scrutinizing it, he realised that the sealing array formation had already vanished. Without the array formation, the pills inside would naturally have lost their intended effect as time went by.
孤月隐隐觉得一盒冷水当头淋了下来，刚刚的激动全消，在玄天宗干得久了，抢资源都抢习惯了。突然装了刷机外挂，还真是寂寞啊！

Lonemoon faintly felt a box of cold water over his head, all the excitement were diminished. After being in the Blackheaven Sect for so long, he was used to fighting for resources. Suddenly installing a rebooting cheat, so lonely!
孤月顺着她指的方向看去，那边仍是一堆碎石，并没有什么特别之处。出于对沈萤的信任，他快步走了过去，轻轻一拂那堆碎石，“咦？”

Looking in the direction she was pointing to, Lonemoon saw a pile of gravel there which looked just the same as the rest; he could not spot anything special about it. Out of trust in Shen Ying, he walked over quickly and glanced at the pile of gravel. "Huh?"
孤月顿时松了口气。为了不让沈萤瞎指挥，扰乱他的教学计划，他第二天特意在新建好的厨房与萝卜住的那片菜地之间，布了个传送阵。彻底断了她帮某厨子拿配菜时，必须要路过演武场的可能。

Lonemoon finally heaved a sigh of relief. On the next day, to prevent Shen Ying from giving nonsensical advice and interrupting his teaching plan, he purposely set up a transportation array between the newly built kitchen and the radish's plot of vegetation, thereby cutting off the need for her to walk past the area when she helped a certain chef take the side dishes.
孤月额间的青筋，叭叽一下断了，“你说句话会死啊？”这丫到底来干嘛啊喂？
Lonemoon felt as if a vein in his head just burst. "Would it kill you to say something?" What the hell are you doing here anyway?
孤月默默的给死不瞑目的青亦点了根烛，不过这烤出来的肉……真TM好吃。在吃完第五块肉排后，孤月越加担忧起自己的前途来。

Lonemoon respectfully lit a candle for Qing Yi, who lay there motionless with his eyes still open. The beast meat was… freaking delicious. As he finished up his fifth beast steak, Lonemoon began to worry about his future.

Lonemoon: "…" Fucking retards.

Lonemoon stood in shock. Was this radish looking down on him? He was sure it was!

Lonemoon: "…" This affair was turning into a bloody farce. Was this monster trying to be funny? Killing people and taking out their hearts, then doing charity at night. But why were only domestic animals like chickens and rabbits missing? Could it be that it was a fox demon?
孤月：“……”隐隐听到了什么幻灭的声音。

孤青比了个十的数字，继续道，“我们现在所在的是中青界，整个中青界的化神修士，不到二十人。中青界有三宗六派，我们玄天宗是三宗六派之首，共有三个化神者。当然我就是其中一个，其它二宗六派之中，还有八位化神。”

Lonemoon gestured the number ten, and continued, "We are currently in the Middle Azure World, and over here there are less than 20 Soul Formation cultivators. The Middle Azure World has the Six Schools Three Sects, and the Blackheaven Sect is the leader of the Six Schools Three Sects and has three Soul Formation cultivators. Of course, I am one of them, and there are eight more within the rest of the Two Sects Six Schools."
学习新的武技，并不能隐瞒他的身份太久，但此刻他只能拖一时是一时了。只要再给他一些时间，等他修炼到铸鼎境四重，就算马家要找他麻烦，他也有一些自保之力了。

Learning new martial arts techniques would not hide his identity for too long, but at that moment he could only try his best to drag out what amount of time he could lay his hands on. So long he could be given some more time, once he cultivated his power level up to the fourth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, even if the Ma Family wanted to give him trouble, he would at least have some ability to defend himself.
宁子安只觉得一股庞大的魔气扑面而来，无论是体内哪个人，顿时都消了声。可以感觉，眼前的魔故意收敛了魔气，但那般的威压仍是让人心惊。

Ning Zi An could only feel a strong demonic presence. Everyone was silent. Everyone within him. It was apparent, that the Devil up in front had restrained its "demonic energy", but the reckoning force still put Ning on his toes.
宁子安脸上的黑色魔痕顿时褪得一干二净，但比起之前来，气息瞬间弱了不少，脸色苍白，张口就吐出一口血来，就连着身上浓郁的仙气也消去了不少。

The black Devil Scar on Ning Zi An's face had vanished completely, but his strength had greatly decreased as compared to the past. His face was pale and he vomited blood as he opened his mouth. Even the strong Immortal aura on him depleted quite a fair bit.
宁子安醒来后才感觉到，四周那无处不在的魔气，仿佛是钢针一般正不断的往他身体里钻。脸上顿时闪过一丝不属于这个年纪的狂喜。

ffEbiquity of the demonic Qi was only felt by Ning ZiAn as soon as he woke up, as though steel needles burrowing into his body. Ecstacy that clearly did not belong to someone of his age flashed on his face.
宁子安顿时脸色一白，却没有说话。
Ning Zi An's face turned pale in an instant but remained silent.
Ning ZiAn was left speechless.
宁子安：“……”他这会是真的想哭了，嘴巴扁了扁，重重一哼，转头就埋进薄仪怀里，再不看她了。
Ning ZiAn kept quiet. He really wanted to cry this time round, but he pressed his lips into a line and let out a loud "hmph", before burying his head in Pu Yi, refusing to look at Shen Ying anymore.
宁小朋友眼里一亮，正要伸着小手去接，沈萤的筷子一转，糕点在他眼前晃了一圈，啊呜一下，塞进了自己嘴里。发出一阵，咔咔咔的脆响。

Ning ZiAn's eyes lit up and just as he was about to reach out for the pastry, Shen Ying's chopsticks worked faster and took the pastry right in front of his eyes and placed it in her own mouth, letting out crunching sounds.
宁小朋友瞅瞅糕点，又看了看她，小脸一皱似是在犹豫，半会还是顶不住诱惑似的，缓缓点了点头。
Ning ZiAn looked at the pastries before looking at her, as if he was hesitating. After a short while, he still could not resist the temptation and nodded his head slowly.
它一个弹跳蹦了起来，却不是逃走，而是转身朝着她咚咚咚的嗑起头来。
It did not flee after it leaped up. It began kowtowing to her instead, producing a series of thuds against the ground.
它兴奋的叫了几声，突然整个萝卜开始发出一道绿色的萤光。
It excitedly shouted for a few times, and suddenly the entire radish began to emit a green glow.
它完全没有方向，绕了一圈却一头撞到了树上，头顶的叶子晃了两晃。转身四周瞅了瞅似是发现没有可以躲的地方。突然朝她冲了过来，一下钻进了沈萤的衣服下摆里，鸵鸟一样瑟瑟发抖，只露出半截雪白的萝卜尖。

It had no idea where it was headed. After making one complete circle, it crashed straight into a tree, the leaves atop its head swaying. The radish quickly gathered itself together and looked for an escape route. To its frustration, there was nowhere it could hide. Suddenly, it ran toward Shen Ying and burrowed straight into her clothes. Shen Ying felt it tremble beneath her garments. Just like an ostrich hiding its head underground, the radish left half of its white body exposed.
它想了想，立马转头吩咐道，“来人，赶紧……赶紧的，查查宝库里还有什么……全都送到沈上仙的旧居去！嗯，一件不留！”

It paused to think for a moment. Suddenly, he turned and commanded, "Someone! Hurry... hurry, take stock of what we have in our treasury... Send everything to Exalted Immortal Shen's old address! And don't leave a single thing behind!"
它是不是瞎了，真的是好久不见的沈上仙写的吗？！可这世上把紫霞玄芝叫成萝卜的，也只有她老人家了。
Was its eyes playing tricks on it? Was this really the long-lost Exalted Immortal Shen writng to him? It must be - she was the only one who would refer to the Splendor Lingzhi as a carrot.
它留在地面的六条脚直直一蹬，再没了动静……
Its six legs, which were still above-ground, twitched a little before they went still...
它话还没说完，上空传来轰隆一声响，整个镇子的上空，突然一阵扭曲，咔嚓一下。原本笼罩在上空的透明阵法顿时碎成了千万片，化为点点萤光落了下来。

Before it had finished speaking, there came a loud bang from the sky. The upper atmosphere of the entire town suddenly buckled under, followed by a loud cracking sound. The transparent array that had formed a shroud in the sky suddenly broke into thousands of pieces, raining tiny bits of fluorescent lights from the sky.
它这一跪，其它的兔妖像是接收到什么信号一样，唰啦啦的跪了一地，朝她疯狂的嗑起了头。
Its action of kneeling seemed to have sent some sort of signal to the rest of the rabbit demons as they followed suit and quickly dropped to their knees and began to frantically kowtow.
它这才委委屈屈的走了出来，然后……一把掀开了下半身的衣衫。
It then walked out of its grievance and… made to tear off its lower clothing.
它这是在做梦吧，一定是的吧？
Was it dreaming? Was this real?
它顿时发出一声凄厉的惨叫，再也维持不住人形，在阵中痛得翻滚起来。
The blood fox broke out into sad and shrill cries; unable to maintain his human form, he tumbled about the array in pain.
The guard: "..."
守门的魔：为什么打我，我只是守门的？
Fiend that guarded the gate to the palace,"Why was I attacked when I simply guarded the door？"

实力最低都是铸鼎境二重，江豹江松等人赫然在列，如此多人就算他拥有铸鼎境四重的实力，怕是也很难安然无恙的走下西山。更别说他刚刚突破铸鼎境二重，丹田内的黑色元力只有六缕……

The weakest of the bunch had a power level at the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, with others like Jiang Bao and Jiang Song at ever-increasingly impressive power levels. With so many people there and then, even if he did have a power level in the fourth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, he would still have much difficulty leaving the Western Hills completely safe and sound. 家主肿成灯泡的眼睛，顿时睁开了一条缝！突然明白五位叔伯为何迟迟不归了，妈呀，这千叶草木灵居然是她的！太恐怖了。
The Family Master's eyes lit up and widened. Suddenly, he understood why five of his uncles had taken so long to return. The Thousand Leaves Vegetation Spirit belongs to her! That's frightening.
家兔啊！
What can I say, house rabbit!
富贵险中求！

对于柳长老，江逸并没有感情，不过人不是他杀的，却因他而死，他这几日时间很是不安和内疚。还半夜去了柳长老的坟墓前磕了几个头，洒了两杯黄酒。

Towards Elder Liu, Jiang Yi had no feelings at all. However, even though he did not directly murder the man, he had spent the past few days feeling uneasy and guilty. He had even gone to Elder Liu's grave in the middle of the night and kowtowed several times as well as poured two cups of yellow wine in front of the grave.
对于这个封印他是熟悉得不能再熟了，自从达到铸鼎境一重能内视后，他最少内视了这个龙形封印几万遍，他清清楚楚记得这龙形封印一共由一万零八千枚符文组成，而此刻少了一枚……

He was very familiar was this seal. Ever since he'd reached the first stage of the Cast Tripod Realm and could observe his inner conditions, he had observed this dragon-shaped seal for at least several tens of thousands of times. He remembered clearly that this dragon-shaped seal was made of a total of eighteen thousand runic patterns. At that moment, one of them was missing...
对方仍是僵立，他以为她没听清，又道，“道友灵气已尽，此战没必要再打下去。”好心提醒她认输。

The other party remained stiff. Thinking that she did not hear him clearly, he repeated, "Fellow Daoist, your Spirit Qi has already been used up. There is no point in continuing this battle." He was reminding her to admit defeat.
对方却只含糊的应了一声，“哦哦哦……”扒饭扒饭扒饭。
The subject of his pledge merely mumbled, "Oh oh oh…" and continued guzzling her food.

His opponent endured his pain, taking in a mouthful of cold air. Creating another knife-hand strike pose with his right hand and using them like claws, he circulated his Silk Hands technique and grabbed his opponent's arm.
Pulling his entire body forward, he shouted, "Twin-Dragon Stealing Pearl!"
Two fingers stabbed forward towards his opponent's eyes like arrows.
对方已经张口了血盆大口，眼看着下一波叫声就要响起。羿清一咬牙，握紧手中的剑，如今只能拼了。

对方愣了一下，身侧的手紧了紧，嘴角动了动。沈萤以为他要说什么，他却突然身形一转，背了过去。
The man hesitated and clenched his fist. His mouth twitched. Shen Ying expected him to say something, but he suddenly turned around.
对方没有回答，只是清冷的目光，利刃一般，直直的看着地上的背云兽。

对方没有回答，应该说完全没有理会他的意思，只是转头直直看向，还站在阵里的沈萤，半天没有回神。

对方的人实在是太多了，就算是一对一，她们也占不了任何优势。特别是一些筑基期的弟子，被对方威压一扫，就倒地不起了，最后勉强支撑的只有郁红和思羽。

对方被他的大喊声吸引了注意力，没有再去理会江小奴，冷笑一声，手掌一荡，朝他双手扫来！

对方铁拳破空而来，缺乏心理准备的江逸只顾着躲避，却没留神地面沟壑不平，于是在急退过程中一下踩空失去身形，待到回过神来时，对方的拳头已经近在眼前。

Jiang Bao’s iron fist flew through the air. Jiang Yi, unprepared to defend against such an attack, was focused entirely on avoiding the incoming attack. Even though he had only just started breaking the seal, his refining speed with the Jiang Water Art had actually increased by two times. Even though it was still much too slow, he was now able to see a thread of light through a door of hope...

He reached the Martial Arts Hall safely in under an hour, with the help of the wisp of black essence force he transferred to his ears halfway; in addition, he had deliberately picked the small alleyways on his way here, to ensure there was no one tailing him.

count his profit. Jiang Yi was intelligent and alert since young—as such he clearly understood the whole incident after mulling over it for just a short moment.

How dare you try to trick and harm Xiaonu to that extent? One of these days, this master will destroy you and your building and turn you into shreds..."

小绿妹子画风咋变这么快，突然想知道，她到底跟人家聊了什么？
