小胖子不留痕迹的收起手中的书册，苦笑的说道：“大哥，你能不能温柔点啊？这门坏了，我以后怎么睡啊！”

Fatty kept the book which he was holding in his hands, making sure not to leave any traces behind. He forced a smile and said, " Big Brother, can you be any gentler? How am I supposed to sleep with a broken door?
小胖子哑然失笑，摇头道：“江逸，其实你应该猜到了一些吧？否则你不会如此暴怒！江云海曾经是王府的内院总管，有一次他因为做错了事情差点被杀了，是一位住在王府女子出言求情这才被免一死，不过最后还是被打瘸了腿，此事在镇西王府闹的很大，很多人都知道，他认这位女子为主也是情理之中的事情。”

Fatty stifled a laugh and said while shaking his head, "Jiang Yi, actually you already guessed it, didn't you? If not you wouldn't be so angsty! Jiang Yunhai used to be the Lord's internal household Chief Supervisor, and once when he was almost killed because of his wrongdoing, it was a lady who lived in the household that pleaded for him that allowed him to live, though he was beaten till he was lame. This incident was well known throughout the Lord's household, and it made sense that he pledged his loyalty to the lady."
小胖子摇头苦笑解释道：“学院内不论学员的身份，只看学员等级。最低等的记名学员每天都得帮学院做杂活，否则将会被驱赶出去的，而且记名学员不能享受学院内的任何福利，除非你捐献大量的紫金，否则连静修室都没资格进去。普通学员则不用做杂务，还可以外出执行任务得到积分，至于精英学员，每个月都有免费积分，最顶级的天才学员更是可以无限使用学院任何资源……”

Fatty shook his head, explaining with a wry smile," The Academy doesn't lay emphasis on the background of her students, but the ranks of them. The lowest-ranked Registered Students are in charge of helping with the crappy jobs of each day in the Academy or risk getting expelled. Furthermore, unless you donate a large amount of violet gold, Registered Students are not given the rights to enjoy any benefits within the Academy, not even the rights to step foot into the Serenity Rooms. Regular Students, on the other hand, are not required to help out with the daily chores and can even gather points by completing outbound missions. As for the Elite Students, well, they're given free points every month. The highest-tier gifted students are even granted unlimited access to the Academy's resources..."
小胖子有些惊恐疑惑的叫道：“大哥，你说什么？我不懂啊！”
Fatty called out in fright and curiosity," Big brother, what are you talking about? I don't understand!"
小胖子翻了一个白眼道：“我们是什么？记名学员！学院内最低级的学员，就算有仪式也不是欢迎我们的！走吧，做事去了！”

Fatty rolled his eyes," What are we? We're Registered Students! Also known as the lowest-ranked students in the Academy. We wouldn't have been invited even if there was a Welcome Ceremony! Let's go and settle some matters!"
小胖子脸上的笑容凝固，面色认真起来，点头道：“行，大哥你说吧，你这人情我要定了。”
The smile on Fatty's face dissolved as he stiffened his expressions. He nodded and said," Sure thing, Big Brother. Tell me more, for I am dead set on this matter!
小胖子脸上露出一丝苦涩，摇了摇头道：“大哥先松开吧，我对你没恶意的。”
A sense of bitter agony filled Fatty's mind, he shook his head and said,"Big brother,please release me first, I have no ill intentions towards you.”

就像他说的，上面开始有了灵兽的影子，有的三五只一伙，有的上百成群。大多出现在岛上，水里也时不时会蹦出一只，每只体型都很大，远远的都能看到灵兽的身影。

就在这时，山顶的另外一边数人飙射而上，吸引了众人的注意。江逸连忙快速走进人群中，这才顺着众人目光看去，这一看之下他脸色立即沉了下来，来的是长孙家那位少爷，还有江麒麟小胖子钱万贯等人。

Just when the alchemist was about to throw the pill back into the porcelain bottle, his cloudy eyes suddenly lit up with two bright sparks. His facial expressions also became more solemn. With his eyes opened widely, he once again carefully inspected the elixirs.

The overwhelming sword intent caused the plants and trees around them to crack and fall to the ground. The Great Golden Sword continued to head straight for Lonemoon's body.

尽管不知道怎么赔？拿什么赔，江逸还是咬牙问道：“怎么个赔法？”
Even though he had no idea how to repay, or even what to pay with, Jiang Yi nonetheless gritted his teeth and asked, "How do you want me to pay it back?"

if one were to judge solely by his descent, he would be ranked foremost among the branch members. But despite this title, his actual position in the Jiang Clan was not much higher than that of the lowest ranking members of the family.

尽管他知道姬听雨找他并不是看上他了，尽管马黑旗和柳河也知道姬听雨不会看上他，但他还是感觉事情有些棘手了，红颜祸水！漂亮的女人一些无心之举很容易让爱慕他的男子做出一些冲动的事情。

尽管江逸以最快速度反应过来，扭转身子朝旁边躲避，同时架起“摔碑手”朝对方手掌推去，企图抵消一些力道。但让他无奈的是，那人的手掌只是被阻拦了一下就摧古拉朽的将他双手荡开，重重的拍在他的胸口上。

Jiang Yi reacted as quickly as possible by dodging to the side and struck out with his Wrestling Hand towards his opponent's palm in an attempt to offset some of the force. But what left Jiang Yi resigned was that the guard's palm had only been obstructed for a moment before he easily brushed away his strike, and smacked his palm heavily onto Jiang Yi’s chest.
尽管演武殿内的子弟天资都不算顶级，但身份地位任何一位都比江逸高。尤其是两名长得和江恨水有些像，同样英俊无比的子弟，这两人其中一人是江恨水的亲弟弟江顾水，另外一人则是刑堂副长老江云石的儿子江如狼。

Even though the descendants that were within the Martial Arts Demonstration Hall weren't of elite level, all of their status were superior than Jiang Yi's. Especially the two individuals who resembled Jiang Henshui's dashing facial features. One of them was Jiang Henshui's younger blood brother—Jiang Gushui. The other was Jiang Rulang, the son of Disciplinary Court's Deputy Elder—Jiang Yunshi.
尽管相差一个级别，但江顾水还是一个照面就被江逸踢飞出去，好在江逸似乎没有动用全力，否则他两条腿怕是要被伤了。

Even with the difference in cultivation of one stage, Jiang Gushui still got sent flying by the kicks of Jiang Yi. Luckily Jiang Yi didn't exert his full force, if not both his legs would have been injured too.
尽管走起路来还是一瘸一拐的，不过明显没有昨日那般疼痛了，江逸的心情也因此变好了不少。
Even though he was still limping, Jiang Yi was clearly not in as much agony as he was in yesterday, and this certainly improved his mood by much.
尽管这翊小姐拳头内没有元力灌注，但里面的力道却是十足，江逸此刻更加确定此人绝对是铸鼎境四重，多年来元力的温养滋润让她肉体的力量达到一马之力以上，攻击速度也快得可比铸鼎境二重武者，他没有元力那下场绝对很惨。

Even though this Young Mistress Yi did not inject any essence force into her fists, the strength in her fist attacks was very powerful. It was at that moment that Jiang Yi received even more confirmation that that person indeed had a power level up to the fourth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm.
Many years of using essence force allowed the strength of her physical body to reach up to one horsepower or more; her combat speed was also much faster than any martial artist with at the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. Without any essence force, his end condition would definitely be tragic.
尽管这速度比起家族的优秀子弟还相差甚远，他原先修炼一个月才能比人家一天，修炼速度比江家优秀子弟整整相差三十倍。但他坚信只要他不断的破解封印上的符文，他的修炼速度迟早会追上家族大部分子弟，甚至……远远超过。

Even though this speed was much slower compared to that of the outstanding members of the family clan, the amount he could originally refine in a month was equivalent to the amount others could produce in a day.
This meant his essence force refining speed was an entire thirty times slower than that of the outstanding members of the Jiang Clan. He steadfastly believed that, so long as he continuously removed more runic patterns from his seal, his refining speed would sooner or later catch up with the average clan members. Eventually he would... far surpass them.
居然是九尾血狐！
It was actually a nine-tailed blood fox!
山下的动静，把其它六人也惊醒了，纷纷跑出来查看。
The commotion below the mountain had awakened the other six sect members, who had come running out to investigate.
左肩膀传来的一丝隐痛，让沉思中的江逸清醒过来，他只能强迫自己暂时不去多想，还是先将伤口疗养好了再说。

The slight sensation of pain coming from his left shoulder jolted Jiang Yi, who was deep in thought, back to his senses. He could only force himself not to think too much for the moment and focus on getting his injury healed first.
左边冲来的是一名铸鼎境三重的子弟，他万万没想到，江逸不从其余两名铸鼎境二重武者那边突围，竟主动朝他冲来？联想到刚才江如鹰被他一拳轰飞，他内心有些打鼓，下意识的脚步一顿。

The descendant rushing from the left had a power level in the third stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. He absolutely failed to consider how, rather than trying to break through their attacks through the other two martial artists with power levels in the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, Jiang Yi actually rushed towards him directly instead. Connecting the dots and remembering how Jiang Ruying was sent flying with one of Jiang Yi's punches, his heart started throbbing somewhat strongly and rapidly. He made the decision in his mind to stop himself in his tracks.
巧的是几个月前轩辕家有两位游仙在中青界陨落了，其中原由不得不令人深思。
What was even more mysterious was that just a few months ago, two Traveling Immortals from the Xuan Yuan Family had gone missing in the Middle Azure World. The reason for that remained unknown.
巧的是水木灵根，也是公认最适合炉鼎的人。
Coincidentally, a person with a Water Spirit Root attribute was also regarded as being most suitable for use in sexual enslavement.
巨兽一声惨叫，缩了回去。巨大的头颅上，皮肉绽开，血红一片。
The beast shouted tragically and retracted its head. Its forehead split open and blood flowed out of its wound.
巨兽沉默了半会，才发出一声低沉的回应，“嗯。”
The beast fell silent and thought for a moment. Then, it let out a soft grunt of acknowledgement.
巨剑挥落，火龙呼啸，巨大的灵气相撞，瞬间暴发刺目的白光，冲击力顿时把整个仙宫的一切化为了灰烬，孤月不得不把沈萤拉到了那个练丹炉的背后，借助仙器的强悍才躲过那一波冲击。

The Great Sword flew downward and the inferno dragon roared. There was a great collision of Spirit Qi, causing an explosion of blinding white light which turned the remainder of the Immortal Pavilion to ashes. Lonemoon grabbed Shen Ying and they both hid behind the pill refining cauldron. They were only able to survive that explosion because of the strength of the immortal artifact.
巨大的骸骨巨人大步朝天庭内踏去，它们那庞大如小山般的身躯，每奔走一步都能踏出虚空震波，荡出一道道涟漪，传出一阵阵沉闷如击打战鼓的响声。

The skeleton giants took wide steps toward the Heavenly Court, their massive bodies as huge as a hill. Ripples vibrated across the vast expanse with every step they took, transmitting deep sounds akin to that of war drums.
已经来不及了，下一瞬，沈萤身影已经出在了郁海珩身后。
It was too late, the next moment, Shen Ying was already behind Yu Hai Heng.
已经来不及了，只见瞬间草木翻飞，精美的殿宇开始土崩瓦解，整个偏殿像从中间被切断一般，轰隆隆的倒了一大片，发出巨大的轰鸣，满地都是残垣断壁，一片尘地飞扬。

It was too late. In a moment, all the grass and plants uprooted. The beautiful Palace Wing flew up together with the earth on which it had stood. The palace wing split right down the middle, making a huge roar that caused the dust to fly from the ground and fill the air.
布满阴气的四周已经暗了许多，魔修的阵法中间，却再次疯长出更多的荆棘，有了黑气的遮挡，对方的攻击越加的猛烈。羿清砍断几条荆棘，却发现对方的直接朝着后面的两人而去。

Engulfed in Yin Qi, the surroundings had become much darker. Even more thistles emerged from the center of the fiendish cultivator's array formation. With the black smoke being used as a shield, the opponent’s attacks became more aggressive. Yi Qing cut down a few thistles, but he realized that the opponent was aiming for the two people at the back.
师叔，果然厉害！
Uncle-Master was indeed formidable!
干嘛呀这是，又不是五一，这么喜欢劳动吗？
Why are they being like this? It's not labor day. Do they really like laboring so much?
年纪和江逸差不多，体型却比江逸胖上几圈的江如虎一怔，面色尴尬起来，他很清楚柳长老的脾气，他要是敢私自去拿丹药，柳长老发飙了，他父亲都顶不住的……

At a similar age as Jiang Yi, yet with a figure several times fatter than Jiang Yi, Jiang Ruhu was instantly stumped and his face gave a look of awkwardness. He was very aware of Elder Liu's temper. If he dared to retrieve the elixirs by himself, Elder Liu would surely fly into a great rage. Even his father couldn't protect him from Elder Liu's anger...
年轻的英俊公子感受到江逸复杂的目光，在江逸脸上扫了两遍，他有些迟疑的问道：“你是……江逸？”
The young suave man felt Jiang Yi's complicated stare. Sweeping a glance across Jiang Yi's face, he hesitatingly asked, "You're... Jiang Yi?"
幻影拳！
"Phantom Punch!"
幻海凶险不适合带太多人，所以此行只有他跟沈掌门，孤月尊者貌似还有事没办完，所以也没打算去。只是临行前突然拉着他耳语，满脸郑重的道。

The Mirage Sea was dangerous and it was not convenient for people to travel in large groups. This time, Yi Feng was only going to bring Sect Master Shen along. Supremacy Lonemoon had no intention to join them, since he still had matters to attend to. Supremacy Lonemoon pulled Yi Feng aside before they set off and left some very strange instructions.
幻海多异兽。
There were many beasts at the Mirage Sea.
幻海是位于上青界最边沿的一片大海，传闻它宽广无界，没有人知道具体有多大，海内多岛屿，由于人迹罕至所以异兽丛生。满布各种高阶异兽，甚至有连易家都未听闻过的，有些连高阶修士都不足以与之匹敌。

The Mirage Sea was a sea located at the boundaries of the Upper Azure World. Many said that it was broad and unbounded. Nobody knew exactly how wide the sea was. There were many islands in the middle of the sea. Since these islands were inaccessible to people, many animals inhabited them. The islands became filled with all kinds of powerful beasts. Even the Yi Family had not heard of some of the beasts on the islands. Even high-level cultivators were no match for some of these beasts
序章 天帝崩 神兵裂！
Chapter 0: Prologue - Fall of the Celestial Thearch. Shattering of the Divine Armament!
应该说，这两人为了小孩的入学问题，真是操碎了心吗？为了找个好老师，还免费提供学区房。
Actually it should be said that these two adults are really overly worried about the child's education. To find a good teacher, they would even be willing to provide lodging for the teacher.
店老板是一个胖胖的中年人，一看紫金一张脸立即笑得谄媚起来，一边笑着一边伸手朝柜台上的金叶子抓来：“嘿嘿……这位客官，一枚灵神丹十两银子，总计一两紫金。”

The store owner was a chubby middle-aged man. Upon seeing the purple gold, his face immediately lit up with a wide smile and a charming expression.
As he smiled, he reached his hand out and tried to grab the gold leaf on the counter-top. "Hehe... my dear customer, a Spirit Pill costs ten taels of silver. The total cost of your order is a tael of purple gold."
废丹药效不明，万一服用出了问题，那可就是一名炼丹师一辈子的污点。
If the efficacy of an useless elixir was questionable and should problems surface after consumption, it would become a stain forever tarnishing an alchemist's reputation.
废丹，顾名思义那就是炼废的丹药。
Useless elixir - as the name implies, they were elixirs that were refined and deemed to not be suitable for use.
开玩笑！
What a joke!
开花跟脱裤……
Blooming flowers and taking off pants...
异口同声。
At the same time.
弟子一：“是呀，我怎么没有想到呢，可以引蛇出洞啊！”
Disciple 1: "Yeah, why didn't I think of it, this can lure the snake out of its hole!"
弟子三：“太好了，不如我们今天晚上就布置一番。”
Disciple 3: "Great, why don't we lay out the plan tonight."
弟子二：“师妹真聪明，看起来眼生，不知是哪峰的弟子？”
Disciple 2: "Junior Sister is really smart, you look unfamiliar, which peak's disciple are you?"
弟子五：“我去布置阵法！”
Disciple 5: "I am going to set up the array!"
弟子六……
Disciple 6…
弟子四：“好，就按这位师妹说的办，我去买鸡！”
Disciple 4: "Good, we'll adopt Junior Sister’s idea. I will buy the chickens!"
弟子立马领命飞走，不到半会，咚咚咚的钟声就响彻了整个玄天宗的上空，所有传送阵法应声关闭。

The disciple took off immediately after receiving his orders, and within a moment, the Che Ming Bell rang throughout the entire Blackheaven Sect, shutting down all the transportation array formations.
强忍着内心的暴怒和左胸撕裂般的痛楚，江逸大喊一声欲吸引对方的注意力，同时双手如两根海藤般朝对方的手掌缠去。

Holding back the violent rage in his heart and the searing agony he felt ripping through his left chest, Jiang Yi shouted aloud to draw his opponent's attention while using both his hands to entangle his opponent's hands like two sea vines.
强忍着内心的贪念，江逸老老实实的取了一枚最低级的元力丹，还有三枚最低级疗伤用的黄参丹就匆匆离开炼丹房，朝荣管事所在的管事房走去。

Resisting with great difficulty the greediness in his heart, Jiang Yi with great humility retrieved a Essence Force Elixir, the lowest-quality pill, as well as three pills of Yellow Ginseng Elixir, the pill with the lowest medicinal healing power, before hastily leaving the alchemy lab and walked in the direction of the Housekeeping Chamber where Chief Rong was located.
当下他什么也不顾了，立即盘坐打坐运转无名功法提炼黑色元力。这黑色元力消耗太快太快了，关键的时候总是不够用。这次他准备多存点，一次提炼四五个时辰，不睡觉直接修炼到天亮，尽可能的提炼多一些，好明早一次性把伤势彻底恢复。

At the moment he did not care about anything else, and immediately sat cross-legged to meditate and circulate the nameless cultivation technique to extract more black essence force. The consumption of this black essence force was way too fast, and there was never enough to use during critical moments.
This time he prepared to store extra—by not sleeping and instead extracting for eight to ten hours until the sky turned bright. He aimed to extract as much as possible so that he could once and for all get his wounds fully recovered the next morning.
当下他全力朝江逸攻击，拳拳用尽全力，眼中都是凶光，显然不把江逸揍趴下绝不罢休。

Yi Longyu's attacks were now at full throttle, each fist thrown held his full power and there was a nasty look in his eyes. It was obvious that he would not rest until he had Jiang Yi beaten into the ground.
当下他立即变招，拳头在空中一幻，化作三道拳影朝马飞砸去。
Jiang Yi promptly changed his technique, transforming his fist into three fist silhouettes which flew at Ma Fei.
当他刚将元力朝脑袋输送上去时，准备玩个新花样，那股融合元力从左眼角的攒竹穴经过时，他的左眼突然黑光一闪，他下意识的眨下眼睛，突然发现整个世界都变样了！

just when he wanted to transfer the essence force to his head, the merged essence force passed through the Zanzhu acupuncture point at the corner of his left eye. Suddenly, a black light flashed across his left eye. When he subconsciously blinked his eyes, he discovered the entire world in front of him had changed completely!
当他睁开眼的时候，小奴正在做饭，她那背对着他正在洗菜的身子看上去好生瘦弱。
When he opened his eyes, he saw Xiaonu preparing a meal. Her back was facing him as she washed some vegetables, and he could not help but notice her skinny, delicate figure.
当日塔破之时，里面源源不断溢出的阴气，惊坏了众人。谁都想不到号称直通仙界的仙塔，里面却隐藏得如此可怕的阴气。以至于整个华元城都受到了影响，阴气弥漫数月不散，灵气灭绝，修士纷纷迁出不敢随意靠近，如今的华元城再不复当年仙城的景象，俨然已经成了一座死城。

After the pagoda broke open, Yin Qi continually flowed out of it, frightening everyone. Nobody thought that what was known as an Immortal Pagoda which linked directly to the Immortal World would be filled with so much Yin Qi. The entire Huayuan City was affected as a result - the Yin Qi did not dissipate even after several months and the spirit Qi remained scarce. The cultivators left the city in groups. Nobody dared to even come near Huayuan City unncessarily. Far from being the central important town, Huayuan City was now just a dead town.
当江逸发泄完最后一腿时，江豹惨叫连连地朝远处滚了足足一丈远才停下。后者强忍着左手和身上的痛楚，手忙脚乱呲牙咧嘴地爬起来，一边喊：“江逸，你给我等着！”一边拔腿朝山下逃。

After Jiang Yi vented with his final kick, Jiang Bao cried out in agony as he rolled a full ten feet away before stopping. He bit his lips to suppress the searing pain and scrambled to his feet.
"Jiang Yi, just you wait!" Jiang Bao shouted as he ran down the mountain.
当然，或许也是因为姬听雨今日的看轻，激起了他心底的傲骨，他也想证明给这个绝色倾城的女子看一看。
Of course, maybe it was also because of Ji Tingyu's belittlement today, that awakened the proud rebel in him. He wanted to prove himself to this woman whose beauty could cause cities to fall.
当融合元力从左胸口附近经脉路过的时候，江逸下意识的停了下来，内视了一下伤口处。
When the merged essence force passed through the meridians near his left chest area, Jiang Yi subconsciously stopped and used his inner vision to observe his wounds.
当金光从出现到消失的半柱香过后，让全部冥军瞠目结舌的是，方圆数百里的偌大天庭竟然消失不见了，地面只留下一个无比巨大丑陋的深坑。

From the appearance of the golden light till it vanished, it took the time for half an incense to burn. What left the Netherworld army flabbergasted was that the massive Heavenly Court, which spanned hundreds of kilometers, had actually disappeared, leaving only a huge, ugly abyss.
当黑红长袍老者出现的那一刻，虚空上方那些数不清的阴兵，骸骨巨人，尸人和尸兽全部单膝下跪，发出一道整齐却沉闷的呼喊。
When the red-robed elder appeared, the yin soldiers, skeleton giants, zombies, and beasts all genuflected and bowed while shouting out in unison.
彻底碎了升仙梦的青亦陷入疯狂了，连抓了好几瓶丹药吞下去，发现仍是没有任何用处，开始脑羞成怒的盯向门口的三人。

Qing Yi's dream of achieving Immortal Ascension was now in shambles and he had officially lost his mind. He frantically grabbed the pill bottles around him and swallowed all of their contents. When he realised that they were not having any effect on him, he turned to glare at the three people standing at the entrance.
彻鸣钟已响，玄天宗已经发现她做下的事，各种离开的通道都已经封锁，她想要闯出来十分困难，原本只想顺手抓个人质，试试运气。却没想到，她的运气居然这般好。她抓着人一路从山门出来，没有一人阻挡不说，即使遇到了巡视的人，也好似看不到她们似的避开了。看来老天都在帮她，让她报此血海深仇！

The alarm bell had sounded, signifying that the Blackheaven Sect had discovered what she had done. The various escape routes left were all sealed off. It would be extremely difficult for her to break out of this place. Her original intention had been to find someone to use as a hostage during her escape. In this she was unexpectedly lucky. She had not only taken a hostage but also managed to leave the mountain exit with her hostage without being intercepted. Even the guards on patrol that they encountered on the way did not seem to see them. It seemed that even God was helping her, letting her take her revenge!
往常洗好的衣物，本是风月楼的人带进内堂的，但今日风月楼的人却没有出现，一名老妈子“主动”叫江小奴和她一起把衣物送进内堂。

Normally, the clothes that have been washed would be brought into the inner court by servants from Fengyue Brothel. Today, however, no one from Fengyue Brothel appeared; instead, an old chambermaid took the initiative to order Jiang Xiaonu to help her bring the clothes into the inner court together.
很多人纷纷对视一眼，露出错愕之色，在场的二十人有大半都欺负过江逸。把江逸打一顿那是轻的，有几次都打得吐血了，但他们从没有见过江逸求饶，更别说……主动认怂要从他们胯下爬过了。

One after another, many people took a glance at each other's faces, giving an expression of astonishment. Out of the twenty people at the scene, over half of them had bullied Jiang Yi before. Beating up Jiang Yi was a small affair with a light sentence, and he had been beaten up to the point of vomiting blood several times before. However, none of them had ever seen Jiang Yi beg for forgiveness, to say nothing of... directly admitting defeat and agreeing to crawl between their legs.
很多次江逸也想出去做工，赚些银钱补贴家用，但都被小奴坚决阻止了。说族里规定的事务也就罢了，他可是江家的少爷呀，少爷将来终究是要做大事的人，怎能到外面去做这种下贱的杂活呢？

There were many moments when Jiang Yi had wanted to head out to work, to make some money and supplement their daily expenses. But these overtures were all strongly rejected by Xiaonu. Jiang Yi was a scion of the Jiang Clan, a person destined to do great things! To say nothing of the work demanded by the family, how could a scion like himself head out to do this kind of lowly menial work?
很快一道消息传遍了整个江家大院，家族十大长老之一，江家唯一的炼丹师柳长老，就在刚才不知什么原因突然猝死在自家院子内。

News spread quickly throughout the Jiang Residence that one of the top ten elders of the family clan, Elder Liu, the only elixir-refining specialist of the Jiang Clan, had suddenly passed away in his own home for unknown reasons.
很快他就理清了思路，对方被他击伤两人，还认出了江家的武技显然有所顾忌，否则这管事怎么不出手？反而喝止护卫住手。既然对方暂时不敢打，要谈？那是好办了，只要能保住他和江小奴的性命，其他倒是好说了。

He quickly cleared his thoughts. He had, after all, already injured two of his opponent's men; additionally, his opponent recognized the martial arts techniques of the Jiang Clan and had evidently become apprehensive. Why else would that housekeeper not retaliate against him, but rather call for his guards to stand down? Since the opponent temporarily did not dare to fight any longer and asked to negotiate, why not? It would probably be easier to deal with—so long as he could protect Jiang Xiaonu's life as well as that of his own, anything else would be secondary.
很快他确定了一点，不管他父亲是不是江别离，他都不会相认，反正做孤儿这么多年，他也习惯了。其次他要想办法见江云海一面，把事情彻底弄清楚，再想办法掩藏身世。

He quickly confirmed that no matter if his father is Jiang Bieli or not, he would not acknowledge him. Anyway he had always been an orphan all these years, and he had long got used to it. Secondly, he confirmed that would find a way to meet Jiang Yunhai to make things clear, before thinking of ways to hide his true identity.
很快动静便大了起来，只见这座雄城上方的虚空中接连不断地裂开裂缝，一个个周身浸染着血肉的人类尸体和巨兽尸体纷纷钻出，它们的周身俱缭绕着诡异的暗灰色符文。还有无数全身笼罩在符文黑甲内，只能看见一双红眸的阴兵不断涌出，在很短的时间里就把天庭附近的虚空给全部遮住，占据。

Soon, the commotion grew in intensity. The rift at the top of this huge city continued to widen and out came hordes of the walking dead—skeletal bodies of human and beasts, all covered in blood and festering flesh. They were enveloped by some strange greyish glowing symbols. Besides that, there were numerous red-eyed, black-armored runic yin soldiers pouring out. They quickly blocked off and occupied the void surrounding the Heavenly Court.
很快她就发现了一丝不对，从容淡然的小脸上出现一丝惊疑和动容，她的那双丹凤眼也亮了起来，樱桃小嘴发出一丝惊呓：“咦？这丹药外面的纹路有古怪，难道，这是传说中……”

It was not long before she discovered that something was not right. A look of shocking confusion and strong emotions appeared on her small tranquil and calm face. Her red phoenix eyes also lit up as her cherry-like mouth released sounds of uncontrollable surprise, saying, "Huh? The vein lines on the exterior of this pill is strange. Don't tell me, is this the legendary..."
很快所有人却是一怔，因为江逸从怀中掏出的是一个用纸包裹的黑乎乎东西，根本不是紫金，那刘管事立即醒悟过来，沉喝道：“飞少小心。”

Soon however, everyone became slightly stunned when Jiang Yi took out something that was definitely not purple gold, but a black substance wrapped up in paper. Housekeeper Liu realized immediately and yelled, "Young Master Fei, look out."
很快江小奴取来肉干，两人对着清水就干嚼起来，江逸这才有时间问道：“小奴，今天是怎么回事？我总感觉这事不正常，是不是风月楼故意设计坑你？”

A few moments later, Jiang Xiaonu retrieved the jerky, which the two gulped down drily with just plain water. Jiang Yi finally had the time to inquire, "Xiaonu, what happened today? I keep feeling something is not right with this entire incident. Did the people at Fengyue Brothel scam you intentionally?"
很快江逸又想起一件事，内心更加的茫然不安起来，柳长老死了，以后再也没有废丹了，他拿什么炼丹？怎么赚钱还债？

Jiang Yi quickly thought of another thing that left him increasingly uneasy and at a loss. With Elder Liu's death, he would no longer have any more rejected pills. What would he use to refine more pills? How could he earn money to repay his debts?
很快的全灭了！
They were dead real quick too！
很快，江逸冷得让江如虎浑身一颤的声音响起：“江如虎，你中计了！今天不打断你四条腿，我江逸名字也倒过来写……”

It was not long before Jiang Yi's voice, so cold that it sent a shiver down Jiang Ruhu's spine, rang out saying, "Jiang Ruhu, you fell for my trick! If I don;t break your four limbs today, I too will write my name 'Jiang Yi' in reverse..."
很明显这管事见小奴虽然瘦瘦弱弱，面黄肌瘦的，但五官长得很是精致，准备培养几年用来接客，所以故意设了陷阱想让她卖身青楼，几年后替他们赚取脏银。

Evidently, the housekeeper must have seen Xiaonu and thought that, though she was skinny, weak and pale-faced, she still had exquisite and pretty facial features; as such, he was ready to groom her for a few years before using her to receive guests. Thus, he deliberately set up a trap to make her sell herself to this brothel, and in turn, help them earn dirty money after a few years.
很显然他这个阵只完成了一半，阵中的血还不足以凝结成血云，也就是说他的下一步……
Obviously, he had only completed half of this formation; the blood in this array was not enough to condense into a blood cloud, which meant that his next step…
得！逃不了了。
Sh*t! It is too late to run.
得，你们爱咋咋地，他不管了！
Fine, if they wanted to make a mess of things, he would wash his hands of them!
心下一惊，兵解成游仙以来，这还是第一次，他毫无察觉就被人近了身，猛的睁大眼回头一看，却撞进一张一脸随意的脸。

Qing Lan's heart jumped. From his days as a soldier to the present, he had never experienced something like this. It felt almost as if he got possessed. His eyes widened as he turned around. His face nearly collided with another, which had a visibly more relaxed expression.
心口有点塞，他刚想多问几句，岛上突然响起几声轰隆隆的雷响，一道电光闪过，原本满岛飞舞的风刃，瞬间全消。
His heart stilled. He was just about to ask more questions when a loud crash came from the island. They saw a bright flash. The black wind blades which filled the island just seconds ago were gone.
心好累……
So tiring...
心好累！
His heart felt exhausted.
心底顿时一沉，带些戒备的扫了对方一眼，隐隐还放出了神识，却发现那人身上居然没有半点灵气。原来是个凡人。
His heart immediately sank and he became on guard. He glanced at the girl, emitting a faint aura of Divine Perception. The aura revealed that she did not possess any Spirit Qi. She was only a mortal.
心情顿时有些复杂，想到正事，立马又回过神来，连忙把几人请了进去才沉声开口道，“当日接到孤月兄的传信后，我等就已经在城内进行了排查。虽没找到所谓的魔界之门，但确实发现了一些不寻常之处。”

His mind was still in a confused state but when he thought of the reason why they were here, he immediately recovered his senses. Hurriedly, he invited his guests in before speaking solemnly, "After receiving Lonemoon's message that day, we had already conducted a search in the city. Even though we did not find the so called "Door of Demon Realm", but we did find something amiss."
忍不住满意的转头看向旁边的便宜徒弟，却发现他自始至终，只是安静的坐在桌边看着她吃，连手都没抬一下。
Turning to look at her cheaply-gotten disciple in satisfaction, she discovered that he had been sitting motionlessly at the table all the while, silently watching her eat.
快步上前伸手接过白泽手里的花道，“多谢白……白道友，两位一路辛苦，不同先去客房休息一番？”

He walked briskly and reached out to receive the flower that Bai Ze was holding out, "Thank you, Bai... Fellow Daoist Bai. You have come a long way. Why don't the two of you go to our guest room to rest for awhile?"
快速吃完早饭，江逸查看了一下小奴的伤势，发现上了药后好了很多，也就不去管她了。回到自己房间内，取出在炼丹房内拿的黄参丹吞服下去，等药力发作了再运转黑色元力辅助疗伤。

After gobbling down his breakfast, Jiang Yi checked on Xiaonu's wounds. On finding that her wounds had healed well after applying medicine, he decided to no longer feel too much concern. Returning to his own room, he retrieved the Yellow Ginseng Elixir he had taken from the alchemy lab and swallowed it. He decided to wait for the medicinal power of the elixir to take effect before circulating black essence force to facilitate the healing process.
快速而准确地清点着草参，江逸只花了大半个时辰就将四号田清点完毕。随后他快步朝山下冲去，虽然身上的伤势还没全好，但却行走如风，整个人都变得精神奕奕了起来。

With speed and accuracy, it took him almost an hour to finish counting the herbs in Plantation Four. Although he had not fully recovered from his injuries, he dashed down the mountain like a breeze, feeling full of drive and spirit.
快速走出西院，江逸朝丹药房所在的南院走去。已是清晨江家开始热闹起来，不过倒是无人在意江逸这个落魄的旁系少爷。

At a fast speed he left the Western Court, Jiang Yi walked in the direction of the South Court, where the Elixir Room was located. As it was already daybreak, the Jiang Residence was getting lively and bustling, but no one concerned themselves with the down-and-out disfavored collateral descendant Jiang Yi.
怀着参观毫宅的心情，沈萤直接走了进去。洞内更大，看起来就像个灵石矿一样，地面墙壁到处都是上品灵石，地面很是平坦，四周空无一物，只是正中间团着一只巨大的……雪白毛团？

Shen Ying gave in to her desire to explore the cave. The inside of the cave was huge and it looked just like a spirit stone mine. The floor and walls were all covered in superior-grade spirit stones The floor was ssmooth and there was nothing else in the cave, save for a huge... white ball of fur in the center?
怀着满心的感动，他低头一口一口的啃着她手里的万年冰参，直到吃完。几乎瞬间，他体内的灵气开始复苏，断裂的经筋开始修复。

Filled with gratitude, he lowered his head and chewed at the ten-thousand-year-old Ice Ginseng in her hand until there was none left. Almost immediately, the Spirit Qi in his body began to recover, and his severed meridians started to rejuvenate.
怎么两个人进去，却出来了三？
How did three people come out when only two went in?
怎么办，鬼王面前，化神以下完全没有回手之力，下一次攻击怕就……
What to do? No one below Soul Formation level could stand against the Ghost King. He was afraid that the next attack would…
怎么突然多了这么多人？
Why are there so many people here all of a sudden?
怎么觉得这个对话这么熟悉?脑海中顿时浮现出羿清那张脑残粉的脸。
Why did this conversation sound so familiar? Yi Qing's face of a brain damaged fan immediately surfaced in his mind.
思羽一喜，之前一直绷紧的神经这才松了下来，激动看向沈萤。
Delighted, Si Yu finally relaxed her nerves and looked over at Shen Ying excitedly.
思羽一惊，再退已经来不及了，只好一跃飞到上空。收敛剑气，化出数百道灵剑，围绕在周身，挡住那些无处不在的雷光。

Si Yu was shocked, but it was too late to avoid it. She thus leaped into the air and controlled her Sword Qi to summon forth hundreds of spirit swords which surrounded her to block the lightning everywhere.
思羽一愣，习惯性的低下头，往郁红身后躲了躲。
Embarrassed, Si Yu instinctively bowed her head and hid herself behind Yu Hong.
思羽却呆了一下，眼睛刹时一亮，就连其它围观的妹子也是一脸晃然大明白样子，“我明白了，多谢掌门指点！”

Si Yu stood there blankly for a while before her eyes lit up along with the rest of the girls around them. With a look of revelation, she said, "I understand now. Thank you for your guidance, Sect Master!"
思羽只能连连躲避，一开始还有些慌乱，半会又马上镇定下来。一边躲还能一边运用剑招，劈开周身的雷光。不到片刻场上除了雷光外，还迷蔓着剑气。

Si Yu could only hide. She had panicked from the moment the battle begun, but she quickly calmed herself down. She alternated between dodging the lightning bolts and using her sword techniques, thus managing to swiftly avoid all the flashes of lightning around her. Within moments, the lightning on stage became mixed with the brilliant flashes of a sword brilliance.
思羽回过头，轻柔的嗓音慢条斯礼的回了个字，“滚。”别打扰我崇拜掌门。
Si Yu turned back and answered tenderly, "Scram." Don't interrupt my worship of Sect Master.
思羽妹子一脸茫然。
Si Yu looked blank.
思羽妹子这暴棚的运气也是……没谁了！
Sister Si Yu's crazy luck is... unbeatable!
思羽成了本届门派大比，金丹期的冠军，无敌派之名更是夺响彻了整个上青界。但孤月一点都不开心，甚至想骂句MMP!

Si Yu had become this year's champion of the Golden Core division. The Invincible Sect's reputation had even spread throughout the entire Upper Azure World. Despite this, however, Lonemoon was not the least bit happy and even wanted to curse: son of a bitch!
思羽本就怕生，此时更是有些手足无措起来，下意识的就退了一步。
Originally Si Yu was already afraid of strangers. Now at this time, she of course did not know what to do and subconsciously took a step back.
思羽立马盘腿坐下，调动灵气护住他的心脉，不到半会郁红拿着织灵草回来了，两人一起给他喂了进去。他那满是裂痕的金丹才开始缓慢的修复起来。

Si Yu immediately sat cross-legged, mobilizing her Spirit Qi to protect his heart meridian. After a short while Yu Hong returned with the Weaved Rhizomed Spirit Grass which they fed to Yin Yuanfei. His Golden Core, which had been full of cracks, slowly began to mend.
思羽紧了紧手里的剑明显有些紧张，抬头往看台最上方看了一眼，似是这才鼓足了勇气似的，深吸一口气大声道，“无敌派，思羽！请道友指教！”

It was obvious that Si Yu was nervous from the way she was gripping her sword. She lifted her head to look at her opponent. Breathing in deep, she feigned courage and replied, "I am Si Yu from Invincible Sect! Please show me your ways, Fellow Daoist!"
思羽调动全身的灵气，肌肉暴发，身体顿时变大了一圈，一拳打过去，破开了四周的火海，转身冲着郁红道，“师姐，你先带他走！”

Si Yu mobilized the her entire body's Spirit Qi causing her muscles to enlarge and her body suddenly grew bigger by an entire girth. She struck her fist forwards, breaking a path through the sea of fire, then turning to the Yu Hong she said, "Senior Sister, take him away!"”
思羽还是有点犹豫。
Si Yu was still hesitant.
思羽这次雷劫整整劈了两个时辰，而且一道比一道重，比起元婴雷劫来都差不了几分。体修本走的就是淬练身体的路子，这每一道雷，都会生生将受劫人的经脉碾碎，再由灵气重组。以此达到重塑身体的目的，所以比起其它修士来，体修的劫雷格外凶残可怕。九九八十一道劫雷，每一道都是一次重生。

This time, Si Yu's lightning tribulation went on for four hours. Each lightning bolt struck harder than the previous one, not straying far from the intensity of a Nascent Soul's lightning tribulation. Body Cultivators walked the path of putting oneself through the mill. Every strike of lightning would break off each meridian of the person under tribulation and use the Spirit Qi to recover them. This was to achieve the aim of reconstructing the body which was why compared to other cultivators, the lightning tribulation of Body Cultivators was more ferocious and fearsome. There were 81 strikes of lightning in total and every one of them signified a rebirth.
思羽连忙稳住了他的心脉。
Si Yu quickly rushed to stabilize his heart meridians.
Si Yu: "..."
总有贱人垂涎我的身体。
lMany people yearn for my body.
总算可以离开这个破地方，沈萤有点兴奋，冲进屋里想收拾一下，却发现自己好像没啥好收拾的。想了想，才转身给兔子留了张字条。出门一看，厨子徒弟已经打包好午饭，在等她了。

Shen Ying was a little excited about finally being able to leave this shabby place. She rushed into the house to pack up but realized that there was nothing much to pack. After pondering for a bit, she decided to leave a note for the rabbit. Stepping outside, she saw that her chef disciple had already packed lunch and was ready for her.
总管一双阴鸷的眸子眯了起来，很快就摇头道：“空口无凭，你们要是跑了怎么办？要么留下东西抵押，要么把这丫头留下吧。”

The malicious eyes of the Chief Supervisor squinted before quickly shaking his head, replying, "Words mean nothing - what if you guys were to run away? Either you leave something behind as collateral, or you leave this servant girl behind."
总觉得哪里不对劲？到底是哪呢？
Something just seemed amiss… but what exactly was it?
悄然吞服了一枚灵神丹，江逸立即盘坐起来打坐修炼，反正杨管事说了这几天不会让他上场，他也不怕黑色元力消耗。

Quietly consuming a Spirit Pill, Jiang Yi immediately sat cross-legged and started meditating for power cultivation. Besides, as Manager Yang said that he would not be letting him fight in sparring matches over the next few days, he need not feel scared that his black essence force would be fully consumed.
悟剑峰虽然属于太虚派，但由于它是化神修士的道场，再加上峰上有直达上青界的通道。寻常弟子反而很少来到此处。

Sword Comprehension Peak belonged to the Taixu Sect, but because it was the dojo of Soul Formation cultivators, and it also had a direct passage to the Upper Azure World at the peak, ordinary disciples rarely came here.
悟剑峰顶。
At the peak of Sword Comprehension Peak.
想了一阵，江逸想不通索性不再多想，和杨管事说了一声走出武殿回到了江家。

After thinking some time, Jiang Yi could not come up with any suitable ideas and as such simply decided not over-think any longer. After informing Manager Yang, he walked out of the Martial Arts Hall and returned to the Jiang Residence.
想了想也不管锅里的菜了，一把抓住她的手道，“师父，你相信我，找道侣可是大事，随意不得。那个白泽一看就不是好人……不是好兽。再说您是人修，本就不该与他为伍。”

He could not care less for the food in the wok anymore. Yi Qing grabbed Shen Ying's hand and said, "Master, trust me. Looking for a Dao partner is a huge thing. You cannot be careless about it. That Bai Ze does not look like a good person.... nor a good beast. What's more, you're a cultivator. You shouldn't partner him."
想了想转身走向右边那团雪白的兔王，刚要伸手抓住兔尾拖走，那只挺尸已久的兔王，却突然炸尸了。

After some thought, she turned and walked to the snow-white Rabbit Monarch on her right. Just as she was about to reach for its tail to drag it away, the supposedly dead Rabbit Monarch suddenly came alive.
想从牛爸爸口袋里掏钱，总得有人告诉他爸爸就是你爸爸，点烛!
To get money out of Father Niu's pockets, someone had to tell him that he should never mess with a godfather-like character. Rest in peace!
想到他可以在炼丹房用黑色元力偷偷炼制上品丹药，再拿出去卖钱偿还风月楼的债务，他心情顿时好了几分。只要能快速赚钱，他还可以去外面购买一切非常高级的丹药辅助修炼，尽快将他境界提升到铸鼎境二重，那样就不惧江如虎等人了！

He planned to use his black essence force to secretly produce some superior-grade elixirs at the alchemy lab and sell them to make money. With this money, he could pay off his debts to the Fengyue Brothel.
Jiang Yi's mood immediately improved significantly when he realized this. So long as he could quickly earn money, he could even head out to purchase all sorts of superior-grade elixirs to facilitate his training, which would in turn help him elevate him to the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. That way, he would no longer have to fear Jiang Ruhu and his cronies!
想到以后再也没有机会弄丹药，没零花钱了，想到回去他父亲听到这个消息肯定会暴怒无比，他不死也会脱成皮，江松整个人都颤抖起来，一时之间心慌气怒不知该如何是好了。

Thinking that he never had any more opportunities to produce elixirs, and by extension, no more allowance. Worse still, when he thought of his father's rage upon hearing this news... It was clear that he was doomed to suffer. Jiang Song's entire body started shuddering and shaking. He was unsure if, at the moment, he should be anxious or furious.
想到以后炼制大量的丹药卖给聚珍阁，轻易获取大量的银钱，江逸整个人都战栗起来。就算他是个修炼废物，他也可以凭借这黑色元力成为富家翁，再不济能和小奴安逸的活一辈子。

Thinking about the large number of elixirs he could manufacture and sell to the Pearl Gathering Pavilion in the future, Jiang Yi's entire body shuddered. Even if he was useless at refining elixirs, he could rely on the power of the black essence force to become a rich person—one who no longer would remain in poverty and live comfortably with Xiaonu for a lifetime.
想到封印江逸就一阵咬牙切齿，按照大长老的估计，江逸的天资不说可比神武国的顶级天才，至少比江家第一天才江恨水还要强上一丝。虽然不知道大长老为何对他如此有信心，但江逸每想到这里，都会郁闷得吐血。

Thinking about the seal, Jiang Yi fumed with rage and gritted his teeth. According to Grand Elder's estimates, Jiang Yi might not be Divine Martial Kingdom's greatest genius, but nonetheless he was more powerful than Jiang Henshui, the top genius of the Jiang Clan, by at least a sliver. Even though he had no idea why Grand Elder had so much confidence in him, every time Jiang Yi had that thought, he would become depressed to the point of vomiting blood in anger.
想到就干！
If one thought of doing something, he would definitely do it!
想到怀中的三枚丹药，江逸咧嘴笑了，扒饭的速度更快了几分。他风卷残云的吃完饭菜，又交代了江小奴几句就走出了院子。

Thinking about the three elixir pills in his chest pocket, Jiang Yi grinned widely, with the speed he was gobbling down his food increasing by several times. Like a whirlwind that sweeps away scattered clouds, he finished his food before giving Jiang Xiaonu a short briefing and subsequently leaving his house courtyard.
想到这薄飞平已经是一身的冷汗了，脸色更是惨白一片，“孤月兄，此事重大，我得尽快通知家父！”现在门已经找到了，只是上报到上都城是不行的，还必须让君上知道。

Pu Feiping broke out in cold sweat just thinking about this, and his face turned even paler than before. He said, "Brother Lonemoon, this matter is very serious. I have to let my father know as soon as possible!" Now that the door is found, only reporting it to the Shang Du court would not suffice. We must let the Lord know about this matter.
想到这里，他更是内心愧疚不已，当下也不绕路转去后院，身子如一阵风般冲进了风月楼内，准备直接穿越内堂，进入后院。
He was full of remorse as he realized this. He did not divert his way to the backyard, he swept into Fengyue Brothel like wind, preparing to enter through the inner hall to the back.
想到这里，江逸一愣，下意思停下无名决运转起江水决，他想证实一件事，这封印既然开始慢慢破解了，那么他的修炼速度是否能有所增幅？

Thinking up to that point, Jiang Yi got distracted as he changed his mind, stopping the practice of the nameless technique and shifting instead to the Jiang Water Art. He wished to confirm something: since the seal was gradually being broken, would his refining speed actually increase?
想到这里，江逸嘴角抽了抽，一个月时间他去哪弄那么多钱？还有早上他打了江豹，怕是他老大江如虎很快会找上门吧？

Thinking to that stage, the corners of Jiang Yi’s mouth twitched. Where could he go to earn so much money within a month? Further, he had beaten up Jiang Bao in the morning—surely his boss Jiang Ruhu would be coming to get revenge soon enough?
想到这，他直接上前一步，用力握紧了手中的剑，就算拼了这条命，也要护恩人周全。强行调动灵气，几乎是瞬间，他就遭到体内妖气的反噬，一嘴的腥甜。

At this point in his thoughts, he stepped forward directly, holding tightly to the sword in his hand. Even at the cost of his life, he had to protect his benefactor. As he tried to forcibly activate his Spirit Qi, his body immediately suffered a backlash from the demonic aura inside him and his mouth became filled with the taste of blood.
想到这，她抬头看了旁边仍是一脸走神，好像完全不在状况内的沈萤一眼，几百年来头一次，觉得心底流转着暖暖的情绪，若是……早点遇到就好了。

With this in mind, she looked up at Shen Ying, whose mind appeared to be wandering as though she had no idea what was happening at the moment. For the first time in centuries, she felt warm emotions in her heart. If only… they had met earlier.
想到这，她有些歉意的回头看了沈萤一眼，压低声音道，“你放心，我们不想害你。等我们到了阵法那，我就解开你身上的禁制，放你回去。”

Thinking of this made her turn to give Shen Ying an apologetic look. She lowered her voice and said, "Don't worry, we won't hurt you. Once we get to the array formation, we will release the Immobilizing Seal and let you go back."
想到这，孤月一惊，如今玉鼎已死，他背后之人，会不会直接针对玄天宗？！上青界高阶修士多如牛毛，玄天宗虽然是中青界的顶级宗门，但在上青界来说，根本不算什么。可他立马又否认了这个想法。不会，活人练丹这样等同于魔修的行径，上青界自己捂着都来不及，怎么可能主动跳出来承认。单看甘子睿躲进悟剑峰，而不是直接逃到上青界就知道了。他们背后的人，在上青界估计也不是能为所欲为的。

At this point, a shocking thought came over Lonemoon: now that Yu Ding was dead, would the people behind him directly target Blackheaven Sect?! High-level cultivators were a dime a dozen in the Upper Azure World. Although Blackheaven Sect was the top sect of the Middle Azure World, in the eyes of the Upper Azure World, the sect was insignificant. But then he immediately rejected this conjecture. No, the act of using a living person to concoct elixirs was no different from the evil acts of fiendish cultivators. The Upper Azure World would spare no effort to hide this heinous act, let alone directly admit to it. The fact that Gan Zirui had hidden himself in Sword Comprehension Peak instead of directly fleeing to the Upper Azure World was proof of this. From this, Lonemoon surmised that the people behind Gan Zirui and Yu Ding probably did not have free rein to do whatever they wanted in the Upper Azure World.
想到黑色元力可以快速破解封印上的符文，提升修炼速度，江逸双眼一亮，休息片刻快速下山了。

Thinking about how his black essence force could remove the runic patterns and rapidly break his seal, while at the same time increasing his power cultivation speed, Jiang Yi's eyes lit up. He restedfor a short moment before leaving the mountain at a quick speed.
想着他麻利的洗完了碗筷，唤出了自己的灵剑，扑通一下重重的跪在了桌前。
With this thought in mind, he quickly finished washing the dishes, summoned out his spiritual sword and plunged down onto his knees before the table.
想起晕倒前的事，他心中一喜，连忙四下一扫，瞬间定在了右边椅子正在啃水果的某人身上。
Recalling what happened before he fainted, his heart leapt with joy and his gaze immediately lit on a certain someone on the right who was sitting on a chair chewing on fruit."
想起羿清的交待，他立马站在了女子的旁边。能让一名金丹道君叫师父，想来必能保他平安。
Recalling Yi Qing's instructions, he immediately stayed by the girl's side. For a Golden Core Dao Lord to call her Master, she had to be someone who could ensure his safety.
想起自己以前的契约兽，易峰也不免有些伤感，也没再继续说什么，看了那岛一眼，继续御剑往前方而去。大概又飞了半个小时的样子，才停在了一座长着郁郁葱葱密林的岛上。

Yi Feng felt a tinge of sadness thinking about his Contract Beast, so he did not explain any further. He took one final look at the island and flew past it. After another hour or so, they stopped at an island that contained a dense forest.
想起这事轩辕禹忍不住咬了咬牙，埋怨起印家这群老狐狸来。轩辕家是四大世家之一，本来一举一动就受到上青界各派的关注。这两日他对沈萤过分热情的事，也不是什么秘密。想必现在四大家都在猜测她的身份。印家自然也不例外，但他没想到，与其它两家默默观望不同，印风居然会直接找上他，求他引见。

Xuan Yuanyu gritted his teeth as he thought about this. He began to inwardly curse that bunch of old foxes, the Yin Family. The Xuan Yuan Family was one of the four aristocratic families and everything that they did attracted the attention of the Upper Azure World. It was no secret that Xuan Yuanyu had been overly warm to Shen Ying. Now, everyone in the three other aristocratic families were trying to guess who she was and the Yin Family was no exception. However, Xuan Yuanyu never would have guessed that Yin Feng would react so differently from the other two families who had remained quiet until now. Yin Feng had went straight up to Xuan Yuanyu and requested for him to invite Shen Ying to meet him.
想趁着这个小门派还不成气侯的时候，彻底的打压下去以除后患，保证世家独一无二的地位。偏偏他们现在又抓到了这个大把柄，自然不留余地想压死无敌派。若是以往，对于这种事，大家也就心照不宣了，或许背后还会推一把。

Trying to suppress this small sect when it had not become established and stable, so as to prevent future troubles and maintain the unique position of the aristocratic families. Since they had chanced upon this opportunity, naturally, they would not give lee way and suppress the Invincible Sect. If it were in the past, everyone would have a mutual understanding and perhaps even give a helping hand.
感受到一股热流从胸口快速朝丹田处涌去，江逸暗暗感慨，有丹药辅助修炼就是好啊，江如虎天资如此差也能修炼到铸鼎境四重，不就是经常把灵神丹当饭吃吗？

天资Sensing a wave of heat flow from his chest and surge at quick speed towards his dantian area, Jiang Yi silently sighed with sorrow about how good it must be to have enough elixirs to facilitate power cultivation. If Jiang Ruhu with his innately poor talent could refine his power up to the fourth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, would it not be the case that he had been consuming Spirit Pills like how one ate rice at meals?
感受到江逸内心的沉重，江小奴笑容凝固了，慌忙跟着江逸朝里屋走去，给江逸到了一杯水，这才睁着大眼睛问道：“少爷，发生了什么事情？”

As if sensing the heaviness residing in Jiang Yi's heart, Xiaonu's smile froze on her face. She hurriedly followed Jiang Yi into the house, not forgetting to pour a glass of water for him before asking, wide-eyed, "Young Master, what happened?"
感受着丹田内的蓝色元力如井喷般冒出，江逸兴奋无比，这丹药配合黑色元力至少让他修炼速度比原先快了数十倍……

Sensing the blue essence force inside his dantian spewing out like an oil well blowout, Jiang Yi was uncontrollably excited. Combined with black essence force, this elixir could allow his cultivation speed to increase by at least ten times the original rate...
感受着裂开的骨头快速的愈合，江逸内心狂喜不已，等黑色元力消耗干净之后，又继续调集黑色元力，让疗伤速度加快。

Feeling the broken bones speedily mending together, Jiang Yi felt much euphoria. He waited for the black essence force to be used up completely before once again continuing to summon more black essence force to speed-up the wound-healing process.
感应到两种不同属性的元力如同孪生兄弟般快速融合着，江逸脸上露出狂喜之色，身子立即从床上跃起，对着床边的青石板重重砸下。

When he felt the effect of the combined forces of two different attributes fusing together like twin brothers, Jiang Yi was elated. He jumped up and smashed heavily down onto the limestone slab beside the bed.
感觉到双手被震得发麻，左胸传来一阵撕裂般的阵痛，看着对方的手掌再次化作一道残影拍来，江逸苦涩的在心里喃喃起来：“完了，怕是今日和小奴，两人都走不出这风月楼了……”

Jiang Yi felt his arm turn numb from the clash. A searing pain tore through his left chest. Looking at the opponent's palm turning into a phantom shadow once again, Jiang Yi mumbled bitterly, "It's over. Xiaonu and I won't be able to escape this brothel today…"
慌乱中，江逸双手快速运转全部元力，交叉上架格挡，却忘了昨日尝试无名口诀时提炼出来的那一丝黑色元力还储藏在左臂的某条小经脉处，忘了排出体外。当他全力运转江水诀元力的时候，竟把那丝黑色元力也一并运转了起来。

Frantically, Jiang Yi transferred out all the essence force as quick as he could and crossed his arms to protect his upper frame. However, he forgot that the little sliver of black essence force he had cultivated using the nameless chant last night was still hidden in a small vein on his left arm and that he had forgotten to force it out of his body. When he spent all his energy to transfer the essence force using the Jiang Water Art, he had accidentally transferred the black essence force together with the other forces as wellu
我就是没有朋友，没有朋友怎么了？关你屁事啊喂！
I do not have friends, so what? How is that your business!
我累啊！
But I am!
战斗了一炷香时间，翊凌雪浑身大汗淋漓，完美曲线再次暴露无遗，她却浑然不觉，娇喝一声，双拳如暴雨般呼啸而来，刹那间漫天都是拳影，足足有十个之多。

After fighting for five minutes, Yi Lingxue's entire body was covered in sweat, allowing her perfect bodily figure to come to light. However, she remained totally unaware of this. Instead, with a delicate shout, she sent both her fists flying like a thunderstorm, leaving the air filled with the silhouettes of fists, numbering ten of such figures, within a split second.
Qi Chengyu: "…"
戚橙雨一急，大声喊道，“别碰她！”居然忘了她还在！原本还想护着这个小姑娘，却没想到她到是受了自己的连累。自己怎么样都无所谓，但沈萤……还是个清白姑娘，绝对不能让她经历那些恶心的事。“她只是个凡人，跟我没有任何关系。你们要是敢动她一下，来日本尊修为恢复之日，定将你们噬骨练魂！”

Qi Chengyu panicked and shouted, "Don't touch her!" She had totally forgotten about her presence! She had wanted to protect this young lady but never did she expect that she would drag her into this mess. She could accept whatever that would happen to her, but Shen Ying… she was still an innocent lady. She could not allow her to experience such disgusting things. "She is only a mortal, and has no ties with me. If you dare to touch her, the day I recover will be the day I feed on your bones!"
戚橙雨一愣，反弹性的点头，“……能。”
Puzzled, Qi Chengyu nodded reflexively. "… We can."
戚橙雨一愣，好似这才想起来，唤出武器，就往着对面冲了过去。她像是已经豁出去了，再没有保留，全身阴气大盛。大片的剑光就朝着对面的人身上招呼而去。

Qi Chengyu fell into a daze before seemingly recalling something and summoned out her weapon, and then headed towards the person opposite her. She looked like she was going all out for it, holding no more reservations as the Yin Qi emanating from her was fully unleashed. The sword in her hand shone and reflected the image of her opponent as it greeted him.
戚橙雨一愣，这才发现她居然是认真的，眼神顿时沉了沉，“为什么？我跟你相熟不过几天，而且你又不清楚我与那人有什么恩怨，你就选择帮我？”

At first, Qi Chengyu thought she was joking. But then she realised that Shen Ying was being serious. Her eyes immediately darkened. "Why? You have only known me for just a few days, and you also don't know what kind of grievances I have with that person. Why do you want to help me?"
戚橙雨不敢置信的接过，左边翻看了一遍，通行玉牌，真的是悟剑峰的玉牌！灵气一探，上面还隐隐浮出孤月的字样。

With a look of disbelief, Qi Chengyu took the token from her, giving it a good look-over. It was the passage jade token, it was really the passage jade token of Sword Comprehension Peak! Upon probing it with her Spirit Qi, she could faintly see the word "Lonemoon" written on it.
戚橙雨与甘子睿都是元婴，修为相当，再加上戚橙雨之前受了伤，原本她该是打不过对方的。但顶不住她那不要命的打法，完全放弃了防御，一心只想报仇。况且原本魔修就比仙修的手段多，不到片刻甘子睿就节节败退。越来越被逼入死角。

Qi Chengyu and Gan Zirui were both Nascent Soul cultivators with similar power levels, and on top of that, Qi Chengyu had been injured previously so logically speaking, she would not be able to defeat her opponent. But the opponent could not handle her crazy, reckless way of fighting; without caring for her own life, she disregarded her defense with the sole purpose of revenge. Moreover, she had more cunning ways at her disposal as compared to immortal cultivators, causing Gan Zirui to retreat in defeat and be forced to a dead corner.
戚橙雨以为她不懂这东西的好处，忍不住又提了一句，“你虽然是凡人，但五阶兽丹难得，凭这定能换到诸多好处。”

Thinking that she didn't understand the benefits of this pill, Qi Chengyu couldn't help explaining again, "Although you are a mortal, this fifth-level beast pill is a rarity. You can benefit in many ways from it."
戚橙雨先将妖兽头部的浊气练化，灵化化刃直接破开，果然在里面发现了一颗亮闪闪的蓝色珠子，拇指大小的五阶兽丹，而且还是水属性。不由得再次感叹这个凡人的运气，随便走走都能捡到五阶灵兽的尸体，而且杀此灵兽的人，居然没有将兽丹取走。

Qi Chengyu first cleansed the head of the beast, directly opening it with a spirit cleansing blade. Sure enough, a bright blue bead was found inside it, a fifth-level beast pill, and it was of the water attribute. She could not help but marvel again at this mortal's luck — just by wandering about she had managed to pick up the bodies of fifth-level spirit beasts left behind by a hunter.
戚橙雨再次闭上眼睛，继续调息，刚运行了半个周天……
Qi Chengyu closed her eyes again and continued to regulate her meridians. Just as she had completed half a cycle…
戚橙雨冷哼笑了一声，满眼的恨意，“你当然不希望我在这，五百年了……我整整找了你五百年，没想到你居然会躲在这里。往日之仇，今日我便与你算个清楚！”

Qi Chengyu laughed coldly, her expression full of hatred. "You certainly wouldn’t want me here. Five hundred years… I have been looking for you for five hundred years. I didn't expect you to be hiding here. Let's settle our past scores once and for all today!"
戚橙雨吓了一跳，体内的灵气一个岔路差点走火入魔，生生压住到口的鲜血，抬头瞪了她一眼。这人是想找死吧？当真以为自己不会杀她吗？

Qi Chengyu almost suffered a Qi Deviation at the shock of hearing this voice. Forcing down the fresh blood that had surged up to her mouth, she looked up and glared at Shen Ying. Is this person asking for death? Does she really think that I will not kill her?
戚橙雨呆了呆，眼中柔软了一瞬，半会才噗嗤一声笑了出来，“就你？得了吧！你的小命还是留着多吃几只烤鸡吧？”她一个凡人，又能做什么，“悟剑峰是什么地方？那可是太虚派的圣地，化神尊者闭关悟道的地方。莫说你只是个凡人，就算是元婴修士，都没有入那的资格。”

Surprised by Shen Ying's offer of help, Qi Chengyu's expression softened for a moment, then she laughed out, "You? Forget it! Save your little life to eat a few more roast chickens!" What could she do? She was just a mortal. "What kind of place do you think Sword Comprehension Peak is? It is the holy land of the Grand Vacuity Sect, the place where Soul Formation cultivators retreat to in order to gain enlightenment. Putting aside the fact that you are just a mortal, even if you were a Soul Formation cultivator, you wouldn’t meet their criteria for entry."
戚橙雨咬了咬牙，似是想起了什么，眼中燃起疯狂的恨意，她找了这么久，原来……原来是躲在了那里。
Qi Chengyu gritted her teeth, and her eyes became alight with burning hatred as if remembering something. She had searched for so long. So… so he had hidden over there.
戚橙雨嘴角一抽，应该是什么鬼？说好的仙门弟子最看重门派呢？
Qi Chengyu was at a loss for words. What the heck does 'I think so' mean? Don't all disciples of immortal sects regard their sects highly?
戚橙雨嘴角一抽，重点是个吗？细一想，她只是个凡人，确实需要进食。于是顺手捏诀在地上燃起团火，“灵兽肉有浊气，用灵火练化后才能吃。”说完直接接过她手里已经被拔光了毛的灵兽，架在火上烤了起来。

Qi Chengyu's mouth twitched. Was this the key point? On closer thought, she remembered that Shen Ying was just a mortal and really needed to eat. So Qi Chengyu formed a seal on the ground and ignited a ball of fire. "The flesh of a spirit beast is putrid, it can only be eaten after cleansing it with spirit fire." So saying, she took over the featherless spirit beast that Shen Ying was holding and placed it in the fire to cook.
戚橙雨心底一梗，这说的是一回事嘛喂！
Qi Chengyu felt like she was about to choke. Were they on the same topic?
戚橙雨心底升起一股深深的无力感，上上下下打量眼前的人一遍，“你到底怎么活到现在的？”这么粗神经的人，居然还入了玄天宗，宗门的人都瞎了吗？

A feeling of utter powerlessness overwhelmed Qi Chengyu. She looked up and down at the person in front of her. "How did you manage to survive till now?" She could not believe such a clueless person was actually accepted by the Blackheaven Sect. Was the sect blind?
戚橙雨恨得眼神充血，眼前闪过一幕幕熟悉的画面，那些原本以为摆脱的恶梦，再一次被唤醒，噬骨饮血般一遍遍在眼前播放着，原来就算是入魔，也还是逃不开。

Qi Chengyu's eyes were raging with anger, and a familiar scene flashed across her eyes. The memories of those nightmares that she had once thought she could escape from were awakened, and they replayed again and again before her eyes. Even joining the ranks of fiend cultivators could not let her escape from all that.
戚橙雨愣了愣，脸色变换了好几次，眼里水光闪烁，朝着他深深行了个礼，“多谢尊者，橙雨谨记！”
Qi Chengyu was taken aback as her expression changed a few times. Her watery eyes shimmered as she gave him a deep bow. "Thank you, Supremacy. I'll definitely keep that in mind!"
戚橙雨拼着一口气，一路飞出了玄天宗的范围。她伤得很重，就连元婴都有溃散的驱势，全身的经脉已经残破得不成样子。玉鼎老贼果然狡诈，即便她谋划了这么多年，好不容易等到了这个时机。没想到，临死还被他阴了一把。

On her last legs, Qi Chengyu flew out of the Blackheaven Sect. She was badly hurt; even Nascent Soul cultivators could be driven to the point of collapse. The meridians in her entire body were badly damaged. She had to give it to Yu Ding, that cunning old thief. Even though she had planned this for so many years before the opportunity finally came by, he somehow still managed to injure her before he died.
戚橙雨深吸了好几口气，才压下心底的狂躁。转手接过对方手里的丹药，沉声道，“滚！”
Qi Chengyu took a deep breath before suppressing the turmoil within her. She took the bottle of elixirs from him and said in a deep voice, "Get lost!"
戚橙雨用兽丹整整调息了一晚上，才让经脉修复了一二成。当初为了躲避玄天宗的追踪，她才特意往灵气稀薄的地方走，却也导致她的伤好得太慢，但好在不会继续恶化下去。兴许晚上她就可以回到冥阴山，唯一让她有些忧心的是……

Qi Chengyu used a beast pill to help her recuperate and rested for the whole night to finally heal a small part of her meridians. Previously, she had purposely traveled to places where Spirit Qi was scarce in order to avoid being tracked down by the Blackheaven Sect, however it had caused her recovery to be too slow. The only thing to be glad about was that her injury would not worsen. Fortunately, she would be able to return to Ming Yin Mountain, but her only worry was…
戚橙雨的怒气顿时消散了不少，对方却好似并没有多在意这事，反而心大的拔起了鸡毛。一时间满地五颜六色的各色羽毛，映着刚升起的月光，仿佛在地上撒了一层各色的光。

At this thought, much of Qi Chengyu's anger dissipated, but all this went unnoticed by the other party who had instead started pulling out the feathers of the pheasant. Immediately after, the colorful feathers reflected the light of the rising moon, forming a rainbow-like pattern on the ground.
戚橙雨皱了皱眉，拿出一块白色的圆石，捏了个诀，顿时一个男子的影像就浮在了上面，一身白衣，长得到是规矩端方，一派正人君子的样。

Frowning, Qi Chengyu took out a white round stone and produced a hand seal. Suddenly the image of a man floated on top of it. He was dressed entirely in white, appearing decent and proper; one got the impression he was a righteous gentleman.
戚橙雨紧了紧手心，想要说点什么，又不知道能说啥，最终只能冷哼一声，“哼，你这性子，早晚让人给卖了！”说完转手把手里已经烤好的鸡塞进对方怀里，“给，快吃！快吃！对了，你叫啥？”

Clenching her hands, Qi Chengyu wanted to say something, but didn’t know what she could say. In the end, she could only snort coldly and say, "With a character like yours, you will be cheated sooner or later!" So saying she stuffed the roasted bird into the other's arms. "Here, eat quickly! Eat quickly! By the way, what's your name?"
戚橙雨紧了紧身侧的手，“尊者的意思，我明白。”
Qi Chengyu clenched her hands tightly. "I understand what you mean,Supremacy."
戚橙雨脸色更沉了，手心松紧了好几次，好似在拼命压抑什么，半会深吸了一口气，看了她一眼，似是想挤出一个笑容，抽动的嘴角却满是苦涩，“看来这几天，你也不是光顾着吃鸡。我说的话你到是全听进去了。”

Qi Chengyu expression became darker and she clenched her hands tightly several times, as if desperately suppressing something. Taking a deep breath, she looked at Shen Ying. She tried hard to smile but her trembling lips could not hide her bitterness. "It seems that during these past few days, your attention was not all spent on eating chicken. You have been listening to what I was saying."
戚橙雨脸色越加的奇怪，看她这样子，也不像能杀死五阶灵兽，难道有人猎兽，扔在河边没管不成。她到是好运气！

The incredulous look on Qi Chengyu face deepened. Looking at Shen Ying, it didn't seem like she could kill a fifth-level spirit beast. Did some hunter capture the beasts, then abandoned them by the river? She really had good luck!
Qi Chengyu: "…"
房门关闭，姬听雨看到江逸眼中的无奈，浅浅一笑道：“易公子不用担忧，有听雨在，马公子和柳公子不会为难你的。”

Shutting the doors, Ji Tingyu saw the exasperation in Jiang Yi's eyes and smiled lightly, "Young Master Yi need not worry. Tingyu will not let Young Master Ma and Young Master Liu make things difficult for you."
房门轰然关上，三位公子站了一会全部转身快步离开，这姬小姐三人追求了几年了总是不温不火，三人早就习惯了，也不敢过多的纠缠。

The door to the room slammed shut. All three gentlemen stood at the same spot for a while, before simultaneously turning around and leaving at a quick pace. This Young Mistress Yi had never been receptive to the three men's attempts at courtship over the past few years, after all. This circumstance was something they were already used to and as such, they did not dare to entangle themselves too much in her affairs.
房间不大，里面有一个壮汉正对着一名瘦弱的小丫头拳打脚踢，那小丫头整个人蜷缩在地，全身都在颤抖，不停的哭喊恳求，但那壮汉却依旧不断拳打脚踢。

The room was not big, but in it a stout man was kicking and punching a weak, delicate girl. She was curled on the ground, trembling while constantly crying and begging. However, the man continued to rain down attacks upon her.
房间里一片冷清，没有熟悉的昏暗烛火，也没有那个熟悉的柔弱身影，伏在桌上喘息了好一会，江逸才哆嗦着手点燃烛火，却看到桌上压着一张字条。

The air in the room was stale and cold. It lacked the familiar, warm glow of a candle and that delicate, weak figure. Jiang Yi leaned over on the table-top to catch his breath. After a few minutes of hoarse panting, he finally sat up and lit the candle with a shaking hand. It was then that he spotted a brief message left on the table.
所以……到底挑战的是掌门，还是羿清啊？
So... who exactly was the one challenged, the sect master or Yi Qing?
所以一开始他佯装妥协，让大部分人放松警惕，然后凭借黑色元力增幅的强大力量，一拳把江如鹰轰飞，此刻再趁着众人震愕之中，准备一举拿下江如虎。

As such, he posed being pro-compromise right from the start, ensuring a large portion of his opponents would let their guard down. Subsequently, he would rely on his great power, expanded in strength by black essence force, and send Jiang Ruying flying with one punch. At that moment, he would take advantage of all his opponents being in a state of shock, and was ready to take Jiang Ruhu down in a single move.
所以他还是倔强的站在原地，一言不发。
Thus he still stubbornly stood his ground, not uttering a single word.
所以他顿了一下，不等对方开口就说道：“姬小姐，你们这丹药是收还是不收？不收在下告辞了！”

As such, he paused for a moment. Not waiting for the other person involved to open her mouth, he just said, "Miss Ji, my elixirs - are you going to accept them, or not? If not, I'm going to take my leave!"
所以听到小奴出事后，江逸立即暴怒起来，满脸狰狞的冲到前院，那如野兽般凶厉的气息把前来报信的少女吓了一跳。
So when he heard that Xiaonu was in trouble, Jiang Yi exploded with anger. Rushing to the front yard, face brimmed with fury. His ferocious manner gave the messenger girl a huge fright.
所以听说江如虎是被马家的人打了，江家便不予理会了，大总管江云蛇倒是怒气十足，尽管江如虎被打得他都认不出来了，依旧狠狠怒骂了一顿，并下令让江家旁系子弟全部紧闭在家，敢再出去丢人现眼，一律重罚。

As such, upon hearing that members of the Ma Family had beaten up Jiang Ruhu, the Jiang Clan paid little heed to that piece of information. Contrary to the rest, the Chief Supervisor Jiang Yunshe was filled with rage. Even though Jiang Ruhu had been so brutally injured and mutilated from the fight that his face seemed unrecognisable, Jiang Yunshe still adamantly scolded Jiang Ruhu with much ferocity and even ordered all the collateral descendants to go into seclusion at home. He even set a penalty - should anyone head out of the Residence again and be a disgrace to the Family, there would be a severe punishment.
所以此刻江如龙如一头疯牛般冲来，他脸上神情没有半点变幻，而是快速弯身，提起江如虎的另外一条腿，当做武器在半空中抡起，对着江如龙狠狠砸去。
Which was why Jiang Rulong just charging him like a frenzied bull. Jiang Yi remained calm and quickly bent over to pick up Jiang Ruhu by his other leg to use him as a weapon to smash at Jiang Rulong.
所以此刻江逸心情很是沉重，风月楼竟是马家的产业？今日可别出乱子啊……
Ergo, Jiang Yi was feeling pretty heavyhearted right now: who knew that Fengyue Brothel was the property of the Ma Family? He could only hope that nothing would go wrong today...
所以此刻江逸没有选择去武殿，而是回了江家！这段时间内，他要是还敢在江家和武殿中来回行走，他相信自己绝对活不过十天。

Therefore, Jiang Yi chose to return to the Jiang Clan, instead of the Martial Arts Hall. He was certain that he would not be able to survive past ten days, if he dared commute back and forth between the Jiang Clan and the Martial Arts Hall during this period.
所以说，他干嘛拜她这种师父？专业不对口，害死人啊！
This was why he should not have asked her to be his master. Their specialties did not even match, and that could lead to harmful consequences!
所以说，他脱裤子真的是为了——开花？！
So it really was taking off its pants to… bloom flowers?!
所以说，灵主不单不隐藏自己的身份，还打算昭告天下吗？
So Spirit Master was not hiding his identity anymore - he was planning on announcing it to the world?
所以那只狐妖是想练制结婴丹升上十阶妖王，所以才要抢的吗？那它之前杀人取心是为何？

So it turned out the fox demon was thinking of refining a neonate formation pill so that it could raise its cultivation level to that of a tenth-level Demon Monarch. That was why it was so desperate to get its hands on it. But why did it have to kill people and take out their hearts?
所有人不忍的别开眼睛，听着耳边传来的清脆骨头断裂声，他们心头一震，回头看着江逸的目光都充满了畏惧。
Everyone couldn't help but close their eyes, but the sound of bones cracking could be heard clearly. Their minds shuddered as they looked at Jiang Yi with fear.
所有人懵了，只有江豹眼中露出一丝惊恐，他那日的情况和江如鹰一模一样，也是一拳被江逸轰飞……

Everyone was left dumbstruck. Only Jiang Bao alone had a look of shock and fright revealed through his eyes. His experiences that day were completely similar to what just happened to Jiang Ruying, in that he was also sent flying by a punch from Jiang Yi...
所有人被江逸的凶厉吓到了，也怕江逸发疯之下，真的把江如虎给活活砸死。那样江逸难逃一死，他们也会被家族重罚的。有一人开始退，其余人也慌忙跟着退后，全部惊恐的望着满脸狰狞的江逸，心里都浮现一个念头，这人还是那个老实巴交的废物江逸吗？怎么发狠起来如此可怕？

Everyone had been shocked and frightened by Jiang Yi's severe viciousness and ferocity; they were also scared that, in a fit of mad rage, Jiang Yi would really smash Jiang Ruhu on the ground to his death. In that way, Jiang Yi's death penalty would be unavoidable, but they too would have to suffer the consequences of being punished by the Family clan. As one person started to retreated, the rest followed suit in hurriedly falling back. All of them stared in horror at the malevolent expression on Jiang Yi's face, as a single thought appeared in their minds - was this person still that docile good-for-nothing Jiang Yi? How could he become so scary when he showed his ferocity?
所谓游仙是指达到了飞升期，却没能成功飞升的修士。为了保命，不得不兵解成游仙。游仙虽然也是修士，算不得真正的仙人，但却是比化神期更强的存在，只是兵解后，再没有飞升的机会。

The so-called Traveling Immortal referred to those who had already reached the Ascension stage, but were unable to ascend successfully. To save their own lives, they had no choice but to disintegrate and become Traveling Immortals. Although a Traveling Immortal was also a cultivator, and not considered an actual immortal, their existence was stronger than those of the Soul Formation stage, they just did not have the chance to ascend after disintegrating.
所谓陪练，自然是陪着别人练武，帮助对方提高实战经验。换句话说，别人可以随便打你，你也可以还手，但却不能伤了对方，这就是主动挨揍的活儿。

As a martial arts sparring partner, one naturally had to accompany others in their practice of martial arts and help the other party increase their actual combat experience.
In other words, other people could beat you up as they fancied. You could always launch a counter-attack, but you were not allowed to injure the other party: this was the responsibility of actively taking beatings.
才一天没盯着而已，她都干了什么？这些是从哪来的啊喂？
He had just taken his eyes off her for one day and look what she had done! Where did she get all these creatures?
打劫？
Rob them?
扫了一眼，江逸很快就意味索然了，这武殿是在招收陪练武者。待遇倒是很诱人，铜牌陪练一天一两银子，银牌陪练一天十两，金牌陪练甚至达到了一两紫金一天。

After scanning through the notice, Jiang Yi very quickly lost his interest. The Martial Arts Hall was calling for applicants for martial arts sparring partners. Frankly, the remuneration was very attractive: a bronze-token-grade sparring partner would earn a tael of silver a day, one with a silver token would earn ten taels of silver a day, and one with a gold token could even earn up to a tael of purple gold a day.
扫向脚下的人，“他干的？”
Looking down at the man on the ground, she asked, "Is he the one?"
把所有药草准备好，江逸擦了擦额头上的汗水，站起身朝外走去，却看到一个披头散发的老头正站在他身后盯着他看，这种感觉就像酣睡中发现厉鬼在侧般恐怖……

After preparing all the medicinal herbs, Jiang Yi wiped off the sweat on his forehead, stood up and walked outside. However, he saw an old man with disheveled hair standing behind him and staring at him. The horrible feeling he got was akin to discovering a scary ghost on one's side while one was in deep slumber...
抑着脖子看着眼前突然出现，山般高大的巨大怪兽……
Suddenly, a beast as tall as a mountain appeared in front of her very eyes. She tilted her neck upwards to get a clearer view of the beast.
抓……抓住了？！
"Caught...caught?"
抓着袋子的沈萤：“……”MMP！
Holding on to her bags, Shen Ying: "..." What the hell!"
抢我的饭碗还有理了！
Snatched my bowl and you are still trying to talk reason!
报信的少女，江逸认识，是住旁边的一名江家老奴的女儿，平时和小奴走得近，也经常一起偷偷出去做工。

Jiang Yi recognized the young girl bearing the news, it was the daughter of an elderly Jiang Clan chambermaid staying next door. She and Xiaonu were good friends and sometimes would sneak out together for work.
抬头一看，只见一座山一样高的巨大怪兽，不知道什么时候蹦了出来，两只车灯样大的眼睛，正死死盯着她前面坑里的——萝卜精？

Shen Ying lifted her head and her field of vision was covered by a beast, which stood as tall as a mountain. She didn't know when or how it appeared. The beast had eyes that looked just like headlights, its gaze transfixed on the radish spirit in the pit.
抬头看向上首，笑了一声。
She raised her head and looked up with a laugh.
拜贴？
Visiting card?
拼命的挤出了几个字，“柿（是）炸鲜（大仙）。”不是不想回，是真的肿得说不了话啊，嘶……好痛啊！
With all the willpower he had, he stuttered, "Y-Yeth, Gray Immorer." It wasn't that he didn't want to answer her — he really couldn't speak. He was still in so much pain!
挂件瞬间开心的伸出两片大叶子，做了个抱抱的动作，乖巧朝对方扑了过去。还没碰到衣服，沈萤却突然转过了头，秒拒！

The pendant happily extended two large leaves in a hugging motion, and rushed over to Shen Ying. But it had not even managed to touch her clothes when Shen Ying suddenly turned her head away in rejection!
按说十二阶的毒兽早就可以化形，不会轻易以原形现身，除非它有什么目的。
Based on his experience, twelfth-level beasts were experts at manifestation. They would never reveal their true form unless they had a motive.
挖的还是同一个，上次只到腰深，这会已经齐颈了。
It was the same pit, only now, instead of being waist deep, it had now reached neck height.
振祥一愣，仿佛这才发现人群中，还有其它人，自己的法器居然这么轻易的就被对方控制了。
Zhen Xiang was stunned and as if just realizing there was someone else in the group. His Dharma artifact had been so easily caught by the other party.
振祥的脸色黑成了锅底，再没了刚刚那谦谦君子的样子，看向郁红的眼神满满都是杀意，声音也冷了数倍，扬手就唤出武器，“既然你们知道得如此清楚，今日便更不能放你们离开了！”

Zhen Xiang's face turned as black as the bottom of a pot. No longer did he have the look of a gentleman about him that he had just now as he looked at Yu Hong with all the intention to kill. His voice had turned much colder as he raised his hand to summon forth his weapon and said, "Since all of you already know about this so clearly, there is no way I am letting you off today!"
据大长老说，是他娘亲在他一岁时购买的弃婴，给他做侍女的。尽管名分上是侍女，但江逸和江小奴一同长大，情同兄妹，在大长老失踪后两人更是相依为命。这些年来如果不是江小奴一直为他鼓气加油，他也不知道能不能坚持下来！

According to the Grand Elder, his mother bought Xiaonu as a maid to serve him when he was one years old. Although her status was just a maid in the household, Xiaonu was never treated like one—she grew up together with Jiang Yi like a sibling. After the disappearance of the Grand Elder, each depended on the other for survival. If not for Xiaonu's constant encouragement, it would have been hard for Jiang Yi to endure the difficult times.
掀桌！
Flips table!
掀桌！为什么他以前不知道，系统会有记录功能？为什么几百年前的记录还在！人家说你是育儿，你还真变育儿用的啊喂！

He wanted to flip the table! Why didn't he find out earlier that the system kept all these things on record? Why were records from a hundred years ago still in there? She called you a parenting system and you really have to act like one?
掀桌！你到底拿了多少人家的东西啊喂！
I'm about to flip! How many items have you taken from this person!
掀桌，原来只是砸啊喂，尼玛这叫逼出来啊，这明明就是拆迁好吗？！别以为你用的不是挖掘机我就认不出来啊，魂淡！
I'm gonna flip out! This is just plain smashing. You call this forcing it out?This is obviously a demolition operation! Don't think that I can't recognize an excavator when I see one, asshole!
掀桌，谁TM要跟你一起吃啊，把我的剑仙还给我！
Who wants to freaking eat with you, give me back my sword immortal!
掀桌，这TM不是一本书的世界吗？为啥别人的穿越方式，完全不一样啊。为啥所有理所当然的事，一到沈萤身上就走神展开啊，你TM到底是个外挂还是个BUG啊啊啊啊！

Wasn't this the world of a single book? Why would other people have different ways of transmigrating? Why did the things that were taken for granted change the moment it concerned Shen Ying? Are you a freaking cheat or bug!
掌事让他们在一个小间隔里等着。羿清也开始主动解释起这份短时工的性质，这里是个商行，一般只有在商家获得难得一见的法宝法器或是丹药时，会举行拍卖。每当这个时候，店家会临时聘请一些修士，护送拍到物品的人回去，也算是售后服务。只不过这些护卫一般都是筑基修士，而且皆是散修。

The steward got them to wait in a small partitioned space. Yi Qing took the initiative to explain the nature of this temporary job. This was a commercial firm, and it was usually only when they received an extremely rare Dharma treasure or artifact or elixirs that they would hold an auction sale. At times like this, the shop owner would hire some cultivators just for a short period — to escort the bidders home, which was also considered as an after-sales service. It was just that these guards were usually Foundation Establishment cultivators and they were all itinerant cultivators.
接下来是第三道，第四道……
Then came the third strike, the fourth...
接下来的日子，他们在秘境继续停留了一个多月。利用这段时间，孤月全力练化那道异火。异火十分强横，收服异火他花废了一番心思，可能是因为附近有着仙气的原因，成功后，连经年没有动过的修为都隐隐有松动的痕迹。

The three of them remained in the mystic realm for over a month. In this time, Lonemoon wholeheartedly cleansed the Deviant Fire. The Deviant Fire was extremely strong — he took a lot of effort just to contain it. This was probably because there was a lot of Immortal Qi surrounding them. After he had contained the Deviant Fire, his cultivation level — which had remained the same throughout the year — finally began to increase.
接下来薄飞平果然忙得晕头转向起来，先是关闭了仙城，只出不进。并及时通知了前去上报情况的薄仪。门已经找到了，接下来怎么处理，就不是他们可以插上手的事了。孤月也没有多停留，找着门就回去了无敌派。

Following on, Pu Feiping was as busy as a bee with so much work to do. First, he had to close the immortal city, only allowing people to leave but not enter. At the same time, he also had to inform Pu Yi who was already on his way to report the matter to the upper courts. The door had been found, thus the follow up work was no longer something they could interfere with. Lonemoon did not stay any longer as well, and returned to the Invincible Sect.
接待他的还是上次的刘管事，刘管事客气的将江逸带进雅阁内，招来侍女奉上香茗后，才微笑问道：“公子，您这次是又准备出售丹药吗？难道有好货色？”

The person who greeted him was Housekeeper Liu, who he had met before. Housekeeper Liu courteously brought Jiang Yi into an elegant booth.
After instructing his maidservant to serve some aromatic tea, he gave a small smile. "Young Master, are you ready to sell more elixirs during this visit? Do you perhaps have some high-quality products?"
接着那管事就出现了，狠狠扇了江小奴一巴掌，让护卫把小奴带到了后院，让她要么赔钱，要么签卖身契……

Following that, that housekeeper appeared and viciously gave Jiang Xiaonu a slap and allowed the guard to bring Xiaonu to the backyard, demanding that she pay up for the damages or otherwise sign a contract and sell herself to the household...
推断出自己的身世，江逸不仅没有半点喜悦，反而脑中都是愤慨之气。对于这个突然冒出来的父亲，他没有半点认同感，亦如他娘亲说的，他没有父亲！以前没有，现在没有，以后也没有……

Even after deducing his background, Jiang Yi did not even feel slight happiness, but instead, his entire mind was filled with rage and indignance. He did not feel any sense of acknowledgement towards this father that came out of no where. Like what his mother had said, he did not have a father! He did not have, does not have, and would never have one in the future...
提着水壶，正准备去给萝卜浇水的某人：“……”
The person carrying a pail of water, prepared to water Radish: "..."
摇了摇头，江逸强迫自己不去多想，开始数起数来。荣管事只给了他两个时辰，要是不能及时清点完毕，回去挨骂事小，要被扣掉月例那就太严重了。

Shaking his head, Jiang Yi forced himself not to overthink and to instead start counting the plants. Chief Rong had only given him four hours to finish this task, after all. If he was unable to finish this work in time, he have to endure yet another scolding and something worse: a salary cut. If his monthly salary was cut, he would be thrown into a truly terrible situation.
摇晃了一下脑袋，江逸重新盘坐起来，暗暗沉吟起来：“嗯……先修炼江水决，这段时间小心些，别被江如虎等人截了。等攒够足够的银钱，我再出去外面购买高级丹药，加快修炼！哼哼，只要我有铸鼎境二重配合黑色元力，江如虎你们敢来找麻烦，看我不把你们一个个打成血猪头？”

Shaking his head, he returned to his cross-legged sitting posture, quietly muttering, "Hmph... I should first practice the Jiang Water Art. I should be more careful during this period of time and not get caught by Jiang Ruhu and gang.
"Once I have acquired enough money, I can head out to purchase high-quality elixirs and speed up my training in refinement! Heh heh! Once I reach the second level of the Cast Tripod Realm and combine that power with black essence force, should Jiang Ruhu dare to come to find trouble... see if I tear you guys up to shreds?"
擒贼先擒王！
To catch bandits, one must first capture the bandit leader!
收啥徒弟啊！她连小学都留级了两次。
What! Taking in a disciple!? Even in primary school she was retained twice.
敢情你不光吃，还想打包吗？！
You're not just going to eat the beast - you want to keep the flesh for later?
敢情刚刚她压根就没醒啊喂！
It seemed that she had been asleep all the time!
敢情只有他一个人以为，她们是想成为剑修的？！
Was he the only one who thought that they wanted to become Sword Cultivators?!
敢情只有他是无敌派捡来的是吧？
So what now, he is the only on picked back from the roadside by Invincible Sect?
敢情这妖怪大晚上做慈善去了？那死的那十几个人是怎么回事？这妖怪是想把人养胖了再杀吗？
Don't tell me that this demon is doing charitable work during the night? Then how to explain the dozen or so people who died? Is this monster trying to fatten people up before killing them?
敢来风月楼闹事，他可不管这少年是谁先打了再说，铸鼎境一重在铸鼎境二重的他看来……屁都不是。

Since the youth dared to barge into Fengyue Brothel to stir trouble, he did not care who he was. A beating was in order. To him, the first or second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm was… nothing to him.
数不清的骸骨巨人、尸人、尸兽和阴兵铺满虚空，密密麻麻，遮天蔽月，它们身上或身周隐隐发亮的暗灰色符文流转不停，光影迷离，规模宏大，似乎把那座原本宏伟神圣，在今夜却显得漆黑寂静的天庭巨城也给比了下去。

Countless skeleton giants, zombies, zombie-beasts, and yin soldiers crowded the space, blotting out the sky and moon. Grey runic patterns sparkled continuously from their bodies—light and shadows blurred. The spectacle was so grand and divine that even the Heavenly Court city, dark and silent that night, paled in comparison.
整个三青界从来没有出现过真正的仙人，碧涛只是仙人的一缕残魂，都能在这仙宫中存在几万年，还保持他们都无法探寻到的实力，谁都不知道真正的仙人到底厉害到什么地步。虽然他们有沈萤这个外挂，但在仙人面前，也不一定有什么胜算。

The Three Realms had never produced a true immortal before. Bitao was only the remnant soul of an immortal, yet he could stay in this Immortal Pavilion for 50,000 years and hide it so that nobody could easily find the Pavilion. Nobody knew what a true immortal would be capable of. Although they had Shen Ying the Cheat with them, they still wouldn't have a chance of winning against an immortal.
整个三青界，几乎没有体修，就算有也在第一次结丹时，被劫雷劈死了。人类的身体，可比不上妖兽之类那般强悍。可思羽妹子，却硬生生抗了下来。即使八十一道劫雷劈完后，她已经只剩下个血架子，却仍是咬着牙完成了结丹。

There were barely any Body Cultivators in all of the Three Realms and even for the ones that existed, they would die from the bolts of lightning during their first Core Formation. A human body was not as tough as the demons’. However, Sister Si Yu forcibly held on. Even after the 81 strikes of lightning had ended and she was only left with a bloody frame, she gritted her teeth to complete her Core Formation.
整个上青界都在坐等好戏！等着轩辕家的游仙长老归来后，如何向这两人讨回来。却不知为何，三个月过去，轩辕家一点动静都没有。而且自那天后，整个家族一反常态，行事作风居然开始低调起来。就连外出送丹弟子，都被要求不能惹出任何事端。

All of the Upper Azure World was waiting to watch a good show. They were waiting for the Elders from the Xuan Yuan Family to return. They were curious to see how they would take revenge on the two sword cultivators. It came as a surprise, therefore, when the Xuan Yuan Family remained quiet for the next three months. From the day the Elders returned, the entire Xuan Yuan Family seemed to have gone under the radar. Even the disciple who was sent out to deliver pills and elixirs had been ordered not to stir any trouble or attract any attention to himself.
整个世界再次变得清晰，时间的流动似乎也凝滞了起来……
The whole world turned distinct again, and time also seemed to pass sluggishly.
整个丹炉一颤，江逸被一股反震之力推到在地，他眼中都是喜色，昨日不就是炸丹才练出两枚地阶丹药吗？

The entire cauldron trembled as Jiang Yi was pushed to the ground by the force of a large reverberating shockwave. His eyes were filled with glee. Was it not the case the day before that the two Earth-tier elixirs were refined only after the original pills exploded?
整个丹炉又一次剧烈摇晃，等他打开一看整张脸都黑了，里面的三枚丹药加上原先的两枚全炸了，变成了残渣，一枚不剩……

Once again the entire cauldron trembled violently. When he lifted the lid and took a look, he facial expressions turned to one of angry dismay. The three elixir pills inside, in addition to the two original pills, had exploded completely and turned to smithereens, with not a single pill left...
整个客栈早早的清了场，寂静无声。客栈的内院正中，一个鸡笼里关着四五只肥壮的公鸡，时不时的发出几声翅膀的拍打声。

The entire inn, having been cleared of all customers very early on, was filled with silence. In the middle of the inn’s inner courtyard, there were four or five fat cockerels in a cage, and the flapping of their wings could be heard from time to time.
整整一个上午，江逸都在柳长老的指挥下忙进忙出，还被骂了整整一个早上。这柳长老明显一夜未睡觉，但炼丹起来却如走火入魔般，眼看到了午后时分了，江逸都饿得肚子哇哇叫还没有停下的意思。

For an entire morning, Jiang Yi had been hustling and bustling under Elder Liu's orders and was scolded the entire time in the process. It was clear that Elder Liu had not slept an entire night, but when it came to refining elixirs it was as if he had been possessed by the devil. Jiang Yi saw that it was already noon and his stomach was rumbling loudly with hunger, yet Elder Liu did not seem to have any intention to stop.
整整一天，他都没有出门，在家疗伤同时研究黑色元力，结果让他有些郁闷。尽管黑色元力再次出现两种新的能力——能让听力和嗅觉增强，但研究了一天，无论他怎么想办法，这黑色元力提炼的上限只有十缕！

He did not leave his room for the entire day. While he was at home, he tended to his injuries and studied the black essence force. The result, however, left him somewhat depressed. Two new abilities of the black essence force were revealed: his hearing and sense of smell could both be made sharper.
Despite this, after researching for a single day, no matter what ideas he could come up with, the upper limit of the black essence force he could refine was only ten strands!
整整半柱香时间，撕裂般的痛楚才缓缓消失。江逸全身冷汗淋漓，汗毛倒立，好半天才艰难的坐了起来。

It took half the time needed for an incense stick to burn out completely before the skin-splitting pain finally dissipated. Jiang Yi’s body was covered in cold sweat, and goosebumps rose to full attention on his arms and back. It took a very long time before he finally managed to lift himself into a seated position.
