断空涯地势险要易守难攻，又位处于幻海边缘，常年阴气不散，魔窟外更是布下了专门针对仙修的聚阴大阵。四大世家与众修仙门派屡次想解决这窝魔头，却被四周的阴气所阻，根本攻不上断空涯就得退出来。久而久之，那里成了众多魔修的容身之处，名副其实的魔窟。

Sky Severance Cliff was extremely easy to defend and it was at the border of the Mirage Sea. The Yin Qi had always been strong there, never dissipating. There was an great array formation of Yin just outside the Fiend Den which was set up specially to get rid of Immortal Cultivators. The four great aristocratic families and the immortal cultivation sects had tried countless times to destroy the Fiend Den but the Yin Qi had stopped them from doing so—they were always forced to retreat even before they made it to the top of Sky Severance Cliff. As time went by, the Fiendish Cultivators made their homes on the cliff. That was how the Fiend Den had formed.
旁边偏厅内，立即传来一道暴怒的大吼：“混账东西！这炉丹药可是人阶上品的灵神丹，老夫撕了你……”
From the side room immediately came a furious roar: "Damn it! This cauldron contained Man-tier superior-grade Spirit Pills! I’m going to kill you, Jiang Yi!"
旁边的孤月第一时间察觉，也同一时间放出了威压，瞬间把对方的气势给顶了回去。上青界又怎么样？他们玄天宗也不是好欺负的。

Lonemoon at the side was the first to notice this, and also released suppression, which immediately pushed back the other party's imposing stance. So what if they were from the Upper Azure World? The Blackheaven Sect was not to be trifled with.
旁边的羿清，淡定的夹起另一块放在了她碗里。
Yi Qing at the side and picked up another piece of meat into her bowl calmly.
无人说得清到底是谁攻下了这个魔窟，只是断空涯的石壁之上，留下了“无敌”二字。一时间众说纷芸。有人说是四大世家终于忍受不了断空涯的挑衅，所以联合了诸多游仙，一起强行攻下了魔窟。有人说是魔头得罪了妖界大妖，妖怪不惧阴气，所以能解决他们。更有人说可能是哪位隐世的高人做的。至于那无敌二字，只是为了警告魔修不要太过嚣张。

No one knew exactly who had taken down the Fiend Den. All that was known related to this incident was a single word which was left on the stone wall atop Sky Severance Cliff—"Invincible". This was the talk of the town. Some said that the four aristocratic families had finally had enough of the constant provoking from Sky Severance Cliff and so had gathered a whole group of their best Traveling Immortals to take down the Fiend Den by force. Others said that the fiends had offended the Great Demons from the Demon Realm. Since demons were unaffected by Yin Qi, they would be able to get rid of the fiends. Yet others said that some hidden expert had done the deed and the word "invincible" was meant as a warning to the Fiendish Cultivators so they would not get too cocky.
无名轻叹一声，道：“如果真要打，老不死你至少要耗掉整个冥界的五成兵力，才能攻破这座天庭的三重防护大阵，那得熬到什么时候？十天还是半个月？更关键的是就算你最终攻破了这里，也最终成功送走了我，可接下来为恢复你的实力以及兵力，你还要在各界制造多少血腥杀戮？我烦恼的其实是这个啊……”

Wu Ming sighed. "If you want to fight, Old Fart Undying, you will need to expend half of all the Netherworld's military might before you can take down the three-layered protective array of the Heavenly Court.
“How long can you withstand the array? Ten days? Half a month? Even if you finally succeed in overrunning the area, you will only succeed in getting rid of me. After that, how much blood do you need to shed in order to recover your strength and military might. I am actually vexed over that…"
无妨才怪吧，都吐血了喂，卧槽还在吐啊！
How could he be alright, especially since he had vomited blood. Holy shit he was still vomiting!
无敌派。
At Invincible Sect.
无敌派少了个管家，沈萤算是彻底的放飞自我了。强烈要求从一顿六个菜，增加到八个。刚决定跟厨子商量一下，夜宵、下午茶的上岗再就业问题。

Now that the Invincible Sect was without a housekeeper, Shen Ying was completely free to do as she pleased. She demanded that the number of dishes per meal be increased from six to eight an was deciding to discuss with the chef on the issue of hiring staff for the preparation of supper and afternoon tea.
无敌派的人，都这么……高深的吗？
Are Invincible Sect's members all so... deep?
无敌派的位置，他虽然告诉过生意伙伴印家，但由于地处妖界，所以交易的地点约定是在上青城。印家也不可能会透露他们的位置，再加上妖界遍地都是妖类，想要平安来到无敌派山下十分困难。他只有元婴修为，只有可能是靠着系统来到这里的。

He did tell his business partners, the Yin Family, about where Invincible Sect was located. However, because they were located in the Demon Realm, he told them that they would meet at the Upper Azure Town instead. What's more, the Yin Family would not have told others about the Invincible Sect's location. Given the number of demons that lurked around in the Demon Realm, it would be difficult for anyone to arrive at the Invincible Sect's hill safely. He was only a Nascent Soul - there was no way he would have made it if not for the system.
无敌派的掌门是大仙啊！
The Sect Master of the Invincible Sect was a Great Immortal!
无敌派除了他和羿清，全是体修，体修重在淬体，法器灵宝对体修来说根本没有任何用处，唯一用得上的也就是少量的灵植丹药了，但那也是快被揍死的时候应急用的。而整个无敌派，最多的就是灵植。

Besides him and Yi Qing, the rest of them in the Invincible Sect were body cultivators. Body cultivation focuses on pure energy, Dharma artifact and spirit treasures are not of any use to body cultivators, the only one that could be used would be a small dose of spirit herbs and elixirs, but those were also only useful for emergencies when they were almost beaten to death and the thing that the whole Invincible Sect had the most was spirit herbs.
无敌派，名字倒挺霸气，但却是从未有人听闻过，一看就是新生的小门派。虽然三人中，有两人看似修为不浅，一身气势隐隐有压过在场所有人的趋势，却也没有人轻易敢加入。

Invincible Sect sounded formidable and powerful, but nobody had ever heard of it. Everybody could tell that the sect was newly formed and small. Even though two out of three of the people from the sect seemed to be of a considerable cultivation level and looked like they could possibly beat everyone else around them, nobody dared to join their sect.
无敌派，后殿。
In the rear hall of Invincble Sect.
无视冥皇的威胁，无名依旧坐在那里喋喋不休，只是……从他的身体内部，不知何时冒出了一股股熊熊烈火。
Ignoring the Netherworld King's menacing stare, Wu Ming continued to sit there blabbering away. However… it was unknown when wisps of raging flames emerged out of his body.
无视又惨叫起来的江如虎，江逸目光锁定围过来的众人，他嘴角此刻还有淤血，配合他那冷漠的神情，看起来别有一番摄人之威。

Disregarding Jiang Ruhu, who had started screaming in agony once again, Jiang Yi's gaze was locked onto the corwd of opponents surrounding him. There was still some clotted blood on the corner of his mouth at that moment. Coupled with his stone-cold facial expression, he looked as though he had some sort of special power to enchant others.
无视议论纷纷的众人，他沉声开口道，“我见过的草木灵生长于那个上古秘境，并不是你们轩辕之物。”

Without any regard for the crowd that was furiously whispering behind him, he said, "I've seen the Vegetation Spirit grow in the ancient mystic realm, and it does not belong to your Xuan Yuan Family."
既然已经砸破江如龙的脑袋，江逸也无所顾忌了，索性继续抡着江如龙在演武殿内狂舞，不过这次他控制了一些力道，不敢将他活活砸死，否则他也怕只有死路一条了。

Since he already smashed up the head of Jiang Rulong, Jiang Yi didn't have any scruple any longer. He simply continued to whirl Jiang Rulong around in the Martial Arts Demonstration Hall like he was performing a mad dance. But this time, he controlled his strength as he didn't dare to smash Jiang Rulong to his death. If he did, he would be immediately put to death.
既然有人点将，江逸只能苦笑出战了，跟随翊凌雪走了一个练功房内，很快房门就关闭了，房间墙壁上光芒闪耀，两人的元力都被封印。

Since there was someone deliberately ordered him, Jiang Yi could only smile bitterly and head out for combat. Following Yi Lingxue, he walked into one of the technique practising rooms. It was not long before the door to the room sealed shut and the walls of the room shone brightly as both persons' essence forces were sealed off from use.
既然猜出了江如虎的如意算盘，江逸怎么能让他得逞？这几日他虽然一直在修炼，但大部分时间都在提炼黑色元力消融封印上的符文，并没有过多的去修炼江水决，实力还停在铸鼎境一重，此刻和江如虎对上，那肯定只有挨揍的份。

Since Jiang Yi guessed Jiang Ruhu's wishful thinking, how could he allow him to prevail? The past few days, while he had always been practicing refining, he had spent most of his time refining black essence force to remove the runic characters on his seal and had barely practiced the Jiang Water Art.
With his strength still stuck at the first stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, should he fight with Jiang Ruhu at that present moment, he would suffer a beating.
日上三竿，柳长老却没有出现，江逸也不管了，一个人又兴奋的开始提炼黑色元力，破解封印上的符文。

It was already late in the morning, yet Elder Liu had not shown up. Jiang Yi chose not to care; instead, he decided to start refining black essence force on his own to continue breaking the runic patterns on his seal.
早就想揍这个跟他抢师父的小婊砸了！
He always wanted to beat this little guy for stealing his master!
早猜到第三层不简单，没想到是他们五个，而且还恢复了仙骨。羿清拼命握紧了手中的剑，如今的情况，也只有一战！

He knew that the third level would not be simple, but he had not expected the five traveling immortals to have restored their immortal bones. Yi Qing held onto his sword for dear life. Given his circumstances, he had no choice but to fight!
早知道应该带着萝卜一起出来的，可现在已经走了大半天了，要不先回去？
If she had known she would get lost, she would have brought Radish out with her. She has already walked such a distance... should she turn back?
时间一点一滴地过去，江逸浑身绷紧，背后已经开始冒冷汗了，江小奴一双漂亮的大眼睛也都是忐忑和紧张，今日两人能否平安走出这风月楼，就在这管事的一念之间了。

Time passed by slowly, second by second. Jiang Yi's body tensed up as cold sweat dripped down his back. Jiang Xiaonu's pair of pretty ears also revealed her nervousness and anxiety. The ability of the two people to safely leave Fengyue Brothel hinged entirely on a single thought made by this very housekeeper.
时间如流水，当江逸九岁时，大长老又一次留信离开了江家。他这次离开，便是整整六年，期间音信全无，宛如人间蒸发。

When Jiang Yi was nine, the Grand Elder once again left a letter to his family to announce his departure. Yet, this time his departure lasted a full six years! With the family not even once receiving any news or message from him throughout this period, it was as though he had vanished from the face of the earth.
时隔多年，内容细节虽然已经不太清楚了，但大概的情节他还是有印象的。而羿清就是这本书里的一个人物，而且还是那种狂霸酷炫屌炸天的人。出场的时候就已经是三界第一剑仙了，真正可以扫荡三界的人物。

After a lapse of many years, the details of the content were blurred but the general idea of the storyline still left an impression in him. Yi Qing was one of the characters in the book, and he was a absurdly cool and super formidable character. When he was introduced in the story, he was already the top sword immortal of the Three Realms, a character who truly was very powerful within the Three Realms.
时隔数月，她终于想起了穿越以来的最大危机——贫穷！
After several months of time, she had now finally remembered the largest crisis of her transmigration — poverty!
明亮火红的碎片无视并穿透了整个冥界大军，瞬间便消失在天际。
Bright red metal shards shot through the Netherworld Realm's forces without any regard, eliminating them in an instant.
明亮的火焰很快便将无名的身体整个包裹，包括他手上拄着的那把剑。
The burning flames quickly engulfed Wu Ming, including the sword he held.
明明四周灵气浓郁得宛如实质，却像是假的一样，根本引导不入体内。所以几人的伤根本无法修复。孤月猜测，应该是里面下了什么，他们都没见过的禁制。

The surrounding Qi was so dense that it was almost papable, but it seemed to be a faked Qi that could not be guided into their bodies. Therefore, they could not recover from their injuries at all. Lonemoon guessed that some kind of restriction had been placed on the Qi.
明明她皮肤跟以前一样，软软柔柔一捏一个准，对方就是咬不动。一开始她还以为是这些小动物太弱。还试着拔起屋后那颗百年大树，结果这些盘根错杂的老树，她拔起来轻易的跟拔葱似的。屋前屋后数十棵老树被她拔了个干净，于是……她顺便圈了个院子。

Her skin looked exactly like it was before, soft as ever, yet the opponent simply could not bite through it. Initially, she had thought that this was because those small animals were too weak. She even went to try lifting the century old gigantic tree behind her cottage, and in the end she lifted the tree which had deep and intertwining roots with as little effort as pulling out a scallion. Dozens of trees around her cottage were completely uprooted by her, and as a result… she conveniently cleared out a yard.
明明带队的是他，练器的是羿清，关沈萤毛事啊喂？你们这一脸收到爱豆礼物的兴奋是要闹哪样？

Lonemoon was the one who had brought the team, Yi Qing was the one who had refined the artifacts. How were those things related in any way to Shen Ying? Why are all of you excited about receiving gifts from your admired idol?
明明有些小动物还有着特殊能力，例如张口可以喷火，落爪可以劈地之类的。但这些技能好像对她完全没有效果，喷火顶多烧掉她个衣角，裂地埋了她还能再爬出来。甚至有时她故意让小动物咬她一只，结果却崩掉了对方满口的尖牙。

Some of the small animals even had special abilities, such as spewing fire, breaking the ground with their paws and so on. However, these skills seemed useless towards her. The damage done by the fire they spewed would at most burn the corner of her clothing while them breaking apart the ground would only bury her for a bit before she climbed right back out. There were even times when she purposely let them bite her and they ended up with a mouth full of chipped-off fangs.
明明现成的宝山就在眼前，却一件都用不上，这心情……
There was a ready treasure right in front of them but not a single one could be of use, that mood...
昏暗的夜色中，江逸看到一道瘦弱的身影在前方茫然寻觅呼喊，心里顿时都是内疚和心疼，脚下元力运转朝江小奴狂奔而去。

In the darkness of night, Jiang Yi spotted a weak skinny figure in front of him shouting and searching for him. His heart suddenly filled with guilt and heartache, he applied some essence force towards the bottom of his feet and raced towards Jiang Xiaonu.
易家。
Yi Family.
易家，万兽峰。
Yi Family, Myriad Beast Peak.
Yi Feng: "..."
易峰一僵：“……”
Yi Feng: "..."
易峰一呆，强行拉回了理智，什么袋子？储物袋吗？
Yi Feng stared back at her blankly. He forced himself to think. What bag? A storage bag?
易峰一脸懵逼，反应过来时，人已经到山下了。
Yi Feng was in shock. By the time he regained his composure, he had already descended down the hill.
易峰不敢置信的睁大了眼睛，“姑娘，也擅长御兽？”
Yi Feng could not believe his eyes. "Lady, are you also an expert in beast taming?"
易峰僵了僵，试探的道，“天色已晚，要不……先回去？”
Yi Feng paused, "It's getting dark. Should we... head back?"
易峰刚要问，突然一道白光亮起，只见白泽周身突然亮起刺眼的光，如烈日骄阳瞬间驱散了四周的黑暗。他只觉得心口一松，刚刚那股威压已经消失了。

Yi Feng was just about to ask Shen Ying about it when suddenly a brilliant light lit up the sky. Bai Ze's body was emitting the blinding light, which like the rays from a blazing sun, immediately dispelled the surrounding darkness. Yi Feng's chest relaxed as the pressure from the aura that was pressing on him vanished.
易峰却越加震惊了，灵主不是从来不跟任何人提起自己的身份吗？为什么就直接说了真名啊？他连忙担忧的看了沈萤一眼，见对方完全没有什么特别的反应，仿佛根本没有意识到这名字有什么问题，才松了口气。

Yi Feng began to panic. Since when did the Spirit Master tell people his name? Why did he tell her his real identity? He shot a worried glance at Shen Ying and saw that she was still calm, as if nothing special had happened. She did not seem to realise there was anything wrong with the name. He visibly relaxed.
易峰只能连连后退，挡下那满天的毒刺。正准备迎接它下一波攻击，背云兽却完全没有追击他的意思，反而回过身，张嘴朝着东南方向咬了下去。

Yi Feng had no choice but to retreat and avoid the toxic needles that were headed in his direction. Just as he was preparing his next attack, he Cloud-Bearing Beast turned away from him, without any intention to continue attacking him. It faced the southeast direction, roared, and bit at the ground.
易峰和管事双双松了口气，总算把这两位送走了，短短三天的时间，起码减寿了十年。
Yi Feng and his house manager heaved a collective sigh of relief. They had finally sent these two off. It was just three days but they felt that their life span had shortened by ten years.
易峰嘴角一抽，有些怀疑自己的耳朵，“灵主……她们不是刚走吗？”还不到半个时辰啊喂。就算人家邀请，这也应得太快了吧？！

Bai Zhe's mouth twitched. He could not believe his ears. "Spirit Master... Didn't they just leave?" It had only been an hour since they left. Even if they had invited him, wasn't this a little too soon? !
易峰四下看了看，这才发现东道主的印家居然不在。
Yi Feng had looked around and realized that the Yin patriarch, their host, was nowhere to be found.
易峰好不容易回来了点的理智，再次全线崩塌。
Yi Feng had regained his composure after much difficulty, but he lost it once again.
易峰小心脏抖得更加厉害了，“不……不客气。”从来没觉得这剑这么重过，要不是自己的本命法器，他就扔出去了。
Yi Feng's heart pounded, "Don't... don't mention it." The sword suddenly felt extremely heavy. If it weren't his intrinsic dharmic artifact, he would throw it out.
易峰带着沈萤一路飞入幻海，虽然不知道她为什么非要站在他剑上，但来者是客，易峰虽疑惑到也不好说什么，开始介绍起幻海的情况来。

Yi Feng brought Shen Ying and flew straight to the Mirage Sea. Although he did not know why she wanted to stand on his sword, he knew that she was a guest no matter what and he had no choice but to give in to her requests. He began to introduce Shen Ying to the Mirage Sea.
易峰干笑了两声，也没有回话，郁家家主一向自傲，说话从不注意场合的事，他也听说过。
Yi Feng laughed but did not respond. He had heard about the arrogance of the Yu Family Patriarch, that he never followed the rules of decorum in his speech.
易峰引着两人向中间的主峰走去，一路行来所见到的弟子身边，都会围绕着一两只灵兽，形态各异。嗯……就是不知道味道怎么样？
Yi Feng led the two of them to ward the centre main peak. All the disciples that he met on the way were surrounded by one or two spirit beast that were unique. Umm...
易峰心都提了起来，但好在沈掌门不是个追根究底的人，说假装没听到，还真就再没开口问灵主的事。没由来的，他越发觉得这个无敌派掌门还是很好相处的，怪不得轩辕和印家都对她那般友好。

Yi Feng became wary. It was fortunate that Sect Master Shen was not someone who questioned things incessantly. She really acted as if she had not heard overheard the Spirit Master matter and did not ask about it again. Yi Feng began to think that the Sect Master of the Invincible Sect was really easy to get along with. It was no wonder that the Xuan Yuan Family and Yin Family were on such good terms with her.
易峰想了想，用力点头到，“有！不过单凭法器对付游仙，恐怕困不了多久。”
Yi Feng thought for a moment and then nodded, "Yes! But we can't hold them off for long with just a Dharma artifact."
易峰愣了一下，以为她是觉得狮吼兽体型小，于是解释道，“狮吼兽是十阶灵兽，可以变换体型，当日沈掌门看到的并非它的真身，实际它要比那大上十倍不止呢。”

Yi Feng hesitated. He figured that she regarded the Lion Roaring Beast as a small beast and explained, "The Lion Roaring Beast is a tenth-stage spirit beast. It can mutate. Sect Master Shen, the form you saw the other day was not its true form. In actual fact, it is about sixy to ninety times larger than it appeared."
易峰愣了愣，难得见他如此严肃的神情，条件反射的点了点头。
Yi Feng hesitated, shocked to see such a stern expression on his Spirit Master's face. He nodded subconsciously.
易峰是易家家主，化神修士。在上青界已经很难找到适合他的灵兽，所以只能冒险前去幻海一探。他当初发那个邀请贴，真正用意只是为了与无敌派交好。其实没想过真请人帮忙的意思，却没想到对方还真就答应了。

Yi Feng was the Family Master of the Yi Family - a Soul Formation cultivator. It was difficult to find a beast suitable for him in the Upper Azure World, so he had not choice but to risk a trip to the Mirage Sea to find one. At first, he invited Shen Ying along just to form good relations with the Invincible Sect. He did not think that he would need Shen Ying's help, or that Shen Ying would agree to come along.
易峰有点懵，轩辕禹却完全没有理他的意思，蹭的一下就站了起来，火急火燎的就朝着郁海衍刚刚指的那个凡人方向，小跑了过去，就连旁边的轩辕家游仙也立马跟上了，那急切的样子，似是赶着投胎似的。

Yi Feng was a little bewildered, but Xuan Yuanyu completely ignored him. He got up immediately and sprinted towards the mortal that Yu Haiheng had been pointing to. Even the Xuan Yuan Family's Traveling Immortals who had been standing next to Xuan Yuan followed behind immediately. They dashed off with such urgency that it seemed like they were rushing to be reincarnated.
易峰有种想要吐血的冲动，若是在这之前，他兴许以为自己和沈掌门连手，或许可以拿下。前提是……对方也会御兽啊！怎么办？现在逃跑还来得及吗？

Yi Feng felt like he was going to vomit. If this had happened ten minutes ago, he would think that Sect Master Shen and he together would be able to tackle the 背云兽. But now... he knew that Sect Master Shen did not know anything about beast control! What am I to do? Is it too late to run?
易峰有种被馅饼砸中的不真实感，连忙召出了飞剑，还不忘回头看了原地的沈萤一眼，“沈掌门是否要一起？”
Everything felt strangely surreal to Yi Feng. He quickly drew his flying sword and almost forgot about Shen Ying. "Sect Master Shen, do you want to come along?"
易峰本来就已经瞪大的眼睛，睁得更大了，她这是干嘛？真的要吃吗？
Yi Feng's were already wide, but at that moment they widened further. What is she doing? Is she really going to eat it?
易峰来禀告的时候，白泽还不敢相信，毕竟他都试了几万年了。直到见到飘浮在半空中那个人高的白色缺口。他能感觉到里面隐隐透出熟悉的气息，那是相隔了几万年的神族气息。

Bai Ze could not believe his ears when Yi Feng reported this to him. Afterall, they had been trying for tens of thousands of years. He only really believed it when he saw the floating white opening, which was then as tall as a human being. He felt the familiar aura - the divine race aura that he had unfortunately been separated from all these years.
易峰立马掏出一堆阵旗，法符之类的物品道，“我是金灵根，所以想寻一只其它属性的灵兽，不知道沈掌门可否也有找一只灵兽的想法？”

Yi Feng retrieved a stack of array flags and dharmic talismans and said, "I have a gold-elemental spirit root, so I want to look for spirit beasts that have spirit roots of other elements. Sect Master Shen, are you looking for any kind of spirit beast in particular?"
易峰脚下一拐，差点从灵剑上摔了下去。心下顿时一沉，僵硬的回过头。惨了，她还是听见了。
Yi Feng lost his footing on the sword and nearly fell off of it. His heart stopped as he turned around stiffly. Damn it, she heard.
易峰脸色一僵，闪过一丝慌乱，尴尬的笑了笑，“哈哈，沈掌门说笑了。万兽山地形复杂，是易某招待不周，应该让弟子上山来接你的。这么长时间你应该累了吧。”说完连忙朝着后面的人道，“易呈，快带沈掌门去客房休息。”

Yi Feng stiffened as a look of panic flashed past his face. He awkwardly smiled and replied, "Haha, Sect Master Shen, you're really funny. The Myriad Beast Peak can get a little confusing. It is my family's fault for not hosting you well. I should have asked my disciples to fetch you from this peak. It's been such a long time, you must be tired." Yi Feng turned to his disciples behind him and instructed, "Yi Cheng, quickly bring Sect Master Shen to her room to rest."
易峰虽然不明白，他们为什么突然一起，把绿身男了按在了地上，但总觉得气氛哪里怪怪的，于是点了点头，“那就有劳沈掌门，和两位长老。”
Yi Feng did not understand why they all suddenly held the green-clothed man back, but he sensed the tense atmosphere and nodded, "Thank you Sect Master Shen and Elders."
易峰还没反应过来，就只见他突然转身朝着两人的方向跑了过来，瞬间就到了两人身边。
Yi Feng had no time to react before his Spirit Master suddenly turned and ran toward them. In seconds, he was beside them.
易峰连忙结印布了一个阵眼，再唤了灵剑出来，沉声道，“沈掌门，此兽不能契约，我试试能不能迫它沉睡，还请帮我守住此处阵眼。”

Yi Feng quickly summoned a seal and set up an array formation. He summoned his spirit sword and instructed, "Sect Master Shen, we cannot contract this beast. I'm going to try to force it into a deep sleep. Please maintain this array formation for me."
易峰隐隐听到了心碎的声音。
Yi Feng could almost hear his own heart shattering
易峰顺着她指的方向细看，却怎么也没有看到她所说的人，“没有啊，你什么时候发现。”
Yi Feng looked in the direction that Shen Ying was pointing, yet he could not see anybody. "There's no one there. When did you see him?"
Yi Feng: "..."
易峰：“……”心里苦。
Yi Feng "..." His heart felt bitter.
易峰：“……”我要的是契约灵兽，不是宠物啊喂。
Yi Feng: "..." I want a contract spirit beast, not a pet.
易峰：“……”还来！
Yi Feng: "..." Come again!
Yi Feng: !!!
春芽一怔，连忙带着哭腔解说起来：“江逸少爷，小奴在风月楼被打了，那管事说是小奴弄坏了一副名画，要小奴赔钱，否则就要活活打死她，你快找人去营救她……”

A stupefied Chunya answered with tears brimming in her eyes. "Young Master Jiang Yi, Xiaonu is being beaten up at Fengyue Brothel. The manager says Xiaonu damaged a painting and wants her to pay, or else she will be beaten to death. Quick, get some people to save her..."
春芽揉了揉眼睛，满脸惊疑的呢喃起来：“咦？江逸少爷的速度怎么那么快了？他不是铸鼎境一重吗？这速度最少有铸鼎境两三重吧？”

Chunya rubbed her eyes.
"Huh?” she murmured in a surprised voice. “How is Young Master Jiang Yi so fast? Ain't he at the first stage of the Cast Tripod Realm? This speed is at least the second or third stage."
春芽看到江逸如一阵风的冲出去，浑身杀气腾腾的，连忙害怕的追着喊了几声：“江逸少爷，你可千万别冲动，风月楼里面的护卫实力很多很强大的……”

Seeing Jiang Yi dashing off like the wind and seething with murderous intent, an alarmed Chunya shouted after him, "Young Master Jiang Yi, please don't do anything rash; there are many guards at Fengyue Brothel—all strong and numerous in number…"
昨夜研究了一夜，他都没有探查出那丹药内莫名出现的成分是什么，所以今日尝试添加了各种药剂，希望和昨天一样炼制出一枚地阶丹药。

After researching for an entire night the night before, he was unable to find out what the identity the component that had mysteriously appeared in that elixir was. Thus, he was trying to add in all types of medicinal ingredients today, hoping to refine a pill of Earth-tier elixir just like he did the day before.
昨天他被江如虎等人打伤，昏死了一上午，回家睡了一觉脑海内莫名出现了一部无名口诀，接着他按无名口诀上修炼出一丝神奇的黑色元力，凭借这黑色元力，他早上将江豹狠狠的揍了一顿，又去风月楼将小奴救了出来，不过却欠下十两紫金的巨额债务……

Yesterday he had just been beaten up by Jiang Ruhu and his lackeys and fallen into a coma for an entire morning; upon returning home a nameless formulation mysteriously appeared in his mind. Subsequently, he refined a sliver of mysterious black essence force through this nameless formulation; borrowing the strength of this black essence force, he had viciously beat up Jiang Bao, and had even gone to rescue Xiaonu from Fengyue Brothel. Yet he now owed an enormous debt worth ten taels of purple gold...
是夜。
At night.
是巧合？还是这小子在扮猪吃虎？他本身其实是一个强大的武者？来这冒充陪练？无意间引导帮助翊小姐武技大成了？

Was this all a coincidence? Or was this kid simply trying to play dumb and weak? Was his identity, in truth, that of a powerful martial artist? Was he here to pass himself off as a sparring partner? Did he inadvertently guide and assist Young Mistress Yi to attain the Phenomenal Stage in her martial arts skills
是本小女孩看的小说，自然高深不到哪去，无非是你爱我，我爱你，爱来爱去，你死我活的类型。他对这种脑残小说向来是嗤之以鼻的，但此书的某些描写的确别致，不知不觉间居然看完了。

Since it was a novel that little girls would read, obviously it would not be of much depth. It was nothing beyond ‘you love me, I love you’, all about loving-till-death kind of stuff. He was always contemptuous of those kinds of ridiculous novels, yet this book had certain descriptions that were interesting and fresh, and he had finished it without even noticing.
是真人真是太好了！
It's great that it's really Lonemoon!
显然沈萤跟宁小朋友的小动作，并没有引起互吹三人组的注意。
Obviously the small antics of Shen Ying and Ning ZiAn did not garner the attention of the bantering trio.
晋……晋阶了？
Level... level up?
晚一步的孤月：“……”MMP！这丫就是故意的，绝对是！
Lonemoon was too late. "..." Motherf*cker! This b*tch did it on purpose! She must have!
曲双城内有仙脉不假，但这仙脉居然就是魔界之门的封印。
To think that the immortal pulse in Qushuang City is actually the seal for the door of Demon Realm.
曲双城已经不适合仙人继续修练下去了，否则城内的仙脉越来越弱，魔界之门总有一天会现世。薄飞平看来有得忙了。

Qushuang City is no longer suitable for the immortals to cultivate there, if not the city's immortal pulse would just become weaker and weaker. One day, the door of Demon Realm might just resurge. Pu Feiping had lots of work to do now.
更要命的是，背云兽是十三阶灵兽，相当于化神后期修士。加上灵兽本身就比同阶人修要强。

What was worse was that the 背云兽 was a thirteenth-stage spirit beast. It was as powerful as a late-stage Soul Formation cultivator. Spirit beasts were also much more powerful than human cultivators from the same realm.
更重要的是，他刚刚科普了一堆的常识。为啥她又绕回了一开始的问题？你刚刚都听了些什么，到底有没有听进去啊喂。
More importantly, he just taught her a bunch of general knowledge. Why did she circle back to the original question? What did you just listen to, did you even hear what I said?
最后一炉丹药出炉，柳长老取出来一枚看了看，脸上顿时都是失望和疲惫之色，他骂骂咧咧几句大步朝炼丹房外走去，走到门口才醒悟过来，回头扫了江逸一眼，交代道：“江……什么？你把这些废丹全丢了，先回去吃饭，下午认真把那本药草简介看几遍，别下次找药草又找半天……还有，有人来领丹药，一律不给……他娘亲的，到底哪出了问题？”

The last cauldron of elixirs was freshly done. Elder Liu retrieved a pill and took a look, his face instantly revealing a look of disappointment and fatigue. He swore several times as he walked with big steps towards the door of the alchemy lab.
He only remembered Jiang Yi when he reached the main door. Turning around and taking a glance at Jiang Yi, he instructed, "Jiang...what? You go throw away all those useless elixirs. After that, go back and have a meal first. Take the afternoon to carefully read through that compendium of medicinal herbs several times, so you don't take so long to find the medicinal herbs next time... Additionally, if anyone comes to retrieve elixirs, do not give it to them... My god, where on earth did it go wrong?"
最后在江如虎耳边说的一段话，果然起效了！
The last statement he made at the side of Jiang Ruhu's ear had indeed been effective!
最终那份丹宗传承，孤月接了，而那仙魂也的确说话算话，收回了炉中的异火。孤月将异火分成了两分，一份给了羿清。

In the end, Lonemoon agreed to inherit Dan Yang Sect's heritage. The immortal soul kept his word and passed down the Deviant Fire from the cauldron as well. Lonemoon split the Deviant Fire in two and gave the other half to Yi Qing.
最近整个妖界都很忙，众妖们忙着帮大仙重建莫名倒塌的后殿，沈萤忙着吃吃吃，而孤月则忙着教导新入门的弟子。原本教术法这种事，羿清也有份的。但不知道他最近受了什么刺激，从这些弟子入门的第二天起，他就在沈萤屋子旁边又僻出了一个临时厨房，一头扎进里面研究起新菜式来。谁都拉不出来。

Recently, the entire Demon Realm had been very busy as all the demons were busy helping the Great Immortal to rebuild the rear hall of her palace which had inexplicably collapsed. Shen Ying was busy eating all day while Lonemoon was busy coaching the new disciples. Originally, Yi Qing had a part to play regarding the matters of teaching sorcery, but he seemed to have experienced some kind of blow. From the second day that those disciples had entered the sect, he sectioned off a temporary kitchen beside Shen Ying's house and began wholeheartedly experimenting on new dishes. No one could get him to come out.
最近灵兽山和镇西军招生在即，江云山亲自下令让勉强上得了台面的子弟全部闭关，要么修炼元力，要么磨练武技，此刻在演武殿内的子弟明显都天资不高，短时间内境界突破不了，只能磨练武技了。

The recruitment of the Mt. Spirit Beast College and West Garrison Army was to be hosted soon. Jiang Yunshan personally gave out the orders to allow all descendants that had certain levels of ability, to go into seclusion for cultivation of essence force or practice of martial arts. It was obvious that all the descendants in the Martial Arts Demonstration Hall did not have sufficient talents, and would be unable make a breakthrough within a short moment; which was why they could only hone their martial arts.
有个自尊心太强的厨子也是个问题啊，看来以后都不能随便换口味了。
Having an overly proud chef was also a problem. It seemed that the flavor of meals would not be changing in the future.
有了兽丹和毕浩给的丹药，伤已经好得差不多了。她立马就离开了那个危险的林子，原本打算直接回去冥阴山，但毕浩带来的那个消息，让她改变了主意。再带着沈萤在身边，明显不适合。偏偏她那逆天的认路本领，让她实在不忍心，直接扔下人不管。于是才临时变道，到了这处仙城的附近。

After taking the beast pills and elixirs from Bi Hao, her injury had almost recovered. She had then immediately left the dangerous forest. Although she originally intended to return to Ming Yin Mountain, the news brought by Bi Hao changed her mind. It was obviously not wise to bring Shen Ying along. However, she could not find it in her heart to leave Shen Ying to her own devices as she knew full well the latter's bizarre sense of road direction. She had thus changed her route at the last minute and came to this place close to an immortal city.
有了草木灵的指路，孤月终于体验了一把暴发户的感觉。那些高阶灵草灵植，简直就像是自家后院长的一样，一采一个准，而且株株都是万年以上的灵植。而且还不用自己动手，草木灵只轻轻一挥叶子，那些灵植就会自己飞到储物袋躺好。

With the vegetation spirit navigating the way, Lonemoon suddenly felt like a parvenu. He felt as if he was plucking all these top-grade spirit herbs from his backyard — each was over ten-thousand years old at that. He didn't even have to lift a finger. The vegetation spirit just had to wave its leaves slightly and the spiritual herbs would fly straight into his bag.
有免费的灵神丹无限供应，加上武殿内浓郁的天地灵气，还有黑色元力辅助，江逸的修炼一日千里，快得让他暗暗咋舌。

天地灵气With free Spirit Pills being limitlessly provided to him, plus the thick heavenly and earthly spiritual aura in the Martial Arts Hall, in addition to the stimulus provided by the black essence force, Jiang Yi's power cultivation achieved rapid progress, so fast that it left him speechless in his heart.
有妖吗？他不禁有些担心，不是担心自己，而是担心之前那个姑娘，不知她有没有事？只是他实在太累了，没清醒一会，再次晕了过去。

Are there demons here? He could not help being worried; not for himself, but for the girl he had met earlier. Was she alright? But he was really too exhausted and before long, lost consciousness again.
有戏啊这是！
Something was abrewing!
有用！
It worked!
有种你下去啊喂！
Stay here if you have the guts!
望着不留痕迹将金叶子收入袖中的荣管事，江逸内心闪过一丝厌恶，他沉声说道：“管事，这是孝敬您的！这次我是跟几个冒险者去山上采药，如果这次能弄到好东西，回来后还有孝敬，家族这边您……打点下。”

Jiang Yi watched Chief Rong slyly putting away the gold leaf, a silver of disgust wormed into his heart. He pitched his voice low, "Chief, this is my tributary offer to you! I'm leaving this time to go harvest herbs in the mountain with a few landlopers. If I happened to find anything good, there would be more tributes for you when I'm back. Please help to... deal with the family in the meantime."
望着丹炉内的几枚白黄色丹药，江逸眼眸陡然一亮，目前的他的确不能炼制丹药，但眼前不就是现成的丹药吗？虽然废了，但他回炉一下再注入黑色元力，说不定就能把这废丹变成好丹了……

Looking at the few white and yellow pills, Jiang Yi's eyes suddenly lit up. At the moment, it was true that he could not develop any elixirs by himself, but did he not have any ready-made elixirs in front of his eyes? Although they were deemed useless, if he reheated and injected some black essence force, surely he could turn these useless elixirs into good, useful elixirs...
望着堆满整个房间的药草，江逸无奈的退了出来，走进偏厅内想询问一下柳长老怎么区分药草，却看到柳长老正全神贯注的配置药粉，他进来站了好一会都没看他一眼……

Looking at the room full of medicinal herbs, Jiang Yi helplessly retreated. He walked into the side room, wishing to ask Elder Liu how one could differentiate between the various medicinal herbs. However, he saw Elder Liu deeply engrossed in configuring the medicinal ingredients, to the point that he did not even notice Jiang Yi despite having entered and stood there for quite a long time...
望着如一条爬虫般瘫软在地的江如虎，江逸眼中闪过一丝快意，在江家被这群人欺辱了这么多年，今日终于算是拿回来一些利息了。

Observing Jiang Ruhu, who was lying limply on the ground like a crawling insect, a sensed of elation flashed in Jiang Yi's eyes. Having been bullied by this bunch of people from the Jiang Clan for so many years, he could finally claim to have earned some interest back that day.
望着满脸从容，悠然转身朝丹房内走去的江逸，江如虎满眸迷茫起来。这还是以前那个经常被他们打得和狗一样的废物吗？怎么刚才那一瞬间给他感觉，江逸的气度比起江恨水还要有过之而无不及？

Seeing Jiang Yi's face filled with calm as he unhurriedly turned around to walk back in the direction of the alchemy lab, Jiang Ruhu was completely bewildered.
Was this the good-for-nothing that they usually beat up like a dog in the past? How could it be possible that that passing moment gave him a feeling that Jiang Yi's presence felt bigger than even that of Jiang Henshui?
未等沈萤问，他接着就主动解释道，“我轩辕家素来倍出丹修，整个三青界怕是找不出比我族更强的丹修，家主更是十阶的练丹师。道友所获那只千叶草木灵乃是练丹圣物，且只对丹修有用，对于其它修士来说是没有任何用处的。我看道友并不是丹修，何不将其让与我轩辕家，物尽其用。”

Before waiting for Shen Ying to ask, he continued, "My Xuan Yuan Family has always worked hard to refine pills and elixirs. I don't think you would be able to find another family of alchemists as powerful as mine in any of the Three Realms. Our family's master is a tenth-level alchemist as well. The Thousand Leaves Vegetation Spirit that you, my fellow Daoists, have obtained is a beast useful only for refining pills and elixirs. It has absolutely no value in any other area. You two don't look like alchemists to me. Why don't you hand the Thousand Leaves Vegetation Spirit over to my Xuan Yuan Family to put it to good use?"
本命武器与他元神相连，青岚张口吐出一口血。
The intrinsic weapon was closely linked to his primordial spirit. Blood spurted out of Qing Lan's mouth.
本来散修向来散漫，三教九流什么人都有，且大多不是转为魔修，就是专干些偷鸡摸狗，杀人夺宝的事。就他像是散修界的一股清流，为人钢铁般的正直，只要是犯在他手里的恶人，绝讨不了好。偏偏他又是名剑修，本来就比同阶要强上一节，传闻金丹以下的魔修，都被他揍过。他所经之地，很少有魔修出来犯事。

Itinerant cultivators had always been a disorganized lot, made up of all manner of people. Most of them either switched to become fiendish cultivators or turned to pilfering, killing and robbery. He was like a breath of fresh air in the world of itinerant cultivators and he had ironclad integrity. Any wicked creature who fell into his hands came to no good end. As if that were not enough, he was also a famous sword cultivator who was one level higher than his peers. It was rumored that fiendish cultivators below the level of Golden Core had all been thrashed by him. Very few fiendish cultivators committed crimes in places he had passed through.
本来这告示一出来，绝对会有很多人找江逸对练的，但江逸既然开口了，杨管事还指望他赚钱，也不好拂他的面子，从怀中取出一块令牌递给江逸道：“在武殿内学习武技本是要紫金的，不过你现在是紫金陪练，我可以给你个特权，你去藏书阁找白管事，任意学习三种人阶武技，这是我的令牌。给你五天假期，五天之后你必须上场陪练。”

Originally, with the release of this announcement, there would definitely be a lot of people who would seek Jiang Yi for sparring practice. However, since Jiang Yi had opened his mouth, while Manager Yang still counted on him to make money and knew that it was not good to brush him aside or make him lose face, Manager Yangdecided to retrieve a token from his breast-pocket and passed it to Jiang Yi. Manager Yang said, "To train one's martial arts techniques in the Martial Arts Hall, one should start off with paying purple gold. However, since you're a purple gold token-grade sparring partner now, I can grant you a certain special privilege. You can go to the Book Storage Pavilion and search for Manager Bai, and learn any three human-grade martial arts techniques, chosen at your own will. This is my command token. I'll let you take five days of leave, but after five days, you must go into the combat training field and conduct sparring practice."
本着同伴的友谊，他提醒了一句，“神兽是不会轻易受人驱使的。”
Yi Feng gave her a friendly warning, "Divine beasts aren't easily controlled by humans."
杀气！好浓厚的杀气！羿清忍不住抖了一下，为啥他突然觉得师父的样子……有点可怕？！
A killing vibe! What an intense killing vibe! Yi Qing could not help shuddering. Why did he suddenly feel that the Master looked…a little scary?!
束魂咒是直接下在魂体上的一种咒术，中术者无论在何处，只要咒术一发动，施术者就能瞬间出现在对方的身边，只是这种咒术对中术人的损者极大。

The Soul Binding Spell was a spell cast directly on the soul. No matter where its castee was, as long as the spell was activated, the spell caster would be able to instantly appear at his side. The only thing was, this spell was greatly detrimental to the castee.
来人是一个穿着火红色武士袍的少女，一脸扯高气昂，姿色算是中等，比起姬听雨还差一个档次，不过因为穿着紧身武士袍，将凹凸有致的身材完全显露出来，很是惹火。

Just as he thought of posing a few queries regarding the rules, the sound of footsteps rang from the corridor behind him. The manager immediately cast him away and sent him off with a smile.
The person who arrived was a teenage girl dressed in fiery-red martial artist robes. With an arrogant look on her face and moderately good looks, she was a level lower compared to Ji Tingyu. However, as she wearing body-hugging martial artist robes that made the shapely contours of her figure visible, she was attractive.
The person: "..."
来到武殿已经整整一个月了，江逸除了修炼外都是破解封印符文。封印符文破解的速度很快，修炼的进展也很快，按他估计差不多还要一个半月，他就能达到铸鼎境四重了。

It had been a month since Jiang Yi came to the Martial Arts Hall. Besides cultivating, he spent all his energy on breaking the runic patterns on the seal. The progress for both was fast. By his estimation, it would only take approximately another month and half for him to reach the fourth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm.
杨管事一张老脸上都是不解和困惑，他看了画面很久还是惊疑不定，最终朝白发老者拱手道：“费老，您怎么看？”

Manager Yang's elderly face revealed a look of non-comprehension and confusion. He stared at the images for a very long time, but remained completely bewildered. Finally, he raised his hands in surrender towards the elderly man with white hair and said, "Elder Fei, what do you make of this?"
杨管事一挥手让护卫下去，这才笑容可掬的和江逸说道：“苍狼，我也不瞒你，开门见山的说了，我代表武殿想和你做一笔交易。”

Manager Yang waved his hands to send away the guard. It was only then that, beaming from ear to ear, he addressed Jiang Yi by saying, "Lone Wolf, I don't want to beat around the bush, so I will say this to you directly that, on behalf of the Martial Arts Hall, I would like to make a deal with you."
杨管事也是一愣，三位公子看到江逸带着铜牌面具更是满眸错愕，姬小姐铸鼎境八重和一个小小的铜牌陪练对战什么？一根手指头怕是就能戳死江逸吧？

Manager Yang similarly stared at her blankly, while the three gentlemen stared at Jiang Yi, who was wearing a bronze mask, with much astonishment in their eyes. How could Young Mistress Ji, with a power level at the eighth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, possibly choose to fight with a little bronze token-grade sparring partner? Would her finger alone not be able to stab Jiang Yi to death?
杨管事傻眼了，看着江逸也一副见鬼了的表情。这铸鼎境一重武者怎么可能是金牌陪练？要是人人都是金牌陪练，武殿也不用如此急迫的招人了……

Manager Yang was flabbergasted. He looked at Jiang Yi as though he had seen a ghost. How could this martial artist at the first stage of the Cast Tripod Realm be a gold-token-grade sparring partner? If everyone was a gold-token-grade sparring partner, then the Martial Arts Hall would not be so desperately hiring new staff...
杨管事哑然失笑，解释道：“苍狼，你只是受聘于武殿，你并不是武殿的人，换句话说你是在做工，我们付工钱。武殿内其余的几名金牌陪练也和我们有交易的，苍狼啊……你别把事情想得那么复杂，实话和你说吧，我就看重你变态的战斗本能，反应速度，准备培养你一番，让你成为顶级的金牌陪练，这样你能替武殿赚钱，就这么简单！”

Manager Yang laughed involuntarily and explained, "Lone Wolf, you're only being hired by the Martial Arts Hall. You're not one of the men of the Martial Arts Hall. In other words, you have a paid job, and we provide you the salary. The few other gold token-grade sparring partners in the Martial Arts Hall have also signed contractual deals with us. Lone Wolf... don't think about things in such a complicated manner. To tell you the truth, I take great interest and importance in your obscenely powerful natural ability in combat and reaction speed, and am ready to invest resources and nurture your skills, so that you can become a top-quality golden token-grade sparring partner. In this way, you can help the Martial Arts Hall make money. It's just that simple a situation!"
杨管事在听说江逸准备在武殿内闭关三月哪也不去，不仅没有半点不满，反而大方的免了江逸的食宿费。江逸能在这全力修炼，尽早提升到铸鼎境四重，武殿内就能快速增加一位金牌陪练，也能为他们赚取更多的银钱。要知道在这武殿内和陪练对战，金牌陪练那可是按每场收费的……

Manager Yang was not displeased at Jiang Yi's intention to go into seclusion at the Martial Arts Hall for three months. Rather, he generously waived Jiang Yi's boarding expenses. Jiang Yi was able to concentrate all his energy into cultivation to elevate his powers to the fourth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. In doing so, the Martial Arts Hall would then acquire a gold token-grade sparring partner, who charged by each match...
杨管事坐了一小会，和门口的一名护卫吩咐道。护卫匆忙朝练功房方向走去，很快就把满眸疑惑的江逸带了进来。

Chief Yang sat down for a short while as he instructed a guard standing at the door. That guard hastily walked in the direction of the Technique Practising Room and very quickly brought Jiang Yi, with his eyes revealing emotions of confusion and doubt, into the room.
杨管事大笑，傲然说道：“不需要那东西，武殿不会违约，也从不怕……别人违约！行了，这瓶丹药你先拿着，你去大殿内修炼吧。这几天不到万不得已的情况，我不会让你上场的，你现在主要的任务就是修炼，尽快提升到铸鼎境四重。”

Manager Yang laughed loudly and proudly replied, "There's no need for that kind of thing. The Martial Arts Hall will never breach a contract, and has never been afraid... that someone else would breach a contract either! That's settled then. You hold on to this elixir bottle first. Head over to the interior of the Great Hall and cultivate your power. For these next few days, unless as an absolute last resort, I will not send you out for a sparring match. Your main task right now would be to cultivate your power and increase its level to the fourth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm as soon as possible."
杨管事头疼的望着一群全部伤痕累累的陪练，又四处一扫其余练功房，看到没有一名白银陪练走出，只能无奈指着江逸道：“苍狼，出战。”

Nursing a headache, Manager Yang looked at the group of sparring partners, all of them riddled with injuries, before giving the rest of the technique-practicing rooms a sweeping glance. Seeing as none of the silver-token-grade sparring partners had left their rooms, he could only helplessly point at Jiang Yi and order, "Lone Wolf, you're up for combat."
杨管事急了，这好不容易招到一个好陪练，他怎么能眼睁睁看着江逸走？这几日他可是被这群公子小姐催得头顶冒烟了。连忙凑过来和江逸笑眯眯的说道：“苍狼，你是不是嫌弃钱少了？这样……你继续在这呆着，我给你按银牌陪练的钱算？十两银子一天，如何？”

Manager Yang was flustered. He had finally managed to hire a good sparring partner after so much difficulty. How could he allow himself to look on helplessly and allow Jiang Yi to leave willy-nilly? After all, he had been so hard-pressed by the demands of that group of young masters and young mistresses over the past few days that he was frustrated and fuming with rage. Hurriedly moving closer to Jiang Yi and beaming at him, Manager Yang said, "Lone Wolf, is it just that you simply dislike how low the pay is? In that case... you continue staying here, and I'll pay you the rate for a silver token-grade sparring partner? Ten taels of silver a day, how about that?
杨管事想不通，不过他知道如果下次江逸还来陪练，一定得想方设法留住他。如果他的确能帮助武殿内的公子小姐们武技快速大成，那么他的价值就不可估量了……

Manager Yang could not understand any of it. However, he knew that the next time Jiang Yi should ever return as a sparring partner, he had to find some way to make him stay. If he could indeed help the young masters and young mistresses in the Martial Arts Hall achieving phenomenal success in speeding up the improvements of their martial arts skills proficiency, then his value would be virtuely incalculable...
杨管事敞开来说了，江逸反而内心安定，他沉思了一会，最终眼中露出一丝狠色，咬牙道：“在这干五年可以，不过我有两个要求。”

With Manager Yang's full disclosure of his intentions, Jiang Yi on the other hand became more calm in his heart. He thought deeply for a while, before finally revealing a look of ruthlessness in his eyes. He gritted his teeth and responded, "I don't have a problem with working here for five years, but I have two requests."
杨管事淡淡一笑道：“很简单，你这算违约，按规矩要赔付百倍财物，我算了下差不多你要赔偿武殿一万两紫金，当然……如果你死了，这合约就自动解除。”

With faint smile, Manager Yang replied, "Very simple - this is considered a breach of contract. According to the rules stipulated, you would have to repay a hundred times worth in valuables. According to my calculation, you would owe the Martial Arts Hall almost ten thousand taels of purple gold. Of course... if you die, this contract will automatically be cancelled."
杨管事疑惑地眨了眨眼睛，询问道：“怎么了？翊小姐，那个陪练有问题？”
Puzzled, Manager Yang blinked his eyes and inquired, "What's the matter? Young Mistress Yi, was there a problem with that sparring partner?"
杨管事的确不在练功房，而是在附近的一个小房间内，他不是一个人，小房间内还有一个衣袍华贵的白发老者，两人正聚精会神的观看着墙壁上的一幅画面。

Manager Yang was indeed not in the Technique Practising Room, but rather in a small room nearby. He was not alone - there was an elderly man with white hair and elegant robes in the small room as well. The two men were attentively observing a painting on the wall.
杨管事笑着起身，点头道：“没问题，不过你必须在这干满十天之后，我才能给你预支，另外还有问题吗？没有的话，祝我们合作愉快！”

Manager Yang smiled as he stood up, before nodding and responding, "No problem, but you must work for ten full days here. Only then will I give you an advance on your pay. Are there any other questions? If not, I hope we have a good working partnership and business collaboration!"
杨管事脸色顿时变了，满眸都是悔意。这练功房对练，主要目的就是训练反应速度，战斗本能，还有磨砺武技。这三项都很难提升，需要长时间的对战和磨练，这也是练功房内封印元力的原因。

Manager Yang's facial expression suddenly changed, as his pupils became filled with remorse. The main purpose of conducting sparring practice at this Technique Practising Room was to facilitate the training of a person's reaction speed and combat instincts as well as improve a person's martial arts skills. It was very difficult to improve these three aspects, requiring a long time of combat practice and honing of skills. This was also the reason why the Technique Practising Room sealed off the use of essence force.
杨管事连忙把江逸原先戴的苍狼面具给江逸，朝旁边的一个下人打了个眼色，那人立即匆匆离去。
Manager Yang hurriedly passed to Jiang Yi the wolf mask he was originally wearing, before giving a visual signal to a servant standing next to him. That servant immediately left in a hurry.
杨管事连忙拱手俯身，等费老离去后，他才快步走到墙壁边上，一只手元力环绕按在一块石砖上，那墙壁上的画面神奇的消失了，又变成一面雪白的石墙。

Manager Yang promptly cupped his hands in greeting and bowed in sending Elder Fei off. It was only once Elder Fei had left that he walked with a quick pace to one of the walls. Using one of his hands, which had essence force revolving around it, to press on a stone brick, the image being broadcast on the wall magically vanished, becoming a snow-white stone wall face once again.
杨管事随意一摆手道：“你说吧，只要不过分都好说。”
Manager Yang nonchalantly waved his hands and replied, "Say it, it's all negotiable so long as it isn't too excessive or demanding."
杨管事颔首道：“没错，武殿会在两个月内全力培养你达到铸鼎境四重，你则必须在这当陪练五年，当然……武殿会根据你的实力，给予相对应的薪水，比如你实力是银牌陪练时，一天十两银子，实力达到金牌陪练时，一天一两紫金。”

Manager Yang nodded his head and replied, "That's right. The Martial Arts Hall will spare no expense in nurturing you over the next two months such that your power level reaches the fourth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. In exchange, you must be a sparring partner here for five years. Of course... The Martial Arts Hall will, based on your power, give you the corresponding salary. For instance, when your power is on par with that of a silver token-grade sparring partner, the rate is ten taels of silver per day; when your power is on par with that of a gold token-grade sparring partner, the rate will be a tael of purple gold per day."
林深树密的，她根本分不出哪些可以吃，哪些吃不了。到是小动物挺多的，个个都有点营养过盛，总是比普通的要大只一些，而且她还发现，这些小动物居然会说话。

Within the depths of the forest, she could not differentiate what was edible and what was not. There were quite a lot of small animals and they seemed to have a little too much nutrition as they were larger than usual. Moreover, she realized that those small animals could actually talk.
果然……
True enough...
果然……他是在作梦吧？
Was he... dreaming/
果然……还是记不住名字！
Indeed… she was still not able to remember names!
果然下一刻，轰隆一声雷响，白色的闪电撕开云层直劈而下，狠狠的打在下面的树木茧上，瞬间烧焦大半层。雷却没有停下，反而一道接一道，越劈越重。不到半刻的功夫，那个密不透风的木茧已经被劈得七零八落，中间一片尘土飞扬，看不清萝卜的样子，只是空气中隐隐传来焦糊味。

In the next moment, there was a loud crack of thunder and a streak of lightning lit up the sky, striking the plants beneath it. Half of the forest seemed to have been burnt by that lightning strike. Yet bolts of lightning still continued to fall, streak after streak, each one more poweful than the last. Only several seconds had passed before they realized that the dome of plants had mostly been struck down. A cloud of dust continued to hide the radish's body from sight and the air was filled with a burnt smell.
果然只见场中已经清场完毕，一绿一蓝两个身影顿时出现在了场中。绿衣的正是思羽，对面是一名金丹大满圆修士，而且看他身上的气息，已经有了半步元婴的趋势了。

Indeed, the stage was clear. The contestants, one green-clothed and one blue-clothed, stepped onto the stage. The one in green was Si Yu, and the person opposite from her was a Perfected Golden Core cultivator. From his aura, he looked like he was halfway to advancing to the Nascent Soul stage.
果然四周突然就暗了下来，无敌派的上空，风起云涌，雷云汇聚，隐隐还有紫色的电光透出。

True enough, the surrounding became dark all of a sudden. Gusts of winds blew, dark clouds, from which a faint purple streak of lightning could be seen, formed in the upper atmosphere of the Invincible Sect.
果然当他们踏上最后一阶台阶，四周的景象再次变了，成了一片一眼看不到头的荒原。他们放开神识也探不到边界，就像突然生出一个空间一样。

As they stepped up the last step, their surroundings changed once again. They were now in an extremely vast wasteland. Even with their Divine Perception, they couldn't perceive the boundaries of this wasteland. It was just as if they stepped out of another dimension.
果然烹饪是门高深的学问。
Clearly, the culinary arts is a profound field of knowledge.
果然这火海一出现，羿清周身的灵剑瞬间化为灰烬，开始反扑了回去。羿清立马改变剑招，召回万千灵剑，在周身形成一道剑墙，顺时针旋转起来，利用形成的剑气驱逐火焰。但却并不能阻止火焰向他靠近。

As soon as the sea of fire appeared, the spirit swords surrounding Yi Qing disintegrated into ashes and scattered. Yi Qing immediately changed his strategy and recalled tens of thousands of his spirit swords. They surrounded him, forming a wall of swords which revolved around him. He tried to use the wall of swords to put out the flames, but he couldn't stop the flames from getting closer to him.
果然里面的声音越来越大了，相较之前几不可闻，现在那声音已经大得有些刺耳了。满个大殿都是那幡内鬼王，声情并茂，酣畅淋漓，放飞自我的：嘤嘤嘤嘤嘤嘤嘤……

The sound coming out from the gonfalon was indeed getting louder; compared to the previous sounds that were almost indistinguishable, now it was already so loud that it was jarring. The entire hall was filled with the sounds of the Ghost King from within the gonfalon. It cried out with deep emotions to its heart content, letting itself loose: Waawaawaawaawaawaawaa…
果然！
Sure enough!
果然，下一刻原本焦黑的地面，像是回春一样，瞬间化出大片的绿色，半息之间满地的鲜花盛放，姹紫嫣红的开了一大片。

Indeed, the next moment, the once black land where the radish stood turned back to green just like in springtime. A moment later, flowers began to bloom from the grass which had sprouted, the ground becoming covered in red and purple.
果然，不到半刻钟的功夫，一个修士唤出满天剑雨，朝着众人唰啦啦的戳了下来。看着后面不堪一击的众人，他不得不撤了回去，高声朝郁红和思羽道，“回阵里去！”

Indeed, after about 30 seconds, one of the cultivators summoned a rain of swords which filled the entire sky. The swords flew down toward Feng Ying and the girls. Feng Ying had no choice but to retreat. As he ran toward the other girls, he turned to shout at Yu Hong and Si Yu, "Go back into the array!"
果然，他眼神刷的一下亮了，闪得跟天上的星星似的，“真的？！”
Indeed, his gaze immediately brightened up like the stars in the sky. "Really?!"
果然，奚秋有些激动，旁边的持法堂主奚辰却先一步急声问道，“一个月前，万魔窟现世之事，可是你所为？”
Sure enough, Xi Qiu was a little excited, but before he could speak, the Hall Master next to him asked urgently, "A month ago, the Myriad Fiend Den was resurrected; was it your doing?"
枫影一惊，十五个化神修士，这郁家家主是想屠无敌派满门吗？
Feng Ying was shocked; fifteen Soul Formation cultivators, was this Yu Family intending to annihilate the Invincible Sect?
枫影一惊，心下猛的一沉，“你……你没事吧？咦，等等……你要干嘛？”
Feng Ying's heart was in his mouth. "You... Are are you okay? Hey, wait... what are you doing?"
枫影不是大意的人，敢公然怼上郁家的无敌掌门，修为肯定不弱。他找无敌派确实也是凭着一时之气，但既然他敢一个人来，自然就已经做好了充足的准备。只是元婴修为又如何，有了系统这个底牌，他绝对能赢，况且这又不是他第一次正面对抗化神修士。

Feng Ying was not a careless person, his cultivation must not be weak to have the guts to go up directly against the Invincible Sect's Sect Master. He did went to Invincible Sect in the heat of the moment, but since he dared to come alone, he had already done sufficient preparation. So what if she had Nascent Soul cultivation, with system as his trump card, he would definitely win. Moreover this was not his first time going against a Soul Formation cultivator directly.
枫影僵了一下，似是没想到她回得这么干脆，“那你最好从现在开始，好好记住这个名字。”他越说越气，一字一句的道，“我是追魂楼楼主枫影，来此是为了三日前那件事讨个说法。”

Feng Ying froze for a moment, as if not expecting her to respond so directly, "Then you better remember this name from now on." The more he spoke, the angrier he grew, as he pronounced every word clearly, "I am the Soul Chasing Tower's Tower Master Feng Ying, I am here to get an explanation for the matter that happened three days ago."
枫影几乎让系统把潜能全激出来，强行把修行暂时提到了化神后期，系统能调出来的帮助全都用上了，却也只能拖住七八个人的脚步。一边还要顺手照顾一下旁边的郁红和思羽，根本撑不了多久。

Feng Ying allowed the system to exert its full potential and forcefully increased his cultivation level to the late stage of Soul Formation. The system activated all the support it could offer, yet it was only just enough to delay seven to eight cultivators - and Feng Ying still had to support Yu Hong and Si Yu. He could not hang on for much longer.
枫影又气又急，偏偏他一边要对付化神修士，一边还要护住后面更小的，根本抽不开身。

Feng Ying was both angry and anxious. Not only did he have to tackle the Soul Formation cultivators, he also had to protect the younger ones behind him. He couldn't afford to protect Si Yu and Yu Hong as well.
枫影嘴角一抽，尽量忽略脑海里的系统音继续道，“据郁家的古籍记载，这个塔是千万年前郁家老祖飞升前的法器，里面是一处试练之地，内通仙界，只要能登上三层塔顶，就可以直接飞升成仙，所以才叫升仙塔。”

Feng Ying's mouth twitched. He tried to ignore the system and continued, "According to the Yu Family's ancient texts, the Pagoda is a Dharma artifact ccreated by its ancestors before they achieved Immortal Ascension millions of years ago. There are plenty of training grounds inside the pagoda which links to the Immortal World. If you make it to the third level of the pagoda, you would be able to achieve Immortal Ascension. That's why it's called the Immortal Ascension Pagoda."
枫影嘴角一抽，所以她把他绑上来的重点在这里吗？谁稀罕你的萝卜地了！
Feng Ying's mouth twitched. Was this the reason she captrued him? Who cares about your radish land!
枫影整个人都惊呆了，张嘴看着对面的人半天都没回神，系统可是他最大的底牌，就这么……被知道了……知道了……道了……了……
Feng Ying was stunned, he looked at the person with his mouth agape and could not elicit a response. The system was his greatest trump card, and it was so easily... made known... known...
枫影显然不信，一脸怒气的看向沈萤道，“今日我倒霉，才会栽在你们手里。要杀要剐随便，但你砸了我追魂楼的事，我是不会就此罢手的。”

Feng Ying couldn't believe his ears. He turned to Shen Ying angrily and said, "I'm unlucky today to end up in your hands. Kill me if you want to, otherwise I will not let you off for destroying my Soul Chasing Tower."
枫影暗骂了一声，连忙联系神识：“系统，潜能激发！”
Cursing silently, Feng Ying quickly contacted his Divine Perception: "System, activate potential!"
枫影的剑已经到了离沈萤不到半米的地方，突然觉得一股电流窜入全身，双膝一软直接趴答一下趴跪了下去，头咚的一声嗑在了旁边的石子堆里。

Feng Ying's sword was already within half a metre of Shen Ying. He suddenly felt a gush of electricity gushing through his entire body, both knees went soft and he fell into a kneel as his head plopped onto the stone stack at the side and kowtowed.
枫影皱了皱，“你这想法我也有过，但三青界之间非化神不能自由往来，我人在上青界，对其它两界消息自然无法第一时间……”

Feng Ying furrowed his brows, "I also had this thought before, but those who are not Soul Formation in the three realms cannot move around freely, I am in the Upper Azure World, it is difficult for me to get first hand news of the other two realms..."
枫影脸色一冷，更生气了，“少给我装蒜！三天前，不就是你们那个叫羿清的掌门，趁本楼主不在带人闯入我追魂楼，还借着找人的名义，打伤了我一百多位楼里的兄弟。你们堂堂隐世仙门，伤了人难道还不敢认账吗？”

Feng Ying's expression turned cold as he became angrier. "Stop acting dumb! Your Sect Master Yi Qing come to our Soul Chasing Tower three days ago claiming to look for someone, then injured over a hundred of my brothers while I wasn't there. Yours is a hidden immortal sect, yet you daren't own up to hitting people?"
枫影脸色一白，转头诧异的看向众人。沈萤不会真不在这里吧，所以她们才不让他进去叫人？
Feng Ying's face drained of color. He turned toward the group of people in shock. Shen Ying isn't really gone, right? Is that why the girls refused to let him go and call her?
枫影觉得自从来到无敌派后，这系统八成是疯了。什么叫独自守护门派？他要有这个本事，刚刚用得着布下迷魂阵逃回来吗？

Ever since Feng Ying arrived at the Invincible Sect, the system had been acting up 80% of the time. What did it mean when it told Feng Ying to defend the sect by himself? If he had the capabilities, would he have had to set up the Soul Confundus Array earlier?
Feng Ying: "..."
枫影：“……”卖主也卖得太快了吧。
Feng Ying: "..." The system is so quick to market its owner.
某人茫然的看了看四周完全陌生的景色，后知后觉的想起个重要问题。
Shen Ying studied her strange surroundings and suddenly recalled an important question.
某厨秒懂，低声提醒，“羿清。”
A certain chef immediately got her meaning and whispered a reminder, "Yi Qing."
某狐一口老血喷涌而出，嘴边动了动硬是没挤出一个字来，下一刻头一歪彻底的没声息，活活憋死了。
The fox spewed a mouthful of blood. His mouth twitched but not a single word came out, and after a moment, his head dropped to the side and he breathed no more — he had suffocated himself to death.
查探到丹田内储存下来的十缕黑色元力只剩下一缕了，江逸摇头叹气起来，这陪练活儿看来不适合他啊。要是那翊小姐再坚持一会，等他黑色元力消耗干净，他就原形毕露等着挨揍了……

Checking the ten wisps of black essence force in his dantian and realizing that he only had one wisp left, Jiang Yi shook his head and sighed. It seemed like this sparring partner job was not suited for him. If that Young Mistress Yi persevered for a little longer, and if his black essence force was fully consumed, his original condition would be fully revealed and he would have to endure getting beaten up...
柳河长相比起黑旗要差上一些，不过肩宽腰细，体态完美，他也不是傻子，淡然一笑道：“听雨小姐，明天见！”

Liu He was slightly inferior to Heiqi in terms of looks. However, with broad shoulders and a slim waist, his figure was the epitome of perfection. He was no fool either, and bid his goodbye with a light smile, "Young Mistress Tingyu, I'll see you tomorrow!"
柳长老一看之下，脸色更加暴怒了几分，目光如刀子般在江逸脸上扫过，手上红色元力滚滚而出，就要一掌朝江逸拍下。

Upon looking into the cauldron, Elder Liu's wrath grew further. His gaze cut across Jiang Yi's face like a knife as the red essence force on his hand rolled. He was getting ready to hit Jiang Yi with one slap.
柳长老不炼丹了，他可就没废丹了，也就不能炼制丹药卖钱了，凭他自己要想炼制丹药，那根本是不可能的事。

If Elder Liu stopped refining elixirs, he would not have any more rejected elixirs. This meant that he would no longer have any more refined elixirs to sell. It was an impossibility to even think of relying on himself alone to produce elixirs.
柳长老不知道昨日那两枚地阶丹药是江逸注入了两缕黑色元力，以为是不小心添加了其他的药剂，让原本的丹方改变，错打错着炼出了地阶丹药。

Elder Liu did not know that the two Earth-tier elixir pills he got yesterday were created when Jiang Yi injected two wisps of essence force. Instead, he assumed that he had accidentally added other medicinal ingredients and changed the original elixir formula, wrongly and unintentionally refining an Earth-tier elixir.
柳长老也被江逸惊醒，目光一扫，微微颔首道：“不错，比江松那个废物勤奋多了，对了……你叫什么来着？”

Elder Liu was similarly surprised by Jiang Yi. He glanced around the room before slightly nodding and saying, "Not bad, you're much more hardworking than that useless good-for-nothing Jiang Song. Right... What did you say your name was?"
柳长老今天炼制的丹药还是昨日的灵神丹配方，不过每次都加了一种药剂，结果不用说——自然所有丹都废掉了，完全不是人阶上品修炼所用的灵神丹，更不可能是地阶丹药。

The elixir Elder Liu was refining today was based on the formula for Spirit Pills used the day before. However, every time he refined he added in a different additional medicinal ingredient. The conclusions need not be stated in deep detail - naturally, all the elixirs turned out to be useless, not at all the Man-tier superior-grade spirit pills that were supposed to be refined, to say nothing of them possibly being Earth-tier elixirs.
柳长老刚才无视江逸，此刻等他一走倒是扭头过来，暗暗点头喃喃一句，继续配置药粉。
Elder Liu had ignored Jiang Yi earlier, but once Jiang Yi had left, he turned his head and silently nodded, before continuing to configure his elixir formula.
柳长老完全无视江逸了，他一双牛眼瞪得滚圆，抓起丹炉内的两枚黑色丹药，满脸都是惊疑：“灵神丹不是白色的吗？这两枚怎么变成黑色的了？好像……药力增强了？”

Elder Liu completely ignored Jiang Yi. His eyes were wide as a full moon as he grabbed the two black pills from the cauldron, his face filled with shock and confusion as he said, "Isn't the Spirit Pill white in color? How did these two become black? And it seems like... their medicinal efficacy has increased in power!"
柳长老已经死去了三天了，江逸每天都躲在自家后院修炼，让江小奴在前院守着。他内心有种深深的担忧，现在不在炼丹房做事了，家族很有可能会安排新的杂活给他，而荣管事也很有可能上门，取回西山药田令牌。

Elder Liu had been dead for three days. For all of the three days, Jiang Yi hid at home and cultivated his power in his backyard while letting Jiang Xiaonu keep watch in the front courtyard.
He had a sense of concern deep in his heart. Now that he no longer worked at the alchemy lab, the family clan would very likely arrange odd jobs for him to work on; and Chief Rong would very likely come to his house and retrieve the command token for the Western Hills herb plantation.
柳长老怒了，横眉竖眼骂道：“混账东西，这有什么难的，这炉丹药已经差不多好了，你只需朝这里注入元力，等丹药凝固成型就行，快滚过来！这事干不好，以后你别想在老夫这领一枚丹药，哼哼！”

Angered, Elder Liu scowled fiercely and reprimanded, "Damn it, this is not difficult at all—this cauldron is almost done anyway! All you need to do is to apply essence force towards this spot; it'll be done once the elixir solidifies and takes shape! Hurry up and get yourself over here! If you screw this up, don't ever think of collecting even a single elixir pill from here ever again! Hmph!"
柳长老捧着剩下的那枚黑色丹药，摇头晃脑的走了，江逸却愁眉苦脸的差点要哭了。
Holding the remaining black elixir pill, Elder Liu left shaking his head. However, Jiang Yi remained looking miserable and was on the verge of crying.
柳长老的古怪的脾气在江家是出了名的，所以江逸等江家子弟领丹药的时候，都喜欢避开他直接找江松领取，避免得罪了这个在家族地位举足轻重的怪老头。

Elder Liu was famous in the Jiang Clan for his weird temper, thus Jiang Yi and other Jiang Clan descendants preferred to avoid him and instead find Jiang Song when they came to collect elixirs, to avoid insulting or angering this weird old man that had an influential position in the family.
柳长老的死因很快查出来了，让江逸没那么内疚的是，柳长老一直就有固疾，这几年前就曾犯病三次险些死去，这几天因没日没夜的钻研才提前归西了……

Elder Liu's cause of death was quickly revealed. What left Jiang Yi feeling less guilty was that Elder Liu was already suffering from an incurable disease. Over the past few years, he had three previous experiences where he had fallen ill but managed to avoid death. However, the non-stop study into the elixir over the past few days and nights had resulted in his early demise...
柳长老的脸色却一下变了，一巴掌扫去，将进来的少年直接扫出大门外，这才冷哼道：“江松，你现在可以滚了，以后这炼丹房你不用来了，混账东西，天天就知道偷懒！”

Elder Liu's look transformed instantly and sent a slap at him, sending the youth entering the room flying out of the main doors.
He then snorted coldly. "Jiang Song, you can get out of my sight now! You no longer need to return to this elixir-refining room. Damned thing, all you do is laze around!"
柳长老终于醒悟过来，瞥了江逸一眼，不耐烦的说道：“去另外一边的丹房内自己拿吧，爱拿多少拿多少，别来烦老夫……咦？这灵神丹内还是原先的成分啊，并没有其余的成分啊？怎么会突然变成地阶了？奇怪，奇怪……”

Elder Liu finally came to his senses. Glancing at Jiang Yi with one look, he responded impatiently, "Go to the Elixir Room on the other side and take them yourself. Take as much as you want, and don't disturb me... Eh? This Spirit Pill still contains the original ingredients, and does not contain any extra components? How did it suddenly become Earth-tier? Strange, strange..."
柳长老翻脸比翻书还快，又横眉竖眼怒道：“老夫要个人，别说那什么荣管事，就算内务堂大总管江云蛇都不敢说个不字。你去和你们管事说说，他敢不同意老夫撕了他。至于不懂炼丹，这慢慢学就是了，不过你可不能学江松那个废物偷懒，否则老夫饶不了你……就这么说定了，你先回去明早来这干活，老夫得去好好研究这丹药，哈哈哈，地阶丹药……”

Elder Liu's emotions changed faster than pages of a book being turned. He scowled fiercely and said angrily, "When I want someone, to say nothing of that Chief Rong, even the Internal Affairs Chief Supervisor Jiang Yunshe doesn't dare to say a word.
“You go and tell your chief; if he doesn't agree, I will rip him to shreds. As for not knowing how to refine elixirs, this you can learn slowly. However, you cannot learn to be lazy like that good-for-nothing Jiang Song, or I will never let you off... That’s settled then. You can go back first, and come back here and work tomorrow morning. I have to go carefully research this elixir. Hahaha... Earth-tier elixir..."
柳长老脸上突然露出笑容，走过来几步，大手在他右肩膀上拍了一下，咧嘴笑道：“你小子不错，是老夫的福将啊！嗯……江松那个废物我不要了，暂时也没人手帮忙，你以后就在这帮老夫炼丹吧。”

Elder Liu suddenly revealed a smile on his face. He walked forward by a few steps and slapped Jiang Yi's right shoulder with his large hand. Grinning widely, he said, "You're not bad, kid! You're my lucky charm! Hmmm... That useless good-for-nothing, Jiang Song—I don't want him anymore! Since I temporarily don't have any more people to help me, why don't you stay here and help me refine elixirs from now on?"
柳长老脸色一沉，吹胡子瞪眼道：“你们这些废物子弟，天天不务正业，领丹药时就贼勤快，丹药？没有！”

Elder Liu's face turned dark, blew his beard and stared at Jiang Yi as he replied, "You useless sons, all of you never ever attend to your daily duties, yet during medicine collection time you guys become so efficiently quick! Elixirs? None!"
柳长老越看眼睛越亮，神神叨叨说个不停：“这色泽，这药力，像，很像！老夫炼丹一辈子，难道……终于炼出两枚地阶的丹药了？”

Elder Liu's eyes brightened the more he looked. With much liveliness, he chattered non-stop. "This hue, this medical healing power... similar, very similar! I have refined elixirs all my life... could it be... finally two Earth-tier elixirs have been refined?"
柳长老这几天肯定还会继续试验炼丹，只要不注入黑色元力，他就永远炼不出地阶丹药，那么就会有很多很多的废丹……

Elder Liu would definitely continue to experiment with elixir-refining for the next few days. So long as black essence force was not injected, he would always be unable to refine Earth-level elixirs—and that would mean there would be a lot of useless elixir pills...
根据这几名护卫的速度，江逸大概判断出四人的实力，内心也是一阵慌乱，如此多护卫他怎么应对？尤其是还有一人是铸鼎境三重。

From the speed of the few guards, Jiang Yi made a general judgment of four guards' strength. A wave of anxiety swept across his mind. How was he to handle that many guards? One of them was even at the third stage of the Cast Tripod Realm...
桌上的懒虫秒起，上前一把握住某人的手，大义凛冽的道，“牛爸爸！我们什么时候出发？”
The slob sat up immediately. She reached for Lonemoon's arm, exclaiming over-enthusiastically, "Father Niu! When do we set off?"
桌边还站着十几位婢女，她们刚一到，一个蓝衣男子，兴冲冲的迎了上来。来人长得很高，标准的模特身材，就是那张脸……有些一言难尽。一团红一团青一团紫的，特别的——色彩斑斓。

There were about a dozen servant girls standing at the tables. When they arrived, a man in blue rushed forwards eagerly to greet them . He was very tall and had the figure of a model, but… it was just that his face… there were no words that could adequately describe it. Covered in red and purple splotches, it was uniquely kaleidoscopic.
槽！原来那货不单是个吃货，还TM是个路痴，话说你到底为啥想不开拜这么个坑货啊喂，“话说回来，她到底是怎么栽在那魔修手里的？”那影像又没有声音，也不知道那魔修到底说了啥？

Holy shit! So it turns out that this creature is not only a foodie, but is also freaking directionally challenged. What made you choose such a worthless creature as your teacher, I really don't know! "By the way, how did she end up in the clutches of the fiendish cultivator?" That image had provided no sound so he had no idea what the fiendish cultivator was saying.
槽！居然特意隐藏了修为，没想到三人中居然有两个游仙！
Holy shit! He had actually hidden his cultivation level. Never did Lonemoon imagine that two out of the three of them were Traveling Immortals!
槽！还真不需要！
Holy shit! They really didn't need it!
正在专心扒饭的某人，突然听见哐当一声，一坨带血的不明生物从天而降，笔直的砸在了她的饭桌上，一只手还按在了汤碗里。

A certain someone was focused on eating her rice when a sudden banging sound was heard. A heap of blood from an unknown source fell from the sky and smashed right onto her dining table, with an arm in her soup.
正在江逸沉吟时，柳长老突然抓起一枚黑色丹药吞了下去，然后就地闭目盘坐起来。只是片刻他就睁开了眼睛，一双牛眼内都是激动和狂喜：“哈哈哈，这的确是地阶下品丹药，三十年了！老夫终于炼出了地阶丹药啊，老夫终于不再是一品炼丹师了……”

Right as Jiang Yi was muttering to myself, Elder Liu suddenly grabbed one of the black elixir pills and swallowed it, before sitting cross-legged with his eyes closed. He opened his eyes almost instantly, his eyes filled with excitement and ecstasy.
"Hahaha! This is indeed an Earth-tier inferior-grade elixir! It's been thirty years! I finally refined an Earth-tier elixir! I am no longer a first-rate elixir-refiner..."
正在江逸迷茫之时，翊凌雪却郑重的从怀中取出一块令牌，说道：“我，翊凌雪代表翊家正式邀请你加入翊家，职位是武堂副长老，俸禄和待遇……”

While Jiang Yi was still in a daze, Yi Lingxue solemnly retrieved a command token from her chest pocket and said, "On behalf of the Yi Family, I, Yi Lingxue, formally invite you to join our family under the position of Deputy Elder of the family's martial arts training court. The remuneration will be.
正想向屋内的恩人禀报，却突然感觉到一阵庞大的阴气袭来，整个人如坠冰窟，身体瞬间进入备战状态，这是妖气！好浓烈的妖气！

Just when he was about to make a report to his benefactor, he suddenly felt a great rush of Yin Qi engulfing him. He felt as if he had fallen into an ice cave. His body geared itself immediately for battle. This was demonic aura! A very strong demonic aura!
正想着，前面传来叭哒一声，什么断裂的声音。易峰的滕蔓困不住体型巨大的背云兽，开始寸寸断裂，那张长满尖牙的血盆大口，更是转身就往空中咬去。

Just as she was figuring out Yi Feng's instructions, a loud snapping sound came from in front of her. Yi Feng's vine was not sturdy enough to control the great 背云兽. The vine that circled the beast's mouth began to snap as the beast opened its mouth, biting at the air behind it.
正想着，沈萤却松开了脚，突然弯腰一把揪住他的领子，像是拔萝卜一样，把人给拔了出来，慢悠悠的道，“你是说实话呢，还是想再挖个坑，感受感受？”

Just as he tried to figure this out, Shen Ying removed her foot from his face and grabbed his collar. As if she was plucking radishes, she lifted him off the ground and angrily warned, "You better tell the truth or I will dig another pit in the ground with your body."
正想着，突然不远处传来一声巨大的兽吼声，声音似是雷声轰鸣，直接唤醒了石化中的易峰。
Just as they were talking, they heard a loud roar from behind them. It sounded as loud as thunder. Yi Feng immediately snapped out of his stupor.
正想解释，话还没说完，地面却突然一阵晃动，隐隐有剑气从四面八方涌了过来，四周的灵气开始疯狂往门外的某个方向涌出。
Just as he was about to explain, the ground suddenly shook; Sword Qi seemed to emerge from all directions, and the Spirit Qi started to head towards a certain direction out of the door.
正打算不顾众人的拦阻强行闯入偏殿叫人，却已经来不及了，山下传来轰隆一声什么崩塌的声音，下一刻郁海珩带着众化神修士，已经出现在前方的广场上。

He was just about to ignore the invaders and barge into the Palace Wing to wake Shen Ying up, but it was too late. A loud sound from something collapsing came from the bottom of the hill. In the next moment, Yu Hai Heng and all the other Soul Formation cultivators appeared on the public square in front of Ying Feng.
正炒着菜的羿清手里的锅铲一停，“师父，你隐世已久，不知人心险恶。”
Yi Qing suddenly stopped stir-frying and turned to Shen Ying, "Master, you have been hidden away from the world for a long time. You don't know how sinister people can be."
正考虑要不要自爆金丹，跟它拼了时，那妖王抖了抖长耳，突然不急不缓的开口，语气还极为献媚？？？

While he was considering whether to self-destruct his Golden Core and fight to the very last breath, that Demon Monarch shook its long ears. Suddenly it opened its mouth unhurriedly and spoke in a tone that was extremely sycophantic?
正要放弃，迎面一道雷，却刚好打在了她的胸口，有什么从里面滑了出来。她脸色顿时一变，慌忙去捡，却晚了一步，一个铃铛叮的一声掉在地上，被落下的雷光劈得四分五裂。

Just when she was about to give up, a bolt of lightning greeted her head-on but luckily it struck her chest. Something seemed to slide out of her. Her expression immediately changed and she rushed over to pick it up, but it was too late—the bell that had fallen out of her clothing dropped to the ground and was destroyed by a bolt of lightning.
正要解释，刚刚还缠斗在一起的一蛟一兽终于从云层中落了下来。立于空中两端，双双都变回了人形，只是蛟龙的人形还保留着兽身的特征，一身长袍黑衣，头上还顶着一只兽角。兽角下的脸上，爬满了一条条黑色纹路，隐隐还有黑气溢出，看着有些像是当初塔里，那个叨逼叨身上的。

Sheng Ying was about to explain what she meant when the beast and wyrm that had been locked in combat finally descended from the clouds. Standing at opposite ends of the sky, both of them had changed back to their human forms; just that the wyrm still retained some characteristics of its animal body-- he was clad in a black robe and had a horn on his head. His face was covered in black stripes and his body emitted a black Q similar to that covering the windbag's body in the pagoda.
此刻他可不敢用真名，他很清楚这丹药既然惊动了姬家的小姐，肯定是对方察觉了黑色元力的特殊，匹夫无罪，怀璧其罪的道理他还是懂的。

He did not dare to use his real name at that moment. He was well aware that, being the case that the elixir had startled the young mistress of the Ji Family, the other party must have found out the special abilities of the black essence force. A man's wealth is his own ruin, for it encourages greed in others - he certainly understood this concept.
此刻在武殿内闭关的公子小姐最少有二三十人，每天这群人中大半部分都会来这打上一两场，所以武殿内的陪练才会如此短缺。当然，根据江逸的猜测武殿内的陪练应该不止这么多，估计很多陪练都是被人打得重伤回去疗伤了，这群公子小姐可从不把陪练当人看的，出手没个轻重……

At present there were at least twenty or thirty young masters and mistresses in seclusion within the Martial Arts Hall. Every single day, more than half of this group of people would go up there to fight one or two matches. That was why there was such a severe shortage of sparring partners in the Martial Arts Hall. Of course, according to Jiang Yi's estimate, there should not be only so many sparring partners in the Martial Arts Hall. He guessed that many of the sparring partners had been beaten up severely and had left to recuperate from their injuries. This bunch of young masters and mistresses had after all never treated their sparring partners as fellow human beings, their attacks always being very heavy-handed and full of force...
此刻外面剩下那个护卫本想跟着冲进来，却看到一道身影被踹飞出来，顿时吓得头一缩不敢冲了。如此短的时间内，江逸连续击伤两人，其中一人还是他们中最强的铸鼎境三重武者？试问这护卫怎么还敢冲进来主动挨打？

At this moment, the last remaining guard outside had thought of following his comrade and rushing in. However, seeing a figure be sent flying out by a single kick left him instantly shocked to the point that he withdrew his head and refused to rush in. In such a short period of time, Jiang Yi was able to consecutively attack and injure two people—and was one of the two not the strongest amongst them, a warrior at the third stage of the Cast Tripod Realm? How could this guard possibly dare to rush in now and end up getting thrashed?
此刻江如虎来了，但他内心却没有一丝兴奋，反而满脸的苦涩，暗道自己太大意了。

At that moment, Jiang Ruhu had indeed arrived, but he did not have a shred of excitement deep in his heart. Rather, his face filled with bitterness and agony. He muttered to himself that he was too careless.
此时他手里明明没有了任何法器，周身却照样出现了万千灵剑，剑意比之前更加强大百倍，青亦的红莲业火也再无法动他分毫，明明他已经把修为压制在元婴，青亦也还是游仙，两人立场却仿佛对调了过来，成了羿清对青亦单方面的辗压。

Yi Qing was not holding any weapon in his hand, yet tens of thousands of spirit swords appeared around him. His sword intent was hundreds of times stronger than before; Qing Yi's Red Lotus Karmic Fire would not be able to do anything to him anymore. He had suppressed his cultivation level so that he remained at the Nascent Soul stage. Qing Yi was still a Traveling Immortal, yet despite that, the two seemed to have swapped positions. Yi Qing now clearly had the upper hand against Qing Yi.
此时漆黑的仙宫内，却由于外人的闯入，瞬间亮了起来，道道仙音响起，仙气大盛五彩霞光充斥着整个大殿。仿佛远古天音般空灵之声，顿时在殿内响起。

At this moment, the pitch black Immortal Pavilion lit up at the intrusion. Otherworldly tunes began to sound as Immortal Qi and colourful lights filled the entire hall. What sounded like ancient sounds coming from Ethereal Spirits suddenly rang out.
此时百里之外。
At this time, 50 kilometers away.
此时的江逸已经完全没了睡意，他朝窗外望了眼，然后点燃油灯，强忍住疼痛把全身上下二三十处伤口上了些药，然后盘腿坐回到床上。

At that moment, Jiang Yi had lost all his drowsiness. He quickly looked out the window, before lighting his candle. After enduring the bodily agony from applying medicine on some twenty or thirty wounds throughout his body, he sat cross-legged on his bed.
此时的沈萤。
At that time, Shen Ying...
此时那枯井中正飞出一个红色影子，那身形十分高大，赤色的皮毛，红得似是染了血，九条火红的尾巴在空中肆意摇摆。

At this moment, a red figure flew out of the dry well. It was very tall, with fur so red that it seemed like it had been dyed in blood, and it was waving its nine flaming red tails wilfully in the air.
此时魔界迎来了史上第一次，也是唯一一次种族灭绝危机。只见一道青色的身影，划破魔界常年昏暗的天空，所经之地，势不可挡，万魔伏首。甚至还没魔看清他长什么样，就已经归于尘土，那道身影，自魔界之门开始，一路横扫过整个万魔大陆。自东向西，然后转南，再转北，再去南，再去北……南北……

Currenly, the Demon Realm was 'greeted' with the first and only extinction crisis. A blueish-green figure sliced through the ever dim and stale sky of the Demon Realm. Through the places she has passed, no one was capable of stopping her. Demons were not even given enough time to register what they were seeing before becoming corpses that laid along the way. Starting from the Door of Demon Realm,the figure swept down the entire Demon ground. From the East to the West, then turned to the South, then North, South, North...North, South...
此时，迎缘峰。
At the same time, on Yingyuan Peak.
此阵绝不可能是狐妖布下的，很有可能它本身就在这里，狐妖发现了，所以故意把血祭大阵的阵眼布在这上里，而他们刚刚攻击时的灵气，刚好重新激活了这个阵法。

This array could not have been set up by the fox demon; it was very likely that it had been there all along. 武堂长老面色更加阴沉了，一只大手元力环绕，大步朝江逸走去，阴冷的声音响彻整个演武殿：“你这畜生伤了人还如此张狂？莫非你以为本座真的不敢杀人？”

The Martial Court Elder's expression was now even more severe. Circulating the essence force around one of his hands, he took a big step towards Jiang Yi and spoke in a gloomy and cold voice that echoed throughout the entire Martial Arts Demonstration Hall, "How dare you this little bastard be this presumptuous even after injuring all these people? Do you really think I dare not kill you?"
武技按照掌握程度分为入门，精通，大成三个阶段，这翊小姐的暴雨拳三年都没有大成，现在和江逸对战一场就直接大成了？

The mastery of martial arts techniques were divided into three different levels - namely the Entry, Proficient and Phenomenal stages. How could it be that this Young Mistress Yi's skills in the Thunderstorm Fist technique had not reached the Phenomenal stage in three years worth of training, yet in one practice match against Jiang Yi, she immediately attained "Phenomenal" success?
武殿只为武者服务，每一座武殿内都有聚灵阵，在里面修炼能加速，这里有海量的各阶武技，神兵，丹药，等宝物。这里有重力房，有陪练，机关房等等各种辅助武者提升实力的好地方，只要有紫金，这里就是武者的天堂。

聚灵阵The Martial Arts Hall only worked in the service of martial artists. The interior of every Martial Arts Hall contained a spirit concentration spell, allowing anyone cultivating spiritual power inside to increase in speed. There was a huge volume of martial arts techniques, spiritual warriors, elixir pills and a wide variety of other treasures. There were good facilities inside including a Heavy Strengthening Room, provision of sparring partners and a Mechanism Training Room - all sorts of facilities that could help martial artists increase their power. So long as one had purple gold to spend, this place was effectively a heaven for any martial artist.
武殿可不是江家的武堂，那是天羽城内一个很神秘的地方，据说在里面打坐闭关修炼速度能快上两倍，而且里面还有重力室，练功房，专业陪练之类的，是武者修炼的天堂。江逸很早就听说过这武殿，却只能远远的看一眼，因为要想进入武殿修炼，入门费用都需要一两紫金……、

The martial arts hall was not the main training court of the Jiang Yi, but rather a mysterious location within Skyplume City.
According to legend, anyone who meditated there in seclusion could increase their essence force refining speed by up to two times.
Additionally, there were many other facilities inside like a strength room, a technique-practicing room, and professional trainers who could facilitate and follow in one's training.
In short, it was a martial artists' paradise. Jiang Yi had heard about this martial arts hall ages ago, but he could only eye it from afar, as the entrance fee for even entering the martial arts hall cost a tael of purple gold...
武殿外还在招陪练，不过围观的人少了，江逸刚刚靠近侧门，那高大黑甲护卫立即热情的招呼他道：“嘿，小哥，你可来了，杨管事可是问了你几次啊。”

The personnel at the Martial Arts Hall were still publicising their call for more sparring partners outside the building, but the surrounding spectators have become fewer in number. Jiang Yi had just walked close to the side door when that big tall guard clad in black armour immediately called out to him and said warmly, "Hey, little man, you're finally here! Manager Yang had asked for you several times."
武殿大门紧闭，侧门倒是打开的，不过有两名黑甲护卫守卫，江逸目光顺着众人定格在武殿外的一张告示上。

The main doors of the Martial Arts Hall were sealed shut. The side door was indeed open, but there were two guards clad in black armor protecting the entrance.
Jiang Yi's gaze followed the crowd and eventually fixed itself on a notice placed outside the Martial Arts Hall.
武殿并不是一股势力，也从不参与大陆纷争，严格来说它应该是天星大陆最大的商号！不过它服务的对象是高级武者和富贵人家的少爷小姐，没有紫府境的实力要想进入武殿，入门必须交纳一两紫金。

The Martial Arts Hall was not an organized faction. It had no power concentrated in it; neither did it ever get involved in continent-wide conflicts.
Strictly speaking, it was the largest business establishment in all of Stellarsky! However, its target customers were highly skilled martial artists and children from rich and powerful families.
If one wished to enter the Martial Arts Hall without a level of power in the Purple Mansion Realm, he or she had to pay an entrance fee of a tael of purple gold.
武殿是个很神奇的存在，没有人知道是谁建立的，什么时候建立的，武殿的人也一直很低调，只要不招惹武殿他们从不主动找事，更不参与六国纷争。

The Martial Arts Hall had a very mysterious existence - no one knew who built it, nor when it was built. The people of the Martial Arts Hall had also always been maintaining a low-profile. So long as no one triggered the ire of the Martial Arts Hall, its people would never actively cause trouble, nor would they ever get involved in six-nation world conflicts.
武殿殿主来转了一圈，算是彻底断绝了杨管事和费老想培养江逸的心思，不过倒是确定江逸的确有一种神奇的能力，能帮武者快速提升武技熟练度。

The Master of the Martial Arts Hall's supervisory walkabout could be considered to have completely severed Manager Yang and Elder Fei's hopes of grooming and training Jiang Yi. However, he actually confirmed that Jiang Yi did indeed possess a mysterious power, capable of helping martial artists rapidly increase their proficiency level in martial arts techniques.
武殿练功房一个小房间内，江逸结束了一轮修炼，睁开眼睛满脸复杂的感慨道。封印有一万八千枚，现在仅仅才消融四百枚，修炼速度就增幅如此之大，他都不敢想象等封印全部破解会何等的逆天。

Jiang Yi opened his eyes and mused after a round of cultivation in his tiny room in the Technique Practising Room.
