There were altogether eighteen thousand runic patterns on the seal, and his cultivation speed had already increased so drastically with just four hundred of them broken. He could hardly wrap his mind around how unnaturally powerful he would be when all of the runic patterns were broken.
武殿虽然不属于城主府管，但姬家在天羽城是土皇帝，杨管事自然不敢得罪姬听雨，江逸也只能苦笑着快步跟随姬听雨进了一个练功房内。

Although the Martial Arts Hall was not under the administrative purview of the city administration, as the Ji Family was effectively the local lords of the land, Manager Yang naturally did not dare to offend Ji Tingyu. As such, Jiang Yi could only smile bitterly as he followed Ji Tingyu at a quick pace into one of the Technique Practising Rooms.
武殿！
The Martial Arts Hall!
武者境界的提升，元力会更一步凝练，威力增加！这是大陆人人皆知的常识，他实力达到铸鼎境二重，蓝色元力变幻这很正常，为何这黑色元力也会微微变色，还是颜色变浅？

As the powers of a martial artist increased in their stages in the Cast Tripod Realm, the essence forces he produced would become even more condensed, and its power would increase greatly! This was common knowledge amongst the people of Stellarsky Continent. It was normal that, with his power reaching the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, the properties of his blue essence force would fluctuate. Yet, why was it that that black essence force would experience a slight change in its colours as well - and on top of that, why did the colour become more light?
武者感悟武技，要看悟性和苦练，一般只要悟性足够，任何一门武技大成都是时间问题。如果悟性不够，凭借苦练一辈子都可能达不到精通的地步。在这练功房内，封印了元力，全凭肉体力量和武技对敌，对于武技的掌握程度是有一定的帮助，但绝不可能随便和他对练几场就能大成。
The mastery of martial art techniques depended on a martial artist's raw talent and
殿内整整安静了五分钟，满个屋里只有某鬼眼泪掉地的声音，啪答啪答又啪答……
The hall remained silent for five minutes, and the entire place was filled with the sounds of tears dripped onto the ground by some ghost: pitter-patter, pitter-patter…
殿内顿时多了一道身影，他看起来极为年轻，身着蓝底白衣的长衫，手持一根玉笛，肩披墨发，面如冠玉，浑身却散发着一股清灵之气，仿佛天上不染尘的仙人，下一刻便会羽化而去。

A figure had suddenly appeared in the hall. He looked extremely young, clad in a long, white gown over a blue outfit, and held a jade flute in his hands. Sporting shoulder-length hair, he had a handsome face and his whole body exuded an aura of Spirit Cleansing Qi. He seemed like an immortal untouched by earthly concerns; one got the impression that he would ascend into heaven the very next moment.
每一只沈萤都要问他一次，然后再拒绝，然后灵主再把灵兽扔掉。
Each time Shen Ying asked him if he knew how to cook meat, he said no and the Spirit Master would release the beast.
每次化丹柳长老都亲自动手的，用强大火红色元力，把里面的药汁分化融炼成丹药。他看到柳长老如此强大实力炼制一炉丹都满头大汗的，他这点实力暂时想都别想了……

Every time they reached the second step, Elder Liu took up the mantle himself to form the elixirs, by using powerful fiery-red essence force to melt down and process the medicinal juices in the cauldron into elixirs. Seeing Elder Liu, with his immensely strong power, produce buckets of sweat on his head as he refined a cauldron of elixirs, Jiang Yi realized he should temporarily forget about doing the same with what little power he had...
每次门派大比，都是上青界最热闹的盛事，比赛其实只用比三天，今天是初赛，主要是选出每个境界的前五十名。比赛方式也简单，每个境界分一百人一组，站到最后的就晋及。

Inter-sect competitions were grand events that attracted huge crowds in the Upper Azure World, but the entire competition actually only needed three days to finish. Today was the preliminary rounds which mainly served to select the top 50 in each cultivation divisions. The rules were also simple: each division would be divided into teams of 100 people and those who made it through this round would automatically qualify for the next round.
每砸一下，鬼王身上的鬼气就散去一分，身形也薄一厘。原本山高一样的鬼影，此时已经小了三分之一了。之前还震耳欲聋的鬼叫，现在只余气音了。

Every time she smashed the ghost, the Ghost King's Qi dissipated a little and he became a little thinner. The giant Ghost King was now only a third of his original size. The deafening ghostly scream of before was reduced to a mere whisper.
比如当江逸修炼水系功法江水决时，产生的元力是蓝色的，而他以前修炼也曾修炼过火系的烈焰决，那套功法产生的元力则是红色的。

For instance, when Jiang Yi practiced channeling water-element abilities through the Jiang Water Art, the essence force produced was blue; as for the Wildfire Art he had practiced when he was younger, the essence force produced was red.
比如江逸修炼的江水决，就是人阶上品，比如他在江家学会的最高等级的武技“幻影拳”也是人阶上品的。

For instance, the Jiang Water Art practiced by Jiang Yi was classified as Man-tier superior grade; the highest level martial art technique "Phantom Fist" that he had learned from the Jiang Clan was also classified as Man-tier superior grade.
比如江逸目前是铸鼎境一重，大致拥有一马之力，可开一石之弓，约等同于四钧一百二十斤力气。而身为铸鼎境二重的江豹呢，则大致拥有两马之力，也就是八均二百四十斤力气。

An average person at the first stage of the Cast Tripod Realm usually had the power of a horse. They could break a rock with a single blow and could lift 72 kilograms. Jiang Bao, a second-stage Cast Tripod Realm martial artist, had the power of two horses and could lift 144 kilograms.
比起其它门派或多或少都站了七八个门人撑场面，这个门派显得格外寒酸，那里只站着三个修士，右侧竖起一面旗帜，上面写了两个字：无敌！

Compared to the other sects which each had seven to eight people in front of their stands, this sect looked cold and empty. There were only three cultivators there. Their flag was being held up by someone on the extreme right and had one word written on it: Invincible!
比起在外面看来，整个山峰的灵气越加的浓郁，隐隐还能看到山顶之上浮着一宫殿。
Compared to what could be sensed from the outside, the Spirit Qi of the whole mountain was much denser, and they could faintly see a palace floating above the mountain.
毕浩一停，却突然抱着右手跪了下去，张口喷出大口的血，喷了满地，整个右手正以诡异的角度垂在地上。
Bi Hao stopped, and suddenly squatted down hugging his right arm. He spewed mouthfuls of blood on the ground as his right arm hung at an awkward angle to the ground.
毕浩快步朝这边走了过来，眼神肆无忌惮的扫过她的身体，里面的贪婪与欲望快要溢出来，“无常魔尊放心，毕浩可不似那些仙修，没有什么采补完，还将人送与他人玩弄的习惯。从今日起你只需服待我兄弟二人就可以了。”说着，伸手就朝着她胸口伸了过去。

Bi Hao quickly walked over. He scanned her body with no discretion, lust and greed apparent in his eyes. "Fiend Supremacy Impermanence, do not worry. Bi Hao is not like the other immortal cultivators, not completing the harvest and allowing others to play around with you. From today onwards, you only need to serve my brother and I." His hand then stretched towards her breasts.
毛团一愣，似是被惊住了一样，怔怔的看着她，半会又低下头看着她的手，半天没反应过来。
The furball hesitated. It looked frightened for a second as it continued to stare at Shen Ying. Then, it looked down at her hand. It did not respond.
毛团也不再反抗，反而顺从朝她靠近了一步，有意无意的把身子蹭向她的掌心。挺自觉啊，沈萤摸得更加欢畅了，从头到尾都撸了一把，一边摸还一边捏了捏它的肌肉。

The furball lost all of its earlier defensiveness. It obediently walked toward Shen Ying and intentionally - or unintentionally - leaned in toward her palm. It's quite self-conscious, Shen Ying carressed it more joyfully. She combed its fur from its head to its tail, feeling up its muscles.
毛团眼睛睁得大大的，死死的盯着她的手，低吼得更加明显。沈萤心情很好的再次伸手过去，直接落在它巨大的头上，顺着头上的毛又摸了一把。

The furball's eyes grew even wider as it glared at Shen Ying's hand. Its growl became louder. Shen Ying once again happily reached out towawrd the beast and patted its head. Then, she began to comb the fur on the beast's head, following the flow of its fur from the top of its head to its neck.
毫无动静。
No movement.
求你了，祖宗！能不能放过这个秘境？
Please, Patriarch! Could you let this mystic realm off?
江云海曾经说过，他可以去找他父亲相认，不过以后就两人将不再见面。对于他来说江云海比那个所谓的父亲重要多了，而且他父亲当年还抛弃了他母亲，这才导致他母亲含恨死去，所以对于这个父亲，他没有半点好感，反而都是恨意，刻骨铭心的恨！

Jiang Yunhai mentioned before that he could look for his father, but in the future, he would not be able to meet Jiang Yunhai anymore. To Jiang Yi, Jiang Yunhai is much more important than his so-called father. Furthermore, his father had abandoned his mother back then, which caused his mother to die out of grief. Hence he did not have a tinge of approval or liking for this kind of father, instead, he only had hatred. Hatred from the bottom of his heart.
江云海透露的信息不多，但是每一句话和此刻钱万贯的情报对照起来，都无比的契合。
Jiang Yunhai had not revealed much, but every word and sentence he mentioned all matches the information he was hearing now perfectly.
江如虎一直在偷偷观察情况，看到江如狼也被击飞后再也不敢看了，身子一缩偷偷朝侧门溜去，江如龙还没来，他还不跑下场唯有和地上江豹江松一样了。

Jiang Ruhu had been observing the situation all this time. After seeing Jiang Rulang got blasted off, he didn't dare continue watching anymore. He shrank his body and stealthily slipped towards the side door. Jiang Rulong had yet to arrive, if he still didn't escape, he would end up in the same state as Jiang Bao and Jiang Song on the floor.
江如虎不是蠢货，否则也不会成为这群人的老大了，他嘴角露出一抹意味深长的微笑，快速和一名铸鼎境三重旁系子弟江如鹰对视一眼，给他打了一个眼色，这才转头和江逸点头道：“那是自然，我江如虎的话一言九鼎，你只要从我们胯下逐一爬过，保证以后见我们绕道而行，我就放你一马。如鹰，摆马步吧！”

Jiang Ruhu was no idiot - otherwise, how could he have possibly become the leader of this group of men? From the corner of his mouth came a faint smile filled with profound hidden meanings and intentions. He quickly turned to exchange glances with collateral descendant Jiang Ruying, whose power level was at the third stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. Only after giving Jiang Ruying a hidden signal with his eyes, did Jiang Ruhu turn his head and nodded at Jiang Yi, replying, "Naturally, I, Jiang Ruhu, speak words of enormous weight. So long as you crawl between all of our legs and under our groins, I will guarantee that the next time we cross paths, I will let you pass unharmed. Ruying, position yourself in the horse stance!"
江如虎双眼失明，双手和一条腿被踢断，此刻感觉整个人飞了起来，被江逸抡起当做一根木棍般抡起乱扫，脑袋还两次从地面上擦过顿时气疯了，当着如此多小弟这么狼狈，他这个老大还怎么当？

Jiang Ruhu was blind in both eyes, had both his hands and legs broken by kicking; and worst of all, at that moment he could feel his entire body flying around as Jiang Yi swung him around in a random sweeping motion like a wooden stick, with his head even brushing past the ground twice. He immediately flew into a wild rage - how could he continue being a boss to all these familial subordinates, if he continued being in such a sorrt state in front so many of them?
江如虎双眼暂时失明，眼中还一阵火辣如烈火灼烧，一听幻影拳心彻底沉了下来，本还想抵挡一下，此刻只能胡乱挥舞双臂在上方一阵乱砸了，护住脑袋。

Jiang Ruhu became temporarily blind in both his eyes; additionally, he felt a scorching sensation of agony burning like a raging inferno in his eyes. Upon hearing the incoming Phantom Punch attack, his heart sank completely. Initially he had thought of withstanding the attack; yet at that moment all he could do was to recklessly brandish both his arms and hitting the air above him in a random manner, in an effort to protect his own head.
江如虎很快就冷笑起来，对着丹房大喝一声：“好，一言为定，十日之后，谁不去谁是孙子。”说完匆匆朝外面奔去，追赶已走了很远的江恨水而去。

Jiang Ruhu very quickly started laughing coldly. "Very well!" he shouted as he left. "A promise is a promise! Ten days later, whoever isn't there will be the other's grandchild!"
Finishing his sentence, he hastily ran out of the building to catch up with Jiang Henshui who had already walked a long distance away.
江如虎想死的心都有了，身体内剧烈的疼痛都让他麻木了，他的脑袋也晕了。这都不算什么，最让他感到屈辱的是，他一个大活人被人如此抡着，还是当着如此多人的面，又被抡了两次了，他以后算是彻底在江家抬不起头了。

Jiang Ruhu had already prepared to die, the intense pain within his body numbed his senses and his brain was in a dazed state of mind too. All those didn't matter, the thing he was most ashamed of, was to be whirled around like a human sack. This was the second time he got whirled in front of so many people. How would he still lift his head in the Jiang Clan?
江如虎满脸横肉的脸却凑了过来，压低声音冷笑道：“哼，江逸！你有种一辈子永远在这炼丹房做缩头乌龟，你敢出江家大院，我保证让你爬着回来。”

Jiang Ruhu rushed over to him with a fierce look on his face, laughing coldly in a low voice as he said, "Hmph, Jiang Yi! If you have the guts, stay in this alchemy lab forever, you coward. If you ever dare to leave the central court, I will guarantee that you'll come back crawling."
江如虎的声音断断续续的传来，众人满脸迷茫，这江如虎难道伤到脑袋了？自己都被打成这样了，还要帮江逸隐瞒？

Jiang Yi's voice stammered out in dribs and drabs. All had a perplexed look on their faces - could it be that Jiang Ruhu's brain was injured as well? He himself had already been beaten to such a pathetic state, yet how could it be that he still wanted to help hide Jiang Yi's secrets?
江如虎看到江逸紧张得全身都绷紧起来，心里莫名感到一阵快意，如一群老虎戏耍一只猴子般有趣。他丹田内的元力悄然运转，一脸的横肉抖动起来，气势汹汹缓缓朝江逸走去，爆喝起来：“早知道怕，就别动我的人，现在……晚了！不过，虎爷我今日心情好就给你一个机会，只要你从我们所有人胯下爬过去，今日我们就放你一马，如何？”

Upon seeing Jiang Yi become so nervous that his entire body started becoming taut, Jiang Ruhu felt an indescribable burst of elation in his heart. It was so interesting, akin to a pack of tigers playing with a monkey. He quietly circulated the essence forces in his dantian as, with a fierce expression on his trembling face and an aggressive spirit surrounding him, he slowly walked toward Jiang Yi. He exploded in a loud shout, "Don't lay a finger on my men, if you knew you were going to be frightened about the consequences! Now... it's all too late! However, I, Master Hu, am in a good mood today so I'll give you one chance - we will let you off today, if you crawl between everyone's legs, under all of our groins. How about that?"
江如虎臃肿的身子应声倒飞出去，重重的撞在三四丈外的一个小树上，又被反弹下来，在地上翻滚几圈。

Jiang Ruhu's obese body responded by flying backwards, crashing heavily into a small tree some thirty or fourty feet away, before recocheting off into the ground, leaving him rolling on the ground for several rounds.
江如虎虽然天资一般，但有个江家大总管的好老子，修炼丹药从不缺，实力可是达到了铸鼎境四重，就算他动用黑色元力怕也很难战胜的。

Even though Jiang Ruhu's abilities were rather average, his dad was the Jiang Clan’s chief supervisor. Jiang Ruhu never lacked elixirs which could help boost his power up to the fourth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. Even if Jiang Yi used his black essence force, he would still find it difficult to emerge victorious in a fight.
江如虎被一口鲜血喷中，眼睛顿时睁不开了，他内心一沉，也不攻击了双手交叉护住头部，一边慌忙爆退，一边歇斯底里的大喊：“你们都是死人吗？还不快上？给我打死江逸这个野种！”

Jiang Ruhu was sprayed by a mouthful of fresh blood and as such, he could not immeidately open his eyes. His heart sank as he chose not to counter-attack but rather hold both his hands to protect his head. As he hurriedly retreated explosively backwards, he hysterically shouted, "Are you guys all dead? Why don't you hurry up and attack? Beat that bastard Jiang Yi to death for me!"
江如虎被打得不成人样抬了回来，引起江家一片哗然，不过听说是马家子弟动的手全都不在意了，反而暗骂江如虎等人废物，丢江家的脸。

The physically mutilated state that Jiang Ruhu was left in after the fight and in which he had been carried home, triggered an uproar from the rest of the Jiang Clan. However, upon hearing that the injuries were the handiwork of Ma Family members, all the Jiang Clan members stopped minding about the injuries; instead, they secretly scolded Jiang Ruhu and his gang of Jiang Clan descendants for being useless good-for-nothings and losing face for the Jiang Clan.
江如虎要的就是这个效果，如此多人江逸就算再逆天也双拳难敌四手，退一万步说，有这么多人拖延时间，足够等到江如龙的到来。

This was exactly the result that Jiang Ruhu wanted. No matter how heaven defying Jiang Yi was, he still wouldn't be able to go against that many people. In other words, it also meant that with so many of them stalling for time, Jiang Rulong would definitely be able to arrive on time.
江如虎身边的三人立即惊醒，一直以来他们习惯了听从江如虎的命令，此刻也没有过多的犹豫，元力疯狂运转朝江逸冲去。

The three people standing next to Jiang Ruhu immediately roused from their stunned condition. They had always been used to obeying Jiang Ruhu's orders; likewise, at that moment they did not hestitate too much, and instead rushed towards Jiang Yi with essence force being circulated like crazy on them.
江如虎那群人也全部懵了，两个多月前在西山，江逸才是铸鼎境二重吧？如此短的时间，他难道吞服了天阶丹药？想到两个多月前，江逸凭借铸鼎境二重都能把他揍得不成人样，江如虎下意识退后了两步。

Jiang Ruhu and the group all got a stun. Two months ago at the Western Hills, Jiang Yi was just at the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm right? Such a large progress in such a short amount of time... Could he have consumed a heaven-tier elixir? Thinking back when Jiang Yi was just second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, he was already beaten into pulp. Jiang Ruhu couldn't help but took two steps back unconsciously.
江如虎！
Jiang Ruhu!
江如鹰却很快醒悟过来，厉声大喝道：“江逸实力进步如此大，要是给家族知道了，非但不会责怪他，反而会重视他！还说不定会赐予核心子弟的身份，到时候我们就只能一辈子被他欺压了，这仇也没办法报了。虎哥说的没错，这事我们全部要隐瞒下来，就说和马家子弟开战，反正也不是第一次了，等龙哥从武殿内回来，再让龙哥出手……做了江逸！”

Yet Jiang Ruying very quickly connected the dots. In a stern voice, he shouted aloud, "Jiang Yi's power has improved so greatly - if the Family found out, not only would they not scold him, they might even see him as someone valuable! On top of that, they might even offer him the position as a core descendant of the Family! By that time, we would have no other option but be pushed around and be bullied by him forever, and we would never be able to get revenge for this. What Brother Hu said is right - we would have to keep this whole event as a secret, and say that we have a fight with the sons of the Ma Family. It's not the first time that has happened, after all. We will wait for Brother Long to return from the Martial Arts Hall, and then we will let Brother Long take action... and punish Jiang Yi for his actions!"
江如鹰的身子重重砸落在地，右腿上裤子全部炸裂，满是鲜血的小腿上，森森白骨隐约可见，他整张脸都扭曲了，一股撕心裂肺的痛苦让他抱着右腿长嚎不休。

Jiang Ruying's body crashed heavily on the ground. His right pants leg had been completely torn to shreds in the explosion. The eerie pale white colour of bone could be vaguely seen on his lower right leg, itself covered in fresh blood. His entire face was distorted in a grimace, as an intensely acute pain radiating from his right leg left him cradling the leg and bawling ceaselessly.
江如鹰眸子一转，快速和众人交代起来对上口供，避免回去之后被发现破绽。众人一边低声交谈，一边快速下了西山朝江家大院奔去。

Jiang Ruying shifted his pupils as he quickly instructed all the people around him by corroborating through the same matching testimony, to avoid discovering any mistakes or gaps in the story after they return home. While the group of men discussed in a low voice, they hastily left the Western Hills and ran towards the Jiang Residence Central Courtyard.
江如龙不愧是江家年轻一代第二人，如果危险的关头，他单手抓住江如虎一甩，然后单腿在地上一点，身子横跃而起，另外一条腿化作残影朝江逸扫去。

Jiang Rulong was indeed worthy to be the no.2 of the Jiang Clan's young generation. At this critical moment, he used one hand to grab Jiang Ruhu and tossed him aside, then found his center of gravity by stepping on the ground with a single leg. He leaped back up and kicked at Jiang Yi with his other leg, leaving behind an afterimage.
江如龙吓坏了，身子本来朝一边躲去的，连忙强行扭转身体，如炮弹般朝江如虎射去，最终在江如虎撞到墙壁前硬生生的抓住了他的身体。

Jiang Rulong got a scare, his body was actually meant to dodge to the side but he managed to twist his body and shot towards Jiang Ruhu like a cannon. He finally caught hold of Jiang Ruhu in time, right before Jiang Ruhu crashed into the wall.
江如龙是铸鼎境七重，如果他能在江如龙出武殿之前，把境界提升到铸鼎境三重到四重，那么未必不可以和他一战了。

Jiang Rulong had a power level at the seventh stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. If he could increase his power-level up to the third or even fourth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm before Jiang Rulong left the Martial Arts Hall, it was not unlikely that he could fight with Jiang Rulong on a relatively-equal footing.
江如龙暴怒的大吼，脑袋内传来的剧痛，鲜血浸入他的眼睛让他整个人都陷入癫狂之中。他不断的扭曲身子，不断的暴怒大吼，另外一条腿胡乱的乱踢，企图击中江逸，摆脱他的控制。

Jiang Rulong roared furiously. The intense pain that came from within his head, the blood that soaked his eyes caused him to going into a frenzied state of mind. He continually contorted his body and roared furiously, his other leg randomly kicked in attempt to hit Jiang Yi and rid of his grasp.
江如龙瞬间醒悟过来，江逸刚才不是不小心……而是故意的，这一切都在他算计之中，他此刻抱着江如虎，因为冲得太猛，加上江如虎朝前方的冲力让他重心不稳，战力大打折扣，江逸偷袭的时机把握的太好了……

Jiang Rulong suddenly come to realize that Jiang Yi wasn't careless... but it was intentional; everything was within his plans. He who was carrying Jiang Ruhu lost his center of gravity due to the himself doing a vigorous dash and coupled with the speed of Jiang Ruhu. He had lost a huge portion of his combat strength and it was now a great opportunity for Jiang Yi to sneak in an attack...
江如龙脸上都是冷汗，但他还来不及擦心里却陡然一凛，他感觉到一股凌冽的杀机锁定了他，他目光猛然一扫却利马一缩，因为一个拳头已经在他眼眸内开始无限放大……

Jiang Rulong's face was covered in cold sweat. Before he even had time to recover from the shock, he felt a sharp killing intent locking onto him. He turned around for a scan but instead shrank his eyes, because a fist was expanding indefinitely in his sight...
江如龙身高足足有七尺，整整高江逸江逸两个头，身子也魁梧如一头暴熊，他和江如虎不一样，浑身都是虬结的肌肉，方头大耳，光看外表就知道是一名猛汉。

Jiang Rulong was seven feet tall and was two heads taller than Jiang Yi. His body was that of a violent bear, it was entirely different from plump Jiang Ruhu and was packed with firm muscles. He had a square face and large ears; just from his appearance, it was safe to say that he was a fierce fighter.
江家东院，管事房。
Jiang Residence Eastern Court, Housekeeping Chamber.
江家子弟很多，直系的有二十多个，旁系的那就更多了，类似江如虎这类旁系子弟足足有上百个，不过真正的优秀天才子弟，肯定不会出现在演武殿。

The Jiang Clan had many descendants; the direct lineage consisted of more than twenty members while the collateral lineage had even more. There were at least over a hundred collateral lineage descendants like Jiang Ruhu. Those truly prodigious descendants would definitely not be appearing in the Martial Arts Demonstration Hall.
江家年轻一代中身份最尊贵的，自然是拥有各种血缘关系的少爷，其次才是没有血缘关系的普通子弟。其中像大少爷这样的直系血统少爷，以及极少数天资卓越的旁系少爷，无疑是最上层的存在。而江如虎等人，作为旁系少爷而言，天资一般，所以在江家子弟中的地位属于第二等。

The most respected members of the youngest generation in the Jiang Clan were naturally the sons with blood relations—direct and indirect—to the main Jiang bloodline. Relatives with no blood ties were deemed secondary. As a result, the top echelon was comprised of direct descendants as well as a tiny minority of highly talented relatives from branch families. Those from a branch family and of average ability, like Jiang Ruhu, possessed less status.
江家族规森严，因触犯族规被活活打死的子弟也不在少数，江逸心里想着炼丹房的事情，一时忘记了令牌的事情，但此刻也只能强装镇定，转头惭愧说道：“荣管事，不好意思，我放家里忘记带了……”

The Jiang Clan rules were strict, and the number of clan members who were beaten to death for breaking these laws was not small. Jiang Yi's mind was focused on the events that happened in the alchemy lab that he had forgotten his issues with the command token. Despite this, at the moment he could only pretend to be calm and composed.
Turning his head, he shamefully said, "Chief Rong, I am sorry. I left it at home and forgot to bring it out..."
江家有一门武技叫幻影拳，本质上和这暴雨拳差不多，幻影拳江逸已经感悟到大成的地步了，拳影比这翊凌雪真实多了，此刻翊凌雪又怎么能伤他？

The Jiang Clan had a martial arts technique called Phantom Punch, which in essence was not much different from this Thunderstorm Fist. Jiang Yi could feel that his mastery of Phantom Punch had hit Phenomenal Stage, with his fist silhouettes being more concrete and realistic that what Yi Lingxue could produce. How could Yi Lingxue possibly harm him at that moment?
江家西山药田种植的主要是一种能够补血的药草，草参。草参是一种九品灵草，虽然品级最低，但好歹挤进了灵药的范畴，这就不是普通百姓消费得起的了。事实上，江家以草参为主要材料制作出来的疗伤药补血丸，主要供给的对象除了家族子弟和外面的武者外，还有就是军队里的军官。

The main crop being produced in the Western Hills was grass ginseng, a type of spirit herb that could boost and enrich the blood. Winter ferula was a ninth-grade spirit herb—even though this medicinal plant was of the lowest grade in quality, as the plant was considered a type of spirit herb, normal civilians could not afford to purchase this herb. Frankly speaking, the medicine produced by the Jiang Clan used grass ginseng as its primary ingredient. It was used heal wounds and improve blood quality and was mainly provided to descendants of the Jiang Clan, martial artists not within the family, as well as soldiers of the state army.
江家西院的一个破败小院内，门突然被撞开，差点没能坚持到家的江逸踉踉跄跄、跌跌撞撞地挨进了门。他眉头紧蹙，眸子内都是痛苦之色，嘴角还留有残余的血迹。

A loud crash sent the door leading to the tiny dilapidated courtyard flying. Jiang Yi staggered through the doorway, swaying left to right. He barely had enough energy left to even make it back to his house. Jiang Yi’s eyes betrayed his great agony, and his brows were furrowed deeply. The corners of his mouth were flecked with dried blood.
江家这些年不待见他，江逸骨子内有一股傲气，不想依靠江家。而且因为柳长老的事情，不到最后关头，他实在不想让江家知道他拥有黑色元力的事情。

All these years, the Jiang Clan did not see him in a positive light. Jiang Yi himself had a sense of haughty pride within his bones, and refused to depend on the Jiang Clan. Additionally, due to the situation with Elder Liu, he truly had no desire of letting the Jiang Clan know of the case that he possessed black essence force until the very last moment.
江小奴一下慌了，连忙跟着跪下来，一张脏兮兮的小脸上都是心疼和愧疚，说着说着泪水又趟了下来。
Jiang Xiaonu hastily knelt down, her small, grimy face showing her heartache and regret. Tears rolling down her cheeks as she spoke.
江小奴一愣，眨了眨眼，迷糊的说道：“坑我？我有什么好坑的？我又没钱……”
Jiang Xiaonu stared blankly, blinking from time to time, replying in a daze, "Scam me? What's there to cheat from me? I'm broke..."
江小奴从小最听江逸的话了，关心的问了几句就一瘸一拐的走出去了，烛光下的瘦弱背影好生可怜……看得江逸又是一阵心疼。

Jiang Xiaonu had obedient to Jiang Yi ever since she was young. After asking a few questions out of concern, she limped out of the house. The weak, skinny figure in the candlelight looked most pitiful... giving the observing Jiang Yi much heartache.
江小奴小鸡啄米的点头，却依旧哭着说道：“可是……少爷，一个月我们上哪去赚十两紫金啊？哎呀，都是小奴不好，连累少爷了……”

Jiang Xiaonu nodded her head rapidly like a chicken pecking rice off the ground, but continued crying. "But...Young Master, how are we ever going to earn ten taels of purple gold in a month? Ah, it's all Xiaonu's fault; she has put her burdens on Young Master..."
江小奴心思单纯倒是没多想，反而替江逸高兴，毕竟武殿那可是大地方，在她看来在武殿做事，那肯定是做大事，殊不知江逸在里面做的是最低等的陪练……

With a simple and naive personality, Jiang Xiaonu did not think too much about what Jiang Yi said, and instead felt happy for him. After all, the Martial Arts Hall was a big place. In her view, working for the Martial Arts Hall definitely meant that he was doing great things. She scarcely realised what Jiang Yi was employed inside for was being the lowest-grade sparring partner...
江小奴抓了抓头，小脸都是尴尬之色，连忙转身又一瘸一拐走出去。
Jiang Xiaonu scratched her head, her small face filled with a look of awkwardness, before hastily turning around and hobbling out.
江小奴担忧江逸一个人在家，想早点做完好回家也就没想那么多了，跟着那老妈子提着一大桶衣物走进内堂，结果刚刚进去却被一名护卫“不小心”绊了一下，“恰好”撞到墙边的一张桌子，而桌子上“正好”放着一副重金购买回来的“名画”。

Jiang Xiaonu was worried about leaving Jiang Yi all alone at home and wanted to finish her work early to go home as soon as possible—as such, without thinking too much, carrying a large pail of clothes she followed the old chambermaid into the Inner Court. As a result, she had only just entered the room when a guard "accidentally" caused her to trip, and she "coincidentally" crashed into a table by the wall, placed upon which "as it turned out" was a "famous artwork" purchased using much gold.
江小奴拍了拍胸口，咧嘴憨笑道：“我还以为是什么大事呢，少爷你去吧，小奴没事的，我能自己照顾自己！少爷以后也要经常做大事的呀，总是会外出的呀。”

Xiao patted her chest, mouth curving into a guileless smile, "And here I thought it was something severe. Go ahead, Young Master, Xiaonu will be fine. I can take care of myself! Young Master will do great things in the future, and will have to venture out after all."
江小奴捧着一个白色小瓷瓶和一碗清水很快进来了，放在床边问道：“少爷，现在吞服丹药吗？还是先吃点东西？哎呀……少爷你中午也没吃吧？要不我先去下两碗面条？”

Jiang Xiaonu walked in shortly after, carrying a small white porcelain bottle and a bowl of clear water.
"Young Master,” she said as she put the items on the bedside table, “do you want to take the elixir now? Or do you want to eat something first? Oh no... Young Master, you haven't eaten lunch yet, have you? Do you want me to go prepare two bowls of noodles first?"
江小奴每隔五天就会和春芽去风月楼做工，帮忙清洗楼子内的姑娘换下的衣物和床单，本来她们一直都在后院做工，从不准去前院和内堂，江小奴生性老实更不会擅自乱跑。

Jiang Xiaonu would go to Fengyue Brothel with Chunya every five days to work, wherein she helped to wash the clothes and linen changed out by the ladies of the manor. Usually, they worked in the backyard and was never allowed to go to the front yard nor the inner court. Xiaonu's honest personality also ensured that she would not run all over the building on her own accord without permission.
江小奴的大喊提醒了江逸，他立即以最快的速度调集了一丝黑色元力，朝拳头内涌去，和拳头内的蓝色元力融合起来。
Xiaonu's yell reminded Jiang Yi of his weakness, and he immediately mustered a wisp of black essence force at his fist and fused it with the blue essence force.
江小奴眨了眨眼睛，看着自家少爷，眸子内都是迷茫之色，这是他家的少爷吗？他家少爷怎么那么厉害了……

Jiang Xiaonu blinked her eyes and looked at her young master. Her eyes clouded with confoundment. Was this her young master?
How did Young Master become so powerful…?
江小奴眼中都是焦急，咬牙说道：“可是，一个月后要是交不出钱，风云楼的人上门要钱，刑堂肯定会责罚少爷的，小奴被打死没事，少爷……”

Jiang Xiaonu's eyes revealed all her anxiety. Gritting her teeth, she responded, "However, if we cannot settle the debt within a month, should the people from Fengyue Brothel come here demanding for money, the Disciplinary Court would definitely punish Young Master. It's alright if Xiaonu gets beaten to death, but Young Master..."
江小奴穿着一身米白色的宽大侍女袍，将她的身子衬托得更加羸弱，听到江逸的声音，看到一道身影飙射而来，顿时大喜道：“少爷，可把你给找到了，担心死我了。”

The wide rice-white maidservant's robes made Jiang Xiaonu's figure appear even frailer. Hearing Jiang Yi's voice and seeing a figure flying towards her, she immediately smiled and said, "Young Master, I've finally found you! I was worried sick."
江小奴笑着点头，看不出半点不舍，只是关切的说道：“少爷一定要小心哦，等你回来我给你包饺子吃。”

Jiang Xiaonu nodded smilingly. She expressed only concern at Jiang Yi's departure, and not a trace of reluctance, "Please be careful, Young Master. I will be sure to make you dumplings when you are back."
江小奴自小和江逸一起长大，两人心灵相通配合默契，这一喊小奴立即反应过来，松开了抱住对方左脚的双手，而江逸一记飞腿恰好飞来，将这铸鼎境三重的武者重重踹飞出去。

Having grown up with Jiang Yi since a young age, Jiang Xiaonu was deeply in sync with Jiang Yi in mind and spirit. This single shout made Xiao Nu immediately respond in kind — by releasing her hands from their opponent's left foot. At the same time, Jiang Yi sent a flying kick sweeping in, sending this martial artist at the third stage of the Cast Tripod Realm flying back.
江小奴被江逸撞到，后脑勺在地上磕碰了一下，痛得叫了一声。不过她反应很快，看那名护卫继续冲去又要攻击江逸，竟身子一扑用双手死死抱住那护卫的一条腿，同时大喊道：“少爷，别管我，快跑！”

Jiang Yi collided into Jiang Xiaonu. She cried out in pain as she knocked the back of her head against the ground. Thankfully, however, her reaction was fast. Seeing the guard continuing to charge forward and attack Jiang Yi once again, she pounced forward and firmly clung to one of the guard's legs. At the same time, she shouted, "Young Master, don't worry about me! Just run!"
江小奴连忙出去取肉干，她以前经常出去做工，怕江逸饿到所以准备了一些肉干，此刻倒是正好派上用场。
Jiang Xiaonu hurried went to retrieve the jerky. She used to regularly head outside to work and had prepared some jerky lest Jiang Yi got hungry. At this moment, the jerky could be put to good use.
江小奴连忙述说起来，把今天的事情详详细细的说了一遍，说完之后才继续迷糊的问道：“少爷，有问题吗？”

Jiang Xiaonu promptly recounted in detail all the events that happened that day once. When she was finished with her recounting, she asked in continued confusion, "Young Master, do you have any questions?"
江小奴追了出来，站在院门目送着江逸离开，不断的挥着手，小脸上还露出甜甜的笑容。
Jiang Xiaonu followed Jiang Yi and stood at the gates watching him leave, steadily waving goodbye with a sweet smile on her small face.
江小奴醒悟过来，甜甜一笑，满眸都是崇拜，她顿了一下把紫金还给江逸道：“少爷，这紫金你收着吧，我拿着怕是睡觉都睡不着了，对了…少爷你的封印是怎么破开的？”

Jiang Xiaonu came to her senses. Smiling sweetly, her face was filled with a look of adoration.
She immediately returned the purple gold to Jiang Yi, saying, "Young Master, I think you should keep the purple gold. If I were to take it, I'm afraid I wouldn't be able to sleep. Oh yes... how did you break your seal, Young Master?"
江恨水扫了一眼江如虎，淡然说道：“我去拿吧，江逸，你回头和柳长老告罪一声，我赶着去武殿！”
Jiang Henshui glanced at Jiang Ruhu, before indifferently replying, "I'll go get it. Jiang Yi, you can report to Elder Liu about my offense later. I am rushing to the martial arts hall!"
江恨水没想到江逸态度转变得如此之快？有些不适应，不过看了一眼背后江如虎他也没说什么，摆了摆手道：“江逸，你现在在炼丹房做事了？那给我拿一百枚灵神丹吧，我最近要去武殿内闭关，冲击一下铸鼎境第九重。”

Jiang Henshui did not expect Jiang Yi's attitude to change so quickly. He was not familiar with such circumstances, yet said nothing as he eyed Jiang Ruhu behind him.
Instead, he waved his hand and responded, "Jiang Yi, are you working at the alchemy lab now? How about you help me retrieve a hundred Spirit Pills, then? I am going into seclusion at the martial arts hall, to train up to the ninth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm."
江松一惊却并不慌乱，在他看来江逸只有铸鼎境一重，就算武技再巧妙纯熟也绝不是他的对手。他境界比江逸高一重，反应速度，攻击速度和力量相差一截，他怎么会输？他冷笑一声也不去管双手了，右腿膝盖上元力灌注，对着江逸的裆部猛然顶去。

Jiang Song was astonished but did not become flustered. As he could see, Jiang Yi was only at the first level of the Cast Tripod Realm. As such, no matter how ingenious or skillful he was in martial arts, he was clearly not his match. His level was higher than Jiang Yi by one stage. Their reaction speeds, attack speeds and strengths all differed by an entire notch.
How could I possibly lose? Jiang Song laughed coldly as he ignored the condition of his hands, instead applying his essence force on his right kneecap, before abruptly hitting upwards, aimed at Jiang Yi's crotch.
江松一看情况不对，扭头就往侧门跑，还不跑那就等着断腿了。江顾水和江如狼不出头，江如虎这点实力他可不敢指望，只要跑出去一喊，江逸已经出手伤人肯定会被刑堂治罪的。

Seeing that the situation was going awry, Jiang Song turned and ran towards the side door. It would be equivalent to having his leg broken if he didn't try to escape. Jiang Gushui and Jiang Rulang wasn't going to interfere, neither could he rely on Jiang Ruhu's strength. As long as he ran out to shout that Jiang Yi injured someone, Jiang Yi would definitely be punished by the Disciplinary Court.
江松两掌刚刚拍来，江逸身子因为陡然后仰，他两只手掌只能拍空了。而当他准备变招朝下方拍下时，江逸两只手已如两根海藻般缠了上来，轻松把他的两只手抓住缠上。

Jiang Song's two hands had just flown downwards, yet as Jiang Yi's body abruptly bent backward, his hands could only hit the air. As for the moment he was ready to change techniques and hit downstairs, Jiang Yi's hand had coiled together like two threads of seaweed, easily entangling his hands in turn.
江松也是旁系少爷，天资不行又懒惰好玩，现在才是铸鼎境二重。他父亲求了柳长老多次才把他安排进来，本意是想让他学些炼丹术，日后好谋生。

Jiang Song was also a collateral descendant. He had a lack of talent and was naturally very lazy; as such, his abilities were only at the second level of the Cast Tripod Realm. His father had begged Elder Liu many times before he could successfully arrange for his son to work there. His father's goal had been to let him learn the skill of elixir-refining so that he would have the skills to survive in the future.
江松昨天被他父亲打了一顿，训斥了很久，也有些后悔了，至少……在这里干活，他可以经常弄些丹药出去卖钱。所以今日他思前想后，决定厚着脸皮来赔罪，就算给柳长老下跪也要留下来。

Jiang Song had been beaten up by his father and had received a long scolding. Furthermore, he was somewhat regretful after the whole incident. At least... working there meant he could regularly produce elixirs and sell them outside. Thus, after much pondering that day, he decided to be more thick-skinned and went over to apologize, even if it meant he had to kneel to Elder Liu, he would stay.
江松气得浑身颤抖，脸上肌肉都扭曲起来，他眼中突然闪过一丝狠色，爆喝道：“看我把你打残废了，柳长老还怎么用你？哼哼，到时候我在让我父亲来求求柳长老，这个位置还是我的。”

Jiang Song was so furious that his entire body was shaking. With the muscles on his face twitching, a look of viciousness flashed past his eyes.
"Let's see how Elder Liu can still use you when I make you handicapped!" he roared. "Hmph! At that time, I will make my father come to beg Elder Liu—by then, the position will still be mine."
江松痛嚎一会，额头上都是冷汗，他满脸扭曲艰难爬起来，眸子内都是惊骇迷茫之色，似乎到现在还不敢相信，自己铸鼎境二重的实力，怎么如此轻松被江逸这个铸鼎境一重的废物给伤了？

Jiang Song howled in agony for quite a while. His forehead was filled with cold sweat. As he tried with much difficulty to lift himself up, his face twitched and his eyes were filled with bewilderment and terror.
Even now he couldn't believe that he had been thrashed by a useless person at the first stage of the Cast Tripod Realm like Jiang Yi.
江松的想法理论上没错，不过他不知道江逸此刻左眼视力变得恐怖，他的一举一动全被江逸看眼里。他还没动江逸已经提前判断出他的攻击轨迹了，力量和攻击速度虽然有差距，但是……反应速度比他快了很多。

Jiang Song's thinking was not wrong in theory, but he did not know that Jiang Yi's left eye at that moment had obscenely powerful eyesight. As such, his every move and action were all caught by Jiang Yi. Before he had even moved, Jiang Yi had already predicted in advance his attack trajectory. Although there was some difference in power and attack speed... Jiang Yi's response speed was much faster than him.
江松看了江逸一眼顿时怒了，指着江逸的鼻子骂道：“你分明是故意的，对了！昨日我上茅房回来你就在这里，一定是你向柳长老告状了，他才会如此暴怒的。江逸你好毒啊，想不到平时看你老实巴交的，却是十足的阴险小人。”

Jiang Song glanced at Jiang Yi and instantly fell into a deep rage. Pointing straight at Jiang Yi's nose, he shouted angrily, "You clearly did this on purpose, yes! Yesterday, while I was in the toilet, he was right here! It must be you who told on me to Elder Liu, that's why he became so angry. Jiang Yi, you're evil! I didn't expect you, someone who usually looks so honest and trustworthy, to be such a treacherous vile person."
江松脸色瞬间大变，眸子内都是惶恐和怒意。昨日他被柳长老扫了一巴掌，回到家中和他父亲一说，却又被狠狠打了一顿，让他今日立即过来给柳长老赔礼道歉，得到柳长老的原谅，好继续留在这炼药房干活。

Jiang Yi's expression changed instantly, his eyes becoming filled with horror and rage. He had received a tight slap from Elder Liu the day before; worse, when he got home and informed his father, he received yet another vicious beating. His father ordered him to immediately return that day and apologize or make amends with Elder Liu, to in turn receive forgiveness from the elder and allow him to continue working at the alchemy lab.
江松说的虎哥，自然是家族二等子弟中的老大，江如虎！江如虎的父亲是内务堂大总管江云蛇，还有一个哥哥江如龙在家族年轻一代中战力排名第二，仅在江家大少爷江恨水之下。有父亲和哥哥罩着，加上本身实力达到铸鼎境四重，江如虎自然混得风声水起，江家的很多旁系少爷和二等子弟，像江豹江松等人都唯他马首是瞻。

The "Brother Hu" mentioned by Jiang Song referred naturally to Jiang Ruhu, the leader amongst the second-tier descendants of the family! Jiang Ruhu's father was Jiang Yunshe, the chief supervisor of the internal affairs department.
He also had an elder brother called Jiang Rulong, who was positioned second in the list of most powerful persons within the young generation of the family; furthermore, his position was right below the Jiang Clan's great young master, Jiang Henshui. With such a father and elder brother protecting him, and adding his strength at the fourth level of the Cast Tripod Realm, Jiang Ruhu naturally commanded a powerful, respected and renowned position. Many Jiang Clan collateral descendants and second-tier descendants, like Jiang Bao and Jiang Song, followed his lead.
江豹万万没有想到这个素来还算老实的家伙此番犯了混，居然敢主动攻击自己？脸上顿时浮现出慌乱的神色。他此刻左手受了重伤，不断传来撕裂般的痛苦已经折磨得他够呛了，哪里还能还手？当下也只能抱着左手在地面上挪来蠕去，搞得异常狼狈。

Jiang Bao did not expect this ever-honest fellow would rebel, let alone attack! He panicked for a moment. His left arm was already seriously injured and sent waves of unbearable pain coursing through his body.
Jiang Bao had lost all ability to fight back. He could only cradle his left arm and roll on the floor like a pathetic wretch.
江豹和江松一听急了，不过看到江如虎淡淡扫过来一眼中的莫名意味，两人立即懂了，嘿嘿直笑起来。江逸从他们跨下爬过的时候，不是最好的偷袭机会吗？江如虎根本就没打算放过江逸，只是想多羞辱一下他罢了……

Jiang Bao and Jiang Song felt anxious upon hearing Jiang Ruhu's offer. However, seeing the ineffable meanings hidden in Jiang Ruhu's gaze as his eyes slightly swept across them, the two person immediately understood his aim and started laughing mischieveously. Was it not the best opportunity to launch a sneak attack whilst Jiang Yi was crawling between their legs? Jiang Ruhu had completely no intention to let off Jiang Yi, but rather he desired to humiliate Jiang Yi even further...
江豹脸色一沉，眼中凶光一闪，爆喝一声，身子一跃而起，右拳红色灵力环绕，宛如一道流星般划破长空，对着他的脑袋狠狠砸来。

Jiang Bao looked down and paused. Suddenly, without warning, with an ominous glint in his eyes and a loud roar, he jumped up into the air, a red-colored energy ball revolving around his right fist. Akin to a shooting star streaking across the vast night sky, he viciously punched at Jiang Yi’s head.
江豹逃出去几步，后背传来一股巨力，他狂喷一口鲜血，身子朝前方扑去，他顾不得身体内的疼痛，惊恐的大叫起来：“三公子，狼哥，你们还不出手吗？再不出手我要被打死了。”

After Jiang Bao tried to escape, a giant force was felt from behind. He regurgitated a mouthful of fresh blood and fell forward. He couldn't be bothered with the pain and shouted with fear, "Third Young Master and Brother Lang, are you guys still not going to step in? Anymore and I would be beaten to death."
江逸一个拳头轰然砸在刘管事的一只手掌上，一股巨力传来，刘管事的身子猛然被震退，根本无法抵挡。
Jiang Yi slammed a fist against Housekeeper Liu's arm, the tremendous shockwave that came from it caused Housekeeper Liu to abruptly stagger back, completely powerless to defend himself.
江逸一听顿时气不打一处来，昨日暴打他的人中，就数这江豹下手最毒，他头上那个至今还在高高肿起的大包就是对方的杰作。而且今日话还没说上两句，这厮就再次动手，还动用大杀招流星拳，这是想再次把他毒打至昏死甚至要人命啊……

Jiang Yi couldn’t help but feel angry. Among those who beat him up yesterday, Jiang Bao was the one who delivered the most vicious blows. The huge bruise on his head was the latter's creation. Furthermore, today he started beating on him even before he could utter a word. The Shooting Star Punch was one of his most powerful trump cards.
He must have wanted to beat me unconscious. Perhaps… he even meant to kill me!
江逸一屁股坐到地上，这一炉丹药可是数量不少，最少有五十枚，最重要的是还是人阶上品的灵神丹！他听说这人阶上品丹药在外面卖，一枚最少是十两银子，换句话说如果里面的丹药全炸了，他就毁掉了五两紫金的丹药……

Jiang Yi fell to the ground, landing on his buttocks. The number of elixirs in the cauldron was not small—there were at least fifty pills, and most importantly they were Man-tier superior-grade Spirit Pills! He had heard hearsay that this Man-tier superior-grade elixir was sold outside for at least ten taels of silver per pill. In other words, if all the elixirs in the cauldron exploded, he had instantly destroyed elixirs worth five taels of purple gold...
江逸一巴掌扫过去，把小胖子打得在原地转了一个圈，他正色说道：“钱万贯，要想和我江逸做朋友，你就收起这点小聪明，我最讨厌虚伪的人。”

Jiang Yi slapped Fatty so hard that he spun an entire round on the spot. He said in a stern manner, "Qian Wanguan! Stop this pretentious nonsense if you want to be friends with me. Pretentious people are what I hate the most."
江逸一巴掌拍在小胖子后脑勺，怒道：“再说这些屁话，信不信我把你丢进茅厕内？”
Jiang Yi slapped the back of Fatty's head, and raged,“If you dare mention these nonsense ever again, don't blame me for throwing you into the toilet.”
江逸一张脸变成了苦瓜，转念一想，这柳长老既然在后面看着，想然自己取的药材是没错了。

Jiang Yi's face changed to show his bitterness. However, on second thoughts, he realized that since Elder Liu had been observing behind his back, it was clear that going to pick up the medicine himself was the right move.
江逸一怔暗道晦气，内心有些惊疑起来，最近天羽城内发生了什么大事吗？怎么这些公子小姐全去武殿内修炼了？

Jiang Yi was startled and swore under his breath at his wretched luck. He was slightly bewildered. Did some major event happen in Skyplume City? Why were all these gentlemen and ladies of big families heading to the Martial Arts Hall to cultivate?
江逸一怔，立即醒悟过来，自己好像带着是苍狼面具？连忙起身朝练功房内走去，在门口却下意识回头一扫，却看到所有陪练的目光中都是默哀之色……

Jiang Yi was startled, but quickly came to his senses. Was he himself not the person wearing a wolf mask? He hastily stood up and walked into the technique-practicing room. At the door, however, he made the decision to turn back and scan the room, but all he could see were the gazes of all the remaining sparring partners seemingly observing a moment of silence in tribute of Jiang Yi.
江逸一愣，他确定那天在聚珍阁这姬小姐应该没有看到他的脸，那怎么一眼就认出了他？

Jiang Yi stared at her blankly. He was sure that, when he was at the Pearl Gathering Pavilion that day, this Young Mistress Ji should not have been able to see his face. How could she have recognised him with one look?
江逸一拱手，压低声音说道：“我想卖几枚丹药，你们这收吗？”
Jiang Yi cupped his hands in greeting and, lowering his voice, said, "I wish to sell some elixirs. Do you accept them here?"
江逸一直清楚，他和江如虎必有一战，这么多年来的恩怨他必须找江如虎清算一下。只要有机会江如虎也会主动找他，维护他在江家二等子弟中老大的权威。

Jiang Yi was always clearly aware that Jiang Ruhu and himself would have a decisive battle one day. He had to find and settle accounts with Jiang Ruhu after all those years of torment and grievances. Once there was a opportunity, Jiang Ruhu would likewise take the initiative to find him, to defend his status and authority as the head amongst the second-tier descendants of the Jiang Clan.
江逸一眼锁定走在最前面锦衣少年，眸子内露出一抹黯然，这个人当年和他一样是上天宠爱的孩子，是江家年轻一代中的翘楚。十年过去了，这人依旧是江家年轻一代的翘楚，还成为了名动天羽城的天才少年，备受瞩目，而他却沦落到这炼丹房做杂活……

Jiang Yi locked his eyes on the well-dressed youth walking in front, his pupils revealing a look of sadness. This person was like Jiang Yi in the past, a boy well-doted on by the heavens, a person of outstanding talent within the young generation of the Jiang Clan.
This person not only maintained his position as a person of outstanding talent within the young generation of the Jiang Clan, he had even become a genius youth. His renown was great enough to shock the entire Skyplume City, and he received the admirable attention of everyone. In contrast, Jiang Yi had fallen to being stuck doing odd jobs at the alchemy lab...
江逸一走出雅阁，竟发现无数目光锁定了他，还有一些公子都露出嫉妒仇恨之色。他不知道是因为姬听雨的关系，有些头皮发麻，低下头紧了紧笼罩脑袋的斗篷快步走出聚珍阁，消失在外面的茫茫人海中……

As Jiang Yi walked out of the elegant booth, he realised that there were countless gazes locked onto him, and that there were even some gentlemen who were giving him looks of envy and hatred. He was unsure if it was because of Ji Tingyu. As such, feeling goosebumps on his head, he bent his head downwards, tightened the cloak that enveloped around his head and, with a quick pace, walked out of the Pearl Gathering Pavilion. He disappeared into the sea of people outside...
江逸一边清点一边朝前方走去，当走过三块药田时，忽然察觉到前方传来一阵轻微的响声。他举目一望，竟看到远处一个杂草丛内有一个鬼鬼祟祟的身影。

Jiang Yi walked forward as he continued his counting task. When he walked past the third field, he heard a soft noise coming from in front of him. He looked up and spotted a suspicious silhouette hiding in the weeds in a far corner.
江逸一边狂奔一边喃喃起来，远远看着自家小院，他脸上很快愁云密布，武殿内绝对不能带人进去，三个月他怎么放心让江小奴这个笨丫头独自在家？

Jiang Yi murmured to himself as he was sprinting. Looking at the little yard of his house, his face soon clouded with worry: it was absolutely forbidden to bring anyone else into the Martial Arts Hall, but how could he feel assured, leaving a silly girl such as Xiaonu alone at home for three months?
江逸一阵头大，感情他不去翊家，这翊凌雪就带着家族子弟来这找他陪练了。只是他能怎么办？只能苦涩的点头。

Jiang Yi could feel a headache coming. So this was how things went - now that he refused to join the Yi Family, Yi Lingxue was bringing descendants over to spar with him. What else could he do besides nodding his consent with a pained look?
江逸一阵头大，经过刚才这事，他内心更加渴望拥有强大的实力，这样才不会被欺负，不会被凌辱。
Jiang Yi was arrogant for a moment. After the events just now, he desired even more in his heart to own more powerful abilities, so that he would no longer be bullied and humiliated.
江逸一阵头疼，目前只能走一步看一步了，至于小胖子会不会把他卖了，这一点他不担心。要卖的话钱万贯也不会想方设法接近他了，直接去找江逆流更好一些。

Jiang Yi had much to worry about, but he knew that he could only proceed with caution from now on. At least he didn't have to worry least bit about Fatty selling him out. If Fatty had wanted to sell him out, he wouldn't have needed to rack his brains to get close to Jiang Yi. Approaching Jiang Yiliu would seem like an easier choice.
江逸不懂炼丹，生怕把差事给干砸了，连忙慌乱的运转元力，拼命注入丹炉内。而在慌乱之中，他不小心……把两缕黑色元力一起给运转出来，融合了蓝色元力内注入了丹炉。

Jiang Yi did not know how to refine elixirs and was naturally scared of ruining the task at hand. As such, he hurriedly and chaotically worked his essence force, using all his might to apply them on the elixir cauldron. In the haste, he accidentally... released two strands of black essence force, merging them with the blue essence force and applying them straight into the cauldron.
江逸不敢置信的望着自己的左手，回想起刚才诡异的一切，半响后才惊愕的喃喃道：“这明显不属于水系元力的黑色元力竟然和江水诀元力完美融合？而且融合后的威力竟然这么恐怖？我刚才那一下最少增加了两三倍力量……否则怎可能把江豹推飞出去那么远？”

Jiang Yi, in completely disbelief, stared at his own left hand and recalled all the weirdness that had just happened. It was a long time before he mumbled, “This black essence force is obviously not water attributed. But… how could it perfectly merge with the water essence force of the Jiang Water Art? And why is the power of the merged force so devastatingly powerful? That technique just now… my power must have increased at least two or three fold… otherwise how could I send Jiang Bao flying?”
江逸不明白这些，他短时间内学不会炼丹，丹房内的丹药他不敢动，唯有打这废丹的注意了。

Jiang Yi did not comprehend any of this. As he could not learn how to refine elixirs in a short time period, and as he did not dare to touch any of the elixirs in the alchemy lab, he had no choice but to make use if the useless elixirs.
江逸不甘心，又盘坐入定运转无名决，但小半个时辰之后，他无奈的睁开眼睛，丹田内的黑色元力一丝都没有增加！

Jiang Yi was discontent and once again sat cross-legged to meditate and operate the nameless technique. Yet one short hour later, he had no choice but to open his eyes—the black essence force in his dantian had not increased by a single strand!
江逸不退反进，气势汹汹，凭借刚才连续击伤两人之威竟把对方吓到了，那人身子畏缩的退后两步，脚步一踉跄，差点摔倒在地……

Jiang Yi surged forward in an aggressive, imposing manner. Relying on the power of consecutively attacking and injuring two persons alone, he had managed to shock his opponent. That person had flinched his body and retreated backward in two steps—yet as he did so, he stumbled and almost fell to the ground...
江逸中饭都没吃却丝毫不觉得饥饿，全神贯注的沉寂在修炼中。下午不断有公子小姐来寻找陪练对战，杨管事果然没有再叫江逸上场。

Despite not having eaten lunch, Jiang Yi did not feel hungry at all. Instead, his attention was fully focused on his power cultivation practice, which he was conducting alone. In the afternoon, there had been a continuous stream of young masters and young mistresses who came in search of sparring partners for combat training, yet as promised Manager Yang had indeed not called Jiang Yi out to fight.
江逸中饭都顾不上吃了，戴上斗篷朝武殿内走去。
Without caring to eat his lunch, Jiang Yi put on his robes and walked in the direction of the Martial Arts Hall.
江逸也不去追究他在看什么，顿了一下说道：“钱万贯，你能帮我传个消息给我大爷爷吗？”
Jiang Yi did not look further into what Fatty was reading and said after a short pause, "Qian Wanguan, can you help get this information out to my Great Grandfather?
江逸也准备走了，黑色元力只有一缕了，他再上场别说翊小姐这级别的武者，就算铸鼎境二重对手也只有被虐的份。他原本还天真的想着进来混个金牌陪练，赚钱还债，此刻看来这钱的确不好赚……

Jiang Yi was also ready to leave. With only one wisp of black essence force left, if he went up for combat again, to say nothing of high-ranking martial artists like Young Mistress Yi, even an opponent with a power level at the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm would be capable of abusing him. Initially he had naively thought of joining the Martial Arts Hall and pass off as a gold token-grade sparring partner to earn money and repay his debts. At the moment, it seemed like this money was indeed not easily earned...
江逸也很不幸，因为此刻他在武殿内又一个小姐点将了，而这个小姐身边跟着的两个公子脸色明显有些臭了……
In the same sense, Jiang Yi was also unlucky: he just got ordered by yet another young mistress, and those two young masters accompanying her were showing clear contempt...
江逸也有逆鳞，那就是……江小奴！
Jiang Yi had a reverse scale too, and it was… Jiang Xiaonu!
江逸人在半空，脸上神情却没有半丝慌乱，反而眼中含着莫名笑意，在身子离开江如虎两尺距离时候，他突然张开大嘴，一口鲜血狂喷而出，喷得江如虎满头满脸都是……

While Jiang Yi was flying in mid-air, his facial expressions did not reveal any strand of frantic confusion; rather, his eyes revealed a mysterious look of glee. Right when his body was just two-thirds of a metre away from Jiang Ruhu, he suddenly opened his mouth wide and spit out a mouth full of fresh blood, drenching Jiang Ruhu's head and face completely...
江逸从小到大很少流泪，除了大长老失踪那一夜他哭了，除了小时候江小奴被人打了他哭了，其外就算他被打得吐血，被打断骨头，被打得遍体鳞伤，甚至昏死过去他都没流泪，但此刻眼泪却如决堤的河水般，一发不可收。

Jiang Yi rarely cried throughout his life, except for the night when Grand Elder vanished and whenever Xiaonu was beaten up when they were little. Other times, even if he was beaten up so badly that he vomited blood, his bones broke, or basically beaten black and blue, even if he fainted and was on the verge of death, he never shed a tear. This time, however, the tears were flowing unstoppably like water through a broken dam.
江逸从怀中取出一片紫金叶子递给江小奴道：“这金叶子你拿着，我不在的这三个月你要好好照顾自己，你牢记一点——千万别出江家大院，风月楼表面虽然不会找麻烦，但你出去乱转难免会出事情，你在大院内没有人能伤害你的。要是有人问你我去哪了，你就说我外出三月，但不能说我去武殿做事了，知道吗？”

Jiang Yi gave a piece of purple gold leaf to Xiaonu and enjoined her, "Here, keep this gold leaf and take good care of yourself in the three months that I'm gone. Bear one thing in mind - under no circumstance are you to leave the Jiang Clan courtyard; Fengyue Brothel will not ostensibly come looking for trouble, but that can't be guaranteed if you wander out. As long as you are in this courtyard, no harm would come to you. Anyone asks my whereabouts, just tell them I'm going away for three months, but do not divulge that I'm working at the Martial Arts Hall, do you understand?" "
江逸从梦中猛然惊醒，却扯到伤口，痛嚎得整张脸顿时扭曲了，羸弱的身子不断抽动。
Jiang Yi abruptly woke up from his dream. He had accidentally opened his bodily injuries in the process and grimaced as his frail body struggled to endure yet another wave of agony.
江逸以前还惊疑，江恨水只比他大三个月，修炼速度为何能如此之快？都达到铸鼎境八重了。现在却释然了，江恨水天资本身就不错，丹药从不缺，没事还来这武殿闭闭关，有各种资源任意挥霍，修炼速度能慢吗？

Jiang Yi used to be very startled about how Jiang Henshui, despite being only older than him by just three months, could have a power cultivation speed that was so fast; and now his power level had already reached the eighth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. Jiang Yi felt relieved - after all, Jiang Henshui had a natural talent that was not too bad, had an abudance of elixirs to use and could even go into seclusion at this Martial Arts Hall when he had nothing to do. Likewise, considering how Jiang Yi now had all sorts of resources to consume at will, how could his own power cultivation speed be slow now?
江逸低头一看，看到自己穿着的破烂布鞋苦笑起来，这是江小奴为他缝制的，因为大半年没换，上面的三个补丁很是显眼。

Jiang Yi bent his head down to take a look and, upon seeing the worn-out tattered cloth shoes he was wearing, he started laughing bitterly. This pair of shoes was sewn for him by Jiang Xiaonu. As he had not procured new shoes in over half a year, there were three patches on his shoes which were very eye-catching.
江逸低头抱拳行礼，嘴角一阵苦涩，他这位落魄的旁系少爷还得给一个小管事行礼……

Jiang Yi lowered his head, cupped his fists together, and bowed deeply. He muttered to himself bitterly that it was inconceivable that a young master like him had fallen from grace so badly that he had to greet and bow to a small supervisor…
江逸低头沉吟起来，内心却还是惊疑不定，天上掉馅饼了？武者越到后面境界越难提升，需要的元力越多，除非武殿给予他足够的高级丹药，否则两个月内绝对无法提升到铸鼎境四重。花费如此巨资？只为让他留在这陪练？陪练时还薪水照付？天下怎么会有如此好的事情？

Jiang Yi lowered his head and started muttering to himself. He still felt much bewilderment and anxiety in his heart. How could it be that something so good could fall into his lap? Martial artists found it ever-increasingly difficult to increase their power levels the high stages in the Cast Tripod Realm they got to, requiring ever-more essence force to make the increament. Unless the Martial Arts Hall gave him enough high-quality elixirs, he would definitely not be able to increase his power levels up to the fourth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm within two months. On top of that, how could possibly be willing to send so much money on him? Did they truly want him to stay and just be a sparring partner? Did they claim to give him a salary without changes to normal rates given to other sparring partners? How could such a good thing exist in this world?
江逸低头沉默，内心却是苦笑连连，这个世界果然很残酷，如果不是因为自己黑色元力特殊，如果不是自己炼制的那几枚丹药，如果不是自己能很诡异的帮人武技大成，这姬听雨和翊凌雪恐怕看都不会看自己一眼吧？自己正因为有利用价值，她们才会放下身段主动和他交朋友吧？原本他还天真的以为，这两人是真的当他是朋友……

Jiang Yi bent his head wordlessly, although he was chuckling bitterly on the inside. The world was indeed cruel. If not for the special black essence force and the elixirs he made, or the fact that he could strangely help others' martial art techniques achieve phenomenal success, would Ji Tingyu and Yi Lingxue have spared him a second glance? They probably only stooped down to befriend him because he was of use to them. And to think he had so naively presumed they genuinely treated him like a friend...
江逸低着头咬着牙，一步步朝江如鹰走去，在离开他三尺时缓缓弯下身子，准备跪在地上朝江如鹰胯下爬过去……

With his head lowered and his teeth grit, Jiang Yi walked towards Jiang Ruying step by step. When he was just a metre away from Jiang Ruying, he slowly bent down his body as he got ready to squat on the ground and crawl in the direction of the area underneath Jiang Ruying's groin...
江逸低着头快速行走，很快走到了广场南边的一座气派恢弘的三层阁楼前。
With his head lowered, Jiang Yi walked speedily forward, quickly arriving at a vast imposing three-storey building at the south side of the city plaza.
江逸余光一直锁定江如虎，哪能让他溜走？当下脚上踏出奇诡的步法，速度陡然飙升轻松穿过人群，一只铁拳朝江如虎砸去。这是他第一次动用极神步，尽管很有可能被认出来，但他也顾不了那么多了……

Jiang Yi's sights were locked on Jiang Ruhu, how could he allow him to slip away? Using an odd footwork, Jiang Yi's speed increased as he traversed through the crowd and launched an iron first at Jiang Ruhu. This was his first time using the Extreme Divine Steps. He couldn't care whether was there any possibility of it being recognized.
江逸倒是没有去追，怎么说这里是江家大院，要是被刑堂知道了，他和江松两人都要责罚的。江家暗中纵容子弟们争斗，但表面上还是要维持一下族规的威严的。

On the other hand, Jiang Yi did not chase after him. After all, this was the central court. Should the disciplinary court find out about the fight, both Jiang Song and him would have to face punishment. The Jiang Clan tolerated in secret the fights occurring between their descendants, but on the surface, they still had to maintain the authority of the clan rules.
江逸倒是没觉得什么，它本身就境界低，他不仅不沮丧反而无比期待，等他境界不断提升，提升到铸鼎境四重五重，他的综合战力该有多强大？

Jiang Yi on the other hand did not find this that big of a deal. His power level was originally already at a low Cast Tripod Realm stage. Not only was he not dejected about it, rather he looked forward incomparably towards the future. He wondered how powerful his combined combat ability would be, once his power-level had continuously increased such that it expands to being the fourth or even fifth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm.
江逸偷偷缩回脑袋，暗暗沉吟起来，但这一刻，房间内那柳长老却突然爆喝起来：“江松，你在外面鬼鬼祟祟干什么？还不快滚进来回火？废物一个，天天就知道偷懒。”

Jiang Yi muttered to himself, lowering his head.
However, at that moment, Elder Liu suddenly shouted from inside the room, "Jiang Song, what are you doing suspiciously standing outside? Faster! Get in here and temper the flames! Useless boy, all you know how to do is to laze around all day."
江逸傻愣愣地看着痛得在地上打滚的江豹，一时半会两个人都没法接受眼前的结果。
Jiang Yi stared blankly at Jiang Bao rolling around on the ground in pain, and for a short while both of them could not comprehend what just happened.
江逸元力疯狂运转，身子一闪已经到了此人面前，闪电般的抬手一巴掌，在对方还没反应之前扫在他脸上，那人立即倒飞出去数丈，重重的砸在地面。

Jiang Yi's essence force frenziedly circulated, Jiang Yi flashed right in front of the one who scolded him and gave him a lightning quick slap before he could even react. The collateral descendant flew back by several meters and crashed onto the ground.
江逸内心长叹一声，抬起头望着姬听雨道：“姬小姐，恐怕要让你失望了，那种丹药你再也看不到了，否则我也不会来这做陪练了，那位炼丹师……死了。”

Jiang Yi heaved a long sigh internally and looked up at Ji Tingyu, "Young Mistress Ji, I'm afraid I'll have to let you down. You will never be able to see those elixirs again, or I would have come here to work as a sparring partner otherwise. You see, that alchemist... had died."
江逸内视了一遍，生怕药力消耗过快，不敢过多的停留，开始转而提炼黑色元力。这一提炼他就感觉不同了，在这灵神丹的增幅下，他提炼黑色元力的速度也增快了三倍，仅仅只是大半个时辰，就提炼出六缕了。

Using his inner vision and observing the conditions in his body, and scared that the medical efficacy would run out too quickly, Jiang Yi did not dare to stay working on the same activity for too long. Instead, he changed his actions and started extracting more black essence force. He felt that his extraction experience this time was different. With the increase in power brought by that Spirit Pill, the speed at which he extracted black essence force had also increased by three times - in just an hour's time, he managed to extract six wisps.
江逸再次苦涩一笑，江恨水果然不愧是天之骄子，闭个关都要去武殿？只比他大三个月，却要冲击铸鼎境九重了。如此年纪，能达到铸鼎境八重的天才，整个天羽城不超过五人吧？

Jiang Yi smiled bitterly once again. Jiang Henshui undoubtedly deserved to be the pride of the heavens. His choice of location for seclusion was, of all places, the prestigious martial arts hall?
Furthermore, he was only three months older than Jiang Yi, yet he was already going to hit the ninth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. The number of geniuses who, at such a young age, were already at the eighth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm numbered not more than five in the entire Skyplume City.
江逸冷哼一声，手却不松开，那胖掌柜面色一变，连忙尴尬笑道：“看来客官是熟客了，得……一共收你九十两银子。”

Jiang Yi snorted coldly and refused to release his grip.
The plump shopkeeper's facial expression changed. He gave a forced, awkward laugh. "Looks like my dear customer is indeed a regular. How about... ninety taels of silver?"
江逸冷笑一声，也不退开躲避，反手抓起江如虎剩下的一条好腿，将他臃肿的身子就这样抡了起来朝众人横扫而去。

Jiang Yi gave a burst of cold laughter. Not only did he not retreat to avoid the incoming assault, he instead used his hand to grab Jiang Ruhu's remaining unbroken leg, swinging swinging Jiang Ruhu's obese body around in a sweeping motion in the direction of the incoming group of opponents.
江逸刚准备讪讪的走出去，听到这长老的话立即一怔，连忙摆手摇头道：“不行啊，柳长老，我不懂炼丹啊，我不行的……”

Jiang Yi was just ready to leave in shame, but upon hearing the elder's orders he was immediately stumped for words. He hurriedly gestured his hands and shook his head in the negative, replying, "No way, Elder Liu, I don't know how to refine elixirs. I can't do it..."
江逸刚刚修炼了一会就被打断，此刻又被带到这样一个小房间内，还好这里面坐着的是杨管事，让他微微心安。

Jiang Yi had just started cultivation practice for a while before he was interrupted. At the moment, being brought into a small room like that, and seeing that the person sitting in the room was none other than Manager Yang, he managed to feel slightly more calm.
江逸刚刚出现在练功房大殿内，一群人目光立即扫了过来，那杨管事一张满是褶皱的老脸笑开了花，老远就叫道：“苍狼，你可来了！怎么样？留下陪练一下午吧？我按一天的工钱算你的，十两银子如何？”

Just as Jiang Yi walked into the large hall of the Technique Practising Room, the glances of a big group of people immediately swept over to look at him. Manager Yang, his old face filled with wrinkles, smiled brightly and called Jiang Yi from afar, saying, "Lone Wolf, you're finally here! How about it? Are you staying to be a sparring partner for a whole afternoon? I'll pay you a whole day's work worth of wages - so how does ten taels of silver sound?"
江逸刚刚在大殿内盘坐下来，走廊内很快响起一阵急迫的脚步声，一道火红色的身影出现，一双大眼睛一眼就锁定江逸，兴奋的说道：“杨管事，我要和那个苍狼陪练对战。”

Jiang Yi had just started sitting cross-legged in the large hall, when the sound of urgent footsteps came ringing from the corridor. A fiery red figure appeared. Her pair of large eyes locking onto Jiang Yi with just one look, the figure excitedly said, "Manager Yang, I want that Lone Wolf to join me in sparring practice."
江逸刚刚想走，那杨管事立即就拦住了他，江逸一愣连忙一边解下面具，一边说道：“管事，这陪练我不干了，钱我也不要了，这面具还给你吧。”

Just as, Jiang Yi was just thinking of leaving, Manager Yang immediately stopped him. Distracted, Jiang Yi hurriedly removed his mask and at the same time said, "Manager, I quit this sparring partnership position, I don't want the money either. Let me return this mask to you."
江逸刚刚背着小奴冲到门口，后院前门四道身影飙射而出，瞬间就把屋子给围了起来，一名管事模样的男子跟着冲出来，老远就尖叫起来：“哼！敢在风雨楼闹事，小野种，你这是想死了不成？给我打！”

just when Jiang Yi reached the door with Xiaonu on his back, four figures appeared in front of the backyard's door, surrounding them in an instant. A man who looked like a housekeeper rushed out.
"Hmph!” he shouted. “How dare you make trouble in Fengyue Brothel? Little bastard, you wanna die? Beat him up!"
江逸刚刚长吁叹了口气，突然脸色一变，表情仿佛见了鬼似的。
Jiang Yi had just heaved a sigh of relief when all the color in his face drained, as though he had just seen a ghost.
江逸刚才在条件反射下使用的武技是人阶中品的“摔碑手”，尽管他从小悟性惊人，这招异常难练的摔碑手被他练的炉火纯青，运劲的巧妙曾让大长老也捋须微笑。

The spontaneous stroke that Jiang Yi delivered was just the Man-tier, medial-grade Wrestling Hand. Jiang Yi had practiced this unusual and difficult Wrestling Hand to perfection. The Grand Elder had once stroked his beard with a smile upon seeing him use it in such a deft manner.
江逸刚走进来，大门就自动关闭了，他举目一望，看到这练功房还算宽敞，四周都悬挂着夜明珠，倒是对练的好地方。

It was not long after Jiang Yi had entered the room that the door automatically sealed shut. He raised his head and looked around, seeing that that room was relatively spacious, with night pearls suspended all around the four corners of the room. This was actually a pretty good place for training.
江逸努力抑制住自己不要情绪化地发笑，再次运转最后的一丝黑色元力朝右眼角附近的穴脉内涌去。
Stifling a laugh, Jiang Yi once again transferred the final sliver of black essence force to the corner of his right eye's Zhanzhu acupuncture point.
江逸单手接过杨管事丢过来的瓷瓶，打开瓶塞一看，见里面竟是三枚灵神丹。暗道武殿果然财大气粗，连忙拱手道谢朝外面走去，在门口时他突然想起什么，回头问道：“管事……如果五年未满，我不干了，或者我有事要暂时离开，那该如何？”

With a single hand, Jiang Yi received the porcelain bottle Manager Yang had threw over to him. Lifting the bottle lid and taking a look, he saw that there were actually three Spirit Pills inside. He muttered to himself about how the Martial Arts Hall was indeed a rich and imposing organisation. He promptly cupped his hands and thanked Manager Yang, as he walked towards the exterior of the room. At the door, he suddenly thought of something - which made him turn his head to ask, "Manager... if it has not been five years and I decide to quit, or if something happens to me and I need to leave temporarily, what happens then?"
江逸却苦笑摇头道：“拿错了，你这笨丫头，我受的是内伤，去把家族赐予的那枚疗伤丹药拿来，这药膏放下吧，迟些你在伤口上敷着。”

However, Jiang Yi shook his head and said with a bitter smile, "You've taken the wrong one, you silly girl. I have internal injuries, so give me the injury-healing elixir bestowed by the family. Leave this ointment behind; you can apply it on your own injuries later."
江逸压制内心的喜悦，排除杂念盘坐在地打坐起来。他准备修炼一个半时辰无名功法，再转修江水决恢复蓝色元力，等天快黑了就带着《药草简录》回去彻夜翻读，他现在可指望在炼丹房长久干下去，柳长老交代的事情不敢怠慢，否则昨天的江松就是他的下场……

Jiang Yi suppressed the elation in his heart as he tried to remove any miscellaneous thoughts, before sitting cross-legged and starting to meditate. He was ready to practice that nameless cultivation technique for three hours, before switching to practice the Jiang Water Art to recover some blue essence force, and then bring the book "Record on Medicinal Herbs" back home when the sky turned dark to read through it all night long.
He hoped to continue working long-term at the Alchemy Lab—which meant he did not dare to be slow in obeying Elder Liu's instructions, otherwise his fate would be the same as Jiang Song's...
江逸原本就没想过把事情闹大，让家族全部人获悉他实力突飞猛进的事情，他是故意“提醒”江如虎，此事不要传扬出去的。

Jiang yi originally had no desire to make a big fuss out of the entire event and thereby allow everyone in the Family to find out about the circumstance of his power improving by leaps and bounds. He had deliberately "reminded" Jiang Ruhu not to widely spread this specific circumstance.
江逸双手如两根海藻般分别朝两人缠去，轻松把慌乱之中的两人手臂缠住，身子朝旁边一转，双手顺势拉着两人朝前方冲去，单腿如毒蛇般朝两人双腿扫去。

Jiang Yi's hands individually aimed to entagle each of the two opponents like two strands of seaweed, easily entangling both persons' arms amidst the confusion. As his body turned to his side and started rushing forward, both of his hands took advantage of the situation and pulled his two opponents into the same direction as he did, while one of his legs swept across to both their legs like a poisonous snake.
江逸反反复复将那些黑色小字默念了好几遍，感觉这份口诀迥然不同于他小时候尝试的众多修炼元力的功法，很是奇异。但心中好奇想要尝试的念头一旦生出，就如同燎原的野火般，再也无法熄灭。

As Jiang Yi repeatedly mouthed those tiny black words again and again, he could feel that this formula was vastly different compared to the multitude of cultivation techniques he tried when he was younger to boost his essence force. It was definitely bizarre. Nonetheless, once that curiosity to experiment and try was borne in his heart, that desire exploded like a wildfire and was unable to ever be extinguished!
江逸取出怀中的小瓷瓶递了过去，那管事倒出一枚，仔细观看一会又闻了闻，最后皱着眉头道：“你这丹药，我从没看过，所以无法鉴定，请稍等，我去请我们聚珍阁的炼丹师鉴定下。”

Jiang Yi took out the porcelain bottle from his chest pockets and handed it over. The housekeeper poured a pill out of the bottle, inspecting it carefully for a moment and even took a sniff of it. Finally, he gave a frown and said, "Your elixir, I've never seen it before, so I have no way to appraise it. Please wait, I shall invite our alchemist working at the Pearl Gathering Pavilion to appraise it."
江逸另外一只拳头长驱而入，重重一拳砸在马飞的面门上，打得他鼻血直喷，身子后仰差点摔倒。此刻江逸的身子也落地了，单手一探抓起落地的匕首，闪电般的架在马飞的脖子上，冷喝道：“不想你家少爷死，全部住手！”

Jiang Yi's other fist burst straight forth and smashed hard against Ma Fei's face, causing blood to sprout out of his nose profusely and knocking him backwards. Jiang Yi, who had landed on the ground in the meantime, grabbed the fallen short sword and held it against Ma Fei's neck in one lightning-quick move. He demanded coldly, "All of you stop right now if you don't want your young master to die!"
江逸只是观摩了一上午，并不是太懂，感应到丹炉内内热气腾腾，那两枚废丹在吸收蓝色元力，立即运转出一缕黑色元力注入丹炉内。

Jiang Yi had only observed for a single morning and as such, was not very familiar with the refining methods. Sensing that the interior of the cauldron had become piping hot, and that the two useless elixirs were absorbing his blue essence force, he immediately circulated a wisp of black essence force and injected it into the cauldron.
江逸可不敢随便找地方出售丹药，万一被人起疑心贪心就麻烦了。整个天羽城都是姬家的，聚珍阁内什么宝物没见过？自然也不会来坑他这等小人物了。

Jiang Yi did not dare to randomly choose a location to sell his elixirs, for in the event that he aroused suspicion and greed in others, he would surely be in trouble. The entire Skyplume City belonged to the Ji Family - what types of treasures had the Pearl Gathering Pavilion not encountered before? Naturally, they would not cheat a small fry like him either.
江逸可没犯糊涂，这风月楼既然能成为东城最大的青楼，背后会被没有大势力支持？刚才他冲进来的时候，可是隐约看到内堂角落内有几名护卫守卫，这要是被围上了就麻烦了……

Jiang Yi was no fool. For Fengyue Brothel to become the biggest brothel in East City, how could it not have a major faction backing it? When he rushed in earlier, he had caught a glimpse of a few sentries and guards in the inner hall. It would be a problem if they got surrounded…
江逸吐出嘴里的一丝淤血，在半空中强行控制身形，单拳元力流转，朝江如虎的脑袋砸去。营造出如此好的机会，他还不知道抓住的话就是白痴了。

Jiang Yi spit out a thread of clotted blood from his mouth and forcefully controlled his body figure whilst in mid air. Circulating essence force on one of his fists, he smashed that fist towards the direction of the top of Jiang Ruhu's head. Having established such as good opportunity to strike, he would be an idiot if he did not fathom to grasp it.
江逸听到消息后，浑身轻松下来，他知道最少在江如龙没从武殿出来之前，他是安全的。他可以从容的修炼，不断破解封印，争取在短时间内提高境界。

Upon hearing the news, Jiang Yi felt more relaxes and less tense throughout his body. He knew that, at the very least, he would be safe before Jiang Rulong returned from the Martial Arts Hall. He could unhurriedly cultivate his power and continously break his seal, and in turn achieve the largest increase in his power-level stages in the Cast Tripod Realm in the shortest amount of time.
江逸听到这里脑袋如炸起一道雷霆般，他闭上了眼睛，脑袋内都是江云海曾经说过的话语。
When Jiang Yi heard this part, something ticked inside his brain and when he closed his eyes, his entire mind was filled with whatever Jiang Yunhai used to tell him.
江逸听着钱万贯的话，一句话没说但脸色阴沉的可怕，眸子内光芒闪烁，也不知道他在想些什么。
After listening to Qian Wanguan, he kept quiet, but his face blackened like a frightening storm and rays flashed in his eyes several times. He must be thinking of something.
江逸听闻背后的风声猛然回头一望，顿时大怒。当年他悟性惊人，在江家地位尊荣，所以看过很多江家武技，江松此刻使出来的武技他一眼就能认出。

Jiang Yi heard the sound of a breeze coming from his back and abruptly took a look back. He flew into a rage at that instant. All those years ago, when his position in the Jiang Clan was well-respected due to his astonishingly high talent, he had seen many martial art techniques practiced by the Jiang Clan. Thus he could recognize with one look the technique used by Jiang Song at that instant.
江逸呆呆地看着眼前格外清晰的一切，连墙角那只蜘蛛腿上有毛他都能看得清清楚楚，而且似乎……那蜘蛛爬走的动作慢得吓人，就像慢动作一般。

Jiang Yi stared at the clear and distinct surroundings in a daze. He could clearly see the hairs on the legs of the spider on the wall. Moreover, the spider's movement was scarily slow, like a slow-motion picture.
江逸咬牙沉喝一声，大步朝江如鹰走去，脸上都是气愤和屈辱之色，身子都气得不断颤抖起来。不过他身上没有半点运行元力的迹象，步履也踉跄，看起来没有一丝想反抗的意思。

Jiang Yi gritted his teeth and shouted loudly as he strode with wide paces towards Jiang Ruying. His entire face revealed expressions of indignation and humiliation, as his body trembled uncontrollably from his intense rage. However, he did not show any indication that he would operate with essence force on his body; he was also staggering forward and stumbling as he walked. It looked as though he did not have a shred of desire to resist.
江逸咽了口唾沫，他实力大涨没错，他有黑色元力没错，但对方如此多人怎么打？而且这群人中除了江如虎铸鼎境四重外，还有五六个铸鼎境三重……

Jiang Yi swallowed a gulp of saliva. It was true that his powers had greatly increased, and it was also true that he had black essence force, but how could he fight an opposing party with so many people. On top of that, in addition to Jiang Ruhu with his power level at the fourth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, this group of people had five or six others whose power was at the third stage of the Cast Tripod Realm...
江逸哑口无言，主要是被对方那句去江家刑堂说理吓到了，他深深的吸了一口气，暗暗平复内心的狂暴心情，脑海飞快运转，想着办法。

Jiang Yi was dumbfounded, shaken by the fact that the other party was going to report to the Jiang Clan Disciplinary Court. Taking a deep breath, he silently calmed his frantic heart. His mind racing, he tried to think of a way out.
江逸哪有心情和这老鸨废话，抽了抽鼻子，强忍着里面令人作呕的胭脂水粉味，目光一扫看到有道门直通后院，拔腿就狂奔而去。

Jiang Yi was in no mood to waste his time with the old mamasan. He sniffled and tolerated the smell of cheap perfume and rouge. His eyes focused on the door that led to the backyard. He darted straight for it.
江逸嘲弄的笑声传来，身子如一阵风在人群中穿过，凡是和他碰触的子弟轻松被扫飞出去，江顾水看到一个个人飞了出来，满脸都是不敢置信，这个被封印废物什么时候这么彪悍了。

The sneering laughter of Jiang Yi echoed as he passed through the crowd like a breeze. Any of the members that got in contact with Jiang Yi were simply swept aside. Seeing everyone got sent flying by Jiang Yi, Jiang Gushui gave a look of disbelief. When did this sealed trash became this valiant?
江逸嘴角一抽，感情在这炼丹房做事还有这福利？当下立即一拱手也不敢打扰柳长老了，走出偏厅回到内堂，看到另外一边还有两个房间，两个都大门关闭的。

Jiang Yi's mouth twitched as he could not believe that working at the alchemy lab could have such benefits. Not daring to disturb Elder Liu any further, he immediately cupped his hands, before walking back out of the side room to the inner court. He spotted two rooms on the other side, both of them having their doors closed.
江逸嘴角都是嘲弄，轮着江如虎不断朝江如龙砸去，江如虎整个人怕是有一百五六十斤，但在他手里真的和一个麻袋没区别，抡起来顺手的很，虎虎生风……

Jiang Yi sneered and swung Jiang Ruhu at Jiang Rulong. Jiang Ruhu who was about 78 kilograms was swung around in the hands of Jiang Yi not different from a sack. He whirled Jiang Ruhu with ease and wielded with prowess...
江逸回到自家小院后，已是正午时分了，想着明日一早就要上西山，他匆忙吃了一口饭，就钻进房间内修炼，准备冲击铸鼎境二重。

It was already noon by the time Jiang Yi returned to the small courtyard of his own home. Thinking about how he had to head up the Western Hills the next morning, he hurriedly swallowed down a mouthful of rice before holing himself up in his room and cultivated his power, readying himself to hit the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm.
江逸回头一瞪，冷面训斥几句。脑海内却是一转，回想起刚才一进来听到小奴的哭喊声，虽然他不知道当时具体发生了什么事情，但也猜到了几分。

Jiang Yi turned around and stared, sternly reprimanding Xiaonu. His mind, however, was still racing. Thinking back about how he had heard the sound of Xiaonu crying when he first entered the building earlier, though he did not know at the time the specific details of what exactly happened, he was still able to guess the gist of it.
江逸回道：“柳长老，我叫江逸。”
Jiang Yi replied, "Elder Liu, I am Jiang Yi."
江逸在得知这事后，第一想法就是完了。这个告示一出，尽管每一场价格高达了百两紫金，但肯定会有无数公子小姐找他对战的，大家族顶级公子小姐可从不缺钱。而他所学的武技全是江家的成名武技，只要对战几场，是个明眼人都能看出他是江家的子弟，他的身份很快就会曝光，不说马家会不会想方设法干掉他，就算这事传回江家也会极其麻烦的，说不定会被重罚……

After finding out about that affair, Jiang Yi's first thought was his impending doom. Once the announcement was spread, even though the price-tag on every sparring match was now up to one hundred taels of purple gold, there would definitely still be an uncountable number of young masters and young mistresses who would seek him for sparring practice. After all, the top-grade young masters and young mistresses of the Big Families were never short on money. Additionally, the martial arts techniques that he had learnt were all famous techniques developed by the Jiang Clan. Anyone who had functioning eyesight could instantly tell tell he was a descendant of the Jiang Clan, after just sparring with him for a few matches. His identity would be instantly revealed. To say nothing of whether the Ma Family would find some way of getting rid of him - even if this affair spread to the Jiang Clan, he would be in great big trouble, and might even have to face severe punishment...
江逸在江家没人待见他，他也很少外人交谈，所以对于这些八卦一点都不了解，此刻倒是暗暗点头。江家有两人上榜，那姬听雨也在榜内，这几人实力的确变态，江恨水和姬听雨都是铸鼎境八重的强者，只要再突破一重，就可以冲击紫府境了。

Jiang Yi, who was not favored by the Jiang Clan, nor did he frequently engage in conversations with outsiders, was unaware of such stories around town, though he was silently nodding now at Yi Lingxue's words. There were two members from the Jiang Clan, as well as Ji Tingyu on that list. They were indeed obscenely powerful - both Jiang Henshui and Ji Tingyu were formidable martial artists whose powers were at the eighth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. They only needed to attain one more breakthrough to reach the Purple Mansion Realm.
江逸在西山清点花费了两个时辰，回家研究了黑色元力几个时辰，一心沉浸在黑色元力神奇的能力中都忘记了时间，否则早就会起疑小奴这么迟还没回来的……

Jiang Yi had spent four hours taking stock at the Western Hills before spending another few hours studying the black essence force at home. He was engrossed in the miraculous effects of the black essence force that he lost his sense of time. If not, he would have long turned suspicious over Xiaonu's late return…
江逸在这一刻无比诡异的没有躲避，身子依旧朝前方冲去，那铸鼎境三重武者轻松击中了他后背，一股巨力从后背涌来，他身子瞬间飞了起来。

At that moment, Jiang Yi had incomparably mysteriously chosen not to avoid the incoming attack, but rather continue rushing forward like before. The martial artist with a power level at the third stage of the Cast Tripod Realm easily hit his back. As a wave of great power rushed from behind him, his body flew up into the air in an instant.
江逸坐在地上，思考了很久，最终决定随便试试，反正这废丹也不值钱，黑色元力消耗完了也可以再练。

Jiang Yi sat on the floor and reflected for a long while, before finally deciding to just randomly experiment. Besides, those useless pills were not worth anything; on top of that, should he deplete all of his black essence force he could always refine more.
江逸大喜，也不管那么多了，连忙一边快速后退，一边控制黑色元力朝左眼涌去。很快他眼中一道黑光一闪而逝，对面暴雨般破空而来的拳头顿时变得清晰而又缓慢起来。

Jiang Yi experienced great joy. Not caring too much any further, he hurriedly took action. He quickly retreated backward and controlled his black essence force, transferring its flow towards his left eye.
It was not long before a black flash flashed past his eye and the fists of the opposing party, flying through the air like a thunderstorm, suddenly became crystal clear and appeared to slow down.
江逸大喝一声，手中元力灌注，手上黑呼呼的东西顷刻间碎成粉末，他抬手猛然一扬朝前方的刘管事和马公子以及两名护卫撒去。

With a great shout, Jiang Yi infused his hands with essence force, instantly shattering the black substance into powder. Abruptly, he lifted his hand and scattered the powder at Housekeeper Liu, Young Master Ma, and the two guards in front.
江逸大笑起来，笑声中尽是凄凉，他重新摇摇晃晃地返回床上躺下，脑袋越来越痛，仿佛下一瞬间就要爆炸一般，不一会他就再度沉沉睡去，连锅里的晚饭都没吃。

Jiang Yi chuckled loudly, but his laughter rang hollow. He once again staggered off the table and lay down on his bed. His head throbbed with ever greater intensity, as though it would explode in the next moment. Yet he was deep in slumber within moments, without having eaten the dinner left for him in the pot.
江逸头疼了，他有个屁的值钱东西啊？把江小奴留下？这一个月怕是不知道被他们糟蹋成什么样子了。他眸子一转，伸手在怀中取出一块令牌丢了过去：“这个抵押！一个月后我来赎回。”

Jiang Yi's head ached. Did he own anything that was worth even a penny? Leave Jiang Xiaonu behind? Who knows how badly she would be abused by them this entire month... He moved his pupils as he retrieved a command token from the chest area of his robes, throwing it towards the Chief Supervisor and saying, "Use this as collateral! I will redeem it back in a month's time!"
江逸头疼了，这翊凌雪还真的准备让家族子弟排队找他对练了。到了此刻他依旧很是怀疑，他真的能帮别人武技大成？如此邪门诡异的事情，怕是传出去整个天羽城都没人相信吧？

Jiang Yi's headache came back in full force. It seemed that Yi Lingxue truly intended to have her family clan's descendants lined up for sparring matches with him. Jiang Yi, however, was still doubtful of his ability - could he really help others to achieve phenomenal success? Would anyone in Skyplume City believe in something so bizarre if word were to get out?
江逸头都没抬，依旧拱手俯首，再次沉喝道：“那请长老成全！江逸情愿死在你手里，也绝不愿去刑堂……冤死！”

Jiang Yi didn't even lift his head and submissively lowered his head and spoke out again, "I beg for Elder to accept my request! Jiang Yi is willing to die in your hands but absolutely unwilling to go the Disciplinary Court and... die of persecution!"
江逸好奇的接过面具，暗道正好可以不用戴斗篷了，连忙把青铜面具戴上用绳带绑好。心里却想着这陪练要戴上野兽面具，该不会是为了激发那群公子小姐的斗志，好把他们当做野兽般痛殴？

Jiang Yi received the mask with much curiosity. He muttered to himself that, by sheer coincidence, he need not wear the cloak any longer.
He hurriedly put on the bronze mask and tied it onto his face with the attached string. In his heart, however, he was thinking that needing sparring partners to put on beast-shaped masks was somewhat strange.
Surely it was not to trigger the fighting spirit in the group of young masters and mistresses? With the masks, it was likely they would treat their sparring partners like mere beasts and ferociously beat them up!
江逸如此恐怖的视力，江如虎能踢中他？而且他随时可以控制江如龙身体让他失去重心，江如龙又怎么能摆脱他的控制？他幽幽一叹，对于江如龙的战力有些失望，他都没用黑色元力增幅力量，只是凭借小小的计谋就轻松战胜了他，都没让他战个痛快……

With his exceptional awareness and vision, how would Jiang Rulong be able to hit him? The fact that Jiang Yi could simply control Jiang Rulong body to make him lose his center of gravity, how would Jiang Rulong be able to escape from his grasp? Letting out a subtle sigh, Jiang Yi was rather disappointed in Jiang Rulong's combat strength. He hadn’t even used the black essence forces to enhance his own strength. He merely used some tactics to easily defeat Jiang Rulong and he wasn't even able to have a satisfied battle...
