He was lucky he was able to rectify the error before he suffered from deviated Qi. Nonetheless, he was distracted by the black script in his mind that kept swaying and moving about in front of his vision. It left him unable to calm down.
江逸虽然元力不足，但对于武技的掌控却是异常纯熟，既然下了决心要收拾对方，怎容江豹躲避？便将蛇鞭腿淋漓尽致地发挥出来，两条长腿便如毒蛇附骨一般，一次次扫在江豹的后背上。

Jiang Yi had little essence force, but he was highly skilled at utilizing various techniques. Since he had already made up his mind to get rid of him, how could he let Jiang Bao escape? Jiang Yi pushed the Snake Whip Leg to its full potential, and his legs shot out like two ferocious snakes, sweeping across Jiang Bao's back, again and again.
江逸被吓到了，连忙站了起来，摇头道：“不是，不是！我只是帮别人来卖丹的…”
Jiang Yi was taken aback. He hurriedly stood up and, shaking his head, he answered, "No, no! I am just selling the elixir on someone else's behalf..."
江逸被震住了，低头沉吟不语，去翊家肯定不可能的，不说他和武殿有协议，就算给江家知道了他也难逃一死，这可是叛族啊。

Jiang Yi was in awe. He mulled with his head lowered. Joining the Yi Family was out of the question; to say nothing of the agreement he had with the Martial Arts Hall, death would be an inevitable end if the Jiang Clan found out, it was an act of treachery against the family clan after all.
江逸要的就是这种效果！
That outcome was exactly what Jiang Yi wanted!
江逸见姬听雨不说话盯着他直看，一双漂亮的丹凤眼内都是迷蒙之色，又尴尬起来随口说道：“姬小姐，既然你找我陪练，那就打一场吧，不过还望手下留情哦。”

Seeing Ji Tingyu continuously stare at him in silence, with her pair of pretty phoenix eyes giving off a misty look, he felt awkward once again and as such quickly opened his mouth to say, "Young Mistress Ji, since you came searching for me for a practice match, how about we spar against each other in a match now? I hope that you please be merciful to me."
江逸讪讪摸了摸头，他要是还手的话，这翊小姐元力被封印怕是一招就要被他撂倒了，不过此刻他能说什么？只能点了点头道：“好！”

Embarrassed, Jiang Yi scratched his head. If he retaliated against her moves, with her essence forces sealed off, he was afraid that with a single move he would knock her down. However, what else could he say at that moment? He had no choice but to nod and reply, "Alright!"
江逸讪讪的摸了摸鼻子，走了出来，一拱手道：“江逸拜见柳长老，我……不是江松，我是来领丹药的。”

Jiang Yi awkwardly scratched his nose, walked out from where he was hiding, and cupped his hands as he greeted, "Greetings, Elder Liu. I... am not Jiang Song. I, Jiang Yi, am here to retrieve elixirs."
江逸讪讪的站立，回了一句：“我不躲避，难道站着给你打？陪练又不是给人出气挨揍的……”
Jiang Yi stood still abashedly and retorted, "Should I not have dodged and let you hit me? Sparring partners are not punching bags for people to vent their anger on..."
江逸讪讪的笑了笑，也不用这黑甲护卫带路了，径直进了武殿朝练功房那边走去。
Jiang Yi smiled, embarrassed. Not needing this guard clad in black armour to lead the way, he directly walked into the Martial Arts Hall and went straight towards the Technique Practising Room.
江逸走后一柱香时间，练功房走廊内一道火红色身影就风风火火冲了过来，一走到大殿内立即在所有陪练脸上的面具上扫了一圈，很是急迫的问道：“杨管事，刚才和我对练的那个金牌陪练呢？”

Five minutes after Jiang Yi left, a fiery-red figure rushed over energetically through the corridor of the technique practising rooms. Upon walking into the central hall, the person immediately gazed around at the masks worn by all the sparring partners before, with much urgency, asking, "Manager Yang, where is that gold token-grade sparring partner whom I was practising with just now?"
江逸越想越心动，实在不行也是被人揍一顿而已，沉吟了一阵，他咬牙朝武殿侧门走去，对着两名黑甲护卫拱手道：“我报名陪练！”

The more Jiang Yi thought about it, the more tempted he felt. Even if he could not make it, he was only going there to receive a beating from others.
Sighing deeply, he gritted his teeth and walked in the direction of the side door of the Martial Arts Hall. Cupping his hands in greeting to the two guards clad in black armor, he said, "I am here to register as a sparring partner!"
江逸跟着这管事进了旁边的一个雅阁内，那管事请江逸坐下，这才抬手道：“请出示一下丹药，如果是好丹，我们会给出合理的价格。”

Jiang Yi followed the housekeeper into an elegant booth at the side. The housekeeper offered Jiang Yi a seat before raising his hand as he said, "Please display your elixirs. If they are good-quality elixirs, we will give you a reasonable monetary offer."
江逸身子一缩走了出去，暗道这五年算是卖身给武殿了，拿了武殿的钱不干活？那就等着武殿无穷无尽的追杀，想到大陆上每一个城池都有武殿分部，江逸都有些不寒而栗……

Jiang Yi contracted his body and left the room. He muttered to himself about how he had just basically sold his body and soul to the Martial Arts Hall for five years. How could he take money from the Martial Arts Hall and not work for them? If he did not, he would have to face the endless chase by the Martial Arts Hall to kill him. Thinking about how every city in the continent had a branch of the Martial Arts Hall, Jiang Yi could not help but shudder with some fear...
江逸身子一转，转到马飞身后反手勒住他的脖子，另外一只手握着青色短剑，元力灌注紧紧贴着马飞的胸口，只要微微用力这短剑将会刺入马飞的胸口，他目光冷冷的朝众人一扫，沉喝道：“全部退后十丈！”

Jiang Yi turned to move behind Ma Fei and restrained his neck with a hand. In his other hand was the teal-colored short sword, which was infused with essence force and at the moment being pressed tightly against Ma Fei's chest, ready to penetrate with just the slightest force. Jiang Yi's cold gaze swept across everyone and bellowed, "All of you move back ten feet!"
江逸身子一震，整个人都战栗起来，因为他明显感觉伤口恢复的速度开始加快，而且越来越快，最终治疗的速度达到了原先的五六倍左右，药效都可比人阶上品疗伤丹药了。

Jiang Yi felt his body tremble and he shuddered. Evidently, his healing speed had accelerated, to the point that the healing speed reached approximately five or six times the original speed. The effects were now on par with Man-tier superior-grade healing elixirs.
江逸身子一颤，但还是很不相信，冷笑道：“证据呢？你凭什么说我是镇西王的儿子？我还说你是我的儿子呢！”

Jiang Yi felt a chill up his spine, but he still did not quite believe it and laughed coldly, "Can you prove it? How can you say that I am the Lord's son? Well based on what you say, I can even say that I'm your son!"
江逸身子一颤，江小奴没有一点实力，居然妄图蜉蝣撼树？这要是给这护卫踹上一脚，不得活活踹死啊？

Jiang Yi trembled. To think that Jiang Xiaonu would try overestimate her capabilities despite her clear lack of strength! If the guard tried to kick her off, wouldn't she end up being kicked to death?
江逸身子一颤，猛然睁开眼睛，面色瞬间变得狰狞，那样子就像一只被激怒鬃毛竖起的狮子王，他身子从地上一跃而起，疯狂的朝前院飙射而去……

Jiang Yi's body trembled as he opened his eyes suddenly. His face instantly turned grim. He looked like an agitated lion with a bristling mane. Jumping up from the ground, he dashed towards the front yard like a maniac…
江逸身子一颤，还没等他说话，不知什么时候来的柳长老却板着脸说道：“一点药草要取那么久？还不拿出来？哼……废物！”

Jiang Yi shuddered. Without waiting for him to speak, Elder Liu, whom Jiang Yi had no idea when he entered the room, spoke with a stern face, "How long do you want to take to retrieve a few herbs? Hurry up and bring them over here! Hmph... useless good-for-nothing!"
江逸身子不动，冷然望着江松说了一句。结果江松脸色一变，江逸还没开始数数就慌忙扶着墙壁，一蹦一跳的凭借左腿快速朝远处逃去，只是十几息时间就消失不见了……

Jiang Yi remained motionless and stared coldly at Jiang Song. As a result, Jiang Song's face changed color. Before Jiang Yi had even started counting down, he hastily relied on his left leg and the wall to hop away. He vanished from sight in about thirty seconds...
江逸身子也滚落在地，但他却如一只猎豹般立即从地上弹射而起，朝江如虎冲去。
Jiang Yi had also tumbled onto the ground, yet he managed to immediately leap off the ground like a cheetah and once again rush towards Jiang Ruhu.
江逸身子快速在地上转圈起来，用最大的力量，最快的速度将江如龙抡得在半空转圈，等他脑袋差不多晕晕乎乎的时候，再移动脚步猛然朝旁边的墙壁砸去……

Jiang Yi began to quickly turn his body and used all his strength to whirl Jiang Rulong with his top speed. When Jiang Rulong's mind was in a dazed state, Jiang Yi then moved vigorously to smash Jiang Rulong into the wall...
江逸身子飙射而入，目光如刀子般在里面扫去，一看之下他更是差点气疯了。
Jiang Yi tore into the room, his eyes sweeping across the room like daggers. What greeted him nearly blew his top.
江逸身影突然在原地一顿，双手一松，江如龙的身子如炮弹般朝上空飞射而去。同时江逸的双腿一蹬，身子快速的跟上，双手抓做落地的江如龙猛然往下压，单腿膝盖却重重的朝他腰身顶去……

Jiang Yi's body suddenly stayed in place, he then loosened both his hands and launched Jiang Rulong's body high up like a cannonball. At the same time, he catapulted himself with both his legs and swiftly caught up to Jiang Rulong. He used both his hands to grab the falling Jiang Rulong and pressed downwards, using a single knee to position at Jiang Rulong's waist...
江逸转身，痛苦的闭上眼睛，大步朝外面走去，没有再回头看小奴一眼，因为……他生怕多看一眼会不舍得离去。

Jiang Yi turned around and closed his eyes in anguish. He marched out the doors without a backward glance at Xiaonu, for... he was afraid that looking at her any longer would render him incapable of leaving.
江逸轻叹一声，从怀中取出一把青色的短剑，看着上面流转的青光，他眼中流露出深深的担忧之色。马飞应该找了他一个月吧？他找不到自己，会不会想方设法去找江小奴的麻烦？

Jiang Yi heaved a sigh and took out a teal-colored short sword from his chest pocket. Staring at its gyrating teal radiance, a deeply troubled look showed on his face. Ma Fei must have been searching for him for a month. With Jiang Yi missing, would he attempt to give Jiang Xiaonu a hard time instead?
江逸轻松过了两人，却似乎忘记还有一人？那铸鼎境三重的武者被江逸晃了一枪，此刻醒悟过来顿时恼羞成怒，大步朝江逸冲来，扬起拳头狠狠对着他的背后砸去。

Jiang Yi had easily defeated two person, but did it seem as though he forgot one more person? Jiang Yi had flashed past that martial artist with a power level at the third stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. At that moment, he finally came to himself and immediately flew into a rage out of humiliation. He rushed towards Jiang Yi with wide steps and raised up his fists before ferociously smashing downwards onto Jiang Yi's back.
江逸运转一缕黑色元力，在调集一些蓝色元力融合起来，缓缓的控制朝脑袋游走而去。这黑色元力太少太少，不融合蓝色元力怕是不足以完成任何功用。

Jiang Yi circulated a strand of black essence force and combined it together with some assembled blue essence force, before slowly controlling its movement towards his head. This black essence force was lacking in quantity. If it was not combined with the blue one, he feared that on its own the black essence force was not enough to produce any effect.
江逸这一顶，尽管没有黑色元力融合，但也是实实在在的一马之力，当下那铸鼎境三重武者立即惨叫一声，身子本能弓了下来，本去抓江逸左手的手掌也收了回去，捧住下身痛嚎起来。

Even though Jiang Yi's single hit was not combined with the power of the black essence force, the attack was nonetheless had an actual horsepower worth of strength.
At the moment of impact, that martial artist at the third stage of the Cast Tripod Realm immediately cried out in extreme agony as his body instinctively bent downwards. He had even withdrawn the hand that was supposed to grasp Jiang Yi's left hand, instead using it to cup his crotch as he howled aloud over his searing pain.
江逸这才微微颔首，肉痛的咬牙松开手，眼睁睁的看着才到手几天的紫金进了别人的荷包。

It was with this offer that Jiang Yi finally nodded silently. His heart ached as he gritted his teeth and released his grip, looking on helplessly as he saw the purple gold he got his hands on just a few days ago enter another person's wallet.
江逸这次没有痛打落水狗了，他早早松开江松双手，漠然看着他惨叫不休，内心没有一丝同情之心。今日如果没有他没有黑色元力，此刻倒在地上惨叫的就是他了，这个世界就是那么残酷，没有实力只有被人欺辱！

This time, Jiang Yi did not continue beating up his fallen opponent. Instead, he released Jiang Song's hands. Coldly observing him scream relentlessly, Jiang Yi's heart did not feel any sense of sympathy. If he did not have any black essence force that day, the one lying on the ground crying in agony at the moment would have been him. The world was cruel. Those without any power would only end up being bullied and humiliated!
江逸进来之后如此张狂的话语明显触怒了两人，不过江逸点名找江如虎的麻烦，两人城府极深，也不好喧宾夺主都冷冷一哼没有说话，目光投向江如虎，等着看好戏。

The presumptuous words that Jiang Yi said obviously enraged the two of them. But the one that Jiang Yi called out for, was Jiang Ruhu. They didn't want to claim what wasn't directed at them. They let out cold snorts and casted their sights at Jiang Ruhu, waiting for a good show.
江逸连忙称是，快速离开管事房朝自家小院走去，内心却是暗暗苦恼，要是过两天这荣管事又来问要令牌，或者干脆上他家去要，不得立即暴露啊……

Jiang Yi promptly replied in the affirmative, before hastily leaving the housekeeping chamber and walking towards the direction of the small courtyard of his own home. He was inwardly distressed in his mind, however. Should Chief Rong return to demand the return of the command token over the next two days, or should he directly head to his house to request for it, his secret would immediately be revealed...
江逸连忙起身，胡乱整理了一下破烂的衣袍，朝外面走去。
Jiang Yi hastily rose from the bed, hurriedly straightened out and tidied up his tattered clothes, and rushed out of the house.
江逸迷茫了，他听说过丹药能回炉再造，但具体不知道怎么操作的，只看了一早上炼丹就能回炉再造的话，他就是炼丹天才了……

Jiang Yi was confused. He had heard before that elixirs could be reheated and refined, but he did not know how to perform the specific processes. If all he needed was to observe the refining process for a morning before being able to reheat and refine elixirs, he would probably be a genius in alchemy...
江逸迷迷糊糊的睁开眼睛，感觉全身上下，特别是头部传来阵阵撕裂般的痛楚。他勉强撑起上半身，呲牙咧嘴地朝四处一望，这才发现自己依旧躺在江家西山的药田田埂上。

When Jiang Yi opened his eyes, he was greeted with a blurry world. Not an inch of his body was spared from the searing pain. Worst of all was his head, which throbbed with unbearable intensity. Red-faced and grimacing, Jiang Yi managed to raise his body up with what little strength he had. As he made sense of his immediate surroundings, Jiang Yi quickly realized that he was lying on an embankment in the Western Hills plantation, one of the many holdings owned by the Jiang Clan.
江逸郁闷得要吐血了，睁开眼睛一扫，发现外面已经天亮了，附近的房间传来窸窸窣窣小奴起床的声音。

Jiang Yi was so melancholic that he wanted to vomit blood. When he opened his eyes and used his vision to sweep the room, he realized that the sky outside was already bright and rustling sounds of Xiaonu waking up were coming from the nearby room.
江逸都不用黑色元力加持力量，只是凭借恐怖的视力和大成的武技就能轻松的战胜在场的所有人，铸鼎境五重？在他看来屁都不是。

Jiang Yi didn't even made use of the black essence forces to enhance his strength. He relied on his terrifying vision and Phenomenal Stage martial arts to easily defeat everyone here. Fifth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm? In his eyes, they couldn't defeat a pile of manure.
江逸长长一叹，不再多想，全神贯注开始运转无名决提炼黑色元力。
Jiang Yi gave a long deep sigh. Not wanting to think about this any further, he placed all his attention on practicing the nameless cultivation technique to refine more black essence force.
江逸闭上眼睛长长吐出一口气，他匕首再次对准马飞的胸口，全力勒住他的脖子让他的尖叫声戛然而止，他目光冰冷的望着刘管事，爆喝起来：“我和风月楼的恩怨今日就此了结，日后你们马家要报复我，尽管放手过来！管事……把我的紫金还给我，否则你家少爷就不是个废人，而是个死人了。”

Jiang Yi closed his eyes and gave a long exhale. He aimed the short sword at Ma Fei's chest again and cut him off in mid-scream with a full-force choke of his neck. He looked at Housekeeper Liu frostily and roared, "The scores between Fengyue Brothel and me are settled. If the Ma Family wish to seek revenge on me from now on, feel free to bring it on! Housekeeper... return my purple gold, or your young master would not just be useless, but dead."
江逸闭上眼睛，小心翼翼地将注意力集中到自己脑海，便再一次看到了那几十个匪夷可思的神秘篆文，每一个字都无比清晰，黑色骨感，十足活泼，绝对不是幻觉。

Jiang Yi closed his eyes, carefully focusing his attention on his inner thoughts. Once again, he saw that unimaginably freakish and mysterious script. He could see each character unbelievably clear; they were black, skinny, and moved about energetically. This was definitely no figment of his imagination.
江逸闭上眼睛，探查到眼睛附近的黑色元力果然还有一丝，没有完全消耗干净。再次过了一会，江逸眼中黑光才一闪，视力逐渐模糊起来，黑色元力完全消耗干净了。

Jiang Yi shut his eyes and checked that there was indeed a wisp of black essence force near his eyes, which had not been completely consumed yet. Once again, after a while, a black flash shone through Jiang Yi's eye, as his visison gradually became more blurry. It looked like the black essence force had completely been consumed.
江逸闭上眼睛，细细感受着身体的变化。
Jiang Yi closed his eyes, faintly feeling the changes in his body.
江逸闭目等死，这柳长老虽然是负责炼丹的，但战力在江家也是排前十的，这一掌下来他不得活活被拍死？

Jiang Yi closed his eyes and awaited the incoming slap. Even though Elder Liu was in charge of refining elixirs, he was considered one of the top ten most powerful in the Jiang Clan. Was he not going to be beaten to death with this single slap?
江逸随便交代两句，让她在家呆着别出去，如果有人找上门就躲去后院。他匆匆的朝东院走去，想立即领回丹药，恢复伤势。

Jiang Yi casually briefed her with two instructions, asking her to stay at home and not go out; additionally, should someone come to the door, she had to hide in the backyard. He hastily walked in the direction of the Eastern Court to immediately retrieve an elixir and heal his injuries.
江逸随便解释了一句，这十多天来他没日没夜的修炼，封印内的符文也再次消融了近百多枚，修炼速度也继续增加，加上杨管事无限的提供灵神丹，他的修炼速度能不快吗？按他估计应该最多三五天，就能突破铸鼎境三重了。

Jiang Yi provided some random explanation. In the past ten days, he had been cultivating round the clock and reduced close to a hundred characters of the runic patterns of his seal, which caused his cultivation speed to increase further. Coupled with the incessant supply of Spirit Pills from Manager Yang, how could his cultivation speed not be fast? By his calculations, he would be able to make a breakthrough in achieving the third stage of the Cast Tripod Realm.
江逸青铜面具下的脸有些阴沉，嘴唇也有些干，望着马黑旗和柳河阴冷的目光，他有些不寒而栗。
Jiang Yi's expression, hidden beneath the bronze mask, was gloomy. His lips turned a little dry. The cold and ruthless looks on Ma Heiqi and Liu He made him shudder with unease.
江逸面无表情的一步步朝众人走去，眼中都是冷意，此刻他下半身的黑色长袍被溅满了鲜血，一只手也被染红了，加上他身上凌冽的杀机，别有一番慑人之势。

Jiang Yi walked towards the group with an indifferent expression. With eyes of chill, Jiang Yi's black robes were covered fresh blood, so was one of his hand. In addition to his sharp killing intent, his entire figure was releasing a frightful presence.
江逸面色一冷，只能脚步一滑，身形很飘逸的退入房间之内，将小奴朝地上一放，再次动用一缕黑色元力运转到拳头，对着一名冲进来的铸鼎境二重武者砸去。

Jiang Yi's expression turned cold. He could only slide back into the room. Placing Xiaonu on the ground, he once again transferred a wisp of black essence force to his fist and smashed it at the second-stage Cast Tripod Realm warrior who charged in.
江逸面色一凛，暗到这风月楼果然背后有大势力支持，否则一个小小的管事怎么会认识江家的武技？

Jiang Yi gave the housekeeper a cold stern look. He thought to himself that this Fengyue Brothel did indeed have someone powerful backing them—otherwise, how would a mere housekeeper be able to recognize the martial art techniques of the Jiang Clan?
江逸面色一沉，眼睛一瞪，又训斥道：“小奴，以后不许再说这样的浑话！这个世界少爷只有你这么一个亲人了，任何事情都没有你重要，知道吗？”

Jiang Yi's face darkened and stared intently at her before chiding, "Xiaonu, don't ever say this kind of silly thing again! You only have me, your young master, as your only loved one in this world, okay? Nothing is more important than you!
江逸面色沉了下来，要想得到学院的重视，那必须成为精英学员，这样才能有机会认识那位天阶的治疗师，从而求他治疗江小奴。也只有成为精英学员才能得到驯化灵兽的秘术，而一旦成为精英学员，将会引起各大家族的注意和招揽，资料也会无可避免的被调查……

Jiangyi's face sunk. If he wanted to garner the school's attention and respect, he needed to become an elite student. Only then, would he have the opportunity to meet the Heaven-tier Healer and from there beg of him to treat Jiang Xiaonu. And only then, would he obtain the secret art of acclimatizing an Indricotherium.. However, if he were to become an elite student, it would attract the attention of the multiple influential Families, which would inevitably expose his background information...
江逸顿了一下，迟疑问道：“我能随时离开吗？”

Jiang Yi paused for a moment.
Hesitating briefly, he asked, "Can I leave at any time I want?"
江逸颔首道：“我要你不惜一切代价帮我掩藏身份，不管我是不是那个人的儿子，如果这事传到江逆流耳中，你应该知道他会千方百计干掉我。”

Jiang Yi nodded with a smile, " I want you to hide my identity at all cost. If this matter were to reach Jiang Yiliu's ears, regardless of my true identity, he will pull no punches and think of a million ways to get rid of me."
江逸飞射而来，拉着江小奴的手满脸都是惭愧，随即想起什么，咧嘴一笑：“小奴，走回家，我给你看好东西，还有一件天大的好事告诉你。”

Jiang Yi flew over and pulled Jiang Xiaonu's hand, his face filled with guilt and regret.
Immediately being reminded of something, he grinned widely as he said, "Xiaonu, let's go home. I have something good to show you, and I have a piece of extremely good news to tell you."
江顾水两人还是没动，江豹这等小角色伤了就伤了，算不得什么。反而这样能增加江逸的罪行，他们出手就更名正言顺了，不过两人的面色却是越来越难看了。

Jiang Gushui and Jiang Rulang maintained their position. It didn't matter if such a minor character like Jiang Bao got injured. It would instead increase the offences that Jiang Yi committed and would justify their interference. But the looks on both their faces were getting increasingly unhappy.
江顾水冷喝几声，大手一挥率先朝江逸冲去。家族三少爷都动手了，其余人自然不敢继续坐视不理，江逸虽然看起来有些恐怖，但他一人能是在场数十人的对手？

After a few shouts, Jiang Gushui gestured with a wave of his hand and was the first to rush at Jiang Yi. Now that the family's Third Young Master was leading the take down, everyone didn't dare to sit on the fence any longer. Jiang Yi may look terrifying but what could one man do against the dozens of people here?
江顾水和江如狼也懵了，他们打过很多架却没见过这么流氓的，两人也看得心惊肉跳，万一江逸一个不小心，江如虎的脑袋砸在地面的青石板上，不得脑浆都得砸出来吗？

Jiang Gushui and Jiang Rulang were both in a state of lost too. They had many fights but nothing as ruffian as this one. Their hearts were thumping as they looked on. What if Jiang Yi accidentally smashed Jiang Ruhu's head onto the limestone flooring? Wouldn't his brain juices be spilled all over?
江顾水和江如狼微微一惊，对于江逸两人有些面生，但小时候江逸悟性惊人，连江恨水都比下去了，作为同辈人终归是有些印象的。两人明明记得江逸丹田被封印了，好像去年还是铸鼎境一重？怎么一下实力暴涨得那么快了？

Jiang Gushui and Jiang Rulang got a slight surprise. They were rather unfamiliar with Jiang Yi, but knew that Jiang Yi had exceptional instincts that was even superior than Jiang Henshui's. Being in the same generation, they would more or less have some impression. They could clearly remember Jiang Yi's dantian being sealed and he was only of first stage of the Cast Tripod Realm last year? How did his strength suddenly skyrocketed?
江顾水和江如狼爆喝起来，江如虎身子却是快速的朝两人身后冲去，江如鹰已经去请他哥哥江如龙了。只要江如龙一来，江逸唯有死路一条。江逸今日恶行累累，就算错手杀了他也不是大罪，顶多责罚一番……

Jiang Gushui and Jiang Rulang bursted out shouting, while Jiang Ruhu swiftly hid behind the two of them. Jiang Ruying had already went seeking for his brother Jiang Rulong. Once Jiang Rulong arrived, Jiang Yi would be left with the path to death. Jiang Yi had sinned gravely today, even if they were to accidentally kill him, it wouldn't be considered a wrongdoing and would at worst receive a scolding...
江顾水幽幽一笑，同样化作六道拳影，对着江逸的六道拳影碰撞而去。在他看来两人相差一个境界，足足一马之力，江逸要是敢和他硬碰硬那是找死。而他攻击速度和反应速度比江逸快多了，就算随便怎么玩，江逸都不是对手！

Jiang Gushui let out a faint smile and produced six fist shadows to clash with Jiang Yi's six fish shadows. From his view, the two of them had a one stage difference and the strength difference of a one full horsepower. If Jiang Yi dared to go head on against himself, it was like courting death. At the same time, his own attack speed and reaction speed was much superior than Jiang Yi; thus no matter how he approached this, Jiang Yi still wasn't his match!
江顾水等人看的面面相觑，不过倒是早早的安排人去叫人了，他们万万没想到这个被封印的废物，这个他们一直敲都不屑瞧一眼的废物竟变得如此生猛了，不仅一人力压数十人，还轻松战胜了家族年轻一辈排名第二的江如龙。

Jiang Gushui and the others looked at each other helplessly, but had long went to seek for help. They never would have though the sealed trash, who they looked with disdain, would become such a ferocious existence that could not only oppress dozens of clansmen but easily defeat the Jiang Rulong who was the no.2 of the clan's younger generation.
沈……沈……沈上仙！
"Ex... ex... exalted Immortal Shen!"
沈萤、孤月、羿清：“……”
Shen Ying, Lonemoon and Yi Qing: "…"
沈萤一僵，一滴冷汗流了下来，来了来了，厨子要开始学手艺了。修行……修行到底是个啥啊？怎么办怎么办？那些年装的逼，现在要还了！

Shen Ying stiffened up, and she shed a drop of sweat. It's here, the chef wants to start learning skills. Cultivation… What exactly was cultivation? Now what? It was time to get what she deserved for all those times of acting cool!
沈萤一僵，作业没完成，所以开始问老师了吗？
Shen Ying froze. Is he seeking guidance because he didn't complete his assignment?
沈萤一愣，下一刻林中哗啦啦的飞出十几个修士，团团把几人围住。
Shen Ying paused. More than ten cultivators suddenly flew out of the forest and surrounded the three of them.
沈萤一愣，下意识的想去扶。旁边却有人快她一步，直接从刚那个店里冲了出来。
Shen Ying hesitated for a moment before moving to help her up, but she was beaten to it by someone who rushed out from inside the shop.
沈萤一愣，回头看了他一眼，一脸的茫然，“啥？”
Shen Ying paused. She turned to face him, stunned. "What?"
沈萤一愣，懒洋洋的样子瞬间一震，一把抓紧了参赛牌。
Shen Ying was stunned. Jolted from her laziness, she gripped the participation token tightly.
沈萤一愣，看着这两个突然冒出来的人，习惯性的扬手打招呼。
Surprised at the sudden appearance of these two people, Shen Ying instinctively raised a hand in greeting.
沈萤一愣，突然睁大了眼睛，直直的看向白泽。
Shen Ying hesitated. Her eyes widened and she looked straight at Bai Ze.
沈萤一愣，起身朝四周看了看，发现不止是郁海珩，刚刚躺在地上的那五位郁家游仙也不见了踪影。
Startled, Shen Ying got up and looked around her. She realized that besides Yu Haiheng, the five Yu Family Traveling Immortals, who had been lying on the ground, had vanished as well.
沈萤一愣，还没回答，羿清上前一步，有意无意的挡在了两人之间道，“师父正要教导我修行，怕是多在不便。尊者若是有事，不如改日再来。”哼，别以为他不知道，他是想来拜师的。

Shen Ying was caught by surprise. Before she could answer, Yi Qing stood forward and seemingly blocked the path between the two of them. "Master is going to teach me cultivation, I am afraid now is not a good time. If Supremacy has some matters to discuss, perhaps you can come back another day." Hmph, don't think I don’t know that you are here to become her disciple.
沈萤一愣，那团黑气却已经飞到面前来了，胖乎乎的一团，后面隐隐还拖着两条黑色的尾巴，晃来晃去的摆动着，她下意识伸手抓住，轻轻往下一拉。

Before Shen Ying could react, the blob of black Qi had already flown right up to her. Greatly bloated, it had two black tails behind it. She instinctively reached out and grabbed at a dangling tail, gently pulling it down.
沈萤一脸懵逼的从床上坐了起来，这才看到眼前那片废墟，“咦？房子怎么了？地震了吗？”
A baffled Shen Ying sat up on her bed. It was then that she noticed the wreckage in front of her. "Huh? What happened to the room? Was there an earthquake?"
沈萤一脸茫然，“我以为你早就取好了呀。”收弟子的事，不是你提出来的吗？
Shen Ying's expression was one of nonchalance. "I thought you thought of one a long time ago." Weren't you the one who thought about recruiting disciples?
沈萤一路发了下去，发完咳了一声难得一本正经的道，“重在参与，努力了就行，名次不重要。毕竟友谊第一，比赛第二嘛！我看好你们哦。”

Shen Ying went on to continue giving out the bells. After she finished, she coughed and in a rare serious tone, she said, "The most important thing is to participate and try your best. The rankings aren’t important. After all, friendship first and competition rank second! I have great hopes for you girls."
沈萤下意识的就夸了一句，“嗯，不错！”就是慢了点。
Without really thinking, Shen Ying praised, "Ah, not bad!" It's just a little too slow.
沈萤下意识的搓了搓手臂，这黑雾看得人有些不舒服，“这烟……”放特效吗？
Shen Ying subconsciousy rubbed her arms. This figure in the black fog made her uncomfortable. "This smoke..." Is he creating special effects?
沈萤与孤月连赶了五天的路，才回到了无敌派。一到后殿，沈莹直接摊在躺椅上起不来了。
It took Shen Ying and Lonemoon five days of non-stop traveling before they finally arrived at Invincible Sect. Once at the palace, Shen Ying flopped herself down on a chair, utterly exhausted.
沈萤与狗，不得入内！
No entry to Shen Ying and his dogs!
沈萤与羿清没有意见，于是点了点头，跟狸猫道了个别，一起回头往玄天宗的方向飞了回去。
Shen Ying and Yi Qing nodded without saying a word. Bidding goodbye to the civet cat, they turned and flew toward Blackheaven Sect.
沈萤也上前两步，“没事吧？”
Shen Ying also stepped forward, asking, "Are you alright?"
沈萤也没在意，顺口问了句，“他贵姓啊？”
Shen Ying did not care. She continued to ask, "What's his surname?"
沈萤也皱了皱眉，雾霾的确是个大问题啊，“要不……我把小黑找来问问？”这会估计他还没走远。
Shen Ying furrowed his eyebrows. The Foggy conditions are indeed a great concern. " How about... we call in Blacky for questioning?" He probably hasn't gone far too.
沈萤仰高了头，才看到这只巨兽的全貌。
Shen Ying raised her head and saw the beast's entire form.
沈萤低头一看，只见那只是一把干枯的叶子，“咸菜？”
Shen Ying lowered her head to study the ite. All she saw were dried leaves. "A pickle?"
沈萤侧头瞅了瞅他手里的盒子，这才发现里面躺着一根干煸得仿佛失去了水分的……
Shen Ying turned slightly and glanced into the box in the cat's hands. That was when he realised that in it lay a dry, wrinkly...
沈萤再次深深的叹了口气，第一次发现自家厨子这么死脑筋。她直接从窗户爬了出去，拉着他在旁边坐下，“厨子啊，你看这大晚上，你不睡觉在这站着，我也不好意思休息不是。要不我答应你，真有人来了我就大声叫你怎么样？”

Shen Ying took a deep breath once again. For the first time, she realized how much of a blockhead her chef was. She climbed out of the window and pulled him to take a seat at the side. "Oh, Chef. If you keep standing here in the middle of the night not sleeping, it won’t feel good for me to just take a rest. How about I promise you that if someone comes, I’ll call for you?"
沈萤几人却一直等到郁红他们九人都比完了，才准备离开。幸运的是，九人都进入了明天的第二轮比式。而一直跟在他们旁边的两位轩辕家的人，硬是陪着三人看了全场，还一路客客气气的把他们送回了休息的院落。

Shen Ying’s group waited till all nine of their disciples had finished their fights before getting ready to leave. The lucky thing was that all nine of them had qualified for the second round of the competition tomorrow. The two members from the Xuan Yuan Family beside them had kept them company throughout the entire match and afterwards even courteously sent them back to their courtyard to rest.
沈萤切了一声，“下界的消息不是兔子给你的吗？”明明什么都没做，就白占了人家三分之二股份，这明明就是空手套白狼吧！再说上青界谁会闲着没事打听下界的事。

Snotting in disgust, Shen Ying retorted, "Isn't this news supplied by the rabbit?" You do nothing, yet you demanded a lion's share. You cooked up this scheme so that you could reap all the benefits without investing a single cent! Besides, nobody in the Upper Azure World bothers about the news in the lower worlds.
沈萤刚从门口跨出，就明显感觉四周的魔气比之前的要浅了不少。只是宁子安由于在魔界待了太久，再加上之前又强行施展转生印，还没等穿过界门，就直接晕了过去。

As soon as Shen Ying stepped across the gates, it was apparent that the demonic aura in the air had decreased by a fair bit as compared to before.With the combination of Ning Zi An staying in Devildom for too long and the forceful use of the Reincarnation Mark, he fainted before he even stepped foot across the Gates
沈萤刚要从魔界之门跳出去，突然又转回头加了一句，“对了，忘了告诉你。我就住这门口。”
Shen Ying was about to jump out of Devildom through its Gates, but turned back and added, " Right, I forgot to mention. I live right at along this entrance.
沈萤到是一脸无所谓的道，“他拜师这么久，就当交点家庭作业啦。”
Shen Ying looked unbothered as she replied, "He's been my disciple for so long. Let's just take it that he's finishing a family assignment."
沈萤到的时候，轩辕禹和印家家主印风已经在门口等着了，白天决赛之时双方见过，只是未有交流，与其它三家家主不同，印风长得特别的……和气，一张笑脸就没落下过。

When Shen Ying arrived, Xuan Yuanyu and the Yin Family's patriarch, Yin Feng, were already waiting at the entrance. Both parties had seen each other at the finals during the day, but had not had the chance to interact. Unlike the patriarchs of the other three aristocratic families, Yin Feng looked especially… friendly. His smile never once left his face.
沈萤却仍旧一脸平静，手中的剑一转，直指向空中的某条，歪了歪头道，“你刚说，要几段？”
With her usual calmness, Shen Ying twirled the sword in her hand and pointed it toward the wyrm in the sky. Cocking her head at him, she asked, "How many pieces did you say?"
沈萤却已经开始在白布上写字了，还就地取材的沾了沾满地的血迹。唰唰写了两行字，好心的放回了盒子里装好，递了过去，“好了，你把这给兔子看就行了。它不会怪你的！”

Shen Ying began to write on the cloth. She resorted to using the only ink she could find and left blood stains all around as a result. Quickly, she finished writing two lines. She placed the cloth in the box and carried it to the cat. "All done, you can hand this to the rabbit. It won't blame you!"
沈萤却弯腰抓了一把地上的珠子，追出去塞给了兔子，“我看你挺喜欢这珠子的，给你！算是这些天，你给我送食物的谢礼。”

Shen Ying unexpectedly bent over, grabbed a bunch of those ‘pearls’ on the ground, and dashed over to shove them to the rabbit. "I see that you really like these pearls, so here you go! Just treat it as a thank you gift for sending me food all these days."
沈萤却没有接，瞅了瞅那块写着‘赛’字的牌子，“那个……为啥一定要参加呢？我们人又不多。”好好呆在家里吃东西不好吗？

Shen Ying did not take it, however, but instead glanced at that token with the word 'Competition' written on it. "That… why must we participate? We don't have a lot of people either." Isn't it better to stay home and eat?
沈萤却没理，转头看向魔王道，“小黑！”
Shen Ying did not patronize him, turning his head to the Devil King and exclaimed, " Blacky!"
沈萤却直接一把拧起了他，“行了，回去了！”
Shen Ying picked him up with little effort and said, " Alright, that's enough! Now return!"
沈萤却直接看向振祥道，“那啥，你跟那个……姓甘和姓……鼎的，两渣男是什么关系？”
Not paying mind to anything else, Shen Ying looked directly at Zhen Xiang and asked, "That guy, you and that… that guy named Gan and another named… Ding? What's your relationship with them?"
沈萤却突然出声，“等一下，别这么快啊。”
Shen Ying suddenly said, "Hold on a second, not so fast."
沈萤受不住周公的邀约，眼皮一寸寸的合拢，即将陷入梦乡的之际，又突然猛的张开。瞅了瞅窗外明亮的月光，长长的叹了口气，不得不爬了起来，转身推开了右侧的窗户，对着窗外笔直的身影道。

Shen Ying’s eyelids were slowly closing as she could not resist the temptation to sleep. But just when she was about to fall asleep, her eyes suddenly snapped wide open and she glanced at the bright moonlight outside the window, letting out a long sigh. She had no choice but to climb up from her position, pushed open the window on the right and talked to that perfectly upright figure outside.
沈萤只好继续把剑又往土里推了推，半会觉得有点不方便，干脆站了起来，抬起腿想把剑踩进土地里，于是用力一脚踏出…

All Shen Ying could do was to continuously push the sword deeper into the ground. After a while, she felt like that was inconvenient, so she stood up and raised her leg with the intention to stomp the sword into the ground; thus with much force, she stomped on it…
沈萤只是打了个哈欠的功夫，反应过来时，就一个人被扔在这片森林里了。四周除了树，只有眼前那只挥着叶子正在挖坑的……

All Shen Ying did was yawn. By the time she started to react, she found herself thrown to the other end of the forest. Around her, there were nothing but trees. Then, she spotted a leaf waving around and something digging into the ground…
沈萤只穿了一件白色的里衣，衣服上沾了些木屑灰尘，脸黑成锅底，眼眯成了一线，明明是再单薄不过的身影，浑身却散发着一种让人胆战心惊的气息，仿佛从地府透出的寒，正一丝一缕的往心脉钻。她身后似有什么正熊熊燃烧。

Shen Ying was dressed only in a white inner tunic spotted here and there with some wood shavings and dust. Her face was as black as the bottom of a pot, and her eyes had narrowed themselves into slits. Although she was as thin as a stick, her body emanated a kind of menacing aura, like the cold draft from hell that was now worming itself into his heart meridians. A raging fire seemed to be burning behind her.
沈萤只觉得一直压着的某根弦，叭叽一下断了，有什么从体内瞬间暴发出来。
The last straw broke for Shen Ying as something within her burst out.
沈萤只顾着往嘴里疯狂的塞菜，哪里还有时间回他，只能一边吃一边点头，半天才挤出一串意味不明的，“唔唔唔唔……”
Shen Ying was so occupied with stuffing her mouth with food that she did not bother to reply, only nodding as she ate. Finally, she mumbled indistinctly, "Ya, ya, ya..."
沈萤叹了一声，只好又走了回去，直接在他旁边坐下，跟着他一起看着满地的萝卜，开始一块一块的消灭碟中的糕点。
Shen Ying sighed. She had no choice but to walk back to where Lonemoon was. She sat down beside him and stared at the radish field together with him. One by one, she gobbled up the pastries.
沈萤叹了一声，突然转头看向羿清，“厨子带我飞上去。”
Shen Ying sighed before turning to look at Yi Qing and said, "Chef, help me fly."
沈萤吃饭的时候，向来不多话，除了啊，哦，嗯之外，基本没有别的回应。羿清就更不用说，除了对着沈萤外，他向来话少，回的话要多简洁，有多简洁。全程只专注于默默把自己桌前的食物，挪向旁边沈萤的桌上。而其她九个妹子身份到底低了一辈。

Shen Ying seldom talked when she was eating except for basic responses such as 'ah', 'oh', 'hmm'. As for Yi Qing, he hardly talked to anybody except for Shen Ying; he kept his words as short and concise as possible. During the entire dinner, he only focused on silently pushing the food in front him towards Shen Ying's side of the table. Moreover, Shen Ying's nine disciples were almost a generation lower in rank compared to the others.
沈萤吓了一跳，“为啥？”
Shen Ying jumped, "Why?"
沈萤呆了呆，半会才喃喃的道，“上面……好像门开了？”
Shen Ying's face was blank. After a few seconds, she muttered, "A gate... seems to have opened up there?"
沈萤和羿清默契齐齐往后退了一步，转开了头。
Shen Ying and Yi Qing kept quiet and retreated, turning away.
沈萤和羿清齐齐抖了一下，呃……牛爸爸只有在坑人的时候笑得这么可怕。
Shen Ying and Yi Qing both shivered, uh... Father Niu only smiled so scarily when he was tricking people.
沈萤啃完一只水果抬头，瞬间撞进一片齐唰唰的眼光中，噎了一下，“咳……有事？”
Shen Ying had finished munching on her fruit and had raised her head when her eyes met with everyone else’s gazes and she choked. "Cough… what's the matter?"
沈萤嘴角一抽，“我懂了！”他们没钱。
Shen Ying's mouth twitched. "I understand!" They were broke.
沈萤嘴角一抽，只能点明，“你随便去哪里溜达一下，我们要说点女孩子的话题。”
The corner of Shen Ying's mouth twitched. She had no choice but to make it clear, "Just go somewhere else for awhile. We want to talk about female matters."
沈萤嘴角一抽，转头看了他一眼道，“你不是说，追魂楼啥消息都知道吗？”问我干嘛？
Shen Ying's mouth twitched. She turned to him and replied, "Didn't you say Soul Chasing Tower knows about everything?" Why are you asking me?
沈萤嘴角一抽，转身调头往那边走了过去，回头路过那头巨兽，顺手抠了出来拖起就走，所行之处树木哗啦啦的倒了满地，掀起一片尘土飞扬，沙尘暴似的迷蔓住了半个树林，现在有厨子了。

The corner of Shen Ying's mouth twitched. She turned to face the direction of the voices. Passing by the beast's corpse, she pulled it out of the soil and along with her. As she dragged the corpse along, the surrounding trees fell to the ground, throwing sand up into the air. The air in half of the forest began to fill with sand. Now she had a chef.
沈萤嘴角抽了抽，没有注意一对方脸侧原本如墨般的黑发，悄悄的染上了几分粉红，隐隐有朝颈侧泛滥的趋势。
Shen Ying's mouth twitched. She hadn't noticed that the black hair on one side of the other party's head had turned slowly turned pink. She looked like she was going to charge for his neck.
沈萤嘴角抽了抽，觉得有点辣眼睛。
Shen Ying's mouth twitched as she couldn’t bear to look.
沈萤嘴角抽了抽，越发想念闭关的厨子。吃惯了高级大厨的拿手菜，再回头吃牛爸爸做的，也太煎熬了。
Shen Ying's mouth twitched. How she missed the chef, who was now in seclusion. She was so used to the chef's fine dining cooking that having to eat food cooked by Father Niu was pure torture.
沈萤四下看了看，伸手摸了一把山壁，却糊了一手的红，“咦，这山在流血吗？”
Looking around, Shen Ying reached out and touched the mountain wall. Her hand came back covered in a red gloop. "Huh, is this mountain bleeding?"
沈萤回到自己的茅草屋的时候，已经是半夜了。她拉开被子，躺了进去，长长的舒了口气，总算安静了。
When Shen Ying went back to her straw cottage, it was already midnight. She pulled open the blanket, laid inside and breathed a deep sigh of relief — it was finally quiet.
沈萤回头瞅了瞅一脸乖巧的萝卜，“萝卜什么的，很重要吗？”
Shen Ying turned around to look at the obedient radish. "Are radishes and whatnot really so important?""
沈萤回想了一下殿中的挺尸，拼命这个操作……对那个家长来说有点困难，“萝卜是用自己的蒲公英换的，他们看样子还挺开心的。”应该？

Shen Ying recalled the stiff-as-corpse people in that hall. Fight desperately… that might have been too difficult for that parent. "The pickle was exchanged with my dandelion. They seemed pretty happy about it." Probably?
沈萤在万兽峰上转了好几圈，连晕过去的那只灵兽都醒了，她也没找着刚刚上来的那个传送阵。正犹豫，要不干脆直接跳下去得了，反正在无敌派也是这么上下山的。

Shen Ying made several rounds around the Myriad Beast Peak until the beast regained consciusness, yet she still couldn't find the transportation array. She hesitated and considered simply jumping off the peak. That was how she got off peaks in Invincible Sect anyway.
沈萤在给萝卜浇水，自印天城回来后，萝卜就自己待在了菜地里不肯出来。可能是有了心理阴影，它身上的灵气早已经恢复，叶子也已经长好了，他却仍旧保持着萝卜的样子，不变回人形。

Shen Ying was watering radish. Ever since returning from Yin Tian Town, radish stayed in his vegetation and refused to come out. Perhaps it was because of the mental trauma, even though his body's Spirit Qi had already recovered and the leaves all grown out, he remained in his radish's form, not turning into the human form.
沈萤好奇多看了两眼，易峰顿时明白了她的意思，笑着道，“雪银好似病了，今日怎么劝也不肯出门，我便将它留在院里了。”

Shen Ying looked over at him out of curiosity. Yi Feng understood what she was thinking and laughed, saying, "I think Xue Yin is sick. No matter how I persuaded it, it refused to leave the house. I left it in the garden."
沈萤嫌弃的瞅了瞅黑旗，别人给的东西又不好直接扔掉，眼睛微眯顺口就说了句，“吵死了！要嚎出来嚎！”说完顺势一抖。

Shen Ying looked at the black gonfalon in disdain, but felt it would be rude to directly throw away an item given to her by another. Her eyes narrowed slightly and she said, "Too noisy! If you want to cry, come out and cry!" And following that, she shook the gonfalon.
沈萤对这些没兴趣，专心吃自己的饭，扒了两口，却感觉到了旁边一道专注的视线。转头一看，只见宁子安小朋友，正眨着一双黑葡萄似的眼睛看着她，眼里满满都是好奇。

Shen Ying took no notice of any of this and just focused on eating her own food. After eating 2 mouths, she suddenly felt that there were a pair of eyes looking at her. Turning around, she noticed that Ning ZiAn was staring right at her with his black grape eyes filled with curiosity.
沈萤对这样的简单的体力工作没意见，只是……为啥要拖到晚上才走，好困啊！
Shen Ying had nothing to say about such simple manual labour, but… why did the auction have to drag on till the night before they started to walk, so sleepy!
沈萤就直挺挺的站在山洞门口……发着呆？
Shen Ying stood upright at the entrance of the cave… looking like she was mulling over something?
沈萤带着两妹子回到小院的时候已经是下半夜了，羿清和孤月也回来了，听到消息本打算出去找她的，却刚好在门口撞上。

When Shen Ying returned to the small courtyard with her two sect members, it was already in the middle of the night. Yi Qing and Lonemoon had also returned. They had intended to look for her when they heard the news about them, but it so happened that both parties met each other at the courtyard entrance.
沈萤弯身把某只从出玄天宗后，就一直缠在她脚上的腿部挂件拎了出来，“你说这只？”

Shen Ying bent over and picked up the Thousand Leaves Vegetation Spirit, which had been hanging on to her leg since they stepped out of Blackheaven Sect. Lifting it up, she asked, "Are you referring to this?"
沈萤心口一塞，不会有皮肤病吧？
Shen Ying's heart skipped a beat. Does it have some skin disease?
沈萤忙挥了挥手，见他走远，这才进了城。
Shen Ying waved in return and after seeing him off, entered the city.
沈萤怎么办？
What would happen to Shen Ying?
沈萤总算知道为啥城里的店子，全都统一挂起那样的牌子了。
Shen Ying finally understood why it seemed like all the shops were hanging up the same wooden signboard..
沈萤恶趣味的朝他嘿嘿一笑，然后拿起筷子叭哒叭哒几口，把他眼前所有碟子里的食物，吃得干干净净，连粒花生米都没放过。
Shen Ying laughed at him playfully before proceeding to use his chopsticks to wipe clean of all the food on the table, not even letting go of a piece of peanut.
沈萤想了想，叹了一口气才撑着桌面，慢吞吞的站了起来，掀开里屋的帘子，突然趴到了床边，伸手往床下掏了掏。

Shen Ying thought for a while, before she gave a sigh and slowly got up from the table using her hands as support. Lifting the curtain in the house, she suddenly crawled to the bed, trying to grab at something.
沈萤想了想，扫过地上五个还在挺尸的人，眼神眯了眯，站起来伸了个懒腰。
Shen Ying pondered for a bit, then she swept aside the stiff bodies of the five people on the ground, squinted her eyes and stood up to stretch.
沈萤想了想，突然掀开衣服下摆，弯腰把什么东西从脚上提了起来，“腿部挂件算吗？”
Shen Ying considered this quietly. Suddenly, she tore her clothes and bent over to pick up something from around her legs. "What are you taking your leg pendant off for?"
沈萤想了想，这才细数道，“吃红薯，吃兔肉，吃萝卜，以及……你的猪食！”
Shen Ying thought about it for a moment before listing what she had done out loud, "Eating sweet potato, rabbit meat, and… your pig's feed!"
沈萤愣了一下“哦。”他干嘛要跟她说这个？
Shen Ying paused. "Oh." Why was he telling her this?
沈萤愣了一下，眼神一眯，突然抱拳咔嚓一按道，“那……就跪下说好了！”
Shen Ying hesitated for a moment, then her eyes narrowed and she suddenly cracked her knuckles loudly. "Then… you can talk while kneeling down!"
沈萤愣了一下，老实的摇了摇头，“不知道啊。”
Shen Ying hesitated. She shook her head innocently, "I don't know."
沈萤愣了半会，才想起这个人是谁，哦……那个坑。
Shen Ying was blank for a moment before recalling who this person was. Oh… it’s that pit hole.
沈萤愣了愣，“呃……到也不是。”就是有点憋屈而已。
Shen Ying hesitated before saying, "Uh… not exactly." I’m just a little indignant.
沈萤愣了愣，转头看向旁边某个一脸怨念的人。
Shen Ying faltered, and turned to looked at a certain someone's begrudging face.
沈萤懒得管它，正打算继续找人，突然却听见前方不远处，传来两道熟悉声音。
Shen Ying couldn't be bothered with it. She was just about to continue her search, when she heard two familiar voices coming from not too far away.
沈萤戳了戳那团糊糊，迟迟没有夹起来，神情更加的嫌弃了，满脸都写着“猪食”两个字。戳了半天，直到某人快要暴走，这才塞进了嘴里。

Shen Ying poked at the mound of mush, but did not pick it up with her chopsticks. Her disgust deepened. Her expression openly conveyed how she felt about this 'pig swill'. She would have continued poking at it but as it appeared that someone was about to leave in a huff, she had no choice but to stuff it into her mouth.
沈萤扁了扁嘴角，“飞升后，你是不是就不能下来了？”
Shen Ying pursed her lips. "Does it mean that you won't be able to come down after your Immortal Ascension?"
沈萤手一顿，低头直直盯向碟子上的包子，顿时浑身杀气全消。
Shen Ying's hands stopped moving. She lowered her head and fixed her gaze at the bun on the plate, and the murderous aura vanished completely.
沈萤手里瓜子一松，下一刻人已经出现在了场中，伸手一抓。千钧一发之际，像是抓绳子一样，一把抓住了那道紫黑色闪电的尾巴，刚好停在了孤月头顶不到一尺的位置。

Releasing the melon seeds from her hand, Shen Ying was at the scene in an instant. She reached out her hand and at the very last moment, managed to catch hold of the streak of purplish black lightning's tail as if it were a rope, stopping it within a foot from Lonemoon's head.
沈萤扒饭的手终于停了一下，眨眨眼抬头扫了他一眼。话说……你们仙圈的人，流行挖墙角，还让别人递铲子的吗？

At last, Shen Ying stopped eating and looked up at him, blinking her eyes. I say… I know you people in the immortal circle like to headhunt, but do you really expect me, his boss, to help you as well?
沈萤抓着他的衣领，往右边一甩，嘭的一声把人砸到了地上，再转手往左一甩。像是甩布袋一样，左边一下，右边一下。一时间整个林间都是一声声，嘭嘭嘭的摔打声，和她一句句极不开心的抱怨。

Shen Ying grabbed his collar and flung him to the right, slamming him to the ground. She switched her grip, and then he was flung to the left as if he were a cloth sack. To the left and right he went, and at that moment the whole forest was filled with the sounds of smacking along with her unhappy grumbling.
沈萤抓着黄灿灿的手一僵，“呃……习惯性的想舔个包？”吃鸡哪有不舔包的。
Shen Ying's hand, which was in the act of picking up the gold pieces, froze for a moment. "Uh… Just picking up loot out of habit?" How can victory be possible without picking up loot?
沈萤抓糕点的手顿了一下。
Shen Ying's hand paused midway toward the pastries.
沈萤抬头直直的看向那团高大的鬼影，眼睛轻轻的眯起，似是有什么恐怖的东西，正从身上源源不断的散发出来。
Shen Ying looked up straight at the huge ghost, her eyes narrowing. It felt as if something terrible was emanating from her body.
沈萤抬头看了看，又瞅了瞅他递过来的符，却摇头塞了回去，“不用了。”
Shen Ying looked up and glanced at the talismans he had handed over, but then shook her head, throwing them back. "No need."
沈萤抬头看了看，正打算回话，旁边的羿清却先一步开口。
Shen Ying looked up and was about to reply, but Yi Qing, who was next to her, spoke up first.
沈萤抬脚一踩，把他整个都踩了进去，一字一句的道，“说，多余的两道雷，谁让你劈的？”
Shen Ying raised her leg and stamped hard till his whole body was buried in the ground. Enunciating each word, she asked, "Tell me. Those two extra bolts, were they by you?"
沈萤拍了拍手，转身往身前已经倒得七零八落的废墟走去，弯身把某个埋在里面，只剩半口气，已经完全看不出人形的人扯了出来，顺势一脚踩上去，脚下隐隐传来什么开裂的声音。

Patting off the dust from her hands, Shen Ying turned and walked towards the pile of ruins and bending down, she dragged out the person buried underneath. The man dragged out was half-dead and completely unrecognizable as a human being. She pressed her foot down on him. There was a sound of something cracking.
沈萤指了指地下道，“这！”
Shen Ying pointed at the underpass and said, "Here!"
沈萤接住看了一眼，转手又扔了回去，“不要，送你！”
Shen Ying glanced at it and threw it back. "No, you can have it!"
沈萤接过一看，顿时被满袋子的灵石闪瞎了眼，这么多！
Shen Ying could not believe her eyes when she saw the number of gleaming spirit stones in the bags.
沈萤接过贴子瞅了瞅，细想了想，“哦，我那天好像是答应过他，有空一块去抓珍稀小动物的。”
Shen Ying took a look at the invitation card. After a moment, she said, "Oh, I think I promised him that I would accompany him to hunt for rare animals when I was free."
沈萤接过，又掏出之前白泽给的蓝色袋子打开，伸手从里面哗的一下，掏出一截比人还高的鱼头，移到新袋子里。然后继续伸手从里面掏……

Taking the bag from Lonemoon, Shen Ying in turn opened the blue bag that Bai Zhe had given her, and fishing out a fish head that was even taller than a man, transferred it to the new storage bag. Whereupon she reached her hand into the blue bag again and fished out...
沈萤整整掏了半个小时，才停了下来。
Shen Ying kept at it for half an hour before finally stopping.
沈萤是在玄天宗的山门口赶上羿清的。
Shen Ying caught up with Yi Qing at the mountain entrance of Blackheaven Sect.
沈萤是真的惊住了，上上下下把对方打量了一遍，真.总裁，活的，会说话的那种！突然很想跟他借钱。
Shen Ying was truly shocked. She scanned him from head to toe several times. He's a real CEO, alive and talking! She suddenly felt like borrowing money from him.
沈萤是真的有点饿了，正要跟着进去，却迎面撞到了入口处一块眼熟的牌子，顿时一僵，整个人停在了门口，隐隐感觉有冷汗滴了下来。

Shen Ying was really a little hungry and was just about to follow him inside, when she saw a familiar-looking sign. All at once she froze in her steps. She felt the faint sensation of perspiration rolling down her face.
沈萤晃若未闻继续靠近，他已经退无可退，咚的一下撞到了墙上，脑海中的系统发出疯狂的警告声。

Shen Ying seemed not to have heard anything he said and continued to advance. Feng Ying kept backing away from her until his back slammed against a wall. The system in his head kept issuing frantic warning beeps.
沈萤有些别扭了动了动，咳了一声才挥了挥手道，“毛团，再见。”
Shen Ying shifted uncomfortably and cleared her throat. She waved, "Goodbye, Furball."
沈萤有点方，她才刚收的徒弟不会是一次性的吧？她没学过医，又对这个世界的套路不是很懂。想了想，转身就冲进林子里，随手抓了只刚出妖界的小动物，让它帮忙找兔子来看看。

Shen Ying was flustered; she had just accepted a disciple, but would it only be a one-off episode? She did not how to cure people, and in addition to that, she was unsure of how things worked in this world. She pondered for a moment before rushing into the forest, conveniently grabbing hold of a small animal nearby that just stepped out of the Demon Realm to get it to look for the rabbit.
沈萤本想再八卦一下，可肚子实在是太饿了，一坐下就只顾专心的吃了起来。
Shen Ying wanted to gossip again, but she was too hungry. Having sat down, she concentrated on devouring her food.
沈萤松了一口气，把人拉起来，“没事就行。”吓死她了，还以为以后又要继续吃猪食了。
Shen Ying heaved a sigh of relief as she pulled him up. "As long as you are alright." She had been scared to death, as she thought she might have had to continue eating pig feed in the future.
沈萤正在吃午饭，刚夹起一块肉，突然就是一阵地动山摇，她手一抖，顿时叭答一下肉掉在了地上。
Shen Ying was having her lunch. As she just took a piece of meat, suddenly the earth trembled and the mountains swayed, her hand shivered and the meat dropped onto the ground.
沈萤正打算再劝几句，却突然听见不远处传来脚步声。
Just as Shen Ying intended to continue persuading, sounds of footsteps nearby were heard.
沈萤正要开吃，孤月却突然火急火燎的冲了进来。
Just as Shen Ying was about to eat, Lonemoon suddenly rushed in with burning impatience.
沈萤正要拒绝，萝卜刚好大步跨了进来。
Shen Ying was just about to turn it down when the Radish suddenly bound toward them.
沈萤歪了歪头，“他们这么不懂事的吗？”
Shen Ying tilted her head, "they're that ignorant?"
沈萤歪了歪头，还没回答，那边的青亦却突然上前两步，死死的盯向地上的羿清道，“果然不能任由你发展下去。否则后患无穷。”说完他强忍着身上的伤，再次唤出那条业火凝成的巨龙，朝着三人的方向冲了过来，“今日，你们必须死在这里。”

Shen Ying tilted her head and stopped talking. Qing Yi suddenly took a couple of steps toward them. Looking directly at Yi Qing, he said, "I really cannot allow you to grow stronger, otherwise you'll definitely create trouble." As soon as the words were out of his mouth, he summoned a Great Inferno Dragon. The dragon charged toward the Yi Qing, Shen Ying and Lonemoon. "Today, the three of you will die here."
沈萤歪头想了想，又补充了一句，“他会做饭！”
Shen Ying tilted her head and pondered, and added, "He can cook!"
沈萤没再管那只狐狸，拿起一把剑，直接朝着那个发白光的阵法上一插，顿时半截剑就没入了土里，只听得咔嚓一声，阵法瞬间出现了裂痕，光暗了大半，却还没有直接崩溃。

Not bothering with the fox anymore, Shen Ying picked up a sword and moved directly towards the glowing array, and then slashed at the ground with the sword, half of it sticking deep into the earth. A breaking sound was heard as cracks immediately surfaced from the array and the glow grew much dimmer, but it had not entirely fallen apart.
沈萤没办法，只好一手拧着人，一手抱着那个婴儿，跳了出去。
Shen Ying had no choice but to hold the other on one hand and hug the Infant on the other. With that, he jumped out.
沈萤没时间管这些改变，在塔顶找了一圈也没有找着其它的人影，细细看了看，才发现前方不远处，不知什么时候出现一排黑色的阶梯弯延而下，似是通往下一层。

Shen Ying had no time to bother about these changes. She looked around the pagoda but could find no signs of anyone. However, after looking carefully, she saw, not far from where she was, a flight of black staircase which was not there before. The winding steps seemed to be leading down to the level below.
沈萤没有动，仍是稳稳的踩着他的肩，到是孤月撑着被劈得半死的身子，上前道，“你既是仙人，又为何要阻我飞升？”

Shen Ying didn't move. She stood atop him, one foot on his shoulder. Lonemoon tried to pull together his battered body and asked, "If you're an immortal, why are you trying to stop me from ascending?"
沈萤没有回答，反而看向魔王手中的那团黑红色的气体道，“这东西咋办？烧了？”
Shen Ying did not reply and looked at the reddish-black matter in the Devil King's hand instead. "What do we do with this thing now? Burn it?"
沈萤没有回话，孤月却越说越顺畅，“我在玄天宗三百多年，一直把那里当成自己的归属，以为修仙的跟凡人总是不同。或许真的像门规说的，同为一门便会同舟共济同共进退。没想到轩辕家一到，他们连打都不打，直接就认了输。还是为什么宗门大义，直接把锅甩到你们身上，也算是让我大开眼界了。”

Shen Ying did not reply, but the more Lonemoon spoke the more he blurted. "I have been in the Blackheaven Sect for over three hundred years and I have treated that place as home, thinking that cultivators are different from mortals. Perhaps the sect's rules were right. As a sect, everyone needs to be in the same boat and move together. Never did I imagine that once the Xuan Yuan Family arrived, they would not even put up a fight and immediately wave the white flag. So much for a sect's principles. It was such an eye-opening experience."
沈萤没有回，只是突然转头又走了回去，对着九人道，“那个……我昨天说错了一句话。”
Shen Ying did not reply, but merely turned around suddenly and walked back to face the nine girls. "Regarding what I said yesterday… I made a mistake."
沈萤没有意见，羿清直接唤出灵剑，习惯性的带着沈萤飞了起来。
Shen Ying kept quiet as Yi Qing immediately drew his spirit sword. Out of habit, he helped Shen Ying onto the sword and they both began to fly.
沈萤没理他，往前走了两步，看了看平坦的小岛，握了握手里的剑，刚刚厨子徒弟是怎么用的来着？好像要先举起来……
Shen Ying ignored him. She took two steps forward, looked at the flat island, and gripped the sword with her hands. How did the chef disciple wield the sword? Seemed like it needs to be lifted first…
沈萤没理它，拍了拍兔王道，“兔子，那就这里了，谢谢啊。”
Shen Ying ignored it and patted the Rabbit Monarch, saying, "Rabbit, this is it. Thanks."
沈萤没由来的有些愧疚，起身用力一跳，落在了场中，拍了拍她的肩膀道，“不哭了不哭了。”
Shen Ying suddenly felt a little guilty. She jumped over onto the competition stage, tapped Si Yu on her shoulders and said, "Don't cry, don't cry."
沈萤浑身冒着火般，拽住身边的人，直接往地上砸去，满个无敌派地动山摇，一时间方圆百里都是嘭嘭嘭的砸地声，以及她气极败坏的怒斥，“叫你吵吵！叫你吵吵！叫你吵吵……”

Fuming with rage, Shen Ying picked up the man beside her and smashed him into the ground. The ground trembled and the mountain shook. For a time, the sounds of repeated pounding reverberated for miles around, mixed with her infuriated scoldings, "Who told you to be so noisy! Who told you to be so noisy! Who told you to be so noisy!..."
沈萤点了点头。果然不到半会眼前就出现了大片岛屿，遍布海上。岛的面积很小，有的看起来只是几平米的石墩而已。易峰也没有在这停留的意思，一边粗粗介绍了一番，一路飞了过去。大概飞了半个时辰的样子，那些岛屿才少了很多，隔个几分钟才能看到一座，而且面积很是宽广。

Shen Ying nodded. Indeed, after a moment, they saw many island in the middle of the Mirage Sea. The islands themselves were small - some resembled stone peaks that were only a few square metres long. Yi Feng had no intention to stop at any of the islands. He described some of them briefly and continued to fly past them. After an hour, there islands became sparser but each of them were much larger than the ones they saw before.
沈萤点了点头，“那你怎么知道他们出了事？”还确定这是郁家的阴谋？
Shen Ying nodded, "Then how do you know that they're in trouble?" And so sure that this is a part of the Yu Family's plan at that?
沈萤点了点头，羿清立马捏了个诀，手中的剑顿时化为万千剑阵，随着灵气飞向空中，瞬间满天都是密密麻麻的剑雨，只见他手中的法诀一变，剑雨开始在空中汇聚凝合，不到片刻就化成了一柄高达天际的金色巨剑。羿清一跃凌空而起，整个人似乎溶入到了那金色巨剑之中。一时间满天的剑气迷蔓。

Shen Ying nodded her assent. Yi Qing immediately produced a hand seal and the sword in his hand suddenly transformed into thousands of swords, all of which started flying up into the sky following the Spirit Qi he released. Immediately, the entire sky was covered by a dense rain of sword. Yi Qing then produced a different hand seal and the sword rain began to gather and condense in the air. Within moments it had turned into a gigantic golden sword that reached up to the sky. Yi Qing made a huge leap into the air, his entire body seemingly merging into the golden sword. The whole sky was covered in a dense fog of Sword Qi.
沈萤点了点头，这才抬头对着莲花上的众人道，“那谁……你们的人是我揍的，萝卜也是我捡来的，要是不服来找我，跟别人无关。”

Shen Ying nodded. She raised her head to face the people on the Lotus Flower and said, "Mr. Whoever… I killed your people and I picked the radish. If you're not happy, you can settle your scores with me. This has nothing to do with anyone else."
沈萤犹豫了一下，点了点头，“好！我答应你，无论发生什么事，先跟他们讲道理。”
Shen Ying hesitated and then nodded, "Okay! I promise you. No matter what happens, I will reason with them first."
沈萤犹豫要不要追上去提醒一下两人，外面却又有人找来了，来人一身标准印家蓝衣，看着四十岁左右的样子，还点眼熟。

Shen Ying had just been thinking about whether she should chase after Lonemoon and Yi Qing when somebody appeared outside the door. The person was wearing the standard blue rope that people from the Yin Family wore. He looked about forty to fifty years old and very familiar.
沈萤用衣袖扫了扫，被砸坏了半边的上座，缓缓坐下。扫了一眼宛如台风来过的后殿，顺脚就踩到了地上已经肿得分不出人样的轩辕家主胸口，“现在……我们可以聊了吗？”

Shen Ying used her sleeve to wipe the half-destroyed top seat, and slowly sat in it. She looked toward the back of the hall which seemed like it had been visited by a hurricane, and conveniently stepped on the chest of the Xuan Yuan Family’s master whose face was swollen beyond recognition. "Now… can we talk?"
沈萤由于没有好好吃顿饭，窝了半个月的火气，全面暴发了出来。一下砸得比一下重，每砸一下郁昊天身上的黑气就会散去一圈，不到半会的功夫，原本浓黑如墨一样的塔顶，恢复了明亮。就连郁昊天也露出了原本的样子，黑色的长袍中，套着的只有一副骨头架子，魔气消尽后已经完全没了任何生息。

Shen Ying had not had a good meal for two weeks, and her pent up frustration suddenly exploded. Every bash was heavier than the last, and with every bash a layer of black Qi on Yu’s body dissipated. In no time at all brightness was restored to the pitch dark pagoda. Even Yu Haotian reverted to his original form; a skeletal figure clad in black robes who showed no signs of life after losing all his demon Qi.
沈萤的脸色好像抽抽了一下，咳了一声，一脸认真的道，“这不是因为，院子上次被那黑衣服的劈了好多坑嘛，我想填填平整。”

Shen Ying's face seemed to twitch slightly. She gave a cough and with an earnest face replied, "It's not what you think. The other time, the one in black caused many holes in the yard. I was thinking of levelling them."
沈萤皱了皱眉，用从未有过的正经神色，看向两人。
Shen Ying frowned. She faced the two of them with an expression more serious than they had ever seen..
沈萤皱了皱眉，突然仰起头看了看，半会才转身对着红绿两位妹子道，“累了，回家！”
Frowning, Shen Ying suddenly raised her head and looked around for a while before turning to the girls of her sect to say, "I'm tired, let's go home!"
沈萤皱着眉在鼻子前扇了扇，半会才把那股腥臭味给扇没了，这小动物好大的口气。侧头瞅了瞅眼前山一样高的肉块，她思考起它的可食用性来，有口臭的能吃吗？

Shen Ying frowned as she waved at the air in front of her nose. It was a while before the smell had completely dissipated — the beast had breathed out a substantial amount of air. Surveying the huge mass of meat in front of her, she considered whether beasts with smelly breath were edible.
沈萤皱起了眉……我的院子。
Shen Ying furrowed her brows… My yard.
沈萤直接一把把人又给按了回去，“烤你的肉去。”
Shen Ying pushed his shoulders downward, "Carry on roasting your meat."
沈萤直接重新坐下，唰唰的写了几句话，然后叠起了手里的纸条递给了郁红。
Shen Ying sat down and immediately began to write on the paper. She afterwards handed the piece of paper over to Yu Hong.
沈萤眉头一皱，更加不耐烦了，仍是那懒洋洋的口气，“你今天整这么大一出，别告诉只是为了抓本派的妹子来一日游。我刚刚没问，不代表我蠢，萝卜呢？”

Shen Ying frowned and grew even more impatient. Still speaking in that lazy drawl of hers, she answered, "You went to so much trouble planning this whole farce today, so don’t tell me it was all to snatch a disciple from my sect. I didn’t question you about it just now, but that doesn't mean I'm stupid. Where's Radish?"
沈萤眉头一紧，伸手一巴掌往下拍了过去。
Shen Ying's eyebrows shot up. She reached out and instinctively struck out with a slap.
沈萤眉头一紧，摸了摸她的头，把人拉到了身后，才扫向厅中的人，声音顿时一沉，“发生了什么事？”
Shen Ying frowned and rubbed her forehead. She pulled Si Yu behind her and scanned the people in the room. She lowered her voice and asked, "What happened?"
沈萤眉头一紧，直接往后退了一步，“死开！”Gay里Gay气的。
Shen Ying frowned in disgust and took a huge step back. "Get lost! You're so gay!"
沈萤看了一眼满山遍野的落石，脚下一点，纵身往着易峰说的方向一跃，顿时整个人飞到了高中，还先对方一步，准确的落在了岛屿的东南侧。

Shen Ying looked at the rocks and mountains falling apart in front of her. Then, she looked down at her feet. She jumped in the direction Yi Feng instructed her to and landed toward the southeast side of the land. Yi Feng landed beside her shortly after.
沈萤看了他一眼，换了个舒服点的态势，继续摊着，“那个甘……甘……”
Shen Ying glanced at him and switched to a more comfortable position while continuing slumping back. "That Gan… Gan…"
沈萤看了看眼前这个油盐不进，一心想守在门外的人有些头疼，想了半会才长长的叹了一声，无奈的出声。

Shen Ying felt a headache as she looked at this person who did not heed any of her advice and wholeheartedly wanted to stand guard by her door. She let out a long sigh after thinking for a while, compelled to say something.
沈萤眨了眨眼，半点没有心动的样子，突然想到什么。
Shen Ying blinked. Suddenly, her face lit up as if she had thought of a brilliant idea.
沈萤眯成一线的眼睛睁了睁，烂泥一般往前挪了挪，拉开袋子一看，只见里面装着满满一袋的上品灵石。

Shen Ying narrowed her eyes. Still looking like a slob, she slowly reached forward and poked at the bag. She pulled it toward her, opened it slightly and peered inside. All she saw were a couple of superior-grade spirit stones.
沈萤眼疾手快，顺手拉了他一把，“怎么了？”突然就跪了？
Shen Ying reacted quickly and supported him, "What's wrong?" Why is he kneeling?
沈萤眼睛一亮，接过袋子，看了仍低着头的人一眼，“谢了，毛团。”
Shen Ying's eyes sparkled once again. She grabbed the bag and faced the man who had his head lowered, "Thanks, Furball."
沈萤眼睛顿时一亮，直接朝着岸边走了过去，一把拉起半截人高的鱼尾巴，习惯性的转头问道，“园长，你会……算了。”她话到嘴边又吞了回去，“海鲜生的也是可以吃的。”

Shen Ying's eyes sparkled. She walked toward the shore and picked up the fish tail, which was as long as half a human's body. Out of habit, she turned and asked, "Director, do you know to... Nevermind," she swallowed her words. "I can eat seafood raw."
沈萤眼神一眯，快步走了过去，一把拧起了地上毫无重量的碧涛，“现在……能开门了吗？”
Shen Ying narrowed her eyes and stomped up to the immortal soul. She swiftly grabbed the immortal soul and pulled him to his feet, asking, "Now can you open the door?"
沈萤眼神却眯得更细，空气中隐隐有什么崩断的声音传来，只见她一字一句的开口，“吼什么吼，知不知道，有、人、在、睡、觉！”
Shen Ying narrowed her eyes even more. There was a faint cracking sound. She spat out the words one by one: "What. Are. You. Yelling. For. Do. You. Know. There. Are. People. Sleeping!"
沈萤眼神眯了眯，“然后呢……”
Shen Ying narrowed her eyes. "Then…"
沈萤眼神轻眯，“我讨厌人渣。”
Slightly narrowing her eyes, Shen Ying said, "I hate scums."
沈萤眼神顿时冷了冷，脸色越来越沉。
Shen Ying's eye went cold as her face grew solemn.
沈萤睁大了眼睛，宁子安有些吃力的把地上的婴儿抱了起来，看向她道，“她不会记得任何之前的事，只要再历经三次转生，就会变成一个真正的人，与我的联系也会切断。待回到仙界，我会亲自送她下界。”

Shen Ying's eyes widened and Ning Zi An picked up the infant with a bit of effort. He looked at her and said, " She won't remember anything that has happened before. After 3 more reincarnations, she will become a true human being and I will cease any further contact with her. When I return to the Immortal World, I will personally bring her to the Mortal World."
沈萤瞅了一眼锅里，随口道，“有话就说啊。”嗯，还好炒的是萝卜，不是肉。
Shen Ying took a quick glance into the pan and casually said, "Just say what you want." Hm, luckily it was carrots that were being cooked, not meat.
沈萤瞅了瞅众人，再看了看满脸都写着不平衡的牛爸爸，这么一说，好像的确有必要的，但是……
Shen Ying took a look at everyone and then looked at the begrudging Father Niu. Now that he said it, it did seem like there was a need to do that, but…
沈萤瞅了瞅手上沉甸甸的袋子，她这是……被人用钱砸了吗？
Shen Ying glanced at the heavy bag in her hand. Was she using this money to… buy her off?
沈萤瞅了瞅手里的剑，“其实……我觉得你刚刚挺好的。”不用再改了吧。
Shen Ying looked at the sword in her hand. "Actually… I think you were just fine." I'm sure there's nothing that needs to be changed.
沈萤瞅了瞅石壁上只剩半口气的血狐，脸上闪过一丝疑惑，刚想开口，孤月却先一步出声道，“还用问，这狐妖居然还想屠城，这样丧心病狂，死不足惜。”

Shen Ying looked at the blood fox who was half dead on the stone wall, and a trace of uncertainty flashed across her face. She was just about to speak, when Lonemoon stepped forward and said, "There's no need to ask, this fox demon wanted to massacre the city. Such a frenzied and unscrupulous demon, its death will not be regretted."
沈萤瞅了瞅脚下发光的阵法，守阵眼的意思……应该是不让那只乌龟碰这里吧？
Shen Ying glanced at the light-emitting array formation beneath her feat. Maintaining the array formation means... not letting the turtle touch it right?
沈萤秒懂，咳了一声道，“那个……厨子啊，要不你先去做个午饭？”
Shen Yin understood what she had to do. She cleared her throat, "Er... Chef, can you go and prepare lunch?"
沈萤稳稳踩着他的脸，力气还重了一点。
Shen Ying was still stepping on his face, even more forcefully than before.
沈萤突然伸手一抓，下一刻那个来势汹汹的法器就被她抓到了手里，一看居然是个铜铃。
Shen Ying suddenly stretched out her hand in a grab and the next moment, that fearsome-looking Dharma artifact was caught in her hand. It was actually a bronze bell.
沈萤突然想到了什么，眼睛亮了几分，“易家很远吗？”
A thought struck Shen Ying and eyes brightening, she asked,"Is the Yi Family very far from here?"
沈萤突然抬头，意味不明的看了他一眼，“你信啊？”
Shen Ying suddenly looked up at him with unclear intentions. "Do you believe it?"
沈萤突然抬起一手。
Suddenly, Shen Ying raised her hand.
沈萤突然精神一震，一把握住了他的手道，“为了不让你为难，我决定了，还是去吧！告诉我什么时间？几点？地点在哪？有没有着装要求？菜色怎么样？”

Shen Ying's face lit up as she reached out to hold his arm. "I don't want to put you in a spot, so I've decided that I will go! When is it going to be? What time? And where? Where will it be? Is there a dress code? What color should I wear?"
沈萤立马拿起了筷子，专心进入进食状态。
Shen Ying immediately picked up her chopsticks, ready to dig in.
沈萤第二天醒来的时候，看到的就是十几个人团团围着她床前的情景。一双双或担忧或激动或崇拜的眼神，齐唰唰的打在她身上。
When Shen Ying woke up the next day, she saw a crowd around her bed. The eyes that were fixed on her had expressions ranging from worry, exhilaration to adoration.
沈萤纠结了半会，只能像往常一样，把肉往白水里煮了煮，等熟了再捞起来直接吃。一口咬下去，又淡又涩，整个嘴巴都木了。想象有多美好，现实就有多骨感。

Stumped by the problem, Shen Ying could only do what she usually did in the past — dump the meat in the water, wait for it to be cooked and then fish it out to eat. She took a bite. It was bland, astringent and made her whole mouth feel numb; the greater the expectation, the harsher the reality.
沈萤细一看，只见它原本翠绿修长的叶子，自中间断了一节，上面还残留着绿色的汁叶。
Looking at it closely, Shen Ying saw that the middle section of the leaf, which was previously long and luscious, had been broken off. Green sap oozed from the broken tip.
沈萤细想了想，“四……五年？”
Shen Ying thought for awhile, "Four... five years?"
沈萤脑海里顿时闪过一个大毛团，“大一点的，白一点的？”好吃一点的。
A huge ball of fur surfaced in Shen Ying's imagination. "I want a big, white one." A delicious one.
沈萤脑海里顿时闪过一只瑟瑟发抖的大猫，晃然大悟，“哦！你说那个猫奴。”
A picture of a huge trembling cat flashed across Shen Ying's mind and she exclaimed, "Oh! You mean the cat slave."
沈萤脸色黑了黑，与羿清一起转头谴责的看向旁边的孤月。
Shen Ying's expression darkened. She and Yi Qing both turned to Lonemoon with chiding eyes.
沈萤表示，有点无聊！
Shen Ying was absolutely bored.
沈萤被他盯着有些发毛，下意识的解释道，“我也就随口一说，没想到……”毕竟他兽形的样子长得还是挺下饭的。
Under Yi Qing's glare, Shen Ying's hair began to stand. She explained, "I said so in passing. I didn't think..." Afterall, he did look delicious as a beast.
沈萤被吓了一跳，顺手一巴掌往上一拍，顿时把龙打偏转而朝着头顶轰隆隆的冲了出去，顿时把整个升仙塔的盖都给掀开了。
Shocked, Shen Ying quickly struck her fist out, redirecting the dragon's trajectory upwards, causing it to crash through the ceiling, leaving the pagoda roofless.
沈萤被盯着有些发毛，下意识的瞅了瞅自己是不是哪里脏了，看对方还是不动，只好礼貌性的打了个招呼，“HI~你好，我叫沈萤。”

Shen Ying began to feel uncomfortable under his gaze. She scanned herself, expecting to find a dirty spot somewhere on her body. Yet, she did not find anything. The man continued to stare at her. She had no choice but to greet him politely, "Hi, how are you? I'm Shen Ying."
沈萤觉得这种袋子，一定是这个世界最伟大的发明。空间大，能保鲜，什么样放进去，还能原样的拿出来。简直居家旅行必备，她起码塞了上百只海鲜进去，才堪堪将袋子填满。满意的拍了拍仍是没什么重量的储物袋，她决定回去后，一定要向牛爸爸申请一个同款的。

Shen Ying thought that the storage bag was the world's greatest invention. It had so much space and it could keep food fresh. Anything she put in would still be in its original state when she took it out later. It was a must-have for family vacations. She must have stuffed hundreds of handfuls of seafood into the bag before it became full. She patted the bag contently and turned to make her way back. She made a mental note to ask for a similar storage bag from Father Niu.
沈萤越想越觉得不对劲，分个手而已，难道是那抖M被拒绝后不甘心，直接把人抓了？
The more Shen Ying thought about it, the more uncomfortable she felt. Could it be that the masochist became angry after he got rejected and decided to kidnap them?
沈萤越摸越上瘾，两只手都抬起来揉了好几把，“嗯，手感很好，一看就很好吃。”
Shen Ying loved the feel of the beast's fur. She placed her other hand on the beast, combing through its fur with both hands. "Mm, it feels so good. It's going to be so delicious."
沈萤转头扫了一圈，“怎么都是兔子，能行吗？”
Shen Ying turned to scan the surroundings, "Why are they all rabbits? Are you sure it will work?"
沈萤转头淡淡的瞟了他一眼，明明没有表情，孤月却从里面看到了鄙视的味道，“你不觉得这洞口写着几个字吗？”
Shen Ying turned to look at him impassively. Although her face did not convey any expression, yet to Lonemoon, there was a hint of disdain behind it. "Don't you see the words written on this cave?"
沈萤转手就把女婴塞进了旁边薄飞平的怀里，“你孙女！”
Shen Ying stuffed the infant girl into the arms of Bao Fei Ping who was right beside her and explained, "She's your granddaughter!"
沈萤还保持踩人的态势，洋懒懒回过头，“你刚说啥？”
Shen Ying kept her foot on Qing Lan. Lazily, she turned to the immortal soul. "What did you just say?"
沈萤还没回应，萝卜臭着脸第一个就冲出去了，气呼呼的瞪着来人道，“你来干嘛？又想蹂躏我的身躯？！”
Shen Ying didn't respond. The radish made a face and rushed out, glaring at the man outside the door. "What are you doing here? Are you trying to ravage my body again?"
沈萤还没回答，他却直接站了起来，转头嗖的一下就往玉鼎的药丹峰飞去。
Shen Ying did not reply as he immediately stood up and turned around, swooshing straight over to Yu Ding's Elixir Peak.
沈萤还没回答，郁红却直接上前一步解释道，“尊者，掌门于我等有救命之恩，而且还帮我们报了血仇。所以……我们才想要做点事报答而已。”
Before Shen Ying could answer him, Yu Hong stopped her and explained, "Supremacy, Sect Master saved all of our lives and she helped us take revenge. So… we just want to do what we can to repay her."
沈萤还没有回答，突然背后传来什么打碎的声音。一个身影瞬间从厨房飞了出来，浑身剑气四溢，击得后殿的房屋哗啦啦的倒了一片。

But before Shen Ying could answer them, the sound of something dropping to the floor came from behind her. Yi Qing flew out of the kitchen, surging with Sword Qi. The rear of the hall collapsed to the ground behind him.
沈萤这场单方面的摔打砸，足足进行了半个小时，强大的鬼王完全无法反抗，原本的声音攻势也从一开始的：嗷嗷嗷……到吼吼吼……到喵喵喵……最后只剩嘤嘤嘤了……

Shen Ying's one-sided bashing match lasted half an hour. The powerful Ghost King was totally incapable of resistance. His once formidable voice, which had started out as a roar, turned into a whine, then finally into a meek whimper…
沈萤这才发现，人群中多了一个人，顿时愣了一下，“谁？”
Only then did Shen Ying realise that there was someone else in the group. "Who are you?" she asked in surprise.
沈萤这才发现，他全身都是血，连着手上的剑都被血染成了红色，赤色的液体正顺着剑锋往下成线的流，眼中还残留着未褪去的杀气。
It was then that Shen Ying saw that his whole body was covered in blood, it even trickled down the tip of the sword he was holding onto. The killing intent could still be seen in his eyes.
沈萤这才发现，他手里多了一株洁白如玉般的花，花和叶都像是精雕细琢出来一般，隐隐还带着股若有若无的香气。
Shen Ying suddenly realised that the white flower in his hand looked exactly like it was hand-crafted. It smelled incredibly fragrant.
沈萤这才发现，场中金丹组和筑基组的晋及赛已经比完了，今天比赛结束得特别快，台上已经没有多少人在了。前十的人选已经出来，幸运的是无敌派不单筑基组有两个人进了前十，就连金丹也有两个。一个是郁红，另一个居然是思羽。九个人里有四个打进决赛，这绝对是意外之喜了，一旁的孤月笑得嘴都歪了。一边还催促着沈萤回去。

Shen Ying realized that the competitions for the Golden Core group and the Foundation Establishment group were over. The competitions had finished up really quickly today. The stage was almost empty and the top ten fighters had already been picked. It was good enough that two people from the Invincible Sect got into the top ten in the Foundation Establishment group, but two people from their sect also got into the top ten for the Golden Core group. One was Yu Hong while the other was Si Yu. Among the nine disciples, four had made it to the finals. This was a pleasant surprise indeed. Lonemoon, who was standing at the side, had a silly grin on his face. He urged Shen Ying to hurry back to their sect.
沈萤这才回头道，“厨子，吃了饭再说！”
Shen Ying finally turned back and said, "Chef, let's talk after eating!"
沈萤这才回过头，继续打砸摔！一下比一下响。
Shen Ying turned back and continued smashing! Each smash was louder than the last.
沈萤这才想起这是牛爸爸昨天说要分的门派福利，连忙接了过去，拆开一个个分到了各人的手里。

Shen Ying finally recalled that this was the welfare benefit that Father Niu had mentioned yesterday. She quickly took over the string of bells and took it apart, putting one each into the girls' hands.
沈萤这才拖起地上的萝卜，带着一众新收的妹子们，走了上去，不到片刻就已经消失在了天际。
Shen Ying plucked the radish up from the ground and brought the newly accepted batch of female disciples up their transportation and disappeared into the horizon in a flash.
沈萤这才走回了屋里。
Only then did Shen Ying return to the house.
沈萤进食的速度终于停了一下，缓缓抬头看了她一眼。
Shen Ying finally slowed her chewing and slowly raised her head to look at her.
沈萤连忙照做，妖丹一落下，只见羿清身上一丝丝灰色的烟雾状的东西正飘出来，涌入珠子里。不到一刻钟的功夫，他体内的妖气就吸了个干净。

沈萤醒来的时候，已经是第二天早上了，她习惯性的伸了个懒腰，一张眼就看到两双，直勾勾看着她的眼睛，区别只在于，一双热情，一双……害怕？

Shen Ying looked on in silence. This man had lain unmoving in the courtyard for many days. At first, she had thought that he was dead for he was not even breathing.
