炼丹工具是现成的，大堂内有几个大大小小的丹炉，炼丹材料也是现成的，一个房间内有着大把的药材，但江逸屁都不懂，难不成炖菜般，把药材丢进丹炉内就成了？

The tools for refining elixirs were readily available. The central hall of the alchemist lab contained several elixir-producing cauldrons of various sizes. Likewise, the ingredients to refine elixirs were readily available, with one room filled with big bunches of medicinal ingredients. However, Jiang Yi knew next to nothing about refining elixirs.
Should I treat it like brewing vegetables in cooking, and simply throw all the ingredients into the cauldron and be done with it?
炼丹师往往对自己的作品很看重，所以尽管这废丹内一样有着浑厚的药力，他也绝对不准许留下毁掉他的声誉。

An alchemist usually treats his own products with the utmost importance. As such, even if an useless elixir contained vigorous medical healing power, he would never allow this useless elixir to be left behind and potentially destroy his reputation.
炼丹房内一片片静悄悄的，柳长老竟然没在？江逸暗暗一喜，立即想偷偷开始炼丹，反正要是柳长老回来了，他可以说在尝试学炼丹，如此好学柳长老应该不会见怪吧？

The interior of the alchemy lab was extremely silent.
Is Elder Liu actually not around? Jiang Yi was happy on the inside and immediately thought of how he could secretly start refining elixirs.
Besides, should Elder Liu return, he could just say that he was trying to learn to refine elixirs. With him being so keen on learning, surely Elder Liu would not fault him!
炼丹是很严谨的事情，丹方内的药剂不能多不能少，每一种药剂也必须准确到一钱，熔炼时间，化丹手法，回炉都必须精准，否则很容易练成废丹。

Alchemy was a very rigorous job. The ingredients used in the medicinal formula must be exact - no more, no less. Every medicinal ingredient also had to be precise down to the closest five grams. Even the smelting time, the method to form the elixir and the reheating process all had to be done with precision, otherwise it was very easy to refine and produce a useless elixir.
然后……
Then...
然后……江逸当着江如龙的面，一脚闪电般重重踩在他的胸口，这才冷笑的望着江如龙道：“我不仅要伤他，还要废他！你想杀我？你确定有这个能力？”

Afterwards... In front of Jiang Rulong, Jiang Yi swiftly stomped on Jiang Ruhu's chest, he sneered and looked at Jiang Rulong, "I am not just going to hurt him, I am going to cripple him! You want to kill me? Are you sure you have that ability to do so?"
然后一蹦一蹦的跟出去了，一边蹦还一边喊人似的发出一长串，“叽……叽……叽。”
It bounced out after Shen Ying. As it bounced, it shouted continuously, "Ji... ji... ji...."
然后刘管事让风月楼内的护卫全城开始搜查，整整找了十天，江逸却如人间蒸发了般，没有一丝线索。

Refusing to give up, Housekeeper Liu ordered the guards of Fengyue Brothel to search the entire city. The operation lasted ten whole days, but there was no sight of Jiang Yi, it was almost as if he had vanished into thin air.
然后第五只……第六只……第七只……
A fifth one... sixth.. seventh...
然而——
However,
然而……
Yet...
然而……回应他的仍是一阵呼噜。
YHowever… he was only met with snores.
然而不论是不是对方的阴谋，今日之局已经是无解！
However, regardless of whether or not it was the housekeeper's sinister plot, there was no solution for the incident that day!
然而两年过后，一切却反转了过来……
However, two years later, his fate suddenly changed overnight…
然而沈萤……连衣角都没动一下。
Shen Ying... didn't even move an inch.
然而让江顾水震愕的是，江逸的双拳在半路就变招了，幻影拳变成了摔碑手，等他想跟着变招的时候，江逸再次变招，双手如两根海藻般探了过来，两条腿不知不觉如蛇鞭般扫来，速度之快，配合之完美，让他完全反应不过来。

What shocked Jiang Gushui was that Jiang Yi's fist style changed suddenly from Phantom Punch into Wrestling Hand. When he was about to change his fist style to match it, Jiang Yi changed his fist style again. Jiang Yi's hands turned into two pieces of seaweed and stretched towards Jiang Gushui, his legs swept like snake whips. Jiang Gushui was unable to react to the extreme speed combined with the perfect combination.
然而！
However...
然而，一道身影比他更快，江松感觉到背后一股凌厉的杀机猛然回头，却看到一条腿从半空中狂压而下，慌乱之中他只能大叫一声：“三公子，狼哥，虎哥，救我！”同时运转摔碑手企图抵挡一下。

However, a figure was even faster than him. Jiang Song could feel an intense killing intent from his back. He then immediately turned back to see a leg violently swinging down from midair. He panicked and screamed, "Third Young Master, Brother Lang, Brother Hu, save me!" At the same time, Jiang Song tried to withstand the kick by using the Wrestling Hand.
然而，就在所有侵略者接近到寂静无声的天庭建筑群三尺之外时……
However, just when the army of invaders were three feet away from the quiet, silent city of the Heavenly Court…
熟悉的声音在身后响起。
They heard the sound of a familiar voice coming from behind.
片刻之后，一道隐约有些熟悉声音从草丛内传来，紧接着一个矮胖的身影钻出，都是肥肉的脸上全是嘲弄之意。

A short moment later, a vague but familiar voice rang out from behind the thick grass. The silhouette of a short, fat person quickly revealed itself. His pig eyes revealed nothing but the intention to mock and deride.
片刻之后，等他平复了激荡的心情再一次内视丹田时，却突然发现了一丝不对！蓝色元力颜色微微变深了？而这黑色元力颜色好像变浅了？

A moment later, once he had calmed down his agitated emotions and when he used his inner vision to to obsereve his dantian once again, he suddenly realised something was wrong! Did it seem like the colour on the blue essence force became slightly darker? Meanwhile, did the colour of that black essence force seemingly become lighter?
牛爸爸出远门了，跟印家约定的交货日期已经到了。由于中途还得去轩辕家练制成丹的原故，他这一走起码要大半个月。

Father Niu had left on a long trip. The delivery date agreed with the Yin Family was due. Because he still had to go to the Xuan Yuan Family to refine pills, the entire trip would take at least half a month.
牛爸爸可是很看好这个年轻人哟！
Father Niu really liked this young man!
牛爸爸这一走，一整天都没看到人影，就连晚饭也没有回来。少了个人吐槽，还真有点安静过头了，沈萤瞅了瞅桌上的糕点，叹了一声，顺手端起一碟走了出去。

Once Father Niu left the rear hall, he seemed to have disappeared. He did not even have dinner with them. Without him around to bicker with Shen Ying, the place felt unusually quiet. Shen Ying glanced at the pastries on the table and sighed. She picked up a plate of pastries and left the rear hall.
牛爸爸这一顿悟，直接坐了整整两个多月，修为也从化神初期，涨到了化神后期。他第一次感受到了跳级的滋味，不得不说，太爽了！突然有些遗憾，怎么不早点找外挂萤认真的聊聊天，她的话里绝对带了增益BUFF，早点聊或许早就涨上去了。

Father Niu's epiphany lasted more than two months. His cultivation level rose from early stage Soul Formation to its late stage. This was the first time that he experienced a jump in cultivation level, and boy, was it great! Suddenly, he felt a tinge of regret at not have gone earlier to Shen Ying for a heart-to-heart talk. Her words contained beneficial BUFF. [2. Slang. https://english.stackexchange.com/questions/4221/etymology-of-buff-and-nerf-as-used-in-video-game-slang]. If he had so earlier, his cultivation level would have progressed faster.
特别是昨天见识过沈萤对灵兽特殊的威慑力后，易峰对此行更加有信心了。
He finally saw how good Shen Ying was with spirit beasts the day before. Yi Feng now felt confident about having her on the trip.
犹豫你妹啊！是真的吧，你丫的绝对就是懒吧？！
To hell with your hesitation! I was right, you're just f*cking lazy!
狂喜的是——他刚才内视丹田外的封印时，发现那龙形封印的符文竟少了一枚！
What made his ecstatic was... while he was observing the seal outside his dantian, he discovered that a character was missing from the runic patterns forming the dragon-shaped seal!
狮吼兽瞬间僵住，宛如石化一般一动不动了。
The Lion Roaring Beast immediately froze like a fossil, still as can be.
狮吼兽颤得更加厉害了……
The Lion Roaring Beast trembled even harder…
狸猫一听哇啊一声，哭得更伤心了。
On hearing this, the civet cat wailed and cried harder.
狸猫僵了一下，一直努力表现乖巧，只差没在脸上写上“家猫”两个字的表情也歪了歪，坐得笔直的身子都斜了一下，神情顿时慌乱起来，圆溜溜的大眼睛左右瞅了瞅，一脸想说又不敢说的样子。

The civet cat, who had been trying his utmost to behave like a meek and obedient domestic house cat, froze for a moment. His body which had be upright, slumped to one side and his expression suddenly became flustered. His big eyes darted left and right, he looked as if he wanted speak yet was afraid to.
Civet Cat: "…"
狸猫：“……”这些人好可怕，喵喵想回家。
The civet cat: "…" These people are really terrifying, kitty wants to go home.
狸猫：“……”追就追，为啥还要拎上他啊，不行，快吐了，呕……
The civet cat: "…" Chase it all you want, but why grab me along with you. On no, I'm going to puke, [vomits]…
猝然！
Suddenly,
玄天宗众人脸上闪过一丝慌乱，就连奚秋与余阳都忍不住怀疑的回头看向羿清。
The people of the Blackheaven Sect began to panic — even Xi Qiu and Yu Yang turned to look at Yi Qing suspiciously..
玄天宗位于玄海，整个门派就浮于海面之上，下方有着数万大大小小的岛屿，羿清直接就落在了最大的一个岛上。相较其它岛来说，此处地势平坦，方圆十里只有大片的岩石，的确是个练剑的好地方。

The Blackheaven Sect was located on the Black Sea, the entire sect floating above the waters; below it were thousands of islands of different sizes. Yi Qing landed directly on the largest one. Compared to the other islands, it had a flatter terrain, and there was a large area with rocks which stretched for 5 kilometers; it was indeed a great location for practicing the sword.
玄天宗，庆云殿
Blackheaven Sect, Qingyun Temple
玉鼎之所以建么一个密室，想必隐藏的就是他一直用活人练丹的事实。而他的练丹材料，就是甘子睿送给他的那些炉鼎。

The reason why Yu Ding built a secret room… was so that he could hide the fact that he had been refining elixirs using living people. And his ingredients for the pills were the sex slaves that Gan Zirui had supplied him with.
玉鼎纵然罪大恶极，但关键是他这么多年在玄天宗，居然没人知道他是上青界的人。他隐藏身份，估计不单单只是帮上界的人练丹这么简单，肯定还有别的目的。上青界的人到底想干什么？他不由得就想起了太虚派，谁都知道太虚派虽然也三宗六派之一，实际上却也只是上青界的傀儡而已。他们难道想让玄天宗，变成第二个太虚派不成！

Granted, Yu Ding was guilty of many crimes, but the key issue was that he had been in Blackheaven Sect for so many years, yet no one knew that he was from the Upper Azure World. Helping his masters in the Upper Azure World refine these pills was probably not the only reason for hiding his true identity. There were definitely other motives at play. What did the people in the Upper Azure World plan to do? He couldn't help but think of Grand Vacuity Sect. Everyone knew that although Grand Vacuity Sect was in name a member of the Three Schools Six Sects, it was actually only a puppet controlled by the Upper Azure World. Could it be that they wanted to turn Blackheaven Sect into a second Grand Vacuity Sect?!
现在也只能试一试了，狸猫吸了吸鼻子收好礼盒，刚想道谢，地面却突然一阵剧烈的晃动，寸寸裂开，一道道白光冲天而起，仿佛有什么要从地上钻出来一般。

"There was no other option left but to try my luck." The civet cat took a deep breath in and put away the gift box. Just as it started to thank Shen Ying, the floor began to shake vigorously. Cracks began to appear as blinding white light shone through the cracks and straight into the sky. It looked like something was going to rise up straight out of the ground.
现在却不用他考虑了，这黑色元力只有十缕，根本不能完全独立攻击，不融合蓝色元力绝对发挥不出威力。

Now he did not need to consider this, as there were only ten strands of black essence force. This was completely not enough to even use in an independent attack, nor release any power without merging with blue essence force.
现在收回之前的话，还来得及吗？
Is it too late to take back whatever they said previously?
现场安静了两秒。
There was silence for two seconds.
现场诡异的静了下来，众人瞬间像是被点穴一样，看着这个突然出现的人，下意识的屏住了呼吸，浑身毫毛直立。
An eerie silence descended over the palace; everyone was frozen to the spot. Looking at this person who had suddenly emerged, they subconsciously held their breath, their hairs standing on end.
现场顿时安静了几秒钟。
The people who were present remained silent.
现场顿时就炸开了锅，几百双眼睛齐唰唰的定在了沈萤身上，异口同声的大声道，“见过掌门！”
The crowd seemed to explode. Hundreds of pairs of eyes fixed on Shen Ying. Together, they greeted her, "Greetings, Sect Master!"
理想总是美好的，现实却很残酷！
Their ideal intention notwithstanding, the reality was harsh!
琢磨了一阵，他再次丢进去三枚丹药，又用黑石加温继续注入蓝色元力，结果这次没炸丹，但他揭开炉盖一看，却发现丹药和原先并没有两样。

After mulling over the situation for a while, he once again threw in three elixir pills, before using coal to heat up the cauldron and continue injecting blue essence force. The result this time round was that, while the elixirs did not explode, when he lifted the cauldron lid and took a look, he discovered that the pills inside had not changed from their original state at all.
瑟瑟发抖中……
He was trembling...
甘子睿的眼神却越来越锐利，隐隐还带着丝疯狂，“当年我好心收你为徒，你却不知靠着什么手段，百年之内就妄想结婴。我费了三百年才练到金丹大圆满，你凭什么在我前面。”

Gan Zirui's glare grew sharper, even containing a hint of madness. "Back in the day, I had good faith and took you in as my disciple. I don't know what methods you used to complete your Nascent Soul Formation within a hundred years, but I wasted 300 years before perfecting my Golden Core. What gives you the right to be ahead of me?"
甘子睿的脸色却越来越难看，横的怕不要命的，戚橙雨分明就是抱着与他同归于尽的心思。不，他不能死在这里，他好不容易才结婴。

Gan Zirui came to look increasingly worse for wear as the fight went on. Even the unreasonable feared the suicidal. Qi Chengyu was obviously holding onto the idea of perishing together. No, he could not die here, not when he had finally completed his Nascent Soul Formation.
甘子睿脸色一白，一脸被拆穿的心虚，那张原本正派的脸，瞬间扭曲起来，好似懒得再伪装，瞪向戚橙雨道，“我是故意的又如何？你的修为本来就是我教的，我收回来又有何不可？”戚橙雨手握得越发紧的，隐隐有血迹从掌中渗出。

Gan Zirui's face was white as a sheet, his guilt from being exposed written all over his face. That originally decent and righteous face of his immediately became twisted, and seemingly too lazy to keep up the pretense any longer, he glared at Qi Chengyu. "I intentionally did that, so what? Your cultivation was taught by me. Even if I take it back, what's wrong with that?" Qi Chengyu clenched her fists tighter as blood started to seep out of her palms.
甚至还有堂主都转头倒戈劝起了羿清，“羿清尊者，你要真拿了那什么草木灵，不如就还给人家吧。何必连累宗门呢。”

Even the Hall Master turned against them and began to persuade Yi Qing, "Supremacy Yi Qing, if you really took the Vegetation Spirit, why don't you just return it to them? Why must you involve the entire sect?"
生平第一次，他有种想死的冲动。
For the first time in his life, he reall wanted to die.
由于上青城地处偏远，各门派前来收弟子的人，相比于大型的仙城也就没有那么正式。大多只是竖个旗子，写上派名，前来加入的登记名字，测试一下灵根品质就行。

Since Upper Azure Town was located in a remote area, the disciples whom the various sects and families sent to recruit other disciples were less formal than those in the huge immortal cities. Most of them just held up their flags with the names of their families or sects written on them. The tests they conducted on people who approached them was simple—they tested the quality of their Spirit Roots.
由于人实在太少了，无敌派这次只报名了筑基和金丹，两个阶段的比赛。其中郁红和思羽，还有另外两个妹子，一共四人进的是金丹组。另外的五个人参加的是筑基组。孤月的目标是，筑基组能进前十，毕竟筑基组的五人中，有两个是筑基大满圆还是很有希望的。

Due to their few numbers, the Invincible Sect only signed up for the Foundation Establishment and Golden Core divisions of the competition. Besides Yu Hong and Si Yu, there were two other girls who were participating in the Golden Core division, four of them in total. The other five girls were participating in the Foundation Establishment division. Lonemoon's goal was to get into the top ten of the Foundation Establishment division. There was still hope to achieve this; after all, two of the five were of Perfected Foundation Establishment.
由于是正午时分，风月楼内没有一个客人，江逸走进风月楼倒是看到了那日的管事，除了这管事外他还意外的见到了一个人，一个在武殿内见过两次的大家族公子。

As it was noon, there was not a single customer in the Fengyue Brothel. When Jiang Yi walked into the Fengyue Brothel, he had indeed seen that housekeeper from that day. Besides that housekeeper, he had also unexpectedly seen a man, a young master of a great family clan whom he had seen twice at the Martial Arts Hall.
由于是第一天，所以各门各派带队的都会前来观赛，一座高高的浮台之上，坐满了各门派观赛的高手。最高一层的就是四大家族的人。虽然每届的前三大多出自世家，但事关世家脸面，各世家的家主到是都到齐了，而且身边跟着的也是游仙。

This being the first day, the various sects who had brought their contingents would all come to watch the proceedings. A towering floating platform was packed with the experts from the different sects. Atop the highest level were the people from the four aristocratic families. The top three contestants of each round were usually from these families, but as their reputations were at stake, the patriarchs from each of these families were all present and the members of their entourage were also all Traveling Immortals.
由于连跳三级，羿清历完天劫已经是十天之后了，修为也从原本的地仙，直接升上了墨仙。修为仅次于薄家薄仪。加上他是剑仙，本就比同级的仙人要更强，真正对敌起来，越级挑战是事态。

As he had jumped three cultivation levels, it has already been 10 days since Yi Qing underwent the Heavenly Tribulation, and his cultivation also rose from being an Earth Immortal to being a Spiritual Immortal, which is only second to Pu Yi. To add on, he is a sword immortal, thus he is already stronger than the other immortals with the same cultivation level as him, in the first place. 男人一惊，往右疾退了十几丈，险险躲开了他的剑招。

男儿有泪不轻弹！

男子吓了一跳，猛的转过头，这才发现自己身边多了一个人，“你……你是谁？什么时候站在这里的！”他居然半点都没有察觉。
The man was taken aback; he turned his head to realize there was another person beside him. "You… who are you? When were you standing here!" He had not even noticed it.
男子这才停了手，打开袋子，掏出一块细细看了一眼，脸色这才好看了些，冷哼一声，“哼！看在这袋上品灵石的份上，下不为例。”他警告似的扫了沈萤一眼道，“你也知道，这种送人下界的事，可不能让世家和仙门知道，否则我们都讨不了好。”

The man stopped himself and received the bag. He opened it to inspect the spirit stones inside. It was only then that his expression softened. He tutted. "Hmph! "As you know, if the aristocratic families and immortal sects find out about me bringing you to the Lower Realm, all of us will suffer for it."
画面是流动的，如果江逸和翊凌雪看到画面，肯定会震惊得无与伦比的。因为……墙壁上的画面播放的正是她们两人对战的情景，不过画面有些模糊，似乎是用某种神奇的阵法，将两人对战的经过保留了下来。

画面里那个女魔修伤得极重，也不知道跟桌前的人说了句什么，突然一把掐住还端着碗之人的脖子，挟持着对方往西南的方向飞去了。

The badly injured female fiendish cultivator in the image seemed to be talking to the person at the table. Suddenly she grabbed the person holding the bowl by the neck and flew off in the southwest direction.
界门打开了。

留下一只手不可能，少一只手就变成真的废物了，放任江小奴不管？这比杀了他还要难。

Leaving behind one hand was impossible—the loss of one hand would make him completely useless. As for the option to leave Xiaonu behind and not care for her anymore? That option would be worse than death.
疯楼主是什么鬼？正常不应该叫影楼主吗？
What is Tower Master Feng? Shouldn't you call me Tower Muster Ying?
白发老者捋了捋白须，开口道：“不用看了，这小子是铸鼎境二重，不过天赋异禀，反应能力变态。杨管事，好好笼络培养一下他，把他实力提升到铸鼎境三重四重，他绝对能成为一名优秀的金牌陪练，替武殿源源不断的赚取银钱！”

The elderly man with white hair stroked his beard as he opened his mouth to speak, saying, "There is no need to look any further. This kid does indeed have a power level in the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, but he has mysterious heaven-endowed natural talent, which allows him to have obscenely powerful abilities to react to attacks. Manager Yang, ensure that he is well-groomed, well-trained and well-invested in, and help increase his power level up to the third or even fourth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. He definitely has the potential of becoming an excellent gold token-grade sparring partner, which would no doubt become a endless source of profit for the Martial Arts Hall!"
白发老者的话，让杨管事很是兴奋起来，他没有急着出去，顿了一下又说道：“那费老，要不要把这小子招揽进武殿内？”

The words of the elderly man with white hair caused Manager Yang to become very excited. He did not leave in a hurry, but rather paused for a moment before once again speaking. He asked, "Then, Elder Fei, should we invite or try to attract this youngster into joining the Martial Arts Hall?
白泽一僵，原本清冷淡定的神情，顿时满是慌乱，“我……想……想……”半会还是没有说出句完整的话来，看了孤月手里的玄灵花一眼，似是想到了什么，发丝越来越红。

Bai Ze stuttered. His calm and cool expression became one of panic. "I... want to... want to..." He could not complete his sentence, even after a long time. He looked at the Black Spirit Blossom in Lonemoon's hands and thought of something to say, but not before he blushed even deeper.
白泽一愣，不满的瞪向羿清，两人间的火焰，噼里啪啦再次燃了起来。果然讨厌这个凡人！
Bai Ze hesitated and glared at Yi Qing. The tension between the two of them rose once again. I really hate this mortal!
白泽一愣，好似这才发现已经出了易家范围似的，张了张口似是想说什么，直直看了她会，脸又开始泛红，再次背过身去了。

Bai Zhe looked nonplussed. He seemed to have only just realized that he was outside the boundary of the Yi Family estate. He opened his mouth as if he wanted to say something, but after looking at her for a while, he blushed and turned his back to her.
白泽下意识的走近两步，点了点头，“是。”
Bai Ze stepped toward the opening and nodded, "Yes."
白泽仍是没有出声，只是眼晴亮亮的看着她，意思很明显。
Bai Ze kept silent. His eyes sparkled as he looked at her. His intentions were clear.
白泽内心没有一点欣喜，甚至有点想哭。才刚刚把玄灵花送出去，决定留在此界了，为啥界门就开了。

Bai Ze was not in the least bit happy. Instead, he felt like he was going to burst into tears. He had just given away the Black Spirit Blossom and decided to stay in this realm. Why did the realm gate open now?
白泽呆了呆，似是被问到了什么重要的问题，脸轰的一下红了，“是……是……”是了半天也没有说出后面的话，习惯性的想背过身，却又生生忍住。

Bai Ze stared blankly at her, as if she asked him something important. He flushed red once more, "It's... it's..." he stuttered for a long while without completing his sentence. He started to turn around out of habit, but caught himself.
白泽抬头看了沈萤一眼，张了张口似是想交代什么，脸上却抑制不住又开始泛红，终还是什么都没说，身形一闪，转头又飞向刚刚那个岛。
Bai Ze glanced at Shen Ying and opened his mouth, as if wanting to say something. He suddenly flushed red and closed his mouth again, turning around to fly toward the island.
白泽没有回答，转头直直看向旁边的沈萤，仍是那张清冷的脸，但眼神却没由来的带上了些……委屈？像是盼着她说点什么。

Bai Ze did not respond. Instead, he turned around to look at Shen Ying, who was standing beside him. His expression was cool, but his eyes looked... unwilling. He looked like he was waiting for Shen Ying to say something.
白泽清冷的脸突然沉了下来，低头看着下方岛上，突然出现的满天黑色风刃。
Bai Ze's calm expression suddenly fell. He looked down at the island, which was fast filling up with black wind blades.
白泽皱了皱眉，脸色一沉，半会才清冷的说了一声，“魔蛟。”
Bai Zhe frowned and his face darkened. After a while, he acknowledged the other coolly, "Wyrm Demon."
白泽眉头顿时拧了起来，手间一紧，直接就化出万道雷光，直接向对方劈了过去。
Bai Zhe frowned. Then with a wave of his hands, he conjured up thousands of lightning bolts, which he directed towards his opponent.
白泽看了沈萤一眼，声音仍是清冷，却多了几分坚定，“还没吃完。”
Bai Ze glanced at Shen Ying and replied coolly, "I have not finished eating."
白泽瞬间僵了一下，习惯性的想背过身去，却又不想甩开肩上的手，只能卖力的低着头，任由脸上的红潮往发丝上漫延。
Bai Ze hesitated. Out of habit, he turned his back toward her, but did not brush her hand away. He lowered his head and allowed the redness of his face to spread to the roots of his hair.
白泽站在原地，仍低着头。
Bai Ze stood still with his head lowered.
白泽脸色一变，再次化出原型，身上白光大盛，放出神兽威压想阻止兽潮。可这群水族明显受了魔蛟魔气的影响，仍是不管不顾的扑向两人。

Bai Zhe's face changed. He transformed once again back to his original form. His body emanated a dazzling white light. He emitted a suppression aura in a bid to prevent the Beast Tide from advancing. However, it was useless. This army of aquatic beasts, who were clearly under the influence of the Wyrm Demon's demonic aura, forged on regardless.
白泽身上的光却越来越亮，原本白衣如雪的身影，瞬间化为一个巨大的白色巨兽，纯白的毛发没有一丝杂色，额头长角晶莹剔透，四爪一动，就冲向空中的黑色蛟龙。

The light from Bai Ze's body grew increasingly brighter until suddenly he underwent a startling transformation. His body, which had been clad in snow-white robes turned into that of a huge beast. Its fur was of the purest white and it had a shiny horn on his head. It crouched forwards on its limbs and leaped straight at the black wyrm in the sky.
白泽这才转过头，看了看界门，又回头看了看沈萤，朝界门的方向走了几步。却停在门前，看着那片雪白的洞口，眉头越皱越深，迟迟没有踏出那一步。

Bai Ze turned to look at the realm gate, then turned to look back at Shen Ying. Finally, he took several steps toward the realm gate. He stopped in front of it, scanning the opening, which was flashing as white as snow. He frowned deeply, refusing to step through the gate.
Bai Zhe: "..."
白泽：讨厌的凡人。
Bai Ze: I hate mortals.
白衣妹子。
White shirt girl.
百里之外，上青界三人组。
About five kilometres away, the group of three from the Upper Azure World...
的确有个门派更加方便些，莫说别的，就这次芮糜的事。如果他背后有个宗门，兴许不必等噬魂幡生出鬼王，就可解决。

Indeed, being a member of a sect did have its benefits. More than anything, one only had to look at the matter of Rui Mi. If he had had the support of a sect, he could have solved the problem before the Soul Devouring Gonfalon gave birth to the Ghost King.
的确，只有化神修士才能划破虚空打开两界的通道，除此之外，想要进入下界，就只有通过印家的传送法阵，或是经由可连通三青界的妖界去往下界。但对她们来说，行走妖界太凶险，而印家的阵法从来都只是为了招揽下界化神修士用的。加上印家和郁家的关系……对方更不可能让她们通行。

Indeed, only Soul Formation Supremacies were able to tear through the void and enter the passage between the two realms. Anyone else who wanted to enter the Lower Realm had to go through the Yin Family's transportation array. However, it was far too dangerous for the group of ladies to walk through the Demon Realm and the Yin Family would only use their array to recruit Soul Formation cultivators from the Lower Realm. What's more, given the relationship between the Yin Family and the Yu Family… the Yin Family would never allow her to use their transportation array.
的确，谁有事，那个外挂都不会有事。
Indeed. No matter what happens, that cheat won’t be harmed.
的确，那狐妖明明知道有人在追，躲哪不好，偏偏跑到了这一看就是死胡同的山洞里。要说里面没有一番准备，鬼都不信。

Indeed, the fox demon clearly knew that it was being pursued. Why of all places would it choose this cave, which was obviously a dead end? It was obvious that the fox demon had planned a trap here in advance.
的确，那狐妖要是能在他们眼皮子底下溜走，刚刚也不至于断了两尾才逃生，要知道血狐的尾巴就是它的修为，一下断了两尾，对它的修为来说是很大的牺牲。

Indeed, if the fox demon could slip away right under their eyes, it would not needed to have sacrificed its two tails to escape. The cultivation of a blood fox lay in its tails, so losing two tails at once was very damaging to its cultivation level.
目送着这位名动天羽城的绝色小姐离开，江逸沉默的转身回自己小房间内修炼了。
Seeing off this heavenly young mistress whose beauty made the entire Skyplume City fall at her feet, Jiang Yi turned away in silence and went back to his room to cultivate.
直到一声叹息，一个身影突然手脚并用的，爬上了众妖王所坐的高台之上。众妖这才看到出声之人。
It was only after a sigh sounded and a figure used all its limbs to climb up to the stand where the Demon Monarchs were seated did the demons finally see the source of the voice.
直到他看到不远处一缕青烟，才总算发现了两人的踪迹。
When he spotted green smoke from afar, he knew that he had found the two of them.
直到再也看不到沈萤的身影，易峰这才松了一口气，慌乱转身朝着后面的纯白巨兽行了个大礼道，“请灵主赎罪！沈掌门初来易家，不识灵主真身，个性又……爽直了些，无意冒犯灵主。”

Only after Shen Ying was long gone did Yi Feng dare to heave a sigh of relief. Flustered, he turned to the beast to bow and said, "Please forgive me, Spirit Master! Sect Master Shen is here to visit us for the first time. It does not know your true form. She's also quite... frank. She doesn't mean Spirit Master any harm."
直到几个月后，他组织的一次内部小比中，原本身材最为娇小的思羽妹子，突然扔开了手中的剑，拧起拳头轰隆一声，一拳砸碎了前方的石壁。

It was not until a few months later when he organized a mini competition that Sister Si Yu, the originally most petite in size, suddenly threw away the sword in her hand and held up her fists and with a crashing sound, smashed a punch right into the stone wall ahead.
直到吃完一块肉，他才沉声道，“我离开玄天宗了。”
It was only after he finished the meat that he said in a low voice, "I left Blackheaven Sect."
直到天空那个鸭蛋一样黄的太阳落了下去，换上一轮弯月。
The sun set and the moon rose in its place.
直到她无意间发现一只黑兔在咬人，顺手打了，救了那几个人。一看还是熟人，就是给她红薯的猎户，这才知道这些小动物，原来是吃人的妖。

It was all until she stumbled upon a black rabbit biting someone, which she conveniently beat up and in doing so saved the people being attacked. On a closer look, she realized that those people looked familiar—they were the hunters that had given her sweet potatoes. That was when she found out that those small creatures were actually demons who devoured humans.
直到沈萤也插了一句道，“小绿妹子，加油！”
Shen Ying chipped in a word of encouragement too. She exclaimed, "You can do it! Greenie!"
直到那雷整整劈了九九八十一道，空中的云层才尽数散去，四周一下恢复了明亮。地上焦黑一片，原本萝卜的位置已经只剩一个大坑了。

9,981 streaks of lightning struck the ground before the clouds began to clear up. The forest now began to lighten up once more. The ground where the radish had been standing was now black and there was a big pit in its place.
直到金光完全覆盖住它全身，没入它身体里，一个金色的契约印记，慢慢在它额头露了出来。
The gold light covered the wyrm's body entirely and disappeared into it, leaving behind a golden contract mark on its forehead.
直接带着沈萤两师徒一起去了主峰大殿，拿出了在秘境捡漏的那些灵植，奚秋笑得像个两百多斤的孩子。

Lonemoon immediately brought Shen Ying and Yi Qing to the main peak's main hall. He took the spirit herbs that he picked from the mystic realm out of his storage bag. Xi Qiu grinned, making himself look like a 200kg child.
看了一会，江逸差不多了解了一些情况，这武殿内金牌陪练只有三人，实力差不多都是铸鼎境五六重。银牌陪练有四五个，铸鼎境三四重左右，剩下的八九人全是铜牌陪练。

After observing for a short while, Jiang Yi had more or less understood some of the circumstances around him. This Martial Arts Hall had only three gold token-grade sparring partners, with power levels around the fifth or sixth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. There were also four or five silver token-grade sparring partners, with power levels around the third or fourth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. The remaining eight or nine persons were all bronze token-grade.
看了一遍后，他直接把这传承中的丹方刻入了玉简中，打算回去交给奚秋，存到藏法阁中去，任由弟子查阅，也算是满足了碧涛想要传承的心。

After he looked through all the recipes, he immediately transferred the recipes in the heritage onto a jade slip. He would hand it to Xi Qiu once he got back to the Dao Repository and allow his disciples to study these recipes freely. At least this would fulfil Bitao's last wish.
看了一阵，他有些自嘲的喃喃：“姬小姐还是别叫公子了，叫我易剑吧！你见过穿如此破烂草鞋的公子？”

After glancing for a while, in an attempt to mock himself, he muttered, "Young Mistress Ji, I think you shouldn't call me a young master. Why don't you call me Yi Jian! Have you ever seen a gentleman or young master wearing such tattered shoes?"
看了一阵，这老者身子居然微微颤动起来，他目光灼热的扫向江逸，竟突然抱拳拱手道：“这位尊贵的客人，请问这丹药是您炼制出来的吗？”

After looking at the elixirs for a while, the elderly man actually trembled slightly. With a burning gaze he glanced at Jiang Yi and actually with a sudden motion cupped his fists and greeted, "This distinguished and honourable guest, may I ask if you refined this elixir yourself?"
看到他出现，那个叫青尹的修士，还特意朝着他看了一眼，掀起一个意味不明的笑容道，“玄天宗的剑修……呵，我们秘境里见！”

Qing Yin spotted Lonemoon. Purposefully, he shot a look in Lonemoon's direction and broke into a strange grin. "Look, if it isn't Blackheaven Sect's sword cultivator… Ha, we'll meet again in the mystic realm!"
看到外面天已经亮了，江逸不敢多研究了，迟些可是要去荣管事那报道，去西山清点草药，他得提炼一些黑色元力备用，避免被江如虎等人截了。

Seeing that the sky outside was already bright, Jiang Yi did not dare to do any more research. After all, he had to head over and report to to Chief Rong, and go to the Western Hills to take stock of the medicinal plants there. He had to refine some black essence force and keep in reserve for use, in case he was intercepted by Jiang Ruhu and his gang.
看到小奴如此惨样，江逸脑海内爆炸了一般，什么也顾不上直接发狂暴走，身子朝那壮汉飙射而去，元力疯狂的朝拳头涌来，一拳朝那壮汉胸口砸下。
When he saw Xiaonu's tragic state, Jiang Yi felt his mind explode. Without a thought, he shot towards the man, essence force surging straight to his fist, he threw at the man's chest.
看到武殿外围满了人，想到江恨水和姬听雨都进去修炼了，江逸一时有些好奇，就快步朝武殿外走去。

Seeing the exterior of the Martial Arts Hall surrounded by people, and thinking about how Jiang Henshui and Ji Tingyu had both entered the Hall to cultivate their power, Jiang Yi felt a surge of curiosity.
As such, he hastened his steps and walked towards the exterior of the Martial Arts Hall.
看到江松捧着一张红肿的脸，畏惧的快步离开，江逸也不敢多待了，一边拱手低声说道：“柳长老您忙着。”一边快速朝外面退去。

Observing Jiang Song's red and swollen face as he fearfully left with quick steps, Jiang Yi did not dare to stay for any longer.
He cupped his hands and said in a low voice, "Elder Liu, I’ll take my leave," before he hastily made his way outside.
看到江逸的拳头一下变成了三个，马飞有些慌了，但如此关头他还怎么变招？只能咬牙控制那把旋转的青色短剑继续朝江逸胸口刺去，江逸这拳要是敢砸下来，他的胸口肯定也会被绞出一个大洞！

Seeing the singular fist suddenly transforming into three, Ma Fei became somewhat panicked. How could he change his own technique at this juncture? He could only clench his teeth and continue to direct the teal-colored short sword on its path towards Jiang Yi's chest. If Jiang Yi dared to hit him with Phantom Punch, Jiang Yi's chest would then become a mangled mess for sure!
看到江逸竟抡起江如虎一阵狂扫，所有人吓得面色惨白，连忙收回攻击慌忙后退，他们这一攻击怕是江逸还没受伤，江如虎就已经被砸成肉泥了。

The entire group of opponents were so frightened by the sight of Jiang Yi brazenly swinging Jiang Ruhu around in a frenzied sweeping move that their faces turned deathly pale. They promptly withdrew their attacks and retreated backwards in a flurry. They were scared that with their single attack, Jiang Ruhu would beaten to a pulp even before Jiang Yi experienced any injury.
看到江逸脸色大变，江如虎仰天长笑起来：“哈哈，江逸，你不是很狂吗？今日不把你双腿打断，我江如虎的名字倒着写！”

Seeing the colours on Jiang Yi's face change greatly, Jiang Ruhu laughed towards the sky for a long time and announced, "Haha! Jiang Yi, I thought you were very wild? If I don't break both your legs today, I will write my name 'Jiang Ruhu' in reverse!"
看到江逸这副神情，江小奴有些惊慌起来。随即很快醒悟，大眼睛睁得滚圆惊疑问道：“哎呀，不对啊，少爷你的实力怎么那么强大了？刚才你好厉害哦，把那几个坏蛋都给打伤了……”

Looking at Jiang Yi's expression, Jiang Xiaonu felt some fear and concern. Almost immediately realizing what he had done, she asked incredulously, "Oh no, hang on, Young Master, since when did you become so strong? Just now you were so powerful, being able to injure all those bad people..."
看到江逸青铜面具下眼眉中神采飞扬之色，姬听雨怔住了，原本她只是怕江逸尴尬随口说出来的宽慰话语，却没想到江逸居然触动如此之大，还宛如变了一个人般，身上的气势竟让她有一种莫名的熟悉感，就好像……他父亲当年受封天羽城城主那一刻般。

Seeing Jiang Yi's eyes glow with vigor and high spirits from under his bronze mask, Ji Tingyu was stumped for words. Originally, she had just wanted to say some simple words of comfort and consoling, out of fear that Jiang Yi would feel too awkward. However, what she did not expect was that Jiang Yi would become so touched, as though he had changed and become a completely different person. The sense of confidence and gradeur emitting from his body actually gave her a mysterious feeling of familiarity, as though he was like... her father, at the moment when he was given the title of City Lord of Skyplume City.
看到这羿清眼睛猛的睁大，“师父！”直接转身就朝着西南方向追了出去。
Upon seeing this, Yi Qing's eyes widened and he exclaimed, "Master!" He immediately turned around and headed out towards the southwest.
看到马黑旗和柳河走之前淡淡瞥过的一眼，江逸暗暗苦恼，扭头朝练功房内走去。
Jiang Yi headed to the Technique Practising Room, inwardly vexed by the faint glance Ma Heiqi and Liu He sent his way before they left.
看得兔王浑身一抖，立马退了好几步，“上仙，我……我不行！我虽然是十阶妖王，但……妖丹离体我就是只死兔了。”

The Rabbit Monarch shivered and retreated a couple of steps, crying out, "Exalted Immortal, I… I cannot do this! Although I am a level ten Demon Monarch, once the demon core leaves my body… I will be a dead rabbit."
看来无论多么强悍的阵法，在时间面前也是无能为力的。难怪他们这么容易就闯进了这仙宫，门上连个阻挡的阵法也没有，恐怕整个大殿内唯一有作用的，就是刚刚储丹室那道阵法了，那还是由于碧涛的仙魂一直在附近，阵法有他的仙力维持的原因。

It looked like even the strongest array formations couldn't withstand time. It was no wonder that they could enter the Immortal Pavilion so easily. The defense array formation at the door had also lost its effect. The only array formation that still seemed to be working in the entire hall was the one at the entrance of the Pill Storage Repository, and that was probably because the presence of Bitao's Immortal Soul close by gave it power to withstand time.
看来羿清这些天，没少查看地形，果然是个勤奋好学的厨……弟子。
It seemed that Yi Qing had done his fair share of research on the land the past few days. He was indeed a diligent and eager chef… disciple.
看来还是没有死心啊！以前羿清是地仙还好，现在他都是墨仙了，整个仙界想找个同为墨仙修为的剑仙都十分困难，更别说还是天生剑体。

It seems as if they had not given up! Before, it was still okay when Yi Qing was a mere Earth Immortal, but now that he is a spiritual immortal, it would be so hard to find another sword immortal with the spiritual immortal cultivation, let alone finding one with an Innate Sword Embodiment.
看来这个仙府已经空了很久很久了，原本放在储药格里的东西没人管，所以自己开始长起来了，才形成了那片森林。怪不得那林中那么多奇珍异植，还催生出了草木灵。

It seemed that this immortal residence had been empty for a long time. The object originally placed in the storage compartment had been left unattended, so it had begun to grow, developing into that patch of forest. No wonder there were so many exotic plants in the forest; it had even spawned many Vegetation Spirits.
看来这魔修不单是夺宝，他是真想杀了姓陆的修士。羿清眉头一皱，再不保留，调动全身灵气。招势一换，剑气化形，一瞬间数十把灵气聚成的剑就出现在了周身，化出万千道剑光，直接破阵而出，把大片的荆棘连同那些黑气一块，切为粉碎。

It seemed like the fiendish cultivator not only wanted to steal the treasure, but was also eager to kill Cultivator Lu. Yi Qing furrowed his brows, and then with no hesitation, he mustered all the Spirit Qi in his body. With Sword Qi being manifested, ten swords made by combining Sword Qi appeared all around him in an instant. The glare from the swords cut through the array along with the forest of thistles and the black gas.
看着他一脸信仰崩溃的绝望样，沈萤没由来的有些不忍心。
Looking at his face of breakdown and despair, Shen Ying did not have the heart to see him like that.
看着因为被收入无敌派，而一个个兴奋的弟子们，孤月对门派的未来，表示深深的担忧。但很快，他就没时间担忧了，因为他发现自己修为居然突破了，而且直逼化神大圆满，隐有压制不住的趋势。

He looked around at the new disciples of Invincible Sect. Looking at each of their excited expressions made Lonemoon worry for the future of the sect. Very quickly, he set aside his worries and found that he had a breakthrough in his cultivation level. He was now a perfected Soul Formation cultivator. He had an unsuppressible force about him.
看着手里的红薯，她实在不好说自己不想干了。于是，从此她过上了猎妖的生活，开始狩猎这些奇怪的小动物，至少肉还是比红薯好吃的。

Looking at the sweet potatoes in her hands, she was too embarrassed to say that she wanted to quit. From then on, she led a life of slaughtering demons, starting by hunting those weird-looking small animals—at least their meat tasted better than sweet potatoes.
看着漫天的手影，江逸暗暗感慨。心底却不愿意在一个大美女面前丢脸，他深知自己的速度绝对比不过姬听雨，索性也不躲避了，目光死死锁定姬听雨的双手，脑海快速转动，预算着对方的攻击轨迹，一双手如海藻般朝前方探去。

Seeing the hand silhouettes cover up the surrounding air for as far as his eyes could see, Jiang Yi slightly sighed with regret. Deep down in his heart, he was in truth unwilling to lose face in front of a beautiful lady. He knew deep down that his speed would definitely be unable to beat that of Ji Tingyu. As such, he simply decided to stop trying to avoid incoming attacks any further, and instead use his eyes to firmly lock on to Ji Tingyu's hands. With his mind spinning at a quick speed, he was able to estimate his opponent's attack trajectory and in turn stretch his two hands forward like a strand of seaweed.
看着眼前两个又开始日常犯蠢的身影，他没由来的一阵心烦，突然就没了胃口，“我吃饱了！”
He lost his appetite looking at the two people in front of them revert to their stupid antics. "I'm full!"
看着眼前桌上突然多出来的祖孙三人，孤月嘴角一阵抽搐，手里篮子一个没拿稳，差点扔了出去。
Seeing that the table appeared three more people out of the blue, Lonemoon's mouth twitched, and almost lost his control over the basket in his hand.
真.第一次上天的沈萤：“……”呃，便宜厨子这关爱残障儿童的眼神是什么鬼？不就是搭你个飞的吗？
Shen Ying who was truly flying for the first time: "…" Uh, what’s with this cheapskate chef's sympathetic gaze, looking at me as if I’m a disabled child? Isn’t it just a getting a ride from you?
真·手撕界门。
She really tore open the realm gate.
真的……她是真的要将兽丹送她，即使她是挟持她的魔修。只是因为……见她重伤吗？世上怎么会有这般‘愚蠢’的人！蠢到……蠢到她居然想护一下！

Really… She really wants to give me the beast spirit pill, even though I, a fiendish cultivator, was the one who held her hostage. Just because… she sees that I am seriously injured? How can there be such a 'stupid' person in this world! So stupid… so stupid that I actually want to protect her!
真的吃了啊喂！
She's really going to eat it!
真难吃……不过，好过自己做的！
It’s really hard to eat… but it’s better than what I cook!
眶当……
Bang!…
眼前是一个山洞，只是洞是用灵石堆砌起来的，隐隐透着白光，一靠近就能感觉到扑面而来的浓郁灵气。沈萤摸了摸，易家是真土豪啊，突然有种想叫牛爸爸的冲动。

There was a cave in front of her. The walls of the cave were made out of spirit stones which continuously emitted white light. As she approached the cave, she felt a strong gust of spirit Qi rush toward her. Shen Ying touched the walls of the cave. The Yi Family was truly a local tyrant. She suddenly felt an urge to call Father Niu.
眼看两个人又开始了日常智障，孤月忍不住翻了个白眼，却还是止住了打算出门的脚步，坐了下来。嗯，不知道海鲜味道怎么样。

Lonemoon saw that the two of them had returned to their normal retarded ways. He rolled his eyes and was just about to walk out of the main door when he stopped himself. Instead, he sat down at the table. Hmm, I wonder how the seafood would taste.
眼看着兽潮就要将两人淹没，耳边全是魔蛟嚣张的狂笑声，“哈哈哈哈，今日我要将你们碎尸万……”
The Beast Tide was about to wash over the them. Their ears were filled with the maniacal laughter of the Wyrm Demon, "Hahaha, I'm going to cut you into a thousand pieces..."
眼看着她就要像抓郁海珩一样，伸手抓住他的领子。
Shen Ying was just about to reach out to grab his collar, just like what she had done to Yu Haiheng earlier.
眼看着就要打在旁边的殿宇之上，思羽脸色一白，突然又追了上去，用力再次朝风刃击出一拳，硬生生使它改变了方向，击在了大殿的门柱上。

The wind blade headed straight for the palace. The color drained from Si Yu's face. She immediately chased after the wind blade and threw another punch toward the wind blade. The wind blade changed its trajectory enough to miss the palace and hit the doorpost in front of the main hall instead.
眼看着郁海衍的风刃，已经到了两人面前了。思羽也只能硬抗，一拳拳挥向那些风刃，可总会有遗漏的，即使是天雷粹练过的身体，也挡不住灵气凝结成的风刃，不时划过血肉翻飞。

The wind blades were just about to hit the two girls. Si Yu had no choice but to try and defend against them. She deflected the wind blades with her fists, but she could not deflect all of them. Even a body that has endured through the Lightning Tribulation could not stand against wind blades which were formed with condensed Spirit Qi. Some of the wind blades cut her body.
眼看着，那道雷就要落在孤月身上。
That bolt of lightning was about to strike at Lonemoon's body.
瞅了瞅自己手里的千叶灵花，再看了看空荡荡的门口。
He looked at the Thousand Leaves Spirit Flower in his hands, then looked up at the empty doorway.
瞅了瞅趴在饭桌上的血人，再看了看手里仅剩的半碗饭，沈萤下意识的就递了过去，“来一碗吗？”
Glancing at the bloody person on the dining table, and then looking at the half-empty bowl of rice in her hand, Shen Ying subconsciously proffered the bowl and asked, "Do you want some?"
瞅着妹子手臂上隐隐鼓起的肱二头肌，他只觉得心底咯噔一下，总算明白哪里不对劲了。
Looking at the biceps on her arm, he had a moment of eureka and finally understood what had been amiss.
瞧这外挂做的好事？！这都是当初她那句，一力降十会害的，才让大家走上歪路。
Look at what this cheat had done! It was all because of that saying, one strong man can overcome ten, that caused everyone to walk on this crooked path.
瞬间他只觉得灵台清明，一直郁结于心底的情绪顿时散得干干净净，体内那层一直无法突破隔墙，隐隐有了倒塌的趋势。

Instantly, a brightness lit up his entire soul, and the self-pity that had been eating away at him vanished. He could feel something in his body stirring; it was as if the wall that been preventing his breakthrough was showing signs of crumbling.
瞬间只见一道黑影，从天而降，嘭的一声砸在地上，半截都陷进了土里。
Suddenly, a black figure plummeted from the sky and crashed to the ground, his lower torso entirely embedded within the earth.
瞬间大殿内就多了四个人。
There were four more people in the hall now.
瞬间对神界充满了排斥感，再次看向眼前的界门，眼神慢慢冷了一下去，深吸了一口气，像是下定了什么决心似的，转头看向沈萤，一字一句的道，“我决定，不回……”

In a moment, he was filled with resentment towardthe divine realm. He looked into the realm gate once more. Then, he clenched his jaw and took a deep breath, as if he had made up his mind. He started to turn to face Shen Ying as he announced, "I have decided not to..."
瞬间，灼热的感觉尽褪，眼前顿时换了一番天地，花草纷芳，绿意遍地。身边围绕着似是七彩霞光一般的仙气。

In an instant, the burning sensation they were feeling faded away, and all at once, a new world appeared in front of them — a green pasture filled with the fresh scent of flowers and plants. Immortal Qi swirled around them like a multi-colored afterglow.
知情观众孤月：“……”
Lonemoon who knew what was going on: "..."
知道这点后，孤月想手撕了沈萤！
After understanding this point, Lonemoon wanted to tear Shen Ying apart with his hands!
短短三天的时间，无敌派的名声就传遍了整个上青界，被迫成为隐世仙门的无敌派，瞬间一跃挤身为一流仙门，而且隐隐凌驾众仙门之上，有与世家比肩的趋势。

Within three days, Invincible Sect became famous throughout the Upper Azure World. They were known for housing a hidden Great Immortal and were now regarded as a top-class immortal sect. Slowly, their ranking creeped above the other immortal sects - they were ranked almost equal with the aristocratic families.
短短不到五分钟的时间，气势汹汹想要灭无敌派满门的十几个化神修士，全灭！
In less than five minutes, the aggressive Soul Formation cultivators, who had come with the intention of destroying the Invincible Sect, were decimated!
短短不过半柱香时间，轩辕禹与印风就见证了，一座豪华别院外加半座仙城，完全变成一片废墟的情景。整个郁家别院甚至再找不着半堵完整的墙，原来大厅的位置更是变成了几十尺宽的大坑。

In less than the time taken to burn half an incense stick, Xuan Yuanyu and Yin Feng had witnessed a luxurious courtyard and half an immortal city reduced to complete ruins. There was not one intact wall to be found in the entire Yu Family courtyard. Where the hall once stood, only a crater of several tens of feet wide remained.
研究到半夜，江逸的伤势倒是全好了，确定不能再研究出其余的功能后，他带着深深的遗憾沉沉睡去，昨夜就一宿没睡了，他终于顶不住了。

After studying till midnight, Jiang Yi's injuries had entirely healed. Confirming that he could no longer discover any other abilities, he went to sleep with deep disappointment. He finally could not take it anymore, after having not slept at all last night.
砰！
BANG!
确定镇西军和灵兽山学院一样将会在三个月后来天羽城招生，整个江家都兴奋忙碌起来，江家家主江云山亲自下令，除了部分天才子弟去武殿闭关外，所有家族子弟不得外出全闭关修炼，争取在三个月后的招生大典上好好表现。

At the news that both the Western Garrison Army and Mt. Spirit Beast College would be visiting Skyplume City to recruit newcomers in three months' time, the entire Jiang Clan became enlivened with enthusiastic preparations. The Jiang Clan Clan Head, Jiang Yunshan, had personally issued an order for all descendants to go into seclusion, in order to make the most of the Grand Audition three months later.
碧涛一边解阵，一边道，“我觉得，那人的目的，多半是里面的化仙丹。”
Bitao explained, "I think that guy was after the Immortal Formation Pill inside the Pill Storage Repository."
碧涛几乎是连滚带爬撑了起来，乖巧的飘向了那面墙，认真开始解阵。好可怕女人，原本以为是个没灵根的凡人，没想到她居然连魂体都可以打，这人一定是上界某位大仙下凡，一定是！

Bitao began to half-crawl and half-roll. Obediently, he floated toward the wall and started to crack the array. This woman was so scary. He had thought that she was a mortal without any Spirit Roots. Little did he know that she could hit even a soul. She must be a Great Immortal of the Upper World, who has descended into the mortal world!
Bitao: “...”
神情却越加严肃的看着下方，果然不到半会，岛上传来轰隆一声响，一个巨大的长条身影从岛上腾飞而出，蛇身鱼尾，头顶还有一只黑色长角，一声尖锐刺耳的长啸响起，那身影直接冲上了空中。

He looked somberly at the island beneath him. A moment later, another loud crash sounded. A big and long figure flew out of the island. It had the body of a snake, the tail of a fish, and black horns on its head. It made a loud, piercing noise and flew straight intot he sky.
神武国以武立国，管理城池的全部都是强大武者，甚至有显著军功的武将还会直接赐予小城作为封地。天羽城城主姬天，就是在十四年前的六国国战中战功彪炳，被赐予羽林偏将，受封天羽城。

The culture and society of Divine Martial Kingdom was built on martial arts. The administrators who run the cities were all powerful martial artists, with military generals wielding significant military prowess even being directly bestowed with entire small cities as vassal territory. The City Lord of Tianyu City Ji Tian had beaten Biao Bing in the Six-Nation War some fourteen years ago and as such was bestowed the title of Yulin Deputy General as well as Skyplume City as his own fiefdom.
神武国首重军功，天羽城城主都是因为军功才被封爵赐城的，能加入神武国三大军团之一的镇西军，那是很荣耀的事情，万一在军中获得军功，封官赐爵，他们家族也能发展壮大，荣耀百年。

Military glory was most valued in Divine Martial Kingdom. The City Lord of Skyplume City was given his lordship as well as command of this city Divine Martial Kingdom precisely because of the military glory he had achieved. Hence, to be able to join the Western Garrison Army, which was one of 's three great armies, was a badge of honor. In the event that a descendant achieved military glory, they would likewise be rewarded with the rank of nobility, and the entire family clan would be able to ride on their coattails of success, sharing the glory for years to come.
禽兽！
You beast!
秘境入口前，上青界的那三个人也到了，他们站在最前面，兴许是已经把秘境只有元婴期以上修士，才能进去的事告诉了众人，三宗六派的很多修士都是一脸失望的样子。

The three people from the Upper Azure World also stood outside the entrance to the mystic realm. They were right in front. From the looks of it, they had just informed the crowd that only cultivators who were at least at the Nascent Soul stage could enter the mystic realm. Many of the cultivators who stood around them had disappointment written all over their faces.
空中的人发出一声警告后，立马就有几人飞出开始结印。不一会只见红光大亮，一道刺目的光芒直逼护山大阵。半会只闻得哐当一声，大阵上顿时出现了几道裂逢。那几个修士却没有停止攻击，反而越加猛烈，整人玄天宗上空都响起轰隆隆的撞击声。

The person in the air sent a warning and a few people immediately flew out and began to conjure up seals. Red lights shone brightly and a ray of glaring light shot directly at the Protective Mountain Array. A loud cracking sound was heard and the huge array immediately cracked. Those cultivators did not stop the attack; instead their attacks grew more intense and the entire sky above Blackheaven Sect was ringing with clashing noises.
空中的局势已经很明朗了，带着一个受伤青尹，青亦只好四下躲避两人的攻击。孤月朝两人冷笑了一声道，“原来上青界的尊者就这点实力？你们那什么世家的长老，也太好混了吧。”

The situation in the air had already become better. With Qing Yin injured, Qing Yi could only try to avoid all the attacks as best as he could. Lonemoon sneered at both of them, "So a Supremacy from the Upper Azure World only has such capabilities? It seems too easy to be an Elder of an aristocratic family."
空中高高飘浮着一面血色的幡旗，大量的鬼气源源不断的从里面溢出，凄厉的鬼叫传来，似是万鬼齐鸣，有什么破幡而出，原本浩月当空，此时已乌云满布，阴风四起。

High above, a blood-red flag was flapping in the air, emitting large amounts of Ghost Qi. Eerie wails, as if emanating from a ghostly orchestra, drifted towards them. Suddenly, something seemed to leap out from the flag. The moon, which had been lighting up the night sky earlier, was now hidden completely by black clouds. Gusts of Yin winds started blowing in from all sides.
穿越后，沈萤遇到的第一个危机——没钱！
After her transmigration into this world, the first crisis Shen Ying encountered was — having no money!
穿过走廊，江逸很快抵达一个大殿内，这个大殿中央盘坐着七八人，竟都带着青铜野兽的面具，很多人身上手臂上还有很明显的伤势，衣袍也有些破烂。大殿四周还有很多小房间，十几个房间内隐约可以听到打斗的声音。

Passing through the corridor, Jiang Yi quickly arrived in the interior of a large hall. Seven or eight people were seated cross-legged in the center of the big hall.
All of them were wearing masks of bronze-green beasts, with many of them having very obvious injuries on their bodies and arms and some even having tattered clothes. There were also many small rooms surrounding the large hall. One could vaguely hear the sounds of combat coming from more than ten of these rooms.
突然——
Suddenly—
突然……
Suddenly...
突然一砣具大的黑气就从旗里弹了下来。
All of a sudden, a copious amount of black gas burst out of the gonfalon.
突然一道浑厚的男声响起，仿佛从天外传来一样，瞬间传到四下。
Suddenly, he heard a man's voice calling out from the horizon. The voice echoed throughout the forest.
突然为门派的前途，无限担忧。
Suddenly, they all began to worry for the future of their sect.
突然了解为啥这个世界人人会飞了，因为地图实在是太大了。出门一趟，把她几年的运动余额都花光了，关键是……没吃到好吃的！（重点）

Shen Ying suddenly realized why everyone could fly in this world; it was because this world was really to big. She had used up a few years of her exercise quota just on this one trip. And the key issue was... she had not had a good meal!
突然他觉得叮的一声，有什么接通的声音。脑海里顿时浮现出一个荒唐的想法，僵硬的转头看向旁边的人，“你……对鬼王做了什么？”
Suddenly, he experienced a moment of eureka; an absurd thought came across his head as he stiffly turned his head towards the person beside him. "You… what did you do to the Ghost King?"
突然却看到右侧的密林中，隐隐闪过一道白光。细一想传送阵好像也是发白光的，心底一喜连忙走了过去。拔开前方的树叶一看，却顿时睁大了眼睛。

Suddenly, she spotted a a flash of light from inside the dense forest to her right. She recalled that the transportation array also emitted white light, rejoiced in her heart and walked toward the dense forest. She brushed aside the leaves in front of her. Then, her eyes widened.
突然她肩膀一重，引动的灵气顿时一散，身侧有人直接上前一步。
Suddenly, her shoulder was pushed down and the Spirit Qi she had triggered dissipated at that moment as the girl beside her took a step forward.
突然它张大嘴，朝着阵法上猛力一咬，随着咔嚓一声响，阵法顿时化为万千碎片消失。背云兽也猛的张开了眼睛，而且看起来比刚刚还要愤怒。张口吐出一道道利刺，铺天盖地的朝着易峰刺了过去。

Suddenly, the beast opened its mouth and bit at the array. There was a loud tearing sound as the array got torn to shreds and disappeared. The Cloud-Bearing Beast opened its eyes once again, looking even angrier than before. it began to shoot needles from its mouth at Yi Feng.
突然就想起了沈萤昨天秒拒他的那句话：物种不同，不能恋爱！明明当初初见的时候，她挺喜欢自己的。还摸……摸了……为啥要拒绝他？

Suddenly, he remembered the words of rejection Shen Ying had spoken to him the day before: Different species cannot fall in love! She was clearly fond of him the first day that they met. He even touched... touched... why was she rejecting him?
突然张嘴就朝着地上啃了过去。
In a fllash, it opened its mouth and bit at the ground.
突然有些怀疑，邀她来抓灵兽这个决定的正确性。
Suddenly, he began to doubt the correctness of her decision to catch spirit beasts.
突然有种想散伙的冲动。
Lonemoon suddenly had the urge to dissolve this partnership of theirs.
突然的动静，就连旁边的女子也转头看了一眼地上的兽，“猫？”
The sudden movement caused the girl beside Yi Feng to turn around and look at the creature on the ground. She asked, "Cat?"
突然觉得玄天宗，前途堪忧！
Lonemoon suddenly felt deep worry for the future prospect of Blackheaven!
突然觉得自己来得有点多余！
I suddenly feel I’m not needed!
突然轰隆一声响，刚刚就已经被砸出个大洞的门，终于倒了下来。满天灵剑，唰啦啦的飞了进来，顿时插了满地都是。
Suddenly a loud boom was heard, and the door which had a big hole smashed through it finally fell to the ground. Spirit swords came flying inside and the whole area was immediately full of them.
突然青岚抓剑的手一重，刚凝出灵力顿时一散，他的手居然被人一把抓住了。
Suddenly, Qing Lan's sword stopped. The Spiritual Power that he had concentrated suddenly dissipated. Something had stopped his hand.
突然，一道雷光从天而降，轰隆一声打在了背云兽的头上。
Suddenly, a flash of lightning struck the Cloud-Bearing Beast's head.
突然，他脑海内闪过一个念头，眸子一下亮若星辰，他的黑色元力可以增强药效？刚才那人阶上品灵神丹，就很有可能是因为黑色元力使得药力增强，变成了地阶丹药的。

Suddenly, a thought flashed past his mind. His eyes shone brightly like stars. Could his black essence force increase medicinal effects? That Man-tier superior-grade Spirit Pills just now had become Earth-tier elixirs, their medical healing power increasing very likely a result of the black essence force.
突然，天空轰隆一声响，一道更加恐怖的雷光，凌空而下，直劈向完全没了反抗之力的孤月。
Suddenly, a loud boom came from the sky and an even more terrifying bolt of lightning descended, heading straight for Lonemoon, who had no more power of resistance left.
突然，平地暴风骤起，只见那剑身顿时化出一道亮如白日的剑光，跨横天地间。随着沈萤的挥势，瞬间横扫而去，轰隆一声巨响，整个海岛瞬间被劈成两半。而那剑光还未停下，直接往着远处而去，直接扫过不远处的玄天宗，把右上方的一座浮峰劈开，直入大海，最终消失在天际。

Suddenly, a hurricane seemed to form out of nowhere and the sword emitted a beam of light as bright as daylight, arching over the earth and across the sky. Shen Ying swung the sword down. There was a loud boom and the entire island was split in two. The sword beam continued moving straight ahead, directly sweeping through the nearby Blackheaven Sect, splitting apart a mountain on the upper right of the sect, then shooting straight into the sea, before finally disappearing into the horizon.
突然，整个练功房墙壁上光芒一闪，江逸莫名的感觉到一股力量禁锢了他般，他慌忙移动身体却发现没有半点影响，下意识的催动元力才发现不能再调动一丝蓝色元力。

Suddenly, the walls of the entire technique practicing room shone with brilliant rays of light. Jiang Yi felt an indescribable force that seemed to confine him tightly in shackles. He hurriedly tried to move his body but found no physical influence or change whatsoever. It was only when he set his mind to move his essence force that he realized he could not circulate even a sliver of blue essence force.
突然，柳长老眸子内闪过一丝惊疑声，那一掌也收了回来，他目光疑惑的注视着丹炉内唯一剩下的两枚丹药，感觉似乎……和原先炼制的灵神丹有些不同？

Suddenly, Elder Liu paused, bewildered. He retracted his hand in the process. He stared in curiosity and suspicion at the two remaining elixirs left in the cauldron. He felt as though... they were different from the Spirit Pills he was originally refining.
突然，自火焰中传出一声碎响，只见天帝手中的火龙剑忽然碎裂为数块碎片朝四面八方飞射出去。
Suddenly, a loud explosion sounded from the fire as Celestial Thearch's sword broke into tiny shards and shot out in all directions.
立马抓紧机会结印，布完了剩下的阵法，顿时空中就出现了一个巨大的阵图，金色的法符文字在阵中流转，缓缓的朝下方的巨兽落了下去。

He immeditaely conjured a seal and made use of his remaining arrays. A huge array chart appeared in the air and words from his golden dharmic talisman began to flow in the chart. The entire chart slowly descended toward the beast.
第101次后悔，当初干嘛脑抽跟着这两坑货一起上界，还TM头脑发热的直接得罪了个世家。前途灰暗有没有？他叹了一声，瞅瞅一边苦恼自己的存在感，一边还完全没受影响吃着饭的某人，突然想起一件事，“对了沈萤，你找他们家主的时候，除了算清楚他们夺宝的事，没发生什么别的事吧？”他可不想再惹出什么事来。

He felt regret for the 101th time — why had he stupidly followed these two worthless creatures to the Upper World, and even rashly offended an aristocratic family? Didn’t the future seem a little bleak? He sighed, and looked at the one who was distressed about her lack of presence, and the other who was unaffected and eating his meal. He suddenly recalled something. "Oh right, Shen Ying. When you went to look for the master of that family, apart from settling the score for them snatching the treasures, nothing else happened right?" He did not want to stir up any trouble.
第20章 天赋异禀
Chapter 20: The Mysteriously Endowed Natural Talent
第一天的初赛其实是走个过场，跟开幕式差不多，重要的是第三天的决赛。所以各门派高手，也只是在专门劈出来的高台看了一二个时辰，就开始陆陆续续的离场了。就连郁易两家也已经离开了看台。

The first day of the preliminary rounds was a mere formality like an opening ceremony. The important part would be the finals on the third day. The experts of every sect only watched for a few hours from the audience platform before they began leaving in succession. Even both the Yu and Yi Family left.
第一次和如此级别的武者对战，江逸不敢马虎，第一时间运转了一次黑色元力去了眼睛，背部微微弓起，目光灼灼的盯着对方的一举一动。

Facing off such a strong opponent for the first time, Jiang Yi could not afford to be sloppy. He transferred a wisp of black essence force at once and hunched his back slightly, sharp gaze tracking his opponent's every move.

第二十章 小说剧情
Chapter 20: The Novel's Storyline
第二天一大早轩辕禹就来请沈萤一同观赛了，背后还跟着自己家嫡系的几名弟子，他们都很客气。相较于家主对沈萤的客气，那些弟子仿佛对羿清和孤月更加尊敬些，估计是揍的人不同。

Early the next day, Xuan Yuanyu invited Shen Ying to watch the competition with him. Behind him followed several disciples from the Xuan Yuan Family bloodline. Each one of them was courteous. While the Family Master was extra courteous to Shen Ying, the disciples were extra courteous to Yi Qing and Lonemoon. Evidently, each of them from the Xuan Yuan Family feared different people.
第二天天还没亮，江逸就醒来要上西山清点，江小奴却闹着要出去做工，被他狠狠训斥了一顿不敢多言了。

Before dawn broke the next day, Jiang Yi was already awake, and had to head to the Western Hills to take stock. Jiang Xiaonu, however, once again disturbed him and demanded to head out to work. It was only after he had viciously reprimanded her that she no longer dared to speak another word.
第二天江逸早早的做好了荣管事交代的差事，就又去武殿了。杨管事再次给了三枚灵神丹，一整天除了翊凌雪点名要江逸出战了一场外，杨总管没有叫江逸一次，让他专心修炼。

The next day, after finishing the tasks given by Chief Rong early in the morning, Jiang Yi once again went over to the Martial Arts Hall. Manager Yang once again gave him three Spirit Pills. For the rest of the entire day, besides Yi Lingxue ordering Jiang Yi specifically by name to join her in a practice match as a sparring partner, Manager Yang did not call out Jiang Yi once and instead allowed him to concentrate on cultivating his power.
第二天，江逸还是一个人修炼了整整一天，柳长老还是不见人影，江逸心里有种淡淡的不祥预感，不过他可不敢独自找去柳长老住的院子找他，只能闷闷的回到家中。

The next day, Jiang Yi did refining practice for an entire day on his own, for Elder Liu was still missing. Jiang Yi had a faintly ominous premonition in his heart, but as he did not dare to visit by himself the courtyard where Elder Liu stayed to find the elder, he had no choice but to melancholically make his way home.
第二日天刚刚亮，江逸就被外面的敲门声惊醒了，江逸打开房门，外面不出意外是钱万贯那张滚圆的脸，江逸好奇的问道：“怎么那么早？难道今日学院要召开新生欢迎仪式什么的？”

At the break of dawn, Jiangyi woke up, startled by the knocking on his door. Jiang Yi pushed his door open, and with little surprise, was greeted by Qian Wanguan's chubby face. Jiangyi asked out of curiosity, "What brings you here at this early hour? Is the Academy hosting a Welcome Ceremony for the new batch of students?
第二日天还没亮，江逸就醒来了，打坐了一个时辰江水决，吃完早饭他交代江小奴这几天没事就去春芽家躲躲，避免江如虎找麻烦就匆匆朝炼丹房走去。

The next day, Jiang Yi was already up before daybreak. He meditated for two hours practicing the Jiang Water Art. After breakfast, he instructed Jiang Xiaonu to hide at Chun Ya's house for the next few days if she was not busy, in case Jiang Ruhu came looking for trouble. He then made his way to the alchemy lab.
第二次醒来的时候，他还是躺在那里，连身都没翻一下，这次比上次好，隐隐能听到声音了。
The second time he awoke, he was still lying there, his position unchanged. He felt better this time and he could vaguely hear the sound of voices.

On the tenth day, as per their agreement, Manager Yang gave an advance of ten taels of purple gold to Jiang Yi. After Jiang Yi received his purple gold, without wasting a single second, he apologised to Manager Yang and, burning with much anxiety, rushed over to the Fengyue Brothel.

Chapter 4: Jiang Xiaonu
等两人急忙赶回门派的时候，却发现某人正一脸淡定的坐在后殿的石桌前，身前围了一群身着各色衣衫，嘘寒问暖的妹子们。

By the time the two of them made it back to the sect, they realized that Shen Ying was already sitting at the stone table at the rear hall. Her expression was calm and in front of her stood a group of girls dressed in robes of various colours, fussing over Shen Ying.
等了一会，江逸正准备和杨管事去告别回家，走廊外突然响起一阵脚步声，江逸扫了一眼，连忙身子一缩坐了回去。

After waiting for a while, Jiang Yi was just getting ready to say farewell to Manager Yang and return home, when the sound of footsteps suddenly rang from outside the corridor. Jiang Yi gave a quick glance, before promptly contracting his body and returned back to his sitting position.
等他走出小房间后，却看到翊凌雪旁边多了一个白色的身影，也是一个漂亮的小姐，年纪和翊凌雪差不多，身材倒是没有她那么火爆，长相倒是更胜一分。

When he came out of his room, Jiang Yi saw that there was someone dressed in white standing beside Yi Lingxue. She was a lovely young mistress around Yi Lingxue's age, and although her figure was not as curvaceous, she looked even more beautiful than Yi Lingxue.
等众人退后，江逸才松了一口气，今日震慑住所有人，他就安全了，否则他难逃被众人群殴的结局。

It was only when everyone had retreated backward that Jiang Yi breathed a sigh of relief. Having shocked and intimidated every single opponent that day, he would finally be safe; otherwise, he would find difficulty escaping from ending up being atatcked from all sides and beaten up by all his opponents.
等反应过来时，对方手里已经拿着他们亲自按了手印的契约书了。
By the time Yin Feng realized he had gotten the shorter end of the stick, Lonemoon was holding onto the contract stamped with both parties' personal hand prints.
等在客栈的呈安与众弟子：“……”师叔到底什么时候回来撤掉这个阵法？
Cheng An and the other disciples remained at the inn. "When will Uncle-Master come back to remove this array formation?"
等大门关闭后，那冷冰冰的少爷才开口道：“在下翊龙宇，苍狼，我听雪儿说过很多次你，还请你全力出手和我对战一场。”

The aloof young master waited till the doors were closed before introducing himself, "Yours truly, Yi Longyu. Lone Wolf, I have heard Xue-er mention you many times. Please battle me with everything you've got."
等她收完海鲜回到岸边的时候，易峰已经坐在一边的岩石上，发了近一个小时的呆了。看了她一眼，下意识的就往后退了一步。
By the time she had finished packing her seafood, Yi Feng had been sittiing on a rock, staring blankly into space for over an hour. He glanced at her and subconsciously took a step back.
等小奴走后，江逸这才怔怔地坐在床上，整理乱成一团麻的脑海。
Only after Xiaonu left did Jiang Yi sit on his bed in a daze. He took the opportunity to clear his cluttered and messy mind.
等所有人消失在西山，半山腰内才走出一个羸弱的身影，他隐约听到江如鹰的话语，脸上都是轻松之色。

It was only after everyone had disappeared from the Western Hills that a frail figure walked out from the mid-way point on the mountain. He had vaguely heard Jiang Ruying's words and, as such, his face gave off an expression of relief.
等江如虎走后，江逸从丹房内走出来，他脸色很是淡然，眸子内都是自信。十天时间他完全可以轻松修炼到铸鼎境二重，到时候江如虎敢来，谁爬回江家大院还不一定呢……

Once Jiang Ruhu was gone, Jiang Yi walked out from inside the Alchemy Lab. His face gave off a look of indifference, while his eyes showed off his self-confidence.
In ten days, he could easily train up to the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. At that moment, should Jiang Ruhu dare to show up, it would be uncertain who would be crawling back to the central court of the Jiang Residence...
等江松彻底消失了，江逸脸色才平和下来，眸子内却闪过一丝忧色。
It was only when Jiang Song had completely disappeared that Jiang Yi calmed down. However, his pupils revealed a flash of worry.
等江逸大步朝走廊内行去，那黑甲护卫才松了一口，如释重负叹道：“总算又招到一个，唉……这灵兽山学院一招生，天羽城的公子小姐都疯了一般，没日没夜的修炼，对练。这就算找一百个陪练也不够他们玩啊，这小子才铸鼎境一重，不知能坚持多久？可别半个时辰不到就爬出来……”

The guard wearing black armor waited for Jiang Yi to walk with big steps through the corridor into the inner bowels of the building before finally heaving a sigh of relief.
As though he was relieved of a heavy burden, he sighed and said, "Finally, I've recruited one person. Once this Spirit Beast College started recruiting students, the young masters and young mistresses in Skyplume City have endlessly trained their cultivation techniques and practiced their martial arts techniques, as though they've all gone mad.
"With this circumstance, even if we manage to find a hundred sparring partners, it will not be enough to fulfill their demands and accompany them in their fun!
"This boy only has his power level at the first stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. Who knows how long he can possibly maintain his post? I hope he does not crawl out after less than one hour..."
等江逸愁眉苦脸的回到自家小院，江小奴已经做好了早饭，正坐在台阶上托着下巴等他回来，一张精致的小脸上都是忧色。看到江逸走进来，连忙紧张的说道：“少爷，你去哪了？急死我了，春芽可是听人说了，一大早江如虎带人就去西山截你了，你可前往别上西山啊……”

By the time the miserable Jiang Yi returned to the small courtyard of his own home, Jiang Xiaonu had already finished making breakfast and was sitting on the entrance stairway, propping her chin on her hand and waiting for him to return. Her delicate face was filled with worry.
When she saw Jiang Yi enter, she hurriedly and nervously asked, "Young Master, where have you been? You've worried me sick! Chun Ya heard someone say that Jiang Ruhu had led people to the Western Hills since dawn to intercept you! Don't you think of heading up to the Western Hills..."
等江逸的身影消失在远处的小巷内，江小奴挥手的动作陡然停了下来，脸上的笑容也瞬间凝固，眼中两行清泪无声的留下，她望着江逸离去的方向，轻声的喃喃起来：“少爷，小奴虽然不知道发生了什么事情，但我知道肯定出大事了，否则你不会抛下小奴的！少爷，你别担心我，放手去做你想做的事情，小奴在家等着你回来，如果……你死了，小奴也一定不会独活，去了冥界小奴还做你的侍女。”

It was only until Jiang Yi's figure disappeared in the distant alleyway that Jiang Xiaonu's waving stumbled to a stop and her smile froze instantly. Tears streaming silently down her face, she gazed in the direction Jiang Yi had gone and murmured, "Young Master, Xiaonu doesn't know what has happened, but something must have gone seriously wrong, or you would not have left Xiaonu like this! Young Master, don't you worry about me, be free to do whatever you wish, I will be waiting for you at home. If... you were to die, Xiaonu would not live this life either. Xiaonu would still be your maidservant in the Netherworld Realm."
等江逸走了一会后，鹤大师才挥退了刘管事和侍女，朝姬听雨问道：“小姐，这丹药除了丹纹外全无价值，而且药效不明，卖不出去的，你怎么全收啊？还有……要不要派人跟踪他？”

Master He waited until Jiang Yi had left for some time before dismissing Housekeeper Liu and the maidservant. He turned to Ji Tingyu and asked, "Young Mistress, besides the vein patterns, this pill is completely valueless; its medical effects are also unclear. We can't sell this off at all. How could you have accepted all of them? On top of that... should we send someone to follow him?"
等灵神丹的药力笼罩丹田，江逸立即调集一丝黑色元力融合药力，接着全力运转江水决。

Once the medical efficacy powers of the Spirit Pills had enveloped his dantian, Jiang Yi immediately assembled a wisp of black essence force and combined it with the medical efficacy power, before circulating the Jiang Water Art technique with all my might.
等等……
Wait...
等等！
Wait a moment!
等等！刚刚她是想说厨子吧？绝对是的吧？！
Wait a minute! She just used the word chef? That was definitely what she said, right!?
等等！那个笛子和玉牌也有点眼熟，他下意识往身侧的储物袋里一探，“卧槽，为什么会在你手上？”啥时候愉的，他完全没有印象啊。

Wait a second! That flute and jade piece seemed familiar too, and he subconsciously searched his storage bag. "Holy shit, why are they in your hands?" When were they stolen? He had no recollection of it.
等等！难道是……
Wait a moment! Could it be…
筑基到是好一些，但一番打斗下来，她们也只有一人进入了五强，就败下阵来。能拿到第五名，已经是意外之喜了。可没想到更惊喜却是金丹组的。他们居然直接进入了最后三强的最终决赛。

The Foundation Establishment disciples did slightly better. After a round of fighting, however, one of them made it to the top five fighters and was defeated. It was already a pleasant surprise that one of them managed to clinch fifth place. What was more surprising was the Golden Core group. Their sect had actually made it into the top three.
答案是肯定的！
The answer is definitely a 'Yes'!
管事一怔，脸上立即露出灿烂的微笑，招手道：“来人，上好茶！”
The housekeeper was startled for a second but quickly revealed a bright smile on his face. Waving his hand, he ordered, "Someone come over here, and serve some premium tea!"
管事似乎也不想和江逸多说，和一名护卫交代道：“去取令牌来。”
The housekeeper did not have much to say to Jiang Yi either. "Go get the command token," he instructed one of the guards instead.
管事和一名护卫打了个眼色，让他安排马家少爷上楼，这才接过江逸的金叶子，斜着眼睛随口教训道：“小子！下次可别那么冲动，这次算是给你们江家面子了……”

The housekeeper glanced at a guard, signaling him to take the Ma Family young master upstairs. Only then did he deign to take the purple gold leaves from Jiang Yi, all the while looking sideways at him, chiding, "You little brat! You'd better not act so brazenly next time, consider this as me giving face to the Jiang Clan..."
管事嘿嘿一笑道：“那是，那是，不过视察楼子内的姑娘这也是正事啊，您说是不？”
The housekeeper grinned roguishly, "Indeed, indeed. Although wouldn't you say that inspecting the girls in this brothel is in itself a part of business?"
管事很快出去取了一片小小的金叶子递给江逸，姬听雨才微笑说道：“易公子，以后如果有这样的丹药，你尽管来我们聚珍阁，我们全要！而且一律按三枚一两紫金收购，品阶高我们还会出高价，当然……你必须取得炼制这丹药的大师同意。”

The housekeeper hastily went to fetch a piece of tiny gold leaf and passed to Jiang Yi. It was only then that Ji Tingyu smiled faintly and said, "Young Master Yi, if you have any more of such elixirs in the future, please feel free to come to Pearl Gathering Pavilion! We want themn all! On top of that, we will buy all of them based on the rate of one tael of purple gold for three pills; if the grading is higher than this, we will even offer an even higher price. Of course... you would need to get the permission of the alchemist who refined this pill."
管事房内，荣管事听完江逸的话后勃然大怒，一拍桌子站了起来就要训斥，但他话还没出口，却被两片递过来的金叶子吸引了。

In his quarters, Chief Rong flew into a rage upon Jiang Yi's words. Slamming down on the table, he shot up from the chair, ready to give Jiang Yi a dressing-down. Before any reproval could pass his lips however, Chief Rong became distracted by the two pieces of gold leaf that made their way under his nose.
管事点了点头，不冷不热的说道：“那好，请跟我来。”
The housekeeper nodded his head and nonchalantly replied, "Very well then, please follow me."
管事点了点头，又询问道：“请问客人的丹药是什么品阶？如果是人阶下品的话……”
The housekeeper nodded his head and asked, "Can I ask you, dear guest, what is the quality grade of your elixir? If it is just Man-tier inferior-grade..."
管事老头连忙赔笑道：“翊小姐，都在陪练呢，要不你再等等？”
The elderly manager smiled and quickly replied, "Young Mistress Yi, they are all busy sparring with other partners. Why don't you wait just a little longer?"
管事阴鸷的眸子在江逸背后的江小奴身上一扫，冷笑道：“要么赔钱，要么这丫头留下为奴十年，要么……你留下一只手！”

The malicious eyes of the housekeeper glanced at Jiang Xiaonu, who was standing behind Jiang Yi, before coldly laughing and replying, "Either you pay up, this girl stays here as a slave for ten years, or... you leave one hand behind!"
System: "..."
素菜家长是什么鬼？总觉得大仙对自己的称呼一直都在变。
What the hell is Master of the Vegetable Family? Why did he feel like the Great Immortal was always calling him something different?
紧接着又是嘭的一声，一个人影掉在了院子里，血花飞溅染了一地，原本的白衣已经被染红了一半，上面布满各种伤口。

Then a loud boom resounded, closely followed by a person falling into the yard, his blood splattering all over the place. His originally white shirt was half stained with blood and he was covered in numerous wounds.
紧接着地面轰隆隆一阵地动山摇。仿佛地龙过境一般，从振祥被埋的地方起，整个大地开始开裂，街道翻起，楼房歪斜，尘土飞扬。倾刻之间，整个上青城被一条条巨大的裂缝撕得四分五裂。

What followed after that was a loud clashing noise as the earth trembled and the nearby mountains swayed. As if an earth dragon had passed by the place Zhen Xiang was buried at, the entirety of the surrounding earth began to crack, the roads were flipped and the houses became crooked as dust flew everywhere. Within a moment, the entire Upper Azure Town was broken and torn apart by the large cracks on the ground.
红衣妹子。
Red shirt girl.
练功房内，江逸尴尬的望着对面这位美得令人窒息的姬家小姐，目光闪烁都有些不敢直视了，还好他带着面具，姬听雨看不到他发烫的脸。

In the Technique Practising Room, Jiang Yi awkwardly glanced at the alluring and beautiful young lady from the Ji Family standing opposite him. His evasive gaze was ysmbolic of his fear of looking at her directly. Thankfully for him, he was wearing a mask, so Ji Tingyu could not see his blushing-hot face.
细一看上面的百名修士，众人不禁都倒吸了口气，里面居然有十几位化神修士，领头的五位更是游仙，其它的人不是元婴就是金丹，居然找不出一个金丹以下的修士。

Upon taking a closer look at the hundreds of cultivators above, everybody sucked in their breath as they realized there were quite a few Soul Formation cultivators, and the five that were leading them were Traveling Immortals. The others were either of the Nascent Soul or Golden Core stage; not one was below Golden Core.
细一看，才发现，这是一间石室，很是宽广，而地上坐满了刚刚一起入塔的修士们，只是好似陷入到了什么幻镜之中，个个面露痛苦之色，醒不过来。

Squinting, he found that he had entered a wide stone room. Seated on the floor were all the cultivators who entered the pagoda. Each of them looked as though they were stuck in some imaginery world - they all had pained expressions but were unconscious.
细想一下，他醒来后，的确没见到过芮糜的身影。再怎么说他也算是个金丹魔修，除非同阶的剑修，或是元婴修士出手，否则谁也拿他没办法。若沈萤真的只是个一点修为都没有的凡人，是不可能在对方手上逃脱的。

Upon deeper thought, he remembered that after he woke up there was indeed no sign of Rui Mi. In any case, he was a Golden Core Fiend Cultivator, so unless one had achieved an equal stage in sword cultivation, or a Nascent Soul cultivator came to help, nobody would be able to do anything to him. If Shen Ying were only a mortal with no cultivation, it would have been impossible to escape from the opponent's clutches.
细数下来，除了各家家主，还有八个游仙。他跟羿清一人四个想想都吃力，再加上他刚刚还受了点伤，虽然不是很严重，但也是有影响的。

Apart from the family masters, there were eight other Traveling Immortals. Lonemoon and Yi Qing each had to take on four of them - just thinking about it tired him out. The fact that he sustained injuries in the earlier level made matters worse. He was not seriously injured, but it did affect his performance.
终于吃饱喝足的一行人，没费什么功夫，在没惊动太虚派的情况下，直接就到了悟剑峰底。
Finally having eaten their fill, the group managed to reach the base of Mt. Sword Comprehension Peak without much effort and without alerting the Grand Vacuity Sect to their presence.
终于接到贺礼的兔王，打开盒子内那块皱巴巴的白布，瞬间脚下一软，差点从王座上摔了下去。
The Rabbit Monarch finally received the gift. On seeing the limp piece of white cloth. he picked it up, ready to throw it from his throne.
终于飞过来的易峰，不敢置信的看着空中落下的人，脱口而出，“灵主！”
Yi Feng, who had finally made it to Shen Ying's side, could not believe his eyes. "Spirit Master!"
终于，第一道劫雷劈了下来。笔直的打在了场中的孤月身上。他周身的阵法瞬间就被攻碎了，身下的地面都陷下去了好几尺。庞大的天地威压，更是朝着四周扩散而去，若不是有护山大阵，四周殿宇估计全要化为灰烬。

At last, the first streak of Lightning Tribulation struck directly at Lonemoon. The array formation around him were all shattered, and the ground around him sank by a few feet. The suppression aura of heaven and earth started spreading outwards. If it were not for the Protective Mountain Array, the palace would have been burned to ashes.
终于，那管事抬头望着江逸，点头道：“我给你们江家一个面子，江家子弟想然也会言而有信。当然……如果一个月后你不赔钱，我会拿着这令牌去你们江家刑堂要钱，你们走吧。”

Finally, the housekeeper raised his head to look at Jiang Yi, before nodding his head and replied, "I will give face to the Jiang Clan - after all, the Jiang Clan members are doubtlessly true to their word. Of course... If you fail to repay the money in a month's time, I will take this token to your Jiang Clan’s Disciplinary Court to demand the money. You guys can go now."
经过一上午的观察，江逸倒是大概懂了这炼丹的步骤，炼丹分为熔炼、化丹、回炉三步，让他绝望的是，这炼丹第一步熔炼药材和第三步回炉丹成倒是好办，第二步化丹他却是完全看不懂。

After observing for an entire morning, Jiang Yi could understand more or less the steps involved in refining elixirs. The refinement of elixirs had three steps: smelting, forming, and melting down. What made him despair was that the first step of melting down the ingredients and the third step of reheating the elixirs were easy to do, but he could not understand the second step of forming the elixirs at all.
结束了。
It was over.
结果……
Alas, in the end…
结果只是片刻时间，练功房的房门就打开了，那陪练的武者跌跌撞撞的走出来，戴着的野猪面具都吊在脖子上，露出一张满是鲜血的脸。那翊小姐的身影出现在门口，对着杨管事冷哼道：“杨管事，这铜牌陪练实力怎么那么差？换一个。”

In the end, it was only a short moment of time before the door to the technique-practicing room opened. "Wild Boar" staggered out. His mask hung from his neck, revealing a face filled with fresh blood. The silhouette of Young Mistress Yi appeared at the door.
She coldly snorted at Manager Yang and said, "Manager Yong, why is the strength of this bronze-token-grade sparring partner so weak? Get me another one."
结果思羽这一出门，直到下午都没回来，沈萤有点不放心，让萝卜和郁红找了出去。可一直到晚上，别说思羽，郁红和萝卜都没了人影，连孤月都回来了，不会真出什么事了吧？

After Si Yu stepped out of the door, she stayed out all afternoon. Shen Ying got worried and asked Radish and Yu Hong to go out to search for her. But none of them came back even after the sun set and Lonemoon returned. Did something happen?
结果确认后，大长老一怒之下亲自去藏书阁把他权限以内可以挑选的，涵盖不少领域的数十本修炼心法统统取了出来，让江逸一本书一本书地，一个系别一个系别地尝试。因为哪怕江逸适合修炼的是某个系别最低等级的心法，只要能有普通人的速度，以他的武学悟性来说，依然是有望成才的。

When he realized this unusual circumstance, an irritated Grand Elder personally went to his private library. Out of the countless books available, he gathered dozens of different books dedicated to the practice of mental cultivation and gave them to Jiang Yi to practice the proposed methods book by book, style by style.
Regardless of whether Jiang Yi was only suited to practice the lowest level of mental cultivation abilities or not, as long as he learned it at the speed of an average person, with his instincts in martial arts, he would definitely be able to master them and become a powerful martial artist.
结果自然不言而喻，江逸就算不动用黑色元力，经过这段时间不断的对练，反应速度和战斗本能也绝不是这骄傲的翊家小姐可比的。

The result was unsurprising. Even without the black essence force, Jiang Yi's speed of reaction and fighting instincts were continuously enhanced after so many sparring matches. The proud young mistress of the Yi Family was naturally no match against him.
结果足足一整天，柳长老依旧没有出现。江逸纳闷了，按理柳长老应该会继续试验啊，怎么一天都没出现？不过柳长老不在，江逸乐得清闲，修炼了一整天封印上的符文又破解了二十枚，江水决的修炼速度继续提升。

Elder Liu did not show up for the entire day. Jiang Yi was perplexed. In theory, Elder Liu would be rearing to continue his experiments. Why did he not turn up for an entire day? However, with Elder Liu not being around, Jiang Yi was able to enjoy his idle moments. He was able to practice refining the entire day and shaved twenty characters off the runic patterns of his seal. The refining speed of his Jiang Water Art likewise continued to grow.
结果这次丹田内却又开始产生黑色元力了，而等黑色元力积累到十缕之后，又不再增加了……
The result was that his dantian once again started producing black essence force; yet once the ten strands of this essence force had been collated, the numbers did not increase again...
结果，让他很是无语的是，内堂一个穿着褐色长袍，披头散发，如一个疯子般的老头正围着一个丹炉瞪着大眼睛细细查看，而平时在丹药房帮忙的一位江家旁系子弟江松却并没有在丹药房内。

In the end what left him truly speechless was an old man in the inner part of the room, wearing a long brown robe with disheveled hair like a madman, standing around a cauldron and staring into it with his eyes wide open. As for the Jiang Clan collateral descendant who was normally in the Elixir Room helping, Jiang Song, he was not in the Elixir Room.
继续？继续啥？
Get on with it? Get on with what?
缓缓转过头看了过来，整个庞大的身影抖了抖，突然吸了吸鼻子，眼泪顿时哗啦一下就涌了出来，止都止不住的那种，指了指地上的铃铛开始嚎啕大哭起来，“掌门，铃……铃……我的铃……哇啊……”

Si Yu slowly turned and looked over, the entirety of her huge frame shaking. She sniffled as an uncontrollable flood of tears came gushing out her eyes. Pointing at the bell on the ground, she wailed, "Sect Master, the bell… bell… My bell… wa…"
群山围绕，几十座浮峰高悬于空中，仙气缭绕，宛如仙境。而在浮峰的右侧不远，一座完全不同的山峰浮于众峰之上。那山比其它浮峰要小数十倍，却被一层透明的屏障包裹在里面，而浮峰的山顶上，亮着一道直达天际的光。

The sect was surrounded by floating mountains, and the numerous peaks were suspended in the sky, enclosed by a thick mist of Immortal Qi — like a scene from a fairyland. Not far from the right of the floating peaks, a completely different mountain peak floated among the other peaks. This mountain was ten times smaller than the other floating peaks, but it was enclosed in a transparent shield. On the top of this floating peak, there was a beam of light that stretched right across the horizon.
群情激愤的浪潮里，突然出现了一个反对的声音，虽然声音不大，但成功引起了众妖的注意。呼喊声一停，所有妖的视线齐唰唰的刺了过去。

The objection that suddenly sounded amid the fervent demons managed to capture the attention of the demons despite being faint. The roarings came to an abrupt halt, and all the demons immediately scanned their surroundings for the perpetrator.
羿清一咬牙，运起全身灵气强站了起来，挥出一剑，叮的一声，险险挡住了对方的威压中的攻击。
Yi Qing fritted his teeth. He used all the Spirit Qi he had left in his body to stand back up on his feet and wave his sword. Ding! He deflected the suppressive force that was headed toward him.
羿清一急，想要过去却动弹不得，“师父，小……”
Anxious, Yi Qing tried to get up but to no avail. "Master, be care-…"
羿清一惊，“原来师父与他，还有这般渊缘！”难怪孤月尊者日日来此，又不进来。原来是近乡情怯，想要与师父一叙同乡之情。

Shocked, Yi Qing said, "So he and Master actually has such an affinity!" No wonder Supremacy Lonemoon came over here everyday but did not come in. It was all because of the affection and sentiment towards his hometown that made him want to look for Master to reminisce it.
羿清一惊，“师父是说……”
“Do you mean……”Shocked, Yi Qing said.
羿清一惊，这人居然是——孤月！
Yi Qing started. This man is Lonemoon!
羿清一愣，皱头紧了紧，这还是第一次，有人一眼看出他是天生剑体。
Yi Qing brows tightened, somewhat surprised. This was the first time someone had been able to tell that he was an Innate Sword Embodiment at one glance.
羿清一愣，立马又站直了一些，一脸严肃的道，“师父放心，我一定会守好这里的。绝对不会再让任何人靠近打扰师父。”他就不信了，还有人敢在他眼皮底下抢人。

Yi Qing hesitated, immediately standing straighter, before answering seriously, "Master, rest assured. I will guard this place well. Nobody can come near to disturb Master again." He did not believe that there would be anyone who would still dare to snatch her away right under his nose.
羿清一愣，脸上的愧疚越加的重，放下锅铲朝着她行了个礼，“您看出来了？果然什么事都瞒不过师父的眼睛。”
Stunned, pangs of guilt weighed Yi Qing down even more. He put down the ladle and bowed towards her, saying, "Have you seen through me? It is truly impossible to hide anything from Master."
羿清一愣，顿时一脸的受伤，“徒儿不能听吗？”
Yi Qing hesitated. He looked wounded and asked, "Can't your disciple listen?"
羿清一时不察，被余压扫到，瞬间气血翻涌，张口吐出一口血。
Yi Qing did not notice in time and was within range of the suppressive aura; he immediately vomited a mouthful of blood.
羿清一看，对方虽只是个练气九层的年轻修士，却穿着一身三阶法衣，想必是修仙世家的公子，手里还捧着一个黑色的盒子，应该是刚刚拍到的法器。

Yi Qing took a look at this person, and realized that despite only being a young, level nine cultivator, he was wearing third stage Dharma clothing which meant that he had to be a Young Master from a family of immortal cultivators.
