In his hand was a black box, most probably a Dharma artifact that he had just bidded for.
羿清一看，居然是极为少见的万年冰参！看来是他想多了，这种修补经脉的圣药，就算在三宗六派也是极为少有的。她居然这么随意的就拿给他疗伤！这姑娘也太良善了。

Taking a look at it, Yi Qing saw to his surprise that it was a rare ten thousand year-old Ice Ginseng! It looked like he had overthought things, for this kind of sacred herb, which could heal and restore a person's body meridians, was rare even in the Six Schools Three Sects. And yet she had given it to him to heal his injuries without a second thought! This girl was just too kind-hearted.
羿清一脸期待的抬头道，“还请师父教授弟子修行。”
Yi Qing raised his head with anticipation. "Master, please impart me the ways of cultivation."
羿清一脸的莫明，却还是老实的回道，“当初炼气之前，还未僻谷之时，做过一些。”
Though bewildered by her question, he nevertheless honestly replied, "I did a little cooking before I started Grain Liberation for my Qi Refinement."
羿清一边击散那些诡异的气息，一边仔细思考这塔内的奥秘，花了三个时辰几乎耗尽了大半的灵力，才摸索些规律找出了四周的破绽，破开了这片黑暗，眼里顿时有了光。

As Yi Qing defended himself against the evil aura, he thought hard about the secret regarding the pagoda. After six hours, he felt low on spiritual power. He began to systematically look for cracks in the pagoda and managed to break out of the darkness. A blinding light suddenly hit his eyes.
羿清不愧是专业的，短短不到二十分钟，一桌丰富的各色菜肴就摆满了一整桌，其中还包括去外门领食材的时间。道道色香味俱全，孤月突然明白，为什么沈萤说自己做的是猪食了。也不知身为剑修，他这手艺是从哪学来的。

Yi Qing was indeed professional. Within 20 minutes he had whipped up a sumptuous meal with a whole table full of different types of dishes, which even included the time he took to fetch the ingredients. Every dish smelled and tasted as great as it looked, and Lonemoon suddenly understood why Shen Ying said that his food was pig's feed. As a sword cultivator, where did he even learn how to cook?
羿清不知什么时候已经应完了雷劫，飞了上来。孤月这才发现，天上的劫云已经散尽了，四下也恢复了光明，就连玄天宗的护山大阵也消失了。而羿清身上正散发着元婴的威压，特别是眉间那剑意的印痕，即使看一眼也能感觉到有剑气渗出。他果然结婴成功了，现在已经是一名元婴剑修。

Yi Qing had already completed his Lightning Tribulation and flown over. It was at that time that Lonemoon realized the tribulation clouds had dissipated, and the surroundings had also resumed its brightness. Even the Blackheaven Sect's protective mountain array had also disappeared. Yi Qing was exuding the pressure of a Nascent Soul cultivator. It could be sensed especially clearly from the sword intent scar between his brows; looking at it once was enough to feel the sword intent seeping out. He had indeed successfully completed his Nascent Soul Formation and had become a Nascent Soul sword cultivator.
羿清与孤月都愣了一下，修士有灵气护体，一般很少注意四周气温的变化，“你这么一说，好像的确热了很……”

Both Yi Qing and Lonemoon were surprised at her sudden question. Cultivators, having Spirit Qi to protect their bodies, rarely paid attention to the changes in the surrounding temperature. "Now that you mentioned it, it feels really hot…"
羿清也下意识的捂住了沈萤的眼睛。
Yi Qing also subconsciously covered Shen Ying's eyes.
羿清也不知道自己晕了多久，只是再次醒来的时候，身上的伤已经好得差不多了。断掉的筋脉完全修复，连受损的元神都在复原。

Yi QIng did not know how long he had been unconscious, but when he woke up, he had almost recovered from his injuries, his severed meridian were completely mended, and even his damaged primordial spirit was restored.
羿清也愣了一下，转身四下看了看，却发现刚刚还站在旁边的人，不见了踪影。
Yi Qing was taken aback as he turned around and looked all about him but then realized the person beside him had disappeared without a trace.
羿清也是一愣，放开神识一探，果然没有对方的踪迹，“我刚刚一直有注意四周，并没有发现它逃走，一定还在这里。”

Yi Qing, who was just as baffled, used his divine perception to probe around and did not find any trace of it either. "I was scanning the surrounding area just now, and did not see it escaping, so it must still be here."
羿清也没有推辞，点了点头，“责无旁贷！”
Yi Qing did not reject. He nodded and said, "It's my responsibility!"
羿清习惯性的摸向身侧的储物袋，却摸了个空，身体一僵，脸色顿时白了。
Yi Qing habitually searched for his storage bag by his side, but there was nothing. He froze and his face turned white.
羿清从玄天宗出来，就一路朝着西北方向而去，可能是因为心底憋着几分气，飞得又快又急。一路离开了玄海，才回过头来。

Yi Qing headed north-west the moment he stepped out of Blackheaven Sect. He flew especially fast — perhaps because he was still indignant inside. He had already flown past the Black Sea before he finally turned around.
羿清伸手指了指右边，“往南而行即可。”
Yi Qing stretched his hand and pointed to the right, "Just heading south will do."
羿清僵了一下，“……萝卜！”
Yi Qing hesitated and replied, "Radish!"
羿清再次醒来的时候，发现他还是躺在那个院子里，连位置都没动一下。伤势太重，视线不清，他只能隐隐看到一灰一白两个影子在说着什么，那白影极大，隐隐还散发着妖气。

When Yi Qing next awoke, he found that he was still lying in that courtyard, in the same exact position he was at before. Due to the severity of his injuries and his blurry vision, he could only vaguely see the shadowy outlines of two figures, one gray and one white, and both seemed to be talking. The white figure, which was huge, exuded a faint demonic aura.
羿清到口的解释又吞了回去，嗯，一定是师父想保持低调。
An explanation had been on the tip of Yi Qing's tongue, but he swallowed down. Yes, Master must want to maintain a low profile.
羿清剑一停，条件反射回身一剑劈开那法器，阵中的魔修却突然破阵而出，一掌打向他的胸前，虽没有击中，却直接抓走了什么。

Yi Qing's sword paused and his basic reflex was to go backwards and avoid the Dharma artifact. But all of a sudden, the fiendish cultivator broke the sword array and attacked precisely at his chest with a palm. Although he missed, he seemed to have grabbed something away.
羿清剑招一换，一剑劈开了那团黑气，周身的灵剑，飞驰而出，刷啦啦朝着魔修遁逃的方向追了出去，瞬间就在对方周围结下了剑阵，直接把人困在中间。

Yi Qing switched to another sword technique and used it to cut right through the black smoke, and then the spiritual swords surrounding him charged toward the direction that the fiendish cultivator went in. Being surrounded by the sword array, he was trapped in the middle.
羿清却已经带着人，火急火燎的出殿去了，远远的还能听到两人的对话声。
However, Yi Qing’s group was already rushing out of the hall with the disciple. Though they were some distance away, the gist of their conversation could still be heard.
羿清却突然回身，手中的剑顺势一挥，顿时一条剑气形成的龙，带着惊人的气势瞬间就朝着她冲了过来。
Yi Qin whipped around. With a wave of his sword, he turned his sword intent into a dragon which charged towards her with great ferocity.
羿清只好转头看向萝卜，“萝卜你刚……”
Yi Qing turned to look at the radish and said, "Radish, you..."
羿清只得把人往后一推，离开危险范围，交待道，“待在后面，不要离开我师父身边。”
Yi Qing shoved him further back, out of the danger zone, and instructed, "Stay behind, do not leave my Master's side."
羿清只觉得气血翻涌，脚下一沉，张嘴就吐出一口血，连着金丹都隐隐有炸裂的趋势。而那边的姓陆的修士，已经直接被叫声中的气息震得趴在了地上。

Yi Qing felt his blood and Qi surging, then his feet buckled and he spit out a mouthful of blood. Even the Golden Core in his body seemed on the verge of exploding. And over on the other side, the cultivator named Lu lay flat on the ground, felled by the impact of the sound.
羿清和孤月与其说一路追着狐妖，不如说是追着沈萤而去，因为她那一骑绝尘实在是太明显了。直到一路跟到了一个山洞门口才停了下来。
Yi Qing and Lonemoon were not so much pursuing the fox demon as pursuing Shen Ying, who had left them trailing far behind. They followed her right up to the entrance of a cave before stopping.
羿清和孤月也在这时追了进来，孤月还好，到是羿清身上多了几道伤痕。
Yi Qing and Lonemoon had also caught up by then. Lonemoon was fine but Yi Qing had several wounds on his body.
羿清和孤月已经在这片灵气稀薄的林子找了好几天了，他们一路寻着魔修的气息而来，明明好几次都感应到了位置，偏偏就是找不着人。整个林子转了好几遍，一无所获，孤月都要怀疑是不是那魔修故意布下的疑阵了。

Yi Qing and Lonemoon had already been searching for a few days in that forest which had very faint traces of Spirit Qi, pursuing the trail of the fiendish cultivator. Although they had clearly sensed the location of their target on several occasions, they just could not seem to find the person. They had gone through the entire forest many times to no avail, and Lonemoon even suspected whether the fiendish cultivator had purposely set up a misdirection array.
羿清和孤月带着三个家主，边打边退，塔中不知岁月，也不知道过了多久。他们才慢慢找了机会调息了过来。但三位家主却伤得太重，他们出手叫醒的时候受的伤到是其次，主要是他们沉迷心魔太久，已经伤到了根基。全身的灵气更是散得七七八八的。更奇怪的是，这塔内，居然不能引气入体。

Yi Qing and Lonemoon, with the three patriarchs in tow, fought off their attackers as they retreated. Time passed. They did not know how long they had been in the pagoda. Finally, they found the chance to regulate their meridians. However, the three family patriarchs were in a bad way, partly due to the injuries they received when they were awakened, but mainly because they had been trapped for too long within the Mental Demon Tribulations spell, causing their their foundations to be damaged. The Spirit Qi in their entire body had almost all dissipated. The strange thing was they could not even draw Qi into their bodies.
羿清和孤月这才一脸淡定的收回了——踹出的腿。
Yi Qing and Lonemoon calmly each of their legs.
羿清嘴角抽了抽，孤月却当机立断，毫不犹豫的伸手指向右边山上。
The corner of Yi Qing's mouth twisted. Lonemoon took this chance and pointed to the hill to his right without hesitation.
羿清回头看了他一眼，眉头一皱，猛的又转了回去，仿佛没听见他刚刚的话一样，继续满眼星星的看着沈萤，
Turning his head to look at Lonemoon, Yi Qing frowned and immediately turned back again, as if he had not heard anything, continuing to look at Shen Ying with a star-gazed expression in his eyes.
羿清好似对这种事，很有经验，在街上打听了一会，就带着她朝着城中最高的一栋楼走去。待到掌事面前，抱拳道，“这位道友，听闻这里需要护卫。”

Yi Qing seemed to have a lot of experience in this matter. After asking around in the city for a while, he brought her towards the tallest building in the city. He cupped his fists before the steward and said, "Fellow Daoist, I heard that this place needs some protection."
羿清带着人进了城，穿过热闹的街道，一路朝着最中心的地方而去。直到来到人最多的一处小广场上，才停了下来。这里人很多，有三五成群的，也有独行的，一个个仙风道骨的，排成了长队，似是在等待着什么。

Yi Qing brought her into the city, cutting a path through the bustling streets towards the central area. They only stopped after they reached the most crowded area that was a small public square. There were many people there; some were in groups while others were traveling alone. All of them were sage-like, standing in the line of a long queue, seemingly waiting for something.
羿清带着沈萤排在了队伍的最后面，指了指前面道，“师父，传送阵就在前面，一会我们就可以到玄天宗。”

Yi Qing brought Shen Ying to stand in line at the very end of the queue. He pointed to the front and said, "Master, the transportation array is right in front. We will be able to reach Blackheaven Sect in a while."
羿清很想回答她，但身上实在是太痛了，经筋修复的痛苦不是常人可以忍受的，再加上他的修为被妖气压制，不能封闭五感，更是痛苦万分，撑不到十息，再次晕了过去。

Yi Qing wanted very much to answer her, but his body was hurting too much. The pain from the rejuvenation of his body’s meridians was not something that a normal person could bear. Moreover, he was unable to block out his five senses, which had been suppressed by demon aura, and this greatly increased his suffering. After holding out for ten breaths, he finally fainted.
羿清心下一紧，早看出噬魂幡有生出鬼王的趋势，所以他才急着送上玄天宗，没想到偏偏是在这个时候。想必是刚刚魔修放出的阴气，加速了它的成长。

Yi Qing tensed up at the sight. He had known all along that the Soul Devouring Gonfalon would eventually give birth to the Ghost King, which was why he had wanted it delivered urgently to the Blackheaven Sect. However, he had not expected that it would choose now, of all times, to give birth. Its rapid growth had likely been aided by the Yin Qi emanating from the fiendish cultivator.
羿清心头一梗，觉得一股郁气堵在了心口，顿时看门口那个身影就有些不顺眼起来，他这才刚拜师，就有人眼红了。

Yi Qing's heart wrenched at the thought and felt stuffiness in his chest. The figure by the door immediately became an eye sore; he had only just managed to become her disciple yet people were already being envious.
羿清心底顿时涌上一股不能自己的激动，就连许久没有动静的剑心，都在兴奋的颤动着。这是一个高人，一个让人根本探不到底的高人。

Yi Qing's heart immediately began to stir with excitement, and even his Heart of the Sword that had been quiet for so long quivered with excitement. This was an expert, one that nobody could even fathom any understanding of.
羿清心里一暖，连忙抱拳行礼，“多谢前辈，不过我的经脉已经修复，用不上这个。”
Yi Qing's heart was warmed and he then immediately saluted her with cupped fists, "Thank you Senior, but my meridians have already been recuperated, I do not need this."
羿清快步进屋察看了一圈，没有找着人，转身走向沾满了鲜血的石桌，捏了一个诀顿时整个石桌大亮，空中慢慢出现了影像，正是半个时辰前的情景。

Yi Qing quickly searched around the house but did not find her. Turning around, he walked towards the blood-stained stone table and formed a hand seal. Immediately, the entire stone table lit up brightly and an image slowly appeared. This was the scene that had taken place an hour ago.
羿清想了想，半会才认真的回答道，“可能是因为……师父还没灭了它全族吧？”
Yi Qing thought about this for a while and then replied earnestly, "Probably because… Master has not destroyed its whole clan yet?"
羿清想了想，接着问道，“我二人，一人两块下品灵石吗？”
Yi Qing contemplated for a moment, and then asked, "There's two of us, so what about two pieces each?"
羿清愣了一下，就连追上来的孤月也是一愣，没想到这只狐妖这么豁得出去。
For a moment Yi Qing stood stunned, as did Lonemoon who had just caught up. They had not expected this fox demon to go all out.
羿清愣了一下，怎么觉得这道理哪怪怪的？却没再继续追问，反而转身朝着对方恭敬的行了个礼，“在下羿清，多谢姑娘的救命之恩。”

For a while, Yi Qing felt perplexed. Why did he feel that there was something wrong with this reasoning? But he did not pursue it further, turning instead to face her. Bowing respectfully, he said, "I'm Yi Qing. Thank you for saving my life."
羿清把沈萤送回了迎缘峰，瞅了瞅天色道，“快中午了，师父您稍等，我去领下今天的食材，马上就回来。”
Yi Qing brought Shen Ying back to Yingyuan Peak, looked at the sky and said, "It's almost noon. Master, please wait for a while, I will go pick up the ingredients for today and be back soon."
羿清拼命调动灵气抵御，刚布下防御的结界。又是一道鬼叫响起，他再次吐出一口血，跪了下去，结界倾刻碎裂，全身沉如千斤，鬼王的威压之下，再不能动弹。

Yi Qing desperately mobilized his Spirit Qi to create a defensive barrier. Just as it was completed, there was another ghostly cry. He vomited blood again and fell to his knees. The barrier was instantly torn apart. His whole body felt unbearably heavy. Utterly overcome by the formidable power of the Ghost King, he lay motionless.
羿清整个人都震惊了，妖又不是异兽，与人素来对立，怎么会甘愿被人驱使。
Yi Qing was taken aback. The demons were not just any creatures; they had always been on opposing sides from the humans, so how could they be willing to be ordered about by a human?
羿清是昨晚赶到郁家的，那升仙塔高耸入云，共有三层，四周围绕着浓郁的仙气，比起上次那个上古仙宫中看到的更加浓郁。奇怪的是这么一座仙塔，郁家居然没有派人在前方镇守，任由修士进入。

Yi Qing rushed to the Yu Family the night before. The Immortal Ascension Pagoda was so tall that it reached the skies. Immortal Qi thicker than in the the ancient Immortal Pavilion surrounded the pagoda. What was strange was that the Yu Family did not send anyone to guard the entrance to such a great Immortal Ascension Pagoda. Cultivators were free to enter.
羿清有点懵，这是……妖？说好的妖性本恶，见人就吃呢？
Yi Qing was a little confused — these were… demons? What about the known fact that the nature of demons was evil and that they would eat every human they came across?
羿清本身就是身体素质过硬的剑修，虽然体内妖气未清，不能使用术法，但填几个坑对他来说不在话下。不到一会，他已经把院里所有的坑都填上了，包括沈萤挖的那个近两米的深坑。

Yi Qing's overly strong body constitution was exactly what defined the sword cultivator. Although the demonic aura in his body was not completely removed yet and he could not wield his sorcery, filling up the pit was definitely within his capabilities. Within a short period of time, he filled up all the holes in the entire yard, including the almost two-meter deep hole that Shen Ying had dug.
羿清沉默了整整一分钟，才一脸复杂的飞了回来，犹豫的朝她伸出手道，“那……我可否载师父一程？”
Yi Qing was silent for a full minute before flying back with complicated emotions. He hesitated, then stretched his hand out towards her, "Then… May I give Master a ride?"
羿清没有再问，唤出了飞剑，想了想又伸手把沈萤拉回自己的剑上，这才御剑而起，朝着曲双城而去。
Yi Qing did not probe further and summoned his sword. He thought for a while before reaching out to pull Shen Ying back on his sword, rode his sword towards Qushuang City.
羿清没有回，而是忍着筋脉被妖气一寸寸切断的疼痛，生生的把手上的阵法结印完全。直到阵法成形，压住了旗面上那不断涌动的黑气，才停了下来，身子一歪，再次倒在了地上。

Yi Qing did not answer as he was enduring the great pain caused by his meridians being gradually severed by the demonic aura. He forced himself to complete the array formation imprint in his hand, stopping only after the array formation had taken shape and suppressed the swirls of black Qi on the flag. His body started to sway and he once again collapsed onto the floor.
羿清没有继续再问，抬头看了看天空道，“那阶梯又出现了。”
Yi Qing stopped pushing him further. He raised his head to look at the sky and said, "There, the flight of stairs again."
羿清没有迟疑直接御剑带她飞了起来，越飞越高，直飞到离地数千米的高空，她这才指向下方，对跟着一起飞上来的薄飞平和孤月道。

Without hesitation, Yi Qing immediately whipped out his sword and rode it with her. They flew higher and higher till they were a few thousand meters away from the ground. She then pointed below and told Pu Feiping and Lonemoon who flew up together.
羿清满心的疑问，却见沈萤已经淡定的撸起袖子，打算前去帮忙了。
Yi Qing was filled with questions, but he saw that Shen Ying was already calmly folding up her sleeves and ready to help out.
羿清点了点头回应。
Yi Qing nodded in response.
羿清点了点头，“我也牛尊者自有打算。”
Yi Qing nodded in agreement. "I also thought Supremacy Niu had plans."
羿清点了点头，他现在也算是玄天宗门人，门派出事，他自然要去看看。于是向沈萤打了声招呼，就随奚秋飞向了右侧一座溢满丹香的浮峰。

Yi Qing nodded. He was also considered to be under the Blackheaven Sect, so when something happened, he certainly should go and take a look. Hence, after bidding goodbye to Shen Ying, he followed Xi Qiu and flew towards the floating peak filled with the scents of elixirs towards the right.
羿清点了点头，四周的灵剑一转，挡开血狐的攻击，剑峰直接朝着妖狐脚下攻去。
Yi Qing nodded, directing the spirit swords around him to fend off the blood fox’s attack while directly attacking the feet of the fox with the tip of his sword.
羿清点了点头，回了个礼道，“还得多谢城主当日赐宝。”
Yi Qing nodded and said, "This is all thanks to you for giving me the precious mirror that day."
羿清点了点头，带着年轻人一起出了门。到是对方很是客气，兴许是惊讶于有金丹修士相送，一路都显得有些兴奋，一边说着自己如何拍到手里的宝贝，一边往城西走去。

Yi Qing nodded as he brought the young man out. The man was rather polite; perhaps due to the surprise of being escorted by a Golden Core cultivator, he seemed really excited the entire journey. He continued to talk about how he had managed to bid for the treasure in his hand as they walked towards the west of the city.
羿清点头，“这里的阴气还未完全散尽，魔修离开应该不到半柱香时间，也就是说……”
Yi Qing nodded. "The Yin Qi has not dissipated completely. The fiendish cultivator must not have left here for more than half an incent stick's time, which also means…"
羿清犹豫了一会，才继续问道，“徒儿有件事，想问师父。”
Yi Qing hesitated for a while before asking, "I have a matter to consult with Master."
羿清犹豫的皱了皱眉。
Yi Qing frowned uncertainly.
羿清甩了甩头，扔开这种荒谬的想法，带着人再次御剑而起。师父这么厉害，怎么可能不会御剑？一定有别的原因。莫非是因为昨晚为他驱除妖气时，受了什么内伤？以免他担心才没有告诉他？

Yi Qing shook his head and tossed this absurd thought away, and once again resumed sword-riding with a passenger. Master being so formidable, how could she not know sword-riding? There had to be another reason. Could it be that when she helped him eliminate the demonic aura last night, she sustained some internal injuries? Was she afraid that he would be worried and so was keeping it from him?
羿清的剑先一步飞了出去，直接截住了血狐逃跑的方法。
Yi Qing was the first to fly out on his sword, directly preventing the blood fox from escaping.
羿清的剑招毫不留情，仿佛对面站的不是同伴，而是仇人一般。哪疼往哪打，而对面的孤月，全程一声不吭，像个没知觉的木偶一般，根本不知道防守，只全力攻击着羿清。

Yi Qing did not hold back his sword techniques. From the way he was fighting, one would think that his opponent was his nemesis and not his companion. He hit Lonemoon everywhere, yet Lonemoon did not seem to feel any pain. He did not try to defend himself, but went all out to attack Yi Qing.
羿清的心更凉了，一个妖王就已经要拼命了，一群……
Yi Qing's heart sunk. One Demon Monarch had already forced him to bring out all his might, yet a whole group…
羿清的眉头却打起了结，“抱歉，在下已有师门。”
Yi Qing, however, began to frown. "I'm sorry, I already have a master."
羿清皱了皱眉，扫视了四周一圈，直到没发现要找的人，才握紧手里的剑，直接往着那阶梯飞了上去，不管这塔内有什么，只有闯了才知道。

Yi Qing frowned. He scanned his surroundings, but didn't see anyone else who was conscious. He tightened his grip on his sword and flew up the flight of stairs. He wasn't afraid of what he would find in the pagoda, all he knew was that he would never find out was there if he refused to move.
羿清皱了皱眉，看了两人一眼道，“之前我们都猜错了，曲双城的魔界之门，只是一个晃子。真正的魔界之门早已经转移了，不在任何一个地方，而是一直在宁子安身上，他本身就是界门。”

Yi Qing furrowed his brows, glanced the two, and said, “All our previous guessings were wrong. The Door of Demon Realm at Qushuang City was just a pretense. The real Door of Demon Realm has been shifted to somewhere not at any particular place, but on Ning ZiAn! He, is the Realm Gate! "
羿清皱了皱眉，细一回想，当时宁子安元灵剑气暴发，薄仪分神。那魔族趁机遁走，然后……
Yi Qing furrowed his eyebrows in deep thought. At that time... NingZiAn's inner sword spirit erupted, which caused Pu Yi to be distracted. The demonic beast took the chance to escape, and then...
羿清盘腿坐下，调息了一会才一咬牙道，“你们在这等着，我一人上去！”
Yi Qing seated himself down in a lotus position. After taking a moment to regulate his meridians, he gritted his teeth and said, "You all wait here. I'm going up!"
羿清直接就冲入那片荆棘之中，剑招变幻，顿时只见万千剑光在一片绿色的荆棘中游走，仿佛活过来一般。不到片刻的工夫，原本密密麻麻的藤蔓全被切成了小段，掉落下来。

Yi Qing immediately rushed towards the field of thistles with his sword. The sword shone as it weaved through the thistles as if it were alive. Within a moment, the thick forest of thistles was sliced into small bits and fell to the ground.
羿清直接把右手上的幡旗横在手里，沉声道，“我来此，是想将此幡交予贵派。想请贵派以清灵之气化解幡上的鬼气，超渡里面的数万怨魂。”

Yi Qing immediately placed the flag which he had been holding in his right hand on his other palm, saying, "I'm here to give this to you. I would like to ask you to use your sect's Spirit Cleansing Qi to rid the Ghost Qi in the flag and release the thousands of vengeful spirits from the gonfalon."
羿清眉头一下皱了起来，“不行，我不能让人误会师父。”
Yi Qing furrowed his brows and said, "No, I cannot let people misunderstand my master."
羿清眉头拧了又松，似是十分的纠结，脸上表情几度变换，犹豫，担忧，崇拜，期待等等情绪，一一闪过。半会才一咬牙，像是终于鼓足了勇气一般，扑通一声跪了下去，恭敬的朝着她一拜，“请前辈，收我为徒！”

Yi Qing furrowed and relaxed his brows in turn, seeming to be very conflicted. His expression kept changing from being hesitant, to worried, then showing adoration followed by anticipation and so on. After a while, he seemed to have finally mustered up courage and dropped down onto his knees, respectfully giving a bow, "Senior, please accept me as your disciple!"
羿清眉头拧得更紧了，细一下看对方的修为，心底顿时有了一番猜测，心头却更加堵得慌。
Yi Qing frowned deeply and studied the two people's cultivations. He suddenly understood something and his heart fell even further as he began to feel nervous.
羿清眉头紧了紧，看了沈萤一眼，出声提醒道，“让萝卜带路吧！”
Yi Qing furrowed his brows, looked at Shen Ying and reminded, "Let the radish lead the way!"
羿清眉头紧收，握紧手中的剑，看向五人道，“你们……是跟郁海珩一起消失的游仙！”
Yi Qing raised his eyebrows and tightened his grip around his sword. He stared at the five poeple, "You... are the traveling immortas who disappeared together with Yu Hai Heng!"
羿清眉头紧皱，他太大意了，幡虽然已经被封印，但仍会有鬼气溢出。原本以为带在身上，以他的灵气刚好可以制住幡上的鬼气，以免祸及他人。但他却忘了，就算是再弱小的鬼气，普通修士感觉不到，魔修却一眼能看出来。

Yi Qing furrowed his brows; he had been too careless. Although the gonfalon was already sealed, its Ghost Qi would seep out and dissipate. He had thought that his Spirit Qi could contain the Ghost Qi in the gonfalon which was why he brought it along with him, so that it would not cause harm to others. However, he forgot that even the tiniest amount of Ghost Qi could be easily spotted by a fiendish cultivator even if a normal cultivator could not sense anything.
羿清神色一沉，剑招一收，直接放弃了防御，调动全身所有的灵气，凝聚成一把直达天际的金色巨剑。
Yi Qing's expression darkened. He recalled his swords, collapsing the defensive wall. Yi Qing channelled all his Spirit Qi into forming a Great Golden Sword which extended to the end of the horizon.
羿清神色顿时一变，一脸坚定的道，“那绝对是魔界之门！没错！”
Yi Qing's face instantly changed, and with a determined look, he confirmed, "That definitely is the door of the Demon Realm. It must be!"
羿清突然插了句道，“师父的意思是说，上次外事堂通知新进一批弟子全已成功僻谷，所以那里已经没有食材可领了。”师父总不能饿肚子的。

Yi Qing suddenly interrupted, "Master actually meant that the Outer Affairs Hall had informed us that the new batch of disciples have all achieved grain liberation, so there were no more ingredients to be collected anymore." Master cannot be left in hunger.
羿清立马把她手里的旗帜接了过去，从储物袋里掏出一把木椅道：“师父要不坐下休息会。”
Yi Qing took the flag from her hands immediately. He then reached into his storage bag and retrieved a wooden stool. "Master, why don't you sit down and take a break?"
羿清立马站了起来，一脸兴奋的捏了个诀，习惯性的带着沈萤御剑而起。直接朝着峰外飞了出去。
Yi Qing stood up immediately, his face lit with excitement as he produced a hand seal before habitually bringing Shen Ying along on his sword and flew out of the peak.
羿清立马调转灵剑，朝着下方一处空地飞了下去，先是捏了个风系法术扫出一片干净的区域。
Yi Qing adjusted his sword and headed toward the ground. He cast a wind-elemental Dharma spell to sweep the area clean before he landed.
羿清立马跟了上去，顺手拣起地上一个铃铛递给陆修士。
Yi Qing immediately followed behind, at the same time picking up a bell from the ground which he handed to Cultivator Lu.
羿清第四次醒来的时候，没错，他还在地上。此时他全身的经脉已经修复，只是体内妖气未清，不能动用灵力。而那个救他的灰衣姑娘，还……还在挖坑。

Yi Qing later awoke for the fourth time. And yes, he was still lying on the ground. At this point, the meridians in his entire body had rejuvenated; only, he could not activate his Spiritual Power as his body had not rid itself completely of the demonic aura. As for that girl in grey, she was still…still at work digging the pit.
羿清细一感应，才发现修为已经涨到了化神后期。心下一喜，第一反应就是出洞往后殿而去，远远就看到了沈萤。

Yi Qing sensed his own body strength and realised he was already in the late stages of Soul Formation. He rejoiced in his heart and exited the cave, heading for the rear hall. He spotted Shen Ying from afar.
羿清脸上又青了青，低声道，“我忘了储物袋在跟芮糜打斗时丢了，师父……可有带灵珠？”
Yi Qing's face turned green, lowered his volume and asked, "I forgot that my storage bag was lost during the battle with Rui Mi. Master… do you have any spiritual pearls with you?"
羿清脸色一沉，瞬间也想到了这一点，扫了所有被控制的人一眼，一边挡住对方的攻击，一边沉声道，“集中注意力，先唤醒三位家主！”

Yi Qing's expression fell as he suddenly realised this as well. He scanned the group of manipulated bodies as he defended against their attacks. Then, he replied, "Focus! Wake the three family masters up first!"
羿清脸色也沉了沉，“郁家是四大世家中，最古老的一个，莫非他们真有什么别人不知道的秘法，能从师父眼前逃走？”

Yi Qing's expression darkened, "The Yu Family is the oldest out of all four aristocratic families. Could it be that they really practise mystic arts that people don't know about so that they can escape right before Master's eyes?"
羿清脸色更冷了，偏偏他还真没理由阻止他，看了看前方已经陆续来齐的众弟子，大声道，“出发！”转身唤出灵剑，朝着沈萤伸出手，“师父，我们走吧！”说完也不理旁边的某人，带着人嗖的一声，先一步飞出去了。

Yi Qing's expression turned even colder, but he really had no grounds to stop him. He looked at the disciples who had gathered in front and in a loud voice, commanded, "Depart!" Turning around, he summoned his sword and reached his hand out to Shen Ying. "Master, let us go!" Completely ignoring a certain someone next to him, Yi Qing immediately took off with Shen Ying.
羿清虽然不练丹，却对练器颇有研究，这异火强横用来练器，再好不过。
Yi Qing did not know how to refine pills, but he had quite a bit of knowledge on weapon refinement. The Deviant Fire would be especially useful for refining weapons.
羿清试着动了一下，发现疼痛消失了，体内的灵气也开始运转，正在自发的修复着筋脉。
Yi Qing tried to move and realized that the pain had disappeared. The Spirit Qi in his body had also begun to regulate itself and heal the meridians on its own.
羿清走上扇面，习惯性的拉开了身侧的储物袋，变戏法似的从里面掏出了，桂花糕，莲花饼，缕子脍，金乳酥，小天酥……

Yi Qing walked onto the fan, habitually opened the storage pouch by his side, and as if by magic, he dug out chrysanthemum cakes, lotus flower biscuits, fish slices, golden milk cakes, small day cakes…
羿清越听眼睛睁得越大，没想到沈姑娘竟然……不，沈前辈居然是如此厉害的人物吗？他突然想起，自己重伤掉到这里的那晚，芮糜被啪啪啪砸得满地开花的场景。原本他以为自己眼花出现了幻觉，没想到那是真的吗？

The more Yi Qing listened, the wider his eyes became. Little did he expect Lady Shen to be… No, Senior Shen was actually such a formidable character? He suddenly thought of the night when he was heavily wounded and fell here; Rui Mi was beaten up so badly all over. Initially, he had thought that his eyes were playing tricks on him, but that was actually all real?
羿清越说越觉得有必要，更加的坚定，“师父尽管去休息，我不会打扰您睡觉的。”
The more Yi Qing spoke, the more he felt the need to stand guard. He held a firm stance as he said, "Master, go ahead and rest. I will not disturb your sleep."
羿清跟了过来，心底又是一阵激荡，连万年冰参，千年绿灵，都可以视做普通萝卜对待，果然是隐世的高人。

Yi Qing followed behind her with an array of thoughts surging in his mind. Even a ten thousand-year-old Ice Ginseng and thousand-year-old Green Spirit were treated just like normal carrots — she was indeed a hidden expert.
羿清跟几人交待了一下细节，不到半刻钟，就隐隐感觉到了众多游仙的威压，直往这边而来。
Yi Qing walked through the plan with the others. A short while later, he could faintly detect the menacing aura of many traveling immortals heading straight towards them.
羿清跟青亦已经战到一块了，满天都是密不透风的剑光，他们一个带着疯狂，一个豁出了命。全都是拼尽了全力出招，本就是高阶修士的对决，不到半会不单是储丹室，整仙宫都开始摇摇欲坠起来。

Yi Qing and Qing Yi had already been fighting for awhile. The air was filled brilliant gleams of light from the sword. One was fighting crazily and the other was fighting for his life. Both were giving all they had to overpower the other. This duel between two high-level cultivators caused not just the Pill Storage Repository, but the entire Immortal Pavilion to quake.
羿清蹭的一下站了起来，转身高兴的出了院子，那轻快的样子，仿佛中了头奖似的，转瞬就消失在门口。
Yi Qing stood up immediately and left the yard in joy. That briskness in his steps were as if he had won a top prize as he turned and disappeared by the door.
羿清身上一松，之前那种巨大的束缚感消失了，就连着灵气的流失也停了下来，刚一起身，却看到地上的狐妖化成了一团红雾，想要遁走。

Yi Qing immediately relaxed. The previous sensation of constraint had disappeared, and even the loss of Spirit Qi had ceased. But just when he stood up, the fox demon on the ground transformed into a cloud of red smoke, trying to flee.
羿清转身朝着追上来的众游仙，挥出一剑，顿时满天剑气铺天盖地而去，“人醒了，走！”他沉声交代了一句，转身就飞向远处。

Yi Qing turned around and thrust his sword toward the Traveling Immortals who were chasing him. The sky filled with Sword Qi. "They're awake! Go!" Yi Qing instructed. Then, he changed directions and flew toward the horizon.
羿清转过头，脸上可惜的表情一闪而失，这才走了过去，一脸认真的道，“若不如此，唤不醒你！”
Yi Qing turned away, a look of pity flashing across his face. He walked toward Lonemoon slowly and said, "If I didn't do that, you wouldn't have regained consciousness!"
羿清这场绝地反杀，只花了半刻钟不到的时间，就解决了那个青亦。他压制的修为也已经到达了极限，兴许是因为这处仙宫中的灵气太过浓郁。羿清这场顿悟只花了不到两个时辰就结束了。修为直接从元婴升上了化神，瞬间赶上了孤月的修为。

Yi Qing was out to kill this time. He took less than a minute to finish off Qing Yi. He could suppress his cultivation level no longer — the Spirit Qi in this Immortal Pavilion was far too thick. Yi Qing's epiphany lasted only two hours, yet in this short timeframe he had advanced to the Soul Formation stage. He had caught up with Lonemoon just like that.
羿清这套剑法整整演示了有大半个时辰，招式千变万化，威力极大。虽然他已经尽量收敛剑气，待收势时还是让整个岛被削掉了一节高。

Yi Qing demonstrated this set of sword techniques for almost an hour. His moves were ever-changing and powerful. Although he had tried his best to rein in the power of his Sword Qi, the entire upper section of the island was chopped off by him by the time he finally withdrew his Qi.
羿清这才把手上的人放下，正是薄家父子。他们似是受了什么打击似的，一脸不敢置信，特别是薄仪似乎还受了重伤。
before Yi Qing put the Bo father and son, who were in his arms down. They seem to be taken aback by whatever just happened, especially the injured Pu Yi, with their faces of disbelief.
羿清这才躺了回去，眼睛却一直看着她，“我已无大碍，多谢师父为我疗伤。”
Yi Qing lay back down, but his eyes kept looking at her. "I'm all right. Thank you Master for nursing my injuries."
羿清这才转头扫向厨房的众人，一时间仿佛一阵寒气横扫而止，使得整个院子温度都冷好几十度。

Yi Qing merely turned to glance at all the people in the kitchen, yet that look alone was enough to make them feel as if a cold draught had enveloped the area, causing the whole yard's temperature to be lowered by dozens of degrees.
羿清这才转身拿起灵剑道，“师父，我现在修行的剑法，名为：荡天诀，乃是我自创的一套剑法，还请师父指教！”

Yi Qing then turned around and took his spiritual sword and said, "Master, the sword technique that I am cultivating now is called the Dang Tian tactic. It is a sword dharma that I invented. Master, please provide me with your guidance!"
羿清都懵了，突然明白修房子那天，兔王紧张兮兮拉着他说的那句话了，“千千万别吵她睡觉！不然后果很严重。”现在他知道了，嗯……真的很严重。

Yi Qing was confused. Suddenly he understood what the Rabbit Monarch had meant that day. When they were repairing the house, it had nervously pulled him over to whisper, "Never disturb her sleep! Otherwise, the consequences will be very serious." Now he knew, uh… It was serious alright.
羿清闭上眼，一次对付八位游仙，的确耗尽了他的全力。继续调息了半个时辰，才睁开眼睛。拿起旁边染血的长剑，这才一步步往最后一层走去。

Yi Qing closed his eyes. Dealing with eight traveling immortals at once definitely wore him down. After an hour, he re-opened his eyes. He picked up the blood-covered sword next to him and ascended to the third level.
羿清闻声，手里的剑一转，那庞大的剑意这才一偏，轰隆一声打在了旁边的山上，顿时把那座山峰削掉了一节，一时间满山遍野的乱石滚落。

Yi Qing twisted his hand and the sword intent deflected with a sharp noise, crashing into the mountain beside Lonemoon. The top of the mountain was shaved off by the Great Golden Sword and rocks began to roll down.
羿清隐隐觉得心口塞塞，才短短几个月的时间，这是从哪蹦出的小婊砸？！
Yi Qing felt his heart grow cold. How did this little kid appear in just a few short months?
羿清顺手拉了她一把，助她出来。回头看了看那深坑，下意识的问，“姑娘您这是……”怎么觉得她比上次更加失望了。

Yi Qing helped to pull her out of the pit. Turning round to look at the deep pit, he subconsciously asked, "Miss, you mean…" He could not help but get the feeling that she was even more disappointed this time.
羿清顿时有些绝望起来，没想到会在此时遇到妖王。莫说他现在灵气未复，就算是他全盛时期，以他金丹的修为，在堪比元婴的妖王面前，也是毫无胜算的。

Yi Qing immediately felt a sense of helplessness. He had not expected to meet a Demon Monarch at this time. Notwithstanding the fact that he had not recovered his Spirit Qi, even if he were at his peak, with his Golden Core cultivation, there was no way he could have defeated this Demon Monarch, who was as powerful as the Nascent Soul.
Yi Qing: "…"
羿清：“……”不愧是师父。
Yi Qing: "…" Master is a true master.
羿清：“……”加一。
Yi Qing: "…" Same here.
羿清：“……”咦？啥意思，为啥只有他一个人听不懂？
Yi Qing: "…" Huh? What did they mean? Why was he the only one who did not understand?
羿清：“……”师父说得好有道理！
Yi Qing: "…" What Master says makes so much sense!
羿清：“……”我才是师父的徒弟！
Yi Qing: "..." I am the rightful disciple of my Master!
羿清：“快中午了，师父我去做饭。”
Yi Qing: "It's almost noon. Master, I'm going to prepare \lunch."
羿清：咦？难道师父刚刚随口说的办法里，有什么厉害的修行道理？
Yi Qing: What? Was there a profound Dao principle behind Master's casual comment?
羿清：感觉自己背叛了师门……
Yi Qing felt as though he had just betrayed his master.
羿清：抢师父的小婊砸。
Yi Qing: Master-stealing bastard.
翊凌雪一脸正色，扬了扬手中的令牌道：“这是我父亲的令牌，我也没有开玩笑，苍狼……或许你自己都不知道，你有一种很奇特的能力，能帮助武者武技快速大成，我们翊家也正是看重了这一点才招揽你的。你去翊家不用做什么，只是天天和家族子弟对练，辅助他们武技快速大成即可……”

Yi Lingxue sent him a stern look and waved the command token in her hand, "This is my father's command token, and I was not joking. Lone Wolf... maybe you didn't realize it yet, but you have a very unique capability that can help martial artists attain phenomenal success for their techniques. The Yi Family saw this in you and therefore decided to recruit you. Once you joined our family, you need not do anything else except sparring with the family descendants, helping them to achieve phenomenal success as quick as possible..."
翊凌雪倒是没有勉强，只是让江逸好好考虑一下，之后的每天她照样来找江逸对练，却是没有再提及此事。
Yi Lingxue did not push any further, only asking Jiang Yi to think it over. Following that day, she still went to Jiang Yi for sparring matches, but not once did she bring up the matter again.
翊凌雪展开攻击之后，江逸身形开始飘逸的在练功房内转圈，无论这翊小姐怎么攻击，都碰不到江逸的一片衣角。每次攻击江逸似乎有预感般，翊凌雪还没出招他就已经开始躲避了，两人元力被封印，攻击速度本就差不了多少，试问翊凌雪如何能攻击到江逸？

After Yi Lingxue carried out her attacks, Jiang Yi's body figure started gracefully moving about in circles around the Technique Practising Room. No matter how much this Young Mistress Yi tried to strike at him, she could not even touch the corner of Jiang Yi's clothes. Every time she launched an attacked, it seemed as though Jiang Yi had premonitive abilities, being able to avoid and hide before Yi Lingxue released her combat techniques. With both persons' essence forces being sealed off from use, their combat speeds were more or less the same. Dare one ask, how could it be possible for Yi Lingxue to ever manage to hit Jiang Yi?
翊凌雪整理了一下火红的武士袍，叹道：“太可惜了……你要是早些努力修炼，说不定天羽城十大天才其中就有你了。”

Yi Lingxue straightened her fiery-red martial artist robes, sighing, "It's such a shame... if only you had put in more effort before in cultivating, you might have been one of the top ten geniuses of Skyplume City."
翊凌雪浑身衣袍湿透了，此刻大口大口喘气，微微隆起的胸脯上下起伏，无比诱人。听到江逸的话，她俏脸上露出一抹淡淡红晕，看了一眼江逸笑道：“你很会说话哦，行了！今天打痛快了，明日我再找你，不过……明日你能不能还手？别总是躲避，那样没意思。”

Yi Lingxue's robes were completely wet. At the moment, she was panting and taking in big mouthfuls of air. With her slightly perky breasts moving up and down as she panted, she appeared incomparably alluring. Upon listening to what Jiang Yi said, a faint reddish blush appeared on her delicate face. Looking at Jiang Yi, she smiled and replied, "You sure know how to speak. very well! Today, I've sparred to my heart's content. I'll come and fine you tomorrow, but... can you at least fight back during our match tomorrow? Don't always simply avoid and try to escape, those tactics don't make the match fun at all."
翊凌雪看到江逸走过来，连忙凑过来压低声音说道：“苍狼，这是我堂妹翊飞儿，这段时间我要闭关，以后就让你就和她对练吧！”

Upon seeing Jiang Yi, Yi Lingxue wasted no time in going to him and whispering, "Lone Wolf, this is my cousin Yi Fei-er. I'll be in seclusion for some time, so I'll let you spar with her in the meantime!"
翊凌雪被虐了一场，不仅没有半点气馁反而兴奋无比，约定第二日再战后扭着圆滚的翘臀大步离开了，看得其余陪练一阵眼热，明显很羡慕江逸的艳福。

大步Having been abused in one match, not only did Yi Lingxue not feel a shred of discouragement; rather, she was unbelievably excited. After promising to return the next day for a rematch, she twitched her round buttocks and walked off at a wide pace. Observing her movements, the other sparring partners were all feeling envious. They were all clearly jealous of Jiang Yi's luck with women.
翊凌雪见江逸沉默不说话有些急了，朝前方走了几步，靠近江逸三尺距离，这才轻咬贝唇说道：“苍狼，你要什么待遇尽管提，我都可以转告我父亲。如果你是别的家族子弟这也不是问题，你可以入赘我们翊家，我有一个堂妹，比我还漂亮……”

Yi Lingxue became slightly anxious at Jiang Yi's silence. She took a few steps towards him until she was a meter away, lightly biting her lips, "Lone Wolf, feel free to make whatever demands you see fit, I'll convey them to my father. If you are the descendant of another family, it won't be a problem either. You can marry into the Yi Family; I have a cousin who is even more beautiful than I am..."
翊凌雪这次让江逸出手攻击她，江逸没办法动用了武技，结果……翊凌雪很悲剧，江逸每次都能先发制人，轻松击中她，好在江逸每次都是点到即止，否则怕是翊凌雪娇贵的身子要饱受虐待了。

This time, Yi Lingxue insisted on allowing Jiang Yi to make the first move and attack her. Jiang Yi had no choice but to use his martial arts skills. In the end... it was a sad case for Yi Lingxue. Every single time, Jiang Yi was able to pre-empt her moves and take the initiative to strike first, allowing him to easily strike her. Thankfully for her, every time Jiang Yi did not over-exert his force in his attacks and stopped once he touched her, otherwise Yi Lingxue's elegant and fragile body would have to be subject to much physical abuse.
翊凌雪顿了一下解释起来：“姬家二公子姬长歌，三小姐姬听雨，马家大少马黑旗，江家大少江恨水，江家旁系少爷江如龙，冷家大少冷千军，冷家四小姐冷芊芊，柳家三少柳河，柳家旁系少爷柳战，还有一个杨家大少杨中天。这十人都不满十八岁，实力最低都是铸鼎境七重，被誉为这一代的天羽城十大天才。”

Yi Lingxue paused for a moment before explaining, "Ji Family Second Young Master Ji Changge and Third Young Mistress Ji Tingyu; Ma Family Great Young Master Ma Heiqi; Jiang Clan Great Young Master Jiang Henshui, and Jiang Rulong from the side branch of the Jiang Clan; Leng Family Great Young Master Leng Qianjun and Fourth Young Mistress Leng Qianqian; Liu Family Third Young Master Liu He, and Liu Zhan from the side branch of the Liu family, and last but not least Yang Family Great Young Master Yang Zhongtian. The ten of them are all below the age of 18, yet their power levels are minimally at the seventh stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, hence they are hailed as Skyplume City's top ten geniuses of our generation."
翊小姐一轮暴雨拳竟砸空了？她精致的小脸上都是错愕，随即恼羞成怒再次施展出漫天的拳影将江逸笼罩进去。

Had her Thunderstorm Fists actually hit nothing but mere air? Young Mistress Yi's delicate face revealed a look of astonishment, which immediately turned to frustrated embarrassment and subsequent anger, as she once again demonstrated her Vast Sky Fists technique and enveloped Jiang Yi inside her fist silhouettes.
翊小姐抓狂了，快步朝江逸欺身而来，又换了几种武技，追着江逸穷追猛打。但无论她怎么攻击，江逸都能提前躲避开去，步伐轻松，像在自家后院闲庭信步般从容。

Young Mistress Yi became frantic and, with quick steps, moved closer to Jiang Yi. She tried to use various different martial arts techniques, as she pursued Jiang Yi relentlessly and tried to strike him. However, no matter the method she used to attack, Jiang Yi could avoid the move in advance. His steps were light and gentle, moving unhurriedly as though he were idly strolling in his own backyard.
翊小姐整理了一下衣裳大步走了出去，江逸也跟了出去。坐在了人群中，他四处一扫却没有发现杨管事。索性也不管了，闭关打坐恢复消耗的黑色元力。

Young Mistress Yi straightened out and tidied up her robes before leaving the room at a wide-stepped pace. Jiang Yi followed behind her out of the room as well. Sitting amongst the crowd of sparring partners, he gave a sweeping glance of the room, but could not spot Manager Yang at all. Simply deciding not to concern himself any further, he decided to sit in silence and meditate to restore the black essence forces he had just consumed.
翊小姐气鼓鼓的走了，此刻她一身武士袍都湿透了，曲线尽露，自然不可能在此多停留，否则就白白便宜了众人了。

Young Mistress Yi stormed off, fuming. At the moment, her entire martial arts robes were completely wet, revealing her figure. Naturally, she could not stay there any longer, lest she continue giving everyone a free show.
翊小姐满脸可惜的说道：“下次他要是再来，一定要第一时间让人通知我，那个陪练好厉害，我的暴雨拳修炼了八年，这三年一直卡在精通阶段，和他对练了一场竟大成了……”

With a look of pity on her face, Young Mistress Yi replied, "You must get someone to inform me in the first instance the next time he returns. That sparring partner is really powerful. I have been practising my Thunderstorm Fist for eight years and have been stuck at the 'Proficiency' stage for the past three years. Yet, once I've sparred with him in a single practice match, I actually managed to reach the 'Phenomenal' stage..."
翊飞儿一听脸色更臭了，一跺脚道：“你不会还手啊？这样陪练有什么意思？”
Yi Fei-er scowled harder at this and stomped her foot, "Why don't you fight back then? Where's the fun in sparring when you are like this?"
翊飞儿差点摔倒，一张俏脸上都是恼羞成怒之色，站稳身子之后立即反手又攻击而来，结局很悲剧，她一次次被江逸抓住手，如耍猴般围绕着江逸冲来冲去……

Yi Fei-er almost fell, her face was red with embarrassment and anger. She steadied herself and immediately resumed her attack. Sadly, the result was the same, and she turned out to be the one who was like a monkey that was being provoked by Jiang Yi, dashing around in the room...
翊飞儿战力明显比翊凌雪差远了，江逸轻松从漫天的拳影中抓住一双滑腻的白手，他也不敢用力，抓住她的手后顺势朝旁边轻轻一带，翊飞儿的身躯就朝那边跌跌撞撞而去。

Yi Fei-er's fighting skills were obviously far below that of Yi Lingxue. Effortlessly, Jiang Yi caught a pair of silky smooth hands amid the flying fist silhouettes. He dared not exert too much force and lightly yanked her sideways. That was all it took for Yi Fei-er to stumble over.
翊飞儿攻击了一阵，尤其是每一拳都打在空中，这让她郁闷得吐血。再一次砸空之后，立即横眉竖眼的娇喝道：“你属猴的？怎么就知道闪来闪去？”

Yi Fei-er continued her attacks for a while, every punch hitting nothing but thin air. It made her incredibly sulky. After yet another miss, she scowled and pouted, "Is your zodiac a monkey? Do you only know how to leap and dodge like one?"
翊龙宇冷笑一声，江逸这铸鼎境三重的武者，就算两人元力被封印了，但是肉体力量和他相差太大了，他随便都能震退对方的双手，当下也不不变招了，继续朝江逸的脖子切去。

Yi Longyu smirked. Jiang Yi was, after all, only at the third stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. Even if the essence forces of the two sparring parties were sealed from use, Jiang Yi's physical strength was far inferior to his own and he could easily push past Jiang Yi's defenses. With this thought, he maintained the current technique and the knifehand strikes continued their downward trajectory to Jiang Yi's neck.
翊龙宇和江逸一样满头大汗，体力消耗巨大，他脸上没有半点胜利的得意，反而全是是自嘲：“苍狼，你不用装了！刚才你是故意被我拍中的吧？你小子果然和凌雪所说的变态，这反应速度太逆天了，你别说达到铸鼎境六重，就算四重都能轻松击败我！对了……去我家做副长老的事情考虑的怎么样了？如果你答应……江家那边我们来处理，甚至我可以代我父亲做主，把凌雪嫁给你！”

Like Jiang Yi, Yi Longyu was bathed in perspiration and extremely fatigued. His expression was not one of complacency, but of self-mockery, "Long Wolf, you might as well drop the pretense! You deliberately allowed me to hit you just now, didn't you? You little bugger are truly as obscenely strong as what Lingxue said. This kind of reaction speed is just unnatural. Forget about the sixth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, you'd be able to defeat me with ease even if you were just at the fourth stage! Speaking of... have you given thought yet to being the Deputy Elder of my family? If you want to... then let us deal with the Jiang Clan. I can even make the decision on my father's behalf, and have Lingxue marry you!"
翊龙宇实力强大，并没有和翊飞儿般被江逸带着转圈，只是瞬间就稳住了身形。身子一转目光内都是高隆战意，他铸鼎境六重的武者竟伤不了一个铸鼎境三重的武者，这要是传出去他在天羽城还怎么混？他作为翊家年轻一代第一强者，翊家也会颜面大损的。

Yi Longyu's prowess was not to be underestimated; unlike Yi Feier, he did not let Jiang Yi lead him on a wild goose chase and promptly steadied himself. He turned on Jiang Yi again, eyes igniting with fighting spirit. How could he, a martial artist at the sixth stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, incapable of inflicting damage on someone at only the third stage of the Cast Tripod Realm? If word got out, he would be the laughing stock of Skyplume City. As the strongest martial artist of his generation in the Yi Family, he would disgrace the family too.
翊龙宇笑了笑，也不多说径直朝外面走去，走了几步才转头笑道：“你小子果然邪门，和你对战一场，我的流云散手竟有些进步，说不定再和你对战几场将会大成了。你放心……这个秘密我会帮你保守，不过作为补偿，以后我和我们翊家的子弟会经常找你陪练的，希望你每次都全力以赴。”

Yi Longyue smiled at Jiang Yi's words and headed outside without saying anything more. A few steps later, he turned around and chuckled, "You are definitely a strange brat. My Cloud-Spin Free Hand had actually seen some progress after a battle with you. Perhaps a few more rounds would see it reaching the phenomenal stage. Don't worry... your secret is safe with me, but in return, you will have to spar a lot more frequently with the Yi Family descendants. I hope you can give your all for every battle."
翊龙宇翊凌雪看到这个告示之后顿时满脸失望，他们知道江逸是绝对不可能投靠翊家了，就算不被武殿收买，也会被江家重视了。不过这段时间翊家很多子弟和江逸对练，或多或少都有收获，翊家也算是赚了，下面的每场对战可是要百两紫金了。

Upon seeing that announcement, Yi Longyu and Yi Lingxue immediately revealed looks of disappointment. They knew that it would be absolutely impossible for Jiang Yi to rely on the Yi Family anymore - even if the Martial Arts Hall did not buy his loyalty, he would surely be treated with great importance by the Jiang Clan. However, over this recent period of time, many descendants of the Yi Family were able to have sparring practice with Jiang Yi and had more or less received some benefits. The Yi Family could be considered to have received a cheap advantage - after all, they would have to spend a whopping hundred taels of purple gold for each sparring match in the future.
翊龙宇见江逸准备好了，眸子内闪过一丝傲然，双手做了一种奇怪的手势，化作掌刀朝江逸斜斜切来。
Knowing that Jiang Yi was ready, Yi Longyu attacked with a haughty glint in his eyes. His hands formed a strange hand-seal and transformed into knifehands that came down on Jiang Yi crosswise.
老头？不会是魔修虞蒙吧？
Old fogey? She couldn’t be referring to that fiendish cultivator, Yu Meng, right?
老者走进来，看到江逸整个人都笼罩在斗篷黑袍内更加不爽了，随手拿起桌子上的丹药倒出一枚拿在手里闻了闻，很是不屑的说道：“这是灵神丹炼废了，回炉再造的吧？而且还添加了一些杂七杂八的药粉，药效估计还要打折了，这丹药价值不高，刘管事你看着办吧！”

As the elderly man walked in, the old man became even more displeased seeing Jiang Yi with his entire body concealed in a cloak and black robes. He readily grabbed the elixir bottle lying on the table, pouring a pill out and giving it a sniff. With much disdain he said, "This is a Spirit Pill that was refined to a useless state, then reheated and re-refined, isn't it? On top of that, a few miscellaneous medicinal powders were added in. I estimate that its medicinal efficacy has also been reduced. The value of this elixir is not high. Housekeeper Liu, you take care of it yourself!"
而上座的印风也开始有一搭没一搭的开始了商业互吹。
Meanwhile, Yin Feng, seated at the head of the table, started on his business spiel.
而且回炉了多次，他体内的元力也损耗了十分之一，不过他倒是不敢动用黑色元力，生怕被这柳长老看出端倪……

On top of that, having melting down the ingredients multiple times, one-tenth of the essence force in his body had been consumed. However, he did not dare to use his black essence force, lest Elder Liu got a clue of his secret...
而且就在这花出现的一瞬间，一股极为纯洁的灵气就从里面散发出来。使人精神一振，连着四周灵气都仿佛浓郁了几分。

The moment Yi Feng presented Shen Ying the flower, a surge of pure spirit Qi burst forth from the flower to fill the surroundings. All of them perked up. The Spirit Qi around them felt a few times richer.
而且是一巴掌一只，比拍蚊子还轻易的，就被打趴了，现在还趴地上不知生死呢！
Each within a single swat, before they groveled on the ground, unconscious. It seems as though more effort was needed to kill a mosquito then the 10 of them.
而且更重要的是，灵主第一次出门，居然是陪他来幻海寻找适合的灵兽，这种事要是说与派中的长老们听，估计没有人会信吧。他越想就越兴奋，以灵主的实力，别说十三阶的背云兽，就是更高阶的也不在话下。他已经可以想象得到，得到一只高阶灵兽后，其它门派世家，羡慕嫉妒恨的眼神了。

What was more important was that his Spirit Master's first time out of the Myriad Beast Peak was on a spirit beast hunt with him at the Mirage Sea. Yi Feng was sure that none of the elders from his family would believe it even if he told them. The more he thought about it, the more excited he felt. Given his Spirit Master's skills, not only would the thirteenth-level Cloud-Bearing Beast not be his match - even the higher level beasts would submit to him. He could already imagine how the other aristocratic families and sects would envy him after he gets his own high-level spirit beast.
而且武者修炼到了后面的境界，丹药对于修炼的增幅也有限了，除非是高级的地品天品丹药，否则也只是能起的效果微乎其微。高级丹药异常昂贵，一枚地品丹药价值百金，小小的天羽城，就算是姬家也不可能长期给家族子弟供应的，至于天品丹药，姬天自己也怕消耗不起吧……

In addition, the elixirs became less effective in strengthening cultivation as martial artists increase their power levels. Unless they were the superior earth-grade and heaven-grade elixirs, the effect would be negligible. However, the superior grade elixirs were extraordinarily expensive. A single earth-grade elixir cost a hundred taels of gold. In a place as small as Skyplume City, even the Ji Family would not be able to supply earth-grade elixirs to its descendants over a long period of time. As for the heaven-grade elixirs, even Ji Tian himself would have trouble affording them...
而且江家只有江恨水和江如龙进了武殿内修炼，他陪练的时候戴着面具，两人不一定能认出他，再说了……两人如此实力，找陪练肯定也找金牌陪练，怎么会找他这种铸鼎境二重的武者？

Additionally, of the Jiang Clan members, only Jiang Henshui and Jiang Rulong had entered the Martial Arts Hall for power cultivation training. Since he was wearing a mask during sparring practice, the two were unlikely to recognise him. Furthermore... considering how the two individuals had such great power, if they wanted to find sparring partners, they would definitely find gold token-grade ones. Why would they ever consider finding a martial artist with a power level at the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm like himself?
而且还是四肢瘫开，丝毫没有半点顾忌，脸朝下趴着。
She lay on the bed bench face down with her four limbs spread apart, having no qualms about it.
而且还是团成团滚出来的那种。
In addition, it was the kind that rolled out in lumps.
而且这个人不是金丹中期的郁红，而是刚刚结丹，看起来最为柔弱的思羽妹子。
It wasn't Yu Hong who was a mid-stage Golden Core. Instead, it was Sister Si Yu who had just completed her Core Formation and who looked the weakest out of all of them.
而他们高高在上，魔骨峥峥，战无不胜的魔王，已经趴在地上哭得一把鼻涕一把泪。
Meanwhile, their lofty, ever victorious Demon King, with unyielding demon character, groveled on the ground in bitter tears.
而因为柳长老的死去，江逸彻底没有机会炼丹了，整个炼丹房都被封了。家族唯一的炼丹师没了，丹药只能去外面购买，丹房内储存的丹药自然会封存，统一调度。

On top of that, because of Elder Liu's death, Jiang Yi had completely no more opportunities to refine elixirs, as the alchemy lab had been completely sealed off. With the only alchemist in the family clan having passed away, elixirs could now only be purchased from outside. The elixirs stored in the alchemy lab naturally had to be sealed up for long-term storage, with all elixirs rationed and dispatched in controlled portions.
而在上面的楼梯上走下一名黄裳少女后，整个聚珍阁内经过短暂的哗然后，立即安静了下来，落针可闻。很多锦袍公子眼中都露出灼热的光芒，刚想匆匆朝黄裳少女走去，却看到她无视众人直接走进了一间雅阁内。

As a young lady dressed in yellow apparel walked down the stairs from the floor above, the entire Pearl Gathering Pavilion immediately turned silent after some commotion for a brief moment. The atmosphere was so silent one could hear a pin drop. The eyes of many gentlemen in embroided robes revealed looks of burning passion as they sought to hastily rush towards the young lady dressed in yellow. However, they could only observe her ignore the masses around her and walk directly towards the interior of a small elegent booth.
而对于那天晚上的事，印家和轩辕家并没有出面澄清，也没有站在哪一方说话，但实际已经是偏向无敌派了。所以外面才会把无敌派传得成了隐世大仙门。

The Yin Family and Xuan Yuan Family did not take nights or so much as offer to clarify what had happened that night. From their conduct, though, it was obvious they were leaning toward the Invincible Sect's side. Otherwise, word wouldn't have spread that the Invincible Sect was a hidden great immortal sect.
而对方却不出他的意料之外身子如破麻袋般倒飞出去，重重的撞在墙上翻滚下来，抱着一条被砸断骨头的手臂惨叫不停……
But unexpectedly, his opponent flew back, slamming heavily into the wall behind and tumbling to the ground. Cradling his broken arm, he yelled out in excruciating pain…
而据兔妖们的说法，她明显是后一种。
According to those rabbit demons, she was obviously the latter.
而现在——
But now—
而等他仔细内视了片刻之后，却整个身子突然一颤，眼睛猛然睁开，一副活见鬼的表情。
And when he carefully observed for a moment, his body suddenly trembled. Abruptly opening his eyes, he looked as though he had just seen a ghost.
而羿清显然已经习惯了她这副丧样，转而收拾起了桌上的碗筷。沈萤眯着眼看着，有心想帮帮忙，毕竟刚刚做饭的是他。但实在是懒得动，默默的瞅着他进了厨房，顿时升起一种——或许收个徒弟也不错的想法。

As Yi Qing was now used to seeing her in this sorry condition, he started to clear the table. Shen Ying looked on with eyes half-closed. She wanted to help, as he was the one who had done the cooking. However, she was too lazy to move, so she silently watched him enter the kitchen. At that instant, a thought arose in her mind - maybe taking in a disciple was not that bad after all.
而这只狸猫之所以能进来，估计真如它所说的，从来没有害过人，所以身上没有丝毫血煞之气，才没有触动阵法。

The fact that it was able to enter the town meant that this civet cat was probably telling the truth. It had never harmed anyone, so there was no trace of baneful Qi in its body which would have triggered the array formation.
而那翊小姐则满脸的不爽，正在教训杨管事：“杨管事，你很不错啊！是不是看我翊凌雪不爽啊？安排一个金牌陪练冒充铜牌陪练……这样戏耍本小姐真的有意思吗？”

As for that Young Mistress Yi... Her face was filled with an expression of discontent.
"Manager Yang, you are truly brazen!" she said with a snort. "Is it just that you're disgruntled with me, Yi Lingxue? You arranged for a gold-token-grade sparring partner to pass off as a bronze-token-grade sparring partner... Is it a lot of fun for you to toy with me this way?"
而金丹的四人中，除了郁红是金丹中期，其它三人都是金丹初期，思羽更是刚刚结丹。想要从一群金丹后期，甚至是金丹大圆满中脱颖而出还是有困难的。

Out of the four Golden Core disciples, aside from Yu Hong who was at mid-stage Golden Core, only Si Yu had completed her Core Formation. It would still be much too difficult to defeat a bunch of late-stage Golden Core and Perfected Golden Core cultivators.
聚珍阁一层一片喧闹，很多大家族公子和小姐都喜欢来这购物，这里是天羽城最大的商号，能经常进出这里本身也是身份的象征。

The atmosphere in the Pearl Gathering Pavilion was noisy. Many sons and daughters from famous and powerful familial clans loved going to the Pavilion to do their shopping. This was after all the biggest merchant-house in all of Skyplume City. To be able to regularly visit the place was a symbol of one's status.
聚珍阁内很宽敞，一眼扫去最少有几十丈宽，里面摆满着各种柜台，每个柜台上都有一名店员站立，无数衣袍华贵的男女在四处乱转，感觉这里面就像是一个小型的坊市。

The interior of the Pearl Gathering Pavilion was wide and spacious. At one glance, one could see ahead for a distance of at least several hundred feet. Various sales counters were spread across the interior of the Pavilion, with a salesperson standing at attention at each counter. Countless numbers of people in luxurious attire were milling and moving about, giving an atmosphere akin to a small market-place.
聚珍阁据说是城主府姬家的产业，里面有无数珍贵的宝物，号称只有你想不到的，没有你买不到的。同时聚珍阁也是成为公认最好出售宝物的地方，童叟无欺。

It was said that the Pearl Gathering Pavilion was the property of the Ji Family, the family that administered the city. The Pavilion held counless precious treasures inside. As one said, anything you could think of, you could buy it there. The Pearl Gathering Pavilion was at the same time the place the public recognised as the best location to sell off their treasures, where they would never cheat anyone.
聚珍阁顶层很宽敞，但这里只有一个小雅阁，其余一大块地方都种满了黄色的不知名的小花，此刻在阳光的照耀下，一片金灿灿的，如梦如幻。

The top floor of the Pearl Gathering Pavilion was very spacious, but there was only a small elegent pavilion there. A large portion of the remaining space was planted fully with small yellow flowers of an unknown name. At that moment, with the flowers illuminated by bright sunlight, the scene was one of bright dazzling gold - akin to a fantastic dream.
背云兽再次发出一声大吼，只见四周的海水瞬间掀起巨浪，形成一个半圆，顿时把半个岛屿都给包裹起来。
The 背云兽 roared once again. Great waves began to form in the sea water around them, threatening to swallow the entire island.
背云兽算是上是体型最大的灵兽了，成年的灵兽本体庞大到可以摭云僻日的程度，所以才名曰背云。此兽性情暴躁，听觉灵敏，却又极为喜静，若是被吵到易发狂，所以并不适合当契约灵兽。刚刚他们上岛时，应该就是不小心唤醒了它。

The 背云兽 was one of the biggest spirit beasts in the Upper Azure World. A mature 背云兽 could cover a huge part of the sky,. This beast was temperamental and sensitive but extremely quiet. It tended to go berserk when annoyed, so it was not suitable as a Contract Spirit Beast. When they landed on the island, they accidentally awakened it.
能什么，后面他没听见，因为他又晕了。
As to what that was, he did not know, for he had blacked out again.
能光明正大的落江家面子，如此好的机会怎么会放过？
How could they give up such a great opportunity to openly and rightly disparage the Jiang Clan?
能对付金丹道君的妖类，至少也是八阶的修为，所以秋掌门才决定让元婴真人带队。此行来的弟子有数十人，都是筑基期，最高的也才筑基大圆满。

A demon who could take on a Golden Core Dao Lord must have attained at least an eighth-level cultivation, so Sect Master Qiu had made the decision to let a Nascent Soul Perfected One lead the training team. There were dozens of disciples on this trip, all at Foundation Establishment level. The highest among them were only at Perfected Foundation Establishment level.
脚下的阵法，顿时咔嚓一声裂开了，魔修张口吐出一口血，一脸不敢置信的看向羿清，“这怎么可能，我的聚阴阵！你……你是剑修！”明明他的修为在他之上，再加上这个阵法，他不可能赢过他。除非对方是剑修，只有剑修才能越阶挑战。

The array formation below the fiendish cultivator’s feet cracked open all of a sudden, and he spat out a mouthful of blood as he stared at Yi Qing in disbelief. "How is this possible, my array formation of Yin! You… You are a sword cultivator!" The other’s cultivation was clearly above his. With this array formation, there was no way the other could have beaten him unless the opponent was a sword cultivator; only sword cultivators could challenge him regardless of cultivation level.
脚下突然阵法大亮，一个防御法阵瞬间成形，挡下了所有攻击。
Suddenly, the array formation flashed brightly. In an instant, a defensive barrier array had formed, blocking off all attacks.
脱离宗门羿清到是无所谓，对玄天宗本就没有什么感情。他太清楚各派宗门的作法，从看到那面水镜开始，他就知道玄天宗众人会有什么反应。

Yi Qing didn't care that he had just left the sect. He had no feelings toward Blackheaven Sect in any case. He knew better than anyone else how sects worked: he knew how the people of Blackheaven Sect would react the moment he saw the image through the crystals.
自从升仙塔一事之后，无敌派的声望已经达到与三大世家并驾齐驱的地步。无数还未有归属的修士，都蠢蠢欲动，想加入无敌派。终于又到了一年一度，众派开山收徒的日子。

After what happened with the Immortal Ascension Pagoda, the Invincible Sect's reputation became on par with the three other aristocratic families. There were countless of cultivators who fought to join the Invincible Sect. The sects were now getting ready for their annual recruitment drive.
自从在薄家父子面前，展示过门派的实力后，孤月对教导门下弟子修行的事，越加的上心了。每天亲自带着上百弟子在演武场修练，一边练一边还齐齐喊着各种口号。

Ever since the sect showcased their strength in front of the Pu's father and son, Lonemoon had been putting in an increasing amount of effort to teach the disciples about cultivation. She would bring hundreds of disciples to the battlefield in person to cultivate, while elling slogans out loud.
自从认识沈吃货后，就连僻谷多年的他，也被召醒了隐藏在每个华夏族人身体内的吃货本能，再没有停下过。这样下去，也不知道什么时候才能得成正果。

Ever since he got to know Foodie Shen, his many years of Grain Liberation had slowly gone to waste. The foodie in him — that was present in every Chinese — was unleashed. He hadn't managed to reign it in. If this carried on, he didn't know when he would see the results of his Grain Liberation.
自从那晚上，羿清体内的妖气全清，伤势总算好了个完全。或许是因为平日全力压气妖气的原因，此时妖气一清，他竟觉得久久未曾松动的修为，隐隐有突破的趋势。而这一切，全是因为师父予他的那颗妖丹而成的，他再次庆幸，能得此良师。于是到口的打算，也就愈加说不出口。

Ever since that night, Yi Qing's body was rid of all the demonic aura and he had finally recovered fully. Perhaps due to having used all his might to suppress the demonic aura all this while, now that the aura was cleared out, he actually felt that his cultivation which had been at a bottleneck was showing signs of possibly making a breakthrough. All of this was thanks to the demon core that Master had given to him, hence he was once again relieved to have met such a good teacher. He therefore swallowed back in the intentions he had been wanting to voice out.
至于江逸嘛……
As for Jiang Yi…
至于沈萤……就安心的做个吉祥物兼外挂就可以了。
As for Shen Ying... she could focus on being a good lucky charm for them.
至于羿清身上有没有千叶草木灵，他们根本不在乎；他们要的只是个借口，若他们坚持没有，他们照样可以灭了玄天宗，不单报了那三人的仇，还能在下界多了股势力；若是有，那更是意外之喜。

They didn’t even care whether Yi Qing had the Thousand Leaves Vegetation Spirit with him; all they needed was an excuse. As long as Lonemoon, Yi Qing and Shen Ying insisted that they didn’t have the Thousand Leaves Vegetation Spirit, they would destroy the Blackheaven Sect. Then, not only would they be able to avenge their three Elders, they would also be able to flaunt their power in the Lower Realm. If the three of them admitted that they had the Thousand Leaves Vegetation Spirit, it would still be a pleasant surprise to them.
至于那丹药的药力就更别说了，这丹药等级太低了，药力太弱而且挥发的速度太慢太慢，一个时辰了才渗透到血液内，缓缓朝伤口涌去……

This is to say nothing about the efficacy of that elixir. The grade of the elixir was too low, its medical efficacy too weak and the speed of its healing effects slow—it had already been two hours, yet the medicine had only just penetrated into the blood and was just slowly making its way to the wound...
至少江如龙懵了，他空有一身的本事却没地方使用，江逸抡麻袋般抡着他弟弟朝他砸来，他能怎么办？只能不断的后退，不断的暴怒大吼：“小野种，我要杀了你，杀了你！小野种，你有种放下我弟弟，看老子不撕了你？”

At least now Jiang Rulong was in a state of confusion. He who had a whole array of skills could do anything. Jiang Yi used his younger brother as a sack to smash at him, what could he do? The only thing he could do was to constantly retreat and yelled with warth, "You little bastard, I am going to kill you, kill you! Little bastard, let my brother down if you have the guts. See if I will tear you apart!"
至此她终于确认了一个事，她在这个世界……好像是无敌的？
At that moment she finally acknowledged one thing, and that was the fact that she… just might be invincible in this world?
良久……
For a long while…
芮糜一惊，还没反应过来，就觉得眼前一阵天旋地转。
Rui Mi was shocked, but before he could react, he felt the world spinning around him.
芮糜已经走到了床边，闻言低声笑道，“呵呵，小娃娃，我马上就让你安静！”永远安静的那种。
Rui Mi had already walked to the side of the bed. Hearing such a remark from her, he sniggered, "Heh heh, little girl, I am going to make you quiet right away! The kind that lasts forever."
花费了大半个时辰，江逸将七号药田的草药清点完毕，在他正准备下山回家修炼时，却听到左边小树林内响起一阵窸窸窣窣的声音。

After spending an entire hour on his work, Jiang Yi finally completed taking stock of the medicinal plants in Plantation Number Seven. Just as he was ready to head down the hills and return home to cultivate, he heard a rustling noise coming from the small forest to his left.
荣管事亲切的拍了拍江逸的肩膀，态度和之前一个天上一个地上。柳长老在江家地位特殊，连带江逸地位也提高了不少，这小小的管事现在可不敢得罪江逸了，否则他在柳长老面前说几句，他这管事的位置就堪忧了……

Chief Rong cordially slapped Jiang Yi's shoulder, his attitude completely different from before. Elder Liu had a special position in the Jiang Clan and had collaterally increased Jiang Yi's position considerably. This tiny housekeeper now no longer dared to insult Jiang Yi—otherwise, should he say something to Elder Liu, his position as housekeeper would be in jeopardy...
荣管事依旧没有回头，只是冷冷地质问道：“昨日不是让你去清点四号药田吗？为何没有上报？这才几天功夫，你就是这样做事的？这事我要是上报刑堂，你本月的月例就一个铜板也别想领到了，哼！”

Chief Rong didn’t even turn around to look at Jiang Yi.
“Didn’t I order you to check on Plantation Four yesterday morning?” he demanded coldly. “Why didn’t you report back to me?! This is a very easy job, you know! Is this how you do things around here?! I’m going to have to report this incident to the Disciplinary Court—forget about even getting a single coin for this month’s salary! Hmph!”
荣管事的脸色一下变了，很快挤出一丝笑容，凑过来问道：“好啊，江逸，你小子倒是很厉害的嘛，竟被柳长老看上了？老实说……你是否有炼丹方面的天赋？这才被柳长老看上的？柳长老可是古板固执的很，江松的父亲求了很久，才把他送进去的。”

Chief Rong's face instantly changed its color as he quickly revealed a thin thread of a smile, before reaching over to ask, "Good, Jiang Yi, a boy like you can sure be incredible—you actually received Elder Liu's favor? Frankly speaking... do you have natural talent in refining elixirs? This was what got you Elder Liu's favor? Elder Liu is very inflexible and stubborn—it took Jiang Song's father much begging for a very long time before he could send him over."
荣管事的面色一下缓和下来，亲切的拍了拍江逸的肩膀道：“行啊，江逸，你小子能耐了啊。年轻人嘛，出去历练下总是好事，不过你得注意安全啊，三个月必须回归家族，否则上面追查起来，要是认定你叛族那可就麻烦了……”

Chief Rong's expression gentled right away. He patted Jiang Yi's shoulder kindly, "Good, Jiang Yi, you little brat has quite the capability. It supposedly can't be a bad thing for a young man like you to venture out for some experience and toughening, but you have to be careful, and return to the family clan in three months, lest things turn complicated if they investigate the matter and deem you a renegade of the family clan..."
荣管事看到江逸走了进来，面色一板冷哼道：“江逸，五号药田内的药草清点完毕了？”
Chief Rong saw Jiang Yi walking over. He glared at him and snorted coldly. "Jiang Yi, are you done accounting for the medicinal herbs in Plantation Number Five?"
荣管事终于转过身狠狠瞪了江逸一眼，训斥道：“还不快去西山清点？要是两个时辰内没有上报准确数量，你就等着挨刑堂的责罚吧！”

Chief Rong finally turned himself around and stared Jiang Yi straight into his eyes with a look of ferocity. “Go to the Western Hills now! If you haven’t reported back in four hours with the right numbers, you’ll be sorry!”
荣管事见江逸没出去，反而狡辩起来顿时怒了，没等江逸说完一拍桌子就站了起来准备训斥几句。不过他突然一怔，眼睛猛然睁大，问道：“你说什么？谁让你去帮忙？柳长老？是炼丹房的柳长老吗？”

Upon seeing Jiang not only not leave, but instead try to defend himself, Chief Rong instantly flew into a rage. Without waiting for Jiang Yi to finish his sentence, he slammed the table and stood up, ready to scold the boy. However, he suddenly appeared startled, his eyes abruptly expanded, as he asked, "What did you say? Who asked for your help? Elder Liu? You mean, the Elder Liu from the alchemy lab?"
荣管事说不定哪天就会来追要令牌了，江逸时间紧迫，也顾不了那么多了，开始在里面转悠寻思炼丹。

There was no way to know what day Chief Rong would suddenly come to demand the command token. Jiang Yi was tight on time. He decided not to worry so much. Instead, he started pondering on how to refine elixirs.
荣管事重重一哼，直接打断他的话：“没清点完毕，你跑这干什么？这里是你能来的地方？还不快滚去西山清点？”

Chief Rong snorted loudly, directly interrupting him. "What are you doing here, since you're not done counting? Is this a place you can even come in? Hurry up and run back to the Western Hills for accounting!"
莫非……
Unless...
莫非……她们遇上了什么隐世的大仙门不成？众人心底顿时有些激动，就连郁红眼睛都亮了几分，开始重新审视起前方这两人。
Could it be… they had met an amazing, hidden immortal sect? Everyone grew excited and even Yu Hong's eyes brightened up as she began to see these two from the Invincible Sect in a new light.
莫非眼前这个女子，有什么特别之处。
Could this girl be special in some way?
萝卜一愣，整个人像是霜打的茄子一样蔫了下去，眼里顿时涌上了两泡泪花，哪还有刚刚惊艳的样子。
The radish was stunned. Its entire body went limp like a shriveled eggplant and its eyes began to well up. It no longer had the glamor and beauty it had before.
萝卜一路控制着法器往回飞。他们来时，孤月在路上布了几个传送的法阵，所以比起之前来，她们只花了不到半个时辰，就到了上青界与妖界的交界处。

The radish was controlling the Dharma artifact the whole way back. Lonemoon had left some transportation arrays on their way to Upper Azure Town, hence the return journey took less than an hour and they arrived at the border between the Upper Azure World and the Demon Realm.
萝卜呆了一下，顺着她指的方向瞅了瞅，然后掷地有声发出响亮的一声：
The radish hesitated before it turned to look in the direction that her finger was pointing. Then, it turned back around and made a sound:
萝卜心碎了一地。
The radish's heart broke into little pieces.
萝卜捂着肿成猪头的脸，蹭的一下可怜兮兮的缩回了原形，原本白胖的萝卜，已经变成紫的了。
The radish's face swelled up and in the next second, it turned back into its true form. The once white, fat radish was now purple.
萝卜眼神一冷，叭的一下，一巴掌拍开了他的手，掷地有声的道，“滚开，丑逼！”
The radish's expression became cold. It smacked Lonemoon's hand away and shouted, "Get lost, Ugly!"
萝卜精原本还带着青色的身体，瞬间被吓成了惨白色，也不装植物了，在那巨兽啃下来的瞬间，噌的一下从坑里跳了出来，慌不择路的在四周惊恐的乱跑起来，“叽叽叽叽叽叽……”

The radish's body had a slight green tinge to it at first, but now it was purely white. It could no longer pretend it was just a motionless plant. Just as the beast's teeth hit the soil, the radish jumped out of the pit, panic-stricken. It started to run around in circles exclaiming, "Ji ji ji…"
萝卜脸色一白，都快哭出来了，“我开，我开还不行吗？”
The radish's face turned pale and became on the verge of crying. "I will make them bloom, I will, alright?"
萝卜被看得一抖，下意识的就抱胸后退了一步，“干嘛？我卖艺不卖身的！”
The radish shivered under their stares, subconsciously hugged its chest and took a step back. "What? I sell my skills but I do not sell my body!"
蓝衣妹子。
Blue shirt girl.
Bao Yi, "..."
薄家两父子越加好奇了，纷纷上前道，“仙子不用害怕，我们只是想见识下贵派高招而已。”
The Pu's father and son were even more curios now and said respectively, "Don't need to be scared. We just want to take a look at your sect's abilities."
薄家两父子，每次见到这种场景，脸色就更绿一分。直到了解到整个无敌派，确实全都是女体修后，他们的脸色就更精彩了，眼神中充满了绝望。

Every time the Pu father and son see this, their faces would turn slightly more green, which became even more interesting when they finally understood that the entire sect were female Body cultivators. Despair was engraved in their eyes.
薄家二人：“……”
Pu's father and son were left thoroughly speechless.
薄家父子和其它弟子也围了上来。
The Bao father and son, and their disciples huddled together as they came forward.
薄飞平仍是不敢置信的扫视了他好几遍，虽然九霄亿镜有着半条仙脉的仙气，确实可以让人的修为突飞猛进，但……这也进得太多了点吧？

Pu Feiping scanned Yi Qing up and down repeatedly. He simply could not believe his eyes! Even though the Infinity Cloud Mirror did carry with it half of the Immortal Qi from an immortal's pulse, and thus could help people rise through the levels of their cultivation, but this... this is a bit too much, isn't it?
薄飞平手一抖，连探查的法术都没维持住，面前的水镜哐的一下就碎了。心底全都是慌乱，一时间之前所有想不通的事，全都想通了，为什么那个魔族会突然消失？为什么到处都找寻不着它的踪迹？为什么它能轻易突破城外的破魔阵直接进到城主府？

Pu Feiping's hand was shaking, and could not even maintain the Dharma spells that were used to scan the city, causing the water mirror in front of them to shatter into pieces. Now his mind was in a mess. Previously whatever he did not understand, all made sense to him now. Things like why did the Demonic beast suddenly disappear, why could they not find any traces of his tracks anywhere, and why could it easily break through the city's shield against demons and directly enter the city, all became clear to him.
薄飞平点了点头，这才带着几人去了偏院。孤月把沈萤所说出现过魔界之门的地方，反复查看了十几遍，如薄飞平所说没有任何异样。

Pu Feiping nodded and brought them to the remote building. Lonemoon kept cheecking the place where Shen Ying said she had seen the Door of Demon realm repeatedly, but to no avail. It was just like what Pu Feiping had mentioned. There was nothing suspicious about the place.
Bao Fei Ping, "..."
虽然他们现在只有三个人，前期可能会辛苦点，但他好歹也是管理过几百万人大公司的人，对这些事情很熟悉。至于术法学习之类的，羿清和他都是剑修，可以先招收几个资质好的剑修弟子。而且他精通阵法，羿清精通练器，有合适的弟子，也可以传授。练丹御兽，就只能靠自学了。

Although there were only the three of them now and the road ahead looked difficult, Lonemoon had experience in managing a company of millions of workers. He was all too familiar with these matters. As for training in sorcery, both he and Yi Qing could handle it. They were sword cultivators after all—they could recruit disciples who were talented. While Lonemoon was proficient in array formations, Yi Qing was proficient in weapon refinement. They could pass down their skills if they found suitable disciples and they could also allow their disciples to pick up pill-refining and beast control on their own.
虽然他知道剧情，但却发现自己距离书中那些情节发展的时间，还很遥远。同为剑修，难免对剑仙有些好奇，本以为真要见到，估计也是他飞升成仙后的事情了。

Although he knew the storyline, he realized that he was quite far back in the timeline before those events happened. Since they were both sword cultivators, it was no wonder that he grew curious of the sword immortal. He thought that even if he really were to meet him, it would be after his Immortal Ascension.
虽然修仙一途向来就是逆天而行，自踏上这条路开始，他就做好了赴死的准备。但此刻，他担心的却是屋内的人，他死不要紧，可恩人怎么办？恩情未报，绝对不能让她出半点事。

Although immortal cultivators had always done things that went against the will of heaven, he had prepared himself for death once he had embarked on this path. But at this moment, his concern was with the person in the house. His death did not matter, but what about his benefactor? He would never let anything endanger her before his debt was repaid.
虽然厨艺一言难尽，经常做得焦的焦糊的糊，好在不用饿肚子。会说话的小动物肉吃着有些别扭，但吃着吃着……也就习惯了！

Although her culinary skills were not exactly out of this world — more often than not, the food would be burnt or overcooked — but at the very least she would not go hungry. Eating the meat of animals that could talk felt a little awkward but the more she ate, the more she grew used to it.
虽然听不懂，但是……这种想吐血的冲动是怎么回事？他堂堂丹阳宗的极品丹方……真的过……过时了吗？
He didn't understand, but… why did he suddenly feel like he was about to vomit blood? All these recipes for supreme-grade pills and elixirs from the honorable Dan Yang Sect are… really… outdated?
虽然她们是比剑修还强悍的体修，但这一年来学习的攻击手段全是剑招，又没有跟人对战过，缺乏经验。甚至之前那些阴柔的术法，她们估计也不会再用。

Although they were Body Cultivators who were tougher than Sword Cultivators, the offensive techniques they had learned in the past year were all sword moves and none of them had actual battle experience. Moreover, the gentle sorcery they had previously learned would most likely not be of use.
虽然方式太过惊心动魄了点，但好在结局还算可以接受。
Although the method used had terrified him a little, the rewards more than made up for it.
虽然此时的他鼻青脸肿，但他……很强！特别强，就算是全盛时候的天帝辰戈，也不会是他的对手！
Even though he badly battered, he was...strong! Extremely strong! Even the Celestial Emperor Chen Ge, in his prime, would not be his match!
虽然现在轩辕家是没理由再发作了，但只要那草木灵在这一天，他和师父一天还是玄天宗的人，他们就不会放过玄天宗，上界世家想对付下界的宗门，多的是不见血的手段，时间久了不保这些人不会对他们生出怨恨来，到不如走了干净。

The Xuan Yuan Family no longer had any reason to destroy Blackheaven Sect. However, as long as Shen Ying and Yi Qing had the Thousand Leaves Vegetation Spirit, the Xuan Yuan family would count them as one with Blackheaven Sect. The Upper World rarely had to resort to violence to deal with families from the Lower Realms. As time went by, nobody could guarantee that these sects from the Lower Realm would not hate the families of the Upper World, so it would be much more worth it for the Upper World families to make a clean break.
虽然能成功飞升成仙的人少之又少，但飞升之人大多都出自四大家族中。而且世家实力强悍，皆有几十名化神的高手，坐镇的兵解游仙每家也四五位。

Although fewer and fewer people could achieve Immortal Ascension, most of the people who had achieved Immortal Ascension came from one of the four aristocratic families. Moreover, the aristocratic families were incredibly strong—they each had dozens of Soul Formation experts and four or five presiding Traveling Immortals.
血性的虎王顿时看不过去了，虎鼻一喷，狠狠的道，“哼，你个没种的小子，区区几个修士就把你吓住了，还变做这般模样。”妖皆可化形，但这是万妖大会，所以这里大部分妖族都露了点原型以区别种族，就只有她保持着完整的人形，这让虎王更加看不顺眼了，“不敢以原形示人，你到是个什么妖？”

The hot-blooded Tiger Monarch could not stand for any of this. Snorting angrily, it said fiercely, "Hmph, you gutless fellow. To think a few mere cultivators are able to scare you to the point of assuming such a form." Demons possessed the ability to morph themselves, but this was the Myriad Demon Congregation. The demons gathered here were in their true forms yet she had chosen to retain her human form instead. This irritated the Tiger Monarch even further. "You do not dare show your true form to us? What kind of demon are you?"
血液是滚烫的，一般都是碱性的，一旦进入眼睛内会腐蚀眼睛内的神经，让对方暂时失明，甚至眼部受创。

Blood was boiling hot and normally alkaline in nature. Once blood entered the eyes, it would corrode the nerves within the eyes, leaving the opposing party temporarily blind and even causing damage to the eye itself.
血狐一惊，刚要收回狐尾，沈萤却突然用力一扯，顿时一道血光喷溅而出，狐妖剩下的六根狐尾被齐根拉断。

The blood fox was shocked. He wanted to retract his tails, when Shen Ying suddenly pulled with great force, and blood immediately splattered out. The blood fox's remaining six tails had been pulled out in one go.
血狐大吼了一声，身后剩下的七条尾巴也猛的变长，似是利刃一般从阵法里飞了出来，攻向两人。
The blood fox let out out a loud roar. His remaining seven tails, which had suddenly grown longer, shot out of the array formation like sharp blades towards the two of them.
血狐笑得更大声，“玄天宗又怎么样？这里就只你们俩个，加上一只不成气侯的狸猫，只要杀了你们，谁知道这阵是我布的。”

The blood fox's laughter grew louder. "Blackheaven Sect, so what? There's only two of you here, plus one less than qualified civet cat. As long as I kill all of you, who would know that I was the one who set up the array."
血狐脸上却全都是兴奋，眼中隐隐还有些疯狂之意，一边抱紧尾巴上的婴儿，一边呢喃，“吸收了这紫霞玄芝的灵气，我儿很快……很快就会醒过来的。”

In contrast, the blood fox looked greatly excited, the expression in his eyes revealing a hint of madness. Holding the baby on his tail, he muttered, "Once he absorbs the aura of this Splendor Lingzhi, my son will soon… soon awaken."
血狐身上的血煞之气瞬间暴涨，连着整个空间都刮起了一阵阴风。孤月眉头一皱，跟羿清对视了一眼，再没有心情跟这个明显已经疯了的狐妖废话，双双冲了出去。手间剑招变换，一时间满目都是剑光。

Suddenly, the baneful Qi in the blood fox surged and a gust of Yin wind buffeted the entire space. Furrowing his brow, Lonemoon exchanged looks with Yi Qing. Not wanting to continue talking nonsense with this fox demon who had obviously gone insane, both of them rushed forwards. Within moments, the whole area was filled with flashes of light from the blade of their swords as they seamlessly switched from one sword move to the next.
Blood fox: "..."
血？孤月一愣，立马走了过去，看向那水淋淋的山壁，本以为这里的土质偏红色，细一看才发现，哪是偏红，分明就是被血染红的。

Blood? Puzzled, Lonemoon immediately walked over and looked at the dripping mountain wall. He had attributed the redness to the soil here being reddish. Upon closer examination, he realized that the stuff covering the wall was not red soil at all; it was blood.
被人尊重和感激是很愉悦的事情，尤其还是个漂亮小姐。江逸在江家从未受到如此待遇，反而在外面受到了姬家小姐和这位翊小姐的高规格待遇，心情自然大好，摆手道：“小姐客气了，我一定全力以赴。”

To receive respect and gratitutde was a very delightful thing, especially since it came from a pretty young lady. Jiang Yi had never experienced such good treatment at the Jiang Clan; on the other hand, to receive such high-standard treatment outside from the young mistress of the Ji Family and this Young Mistress Yi, his emotions naturally improved greatly. He waved his hands and replied, "Young Mistress, you are too courteous. I will definitely give it my all."
被强塞了一袋海鲜的白泽：“……”他没想要这个啊？
Bai Zhe, who had the bag of seafood forcibly stuffed at him: "..." He had not asked for this?
被甩了个背景的，“……”啥意思？
He turned his back toward her. "..." What's that supposed to mean?
被说破身份的那天，说实话，他是真的被吓到了。想确认，又怕去跟她确认。这种突然知道，自己不是老天爷，唯一的小甜心感觉，谁懂？！谁理解？！

The day that his identity was exposed, in all honesty, he was truly shocked. He had wanted to verify her identity but at the same time was afraid. Such an unexpected revelation that he was not all-powerful took away the only bit of sweet joy in him. Who could understand that!? Who could understand that!?
西院一个破败的小院子内，江逸大口大口的扒着饭，江小奴却蹲坐旁边满脸傻笑，手里拿着一片亮晶晶的紫色金叶子，感觉一切都是那么的不真实。

In a small poorly-maintained courtyard of the Western Court, Jiang Yi swallowed down big gulps of rice as Jiang Xiaonu squatted beside him, her face grinning foolishly. As she held the bright, sparkling piece of purple gold leaf, she felt as though all of it was quite surreal.
要不……
Why not...
要不要这么没节操啊喂，还真就答应了。
Why must you agree so readily? Can't you show a little backbone?
要不要这样，揍人还带接力的啊喂。
Do you have to go to this extent - that you would find a substitute to punch someone?
要想伤势尽快复原，关键在于外药内调。
The most important factor behind the speedy recovery of any wound was to apply medicine on the exterior and “regulate” from the interior.
要打，他身上没有黑色元力了，不说没受伤的护卫还有两人，这管事明显实力也不低。打下去结局只有一个，他爬着回江家……

If he chose to fight, there was no more black essence force in his body. To say nothing of the two uninjured guardsmen still available, the housekeeper himself evidently had power at a level that was not considered weak. There would only be one outcome should they fight: that of Jiang Yi crawling back to the Jiang Residence...
要知道修士一般契约的灵兽，都是喜欢栖息在陆地上的，水族由于限制多，所以很少契约。而且水族在陆上战斗力大减。但在水中却不一样，这幻海明显是他们的主战场。

Cultivators usually sought to contract spirit beasts that lived on land. Aquatic beasts, which had more restrictions, were deemed unsuitable for contract. Moreover, aquatic beasts made poor warriors on land. But it was a different story when they were in the sea; the Mirage Sea was obviously their natural battle ground.
要知道这次参赛的可是有上千个门派，特别是四大世家的人。那些可都是年轻一辈的佼佼者。哪一个不是世家精心陪养出来的人才。就单这十个人中，除了无敌派以外，其它几人几乎全都是世家弟子。以至于接连出现的四个无敌派的名字，就特别明显。

Thousands of sects had taken part in the competition today, including the four aristocratic families. They were the younger generation of leaders, each one of them trained and nurtured by the people from the aristocratic families. Everybody else who made it to the top ten list, apart from those from the Invincible Sect, were from the aristocratic families. This was only to be expected.
要闹，那更不可能，江家离开这并不远，一旦传回江家此事后果更加严重，那剩下唯有按对方的要求办了。

If he chose to complain further... that option was even more improbable. The Jiang Residence was not far from here. Should this incident get spread to the Jiang Clan, the consequences would be even more severe. That left only one solution, which was to give in to his opponent's requests.
见人走远，戚橙雨这才盘脚坐下，开始调息经脉，刚将灵气运转了一个周天。熟悉的女声突然在耳边响起。
