Qi Chengyu made sure that Shen Ying had walked quite a distance away before sitting down in the lotus position. She began to regulate her meridians. Just as her Spirit Qi finished one cycle through her body, a familiar female voice suddenly rang in her ear.
见他不接，她直接塞到了他的手里道，“你也辛苦了，拿着！不用送我了回去吧，有空来无敌派玩哦。再见！”

When Bai Zhe showed no signs of taking the bag, she directly stuffed it into his hands and said, "You worked hard today. Take it! Don't bother sending me off. Come visit Invincible Sect when you are free. Bye!"
见他们不动，狸猫呆了呆，又从袋子里掏出一碇，跟之前那个并排摆在了一起。
Seeing no reaction from them, the civet cat pondered for a while and took another gold piece out of his bag, putting it side by side with the other one.
见他们带着千叶草木灵走了，轩辕家的人也无心继续围攻玄天宗了。
Seeing that Yi Qing, Shen Ying and Lonemoon had taken the Thousand Leaves Vegetation Spirit with them, the people of the Xuan Yuan Family saw no point in surrounding the Blackheaven Sect.
见他们还是不动，狸猫妖干脆一咬牙，直接把袋子里的金子全倒了出来，屋顶顿时哗啦啦的掉了七八碇金子，弱弱的看了他们一眼道，“没……没了喵。”

Still seeing no reaction, the civet cat demon gritted his teeth and poured out all the gold pieces from his bag. Seven or eight gold pieces slid down from the roof. He looked at them meekly, "No… no more. Meow."
见众人脸色一白，郁海珩越加确定了自己的猜测，未等众人反应，突然手间一转。与刚刚小打小闹似的风刃不同，一条巨大的风龙瞬间出现，围绕着满天的风刃顿时就朝着偏殿呼啸而去。

When everybody went pale, Yu Hai Heng knew that he had guessed correctly. Before anyone could respond, he twisted his palm. He summoned a gigantic wind blade that made the previous wind blades look like toys. The gigantic wind blade, together with all the smaller wind blades, flew toward the Palace Wing.
见她们落地，快步迎了上来。轩辕禹上前了几步，先是朝着沈萤行了个礼，“大仙。”才转头介绍道，“这位就是印家家主印风。”

Seeing that Shen Ying's group had arrived, the both of them quickly went to greet them. Stepping forward, Xuan Yuanyu saluted Shen Ying first and said, "Great Immortal." He then turned his head to make the introductions. "This is Yin Feng, the patriarch of the Yin Family."
见她看过去，呆了一下，给了她个小太阳般的笑容。转头看向桌上的一块糕点，一脸跃跃欲试。

When Ning ZiAn saw that Shen Ying turned around, he was in a trance for a while, before giving her a sunflower like smile. He turned towards the table with the small pastries and his eager face revealed that he wanted to try the food.
见她走了，她干脆换了一个地点调息，然而十分钟后……
Seeing her walk away, Qi Chengyu decided to choose another place to regulate her meridians. However, ten minutes later…
见她问话，碧涛眼里顿时一亮，乖巧的飘近一点道，“禀大仙，这传承的，是我丹阳宗中所有的丹法丹方，以及制丹心得等等。我丹阳宗在五万年前，就是赫赫有名的第一仙门。门中的丹师无数，多少仙人求上我宗，就为求得一颗丹药。”

Bitao's eyes lit up on hearing her question. He obediently floated closer to her and answered, "Let me answer you, Great Immortal: my heritage contains all the recipes for all the pills and elixirs of Dan Yang Sect, as well as all the knowledge of refining pills. My Dan Yang Sect was the top Immortal Sect 50,000 years ago. We had countless alchemists and many immortals would come to our sect, begging for just one pill or elixir."
见它一脸誓死不从的样，沈萤转头就看向羿清，“厨子，今天晚上吃萝卜炖排骨吧。”
Seeing that it did not want to budge, Shen Ying turned to look at Yi Qing and said, "Chef, let's have boiled ribs and radish soup tonight."
见它坐不稳，沈萤从善如流的直接蹲在了它的旁边，呵呵一笑道，“是这样的，我三个刚刚到上青界，没找着地方住。听说你们妖界不像三青界还分上中下的，而且隔着上青界最近，就想问问你有没有合适的地方？”

Noticing the rabbit’s predicament, Shen Ying directly squatted down beside it. Chuckling, she said, "It's like this.The three of us have just been to the Upper Azure World but couldn't find a place to live. I heard that, unlike the Three Realms, your Demon Realm is not partitioned into upper, middle and lower worlds, and it is also nearest to the Upper Azure Word. I’d like to ask if you have a suitable place for us?"
见对方完全没了反抗，印元飞立马停下了攻击，抱拳道，“道友，承让了！”
Seeing the opponent not resisting, Yin Yuanfei immediately stopped his attacks and cupped his fists, saying, "Fellow Daoist, thank you!"
见对方确实不动了，已经小了一半大小的鬼王，瞬间化作一股黑气钻回了噬魂幡里，还掩饰性的挪了挪，上面那个已经破碎得只留下几个符文的封印阵，似是拼命想把自己藏到那个符文后面。整个幡旗，瑟瑟发抖！

Seeing that his opponent was not moving, the Ghost King, who was already half his original size, instantly turned into a black gas and burrowed back into the Soul Devouring Gonfalon. The seal array was so torn that only a few runes could be seen on it. He desperately tried to hide himself behind a rune. The whole flag was shivering!
视线交汇，又是噼哩啪啦的电光声。
They locked eyes and static filled the air between them once again.
觉得有点冤！
What a waste of effort!
觉得这个结果，一点都不意外是怎么回事？
Why wasn’t this result surprising at all to them?
认真挖坑的人一顿，回过头似乎是呆了一下，“咦？原来还没死啊？”她皱了皱眉，叹了口气，这才手脚并用的从坑里爬了出来，一边爬还一边念叨，“早说啊，我挖那么久。”

The girl earnestly digging at the pit stopped working and turned around. For a moment, there was stunned silence. "Huh? You are not dead after all?" She frowned and sighed, before climbing out of the pit using her hands and feet. While climbing out she kept grumbling, "You should have told me earlier, I was digging for so long."

What made him shocked, however, was their determination. It was precisely because they understood their own circumstances that they worked way harder every day and night, training nonstop. What made his heart relax was that after he had followed that guard in, all he saw was a spacious and empty central hall, with not a single person inside. He allowed himself to lower his cloak slightly, while silently praying that he would not meet Jiang Henshui here.

What left her astonished was that Jiang Yi, whose power level was only at the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, could actually once again easily avoid her attack. This time she once again failed to touch even the corner of Jiang Yi's robes.

What befuddled Jiang Yi was that the essence force, which he had just been applied to the cauldron, was being absorbed speedily and automatically by the cauldron like a sponge—with the absorption at a shocking speed, so fast that the essence force in the meridians in his hands was completely absorbed in an instant.
让江逸诧异的是，那身材火辣的翊小姐进来后没有立即出手，反而朝他感激的一笑，抱拳行礼道：“你叫苍狼？多谢你的陪练！希望你今日同样全力以赴。”

The branches and leaves on the ground flew up as the Spirit Qi in the air suddenly became dense. He was really quick; in a second, he was right in front of Shen Ying. His sword was centimetres away from Shen Ying's head.
说完，他眼神一冷，似是耐心用尽，一挥手顿时身后两个化神修士冲出，满天火海朝两人烧了过来。

On saying this, his eyes turned cold, and he seemed to have exhausted hs store of patience. With a wave of his hands, two Soul Formation cultivators, their bodies ablaze in flames, rushed out and surrounded the two girls.
说完，他认真咚咚咚的朝着她嗑了三个头，一脸紧张期待的看着她。
He then conscientiously gave her three loud kowtows with a face of eagerness.
说完，作势就要掀开身下的长袍。
It looked as though it wanted to tear open its robes as soon as it finished speaking.
说完，十几个化神修士，顿时蜂拥而上，各式的术法铺天盖地而来。
As soon as he finished speaking, ten of the Soul Formation cultivators floated into the sky. All kinds of sorcery shot toward the ground.
说完，又回头看向孤月，“你过半个时辰后，再将另外四个人引过来即可。”
Turning to Lonemoon he said, "After an hour, divert another four over here."
说完，她再次转身走了，又十分钟后……
After that, she turned and walked away again. Ten minutes later...
说完，干脆利落的往门口而去，刚要出门。
As soon as the words were out of her mouth, she headed for the exit.
说完，放下筷子，转身一言不发的就出了后殿。
He put down his chopsticks and turned to leave without saying another word.
说完，更盛数倍的威压，带着杀气，直朝着对方而去。
After he finished speaking, he increased the air pressure, fully intending to kill. The suppressive force flew toward Yi Qing.
说完，江恨水径直走进丹房取了几大瓶丹药就离开了炼丹房，走出丹房后再也没有看江逸一眼，更别说道别了，宛如两个陌路人。

Finishing his sentence, Jiang Yi walked directly into the elixir room, retrieved several big bottles of elixirs and left the alchemy lab. As he left the alchemy lab, he did not look back and give Jiang Yi a glance, to say nothing of sending him a farewell. It was as though they were two strangers to each other.
说完，江逸目光陡然扫向江豹，身子也闪电般朝江豹冲去，身上杀气十足，双腿和衣袍之上都有江松的鲜血，看起来如一尊杀神般恐怖。

Finishing his declaration, Jiang Yi's sights suddenly turned to look at Jiang Bao; like a lightning, he rushed at Jiang Bao. He looked just like a horrifying killer god that was bursting with killing intent, both his legs and robes were drenched with Jiang Song's blood.
说完，直接起身往前走去，开始一手一截，一手一截的把满地的海鲜，往袋里扔，大丰收啊！
She walked toward the seafood and grabbed handfuls of meat, chucking them into the storage bag. What a catch!
说完，直接转头看向沈萤道，“沈萤，我跟羿清去一趟追魂楼，马上就回来。”
As soon as he finished speaking, he turned to Shen Ying and said, "Shen Ying, Yi Qing and I will make a trip to Soul Chasing Tower. We'll be right back."
说完，继续泪汪汪的看向沈萤，“嘤嘤……萝卜需要小姐姐抱抱才能起来。”
It turned back to Shen Ying and continued to cry, "Wa... wa... Radish needs Little Missy to carry it up before it can stand."
说完，转身拉着牛爸爸走入了传送阵。
With that, she pulled Father Niu with her into the transportation array.
说完，追着羿清的方向飞了过去。
So saying, he flew off in pursuit of Yi Qing.
说实话发现这个问题后，她是想找别人确认确认的，听说这个世界还真的有仙人，可惜她一个月实在见不着几个人。只能在这里住下来，她性子一向安逸，说好听点是随遇而安，难听点就是不知上进的死宅懒。人生还真没啥追求。

To be completely honest, after discovering this problem, she wanted to find someone to acknowledge that there were indeed deities in this world, but to her dismay she barely met more than a handful of people in a month. Her character had always been happy-go-lucky: to put it nicely would be that she was adaptable to her circumstances, but to put it bluntly would be that she did not strive for progress and was a totally lazy shut-in. Her life was truly lacking of any pursuits.
说实话，由于男主宁子安，他是不想过多跟薄家扯上关系的。上次魔界之门是个意外，毕竟事关整个仙界。

To be honest, because of the owner Ning ZiAn, he did not wish to have anymore relations with the Pu Family. The door of Demon Realm the previous time was just an accident. Moreover, it concerned the entire Immortal Realm.
说干就干。
If Jiang Yi said he'd do it, he would definitely do it!
说干就干！
That was how Jiang Yi was: if he said he would do it, he would definitely do it!
说时迟，那时快！
In the blink of an eye!
说是九九雷劫，却是八十二道，牛爸爸的直接变成了八十三道，很明显就是不想让人成仙。
It was called the Nine Nine Lightning Tribulation, yet there were 82 bolts of lightning - 83 for Father Niu. It was obvious he was trying to stop people from ascending into immortality.
说着他一挥手，果然十几只兔子同时立了起来，整个兔身发生了变化，不到半会已经化出了人形，只是……顶着个兔头。
Upon saying those words, sure enough, about ten or so rabbits stood up simultaneously as their rabbit bodies transformed. Within a moment they had manifested human forms, but… with rabbit heads.
说着他向前两步，开始展示起剑法来。一招一式都极为凌厉，大片的剑光瞬间笼罩住了整个岛，掀起大片的沙石在空中飞舞。他的身影更是直接消失在了剑光之中，仿佛已经溶入了剑法之中。

As he said this, he took a couple of steps forward and started to showcase his swordsmanship. Every sword move was very sharp, the brilliant gleams of the sword enveloping the whole island, causing the large patches of sand and stones on the ground to be blasted away. His figure disappeared within the sword gleams, as if merged with the sword dharma.
说着他手间一转，手里的法器带着凌厉的杀气，就朝着郁红飞了过去。
As he said this, he flipped his hand and a Dharma artifact enveloped in a dense murderous aura flew towards Yu Hong.
说着他接过那团黑气，扬手布下一个阵法，口中念了大段的咒法，不到一会他周身就出现了道道金色光芒，无数法符快速飞入那团黑气里。

He received the lump of black matter as he spoke and set up a matrix. He chanted a long spell and rays of golden lights shimmered around him not long after. Countless talismans quickly flew towards the lump of black matter.
说着他直接强行调动灵气，结印布阵，手里阵法出现的一瞬间，体内的妖气再次反噬筯脉，张口噗的一声，喷出大口血，把本就沾了血迹的衣服，染得更红了。

He immediately forced his Spirit Qi to activate, directing it to imprint the layout of an array. The moment the array formation appeared in his hand, the demonic aura in his body once again engulfed and attacked his meridians. He opened his mouth and blood spurted out in a gush. His clothes, already covered in blood stains, was dyed into an even deeper shade of red.
说着她直接把参赛令牌递了过去。
He handed over the participation token to her as he spoke.
说着她突然手心一紧。
As soon as the words were out of her mouth, she clenched the fist that held onto the Traveling Immortal's fist..
说着它朝着后面的众兔一挥爪，十几只高阶兔妖立马一字排开，规规矩矩的坐成一排，连尾巴都没有乱动一下，别说是攻击了。

As it spoke, it turned towards the colony of rabbits behind it. With a wave of its paw, around ten of the highly powerful rabbit demons fell into a straight line in a snap. They sat in an orderly row and did not so much as wag their tails, not to mention attack.
说着就想去抓她的手。这么多年，她是唯一一个让他送出玄灵花的女子。
He graspd her hand suddenly. She was the only girl who made him want to give the Black Spirit Blossom to her after all these years.
说着手里的旗子一扬，顿时数十道闪电发出，嗞啦啦的劈向院中，不单将那人再次劈得瘫了回去，周围更是劈出了好几个大坑。

The gonfalon was raised along with those words. Right at that moment, dozens of lightning bolts shot out towards the yard. Not only was the man struck by those lightning bolts till he was limp, several gaping craters were made in the surrounding as well.
说着江逸匆忙的朝怀中掏去，满脸都是哀求之色，管事和马公子还有那几名护卫眼眸一亮，下意识朝江逸掏钱的左手望去。

As he was speaking, Jiang Yi hurriedly reached into his chest pocket with a pleading look. The eyes of the housekeeper, Young Master Ma, and those guards, lit up. They subconsciously directed their gaze to Jiang Yi's left hand that was in the midst of retrieving the money.
说着直接上前一步，想接过他手里的盘子，对方却不松，拉了几次都没拉过来，一时间僵持了下来。
Yi Qing stepped forward and took the plate from Bai Ze's hands, but Bai Ze refused to let go of the plate. Yi Qing kept trying to pull the plate over, but to no avail.
说着直接扬起刚刚从易峰手里接过的剑，开始在鱼尾上片起了生鱼片。
She raised the sword she received from Yi Feng and began to slice the fish's tail into sashimi.
说着转身一头扎进了树林，不到半会，只听见唰啦啦的一阵什么滑过的声音，四周的树木突然被从两边挤开。她一手拖着什么，一步步走了回来。

She turned around and ran into the forest. After a few seconds, they heard sounds of slashing coming from inside the forest. The trees began to bend outward, opening up a lane on which Shen Ying walked out. She was holding something in her hand.
说着钱万贯的眉头蹙了起来，沉默了很久，才苦笑说道：“大哥，这事我可以帮你，短期内我能利用家族的人帮你掩护一下，但这事瞒不了多久。除非你在学院内不冒头，一旦你成为精英学员，各家族都会调查你的资料，到时候绝对有人会查出一丝蛛丝马迹的。”

Qian Wanguan's eyebrows furrowed as he spoke and only squeezed out a wry smile after a long silence, " Big Brother, I can help you on this matter and make use of the people in my family to hide your identity for the time being. However, it would only be a matter of time before word gets out. Unless you stay completely low-key in the Academy, else as soon as you become an elite student, every family would run a check on your background and it would only be a matter of time before others find traces of your identity."
说着，他指了指右侧道，“之前吃饭的时候，我打听过了，上青城离此不远。我们穿过这片森林过去就到了。”
Lonemoon gestured to the right and said, ”I went to ask around during lunch earlier. Upper Azure Town isn’t far from here. We just have to go through this forest and we'll be there."
说着，柳长老就大步朝旁边的一个偏厅内走去。江逸踌躇一阵只能咬牙上了，运转蓝色元力双手贴在丹炉侧壁上。

Finishing his scolding, Elder Liu walked with big steps in the direction of a side room. Jiang Yi hesitated for a moment, knowing that he had to grit his teeth and do this task, before sticking both his hands on the cauldron walls and applying blue essence force.
说着，江松就眼露凶光，嘴里大喊“赤练黑砂掌”，双掌掌心呈现一片慑人的黑色，狠狠拍向江逸后背。

Right after speaking, Jiang Song revealed an ominous glint in his eyes as he shouted, "Red-Band Black Sand Palm!"
Both his palms produced terrifying black discs, which he viciously unleashed on Jiang Yi's back.
说着，法器已经带着众人飞了进去，入界瞬间，一道阵法光亮起，瞬间整个叶上的人都被包裹在里面，隔绝了四周的妖气。

As she explained, the Dharma artifact had already flown into the Demon Realm. The moment they entered the Demon Realm, an array formation lit up which encapsulated everyone on the leaf Dharma artifact, isolating them from the demonic aura of the surroundings.
说着，管事也不再理会江逸，转头谄媚笑着和那马家公子低声说道：“飞少，时间还早，要不让小凤仙伺候下您？这小凤仙最近可是和花姐学了不少新活儿，保证您舒坦。”

Thereafter, he ignored Jiang Yi completely. Turning to the Ma Family young master, he asked with a toadying smile, "Young Master Fei, there's still plenty of time, why don't we summon Little Fengxian over to service you? She has learned many new tricks from Madam Flower recently, guaranteed to bring you great comfort."
谁TM叫谁宝宝呢？虽然他的系统是育儿系统，但你还真把我当小孩是什么鬼？
Who the hell was she calling Baby? Although his was a parenting system, do you really have to treat me like a child?
谁TM知道原来体修还有第二形态，一战斗就会暴出全身肌肉，秒变金钢芭比啊喂。
Who freaking knew that Body Cultivators had a second mode? Bursting into muscles in battle and immediately transforming into an iron barbie?
谁也不知道他的名字，早年他的朋友们都叫他无名。
No one knew his name. In the early years, his friends used to call him Wu Ming, the nameless one.
谁料，此刻姬听雨目光正朝他们这群陪练扫来，恰好和江逸对视了一眼，而等在江逸慌忙低头隐藏身形时，那姬小姐却突然伸出一根葱白手指指着江逸，淡淡开口道：“诸位公子好意，听雨心领了，杨管事，给我安排这戴狼首面具的陪练对战一场。”

Who knew that at the moment Ji Tingyu's gaze was sweeping across the room in the direction of the group of sparring partners, and she had coincidentally met Jiang Yi's eyes. As Jiang Yi hurriedly lowered his head to hide his body, that Young Mistress Ji suddenly extended an onion-white finger and pointed towards Jiang Yi. She faintly opened her mouth to say, "Everyone, this young gentleman has good intentions and I, Ji Tingyu, receive and appreciate your kindness. Manager Yang, please arrange for me to have a sparring match with the sparring partner wearing a wolf mask."
谁是你的小东西！
Who's your little thing?!
谁是小红？
Who's Little Hong?
谁知江逸的身子一闪，竟在半路转向朝右边掠去，而右边的两人本看着江逸朝左边冲去，身体已经开始转向了，现江逸却笔直朝两人冲来？当下只能慌乱的挥舞拳头，朝江逸砸去。

Who knew that Jiang Yi's figure would duck out of the way and, in the midst of his run, turn to sweep towards the right? How could the two persons on the right predict that, having originally seen Jiang Yi rush towards the left and having started turning their bodies in the same direction, Jiang Yi would actually race straight towards them right now? The two persons could only brandish their fists in a state of confused fury and smash them towards Jiang Yi.
谁知，异变突生——
He was unprepared for the unexpected change.
谁要你的蒲公英!
Who wants your dandelions!
谁都不知道他从哪冒出来的，出现时就是金丹修为。传闻他生性嫉恶如仇，好打抱不平。死在他手上的魔修不计其数。

No one knew where he came from, for when he appeared, he was already a Golden Core sword cultivator. Rumor had it that he hated evil with a vengeance and that he liked to champion the cause of justice. Countless fiendish cultivators had died by his hands.
败家子*2！
Prodigal!
费老漠然起身朝外面走去，在门口才侧脸解释了一句：“十五六岁的才铸鼎境二重，这小子已经过了修炼的黄金时段，这辈子不会有大成就了，尽管反应能力变态，但境界提升不上来，也只能是个废物，武殿……不养废物。”

Elder Fei apathetically stood up and walked in the direction of the exterior of the room. It was only when he reached the door that he turned his head around and explained, "He's fifteen or sixteen years old, yet his power level is only at the second stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. This boy's already missed the golden opportunity to cultivate his power and as such he'll not have any great accomplishments for the rest of his life. Even if he does have an obscenely powerful capability to react to opponents' moves, so long as he can't increase his power-level stages, he's just going to be a good-for-nothing. The Martial Arts Hall... does not waste resources on caring for useless good-for-nothings."
赔我的学生！
Give me back my students!
赤练黑砂掌！
Red-Band Black Sand Palm!
走到半山，江如虎终于缓过来一口气，他艰难的开口道：“江逸……实力进步的那么快……不能……等我哥回来……我要他死……全部人给我记住，今日之事……就说和马家开战……”

Jiang Ruhu finally revived and took in a breath of air, they were mid-way down the mountain. With much difficulty, he opened his mouth and said, "Jiang Yi's... power has improved so quickly... cannot... wait for my brother to return... I want him dead... everyone better remember, whatever happened today... just say that we had to fight with the Ma Family..."
走到半路，他脚步突然一顿，拐进了旁边一个衣袍铺子内，很快就穿着一身黑袍走了出来，还把脑袋全部笼罩在斗篷内。
Along the way, he suddenly froze in his tracks and turned into a nearby garment shop. It was not long before he came out dressed in black from head to toe, and even had his head enveloped in a cloak.
走哪？刚刚到底发生了什么？她们是谁？她们在哪？
Go where? What had just happened? Who were they? Where were they?
走完最后一阶的瞬间，眼前景色一换，与一二层那样宽广的地界不同，这里似乎是座殿宇内，四周还燃着灵火，他脚下还有着传送阵法的光芒，而殿中高台上坐着五个人。

As he ascended the final step, the view in front of him changes. The vast spaces he saw in the first and second levels was now replaced with a confined space - the inside of what looked like a temple hall. Spirit fires surrounded him and a transportation array lay under his feet. Five people were seated atop a stage in the middle of the hall.
走廊上走来四人，全部衣袍华贵，气态不凡，是三名公子和一名漂亮小姐。小姐一身黄裳长裙，靓丽如一朵盛开的黄玫瑰，正是姬家小姐姬听雨，而旁边的三位公子中江恨水赫然在列。

Four people walked through the corridor, all of them dressed elegently in luxurious clothes with extraordinary atmospheres about them. They consisted of three gentlemen and a beautiful lady. The young lady was dressed in a yellow robe with long dress and was pretty like a yellow rose in full bloom. That was the young mistress of the Ji Family Ji Tingyu, and amongst the three gentlemen beside her included, impressively enough, Jiang Henshui.
走进武殿，江逸明显感觉一丝不对了，这里的气息比外面清新好闻多了，他不用闭关打坐都知道这里的天地灵气浓郁得吓人，在这里面修炼速度绝对比外面快很多。

Entering the Martial Arts Hall, Jiang Yi evidently felt that something was not right. The atmosphere in the building was a lot more fresh, clean and nicer-smelling than the air outside. He didn't need to go into seclusion and sit in meditation to know that the heavenly and earthly spiritual forces in here were obscenely powerful, allowing anyone's cultivation speed to be much faster in the Hall than outside.
越想就越气，深呼吸几次，才压下心底的怨气开口，“喂，我找你有事，你先跟我来一下，我们聊聊。”

The more he brooded over it, the more anger he felt. He took several deep breaths before holding back the resentment and said, "Hey, I was looking for you to discuss a matter. Follow me and let's talk about it."
越来越不懂这些兽兽们的世界了。
He was getting more and more confused by the world of beasts.
足足半柱香时间，江逸才平静下来，他擦拭了眼角的泪痕，长长吐出两口气他又入定了，仔细的内视丹田外的封印，确定那龙形封印上的符文的确少了三枚后，他彻底放松下来。

It took him half the time it takes for a stick of incense to burn before Jiang Yi finally calmed himself down. He wiped off the tear stains from the corners of his eyes, took two long deep breaths, and returned to a meditative state. He carefully observed the seal outside his dantian. It was only after confirming that the runic patterns of that dragon-shaped seal had indeed been reduced by three characters that he completely relaxed.
足足盘坐了一个时辰，江逸才睁开了眼睛，眸子内都是无奈，他刚才运转江水决疗伤的时候内视了一下，发现左肩的三根骨头果然有几处裂痕，靠江水决疗伤速度最少要打坐一天一夜才能愈合。

After sitting cross-legged for two entire hours, Jiang Yi finally opened his eyes with a look of helplessness. When he was just circulating the Jiang Water Art, he had used his inner vision and discovered that three bones on his left shoulder had cracked. This was an injury which, relying on the Jiang Water Art, would take at least a full day and night of meditation to fully heal.
足足花了半个月的时间，她才恢复过来，并稳定了境界。就连其它人的修为，也纷纷增长了，虽然没有像思羽一样直接结丹，但最少的也涨了一个小境界，体修已经成了不可改变的事实。

After exactly half a month's time, she finally recovered and her cultivation stabilized. Even the rest of them had grown in their cultivation. Although they were unlike Si Yu who had directly completed her Core Formation, they were at least improving by a minor realm. Their cultivation of the body had already become a fact that could not be changed.
距离和风月楼约定的一月之期只有十八天了，江逸此刻身上只有十两银子，他想了很多办法，但最后发现除了和江家坦白，让江家出钱外，他唯有找姬听雨借钱了。

There were only eighteen days left to go before the one-month deadline on the agreement of repayment made with the Fengyue Brothel was up, yet at the moment Jiang Yi only had ten taels of silver on his person. He tried to come up with many ideas, but eventually realised that, besides coming clean with the Jiang Clan and letting the Family come up with the money, he had no other viable option but to seek Ji Tingyu and borrow money from her.
跟下界传闻的一样，上青界最大的修仙势力不是宗门，而是四大世家。除了以丹修闹名的轩辕家外，还有以符阵闻名的郁家，御兽练器为主的易家，以及最有钱的印家。印家掌控着半数以上灵石矿，上青城半数以上的商店都是印家的，包括之前吃霸王餐的那一家。

It was the same story up here as it was in the Lower Realm—the most powerful immortal cultivators were not in the sects but in the four aristocratic families. There were three others apart from the pill-refining Xuan Yuan Family: The Yu Family who was famous for their talisman arrays, the Yi Family who specialized in beast control and weapon refinement, and the Yin Family who was filthy rich. The Yin Family controlled more than half of the Spirit Stone mines and more than half of the shops in Upper Azure Town including the restaurant where they were accused of eating a free meal.

Jiang Xiaonu stood up behind him, her frail weak body trembling violently as she held tightly onto Jiang Yi's arm. Free-flowing tears gushed out of her eyes. She clenched her teeth and pleaded in a low voice, "Young Master, it's all my fault. You can just leave; don't worry about me anymore."
身形一闪下一刻已经站到了对方的面前。

这么多年，她活着就是为了找甘子睿报仇。她很清楚，只要甘子睿在悟剑峰，她就绝对没有杀他的机会。如果不是沈萤，她兴许穷其一生，都进不了悟剑峰一步。

All these years, she had lived to seek revenge against Gan Zirui. She knew very well that as long as Gan Zirui remained at Sword Comprehension Peak, there was absolutely no hope for her to kill him. If not for Shen Ying, there would have been perhaps no way for her to take a step into Sword Comprehension Peak her entire life.
这么大一个门派，你跟我说只有四个人？！骗鬼呢！
Such a large sect yet you’re telling me there are only four people?! Who are you trying to kid!
这么有想法，你们咋不上天呢？老了不管了！
If you all have so many ideas, why are you guys still here? I can't be bothered anymore!
这也可以！
How is this possible!
这些对化神的孤月来说没什么，对金丹以下的弟子来说却是莫大的威势，刚想布下个隔绝阵，转头一看，有四五个人似是从这丝天地之威里感受到了什么，直接原地打坐起来，身上的修为也噌噌的迈进了一阶。

These were nothing to the Soul Formation cultivator Lonemoon, but it was a great might to the disciples below the Golden Core stage. But just as he was about to set up an isolating array, he turned to see that four to five people seemed to have been affected by the might of the world and were immediately sitting on the spot to meditate. Even their cultivations went up a level.
这些年来，江家和马家子弟经常冲突，江逸在去年就曾见过江如龙和马家一位少爷各自带着数十名子弟混战，还把马家两名子弟活活打成了活死人，据说此刻还瘫痪在床。

The members of the two families butted heads constantly over the past couple of years. Just last year, Jiang Yi had witnessed a brawl between Jiang Rulong and one of the sons of the Ma Family, each leading a group of dozens of descendants from their respective family. Two of the Ma Family's descendants had been beaten straight into a vegetative state, and were apparently still paralyzed and bed-bound till this day.
这些文字和他刚才梦中所见一模一样，像小蝌蚪，欢快地旋转、翻转和游动在他的脑海里面……
These words were identical to those he had witnessed in his dream: like little tadpoles they wiggled, turned, and swam in the waters of his mind…
这人……真的是魔王！
This man... he's the real Devil King!
这人是谁？什么时候出现的！
Who is this? When did she appear?
这人看来不简单。
This man was not simple.
这人谁啊？他开始快速搜索记忆中的人名，却发现没有一个可以对上号的。
Who was this person? He made a quick search through the names in his memory, but found that none of them matched.
这元力丹是最低级的辅助修炼的丹药，药力和黄参丹差不多，挥散的速度慢得如蜗牛般。江逸都修炼江水决半个时辰了，元力丹的药力才扩散到丹田外面，把丹田全部笼罩进去，开始增幅丹田提炼元力的速度。

This essence force elixir was the lowest-grade elixir that could facilitate cultivation. It had a similar medicinal power to the Yellow Ginseng Pill, and its dissemination speed was as slow as a snail. Jiang Yi had circulated the Jiang Water Art for a whole hour, yet the medicinal power of the essence force elixir had just spread to the exterior of the dantian. Here, the power enveloped the entire dantian, increasing the dantian's essence refinement speed.
这公子他不知道名字，但他知道姓马！此刻这管事正谄媚的和他低声说着话，一副奴才样子，江逸只是看了一眼就明白了风月楼背后的大势力，正是同属五大家族的马家。

He did not know the name of that gentleman, beyond his surname of "Ma"! At the moment, that housekeeper was speaking to him in a low voice and with much flattery, giving an impression that he was a servant. With just one look, Jiang Yi immediately understood the great power backing the Fengyue Brothel. It was none other than the Ma Family, which was one of the five great family clans of the city.
这几人从哪冒出来的？
Where did these people come from?
这凡人真是有分分钟把人带歪的本领。可不知为何……她偏偏半点脾气都升不起来。反而不知不觉加大了那练化的灵火，心底也开始怪怪的，一时酸一时涩五味杂陈起来。

This mortal really had the ability to lead people astray. Yet… she was unable to raise her temper at all, instead, she unconsciously raised the level of the spirit cleansing fire. She felt strange emotions stirring in her chest; a mixed concoction of bitter and sweet feelings.
这到底……是只什么鬼？
What exactly... was this ghost?
这到底是个什么鬼门派？！
What kind of sect was this exactly?!
这到底，是对什么鬼师徒？
What should they make of this oddball master and disciple?
这力度，这打斗的方式，这满是杀气的拳风……
That strength and the fighting style, those fists full of killing intent…
这只狐妖是故意的，他早就发现了他们进镇，也知道狸猫藏宝的地方，所以将计就计，让狸猫引开他们的注意力，然后趁机突破防护阵，进来盗宝！

This fox demon was doing this on purpose. It had already discovered that they had entered the town and also knew the place where the civet cat had hidden its treasure, so it decided to turn the situation to its advantage by letting the civet cat draw away their attention, and then using the opportunity to break through the defensive array to steal the gift!
这叫一点点需求吗？你干脆让人家盖个皇宫得了，从未见过如此厚颜无耻之人！
This is called a little request? You might as well get him to build you an emperor's palace. I’ve never met such a brazen person like you!
这哪是剑修，这赤果果的就是体修啊喂！
That was not sword cultivation. That was purely body cultivation!
这哪是去收弟子，这TM就是去发展邪教的吧？这压根就是带了一群脑残粉回来！
This wasn't a recruitment drive. They are forming a freaking cult! They've brought a bunch of retards back!
这回他意识总算完全清醒了，有了转头的力气，终于看清了那个灰色的身影，正是那晚的姑娘，而她好像……在挖坑！
This time he finally regained his mental faculties. At last, he could turn his head and see the gray figure. It was the girl from last night, and she seemed to be… digging a hole in the ground!
这回搬起石头砸到的脚，略疼啊！
It was as if she smashed her own feet with a stone - it was utterly painful!
这场二对一的单方面殴打整整持续了十五分钟，直到萝卜那张新生的绝色脸上，再也找不到半点完好的皮肤，两人这才停了手。
The one-sided battle between Lonemoon and Yi Qing versus the radish lasted a full 15 minutes. They didn't stop until the radish's once perfect face was covered in bruises.
这场打斗，整整持续了十几个时辰，孤月几乎把全身的灵力都用尽了，最后挥出一剑，带着凌厉的杀意直击向印风，眼看着就要击向对方命门的时候，一直分神注意着的脸色，果然一变，满眼都是惊恐之色，他连忙收住剑意，但剑风还是扫到了对方的右手，顿时鲜血如柱。

This battle lasted over twenty hours. Lonemoon's spiritual power was nearly used up. He made a final effort to thrust his sword toward Yin Feng, generating an aggressive killing intent. Just before the sword cut through Yin Feng's body, his distracted face regained some sort of focus. His eyes filled with horror as he suddenly registered the sword intent. He dodged but the sword still sliced his right arm. Blood began to flow out of the wound.
这声音……师父！
This voice… Master!
这声音他很熟悉，他是家族负责药田那边的荣管事。自己接手家族西山的药田清点工作，按道理每天都要向他报告的，可昨日因为被江如虎等人打了一顿，醒来后气愤加迷糊，一时之间竟然忘记了……

This familiar voice came from Chief Rong, the man in the family in charge of the herb plantations. After taking over the responsibility of maintaining the herb plantations in the Western Hills, Jiang Yi had to report to Chief Rong daily as part of his instructions. However, he endured a vicious attack at the hands of Jiang Ruhu and his gang of cronies the day before. When he woke up, he was angry, dazed, and weak, so he had momentarily forgotten about that specific duty…
这姬家少女是个绝色妖精，而且她那双漂亮的丹凤眼内闪烁的光芒，让他感觉能洞悉一切般，他生怕在这呆久了，自己身上的一切秘密都无所遁形。

This young mistress of the Ji Family was a remarkably beautiful and alluring woman. Her pair of beautiful red phoenix eyes twinkled radiantly, making him feel as if she could see through everything clearly. he feared that, if he stayed here for too long, all of his personal secrets might be completely revealed.
这就……走了？
They left... just like that?
这就好像得了一本，早已经脱离时代的教材，并没有什么卵用。关键那些已经失传的丹方里，有的在青界中早已经有替代的丹药，有的就是材料早已经绝迹比如：化仙丹。所以删删减减下来，还真没几个能用的。

He felt as if he had just found education material from a whole other age — the recipes were useless. 这座宏伟的大殿江逸知道一些，事实上整个天星大陆不知道武殿的人还真没有，因为所有城池中心都会有这么一座黑色古朴的大殿，而且武殿存在的历史太悠久了，似乎人类有纪元开始，这武殿就已经存在了。

Jiang Yi knew a bit about this imposing grand hall. In fact, there was truly not a single person in the entire Stellarsky Continent who did not know of the Martial Arts Hall.
This was because a simple and unadorned black grand hall could be found in every city center would have. Additionally, the existence of the Martial Arts Hall in history had been extremely long.
It seemed as though Martial Arts Halls had existed ever since the start of the era of mankind.
这怎么可能！这女子的修为居然如此厚深。转瞬间他脑海中闪过千万种想法心底一沉，是他太意了！没想到小小一个中青界，居然有一手就能制住游仙的人物。

How can this be! This woman's cultivation was so thick and so deep. A thousand thoughts flashed through his mind, and his heart sank. He had been too careless! He hadn't thought that the insignificant Middle Azure World could produce a cultivator that matched up to a Travelling Immortal.
这总管说得不错，今日就算打死了两人也没大事，江家肯定不会追究的。这管事很是精明，眼睛很毒，从他的穿着和侍女小奴在这做工应该猜出了，他在江家地位很低，也算定了他不敢大闹的。

The chief supervisor was right—it was unimportant if they beat the two of them to death, for the Jiang Clan would definitely not bother to investigate the incident. This chief was shrewd, and eyes shone with malic. 这才两天时间，他竟赚了一两紫金，最重要的是那位姬听雨小姐还说了，以后有多少丹药她全收？那他再炼出二十七枚黑色丹药，不就能赚取十两紫金，赎回令牌了吗？

这护卫的速度快得江逸根本反应不过来，而且力量也强大了很多，从这掌拍来引起的赫赫风声就可判断出。
The guard's speed was more than Jiang Yi could handle, and his strength was also a lot more potent. He could determine that from the howling wind produced by the palm strike.
这护卫虽然受伤，也被江逸缠住右手，一时有些慌乱，但毕竟是铸鼎境三重武者，反应速度快得惊人，当下另外一只大手化作利爪朝江逸的左手两根指头抓来，欲折断他的两根手指。

The guard panicked for a short moment. Although he was injured and had his right arm entangled by Jiang Yi, he was nonetheless a martial artist at the third stage of the Cast Tripod Realm. As such, his reaction speed was shockingly fast. He immediately formed a claw with his other hand and grasped towards two fingers on Jiang Yi's left hand, in the hopes of breaking the two fingers.
这时丹药房外传来一阵轻微的脚步声，一名少年偷偷的钻了进来，扫了一眼江逸，这才满脸谄媚笑意的朝柳长老走去，一边拱手说道：“恭喜长老，贺喜长老，您老人家终于炼出绝世丹药了……”

At this time, the light sound of footsteps came from the exterior of the Elixir Room. A young man secretly entered, glanced at Jiang Yi with one look, before walking in the direction of Elder Liu while putting on a face filled by a flattering and charming smile and cupping his hands in greeting.
"Congratulations, Elder!” he exclaimed. “Congratulations, Elder! You, dear elder, have refined an exceptional elixir..."
这时小奴也递上来一根点燃蜡烛，嘴里说着“少爷加油！”
At this moment, Xiaonu quickly delivered a lit candle and mouthed, “Don't give up, Young Master! You can do it!”
这时，外面传来杨管事的叫声，江逸只能无奈的把那把从马飞那抢来的宝器藏入怀中，带上苍狼面具朝外面走去。
Manager Yang's voice came from the outside. Resigned, Jiang Yi stowed away the treasured artifact he took from Ma Fei back in his chest pocket, and went out wearing the wolf mask.
这时，就在万般疯狂的喧嚣嘶吼声中，一句平静、普通，但却刺透所有声响的话语，在所有人耳边响起。
In the midst of all the commotion, a calm, ordinary sound pierced through all the noises and rang within everyone's ears.

这是……一座仙宫！

这是……剑气？！

这是威胁吧？绝对赤果果的威胁吧！
This is a threat, isn't it? It's a blatant and apparent threat.
这是江家的人阶上品武技，这武技不追求幻化出的拳影多少，而是追求每一个拳影的真实度，让一般实力低下的武者根本看不出真实拳影，从而轻松伤敌。

The Phantom Punch was a Man-tier superior-grade technique belonging to the Jiang Clan. This technique was not about the number of fist silhouettes produced, but the degree of realism of each fist silhouette, preventing the average martial artist from ever making out the real fists, thereby wounding the enemy with ease.
这是荣管事给他的令牌，可自由出入西山药田，江家族规甚严，如果被刑堂知道他敢用这令牌抵押，肯定会重重责罚的，但此刻他是黔驴技穷，唯有出此下策。

This meant that Shen Ying, Yi Qing and Lonemoon were in a very awkward situation.

To go on like this would not do any good. Lonemoon's expression became grave. Just as he was about to activate his Spirit Qi to end the fight quickly, Qi Chengyu suddenly shouted out.

Such a lineup would not be possible for them even if they rounded up all the cultivators in the Middle Azure World. 这样看来，这登塔不比飞升劫雷容易。而他们现在所在的，应该是第二层。

This time, he did not walk towards the alchemy lab, but rather quietly turned his way out of the Western Courtyard and walked speedily in the direction of the city. He was going to the biggest merchant-house in the city - the Pearl Gathering Pavilion!

In desperation they had requested Blackheaven Sect for help.

This time it was Manager Yang who hesistated.
