这群人刚才在下面还打打杀杀的，此刻却宛如什么事都没有发生，和和气气的走来上来，各自将灵牌交了上去。
This bunch of people who were fighting and killing below a moment ago, walked up amiably, and handed over their Anima Token, as if nothing happened before.
这群胆小怕事忘恩负义的小人，凭什么？！
How dare this bunch of cowardly, ungrateful people do something like this?
这翊凌雪也很是奇怪，每天下午时分都会来到练功房，让杨管事把江逸叫出来对战一场。尽管每次对练都是输，她却乐此不疲，让武殿内的陪练和杨管事都很是怀疑，难道她看上了江逸？

Yi Lingxue was indeed a strange girl - she would come to the Technique Practising Room every afternoon and ask for Jiang Yi for a sparring match, and despite losing every single match, she never seemed to tire of it. This made the other sparring partners at the Martial Arts Hall as well as Manager Yang dubious: could it be that she had taken a fancy to Jiang Yi?
这翊小姐实力只有铸鼎境四重，前天他才铸鼎境一重，凭借黑色元力她都不能碰触到一片衣角，今日他实力大涨，自然不用说了。

The power level of Young Mistress Yi was only at the fourth stafe of the Cast Tripod Realm. The day before, his power level was only at the first stage of the Cast Tripod Realm and already, when he relied on the power of black essence forces, she was unable to even touch the corner of his robes. Today, with his power having greatly expanded, naturally she would be unable to hit him.
这话一出口，不单是奚秋，就连在场的大半修士脸色都有些黑了，转头看了旁边的孤月一眼，顿时就猜到了怎么回事。之前那三个上青界的人，来的时候是什么德行，大部分弟子都看到了。说着是帮助探寻秘境，还不是来抢资源的，想必在秘境中也没少对各派的修士动手。但结果很明显，后来踢到了铁板被反杀了。

At those words, not only Xi Qiu’s, but more than half of the cultivators' faces turned black. He looked over at Lonemoon and immediately guessed at what had happened. Previously, most of the disciples had witnessed the ill conduct of the three people from the Upper Azure World. While they claimed to help explore the mystic realm, they were actually here to fight for the resources, and probably also fought with many of the cultivators of the sects. Yet the outcome was obvious; apparently, all the fighting backfired and they were killed instead.
这话什么意思？威胁吗？一个小小掌门也敢威胁郁家！郁海珩气得正要站起来，轩辕禹却连忙上前拉住了人，一边朝沈萤点头，一边呵呵笑着道。

What was that suppposed to mean? A small Sect Master threatening the Yu Family! Yu Hai Heng was so mad and was about to stand up when Xuan Yuanyu quickly went over to hold him back, smiling and nodding at Shen Ying.
这还仅仅只是一丝黑色元力啊……
This was only a sliver of black essence force…
这里对于整个聚珍阁的店员来说是禁地，能上顶层的不超过五人。
For all the staff of the Pearl Gathering Pavilion, this place was restricted. No more than five people were allowed to visit the top floor.
这门口护卫眼中的畏惧和迟疑神情，尽管只是一闪而逝，江逸却看得清清楚楚，他灵机一动大步朝大门外走去，满脸张狂的望着那护卫冷笑道：“上啊？怎么不上了？”

Jiang Yi was able to see clearly the look of confusion and dread in the guard's eyes, even though it had only flashed past for a single moment. Struck with some inspiration, he walked towards the main door with big strides. With a face full of insolence, he glared at the guard and called coldly, "Come on and attack! Why don't you come over here and fight me?"
这门掌法因为十分歹毒，中掌者如果不及时治疗，轻则变成废人重则致死。即便容易速成，但大多数自视甚高的大家族子弟都不屑去修炼，而这个江如风竟然因为一点小事，就使出全力，这是想废了他，或者想直接要了他的命？

This martial art technique was very vicious. If the victim was not healed in time, he would become handicapped if lucky, or die if his injuries were too severe. Even though it was easy to manifest, most Jiang Clan sons arrogantly saw themselves as important and would find it beneath them to practice this move. Yet Jiang Song was using his full force over a small matter—did he want to make Jiang Yi disabled, or did he directly want Jiang Yi's life?
这黄参丹药力很弱，是用西山药田内的草参配合一些药草炼制而成，仅仅只有活血化瘀之功效。江逸本也没完全打算靠这低级丹药，吞服之后立即就运转江水决，开始疗伤。

The medicinal power of this yellow ginseng elixir was very weak—it was refined from the grass ginseng grown in the medicinal plantations in the Western Hills combined with some medicinal herbs, and only had the effect of improving blood circulation. Jiang Yi had no intention to rely fully on such a low-grade elixir—after taking the pill he immediately started circulating the Jiang Water Art technique to begin the healing process.
这黑色元力只能增幅丹药的药力，不能单独疗伤。
This black essence force could only increase the medical healing power of elixirs, and not heal wounds on its own.
远远的就看到一堆八九阶的大妖，围在山门口的阵法处撕吼着，跟一个黑衣男子对质，场面很是剑拔弩张。
From afar, they saw a group of eighth- and ninth-level demons surrounding the array at the entrance of the hill. They were shouting at a man dressed in black. The scene looked extremely tense.
连忙双手结印，念出大段的法咒，一个金色的契约法阵顿时出现在了青蛟身下，金光开始朝着它全身蔓延。小青蛟没有反抗的意思，也不敢反抗。

He quickly used both of his hands to conjure the contract seal while he recited a long curse under his breath. A golden contract array appeared on the green wyrm's body as a flash of gold light began to spread throughout the wyrm's body. The wyrm stayed perfectly still, not daring to resist.
连羿清也好奇的看了过来。
Even Yi Qing curiously waited for Shen Ying's answer.
追来的众人见江逸竟下如此狠手，一时又气又怒，全加速狂奔，手中身上元力运转，从三面朝江逸攻击而去。

Upon seeing Jiang Yi act so brazenly and ferociously, the group of opponents who had rushed over were infuriated and in a rage. They all sped up and raced frantically as they circulated their bodily essence force into their hands, rushing to attack Jiang Yi from three sides.
退一万步说，在没有GM的情况下，这种外挂玩家，发展成亲友，总比做对手要好得多。那么普及这个世界的常识，自然是做为亲友的基本义务。而做为一个穿越前辈，他想当然的以为对方跟自己一样，看过了那本书，知道了剧情才过来的。

Taking a step back, under the lack of an administration for the game, it would be more beneficial to befriend the cheat than to become an opponent. Passing on general knowledge about the world was certainly the basic responsibilities of a friend. As a transmigration senior, he had hoped that the other party was surely just like him, someone who had read the book and understood the storyline before transmigrating over.
透过大殿上方的天井，看到天色逐渐暗了下来，江逸也不修炼了，好奇的开始打量四周，看到四周的练功房不时有公子小姐进进出出，看到偶尔有陪练被打得吐血爬了出来，那些公子小姐却冷漠地离去……

Through the skylight on the ceiling of the Great Hall, one could see the colours of the sky gradually turn darker over time. Jiang Yi had also decided to stop power cultivation and instead out of curiosity started to look around at his surroundings. He saw from time to time some young masters and mistresses walking in and out of the surrounding Technique Practising Rooms. He had also observed how occassionally some sparring partners crawled out of the rooms, vomiting blood from their injuries due to the fight, yet their partnering young masters and mistresses simply coldly walked past them and left...
逐个击破的计划险些毁于一旦，好在羿清临时暴发了一波，硬撑了下来。幸运的是，这些游仙里有四个都清醒了过来，只是他们陷入心魔太久，比起三个家主来伤得更重。连行走都成问题了。

Their divide and conquer plan would have failed if Yi Qing had not activated all his reserves and held on. Fortunately, four of the traveling immortals had awakened, but as they had been in the demonic trance for a long time, they were in far worse shape than their three family patriarchs and they could barely walk.
那一瞬间，羿清觉得她好像有些失望，失望什么？他没死？
At that moment, Yi Qing felt that she seemed disappointed. But what was she disappointed about? That he was still alive?
那三个人是突然出现在玄天宗上空的，出场还伴着数道天音，背后的天空还残余着一个仿佛被撕裂的缺口，他们是划破虚空来的。

Those three people suddenly appeared above the Blackheaven Sect. Their entrance was accompanied by numerous heavenly sounds, and even the sky seemed to have been torn apart — they had arrived by tearing through the void.
那上古秘境中到底有什么了不得的东西，能让资源本就丰富的上青界，不惜派了三个高阶修士来，其中居然还有一位游仙。
What could lie within that Ancient Mystic Realm for the Upper Azure World, which was already abundant in resources, to send three high level cultivators, one of whom was even a Traveling Immortal?
那个人终于出现了！
That man has finally appeared!
那个刚一上界，一人个打得五个游仙满地找牙，一天之内差点拆了他轩辕家的沈大仙！甚至都没人知道她具体强到了哪种可怕的地步。直到现在他连一点反抗想法都生不出来！

The one who had beaten up the five traveling immortals so badly when she just entered the upper world, and almost tore down the Xuan Yuan Family in a day - Great Immortal Shen! Moreover, no one knew roughly how powerful she actually was. Up till now, he did not even dare to think about retaliating!
那个少年不轻狂？谁真的就不喜欢权势金钱美女，不喜欢受到万人敬仰，轰轰烈烈风风光光？江逸性格沉稳，但一旦冲动起来他什么都可以不顾，他骨子内还是潜藏着一股疯狂的火焰，一旦爆发出来那将可以燎原，比如在西山之上将江如虎打得不像人样，又比如在风月楼废了马飞。

Which young man was not defiant in his core? Was there really someone who would genuinely turn away from power, wealth, and beautiful women; who would shun the respect and awe of millions; who would dislike a life of grandeur and glory? Despite his mature and sensible temperament, Jiang Yi could also throw any and all caution to the wind once impulsiveness hit. In the end, there was still a fire of passion burning unbridled deep within him. Once erupted, this fire could set whole plains ablaze, as seen by that time when he had beaten Jiang Ruhu into a pulp at the Western Hills, and more recently, when he had rendered Ma Fei useless at Fengyue Brothel.
那个很有名气的大学院江逸半点不感兴趣，因为对于他来说遥不可及。至于城内顶级公子小姐的八卦他也一点不好奇，转身就要江家大院走去。

Jiang Yi did not even have a shred of interest in the distinguished college as it was a place far beyond his reach. As for the gossip about the upper-class children, he was not interested in that either.
Instead, he turned his body and was about to walk in the direction of the Jiang Residence Central Courtyard.
那么问题来了，她不会炒啊！
But then the problem came — she did not know how to cook them!
那些丹药里，居然有晋阶丹。这种丹药不限使用者的修为，可作用于高阶修士，甚至是化神修士的丹药，吃了可以直接提升修为。只是材料极为难得，有很多更是早已经在青界绝迹，根本没有办法练制出来。而玉鼎的密室中却有不止一瓶。

Among those elixirs, there were actually cultivation boosting pills. The use of these kinds of pills was not tied to the consumer's cultivation level; the pills could be taken by high-ranking cultivators and even by Soul Formation cultivators. Anyone who took the pills would immediately gain a boost in their cultivation level. However, the ingredients to make these pills were extremely rare, many of which had already ceased to exist in the Azure World; there was simply no way to refine them. Yet despite that, there were more than one bottle of these pills in Yu Ding’s secret chamber.
那些奔跑中的阴兵和尸人，其黑甲、兵器以及身上的暗灰色符文同时闪耀起来，发出各色各样的流光，汇聚成一股股枯朽的死气，从四面八方朝天庭倾泻而去。

The running yin soldiers and zombies, as well as their black armors, weapons, and the greyish glowing runic patterns coruscated at the same time, producing all sorts of colored streams of light. From all four corners, they poured forward like a cadaveric torrent, moving toward the Heavenly Court.
那些符文在四面八方浮现、闪亮，发出耀眼的光芒。
The runic patterns surfaced from all directions, flashing blinding lights.
那人一愣，这才看向中间的人，眼神顿时一缩，脸上闪过一丝慌乱，“你是……橙雨？！你……你怎么会在这里？”
Startled, the man looked at the person at the center of the group. He suddenly retracted his gaze and a nervous expression flashed across his face. "You are… Qi Chengyu?! You… why are you here?"
那人一愣，顿时僵在原地，还有这种操作？！
The man was made speechless by her logic. He had never thought of this alternative!
那人指了指前面华元城的城门，御剑落了下去。
The man pointed to the Huayuan City gate which was just ahead and descended to the ground on his sword.
那人明明有着让轩辕家从上青界消失的机会，就这么轻易的放过他们了？
That person had the ability to wipe the entire Xuan Yuan Family off the face of the Upper Azure World, yet she let them go so easily?
那人的仙骨直接被踢断了，张口吐出口血，却仍是嘴硬不肯开口。
His immortal bones were broken. He spit out blood, but still refused to speak.
那人直接转头看向羿清，“道友，秘境中机遇随缘，但是千叶草木灵，可不是秘境里那些无主之物。还请道友归还！”说完，他直接就朝羿清的方向走了两步。

The man turned around to face Yi Qing and said, "Fellow Daoist, there are indeed many treasures you could come across in the mystic realm that are free for the taking, but the Thousand Leaves Vegetation Spirit is definitely not one of them. It has a rightful owner. Please return it to us, Fellow Daoist!"
那人眼里闪过一丝慌乱，却没有回答，似是极力隐瞒什么一样，转而威胁道，“你……你们，我不管用了什么手段抓到我的，但劝你们赶紧放开我，不然上界仙人发怒的后果你们承受不起。”

Panic flashed in the person's eyes, but he did not respond. He looked extremely suspicious, as if he was hiding something. Then, he began to threaten them, "You... All of you, I don't care what kind of methods you used to capture me, but I advise you to release me immediately or you would not be able to bear the wrath of the immortals from the Upper Realm."
那人瞪了思羽一样，眼神更加不屑，“哼！区区一个凡人的灵气怎么伤得……”
He looked at Si Yu with disdain and said, "Pfft! A mere mortal - what damage can you..."
那人笑得更加的猖狂，满脸兴奋的样子，“原本只想抢个小法器，没想到居然能见到此幡。你还蠢到将它带在身上！真以为，这个剑阵能困得住我！”

His laughter grew wilder, his face filled with excitement, "I had originally just wanted to snatch a small Dharma artifact, never did I expect to see such a gonfalon. You were even stupid enough to bring it along with you! You really thought that this sword array can hold me down!"
那人轻笑一声，眼神一眯沉声道，“当日三位长老进入那秘境之时，为更方便的探查这个秘境，特求家主赐予轩辕家至宝一同前往。如今三位长老已死，此宝却下落不明，我等不该来问个清楚吗？”

The Traveling Immortal laughed slightly, and narrowing his eyes, he said, "That day, the three Elders entered the mystic realm to aid in the exploration of this mystic realm, and they specially requested for our family's treasure to be brought in with them. Now that three of them are dead, and this treasure is missing, aren't we supposed to find out what exactly happened?"
那位翊家的大小姐，尽管他已经拒绝了几次了却百折不饶，天天准时准点的来找他。这让他很是无奈，但她是武殿的顾客，点名要江逸出战杨管事也没办法。

That young mistress of the Yi Family simply refused to give up no matter how many times Jiang Yi turned her down, coming here every day like clockwork to order him. Although Jiang Yi was exasperated, there was little he or Manager Yang could do, as she was a customer of the Martial Arts Hall after all.
那你到底会什么啊喂？真的是来帮忙的吗？
What exactly do you know? Are you really here to help out?
那修士明明被十几只高阶妖类围住，却没有露出半点害怕的样子，冷哼一声道，“我乃追魂楼楼主枫影，今日来此，只为找无敌派掌门讨回个公道，与别人无关，阻我者杀无赦！”

The cultivator was surrounded by over ten high-level demons, yet he did not seem in the least bit afraid. He laughed coldly and replied, "I'm the Tower Master of Soul Chasing Tower, Feng Ying. I came here today to seek justice from your Sect Master. This has nothing to do with the rest of you. I will kill whoever gets in my way!"
那傻乎乎的猪将闻言一愣，认真思考了一番后，正要朝那座寂静无人的天庭冲进去时，忽然感觉虚空剧烈地波动了起来，让他那硕大的体型差点凭空摔倒！

The silly pig soldier was taken aback when he heard that. After seriously contemplating for a while, he came to a decision. Just as he was about to charge towards the silent and uninhabited Heavenly Court, he felt the void shake violently. His massive body nearly fell flat on the floor!
那光亮了半刻才暗了下去，空中两人已经落回了地上，青亦张嘴吐出一口血，受伤不轻。而羿清更加的严重，手上的剑已经折断，浑身都是血迹，身上到处都是被烧焦的痕迹，站立不稳，单膝跪了下去，嘴里止不住的往外流血，岂是一个惨字可以形容。

After a couple of seconds, the light disappeared. Yi Qing and Qing Yi had fallen to the ground. The latter had spit out a mouthful of blood and he was obviously gravely injured, while Yi Qing was even more so. The sword which he held in his hands had already been broken, his entire body covered with wounds and burns. Unable to hold the weight of his body up any longer, he fell to his knees. Blood flowed uncontrollably out of his mouth. There was only one word to describe Yi Qing right now: tragic.
那几个猎户以为他是仙人，对她谢了又谢。这回到是没邀她下山了，而且对她猎妖的行为大加赞赏。鼓励她多杀几只，以免它们吃人，并塞了她更多红薯。

The small group of hunters thought that she was a deity and thanked her profusely. This time she was not invited to leave the mountain. They praised her actions of slaughtering demons and encouraged her to kill more so as to prevent them from eating humans, all whilst stuffing more sweet potatoes towards her.
那几十黑蝌蚪般的文字突然解散了队形，纷纷爪牙舞爪的朝他脑袋扑了上来，一个个咬他的身体，甚至还有想要钻入他眼睛和耳朵的！

The tadpole-like words suddenly abandoned their organized formation and ferociously flew towards his head in a massive swarm. Most latched on to his body, and some made to burrow into his eyes and ears!
那句话，那声音仿佛有无穷魔力，居然让亿万冥军不由自主地安静了下来，纷纷停下了正在进行的动作。
The voice that delivered the sentence seemed to contain infinite charm. It silenced hundreds of millions of Netherworld soldiers and stopped their advance.
那只妖王更近了，羿清这才看清，它身后还跟着一大串，小一圈的白色身影。还有别的兔妖！细一数居然有近二十个之多。

As the Demon Monarch came closer, Yi Qing finally had a clearer view. It was being followed by a bunch of slightly smaller white silhouettes; there were other rabbit demons! There were as many as up to 20 of them.
那只巨大的血狐，突然吼了一声，不顾羿清布下的剑阵，九条尾巴直接往着剑峰上一扫，其中两条尾巴瞬间被截断，它却拼着鲜血淋淋，硬生生的冲了出来，往远处逃去。

Suddenly giving out a loud roar, the huge blood fox ignored the sword array that Yi Qing had set up and swept its nine tails directly toward the tip of his sword. Its two tails were instantly cut off, but despite the blood gushing out, it managed to force its way through the array and fly off into the distance.
那只能赔钱了！
Then there was no choice but to pay for the damages!
那叫一个气势如宏，声振寰宇。
Their united voices resonated within the hall.
那叫郁红的女子一愣，脸上闪过一丝慌乱，立马又恢复，笑着道，“这位仙师，我们几个都是来自同一个村子，村中都是自幼开始修道，有修为很正常，之前确实无门无派。若是不信，大可一探我等的神识，看看有没有其它门派的印记？”

The lady named Yu Hong faltered for a moment and a tinge of panic flashed across her face before it immediately returned back to normal. She smiled and said, “Immortal Master. We are all from the same village and in the village, everyone learned cultivation from young which is why it is normal for us to have cultivation. We really did not come from any sect. If you do not believe it, you may check our Divine Perception to see if there are transmission marks of other sects."
那可是魔窟，别说得跟上街买大白菜似的啊喂！
That’s a fiend den we’re going to. Don't talk as if we’re going to the streets to buy cabbage!
那啥，你们是不是忘了我也在这里啊喂？
Hey, are you forgetting that I'm right here?
那声音带着些兴灾乐祸之意，那道天光慢慢散去，不到片刻就露出一个身着白衣的身影，一身化神威压隐隐传来，手持一支玉笛法器。
The voice was mocking him. The light slowly faded and a man in a white robe stood in front of Yi Qing, holding a jade flute Dharma artifact in his hands. He felt the man's Soul Formation suppression.
那女子仍是那要死不活的懒散样，长长的叹了口气……
However, the woman gave a long sigh while exuding that same languid attitude…
那妹子刚出门不到五分钟，就急急忙忙的回来了，“掌门，下午的时候，印家少主在城西跟人发生了冲突，还打起来了，听闻是遇到了追魂楼的人。”

Within five minutes, the Sister came back running through the door. "Sect Master, The Young Master of the Yin Family got into a scuffle with someone this afternoon. They got into a huge fight. I heard it's the people from the Soul Chasing Tower."
那威压只出现了一瞬，下一刻就已经收了回去，五位游仙中最中间的一位中年修士上前一步，扫视了在场的众人一圈。在羿清身上停了一下，眼里闪过一丝忌惮，这才出声道，“这位道友所言也不无道理，秘境凶险。机缘境遇确实全看个人造化，不存在出来后继续寻仇的道理。”至少明面上不行。

That suppressive aura only appeared for a while before it was immediately withdrawn. Of the five Traveling Immortals, the middle aged cultivator in the centre stepped forward and looked around at the people. His gaze stopped on Yi Qing, a tinge of fear flashing past his eyes, and he then said, "Fellow Daoist, what you said was not illogical. The encounters in the mystic realm are indeed dependent on each person's fate. There is no reason to seek revenge afterwards." At least not openly.
那巨兽一下没啃到，到是直接在地上咬出了个大坑，似是被惹怒了，眼睛睁得更大。抬头找了找，然后直勾勾的看向沈萤，瞬间把她当成了抢萝卜的敌人，身上的鳞片片片炸开，张开大嘴朝她威胁似的吼了一声。

The beast stood back upright, its mouth full of soil. The radish had managed to escape and the beast's mouth was filled with soil, while the ground had a huge hole where the beast bit into it. Outraged, it widened its eyes. Looking around, his gaze settled on Shen Ying. To the beast, Shen Ying was now an enemy who stole its food from right under its nose. The scales on its body began to flare, and it bore its teeth in an attempt to intimidate Shen Ying.
那座宅邸突然打开，一道人影从里面飞了出来，哐当一声，一把灵剑就插到了众人的后面，挡住了几人的退路。

The doors to the magnificent residence suddenly opened up as a figure came flying out. With a banging sound, a spirit sword pierced into the ground of the road behind the girls, blocking some of their escape routes.
那急切的样子，怎么看都有点……过度兴奋？像极了各门派里第一次御剑的小弟子。
That urgent look of hers seemed to be a little… overly excited? Appearing just like those young disciples when they were having their first experience of sword-riding.
那总管幽幽一笑，轻描淡写的说道：“这名画是从聚珍阁购得，花费十两紫金，我也不要你的多，原价赔偿就行！否则，嘿嘿……就算打死你们，我们也有地方说理去。”

The chief supervisor smiled faintly and, as though he was trying to play down the issue, said simply, "This artwork was purchased at Pearl Gathering Pavilion and cost some ten taels of purple gold. Look, I don't want much from you. All you need to do is to pay me back the original value of the artwork! Otherwise... hehe... even if we beat you two to death, we have the right of reason."
那把伴随他征战一生，号令天下的火龙剑！
This was the Fire Dragon Sword that had accompanied him in battle his entire life! A sword that reigned supreme!
那护卫一冲进来就看到三个拳影，自然本能的双手一架挡住面门，哪知江逸的真实拳身却是砸向他的左肩。
Upon seeing the three fist shadows the moment he burst in, the guard instinctively raised his arms to block the attack; however, Jiang Yi smashed his real fist towards his left shoulder.
那掌事到是客气，回了一礼，打量了两人一眼才道，“的确，我珠宝阁的鉴宝会，需要几名修为高强的护卫。不知道友是？”

The steward was courteous and he returned the gesture. After looking at them for a moment, he said, "That's right, my Treasure Pavilion is having a treasure evaluation event, which requires a few strong cultivators as guards. Fellow Daoist is…?"
那是一个穿着灰扑扑袍子的女子，双肩无力下搭，双眼无神还一拉一拉的往下掉，整个人都透着一股懒洋洋的气质，个子很矮又瘦，脸色还带着点腊黄。

It was a woman dressed in a gray robe. Her shoulders were slouched weakly and her spiritless eyes seemed to droop lowly. Her entire being seemed to effuse an aura of laziness. She had a short and skinny figure, and her face was a little sallow.
那是一名漂亮的小姐，年纪看起来只有十六七岁，五官长得比小奴还要精致几分，一袭淡黄色的长裙将她玲珑有致的娇躯包裹地严严实实，她坐在群花围绕地雅阁内静静的捧着一本书观看，旁边一杯热茶热气飘绕，更给人一种淡雅出尘的气质，就像一朵花中之王，让群花都失去了颜色般。

She was a beautiful young lady, who seemed like she was aged just sixteen or seventeen, with facial features that were more delicate than Xiaonu by several levels. Dressed in a light-yellow long dress that wrapped tightly around her delicate body, she sat in the elegent pavilion that was surrounded by flowers, quietly reading a book held in her hands with a cup of hot tea next to her that had hot vapour swirling above. She gave off an air of elegence and perfection, like a queen amongst flowers, completely overshadowing all the other flowers surrounding her.
那条蛟龙在空中游转了一圈，带着更加浓郁的黑气，突然朝下方俯冲了下来。一时间庞大的威压就从天际传了下来，易峰只觉得心口一痛，嘴里顿时传来一阵腥甜，体内的气息瞬间消散，脚下一颤，眼看着就要从空中摔下去。

The flood dragon turned several rouonds in the sky, carrying thick black Qi with it. Suddenly, it rushed down toward them. In moments, a strong suppressive force gushed toward the group. Yi Feng felt a sharp pain in his chest and tasted something weet in his mouth. The aura in his body suddenly dissipated and his legs gave way. He was falling down from the sky.
那柳长老瞪了江逸一眼，手中开始亮起红色元力单手附在丹炉侧壁上，不过他眸子一转，突然转头朝江逸招手道：“你，过来！给这炉丹药先回火，老夫去看看丹方。”

Elder Liu stared at Jiang Yi as the single hand he placed on the cauldron walls started glowing with red essence force. However, he shifted his pupils and turned his head towards Jiang Yi as he waved his hand, ordering, "You, get over here! Help me temper the flames of this cauldron of elixirs; I am going to check the elixir formula."
那洞极深，他们足足往下飞了两分钟，才落到了实地，四周一片漆黑，孤月扬手唤出一团火照明。这才看清，四周空荡荡的没有一物，一片寂静。可却并没有那狐妖的身影，明明妖气这么浓烈。

The pit was so deep that they had to fly down for two minutes before they reached the ground. It was pitch black down there. Lonemoon raised his hands to summon a fire. Now they could see that there was nothing around. The whole place was silent. Although the demonic aura was still prominent, there was no sign of the fox demon.
那游仙双手背在身后，一副大义凛然的样子，“此事还有许多不明之处，我等来此，只是想彻底查清。如果只是普通的一场机缘纷争，我等也不必大张其鼓的来此。”

That Traveling Immortal's hands were behind his back and he had a strong air of righteousness about him. "This matter has a lot of grey areas, which is why we are all here to get a better understanding of it. If it were only a normal fight of fate, we would have not come here with such great fanfare."
那游仙愣了一下，转头四下找寻了几遍，半会才将视线定在了羿清身边，一个举着手的女子身上，皱心顿时拧了拧。

The Traveling Immortal hesitated before he searched the ground below him. A few seconds passed before his eyes landed on the woman beside Yi Qing. Her hand was raised. His troubled heart suddenly fell quiet.
那游仙瞬间黑了脸，到是他旁边一人忍不住出声道，“你何必跟她废话这么多，反正这千叶草木灵不能落入轩辕家以外的人手里，她不给也得给！”

The Traveling Immortal's expression darkened immediately. Another Traveling Immortal beside him couldn't stop himself from interrupting, "Why do you bother talking to this woman? No matter what, nobody else but the Xuan Yuan Family can possess a Thousand Leaves Vegetation Spirit. She has no choice but to hand it over!"
那游仙脸色变了变，笑得更加的深道，“道友，这只千叶草木灵灵智不低，好好养护或许用不了多久就可以化形，恕我直言这世间除了我轩辕家，怕是无人护得住此等宝物。道友现在孑然一身，无门无派，又何苦再得罪一个世家。”

The Traveling Immortal's expression changed. His smile widened as he said, "Fellow Daoist, this Thousand Leaves Vegetation Spirit has quite a high sentience. With proper care and protection, it may manifest after a short while. Forgive me for being blunt — apart from my Xuan Yuan Family, I don't think anyone else has the capabilities to provide the proper care and protection for it. You, my fellow Daoist, are now on your own. You don't belong to any family or sect. Why would you want to offend an aristocratic family?"
那火龙大吼了一声，龙吟之声连着大地都颤动起来，火龙冲天而起，张开大嘴就朝着羿清飞了过去。
The inferno dragon roared loudly, causing the entire place to vibrate. It flew up into the air toward Yi Qing, opening its mouth wide.
那炼丹师脸上露出一丝失望之色，再次看了一下丹药，很快转身朝外走去，同时交代管事：“好好招待这位客人，我先去请示一下二小姐。”

That alchemist reveal a sliver of disappointment on his face. Looking at the elixirs once again, he quickly turned his body and walked out of the booth. At the same time, he instructed the manager by saying, "Entertain this customer well, I need to consult with Second Young Mistress for a moment."
那石峰升到半空，峰顶开始电闪雷呜，一道紫色的闪电破空而至，空中突然开始扭曲起来，不到半会峰顶出现了一个半透明宛如水镜一般的入口。隐隐还能看到里面的另一片天地，仙山渺渺灵气逼人，群山间灵气浓郁得惊人，隐隐还透出七彩雾光。

The peak continued to stand tall. Lightning and thunder started to come from the top of the peak. A purple flash of lightning shot through the sky as the surrounding air began to stir. Suddenly, a translucent entrance started to form on the peak. Peering in, one would just be able to make out that there was a plain on the other side. The beautiful spirit Qi was almost oppressive - it was surprisingly thick. There was also a hint of a rainbow fog light.
那砣金钢芭比是什么鬼？还我软萌的弟子啊喂！
What’s that iron barbie doing? Return me my gentle and cute disciple!
那管事接过令牌，脸上露出不出意料的神情，不过他并没有立即答应，反而低头沉吟起来。
The housekeeper received the token with a look of astonishment, yet he did not immediately respond; instead, he lowered his head and started muttering to himself.
那管事放声大笑，嘲弄的望着江逸道：“道理？你这侍女在我这做工，我可少了他一分银钱？她不好好做工？竟跑去内堂，毁掉了我们楼主在聚珍阁重金购买的一副名画。还有……你这小子不问青红皂白，冲进来就打伤我们风月楼的护卫！既然你要说道理，那要不我们去你们江家刑堂说去？哼哼……今日不给个说法，这事就算闹到哪去都没完。”

The housekeeper laughed aloud. He stared at Jiang Yi and replied sarcastically, "Justice? Your maidservant works for me. Have I ever not paid her a cent less? She did not do her work properly, you know? Not only did she brazenly run to the inner court, she even destroyed a famous painting that our Fengyue Brothel boss bought at an exorbitant price.
"On top of that... you, little brat, you did not bother finding out what happened, and just rushed in and attacked our guards here at Fengyue Brothel indiscriminately! Since you say you want to serve justice, then should we go over to your Jiang Clan Disciplinary Court to seek that justice? Hmph... if you can't give us an explanation or a solution, we will be at an impasse and the problem will not go away."
那管事满眸都是惊疑走前几步，目光在江逸身上打了几个转，开口问道：“迷幻步？幻影拳？缠丝手？你是江家的子弟？敢问是谁家的公子？江家的几位爷鄙人倒是略有耳闻。”

That housekeeper took several steps forward, his eyes giving a look of bewilderment. Taking several glances at Jiang Yi from top to bottom, he asked, "Psychedelic Step? Phantom Punch? Silk Hand? Are you a member of the Jiang Clan? Dare I ask, are you a young master, and which family do you belong? This humble servant has indeed heard of some of the young masters of the Jiang Clan."
那翊飞儿明显对江逸不感冒，等翊凌雪走了之后，淡淡的看着江逸一眼昂着头走进一个练功房内，在门口才漠然说道：“还不进来？”

Yi Fei-er was apparently uninterested in Jiang Yi. After Yi Lingxue's departure, she looked at Jiang Yi dispassionately and went into the Technique Practising Room with her head held up high. She stopped at the doors and said in an indifferent tone, "You are not coming inside?"
那莲上的众人愣了一下，杀另外两位尊者的居然是她！细一看那水镜，的确在青尹死前影像里发现羿清旁边站着的就是这名女子，一时间看她的眼神充满了警惕，关键他们居然探不出这女子的修为。

The crowd on the Lotus Flower hesitated. She was the one who killed the other two elders! They looked closer at the crystal and realised that just before Qing Yin died, this woman was standing next to him. Her eyes were filled with warning. What's worse was that they couldn't figure out her cultivation level.
那边江逸对着书册，仔细辨认，整整找了小半个时辰才找到柳长老所需的八九种药草，用一个小杆秤准确的秤好。

At the other corner of the building, Jiang Yi referenced the book and carefully identified the various medicinal herbs. It took an entire hour before he managed to find all nine medicinal herbs that Elder Liu requested. He used a small scale to accurately measure the right amount of each ingredient.
那铸鼎境界三重旁系子弟江如鹰立即朝前走了两步，蹲了一个马步，满脸嘲弄的伸手指着胯下道：“来吧！钻过去。”

That collateral descendant Jiang Ruying, with a power level at the third stage of the Cast Tripod Realm, immediately took two steps forward and squatted down in a horse stance position. With a look of desire to make fun of Jiang Yi, he pointed towards the bottom of his groin and said, "Come on! Crawl through it!"
那黑气似乎吓了一大跳，连忙原地转了一圈，开始在众弟子的招式下，上窜下跳起来。兴许是这内院太小，玄天宗来的弟子又多，人挤人的居然一时间让那妖给躲了过去。

Seemingly startled, the black Qi hurriedly turned around in a circle, and began to jump up and down in an attempt to fend off the attacks from the disciples. Perhaps this inner court yard was too small, and there were too many Blackheaven Sect disciples, but the demon actually managed to evade capture.
那黑色元力竟从蓝色元力内分离出来，突然和附近的丹药药力融合了……
That black essence force actually separated from the blue essence force and suddenly merged with the nearby elixir powers...
郁家家主一脸吃惊，用看神经病的眼神瞄了那两人一眼，这轩辕家莫不是疯了吧？但到底是别家的事，他又不好开口问，只能冷哼一声转过了头。

The Yu Family Patriarch was shocked, looking at the two men as if they were mad. Had the Xuan Yuan Family gone crazy? But it was none of his business after all, and it would not do for him to ask them about it, so he just snorted coldly and turned his head away.
郁家家主郁海珩没有回沈萤的话，像是完全没有把她看在眼里。
The Yu Family Family Master, Yu Hai Heng, ignored Shen Ying. He could not even be bothered to acknowledge her.
郁家经过这一回后，也彻底的龟缩起来，虽然底子厚，不至于就此倒掉，但少了游仙撑场子，在上青界的影响力终究不如以前。

The Yu Family kept a low profile after what had happened. They were low-key, but they weren't completely off the radar. Without any Traveling Immortals to their name, their influence in the Upper Azure World dwindled.
郁昊天还没反应过来，下一刻他只觉得眼前一花，咚的一声响，一头砸在了地上。
Before Yu Haotian could react he felt something flash before his eyes,and then there was a loud bang as his head hit the ground.
郁海珩以为无敌派其它弟子躲在里面，往里一看，却没发现任何身影，于是再次发了几道风刃道，“我到要看看，这偏殿中到底藏了什么，让你们……”

Yu Hai Heng thought that the other disciples of Invincible Sect were hiding inside, but he discovered that there was no one inside the Palace Wing. Once again, he summoned a few more wind blades and said, "I want to see what exactly you're hiding in this Palace Wing. I'll let you guys..."
郁海珩冷笑了一声，“没想到你们这两卑贱的炉鼎，居然还认得本尊。”
Yu Haiheng laughed coldly. "I didn't expect you two despicable human cauldrons to recognize a Supremacy."
郁海珩却以为他默认，眼神越加的轻视，突然扫到了什么，重重冷哼了一声，“你瞧那边，居然还有把凡人带上看台来的，以为这边是什么地方？随便什么人……”

However, Yu Haiheng took his silence for agreement. The expression in his eyes grew increasingly contemptuous. Having suddenly spotted something, he snorted coldly. "Look over there, there are actually people who bring mortals to the viewing platform. What do they think this place is? Any kind of people…"
郁海珩却笑得越加的阴沉了，仿佛在逗人玩似的，突然唤出一道人高的风刃，朝两人攻击了过去。思羽一惊，硬接是不行了，只能运起全身所有的灵气，一拳打在那风刃之上，却也只使它偏离了一点，擦着两人往左侧飞了过去。

Yu Hai Heng laughed manically, as if he was playing a game. Suddenly, he summoned a wind blade as tall as himself and threw it toward the two girls. Si Yu quickly recovered from her shock and summoned all the Spirit Qi in her body, punching it out toward the wind blade. However, the Spirit Qi only managed to slightly change the blade's trajectory. The two girls had no choice but to shun toward the left.
郁海珩只觉得从头到脚猛的一凉，那熟悉的语调，仿佛是从地狱钻出来一样。他甚至不敢动一下，明明什么都没有，他却感觉有什么铺天盖地的压了下来，一时间忘了怎么呼吸。

Yu Haiheng felt a cold shiver run down his spine, that familiar voice seemed to have come from the depths of hell. He didn't even dare to move, and although he was sure he saw nothing, he felt overcome by an overwhelming pressure, and for a moment he even forgot to breathe.
郁海珩完全不懂他的眼神暗示，冷哼一声，直接转头看向印风，“印家主也认为振祥之死，是咎由自取吗？”
Yu Hai Heng totally did not understand his signalling, he sneered and looked directly at Yin Feng, "Does Master Yin also thinks that Zhen Xiang deserves to die?"
郁海珩意识还没有回归，全身疼得已经快没知觉了，只觉得有什么正从身上急速流失，化神多年，这是他第一次知道，有人可以光凭拳头，就直接打散了他一身修为。再次对上眼前这张满是不耐的脸，心下升起的是满心的恐惧，这……真的只是修士吗？

Yu Haiheng had not yet regained his faculties. His whole body felt so painful that it had become numb. He could only feel something rapidly dissipating from his body. As someone who had been at the Soul Formation stage for many years, this was his first time learning that a person could undo a lifetime of cultivation just by using their fist. Now he was facing that very person again, and she was wearing a very impatient look on her face. Fear overwhelmed him. Was… she really only just a cultivator?
郁海珩眼睛越睁越大，一脸的不敢置信，不，这不可能，她怎么会在这里？不是接了挑战去塑方城了吗？明心宗费晔书明明说看到人了，为什么她会出现在这！

Yu Haiheng’s eyes grew as big as saucers, an expression of total disbelief on his face. No, it was impossible. How could she be here? Hadn't she accepted the challenge and gone to Northern City? [1. An ancient city, https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shuofang]. Bright Heart Sect's Fei Yueshu clearly said that he saw her, so how could she be here!
郁海珩脸色却彻底的黑了，再没什么好辩的。振祥的事郁家也接到了些风声的，现在翻出来只是找个借口打压无敌派，但如果真找到振祥的身体，元婴尸身不腐，一探经脉那什么都清楚了。

Yu Hai Heng's face went completely black with no argument to refute her. The Yu Family had already received some news with the matters regarding Zhen Xiang. They were only using it as an excuse to suppress the Invincible Sect, but if they were to find Zhen Xiang's body, and as a Nascent Soul's corpse does not rot, a check of the meridians would clear everything up.
郁海珩自那天晚上后，再没出现过，就连郁家也只说他失踪了。想起那个救走他们的人，他就忍不住有些担忧，有种莫名的预感，郁家绝对不会像轩辕家一样就这么怂了，没准正暗挫挫的憋个大招什么的，用不着多久，一定会找上门来。

Nobody saw Yu Hai Heng after that night. Even the Yu Family claimed that he was missing. Lonemoon felt uneasy just thinking about the people who saved Yu Hai Heng and the Traveling Immortals. Something in his gut told him that the Yu Family would not submit as easily as the Xuan Yuan Family did. Maybe they did have a big trick up their sleeves. Lonemoon expected them to turn up at their door soon.
郁海珩顿时只觉得元神都有种被撕裂的感觉，视线都开始模糊起来，什么萝卜？他根本就没有拿她什么萝卜啊喂？
Yu Haiheng suddenly felt as if his Primordial Spirit was being torn apart and even his vision was becoming blurry. What radish? But he really hadn't taken any radish from her?
郁海珩：“……”这轩辕禹是有病吧？
Yu Hai Heng: "..." This Xuan Yuanyu has some issue right?
郁红一喜，“那仙师可否现在就带我们回派中去。”见对方怀疑，立马又解释，“我们几个姐妹自半月前起就出发来上青城，路途遥远，所以想赶紧回到派中休整。”

Yu Hong was delighted. "Then, can Immortal Master bring us back to the sect now?" But sensing suspicion from the other party, she immediately explained again, "We have spent half a month traveling to Upper Azure Town. The journey has been long and tiring, so we would like to return to the sect to rest."
郁红一愣，回头看了众人一眼，才退了回去，“是！”
Yu Hong faltered for a moment before looking back at the girls and stepping back. "Yes!"
郁红一愣，看了身侧的沈萤一眼，“她……是我一位朋友，只是送送我们，不会随我们去中青界。”
Yu Hong hesitated. She glanced at Shen Ying who was standing beside her and said, "She's… my friend. She's just sending us off. She won't be coming with us to the Middle Azure World."
郁红一点头，扶住印元飞就往后退。
Yu Hong nodded and carrying Yin Yuanfei, started to back away.
郁红也想到了这点，看了沈萤一眼，一咬牙，直接捏了个定身诀朝她胸口拍了过去，“姑娘，得罪了。”说完示意众人御剑，直接带着沈萤一块御剑飞出了无敌派。

Yu Hong had thought of this too. She turned to look at Shen Ying and immediately produced an Immobilizing Seal. She slapped the seal onto Shen Ying's chest and said, "Miss, I'm sorry." She signalled for the other girls to draw their swords. Taking Shen Ying with them, they rode their swords out of the Invincible Sect.
郁红也是一惊，立马蹲下身一探他的经脉，却发现他金丹居然已经有崩碎的趋势，所以才昏迷不醒。
Yu Hong was also shocked. She immediately bent down to examine his meridians. She found that his Golden Core was about to disintegrate, which was why he was in a state of comatose.
郁红也是一脸的震惊，虽然知道小门派所在处，必然不会是什么好的地点，却从来没想过对方会直接把她们带来了妖界。

Yu Hong was also wearing a face of shock. Although they knew that the location of a small sect would not be pristine, they had never imagined that the other party would bring them straight to the Demon Realm.
郁红也确实负责，带着九个姐妹一起出了妖界。还特意分了九个不同的仙城方向，一人负责一个地方，不再仅限于上青城。不到半个月的功夫众人就带着招收到的弟子，浩浩荡荡的回来了。

Yu Hong was indeed responsible. She brought the other eight female cultivators out of the Demon Realm, and instructed them to head to different immortal towns. They were to recruit worthy disciples from these different towns - Invincible Sect was not limiting themselves to the Upper Azure Town. Within less than six months, the group proudly returned with new disciples.
郁红内心一阵激动，却又隐隐泛上些许担忧，喜的是这样强大的门派，必然可以护众人周全，忧的是若是派中人知道她们的身份，那么会不会……

Yu Hong felt a rush of excitement, but had a slight worry in her mind. She was delighted as such a huge sect had to be capable of protecting the safety of everyone in her group, but she was worried that if someone in the sect were to find out their identities, that would result in…
郁红却抬头看向旁边的沈萤，眼睛顿时就是一亮，轻轻的唤了一声，“掌门。”她张了张嘴角，似是想要露出个笑容让她放心，却掀动脸上的伤口，瞬间一滴鲜血就顺着脸侧滑了下来。

Yu Hong raised her head towards Shen Ying at the side, as her eyes lit up, she softly called out, "Sect Master." She opened her mouth try to show a smile to not let her worry but the wounds on her face immediately began to bleed.
郁红却浑身冰凉，仿佛有丝丝寒气从骨缝里渗出来，就连在场的其它妹子也连连后退了几步，仿佛抑制不住似的微颤着。

However, Yu Hong's body became ice-cold as if a cold aura seeped out of her bone fissures, and even all of the other girls present took a couple of steps back like they could not endure the atmosphere, shivering.
郁红却突然匆忙走了进来，递过来一只白色的纸鹤，“掌门，我刚刚在前殿发现了这个。”
Yu Hong suddenly hurried in and handed a white paper crane to her. "Sect Master, I just found this in the front hall."
郁红只觉得巨大的威压铺天盖地而来，一咬牙直接就引动了体内的金丹，拼着自暴也要给身后的众人争取逃跑的时候。

Yu Hong could only feel an immense suppressive aura overwhelming her as she gritted her teeth and immediately activated the Golden Core inside of her—even if she were to blow up, she wanted to fight for more time to allow the rest to escape.
郁红和思羽心底顿时一沉，警剔看向眼前的人，“你们怎么会在这里？”
Yu Hong and Si Yu’s hearts sank. Raising their guard, they looked at the people in front of them. "Why are you here?"
郁红她们毕竟修为低，这印天城又是别人的地盘，还是回去妖界保险些。
Yu Hong's and the other sister's cultivation levels were still low afterall, and Yin Tian Town was someone else's territory. It would be much safer for them to return to the Demon Realm.
郁红心下一紧，这是试探她们吗？这么大一个仙门，哪能容新入门的弟子乱闯，莫非她已经起疑了？

Yu Hong's heart contracted as she wondered: were they being tested? How could such a huge immortal sect allow the new disciples to barge in anywhere. Could the sect master already be suspicious of them?
郁红抓着沈萤，带着众人一路飞出了妖界。原本她还有点担心会遇上高阶妖类，也不知道是不是她们幸运，这一路来居然没有正面遇到半只妖，就连偶尔看到一两只的身影，也转身往别的方向走了，意外顺畅的避开了。

Yu Hong grabbed Shen Ying and led the rest of the girls to fly out of the Demon Realm. She was initially worried that they would encounter a powerful demon, but they must have been lucky as they had already travelled half of the journey and they had not come across a single demon. They did see a couple of shadows, but those shadows had headed in the opposite direction from them. Surprisingly, their journey had been really smooth.
郁红抓着身侧人的手紧了紧，连忙摇了摇头，压低声音道，“见机行事。”
Yu Hong grabbed the hand of the person beside her and squeezed it, then shook her head and said in a low volume, "Watch and wait to see what happens."
郁红摇了摇头，“羿长老还未回来。”
Yu Hong shook her head, "Elder Yi hasn't returned."\
郁红有些犹豫，回头看了看众人，还是跟了上去，“有劳道友。”
Yu Hong hesitated. She turned around to look at the other girls and then decided to follow him. "Thank you, Fellow Daoist."
郁红深吸了一口气，带着同样面露喜色的姐妹们，小心翼翼的跟在了那人身后。一路穿过了好几条的街道，却不知为何，越走周围越加的热闹，男子并非带她们去到什么隐蔽的场所，反而来到了城中更加繁华的地界，最后停在了一座华美的宅邸前。

Yu Hong took a deep breath. She appeared as delighted as the other girls were as she carefully followed behind the man leading them. They went through several streets but somehow, the more they walked, the more crowded their surroundings became. The man did not bring them to some secluded area, but instead brought them to the town's more prosperous region before finally stopping before a magnificent residence.
郁红点了点头。
Yu Hong noddd.
郁红点了点头，她自然看得出，印元飞身上的伤是灵力所致，伤他的一定是个修士，连忙交待思羽道，“师妹，你先用灵气护住他的心脉，我去后山采株织灵草！”

Yu Hong nodded. She naturally saw that the injuries on Yin Yuanfei were caused by spiritual power. It must have been a cultivator who injured him. She quickly instructed to Si Yudao. "Junior Sister, protect his heart meridians with Spirit Qi first. I'm going to the back of the mountain to pick some Weaved Rhizomed Spirit Grass!"
郁红疑惑的看了看两只八阶兔妖，抱拳道，“两位兔兄，不知道深夜前来所为何事？”
Looking at the two eighth-level rabbit demons with a puzzled expression, Yu Hong greeted them with cupped fists, "Brother Rabbits, may I know what brings you here this late in the night?"
郁红神情变了变，立马又恢复上前一步道，“禀仙师，我等只是学过一些粗浅的引气入体的仙法。我是火木灵根，只修习过春华诀，至于其它的姐妹……”

Yu Hong's expression changed but returned back to normal again. She stepped forward and said, "Reporting to Immortal Master, we have only roughly learned a bit of the immortal Dharma of drawing aura into our body. I possess a Spirit Root of fire and wood and have only learned the Springbloom Art. As for the rest of the girls…"
郁红脸上闪过一丝惊讶，看向他们的眼神，隐隐有些失落。回头跟后面的妹子们交换了一个眼神，咬了咬牙似是决定了什么，九人齐齐深吸了一口气，突然朝着他们就跪了下去。

Yu Hong was clearly surprised. After a moment, her face fell. She turned around to exchange looks with the girls behind her. Then, she gritted her teeth, as if she had decided on something. The nine of them breathed in simultaneously before they knelt in front of Shen Ying.
郁红身后的众妹子，也纷纷朝着她拜了下去，齐齐出声道，“但请掌门吩咐。”
The girls behind Yu Hong also knelt down and said in unison, "Awaiting Sect Master's orders."
郁红这才站了出来，看了她一眼道，“掌门，昨晚郁家家主带着十几个化神修士闯上山，我们打了起来，所以这里才……”

Yu Hong stood up and looked at her. "Sect Master, last night, the Yu Family Patriarch led a group of Soul Formation cultivators up the mountain and broke into our sect. We got into a fight so that is why..."
郁红领会，立马上前一步带路，“两位请。”
Yu Hong understood and began to walk ahead of the guests, motioning for them to follow her, "This way, please."
Yu Hong: "..."
都招了，为什么还要打啊？还排成队是什么鬼？救命啊！
He already said he would speak; why were they still hitting him? What's wrong with these people? Help!
都是TM沈萤害的！再说干嘛让他发落，你丫干嘛不去问那个吃货啊？
It’s all that f**king Shen Ying's fault! Besides, why ask me to pass judgment? Why don't you ask that foodie?
钱万贯拍了拍胸脯道：“你放心，我们钱家的子弟最懂的就是做生意，要做生意首先得学会看人。在我看来大哥你绝非池中物，你这人情值得我全力投资，这可是一本万利的事情。”

Qian Wanguan struck his chest in assurance," Rest assured, doing business is the forte of us, descendants of The Qian Family. The first step to doing business is to have a good eye. To me, you are not just any Tom, Dick and Harry, and I will do my best in this high-profit returns investment."
门口的掌柜笑着快步走了出来，“三位客……”话还没说完，三人已经消失在了天际。
The shop owner by the door quickly walked over with a smile. "Our three…" But before he could finish, they had already disappeared into the horizon.
门派大比终于迎来了决赛，比起第一天来，这次来观赛的人更多。就连四大家族都来齐了，包括东道主的印家。

Finally, they had come to the finals of the competition amongst the sects. There were far more spectators compared to the first day. Even the four aristocratic families were present including the host, the Yin Family.
门派大比结束后，孤月仿佛找到了人生的新目标，硬拖着在印天城多呆了几天，整天也不知道在忙些什么，大早就不见了人影，天黑才会回来。已经很久没有用生活费威胁过某人了。

Since the competiton amongst the sects ended, Lonemoon seemed to have found his new life goal. He made everybody stay for a few more days in Yin Tian Town. Each day, he went out early in the morning and came back late at night. Yet, nobody knew what he was up to. It had been a long time since he threatened Shen Ying with her allowance.
闭关了整整三个多月的羿清终于睁开了眼睛，察觉到四周不同以往的灵气，立即反应过来，连忙引气入体。只见那些金色灵气，一点点的没入他的体内。直到完全容纳，无敌派上空的异象这才消失。

Yi Qing secluded himself for a total of over three months. Suddenly, he opened his eyes. The first thing he felt was that the Spirit Qi around him was different from before. He immediately reacted by sucking the Qi into his body. The golden spirit Qi flowed into his body until they were all gone. Only then did the Invincible Sect's appearance return to normal.
队伍走得很快，不到片刻他们就到了最前面。沈萤这才看清，中间的地上，有着一个发光的图案，有些像是某些动画里的魔法阵，四周立着四根石柱，上面写着都是一些不认识的文字。人只要一走向那个图里，就消失了。

The queue moved very quickly, and within a short period of time they were at the very front of the line. Shen Ying finally had a clear view — there were glowing patterns in the center of the transportation area, some of which looked like the magic arrays that could be seen in cartoons. Surrounding them were four stone pillars that were inscribed with incomprehensible words. Once someone walked towards that pattern, they would disappear.
阿黑是什么鬼？她遇到的其它魔族吗？这明显是被她恐吓了，才故意把他供出来，想借刀杀人吧？要让他知道是哪个魔族把这煞星引来魔王殿，他一定会不会放过他。

What the heck are 'Blackies'? She met other members of Demon? They obviously confessed his name because they were threatened by her. Trying to kill with a borrowed knife? Should he know which Demon led this malefic to the Demon King Palace, he will not be let off easily.
陆修士一愣，师父？什么师父？他下意识的回头找了找，半会才在身后看到一个灰衣袍的女子，吓了一跳。
Surprised and confused, Cultivator Lu thought, Master? What Master? He subconsciously turned around to look and only then did he see a girl in grey robes, giving him a scare.
陆修士一抖，条件反射的往羿清背后躲了躲，“不……不远，前面就出竹林了，不用一刻钟便到。”
Cultivator Lu shivered, hiding himself behind Yi Qing. "Not far… not far, the bamboo forest is just ahead, we will reach there in a quarter of an hour."
陆修士吓了一跳，手里一个不稳，刚刚还捧着的盒子就掉了下去，直接被那些疯长的荆棘给卷了进去。
Cultivator Lu was taken aback. He lost his grip and dropped the box in his hands, right into the crazy thistles as they coiled back into the ground.
陆修士猛的一颤，好……好可怕！居然可以把鬼王当锤子轮。这样的人真的只是修士吗？
Cultivator Lu gave a great shudder. How… how terrible! She actually threw the Ghost King like a hammer wheel. Could such a person be just a cultivator?
陆修士赶紧照做，一边布起一个简单防御阵法，一边提醒旁边的女子，“道友快进阵法，阴气非同小可。”

Cultivator Lu hurriedly did as he was told. As he set up a simple defense array formation, he warned the girl beside him, "Fellow Daoist, get into the array formation quickly, Yin Qi can cause a great deal of harm."
陆家在方圆百里也算是数得出名号的家族，只是距顺于城还有段距离。加上出城后，要经过一片竹林，林深叶茂且多瘴气，不适合御剑而行。他此次拍的又是难得的四阶法器，对这样的重要客户，珍宝阁自然请最好的人护送，以防有人杀人夺宝。

The Lu family was considered a reputable family clan in the area, but was a distance away from Shunyu City. In addition to leaving the city, they needed to pass through a thick bamboo forest which was dense with miasma, making it unsuitable to travel through by sword-riding. The item he had bidded for was a rare stage four Dharma artifact, which was why the Treasure Pavilion had to arrange for the best escort it could to protect such an important customer in case somebody tried to kill him and steal the artifact.
院中的人一愣，见是她，立马抱拳道，“在下羿清。”
The person in the yard was taken aback at first, but seeing it was her, immediately clasped his fists in salutation, "I'm Yi Qing."
除了可食用的，沈萤记得的灵兽不多，但却没有任何一只，像这一只白得那么纯粹，就连地上的灵石比不上它的皮毛，额头更长着一根晶莹剔透的长角。

Shen Ying didn't remember many beasts aside from the ones that could be eaten. She did not remember seeing a beast that white , so that even the spirit stones on the ground could not compare with its fur. Its forehead was as long and clear as a crystal horn.
除了她们几人外，易家家主易峰也在，却是孤身一人前来，身边空荡荡的。
Apart from the few of them, the Family Master from the Yi Family, Yi Feng, was also present. He was alone and the seats around him were empty.
除了沈萤……她还是个看起来弱鸡的BUG。
Except for Shen Ying... She was still the same old chicken-like cheat.
除非……
Unless...
随着“喝！”的一声，一拳击出。原本坚硬的山壁轰隆隆的散了一地的碎石，扬起丈高的尘土，倾刻间扑了他们一脸。

Following a "He!" sound, a punch came straight out. The mountain that was originally solid hard, scattered a load of rocks all over the ground and raise the soil to about ten feet high, which instantly landed on their faces.
随着飞剑一起的还有青尹，咚的一声砸到了地上，刚刚还不可一世的人，如今已经浑身是血受伤严重，眼看着下一波灵剑就要往他身上刺去。

Along with the flying swords came Qing Yin, smashing onto the ground with a loud thud. This person had previously shown insufferable arrogance was currently covered in blood and riddled with wounds all over, and the next barrage of spirit swords was about to slash through him.
隐世仙门！这个无敌派绝对是隐世的大仙门。
A hidden immortal sect! This Invincible Sect was absolutely an amazing hidden immortal sect.
隐隐听到啥画面破碎的声音。
Faintly, they heard sounds of that perfect image cracking.
隐隐有光亮起，却又突然暗了一下，“哼！你以为这还是在仙界，我只能任你处置吗？这里魔气充足，你是不是我对手还不一定呢！”

There were some faint light, but it dimmed down quickly. "Hmph! You still thinks this is the Immortal Realm where I'm wrapped around your fingers? There are more than sufficient Demonic Qi here, and you might not necessarily gain the upper hand!"
隔壁桌的沈萤：“……”
Shen Ying sat in silence at the adjacent table.
难得见她正经的样子，他下意识抬头，顺着她的眼光看了过去，却只看到一片蔚蓝的天空，“你看到啥了？”
She hardly ever looked this serious. He subconsciously followed her gaze and saw the blue skies above. "What do you see?"
难怪这三个月来，所有出妖界的妖，没一只回来的。有这样厉害的人物在，就算想灭掉妖族，也只是一两个时辰的问题。
It was no wonder not a single demon who left the Demon Realm in the past three months returned. Such a powerful figure could destroy every demon within a couple of hours.
难怪这丹药里，会有这么重的怨气。生前被人采补，临死还要被练成丹药。

No wonder there was such a heavy aura of grievance contained in this elixir. The unfortunate soul was harvested while he was still alive, and even after death, his body was still used for refining pills.
难怪这人有点眼熟，原来是刚那家店的掌柜。
It was no wonder this person looked familiar—he was the owner of the restaurant they ate at earlier.
难道……
Could it be…
难道只有他一个人不知道怎么回事吗？这是要上哪去啊喂？为什么没人解释一下？沈萤跟那魔修又是什么关系？还有什么叫东西齐了？到底谁是你的东西啊喂！

Was he the only one who did not know what was happening? Where were they heading to? Why was no one explaining it? What was the relationship between Shen Ying and that fiendish cultivator? And what did it mean by all the items were set? Who exactly are your items!
雷云消尽，空中顿时落下灵雨，全数滴在了受劫之人身上，思羽妹子身上才开始生肌长肉，慢慢恢复成了个人样。只是仍旧没有爬起来的力气。

After the thunder clouds dissipated, the sky began to shower down spirit rain which all fell upon the person who had taken the tribulation. Sister Si Yu's body began to grow flesh and muscles then gradually regained a human look, but she was still too weak to get up.
需要灵兽的不是他吗？
Wasn't he the one who needed spirit beasts?
霸王餐三人组：“……”奸商！
The group of three accused of said dine and dash crime: "…" Unscrupulous merchant!
霸王餐？！刚刚？
A free meal? Just now?
青亦也是一愣，眼里却不是担忧，而是满眼兴奋的看了看四周，目光瞬间定在了大殿前方，那个醒目的两个大字之上：丹宗。
Qing Yi also paused. His gaze was not filled with worry but excitement as he looked around him, and then he set his eyes on the hall ahead with those two prominent words: Alchemical Sect.
青亦回头看了一眼，冷哼一声，却没有退开，“没时间跟你们纠缠！”他突然转手朝着身边人的背后击出一掌，直接把青尹给推了出去，迎上两人全力的一击。
Qing Yi looked back and sneered without backing off, "I have no time for this!" He suddenly turned his palm and hit the back of the person beside him, pushing Qing Yin out to block off their attack.
青亦没有回答，反而冷眼扫过追进来的两人一眼，眼神停在了羿清身上，“没想到一个元婴修士，居然会有这般实力，到是我大意了。”

Qing Yi did not respond. Instead he looked coldly over at the two people who were chasing from behind, and his eyes stopped on Yi Qing. "Never did I expect a Nascent Soul cultivator to have such capabilities. I was careless."
青亦的法诀再次变换，火海中顿时生出一条火龙，比起之前的来，这条大了数倍有余，整身火焰赤红如血，仿佛要将天空都点燃一般，四下顿时一片红光。

Qing Yi changed his tactic once again. Out of the sea of fire came an inferno dragon, which was several times bigger than the ones before. Its flames looked red as blood and appeared as if it could light the entire sky on fire. The whole surroundings were suddenly illuminated under its red light.
青亦身后已经出现好几条火龙，似是活过来一样，咆哮着朝羿清扑了过去，而羿清周围全是一把把灵剑，剑气冲天。转瞬化成剑雨一次又一次攻散那些火龙，砍出满天火雨。

Qing Yi already had several inferno dragons following close behind him. They flew toward Yi Qing, who was surrounded by spirit swords. His Sword Qi was surging. At once, the spirit swords all flew toward the inferno dragons, cutting them up and causing a rain of fire.
Qing Yi: "..."
青尹一惊，被逼得直接退了一步，没想到旁边这人明明只是化神初期，却可以截住他的威压。正要反击，中间一直没出声的人，却突然上前一步，瞬间比刚刚还大的庞大威压反扑了回来。

Taken aback, Qing Yin was pushed to the point where he needed to retreat a step; never had he imagined that this person who was only in the early-stage Soul Formation level would be able to intercept his suppression. He was about to retaliate, when the silent person in the middle of their group suddenly stepped forward, and an opposing suppression of much greater force was immediately felt.
青尹似是想到了什么，嘴角掀起一个恶意的笑容，“也是，反正那秘境最少也要到达元婴修为的修士才能进去。其它门派要进去也随便，凡是上古境皆是凶兽遍地，单看你们舍得几个。”

Qing Yin broke out into a devilish grin as a thought sprung into his mind. "In any case, only Nascent Soul stage cultivators would be able to enter the mystic realm. Cultivators from other sects may enter if they please. Formidable beasts are lurking everywhere within the Ancient Realm. We'll just see how many cultivators you're willing to lose."
青岚下意识的想退，用力一收手，却发现收……收不回来！抓住他的那只手宛如生了根一般。连连单手结印，捏了几个法诀打过去，却发现一点作用都没有，被抓的手仍是纹丝不动。

Qing Lan subconsciously wanted to retreat. He moved to retract his outstretched hand. That was when he realised… he couldn't retract it! He felt like his hand was rooted in place. Using a single hand, he made to cast a Dharma spell. However, it was of no use. He still couldn't move his captured hand.
青岚做为游仙，压根没有把还是元婴的羿清看在眼里，于是随着青尹一起直接朝着修为最高的孤月冲去。
Qing Lan was a Travelling Immortal. Yi Qing amounted to nothing in his eyes. He paired up with Qing Yin to fight the most powerful of the three — Lonemoon.
青岚只觉得耳边唰啦啦的一阵风响，整个人像离弦的箭一般直直的朝后方仙宫的方向飞了出去。轰隆一声把仙宫的门砸了个大洞，这才停了下来，滚落在满地的碎石之中，再爬不起来。

All Qing Lan could hear was the air as it whooshed past his ears. His entire body flew, just like an arrow that had been launched from a bow. He flew in the direction of the Immortal Pavilion behind him. Before he knew it, he had flown through the doors of the Immortal Pavilion, making a gigantic hole in it. The impact stopped him. He fell to the floor and rolled atop a pile of gravel. He couldn't get up.
靠！
Damn!
靠！居然又是一个体修，这到底是什么鬼地方。
Shit! She's also a body cultivator. What kind of shithole is this?
靠，这也可以！
Holy shit, how is this possible?!
顺手就把花给了旁边的人，“沈萤，用你的外挂之眼看看。”
He handed the flower over to Shen Ying, "Shen Ying, use your cheater eyes to take a look."
须臾。
After a moment...
顿时大地轰隆一声巨响，青亦只觉得一道仿佛连接天地的白光擦着他的剑滑过，火龙瞬间消失，脚下的实地突然猛的往下一落，转头一看……整个仙宫秘境切成了两半！！！

In seconds, the earth rumbled beneath them. Qing Yi saw a ray of blinding light that seemed to span from the earth and all the way to heaven. The ray of light brushed past his sword. Suddenly, the Inferno Dragon disappeared, and the earth beneath his feet began to fall inward. Turning around, he saw… the entire Immortal Pavilion mystic realm had split into two!!!
顿时有种被整个世界排除在外的憋屈感。
She felt the sudden grievances for being excluded from the world.
顿时满心的绝望，完了！
All at once, Feng Ying lost all hope. This was the end!
飞了一天的三人，停下休息。
After flying for a day, the three of them stopped to take a break.
高深个鬼啊！喂喂喂，你拿笔是什么意思！这TM就是个段子好吗？羿清你个师父吹能不能不要强行捧场啊喂！
Profound your head! Hey, what are you holding a pen for! This is a freaking joke alright? Yi Qing, can you not forcefully support your Master's bluff?!
鬼信啊，这萝卜明显是故意的！还有牛尊者是什么鬼？！
Nonsense, the radish is doing this on purpose! And what the heck is Supremacy Niu supposed to mean?
鬼王再次吼了一声，整个身影都有些急躁的动了动，似是想把爪子抽出来，努力了半天，对方抓爪的手，却纹丝不动。
The Ghost King roared again, his whole figure shaking in exasperation, as if trying to withdraw its claws. Although he tried long and hard, his claws hardly moved an inch.
鬼王双膝跪地，那双尖锐的利爪规矩的压在双腿上，跪得那叫一个端正。巨大的头扣着，血红的大眼里，两串不明液体正哗啦啦的往外流，声音到没了。那排可以碎魂的巨大尖牙，正死死的咬着下嘴唇，一脸想哭又不敢哭的怂包样。

The Ghost King was on both its knees, its sharp claws laid properly on its legs, in the most proper posture it could manage. Two streams of unknown liquid were leaking from the large, bloodshot eyes on its large face, but on the other hand the sound was now gone. Its sharp, jagged teeth capable of crushing souls were biting on its bottom lip, and it was wearing a pathetic look that seemed as if it wanted to cry but dared not.
鬼王只有养幡人可以驱使，那魔修就是被反噬而死的。也就是说，这是一只无主，只知道杀戮的鬼王！
Only a Gonfalon Nurturer could control the Ghost King, but the fiendish cultivator had died from self-implosion, which meant that this Ghost King had no owner. It existed only to kill and massacre.
鬼王已经彻底叫不出声，沈萤才终于停下了这场单方面的殴打，因为……她又睡着了。
The Ghost King had already lost the strength to even groan. Shen Ying finally stopped this one-sided thrashing match, because... she had fallen asleep again。
鬼王躁动得更加厉害，再次急吼了一声。
The Ghost King became even more agitated. He roared again.
鬼王都顿了一下，半会似被惹恼了，于是一声更大的吼声发出，同时四道黑色的似是利爪一样的东西，从黑影直射而出无限伸长，速度极快，电光一样直射向场中唯一一个站立的人。
The Ghost King paused, then seemingly provoked, let out an even louder roar. Four black claw-like shapes extended from the shadows, shooting like a laser beam towards the only person standing.
魔修愣愣的低下头，看着那颗鲜活跳动的心脏，似是还没反应过来，下一刻那手爪却是一紧，直接捏爆了那颗血淋淋的心。

Shocked, the fiendish cultivator looked down at the fresh and still-beating heart, and he did not seem to be able to react. The next moment, the claw tightened its grip, causing the bloody heart to burst.
魔修慌了，拼命想突破剑阵却完全没有作用，脸色已经惨白得没有一丝血气，惊恐的看着飞近的羿清，连忙把手里的法器扔了出去，“给……给你！我不要了。反正你们也没事，饶了我吧，我只是一时鬼迷心窍，下次再也不敢了。求求你！”

The fiendish cultivator panicked; he struggled to try and break the sword array but to no avail, and his face was so pale that there was no sign of blood on it. Panic-stricken at the sight of Yi Qing flying nearer to him, he quickly threw the Dharma artifact over. "Here… Here you go! I don't want it. Since all of you are alright, how about you let me go. I was only momentarily blinded by greed, it won't happen again, please I am begging you!"
魔军：为什么打我，我只是站岗的？
Demonic soldier," Why was I attacked when I just stood guard?"
魔将：为什么打我，我只是来上班的？
Demonic General,"Why was I attacked when I was simply here for duty?"
魔气最浓郁，万魔汇聚的魔王殿，一片清明，满城魔骨。此时所有牺牲的魔族心中只有一个疑问。
Demon King Palace, with the miasma of Demonic Qi, where all demons gather, became a house of corpse. At this moment, all those who sacrificed only had one question。
魔气！为什么无敌派会突然出现这么多魔气？！
Demonic Qi! Why would there be so much Demonic Qi here out of a sudden?!
魔王一听，不用沈萤开口，立马放了一丝魔气过去，压制住了宁子安体内的魔种。果然不到一会，他脸上的魔痕褪去，又变回那个清秀的小朋友。终于有了点以前那个乖巧小孩的样子，只是眼里多了一丝与年纪不符的成熟。

The Devil King did not need to wait for Shen Ying to speak and let out a string of demonic aura, repressing the Demon Seed within Ning. Sure enough, the devil scar on his face faded in no time and he transformed back into the delicate-looking little child. He was finally back to the obedient-looking child, with the exception of the sense of maturity in his eyes.
魔王一惊，“魔界之门开了吗？”
Shocked, the Demon King said，“The Door of Demon Realm was opened？”
魔王内心一阵激动，转头看了看身边的女子，顿时心头像被浇了盆冷水，嗞的一下又灭了。
A gush of emotions filled the Devil King. However, when the Devil King turned his head to look at the girl beside him, he instantly felt like he'd hit a brick wall.
魔王只是轻轻一扫地上的小孩，就明白了他的情况，为免大仙以为他敷衍了事，特意伸手点在对方的额心，扫了一丝神念进去。

The Devil King merely scanned the child on the floor, but already understood the situation. In order to avoid being misunderstood by the Great Immortal and labeled as perfunctory, the Devil King extended his hands on purpose and laid it on the child's forehead, transferring a strand of Divine wisdom along with it.
魔王吓得一抖，声音立马就低了下去，“这……这个我也不清楚，魔种的产生有很多种原因。况且这人魂体的魔种是降生就在的，已经无法考证了。”

The Devil King was scared stiff and immediately lowered his voice," This... well I'm not too sure either. The production of the Demon seed can be caused by multiple factors. Besides, the Demon Seed in the Human Soul came along with the Human Soul and this cannot be tested and proven anymore. "
魔王没有废话，直接捏了个诀。宁子安脸色一变，几乎是立马转身就想跑，可刚走出几步，却一脸痛苦的蹲下身去。整个身子卷缩成一团，全身黑气缭绕，有什么正从他身上飘浮出来。

The Devil King did not hesitate before he started working on his demonic magic. Ning Zi An's face quickly changed, and ran almost in an instant. However, within a few steps, he kneeled on the ground in pain. He huddled himself into a ball and was surrounded by a dark, mystic magic. Something. Something was coming out of him.
魔王直接上前一步，朝他伸手一抓，直接把一团什么东西，从他身上拔了出来。不到半会他手上就多了一团黑中带着点红的东西。
The Devil King went straight up to him and pulled out an unknown mass from his body. It was not long before there was another lump of reddish-black mass on his hand.
Demon King：“……”
魔界。
Demon Realm。
魔界之门！
The Door of the Demon Realm!
Demon seed, "..."
魔种：“……”说好的相信他呢！
Devil Seed,"..." After all, he'd already made a promise with the Great Immortal!
魔蛟顿时一声惨叫，痛得在沙滩上翻滚了起来。身上残余的黑色魔气慢慢消散，身上的皮肉也开始片片绽开，鲜血淋淋。像是脱皮似的，身形小了整整一大圈，身上新生血肉也开始慢慢覆盖上一层青色的鳞片。

The demonic wyrm let out a piercing scream and began to write around oon the sand. The black demonic Qi around its body began to dissipate and its skin began to split and flake, revealing fresh blood underneath it, as if it were shedding. It greatly reduced in size, but new skin began to grow atop its exposed flash. Green scales began to form all over its body.
The Demonic Wyrm: "..."
魔蛟：麻麻，我想回家！
Demonic Wyrm: Mama, I want to go home!
鸡都能留下，你丫留个字条会死啊！
Since you could leave a chicken, couldn't you just leave a note!?
鹰王点了点头，似是回想到了什么，身上的羽毛都抖了抖，“我听说，那些出界的妖族，个个死得尸骨无存，还有被扒皮烹尸的，林中的老愧树上，都有被风干的尸首。下手如此残忍……禽兽不如。”

The Eagle Monarch nodded, seeming as if having recalled something. It shook its feathers and said, "I heard that the demons who traversed out of the Demon Realm were left without bodies. They were even mercilessly slaughtered, skinned, and cooked. There were corpses that were left to dry on the ancient Pagoda Tree in the forest. Such ruthless means… make them truly worse than a beast!"
黑气落地成形，十几丈高，青面獠牙，血盆大口，斗大的血红眼珠，仿佛可以吸人魂魄，看起来甚为恐怖。

The black gas landed and showed its form. A hundred feet tall. Green face with jagged teeth. Fierce-looking, bloody mouth. Large, bulging, bloodshot eyeballs, as if they could devour the soul of a human — it would have looked extremely terrifying.
默默瞪了某个只顾着扒饭的人一眼，这才大步走了进去，跟另一边的薄仪打了声招呼，顺手把一蓝子的葱送进厨房。
Silently glaring at one of them who only cared about eating the grilled rice, Lonemoon walked over and greeted Pu Yi, before casually bringing the basket of shallots into the kitchen.
